Original Text: 9 hurt in blast at Indonesian Embassy PARIS -- An explosion struck the Indonesian Embassy in Paris today, slightly injuring nine people, a French radio station reported.
Translation: 9 heridos en explosión en la Embajada de Indonesia PARÍS -- Una explosión golpeó la Embajada de Indonesia en París hoy, hiriendo levemente a nueve personas, según informó una estación de radio francesa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Indonesian Embassy in Paris was struck by an explosion today, leading to minor injuries for nine individuals, as reported by a French radio station.

Original Text: Indonesia Pursues Two Terror Suspects (AP) AP - Indonesian police pursued a manhunt Sunday for two of Southeast Asia's most wanted terrorism suspects while warning of the danger of more suicide attacks on Western interests in the wake of a lethal bombing outside the Australian Embassy.
Translation: Indonesia Persigue a Dos Sospechosos de Terrorismo (AP) AP - La policía indonesia llevó a cabo una cacería humana el domingo para dos de los sospechosos de terrorismo más buscados del sudeste de Asia, mientras advertía sobre el peligro de más ataques suicidas contra intereses occidentales después de un letal atentado fuera de la Embajada Australiana.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Indonesian law enforcement initiated a manhunt on Sunday for two highly sought-after terror suspects in Southeast Asia, amid warnings about potential additional suicide attacks on Western targets following a deadly bombing near the Australian Embassy.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) Sunday saw Indonesian law enforcement in hot pursuit of two top Southeast Asian terror suspects. Alongside this, they cautioned about the increasing threat of more suicide bombings aimed at Western interests, subsequent to a fatal blast that took place near the Australian Embassy.

Original Text: Iran rejects call to stop atomic research Iran has rejected a UN resolution calling on the country to freeze uranium enrichment activities. It has also threatened to stop snap checks of its atomic facilities if Iran #39;s case is referred to the UN Security Council.
Translation: Irán rechaza la llamada para detener la investigación atómica. Irán ha rechazado una resolución de la ONU que pide al país congelar las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio. También ha amenazado con detener las inspecciones instantáneas de sus instalaciones atómicas si el caso de Irán es remitido al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Iran has declined a United Nations resolution urging the nation to halt uranium enrichment activity, and have conveyed threats of ending abrupt inspections of its nuclear facilities if its case is forwarded to the UN Security Council.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Iran has turned down a request based on a UN resolution to cease uranium enrichment actions. If its case is elevated to the UN Security Council, it threatened to terminate impromptu examinations of its nuclear installations.

Original Text: Hernndez #39;s Shoulder Worries Yanks he Yankees #39; game against the Minnesota Twins was rained out last night, but Orlando Hernndez, the Yankees #39; scheduled starter, would not have pitched anyway.
Translation: La preocupación de los Yankees por el hombro de Hernández. El partido de los Yankees contra los Minnesota Twins fue cancelado ayer debido a la lluvia, pero de todas formas, Orlando Hernández, el lanzador programado de los Yankees, no habría jugado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite their game against the Minnesota Twins being cancelled due to rain last night, the Yankees would not have had Orlando Hernández as their scheduled starter due to concerns about his shoulder.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Concerns over Orlando Hernández's shoulder meant he would not have pitched for Yankees in the game against Minnesota Twins last night, which was ultimately called off due to rain.

Original Text: US economic indicators fall; new jobless claims rise A gauge of future business activity fell in August, indicating company managers and US consumers remain uncertain about the economy.
Translation: Los indicadores económicos de EE.UU. caen; las nuevas solicitudes de desempleo aumentan. Un indicador de la actividad empresarial futura cayó en agosto, lo que indica que los gerentes de empresas y los consumidores de EE.UU. siguen sin tener certeza sobre la economía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In August, a measure of future business activity saw a decline, suggesting persistent uncertainty about the economy among company managers and US consumers, alongside an increase in new unemployment claims.
Paraphrase 2: 2. New unemployment claims are increasing as a key measure of future business activity in the US saw a drop in August, revealing continued economic insecurity amongst US consumers and business managers.

Original Text: Retailer Gets Out the Green Votes Patagonia, a seller of outdoor equipment, says it wouldn't have a business if the wilderness were paved over. So the company launches a voter-education initiative on its website to support environment-friendly candidates. By Louise Witt.
Translation: El Minorista Obtiene los Votos Verdes Patagonia, un vendedor de equipo para actividades al aire libre, dice que no tendría un negocio si la naturaleza estuviera cubierta de asfalto. Por lo tanto, la empresa lanza una iniciativa de educación para votantes en su sitio web para apoyar a los candidatos amigables con el medio ambiente. Por Louise Witt.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Outdoor equipment provider, Patagonia, is conscious that its business would cease to exist if wilderness lands were encroached upon. To protect nature's spaces, the company has unveiled a voter-education appeal on its website, advocating for politicians with a pro-environment stance. Article by Louise Witt.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Fearing the obscuration of wilderness, which would mean an end of its retail business, Patagonia, an outdoor equipment merchant, has put forth a voter-education program on their website. The aim is to rally support for environmentally conscious politicians. This piece was penned by Louise Witt.

Original Text: Whooping Cranes' Migration Interrupted (AP) AP - Wildlife researchers leading a flock of young whooping cranes south for the winter are warning people to stay out of their way after an apparently curious ultralight pilot disturbed the endangered birds.
Translation: Interrupción en la Migración de las Grullas Trompeteras (AP) AP - Investigadores de vida silvestre que guían a un grupo de jóvenes grullas trompeteras hacia el sur para el invierno, advierten a la gente que se mantenga alejada después de que un piloto de ultraligero aparentemente curioso perturbó a las aves en peligro de extinción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) Wildlife researchers guiding a flock of young whooping cranes to their winter habitat are urging people to avoid interference following a recent incident involving an inquisitive ultralight pilot disturbing the endangered birds.

Original Text: Gerrard strikes mighty blow Steven Gerrard #39;s glorious strike against Olympiakos on Wednesday night was so good that Sven-Goran Eriksson watched countless reruns of it in his Soho Square office yesterday.
Translation: El poderoso golpe de Gerrard. El magnífico golpe de Steven Gerrard contra el Olympiakos el miércoles por la noche fue tan impresionante que Sven-Goran Eriksson vio innumerables repeticiones de este en su oficina de Soho Square ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Steven Gerrard's impressive strike against Olympiakos on Wednesday night was so outstanding that Sven-Goran Eriksson replayed it numerous times in his Soho Square office yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The superb hit against Olympiakos on Wednesday night by Steven Gerrard was so powerful that it had Sven-Goran Eriksson viewing its many replays in his Soho Square office the next day.

Original Text: Dollar Near Recent Lows on Data Jitters  LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar hovered around recent  one-week lows against the euro and Swiss franc on Thursday as  investors grew cautious Friday's U.S. jobs data might add to  recent weak U.S. data and cloud the interest rate outlook.
Translation: El Dólar Cerca de Mínimos Recientes por Inquietudes sobre los Datos LONDRES (Reuters) - El dólar fluctuaba alrededor de los mínimos de una semana recientes frente al euro y el franco suizo el jueves, ya que los inversores se mostraban cautelosos ante la posibilidad de que los datos de empleo de EE.UU. del viernes pudieran sumarse a los recientes datos débiles de EE.UU. y oscurecer las perspectivas de las tasas de interés.
Paraphrase 1: LONDON (Reuters) - Lingering concerns regarding the U.S. jobs data set to be released on Friday caused the dollar to remain close to its recent one-week lows against the euro and Swiss franc on Thursday. This anticipation intensified following recent weak U.S. data, casting a shadow over the future of interest rates.
Paraphrase 2: LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar danced around its recent trough levels against the euro and Swiss franc on Thursday due to rising skepticism regarding Friday's forthcoming U.S. jobs data. Recent weak U.S. statistics have already unnerved investors, prompting concerns on the course of interest rates.

Original Text: US embassy in Malaysia shuts indefinitely amid security threat (AFP) AFP - The US embassy in Malaysia was shut indefinitely after it received a letter containing a suspicious powdery substance, its second security scare in two weeks.
Translation: Embajada de EE.UU. en Malasia cierra indefinidamente ante amenaza de seguridad (AFP) AFP - La embajada de EE.UU. en Malasia cerró indefinidamente después de recibir una carta que contenía una sustancia en polvo sospechosa, su segundo susto de seguridad en dos semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the receipt of a letter containing a suspicious powdery substance, the US embassy in Malaysia has been indefinitely closed; a second security alert in a two-week span (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US embassy in Malaysia has indefinitely suspended operations due to a security threat involving a letter with a suspicious powdery substance, marking its second security concern within two weeks (AFP).

Original Text: Telecoms sell-off price reduced Hutchison Whampoa, under pressure to offset losses on 3G mobile costs, cuts the price for the sale of its emerging markets arm.
Translation: Hutchison Whampoa reduce el precio de venta de su división en mercados emergentes, bajo presión para compensar las pérdidas en los costos de móviles 3G.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Facing pressure to counterbalance losses on 3G mobile expenses, Hutchison Whampoa lowers the selling price for its emerging markets division, an unexpected move in the telecom sell-off.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hutchison Whampoa, in a need to balance the losses incurred from 3G mobile costs, slashes the selling price of its upcoming markets branch in the telecom divestment process.

Original Text: News Corp. Assures Investors on U.S. Move  SYDNEY (Reuters) - Buckling under investor pressure, Rupert  Murdoch's News Corp. Ltd. agreed on Thursday to stick to  Australia's tough corporate governance standards when it moves  its legal base to the United States.
Translation: News Corp. Asegura a los Inversores sobre el Movimiento en EE.UU. SÍDNEY (Reuters) - Cediendo bajo la presión de los inversores, el jueves News Corp. Ltd. de Rupert Murdoch acordó adherirse a los estrictos estándares de gobernanza corporativa de Australia cuando traslade su base legal a los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yielding to the pressure from investors, News Corp. Ltd., led by Rupert Murdoch, committed on Thursday to adhere to Australia's strict corporate governance rules when it relocates its legal base to the United States, reassuring its investors.

Original Text: Profit Tumbles at May Department Stores May Department Stores (MAY:NYSE - news - research) reported dismal third-quarter results Tuesday, weighed down by its acquisition of Marshall Field #39;s and negative sales trends.
Translation: Las ganancias se desploman en las tiendas May Department Stores May Department Stores (MAY:NYSE - noticias - investigación) informó resultados desalentadores del tercer trimestre el martes, lastrados por su adquisición de Marshall Field #39;s y tendencias de ventas negativas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. May Department Stores (MAY:NYSE - news - research) revealed disappointing third-quarter results on Tuesday. The company's profit took a hit primarily due to its acquisition of Marshall Field #39's and ongoing negative sales trends.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, May Department Stores (MAY:NYSE - news - research) reported that their third-quarter earnings have drastically fallen. The poor performance has been attributed to their purchase of Marshall Field #39's and steadily declining sales trends.

Original Text: Space Station Astronauts Move Soyuz to Prepare for Spacewalks The two astronauts aboard the International Space Station moved the Soyuz spacecraft that brought them to the orbiting outpost to prepare for a pair of spacewalks to be conducted next year.
Translation: Los astronautas de la Estación Espacial mueven la Soyuz para prepararse para caminatas espaciales. Los dos astronautas a bordo de la Estación Espacial Internacional movieron la nave espacial Soyuz que los llevó al puesto de avanzada en órbita para prepararse para un par de caminatas espaciales que se realizarán el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In preparation for a couple of spacewalks planned for next year, the two astronauts currently residing on the International Space Station have relocated the Soyuz spacecraft that brought them to the orbital station.

Original Text: Malaysian PM denies deal with Anwar KUALA LUMPUR - Malaysian Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi has denied that he struck a deal with rebel politician Anwar Ibrahim before Anwar was freed last week after nearly six years in jail.
Translation: El Primer Ministro malasio niega trato con Anwar KUALA LUMPUR - El Primer Ministro malasio, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi, ha negado que haya hecho un trato con el político rebelde Anwar Ibrahim antes de que Anwar fuera liberado la semana pasada después de pasar casi seis años en prisión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Abdullah Ahmad Badawi, the Prime Minister of Malaysia, has rejected claims that he made a deal with the dissident politician, Anwar Ibrahim, ahead of Anwar's release last week after almost six years of imprisonment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A deal with opposition politician, Anwar Ibrahim, was not made prior to his release from a near six-year imprisonment, according to Malaysian Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

Original Text: Nets make sure Storey has a happy ending Not too many 27-year-old rookies come down the pike in the NBA. But Nets coach Lawrence Frank wasn #39;t concerned that Awvee Storey #39;s only previous NBA experience was a summer camp with the Dallas Mavericks.
Translation: Las redes aseguran que Storey tenga un final feliz. No son muchos los novatos de 27 años que llegan a la NBA. Pero al entrenador de los Nets, Lawrence Frank, no le preocupaba que la única experiencia previa de Awvee Storey en la NBA fuera un campamento de verano con los Dallas Mavericks.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite being a 27-year-old rookie, which is relatively rare in NBA, Awvee Storey's lack of experience didn't worry Nets coach Lawrence Frank. Storey's only background in NBA was a summer camp stint with the Dallas Mavericks, but that didn't stop the Nets from ensuring he had a happy ending.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Awvee Storey might have been a 27-year-old NBA rookie with just a Dallas Mavericks' summer camp under his belt, but Nets coach Lawrence Frank didn't fret about his inexperience, assuring Storey has a satisfying finish.

Original Text: Nortel makes security push Nortel Networks is pushing its security features to the forefront with a series of updated products and a new relationship with security vendor Symantec.
Translation: Nortel impulsa la seguridad. Nortel Networks está destacando sus características de seguridad con una serie de productos actualizados y una nueva relación con el proveedor de seguridad Symantec.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to highlight its security features, Nortel Networks is introducing a stream of updated products and partnering with security vendor Symantec.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nortel Networks is bolstering its security profile through the launch of revised products and a fresh alliance with security provider Symantec.

Original Text: Web Sites Spoof Bush and Kerry With Parodies If you're not ready to feverishly debate Iraq or the deficit in this bitterly divisive election year, you can always surf the Web, where politics is frequently nothing but a big joke. President Bush and challenger John Kerry are spoofed as utter fools on the Internet daily, usually in good fun.
Translation: Sitios web parodian a Bush y Kerry con parodias. Si no estás listo para debatir fervorosamente sobre Irak o el déficit en este amargamente divisivo año electoral, siempre puedes navegar por la web, donde la política frecuentemente no es más que una gran broma. El Presidente Bush y el retador John Kerry son parodiados como auténticos tontos en Internet a diario, usualmente en tono de buen humor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you're not prepared for intense arguments about Iraq or the deficit during this highly polarized election year, the internet offers a less serious take on politics. It's a place where political figures like President Bush and his opponent John Kerry are often humorously depicted as complete buffoons, mostly in a light-hearted manner.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Instead of heatedly discussing Iraq or the budget shortfall in this extremely contentious election year, one can opt for a more humorous perspective of politics on the web. Presidential figures like Bush and his rival Kerry are regularly ridiculed as absolute buffoons on the Internet, generally in a jovial spirit.

Original Text: Ukrainian region seeks autonomy Supporters of Ukraine's PM announce a vote for autonomy, upping the stakes in the disputed election.
Translation: La región ucraniana busca autonomía. Los partidarios del primer ministro de Ucrania anuncian una votación por la autonomía, aumentando las apuestas en la controvertida elección.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Advocates for Ukraine's Prime Minister put forth an autonomy vote, intensifying the conflict in the contentious election, as the Ukrainian region pushes for independence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Ukrainian region is aiming for autonomy, and with supporters of the country's Prime Minister declaring a vote for autonomy, the disputed election's tension escalates.

Original Text: Sun postpones September user show In a bid to save money, Sun Microsystems is postponing its SunNetwork 2004 San Francisco user conference and may merge the event with its JavaOne 2005 developer conference, set for next June.
Translation: El Sol pospone el espectáculo de usuarios de septiembre En un intento por ahorrar dinero, Sun Microsystems está posponiendo su conferencia de usuarios SunNetwork 2004 en San Francisco y puede fusionar el evento con su conferencia de desarrolladores JavaOne 2005, programada para el próximo junio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an effort to cut costs, Sun Microsystems has decided to delay its SunNetwork 2004 San Francisco user conference, with the possibility of combining it with its JavaOne 2005 developer conference in June.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To economize, Sun Microsystems has pushed back its SunNetwork 2004 San Francisco user conference and is considering amalgamating the event with their JavaOne 2005 developer conference, scheduled for the upcoming June.

Original Text: Kidnappers Release Seven Hostages in Iraq BAGHDAD, Iraq - Kidnappers released two female Italian aid workers and five other hostages Tuesday, raising hopes for at least 18 foreigners still in captivity. But insurgents showed no sign of easing their blood-soaked campaign against the U.S...
Translation: Secuestradores liberan a siete rehenes en Iraq BAGDAD, Iraq - Los secuestradores liberaron a dos trabajadoras de ayuda italiana y a otros cinco rehenes el martes, incrementando las esperanzas para al menos 18 extranjeros aún en cautiverio. Sin embargo, los insurgentes no mostraron señales de aliviar su sangrienta campaña contra los EE.UU...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Iraq, seven hostages were released by kidnappers consisting of two Italian female aid workers and five other persons. The release raises expectations for the liberation of the remaining 18 foreign captives. However, the insurgents continue their ruthless offensive against the U.S., showing no inclination to relent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday witnessed the release of seven hostages in Iraq, including two Italian female aid workers, instilling hope for the other 18 foreigners currently held captive. Despite this, the insurgent group's violent campaign against the U.S. shows no signals of being scaled down.

Original Text: Barroso heading for victory in commission vote The new European commission will start work on Monday after its incoming president, Jos Manuel Barroso, won the guarantee of substantial support for his team last night by making further concessions to the European parliament.
Translation: Barroso se dirige hacia la victoria en la votación de la comisión. La nueva Comisión Europea comenzará a trabajar el lunes después de que su presidente entrante, José Manuel Barroso, obtuvo la garantía de un apoyo sustancial para su equipo anoche al hacer más concesiones al Parlamento Europeo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The new European Commission is set to commence work on Monday, following President-elect Jos Manuel Barroso securing widespread backing for his team after making additional compromises to the European Parliament; Barroso is therefore on track for a victory in the commission vote.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following further conciliations to the European Parliament, which won him significant support for his team, Jos Manuel Barroso, the president-elect of the new European Commission, is poised for success in the impending commission vote, with work set to begin on Monday.

Original Text: Shifts and shake-ups in open source MySQL developers turn to an unlikely source for database tool: Microsoft. Also: SGI visualizes Linux, and the return of Java veteran Kim Polese.
Translation: Cambios y conmociones en los desarrolladores de MySQL de código abierto se dirigen a una fuente improbable para la herramienta de base de datos: Microsoft. Además: SGI visualiza Linux, y el regreso de la veterana de Java, Kim Polese.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Unanticipated source, Microsoft, becomes the choice for open source MySQL developers experiencing changes and turbulence. In other news: SGI envisions Linux and Java veteran Kim Polese makes a comeback.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Open source MySQL developers dealing with changes are surprisingly gravitating towards Microsoft for database tools. Furthermore: SGI is visualizing Linux, and Kim Polese, a Java veteran, is making a return.

Original Text: Lockheed Martin Defends Polish Investment Lockheed Martin Corp. defended itself Friday against criticism it was moving too slowly in investing \$6 billion in Poland - a commitment that helped win the US company an order for 48 F-16 fighter jets over its European competitors.
Translation: Lockheed Martin Defiende Inversión en Polonia. Lockheed Martin Corp. se defendió el viernes contra críticas de que estaba avanzando demasiado lentamente en su inversión de $6 mil millones en Polonia - un compromiso que ayudó a la compañía estadounidense a ganar un pedido de 48 aviones de combate F-16 por encima de sus competidores europeos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Lockheed Martin Corp. responded to criticism suggesting that it was not investing rapidly enough in Poland, a decision that secured them an order for 48 F-16 fighter jets from the US over their European counterparts. The investment totals $6 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid criticism for alleged slow progress in its $6 billion investment in Poland, Lockheed Martin Corp. stood its ground on Friday. The investment played a key role in the US company outperforming European rivals to secure an order for 48 F-16 fighter jets.

Original Text: It #39;s never too early to be thinking about retirement -- just ask <b>...</b> Banks can destroy checks: The new law, known as Check 21, allows banks to destroy original paper checks and to convert them into digitized equivalents.
Translation: Nunca es demasiado temprano para pensar en la jubilación, solo pregúntale a <b>...</b>. Los bancos pueden destruir cheques: La nueva ley, conocida como Check 21, permite a los bancos destruir los cheques originales en papel y convertirlos en equivalentes digitalizados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Begin pondering over your retirement as early as possible, as advised by... Destruction of checks by banks is made possible by the new law, Check 21. The law permits banks to convert original paper checks into their digital counterparts and then discard them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Look into your retirement plans earlier than later, according to the advice of... Under Check 21 law, banks are authorized to digitalize original paper checks and thereafter, get rid of them.

Original Text: Verizon Wireless agrees to buy NextWave licenses Verizon Wireless has agreed to buy wireless spectrum licenses covering 23 US markets from bankrupt NextWave Telecom Inc. for \$3 billion in a deal that would boost Verizon #39;s capacity in several major markets.
Translation: Verizon Wireless acepta comprar licencias de NextWave. Verizon Wireless ha acordado comprar licencias de espectro inalámbrico que cubren 23 mercados en los EE. UU. de la quebrada NextWave Telecom Inc. por 3 mil millones de dólares en un acuerdo que aumentaría la capacidad de Verizon en varios mercados importantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Verizon Wireless has struck a $3 billion agreement to purchase wireless spectrum licenses that encompasses 23 US markets from NextWave Telecom Inc., a company presently in bankruptcy. This strategic move would significantly enhance Verizon's capacity in numerous key markets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With an eye towards enhancing its capacity in various major markets, Verizon Wireless has announced its plans to purchase wireless spectrum licenses covering 23 American markets from a bankrupt company, NextWave Telecom Inc., for an amount of $3 billion.

Original Text: Casino Forks Over \$28K for Cheese Sandwich HOLLYWOOD, Fla. - An online casino forked over \$28,000 Wednesday to the owner of a 10-year-old, partially eaten cheese sandwich thought to be embedded with the image of the Virgin Mary - and then sent the  quot;religious icon quot; on a world tour.
Translation: Casino Desembolsa \$28K por un Sándwich de Queso HOLLYWOOD, Florida. - Un casino en línea desembolsó \$28,000 el miércoles al dueño de un sándwich de queso de 10 años, parcialmente comido, en el que se cree que está incrustada la imagen de la Virgen María - y luego envió el "icono religioso" en una gira mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The owner of a 10-year-old partially eaten cheese sandwich, believed to carry the image of the Virgin Mary, received \$28,000 from an online casino in Hollywood, Florida. The casino then proceeded to dispatch this "religious icon" on a global tour.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Hollywood, Florida, a cheese sandwich thought to bear the Virgin Mary's image and partly eaten 10 years ago was purchased by an online casino for \$28,000. The casino then arranged for this so-called "religious icon" to be presented globally.

Original Text: 9/11: NY port authority sues Saudi Arabia The New York port authority has decided to join a lawsuit charging Saudi Arabia with providing financial assistance to the Osama bin Laden-led Al Qaeda.
Translation: 9/11: La Autoridad Portuaria de NY demanda a Arabia Saudita. La Autoridad Portuaria de Nueva York ha decidido unirse a una demanda que acusa a Arabia Saudita de proporcionar asistencia financiera a Al Qaeda, liderada por Osama bin Laden.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Port Authority of New York is taking legal action against Saudi Arabia, accusing it of financially supporting Al Qaeda, led by Osama bin Laden.

Original Text: Fincke #39;s space odyssey in its final day Emsworth #39;s Mike Fincke returns to Earth on Saturday, six months after leaving for the space voyage he had dreamed of since he was a young boy.
Translation: La odisea espacial de Fincke #39 llega a su día final. Mike Fincke de Emsworth regresa a la Tierra el sábado, seis meses después de partir para el viaje espacial con el que soñaba desde que era un niño pequeño.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Emsworth's Mike Fincke will be returning to Earth this Saturday, concluding his space odyssey that he has fantasized about since childhood, a full half year after his departure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After being away for six months on the space journey he had always dreamed about since he was a child, Mike Fincke from Emsworth is finally returning to Earth on Saturday, marking the end of his space odyssey.

Original Text: Warning on internet health advice People with chronic disease should not rely on the net for health advice, research suggests.
Translation: Advertencia sobre consejos de salud en internet: Las personas con enfermedades crónicas no deberían depender de la red para obtener consejos de salud, sugieren las investigaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Research suggests that individuals with chronic illnesses should not depend on the internet for medical guidance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is advised, according to research, that people suffering from chronic diseases should not trust health advice found on the internet.

Original Text: Hamas militants vow revenge for assassination Hamas vowed revenge yesterday after an Israeli airstrike in Gaza killed one of its senior commanders - the latest assassination to have weakened the militant group.
Translation: Los militantes de Hamas juran venganza por asesinato. Hamas juró venganza ayer después de que un ataque aéreo israelí en Gaza mató a uno de sus comandantes superiores, la última asesinato que ha debilitado al grupo militante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After an Israeli airstrike in Gaza resulted in the death of one of their senior commanders, Hamas militants pledged retaliation yesterday - a recent killing that has further debilitated the militant group.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to the killing of one of its high-ranking commanders in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, Hamas proclaimed a promise of retribution yesterday - the newest in a series of assassinations that have undermined the militant group.

Original Text: Can Lifeway Survive a Disaster? What happens when a great company gets hit by unforeseen circumstances?
Translation: ¿Puede Lifeway sobrevivir a un desastre? ¿Qué sucede cuando una gran empresa es golpeada por circunstancias imprevistas?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is Lifeway equipped to endure a catastrophe? How does a successful company react to unexpected situations?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Can Lifeway withstand a crisis? What occurs when an exceptional corporation faces unpredicted challenges?

Original Text: Delta Hedging Its Bets on Debt Swaps Delta Air Lines (DAL:NYSE - news - research) appears to have given up on part of a debt exchange that is part of its restructuring plan.
Translation: Delta Cubriendo sus Apuestas en Swaps de Deuda. Delta Air Lines (DAL:NYSE - noticias - investigación) parece haber abandonado una parte de un intercambio de deuda que es parte de su plan de reestructuración.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It seems that Delta Air Lines (DAL:NYSE - news - research) has abandoned a segment of its debt exchange, which is a crucial component of its restructuring plan. It's like Delta is hedging its bets on debt swaps.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In its restructuring plan, a part of the debt exchange appears to no longer be pursued by Delta Air Lines (DAL:NYSE - news - research), indicative of the airline hedging its bets on debt swaps.

Original Text: Danes to seek oil at North Pole Denmark is to undertake an expedition to try to back its bid for the North Pole, the country's Science Ministry says.
Translation: Los daneses buscarán petróleo en el Polo Norte. Dinamarca emprenderá una expedición para intentar respaldar su reclamo por el Polo Norte, dice el Ministerio de Ciencia del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Science Ministry of Denmark has announced that the country will be launching an expedition to the North Pole to support its claim, with the pursuit of oil as a major intent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an emphasis to reinforce its claim on the North Pole, Denmark, driven by the ambition of oil exploration, is set to embark on an expedition, states the country's Science Ministry.

Original Text: Seahawks outclassed Still lacking in the Patriots #39; 5-0 start is a wire-to-wire performance of consistent quality. But who #39;s to quibble? A win is a win -- even when the head coach
Translation: Los Seahawks superaron con creces a los Patriots. Aún falta en el inicio 5-0 de los Patriots una actuación de calidad consistente de principio a fin. Pero, ¿quién tiene pegas? Una victoria es una victoria, incluso cuando el entrenador en jefe
Paraphrase 1: 1) Despite lacking a wire-to-wire quality performance in their 5-0 start, the Seahawks proved superior. However, one may ask, does that really matter? A victory remains a victory, regardless of the circumstances, even from the head coach's perspective.

Original Text: Crude oil prices fall amid optimism over US oil stockpiles Crude oil prices fell Tuesday astraders widely anticipated a continuing increase in US inventories of crude oil. On the New York Mercantile Exchange, crude oil futures for
Translation: Los precios del petróleo crudo caen ante el optimismo sobre las reservas de petróleo de EE. UU. Los precios del petróleo crudo cayeron el martes mientras los operadores anticipaban ampliamente un continuo aumento en las reservas de petróleo crudo de EE. UU. En la Bolsa Mercantil de Nueva York, los futuros del petróleo crudo para
Paraphrase 1: 1) On the New York Mercantile Exchange, crude oil futures experienced a decrease in price due to the optimism concerning the ongoing growth of US oil stockpiles. There was an expectation amongst traders on Tuesday that US crude oil inventories would continue to rise, causing crude oil prices to fall.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Anticipated to continue their growth, US inventories of crude oil sparked optimism, leading to a dip in crude oil prices on the New York Mercantile Exchange. On Tuesday, this anticipation was widespread among traders, and as a result, crude oil futures took a hit.

Original Text: Sun releases Java 5 aka 1.5.0  quot;If they repeated history, then Java 1.3 should have been Java3 and Java 1.4 would have been Java 4 making Java 1.5 as Java5.
Translation: El Sol lanza Java 5 también conocido como 1.5.0 "Si hubieran repetido la historia, entonces Java 1.3 debería haber sido Java3 y Java 1.4 habría sido Java 4, haciendo a Java 1.5 como Java5.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "If historical patterns were to stay consistent, then Java 1.3 should have been named Java3 and Java 1.4 should have been Java 4, leading to Java 1.5 being Java5, following the release of Java 5, also known as 1.5.0, by Sun."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Taking into account past trends, Java 1.3 should have been labeled as Java3 and Java 1.4 as Java 4, which logically makes Java 1.5 as Java5, particularly in light of Sun's release of Java 5, referred to as 1.5.0."

Original Text: Has Ken Jennings' 'Jeopardy!' Run Ended? LOS ANGELES - Has Ken Jennings ended his "Jeopardy!" streak? A report posted Wednesday on TV Week's Web site said the brainy software engineer lost in a show taped Tuesday, walking away after his 75th straight game with about \$2.5 million overall in cash and prizes. The magazine cited unidentified sources and said the show would air later this fall...
Translation: ¿Ha terminado la racha de Ken Jennings en 'Jeopardy!'? LOS ÁNGELES - ¿Ha terminado Ken Jennings su racha en "Jeopardy!"? Un informe publicado el miércoles en el sitio web de TV Week afirmaba que el ingenioso ingeniero de software perdió en un programa grabado el martes, retirándose después de su 75º juego consecutivo con alrededor de $2.5 millones en total en efectivo y premios. La revista citó a fuentes no identificadas y dijo que el programa se emitiría más adelante este otoño...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Did the "Jeopardy!" winning streak of Ken Jennings come to an end? A piece uploaded on TV Week's online platform on Wednesday claimed that the ingenious software engineer met his defeat in an episode recorded on Tuesday, thus concluding his 75-game victorious run. He purportedly exited with around $2.5 million in total cash and rewards. Anonymous insiders were cited by the magazine, mentioning that the episode will be broadcasted later this Autumn...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Is Ken Jennings' record-breaking performance on "Jeopardy!" over? An article on TV Week's site that was published on Wednesday indicated that the intellectual software engineer suffered a loss on an episode taped on Tuesday, drawing his remarkable 75-game winning streak to a close. He is said to have left with approximately $2.5 million in collective cash and prizes. The show is expected to screen later in the fall, according to unsourced information referred to in the magazine...

Original Text: Revelations should cast Thomas in a different light The news is not so much shocking as sad. Surely, everyone whose eyes were open suspected that Jason Giambi and Barry Bonds had been using performance-enhancing drugs for many years.
Translation: Las revelaciones deberían mostrar a Thomas bajo una luz diferente. La noticia no es tanto impactante como triste. Seguramente, todos aquellos cuyos ojos estaban abiertos sospechaban que Jason Giambi y Barry Bonds habían estado usando drogas para mejorar el rendimiento durante muchos años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The uncovering of information should inevitably depict Thomas from a different viewpoint. It's not so shocking as it is heartbreaking. It was essentially an open secret that there was a long history of alleged performance-enhancing drug use by Jason Giambi and Barry Bonds.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The disclosures should change the way we perceive Thomas. These aren't shocking revelations but rather unfortunate news. It was practically common knowledge for all aware folks that performance-enhancing drugs were supposedly a part of Jason Giambi's and Barry Bonds' routines for many years.

Original Text: AOL Releases Version 9.0 with Security Software America Online today released AOL 9.0 Security Edition features a suite of safety and security features, marking the Internet service provider #39;s first version to focus specifically on safety and security.
Translation: AOL lanza la versión 9.0 con Software de Seguridad. America Online lanzó hoy la AOL 9.0 Edición de Seguridad que presenta un conjunto de características de seguridad y protección, marcando así la primera versión del proveedor de servicios de Internet #39 enfocada específicamente en seguridad y protección.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the first time, the internet service provider America Online is focusing specifically on safety and security, launching AOL 9.0 Security Edition with a comprehensive suite of protective features today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, America Online emphasized safety and security with the release of AOL 9.0 Security Edition, making it their debut version to concentrate specifically on these features.

Original Text: How To Create Dynamic Headlines For Your Google AdWords Ads How To Create Dynamic Headlines For Your Google AdWords Ads\\Relevancy is the key to the success of all advertising.  If your ad conveys the right message at the right time, to the right people, then you stand a very good chance of increasing the response to your ad. If ...
Translation: Cómo Crear Encabezados Dinámicos Para Tus Anuncios de Google AdWords\\La relevancia es la clave del éxito de toda publicidad. Si tu anuncio transmite el mensaje correcto en el momento adecuado, a las personas correctas, entonces tienes una muy buena oportunidad de aumentar la respuesta a tu anuncio. Si ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Developing Dynamic Headlines for Your Google AdWords Ads: Success in advertising lies in relevancy. The probability of getting a stronger response to your ad increases when it sends the correct message, to the precise audience, at the most opportune moment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Art of Crafting Dynamic Headlines for Your Google AdWords Ads: The cornerstone of a successful ad is its relevancy. Delivering the perfect message to the ideal people at the right time could significantly enhance your ad's response rate.

Original Text: Broadcasters Gut Digital TV Bill That was all it took to gut a bill introduced Tuesday by Sen. John McCain (R-Arizona) to force broadcasters to give back all of their beachfront analog TV spectrum by Jan. 1, 2009.
Translation: Los emisores vacían el proyecto de ley de televisión digital. Eso fue todo lo que se necesitó para vaciar un proyecto de ley presentado el martes por el senador John McCain (R-Arizona) para obligar a los emisores a devolver todo su espectro de televisión analógica en primera línea de playa antes del 1 de enero de 2009.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The digital TV bill introduced Tuesday by Sen. John McCain (R-Arizona), which would have required broadcasters to relinquish all of their beachfront analog TV spectrum by Jan. 1, 2009, was effectively killed off by the broadcasters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Broadcasters managed to dismantle a legislation propositioned on Tuesday by Sen. John McCain (R-Arizona), the digital TV bill which demanded that all beachfront analog TV spectrum should be returned by broadcasters by the 1st of January, 2009.

Original Text: Real Salt Lake trades for Kreis in first player move Real Salt Lake obtained its first player in Major League Soccer Wednesday, trading for Dallas forward Jason Kreis in exchange for future considerations.
Translation: Real Salt Lake realiza cambios para Kreis en su primer movimiento de jugador. Real Salt Lake obtuvo a su primer jugador en la Major League Soccer el miércoles, intercambiando al delantero de Dallas, Jason Kreis, a cambio de consideraciones futuras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In their first player transaction, Real Salt Lake acquired Jason Kreis from Dallas on Wednesday, trading future considerations to the Major League Soccer team in exchange for the forward.

Original Text: Spokesman says Arafat not in a coma, still in ICU Yasser Arafat was not in a coma but remained in intensive care Saturday after undergoing more medical tests, a senior aide to the ailing Palestinian leader said.
Translation: El portavoz dice que Arafat no está en coma, sigue en la UCI. Yasser Arafat no estaba en coma, pero permaneció en cuidados intensivos el sábado después de someterse a más pruebas médicas, dijo un asistente senior del líder palestino enfermo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior aide confirmed that Palestinian leader, Yasser Arafat, who has been in the ICU after recent medical tests, was not in a coma on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The ill Palestinian leader, Yasser Arafat was not comatose, but he stayed in the Intensive Care Unit after additional medical examinations on Saturday, a high-ranking assistant disclosed.

Original Text: Google blocks Gmail exploit Google has fixed a flaw in its high-profile webmail service, Gmail, which created a possible route for hackers to gain full access hackers full access to a user #39;s email account simply by knowing their user name.
Translation: Google bloquea la explotación de Gmail. Google ha corregido un fallo en su destacado servicio de correo web, Gmail, el cual creaba un posible camino para que los hackers obtengan acceso total a la cuenta de correo electrónico de un usuario simplemente conociendo su nombre de usuario.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A flaw in Google's well-known webmail service, Gmail, has been fixed by the tech giant. It previously allowed hackers to completely access a user's email account just by knowing their username.

Original Text: Drastic changes to Scream museum The Munch Museum in Oslo could be shut until next summer while it introduces drastic security measures after the theft of its most famous painting.
Translation: Cambios drásticos en el museo Scream. El Museo Munch en Oslo podría cerrarse hasta el próximo verano mientras introduce medidas de seguridad drásticas tras el robo de su pintura más famosa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Munch Museum in Oslo, home to the famous Scream painting, may be closed until next summer to introduce significant security enhancements following a robbery.

Original Text: Microsoft tightens Windows-mainframes link Company releases revamped version of server software for linking Windows servers to mainframes, other large computers.
Translation: Microsoft fortalece el vínculo entre Windows y mainframes. La compañía lanza una versión renovada de software de servidor para enlazar servidores Windows con mainframes y otras computadoras de gran tamaño.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft strengthens the connection between Windows servers and mainframes by launching an updated version of the server software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With an upgraded server software release, Microsoft enhances the integration of Windows servers with mainframes and other sizeable computers.

Original Text: Suicide Car Bomb Kills 37 at Pakistan Religious Rally  MULTAN, Pakistan (Reuters) - A suicide car bomb exploded in  central Pakistan, killing at least 37 people and wounding more  than 50 at a rally for an assassinated militant religious  leader early on Thursday, police said.
Translation: Atentado suicida con coche bomba mata a 37 en manifestación religiosa en Pakistán MULTAN, Pakistán (Reuters) - Un coche bomba suicida explotó en el centro de Pakistán, matando al menos a 37 personas e hiriendo a más de 50 en una manifestación por un líder religioso militante asesinado a primeras horas del jueves, según informó la policía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At a religious rally in Multan, Pakistan, held in honor of an assassinated militant religious leader, at least 37 people lost their lives and over 50 were injured when a suicide car bomb exploded on early Thursday, as reported by the police.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An explosive device set off by a suicide bomber in a car erupted at a religious gathering in Multan, Pakistan, claiming the lives of no less than 37 individuals and injuring over 50 on early Thursday. This rally was organized in memory of a militant religious leader who had been assassinated, as stated by the police.

Original Text: #39;San Andreas #39; poised for big sales, big debate Video gaming #39;s most felonious franchise is back, and it #39;s threatening to hijack the holidays. Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, the latest in a line that has sold 32 million games and
Translation: # 39;San Andreas # 39; listo para grandes ventas, gran debate. La franquicia de videojuegos más delictiva está de vuelta, y amenaza con secuestrar las vacaciones. Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, el último de una serie que ha vendido 32 millones de juegos y
Paraphrase 1: 1. The latest edition, Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, from the most scandalous video game franchise, is set to make major sales and spark significant debates. It is all set to dominate the holiday season, continuing the line that has already sold 32 million games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Poised to make a significant splash in sales and ignite a large debate, the infamous franchise's newest addition, Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas is here. The game, part of a succession that has already retailed 32 million, is set to take over the holiday landscape.

Original Text: Grievance hearing to proceed after NBA says it won #39;t seek TRO The NBA informed the players #39; union Sunday it will not seek a temporary restraining order in federal court, clearing the way for a grievance hearing over suspensions for the Pacers-Pistons brawl.
Translation: La audiencia de agravio procederá después de que la NBA dice que no buscará una TRO. La NBA informó al sindicato de jugadores el domingo que no buscará una orden de restricción temporal en el tribunal federal, despejando el camino para una audiencia de agravio por las suspensiones del enfrentamiento entre los Pacers y los Pistons.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The NBA announced to the players' union on Sunday that it will not apply for a temporary restraining order in federal court. This decision sets the stage for the grievance hearing to proceed regarding the suspensions from the Pacers-Pistons brawl.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After refusing to pursue a temporary restraining order in a federal court, the NBA told the players' union on Sunday that the grievance hearing, relating to the Pacers-Pistons brawl suspensions, can now proceed.

Original Text: PGA alters system for Ryder Cup points The PGA of America has radically altered the points system to determine future US Ryder Cup teams. Changes announced Thursday heavily weigh the points in favor of performances during a Ryder Cup year.
Translation: La PGA modifica el sistema de puntos para la Copa Ryder. La PGA de América ha alterado radicalmente el sistema de puntos para determinar los futuros equipos de la Copa Ryder de EE.UU. Los cambios anunciados el jueves inclinan en gran medida los puntos a favor de las performances durante un año de la Copa Ryder.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The PGA of America has dramatically changed the points system for deciding upcoming US Ryder Cup teams. The revisions, declared on Thursday, significantly give more weight to showings during a Ryder Cup year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Radical alterations have been made by The PGA of America to the points system for the selection of future US Ryder Cup teams. Announcements made on Thursday emphasized the increased value of points for performances in the year of the Ryder Cup.

Original Text: Anheuser-Busch: World's Drinking More Bud  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Anheuser-Busch Cos. Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BUD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BUD.N</A>, the  largest U.S. brewer, said on Wednesday quarterly profit rose  due to price increases on brands such as Bud Light and strong  growth in its international business, which benefited from the  acquisition of Harbin Brewery in China.
Translation: Anheuser-Busch: El mundo bebe más Bud NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Anheuser-Busch Cos. Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BUD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BUD.N</A>, la cervecería más grande de EE. UU., anunció el miércoles que las ganancias trimestrales aumentaron debido a los incrementos de precios en marcas como Bud Light y el fuerte crecimiento en su negocio internacional, que se benefició de la adquisición de Harbin Brewery en China.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anheuser-Busch Cos. Inc., the biggest brewer in the U.S., announced on Wednesday an increase in quarterly profit due to pricing hikes on products such as Bud Light and the expansion of its global business, which was boosted by the purchase of Harbin Brewery from China.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to the growing success of brands such as Bud Light and the advantageous acquisition of China's Harbin Brewery, Anheuser-Busch Cos. Inc., America's leading brewer, reported a rise in its quarterly profit on Wednesday.

Original Text: Bryant Arrives at Trial Kobe Bryant arrived at his sexual assault trial Monday as attorneys in the case who spent the weekend poring over questionnaires prepared to question potential jurors.
Translation: Bryant llega al juicio. Kobe Bryant llegó a su juicio por agresión sexual el lunes mientras los abogados del caso, que pasaron el fin de semana revisando cuestionarios, se preparaban para interrogar a los posibles jurados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Kobe Bryant made his appearance at his sexual assault trial where lawyers, who had devoted the weekend to examining questionnaires, got ready to interrogate potential jurors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kobe Bryant showed up at his sexual assault trial on Monday, while the lawyers involved in the case, having reviewed questionnaires over the weekend, were preparing to query prospective jurors.

Original Text: Nikkei Dips Techs, Steel Makers Fall (Reuters) Reuters - Tokyo's Nikkei average fell 0.14 percent\by midday on Thursday with losses in shipping firms, steel\makers and several technology shares overshadowing gains in\selective small-cap stocks and firms with bright earnings\outlooks.
Translation: Caída del Nikkei, la Tecnología y los Fabricantes de Acero sufren (Reuters) Reuters - El promedio del Nikkei de Tokio cayó un 0,14 por ciento para el mediodía del jueves, con pérdidas en las empresas de envío, los fabricantes de acero y varias acciones tecnológicas eclipsando las ganancias en acciones selectivas de pequeña capitalización y empresas con perspectivas brillantes de ganancias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) The Nikkei average in Tokyo recorded a downward shift of 0.14 percent by Thursday midday. This fall was largely influenced by the losses in sectors such as shipping, steel manufacturing, and various tech shares, despite the gains registered by a few small-cap stocks and companies with promising earnings prospects.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Tokyo, the Nikkei average witnessed a decline of 0.14 percent by half-day on Thursday, according to Reuters. Losses predominantly in shipping companies, steel producers, and certain tech shares were the culprits, even though increment were noted in selected small-cap stocks and businesses with positive upcoming earnings.

Original Text: Cubs beat Pirates again CHICAGO -- Sammy Sosa appears to have found his swing, and the timing couldn #39;t be better for the Chicago Cubs. Sosa hit his first grand slam in more than two years, and also had a solo homer as the Cubs hit
Translation: Los Cubs derrotan a los Piratas nuevamente CHICAGO -- Parece que Sammy Sosa ha encontrado su bateo, y el momento no podría ser mejor para los Chicago Cubs. Sosa hizo su primer grand slam en más de dos años, y también tuvo un jonrón en solitario mientras los Cubs golpeaban
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sammy Sosa seems to have rediscovered his batting prowess, just in time for the Cubs' benefit. For the first time in over two years, Sosa scored a grand slam, also contributing a solo home run, as the Cubs once again overpowered the Pirates in Chicago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Chicago, the Cubs triumphed over the Pirates once more, greatly aided by Sammy Sosa finding his rhythm again. Surpassing over two years, Sosa hit a grand slam and topped it off with a solo homer, enabling the Cubs victory.

Original Text: Clemens Perseveres, Astros Top Braves 9-3 (AP) AP - Roger Clemens and the powerful Houston lineup made sure the Astros got off to a good start in their quest to finally win a playoff series. While Clemens continually pitched out of trouble, Brad Ausmus, Lance Berkman, Carlos Beltran and Jason Lane homered for the Astros to lead a 9-3 rout of the Atlanta Braves in Game 1 of their NL division series Wednesday.
Translation: Clemens Persevera, Astros Superan a los Bravos 9-3 (AP) AP - Roger Clemens y la poderosa alineación de Houston se aseguraron de que los Astros tuvieran un buen comienzo en su búsqueda para finalmente ganar una serie de playoffs. Mientras Clemens continuaba lanzando a pesar de los problemas, Brad Ausmus, Lance Berkman, Carlos Beltran y Jason Lane batearon home runs para los Astros, liderando una aplastante victoria de 9-3 sobre los Bravos de Atlanta en el Juego 1 de su serie de división de la Liga Nacional el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Roger Clemens showcased his pitching skills while Brad Ausmus, Lance Berkman, Carlos Beltran, and Jason Lane hit homeruns, leading the Houston Astros to defeat the Atlanta Braves 9-3 in the first game of their NL division series on Wednesday. The strong performance by Clemens and the robust Houston lineup fueled their quest to win their first playoff series.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - With Roger Clemens successfully pitching throughout the match, and home runs by Brad Ausmus, Lance Berkman, Carlos Beltran, and Jason Lane, the Houston Astros emerged victorious against the Atlanta Braves by nine runs to three in the first game of the NL division series. Their dominating performance on Wednesday provided a promising start to their campaign to clinch a playoff series win.

Original Text: Sakhalin to Supply America A Royal Dutch/Shell-led group building the world #39;s largest liquefied natural gas plant on Sakhalin Island has clinched its first term supply deal in North America, the group said Thursday.
Translation: Un grupo liderado por la Royal Dutch/Shell que está construyendo la planta de gas natural licuado más grande del mundo en la isla de Sakhalin, ha cerrado su primer acuerdo de suministro a largo plazo en América del Norte, dijo el grupo el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Royal Dutch/Shell-led consortium, which is constructing the world's largest liquefied natural gas plant on Sakhalin Island, announced on Thursday that it has secured its first long-term supply contract in North America.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The group led by Royal Dutch/Shell, responsible for the establishment of the world's biggest liquefied natural gas factory on Sakhalin Island, revealed on Thursday that they have confirmed their initial supply agreement for North America.

Original Text: Google Rises in Market Debut  NEW YORK/SEATTLE (Reuters) - Shares of Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A>  made their long-awaited stock market debut on Thursday, rising  more than 20 percent to over \$100 after an initial public  offering marked by missteps and lackluster market conditions.
Translation: Google Crece en su Debut en el Mercado  NUEVA YORK/SEATTLE (Reuters) - Las acciones de Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A>  hicieron su tan esperado debut en el mercado de valores el jueves, subiendo más del 20 por ciento a más de $100 después de una oferta pública inicial marcada por tropiezos y condiciones de mercado poco entusiastas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK/SEATTLE (Reuters) - On Thursday, the highly-anticipated stock market debut of Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A> happened, where the shares climbed over 20 percent, reaching more than $100. This was despite an initial public offering that was characterized by lackluster market conditions and various hiccups.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK/SEATTLE (Reuters) - Despite initial public offering challenges and unsatisfactory market conditions, Google Inc.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A> eagerly-awaited stock market entrance took place on Thursday. It resulted in a more than 20 percent increase, with shares exceeding $100.

Original Text: Karzai clinches Afghan poll win woman and a young Afghan girl killed on Saturday by a Taliban suicide bomber in central Kabul. declare a winner until it has reviewed a report by an independent panel investigating voting irregularities.
Translation: Karzai asegura la victoria en las elecciones afganas, una mujer y una joven afgana murieron el sábado por un atacante suicida talibán en el centro de Kabul. No se declarará un ganador hasta que se haya revisado un informe de un panel independiente que investiga irregularidades en la votación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Karzai secures victory in the Afghan election as a woman and a young girl fall victim to a Taliban suicide bomber in central Kabul on Saturday. The declaration of a winner will not take place until the independent panel's investigation into voting irregularities is reviewed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid the tragic death of a woman and a young Afghan girl in central Kabul on Saturday due to a Taliban suicide bombing, Karzai manages to win the Afghan poll. However, the announcement of the winner is pending until the review of a report on voting irregularities by an independent panel.

Original Text: Kings Stop Spurs Peja Stojakovic's long-range shooting and Mike Bibby's big second half catapults the Kings over the Spurs, 86-81, on Sunday night.
Translation: Los Kings detienen a los Spurs. El tiro de larga distancia de Peja Stojakovic y la gran segunda mitad de Mike Bibby catapultaron a los Kings sobre los Spurs, 86-81, el domingo por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday night, Peja Stojakovic's long-range shooting combined with Mike Bibby's formidable second half propelled the Kings to a victory over the Spurs with a score of 86-81.

Original Text: No. 2 Oklahoma Expects Good Oregon Team (AP) AP - Oregon lost its season opener and dropped out of the Top 25 thanks mostly to its own mistakes.
Translation: No. 2 Oklahoma espera a un buen equipo de Oregon (AP) AP - Oregon perdió su partido inaugural de la temporada y salió del Top 25 gracias principalmente a sus propios errores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oklahoma, ranked second, Anticipates Facing a Strong Oregon Team (AP) AP - Oregon fell out of the Top 25 after losing their season opener, largely due to their own errors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oklahoma, being the No. 2, Foresees a Robust Oregon Team (AP) AP - Following their season opener loss and a subsequent drop out from the Top 25, Oregon primarily has itself to blame.

Original Text: Negotiators Add Abortion Clause to Spending Bill House and Senate negotiators have tucked a potentially far-reaching anti-abortion provision into a \$388 billion must-pass spending bill.
Translation: Los Negociadores Añaden Cláusula sobre Aborto al Proyecto de Ley de Gasto Los negociadores de la Cámara y el Senado han ocultado una disposición potencialmente de gran alcance contra el aborto en un proyecto de ley de gasto de 388 mil millones de dólares que debe aprobarse.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A significant anti-abortion provision has been included in a $388 billion spending bill by House and Senate negotiators, adding an abortion clause.

Original Text: Supreme Court sidesteps credit card dispute MasterCard and Visa no longer can block banks from issuing credit cards from competitors after the Supreme Court declined to hear their appeal Monday.
Translation: El Tribunal Supremo esquiva la disputa de tarjetas de crédito. MasterCard y Visa ya no pueden bloquear a los bancos de emitir tarjetas de crédito de competidores después de que el Tribunal Supremo se negó a escuchar su apelación el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the Supreme Court declined to hear their appeal on Monday, MasterCard and Visa are no longer able to stop banks from issuing competitors' credit cards.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Supreme Court's decision to not hear an appeal this Monday now prevents MasterCard and Visa from blocking banks from issuing credit cards of their competitors.

Original Text: Europe lifts weapons ban from Libya Two days after the American trade embargo was lifted from Libya, the European Union yesterday approved to lift the economic sanctions imposed on Tripoli in addition to lifting arms sales to it.
Translation: Europa levanta el embargo de armas de Libia. Dos días después de que se levantara el embargo comercial estadounidense sobre Libia, la Unión Europea aprobó ayer levantar las sanciones económicas impuestas sobre Trípoli, además de permitir la venta de armas a este.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two days post the removal of the American trade embargo from Libya, the European Union assented to alleviate the economic sanctions placed on Tripoli, as well as to resume arms sales with it.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Immediately following the American trade embargo's removal from Libya by two days, the economic sanctions enforced on Tripoli were lifted by the European Union, which also agreed to recommence arms sales to the country.

Original Text: Astronaut to Meet Baby Daughter on Return to Earth Days away from ending a six-month mission in space, US astronaut Michael Fincke said on Wednesday he is looking forward to meeting his 4-month-old daughter.
Translation: Astronauta conocerá a su hija recién nacida al regresar a la Tierra. A días de terminar una misión de seis meses en el espacio, el astronauta estadounidense Michael Fincke dijo el miércoles que está ansioso por conocer a su hija de 4 meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US astronaut Michael Fincke, who is on the verge of concluding a six-month space mission, expressed his eagerness on Wednesday to meet his 4-month-old daughter upon his return to Earth.

Original Text: Europe losing growth race, says report The EU is in danger of being relegated from the economic super-league because of its failure to match the US and Asia in growth, productivity, innovation and competitiveness, a high-level report warned political leaders yesterday on the eve of their
Translation: Europa pierde la carrera del crecimiento, dice informe. La UE corre el peligro de ser relegada de la superliga económica debido a su incapacidad para igualar a EE.UU. y Asia en crecimiento, productividad, innovación y competitividad, advirtió un informe de alto nivel a los líderes políticos ayer en la víspera de su
Paraphrase 1: 1. A high-level report issued a warning to political leaders yesterday, cautioning the European Union is at risk of slipping from the economic super-league due to its inability to keep up with the growth, productivity, innovation, and competitiveness of the United States and Asia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A leading report relayed to political leaders yesterday has revealed that the EU's place in the economic super-league is threatened, as it falls behind the US and Asia in terms of growth, productivity, innovation and competitiveness.

Original Text: Bird flu eagles killed in Belgium Belgian authorities destroy two Asian eagles infected with bird flu found at Brussels airport.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Autoridades belgas destruyen dos águilas asiáticas infectadas con gripe aviar encontradas en el aeropuerto de Bruselas, Bélgica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two Asian eagles, infected with bird flu, were exterminated by Belgian authorities at Brussels airport.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At Brussels airport, Belgian officials eliminated two Asian eagles that were found to be infected with bird flu.

Original Text: NASA to Test Automated Mission Look, Ma, no hands! The U.S. space agency's latest spacecraft can run an entire mission by itself. By Amit Asaravala.
Translation: La NASA probará la Misión Automatizada Mira, mamá, ¡sin manos! La última nave espacial de la agencia espacial estadounidense puede ejecutar una misión completa por sí misma. Por Amit Asaravala.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Look, Ma, no hands! NASA is set to test an automated mission with its latest spacecraft that can operate itself throughout an entire mission. With contributions from Amit Asaravala."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "NASA is gearing up to test a spacecraft that can navigate an entire mission autonomously. It's as if they're saying 'Look, Ma, no hands!' The article is written by Amit Asaravala."

Original Text: Annan Vows to Protect U.N. Staff from Attacks (Reuters) Reuters - U.N. Secretary-General Kofi Annan called\at an emotional tribute on Thursday for the prosecution of\those behind the "cold-blooded murder" of 22 people at the\United Nations office in Baghdad one year ago.
Translation: Annan Promete Proteger al Personal de la ONU de Ataques (Reuters) Reuters - El Secretario General de la ONU, Kofi Annan, pidió con emoción el jueves el procesamiento de los responsables del "asesinato a sangre fría" de 22 personas en la oficina de las Naciones Unidas en Bagdad hace un año.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) Reuters - On Thursday, during a heartrending tribute, U.N. Secretary-General Kofi Annan expressed his resolve to shield U.N. staff from attacks. He demanded legal action against the individuals responsible for what he dubbed as the "cold-blooded murder" of 22 individuals at the United Nations office in Baghdad that occurred one year ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - In an impassioned tribute on Thursday, Kofi Annan, U.N. Secretary-General, pledged to safeguard U.N. staff from further assaults. His speech incorporated a strong demand for punishing those accountable for the brutal killing of 22 people a year ago in the United Nations office based in Baghdad.

Original Text: Snow to Remain as U.S. Treasury Secretary  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Bush on Wednesday asked  Treasury Secretary John Snow to stay in his job and Snow  agreed, ending a frenzy of speculation that the former railroad  executive and loyal Bush foot soldier was about to be replaced.
Translation: La Nieve Permanecerá como Secretario del Tesoro de EE.UU. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - El Presidente Bush pidió el miércoles al Secretario del Tesoro, John Snow, que permaneciera en su cargo y Snow aceptó, poniendo fin a una frenética especulación de que el antiguo ejecutivo de ferrocarriles y leal soldado de Bush estaba a punto de ser reemplazado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. Treasury Secretary John Snow is going to stay in his position, as President Bush requested on Wednesday. This halts the rampant conjectures that the ex-railroad executive, who staunchly supports Bush, was on the brink of being substituted.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following President Bush's Wednesday request for him to continue his term, John Snow has consented to remain in his role as the U.S. Treasury Secretary. This allays widespread rumors about the imminent replacement of the former railway executive, who is a devoted follower of Bush.

Original Text: Bush Attacks Kerry; Edwards Says Bush 'In Denial' (Reuters) Reuters - President Bush, going on the attack\after a slip in the polls, said on Wednesday Democratic rival\John Kerry's "mind-set of September 10th" would paralyze the\United States and weaken its ability to respond to threats.
Translation: Bush Ataca a Kerry; Edwards Dice Que Bush 'Está en Negación' (Reuters) Reuters - El Presidente Bush, pasando al ataque después de un resbalón en las encuestas, dijo el miércoles que la "mentalidad del 10 de septiembre" del rival demócrata John Kerry paralizaría a los Estados Unidos y debilitaría su capacidad para responder a las amenazas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Reuters - Following a dip in polls, President Bush retaliated by asserting on Wednesday that Democratic competitor, John Kerry's "pre-September 10th mentality" would impede the United States and hamper its capability to react to threats, a notion which John Edwards labeled as Bush being 'in denial'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) Reuters - Experiencing a decrease in his polling numbers, President Bush struck back by arguing on Wednesday that the United States would be debilitated and its response to threats reduced under John Kerry's 'mindset of September 10th', a position John Edwards dismissed as Bush's 'denial'.

Original Text: Wachovia adds to wealth-management unit Wachovia Corp. aims to increase its profile in the Northeast and Southwest by expanding its wealth-management division. The bank, based in Charlotte, said yesterday that it is buying Tanager Financial Services Inc.
Translation: Wachovia añade a la unidad de gestión de patrimonio. Wachovia Corp. tiene como objetivo aumentar su perfil en el Noreste y Suroeste al expandir su división de gestión de patrimonio. El banco, con sede en Charlotte, dijo ayer que está comprando Tanager Financial Services Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Striving to amplify its prominence in the Northeast and Southwest, Wachovia Corp. has revealed its plans to grow its wealth-management department. The Charlotte-based bank announced yesterday its acquisition of Tanager Financial Services Inc.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an effort to elevate their standing in the Northeast and Southwest, Wachovia Corp. is broadening its wealth-management arm. The banking organization, headquartered in Charlotte, stated yesterday it will bankroll the purchase of Tanager Financial Services Inc.

Original Text: Apple's fourth quarter, by the numbers (MacCentral) MacCentral - On Wednesday, Apple not only reached a major milestone with its highest fourth quarter earnings in nine years, according to CEO Steve Jobs, but it also shattered its previous record with more than 2 million iPods shipped during the fourth quarter of its 2004 fiscal year -- an incredible 500 percent increase over the fourth quarter of 2003 and 134 percent more than the previous quarter. That number not only helped the company reach a commanding 92. ...
Translation: Traducción al español: El cuarto trimestre de Apple, en cifras (MacCentral) MacCentral - El miércoles, Apple no solo alcanzó un hito importante con sus mayores ganancias en el cuarto trimestre en nueve años, según el CEO Steve Jobs, sino que también rompió su récord anterior con más de 2 millones de iPods enviados durante el cuarto trimestre de su año fiscal 2004 - un increíble aumento del 500 por ciento con respecto al cuarto trimestre de 2003 y un 134 por ciento más que el trimestre anterior. Esa cifra no solo ayudó a la compañía a alcanzar un dominio del 92. ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. MacCentral reports that Apple achieved a significant landmark on Wednesday by recording its highest fourth quarter earnings in the past nine years, as stated by CEO Steve Jobs. Not only did they attain this feat, they also smashed their former record by shipping over 2 million iPods in the fourth quarter of 2004, showcasing a staggering 500% increment compared to the same quarter in 2003, and a 134% rise from the preceding quarter. This considerable number greatly contributed to the company securing a dominant 92...
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to MacCentral, Wednesday marked a pivotal moment for Apple, when they declared their largest fourth quarter profits in nine years, a fact noted by CEO Steve Jobs. Besides this remarkable achievement, they surpassed their own record by dispatching more than 2 million iPods within the 2004 fiscal year's fourth quarter, an exceptional 500% leap over the 2003's fourth quarter and an increase of 134% from the previous quarter. This dramatic increase significantly contributed to Apple holding an impressive 92...

Original Text: NHL players meet Seventy-five National Hockey League players met with union leaders yesterday to get an update on a lockout that shows no sign of ending.
Translation: Los jugadores de la NHL se encuentran: setenta y cinco jugadores de la Liga Nacional de Hockey se reunieron con los líderes sindicales ayer para obtener una actualización sobre un cierre patronal que no muestra signos de terminar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, seventy-five players from the National Hockey League convened with union leaders for an update regarding the ongoing lockout, which appears to have no imminent resolution.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An update on an unending lockout was the purpose of yesterday's meeting between seventy-five NHL players and union leaders.

Original Text: Pakistan ; India, Pakistan hold talks on nuclear CBMs Pakistan News, Islamabad,Pakistani and Indian experts began talks here Tuesday on confidence building measures (CBMs) aimed at averting any accidental outbreak of hostilities between the nuclear-armed neighbours.
Translation: Pakistán; India, Pakistán sostienen conversaciones sobre medidas de confianza nuclear Noticias de Pakistán, Islamabad, Expertos paquistaníes e indios comenzaron conversaciones aquí el martes sobre medidas de confianza (CBMs) destinadas a evitar cualquier brote accidental de hostilidades entre los vecinos armados con armas nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Indian and Pakistani professionals launched discussions in Islamabad on implementing confidence building measures (CBMs) specifically designed to reduce the chance of an accidental conflict between the two nuclear-powered neighbors. This significant event was reported in Pakistan News.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pakistan News reported that discussions commenced on Tuesday in Islamabad between experts from India and Pakistan. The discussions were focused on formulating confidence building measures (CBMs) that aim to prevent any unintended hostilities between these two neighboring nations, both of which are nuclear-armed.

Original Text: Phone Makers Turn On Mobile TV (PC World) PC World - Five companies are teaming up to deliver broadcast programming to wireless handsets.
Translation: Los Fabricantes de Teléfonos Activan la Televisión Móvil (PC World) PC World - Cinco compañías se están uniendo para ofrecer programación de transmisión a dispositivos inalámbricos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PC World - Five corporations collaborate to provide broadcast programming to mobile devices (Mobile TV Activated by Phone Manufacturers).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mobile TV Initiated by Phone Producers (PC World) - Broadcast programming is being brought to wireless handsets by a team of five companies.

Original Text: TSMC to tape out 40 more products at 90nm by year-end Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has already produced over 80 products using 90nm processes, and the company expects to tape out 40 more products at this technology node by the end of this year, according to Genda Hu, vice president of
Translation: TSMC fabricará 40 productos más a 90nm para fin de año. Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) ya ha producido más de 80 productos utilizando procesos de 90nm, y la empresa espera realizar el tape-out de 40 productos más en este nodo tecnológico para fin de año, según Genda Hu, vicepresidente de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. By the end of the year, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) is projected to showcase 40 new products using the 90nm process, adding to their catalogue of over 80 products produced with the same technology node, as reported by the Vice President, Genda Hu.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Vice President of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC), Genda Hu, has declared that the company, having already created more than 80 products with 90nm processes, is planning to develop 40 additional such products by the close of this year.

Original Text: Computer Associates Names CEO After months without a permanent CEO, scandal-rocked Computer Associates (CA:Nasdaq - news - research) is about to give the job to a veteran IBM (IBM:NYSE - news - research) executive, according to published reports.
Translation: Computer Associates Nombra CEO Tras meses sin un CEO permanente, el escandalizado Computer Associates (CA:Nasdaq - noticias - investigación) está a punto de dar el trabajo a un veterano ejecutivo de IBM (IBM:NYSE - noticias - investigación), según informes publicados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a period of several months without a solid leadership, it's reported that Computer Associates, a company plagued by scandals, is on the verge of appointing a seasoned IBM executive as its CEO.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Computer Associates, which has been embroiled in controversy and without a fixed CEO for some time, is reportedly set to announce an experienced IBM executive as their new chief executive, as per numerous reports.

Original Text: ID Biomedical Gets U.S. Flu Vaccine Deal  MONTREAL (Reuters) - ID Biomedical Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IDB.TO target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IDB.TO</A> <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IDBE.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IDBE.O</A>  signed a distribution deal for its Fluviral drug that could  reap sales of up to \$2.5 billion over a decade and help U.S.  authorities ease a vaccine shortage as early as next year, it  said on Monday.
Translation: ID Biomedical obtiene contrato de vacuna contra la gripe en los EE.UU.
