MONTREAL (Reuters) - ID Biomedical Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IDB.TO target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IDB.TO</A> <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IDBE.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IDBE.O</A> firmó un acuerdo de distribución para su medicamento Fluviral que podría generar ventas de hasta \$2.5 mil millones durante una década y ayudar a las autoridades de los EE.UU. a aliviar la escasez de vacunas tan pronto como el próximo año, dijo el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ID Biomedical Corp. has signed a distribution agreement for its Fluviral drug, which is estimated to generate sales up to $2.5 billion over the next ten years and potentially alleviate a vaccine shortage in the U.S. as soon as next year, the company announced on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, ID Biomedical Corp. announced that it had secured a U.S. deal for their Fluviral drug that could potentially earn them up to $2.5 billion in sales over the span of a decade and assist U.S. authorities in overcoming a vaccine shortage by next year.

Original Text: Americans fall on tennis court A US tennis team expected to collect a gold rush or at least challenge for one, instead got derailed just after coming out of the gate.
Translation: Los estadounidenses caen en la cancha de tenis. Se esperaba que un equipo de tenis de los EE. UU. recolectara una avalancha de oro o al menos desafiara por una, en cambio se descarriló justo después de salir de la puerta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A US tennis team, anticipated to gather a wealth of gold medals, or at least contend for them, found themselves off track immediately after starting, which is quite a disappointment for the Americans.

Original Text: It #39;s the Occupation, Stupid Four years ago on Sept. 28, 2000, when Ariel Sharon made his operatic visit to the Temple Mount, no one could have predicted how dire the situation would become so quickly: close to 6,000 dead; the building
Translation: Es la ocupación, estúpido. Hace cuatro años, el 28 de septiembre de 2000, cuando Ariel Sharon hizo su visita operística al Monte del Templo, nadie podría haber pronosticado cuán grave se volvería la situación tan rápidamente: cerca de 6,000 muertos; el edificio
Paraphrase 1: 1. Back on September 28, 2000, as Ariel Sharon made his dramatic visit to the Temple Mount, nobody could foresee the rapidly escalating situation that resulted in nearly 6,000 deaths - a consequence of the Occupation, and it all was amplified over the coming four years.

Original Text: New \$50 Bill Begins Circulating WASHINGTON - Coming to cash registers near you: Colorful new \$50 bills sporting splashes of red, blue and yellow. Next up for a makeover, the government said Tuesday: \$10 bills...
Translation: Nueva Billete de \$50 Comienza a Circular WASHINGTON - Llegando a cajas registradoras cerca de ti: Coloridos nuevos billetes de \$50 luciendo toques de rojo, azul y amarillo. El gobierno dijo el martes que lo próximo en recibir un cambio de imagen serán los billetes de \$10...
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON - Look out for colorful new $50 bills making their way around; the bills, enhanced with splashes of red, blue, and yellow, are coming to a cash register near you. Following this change, the government announced on Tuesday that $10 bills will be the next to undergo a transformation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON - Cash registers will soon be seeing new $50 bills with hues of red, blue, and yellow. Tuesday saw the government announcing that a redesign of the $10 bills is in the pipeline.

Original Text: Systinet, AmberPoint bundle Web services wares The two companies are targeting customers that have invested in a services-oriented architecture.
Translation: Systinet, AmberPoint agrupan productos de servicios web. Las dos compañías están orientadas a los clientes que han invertido en una arquitectura orientada a servicios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Systinet and AmberPoint are packaging their Web services products together, with a targeted customer base of those who have invested in a services-oriented architecture.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a targeting of customers invested in a services-oriented architecture, Systinet and AmberPoint are bundling their Web services offerings.

Original Text: We can #39;t afford to mess up again SHOTA ARVELADZE today insisted Rangers can #39;t repeat the mistakes of a year ago if they want to secure a Uefa Cup future. The Georgian striker looked on in agony then as Alex McLeish #39;s side crashed to a 3-1
Translation: Hoy, Shota Arveladze insistió en que Rangers no puede permitirse repetir los errores del año pasado si quieren asegurar un futuro en la Copa de la UEFA. El delantero georgiano miró con agonía en ese entonces cuando el equipo de Alex McLeish perdió por 3-1. No podemos permitirnos volver a equivocarnos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shota Arveladze, the Georgian striker, emphatically stated today that another mistake like last year's would be too costly for Rangers as they aim for their Uefa Cup future. He painfully witnessed the team, led by Alex McLeish, lose at a scoreline of 3-1 then.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Shota Arveladze insistently declared today that the Rangers must avoid repeating last year's errors to ensure their future in the Uefa Cup. The Georgian striker had watched with despair as Alex McLeish's team met a 3-1 defeat then.

Original Text: Microsoft Order Cancelled by Beijing The Chinese city of Beijing has cancelled an order for Microsoft software, apparently bowing to protectionist sentiment. The deal has come under fire in China, which is trying to build a domestic software industry.
Translation: Orden de Microsoft cancelada por Beijing La ciudad china de Beijing ha cancelado una orden de software de Microsoft, aparentemente cediendo a los sentimientos proteccionistas. El trato ha sido objeto de críticas en China, que está intentando construir una industria de software nacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Chinese capital, Beijing, has rescinded a software order from Microsoft, seemingly due to protectionist attitudes. The contract has been heavily criticized in China, a country that is striving to nurture its own software industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An agreement for Microsoft software has been revoked by the Beijing authorities, ostensibly yielding to homegrown protectionism. This transaction has drawn criticism in China, which is working towards establishing a self-sustaining software industry.

Original Text: US Dollar Hits Another Low Against Euro A window display in London showing the financial prices, Thursday Nov. 25, 2004. The dollar has dropped to an all time low against the Euro.
Translation: El Dólar Estadounidense Alcanza Otro Mínimo Contra el Euro. Un escaparate en Londres muestra los precios financieros, jueves 25 de noviembre de 2004. El dólar ha caído a su mínimo histórico contra el Euro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Nov. 25, 2004, a window display in London showing financial prices revealed yet another historic low for the US Dollar against the Euro.

Original Text: Ukraine rivals bid to end crisis Presidential rivals Viktor Yushchenko and Viktor Yanukovych meet in a fresh bid to resolve the poll crisis.
Translation: Los rivales ucranianos intentan poner fin a la crisis. Los rivales presidenciales Viktor Yushchenko y Viktor Yanukovych se encuentran en un nuevo intento de resolver la crisis electoral.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a new attempt to conclude the electoral crisis, presidential adversaries, Viktor Yushchenko and Viktor Yanukovych from Ukraine are set to meet.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ukrainian presidential competitors, Viktor Yushchenko and Viktor Yanukovych unite in a renewed effort to settle the voting dispute.

Original Text: F1: Move put on hold Jenson Button is still planning a return to Williams despite being told yesterday he cannot drive for them in 2005. Button had wanted to return to Williams, where he started his Formula One
Translation: F1: Mueven en espera el regreso de Jenson Button. Aunque se le informó ayer que no puede conducir para ellos en 2005, Button aún planea regresar a Williams. Button había querido volver a Williams, donde comenzó su carrera en la Fórmula Uno.
Paraphrase 1: F1: Jenson Button, despite being informed yesterday that he is not permitted to drive for them in 2005, is persisting in his plans to make a comeback with Williams. Button had expressed desires of returning to Williams, his initial start point for his Formula One career.
Paraphrase 2: F1: Jenson Button's move is put on hold; however, he remains intent upon a return to Williams even though he received news yesterday that his ability to drive for them in 2005 is impossible. Button had sought to go back to Williams, the team with which he began his Formula One journey.

Original Text: Sea of Sorrow The world suffers an epic tragedy as a tsunami spreads death across Asia. An on-the-scene look at how it happened--and whether the carnage could have been avoided
Translation: Mar de Tristeza: El mundo sufre una tragedia épica mientras un tsunami propaga muerte a través de Asia. Un vistazo en el lugar de los acontecimientos a cómo sucedió, y si la carnicería podría haberse evitado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An extensive tragedy engulfs the world as a devastating tsunami brings death throughout Asia - an immediate inspection into the event's occurrence and the potential of preventing such destruction, in an episode titled "Sea of Sorrow".
Paraphrase 2: 2. In "Sea of Sorrow", an enormous tragedy unfolds before the world's eyes as a tsunami strews devastation across Asia. Our coverage dives into the scene, examining how it transpired and contemplating the feasibility of circumventing such colossal damage.

Original Text: Yukos lawyer faces arrest warrant Russian authorities pile the pressure on oil firm Yukos, arresting an official at its Moscow office and issuing an arrest warrant for the firm's leading lawyer.
Translation: El abogado de Yukos enfrenta una orden de arresto. Las autoridades rusas incrementan la presión sobre la empresa petrolera Yukos, arrestando a un oficial en su oficina de Moscú y emitiendo una orden de arresto para el principal abogado de la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The leading lawyer for Yukos is facing an arrest warrant as Russian authorities continue to apply pressure on the oil firm, which includes the arrest of an official from its Moscow office.

Original Text: The Bush-Kerry Tax Duel It may be of great interest to voters whether Sen. John F. Kerry was or was not a war hero. That certainly seems to be the issue of the day.
Translation: El Duelo Fiscal entre Bush-Kerry Puede ser de gran interés para los votantes si el senador John F. Kerry fue o no un héroe de guerra. Eso ciertamente parece ser el tema del día.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Tax Dispute between Bush and Kerry: The question of whether Sen. John F. Kerry is a war hero or not appears to be a significant concern for voters, indeed, it appears to be today's main issue.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Tax Battle between Bush and Kerry: Voters may be deeply intrigued by the topic of whether Sen. John F. Kerry was a war hero or not. Clearly, this comes across as the prevailing issue at present.

Original Text: Looking for Water on the Red Planet Description: Scientists exploring Mars via the rover  #39;Opportunity #39; published 11 papers detailing the progress of the research being done in an area called Meridiani Planum.
Translation: Buscando Agua en el Planeta Rojo Descripción: Científicos que exploran Marte a través del rover 'Opportunity' publicaron 11 documentos detallando el progreso de la investigación que se está realizando en un área llamada Meridiani Planum.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The rover 'Opportunity' has been exploring Mars, and scientists have released 11 reports on the ongoing research in an area known as Meridiani Planum, seeking water on the Red Planet.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Using the rover named 'Opportunity' to investigate Mars, scientists have shared 11 papers that delineate the advancements of the research carried out in an area termed Meridiani Planum, as part of their quest to find water on the Red Planet.

Original Text: EMC hires ex-IBM grid guru for CTO role EMC has appointed Jeff Nick, the former chief architect of IBM #39;s grid computing initiative, as its senior vice-president and chief technology officer (CTO).
Translation: EMC contrata al ex-gurú de la red de IBM para el puesto de CTO. EMC ha nombrado a Jeff Nick, el antiguo arquitecto jefe de la iniciativa de computación en red de IBM, como su vicepresidente senior y director de tecnología (CTO).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jeff Nick, previously the leading architect of IBM's grid computing initiative, has been appointed by EMC as their Senior Vice President and Chief Technology Officer (CTO).
Paraphrase 2: 2. EMC has assigned the position of Senior Vice President and Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to Jeff Nick, who was the chief architect of IBM's grid computing initiative previously.

Original Text: Numb to the Numbers, Bonds Wins Another M.V.P. Award A 40-year-old left fielder for the San Francisco Giants, Barry Bonds won the National League M.V.P. for the seventh time over all.
Translation: Insensible a los números, Bonds gana otro premio M.V.P. Un jardinero izquierdo de 40 años para los Gigantes de San Francisco, Barry Bonds ganó el premio M.V.P. de la Liga Nacional por séptima vez en total.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Barry Bonds, the 40-year-old left fielder for the San Francisco Giants, claims his seventh National League M.V.P award, undeterred by the statistics.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the figures, Barry Bonds, a 40-year-old left fielder for the San Francisco Giants, secures his seventh National League M.V.P award.

Original Text: Toshiba Wins Support for HD DVD from 4 Film Studios <p>\</p><p> By Kiyoshi Takenaka and Nathan Layne</p><p> TOKYO (Reuters) - Toshiba Corp. said on Monday it had won\support for the HD DVD optical disc standard from Warner Bros.\Studios, Paramount Pictures, Universal Pictures and New Line\Cinema, advancing its cause in the battle for the\next-generation DVD.</p>
Translation: Toshiba gana el apoyo para HD DVD de 4 estudios de cine <p>\</p><p> Por Kiyoshi Takenaka y Nathan Layne</p><p> TOKIO (Reuters) - Toshiba Corp. dijo el lunes que había ganado el apoyo para el estándar de disco óptico HD DVD de Warner Bros. Studios, Paramount Pictures, Universal Pictures y New Line Cinema, avanzando su causa en la batalla por el DVD de próxima generación.</p>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Toshiba Corp. announced on Monday that Warner Bros. Studios, Paramount Pictures, Universal Pictures, and New Line Cinema had pledged their backing to the HD DVD optical disc standard. This is a significant stride in their pursuit for the status of the next-generation DVD. - By Kiyoshi Takenaka and Nathan Layne.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Toshiba Corp. relayed that it secured patronage from Warner Bros. Studios, Paramount Pictures, Universal Pictures, and New Line Cinema for its HD DVD optical disc standard, enhancing their position in the contest for the next-generation DVD. - Written by Kiyoshi Takenaka and Nathan Layne.

Original Text: Apec pushes for free trade boost Leaders of 21 Asia-Pacific states pledge to bolster anti-terrorism measures and efforts to lower trade barriers.
Translation: Apec apoya el impulso del libre comercio. Los líderes de 21 estados de Asia-Pacífico se comprometen a fortalecer las medidas contra el terrorismo y los esfuerzos para reducir las barreras comerciales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Leaders of the 21 Asia-Pacific states have pledged to reinforce measures against terrorism and efforts to reduce trade restrictions, as part of Apec's push for a free trade boost.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an effort to boost free trade, the leaders of 21 Asia-Pacific states, under the guidance of Apec, have committed to strengthening anti-terrorism measures and lowering trade barriers.

Original Text: Fed raid pounces on equipment for digital piracy Continuing a crackdown on digital piracy, federal agents on Wednesday raided five locations housing equipment used by elite hackers to exchange unauthorized copies of blockbuster films and popular music.
Translation: La redada federal se cierne sobre el equipo para la piratería digital Continuando con la represión contra la piratería digital, agentes federales el miércoles realizaron redadas en cinco ubicaciones donde se alojaban equipos utilizados por hackers de élite para intercambiar copias no autorizadas de películas exitosas y música popular.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Continuing their crackdown on digital piracy, federal agents raided five venues on Wednesday where equipment used by high-ranked hackers to share unauthorized copies of popular films and music was kept.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As part of an ongoing effort against digital piracy, locations harboring the equipment for unauthorized sharing of top-tier films and music were raided by federal agents on Wednesday.

Original Text: Oil Steadies, Investors Wary Ahead of GDP  LONDON (Reuters) - European equities clung to three-week  highs on Friday as oil steadied around the \$43 a barrel mark.
Translation: El Petróleo se Estabiliza, los Inversores se Mantienen Alerta Antes del PIB LONDRES (Reuters) - Las acciones europeas se aferraron a máximos de tres semanas el viernes mientras el petróleo se estabilizaba alrededor de la marca de los \$43 por barril.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - European stocks sustained three-week highs on Friday, with oil prices stabilizing at about $43 per barrel, and investors bracing for GDP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As oil stabilizes at around $43 per barrel, European equities maintain their three-week peaks on Friday, while investors remain cautious before the GDP is released.

Original Text: Saudi Questions Need for OPEC Supply Cuts  CAIRO (Reuters) - OPEC's top producer Saudi Arabia on  Wednesday questioned the need for the cartel to bolster oil  prices by cutting supply, saying the kingdom would keep crude  output at current high levels as long as customers wanted it.
Translation: Arabia Saudita cuestiona la necesidad de los recortes de suministro de la OPEP CAIRO (Reuters) - El mayor productor de la OPEP, Arabia Saudita, cuestionó el miércoles la necesidad de que el cártel aumente los precios del petróleo mediante el recorte del suministro, diciendo que el reino mantendría la producción de crudo en los niveles actuales altos siempre y cuando los clientes lo deseen.
Paraphrase 1: (Version 1)
Paraphrase 2: The leading producer of OPEC, Saudi Arabia, expressed doubts on Wednesday regarding the need of the cartel to enhance oil prices by decreasing supply. The country reaffirmed it would maintain its elevated levels of crude oil output as desired by its customers.

Original Text: Lycos Offers Program to Attack Spammers (AP) AP - At the risk of breaching Internet civility, Lycos Europe is offering computer-users a weapon against spam-spewing servers: a screen-saver program that automatically hits the offenders with data to slow them down.
Translation: Lycos Ofrece Programa para Atacar a los Emisores de Spam (AP) AP - A riesgo de violar la cortesía de internet, Lycos Europa está ofreciendo a los usuarios de ordenadores una herramienta contra los servidores que emiten spam: un programa de salvapantallas que automáticamente golpea a los infractores con datos para ralentizarlos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lycos Proposes a Tool to Combat Spam (AP) - Despite potentially upsetting online etiquette, Lycos Europe has developed a tool for computer users to counteract spam-creating servers: a screen-saver application designed to automatically flood the violators with data to reduce their speed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lycos Introduces Initiative to Curb Spammers (AP) - In a bold move that could infringe on internet courtesy, Lycos Europe has presented a solution for computer users to retaliate against servers generating spam: a screen-saver software that auto-sends data to offending servers, thereby decelerating them.

Original Text: First contract signed with US companies at Havana Trade Fair US entrepreneurs participating in the Havana Trade Fair are planning to negotiate new sales of cattle and foodstuffs and hope to exceed the one billion dollars in total revenue they have
Translation: Primer contrato firmado con empresas estadounidenses en la Feria de Comercio de La Habana Los empresarios estadounidenses que participan en la Feria de Comercio de La Habana planean negociar nuevas ventas de ganado y alimentos, y esperan superar los mil millones de dólares en ingresos totales que tienen.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US companies' first agreement was signed at the Havana Trade Fair, where American entrepreneurs are aiming to negotiate additional sales of livestock and food products, hopeful of generating more than their previous total earnings of a billion dollars.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Havana Trade Fair, the inaugural deal with US firms took place, where US businesspeople envision negotiating additional deals for cattle and food items, with hopes to surpass their prior one billion dollars total turnover.

Original Text: Mississippian captures silver ATHENS, Greece - The Mississippian few thought would make the US Olympic team nearly won gold Monday in the 400 meters. Otis Harris of Edwards had the lead rounding the final turn of the one-lap sprint but
Translation: El habitante de Mississippi captura plata ATENAS, Grecia - El habitante de Mississippi que pocos pensaban que formaría parte del equipo olímpico de EE.UU casi gana oro el lunes en los 400 metros. Otis Harris de Edwards tenía la delantera al hacer la última curva de la carrera de una vuelta pero
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Athens, Greece, Otis Harris from Edwards, a Mississippian who was less expected to be part of the US Olympic team, surprisingly achieved second place on Monday in the 400 meters. Although leading as he rounded the final turn, he didn't secure the gold in the one-lap sprint.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Otis Harris of Edwards, Mississippi, almost clinched the gold at the US Olympic team's 400 meters event on Monday in Athens, Greece. Being an unlikely contender, Harris was ahead during the final turn of the one-lap sprint, but eventually secured the silver.

Original Text: Infineon execs plead to price-fixing Four executives of German memory chip maker Infineon Technologies AG have agreed to plead guilty to participating in a conspiracy to fix computer memory chip prices, the Department of Justice said Thursday.
Translation: Ejecutivos de Infineon se declaran culpables de manipulación de precios. Cuatro ejecutivos del fabricante alemán de chips de memoria Infineon Technologies AG han accedido a declararse culpables de participar en una conspiración para manipular los precios de los chips de memoria para computadoras, dijo el Departamento de Justicia el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Department of Justice announced on Thursday that four executives from Infineon Technologies AG, a German memory chip manufacturing company, have consented to plead guilty for their involvement in a scheme to manipulate the prices of computer memory chips.

Original Text: AT amp;T Cuts Internet Phone Service Prices AT amp;T Corp. is trimming the price of its new Internet-based telephone service for the second time in six months, prompting a top rival to follow suit.
Translation: AT&T Reduce los Precios del Servicio de Telefonía por Internet AT&T Corp. está reduciendo el precio de su nuevo servicio de telefonía basado en Internet por segunda vez en seis meses, lo que provoca que un principal competidor haga lo mismo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The cost of AT&T Corp.'s newly introduced Internet-based phone service has been reduced for the second time within a six-month period, which has led a major competitor to do the same.

Original Text: Oracle #39;s  #39;best and final #39; offer rejected PeopleSoft #39;s (PSFT) board Wednesday rejected Oracle #39;s (ORCL)  quot;best and final quot; hostile takeover bid worth about \$8.
Translation: La junta de PeopleSoft (PSFT) rechazó el miércoles la "mejor y última" oferta de adquisición hostil de Oracle (ORCL), valorada en aproximadamente \$8.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, PeopleSoft's board refused Oracle's "best and final" hostile takeover bid, which was worth approximately $8 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The board of PeopleSoft rebuffed Oracle's final and best hostile takeover attempt, valued around $8 billion, on Wednesday.

Original Text: Japanese taken captive in Iraq A group led by Jordanian Abu Musab al-Zarqawi said it would behead a member of Japan #39;s forces it had captured in Iraq if the Japanese government did not withdraw its forces from the country within 48 hours.
Translation: Un japonés tomado como prisionero en Irak. Un grupo liderado por el jordano Abu Musab al-Zarqawi dijo que decapitaría a un miembro de las fuerzas japonesas que había capturado en Irak si el gobierno japonés no retiraba sus fuerzas del país en un plazo de 48 horas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A group guided by the Jordanian Abu Musab al-Zarqawi has declared its intention to decapitate a captured member of the Japanese forces in Iraq if Japan's government fails to withdraw its troops from the country within two days.
Paraphrase 2: 2. If Japan does not withdraw its military forces from Iraq within 48 hours, Abu Musab al-Zarqawi's group, which has a Japanese captive from the country’s forces, threatened to execute him.

Original Text: Nymex launches Dublin oil trading US energy exchange Nymex has set up a new oil trading floor in Dublin, Ireland, in a move it hopes will lure disenchanted dealers from London.
Translation: Nymex lanza el comercio de petróleo en Dublín. La bolsa de energía de los Estados Unidos, Nymex, ha establecido un nuevo piso de comercio de petróleo en Dublín, Irlanda, en un movimiento que espera atraer a los comerciantes descontentos de Londres.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hoping to attract dissatisfied dealers from London, US energy exchange Nymex has initiated a new oil trading floor in Dublin, Ireland.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US energy exchange Nymex has commenced an oil trading hub in Dublin, Ireland, aiming to entice frustrated dealers away from London.

Original Text: Australian PM Howard Celebrates Fourth Poll Win Australian Prime Minister John Howard, a key US ally and supporter of the Iraq war, celebrated on Sunday his election win over opposition Labor after voters enjoying the fruits of a strong economy gave him another term.
Translation: El Primer Ministro Australiano Howard Celebra Cuarta Victoria Electoral El Primer Ministro de Australia, John Howard, un aliado clave de los EE.UU. y partidario de la guerra en Irak, celebró el domingo su victoria electoral sobre la oposición laborista después de que los votantes que disfrutan de los frutos de una economía fuerte le dieran otro mandato.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After voters reaped the benefits of a robust economy, Australian Prime Minister John Howard, a vital ally of the US and a supporter of the Iraq war, rejoiced his election victory over the opposition Labor party this Sunday, marking his fourth poll win.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Enjoying the rewards of a powerful economy, Australian voters awarded John Howard, the nation's Prime Minister and an important US ally backing the Iraq war, another term in office. The enthusiastic PM celebrated his fourth electoral success against the Opposition Labor party on Sunday.

Original Text: Thousands in Russia Rally Against Terror MOSCOW - Waving flags and banners, tens of thousands of Russians demonstrated against terrorism Tuesday, massing outside the Kremlin in response to calls for solidarity by President Vladimir Putin's government after a series of deadly attacks that have killed more than 400 people.    The growing crowd stood still for a moment of silence in memory of victims, starting the rally after a clock atop the Kremlin's Spassky Tower struck 5 p.m...
Translation: Miles en Rusia se Reúnen en Contra del Terrorismo MOSCÚ - Bajo el ondear de banderas y pancartas, decenas de miles de rusos se manifestaron contra el terrorismo el martes, agrupándose fuera del Kremlin en respuesta a los llamados de solidaridad por parte del gobierno del presidente Vladimir Putin tras una serie de mortales ataques que han matado a más de 400 personas. La multitud en crecimiento permaneció quieta durante un momento de silencio en memoria de las víctimas, iniciando la manifestación luego de que un reloj en la Torre Spassky del Kremlin marcara las 5 p.m.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a sequence of fatal attacks that claimed over 400 lives, tens of thousands of Russian demonstrators rallied against terrorism in response to President Vladimir Putin's call for unity. Specifically, this mass demonstration, replete with flags and banners, took place outside the Kremlin on Tuesday. The protest commenced after a solemn moment of silence in honor of the victims, symbolically starting when the Spassky Tower's clock atop the Kremlin marked 5 p.m.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, outside the Kremlin walls, tens of thousands of Russian civilians came together in a massive display against terrorism, driven by President Vladimir Putin's plea for national unity after a horrifying series of attacks slayed more than 400 citizens. The crowds, carrying banners and flags, observed a moment of silence remembering the victims prior to starting the rally, synchronized with the 5 p.m. toll of the clock on top of the Spassky Tower in the Kremlin.

Original Text: Artest Banned for Rest of Season After Ugly Brawl  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The National Basketball Association  suspended All-Star Ron Artest for the rest of the season and  Indiana Pacers team mates Stephen Jackson for 30 games and  Jermaine O'Neal for 25 following Friday's ugly brawl.
Translation: Artest Prohibido por el Resto de la Temporada Después de Horrible Pelea  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - La Asociación Nacional de Baloncesto suspendió al All-Star Ron Artest por el resto de la temporada y a sus compañeros de equipo de los Indiana Pacers, Stephen Jackson por 30 partidos y Jermaine O'Neal por 25, después de la fea pelea del viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a severe brawl on Friday, All-Star Ron Artest of the Indiana Pacers has been suspended by The National Basketball Association for the remainder of the season. His teammates - Stephen Jackson and Jermaine O'Neal have also been suspended for 30 games and 25 games respectively.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the aftermath of Friday's brawl, The National Basketball Association has sanctioned suspensions for several players from the Indiana Pacers team. All-Star Ron Artest got the rest of the season, while Stephen Jackson and Jermaine O'Neal received suspensions for 30 and 25 games, respectively.

Original Text: Unlike Florida, Alabama lacks state reinsurance program SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Reinsurers may be left with more of the losses from Hurricane Ivan than they faced from hurricanes Charley and Frances because Alabama has no state program to help insurers pay claims, analysts said.
Translation: A diferencia de Florida, Alabama carece de programa estatal de reaseguro SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Los reaseguradores podrían quedarse con más de las pérdidas del Huracán Iván de las que enfrentaron con los huracanes Charley y Frances porque Alabama no tiene un programa estatal que ayude a las aseguradoras a pagar las reclamaciones, dijeron los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts have reported that reinsurers could shoulder more losses from Hurricane Ivan than they did from hurricanes Charley and Frances because Alabama, unlike Florida, does not have a state reinsurance program to assist insurers in paying claims.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to analysts, the absence of a state reinsurance program in Alabama, unlike Florida, might mean that reinsurers are burdened with heavier losses from Hurricane Ivan compared to hurricanes Charley and Frances, since they have no extra support for payment of insurance claims.

Original Text: The CRM Money Pit - Part 5 (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Over the course of this series, CRM Daily is looking at areas that tend to develop into financial black holes for companies launching or updating a CRM project.
Translation: El Pozo de Dinero del CRM - Parte 5 (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - A lo largo de esta serie, CRM Daily está examinando áreas que tienden a convertirse en agujeros negros financieros para las empresas que lanzan o actualizan un proyecto de CRM.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NewsFactor presents Part 5 of 'The CRM Money Pit' series. In this series, CRM Daily is examining the sections that often turn into economic liabilities for businesses launching or upgrading a CRM project.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the fifth installment of 'The CRM Money Pit' by NewsFactor, CRM Daily explores the aspects that can potentially morph into financial sinkholes for companies undertaking or modernizing a CRM initiative.

Original Text: UNITED FEAR FAN TROUBLE MANCHESTER United will draft in extra security for today #39;s annual meeting amid fears of protests from fans opposed to Malcolm Glazer #39;s planned take-over.
Translation: EL UNITED TEME PROBLEMAS DE LOS FANÁTICOS. Manchester United incorporará seguridad adicional para la reunión anual de hoy debido a los temores de protestas por parte de los fanáticos en contra de la planeada adquisición de Malcolm Glazer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Manchester United is planning to bring in additional security for today's annual meeting due to concerns about potential fan protests against Malcolm Glazer's intended acquisition.

Original Text: UPDATE 1-Proud Palermo ensure Inter are held again Inter Milan were held to a 1-1 draw at home to promoted Palermo on Saturday after Luca Toni cancelled out Adriano #39;s opener for Inter at the San Siro stadium.
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1- Un orgulloso Palermo asegura que Inter es detenido nuevamente Inter Milan fue llevado a un empate 1-1 en casa contra Palermo promovido el sábado después de que Luca Toni cancelara la apertura de Adriano para Inter en el estadio San Siro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the first revision: Adriano's initial score for Inter Milan was offset by Luca Toni, resulting in a 1-1 draw against the newly promoted Palermo at San Siro Stadium on Saturday. Inter Milan has once again been unable to secure a win, a point of pride for Palermo.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the second revision: Despite Adriano's opening goal for Inter Milan at the San Siro Stadium, Luca Toni equalized for Palermo, resulting in a 1-1 draw in Saturday's match. This result ensured that Inter was held again, a feat that the newly elevated Palermo team are proud of.

Original Text: Atari launches 64-bit AMD 64 game CHIP FIRM AMD has got itself very excited because Atari has released a game that takes advantage of 64-bitness. The game, called Shadow Ops: Red Mercury, has more detail, uses artificial intelligence and  quot;never before seen textures quot;.
Translation: Atari lanza un CHIP de juego AMD 64 de 64 bits. La empresa CHIP, AMD, está muy emocionada porque Atari ha lanzado un juego que aprovecha la capacidad de 64 bits. El juego, llamado Shadow Ops: Red Mercury, tiene más detalle, utiliza inteligencia artificial y "texturas nunca antes vistas".
Paraphrase 1: 1. AMD is highly enthusiastic since Atari has introduced a new game, "Shadow Ops: Red Mercury", that leverages its 64-bit capabilities. This game, powered by a 64-bit AMD chip, delivers intricate detail, uses artificial intelligence, and offers innovative textures never seen before.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The release of a new game, "Shadow Ops: Red Mercury", by Atari has created a buzz at CHIP FIRM AMD. The game utilizes the 64-bit prowess of an AMD chip and impresses with its detailed graphics, application of artificial intelligence, and unprecedented textures.

Original Text: Update 2: Senate Delays Approving Tax Law Overhaul The drive to pass a \$136 billion corporate tax bill hit a roadblock in the Senate on Friday when lawmakers upset about tobacco regulation, new overtime rules and combat pay employed delaying tactics to keep the measure from coming up for a vote.
Translation: Actualización 2: El Senado Retrasa la Aprobación de la Reforma de la Ley de Impuestos. El impulso para aprobar un proyecto de ley de impuestos corporativos de $136 mil millones encontró un obstáculo en el Senado el viernes cuando los legisladores, molestos por la regulación del tabaco, las nuevas reglas de horas extras y el pago por combate, emplearon tácticas de retraso para evitar que la medida se sometiera a votación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The push to pass a $136 billion corporate tax bill suffered a setback in the Senate on Friday as lawmakers, frustrated over tobacco regulation, new overtime rules, and combat pay, used delaying strategies to prevent the bill from being voted on. This was the second update and the Senate delayed the approval of the tax law overhaul.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, a $136 billion corporate tax bill's progression was impeded in the Senate due to objections about tobacco regulation, new overtime rules, and combat pay, leading lawmakers to resort to delay tactics to avoid a vote. This event marked the second delay for the Senate in approving the tax law overhaul.

Original Text: Blast hits Bangladesh party rally A bomb explodes at an opposition rally in Bangladesh, killing at least one person, witnesses and police say.
Translation: Una explosión golpea el mitin de un partido en Bangladesh. Una bomba explota en un mitin de la oposición en Bangladesh, matando al menos a una persona, según testigos y la policía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A bomb detonation at a Bangladesh opposition rally results in at least one fatality, according to police and eyewitness reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Witnesses and police report that at least one individual was killed when an explosion occurred at an opposition party gathering in Bangladesh.

Original Text: The End User: What price cheaper ink? One measure of how much consumer technology you can get for the buck, yen or euro is today #39;s lowly printer. The reproduction capability of basic inkjet models that can be had for well under 200, or even
Translation: El Usuario Final: ¿Qué precio tiene la tinta más barata? Una medida de cuánta tecnología de consumo puedes obtener por dólar, yen o euro es la humilde impresora de hoy en día. La capacidad de reproducción de los modelos básicos de inyección de tinta que se pueden conseguir por bastante menos de 200, o incluso
Paraphrase 1: 1. Considering the end user who is keen on cost-effectiveness: How affordable is ink? A way to gauge the value for money in terms of consumer tech in present times, whether in dollars, yen, or euro, is to look at the humble printer. It's amazing how the reproduction ability of simple inkjet models, which can be purchased for considerably less than 200, or even...
Paraphrase 2: 2. From the perspective of the consumer: How much less expensive can ink be? Presently, an effective measure of the amount of consumer electronics one can purchase for their money, be it in dollars, yens, or euros, is the seemingly unassuming printer. The printing capability of basic inkjet models, which can be obtained for significantly less than 200, or potentially less...

Original Text: Global warming #39;s big chill plummeted, ushering in a deep freeze that lasted a century or more, researchers have proposed. earth and environmental sciences at the University of Illinois at Chicago, says he has evidence that this happened.
Translation: El gran enfriamiento del calentamiento global se desplomó, dando paso a una congelación profunda que duró un siglo o más, han propuesto los investigadores. Un profesor de ciencias de la tierra y medioambientales de la Universidad de Illinois en Chicago, dice que tiene evidencias de que esto ocurrió.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It has been proposed by researchers that global warming induced a dramatic drop in temperatures, leading to a deep freeze that spanned over a century. An earth and environmental scientist from the University of Illinois at Chicago claims to have evidence supporting this occurrence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A significant dip in global warming temperatures triggered a century-long deep freeze, a hypothesis that researchers have put forth. An expert in earth and environmental sciences at the University of Illinois at Chicago asserts that he possesses proof of this happening.

Original Text: Breathing problems from smoke or toxic fumes As NASA lays the groundwork for a return to the moon and unprecedented trips to Mars, experts must confront a new concern: What if an astronaut gets really sick 35 million miles from home?
Translation: Problemas respiratorios por humo o vapores tóxicos. A medida que la NASA sienta las bases para un regreso a la luna y viajes sin precedentes a Marte, los expertos deben enfrentar una nueva preocupación: ¿Qué pasaría si un astronauta se enferma gravemente a 35 millones de millas de casa?
Paraphrase 1: 1. As NASA plans their return to the moon and unprecedented Mars missions, a new concern arises: What happens if an astronaut becomes severely ill 35 million miles away from home due to breathing problems from smoke or toxic fumes?
Paraphrase 2: 2. If an astronaut falls severely ill from inhaling smoke or toxic fumes while 35 million miles away from home, what would happen? This is a novel concern that experts must address as NASA prepares for their return to the moon and their first-ever trips to Mars.

Original Text: Patriots Establish Web Site in Chinese (AP) AP - How do you explain a quarterback sneak in Chinese? How about a blitz, an onside kick, or a fair catch?
Translation: Patriotas establecen sitio web en chino (AP) AP - ¿Cómo se explica un acarreo de quarterback en chino? ¿Qué tal una blitz, un despeje al comienzo, o una recepción limpia?
Paraphrase 1: (AP) AP - How would you describe a quarterback sneak in Chinese? Could you explain a blitz, an onside kick, or a fair catch?
Paraphrase 2: (AP) AP - Can you translate a quarterback sneak into Chinese? How would you interpret a blitz, an onside kick, or a fair catch?

Original Text: Update 4: Ex-Enron Treasurer to Testify at Trial A former Merrill Lynch executive pointed to a verbal buyout agreement with Enron Corp. in saying he might support an  quot;unsecured deal quot; with another company, according to an e-mail presented to jurors in an ongoing conspiracy and fraud trial.
Translation: Actualización 4: Ex tesorero de Enron testificará en el juicio. Un ex ejecutivo de Merrill Lynch apuntó a un acuerdo de compra verbal con Enron Corp. al decir que podría apoyar un "acuerdo no garantizado" con otra compañía, según un correo electrónico presentado a los jurados en un juicio de conspiración y fraude en curso.
Paraphrase 1: Fourth Update: The ex-treasurer of Enron is set to give testimony in court. Evidence in the form of an email revealed during the ongoing conspiracy and fraud trial shows a former executive at Merrill Lynch referencing a spoken buyout agreement with Enron Corp., suggesting his potential backing for an 'unsecured deal' with a different firm.
Paraphrase 2: Update 4: In the ongoing trial involving conspiracy and fraud, the former Enron treasurer will take the stand. An email displayed to the jury indicates that a Merrill Lynch ex-executive acknowledged a verbal buyout arrangement with Enron Corp., hinting at his possible endorsement of an 'unsecured deal' with another entity.

Original Text: Microsoft Patch to Fix Security Flaws (AP) AP - Microsoft Corp. announced Tuesday it has found a new security flaw with its Windows XP operating system and warned that an attacker could infiltrate other computers by persuading their owners to open a specialized graphics file.
Translation: Parche de Microsoft para arreglar fallas de seguridad (AP) AP - Microsoft Corp. anunció el martes que ha encontrado una nueva falla de seguridad en su sistema operativo Windows XP y advirtió que un atacante podría infiltrarse en otros ordenadores persuadiendo a sus dueños para abrir un archivo de gráficos especializado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Microsoft Corporation issued a warning on Tuesday, stating that they have uncovered a fresh security vulnerability within their Windows XP operating system. They cautioned that a hacker could potentially access other computers by convincing their owners to open a specific type of graphics file. The firm promises a correcting patch soon.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) Microsoft Corp., on Tuesday, revealed that they've detected a novel security issue in the Windows XP operating system, raising an alarm that computers could be breached if an attacker can persuade their owners to open a unique graphics file. Consequently, they are set to release a patch that would rectify this vulnerability.

Original Text: US Weekly Jobless Claims Rise The US Labor Department said Thursday the number of workers filing first-time applications for unemployment benefits rose by 10,000 last week.
Translation: Las solicitudes semanales de desempleo en EE.UU aumentan. El Departamento de Trabajo de EE.UU dijo el jueves que el número de trabajadores que presentaron solicitudes por primera vez para los beneficios de desempleo aumentó en 10,000 la semana pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, the US Labor Department revealed that there was a rise of 10,000 in the number of first-time applications for unemployment benefits last week, indicating an increase in weekly jobless claims.

Original Text: China, Taiwan lauded for canceling exercises WASHINGTON -- The State Department welcomed yesterday steps by China and Taiwan to ease tensions by curtailing long-planned military exercises. Taiwan canceled a major live-fire military exercise shortly after Beijing reportedly called off massive war games near Taiwan.  quot;We welcome and encourage all these steps that are being taken by Taiwan and the People's Republic of China to reduce tensions, quot; ...
Translation: China, Taiwan elogiados por cancelar ejercicios WASHINGTON -- El Departamento de Estado dio la bienvenida ayer a las medidas tomadas por China y Taiwan para aliviar las tensiones mediante la reducción de los ejercicios militares planeados desde hace mucho tiempo. Taiwan canceló un importante ejercicio militar de fuego real poco después de que Beijing supuestamente llamara para cancelar los masivos juegos de guerra cerca de Taiwan. "Damos la bienvenida y alentamos todos estos pasos que están tomando Taiwán y la República Popular de China para reducir las tensiones," ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The State Department expressed their approval yesterday for the actions taken by China and Taiwan to lessen strains, with both nations suspending their respective long-planned military exercises. Following Beijing's reported cancellation of large-scale war exercises near Taiwan, the latter also withdrew a major live-fire military exercise. "We endorse and promote all such initiatives from Taiwan and the People's Republic of China aiming at tension reduction,"...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, the Department of State lauded the moves by China and Taiwan to alleviate stresses by discontinuing their projected military drills. Shortly after Beijing purportedly put an end to extensive war drills in proximity to Taiwan, the latter also aborted a key live-fire military drill. "We are in favor of and support every measure being employed by both Taiwan and the People's Republic of China to decrease animosities,"...

Original Text: Thousands sign up for British tycoon Branson #39;s space flights  quot;Star Trek quot; star William Shatner and Red Hot Chili Peppers drummer Dave Navarro are among thousands who want to fly on Virgin #39;s proposed commercial space flights, company chief Richard Branson said Friday.
Translation: Miles se inscriben para los vuelos espaciales del magnate británico Branson. La estrella de "Star Trek", William Shatner, y el baterista de Red Hot Chili Peppers, Dave Navarro, están entre los miles que quieren volar en los propuestos vuelos espaciales comerciales de Virgin, dijo el viernes el jefe de la compañía, Richard Branson.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Richard Branson, the head of the company, announced on Friday that among the thousands who have signed up for Virgin's upcoming commercial space flights are William Shatner, the "Star Trek" star, and Dave Navarro, the drummer for Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Virgin's company boss, Richard Branson revealed that "Star Trek" actor William Shatner and Red Hot Chili Peppers drummer Dave Navarro are among the thousands who have registered their interest in Virigin's prospective commercial space trips.

Original Text: Israeli Company Offers Free Tsunami Alert System  JERUSALEM (Reuters) - An Israeli company said on Monday it  planned to distribute free to Asian countries hit by last  week's tsunami a device it says could save lives by warning  holiday-makers directly that a tidal wave is coming.
Translation: Empresa Israelí Ofrece Sistema de Alerta de Tsunami Gratis JERUSALÉN (Reuters) - Una empresa israelí dijo el lunes que planeaba distribuir gratis a los países asiáticos afectados por el tsunami de la semana pasada un dispositivo que, según afirma, podría salvar vidas al advertir directamente a los turistas que se acerca una ola gigante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. JERUSALEM (Reuters) - An Israeli firm announced its plan on Monday to provide, free of cost, a tsunami warning system to the Asian nations affected by the recent tidal wave. The company claims that this device could directly alert vacationers about approaching tsunamis and potentially save lives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. JERUSALEM (Reuters) - A device that could warn beach-goers of impending tsunamis and potentially save lives is to be distributed for free to the Asian countries affected by the recent tsunami, as per the announcement made by an Israeli company on Monday.

Original Text: French media: Israelis aided Ivory Coast military in attacks  quot;Israel mercenaries assisting the Ivory Coast army operated unmanned aircraft that aided aerial bombings of a French base in the country, quot; claimed
Translation: Medios franceses: Israelíes ayudaron al ejército de Costa de Marfil en ataques "Mercenarios israelíes asistiendo al ejército de Costa de Marfil operaron aviones no tripulados que ayudaron en bombardeos aéreos de una base francesa en el país", afirmaron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "It's claimed that Israeli mercenaries helped the Ivory Coast military carry out attacks by operating unmanned aircraft and assisting in the aerial bombing of a French base in the country," according to French media reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to sources in French media, "The Ivory Coast army received assistance from Israeli mercenaries, who operated unmanned aircraft to aid in aerial assaults on a French base in the nation."

Original Text: Hewitt cruises past Llodra Second seed Lleyton Hewitt beat Frenchman Michael Llodra 6-1 6-4 to reach the quarter-finals of the TD Waterhouse Cup on Thursday.
Translation: Hewitt avanza fácilmente ante Llodra. El segundo cabeza de serie, Lleyton Hewitt, venció al francés Michael Llodra 6-1 6-4 para llegar a los cuartos de final de la Copa TD Waterhouse el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Lleyton Hewitt, the second seed, defeated French player Michael Llodra with a score of 6-1, 6-4, advancing to the TD Waterhouse Cup quarter-finals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Frenchman Michael Llodra lost to second seed Lleyton Hewitt, with a score of 6-1, 6-4, in the TD Waterhouse Cup on Thursday, sending Hewitt into the quarter-finals.

Original Text: US Airways pilots vote for pay cuts of \$300m Pilots at US Airways have voted in favour of giving \$300 million in annual wage and benefit concessions to the struggling airline, becoming the first major labor group to accept permanent cuts, the union representing pilots said.
Translation: Los pilotos de US Airways votan a favor de recortes salariales de $300 millones. Los pilotos de US Airways han votado a favor de conceder $300 millones en concesiones anuales de salarios y beneficios a la aerolínea en dificultades, convirtiéndose en el primer grupo laboral importante en aceptar recortes permanentes, según dijo el sindicato que representa a los pilotos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) US Airways pilots have cast their votes, agreeing to annual wage and benefit reductions amounting to $300 million, according to the pilots' union. This makes them the first major labor group to consent to lasting cuts in the face of the airline's financial struggles.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The pilot's union revealed that the pilots of US Airways have voted to concede $300 million in annual salary and perks, marking them as the first significant labor force to accept long-term cuts as the airline grapples with financial difficulties.

Original Text: Lunar Ice: 'Cold Traps' Eyed for Exploration (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - BOULDER, COLORADO -- Think \  of it as some sort of extraterrestrial axiom: Look for places on a celestial \  body where the Sun doesn't shine.
Translation: Hielo Lunar: 'Trampas Frías' Observadas para Exploración (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - BOULDER, COLORADO -- Considéralo como una especie de axioma extraterrestre: Busca lugares en un cuerpo celestial donde el sol no brilla.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lunar Ice: Exploration of 'Cold Traps' Considered (SPACE.com). SPACE.com - BOULDER, COLORADO -- View it as an outer space principle: Seek out locations on an astronomical object where sunlight doesn't reach.
Paraphrase 2: 2. 'Cold Traps' on Lunar Ice: A Potential Area for Investigation (SPACE.com). SPACE.com - BOULDER, COLORADO -- Perceive this as a universal truth: The areas on a heavenly body that remain untouched by the sun should be explored.

Original Text: Minnesota Wild re-sign defenceman Nick Schultz to one-year deal The Minnesota Wild re-signed defenceman Nick Schultz to a one-year contract on Tuesday. Schultz established career-highs in games played (79), goals (6), assists (10), points (16), shots (72) and plus/minus rating (12) last season.
Translation: Minnesota Wild renueva al defensor Nick Schultz con un contrato de un año. El Minnesota Wild recontrató al defensor Nick Schultz con un contrato de un año el martes. Schultz estableció máximos en su carrera en partidos jugados (79), goles (6), asistencias (10), puntos (16), tiros (72) y calificación de más/menos (12) la temporada pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Nick Schultz, the defenceman, was re-signed to a one-year contract by the Minnesota Wild. Schultz set new career-highs last season, playing 79 games, scoring 6 goals and 10 assists, netting 16 points, taking 72 shots, and with a plus/minus rating of 12.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Minnesota Wild have confirmed the re-signing of defenceman Nick Schultz for another year. Schultz had a breakout last season, setting personal records in games played (79), goals (6), assists (10), points (16), shots (72), and the plus/minus rating (12).

Original Text: Pfizer launching expanded ad campaign for Celebrex Just weeks after Merck  amp; Co. pulled its anti-inflammatory drug Vioxx from the market, rival Celebrex, marketed by Pfizer Inc. , is mounting a wide-scale, consumer-oriented ad campaign to get people to ask their doctors about the drug.
Translation: Pfizer lanza una ampliada campaña publicitaria para Celebrex. Solo semanas después de que Merck & Co. retirara su medicamento antiinflamatorio Vioxx del mercado, su rival Celebrex, comercializado por Pfizer Inc., está montando una campaña publicitaria a gran escala y orientada al consumidor para que las personas pregunten a sus médicos acerca del medicamento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shortly after Merck & Co. withdrew its anti-inflammatory drug Vioxx from the market, Pfizer Inc. is increasing its promotional efforts for its competing drug, Celebrex. The pharmaceutical giant is launching a comprehensive, consumer-targeted advertisement campaign to encourage individuals to inquire about the drug with their physicians.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pfizer Inc., not long after the recall of Merck & Co.'s anti-inflammatory drug Vioxx, is escalating its marketing for Celebrex, its equivalent offering. Aiming to spur customers into consulting their doctors about the drug, the company is undertaking an intensive advertising campaign.

Original Text: Chirac promotes China trade links The French president will meet his Chinese counterpart on a four-day state visit focusing on economic ties.
Translation: Chirac promueve vínculos comerciales con China. El presidente francés se reunirá con su homólogo chino en una visita de estado de cuatro días centrada en los lazos económicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The French president is set for a four-day state visit where he will meet his Chinese counterpart to enhance China trade links - Chirac is promoting the same.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During his four-day state visit, Chirac, the French president, will meet with his Chinese counterpart to foster economic ties, thus promoting trade links with China.

Original Text: Nokia to offer encryption tool The handset maker is teaming up with a Swedish security company to offer encryption software for some of its phones.
Translation: Nokia ofrecerá herramienta de cifrado. El fabricante de teléfonos se está asociando con una compañía de seguridad sueca para ofrecer software de cifrado para algunos de sus teléfonos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nokia, the handset manufacturer, is collaborating with a Swedish security firm to provide encryption software for certain models of its phones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In partnership with a Swedish security company, Nokia plans to provide encryption software for selected phones.

Original Text: Tinsley #39;s big 2nd half lifts Pacers to win INDIANAPOLIS  Jamaal Tinsley scored 17 of his 22 points in the second half to lead the Pacers to an 89-86 victory over the Raptors, who traded All-Star Vince Carter to New Jersey earlier Friday.
Translation: La gran segunda mitad de Tinsley #39 lleva a los Pacers a la victoria INDIANAPOLIS Jamaal Tinsley anotó 17 de sus 22 puntos en la segunda mitad para liderar a los Pacers a una victoria de 89-86 sobre los Raptors, quienes habían traspasado al All-Star Vince Carter a New Jersey el viernes anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jamaal Tinsley, who scored 17 out of his total 22 points in the second half, led Pacers to an 89-86 triumph over the Raptors on Friday, the same day Raptors traded All-Star Vince Carter to New Jersey. This critical performance from Tinsley helped Pacers secure victory in Indianapolis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Indianapolis, the Pacers secured an 89-86 win over the Raptors, majorly thanks to Jamaal Tinsley's impressive second half where he scored 17 of his 22 points. Notably, the Raptors had earlier on Friday traded their All-Star, Vince Carter, to New Jersey.

Original Text: Election will also decide Greenspan's successor Wanted: Brilliant economist. Must be politically savvy, trusted by Wall Street, a strong leader and consensus builder, cool in a crisis, able to calm world markets with a few words and likely to guide the economy into robust health in time for the 2008 presidential election.
Translation: Las elecciones también decidirán al sucesor de Greenspan. Se busca: economista brillante. Debe ser políticamente astuto, confiable para Wall Street, un líder sólido y creador de consensos, sereno en crisis, capaz de calmar los mercados mundiales con unas pocas palabras y probablemente guiará a la economía hacia una salud robusta a tiempo para las elecciones presidenciales de 2008.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Wanted: A mentally astute economist who is politically knowledgeable, possesses Wall Street's trust, demonstrates strong leadership and consensus-building skills, maintains composure in crises, can pacify global markets with terse communication, and is apt to steer the economy to robust health by the 2008 Presidential election. This upcoming election will also determine the successor to Greenspan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Required: An economist of brilliance who is adept in politics, has the confidence of Wall Street, exhibits strength in leadership and agreement formation, remains unflustered in turbulent scenarios, can stabilize world markets with succinct phrases, and can bring about flourishing economic health in sync with the 2008 Presidential election timeline. Additionally, the impending election will decide who will fill Greenspan's shoes.

Original Text: Around the world Israeli forces continued a major operation in the Gaza Strip on Thursday, using tanks and armored vehicles to suppress rocket fire into Israel, and in the process killing seven Palestinians.
Translation: En todo el mundo, las fuerzas israelíes continuaron una operación mayor en la Franja de Gaza el jueves, utilizando tanques y vehículos blindados para suprimir el fuego de cohetes hacia Israel, y en el proceso matando a siete palestinos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Israeli forces pressed on with a large-scale operation in the Gaza Strip, utilizing tanks and armored vehicles to curb rocket attacks into Israel. This operation resulted in the death of seven Palestinians.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Israeli forces maintained a significant campaign against rocket attacks in the Gaza Strip on Thursday, employing tanks and armored vehicles globally. Unfortunately, this operation led to the death of seven Palestinians.

Original Text: Baghdad Suicide Bomber Kills at Least 5 A suicide attacker detonated a car packed with explosives in front of a row of parked police cars in central Baghdad on Friday, killing at least five people and wounding 20, officials said.
Translation: Atacante suicida en Bagdad mata al menos a 5 personas: un atacante suicida detonó un coche lleno de explosivos frente a una fila de autos de policía estacionados en el centro de Bagdad el viernes, matando al menos a cinco personas y hiriendo a 20, dijeron funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1) An assailant committed suicide by detonating a vehicle filled with explosives in the heart of Baghdad strip of stationary police cars last Friday, resulting in at least five deaths and twenty injuries, mentioned the authorities.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In the central region of Baghdad, a suicide bomber ignited a car filled with explosives in front of a line of police vehicles this past Friday, tragically causing a minimum of five fatalities and wounding 20 others, as reported by officials.

Original Text: Minaya Heads South, and Things Heat Up KEY BISCAYNE, Fla., Nov. 8 - When Omar Minaya checked into the Ritz-Carlton on Monday for the major league baseball general managers meetings, he had a receiving line of New York reporters waiting for him in the lobby.
Translation: Minaya se dirige al sur, y las cosas se calientan KEY BISCAYNE, Florida, 8 de noviembre - Cuando Omar Minaya se registró en el Ritz-Carlton el lunes para las reuniones de los gerentes generales de las Grandes Ligas de Béisbol, tenía una línea de recepción de periodistas de Nueva York esperándole en el vestíbulo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Things started sizzling in Key Biscayne, Florida on November 8, as Omar Minaya arrived at the Ritz-Carlton for the major league baseball general managers meetings. Upon his arrival, a congregation of New York reporters were eagerly waiting to receive him in the hotel lobby.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, November 8, Omar Minaya was greeted by a line of New York reporters who were stationed in the lobby of the Ritz-Carlton in Key Biscayne, Florida. He was in town for the major league baseball general managers meetings, an event that certainly heated up the southern state.

Original Text: Lippi sticks to his guns against Belarus Italy coach Marcello Lippi is sticking to his guns in a World Cup qualifier against Belarus Wednesday night despite Saturday #39;s shock defeat in Slovenia with 0-1, local media reported Tuesday.
Translation: Lippi se mantiene firme en su postura contra Bielorrusia. El entrenador de Italia, Marcello Lippi, se mantiene firme en su postura en un partido clasificatorio para la Copa del Mundo contra Bielorrusia el miércoles por la noche, a pesar de la sorpresiva derrota del sábado en Eslovenia con un 0-1, informaron los medios locales el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite suffering a surprising 0-1 defeat to Slovenia on Saturday, Italy's coach Marcello Lippi is holding firm in his strategies for the World Cup qualifier against Belarus on Wednesday night, according to local reports on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Local media reported on Tuesday that Marcello Lippi, the coach of Italy, intends to maintain his tactics for the forthcoming Wednesday's World Cup qualifier against Belarus, notwithstanding the unexpected 0-1 defeat to Slovenia on the previous Saturday.

Original Text: Softbank Protests Bandwidth Allocation the billionaire founder and CEO of Softbank -- says Softbank issued a statement protesting the Japanese government #39;s plan to allocate the 800mhz band exclusively to two existing mobile-phone operators.
Translation: Softbank protesta la asignación de ancho de banda. El fundador multimillonario y CEO de Softbank, dice que Softbank emitió un comunicado protestando el plan del gobierno japonés de asignar la banda de 800mhz exclusivamente a dos operadores de telefonía móvil existentes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The CEO of Softbank, who also happens to be its billionaire founder, has announced that Softbank is expressing dissent over the Japanese government's intention to assign the 800mhz band solely to a pair of present mobile-phone operators.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Softbank has expressed opposition to the Japanese government's proposal to restrict access to the 800mhz band to only two current mobile-phone operators, according to a statement from the company's billionaire founder and CEO.

Original Text: Karzai hopeful unhurt by blast TALIBAN attackers set off a roadside bomb near a convoy carrying the Afghan president #39;s running mate and other dignitaries in north-eastern Afghanistan yesterday, killing one man and injuring five.
Translation: Karzai, esperanzado, indemne tras la explosión. Atacantes TALIBANES detonaron una bomba a la orilla del camino cerca de un convoy que transportaba al compañero de fórmula del presidente afgano y a otros dignatarios en el noreste de Afganistán ayer, matando a un hombre e hiriendo a cinco.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A roadside bomb explosion, set off by Taliban attackers near a convoy transporting the Afghan president's running mate and other dignitaries within north-eastern Afghanistan yesterday, resulted in one death and injuries to five others. However, the hopeful Karzai remained unscathed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite a roadside bomb detonation by Taliban assailants close to a convoy that included the Afghan president's running mate and notable personalities in north-eastern Afghanistan, the candidate Karzai escaped without injury. The incident, which happened yesterday, claimed one life and left five people injured.

Original Text: NIGERIA: New fuel strike shuts down key cities LAGOS, 11 Oct 2004 (IRIN) - Several of Nigeria #39;s biggest cities were paralysed on Monday as labour unions began a four-day general strike to protest at the latest fuel price increases under President Olusegun Obasanjos deregulation programme.
Translation: NIGERIA: Nueva huelga de combustible paraliza ciudades clave LAGOS, 11 de Octubre de 2004 (IRIN) - Varias de las ciudades más grandes de Nigeria quedaron paralizadas el lunes cuando los sindicatos laborales comenzaron una huelga general de cuatro días para protestar contra los últimos aumentos en los precios del combustible bajo el programa de desregulación del Presidente Olusegun Obasanjo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LAGOS, 11 Oct 2004 (IRIN) - A four-day general strike initiated by labour unions in response to the recent fuel price hikes as a part of President Olusegun Obasanjo's deregulation program, brought several of Nigeria's largest cities to a standstill on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Several major cities in Nigeria were crippled on Monday due to a general strike spearheaded by labour unions, protesting the ongoing fuel price hikes as a result of President Olusegun Obasanjo's deregulation policy. LAGOS, 11 Oct 2004 (IRIN).

Original Text: E*Trade Says Customer Trading Dipped in July NEW YORK (Reuters) - E*Trade Financial Corp. (ET.N: Quote, Profile, Research) , a major online broker, on Wednesday said customer stock trading for the month of July dropped 1.6 percent from June as investors curbed their enthusiasm for trading stocks.
Translation: E*Trade dice que las operaciones de los clientes disminuyeron en julio NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - E*Trade Financial Corp. (ET.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), un importante corredor en línea, dijo el miércoles que las operaciones de acciones de los clientes para el mes de julio cayeron un 1,6 por ciento desde junio, ya que los inversores moderaron su entusiasmo por operar acciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a recent Wednesday announcement, major online broker E*Trade Financial Corp. reported a 1.6 percent decrease in customer stock trading in July compared to June, suggesting decreased investor interest in trading stocks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. E*Trade Financial Corp., a significant online broker, reported on Wednesday a decline of 1.6 percent in customer stock trades during July from the previous month, indicating a lessening enthusiasm among investors for trading stocks.

Original Text: Howard Says Full Sale of Telstra This Term Isn #39;t Guaranteed Australian Prime Minister John Howard said yesterday #39;s invitation for proposals from investment banks on how to sell the government #39;s A\$32 billion (\$24 billion) stake in Telstra Corp.
Translation: Howard Dice que la Venta Total de Telstra en este Período No Está Garantizada. El Primer Ministro Australiano, John Howard, dijo ayer que se invitó a propuestas de los bancos de inversión sobre cómo vender la participación del gobierno de A\$32 mil millones (\$24 mil millones) en Telstra Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australian Prime Minister John Howard indicated that the complete sale of Telstra within this term is not guaranteed, despite yesterday's request to investment banks for proposals on the best way to sell the government's A$32 billion stake.

Original Text: Sprint, SBC In Hotspot Roaming Deal Sprint and SBC Communications Friday announced a two-way roaming deal that will enable the customers of each vendor to access the hotspots run by the other.
Translation: Sprint, SBC en Acuerdo de Roaming para Hotspot Sprint y SBC Communications anunciaron el viernes un acuerdo de roaming bidireccional que permitirá a los clientes de cada proveedor acceder a los puntos de acceso administrados por el otro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A two-way roaming agreement has been announced this Friday by Sprint and SBC Communications, which allows customers of each provider to utilize the hotspots operated by the other.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Friday saw the proclamation of a mutual roaming agreement between Sprint and SBC Communications, granting customers from each company access to the other's hotspots.

Original Text: Lincou seals world squash triumph DOHA, Qatar -- Thierry Lincou has become the first Frenchman ever to win the world squash title. Lincou beat top-seeded Englishman Lee Beachill 5-11 11-2 2-11 12-10 11-8 on Friday, saving a match point at 9-10 in the fourth game.
Translation: Lincou sella el triunfo mundial de squash DOHA, Qatar -- Thierry Lincou se ha convertido en el primer francés en ganar el título mundial de squash. Lincou venció al sembrado inglés número uno, Lee Beachill, 5-11 11-2 2-11 12-10 11-8 el viernes, salvando un punto de partido en 9-10 en el cuarto juego.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thierry Lincou of France emerged victorious in the world squash championship, making history by defeating the number one seed from England, Lee Beachill. The scores were 5-11 11-2 2-11 12-10 11-8 on Friday, with Lincou making a spectacular save at a match point when he was trailing 9-10 in the fourth game. This marked the first time a Frenchman has ever claimed this title.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Frenchman Thierry Lincou won the world squash championship, a first for any French player. Battling against top-seeded Lee Beachill from England, Lincou won the match with scores 5-11 11-2 2-11 12-10 11-8. He made an impressive save at 9-10 down in the fourth game, eventually securing his historic win.

Original Text: Economy Grows Faster Than Expected in 3Q (AP) AP - The economy  #151; helped out by more brisk consumer and business spending  #151; grew at an annual rate of 3.9 percent in the third quarter, a performance that was stronger than previously thought.
Translation: Economía Crece Más Rápido de lo Esperado en 3T (AP) AP - La economía #151; impulsada por un gasto de consumidores y empresas más vigoroso #151; creció a una tasa anual del 3.9 por ciento en el tercer trimestre, un rendimiento que fue más fuerte de lo que se pensaba anteriormente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - With the aid of accelerated consumer and business spending, the economy expanded by a surprising yearly rate of 3.9 percent in the third quarter, showing a performance that exceeded previous estimations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The annual economic growth rate for the third quarter reached 3.9 percent, surpassing earlier assumptions, according to AP. This acceleration results primarily from higher consumer and business spending.

Original Text: Arsene Wenger  the Arsenal years 1998: Wins Premiership with club-record 10 consecutive League wins. Arsenal equal Manchester United #39;s record of two Doubles when they beat Newcastle in the FA Cup final.
Translation: Arsene Wenger, los años en Arsenal 1998: Gana la Premiership con un récord del club de 10 victorias consecutivas en la Liga. Arsenal iguala el récord de dos Dobletes de Manchester United cuando vencen a Newcastle en la final de la FA Cup.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In 1998, Arsene Wenger led Arsenal to a club-record 10 consecutive League victories, earning the Premiership title. Additionally, by defeating Newcastle in the FA Cup final, Arsenal equaled Manchester United's record of achieving two Doubles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Under Arsene Wenger's guidance, Arsenal set a club-record in 1998 with 10 consecutive League wins which led to them winning the Premiership. They also matched Manchester United's achievement of two Doubles by triumphing over Newcastle in the FA Cup final.

Original Text: Medtronic Net Up on Higher ICD Sales (Reuters) Reuters - Medtronic Inc. (MDT.N) on Wednesday\said its quarterly earnings rose on surprisingly brisk demand\for devices that slow racing heartbeats, offsetting a\weaker-than-expected performance in some of its other\businesses.
Translation: Aumentan las ganancias netas de Medtronic debido a mayores ventas de ICD (Reuters) Reuters - Medtronic Inc. (MDT.N) el miércoles dijo que sus ganancias trimestrales aumentaron debido a una demanda sorprendentemente fuerte de dispositivos que ralentizan los latidos del corazón acelerados, compensando un rendimiento más débil de lo esperado en algunos de sus otros negocios.
Paraphrase 1: (1) Reuters - Medtronic Inc. (MDT.N) announced on Wednesday that its quarterly profits increased due to the unexpected surge in the demand for devices that regulate rapid heart rates, compensating for the underperformance in some of its other sectors.
Paraphrase 2: (2) According to Reuters, despite some of its sectors performing below expectation, Medtronic Inc. (MDT.N) reported an increase in its quarterly earnings on Wednesday, due to a surprising boost in sales for devices used to manage fast heartbeats.

Original Text: Designated hitter to have season-ending surgery Anaheim Angels designated hitter Tim Salmon will have season-ending operations on his left knee and left shoulder. Salmon was examined Wednesday by Dr.
Translation: Bateador designado tendrá cirugía que terminará con su temporada. El bateador designado de los Angeles de Anaheim, Tim Salmon, tendrá operaciones que terminarán su temporada en su rodilla izquierda y en su hombro izquierdo. Salmon fue examinado el miércoles por el Dr.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tim Salmon, the designated hitter for the Anaheim Angels, will undergo surgery on his left knee and left shoulder, ending his season. The medical examination was undertaken by Dr. on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tim Salmon, of the Anaheim Angels, who serves as a designated hitter, is set to have operations on his left shoulder and knee, putting an end to his season. The issues were assessed by Dr. this Wednesday.

Original Text: US planes pound Fallujah FALLUJAH - American warplanes struck Iraqi positions in the rebel stronghold of Fallujah Thursday, ahead of an expected assault on the city.
Translation: Aviones estadounidenses bombardean Fallujah FALLUJAH - Aviones de guerra americanos atacaron posiciones iraquíes en el bastión rebelde de Fallujah el jueves, anticipándose a un asalto esperado sobre la ciudad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. FALLUJAH - Ahead of a projected attack on the city, American aircraft targeted Iraqi sites in the rebel bastion of Fallujah on Thursday.

Original Text: Browns Place Garmon, Bodden on IR (AP) AP - The Browns placed offensive lineman Kelvin Garmon and defensive back Leigh Bodden on injured reserve Tuesday.
Translation: Lugar de los Browns Garmon, Bodden en IR (AP) AP: Los Browns colocaron al liniero ofensivo Kelvin Garmon y al defensa Leigh Bodden en la reserva de lesionados el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - Kelvin Garmon, an offensive lineman, and Leigh Bodden, a defensive back, were placed on the injured reserve by the Browns on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AP - Tuesday saw the Browns put Kelvin Garmon, their offensive lineman, and Leigh Bodden, a defensive back, on the injured reserve.

Original Text: HP drops plans to put Compaq technology into HP-UX Hewlett-Packard Co. (HP) has abandoned plans to integrate a number of advanced technologies it acquired in its 2002 purchase of Compaq Computer Corp.
Translation: HP abandona los planes de incorporar la tecnología de Compaq en HP-UX. Hewlett-Packard Co. (HP) ha abandonado los planes de integrar una serie de tecnologías avanzadas que adquirió en su compra de Compaq Computer Corp. en 2002.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hewlett-Packard Co. (HP) has decided to forego the integration of myriad high-tech features acquired from its 2002 purchase of Compaq Computer Corp, dashing earlier plans to incorporate Compaq technology into HP-UX.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Plans by HP to introduce Compaq's technology into HP-UX have been abandoned, following HP deciding not to use the advanced technologies they acquired from their 2002 purchase of Compaq Computer Corp.

Original Text: The Sun's Travels and Why Fall is Nigh (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - Wednesday, Sept. 22 marks what scientists call the fall equinox in the Northern \  Hemisphere, when night and day are of equal length and cooler weather is on \  the way -- if it hasn't already arrived.
Translation: Viajes del Sol y Por Qué el Otoño Está Cerca (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - El miércoles 22 de septiembre marca lo que los científicos llaman el equinoccio de otoño en el hemisferio norte, cuando la noche y el día tienen la misma duración y el clima más fresco está en camino, si es que no ha llegado ya.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (SPACE.com) On Wednesday, September 22, the fall equinox in the Northern Hemisphere, a scientific event when day and night reach equal duration, is signalled by SPACE.com. This occurrence denotes the advent of cooler weather, if it hasn't set in yet. It's the focus of the article, "The Sun's Travels and Why Fall is Nigh".
Paraphrase 2: 2. The article "The Sun's Travels and Why Fall is Nigh" on SPACE.com informs that Wednesday, Sep 22 witnesses the occurrence of the fall equinox in the Northern Hemisphere.
