This scientific phenomenon, characterized by equal lengths of day and night, is often a herald for forthcoming cooler weather, unless it has already commenced.

Original Text: Harvest time in Indonesia by our Internet desk, 22 September 2004. Former Indonesian security minister Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono and his advisers are moving ahead with preparations to assume the presidency, discussing policy plans and
Translation: Tiempo de cosecha en Indonesia por nuestro escritorio de Internet, 22 de septiembre de 2004. El ex ministro de seguridad de Indonesia, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, y sus asesores están avanzando con los preparativos para asumir la presidencia, discutiendo planes de política y
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, the former Indonesian security minister, along with his advisors, is preparing for his presidential tenure by discussing policy plans. This information is brought to you from our Internet desk in Indonesia, dated 22 September 2004."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "22nd September 2004, Indonesia - As reported by our Internet desk, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, the former security minister of Indonesia, and his advisers are proactively orchestrating preparations for his presidency with detailed policy plan discussions."

Original Text: Knicks: Carter puts on a show for Raptors If Vince Carter really wants to be traded, then he must slip a few bucks to the Toronto Raptors #39; video coordinator and ask him to burn a few copies of the DVD from last night #39;s game against the Knicks at Air Canada Centre.
Translation: Knicks: Carter ofrece un espectáculo para los Raptors Si Vince Carter realmente quiere ser traspasado, entonces debe soltar unos cuantos dólares al coordinador de video de los Toronto Raptors #39 y pedirle que grabe unas cuantas copias del DVD del partido de anoche contra los Knicks en el Air Canada Centre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If Vince Carter is indeed eager to be transferred, he should consider persuading the Toronto Raptors' video coordinator to make a couple of copies of last night's game DVD against the Knicks at Air Canada Centre- a game in which Carter truly outdid himself.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Given the outstanding performance Carter showcased in the Raptors' game against the Knicks at the Air Canada Centre, if he has any desire to be traded, it would be in his best interest to ask the Raptors' video coordinator to replicate a few DVDs of that match.

Original Text: Landmark eight-year ban for US sprinter MICHELLE COLLINS, of the United States, the former world indoor 200 metres champion, was suspended for eight years yesterday for drug abuse in a landmark ruling in the fight against doping.
Translation: Suspensión histórica de ocho años para la velocista estadounidense MICHELLE COLLINS, de los Estados Unidos, la ex campeona mundial indoor de 200 metros, fue suspendida ayer por ocho años por abuso de drogas en una resolución histórica en la lucha contra el dopaje.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a notable decision in the battle against doping, Michelle Collins, the former world indoor 200 meters champion from the United States, was handed an eight-year suspension yesterday for drug abuse.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Michelle Collins, United States sprinter and ex-world indoor champion in 200 metres, faced an eight-year suspension in an unprecedented ruling yesterday, marking a significant milestone in the battle against doping.

Original Text: Parmalat sues ex-auditors Deloitte, Grant Thornton MILAN, Aug 18 (Reuters) - Parmalat sued its former auditors Deloitte  amp; Touche and Grant Thornton on Wednesday, broadening a legal battle to claw back billions of euros from ex-allies the food group says helped drive it into ...
Translation: Parmalat demanda a ex auditores Deloitte, Grant Thornton MILÁN, 18 de agosto (Reuters) - Parmalat demandó a sus antiguos auditores Deloitte & Touche y Grant Thornton el miércoles, ampliando una batalla legal para recuperar miles de millones de euros de ex-aliados que el grupo alimenticio dice que ayudaron a conducirlo hacia ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Parmalat expanded its legal fight to reclaim billions of euros, as it lodged suits against its previous auditors, Deloitte & Touche and Grant Thornton. The food company alleges these ex-partners played a part in its financial downfall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Parmalat, aiming to recoup billions of euros, increased their legal actions on Wednesday by suing their former auditors Deloitte & Touche and Grant Thornton, whom the food group accuses of assisting in their financial demise.

Original Text: Alta Premier Klein vows retribution for those who actively jockey for his job (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - CALGARY (CP) - In his last day of campaigning in what he has promised will be his last election, Alberta Premier Ralph Klein warned there would be retribution for would-be successors who publicly jockey for his job.
Translation: Traducción al español: Alta Premier Klein jura venganza para aquellos que activamente luchan por su trabajo (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - CALGARY (CP) - En su último día de campaña en lo que ha prometido que será su última elección, el Premier de Alberta, Ralph Klein, advirtió que habrá retribución para los posibles sucesores que públicamente luchen por su trabajo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Alberta Premier Ralph Klein, on his last day of campaigning in what he pledges to be his final election, declares there will be consequences for those who outwardly vie for his position, states the Canadian Press.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a promise of facing his last election, Alberta's Premier Ralph Klein, warns of reprisals against those openly campaigning for his role during his final day of campaigning, as per Canadian Press.

Original Text: Afghan president on course for historic election victory (AFP) AFP - Afghan President Hamid Karzai is on course for a clear victory in the country's historic election, with more than half the votes counted.
Translation: Traducción al español de manera precisa: El presidente afgano en camino a una histórica victoria electoral (AFP) AFP - El presidente afgano, Hamid Karzai, está en camino a una clara victoria en la histórica elección del país, con más de la mitad de los votos contabilizados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AFP) With over fifty percent of the votes tallied, Afghan President Hamid Karzai appears set for a clear win in the nation's landmark election- AFP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AFP) Hamid Karzai, the President of Afghanistan, is poised for a decisive win in the momentous national election as more than half the votes have already been counted- AFP.

Original Text: Foodland says don #39;t sell Australasian grocer Foodland Associated which owns major chains in New Zealand says the hostile takeover bid by rival Metcash is complex and risky, and is urging shareholders not to act on the \$920 million bid.
Translation: Foodland dice no vendan a Foodland Associated, el supermercado australiano que posee grandes cadenas en Nueva Zelanda, dice que la oferta de adquisición hostil por parte del rival Metcash es compleja y arriesgada, y está instando a los accionistas a no actuar sobre la oferta de 920 millones de dólares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Foodland Associated, an Australasian grocer owning major chains in New Zealand, is classifying the hostile takeover bid of \$920 million by its competitor, Metcash, as complex and risky. Thus, it is recommending its shareholders to abstain from reacting to the bid.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Australasian grocery corporation, Foodland Associated, which has significant chain stores in New Zealand, has described the \$920 million hostile takeover attempt by Metcash as complicated and hazardous. They are advising their shareholders not to respond to this bid.

Original Text: Els and Westwood clash for million pound Match Play title (AFP) AFP - Defending champion Ernie Els and European Ryder Cup hero Lee Westwood clash for the one million pounds first prize in Sunday's final of the World Match Play Championship after winning their semi-final matches.
Translation: Els y Westwood se enfrentan por el título del Match Play de un millón de libras (AFP) AFP - El campeón defensor Ernie Els y el héroe europeo de la Ryder Cup, Lee Westwood, se enfrentan por el primer premio de un millón de libras en la final del domingo del Campeonato Mundial de Match Play después de ganar sus partidos de semifinales.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - Ernie Els, the defending champion, and Lee Westwood, a hero of the European Ryder Cup, will compete for the one million pounds top prize in the final of the World Match Play Championship on Sunday, following their victories in the semi-final matches.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Defending champion Ernie Els and Lee Westwood, well known from the European Ryder Cup, will go head-to-head in the World Match Play Championship's final match, vying for a million-pound prize, as reported by AFP. Both moved forward following successful semi-final matches.

Original Text: Labor Vows to Consider Change, but Rebel Voices Discontent The president of the AFL-CIO announced Wednesday that organized labor, facing the second term of an administration it fought hard to beat in last week #39;s election, would
Translation: El Trabajo Promete Considerar Cambios, pero el Rebelde Expresa Descontento. El presidente de la AFL-CIO anunció el miércoles que el sindicato, enfrentando el segundo mandato de una administración a la que luchó fuertemente para vencer en las elecciones de la semana pasada, lo haría.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, the President of the AFL-CIO declared that the organized workforce, grappling with the re-election of an administration they opposed strenuously in the recent elections, is contemplating changes, though there is evident rebellion and unrest.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the discordant and rebellious voices, the president of the AFL-CIO confirmed on Wednesday that the organized labor, struggling with the inauguration of an administration they tried strenuously to defeat in the recent election, would consider reforms.

Original Text: West Virginia #39;s task: Climb over Maryland An hour or so after West Virginia dispatched Central Florida on a steamy Saturday night in Orlando, West Virginia football coach Rich Rodriguez #39;s thoughts turned to this weekend #39;s opponent, No.
Translation: Tarea de West Virginia #39: Superar a Maryland. Una hora o más después de que West Virginia despachó a Central Florida en una calurosa noche de sábado en Orlando, los pensamientos del entrenador de fútbol de West Virginia, Rich Rodriguez #39, se volcaron hacia el oponente de este fin de semana, Nº.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Approximately an hour after West Virginia swept Central Florida on a humid Saturday night in Orlando, the state's football coach, Rich Rodriguez, began to focus on the upcoming weekend's competitor - Maryland. This is the challenge ahead for West Virginia, scraping a victory over Maryland.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On a hot Saturday night in Orlando, just an hour after West Virginia's triumph over Central Florida, Coach Rich Rodriguez of West Virginia's football team directed his attention towards their next adversary - Maryland. This signifies West Virginia's upcoming mission: surmounting Maryland.

Original Text: Jets QB passes test, return near On his first day back under center with the first-team offense, Chad Pennington went for it all.
Translation: El mariscal de campo de los Jets pasa la prueba, su regreso está cerca. En su primer día de regreso al centro con la ofensiva del primer equipo, Chad Pennington lo dio todo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On his initial day back with the premier offense team, Chad Pennington, the quarterback of the Jets, threw his all into it and passed the test, indicating a near return.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jets quarterback, Chad Pennington, successfully passed his test on his first day back with the first-team offense, signaling his imminent return. He really put his all into it.

Original Text: Money no object as Russian teams go after locked out NHL stars (CP) - The NHL all-star game hasn #39;t been cancelled after all. It #39;s just been moved to Russia. The agent for New York Rangers winger Jaromir Jagr confirmed Monday that the Czech star had joined Omsk Avangard
Translation: El dinero no es problema ya que los equipos rusos persiguen a las estrellas de la NHL bloqueadas (CP) - El juego de las estrellas de la NHL no ha sido cancelado después de todo. Simplemente se ha trasladado a Rusia. El agente del extremo de los New York Rangers, Jaromir Jagr, confirmó el lunes que la estrella checa se había unido a Omsk Avangard.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As Russian teams pursue locked out NHL stars without considering the financial implications, New York Rangers' winger, Jaromir Jagr's agent made it known on Monday that the Czech star has now joined Omsk Avangard. Additionally, the NHL all-star game was never actually cancelled; it has simply been relocated to Russia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Czech star and New York Rangers winger, Jaromir Jagr, has joined Omsk Avangard as revealed by his agent on Monday, highlighting the trend of Russian teams lavishly acquiring NHL players who are currently locked out. Additionally, contra to previous rumors, the NHL all-star game hasn't been axed; instead, it has been moved to Russia.

Original Text: Revival! Lions Punish Giants, 28-13 Just one week removed from a devastating home loss to the Green Bay Packers, the Detroit Lions responded offensively and defensively in Sunday #39;s 28-13 victory over the previously 4-1 New York Giants.
Translation: ¡Renacimiento! Los Leones Castigan a los Gigantes, 28-13. A solo una semana de una devastadora derrota en casa ante los Green Bay Packers, los Detroit Lions respondieron ofensiva y defensivamente el domingo en la victoria 28-13 sobre los anteriormente 4-1 New York Giants.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a dramatic comeback, the Detroit Lions retaliated with great offense and defense only a week after their crushing defeat at home against the Green Bay Packers, and dominated the New York Giants 28-13 last Sunday. The Giants, who had an impressive 4-1 record, fell to the resurgent Lions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Bouncing back from their debilitating home loss to the Green Bay Packers the previous week, the Detroit Lions staged an assertive offensive and defensive attack against the New York Giants on Sunday, culminating in a 28-13 victory. The striking performance brought down the Giants who were enjoying a prior 4-1 run.

Original Text: Delta Pilots Take Pay Cut as Bankruptcy Looms Description: Delta Airline pilots agree to a 32 percent pay cut to help the airline avoid bankruptcy. Analysts say it #39;s not yet clear whether those cuts will be enough to put Delta back in the black.
Translation: Los Pilotos de Delta Aceptan una Reducción de Salario ante la Inminencia de la Bancarrota. Descripción: Los pilotos de la aerolínea Delta acuerdan una reducción de salario del 32 por ciento para ayudar a la aerolínea a evitar la bancarrota. Los analistas dicen que aún no está claro si esos recortes serán suficientes para volver a poner a Delta en números negros.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As bankruptcy threatens Delta Airlines, its pilots have consentingly accepted a 32 percent reduction in their wages. It is still unclear to analysts if such cuts will suffice to bring Delta back to profitability.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a bid to steer clear of bankruptcy, pilots at Delta Airlines have consented to a 32 percent salary decrement. Still, experts remain uncertain if such sacrifices will be ample to restore Delta's financial health.

Original Text: Battle for Ryder Cup 'Underdog' Tag at Oakland Hills  BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - The 19-inch Ryder  Cup is not the only thing coveted by holders Europe and the  United States at Oakland Hills this week.
Translation: Lucha por la etiqueta de 'perdedor' en la Ryder Cup en Oakland Hills BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - La Ryder Cup de 19 pulgadas no es lo único deseado por los poseedores Europa y los Estados Unidos en Oakland Hills esta semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - Apart from the 19-inch Ryder Cup, both Europe, the current holders, and the United States have set their sights on the 'Underdog' title at Oakland Hills this week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At Oakland Hills this week, the holders Europe and the United States aspire for more than just the 19-inch Ryder Cup - they are also vying for the 'Underdog' tag in Battle for the Ryder Cup, BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters).

Original Text: Airfares to rise as cost of fuel reaches record Air passengers are set to pay for record oil prices as airlines move to increase ticket prices. Qantas said yesterday it would increase the fuel surcharge it includes in the cost of tickets and Air New Zealand is expected to follow.
Translation: Las tarifas aéreas subirán a medida que el costo del combustible alcanza un récord. Se espera que los pasajeros aéreos paguen por los precios récord del petróleo, ya que las aerolíneas planean aumentar los precios de los billetes. Qantas dijo ayer que aumentará el recargo por combustible que incluye en el costo de los billetes y se espera que Air New Zealand siga el mismo camino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the cost of fuel reaching record levels, airlines, including Qantas and Air New Zealand, are raising their airfares. Qantas announced yesterday that it plans to hike the fuel surcharges included in ticket prices, and Air New Zealand is predicted to do the same, resulting in air passengers shouldering the burden of these increased oil prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. High fuel costs, hitting record levels, are triggering an increase in airfares. Passengers will bear the brunt of these rising oil prices as airlines, like Qantas and Air New Zealand, make moves to adjust their ticket prices. The fuel surcharge included in ticket costs is set to rise, as announced by Qantas yesterday, while Air New Zealand's similar action is anticipated too.

Original Text: Low-Cost Versions of Windows XP Unveiled (AP) AP - Microsoft Corp. is removing features and cutting prices in India for a special version of its Windows XP operating system to tap the large market potential in a country where only about 1 percent of the 1 billion people own computers.
Translation: Se presentan versiones de bajo costo de Windows XP (AP) AP - Microsoft Corp. está eliminando características y reduciendo precios en India para una versión especial de su sistema operativo Windows XP con el fin de aprovechar el gran potencial de mercado en un país donde solo alrededor del 1 por ciento de las 1 mil millones de personas posee computadoras.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) - Microsoft Corp. is introducing a reduced-price, feature-light version of its Windows XP operating system in India to capitalize on the country's massive market potential, where only approximately 1 percent of its 1 billion people own computers.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) - With an aim to exploit the enormous market potential in India where merely about 1 percent of the 1 billion residents own computers, Microsoft Corp. is launching a budget-friendly, slightly scaled-down version of its Windows XP operating system.

Original Text: SEC eases rules on independent board directors After spending the past few years mounting a strong corporate governance campaign, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced Friday that it would start easing its rules
Translation: La SEC flexibiliza las reglas sobre directores de la junta independientes. Después de pasar los últimos años llevando a cabo una fuerte campaña de gobierno corporativo, la Comisión de Bolsa y Valores (SEC) anunció el viernes que comenzaría a relajar sus reglas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), after pursuing a robust corporate governance campaign over the past few years, proclaimed on Friday that it will begin to relax its strict regulations on independent board directors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, after conducting an aggressive corporate governance campaign for several years, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) declared that it plans to lessen its regulations on independent board directors.

Original Text: Space Station #39;s Oxygen Generator Is Repaired With Spare Parts The main oxygen generator aboard the International Space Station, which has been malfunctioning since last month, was partially repaired using spare parts that arrived last week.
Translation: El Generador de Oxígeno de la Estación Espacial #39 ha sido reparado con piezas de repuesto. El principal generador de oxígeno a bordo de la Estación Espacial Internacional, que ha estado funcionando mal desde el mes pasado, fue parcialmente reparado utilizando piezas de repuesto que llegaron la semana pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The primary oxygen generator of the International Space Station, malfunctioning from the previous month, was partially restored with the use of spare parts that were delivered recently.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Spare parts that arrived recently were utilized to partially repair the main oxygen generator on the International Space Station, which had been experiencing issues since last month.

Original Text: REGION: UN presses Iran and N Korea on N-threat UNITED NATIONS: The director of the UN nuclear watchdog agency said on Monday that North Korea posed a serious challenge to attempts to limit nuclear weapons in the world and Iran should suspend uranium enrichment activities.
Translation: REGIÓN: La ONU presiona a Irán y Corea del Norte sobre la amenaza nuclear. NACIONES UNIDAS: El director de la agencia de vigilancia nuclear de la ONU dijo el lunes que Corea del Norte representa un serio desafío para los intentos de limitar las armas nucleares en el mundo e Irán debería suspender las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio.
Paraphrase 1: REGION: UN urges Iran and North Korea to address nuclear threats. UNITED NATIONS: The head of the UN's nuclear control agency stated on Monday that North Korea's activities present a critical obstacle in global nuclear weapons limitation efforts, and further suggested that Iran should halt its uranium enrichment processes.
Paraphrase 2: REGION: The UN emphasizes to Iran and North Korea the gravity of nuclear threats. UNITED NATIONS: On Monday, the UN nuclear agency director expressed that North Korea is a significant concern in the global efforts to curb nuclear weaponry and advised Iran to put a pause on their uranium enrichment endeavors.

Original Text: Sony on Collision Course with Music Majors over MP3 including its own Sony BMG venture - over the MP3 song format. Sony is considering manufacturing devices that play digital
Translation: Sony en curso de colisión con las grandes empresas de música, incluyendo su propia aventura Sony BMG, por el formato de canción MP3. Sony está considerando fabricar dispositivos que reproduzcan música digital.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony is veering towards a conflict with leading music companies, including its own venture Sony BMG, due to the MP3 song format. Sony contemplates making devices that support digital music.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the matter of the MP3 song format, Sony may potentially face disagreement with prominent music companies, inclusive of its own subsidiary Sony BMG. Notably, Sony is thinking about producing devices that function with digital music.

Original Text: PEREZ DENIES SPECULATION Real Madrid president Florentino Perez has dismissed suggestions the club are actively searching for a new coach to fill the position currently held by Mariano Garcia Remon.
Translation: PEREZ NIEGA ESPECULACIONES El presidente del Real Madrid, Florentino Pérez, ha desestimado las sugerencias de que el club está buscando activamente a un nuevo entrenador para cubrir el puesto que actualmente tiene Mariano García Remón.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Florentino Perez, president of Real Madrid, contradicts the conjecture that the club is presently seeking a new coach to replace their current one, Mariano Garcia Remon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Rumors of Real Madrid actively hunting for a new coach to take over Mariano Garcia Remon's role have been rejected by the club's president, Florentino Perez.

Original Text: Iraq Rebels Hit Back as U.S. Bombs Falluja  FALLUJA, Iraq (Reuters) - U.S. forces hit Iraq's rebel  stronghold of Falluja with the fiercest air and ground  bombardment in months, as insurgents struck back on Saturday  with attacks that killed up to 37 people in Samarra.
Translation: Los rebeldes de Irak contraatacan mientras EE.UU. bombardea Faluya. FALUYA, Irak (Reuters) - Las fuerzas de los EE.UU. atacaron el bastión rebelde de Faluya en Irak con el bombardeo aéreo y terrestre más feroz en meses, mientras los insurgentes contraatacaban el sábado con ataques que dejaron hasta 37 personas muertas en Samarra.
Paraphrase 1: 1) FALLUJA, Iraq (Reuters) - The rebel heartland of Falluja in Iraq was dealt the most vigorous ground and air assault by U.S. forces in recent months while the rebels retaliated on Saturday, with strikes in Samarra that resulted in up to 37 deaths.
Paraphrase 2: 2) FALLUJA, Iraq (Reuters) - An intense air and ground onslaught on the insurgent-held Falluja by U.S. forces took place, marking the toughest in several months. Meanwhile, defiant insurgents counterattacked on Saturday in Samarra, causing up to 37 casualties.

Original Text: Fall in US oil inventory pushes prices higher WASHINGTONCrude futures prices surged above \$48 (US) per barrel yesterday as oil production and shipping disruptions caused by Hurricane Ivan prompted domestic supplies to shrink more than expected.
Translation: La caída en el inventario de petróleo de EE.UU. eleva los precios WASHINGTON - Los precios de los futuros del crudo se dispararon por encima de los \$48 (EE.UU.) por barril ayer, ya que las interrupciones en la producción y el envío de petróleo causadas por el huracán Ivan provocaron que las reservas domésticas se redujeran más de lo esperado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US crude futures prices climbed over $48 per barrel yesterday due to the unexpected shrinking of domestic supplies, prompted by the disruption of oil production and shipping due to Hurricane Ivan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Disruptions in oil production and shipping caused by Hurricane Ivan caused a more than expected reduction in domestic supplies, resulting in a surge in crude futures prices, which exceeded $48 per barrel in the US yesterday.

Original Text: China sows confusion over attack on Bush policies WASHINGTON - Chinas embassy in Washington sowed confusion on Monday about an election-eve attack on President George W. Bushs policies that raised questions about whether Beijing was trying to gain favor with Democrat John Kerry.
Translation: China siembra confusión sobre el ataque a las políticas de Bush WASHINGTON - La embajada de China en Washington sembró confusión el lunes sobre un ataque en vísperas de las elecciones a las políticas del presidente George W. Bush, lo que planteó preguntas sobre si Pekín estaba intentando ganar favor con el demócrata John Kerry.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, China's embassy in Washington sparked uncertainty with an attack on President George W. Bush's policies on the eve of the election, leading to speculations about whether Beijing was attempting to court favor with Democrat John Kerry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There was a wave of confusion caused by China's embassy in Washington on Monday, due to their attack on the policies of President George W. Bush on the cusp of the election. This raised doubts about Beijing's intentions - were they trying to affiliate more closely with Democrat John Kerry?

Original Text: Microsoft releases desktop search suite to testers Microsoft today joined the desktop search fray by releasing the beta-test version of a suite of tools designed to let users find information stored in their PCs.
Translation: Microsoft lanza la suite de búsqueda de escritorio para probadores. Microsoft se unió hoy a la contienda de búsqueda de escritorio al lanzar la versión beta de un conjunto de herramientas diseñadas para permitir a los usuarios encontrar información almacenada en sus PC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Microsoft entered the desktop search market by launching a beta version of a tool set aimed at helping users locate data on their personal computers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft started offering its desktop search tools suite's beta-test version to users today, aiming to join the desktop search competition and assist users in finding stored data on their computers.

Original Text: White Sox victims of clinch For a brief moment Monday night, the celebration for Minnesota manager Ron Gardenhire stopped following his team #39;s division-clinching 8-2 victory over the White Sox and 21,991 at US Cellular Field.
Translation: Las víctimas de los White Sox al asegurar un lugar en la postemporada Por un breve momento en la noche del lunes, la celebración para el manager de Minnesota, Ron Gardenhire,  se detuvo tras la victoria de su equipo 8-2 sobre los White Sox y la audiencia de  21,991 en el US Cellular Field, que aseguraba su división.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Minnesota manager Ron Gardenhire temporarily halted his team's celebrations Monday night after their 8-2 division-clinching victory over the White Sox, an event witnessed by 21,991 at US Cellular Field.

Original Text: No. 11 Michigan St. Rebounds with Win Over George Mason WASHINGTON (Sports Network) - Maurice Ager scored 13 points to lead 11th-ranked Michigan State to a 66-60 win over George Mason in the consolation game of the BB amp;T Classic from the MCI Center.
Translation: No. 11 Michigan St. se recupera con victoria sobre George Mason WASHINGTON (Sports Network) - Maurice Ager anotó 13 puntos para liderar al 11° clasificado, Michigan State, a una victoria de 66-60 sobre George Mason en el partido de consolación del Clásico BB amp;T desde el Centro MCI.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Maurice Ager's 13 point contribution was instrumental in 11th-ranked Michigan State's 66-60 victory over George Mason in BB&T Classic consolation game at the MCI Center, signalling a period of recovery for the team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the BB&T Classic's consolation game held at the MCI Center, the 11th-ranked Michigan State team bounced back by defeating George Mason with a score of 66-60, with Maurice Ager leading the scoring with 13 points.

Original Text: Bonds still on hold for 700 Club Miller Park fans seemed far more disappointed Wednesday night at missing a chance to witness history than seeing the San Francisco Giants embarrass their Milwaukee Brewers.
Translation: Aún retenidos, los bonos para 700 aficionados del Club Miller Park parecían mucho más decepcionados el miércoles por la noche al perder la oportunidad de presenciar la historia que al ver a los San Francisco Giants avergonzar a sus Milwaukee Brewers.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The disappointment was more profound among the 700 Club Miller Park fans on hold from seeing the potential historical event on Wednesday night than witnessing the Milwaukee Brewers' embarrassment to the San Francisco Giants.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday night saw the 700 Club Miller Park fans, whose bonds were still on hold, feeling more upset about missing a potential historical moment than witnessing their Milwaukee Brewers being outdone by the San Francisco Giants.

Original Text: Ex-presidents to lead aid effort WASHINGTON -- President Bush, seeking to highlight America's concern over the Asian disaster, named his father and his predecessor yesterday to spearhead a private fund-raising campaign to help victims of last month's tsunamis, calling on Americans to ''contribute as they are able to do so."
Translation: Ex-presidentes liderarán esfuerzo de ayuda WASHINGTON -- El presidente Bush, buscando resaltar la preocupación de Estados Unidos sobre el desastre asiático, nombró a su padre y a su predecesor el día de ayer para liderar una campaña de recaudación de fondos privada para ayudar a las víctimas de los tsunamis del mes pasado, haciendo un llamado a los estadounidenses para que ''contribuyan según su capacidad."
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON -- Highlighting America's commitment towards the aftermath of the Asian disaster, President Bush, yesterday appointed his father and his predecessor to head up a private fund-raising campaign. They are tasked with gathering aid for the victims affected by the tsunamis that occurred the previous month, urging all Americans to donate according to their capacity.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To showcase American empathy towards those afflicted in the Asian disaster, President Bush conferred upon his father, alongside his predecessor, the roles of leading a private fund-raising campaign yesterday. The campaign seeks to generate funds to aid those tormented by the tsunamis of the past month, and President Bush is appealing to Americans to donate in accordance with their ability.

Original Text: Subscription news boosts Reuters Shares in global news group Reuters surge as it posts a smaller than expected fall in subscription numbers over the last three months.
Translation: Las noticias de suscripción impulsan las acciones de Reuters en el grupo de noticias global, ya que este publica una caída menor de lo esperado en el número de suscripciones durante los últimos tres meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters shares saw a significant increase globally as the news group reported a less substantial decrease in subscription numbers than predicted in the last quarter.

Original Text: Death toll rises in Lagos pipeline fire THE Police confirmed yesterday that between 30 and 50 people were killed in Thursdays pipeline explosion at Imore village in Lagos.
Translation: El número de muertos aumenta en incendio de oleoducto en Lagos. LA Policía confirmó ayer que entre 30 y 50 personas murieron en la explosión del oleoducto del jueves en la aldea de Imore en Lagos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The police confirmed yesterday that the Imore village in Lagos experienced a pipeline explosion on Thursday, which claimed the lives of about 30 to 50 people.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, authorities confirmed the number of fatalities from Thursday's pipeline explosion at Imorse village in Lagos has increased, with totals ranging from 30 to 50.

Original Text: Thailand Decides Against Bird Flu Vaccine BANGKOK, Thailand Sept. 15, 2004 - Thailand, faced with a second outbreak of bird flu, said Wednesday its poultry would not be inoculated against the disease because vaccines offer no guarantee of safety.
Translation: Tailandia decide no usar la vacuna contra la gripe aviar BANGKOK, Tailandia, 15 de septiembre de 2004 - Tailandia, enfrentada con un segundo brote de gripe aviar, dijo el miércoles que su avicultura no sería inoculada contra la enfermedad porque las vacunas no ofrecen ninguna garantía de seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BANGKOK, Thailand Sept. 15, 2004 - Despite facing a second wave of bird flu, Thailand announced on Wednesday that it will not be vaccinating its poultry as vaccines don't provide an absolute guarantee of safety.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thailand, experiencing its second bout of bird flu, declared on Wednesday, Sept. 15, 2004 in Bangkok, that their poultry will not receive immunization against the disease due to the lack of assured safety from the vaccines.

Original Text: India orders Olympic dope probe Sports Minister Sunil Dutt says action will be taken after two weightlifters fail a drugs test at the Athens Olympics.
Translation: India ordena investigación sobre dopaje olímpico. El Ministro de Deportes Sunil Dutt dice que se tomarán medidas después de que dos levantadores de pesas fallaron una prueba de drogas en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sports Minister Sunil Dutt declares that India will take action following the failed drug test of two weightlifters at the Athens Olympics, and has thus demanded an Olympic dope investigation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to the failure of a drugs test by two weightlifters at the Athens Olympics, Sports Minister Sunil Dutt has announced that India will initiate an Olympic doping probe.

Original Text: Iraqi Leader Criticizes U.S.-Led Coalition (AP) AP - Iraq's interim President Ghazi al-Yawer said in an interview broadcast Monday that the U.S.-led coalition was wrong to dismantle the Iraqi security forces.
Translation: Líder Iraquí Critica a la Coalición liderada por Estados Unidos (AP) AP - El presidente interino de Irak, Ghazi al-Yawer, dijo en una entrevista transmitida el lunes que la coalición liderada por los Estados Unidos estaba equivocada al desmantelar las fuerzas de seguridad iraquíes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ghazi al-Yawer, Iraq's interim President, expressed criticism against the U.S.-led coalition's decision to disband the Iraqi security forces, in an interview aired on Monday (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The interim President of Iraq, Ghazi al-Yawer, in a recent interview broadcasted on Monday, castigated the U.S.-led coalition for the improper dismantling of the Iraqi security forces (AP).

Original Text: Bombing claims 4 at Pak mosque LAHORE, Oct. 10 - A bombing at a Shiite mosque in the eastern city of Lahore on Sunday killed at least four people and injured four, officials said.
Translation: Un bombardeo se cobra 4 vidas en una mezquita de Pakistán en LAHORE, 10 de Oct. - Un bombardeo en una mezquita chiíta en la ciudad oriental de Lahore el domingo mató al menos a cuatro personas e hirió a cuatro, dijeron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to officials, at least four individuals lost their lives and another four were injured when a Shiite mosque in Lahore, an eastern city, was bombed on Sunday, the 10th of October.

Original Text: Darfur Rebels Boycott Talks for 24 Hours (Reuters) Reuters - Sudan's two Darfur rebel groups\walked out of peace talks in Nigeria for 24 hours Saturday,\saying they needed to mourn 75 civilians killed by Sudanese\government forces and Arab Janjaweed militia in the last three\days.
Translation: Los Rebeldes de Darfur Boicotean las Conversaciones por 24 Horas (Reuters) Reuters - Los dos grupos rebeldes de Darfur en Sudán se retiraron de las conversaciones de paz en Nigeria durante 24 horas el sábado, diciendo que necesitaban lamentar la muerte de 75 civiles asesinados por las fuerzas gubernamentales sudanesas y la milicia árabe Janjaweed en los últimos tres días.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - The two rebel groups from Darfur in Sudan suspended their participation in the peace negotiations in Nigeria for a day on Saturday. They stated that they needed that time to grieve for 75 civilians who lost their lives due to the actions of the Sudanese government forces and the Arab Janjaweed militia over the past three days.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - On Saturday, Sudan's Darfur rebel factions withdrew from peace negotiations in Nigeria for a duration of 24 hours. They cited the need to pay respects to 75 of their civilian compatriots who were slain by actions of Sudan's government forces and the Arab Janjaweed militia in the preceding three days.

Original Text: EU to end Libya arms embargo The European Union has agreed to lift an arms embargo on Libya after pressure from Italy, which said the North African country needed better equipment to tackle illegal migrants.
Translation: La UE pondrá fin al embargo de armas a Libia. La Unión Europea ha acordado levantar el embargo de armas sobre Libia después de la presión de Italia, que afirmó que el país del norte de África necesitaba un mejor equipamiento para enfrentar a los migrantes ilegales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following persuasion from Italy that suggested Libya needs improved equipment to handle unlawful immigrants, the European Union has decided to terminate its arms embargo on Libya.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The European Union has consented to abolish arms restrictions on Libya, after Italy's insistence that the North African nation requires superior defense means to combat illegal migration.

Original Text: Cleric Who Died in Pakistan Custody 'Tortured'  ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - An Afghan Islamic cleric who died in  custody in Pakistan on Wednesday had signs of torture on his  body, an intelligence official said.
Translation: Clero que murió en custodia de Pakistán 'torturado' ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Un clérigo islámico afgano que murió en custodia en Pakistán el miércoles mostraba signos de tortura en su cuerpo, dijo un oficial de inteligencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "An Afghan Islamic cleric, found dead in Pakistani custody, exhibited signs of torture according to an intelligence official." - ISLAMABAD (Reuters)
Paraphrase 2: 2. "ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Signs of torture were on the body of an Afghan Islamic cleric who died while in Pakistan's custody, as per an intelligence official's statement."

Original Text: Barghouti 'pulls out of election' An aide says jailed Palestinian leader Marwan Barghouti has withdrawn from the presidential campaign.
Translation: "Barghouti 'se retira de las elecciones' Un asistente dice que el líder palestino encarcelado Marwan Barghouti se ha retirado de la campaña presidencial."
Paraphrase 1: 1. An assistant reports that Marwan Barghouti, the imprisoned Palestinian leader, has decided to withdraw from the presidential race.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Marwan Barghouti, a detained Palestinian leader, has opted out of the presidential election, as reported by an aide.

Original Text: AOL: Serious about security - for a price AOL is getting serious about security - if you pay them an extra \$1.95 to \$4.95 a month. Grandma #39;s favorite ISP has teamed with RSA Security to offer an optional login service that provides a second layer of authentication to prevent identity theft.
Translation: AOL: Serio acerca de la seguridad - por un precio. AOL se está tomando en serio la seguridad - si les pagas un extra de $1.95 a $4.95 al mes. El proveedor de servicios de Internet favorito de la abuela se ha asociado con RSA Security para ofrecer un servicio de inicio de sesión opcional que proporciona una segunda capa de autenticación para prevenir el robo de identidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you can afford an additional monthly fee of $1.95 to $4.95, AOL is joining hands with RSA Security to ramp up security measures, bringing a second layer of authentication to deter identity theft. This shows AOL's commitment towards security, making it a favored ISP for many, including Grandma.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For an added monthly charge of $1.95 to $4.95, AOL, a popular ISP among grandmas, is seriously stepping up its security game. In partnership with RSA Security, it is introducing an optional second authentication level on its login service to fend off identity theft.

Original Text: Canadian spammer hunted by Amazon and Microsoft Online retailer Amazon and Microsoft have teamed up to sue a Canadian spamming operation the companies allege is responsible for sending millions of forged e-mails claiming to have come from Amazon.
Translation: El spammer canadiense perseguido por Amazon y Microsoft. El minorista en línea Amazon y Microsoft se han unido para demandar a una operación de spam canadiense a la que las compañías acusan de enviar millones de correos electrónicos falsificados que, supuestamente, habrían provenido de Amazon.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Canadian spam operation, accused of sending millions of falsified emails pretending to be from Amazon, is now facing a lawsuit jointly initiated by Amazon and Microsoft.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amazon and Microsoft are jointly suing a Canadian outfit that they accuse of spamming millions of counterfeit emails under the pretense of being sent by Amazon.

Original Text: Irish Gold Medal-Winning Horse Fails Dope Test  DUBLIN (Reuters) - Waterford Crystal, the horse Cian  O'Connor rode to win Ireland's only gold medal at the Athens  Olympics, failed a dope test after the individual show jumping  competition.
Translation: El Caballo Ganador de la Medalla de Oro de Irlanda Falla en la Prueba de Dopaje DUBLÍN (Reuters) - Waterford Crystal, el caballo que montó Cian O'Connor para ganar la única medalla de oro para Irlanda en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas, falló en una prueba de dopaje después de la competición individual de salto ecuestre.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Cian O'Connor's gold medal-winning horse from the Athens Olympics, Waterford Crystal, had a positive result in a dope test after the individual show jumping competition.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The horse that led Cian O'Connor to victory in the Athens Olympics, earning Ireland's only gold medal in the competition, Waterford Crystal, did not pass a dope test after competing in individual show jumping.

Original Text: EA developing tie-in game for Batman Begins Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment has signed a deal with Electronic Arts which will see the giant publisher taking on the creation of videogames based on the forthcoming Batman Begins, which is tipped to be one of the biggest movies of next summer.
Translation: EA desarrolla un juego vinculado para Batman Begins. Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment ha firmado un acuerdo con Electronic Arts que verá al gigante editor encargándose de la creación de videojuegos basados en la próxima película Batman Begins, que se espera será una de las películas más grandes del próximo verano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment has inked a contract with Electronic Arts, entrusting the prestigious publisher with the construction of video games related to the much-anticipated Batman Begins. The film is expected to be a major hit next summer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A forthcoming epic movie, Batman Begins, expected to be a hit next summer, has triggered a partnership between Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment and Electronic Arts. The renowned publisher, Electronic Arts, will develop video games in association with the film.

Original Text: USA: Interstate Bakeries delays filing full-year report US food company Interstate Bakeries has said that it has had to delay filing its fiscal year report. The company had previously obtained an extension to last Friday for filing its Fiscal 2004 Form 10-K with
Translation: EEUU: Interstate Bakeries retrasa la presentación del informe anual. La compañía de alimentos de los Estados Unidos, Interstate Bakeries, ha dicho que ha tenido que retrasar la presentación de su informe fiscal anual. La compañía había obtenido previamente una extensión hasta el pasado viernes para presentar su Formulario 10-K del año fiscal 2004 con
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. food corporation, Interstate Bakeries, has announced a delay in submitting its annual report for the fiscal year. Previously, the company was given an extension till the previous Friday to file their Fiscal 2004 Form 10-K.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The submission of the full-year report has been postponed by the US-based Interstate Bakeries. Interestingly, an extension till the last Friday had been previously granted to the company to file their Fiscal 2004 Form 10-K.

Original Text: Update 2: Authorities Arrest Yukos Unit Manager Authorities intensified the pressure on the OAO Yukos oil giant Thursday, arresting a manager at a key subsidiary and issuing an international arrest warrant for the company #39;s chief lawyer.
Translation: Actualización 2: Las Autoridades Arrestan al Gerente de una Unidad de Yukos Las autoridades intensificaron la presión sobre el gigante petrolero OAO Yukos el jueves, arrestando a un gerente de una subsidiaria clave y emitiendo una orden de arresto internacional para el abogado jefe de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: Second Update: In a recent move escalating tensions with the OAO Yukos oil corporation, authorities have detained a manager from a crucial subsidiary and have also issued an international arrest warrant for the firm's lead attorney.
Paraphrase 2: Update Number Two: The crackdown on OAO Yukos intensifies as officials apprehend a managerial figure from an important branch of the company and simultaneously issue a global arrest warrant for Yukos's chief legal officer.

Original Text: Nallen rolls to record win Chandler, AZ (Sports Network) - Chris Nallen closed with a one-under 71 on Sunday, but it was more than enough to win the Gila River Golf Classic.
Translation: Nallen se lanza para ganar el récord en Chandler, AZ (Sports Network) - Chris Nallen cerró con un uno bajo 71 el domingo, pero fue más que suficiente para ganar el Clásico de Golf del Río Gila.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Chandler, AZ (Sports Network) - Chris Nallen secured a record-breaking win at the Gila River Golf Classic, finishing with a one-under 71 on Sunday.

Original Text: Invasion of the Data Snatchers Think your PC is safe? Think again. A new study indicates your home computer is likely bogged down with spyware, viruses and other scourges wrought by hackers and PC pranksters.
Translation: Invasión de los Atrapa Datos ¿Crees que tu PC está seguro? Piénsalo de nuevo. Un nuevo estudio indica que es probable que tu computadora doméstica esté sobrecargada con spyware, virus y otras plagas causadas por hackers y bromistas de PC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Do you believe your personal computer is secure? You might want to reconsider. Research findings suggest that your domestic computing device is possibly cluttered with spyware, viruses, and other types of digital menace, usually the handiwork of hackers and computer jesters, hence the term 'Invasion of the Data Snatchers'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Presume your PC to be safe? It might be time for a reality check. Recent studies demonstrate your desktop is possibly laden with malwares like spyware and viruses, along with other threats instigated by cybercriminals and PC tricksters – a real 'Invasion of the Data Snatchers'.

Original Text: Jets 10, Browns 7 Quincy Carter threw an 11-yard touchdown pass to Justin McCareins with 5:32 remaining as the Jets bounced back from an embarrassing loss with an ugly 10-7 win over the Cleveland Browns on Sunday.
Translation: Jets 10, Browns 7 Quincy Carter lanzó un pase de touchdown de 11 yardas a Justin McCareins con 5:32 restantes, ya que los Jets se recuperaron de una vergonzosa derrota con una fea victoria de 10-7 sobre los Cleveland Browns el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Quincy Carter assisted the Jets in recovering from a humiliating defeat by throwing an 11-yard touchdown pass to Justin McCareins with just 5:32 left on the clock, resulting in a hard-fought 10-7 victory over the Cleveland Browns on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Sunday, the Jets managed to overcome a previous disgraceful loss through an unattractive 10-7 victory over the Cleveland Browns. The tide of the game changed when Quincy Carter passed an 11-yard touchdown to Justin McCareins with only 5:32 to spare.

Original Text: Bush's lead gets smaller in poll (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - President Bush leads Sen. John Kerry by 8 percentage points among likely voters, the latest USA TODAY/CNN/Gallup Poll shows. That is a smaller advantage than the president held in mid-September but shows him maintaining a durable edge in a race that was essentially tied for months.
Translation: La ventaja de Bush se reduce en la encuesta (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - El presidente Bush lidera al senador John Kerry por 8 puntos porcentuales entre los votantes probables, muestra la última encuesta de USA TODAY/CNN/Gallup. Esa es una ventaja menor que la que el presidente tenía a mediados de septiembre, pero muestra que mantiene un borde duradero en una carrera que estuvo esencialmente empatada durante meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. USATODAY.com - An updated USA TODAY/CNN/Gallup Poll reports a slight reduction in President Bush's lead over Sen. John Kerry, showing an 8 percentage point lead among probable voters. Although less than the advantage he enjoyed in mid-September, he continues to hold a significant lead, especially after months of the race appearing largely tied.
Paraphrase 2: 2. USATODAY.com - The recent USA TODAY/CNN/Gallup Poll reveals that President Bush's lead over Sen. John Kerry has slightly decreased to 8 percentage points among likely voters. Despite this drop from the figures in mid-September, Bush continues to maintain a strong lead, after a long stretch when the race was essentially even.

Original Text: Election likely to put investors in motion It #39;s not just voters who are ready for the presidential campaign to end. Investors are anxious to put Tuesday #39;s election behind them.
Translation: Es probable que las elecciones pongan en movimiento a los inversores. No son solo los votantes los que están listos para que termine la campaña presidencial. Los inversores están ansiosos por dejar atrás las elecciones del martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Not only are voters eager for the presidential campaign to conclude, but investors are also keen to move past Tuesday's election, which is likely to spur them into action.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The upcoming election is poised to trigger significant activity among investors, just like voters, who are also eagerly waiting for an end to the presidential campaign.

Original Text: Sans list warns of Unix version control risk New threats to Unix users include a widely used software development aid known as concurrent version control, according to the latest annual Sans Top 20 vulnerability report.
Translation: La lista de Sans advierte del riesgo del control de versiones Unix. Las nuevas amenazas para los usuarios de Unix incluyen una herramienta de desarrollo de software ampliamente utilizada conocida como control de versiones concurrente, según el último informe anual de vulnerabilidad de Sans Top 20.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The latest annual Sans Top 20 vulnerability report indicates that Unix users are now faced with new threats, including a widely used software development aid known as concurrent version control.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the recent annual Sans Top 20 vulnerability report, a software development aid, known as concurrent version control, has emerged as a new threat to Unix users.

Original Text: Auburn #39;s running backs trample biteless Bulldogs He rolled to his right, bought as much time as possible and made the sort of touchdown pass that any veteran quarterback would envy.
Translation: Los corredores de Auburn aplastan a los Bulldogs sin mordida. Rodó hacia su derecha, compró todo el tiempo posible e hizo el tipo de pase de touchdown que cualquier mariscal de campo veterano envidiaría.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Without any resistance from the Bulldogs, Auburn's running backs simply stampeded over them. Darting to his right, he utilised all the time he could and executed a touchdown pass that would pique the jealousy of any experienced quarterback.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The running backs of Auburn dominated over the Bulldogs, who couldn't put up a fight. He maneuvered skillfully to his right, optimized the time at his disposal, and delivered a touchdown pass that even veteran quarterbacks would covet.

Original Text: Bush Seeks to Build on His Education Base (AP) AP - President Bush is ready to shift his education focus to older students, building on the law he pushed through before terrorism and war came to define his presidency.
Translation: Bush Busca Ampliar Su Base Educativa (AP) AP - El presidente Bush está listo para cambiar su enfoque educativo a los estudiantes mayores, basándose en la ley que impulsó antes de que el terrorismo y la guerra llegaran a definir su presidencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - Intent on expanding his education initiatives, President Bush is shifting his attention towards older students, using as foundation the law he advocated for before the realities of terrorism and war shaped his presidency.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - President Bush is set to concentrate his education interests on mature students, enhancing the implementation of a law he pioneered before his presidency was characterized by terrorism and war.

Original Text: Reebok Unveils High-Tech Sneaker Pump 2.0 Hoping to build on the success of a shoe that generated big sales but also some snickers when it was introduced 15 years ago, Reebok Inc.
Translation: Reebok presenta la zapatilla de alta tecnología Pump 2.0 Esperando construir sobre el éxito de un zapato que generó grandes ventas pero también algunas risas cuando se introdujo hace 15 años, Reebok Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reebok Inc. hopes to capitalize on the past success and overlook the mockery of a shoe unveiled 15 years ago, so it has introduced the advanced Pump 2.0 sneaker.

Original Text: Bledsoe, Tobeck Are Old College Pals (AP) AP - Seattle center Robbie Tobeck once took a swing at Buffalo quarterback Drew Bledsoe. Not on the field, of course. They were college roommates at Washington State, where Tobeck snapped the ball to Bledsoe.
Translation: Bledsoe, Tobeck son viejos amigos de la universidad (AP) AP - El centro de Seattle, Robbie Tobeck, una vez lanzó un golpe al mariscal de campo de Buffalo, Drew Bledsoe. No en el campo, por supuesto. Fueron compañeros de habitación en la universidad de Washington State, donde Tobeck pasó el balón a Bledsoe.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - Robbie Tobeck, Seattle's center, has an old history with Buffalo quarterback Drew Bledsoe. Their relationship dates back to their college days at Washington State, where Tobeck was the one snapping the ball to Bledsoe. There was even a time when Tobeck attempted to take a swing at Bledsoe - but it didn't happen on the field.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - There's a longstanding connection between Robbie Tobeck, the center from Seattle, and Drew Bledsoe, the Buffalo quarterback. Their friendship traces back to their time at Washington State, where they shared a college room and Tobeck used to snap the ball to Bledsoe. Interestingly, there was an incident where Tobeck tried to take a swing at Bledsoe, but this was off-field.

Original Text: SAP Delivers for the Mailman Neither rain nor sleet nor gloom of night can keep the US Postal Service from its appointed rounds, but a 25-year-old Human Resources software system is apparently stopping the mailman in his tracks.
Translation: SAP Ofrece para el Cartero Ni la lluvia ni la nieve ni la penumbra de la noche pueden impedir que el Servicio Postal de los EE.UU. cumpla con sus rondas designadas, pero un sistema de software de Recursos Humanos de 25 años de antigüedad aparentemente está deteniendo al cartero en su camino.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The US Postal Service, undeterred by rain, sleet, or the gloom of night, continues its appointed rounds, however, it seems a 25-year-old Human Resources software system, SAP, is impeding the mailman's progress.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Despite the challenges of weather or the night's gloom, nothing can deter the US Postal Service from its duties. Yet, the mailman appears to be halted by a 25-year-old Human Resources software system, known as SAP.

Original Text: Canada Lawmakers Avoid No-Confidence Vote (AP) AP - Canadian Prime Minister Paul Martin reached a last-minute agreement with opposition leaders Thursday night to avoid a no-confidence vote in Parliament that could have brought an end to his government and new elections.
Translation: Los Legisladores de Canadá Evitan la Votación de No Confianza (AP) AP - El Primer Ministro canadiense, Paul Martin, llegó a un acuerdo de última hora con los líderes de la oposición el jueves por la noche para evitar una votación de no confianza en el Parlamento que podría haber puesto fin a su gobierno y provocado nuevas elecciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - An eleventh-hour deal with opposition leaders on Thursday night enabled Canadian Prime Minister Paul Martin to evade a parliamentary no-confidence vote that may have concluded his government and prompted new elections.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Thursday night saw a last-ditch agreement between Canadian Prime Minister Paul Martin and opposition leaders, circumventing a potentially government-ending no-confidence vote in Parliament and the possibility of new elections.

Original Text: Napster founder goes legit Shawn Fanning, founder of Napster and former scourge of the music industry, has set up his own firm in an attempt to legitimise online file-sharing.
Translation: El fundador de Napster se vuelve legítimo. Shawn Fanning, fundador de Napster y antiguo azote de la industria de la música, ha creado su propia empresa en un intento de legitimar la compartición de archivos en línea.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shawn Fanning, the founder of Napster and previously considered a menace to the music industry, has established his own company with the goal to legalize online file-sharing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The founder of Napster, Shawn Fanning, who was once a threat to the music industry, has now initiated his own business endeavor aiming to bring legitimacy to online file-sharing.

Original Text: College-Football Roundup Aggies slip past Eagles on last-second <b>...</b> NCA amp;T 16, NC Central 15: Carlos Davalos kicked a 50-yard field goal as time expired to give NC A amp;T a victory against NC Central yesterday at Carter-Finley Stadium in Raleigh.
Translation: Resumen del Fútbol Universitario: Los Aggies vencen a los Eagles en el último segundo <b>...</b> NCA amp;T 16, NC Central 15: Carlos Davalos anotó un gol de campo de 50 yardas cuando expiraba el tiempo para darle la victoria a NC A amp;T contra NC Central ayer en el Estadio Carter-Finley en Raleigh.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Carlos Davalos led the NC A&T to a stunning victory over NC Central by kicking a 50-yard field goal as time ran out, pulling out a 16-15 win at Raleigh's Carter-Finley Stadium yesterday. Aggies edged past Eagles in a thrilling last-second college-football roundup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a college-football roundup, the Aggies narrowly defeated the Eagles. NC A&T triumphed over NC Central at Carter-Finley Stadium in Raleigh, courtesy of a 50-yard field goal kicked by Carlos Davalos just as time expired - the score was 16-15.

Original Text: Panasonic unveil DVD Recorders with 400GB HDD Capacity Today, Panasonic revealed the new models of DIGA DVD recorders. These recorders have HDD capacities of 160GB to 400GB. This is massive storage space for DVD Recorder; it also has high-speed dubbing, and superb home and mobile networking capabilities.
Translation: Hoy, Panasonic presenta Grabadoras de DVD con Capacidad de HDD de 400GB. Panasonic reveló los nuevos modelos de grabadoras de DVD DIGA. Estas grabadoras tienen capacidades de HDD de 160GB a 400GB. Este es un espacio de almacenamiento masivo para la Grabadora de DVD; también tiene capacidad de doblaje de alta velocidad, y excelentes capacidades de red en el hogar y móvil.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Panasonic has announced new models of DIGA DVD recorders with an immense storage space ranging from 160GB to 400GB. These DVD Recorders not only provide high-speed dubbing but also excellent home and mobile networking functionalities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having high-speed dubbing and exceptional home and mobile networking features, the new models of Panasonic's DIGA DVD recorders, unveiled today, offer a substantial 160GB to 400GB HDD capacity, a massive storage space for DVD recorders.

Original Text: Sony u-turn over MP3 music files Sony says its digital music players will now play MP3 music tracks, and not just its own format.
Translation: Sony cambia de opinión sobre archivos de música MP3. Sony dice que sus reproductores de música digital ahora reproducirán pistas de música MP3, y no solo su propio formato.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony has reversed its policy and announced that its digital music players will now support MP3 music tracks, not solely its proprietary format.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Changing its initial stance, Sony has stated its digital music players will no longer be limited to its own format but will also accommodate MP3 music tracks.

Original Text: Cavaliers beat defending champions Pistons LeBron James scored his career-high 43 points to pace the Cleveland Cavaliers for their seventh victory in eight games, a 92-76 home win over defending champions Detroit Pistons on Wednesday.
Translation: Los Cavaliers vencen a los campeones defensores Pistons. LeBron James anotó su récord personal de 43 puntos para liderar a los Cleveland Cavaliers hacia su séptima victoria en ocho juegos, un triunfo en casa de 92-76 sobre los campeones defensores, los Detroit Pistons, el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, LeBron James achieved a career-high score of 43 points, helping the Cleveland Cavaliers to secure their seventh win in eight games, a 92-76 home victory over the reigning champions, Detroit Pistons.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A home win of 92-76 over the Detroit Pistons, the defending champions, marked the Cleveland Cavaliers' seventh triumph in eight games, courtesy of LeBron James' record personal tally of 43 points. The match took place on Wednesday.

Original Text: Study: Firms see mixed results in outsourcing Survey of U.S. and European companies finds that less than half consider outsourcing financial functions to be cost effective.
Translation: Estudio: Las empresas ven resultados mixtos en la externalización. La encuesta realizada a empresas de EE.UU. y Europa encuentra que menos de la mitad considera que la externalización de funciones financieras es rentable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A survey of U.S. and European corporations reveals that outsourcing financial operations delivers mixed outcomes, with less than half of them finding it cost-effective.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Less than half of U.S. and European companies find outsourcing of financial tasks to be cost-effective, as shown by mixed results from a recent study.

Original Text: Raiders fail to keep up with Broncos The usually heated rivalry between the Raiders and Broncos didn #39;t have the same fire this Sunday after Denver waltzed into Oakland and embarrassed the Raiders, 31-3.
Translation: Los Raiders no logran mantener el ritmo con los Broncos. La acalorada rivalidad entre los Raiders y los Broncos no tuvo el mismo fuego este domingo después de que Denver entró triunfalmente en Oakland y avergonzó a los Raiders, 31-3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Raiders faltered against the Broncos in what was a typically intense rivalry, suffering a crushing 31-3 defeat as Denver confidently stormed the Oakland turf this Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This Sunday, the Broncos decisively defeated the Raiders, 31-3, in Oakland, a stark departure from their normally aggressive rivalry.

Original Text: Backley scrapes Edward praises Khan for taking acclaim in his <b>...</b> TEAM GB boxing coach Terry Edwards has described teenage sensation Amir Khan as one of the most talented British boxers to emerge so far this decade - and one of the most relaxed.
Translation: Backley raspa mientras Edward alaba a Khan por tomar el reconocimiento en su <b>...</b> El entrenador de boxeo del EQUIPO GB, Terry Edwards, ha descrito al adolescente sensación Amir Khan como uno de los boxeadores británicos más talentosos que ha surgido en lo que va de esta década, y uno de los más relajados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Terry Edwards, TEAM GB boxing coach, has depicted Amir Khan, the teenage sensation, as one of the most talented and calmest British boxers to surface so far this decade, an acknowledgment that Backley begrudgingly echoes while Edward lauds Khan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Acknowledged as one of the most talented and unflappable British boxers of this decade by TEAM GB boxing coach, Terry Edwards, rising star Amir Khan also receives reluctant commendation from Backley.

Original Text: CIOs Cheerier About Future Spending CIOs surveyed by Forrester Research are more confident than they were earlier in the year, and expect IT spending to grow by 7 next year.
Translation: Los CIOs se muestran más optimistas sobre el gasto futuro. Los CIOs encuestados por Forrester Research tienen más confianza que a principios de año, y esperan que el gasto en TI crezca un 7% el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A recent Forrester Research survey indicates that CIOs are showing increased optimism compared to earlier this year, anticipating a 7% growth in IT spending next year.

Original Text: Brawl after Bashir arrest cleared A BRAWL broke out at an Indonesian court yesterday after the arrest and detention of alleged Jemaah Islamiah head Abu Bakar Bashir was found to be legal, clearing the way for his trial under tough anti-terror laws.
Translation: Un enfrentamiento estalló en un tribunal indonesio ayer después de que se encontrara legal la detención y arresto del presunto jefe de Jemaah Islamiah, Abu Bakar Bashir, despejando el camino para su juicio bajo severas leyes antiterroristas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the legality of alleged Jemaah Islamiah leader Abu Bakar Bashir's arrest and detention was established in an Indonesian court yesterday, a brawl ensued, paving the path for his trial under stringent anti-terrorism laws.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An altercation broke out in an Indonesian court yesterday following the validation of Abu Bakar Bashir's arrest and detention, the alleged head of Jemaah Islamiah. This clears the path for his imminent trial under stringent anti-terror legislation.

Original Text: New Orleans Bowl Teams: North Texas (7-4) vs. Southern Mississippi (6-5) When: Tuesday, 7:30 p.m. Where: New Orleans TV: ESPN At a glance: The Mean Green are really mean, and not green, other than freshman running back Jamario Thomas, who has rushed for 1,709 yards and scored 17 TDs. Thomas is worth watching and is the best running back not involved in the ...
Translation:
Equipos del New Orleans Bowl: North Texas (7-4) vs. Southern Mississippi (6-5) 
Cuándo: Martes, 7:30 p.m. 
Dónde: Nueva Orleans 
Televisión: ESPN 
De un vistazo: The Mean Green son realmente malos, y no verdes, aparte del corredor de primer año Jamario Thomas, quien ha corrido 1,709 yardas y ha anotado 17 TDs. Thomas vale la pena ver y es el mejor corredor que no está involucrado en el ...
Paraphrase 1: Rewritten Sentence 1:
Paraphrase 2: North Texas with a standing of 7-4 is set to face off with Southern Mississippi with 6 wins and 5 losses, on Tuesday at 7:30 p.m in New Orleans Bowl. The match will be broadcast on ESPN. Among the standout players is North Texas' freshman running back, Jamario Thomas. He has an impressive record of 1,709 yards run and 17 touchdowns under his belt. Despite the team's moniker 'Mean Green', it's Thomas who really stands out - not because he's mean or even green, but due to his unprecedented skills that have made him one of the most important players not engaged elsewhere.

Original Text: Oil jumps as Bush nears victory Oil has leapt back above \$50 as President George W. Bush edges towards US election victory, a result which traders. say will bolster fuel demand and underpin anxiety over security of Middle East supply.
Translation: El petróleo se dispara a medida que Bush se acerca a la victoria. El petróleo ha saltado nuevamente por encima de los \$50 a medida que el Presidente George W. Bush se acerca a la victoria en las elecciones de los Estados Unidos, un resultado que, según los operadores, impulsará la demanda de combustible y respaldará la ansiedad sobre la seguridad del suministro de Medio Oriente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As President George W. Bush approaches a win in the US election, oil prices surged past $50. Market traders suggest that this result will increase the demand for fuel and intensify concerns about the security of Middle East supply.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The nearing victory of President George W. Bush in the US election has triggered a leap in oil prices beyond $50. Traders predict such a result would escalate fuel demand and amplify concerns pertaining to the security of the Middle East's supply.

Original Text: Is Syracuse Football on Permanent Slide? (AP) AP - The players hear it and so do the coaches. The perception is out there that Syracuse football is in a downward spiral.
Translation: ¿Está el fútbol de Syracuse en una caída permanente? (AP) AP - Los jugadores lo escuchan y los entrenadores también. La percepción está ahí afuera, que el fútbol de Syracuse está en una espiral descendente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is Syracuse Football Continuously Deteriorating? (AP) AP - Both players and coaches are familiar with the public pronouncement that Syracuse football is on a relentless decline.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Does Syracuse Football's Downfall Have No End? (AP) AP - The notion is widespread - Syracuse football is undergoing an unremitting slump; a sentiment known not just to spectators, but to the players and coaches as well.

Original Text: Kasthari makes himself known Digital technology has now replaced the old photo-finish cameras at Britain #39;s racecourses, but still there are times when even a computer cannot help.
Translation: Kasthari se hace conocer. La tecnología digital ha reemplazado ahora a las antiguas cámaras de foto-finish en los hipódromos de Gran Bretaña, pero aún hay momentos en los que incluso una computadora no puede ayudar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Digital technology, having now usurped the obsolete photo-finish cameras at Britain's racecourses, still has moments where it is powerless, and that's when Kasthari reveals himself.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though digital technology has taken over the antiquated photo-finish cameras at British racecourses, Kasthari stands out during those moments when a computer is not able to offer any assistance.

Original Text: INTER THRASH VALENCIA 5-1 VALENCIA - Inter bring home all three points from Wednesday evening #39;s hard-fought Uefa Champions League Matchday 3 encounter at the Mestalla to keep their one hundred record in Group G. Stankovic, Vieri, van der Meyde, Adriano and Cruz scored the goals in
Translation: INTER HUMILLA A VALENCIA 5-1 VALENCIA - Inter se lleva a casa los tres puntos del duro enfrentamiento del miércoles por la noche en la Jornada 3 de la Uefa Champions League en Mestalla, manteniendo su récord perfecto en el Grupo G. Stankovic, Vieri, van der Meyde, Adriano y Cruz marcaron los goles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Inter dominated Valencia with a 5-1 triumph in Wednesday evening's UEFA Champions League Group G Matchday 3 clash, maintaining their undefeated track record. The goals were scored by Stankovic, Vieri, van der Meyde, Adriano, and Cruz.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a comprehensive 5-1 victory against Valencia, Inter successfully secured all three points from their grueling UEFA Champions League Group G encounter on Wednesday evening. Their flawless record was upheld thanks to the goals made by Stankovic, Vieri, van der Meyde, Adriano, and Cruz.

Original Text: Budget Version of Windows Headed for Russia (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) will release a low-cost version of Windows for the Russian market in an attempt to combat the country's pirated software problem and growing Linux adoption.
Translation: Versión de bajo presupuesto de Windows destinada para Rusia (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) lanzará una versión de bajo coste de Windows para el mercado ruso en un intento de combatir el problema del software pirata del país y la creciente adopción de Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NewsFactor - In an effort to curb piracy and stave off the growing adoption of Linux, Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) plans to introduce a more affordable version of Windows specifically for the Russian market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) is set to launch a budget-friendly Windows version for Russia, aiming to tackle the prevalent software piracy issue in the country and combat the increasing popularity of Linux, according to NewsFactor.

Original Text: Jones to buy Barneys Jones, owner of the Jones New York, Anne Klein and Nine West brands, yesterday said it is buying luxury retailer Barneys New York for approximately \$400 million.
Translation: Jones comprará Barneys Jones, propietario de las marcas Jones New York, Anne Klein y Nine West, anunció ayer que está comprando el minorista de lujo Barneys New York por aproximadamente $400 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The owner of Jones New York, Anne Klein, and Nine West brands, Jones, announced yesterday that they are purchasing luxury retailer Barneys New York, for a sum around $400 million.

Original Text: Historic teams meet in World Series CBC SPORTS ONLINE - It?s been 86 years since the Boston Red Sox last won the World Series, but they still have a long way to go to vanquish the so-called  #39;Curse of the Bambino.
Translation: Equipos históricos se encuentran en la Serie Mundial CBC DEPORTES EN LÍNEA - Han pasado 86 años desde que los Boston Red Sox ganaron por última vez la Serie Mundial, pero aún les queda un largo camino por recorrer para vencer la llamada 'Maldición del Bambino'.
Paraphrase 1: 1) CBC SPORTS ONLINE - The Boston Red Sox, who haven't claimed a World Series victory in 86 years, still face a considerable challenge in overcoming the notorious 'Curse of the Bambino', despite having a historic matchup in the World Series.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Despite the passage of 86 years since their last World Series win, the Boston Red Sox still have to grapple with the so-called 'Curse of the Bambino' in their historic showdown, as highlighted by CBC SPORTS ONLINE.

Original Text: Giants Slip and Vanish in a Torrent of Turnovers The Giants coughed up three straight second-quarter turnovers and dissolved in a torrent of penalties in a baffling loss at Giants Stadium.
Translation: Los Gigantes Resbalan y Desaparecen en un Torrente de Perdidas de Balón. Los Gigantes perdieron el balón tres veces consecutivas en el segundo cuatrimestre y se disolvieron en un torrente de penalidades en una desconcertante derrota en el Estadio de los Gigantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Giants experienced a perplexing loss at their home stadium due to three consecutive turnovers in the second quarter, and a flood of penalties causing them to disintegrate.

Original Text: Manchester United Football Club boss admits mistakes Manchester United Football Club manager Sir Alex Ferguson admits he has made mistakes with his line-ups this season. The Reds have slipped eleven points behind leaders and champions Arsenal after only nine
Translation: El jefe del Manchester United Football Club admite errores. El gerente del Manchester United Football Club, Sir Alex Ferguson, admite que ha cometido errores con sus alineaciones esta temporada. Los Rojos han perdido once puntos frente a los líderes y campeones, Arsenal, después de solo nueve
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sir Alex Ferguson, the manager for Manchester United Football Club, concedes making lineup errors this season. This has resulted in the Reds falling eleven points behind the season leaders, Arsenal, after just nine games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After only nine games this season, the Reds, managed by Sir Alex Ferguson, are lagging eleventh points behind leading Arsenal, due to acknowledged mistakes in his team choices for Manchester United Football Club.

Original Text: Brazilian Ruling Party Makes Gains in Local Elections Brazil #39;s ruling party has made gains in Sunday #39;s local elections seen as mid-term referendum on the government of left-leaning President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva.
Translation: El Partido Gobernante Brasileño Logra Avances en las Elecciones Locales. El partido gobernante de Brasil ha logrado avances en las elecciones locales del domingo, vistas como un referéndum a mitad de mandato sobre el gobierno del presidente de izquierdas Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Sunday local elections, considered as a mid-term referendum on the administration of left-leaning President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, Brazil's ruling party has recorded significant gains.

Original Text: U.S.-Led Forces Claim Victory in Samarra  SAMARRA, Iraq (Reuters) - U.S. and Iraqi forces on Sunday  declared victory in Samarra, the first step of a drive to take  back all of Iraq's rebel-held areas before elections due in  January.
Translation: Las Fuerzas Dirigidas por Estados Unidos Reclaman Victoria en Samarra.
