SAMARRA, Iraq (Reuters) - Las fuerzas estadounidenses e iraquíes declararon victoria en Samarra el domingo, el primer paso de una campaña para recuperar todas las áreas de Iraq controladas por los rebeldes antes de las elecciones programadas para enero.
Paraphrase 1: 1) SAMARRA, Iraq (Reuters) - A declaration of triumph was made over Samarra by U.S. and Iraqi forces on Sunday; marking the initial phase of their mission to reclaim each of Iraq's areas under rebel control prior to the January elections.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Sunday in Samarra, Iraq (Reuters), U.S. and Iraqi forces announced their win - the preliminary move in their endeavor to regain all places in Iraq held by rebels, ahead of the elections scheduled for January.

Original Text: NASA needs Lockheed savvy Despite four major disappointments involving Lockheed Martin Space Systems projects in recent years, NASA is unlikely to deny the Jefferson County company future contracts, space analysts said.
Translation: A pesar de cuatro grandes decepciones involucrando proyectos de Lockheed Martin Space Systems en años recientes, es poco probable que la NASA niegue futuros contratos a la compañía del condado de Jefferson, dijeron analistas espaciales. La NASA necesita la experiencia de Lockheed.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite experiencing four significant setbacks with Lockheed Martin Space Systems projects over the past few years, space analysts contend that NASA will probably not refuse future contracts with the Jefferson County firm, confirming the organization's need for Lockheed expertise.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Space analysts stated that even though there have been four major failures with projects from Lockheed Martin Space Systems recently, it is implausible that NASA will reject future contracts from the company based in Jefferson County, emphasizing NASA's reliance on Lockheed's proficiency.

Original Text: Entries just can't keep pace As expected, none of the four United States entries survived yesterday's second set of Olympic rowing semifinals, leaving just four boats -- the men's and women's eights, the men's double sculls and the women's quadruple sculls -- going for medals this weekend, five fewer than in Sydney four years ago.
Translation: Las entradas simplemente no pueden mantener el ritmo. Como se esperaba, ninguna de las cuatro entradas de los Estados Unidos sobrevivió al segundo conjunto de semifinales de remo olímpico de ayer, dejando solo cuatro botes: los ochos masculinos y femeninos, los dobles sculls masculinos y los cuádruples sculls femeninos, en busca de medallas este fin de semana, cinco menos que en Sydney hace cuatro años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Predictably, none of the four American participant boats made it past the second round of Olympic rowing semifinals yesterday. Consequently, only the men's and women's eights, the men's double sculls, and the women's quadruple sculls will be competing for medals this weekend, a decline from the number of boats in the Sydney Olympics four years ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As anticipated, all four American teams failed to advance after yesterday's second set of Olympic rowing semifinals. So, only four boats - the men's and women's eights, the men's double sculls and the women's quadruple sculls - are left in the medal competition this weekend, which is five boats less than those in the Sydney Olympics four years ago.

Original Text: Disney Chief to Leave, Setting Off Race for Job Michael Eisner announced an exit on his own terms, shifting the spotlight from the debate over his leadership to speculation over his successor.
Translation: El jefe de Disney se retira, desencadenando la carrera por el puesto. Michael Eisner anunció su salida en sus propios términos, desviando el foco del debate sobre su liderazgo hacia especulaciones sobre su sucesor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The departure announced by Disney's Head, Michael Eisner, takes the focus off his leadership controversy and instigates conjecture about his successor.

Original Text: Techs Can't Find Hangover Cure There's plenty of good news out there in the technology sector, but nearly five years after the great Nasdaq bust of 2000, bellwether firms like Cisco Systems continue to struggle. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Translation: Los Técnicos No Pueden Encontrar Cura para la Resaca. Hay muchas buenas noticias en el sector de la tecnología, pero casi cinco años después del gran colapso de Nasdaq en el 2000, las empresas líderes como Cisco Systems continúan luchando. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the burgeoning growth in the technology sector, prominent companies like Cisco Systems remain in a challenging position nearly five years following the substantial Nasdaq crash of 2000. It seems technology specialists are still grappling to find a solution to this ongoing issue. Source: washingtonpost.com.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The technology sector is saturated with positive news, yet, companies of considerable influence such as Cisco Systems continue to face difficulties. This is nearly half a decade after the enormous Nasdaq downturn in 2000, a setback from which tech experts are yet to discover a recovery remedy. Courtesy: washingtonpost.com.

Original Text: Maker of Palm Software to Unveil Operating System for Smart Phones PalmSource is set to announce its first operat- ing system for smart phones, with applications typically found on desktop computers.
Translation: Fabricante de Software Palm Revelará Sistema Operativo para Teléfonos Inteligentes. PalmSource está a punto de anunciar su primer sistema operativo para teléfonos inteligentes, con aplicaciones típicamente encontradas en computadoras de escritorio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PalmSource, the creator of Palm software, is gearing up to launch its inaugural operating system for smartphones, replete with applications usually seen on desktop computers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ready to introduce applications normally available on desktop computers, PalmSource, the manufacturer of Palm software, is poised to reveal its very first operating system designed for smart phones.

Original Text: No. 11 Pittsburgh Beats Memphis  NEW YORK (Sports Network) - Carl Krauser scored 17 points,  grabbed seven rebounds and handed out four assists to lead No.  11 Pittsburgh over Memphis, 70-51, in the Jimmy V Classic from  New York's famed Madison Square Garden.
Translation: No. 11 Pittsburgh Derrota a Memphis NUEVA YORK (Red Deportiva) - Carl Krauser anotó 17 puntos, capturó siete rebotes y repartió cuatro asistencias para liderar a No. 11 Pittsburgh sobre Memphis, 70-51, en el Clásico Jimmy V desde el famoso Madison Square Garden de Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the renowned Jimmy V Classic held at New York's Madison Square Garden, Carl Krauser of No.11 Pittsburgh led his team to a 70-51 victory over Memphis, contributing 17 points, seven rebounds and four assists.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Carl Krauser's 17-point contribution, along with seven rebounds and four assists, led No.11 Pittsburgh to a convincing 70-51 triumph over Memphis at the Jimmy V Classic, hosted in New York's Madison Square Garden.

Original Text: Lenovo acquires IBM #39;s personal computing division Chinese PC vendor Lenovo announced its acquisition of IBM #39;s Personal Computing Division (PCD) for a combination of cash and stock totaling US\$1.25 billion.
Translation: Lenovo adquiere la división de computación personal de IBM. El vendedor chino de PC, Lenovo, anunció su adquisición de la División de Computación Personal (PCD) de IBM por una combinación de efectivo y acciones por un total de 1.25 mil millones de dólares estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lenovo, a Chinese PC seller, has stated its purchase of IBM's Personal Computing Division (PCD), a deal amounted to US$1.25 billion and paid in both cash and stock options.

Original Text: Wenger close to new deal Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has revealed he expects to sign a new contract  quot;within the next few days quot;. Wenger #39;s current Highbury contract expires at the end of this season but his new deal is set to keep him at the club until at least 2008.
Translation: Wenger cerca de un nuevo acuerdo El entrenador del Arsenal, Arsene Wenger, ha revelado que espera firmar un nuevo contrato "en los próximos días". El contrato actual de Wenger con Highbury expira al final de esta temporada, pero su nuevo acuerdo está destinado a mantenerlo en el club hasta al menos 2008.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Arsenal's manager, Arsene Wenger, anticipates signing a new contract "within the next few days." His present contract at Highbury is due to end this season, yet the new agreement should retain him at the club till at least 2008.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arsene Wenger, the manager of Arsenal, has announced that his new contract should be finalized within a few days. While Wenger's current contract at Highbury is set to expire at the season's end, his forthcoming deal should secure his place at the club until 2008 at the very least.

Original Text: Mozilla Firefox Browser Blazes Across the Globe Blake Ross started working on building  quot;a better quot; browser while other kids were just getting hooked on instant messenger.
Translation: El navegador Mozilla Firefox Avanza a Través del Mundo. Blake Ross comenzó a trabajar en la construcción de un navegador "mejor" mientras otros niños apenas comenzaban a engancharse con el mensajero instantáneo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Blake Ross began developing a superior browser, termed Mozilla Firefox, that is now widely used around the world, while his peers were only just starting to use instant messenger.

Original Text: Colts Lead Vikings 14-6 at Halftime (AP) AP - Peyton Manning threw two touchdown passes and the Indianapolis Colts built a 14-6 halftime lead over the Minnesota Vikings on Monday night.
Translation: Los Colts lideran a los Vikings 14-6 en el medio tiempo (AP) AP - Peyton Manning lanzó dos pases de touchdown y los Indianapolis Colts establecieron una ventaja de 14-6 sobre los Minnesota Vikings en la noche del lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - With two touchdown passes thrown by Peyton Manning, the Indianapolis Colts secured a 14-6 lead over the Minnesota Vikings during Monday night's halftime.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - At halftime of Monday's night game, Peyton Manning's duo of touchdown passes resulted in a 14-6 lead by the Indianapolis Colts against the Minnesota Vikings.

Original Text: South Shore goes out a winner It's not a Super Bowl, but South Shore Voke is not complaining. The Vikings, who won back-to-back Division 7 Super Bowls before moving up a division this season, capped their 2004 campaign by defeating Blackstone Valley, 16-6, last night in the Vocational Football Championship Series small school final at Chelsea High School.
Translation: "South Shore sale como ganador. No es un Super Bowl, pero South Shore Voke no se está quejando. Los Vikings, quienes ganaron consecutivamente los Super Bowl de la División 7 antes de subir de división esta temporada, culminaron su campaña 2004 derrotando a Blackstone Valley, 16-6, anoche en la final de la Serie del Campeonato de Fútbol Vocacional de la escuela pequeña en la Escuela Secundaria Chelsea."
Paraphrase 1: 1) South Shore Voke ended their 2004 season triumphantly, despite not being in the Super Bowl, by defeating Blackstone Valley 16-6 in the Vocational Football Championship Series small school final at Chelsea High School. This comes after the Vikings' successive victories in two Division 7 Super Bowls prior to their promotion this season.
Paraphrase 2: 2) While not a Super Bowl, South Shore Voke certainly has no grievances about their win over Blackstone Valley with a score of 16-6 in the small school final of the Vocational Football Championship Series, held at Chelsea High School. The victory marked the end of their 2004 season, a noteworthy feat following their consecutive wins in Division 7 Super Bowls before moving up a division this season.

Original Text: Google launches new Web site for readers, publishers (AFP) AFP - Leading Web search engine Google launched a new site for book lovers at the world's largest publishing show that will provide a new avenue for sales.
Translation: Google lanza nuevo sitio web para lectores, editores (AFP) AFP - El líder en buscadores web, Google, lanzó un nuevo sitio para amantes de los libros en la feria de publicación más grande del mundo, que proporcionará un nuevo canal de ventas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP reports that Google, the leading internet search engine, has unveiled a new website at the world's largest publishing show. This innovative site targets book enthusiasts and provides a fresh platform for publishers to boost sales.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new website intended for book enthusiasts and publishers has been launched by Google, the foremost web search engine, at the biggest publishing show in the world, as reported by AFP. This platform introduces a novel way to increase sales.

Original Text: U.S. Stocks Rebound as Oil Prices Ease  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks rebounded on Monday as oil  prices retreated from their highs, while upbeat earnings  announcements from retailers fueled the improved sentiment.
Translation:
Las Acciones de EE.UU. se Recuperan a Medida que los Precios del Petróleo se Suavizan

NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones estadounidenses se recuperaron el lunes a medida que los precios del petróleo retrocedían desde sus máximos, mientras que los anuncios de ganancias optimistas de los minoristas alimentaron el mejorado sentimiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, U.S. stocks experienced a resurgence as oil prices saw a reduction from their peaks. This improvement in sentiment was further boosted by positive earnings reports from retailers (Reuters, New York).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite recent uncertainties, a decrease in oil prices led to a bounce back in U.S. Stocks on Monday. This uplift in the market mood was also propelled by encouraging earnings news from retail businesses (Reuters, New York).

Original Text: Suicide bomber hits Kabul's fabled Chicken Street, 3 peacekeepers wounded (AFP) AFP - A suicide bomber blew himself up in Kabul's famous  quot;Chicken Street quot; shopping haunt, wounding up to seven people, including three foreign peacekeepers, in the boldest attack since the peaceful October 9 presidential election.
Translation: Un terrorista suicida ataca la famosa Calle del Pollo en Kabul, 3 cascos azules heridos (AFP) AFP - Un terrorista suicida se hizo explotar en la famosa "Calle del Pollo" de Kabul, centro de compras, hiriendo hasta a siete personas, incluyendo tres cascos azules extranjeros, en el ataque más audaz desde las pacíficas elecciones presidenciales del 9 de octubre.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A suicide bomber detonated his explosives on Kabul's landmark "Chicken Street", leading to as many as seven people getting injured, amongst whom were three foreign peacekeepers. This bold act represents the most substantial attack since the tranquil presidential election held on October 9 (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Kabul's renowned "Chicken Street", a suicide bomber triggered his explosives, causing injuries to about seven individuals, which included three international peacekeepers. This audacious attack stands as the most significant since the peaceful October 9 presidential election (AFP).

Original Text: FCC Chief Pushes TV Via High-Speed Internet Lines US Federal Communications Commission Chairman Michael Powell on Wednesday said technology and telecommunications companies are racing to develop ways to pipe television
Translation: El Jefe de la FCC impulsa la televisión a través de líneas de Internet de alta velocidad El presidente de la Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones de EE.UU., Michael Powell, dijo el miércoles que las empresas de tecnología y telecomunicaciones están compitiendo para desarrollar formas de transmitir televisión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Michael Powell, the Chairman of the US Federal Communications Commission, announced on Wednesday that the technology and telecommunications industries are rapidly advancing efforts to deliver television through high-speed internet lines.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, FCC Chairman Michael Powell highlighted the efforts of technology and telecommunications firms focusing on the provision of television via high-speed internet lines.

Original Text: Yasser Arafat #39;s nephew hands over Palestinian leader #39;s medical <b>...</b> (Ramallah, West Bank-AP) Dec. 11, 2004 - Yasser Arafat #39;s nephew has given Palestinian leaders his uncle #39;s medical records.
Translation: El sobrino de Yasser Arafat entrega las historias clínicas del líder palestino <b>...</b> (Ramallah, Cisjordania-AP) 11 de diciembre de 2004 - El sobrino de Yasser Arafat ha entregado a los líderes palestinos los registros médicos de su tío.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yasser Arafat's nephew has handed over his uncle's medical records to the Palestinian leaders on Dec. 11, 2004, in Ramallah, West Bank  - (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Dec. 11, 2004, as reported by (AP) in Ramallah, West Bank, the medical records of Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat were handed over to the Palestinian leaders by his nephew.

Original Text: Zurich Financial Q3 falls 31 on hurricane impact LONDON (CBS.MW) -- Zurich Financial Services (ZZ:001107539) said Wednesday that third quarter net profits fell 31 percent to \$454 million, hit by the impact of hurricanes.
Translation: Zurich Financial Q3 cae un 31% debido al impacto de los huracanes LONDRES (CBS.MW) -- Zurich Financial Services (ZZ:001107539) dijo el miércoles que las ganancias netas del tercer trimestre cayeron un 31 por ciento a \$454 millones, afectadas por el impacto de los huracanes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Zurich Financial Services (ZZ:001107539) announced that their third-quarter net profits decreased by 31 percent to $454 million due to the influence of hurricane impacts. (CBS.MW, LONDON)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Zurich Financial Services (ZZ:001107539) reported a 31 percent drop, to $454 million, in net profits for the third quarter, attributing it to the effects of hurricanes. This news came out on Wednesday from London (CBS.MW).

Original Text: Yahoo Unveils Mobile Search, Google Rivalry Rages  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Internet media company Yahoo Inc.  <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=YHOO.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">YHOO.O</A> on Wednesday launched its Web search service aimed at  mobile phone users in the United States, opening a new front in  its rivalry with Internet search leader Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=GOOG.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">GOOG.O</A>
Translation: Yahoo presenta búsqueda móvil, aumenta la rivalidad con Google SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - La compañía de medios de Internet Yahoo Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=YHOO.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">YHOO.O</A> lanzó el miércoles su servicio de búsqueda web dirigido a los usuarios de teléfonos móviles en los Estados Unidos, abriendo un nuevo frente en su rivalidad con el líder de búsqueda en Internet, Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=GOOG.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">GOOG.O</A>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yahoo Inc, an Internet media company, initiated its Web search service targeted towards mobile phone users in the United States on Wednesday. This marks a new chapter in its competition with Google Inc, the leader in Internet search.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The conflict with Google Inc, the Internet search leader, escalates as Yahoo Inc, a digital media company, introduces its web search services for mobile phone users in the United States on Wednesday.

Original Text: Fatal accidents damage Japan #39;s nuclear dream On the coast of the Japan Sea, two and a half hours by train from Kyoto, is the quiet fishing village of Mihama. Noted for its harbour and beautiful beaches, it draws tourists from all over the country.
Translation: Los accidentes fatales dañan el sueño nuclear de Japón #39. En la costa del Mar de Japón, a dos horas y media en tren desde Kioto, se encuentra el tranquilo pueblo pesquero de Mihama. Conocido por su puerto y hermosas playas, atrae a turistas de todo el país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On the Japan Sea's coast, just two and a half hours away from Kyoto by train, the tranquil fishing village of Mihama is situated. The village, famous for its harbor and picturesque beaches, attracts visitors from across Japan. Unfortunately, deadly accidents have implicated Japan's nuclear dream.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Japan's nuclear ambition has been tainted by lethal accidents in the peaceful fishing village of Mihama, which lies on the Japan Sea coast. Just a two and a half hour train ride from Kyoto, this location, renowned for its stunning harbor and beautiful beaches, attracts tourists nationwide.

Original Text: Co-Founder of Google #39;s Blogger Leaving Company Web search leader Google Inc. (GOOG.O: Quote, Profile, Research) on Thursday said the head of its Web log service, Blogger, will leave at the end of the week to pursue other interests.
Translation: Cofundador de Blogger de Google #39 abandonará la compañía. El líder de búsqueda en la web, Google Inc. (GOOG.O: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) anunció el jueves que el jefe de su servicio de blogs, Blogger, se irá al final de la semana para perseguir otros intereses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The leader of Google Inc.'s (GOOG.O: Quote, Profile, Research) Blogger service will be leaving the company at the end of this week to follow different pursuits, according to an announcement made on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As announced on Thursday, the Co-Founder of Blogger, a web log service that forms part of Google Inc. (GOOG.O: Quote, Profile, Research), will be ending his tenure at the company by the week's end to seek other opportunities.

Original Text: Peterson Could Break New Heisman Ground (AP) AP - Adrian Peterson's arrival at Oklahoma was accompanied by impossible expectations. Before he even stepped on a practice field, he was hyped as one of the nation's best runners who would carry the Sooners to greatness.
Translation: Peterson Podría Romper Nuevos Récords Heisman (AP) AP - La llegada de Adrian Peterson a Oklahoma estuvo acompañada por expectativas imposibles. Antes de que incluso pisara un campo de práctica, se le promocionó como uno de los mejores corredores de la nación, que llevaría a los Sooners a la grandeza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - The moment Adrian Peterson set foot at Oklahoma, he was burdened with unrealistically high expectations. The nation was already raving about him as one of the outstanding runners who would steer the Sooners to exceptional success, even before he got a chance to practice on the field.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - From the time Adrian Peterson joined Oklahoma, he was confronted with expectations of performing miracles. He was lauded as one of the country's elite runners who would lead the Sooners to victory, all this even before he had the chance to break a sweat on the training ground.

Original Text: Fourth gold for Pinsent Britain's Matthew Pinsent claims his fourth Olympic gold as the men's coxless four triumph in a photo finish.
Translation: Cuarto oro para Pinsent, el británico Matthew Pinsent reclama su cuarto oro olímpico ya que el equipo masculino de cuatro sin timonel triunfa en un final de foto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Matthew Pinsent, from Britain, secures his fourth Olympic gold following a photo finish in the men's coxless four event.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The British Olympian, Matthew Pinsent, achieves his fourth Olympic gold victory in the men's coxless four, winning in a photo finish.

Original Text: Sri Lankan rebels 'shoot rival' The brother of the man who led a split in Sri Lanka's Tamil Tiger rebel group is shot and killed, reports say.
Translation: Los rebeldes de Sri Lanka 'disparan a un rival'. El hermano del hombre que lideró una división en el grupo rebelde de los Tigres Tamiles de Sri Lanka ha sido disparado y asesinado, según informes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to reports, the brother of the man who spearheaded a divide within Sri Lanka's Tamil Tiger rebel group has been shot and killed, believed to be the act of rival rebels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reports reveal that the man who initiated a schism in Sri Lanka's Tamil Tiger rebel group has had his brother shot and killed, presumably by opposing rebel factions.

Original Text: Aznar Denies Madrid Bombs Were Linked to Iraq War (Reuters) Reuters - Former Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar\said Islamic militants tried to use the Madrid train bombings\to oust the pro-U.S. ruling party from power in Spain, but not\because of its support for the Iraq war.
Translation: Aznar niega que las bombas de Madrid estuvieran vinculadas con la guerra de Irak (Reuters) Reuters - El ex primer ministro José María Aznar dijo que los militantes islámicos intentaron usar los atentados del tren de Madrid para expulsar al partido gobernante pro-estadounidense del poder en España, pero no debido a su apoyo a la guerra en Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Former Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar states that the Madrid train bombings, carried out by Islamic militants, were an attempt to overthrow the pro-US governing party in Spain, but they were not influenced by Spain's endorsement of the Iraq war.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) Contradicting assumptions of a link to the Iraq war, Former Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar affirmed that Islamic extremists orchestrated the Madrid train bombings in an attempt to topple the pro-US administration in Spain, rather than it being a repercussion of Spain's support for the Iraq war.

Original Text: Cavs Slip Past Furman After their first loss of the season, the 19th-ranked Cavaliers came away with a sluggish 70-67 victory over Furman at Alumni Hall on Wednesday night.
Translation: Los Cavs se deslizan pasando a Furman después de su primera derrota de la temporada, los Cavaliers, 19º en el ranking, lograron una victoria apática de 70-67 sobre Furman en el Alumni Hall el miércoles por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The 19th-ranked Cavaliers managed to secure a narrow 70-67 win over Furman at Alumni Hall on Wednesday night, following their season's first defeat. It was a sluggish performance by the Cavs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A lethargic performance saw the 19th-ranked Cavaliers squeeze a 70-67 win over Furman at Alumni Hall, on Wednesday night, bouncing back after their first seasonal loss.

Original Text: Otellini: soft-spoken, ruthless and an Intel lifer Intel selects consummate insider as next CEO. Can he take Intel beyond the PC?
Translation: Otellini: tranquilo, implacable y un veterano de Intel. Intel selecciona a un consumado interno como próximo CEO. ¿Podrá llevar a Intel más allá de la PC?
Paraphrase 1: Otellini, a quiet but relentless Intel veteran, is chosen as the next CEO. Is he capable of propelling Intel beyond just PCs?
Paraphrase 2: Intel picks Otellini, a soft-spoken, ruthless, and loyal employee, to be their next CEO. Will he be able to facilitate Intel's move beyond the realm of personal computers?

Original Text: Clayton, Counsell now on board The Diamondbacks introduced shortstop Royce Clayton as their newest member Tuesday after free-agent pitcher Matt Clement visited Bank One Ballpark.
Translation: Clayton, Counsell ahora forman parte del equipo. Los Diamondbacks presentaron al campocorto Royce Clayton como su nuevo miembro el martes después de que el lanzador agente libre Matt Clement visitara el Bank One Ballpark.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, The Diamondbacks welcomed their latest addition, shortstop Royce Clayton, shortly after the free-agent pitcher Matt Clement made a visit to Bank One Ballpark.

Original Text: Tyco Raises Dividend  BOSTON (Reuters) - Tyco International Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=TYC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">TYC.N</A>        on  Thursday raised its dividend for the first time in five years,  the latest indication of change at the once scandal-tarnished  diversified manufacturer.
Translation: Tyco Aumenta el Dividendo BOSTON (Reuters) - Tyco International Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=TYC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">TYC.N</A> el jueves aumentó su dividendo por primera vez en cinco años, la última indicación de cambio en el otrora fabricante diversificado manchado por escándalos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Tyco International Inc. increased its dividend for the first time in a half-decade, a fresh sign of transformation at the diversified manufacturer previously tarnished by a scandal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tyco International Inc. boosted its dividend this Thursday, the first time in five years, marking another positive shift at the diversified manufacturing company that had once been embroiled in scandal.

Original Text: Ichiro as exciting as they come This record is for all the little guys, for all the players who have to leg out every hit instead of taking a relaxing trot around the bases, for all the batters whose muscles aren #39;t
Translation: Ichiro es tan emocionante como cualquier otro. Este récord es para todos los pequeños, para todos los jugadores que tienen que esforzarse por cada golpe en vez de dar un relajante trote alrededor de las bases, para todos los bateadores cuyos músculos no son
Paraphrase 1: 1. This record is dedicated to all the relentless players like Ichiro, who have to hustle for every hit instead of leisurely jogging around the field, and for all the batters who may not be the most physically imposing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This achievement belongs to all the underdogs, akin to Ichiro, who have no choice but to earn each hit through sheer effort, not a casual jaunt around the bases, and for all those batters who don't exhibit conventional muscular strength.

Original Text: Four held by anti-terror police Four men have been arrested by police in London on suspicion of commissioning, preparing or instigating acts of terrorism. Three men were held after officers from the Metropolitan Police #39;s anti-terrorist branch
Translation: Cuatro detenidos por la policía antiterrorista. Cuatro hombres han sido arrestados por la policía en Londres bajo sospecha de cometer, preparar o instigar actos de terrorismo. Tres hombres fueron detenidos después de que oficiales de la rama antiterrorista de la Policía Metropolitana
Paraphrase 1: 1. The anti-terrorist unit of the Metropolitan Police in London has apprehended four men for possible involvement in the planning, preparation, or initiation of terrorist acts. Three out of the four men were detained by the officers from the police's anti-terrorism division.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The London police force has taken into custody four males on the grounds of their suspected participation in terror-related activities; This action was taken by the Metropolitan Police's counter-terrorism branch, and included detaining three of the men.

Original Text: Souness Leaves Rovers Manager Graeme Souness has stunned the football world by turning his back on Blackburn Rovers to become the new manager of Newcastle United.
Translation: Souness deja Rovers. El gerente Graeme Souness ha sorprendido al mundo del fútbol al darle la espalda a Blackburn Rovers para convertirse en el nuevo gerente de Newcastle United.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Graeme Souness, the manager of Rovers, has shocked the football community by departing from Blackburn Rovers and taking on the role of the new manager for Newcastle United.

Original Text: Universe evolved at a pace much slower than formerly thought The evolution of the universe may have been much slower than previously thought, British scientists have revealed. A team of scientists lead by Dr.
Translation: El universo evolucionó a un ritmo mucho más lento de lo que se pensaba anteriormente. La evolución del universo podría haber sido mucho más lenta de lo que se pensaba previamente, han revelado científicos británicos. Un equipo de científicos liderado por el Dr.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A group of British scientists, led by Dr., uncovered that the pace of the universe's evolution might have been considerably slower than what was previously believed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dr. and his team of British scientists have suggested that the rate of the universe's evolution possibly progressed more leisurely than initially theorized.

Original Text: Bumbling Ramirez Gives (And Gives Away) (AP) AP - He slips. He trips. He lets it rip. That's Manny Ramirez.
Translation: El Despistado Ramírez da (Y Regala) (AP) AP - Se desliza. Se tropieza. Lo deja volar. Ese es Manny Ramírez.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - Manny Ramirez is known for his slips, trips, and unrestrained actions; he's somewhat dexterous and just can't help but give it away.

Original Text: Derby draw pleases Juve LEADERS Juventus were the happiest team in Serie A today after title rivals AC Milan and Inter Milan played out a 0-0 draw at the San Siro.
Translation: El empate en el derbi complace a la Juve. LOS LÍDERES Juventus fueron el equipo más feliz en la Serie A hoy después de que los rivales por el título AC Milan e Inter de Milan jugaran un empate 0-0 en el San Siro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Juventus, the leaders in Serie A, expressed satisfaction today as their championship competitors, AC Milan and Inter Milan, ended in a goalless draw at the San Siro.

Original Text: Hewitt routs Gaudio, eases into Masters Cup semis Houston, TX (Sports Network) - Third-seeded Lleyton Hewitt humbled eighth- seeded Gaston Gaudio 6-2, 6-1 on Friday to secure a spot in the semifinals at the 2004 Tennis Masters Cup.
Translation: Hewitt derrota a Gaudio, se desliza fácilmente a las semifinales de la Copa Masters Houston, TX (Sports Network) - El tercer sembrado, Lleyton Hewitt, humilló al octavo sembrado, Gaston Gaudio, 6-2, 6-1 el viernes para asegurar un lugar en las semifinales de la Copa Masters de Tenis 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, in the 2004 Tennis Masters Cup, third-seeded Lleyton Hewitt decisively defeated eighth-seeded Gaston Gaudio with a score of 6-2, 6-1, advancing to the semifinals, as reported by Sports Network from Houston, TX.

Original Text: Space trailblazer Max Faget dies The designer of the Mercury space capsules that took the first Americans into orbit has died at age 83, NASA announced Sunday. Maxime Faget led the space agency #39;s engineering and development branch
Translation: Fallece Max Faget, pionero del espacio. El diseñador de las cápsulas espaciales Mercury que llevaron a los primeros estadounidenses al espacio ha fallecido a los 83 años, anunció la NASA el domingo. Maxime Faget lideró la rama de ingeniería y desarrollo de la agencia espacial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The creator of the Mercury space capsules, which launched the first Americans into orbit, Maxime Faget, has passed away at 83, announced by NASA on Sunday. Faget was at the helm of NASA's engineering and development branch, making significant contributions as a space pioneer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NASA revealed on Sunday the death of Maxime Faget, the visionary behind the design of the Mercury space capsules that catapulted America's first astronauts into orbit. Faget, 83, was a space trailblazer leading the agency's engineering and development branch.

Original Text: Friction Grows Between Japan and China (AP) AP - Despite a thriving economic partnership, political ties between Japan and China are at their lowest ebb in years. The two countries are locked in disputes over World War II history, natural gas exploration and now a bold incursion by a Chinese nuclear submarine.
Translation: Crece la Fricción Entre Japón y China (AP) AP - A pesar de una floreciente asociación económica, los lazos políticos entre Japón y China están en su punto más bajo en años. Los dos países están en disputa por la historia de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, la exploración de gas natural y ahora una audaz incursión de un submarino nuclear chino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Amidst a flourishing economic alliance, Japan and China's political connection is currently witnessing its worst phase in years. Conflicts over the history of World War II, natural gas exploration, and the recent audacious intrusion by a Chinese nuclear submarine have led to escalating tensions between the two nations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Even though there is a robust economic bond, Japan and China's political affiliations are presently at the weakest they have been in years. The disputes surrounding World War II history, natural gas exploration and the latest provocative violation by a Chinese nuclear submarine have fueled tension between the two countries.

Original Text: Turkish PM lobbies EU officials Turkey's PM Erdogan visits Brussels to put his case for Turkey to start formal talks on joining the EU.
Translation: El primer ministro de Turquía hace cabildeo con funcionarios de la UE. El primer ministro de Turquía, Erdogan, visita Bruselas para presentar su caso y que Turquía comience conversaciones formales sobre su adhesión a la UE.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Turkish Prime Minister, Erdogan, travels to Brussels to advocate for the initiation of official discussions about Turkey's potential accession to the EU.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In pursuit of formal talks on Turkey's EU membership, Prime Minister Erdogan of Turkey lobbies European Union representatives during his visit to Brussels.

Original Text: Eli Lilly Launches Online Clinical Trial Registry Drugmaker Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Wednesday said it will make clinical trial information available online amid calls by lawmakers and physicians for more disclosure of negative trial results.
Translation: Eli Lilly lanza un registro de ensayos clínicos en línea. El fabricante de medicamentos Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) dijo el miércoles que hará disponible la información de los ensayos clínicos en línea ante los llamados de legisladores y médicos para una mayor divulgación de los resultados negativos de los ensayos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY.N: Quote, Profile, Research) announced the launch of an online clinical trial registry, in response to demands from lawmakers and doctors for increased transparency regarding unfavorable trial outcomes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to health practitioners and legislative demands for greater openness about negative trial findings, Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY.N: Quote, Profile, Research) made a move on Wednesday to unveil an online clinical trial registry.

Original Text: Bailey Tries WR Pro Bowl cornerback Champ Bailey practiced with the offense at wide reciever during the Denver Broncos' practice on Tuesday.
Translation: Bailey Intenta WR El esquinero del Pro Bowl, Champ Bailey, practicó con la ofensiva como receptor abierto durante el entrenamiento de los Denver Broncos el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the Denver Broncos' Tuesday practice, Champ Bailey, a Pro Bowl cornerback, attempted the position of a wide receiver.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Denver Broncos' practice on Tuesday, Champ Bailey, a WR Pro Bowl cornerback, played as a wide receiver.

Original Text: Scientists Recover Critical Genesis Parts (AP) AP - NASA scientists said they have recovered some critical pieces of the Genesis space capsule intact and are optimistic the wreckage will yield valuable information about the origins of the solar system.
Translation: Científicos Recuperan Partes Críticas de Génesis (AP) AP - Científicos de la NASA dijeron que han recuperado algunas piezas críticas de la cápsula espacial Genesis intactas y están optimistas de que los restos proporcionarán información valiosa sobre los orígenes del sistema solar.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NASA scientists have announced the recovery of key fragments of the Genesis space capsule, expressing hope that the salvageable wreckage could offer important insights into the beginnings of our solar system. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to AP, pieces crucial to the Genesis space capsule have been retrieved by NASA's scientists, who believe that the available wreckage could unlock valuable knowledge about how our solar system initially formed.

Original Text: HP Rolls Out Ultra-Low Priced PC in China (Reuters) Reuters - Hewlett-Packard Co. , the\world's number-two PC maker, said on Friday it has launched a\3,999 yuan ( #36;483) computer in China, turning up the heat in the\intensely competitive market.
Translation: HP lanza PC de precio ultra bajo en China (Reuters) Reuters - Hewlett-Packard Co., el segundo fabricante de PC más grande del mundo, anunció el viernes que ha lanzado una computadora de 3,999 yuanes ( #36;483) en China, intensificando la competencia en el mercado intensamente competitivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hewlett-Packard Co, the second largest PC producer globally, announced its launch of a 3,999 yuan (approximately $483) computer in China, marking its move in the highly competitive market (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - The global second-place PC creator, Hewlett-Packard Co, declared on Friday its introduction of an affordably-priced computer in China, valued at 3,999 yuan ($483), intensifying the competition in the market.

Original Text: Road-Weary Cardinal Drops Decision To Michigan State, 78-53 Paul Davis scored 20 points and keyed a first-half surge to lead No. 20 Michigan State to a 78-53 win over Stanford on Saturday. Michigan State (5-2) took control with an
Translation: Cardenal cansado de la carretera pierde ante Michigan State, 78-53. Paul Davis anotó 20 puntos e impulsó una racha en la primera mitad para llevar a Michigan State, número 20, a una victoria de 78-53 sobre Stanford el sábado. Michigan State (5-2) tomó control con un
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Cardinal, exhausted from constant travelling, lost to Michigan State, 78-53. Paul Davis was pivotal in a first-half surge to victory, contributing 20 points for No. 20 Michigan State against Stanford on Saturday. Asserting their dominance early on, Michigan State (5-2) took control.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An evidently fatigued Cardinal lost a 78-53 decision against Michigan State, with Paul Davis' 20-point contribution becoming instrumental for the 20th ranked Michigan State's victory on Saturday. It was a game where Michigan State (with a 5-2 record) seized control in the beginning itself.

Original Text: IBM to acquire life insurance processing, admin company IBMis acquiring Liberty Insurance Services, or LIS, which is the U.S. business process services operation of RBC Insurance, IBM and RBC announced Tuesday. LIS handles life insurance and annuity processing and administration, and will become a new IBM subsidiary focused on that service.
Translation: IBM adquirirá la empresa de procesamiento y administración de seguros de vida. IBM está adquiriendo Liberty Insurance Services, o LIS, que es la operación de servicios de procesos de negocios de RBC Insurance en los Estados Unidos, anunciaron IBM y RBC el martes. LIS maneja el procesamiento y la administración de seguros de vida y anualidades, y se convertirá en una nueva subsidiaria de IBM enfocada en ese servicio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM has announced its plans to purchase Liberty Insurance Services (LIS), a US business process services unit of RBC Insurance that specializes in life insurance and annuity processing and administration. After the acquisition, LIS will be transformed into a new IBM subsidiary dedicated to offering these services.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, IBM and RBC announced IBM's intention to purchase Liberty Insurance Services (LIS), an entity of RBC Insurance that manages life insurance and annuity processing and administration in the US. Post-acquisition, LIS will operate as a new IBM subsidiary with a primary focus on these services.

Original Text: Seedorf: We Are Ready The Milan midfielder believes that the Rossoneri are ready to take on Juventus on Saturday night. Clarence Seedorf will be facing his former coach at Real Madrid, Fabio Capello, this weekend, but hed rather
Translation: Seedorf: Estamos Listos. El mediocampista del Milan cree que los Rossoneri están listos para enfrentarse a la Juventus el sábado por la noche. Clarence Seedorf se enfrentará a su antiguo entrenador en el Real Madrid, Fabio Capello, este fin de semana, pero preferiría
Paraphrase 1: 1. Milan's midfielder, Seedorf, confidently states that the Rossoneri are prepared for their Saturday night showdown with Juventus. Expressing his readiness, Seedorf, who will be up against his ex-coach from Real Madrid, Fabio Capello, this weekend, prefers...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Clarence Seedorf, midfielder for Milan, feels that the Rossoneri are prepped and set for their game against Juventus this coming Saturday night. Seedorf faces the prospect of going against his previous coach at Real Madrid, Fabio Capello, yet he would rather...

Original Text: PM: Iraq will vote US warplanes and artillery units bombed the Sunni stronghold of Fallujah yesterday, a day after scores died when insurgents hammered the capital.
Translation: PM: Irak votará. Los aviones de guerra y unidades de artillería de los Estados Unidos bombardearon ayer el bastión sunita de Fallujah, un día después de que murieran decenas cuando los insurgentes atacaron la capital.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Sunni stronghold of Fallujah in Iraq was bombed by US warplanes and artillery units yesterday, following a devastating attack by insurgents on the capital that resulted in many deaths the day prior. This comes as Iraq prepares for a vote.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A day after many were killed by insurgent attacks on the capital, US warplanes and artillery units launched a bombing action on Fallujah, a Sunni stronghold, yesterday. This occurred as Iraq is gearing up for a vote.

Original Text: Enjoying a Visit To Boston (Un)Common My father-in-law, Irving  quot;Sheik quot; Karelis, was born in 1920 in New England, the very year the Red Sox sent Babe Ruth to the New York Yankees.
Translation: Disfrutando una Visita a Boston (In)Común. Mi suegro, Irving "Sheik" Karelis, nació en 1920 en Nueva Inglaterra, el mismo año en que los Red Sox enviaron a Babe Ruth a los Yankees de Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. My father-in-law, Irving "Sheik" Karelis who was born in New England in 1920 - the same year Babe Ruth was transferred from the Red Sox to the New York Yankees, had quite an enjoyable visit to Boston (Un)Common.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the same year that the Red Sox traded Babe Ruth to the New York Yankees, 1920, my father-in-law Irving "Sheik" Karelis was born in New England and he had a delightful time during his visit to Boston (Un)Common.

Original Text: Motorola trimming 1,000 jobs Motorola Inc. says it #39;s cutting about 1,000 jobs, or about 1 percent of its workforce, as it winds up its spinoff of Austin-based chip company Freescale Semiconductor Inc.
Translation: Motorola recortando 1,000 empleos. Motorola Inc. dice que está recortando alrededor de 1,000 empleos, o alrededor del 1 por ciento de su fuerza laboral, mientras concluye su escisión de la empresa de chips con sede en Austin, Freescale Semiconductor Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Motorola Inc. has announced that it is slashing approximately 1,000 jobs, which equates to about 1 percent of its total labor force, as it concludes the spinoff of Austin's Freescale Semiconductor Inc.

Original Text: Rugby-Gregan signs with Wallabies through 2007 World Cup Australia captain George Gregan has signed a three-year contract with the Wallabies which will take him through the 2007 World Cup in France.
Translation: Rugby-Gregan firma con los Wallabies hasta la Copa del Mundo 2007. El capitán de Australia, George Gregan, ha firmado un contrato de tres años con los Wallabies que lo llevará hasta la Copa del Mundo 2007 en Francia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australia's captain, George Gregan, has inked a three-year deal with the Wallabies that ensures his participation in the 2007 World Cup in France.
Paraphrase 2: 2. George Gregan, the captain of Australia, has secured a three-year agreement with the Wallabies that will extend until the World Cup in France in 2007.

Original Text: Bigley: Gaddafi to help London - Members of Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi #39;s family have pledged to support efforts to free British hostage Kenneth Bigley, his brother claims.
Translation: Bigley: Gaddafi para ayudar a Londres - Miembros de la familia del líder libio Muammar Gaddafi se han comprometido a apoyar los esfuerzos para liberar al rehén británico Kenneth Bigley, según afirma su hermano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Kenneth Bigley's sibling, the family of Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi has committed to assisting in the campaign to release the British hostage Bigley.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The brother of captive British national, Kenneth Bigley, asserts that Muammar Gaddafi's family, the Libyan leader, has promised to aid in securing his release.

Original Text: U.S.: High Oil Price Due to Supply Fears  MELBOURNE (Reuters) - Supply and demand in the oil market  are roughly in balance and current high prices are due to the  possibility of disruptions rather than any shortage, a U.S.  official said on Tuesday.
Translation: EE.UU.: El alto precio del petróleo se debe a temores de suministro. MELBOURNE (Reuters) - La oferta y la demanda en el mercado del petróleo están aproximadamente en equilibrio y los altos precios actuales se deben a la posibilidad de interrupciones más que a cualquier escasez, dijo un funcionario estadounidense el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MELBOURNE (Reuters) - A U.S. official confirmed on Tuesday that the ongoing high oil prices in the U.S. are due to concerns over possible supply interruptions, rather than an actual shortage. The oil market is largely balanced in terms of supply and demand.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The oil market's supply and demand are essentially equal, stated a U.S. representative on Tuesday from MELBOURNE (Reuters). He clarified that rising oil prices within the United States aren't a result of scarcity, but rather apprehensions about potential disturbances in supply.

Original Text: Iran meets deadline to halt nuclear program TEHRAN - Iran said Monday it was suspending its program to produce enriched uranium, the crucial ingredient needed for the production of nuclear weapons.
Translation: Irán cumple plazo para detener el programa nuclear TEHERÁN - Irán dijo el lunes que estaba suspendiendo su programa para producir uranio enriquecido, el ingrediente crucial necesario para la producción de armas nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TEHRAN - On Monday, Iran announced the suspension of its enriched uranium production program, which is an essential element in the creation of nuclear arms, as it met the allotted deadline.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Successfully meeting the deadline, Iran declared on Monday from Tehran that it was putting a halt to its enriched uranium production program - a key factor involved in nuclear weapon manufacture.

Original Text: News: US Secret Service busts 28 ID fraudsters A US-led operation targeting ID fraud crooks has led to the arrest of 28 people across seven countries this week.\
Translation: Noticias: El Servicio Secreto de EE. UU. detiene a 28 estafadores de identidad. Una operación liderada por EE. UU. dirigida a los delincuentes de fraude de identidad ha llevado a la detención de 28 personas en siete países esta semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A total of 28 identity fraud criminals in seven different countries have been apprehended this week, thanks to an operation spearheaded by the US Secret Service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US Secret Service has executed a successful operation this week, leading to the capture of 28 individuals across seven nations involved in identity fraud.

Original Text: Premiership: Ban Diouf, for a long time If the FA had anything about them at all, which is a separate debate, they would slap a hefty ban on Boltons El-Hadji Diouf, for spitting in the face of Portsmouths Arjan de Zeeuw.
Translation: Premier League: Prohibición a Diouf, durante mucho tiempo. Si la FA tuviera algo de sentido, lo cual es un debate aparte, deberían imponer una prohibición severa a El-Hadji Diouf del Bolton, por escupir en la cara de Arjan de Zeeuw del Portsmouth.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Assuming the FA possesses any credibility, a topic up for debate, they should impose a strict ban on Bolton's El-Hadji Diouf from Premiership for spitting in the face of Portsmouth's Arjan de Zeeuw.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Given any level of integrity within the FA, a matter worthy of separate discussion, a significant sanction on El-Hadji Diouf of Bolton’s, in the Premiership, should be placed for his disrespectful action of spitting at Portsmouth's Arjan de Zeeuw.

Original Text: Bosch to hire 600 software engineers in India by next year (AFP) AFP - German maker of car parts and electrical household goods Robert Bosch said it will hire 600 software professionals by next year at its Indian software and engineering centre.
Translation: Bosch contratará a 600 ingenieros de software en India para el próximo año (AFP) AFP - El fabricante alemán de piezas de automóviles y productos eléctricos para el hogar, Robert Bosch, dijo que contratará a 600 profesionales de software para el próximo año en su centro de software e ingeniería en India.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - Robert Bosch, a German manufacturer of car parts and electrical domestic appliances stated its plans to recruit 600 software experts by the next year at its software and engineering facility in India.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - 600 software engineering roles are expected to be filled by next year at the Indian software and engineering hub of Robert Bosch, the German producer of car parts and electric home appliances.

Original Text: Cops Put Brakes on Bike Protest The creator of Bikes Against Bush planned to use his Wi-Fi-Bluetooth-SMS-bike combo to spray anti-Bush messages on city streets. But police intervene before he could start. Cyrus Farivar reports from New York.
Translation: La Policía Frena la Protesta de Bicicletas. El creador de Bicicletas Contra Bush planeaba usar su combo de bicicleta con Wi-Fi-Bluetooth-SMS para rociar mensajes anti-Bush en las calles de la ciudad. Pero la policía intervino antes de que pudiera comenzar. Cyrus Farivar informa desde Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The founder of Bikes Against Bush intended on using a unique combo of Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and SMS in his bike to spray anti-Bush sentiments across city streets. However, police interfered before the plan could be initiated. A report from Cyrus Farivar in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Before the inventor of Bikes Against Bush could initiate his creative plan of disseminating anti-Bush messages across the city using a bike equipped with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and SMS, police put a stop to it. This is according to Cyrus Farivar from New York.

Original Text: Virgin Mobile UK Ramps Up Data Strategy Virgin Mobile UK, the UK mobile virtual network operator, is boosting its mobile data capabilities through a key deal with InfoSpace Mobile.
Translation: Virgin Mobile UK Acelera su Estrategia de Datos Virgin Mobile UK, el operador de red virtual móvil del Reino Unido, está mejorando sus capacidades de datos móviles a través de un acuerdo clave con InfoSpace Mobile.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Through a significant agreement with InfoSpace Mobile, Virgin Mobile UK is enhancing its mobile data abilities as the UK's mobile virtual network operator.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Virgin Mobile UK is improving its mobile data strategy by forming a pivotal partnership with InfoSpace Mobile, operating as a mobile virtual network in the UK.

Original Text: Germany #39;s Volkswagen workers stage warning strikes Workers at Germany #39;s automobile giant Volkswagen (VW) have staged warning strikes in the on-going wage dispute with the management.
Translation: Los trabajadores de Volkswagen de Alemania llevan a cabo huelgas de advertencia. Los trabajadores de la gigante automotriz Volkswagen (VW) de Alemania han realizado huelgas de advertencia en medio de la disputa salarial en curso con la dirección.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In response to the on-going salary disagreement with the management, workers at Volkswagen (VW), Germany's automotive behemoth, have initiated warning strikes.

Original Text: Germany to play the 2006 WC opener match Hosts Germany will open the 2006 World Cup in Munich on June 9, it was confirmed on Wednesday following a FIFA meeting in Zurich. German national coach Jurgen Klinsmann initially
Translation: Alemania jugará el partido inaugural de la Copa del Mundo 2006: los anfitriones de Alemania abrirán la Copa del Mundo 2006 en Munich el 9 de junio, se confirmó el miércoles después de una reunión de la FIFA en Zurich. Inicialmente el entrenador nacional alemán Jurgen Klinsmann
Paraphrase 1: 1. It was verified at a FIFA meeting in Zurich on Wednesday that the inaugural match of the 2006 World Cup will be played by the host, Germany, in Munich on June 9. Initially, German national coach Jurgen Klinsmann...
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 2006 World Cup's opening match will be hosted by Germany in Munich on June 9, as finalised during a FIFA meeting in Zurich on Wednesday. This was initially something German national coach Jurgen Klinsmann...

Original Text: New Mexico Museum to Launch Names Into Space ALAMOGORDO, N.M. (AP) -- The New Mexico Museum of Space History will be shipping names to the stars with the first X-Prize launch into space...
Translation: Museo de Nuevo México lanzará nombres al espacio ALAMOGORDO, N.M. (AP) -- El Museo de Historia Espacial de Nuevo México enviará nombres a las estrellas con el primer lanzamiento del Premio X al espacio...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The New Mexico Museum of Space History, located in Alamogordo, N.M., is poised to send names into space with the inaugural X-Prize launch.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the first X-Prize launch, names will be catapulted into space courtesy of the New Mexico Museum of Space History, based in Alamogordo, N.M.

Original Text: N Koreans arrested in Beijing Chinese police are reported to have arrested 60 North Korean refugees in raids on safe houses in Beijing.
Translation: Se informa que la policía china ha arrestado a 60 refugiados norcoreanos en redadas a casas seguras en Beijing.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It's reported that the Beijing Chinese police conducted raids on safe houses, resulting in the apprehension of 60 North Korean refugees.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sixty North Korean refugees are reported to have been detained in Beijing during raids on safe houses by Chinese police.

Original Text: Virginia, Fairfax Commit Funds To Help Lure New IBM Jobs The state of Virginia and Fairfax County each pledged \$600,000 to entice International Business Machines Corp. to bring 1,250 high-paying new government contracting jobs to Fairfax.
Translation:
Virginia, Fairfax Comprometen Fondos para Atraer Nuevos Empleos de IBM
El estado de Virginia y el condado de Fairfax prometieron cada uno \$600,000 para incentivar a la Corporación de Negocios Internacionales (International Business Machines Corp.) a traer 1,250 nuevos empleos de contratación gubernamental bien remunerados a Fairfax.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To attract new IBM job opportunities, both the State of Virginia and Fairfax County have each allocated $600,000 in efforts to persuade International Business Machines Corp. to introduce 1,250 well-paying government contracting positions in Fairfax.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Both Virginia State and Fairfax County have each committed $600,000 to encourage International Business Machines Corp. to generate 1,250 high-paying new government contracting jobs in Fairfax.

Original Text: Virgin to offer commercial space flights; expands into online <b>...</b> LONDON, September 27 (newratings.com) - Virgin Group Limited, owned by the British billionaire entrepreneur Richard Branson, is planning to launch the world #39;s first passenger flight service to space in 2007, with seat prices starting at about \$198,600.
Translation: Virgin ofrecerá vuelos espaciales comerciales; se expande a en línea <b>...</b> LONDRES, 27 de septiembre (newratings.com) - Virgin Group Limited, propiedad del empresario multimillonario británico Richard Branson, planea lanzar el primer servicio de vuelos espaciales para pasajeros del mundo en 2007, con precios de asientos a partir de aproximadamente \$198,600.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Richard Branson's Virgin Group Limited, the British-owned company, is projected to start the world's premier passenger service to space by 2007, with fares commencing from approximately $198,600. This step was announced on September 27th in London, expanding their operations into the online market as well.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The first-ever passenger space flight service is planned to be launched by Britain's Virgin Group Limited in 2007, with ticket prices set to start around $198,600. This move forms part of their expansion into the online world, as was revealed in London on September 27th, under the proprietorship of billionaire entrepreneur Richard Branson.

Original Text: NewsView: Mosque Adds Problems for U.S. (AP) AP - The Bush administration is supporting the Iraqi government as it uses diplomacy and the threat of force to oust radical Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr's militia from a holy shrine in Najaf. At the same time, it is trying to steer clear of becoming the target of an angry Muslim world.
Translation: NewsView: La mezquita agrega problemas para los EE. UU. (AP) AP - La administración de Bush está apoyando al gobierno iraquí mientras usa la diplomacia y la amenaza de fuerza para expulsar a la milicia del clérigo chiíta radical Muqtada al-Sadr de un santuario sagrado en Najaf. Al mismo tiempo, está intentando evitar convertirse en el objetivo de un mundo musulmán enfadado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Bush Administration is backing the Iraqi government's efforts to diplomatically and forcefully remove radical Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr's militia from a holy shrine in Najaf, while concurrently striving to avoid becoming a focal point for global Muslim anger. (AP NewsView: U.S. Troubles Increased by Mosque)
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the objective of dislodging radical Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr's militia from a sacred shrine in Najaf, the Iraqi government's diplomatic efforts and displays of potential force are receiving support from the Bush administration. However, the U.S simultaneously attempts to refrain from becoming the object of wrath within the Muslim world. (AP NewsView: U.S. Faced with Mosque Complications)

Original Text: Guild members boycott gala, picket outside Sun-Times building The Chicago Sun-Times #39; management and unionized reporters planned to return to the bargaining table Wednesday morning on the heels of a vote authorizing a strike and picketing by employees outside a gala thrown by the company.
Translation: Miembros del gremio boicotean la gala, protestan fuera del edificio Sun-Times de Chicago. La gerencia del Chicago Sun-Times y los reporteros sindicalizados planeaban regresar a la mesa de negociaciones el miércoles por la mañana tras una votación que autorizó una huelga y protestas de los empleados fuera de una gala organizada por la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a vote that authorized a strike, members of the Guild decided to boycott the gala and picket outside the Sun-Times building in Chicago. As a result of this action, the company's management and unionized reporters are intending to resume negotiations on Wednesday morning.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In reaction to a vote sanctioning a strike, a boycott of the gala by Guild members and picketing at the premises of Sun-Times in Chicago happened. In response to this, a Wednesday morning meeting is being set up for the management of the Chicago Sun-Times and its unionized reporters to restart negotiations.

Original Text: Johnson Controls Profit Up 25 Percent Johnson Controls Inc. on Tuesday said its fourth-quarter profit rose 25 percent, helped by a lower tax rate and decreased miscellaneous net expenses.
Translation: Beneficios de Johnson Controls aumentan un 25 por ciento. Johnson Controls Inc., el martes, declaró que su beneficio del cuarto trimestre aumentó un 25 por ciento, ayudado por una menor tasa de impuestos y una disminución de los gastos netos varios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Johnson Controls Inc. announced on Tuesday that their fourth-quarter profit surged by 25 percent, boosted by a reduced tax rate and a drop in miscellaneous net expenses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Johnson Controls Inc. reported a 25 percent increase in their fourth-quarter profit, thanks to a decrease in tax rate alongside lowered miscellaneous net expenses.

Original Text: Rooney set for Man Utd Wayne Rooney arrives at Man Utd's training ground for a medical ahead of a 25m move from Everton.
Translation: Rooney se prepara para el Man Utd. Wayne Rooney llega al campo de entrenamiento del Man Utd para un examen médico antes de un traslado de 25m desde Everton.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Poised to make a 25m switch from Everton, Wayne Rooney has arrived at Man Utd's training grounds to undergo a medical check-up.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anticipating a 25m transfer from Everton, Wayne Rooney has reached Man Utd's training facility for preliminary medical examinations.

Original Text: Ancient fruit basket dug up near Athens ATHENS -- A scientific dig has uncovered four pomegranates believed to be 2,500 years old preserved inside a woven basket nestled inside a bronze vessel, a Greek archeologist said yesterday.
Translation: Cesta antigua de frutas excavada cerca de Atenas ATENAS -- Una excavación científica ha descubierto cuatro granadas que se cree tienen 2,500 años de antigüedad, preservadas dentro de una cesta tejida, alojada en un recipiente de bronce, dijo ayer un arqueólogo griego.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A Greek archeologist revealed yesterday that a scientific excavation near Athens has unearthed an aged fruit basket - a woven container inside a bronze vessel holding four pomegranates considered to be around 2,500 years old.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Unveiled yesterday by a Greek archeologist, a 2,500 years old woven basket discovered during a scientific dig near Athens was found to contain four preserved pomegranates within a bronze vessel.

Original Text: Latest Internet Peril: Cyber Bullies The US leads other technologically advanced nations in the reported incidences of cyber bullying, the latest trend to threaten youngsters who use the Internet.
Translation: Último Peligro de Internet: Ciberacosadores. Los EE.UU. lideran a otras naciones tecnológicamente avanzadas en los incidentes reportados de ciberacoso, la última tendencia que amenaza a los jóvenes que usan el Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The United States, compared to other countries with advanced technology, reports the highest incidences of cyber bullying, posing a new major threat to young Internet users. This is the newest danger surfacing on the internet.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Internet's newest danger is cyber bullying and the United States is leading the pack amongst technologically advanced nations in reported cases. This trend is particularly threatening to the youth who utilize the internet.

Original Text: Hooters Air brings flights to Rockford Hooters Air will begin offering nonstop flights out of the Greater Rockford Airport in early 2005 to Denver, Atlanta and Las Vegas, officials said.
Translation: Hooters Air comienza a ofrecer vuelos a Rockford. Hooters Air comenzará a ofrecer vuelos directos desde el Aeropuerto Greater Rockford a principios de 2005 hacia Denver, Atlanta y Las Vegas, dijeron las autoridades.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nonstop flights to Denver, Atlanta, and Las Vegas will be offered by Hooters Air out of the Greater Rockford Airport starting in early 2005, according to officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Officials have announced that Hooters Air is set to launch nonstop flights from the Greater Rockford Airport to Denver, Atlanta, and Las Vegas in early 2005.

Original Text: Brugnetti upsets the field to win 20km walk Athens, Greece (Sports Network) - The first official track event took place this morning and Italy #39;s Ivano Brugnetti won the men #39;s 20km walk at the Summer Olympics in Athens.
Translation: Brugnetti sorprende al campo para ganar la caminata de 20 km en Atenas, Grecia (Red Deportiva) - El primer evento oficial de pista tuvo lugar esta mañana y el italiano Ivano Brugnetti ganó la caminata de 20 km para hombres en los Juegos Olímpicos de Verano en Atenas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Athens, Greece (Sports Network) - The opening track event was the men's 20km walk, in which Italy's Ivano Brugnetti emerged victorious, upsetting predictions at the Summer Olympics held in Athens.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ivano Brugnetti from Italy surprised everyone by coming first in the men's 20km walk, which was the initial official track event of the Summer Olympics in Athens, Greece. (Sports Network)

Original Text: Jockeying for Top Senate Job Under Way (AP) AP - Democrat or Republican, whether for this fall or 2006, it's never too early to jockey for position in the Senate, especially if party leadership might be the prize.
Translation: Maniobrando para el Mejor Puesto del Senado en Marcha (AP) AP - Democráta o Republicano, ya sea para este otoño o para 2006, nunca es demasiado temprano para maniobrar por una posición en el Senado, especialmente si el liderazgo del partido podría ser el premio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Regardless of the party, Democrats or Republicans, positioning for the top job in the Senate has kicked off, whether for the upcoming fall or 2006. Particularly with the potential of party leadership as a reward, it is never premature to make a move. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - Be it for the impending fall or 2006, and irrespective of being a Democrat or Republican, the scramble for the leading position in the Senate is in progress. The lure of possibly securing party leadership has perpetuated the belief that it's never too soon to strive for this.

Original Text: UF gets lesson in growing up GAINESVILLE -- The young Florida Gators needed to grow up all at once here Saturday night. They weren #39;t ready to. They didn #39;t know how.
Translation: La UF recibe una lección de madurez GAINESVILLE -- Los jóvenes Gators de Florida necesitaban madurar de golpe aquí la noche del sábado. No estaban preparados para hacerlo. No sabían cómo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GAINESVILLE - The inexperienced Florida Gators were expected to mature instantly on Saturday night here, but they weren't prepared for it and lacked the knowledge on how to do so.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The youthful Florida Gators, in GAINESVILLE, were expected to abruptly mature on Saturday night, however, they were unprepared and uncertain about how to accomplish this.

Original Text: Owen to give Sven selection dilemma Michael Owen has reassured Sven-Goran Eriksson that he will be fit to face Wales in Saturday #39;s World Cup qualifier - if selected.
Translation: Owen da a Sven un dilema de selección. Michael Owen ha tranquilizado a Sven-Goran Eriksson asegurándole que estará en forma para enfrentarse a Gales en el partido de clasificación para la Copa del Mundo el sábado, si es seleccionado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Michael Owen has confirmed to Sven-Goran Eriksson that he will be capable of taking on Wales in the upcoming Saturday's World Cup qualifier, posing a selection challenge for Sven - if he decides to choose Owen.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sven-Goran Eriksson has been assured by Michael Owen that he is healthy enough to confront Wales in the World Cup qualifier this Saturday, creating a selection conundrum for Sven - if he opts to pick Owen.

Original Text: Many similarities, differences between #39;04 US basketball and #39;80 Soviet hockey teams This was no miracle, but you could not tell by the amount of elation surrounding the Dream Team #39;s trip to the woodshed Sunday.
Translation: Muchas similitudes, diferencias entre los equipos de baloncesto de EEUU '04 y de hockey soviético '80. Esto no fue un milagro, pero no se podía reconocer por la cantidad de euforia que rodeaba el viaje del Dream Team a la leñera el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The '04 US basketball and '80 Soviet hockey teams had numerous similarities and differences. Despite no miraculous event, the level of joy around the Dream Team's Sunday visit to the woodshed was undeniably high.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US basketball team of '04 and the Soviet hockey team of '80 shared a lot of similarities, while also having their differences. The ecstasy around the Dream Team's visit to the woodshed on Sunday was immense, even though there was no miracle involved.

Original Text: Gambill #39;s slump worsens Delray Beach  A return to one of his favorite and most successful ATP Tour stops wasn #39;t enough to stop Jan-Michael Gambill #39;s slide.
Translation: El declive de Gambill #39 empeora en Delray Beach. Un retorno a uno de sus lugares favoritos y más exitosos del ATP Tour no fue suficiente para detener el declive de Jan-Michael Gambill #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite returning to one of his most favored and successful ATP Tour spots, Jan-Michael Gambill's decline in performance exacerbated in Delray Beach.

Original Text: Waiting for a refund check? IRS may be looking for you The Internal Revenue Service is looking for 2,955 New Jersey taxpayers whose refund checks totaling nearly \$2.6 million were returned to the government this year by the Postal Service as undeliverable.
Translation: ¿Esperando un cheque de reembolso? Es posible que el IRS te esté buscando. El Servicio de Impuestos Internos está buscando a 2,955 contribuyentes de Nueva Jersey cuyos cheques de reembolso, que suman casi $2.6 millones, fueron devueltos al gobierno este año por el Servicio Postal por ser no entregables.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you're awaiting a refund check, the IRS might be on the hunt to find you. This year, roughly 2,955 taxpayers in New Jersey didn't receive their refund checks, valued at almost $2.6 million in total, as they were returned undeliverable by the Postal Service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Are you anticipating a refund check? You could be on the IRS radar. This year, the Postal Service returned nearly $2.6 million worth of refund checks addressed to 2,955 New Jersey taxpayers, marking them as undeliverable.

Original Text: Peru Coca Growers Briefly Hold Tourists Coca growers protesting government plans to eradicate their cocaine-producing crop briefly held a group of European tourists visiting Inca ruins in the Andean city of Cuzco Tuesday, police said.
Translation: Los cultivadores de coca de Perú retuvieron brevemente a turistas. Los cultivadores de coca que protestaban contra los planes del gobierno para erradicar su cosecha productora de cocaína retuvieron brevemente a un grupo de turistas europeos que visitaban las ruinas incas en la ciudad andina de Cuzco el martes, según la policía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to police, a group of European tourists visiting the Inca ruins in the Andean city of Cuzco were held momentarily by Coca growers from Peru, who were demonstrating against the government's proposed plans to destroy their cocaine-producing crop.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, European tourists visiting the Inca ruins in the Andean city of Cuzco, were temporarily detained by protesting Coca growers from Peru. The growers were objecting to the government's plans to eradicate their crop, which is used to produce cocaine, police reported.

Original Text: Rosy outlook from Greenspan fails to sway many economists WASHINGTON : The upbeat outlook from Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan has failed to convince many economists, who argue that the United States is likely to see tepid growth at best in the near future.
Translation: Perspectiva optimista de Greenspan no logra convencer a muchos economistas WASHINGTON: El pronóstico optimista del presidente de la Reserva Federal, Alan Greenspan, no ha logrado convencer a muchos economistas, quienes argumentan que es probable que Estados Unidos vea un crecimiento tibio como mucho en el futuro cercano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON: Despite Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan's optimistic perspective, several economists remain unconvinced, asserting that the United States can only expect sluggish growth in the coming period.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON: Many economists remain skeptical even after an optimistic prognosis from Federal Reserve Chairman, Alan Greenspan. They believe that the US will experience only moderate growth at best in the near term.

Original Text: Mets End Losing Skid The Mets snap an 11-game losing streak while stopping the Marlins' franchise record-tying nine-game winning streak with a 4-0 victory.
Translation: Los Mets terminan racha de derrotas. Los Mets rompen una racha perdedora de 11 partidos mientras detienen la racha ganadora de nueve partidos de los Marlins, igualando el récord de la franquicia, con una victoria de 4-0.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Mets break their 11-game losing streak with a 4-0 victory over the Marlins, simultaneously ending their opponent's run of nine consecutive wins, which tied a franchise record.

Original Text: Open-Fireworks in store as Agassi takes on Federer Andre Agassi, darling of the New York crowd, meets world number one Roger Federer in a mouthwatering quarter-final at the US Open on Wednesday as the year #39;s final grand slam bursts into life.
Translation: Fuegos artificiales en tienda cuando Agassi se enfrenta a Federer. Andre Agassi, el querido del público de Nueva York, se encuentra con el número uno del mundo, Roger Federer, en un apetecible cuartos de final en el US Open el miércoles, mientras el último gran slam del año toma vida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The final grand slam of the year sparks to life at the US Open on Wednesday, presenting a thrilling quarter-final where New York's beloved Andre Agassi confronts world number one, Roger Federer. Anticipation is high for this virtual fireworks display on the court.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday's US Open promises a spectacle as it unfolds the final grand slam of the year, featuring a much-anticipated quarter-final showdown between crowd favorite Andre Agassi and reigning world champion Roger Federer. This match promises to ignite the event like fireworks in a store.

Original Text: Malaysia, Singapore Propose Key Political Deal Malaysia and Singapore agreed Monday to work on a proposal to solve some of their long-standing bilateral disputes in what could be a milestone in relations between the two quarrelsome neighbors.
Translation: Malasia, Singapur proponen Acuerdo Político Clave. Malasia y Singapur acordaron el lunes trabajar en una propuesta para solucionar algunas de sus disputas bilaterales de larga data en lo que podría ser un hito en las relaciones entre los dos vecinos conflictivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Malaysia and Singapore made a concord to devise a plan aimed at resolving their long-term bilateral disagreements. This decision could potentially mark a significant turn in the relations between these two contentious neighboring countries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The longstanding bilateral issues between Malaysia and Singapore could find resolution, following a proposal that both countries agreed to work on this Monday. This may serve as a landmark moment in the tumultuous relationship shared by these neighboring nations.

Original Text: Election Over, Eyes Turn to Rates (Reuters) Reuters - With the U.S. presidential election\finally over, stock investors won't get much of a break next\week as they face the next big obstacle -- higher interest\rates.
