Translation: Terminadas las Elecciones, las Miradas se Dirigen a las Tasas (Reuters) Reuters - Con las elecciones presidenciales de EE. UU. finalmente concluidas, los inversionistas de acciones no tendrán mucho descanso la próxima semana ya que enfrentan el próximo gran obstáculo: tasas de interés más altas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - Following the conclusion of the U.S. presidential election, the primary concern for stock investors is now the impending rise in interest rates, providing them with little respite.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Post U.S. Presidential Election, Attention Shifts to Interest Rates (Reuters) - There's hardly a breather for stock investors even after the conclusion of the U.S. presidential election, as they now confront the upcoming challenge of increased interest rates.

Original Text: Microsoft Sharpens Its Software Factory Vision VANCOUVER, British ColumbiaIn a speech at the Object-Oriented Programming, Systems, Languages and Applicationsor OOPSLAconference here, Microsoft Corp.
Translation: Microsoft afina su visión de la fábrica de software VANCOUVER, Columbia Británica. En un discurso en la conferencia de Programación Orientada a Objetos, Sistemas, Lenguajes y Aplicaciones, o conferencia OOPSLA, aquí, Microsoft Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Object-Oriented Programming, Systems, Languages and Applications (OOPSLA) conference in Vancouver, British Columbia, Microsoft Corp articulated its refined vision for a software factory.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft Corp., presenting at the OOPSLA (Object-Oriented Programming, Systems, Languages and Applications) conference in Vancouver, British Columbia, clarified their vision for a software factory.

Original Text: Hard Rock to display Virgin Mary sandwich The handover for the infamous Virgin Mary grilled cheese sandwich is to take place at 1 pm, Wednesday, at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel  amp; Casino in Hollywood.
Translation: Hard Rock exhibirá el sándwich de la Virgen María. La entrega del infame sándwich de queso a la parrilla de la Virgen María tendrá lugar a la 1 pm, el miércoles, en el Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino en Hollywood.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The notorious Virgin Mary grilled cheese sandwich will be exhibited at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, with the exchange scheduled for Wednesday at 1 pm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood has planned the handover of the well-known Virgin Mary grilled cheese sandwich for Wednesday at 1 pm.

Original Text: Paradorn powers through to Federer test Thai tennis ace Paradorn Srichaphan lined up a high-profile career-first clash with formidable Roger Federer as he hammered home a 6-2, 7-5 defeat of Dutchman Dennis van Scheppingen at the Thailand Open in Bangkok on Friday.
Translation: Paradorn avanza con fuerza hacia el desafío de Federer. El as del tenis tailandés Paradorn Srichaphan preparó un choque de alto perfil por primera vez en su carrera con el formidable Roger Federer, al dominar con una victoria de 6-2, 7-5 sobre el holandés Dennis van Scheppingen en el Abierto de Tailandia en Bangkok el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Thailand Open in Bangkok on Friday, Thai tennis star Paradorn Srichaphan achieved a 6-2, 7-5 victory over Dutch player Dennis van Scheppingen, setting up an unprecedented high-stakes match with the formidable Roger Federer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thai tennis pro Paradorn Srichaphan decisively defeated Dennis van Scheppingen with a 6-2, 7-5 score in the Thailand Open in Bangkok on Friday; his triumph pits him against the daunting Roger Federer for the first time in his career.

Original Text: Burma exiled government denounced over continued detention of <b>...</b> Exiled - National Coalition of Government of the Union of Burma (NCGUB) on 30 November strongly denounced Burmas military junta, State Peace and Development Council (SPDC) for extending the house arrest of democracy leader and Nobel laureate Daw Aung
Translation: El gobierno exiliado de Birmania denunció a <b>...</b> Exiliado - La Coalición Nacional del Gobierno de la Unión de Birmania (NCGUB) el 30 de noviembre denunció enérgicamente a la junta militar de Birmania, Consejo de Paz y Desarrollo del Estado (SPDC) por extender el arresto domiciliario del líder de la democracia y laureado con el Premio Nobel Daw Aung.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On November 30, the National Coalition of Government of the Union of Burma (NCGUB), a government in exile, vehemently criticized Burma's military government, the State Peace and Development Council (SPDC), for extending the house arrest of Daw Aung, a democracy leader and Nobel laureate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The State Peace and Development Council's (SPDC) decision to extend Daw Aung's house arrest was strongly condemned by the National Coalition of Government of the Union of Burma (NCGUB) — the exiled government of Burma, on 30 November. Daw Aung is a renowned democracy leader and a recipient of the Nobel Prize.

Original Text: Benitez: Reds need time to gel Liverpool manager Rafael Benitez has conceded that his side could take a few months to kick into gear following Sunday #39;s 1-0 defeat at Bolton.
Translation: Benítez: Los Reds necesitan tiempo para consolidarse. El gerente del Liverpool, Rafael Benítez, ha admitido que su equipo podría tardar unos meses en ponerse en marcha tras la derrota del domingo por 1-0 ante el Bolton.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following their 1-0 loss to Bolton on Sunday, Liverpool manager Rafael Benitez admitted that his team may require a few months to find their rhythm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Rafael Benitez, the manager of Liverpool, has acknowledged post their 1-0 setback against Bolton on Sunday, that it might take his team a few months to start performing consistently.

Original Text: Annual Competition for Public Space Flight MOJAVE, Calif. - Hoping to build on the momentum sparked by SpaceShipOne's dash into space, supporters of opening the heavens to civilians are turning the winner-take-all race into an annual competition that might further fuel imaginations...
Translation: Competencia Anual para Vuelos Espaciales Públicos MOJAVE, Calif. - Con la esperanza de aprovechar el impulso generado por la incursión de SpaceShipOne en el espacio, los partidarios de abrir los cielos a los civiles están convirtiendo la carrera al todo por el todo en una competencia anual que podría avivar aún más las imaginaciones...
Paraphrase 1: 1. MOJAVE, Calif. - With hopes of capitalizing on the momentum ignited by SpaceShipOne's space journey, advocates for civilian space travel are converting the win-all race into a yearly contest that could potentially inspire more imaginations...
Paraphrase 2: 2. MOJAVE, Calif. - Eager to leverage the enthusiasm stirred by SpaceShipOne's venture into space, proponents of allowing ordinary people to access space are transitioning the challenge into an ongoing yearly competition, aiming to spark even more creativity...

Original Text: Bugging device found at UN headquarters GENEVA - The United Nations said on Thursday a secret listening device had been found in a posh meeting room of its European headquarters in Geneva.
Translation: Se encontró un dispositivo de espionaje en la sede de la ONU en GINEBRA - La Organización de las Naciones Unidas dijo el jueves que se había encontrado un dispositivo de escucha secreto en una elegante sala de reuniones de su sede europea en Ginebra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The United Nations announced on Thursday that a clandestine listening gadget was discovered in an upscale conference room of its European headquarters in Geneva.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, a covert listening apparatus was uncovered within a luxurious meeting room of the United Nations European headquarters in Geneva, as confirmed by the organization itself.

Original Text: Oil prices approach \$54 amid Nigeria unrest fears Oil futures prices advanced to another record high yesterday as a strike began in Africa's largest exporter of crude, exacerbating global supply concerns at a time of strong demand and reduced output in the hurricane-ravaged Gulf of Mexico.
Translation: Los precios del petróleo se acercan a los $54 debido a los temores de disturbios en Nigeria. Los precios a futuro del petróleo avanzaron a otro récord histórico ayer cuando comenzó una huelga en el mayor exportador de crudo de África, exacerbando las preocupaciones globales de suministro en un momento de fuerte demanda y reducción de la producción en el Golfo de México, devastado por el huracán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid concerns over unrest in Nigeria, oil prices advanced to $54. The strike in Africa's largest crude exporter combined with the strong demand and lowered production due to the hurricanes in the Gulf of Mexico intensified global supply worries, leading to a new record high in oil futures prices yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oil futures prices reached an all-time high yesterday, hitting $54 due to the strike sparked in Nigeria, Africa's biggest crude exporter. This issue, coupled with the high demand and decreased production in the hurricane-torn Gulf of Mexico, heightened global supply concerns.

Original Text: US  #39;politicking #39; over Osama capture claim: Pakistan Pakistan rejected a US official #39;s weekend claim that Osama bin Laden was close to being captured as  quot;politicking quot;.  quot;He can say this, but we have no sound information.
Translation: Rechazo de Pakistan a las "maniobras políticas" de EEUU sobre la afirmación de la captura de Osama: Pakistan rechazó la afirmación de un funcionario estadounidense durante el fin de semana que alegaba que Osama bin Laden estaba cerca de ser capturado como una "maniobra política". "Él puede decir esto, pero no tenemos información sólida".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Pakistan dismissed a US official's weekend assertion regarding the imminent capture of Osama bin Laden as mere "politicking", stating, "He can say this, but we have no solid evidence."
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the weekend, a US official's proclamation of Osama bin Laden's impending arrest was refuted by Pakistan, who labeled it as "politicking" and declared, "He can make such claims, but we lack any substantial information."

Original Text: Mine blast kills 33, injures 6 in Henan Thirty-three people were confirmed dead in a gas explosion, which also injured six, at a coal mine in Central China #39;s Henan Province on Friday, according to local safety authorities.
Translation: Una explosión en una mina mata a 33 personas e hiere a 6 en Henan. Se confirmó la muerte de treinta y tres personas en una explosión de gas, que también hirió a seis, en una mina de carbón en la provincia central de China, Henan, el viernes, según las autoridades locales de seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to local safety authorities, a gas explosion at a coal mine in Central China's Henan Province resulted in 33 confirmed deaths and six injuries on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, local safety authorities confirmed that a gas explosion at a coal mine in Central China's Henan Province claimed 33 lives and left six injured.

Original Text: Play it differently, Sam: Jussi Jskelinen at Bolton Already last season Bolton Wanderers, a modern-day minnow even if they were one of the founder-members of the Football League in 1888, managed to cause a measure of astonishment in the English Premiership.
Translation: Tócala de manera diferente, Sam: Jussi Jskelinen en el Bolton. Ya la temporada pasada, los Bolton Wanderers, un pez pequeño en la era moderna, aunque fueran uno de los miembros fundadores de la Liga de Fútbol en 1888, lograron causar una medida de asombro en la Premier League inglesa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Already in the previous season, Bolton Wanderers, even if they were one of the founding members of the Football League in 1888 and are now considered a modern-day minnow, managed to create a surge of surprise in the English Premiership, and this is especially noteworthy with Jussi Jääskeläinen playing it differently, Sam.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sam, show something different with Jussi Jääskeläinen at Bolton. Despite being one of the founding members of the Football League in 1888, the Bolton Wanderers, now seen as a modern-day underdog, already caused a stir in the English Premiership last season.

Original Text: PAC-10 MEN #39;S Basketball: Timing of Bibby firing irks Olson Just last month USC basketball coach Henry Bibby said he was enjoying his job more than ever and getting ready for what he hoped would be a good season.
Translation: Baloncesto masculino de la PAC-10: El momento del despido de Bibby molesta a Olson. Justo el mes pasado, el entrenador de baloncesto de USC, Henry Bibby, dijo que estaba disfrutando de su trabajo más que nunca y se estaba preparando para lo que esperaba sería una buena temporada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Just last month, Henry Bibby, the men's basketball coach for USC, proclaimed his job satisfaction and prepared for what he anticipated to be a successful season. However, the recent dismissal of Bibby from the PAC-10 arena has upset Olson due to its timing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite expressing his love for his job and anticipation for a promising season just the previous month, USC basketball coach Henry Bibby, was dismissed. The timing of this decision in the PAC-10 MEN'S basketball arena has upset Olson.

Original Text: Hockey: Australia win first men #39;s gold ATHENS - Australia won the Olympic men #39;s hockey title for the first time in history on Friday, beating defending champions the Netherlands 2-1 with a golden goal.
Translation: Hockey: Australia gana su primer oro masculino ATENAS - Australia ganó el título olímpico masculino de hockey por primera vez en la historia el viernes, venciendo a los campeones defensores, los Países Bajos, 2-1 con un gol de oro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Having triumphed over the reigning champions, the Netherlands, with a solid 2-1 golden goal, Australia made history on Friday by claiming their first-ever Olympic men’s hockey title in Athens.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Friday saw a milestone achievement in Athens when Australia clinched their inaugural men's hockey Olympic gold, edging out the Netherlands, the past champions, 2-1 with a decisive golden goal.

Original Text: AOL Reportedly Cutting Jobs Time Warner #39;s (TWX:NYSE - news - research) America Online division reportedly plans to cut 700 jobs next month in a concession to declining subscription rates at its flagship Internet unit.
Translation: Se informa que AOL reducirá empleos en Time Warner # 39; s (TWX:NYSE - noticias - investigación) La división America Online supuestamente planea recortar 700 empleos el próximo mes como una concesión a las tasas de suscripción en descenso en su unidad de Internet principal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It's reported that Time Warner's America Online division, AOL, plans to lay off 700 employees next month, a move seemingly driven by falling subscription rates at their main Internet operation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following the reported decrease in subscription rates at its principal Internet unit, America Online, a division of Time Warner, is allegedly preparing to eliminate 700 positions next month.

Original Text: When Executives Speak, Hotels Listen  NEW YORK (Reuters) - When corporate guests ask for  something, smart hotel managers get it.
Translation: Cuando los Ejecutivos Hablan, los Hoteles Escuchan NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Cuando los invitados corporativos piden algo, los inteligentes gerentes de hotel lo consiguen.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Intelligent hotel managers provide what corporate guests request when they speak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hotel managers who are wise heed the requests of corporate guests when executives express their needs, according to NEW YORK (Reuters).

Original Text: Canada considers fate of suspected NKorean refugees in China <b>...</b> Canada is facing a diplomatic headache after a group of suspected North Koreans broke into the Canadian Embassy in the Chinese capital, Beijing, on Wednesday.
Translation: Canadá considera el destino de los supuestos refugiados norcoreanos en China <b>...</b> Canadá se enfrenta a un dolor de cabeza diplomático después de que un grupo de presuntos norcoreanos irrumpió en la Embajada de Canadá en la capital china, Beijing, el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Canada is evaluating the predicament of alleged North Korean refugees in China after a group believed to be North Koreans unlawfully entered the Canadian Embassy in Beijing, leading to a diplomatic issue on Wednesday.

Original Text: Swimming: Shibata Joins Japanese Gold Rush  ATHENS (Reuters) - Ai Shibata wore down French teen-ager  Laure Manaudou to win the women's 800 meters freestyle gold  medal at the Athens Olympics Friday and provide Japan with  their first female swimming champion in 12 years.
Translation: Natación: Shibata se une a la fiebre del oro japonesa ATENAS (Reuters) - Ai Shibata agotó a la adolescente francesa Laure Manaudou para ganar la medalla de oro en los 800 metros libres femeninos en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas el viernes y proporcionar a Japón su primera campeona femenina de natación en 12 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1) ATHENS (Reuters) - Ai Shibata claimed the gold medal for the women's 800 meters freestyle at the Athens Olympics Friday, outlasting French teenage competitor Laure Manaudou. This win marks Japan's first female swimming championship in 12 years, adding to their gold rush.
Paraphrase 2: 2) After a 12-year gap, Japan sees its first female swimming champion as Ai Shibata beats French teen Laure Manaudou to take the gold in the women's 800 meters freestyle at the Athens Olympics on Friday, contributing to Japan's ongoing gold rush.

Original Text: Australia #39;s Labor Leader Latham Hospitalized With Pancreatitis Aug. 18 (Bloomberg) -- The leader of Australia #39;s main opposition Labor Party, Mark Latham, has been hospitalized with pancreatitis, according to a statement released by his party.
Translation: Líder Laborista de Australia, Latham, Hospitalizado con Pancreatitis el 18 de Agosto (Bloomberg) -- El líder del principal partido de oposición de Australia, el Partido Laborista, Mark Latham, ha sido hospitalizado con pancreatitis, según un comunicado lanzado por su partido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mark Latham, the head of Australia's primary opposition, the Labor Party, has been admitted to the hospital due to pancreatitis, as per a party statement released on August 18, Bloomberg reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On August 18, Bloomberg reported that Mark Latham, the leader of the Labor Party - Australia's main opposition party, has been taken into hospital suffering from pancreatitis, as announced in a statement by his party.

Original Text: Straw leaves for Darfur visit (AFP) AFP - Foreign Secretary Jack Straw left London for Sudan, where he was to discuss the crisis in war-torn Darfur with President Omar al-Beshir and senior officials.
Translation: Hoja de paja para la visita a Darfur (AFP) AFP - El secretario de Relaciones Exteriores, Jack Straw, salió de Londres hacia Sudán, donde debía discutir la crisis en la guerra asolada Darfur con el presidente Omar al-Beshir y altos funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jack Straw, the Foreign Secretary, has departed from London to Sudan for a visit, where he will engage in discussions about the ongoing crisis in the conflict-ridden region of Darfur with President Omar al-Beshir and top-level officials, as reported by AFP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to AFP, Foreign Secretary Jack Straw has jetted off from London and headed to Sudan where he is scheduled to delve into dialogue about the Darfur catastrophe with President Omar al-Beshir and high-ranking authorities.

Original Text: Ashado in Winning Breeders #39; Cup Start Ashado, ridden by John Velazquez, won the \$2 million Distaff Race at Lone Star Park Saturday, the first event on the \$14 million eight-race Breeders #39; Cup card.
Translation: Ashado en la Victoria del Inicio de la Copa de Criadores #39; Ashado, montado por John Velazquez, ganó la Carrera Distaff de 2 millones de dólares en Lone Star Park el sábado, el primer evento en la tarjeta de ocho carreras de 14 millones de dólares de la Copa de Criadores #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. John Velazquez rode Ashado to victory in the $2 million Distaff Race at Lone Star Park on Saturday, marking the first event in the $14 million Breeders' Cup card's eight races.

Original Text: EP Socialist Group hails Barroso #39;s revamping efforts President of the Socialist Group in the European Parliament (EP) Martin Schulz on Thursday hailed the efforts by incoming President of the European Commission Jose Manuel Barroso in revamping his team for approval.
Translation: El Grupo Socialista del PE elogia los esfuerzos de renovación de Barroso. El Presidente del Grupo Socialista en el Parlamento Europeo (PE) Martin Schulz elogió el jueves los esfuerzos del presidente entrante de la Comisión Europea, Jose Manuel Barroso, en la reestructuración de su equipo para su aprobación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Martin Schulz, the President of the Socialist Group in the European Parliament, applauded Jose Manuel Barroso, the incoming President of the European Commission, on Thursday for his efforts to overhaul his team for approval.

Original Text: Militant Wanted in Pearl Abduction Killed An Islamic militant wanted in the murder of American Journalist Daniel Pearl was discovered running a clothing shop near the Indian border and killed in a shootout with police, Pakistani authorities said Wednesday.
Translation: Un militante buscado en el secuestro de Pearl fue asesinado. Un militante islámico buscado por el asesinato del periodista estadounidense Daniel Pearl fue descubierto manejando una tienda de ropa cerca de la frontera con India y muerto en un tiroteo con la policía, dijeron las autoridades paquistaníes el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An Islamic radical, involved in the homicide of American journalist Daniel Pearl, was found operating a clothing store near the Indian border. He was shot dead in a clash with the police, announced the Pakistani officials on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pakistani authorities reported on Wednesday that a radical Islamic member, implicated in the assassination of American journalist Daniel Pearl, was tracked down to a clothing store on the Indian border. A gunfire exchange with the police led to his death.

Original Text: Horna will face Ferrero in Madrid Luis Horna will clash with Juan Carlos Ferrero at the Madrid Masters after a first-round win over Hicham Arazi. The Peruvian broke Arazi to win the first set and, although the Moroccan recovered from 5-2 to
Translation: Horna se enfrentará a Ferrero en Madrid. Luis Horna se enfrentará a Juan Carlos Ferrero en el Masters de Madrid después de una victoria en la primera ronda contra Hicham Arazi. El peruano rompió el servicio de Arazi para ganar el primer set y, aunque el marroquí se recuperó de 5-2 para
Paraphrase 1: 1. After triumphing over Hicham Arazi in the first round, Luis Horna is scheduled to take on Juan Carlos Ferrero in the Madrid Masters. Despite Arazi making a comeback from 5-2, Horna, a Peruvian, secured the first set by breaking Arazi.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following his first-round victory against Hicham Arazi, Peruvian Luis Horna is set to square off against Juan Carlos Ferrero in Madrid Masters. Even though Arazi bounced back from 5-2 down, Horna took the first set by breaking Arazi's serve.

Original Text: Defense keeps San Diego in charge SAN DIEGO -- The San Diego Chargers' long nightmare is coming to an end. And if the Chargers do go on and break their eight-year playoff drought, they can thank their anonymous defense.
Translation: La defensa mantiene a San Diego al mando SAN DIEGO -- La larga pesadilla de los Chargers de San Diego está llegando a su fin. Y si los Chargers siguen adelante y rompen su sequía de ocho años sin playoffs, pueden agradecer a su defensa anónima.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN DIEGO -- The extensive unfavorable period San Diego Chargers have been enduring is nearing its conclusion. If the Chargers eventually manage to terminate their eight-year hiatus from the playoffs, their less-recognized defense deserves credit for keeping them in control.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In San Diego, the prolonged unpleasant phase for the San Diego Chargers is drawing to a close. The faceless defense of the Chargers could be owed gratitude if they succeed in ending their eight-year absence from the playoffs and continue their domination.

Original Text: Blair in Ethiopia to outline vision for Africa (AFP) AFP - Prime Minister Tony Blair was due to outline his personal vision for the future of Africa at a meeting of the organisation he set up to spur development efforts in the region.
Translation: Blair en Etiopía para esbozar su visión de África (AFP) AFP - Se esperaba que el Primer Ministro Tony Blair presentara su visión personal para el futuro de África en una reunión de la organización que él estableció para impulsar los esfuerzos de desarrollo en la región.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - In Ethiopia, Prime Minister Tony Blair is expected to lay out his personal outlook for Africa's future during a meeting of the organization he founded to promote developmental initiatives in the area.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - Tony Blair, during his visit to Ethiopia, was tasked with articulating his unique vision for the progression of Africa in a conference of the entity he initiated to boost development activities across the region.

Original Text: Update 2: French Gov #39;t May Link EADS With Thales The French government plans to merge Airbus parent EADS with defense company Thales to create a new European giant to rival Boeing Co.
Translation: Actualización 2: El Gov francés #39; t puede vincular EADS con Thales. El gobierno francés planea fusionar la empresa matriz de Airbus, EADS, con la empresa de defensa Thales para crear un nuevo gigante europeo que compita con Boeing Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The French administration is considering the amalgamation of EADS, the parent company of Airbus, with the defense corporation Thales. This venture aims to establish a new European titan to compete with Boeing Co.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A strategic move is being planned by the French government to stir a merger between Airbus's parent organization, EADS, and defense firm Thales, shaping a formidable European competitor against Boeing Co.

Original Text: Snap-On plunges on Q3 warning SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Shares of Snap-On Inc. plunged 11 percent early Tuesday after the tool and equipment maker warned of lower third-quarter profits due to higher steel costs, weakness in Europe and disruptions from hurricanes in the US.
Translation: Snap-On se desploma tras la advertencia del tercer trimestre SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Las acciones de Snap-On Inc. se desplomaron un 11 por ciento a primera hora del martes después de que el fabricante de herramientas y equipos advirtiera de menores beneficios para el tercer trimestre debido a los mayores costos del acero, la debilidad en Europa y las interrupciones causadas por los huracanes en los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to rising steel costs, weakness in Europe, and US hurricane disruptions affecting their third quarter profits, Snap-On Inc.'s shares took a severe hit, plummeting 11 percent early Tuesday, as reported from San Francisco by CBS.MW.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Early Tuesday, Snap-On Inc. experienced a significant 11% drop in their shares following their warning of decreased profits in Q3 owing to escalated steel prices, lackluster performance in Europe, and hurricane-induced disruptions in the US, according to a SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) report.

Original Text: PeopleSoft's last hurrah? After Oracle's court victory, customers will look for reassurance at what could be PeopleSoft's last annual user conference.
Translation: ¿El último hurra de PeopleSoft? Después de la victoria en corte de Oracle, los clientes buscarán seguridad en lo que podría ser la última conferencia anual de usuarios de PeopleSoft.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After Oracle's courtroom win, customers will seek certainty at what may be the final annual user conference of PeopleSoft - a seemingly last hurrah?

Original Text: First Reserve to Buy Ingersoll-Rand Unit for \$1.2 Bln (Update1) First Reserve Corp., the largest private buyout firm specializing in energy-industry investments, agreed to buy a unit from Ingersoll-Rand Co.
Translation: Primera Reserve para comprar unidad de Ingersoll-Rand por $1.2 mil millones (Actualización1) Primera Reserve Corp., la firma de compra privada más grande que se especializa en inversiones en la industria de la energía, acordó comprar una unidad de Ingersoll-Rand Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Agreeing to purchase a subsidiary from Ingersoll-Rand Co., First Reserve Corp., a leading private buyout organization with specialisation in energy-industry investments, is set to invest $1.2 Bln.

Original Text: Siebel unveils SMB go-to-market strategy (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - After a year of pilots and trials, Siebel Systems jumped with both feet into the SMB market Tuesday, announcing a new approach to offer Siebel Professional CRM applications to SMBs (small and midsize businesses) -- companies with revenues up to about  #36;500 million.
Translation: Siebel revela estrategia de entrada al mercado para las SMB (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Después de un año de pilotos y pruebas, Siebel Systems se lanzó de lleno al mercado de las SMB el martes, anunciando un nuevo enfoque para ofrecer aplicaciones de CRM Profesional Siebel a las SMB (pequeñas y medianas empresas) - empresas con ingresos de hasta aproximadamente #36;500 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Siebel Systems announced their entry into the SMB market on Tuesday following a year of pilots and tests, revealing a fresh strategy to provide Siebel Professional CRM applications specifically for small and midsize businesses (SMBs) with revenues up to approximately $500 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Siebel Systems boldly ventured into the SMB market on Tuesday after a year of trials and pilot programs, declaring a new plan to supply SMBs (small and midsize businesses) -- businesses with income up to around $500 million, with Siebel Professional CRM applications.

Original Text: Record 13th straight mens title HOUSTON - Top-seeded Roger Federer of Switzerland won a record 13th straight final Sunday, beating Australian Lleyton Hewitt, 6-3, 6-2, in the title match of the Association of Tennis Professionals Masters Cup.
Translation: Título masculino número 13 consecutivo HOUSTON - Roger Federer, el sembrado número uno de Suiza, ganó un récord de 13ª final consecutiva el domingo, venciendo al australiano Lleyton Hewitt, 6-3, 6-2, en el partido por el título de la Copa Masters de la Asociación de Profesionales del Tenis.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Association of Tennis Professionals Masters Cup title match, Roger Federer from Switzerland, as the top-seed, secured a record 13th consecutive men's title on Sunday. He achieved victory over Australian player Lleyton Hewitt, with a score of 6-3, 6-2.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Top-seeded Swiss player Roger Federer has set a new record by winning his 13th men's championship in a row on Sunday, at the Association of Tennis Professionals Masters Cup. He clinched the title match against the Australian, Lleyton Hewitt, with final scores of 6-3, 6-2.

Original Text: History promises memorable Chennai encounter Over the years, the ground has produced some of the most endearing moments between the two countries. In the 1969-70 series, the match produced a shoot-out between two of the best post-war
Translation: La historia promete un encuentro memorable en Chennai. A lo largo de los años, el campo ha producido algunos de los momentos más entrañables entre los dos países. En la serie 1969-70, el partido produjo un enfrentamiento entre dos de los mejores después de la guerra
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the years, significant memories have been forged between the two countries on the Chennai ground. In the 1969-70 series, it was the backdrop for a thrilling showdown between two of the top post-war performers, as history attests.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Historical records show that the Chennai field has been the stage for unforgettable moments in the contests between these two countries. A dramatic duel between two of the finest post-war players occurred during the series of 1969-70.

Original Text: RFID, coming to a library near you The dusty shelves of your local library are going high-tech with tagging chips. Civil liberties groups warn of a privacy nightmare.
Translation: RFID, llegando a una biblioteca cercana a ti. Los estantes polvorientos de tu biblioteca local se están actualizando con chips de etiquetado. Los grupos de libertad civil advierten sobre una pesadilla de privacidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Your local library's dusty shelves are transitioning to high-tech with the implementation of RFID tagging chips, despite privacy concerns raised by civil liberties groups.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Civil liberties groups express privacy concerns as your local library shelves upgrade to high-tech RFID tagging chips.

Original Text: But seriously folks You want answers and you want them now. The only thing is, four weeks of ludicrous exhibition games haven't told you anything. So here's some advice: Take it slow, real slow.
Translation: Pero en serio, amigos, quieren respuestas y las quieren ahora. Lo único es que cuatro semanas de ridículos juegos de exhibición no les han dicho nada. Así que aquí les va un consejo: Tómenlo con calma, muy despacio.
Paraphrase 1: Honestly speaking, everyone is eagerly seeking immediate answers. However, the past month of absurd demonstration games have given no clarity. Thus, my suggestion is to be patient, extremely patient.
Paraphrase 2: Honestly, everyone is in search of fast answers. But, the previous month of bizarre display games have yielded no insights. Therefore, my advice is to proceed with caution, extreme caution.

Original Text: Hollywood sues over home theatre A FILM industry group has sued a high-end consumer electronics company, claiming its home theatre jukebox system makes illegal copies of movie DVDs.
Translation: Hollywood demanda por un teatro en casa. Un grupo de la industria cinematográfica ha demandado a una empresa de electrónica de consumo de alta gama, alegando que su sistema de cine en casa tipo jukebox realiza copias ilegales de DVDs de películas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A high-end consumer electronics company is being sued by a film industry group in Hollywood, alleging that the company's home theatre jukebox system illegally replicates movie DVDs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A legal action has been brought against a prestigious consumer electronics firm by a group from the film industry. They allege that the company's home theatre jukebox system allows for the unlawful duplication of movie DVDs.

Original Text: UN staff, foreigners to be evacuated from Ivory Coast France will begin evacuating its nationals and other Europeans from Ivory Coast starting Wednesday, the spokesman of French forces in the troubled west African country said.
Translation: El personal de la ONU y extranjeros serán evacuados de Costa de Marfil. Francia comenzará a evacuar a sus ciudadanos y otros europeos de Costa de Marfil a partir del miércoles, dijo el portavoz de las fuerzas francesas en el problemático país del oeste de África.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The spokesperson for the French forces in the strife-ridden West African nation of Ivory Coast announced that the evacuation of French nationals and other Europeans, including UN staff, will commence on Wednesday.

Original Text: Binge drinking, the weekend activity of choice for many young Britons (AFP) AFP - Britain might currently be struggling for Olympic medals in Athens, but if drinking to excess were a competitive sport, there seems little doubt its nationals could beat all-comers.
Translation: Beber en exceso, la actividad de fin de semana preferida por muchos jóvenes británicos (AFP). AFP - Gran Bretaña podría estar luchando actualmente por conseguir medallas en las Olimpiadas de Atenas, pero si el beber en exceso fuera un deporte competitivo, parece haber poca duda de que sus nacionales podrían vencer a todos los contrincantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP reports that while Britain continues to grapple with obtaining Olympic medals in Athens, if a contest were held for excessive drinking, it appears that its citizens could easily outperform everyone else, given the prevalence of binge drinking among young Britons over the weekend.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to AFP, although Britain is having difficulty winning Olympic medals in Athens, it's clear that its nationals could surpass all others if overindulgence in alcohol were a competitive game. This is evident from the favoured weekend pastime of numerous young Britons, namely, binge drinking.

Original Text: Scottish stay of execution for Vogts The German has been a lame duck since the 1-1 draw in Moldova 13 days ago, which meant that qualification for the World Cup finals in two years #39; time was unlikely.
Translation: Aplazamiento escocés de la ejecución para Vogts. El alemán ha sido un pato cojo desde el empate 1-1 en Moldavia hace 13 días, lo que significó que la clasificación para las finales de la Copa del Mundo en dos años era poco probable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the stay of execution for Vogts in Scotland, the German's effectiveness has dwindled since their 1-1 draw with Moldova 13 days ago. This resulted in a diminished likelihood of qualifying for the World Cup finals in two years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Vogts, the German, keeps his Scottish position despite being ineffectual since the 1-1 stalemate against Moldova 13 days prior, thus reducing chances of making it to the World Cup finals in two years.

Original Text: Mergers pinching smaller nonprofits The staff at the Veterans Benefits Clearinghouse knows many of the homeless men and women who roam Boston's streets once served in the armed forces. For years, the small Roxbury nonprofit has helped by finding them jobs.
Translation: Las fusiones aprietan a las pequeñas organizaciones sin fines de lucro. El personal de la Casa de Beneficios para Veteranos conoce a muchos de los hombres y mujeres sin hogar que deambulan por las calles de Boston y que antes servían en las fuerzas armadas. Durante años, la pequeña organización sin fines de lucro de Roxbury los ha ayudado encontrándoles empleos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For several years, the small Roxbury nonprofit, known as the Veterans Benefits Clearinghouse, has been instrumental in finding employment for many homeless men and women, who once served in the armed forces, roaming the streets of Boston. Its services are especially critical considering the squeeze mergers place on smaller nonprofits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the pressure from mergers on smaller nonprofits, the Veterans Benefits Clearinghouse in Roxbury has been assisting homeless ex-military men and women in Boston to secure jobs. Most of these individuals are familiar faces to the staff at the organization.

Original Text: Home Depot Profit Rises on Services, Pros  ATLANTA (Reuters) - Home improvement retailing leader Home  Depot Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HD.N</A> on Tuesday reported a 15 percent rise in  third-quarter profit, topping estimates, aided by sales in its  installed and professional businesses.
Translation: Aumenta la ganancia de Home Depot por servicios y profesionales ATLANTA (Reuters) - El líder en venta minorista de mejoramiento del hogar, Home Depot Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HD.N</A> informó el martes un aumento del 15 por ciento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre, superando las estimaciones, impulsado por las ventas en sus negocios instalados y profesionales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Home Depot Inc., the leader in home improvement retail, announced a third-quarter profit rise of 15%, exceeding expectations. This increase is attributed to sales in their installed and professional sectors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sales from its professional and installed segments helped Home Improvement retail titan, Home Depot Inc., report a 15% hike in profits for the third quarter of Tuesday, surpassing predictions.

Original Text: Iran Acknowledges Talks on Renewed Nuclear Freeze  TEHRAN (Reuters) - Iran's chief nuclear negotiator  acknowledged on Wednesday that Tehran was in talks to renew its  freeze of some sensitive nuclear activities.
Translation: Irán Reconoce Conversaciones sobre la Renovación de la Suspensión Nuclear TEHRÁN (Reuters) - El principal negociador nuclear de Irán reconoció el miércoles que Teherán estaba en conversaciones para renovar su suspensión de algunas actividades nucleares sensibles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TEHRAN (Reuters) - Iran's primary nuclear negotiator conceded on Wednesday that discussions were being held concerning the reinstatement of certain restricted nuclear pursuits.

Original Text: Enron-Linked Securities Sparks Lawsuit  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Citigroup Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=C.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">C.N</A> faces a lawsuit  from angry investors who allege they were defrauded in a  "massive scheme of deception" when they bought securities tied  to the credit-worthiness of Enron Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ENRNQ.PK target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ENRNQ.PK</A>.
Translation: Valores vinculados a Enron desatan demanda NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Citigroup Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=C.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">C.N</A> enfrenta una demanda de inversores enfadados que alegan que fueron defraudados en un "esquema masivo de engaño" cuando compraron valores vinculados a la solvencia crediticia de Enron Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ENRNQ.PK target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ENRNQ.PK</A>.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Citigroup Inc. is confronted with a lawsuit filed by disgruntled investors who claim they were misled in a significant fraudulent scheme when they acquired securities related to the financial credibility of Enron Corp.

Original Text: Knicks: From the outside, they #39;re looking in Lenny Wilkens isn #39;t taking for granted what practically everyone else is -- that a healthy Knicks team will make the postseason.
Translation: Knicks: Desde el exterior, están #39; observando hacia adentro. Lenny Wilkens no da por sentado lo que prácticamente todos los demás sí -- que un equipo de Knicks saludable llegará a la postemporada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lenny Wilkens doesn't assume, like most others, that a fit Knicks team will secure a place in the playoffs, despite them appearing strong from the outside.
Paraphrase 2: 2. From an outsider's perspective the Knicks look strong, but unlike the majority's view, Lenny Wilkens doesn't necessarily believe they're a shoe-in for the postseason if they maintain their health.

Original Text: US deficit widens to \$164.7 billion The deficit in the broadest measure of trade climbed to a record high of \$164.7 billion in the third quarter of this year, reflecting Americans' hardy demand for imported oil and foreign-made goods.
Translation: El déficit de EE.UU. se amplía a 164.7 mil millones de dólares. El déficit en la medida más amplia del comercio ascendió a un récord de 164.7 mil millones de dólares en el tercer trimestre de este año, reflejando la fuerte demanda de los americanos por petróleo importado y bienes fabricados en el extranjero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The trade deficit of the US swelled to an all-time high of $164.7 billion in this year's third quarter, driven by the robust demand of Americans for foreign-manufactured goods and imported oil.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reflecting the strong American demand for imported oil and products made overseas, the trade deficit reached a record peak of $164.7 billion in the third quarter of this year.

Original Text: Tennis: Dementieva clinches first title of season HASSELT, Belgium : Russian top seed Elena Dementieva won her first title of 2004 with a 0-6, 6-0, 6-4 victory against compatriot Elena Bovina in the final of the 170,000-dollar tournament.
Translation: Tenis: Dementieva asegura el primer título de la temporada. HASSELT, Bélgica: La primera cabeza de serie rusa, Elena Dementieva, ganó su primer título del 2004 con una victoria de 0-6, 6-0, 6-4 contra su compatriota Elena Bovina en la final del torneo de 170,000 dólares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Elena Dementieva, the top-seeded Russian tennis player, secured her first victory of the 2004 season at the 170,000-dollar tournament in Hasselt, Belgium, with a score of 0-6, 6-0, 6-4 against her fellow countrywoman, Elena Bovina.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the 170,000-dollar tournament held in Hasselt, Belgium, the first title of the 2004 season was won by Russian top seed Elena Dementieva. She defeated compatriot Elena Bovina with a score line of 0-6, 6-0, 6-4.

Original Text: Relief Effort Gains as Aid Is Reaching More Survivors The international lifeline to save five million homeless victims of the Indian Ocean tsunami gathered strength on Sunday.
Translation: El esfuerzo de alivio aumenta a medida que la ayuda llega a más supervivientes. La línea de vida internacional para salvar a cinco millones de víctimas sin hogar del tsunami del Océano Índico cobró fuerza el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The international mission to aid five million homeless victims of the Indian Ocean tsunami intensified on Sunday as help began to reach more survivors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Help for the five million homeless victims of the Indian Ocean tsunami grew stronger on Sunday, resulting in the relief effort reaching more survivors.

Original Text: Cardinals Demonstrate How to Build a Sturdy Lead With Heavy Lumber In this era of wild-card entries and best-of-five-game playoff series, a talented team can stroll through the regular season, fire its manager, pick up its pace and find
Translation: Los Cardenales Muestran Cómo Construir una Sólida Ventaja Con Madera Pesada. En esta era de entradas de comodines y series de playoffs de mejor de cinco juegos, un equipo talentoso puede pasearse por la temporada regular, despedir a su manager, acelerar su ritmo y encontrar
Paraphrase 1: 1. In this era characterized by wild-card entries and best-of-five-game playoff series, a skilled team like the Cardinals can confidently navigate the regular season, even let go of its manager, and up its game, exemplifying the art of constructing a robust lead with powerful batting.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Given the current age of wild-card entries and best-out-of-five playoff series, the Cardinals portray the ability of a high-quality team to casually pass through the regular season, discharge its manager, accelerate its speed, and discover the technique to establish a formidable lead through potent offense.

Original Text: Japan on alert as suspected Chinese sub found in territorial <b>...</b> TOKYO : Japan was on alert after a suspected Chinese nuclear submarine entered its territorial waters, prompting Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi to voice concern, officials and reports said.
Translation: Alerta en Japón debido a un presunto submarino chino encontrado en aguas territoriales <b>...</b> TOKIO: Japón se encontraba en alerta después de que un presunto submarino nuclear chino entrara en sus aguas territoriales, lo que provocó que el Primer Ministro Junichiro Koizumi expresara su preocupación, según informaron funcionarios y reportes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reports and officials stated that Japan heightened its alert status when a presumed Chinese nuclear submarine was detected in its territorial waters, leading to Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi expressing his worries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Upon noticing an alleged Chinese nuclear submarine in its territorial zone, Japan increased its vigilance. This sparked concern in Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi, as stated by officials and various reports.

Original Text: Terry and Gudjohnsen keep 100 per cent record intact CHELSEA moved five points clear at the top of Group H last night, continuing their 100 per cent record in the Champions League group stage with a 2-0 win over CSKA Moscow.
Translation: Terry y Gudjohnsen mantienen intacto el récord del 100 por ciento. CHELSEA se adelantó ayer por la noche cinco puntos en la cima del Grupo H, continuando su récord del 100 por ciento en la fase de grupos de la Liga de Campeones con una victoria de 2-0 sobre el CSKA de Moscú.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Chelsea's streak of a perfect record in the Champions League group stage continued last night, putting them five points ahead in Group H thanks to the combined efforts of Terry and Gudjohnsen which resulted in a 2-0 victory over CSKA Moscow.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Boosted by Terry and Gudjohnsen, Chelsea extended their lead to five points at the apex of Group H while maintaining their unbeaten record with a 2-0 triumph against CSKA Moscow in last night's Champions League group stages.

Original Text: Alpharma Launches Generic Pfizer Drug Drugmaker Alpharma Inc. on Friday said it launched its generic version of Pfizer Inc. #39;s Neurontin for the treatment of epilepsy.
Translation: Alpharma lanza medicamento genérico de Pfizer. El productor de medicamentos Alpharma Inc. anunció el viernes que lanzó su versión genérica del Neurontin de Pfizer Inc. para el tratamiento de la epilepsia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Alpharma Inc., the drugmaker, announced launching their generic version of Pfizer Inc.'s Neurontin, used for treating epilepsy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alpharma Inc. revealed on Friday that they have initiated the distribution of their generic version of the epilepsy treatment drug Neurontin, originally by Pfizer Inc.

Original Text: US soldier seeks Canada asylum A US army deserter seeks refugee status to stay in Canada, arguing the US-led war in Iraq is illegal.
Translation: Soldado estadounidense busca asilo en Canadá. Un desertor del ejército de EE.UU. busca estatus de refugiado para permanecer en Canadá, argumentando que la guerra liderada por los EE.UU. en Irak es ilegal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A US military defector is requesting asylum in Canada, asserting that the American-led conflict in Iraq is unlawful.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arguing that the war in Iraq, led by the US, is illegal, a deserter from the US army is applying for refugee status in Canada.

Original Text: An Open Music Platform John Gruber observes on Daring Fireball,  #147;The iPod, iTunes, and iTMS work with any modern personal computer, Windows or Mac. Yes, the original iPod debuted as a Mac-only peripheral, and iTunes for Windows appeared even later  #151; but Apple offered complete support for Windows relatively quickly. The iPod and iTunes are fully compatible with your existing CD and MP3 music collections. #148; Aug 20
Translation:
Una Plataforma de Música Abierta
John Gruber observa en Daring Fireball, #147; El iPod, iTunes, e iTMS funcionan con cualquier computadora personal moderna, Windows o Mac. Sí, el iPod original debutó como un periférico solo para Mac, y iTunes para Windows apareció incluso más tarde #151; pero Apple ofreció soporte completo para Windows relativamente rápido. El iPod y iTunes son completamente compatibles con tus colecciones de música en CD y MP3 existentes. #148; 20 de agosto.
Paraphrase 1: 1) As John Gruber points out on his blog Daring Fireball in post #147, the iPod, iTunes, and iTMS have evolved to support all contemporary PCs, be it Windows or Mac. Even though the first iPod was exclusively for Mac and iTunes for Windows was introduced later on, Apple proficiently managed to extend full support to Windows very soon. Not to forget, the iPod and iTunes are fully compatible with your existing CD and MP3 music libraries. This observation was made on August 20.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Daring Fireball, John Gruber offers insights in post #147 regarding Apple's Open Music Platform. Though initially the iPod was only compatible with Mac and iTunes was later made available for Windows, Apple successfully mitigated these restrictions by swiftly providing comprehensive Windows support. Furthermore, the iPod and iTunes are fully capable of syncing with your pre-existing CD and MP3 music collections, a point he underlined on August 20.

Original Text: Suicide bomber kills 4 in Tel Aviv #39;s Carmel Market Shortly before 11:30 am a large explosion was heard in Tel Aviv #39;s Carmel Market. A suicide bomber entered the market and blew himself up close to a stall at the corner of Hacarmel St.
Translation: Un atacante suicida mata a 4 en el Mercado Carmel de Tel Aviv. Poco antes de las 11:30 am se escuchó una gran explosión en el Mercado Carmel de Tel Aviv. Un suicida entró al mercado y se hizo estallar cerca de un puesto en la esquina de la calle Hacarmel.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A massive blast, caused by a suicide bomber, was heard around 11:30 am in Tel Aviv's Carmel Market taking the lives of four individuals. The bomber detonated himself near a stall located at the corner of Hacarmel St.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Just prior to 11:30 am in Tel Aviv's Carmel Market, a suicide attacker detonated a bomb, resulting in the death of four people. The lethal explosion occurred nearby a corner stall on Hacarmel St.

Original Text: Navy football shipshape again The doubters were in Paul Johnson #39;s ear three years ago when the ultra-successful coach at Georgia Southern decided to accept the head coaching job at Navy.
Translation: El fútbol de la Marina de guerra en buena forma nuevamente. Los escépticos estaban en el oído de Paul Johnson hace tres años cuando el entrenador ultra exitoso de Georgia Southern decidió aceptar el puesto de entrenador principal en la Marina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Three years ago, when Paul Johnson, the incredibly successful coach from Georgia Southern, chose to take the head coaching role at Navy, skeptics had their doubts. Now, the Navy football team has bounced back strongly.
Paraphrase 2: 2. When Paul Johnson, an exceptionally successful coach at Georgia Southern, elected to take on the head coaching position at Navy three years back, he faced skepticism. Now, under his leadership, the Navy football team has returned to form.

Original Text: English Stars Out in Cold David Beckham, Michael Owen and Steven Gerrard found themselves out in the cold tonight as the European Footballer of the Year award went to AC Milans Andriy Shevchenko.
Translation: Las estrellas inglesas quedan en el frío, David Beckham, Michael Owen y Steven Gerrard se encontraron en la inclemencia esta noche mientras que el premio al Futbolista Europeo del Año fue para Andriy Shevchenko del AC Milan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the race for the European Footballer of the Year award, English luminaries David Beckham, Michael Owen and Steven Gerrard were left behind as Andriy Shevchenko of AC Milan claimed the victory tonight.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tonight, AC Milan's Andriy Shevchenko won the European Footballer of the Year award, while English football stars such as David Beckham, Michael Owen, and Steven Gerrard were left out in the cold.

Original Text: Windows Update Operating systems just ain #39;t what they used to be. For a while, Microsoft released a new version of Windows every two or three yearseach creating a ripple effect on how we all used and thought about technology. But now, there #39;s a ...
Translation: Los sistemas operativos de actualización de Windows simplemente ya no son lo que solían ser. Durante un tiempo, Microsoft lanzaba una nueva versión de Windows cada dos o tres años, cada una creando un efecto dominó en cómo todos usábamos y pensábamos en la tecnología. Pero ahora, hay ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The times when Microsoft released a new Windows every two to three years, influencing our technology usage and thoughts, are past. Nowadays, Windows Update Operating systems decidedly aren't the same.
Paraphrase 2: 2. We're in a different era where Windows Update Operating systems no longer resemble their past versions. Gone are the days when a new version of Windows released by Microsoft every two or three years revolutionized our use and perception of technology.

Original Text: Program Turns Restaurant Food to Compost (AP) AP - Haute cuisine is going green in a program that recycles restaurant and household food scraps into high-grade compost for Northern California farms and vineyards.
Translation: Programa Convierte la Comida de los Restaurantes en Compost (AP) AP - La alta cocina se está volviendo verde en un programa que recicla los desechos de comida de restaurantes y hogares en compost de alta calidad para granjas y viñedos del norte de California.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - A program has been initiated that transforms food waste from restaurants and households into top-quality compost, benefitting farms and vineyards in Northern California – an environmentally friendly approach to haute cuisine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Northern California's farms and vineyards are benefitting from an innovative environmental program that recycles leftover food from restaurants and homes into high-quality compost, taking fine dining's green revolution to a new level.

Original Text: LookSmart Adds Porn Free Search to Net Nanny LookSmart Adds Porn Free Search to Net Nanny\\LookSmart today announced the release of Net Nanny 5.1, an updated version of its Internet filtering software, and the first version to include family-safe Web search. Net Nanny 5.1 has a suggested retail price of \$39.95 for new buyers of Net Nanny and ...
Translation: LookSmart Agrega Búsqueda Libre de Pornografía a Net Nanny\\LookSmart anunció hoy el lanzamiento de Net Nanny 5.1, una versión actualizada de su software de filtrado de Internet, y la primera versión que incluye búsqueda web segura para la familia. Se sugiere un precio de venta al por menor de \$39.95 para los nuevos compradores de Net Nanny y ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. LookSmart has incorporated a porn-free search feature to Net Nanny and today, they have released the updated version, Net Nanny 5.1, which incorporates a family-safe web search. The Internet filtering software's new version is the first to have this feature and is priced at $39.95 for new Net Nanny buyers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The latest version of LookSmart's internet filtering software, Net Nanny 5.1, comes equipped with a family-safe web search feature. Today, LookSmart announced this updated version, which offers a porn-free search, marking it as a first for Net Nanny. Potential buyers can avail this new software at the suggested retail price of $39.95.

Original Text: Wachovia Profit Rises 14 Percent Wachovia Corp. (WB.N: Quote, Profile, Research) , the No. 5 US bank, on Friday said third-quarter profit rose 14 percent, helped by increased lending to consumers and a decline in bad loans.
Translation: Las ganancias de Wachovia aumentan un 14 por ciento. Wachovia Corp. (WB.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), el quinto banco más grande de EE.UU, dijo el viernes que las ganancias del tercer trimestre aumentaron un 14 por ciento, ayudadas por un aumento en los préstamos a los consumidores y una disminución en los préstamos morosos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Wachovia Corp. (WB.N: Quote, Profile, Research), the 5th largest US bank, announced on Friday that their third-quarter profits have surged 14 percent. This surge was aided by a boost in consumer lending and a reduction in non-performing loans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Wachovia Corp. (WB.N: Quote, Profile, Research), ranked 5th among US banks, reported a 14 percent rise in their third-quarter profits. This growth was due to a rise in consumer lending and a drop in the number of bad loans.

Original Text: #39;Tankan #39; sees first slide in 21 months; recovery past peak Business confidence at Japan #39;s large manufacturers in the October-December quarter worsened for the first time in 21 months, and the outlook for next quarter is even dimmer, according to the
Translation: #39;Tankan #39; ve su primera caída en 21 meses; la recuperación superó su pico. La confianza empresarial entre los grandes fabricantes de Japón en el trimestre de octubre-diciembre empeoró por primera vez en 21 meses, y las perspectivas para el próximo trimestre son aún más sombrías, según los datos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the first time in 21 months, the 'Tankan' witnessed a drop as business confidence amongst large Japanese manufacturers deteriorated in the October-December quarter. The forecast for the next quarter appears even more bleak, indicating a recovery that has surpassed its peak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During the October-December quarter, business confidence in Japan's large manufacturers saw a downturn for the first time in 21 months as recorded by 'Tankan', leading to a scenario where recovery has passed its peak. Moreover, a gloomier prediction for the upcoming quarter has been made.

Original Text: After Bell: Hot Topic Falls, Micromuse Up Shares of clothing retailer Hot Topic (HOTT.O: Quote, Profile, Research) fell nearly 10 percent in extended-hours trading on Monday after it cut its fourth-quarter earnings forecast, citing lackluster sales of accessories.
Translation: Después de Bell: Hot Topic cae, Micromuse sube Las acciones del minorista de ropa Hot Topic (HOTT.O: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) cayeron casi un 10 por ciento en las operaciones fuera de horario del lunes después de que redujo su pronóstico de ganancias del cuarto trimestre, citando ventas de accesorios mediocres.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Clothing retailer Hot Topic (HOTT.O: Quote, Profile, Research) saw a nearly 10 percent drop in shares during extended-hours trading on Monday following a cut in its fourth-quarter earnings forecast due to poor accessories sales.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hot Topic (HOTT.O: Quote, Profile, Research), a clothing retail company, experienced a significant fall in shares by nearly 10 percent in Monday's extended-hours trading, after revising its fourth-quarter earnings forecast downward, attributing it to underwhelming accessories sales.

Original Text: Premiers wary of new funding formula Martin proposes for medicare (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - The premiers went for Sunday dinner at Prime Minister Paul Martin's but his offer of billions more for health care left them confused, frustrated, and hungry for more.
Translation: Los primeros ministros desconfían de la nueva fórmula de financiación que Martin propone para la medicare (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - OTTAWA (CP) - Los primeros ministros fueron a cenar el domingo en casa del Primer Ministro Paul Martin, pero su oferta de miles de millones más para la atención de salud los dejó confundidos, frustrados y con ganas de más.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - The unexpected proposal by Prime Minister Paul Martin for a new medicare funding formula caused confusion and frustration among the premiers over Sunday dinner. Despite his offer of several billion more towards healthcare, they were left unsatisfied and desiring more.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - During Sunday dinner at Prime Minister Paul Martin's residence, the premiers found themselves bewildered and discontented by his proposition of a new funding system for medicare, even with the assurance of additional billions for health care. Their appetite for clearer explanation and more assurances was still yet to be satisfied.

Original Text: FTC wants spammer bounties Congress has asked the US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to look into spam reduction measures, including a  quot;Do Not Spam quot; list idea passed with the CAN-SPAM Act.
Translation: La FTC quiere recompensas para los spammers. El Congreso ha pedido a la Comisión Federal de Comercio de EE. UU. (FTC) que investigue medidas para la reducción de spam, incluyendo la idea de una lista de "No Enviar Spam" aprobada con el Acta CAN-SPAM.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has been requested by Congress to examine potential spam reduction strategies, including a "Do Not Spam" list concept which was approved under the CAN-SPAM Act.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The idea of a "Do Not Spam" list, approved as part of the CAN-SPAM Act, along with other spam reduction measures, is being evaluated by the US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) at the behest of Congress.

Original Text: Four Teams Advance at Champions League Real Madrid #39;s Luis Figo of Portugal, right, and Roma #39;s Traianos Dellas of Greece, top left, and Philippe Mexes of France reach for the ballr during their Champion #39;s League Group B soccer match between Roma and Real Madrid, in Rome #39;s Olympic stadium
Translation: Cuatro equipos avanzan en la Liga de Campeones. Luis Figo del Real Madrid #39 de Portugal, a la derecha, y Traianos Dellas de Roma #39 de Grecia, arriba a la izquierda, y Philippe Mexes de Francia, alcanzan la pelota durante su partido de fútbol del Grupo B de la Liga de Campeones entre Roma y Real Madrid, en el estadio Olímpico de Roma.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the Group B Champions League soccer match at Rome's Olympic stadium, Real Madrid's Luis Figo from Portugal and Roma's Traianos Dellas from Greece and Philippe Mexes from France, all make attempt to seize the ball; these four teams successfully advance in the Champions League.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Champion's League Group B soccer match at the Olympic stadium in Rome, Portugal's Luis Figo from Real Madrid, along with Greece's Traianos Dellas and France's Philippe Mexes from Roma, are all battling for the ball. The match leads to four teams moving forward in the Champions League.

Original Text: U.S. Money Funds Drop to  #36;848.66 Billion (AP) AP - Assets of the nation's retail money market mutual funds fell by  #36;6.07 billion in the latest week to  #36;848.66 billion, the Investment Company Institute said Thursday.
Translation: Los fondos monetarios de EE. UU. caen a $ 848.66 mil millones (AP) AP - Los activos de los fondos mutuos del mercado monetario minorista de la nación disminuyeron en $ 6.07 mil millones en la última semana a $ 848.66 mil millones, dijo el jueves el Instituto de la Compañía de Inversión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Investment Company Institute announced on Thursday that the national retail money market mutual funds' assets had dropped by #36;6.07 billion to #36;848.66 billion in the most recent week according to AP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a Thursday report by the Investment Company Institute, the value of the country's retail money market mutual funds decreased by #36;6.07 billion, settling at #36;848.66 billion for the previous week, as reported by AP.

Original Text: Intel sets cruise control on Pentium 4 SAN FRANCISCO - Intel Corp. President and Chief Operating Officer Paul Otellini served notice at the company's recent developer conference that the megahertz era was coming to a close, and the decision Thursday to remove the 4GHz Pentium 4 processor from its road map is clear evidence that Intel has once and for all kicked its speed habit, according to industry analysts.<p>ADVERTISEMENT</p><p><img src="http://ad.doubleclick.net/ad/idg.us.ifw.general/sbcspotrssfeed;sz=1x1;ord=200301151450?" width="1" height="1" border="0"/><a href="http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk;9228975;9651165;a?http://www.infoworld.com/spotlights/sbc/main.html?lpid0103035400730000idlp">SBC Case Study: Crate   Barrel</a><br/>What sold them on improving their network? A system that could cut management costs from the get-go. Find out more.</p>
Translation: Intel establece el control de crucero en Pentium 4 SAN FRANCISCO - El presidente y director de operaciones de Intel Corp., Paul Otellini, anunció en la reciente conferencia de desarrolladores de la compañía que la era de los megahercios estaba llegando a su fin, y la decisión del jueves de retirar el procesador Pentium 4 de 4GHz de su hoja de ruta es una clara evidencia de que Intel ha abandonado de una vez por todas su hábito de velocidad, según analistas de la industria.<p>PUBLICIDAD</p><p><img src="http://ad.doubleclick.net/ad/idg.us.ifw.general/sbcspotrssfeed;sz=1x1;ord=200301151450?" width="1" height="1" border="0"/><a href="http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk;9228975;9651165;a?http://www.infoworld.com/spotlights/sbc/main.html?lpid0103035400730000idlp">Estudio de caso de SBC: Crate   Barrel</a><br/>¿Qué los convenció de mejorar su red? Un sistema que podría reducir los costos de gestión desde el primer momento. Descubre más.</p>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Paul Otellini, the President and Chief Operating Officer at Intel Corp., made an announcement at a recent developer conference signifying the impending end of the megahertz era. The company's decision to withdraw the 4GHz Pentium 4 processor from its future planning underlines that Intel has unequivocally forsaken its focus on speed, as noted by industry experts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At a recent developer conference, Intel Corp.'s President and COO Paul Otellini hinted the closing of the megahertz era. This was highlighted further when the company decided to exclude the 4GHz Pentium 4 processor from its upcoming projects, indicating Intel's definitive shift away from the speed focus, as per industry analysts.

Original Text: Black Watch regroups after first soldier dies THE bulk of an 850-strong group of British troops was today gathering near their new base in a United States- controlled area of Iraq.
Translation: El Black Watch se reagrupa después de que muere el primer soldado. EL grueso de un grupo de 850 soldados británicos estaba hoy reuniéndose cerca de su nueva base en una zona de Irak controlada por Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the first soldier's death, Black Watch is restructuring as the majority of its 850 British troops start to assemble today next to their fresh base inside a US-dominated sector of Iraq.

Original Text: Do Newspapers Make Good News Look Bad? Two economists argue that reporters commit the same archetypal sin: slant the news unequivocally in favor of the Democrats.
Translation: ¿Los periódicos hacen que las buenas noticias parezcan malas? Dos economistas argumentan que los reporteros cometen el mismo pecado arquetípico: sesgan las noticias inequívocamente a favor de los Demócratas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is there a negative portrayal of positive news in newspapers? According to two economists, journalists consistently favor the Democrats, which they consider a common error.

Original Text: Boise State-Nevada Game on ESPN RENO, Nev. Nov 22, 2004 - Kickoff for the regular-season finale between No. 10 Boise State and Nevada has been moved back to 4:45 pm PST Saturday to accommodate a national television audience.
Translation: Partido entre Boise State-Nevada en ESPN RENO, Nev. 22 de Noviembre del 2004 - La patada inicial para la final de la temporada regular entre el número 10, Boise State, y Nevada, se ha retrasado hasta las 4:45 pm PST del sábado para acomodar a la audiencia televisiva nacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The regular-season finale between No. 10 Boise State and Nevada, initially scheduled for an earlier time, has been delayed to 4:45 pm PST on Saturday, Nov 22, 2004, in Reno, Nev., to cater to a national television audience on ESPN.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The game time for the regular-season finale between No. 10 Boise State and Nevada in Reno, Nev., on Nov 22, 2004, has been rescheduled to 4:45 pm PST on Saturday to facilitate nationwide broadcasting on ESPN.

Original Text: NASA Develops Robust Artificial Intelligence for Planetary Rovers NASA is planning to add a strong dose of artificial intelligence (AI) to planetary rovers to make them much more self-reliant, capable of making basic decisions during a mission. Scientists are developing very complex AI software that enables a higher level of robotic intelligence.
Translation: NASA Desarrolla Inteligencia Artificial Robusta para Rovers Planetarios. NASA está planeando añadir una fuerte dosis de inteligencia artificial (IA) a los rovers planetarios para hacerlos mucho más autónomos, capaces de tomar decisiones básicas durante una misión. Los científicos están desarrollando software de IA muy complejo que permite un nivel más alto de inteligencia robótica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NASA is formulating plans to infuse a potent measure of Artificial Intelligence (AI) into planetary rovers, aiming to significantly enhance their independence and decision-making capability during a mission. Complex AI software is under development by scientists, designed to furnish a greater degree of intelligence to these robots.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Scientists at NASA are in the process of creating intricate AI software that will provide an augmented level of intelligence for robots, making them more self-sufficient. The plan is to incorporate a significant amount of AI into planetary rovers, enabling them to make rudimentary decisions during expeditions.

Original Text: Biffle bests Mears for Busch win  quot;My car worked so well, quot; Greg Biffle said after winning a duel with Mears to claim the Target House 300 for NASCAR #39;s Busch Series cars.
Translation: "Biffle supera a Mears para ganar en Busch". "Mi coche funcionó tan bien", dijo Greg Biffle después de ganar un duelo con Mears para reclamar la victoria en el Target House 300 para los coches de la Serie Busch de NASCAR.
Paraphrase 1: "Greg Biffle expressed his satisfaction with his car's performance after he took the top spot at the Target House 300, beating Mears for a momentous NASCAR's Busch Series victory."
Paraphrase 2: "After a tough competition with Mears, Greg Biffle celebrated his victory at the Target House 300 for NASCAR's Busch Series cars, attributing his success to his car's impeccably good performance."

Original Text: Music industry wins court ruling against song-swappers UK record companies today fired the opening salvo in their legal battle with music fans who illegally share tracks on the internet, winning a court order to obtain the names and addresses of 28 people alleged to have given away tens of thousands of tracks
Translation: La industria de la música gana fallo judicial contra los intercambiadores de canciones. Las compañías discográficas del Reino Unido dispararon hoy el primer salvo en su batalla legal contra los aficionados a la música que comparten ilegalmente pistas en internet, ganando una orden judicial para obtener los nombres y direcciones de 28 personas presuntamente responsables de haber regalado decenas de miles de pistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The music industry in the UK secured a preliminary victory in their legal pursuit against individuals involved in unlawful internet song sharing. Today, record companies attained a court warrant which permits them to procure the personal details of 28 people suspected of illegally distributing tens of thousands of songs online.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, British record companies initiated their fight against illegal music sharing and triumphed with a court order. This order gives them the power to attain the identities of 28 people accused of unlawfully sharing tens of thousands of music tracks online.

Original Text: Minister: Captured Man Not Ibrahim Medical tests have shown that a man being held in Iraqi custody is not former president Saddam Hussein's deputy, Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, Interior Ministry spokesman Sabah Kadhim said Monday.
Translation: Ministro: El hombre capturado no es Ibrahim. Las pruebas médicas han demostrado que un hombre detenido en custodia iraquí no es el exvicepresidente de Saddam Hussein, Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, dijo el lunes el portavoz del Ministerio del Interior, Sabah Kadhim.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sabah Kadhim, an Interior Ministry spokesperson, announced on Monday that the man currently detained in Iraq got confirmed through medical tests as not being Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, the ex-deputy of former President Saddam Hussein.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The man in Iraqi custody has been medically confirmed not to be Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, Saddam Hussein's erstwhile deputy, according to the statement by Interior Ministry spokesperson Sabah Kadhim on Monday.

Original Text: For Duncan, No Fun In Games Tim Duncan wore a haggard look as he emerged from a locker room of bronze medalists. Hardly an emotional guy, he mumbled that his international basketball career is  quot;95 percent quot; over and that, oh yeah,  quot;FIBA stinks.
Translation: Para Duncan, Nada Divertido en los Juegos. Tim Duncan tenía una expresión desgastada mientras surgía del vestuario de los medallistas de bronce. No es un chico muy emocional, musitó que su carrera en el baloncesto internacional está "95 por ciento" acabada y que, bueno, "FIBA apesta".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Emerging from the locker room of bronze medalists, Tim Duncan appeared weary. He, a man seldom driven by emotions, mumbled that his international basketball career is probably 95 percent done, and also unabashedly expressed his disapproval of FIBA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tim Duncan, a typically reserved individual, wore a look of exhaustion after coming out of a locker room filled with bronze medalists. He quietly stated his international basketball career was nearly over, with about 95 percent certainty, and added his blunt opinion that FIBA was undesirable.

Original Text: USC-UCLA rivalry goes deep Growing up as a Southern California native, Jim Hardy wanted to play for USC since he was 8 years old. Many of the kids he grew up with and played football against would later become rivals of his at UCLA.
Translation: La rivalidad entre USC-UCLA es profunda. Al crecer como nativo del sur de California, Jim Hardy quería jugar para USC desde que tenía 8 años. Muchos de los niños con los que creció y contra los que jugó al fútbol más tarde se convertirían en sus rivales en UCLA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a native of Southern California, Jim Hardy harbored a desire to represent USC on the field starting from the age of eight. His childhood friends, with whom he shared numerous football matches, went on to be his competitors at UCLA, reflecting the profound USC-UCLA rivalry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ever since he was 8, Southern California-bred Jim Hardy coveted a spot on the USC football team. The rivalry between USC and UCLA deeply pervaded his experience, as many of his childhood friends and football co-players ended up on the opposing side at UCLA.

Original Text: Dubious plan to free French hostages snags Chirac in fiasco Paris -- A high-stakes scheme to free two French journalists kidnapped in Iraq threatens to embroil President Jacques Chirac in a political scandal over whether his government assisted private intermediaries in negotiating with terrorists for the hostages
Translation: Plan dudoso para liberar a rehenes franceses complica a Chirac en un fiasco París -- Un plan arriesgado para liberar a dos periodistas franceses secuestrados en Irak amenaza con involucrar al presidente Jacques Chirac en un escándalo político sobre si su gobierno asistió a intermediarios privados en la negociación con terroristas por los rehenes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A risky strategy to liberate two French reporters abducted in Iraq might involve President Jacques Chirac in a political controversy. The debate is centered around whether his administration aided private middlemen in negotiations with the captors, putting Chirac in an embarrassing position in Paris.
Paraphrase 2: 2. President Jacques Chirac is at risk of getting caught up in a political controversy in Paris.
