This involves a daring but dubious plan to negotiate the release of two French journalists held hostage in Iraq, raising questions about the governmental support to private representatives in negotiations with terrorists.

Original Text: Hello Ogo : IM a-go-go In the week when rumours of the Oqo launch have been buzzing, it #39;s a bit confusing to have AT amp;T announce something called Ogo.
Translation: Hola Ogo: Estoy a la vanguardia. En la semana en que los rumores del lanzamiento de Oqo han estado zumbando, es un poco confuso tener a AT&T anunciando algo llamado Ogo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Greetings, Ogo. During a week dense with speculation about the coming Oqo launch, the announcement of something called Ogo from AT&T adds a fair share of confusion.

Original Text: Yahoo to close online payment service SAN FRANCISCO - Yahoo Inc. in November will close PayDirect, its online payments service that aimed to compete with eBay Inc. #39;s PayPal, the company said Friday.
Translation: Yahoo cerrará el servicio de pagos en línea SAN FRANCISCO - Yahoo Inc. cerrará en noviembre PayDirect, su servicio de pagos en línea que tenía como objetivo competir con PayPal de eBay Inc. #39, dijo la compañía el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Yahoo Inc. announced its decision to shut down PayDirect, the online payment service that was intended to rival eBay Inc.'s PayPal, in November.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yahoo Inc.'s PayDirect, an online payment platform that was designed to challenge eBay Inc.'s PayPal, is scheduled for closure in November, the company announced on Friday.

Original Text: October probably had job growth US employers probably added 175,000 workers to payrolls in October, the most in five months, while the unemployment rate held at a three-year low of 5.4 percent, the median forecast in a Bloomberg News survey of economists shows.
Translation: Probablemente octubre tuvo crecimiento laboral. Los empleadores estadounidenses probablemente agregaron 175,000 trabajadores a las nóminas en octubre, la cantidad más alta en cinco meses, mientras que la tasa de desempleo se mantuvo en un mínimo de tres años del 5.4 por ciento, muestra la previsión mediana en una encuesta de Bloomberg News a economistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As per the median forecast derived from a Bloomberg News survey of economists, around 175,000 job additions were likely made by US employers in October, marking it as the highest in five months. During this period, the unemployment rate remained steady at a minimal 5.4 percent, which is a three-year low.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The most significant job growth in five months probably occurred in October, with US employers projected to have added around 175,000 workers to their payrolls, according to the median forecast shown in a Bloomberg News survey of economists. The unemployment rate during this time remained constant at a three-year low of 5.4 percent.

Original Text: Campus Computer Hacking Spurs Federal Investigation A computer hacker broke into a UC Berkeley computer containing more than one million records of California residents, prompting federal agencies to launch an ongoing investigation into the incident, state officials said.
Translation: La intrusión de un hacker en el sistema informático del Campus desencadena una investigación federal. Un pirata informático se infiltró en un ordenador de UC Berkeley que contenía más de un millón de registros de residentes de California, lo que provocó que las agencias federales iniciaran una investigación continua sobre el incidente, dijeron funcionarios estatales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Federal agencies have initiated a thorough investigation after a computer hacker infiltrated a UC Berkeley computer system that held over a million California residents' records, according to state officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. State officials have reported that a breach in UC Berkeley's computer system by a hacker, affecting more than a million records of Californians, has spurred an active investigation by federal agencies.

Original Text: Supply worries lift oil prices Oil prices hit a one-month high of \$47 a barrel yesterday as traders worried that US petroleum inventories had drawn down heavily due to Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: Las preocupaciones sobre el suministro elevan los precios del petróleo. Los precios del petróleo alcanzaron un máximo de un mes de \$47 por barril ayer, ya que los comerciantes estaban preocupados de que las reservas de petróleo de los Estados Unidos se habían reducido considerablemente debido al Huracán Iván.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to concerns over the reduction in US petroleum stocks caused by Hurricane Ivan, oil prices rose to a one-month peak of $47 a barrel yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oil prices reached a one-month high of $47 a barrel yesterday, driven up by anxieties about substantial depletion of US petroleum reserves due to Hurricane Ivan.

Original Text: Falluja negotiator dismisses threat Iraq #39;s interim prime minister has threatened to attack Falluja unless it turns in foreign militants, but a negotiator for the rebel-held city says its people are being asked to chase shadows.
Translation: El negociador de Faluya descarta la amenaza. El primer ministro interino de Irak ha amenazado con atacar Faluya a menos que entregue a los militantes extranjeros, pero un negociador de la ciudad controlada por los rebeldes dice que se está pidiendo a su gente que persiga sombras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The threat by Iraq's interim prime minister to assault Falluja unless it hands over foreign militants is rejected by a negotiator from the insurgent-controlled city, claiming that its citizens are essentially being ordered to chase illusions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Iraq's acting prime minister's threat of attacking Falluja unless they surrender foreign militants has been dismissed by a representative for the rebel-dominated city, who asserted that its residents are essentially being tasked with chasing after non-existent threats.

Original Text: Deep Tremors Detected Along San Andreas Fault Seismologists have detected deep, non-volcanic tremors lasting up to 20 minutes along the San Andreas Fault in central California. The discovery suggests earthquakes may have deeper origins than previously thought.
Translation: Detectados Temblores Profundos a lo Largo de la Falla de San Andrés. Los sismólogos han detectado temblores profundos, no volcánicos, de hasta 20 minutos a lo largo de la Falla de San Andrés en el centro de California. El descubrimiento sugiere que los terremotos pueden tener orígenes más profundos de lo que se pensaba anteriormente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Seismologists found deep, non-volcanic tremors with a duration of up to 20 minutes on the San Andreas Fault in central California, suggesting that earthquakes might originate deeper than what was initially believed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The detection of deep, non-volcanic tremors that last for as long as 20 minutes on the central California's San Andreas Fault has led seismologists to postulate that earthquakes may have deeper origins than was previously assumed.

Original Text: Poland unexpectedly says troops may quit Iraq in 2005 BERLIN President Aleksander Kwasniewski of Poland moved quickly on Monday to end an escalating row inside his country #39;s fragile leftist government coalition, saying he hoped that 2,500 troops serving in Iraq would be withdrawn next year.
Translation: Polonia dice inesperadamente que las tropas pueden abandonar Irak en 2005. BERLÍN - El Presidente Aleksander Kwasniewski de Polonia se movió rápidamente el lunes para terminar una creciente disputa dentro de la frágil coalición gubernamental de izquierda de su país, diciendo que espera que las 2,500 tropas que sirven en Irak sean retiradas el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an unexpected move, President Aleksander Kwasniewski of Poland suggested on Monday that their 2,500 troops stationed in Iraq could be pulled out in 2005 amid an intensifying conflict within his nation's frail leftist government coalition.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Poland, an unforeseen declaration emerged on Monday from President Aleksander Kwasniewski, expressing hope to withdraw the 2,500 troops presently in Iraq by next year to diffuse the mounting tension inside his vulnerable leftist coalition government.

Original Text: Oil Supply Exceeding Demand After Cuts, Qatar Says (Update1) The supply of oil is still outstripping demand after OPEC, the producer of more than a third of the world #39;s output, begins to reduce production to prop up falling prices, the Qatari oil minister said.
Translation: Suministro de Petróleo Excede la Demanda Después de los Recortes, Dice Qatar (Actualización1) El suministro de petróleo sigue superando la demanda después de que la OPEC, el productor de más de un tercio de la producción mundial, comienza a reducir la producción para apoyar los precios en caída, dijo el ministro de petróleo de Qatar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After OPEC's production cuts, Qatar's Oil Minister stated that despite these measures, the supply of oil is exceeding demand. OPEC, which produces over a third of the world's oil, initiated these cuts to mitigate falling prices.

Original Text: Wolves lead Bundesliga pack, unlucky seven for Schalke Surprise package VfL Wolfsburg remained on top of the Bundesliga following a comfortable 3-0 home win over VfB Stuttgart. The three points saw Wolfsburg, only promoted to the Bundesliga in 1997, open up a
Translation: Los lobos lideran la Bundesliga, siete infortunios para Schalke. El paquete sorpresa VfL Wolfsburg se mantuvo en la cima de la Bundesliga después de una cómoda victoria en casa por 3-0 sobre el VfB Stuttgart. Los tres puntos vieron a Wolfsburg, que solo ascendió a la Bundesliga en 1997, abrir una
Paraphrase 1: 1. VfL Wolfsburg, an unexpected success story, stayed at the lead in Bundesliga after an easy 3-0 victory against VfB Stuttgart at home. Wolfsburg, which entered the Bundesliga only in 1997, used the three points to solidify their lead, while Wolves maintained their dominance and Schalke suffered an unfortunate seventh loss.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After securing a smooth 3-0 win over VfB Stuttgart on home turf, VfL Wolfsburg, the underdog since their Bundesliga debut in 1997, managed to retain their top position. Thus, the Wolves lead the pack, with Schalke encountering their seventh misfortune.

Original Text: Wis. Peace Activists Shy From Nader  LUCK, Wis. -- A small but zealous group of antiwar activists in a pacifist commune called Anathoth in this lakeside speck near the Minnesota border say that four years ago, they gave presidential candidate Ralph Nader all five of their votes.
Translation: Activistas por la Paz de Wis. se alejan de Nader. LUCK, Wis. -- Un pequeño pero ferviente grupo de activistas contra la guerra en una comuna pacifista llamada Anathoth en esta pequeña localidad junto al lago cerca de la frontera con Minnesota, dicen que hace cuatro años, le dieron al candidato presidencial Ralph Nader todos sus cinco votos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LUCK, Wis. -- A small group of fervent antiwar activists from a peaceful commune named Anathoth, situated by a lakeside close to the Minnesota border, reveal that they unanimously voted for presidential candidate Ralph Nader four years ago. However, they are currently hesitant to support him.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In LUCK, Wis., near the Minnesota boundary and by a lake, lies the pacifist commune of Anathoth. Its passionate antiwar members admit they joined forces to render all their five votes in favor of Ralph Nader in the last presidential election, but presently, they are reluctant to extend the same support.

Original Text: Norwegians finish 1-2 at biathlon World Cup CBC SPORTS ONLINE - Five-time Olympic biathlon champion Ole Einar Bjorndalen of Norway may have been absent from a World Cup event Wednesday, but his fellow countrymen Stian Eckhoff and Frode Andresen were there to pick up the slack.
Translation: Los noruegos terminan 1-2 en la Copa del Mundo de Biatlón CBC DEPORTES EN LÍNEA - El cinco veces campeón olímpico de biatlón Ole Einar Bjorndalen de Noruega puede haber estado ausente en un evento de la Copa del Mundo el miércoles, pero sus compatriotas Stian Eckhoff y Frode Andresen estuvieron allí para compensar su falta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CBC SPORTS ONLINE - Despite the absence of Ole Einar Bjorndalen, a five-time Olympic Biathlon champion from Norway, at a World Cup event on Wednesday, his compatriots Stian Eckhoff and Frode Andresen stepped in and successfully secured the top two positions at the biathlon World Cup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Stian Eckhoff and Frode Andresen, of Norway, came in first and second at the Biathlon World Cup, as reported by CBC SPORTS ONLINE. This happened on a Wednesday event in which their country mate, five-time Olympic Biathlon victor, Ole Einar Bjorndalen, was missing.

Original Text: Giants' Coughlin Gets Win Over Redskins Linebacker Barrett Green scored on a 16-yard fumble return and the Giants forced seven turnovers, handing Tom Coughlin his first win as the team's head coach.
Translation: El Entrenador de los Giants, Coughlin, Consigue Victoria Sobre los Redskins. El linebacker Barrett Green anotó en una devolución de balón perdido de 16 yardas y los Giants forzaron siete pérdidas de balón, otorgando a Tom Coughlin su primera victoria como entrenador principal del equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Barrett Green, the linebacker for the Giants, scored on a 16-yard fumble return and the team induced seven turnovers; this gave Tom Coughlin his inaugural victory as the Giants' head coach over the Redskins.

Original Text: Illinois Governor Wants To Keep  #39;GTA, #39;  #39;Halo 2 #39; Out Of Kids #39; Hands That iconic black-and-white parental advisory sticker you see on CDs containing violent and/or sexually explicit content may soon be appearing on video games, if the governor from Illinois has his way.
Translation: El Gobernador de Illinois quiere mantener 'GTA', 'Halo 2' fuera de las manos de los niños. Esa icónica pegatina de advertencia parental en blanco y negro que ves en los CD que contienen contenido violento y/o sexualmente explícito podría aparecer pronto en los videojuegos, si el gobernador de Illinois consigue lo que quiere.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Governor of Illinois is advocating for the application of the distinctive black-and-white parental advisory sticker, commonly seen on CDs with violent or sexually explicit content, for video games like 'GTA' and 'Halo 2' to keep them away from children.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Illinois Governor is pushing for the famous black-and-white parental advisory sticker, typically spotted on explicit CDs, to also be used on video games such as 'GTA' and 'Halo 2' with the aim of keeping them out of the reach of children.

Original Text: A New Season The Astros, Red Sox and Braves are riding hot streaks at just the right time as the Yankees limp into the playoffs.
Translation: Una Nueva Temporada Los Astros, Red Sox y Braves están en rachas calientes justo en el momento adecuado, mientras que los Yankees entran cojeando a los playoffs.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As we head into a fresh season, the Astros, Red Sox, and Braves hit a stride of winning streaks whilst the Yankees struggle into the playoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Heading into a new season, the Astros, Red Sox, and Braves are enjoying a winning momentum just when needed, whereas the Yankees appear to be staggeringly making their way into the playoffs.

Original Text: SEC OKs Hedge Fund Registration The Securities and Exchange Commission passed rules Tuesday that will require most hedge fund advisers to register with the government within two years, firming up oversight on an industry that has been linked to several high-profile financial blowups.
Translation: La SEC aprueba el registro de fondos de cobertura. La Comisión de Valores y Bolsa aprobó reglas el martes que requerirán que la mayoría de los asesores de fondos de cobertura se registren con el gobierno dentro de dos años, reforzando la supervisión sobre una industria que ha estado vinculada a varios colapsos financieros de alto perfil.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Securities and Exchange Commission has approved regulations on Tuesday that mandate the majority of hedge fund advisors to register with the government within a span of two years. This will strengthen supervision over an industry that has had associations with numerous prominent financial mishaps.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Proposing stringent overview of an industry marred with notable financial debacles, the Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday pushed through laws compelling most hedge fund advisors to complete government registration in the next two years.

Original Text: Argentina coach Bielsa resigns Marcelo Bielsa has resigned, less than a month after steering Argentina to their first Olympic gold medal and less than two months after their Copa America final appearance, Argentina Football Association (AFA) president Julio
Translation: El entrenador de Argentina, Bielsa, renuncia. Marcelo Bielsa ha renunciado, menos de un mes después de llevar a Argentina a su primera medalla de oro olímpica y menos de dos meses después de su aparición en la final de la Copa América, afirmó el presidente de la Asociación de Fútbol de Argentina (AFA), Julio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Marcelo Bielsa has stepped down as Argentina's coach, states Argentina Football Association (AFA) president Julio. This comes less than a month following Argentina's first Olympic gold medal under his guidance and less than two months after they appeared in the Copa America final.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Less than a month after leading Argentina to their first Olympic gold medal and less than two months after their Copa America final appearance, Marcelo Bielsa has stepped down from his position as coach, as confirmed by the president of the Argentina Football Association (AFA) Julio.

Original Text: Green Decides to Miss at Least One Game If Shawn Green follows his own precedent, he will not play in the Los Angeles Dodgers' games in San Francisco on Friday and Saturday because of Yom Kippur.
Translation: Si Shawn Green sigue su propio precedente, no jugará en los partidos de los Dodgers de Los Ángeles en San Francisco el viernes y sábado debido a Yom Kippur.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If Shawn Green chooses to adhere to his previous decisions, he will abstain from participating in the Los Angeles Dodgers' San Francisco games on Friday and Saturday due to Yom Kippur.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Should Shawn Green maintain his usual practice, his participation in the Los Angeles Dodgers' matches in San Francisco on Friday and Saturday will not occur as a result of Yom Kippur.

Original Text: IMF Predicts Faster Growth In Global Economy This Year Oil prices may have just hit record levels, but the International Monetary Fund is even more bullish about global economic growth in 2004 than it was six months ago.
Translation: El FMI Predice Un Crecimiento Más Rápido En La Economía Global Este Año. Los precios del petróleo pueden haber alcanzado recientemente niveles récord, pero el Fondo Monetario Internacional es aún más optimista sobre el crecimiento económico global en 2004 de lo que era hace seis meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite oil prices reaching record highs, the International Monetary Fund remains optimistic regarding global economic growth in 2004, foreseeing an acceleration from its predictions six months ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The International Monetary Fund projects a heightened growth rate in the global economy this year, even amid soaring oil prices, exceeding the estimates it made six months prior.

Original Text: US interest rates to rise to 2 The US Federal Reserve, headed by Alan Greenspan, raises interest rates by 0.25 in a widely anticipated move.
Translation: Las tasas de interés de EE.UU. subirán a 2. La Reserva Federal de EE.UU., encabezada por Alan Greenspan, aumenta las tasas de interés en 0.25 en un movimiento ampliamente anticipado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a move that was highly expected, the US Federal Reserve, under the leadership of Alan Greenspan, has increased interest rates by 0.25, which will take US interest rates to 2.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With Alan Greenspan at the helm, the US Federal Reserve has increased interest rates by 0.25, as was widely predicted, resulting in a rise of US interest rates to 2.

Original Text: Greenspan: Economy Regaining Traction  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The U.S. economy has escaped a  recent soft patch and seems to be picking up steam, Federal  Reserve chief Alan Greenspan said on Wednesday in remarks  economists saw as cementing a September rate rise.
Translation: Greenspan: La economía está Recuperando Fuerza  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - La economía estadounidense ha escapado de una reciente etapa de debilidad y parece estar ganando impulso, dijo el jefe de la Reserva Federal, Alan Greenspan, el miércoles en comentarios que los economistas interpretaron como una confirmación de un aumento en las tasas de interés en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - According to Federal Reserve chief Alan Greenspan, the U.S. economy is surmounting a recent decline and appears to be gaining momentum. His Wednesday comments led economists to strongly anticipate a rate increase in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, Alan Greenspan, the head of the Federal Reserve, stated that the U.S. economy has successfully navigated through a recent slow phase and appears to be accelerating, leading economists to believe a rate rise is imminent in September.

Original Text: NL: Bonds Drills 700th Career Homer Against Padres  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - San Francisco Giants slugger  Barry Bonds hit his 700th career home run on Friday to join  Hank Aaron and Babe Ruth as the only major league players to  reach the milestone.
Translation: ES: Bonds batea su jonrón número 700 en su carrera contra los Padres SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - El bateador estrella de los Gigantes de San Francisco, Barry Bonds, conectó su 700º jonrón en su carrera el viernes para unirse a Hank Aaron y Babe Ruth como los únicos jugadores de la liga mayor que han alcanzado esta meta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Barry Bonds of the San Francisco Giants has achieved the milestone of hitting his 700th career home run, joining the ranks of Hank Aaron and Babe Ruth as the sole major league players to accomplish this feat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Joining the elite ranks of Hank Aaron and Babe Ruth, Barry Bonds from the San Francisco Giants has successfully hit his 700th career home run, a feat only achieved by major league players.

Original Text: Intel preaches gospel of mobile diversity <strong>Analysis</strong> Standardised phones? Pah!
Translation: Intel predica el evangelio de la diversidad móvil <strong>Análisis</strong> ¿Teléfonos estandarizados? ¡Bah!
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel advocates for diversity in mobile industry - Analysis. Homogenized phones? No way!
Paraphrase 2: 2. Intel promotes an array of mobile options - Analysis. Uniformity in phones? Absolutely not!

Original Text: Australian Official Travels to Iraq (AP) AP - Defense Minister Robert Hill traveled to Iraq Saturday to meet with some of the 900 soldiers Australia has stationed there as part of the U.S.-led coalition, the ministry said.
Translation: Funcionario Australiano Viaja a Irak (AP) AP - El Ministro de Defensa Robert Hill viajó a Irak el sábado para reunirse con algunos de los 900 soldados que Australia tiene estacionados allí como parte de la coalición liderada por los EE.UU., dijo el ministerio.
Paraphrase 1: 1) According to reports from AP, Australian Defense Minister, Robert Hill, embarked on a journey to Iraq on Saturday to have a meeting with some of the country's 900 soldiers stationed as part of the U.S led coalition, revealed by the ministry.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Robert Hill, the Defense Minister of Australia, made a trip to Iraq this Saturday to engage in talks with a portion of the 900 Australian soldiers currently serving there under the U.S.-led coalition, as confirmed by the ministry, AP reported.

Original Text: Westmoreland agrees to NC deal Colorado Springs-based Westmoreland Coal Co. (AMEX: WLB) will buy LG amp;E Energy #39;s 50 percent stake in a North Carolina power project for \$125 million.
Translation: Westmoreland acepta el acuerdo de NC. Westmoreland Coal Co., con sede en Colorado Springs (AMEX: WLB), comprará el 50% de participación de LG amp;E Energy #39 en un proyecto de energía de Carolina del Norte por 125 millones de dólares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Westmoreland Coal Co., headquartered in Colorado Springs, is set to purchase a 50 percent stake in a North Carolina power project from LG&E Energy for $125 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Colorado Springs-based company Westmoreland Coal Co. (AMEX: WLB) has agreed to acquire 50 percent of a North Carolina power project from LG &E Energy, for a price of $125 million.

Original Text: Bears Defense Turns It Up (AP) AP - The Chicago Bears played defense the way coach Lovie Smith envisioned, swarming to the ball and making the New York Giants cough it up. Seven sacks and five takeaways brought a 28-20 victory and produced a modest two-game winning streak that didn't appear possible for a team that dropped five of its first six games.
Translation: La Defensa de los Osos se Intensifica (AP) AP - Los Chicago Bears jugaron a la defensa de la manera que el entrenador Lovie Smith imaginó, acudiendo en masa al balón y haciendo que los New York Giants lo perdieran. Siete sacks y cinco balones recuperados resultaron en una victoria de 28-20 y produjeron una modesta racha de dos victorias consecutivas que no parecía posible para un equipo que había perdido cinco de sus primeros seis partidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - The Chicago Bears' defense operated exactly as Coach Lovie Smith had planned, aggressively pursuing the ball and prompting the New York Giants to lose control over it. The Bears succeeded in securing a 28-20 victory through seven sacks and five takeaways, subsequently leading to a surprising two-game winning streak, a feat seemingly improbable for a team that had lost five of its initial six games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - Executing Coach Lovie Smith's strategy to perfection, the Chicago Bears' defensive squad swarmed the ball and caused the New York Giants to lose their grip. Achieving seven sacks and five takeaways, the Bears bagged a 28-20 victory, leading to an unexpected two-game winning streak. This came as a pleasant surprise, particularly for a team that had suffered five losses in their first six games.

Original Text: Australian stocks: Stocks close lower on banks, insurers SYDNEY- Australian shares fell 0.3 per cent on Monday, led down by insurer Axa Asia Pacific after it ended buyout talks with its French parent and by a weaker banking sector on concerns over higher interest rates.
Translation: Acciones australianas: Las acciones cierran a la baja debido a los bancos, aseguradoras SYDNEY- Las acciones australianas cayeron un 0,3 por ciento el lunes, lideradas a la baja por la aseguradora Axa Asia Pacific después de que terminó las negociaciones de compra con su matriz francesa y por un sector bancario más débil debido a preocupaciones sobre tasas de interés más altas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australian shares experienced a drop of 0.3 per cent on Monday, primarily influenced by a decline in the banking sector due to heightened concerns over rising interest rates, as well as Axa Asia Pacific putting an end to buyout discussions with its French parent company, causing a significant downturn for insurers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, the Australian stock market saw a 0.3 per cent decrease, chiefly driven by a weaker banking sector that's apprehensive over increased interest rates and the insurer Axa Asia Pacific terminating its buyout negotiations with its parent firm in France.

Original Text: Chiefs suddenly struggling in red zone To the expanding litany of woes that has plagued the winless Kansas City Chiefs through the first three weeks of the 2004 campaign, a spate of unexpected problems that extends far beyond
Translation: Los Chiefs luchan repentinamente en la zona roja. A la creciente letanía de problemas que ha plagado a los Kansas City Chiefs sin victorias durante las primeras tres semanas de la campaña de 2004, se suma una serie de problemas inesperados que se extienden mucho más allá.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The winless Kansas City Chiefs are facing an unexpected series of challenges in the red zone, adding to their growing list of issues in the first three weeks of the 2004 campaign, a scope of problems that extends farther than anticipated.

Original Text: Nvidia aims to take lead in K8 chipset market with nForce 4 MCP With its recent introduction of the PCIe-enabled Nvidia nForce4 media and communication processors (MCP) for Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) processors, Nvidia expects to extend its lead against other chipmakers for the worlds K8 chipset market, said Drew
Translation: Nvidia tiene como objetivo liderar el mercado de chipsets K8 con nForce 4 MCP Con su reciente introducción de los procesadores de medios y comunicación Nvidia nForce4 habilitados para PCIe para los procesadores Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Nvidia espera ampliar su ventaja frente a otros fabricantes de chips para el mercado mundial de chipsets K8, dijo Drew.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nvidia, with the recent launch of its PCIe-enabled Nvidia nForce4 media and communication processors (MCP) for Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) processors, is looking forward to bolstering its lead position in the global K8 chipset market against other competitors, according to Drew.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Drew declares that Nvidia, through the introduction of its Nvidia nForce4 media and communication processors (MCP) - armed with PCIe capabilities for Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) - intends to solidify its dominance over other manufacturers in the global K8 chipset market.

Original Text: Clubhouse Is Opened to Sifford HE #39;S considered to be golf #39;s Jackie Robinson, but between puffs on a cigar, Charlie Sifford preferred to compare his struggle to that of another black man in another nation.
Translation: El Clubhouse se abre para Sifford. ÉL #39; SE considera el Jackie Robinson del golf, pero entre bocanadas de un cigarro, Charlie Sifford prefería comparar su lucha con la de otro hombre negro en otra nación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Often deemed the Jackie Robinson of golf, Charlie Sifford, amidst cigar puffs, rather likened his fight to another black man from a different nation, as Clubhouse opens its doors to him.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite being regarded as the Jackie Robinson of golf, Charlie Sifford, while enjoying a cigar, chose to liken his battle to that of another black individual from a different country. This happened as the Clubhouse was being opened to him.

Original Text: Opera browser to come to Windows Mobile Norwegian browser specialists Opera Software announce a version of their browser for Microsoft #39;s Windows Mobile platform is forthcoming.
Translation: Los especialistas noruegos en navegadores, Opera Software, anuncian que una versión de su navegador para la plataforma Windows Mobile de Microsoft está por llegar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Norwegian specialists at Opera Software have announced that a version of their browser will soon be available for Microsoft's Windows Mobile platform.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A forthcoming version of the Opera browser for Microsoft's Windows Mobile platform has been announced by Norwegian specialists, Opera Software.

Original Text: Sony #39;s no blockbuster EVERYONE from Rupert Murdoch to Christopher Skase kicked the tires at MGM at some point during the 30 years the fabled studio was on and off the block.
Translation: No hay un gran éxito para Sony #39; TODOS, desde Rupert Murdoch hasta Christopher Skase, patearon los neumáticos en MGM en algún momento durante los 30 años que el mítico estudio estuvo dentro y fuera del bloque.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Every individual, from Rupert Murdoch to Christopher Skase, inspected MGM at one time or another during the 30-year period when the renowned studio was intermittently up for sale - Sony's project wasn't a blockbuster though.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During the three decades when MGM was frequently up for acquisition, everyone, including figures such as Rupert Murdoch and Christopher Skase, had investigated it at some point, yet Sony's venture didn't turn out to be a blockbuster.

Original Text: India #39;s Pratima, four others suspended for doping : Five weightlifters, including India #39;s Pratima Kumari, were Thursday suspended by the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) for failing drug tests conducted at the Olympic Games Thursday, reports Xinhua.
Translation: "India #39; Pratima, cuatro más suspendidos por dopaje: Cinco levantadores de pesas, incluyendo a Pratima Kumari de India, fueron suspendidos el jueves por la Federación Internacional de Halterofilia (IWF) por no pasar las pruebas de drogas realizadas en los Juegos Olímpicos el jueves, informa Xinhua."
Paraphrase 1: 1. The International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) has announced the suspension of five weightlifters, among them Pratima Kumari of India, for testing positive in doping checks at the Olympic Games, as reported by Xinhua on Thursday.

Original Text: Japan #39;s Nikkei 225, Topix Decline; Kyocera Corp., Canon Drop Japanese stock benchmarks fell. The Nikkei 225 Stock Average lost 126.43, or 1.1 percent, to 10,956.41 at 9:02 am in Tokyo. The broader Topix index dropped 11.04, or 1 percent, to 1098.73.
Translation: Los índices de la bolsa japonesa cayeron. El Promedio de Valores Nikkei 225 de Japón perdió 126.43, o el 1.1 por ciento, a 10,956.41 a las 9:02 am en Tokio. El índice Topix más amplio bajó 11.04, o un 1 por ciento, a 1098.73; Nikkei 225 de Japón, Topix disminuyen; Cae Kyocera Corp., Canon.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Japanese stock benchmarks experienced a fall, with the Nikkei 225 Stock Average declining 126.43 points or 1.1 percent, settling at 10,956.41 at 9:02 am in Tokyo. Similarly, the extensive Topix index witnessed a drop of 11.04 points, a decrease of 1 percent, to 1098.73. Notably, major entities like Kyocera Corp and Canon also experienced a drop.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tokyo's Nikkei 225 Stock Average and the broader Topix index saw declines in the Japanese market. The Nikkei 225 suffered a 1.1 percent drop, losing 126.43 points and reaching 10,956.41 at 9:02 am. Concurrently, the Topix index decreased by 1 percent, falling 11.04 points to 1098.73. Corporate giants Kyocera Corp. and Canon also faced declines.

Original Text: Lehman joins Beard atop the leaderboard in Funai Classic Tom Lehman shot a five-under-par 67 on Saturday to join Briny Baird at the top of the leaderboard after the third round of the Funai Classic.
Translation: Lehman se une a Beard en la cima de la clasificación en el Funai Classic. Tom Lehman disparó un 67, cinco bajo par el sábado para unirse a Briny Baird en la cima de la clasificación después de la tercera ronda del Funai Classic.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After scoring a five-under-par 67 on Saturday, Tom Lehman now stands alongside Briny Baird at the pinnacle of the leaderboard in the Funai Classic's third round.

Original Text: Munich Set to Approve Linux Despite Patent Worries  FRANKFURT (Reuters) - More than a year after the German  city of Munich declared its landmark intention to abandon  Microsoft Windows in favor of upstart rival Linux, its  councillors are finally ready to go ahead with the plan.
Translation: Múnich Listo para Aprobar Linux a pesar de Preocupaciones de Patentes  FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Más de un año después de que la ciudad alemana de Múnich declaró su histórica intención de abandonar Microsoft Windows a favor del rival emergente Linux, sus concejales finalmente están listos para seguir adelante con el plan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. FRANKFURT (Reuters) - After over a year since the monumental announcement from Munich, a German city, to switch from Microsoft Windows to its emerging competition, Linux, the city's councillors are now prepared to implement the plan despite concerns over patents.
Paraphrase 2: 2. FRANKFURT (Reuters) - In spite of patent concerns, the councillors of Munich, a German city, are set to finally execute the plan announced over a year ago, which entails switching from Microsoft Windows to Linux, an aspiring alternative.

Original Text: Outgoing Ambassador Of Qatar Meets Musharraf ISLAMABAD, Pakistan : Aug 18 (PID) - The outgoing Ambassador of Qatar, Mr. Abdullah Falah A. Al-Dosari paid a courtesy called on the President General Pervez Musharraf here on Tuesday.
Translation: Embajador saliente de Qatar se reúne con Musharraf ISLAMABAD, Pakistán: 18 de agosto (PID) - El embajador saliente de Qatar, el señor Abdullah Falah A. Al-Dosari, realizó una visita de cortesía al Presidente General Pervez Musharraf aquí el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, President General Pervez Musharraf of Pakistan held a meeting in Islamabad with the departing Ambassador of Qatar, Mr. Abdullah Falah A. Al-Dosari (PID announced on Aug 18).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mr. Abdullah Falah A. Al-Dosari, the retiring Ambassador of Qatar, paid a visit to President General Pervez Musharraf in Islamabad, Pakistan, as reported by PID on August 18, Tuesday.

Original Text: Cisco Profits Are Higher, but Investors Want More Cisco Systems, the largest maker of Internet networking equipment, reported Tuesday that its first-quarter profit rose 29 percent, squarely in line with Wall Street forecasts.
Translation: Las ganancias de Cisco son más altas, pero los inversores quieren más. Cisco Systems, el mayor fabricante de equipos de red de Internet, informó el martes que su beneficio del primer trimestre aumentó un 29 por ciento, en línea con las previsiones de Wall Street.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Cisco Systems, the foremost producer of Internet networking hardware, announced first-quarter profit gains of 29% on Tuesday, meeting Wall Street's expectations. However, investors are clamoring for more despite the high profits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Posting a 29% gain in their first-quarter profit on Tuesday, Cisco Systems, the leading manufacturer of Internet networking equipment, has satisfied Wall Street predictions. However, even with these increased earnings, investors are still demanding more.

Original Text: Veteran guard Black bugs opponents The Connecticut Sun have the  quot;Tasmanian Devil quot; on their side as they enter the WNBA Finals tonight.  quot;Well, you know, I play a lot like that; I #39;m kind of
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: El veterano guardia Black molesta a los oponentes. El Connecticut Sun tiene al "Diablo de Tasmania" de su lado mientras entran a las Finales de la WNBA esta noche. "Bueno, ya sabes, juego mucho de esa manera; soy algo así como
Paraphrase 1: 1. As the Connecticut Sun heads into the WNBA Finals tonight, they are benefitted by having their "Tasmanian Devil" - the veteran guard who goes by the name Black, tormenting opponents with his play. He's been known to say, "Well, you know, my style of play is somewhat like that, kind of".
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Well, you know, I'm somewhat like that," says the veteran guard Black, who plays for the Connecticut Sun. As they prepare for the WNBA Finals tonight, they know they have their secret weapon - the "Tasmanian Devil", known for rattling opponents.

Original Text: Total deal shows appetite for Russian oil, but limits foreign role MOSCOW : A deal between French energy group Total and Russian gas firm Novatek shows that oil majors have an appetite for Russia #39;s energy riches despite the Yukos affair, but also the limited role now possible for foreigners in this strategic sector
Translation: El acuerdo total muestra el apetito por el petróleo ruso, pero limita el papel extranjero MOSCÚ: Un acuerdo entre el grupo energético francés Total y la firma de gas rusa Novatek demuestra que las empresas petroleras tienen un apetito por las riquezas energéticas de Rusia a pesar del asunto Yukos, pero también el papel limitado ahora posible para los extranjeros en este sector estratégico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the Yukos incident, the agreement between the French energy conglomerate, Total, and Russian gas company, Novatek, exhibits the oil major's keen interest in Russia's energy resources, all the while underscoring the restricted participation for foreign entities in this crucial sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The partnership between Total, a French energy conglomerate, and Novatek, a Russian gas firm, indicates a strong interest from oil majors in Russia's energy wealth, even after the Yukos situation. However, it also reveals the narrow scope that is currently available for foreign players in this strategic industry.

Original Text: Pepsi Bottling Profit Up, Hikes Outlook Pepsi Bottling Group Inc. (PBG.N: Quote, Profile, Research) , the largest bottler of Pepsi drinks, on Tuesday said quarterly profit rose on volume growth in the United States and Europe
Translation: Beneficios de embotellamiento de Pepsi aumentan, mejora las perspectivas. Pepsi Bottling Group Inc. (PBG.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), el embotellador más grande de bebidas Pepsi, dijo el martes que los beneficios trimestrales aumentaron debido al crecimiento del volumen en los Estados Unidos y Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, the largest bottler of Pepsi drinks, Pepsi Bottling Group Inc. (PBG.N: Quote, Profile, Research), reported an increase in quarterly profits due to volume growth in both the United States and Europe, and accordingly raised its financial outlook.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pepsi Bottling Group Inc. (PBG.N: Quote, Profile, Research), the leading bottler of Pepsi beverages, announced on Tuesday that their quarterly profits have risen due to increased sales volumes in the US and Europe, thus enhancing its financial forecast.

Original Text: Cuba Hospitalizes Dissident After Wife's Protest (Reuters) Reuters - Cuban authorities transferred a jailed\dissident suffering from a herniated disc to a military\hospital on Thursday after his wife staged an unprecedented\protest in Havana's Revolution Square.
Translation: Reuters - Las autoridades cubanas trasladaron a un disidente encarcelado que sufre de una hernia de disco a un hospital militar el jueves después de que su esposa protagonizara una protesta sin precedentes en la Plaza de la Revolución de La Habana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Following an unprecedented protest by his wife in Havana's Revolution Square, a dissident jailed in Cuba, who is struggling with a herniated disc, was relocated to a military hospital by Cuban authorities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cuban authorities moved a detained dissident, who was dealing with a herniated disc, to a military hospital after his wife initiated an exceptional protest in Havana's Revolution Square (Reuters).

Original Text: Cut n #39; paste and colour codes My system configuration is as follows: Pentium IV - 1.60 GH, 128 MB RAM, Windows XP Pro OS, OXP. NAV2003 updated upto August 09, 2004.
Translation: Cortar n #39; pegar y códigos de colores. La configuración de mi sistema es la siguiente: Pentium IV - 1.60 GH, 128 MB de RAM, sistema operativo Windows XP Pro, OXP. NAV2003 actualizado hasta el 09 de agosto de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. My system is configured as follows: it has a Pentium IV processor that runs at 1.60 GH, 128 MB of RAM, an operating system of Windows XP Pro, and OXP. The NAV2003 is updated to August 09, 2004, and this includes cut, paste, and colour code functionalities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The configuration of my system includes a 1.60 GH Pentium IV processor, 128 MB RAM, and runs on Windows XP Pro OS with OXP. It also has cut and paste features along with colour codes. Moreover, its NAV2003 has the latest updates as of August 09, 2004.

Original Text: Globus Toolkit Creators Form Grid Software Company (TechWeb) TechWeb - The creators of the Globus Toolkit, an open source grid infrastructure software, have formed a new company, Univa, to provide commercial software, services and support for Globus software.
Translation: Creadores del Globus Toolkit Forman Compañía de Software Grid (TechWeb) TechWeb - Los creadores del Globus Toolkit, un software de infraestructura de grid de código abierto, han formado una nueva empresa, Univa, para proporcionar software comercial, servicios y soporte para el software Globus.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TechWeb: The founders of Globus Toolkit, a free software for grid infrastructure, have established a new firm named Univa, with the objective of offering commercial software, services, and Globus software support.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TechWeb: A new company called Univa has been formed by the inventors of the open source grid infrastructure software - Globus Toolkit, serving the needs for commercial software, services support, and comprehensive assistance for Globus software.

Original Text: Precision and Pressure in a Classic Stadium THENS, Aug. 19  The two finalists in the men #39;s archery strode out this afternoon and took their positions side-by-by side between the twin columns topped with the two-faced busts of Hermes that mark the start and finish lines in the ...
Translation: Precisión y Presión en un Estadio Clásico ATENAS, 19 de agosto - Los dos finalistas en el tiro con arco masculino se adueñaron esta tarde y tomaron sus posiciones lado a lado entre las columnas gemelas coronadas con los bustos bifrontes de Hermes que marcan las líneas de salida y llegada en el ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. THENS, Aug. 19 - This afternoon saw both finalists of the men's archery march into the revered Classic Stadium, taking their respective positions beside the twin columns capped with the Hermes' two-faced busts that indicate the initial and final lines...
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Classic Stadium on Aug. 19, the finalists of men's archery stepped forward beside the twin columns crowned with the two-faced busts of Hermes, the renowned start and finish indications...

Original Text: France hold edge over Spain in Davis Paul-Henri Mathieu put France in front in their Davis Cup semi-final against Spain on Friday. France were clinging on to hopes of a 2-0 lead when bad light forced Juan Carlos
Translation: Francia tiene ventaja sobre España en Davis. Paul-Henri Mathieu puso a Francia en cabeza en su semifinal de la Copa Davis contra España el viernes. Francia se aferraba a las esperanzas de un liderazgo 2-0 cuando la mala luz obligó a Juan Carlos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Paul-Henri Mathieu helped France take the lead in their Davis Cup semi-final against Spain on Friday; France was on the verge of a 2-0 lead until poor lighting interrupted Juan Carlos. Consequently, France seems to have an advantage over Spain in Davis Cup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Davis Cup semi-final against Spain on Friday, France took the lead thanks to Paul-Henri Mathieu. Unfavorable lighting conditions hindered Juan Carlos' performance and paused the game, leaving France in anticipation of a 2-0 lead and giving them an upper hand over Spain.

Original Text: Can 2 Wrongs Make Cingular Right? One lousy wireless service provider buys another. It might not be all bad, though.
Translation: ¿Pueden 2 errores hacer bien a Cingular? Un pésimo proveedor de servicios inalámbricos compra a otro. Sin embargo, podría no ser del todo malo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is it possible for two inferior service providers to create a superior wireless entity? Despite the negative connotation, this might still result in a beneficial outcome.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Could the merger of two inadequate wireless service providers result in a better one? The end result could surprisingly defy expectations.

Original Text: Japan #39;s manufacturers less confident Bank of Japan  #39;tankan survey #39; also shows strong capital spending, boosting stocks and the yen. TOKYO (Reuters) - Confidence among Japan #39;s big manufacturers waned for the first time in seven quarters, the Bank
Translation: Los fabricantes de Japón tienen menos confianza, la encuesta 'tankan' del Banco de Japón también muestra un fuerte gasto de capital, impulsando las acciones y el yen. TOKIO (Reuters) - La confianza entre los grandes fabricantes de Japón disminuyó por primera vez en siete trimestres, según el Banco.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Bank of Japan's 'tankan survey' displays strong capital spending, propelling stocks and the yen, although the confidence among Japan's major manufacturers has decreased for the first time in seven quarters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite evidence of robust capital spending boosting stocks and the yen as revealed by the Bank of Japan's 'tankan survey', confidence levels amongst large-scale Japanese manufacturers have dipped for the first time in seven quarters.

Original Text: Wine-tippling in China 9,000 years ago Wine, the elixir of the gods, may be as old as human history, and a team of archaeologists who combine their science with chemistry has found evidence that Chinese were already enjoying sips of fermented rice, honey and fruit in the late Stone Age, more
Translation: Beber vino en China hace 9,000 años El vino, el elixir de los dioses, puede ser tan antiguo como la historia humana, y un equipo de arqueólogos que combina su ciencia con la química ha encontrado evidencia de que los chinos ya disfrutaban sorbos de arroz fermentado, miel y fruta en la última Edad de Piedra, más
Paraphrase 1: 1. Archaeologists, blending science and chemistry, have uncovered evidence suggesting that the Chinese were imbibing wine made from fermented rice, honey, and fruit in the late Stone Age, around 9,000 years ago. This discovery implies that this divine beverage, wine, might be as ancient as mankind's recorded history.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The history of wine, considered divine nectar, may trace back to early human history. Through a blend of archaeology and chemistry, a group of researchers has discovered that the Chinese enjoyed fermented beverages—prepared from rice, honey, and fruit—as early as the late Stone Age, some 9,000 years ago.

Original Text: Michigan State DURHAM, North Carolina (Ticker) -- Two of the top coaches and programs square off when No. 9 Michigan State tangles with 10th-ranked Duke at Cameron Indoor Stadium on Tuesday in the ACC-Big Ten Challenge.
Translation: Estado de Michigan DURHAM, Carolina del Norte (Ticker) -- Dos de los mejores entrenadores y programas se enfrentan cuando el número 9, el Estado de Michigan, se enreda con el Duke, décimo clasificado, en el Cameron Indoor Stadium el martes en el Desafío ACC-Big Ten.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, in the ACC-Big Ten Challenge, the 9th-ranked team Michigan State will duke it out with 10th-ranked Duke at Cameron Indoor Stadium in Durham, North Carolina. These two teams are led by some of the top coaches in the nation and represent premier programs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As part of the ACC-Big Ten Challenge, this Tuesday will feature a face-off between two leading teams and their celebrated coaches: No. 9 Michigan State and No. 10 Duke. The exciting game will unfold at Cameron Indoor Stadium, Durham, North Carolina.

Original Text: Hamas vows to keep up armed struggle Palestinian militant group Hamas vowed Tuesday to keep up its armed resistance against Israeli occupation in the West Bank and Gaza.
Translation: El grupo militante palestino Hamas prometió el martes mantener su resistencia armada contra la ocupación israelí en Cisjordania y Gaza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Palestinian militant group, Hamas, pledged on Tuesday to continue their armament against the Israeli occupation in the West Bank and Gaza.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Hamas, the Palestinian militant organization, asserted their commitment to resist the Israeli occupancy in the West Bank and Gaza using armed measures.

Original Text: Investors Flock to Web Networking Sites Internet whiz kids Marc Andreessen, Josh Kopelman and Joe Kraus share something in common besides reaping huge jackpots during the dot-com boom.
Translation: Los inversores se agolpan en sitios de redes sociales en la web. Los genios de internet Marc Andreessen, Josh Kopelman y Joe Kraus comparten algo más que haber obtenido enormes ganancias durante el auge de las punto-com.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Internet geniuses Marc Andreessen, Josh Kopelman, and Joe Kraus, known for earning massive profits during the dot-com explosion, are now attracting investors towards web networking sites.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Marc Andreessen, Josh Kopelman, and Joe Kraus, eminent figures from the dot-com boom, are now drawing investors' attention to online networking platforms.

Original Text: IBM regains No.1 supercomputer rank Blue Gene L leads the group followed by SGI #39;s NASA installation and NEC #39;s Earth Simulator Center in the third position. NEW YORK: IBM, the world #39;s biggest computer maker, has regained its position at the head
Translation: IBM recupera el rango N.º1 de supercomputadora. Blue Gene L lidera el grupo seguido de la instalación de SGI #39; en la NASA y el Centro de Simulador de la Tierra de NEC en la tercera posición. NUEVA YORK: IBM, el mayor fabricante de computadoras del mundo, ha recuperado su posición en la cabeza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK: IBM, recognized as the world's largest computer manufacturer, has reclaimed its top position with Blue Gene L leading the group. It is followed by SGI's NASA installation, with NEC's Earth Simulator Center taking the third spot, thus marking IBM's return to the No.1 rank in supercomputing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Becoming the leader once again in the supercomputer rank, IBM - the world's premier computer maker based in NEW YORK - has its Blue Gene L at the forefront. SGI's NASA installation trails behind, and NEC's Earth Simulator Center is in the third rank.

Original Text: 'Miracle baby' nurses face probe The Nursing and Midwifery Council is investigating the activities of seven women who claim they confirmed "miracle babies".
Translation: 'Bebe milagroso' las enfermeras enfrentan investigación. El Consejo de Enfermería y Partería está investigando las actividades de siete mujeres que afirman haber confirmado "bebés milagrosos".
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Nursing and Midwifery Council is conducting an investigation into the actions of seven women who allege they validated the existence of "miracle babies".
Paraphrase 2: 2. An investigation is being carried out by the Nursing and Midwifery Council into the claims of seven nurses about authenticating "miracle babies".

Original Text: Cisco to power Indian Ethernet One of India #39;s leading telecommunications providers will use Cisco Systems #39; gear to build its new Ethernet-based broadband network.
Translation: Cisco suministrará energía a la Ethernet India Uno de los principales proveedores de telecomunicaciones de India utilizará el equipo de Cisco Systems para construir su nueva red de banda ancha basada en Ethernet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. One of India's top telecom providers will leverage Cisco Systems' equipment to construct its latest Ethernet-based broadband network.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cisco Systems' equipment will be utilized by a leading telecommunications provider in India to develop its new Ethernet-oriented broadband network.

Original Text: Stocks Rise as Oil Price Dips After Ivan  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks rose on Thursday as  inflation data suggesting the Federal Reserve will not hurry to  raise interest rates encouraged investors and oil prices  slipped as some refineries restarted after Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: Las acciones aumentan a medida que el precio del petróleo disminuye después de Ivan NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de Estados Unidos subieron el jueves debido a los datos de inflación que sugerían que la Reserva Federal no se apresurará a aumentar las tasas de interés, lo cual alentó a los inversores y los precios del petróleo cayeron cuando algunas refinerías se reanudaron después del huracán Ivan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. stocks saw an uplift on Thursday, buoyed by inflation data that suggested a delay in the Federal Reserve's decision to raise interest rates, thereby incentivizing investors. The decrease in oil prices, following the resumption of some refineries post-Hurricane Ivan, also contributed to the rise.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thursday witnessed a surge in U.S. stocks, spurred by encouraging inflation data indicating no rush from the Federal Reserve to hike interest rates. The revival of some refineries after Hurricane Ivan also resulted in a dip in oil prices, further propelling the stocks.

Original Text: Australia's Lonard Wins Third in a Row (AP) AP - Australia's Peter Lonard won for the third straight week, shooting a 7-under 65 on Sunday in the Australian PGA for a two-shot victory over third-round leader James Nitties.
Translation: Australia's Lonard gana el tercero consecutivo (AP) AP - Peter Lonard de Australia ganó por tercera semana consecutiva, disparando un 7 bajo par 65 el domingo en el PGA australiano para una victoria de dos golpes sobre el líder de la tercera ronda, James Nitties.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - In three consecutive victories, Australia's Peter Lonard won in the Australian PGA on Sunday, finishing two shots ahead of third-round leader James Nitties after shooting a 7-under 65.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In his third successive win, Australia's Peter Lonard triumphed in the Australian PGA, where he shot a 7-under 65 on Sunday, securing a two-shot lead over James Nitties, the third-round leader, as reported by AP.

Original Text: Pill 'may cut heart disease risk' The oral contraceptive pill may protect women from heart disease and some cancers, scientists suggest.
Translation: La píldora 'podría reducir el riesgo de enfermedad cardíaca' La píldora anticonceptiva oral puede proteger a las mujeres de enfermedades del corazón y de algunos cánceres, sugieren los científicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scientists suggest that the risk of heart disease and some cancers in women could potentially be reduced by the oral contraceptive pill.

Original Text: Boks snatch Tri-Nations The Springboks have won the Tri-Nations title with a 23-19 win against the Wallabies in Durban. In a tense finish, the Wallabies scored twice in the final 10 minutes with the Springboks reduced to 13 men, but the home side held on for a deserved victory.
Translation: Los Boks arrebatan el Tri-Nations. Los Springboks han ganado el título del Tri-Nations con una victoria de 23-19 contra los Wallabies en Durban. En un final tenso, los Wallabies anotaron dos veces en los últimos 10 minutos con los Springboks reducidos a 13 hombres, pero el equipo local logró mantenerse para conseguir una victoria merecida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Springboks triumphed over the Wallabies in Durban with a 23-19 victory to secure the Tri-Nations title. Although the Wallabies managed to score twice in the last 10 minutes when the Springboks were down to 13 men, the home team successfully maintained their lead and pulled off a well-earned victory.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Durban, the Springboks achieved a much-deserved victory in the Tri-Nations title by beating the Wallabies 23-19. Despite a challenging finish, with the Wallabies scoring twice in the final 10 minutes when the Springboks were reduced to 13 men, the home team managed to hold their ground and clinch the win.

Original Text: I will stay army chief until 2007: Musharraf LAHORE: General Pervez Musharraf has said he will stay army chief and president until 2007, as the law now permits him to do so, the first time he has clearly stated his intention to keep both offices.
Translation: Me quedaré como jefe del ejército hasta 2007: Musharraf LAHORE: El general Pervez Musharraf ha dicho que se quedará como jefe del ejército y presidente hasta 2007, ya que la ley ahora le permite hacerlo, la primera vez que ha declarado claramente su intención de mantener ambos cargos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LAHORE: For the first time, General Pervez Musharraf has explicitly expressed his intention to remain in his dual role as army chief and president until 2007, in line with the law's current provision.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LAHORE: In compliance with current law, General Pervez Musharraf has announced for the first time that he will hold the positions of both army chief and president until 2007.

Original Text: UN rights chief says Sudan "failing" people of Darfur (AFP) AFP - The UN's top rights official accused Sudan of  quot;failing quot; the people of Darfur and called for an international police presence to curb continued attacks on civilians in the troubled region.
Translation: El jefe de derechos de la ONU dice que Sudán está "fallando" al pueblo de Darfur (AFP) AFP - El principal funcionario de derechos de la ONU acusó a Sudán de "fallar" al pueblo de Darfur e hizo un llamado a la presencia de policía internacional para frenar los continuos ataques a los civiles en la problemática región.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - The chief of rights at the UN has accused Sudan of "failing" to protect the people of Darfur and has called for the deployment of international police to control ongoing assaults on civilians in the distressed area.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - Indicting Sudan for "failing" its Darfur inhabitants, the head of human rights at the UN has urged for an international police force to stop the persistent attacks on civilians in the disturbed region.

Original Text: EU  #39;opens the door #39; to a longer workday BRUSSELS The European Commission proposed on Wednesday to water down the rules that govern maximum working hours for employees, bowing to pressure from business and from Eastern European members of the EU seeking to catch up with their richer western
Translation: La UE #39; abre la puerta #39; a una jornada laboral más larga BRUSELAS La Comisión Europea propuso el miércoles suavizar las reglas que rigen las horas máximas de trabajo de los empleados, cediendo a la presión de los negocios y de los miembros de Europa del Este de la UE que buscan alcanzar a sus miembros occidentales más ricos
Paraphrase 1: 1. BRUSSELS: In an attempt to yield to pressures from businesses and Eastern European EU members aspiring to level up with their affluent western counterparts, the European Commission suggested on Wednesday a proposition to relax the regulations on the maximum working hours for employees, effectively paving the way for a longer workday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Brussels, facing the insistence from the business sector and Eastern European EU countries aiming to match their wealthier west, the European Commission put forth a proposal on Wednesday to lessen the constraints on the upper limit of working hours, thereby potentially extending the average working day.

Original Text: Strong Earthquake Kills One in Caribbean (AP) AP - A strong earthquake rocked the Caribbean islands of Dominica and Guadeloupe early Sunday, killing a child, destroying numerous homes and knocking out power to thousands of people.
Translation: Fuerte Terremoto Mata a Uno en el Caribe (AP) AP - Un fuerte terremoto sacudió las islas caribeñas de Dominica y Guadalupe el domingo temprano, matando a un niño, destruyendo numerosas casas y dejando sin electricidad a miles de personas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) A child's life was tragically claimed when a potent earthquake struck Dominica and Guadeloupe in the Caribbean on Sunday morning. The quake also resulted in the destruction of several homes and massive power outages, affecting thousands of residents.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Early Sunday, Dominica and Guadeloupe, Caribbean islands, were hit by a severe earthquake. The natural disaster claimed the life of a child and caused widespread destruction - many homes were demolished, and power services were interrupted for thousands. (AP)

Original Text: England captain Beckham breaks a rib David Beckham broke his rib moments after scoring England #39;s second goal in Saturday #39;s 2-0 win over Wales in a World Cup qualifying game.
Translation: El capitán de Inglaterra, Beckham, se rompe una costilla. David Beckham se rompió una costilla momentos después de marcar el segundo gol de Inglaterra en la victoria 2-0 sobre Gales en un partido de clasificación para la Copa del Mundo el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) David Beckham, the captain of England, fractured a rib just after netting England's second goal in their 2-0 World Cup qualifying victory against Wales on Saturday.

Original Text: St. Helens climbers ordered to lie low The risk of a volcanic explosion or related landslide on Mount St. Helens has prompted the mountain #39;s managers to keep climbers off the 8,363-foot peak and close some hiking trails while scientists assess the danger.
Translation: A los alpinistas de St. Helens se les ordena mantenerse al margen. El riesgo de una explosión volcánica o deslizamiento de tierra relacionado en el Monte St. Helens ha llevado a los administradores de la montaña a mantener a los alpinistas fuera de la cumbre de 8,363 pies y cerrar algunos senderos de excursionismo mientras los científicos evalúan el peligro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mount St. Helens' administrators have instructed climbers to stay away from the 8,363-foot peak and closed some hiking paths due to the potential risk of a volcanic blast or associated landslide; scientists are currently evaluating the threat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to a possible destabilization risk involving a volcanic eruption or landslide on Mount St. Helens, the peak's authorities have mandated a hiatus for climbers on the 8,363-foot high summit and shut down some trekking trails for now, while the danger is being thoroughly analyzed by scientists.

Original Text: Ron Regan Jr is My Kinda Guy \\"Now that the country is awash in Reagan nostalgia, some observers are predicting\that you will enter politics. Would you like to be president of the United\States?"\\"I would be unelectable. I'm an atheist. As we all know, that is something\people won't accept."\\"What would you do if Senator Kerry asked you to be his vice president?"\\"I would question his sanity."\\"Do you ever go to church?"\\"No. I visit my wife's sangha."\\"So you sometimes practice Buddhism?"\\"I don't claim anything. But my sympathies would be in that direction. I admire\the fact that the central core of Buddhist teaching involves mindfulness and\loving kindness and compassion."\\So lets get this straight.  He's an a ...\\
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Ron Regan Jr es Mi Tipo de Chico "Ahora que el país está inundado de nostalgia por Reagan, algunos observadores están prediciendo que entrarás en la política. ¿Te gustaría ser presidente de los Estados Unidos?" "Sería inelegible. Soy un ateo. Como todos sabemos, eso es algo que la gente no aceptará." "¿Qué harías si el senador Kerry te pidiera que fueras su vicepresidente?" "Cuestionaría su cordura." "¿Alguna vez vas a la iglesia?" "No. Visito la sangha de mi esposa." "¿Así que a veces practicas el budismo?" "No afirmo nada. Pero mis simpatías estarían en esa dirección. Admiro el hecho de que la enseñanza central del budismo implica atención plena, bondad amorosa y compasión." Así que, dejemos esto claro. Es un a ...
Paraphrase 1: 1) Let's clarify then: Ron Regan Jr is My Kinda Guy. Amid the current tidal wave of Reagan sentiment across the nation, there are whispers about whether or not you would make a move into the political realm. Have you ever thought about running for presidency? To which he boldly declared, "The public wouldn't elect me. They can't yet accept an atheist at the helmet." Furthermore, if called upon by Senator Kerry to be his runner-up, his response would be: "That would make me question his mental wellbeing." When questioned about his religious practices, he plainly replied, "I don't go to church. Rather, I pay visits to my wife's Buddhist community." On further probing, he confessed, "I don't really identify with any religion, but I do find myself partial towards Buddhism. What really impresses me is that its core teachings revolve around mindfulness and compassion." Taking this all into account, it's clear that he's...
Paraphrase 2: 2) Let's decode this: Ron Regan Jr is the subject of my admiration. As the entire country seems to be swept into a Reagan-inspired nostalgia, there are speculations that you might plunge into politics yourself. How about becoming the President of United States someday? His response: "To be honest, no one would vote for me. An atheist leading the country is still too much for people to accept." Moreover, how would you react if Senator Kerry wanted you to join him as his Vice President? His retort: "I'd seriously question his rationality." Enquiring about his church attendance, he admits, "No, I don't. Instead, I go to my wife's sangha." Pressed further about if he follows Buddhism to some extent, he acknowledges, "I don't affiliate myself with any particular belief. However, my inclinations are more towards Buddhism because I value its central teachings that focus on mindfulness, compassion, and kindness." So, after putting it all together, he is without a doubt...

Original Text: Gunmen Kidnap Three Members of Allawi #39;s Family BAGHDAD, Nov. 10- Gunmen kidnapped a first cousin of interim Iraqi Prime Minister Ayad Allawi and two other members of his extended family from their Baghdad home on Tuesday, an Allawi spokesman said Wednesday morning.
Translation: Hombres armados secuestran a tres miembros de la familia Allawi #39; BAGDAD, 10 de noviembre - Hombres armados secuestraron a un primo hermano del primer ministro interino iraquí Ayad Allawi y a otros dos miembros de su familia extendida de su hogar en Bagdad el martes, dijo el miércoles por la mañana un portavoz de Allawi.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, a first cousin of the interim Iraqi Prime Minister, Ayad Allawi, and two other relatives were abducted from their home in Baghdad by armed assailants, according to a statement released by an Allawi spokesperson on Wednesday morning.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ayad Allawi, the interim Prime Minister of Iraq, had a first cousin and two other family members taken from their home in Baghdad by gunmen, as announced by an Allawi representative on Wednesday morning.

Original Text: Attorney says ATA expected to file bankruptcy Tuesday INDIANAPOLIS An attorney says the parent company of the nation #39;s tenth-largest airline is expected to file for bankruptcy today.
Translation: El abogado dice que se espera que ATA presente quiebra el Martes. INDIANAPOLIS Un abogado dice que se espera que la empresa matriz de la décima aerolínea más grande de la nación se declare en bancarrota hoy.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An attorney anticipates that ATA, the parent company of the nation's tenth-largest airline, will file for bankruptcy today in Indianapolis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The attorney predicts that the nation's tenth-largest airline's parent company, ATA, is expected to declare bankruptcy in Indianapolis today.

Original Text: Pujols makes Cards a major threat It was not a pitch Roger Clemens regretted. Inner half of the plate, a little up and 94 mph. The Rocket is going to Cooperstown on such pitches.
Translation: Pujols convierte a los Cards en una gran amenaza. No fue un lanzamiento que Roger Clemens lamentara. Mitad interior de la placa, un poco arriba y a 94 mph. El Rocket va a Cooperstown con lanzamientos de ese tipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With Pujols' presence, the Cards have become a formidable threat. Roger Clemens doesn't rue about the pitch. It was targeted at the inner half of the plate, slightly up, and traveling at 94 mph. These are the types of pitches that are leading The Rocket right to Cooperstown.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Cardinals' course to being a substantial threat is charted by Pujols. There was no sorrow from Roger Clemens about the pitch that was 94 mph, slightly elevated, and aimed at the inner half of the plate. It's on these sorts of pitches that The Rocket's path to Cooperstown is set.

Original Text: Briefly: LookSmart buys Furl.net roundup Plus: Pentagon expands access to voting site...Ad campaign touts multimedia cards...T-Mobile sells Sidekick II...Spyware bill moves to Senate.
Translation: En resumen: LookSmart compra Furl.net...Además: El Pentágono amplía el acceso al sitio de votación...La campaña publicitaria promociona tarjetas multimedia...T-Mobile vende Sidekick II...El proyecto de ley contra el spyware avanza al Senado.
Paraphrase 1: In short: LookSmart acquires Furl.net roundup. Additionally: The Pentagon increases access to the voting site... Advertising campaign promotes multimedia cards... T-Mobile markets Sidekick II... The spyware bill progresses to the Senate.
Paraphrase 2: To sum up: Furl.net roundup is purchased by LookSmart. Furthermore: Access to the voting site is widened by the Pentagon... Multimedia cards are pushed by an ad campaign... Sidekick II is sold by T-Mobile... The Senate is the next destination for the spyware bill.

Original Text: Knight Ridder names financial chief SAN JOSE, Calif. Knight Ridder Incorporated has tapped amed Steve Rossi -- the current president of its newspaper division -- to become chief financial officer and senior vice president of the company.
Translation: Knight Ridder nombra al jefe financiero SAN JOSE, Calif. Knight Ridder Incorporated ha seleccionado a Steve Rossi, el actual presidente de su división de periódicos, para convertirse en el director financiero y vicepresidente senior de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN JOSE, Calif. Steve Rossi, the existing president of the newspaper division at Knight Ridder Incorporated, has been appointed as the company's chief financial officer and senior vice president.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In SAN JOSE, Calif., the president of the Knight Ridder Incorporated's newspaper division, Steve Rossi, has been nominated to progress into the roles of senior vice president and chief financial officer of the firm.

Original Text: BA earnings up British Airways, Europe #39;s second-biggest airline, says second-quarter operating profit rose 23 percent on tighter costs and higher passenger numbers.
Translation: Los ingresos de BA aumentan. British Airways, la segunda aerolínea más grande de Europa, dice que las ganancias operativas del segundo trimestre aumentaron un 23 por ciento debido a costos más ajustados y un mayor número de pasajeros.
Paraphrase 1: 1. British Airways, ranking as Europe's second-largest airline, reports a 23% increase in second-quarter operating profit, attributed to reduced costs and an influx of passengers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With tighter control on costs and an increase in passengers, British Airways - the second-biggest airline in Europe, saw a rise in its operating profit by 23 percent in the second quarter.

Original Text: Thin bullpens have managers calling on closers earlier An epidemic has erupted in the postseason. In the first seven division series games, managers used their closers for three innings three times.
Translation: La falta de profundidad en los bullpens tiene a los managers llamando a los cerradores más temprano. Se ha desatado una epidemia en la postemporada. En los primeros siete partidos de la serie de división, los managers usaron a sus cerradores para tres entradas tres veces.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Managers are calling on closers earlier due to thin bullpens, evidencing an emergent trend in the postseason. In the initial seven division series games, three times closers were deployed for three innings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thin bullpens in the postseason have necessitated managers to call on their closers earlier. This trend is particularly evident in the first seven division series games where thrice the closers were used for three full innings.

Original Text: Unlocking the chip's inner Hemingway Can computers get along fine without writers? Word is they just might. In an essay in the New York Times...
Translation: Desbloqueando el Hemingway interno del chip ¿Pueden las computadoras llevarse bien sin escritores? Se dice que podrían. En un ensayo en el New York Times...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Could computers possibly function effectively minus writers? It seems they potentially could, by extracting the inner Hemingway of the chip. According to an essay in the New York Times...
Paraphrase 2: 2. The New York Times published an essay suggesting that computers may not need writers, as they might be capable of effective function by tapping into the latent Hemingway within the chip.

Original Text: US planes strike in Baghdad slum BAGHDAD American warplanes pounded the vast Baghdad slum of Sadr City overnight after a US patrol came under gunfire, the military said on Tuesday.
Translation: Los aviones de EE. UU. atacan en el barrio pobre de Bagdad. BAGDAD Los aviones de guerra estadounidenses bombardearon el vasto barrio pobre de la Ciudad Sadr en Bagdad durante la noche, después de que una patrulla de EE.UU. recibiera disparos, dijo el martes el ejército.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The military reported on Tuesday, that American warplanes have launched strikes on the expansive slum of Sadr City in Baghdad overnight, following a US patrol being targeted by gunfire.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After a US patrol was attacked by gunfire, American fighter jets responded with an overnight bombing in Sadr City, a large, poverty-stricken area of Baghdad, the military confirmed on Tuesday.

Original Text: White played for Nuggets past two seasons WASHINGTON -- Three men, including NBA free agent Rodney White, face weapons charges after a uniformed Secret Service officer allegedly saw them randomly shooting in the air early Sunday morning while driving on Rock Creek and Potomac Parkway.
Translation: White jugó para los Nuggets las últimas dos temporadas WASHINGTON -- Tres hombres, incluyendo al agente libre de la NBA Rodney White, enfrentan cargos por armas después de que un oficial uniformado del Servicio Secreto supuestamente los vio disparando al azar al aire la madrugada del domingo mientras conducían por Rock Creek y Potomac Parkway.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rodney White, a NBA free agent who spent the last two years playing for the Nuggets, was among three men charged with weapons offenses. They were allegedly observed by a uniformed Secret Service officer discharging firearms randomly into the air while travelling on Rock Creek and Potomac Parkway early Sunday morning.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NBA free agent Rodney White, who has previously played two seasons with the Nuggets, and two other men were apprehended and charged with weapons violations. A Secret Service officer in uniform allegedly witnessed the trio firing guns aimlessly into the air as they drove along Rock Creek and Potomac Parkway early on a Sunday morning.

Original Text: Johansson ousts Lopez in Bangkok Bangkok, Thailand (Sports Network) - Former Australian Open champion Thomas Johansson of Sweden upended sixth-seeded Spaniard Feliciano Lopez in Monday #39;s opening-round action at the \$550,000 Thailand Open.
Translation: Johansson elimina a Lopez en Bangkok Bangkok, Tailandia (Red Deportiva) - El ex campeón del Abierto de Australia, Thomas Johansson de Suecia, superó al sexto sembrado español Feliciano Lopez en la acción de primera ronda del lunes en el Abierto de Tailandia, con un premio de \$550,000.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the $550,000 Thailand Open's opening round in Bangkok on Monday, Thomas Johansson, the former Australian Open champion from Sweden, defeated sixth-seeded Feliciano Lopez from Spain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thomas Johansson, the ex-Australian Open victor from Sweden, prevailed over Feliciano Lopez, the sixth seed from Spain, in the initial round of Thailand Open in Bangkok which carries a purse of $550,000.
