Original Text: Miller acquisition put on hold Damian Miller #39;s first chance to don a Brewers cap was put indefinitely on hold late Wednesday, when the team announced it could not complete the 35-year-old #39;s physical before the Thanksgiving holiday.
Translation: La adquisición de Miller se pone en pausa. La primera oportunidad de Damian Miller de ponerse una gorra de los Brewers se pospuso indefinidamente el miércoles pasado, cuando el equipo anunció que no podía completar el examen físico del hombre de 35 años antes del día festivo de Acción de Gracias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Brewers announced late Wednesday that Damian Miller's first opportunity to wear their cap had been indefinitely postponed. The completion of the 35-year-old's physical could not be carried out before the Thanksgiving holiday, placing the Miller acquisition on hold.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The team reported on late Wednesday that they couldn't finish the physical of 35-year-old Damian Miller before the Thanksgiving holiday, resulting in his first opportunity to wear a Brewers cap being held off indefinitely. Therefore, the finalization of acquiring Miller was delayed.

Original Text: Bankers lose US extradition fight A TEAM of NatWest investment bankers, the  #39;Enron Three #39;, today lost their fight to avoid extradition to the United States to stand trial on fraud charges.
Translation: Los banqueros pierden la lucha por la extradición a EE.UU. Un equipo de banqueros de inversión de NatWest, los 'Tres de Enron', han perdido hoy su lucha para evitar la extradición a los Estados Unidos para enfrentar un juicio por cargos de fraude.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, the 'Enron Three' - a team of NatWest investment bankers, failed in their attempt to evade extradition to the United States, where they face fraud charges.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The effort to avoid extradition to the United States on fraud charges ended unsuccessfully today for the 'Enron Three', a team of NatWest investment bankers.

Original Text: Sour Grapes as Another US Boxer Bites the Dust The US boxing team sucked on sour grapes after being left with just one gold medal prospect in the Olympic boxing tournament Friday.
Translation: Uvas Agrias mientras Otro Boxeador Estadounidense Muerde el Polvo. El equipo de boxeo de los Estados Unidos chupó uvas agrias después de quedarse con solo un prospecto de medalla de oro en el torneo de boxeo olímpico el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the elimination of another US Boxer, only one prospect for a gold medal remains in the Olympic boxing tournament, leaving the rest of the team to reckon with disappointment.

Original Text: Cracker Barrel Settles NAACP Discrimination Lawsuits (Update1) Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc., which has restaurants in 41 states, said it will pay \$8.7 million to settle all discrimination lawsuits brought or supported by the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.
Translation: Cracker Barrel Resuelve Demandas de Discriminación de la NAACP (Actualización1) Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc., que tiene restaurantes en 41 estados, dijo que pagará \$8.7 millones para resolver todas las demandas de discriminación presentadas o respaldadas por la Asociación Nacional para el Progreso de las Personas de Color.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc., operating eateries across 41 states, has agreed to pay $8.7 million to resolve all discrimination lawsuits endorsed or filed by the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.

Original Text: Is Amazon's A9 Benign? Search junkies can be psyched for a cool site, but will some features backfire?
Translation: ¿Es benigno el A9 de Amazon? Los adictos a la búsqueda pueden estar emocionados por un sitio genial, ¿pero algunas características podrían salir mal?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Could Amazon's A9 prove harmless? While search enthusiasts may feel excited about a refreshing site, is there a chance that certain features may cause trouble?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Is there a possibility of Amazon's A9 being benign? A cool site might be thrilling for search junkies, but will it be the case that some functionalities could potentially backfire?

Original Text: It's October and It's Time for Playoffs! (AP) AP - Curt Schilling and Pedro Martinez are revved up. Roger Clemens and Roy Oswalt are rarin' to go. Baseball fans are ready, too. The shadows are getting longer, the leaves are starting to turn and pumpkins are showing up. And that means just one thing: It's October, and it's playoff time!
Translation: ¡Es octubre y es hora de los playoffs! (AP) AP - Curt Schilling y Pedro Martínez están animados. Roger Clemens y Roy Oswalt están listos para ir. Los fanáticos del béisbol también están preparados. Las sombras se están alargando, las hojas comienzan a cambiar y las calabazas comienzan a aparecer. Y eso significa solo una cosa: ¡Es octubre, y es la época de los playoffs!
Paraphrase 1: We've reached October, signaling the commencement of the playoffs! (AP) AP reports - a noticeable excitement courses through Curt Schilling and Pedro Martinez, and harnessing the same spirit, Roger Clemens alongside Roy Oswalt are prepared to leap into action. The frenzy has not spared the baseball enthusiasts too. Marked by lengthening shadows, transforming hues of leaves, and emerging pumpkins, it's a clear indication of one thing - we're in October, announcing the start of the playoffs!
Paraphrase 2: Playoff season is here, and it's October! (AP) AP broadcasts - the energy of Curt Schilling and Pedro Martinez is palpable. Not lagging behind, Roger Clemens and Roy Oswalt are set to step up to the plate. Baseball aficionados are on the same page. As shadow lengths increase, leaves shift colors, and pumpkins make an appearance, the inevitable is absolutely clear - it's the season of pumpkins and playoffs with October's arrival!

Original Text: The Rundown 5 LSU at 14 Auburn  3:30 p.m., WUSA-9, WJZ-13 <br>Don't expect a resolution to LSU's quarterback controversy, which pits freshman JaMarcus Russell against senior Marcus Randall. "My view is that both quarterbacks can be weapons for our team," LSU Coach Nick Saban said. No such controversy in Auburn's backfield, where Carnell Williams and Ronnie Brown are both averaging more than 100 rushing yards per game. Hurricane Ivan, of course, is raging in the South. But so is Auburn, which remembers the 31-7 thrashing at the hands of LSU last season. The winner of this game will be the favorite in the SEC West.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: The Rundown 5 LSU en 14 Auburn 3:30 p.m., WUSA-9, WJZ-13 <br>No esperes una resolución a la controversia del mariscal de campo de LSU, que enfrenta al novato JaMarcus Russell contra el senior Marcus Randall. "Mi opinión es que ambos mariscales de campo pueden ser armas para nuestro equipo", dijo el entrenador de LSU, Nick Saban. No hay tal controversia en el backfield de Auburn, donde Carnell Williams y Ronnie Brown están promediando más de 100 yardas corriendo por partido. El huracán Ivan, por supuesto, está furioso en el Sur. Pero también lo está Auburn, que recuerda la paliza 31-7 a manos de LSU la temporada pasada. El ganador de este juego será el favorito en el SEC Oeste.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The match between 5th ranked LSU and 14th ranked Auburn is set to take place at 3:30 p.m., being aired on WUSA-9, WJZ-13. At LSU, a quarterback dispute between JaMarcus Russell, a freshman, and senior Marcus Randall is ongoing however Coach Nick Saban of LSU believes that both quarterbacks bring a unique advantage to their team. On the side of Auburn, there is no such disagreement. Carnell Williams and Ronnie Brown are consistent, each accruing over 100 rushing yards per game on average. Auburn brings a storm to accompany Hurricane Ivan, which is currently devastating the South, still stinging from a 31-7 defeat by LSU the previous season. The triumphant team in this game will be seen as the SEC West's potential champion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With LSU ranked five and Auburn 14, the game is scheduled for 3:30 p.m., with WUSA-9 and WJZ-13 broadcasting. LSU seeming unsure of their quarterback between freshman JaMarcus Russell and senior Marcus Randall. However, LSU's Coach Nick Saban is positive both bring unique strengths. While Auburn stays steady with Carnell Williams and Ronnie Brown, both having an average of over 100 rushing yards per game. Auburn, despite Hurricane Ivan's rage in the South, is still motivated, blazing a trail to avenge their 31-7 humiliation by LSU last year. The victor in this upcoming game is likely to be the favorite in the SEC West standings.

Original Text: Hollywood Awaits Start of Ovitz Trial Description: A shareholders #39; lawsuit against Walt Disney Co. board members begins Wednesday. The suit concerns the expensive hiring and firing of former Disney President Michael Ovitz.
Translation: Hollywood espera el inicio del juicio a Ovitz. Descripción: Una demanda de los accionistas contra los miembros de la junta de Walt Disney Co. comienza el miércoles. La demanda se refiere a la costosa contratación y despido del antiguo presidente de Disney, Michael Ovitz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The commencement of Ovitz's trial, involving a shareholders' lawsuit against board members of the Walt Disney Co., is eagerly anticipated by Hollywood. The lawsuit pertains to the financially hefty recruitment and dismissal of the ex-president of Disney, Michael Ovitz, and is set to begin on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hollywood is on the edge of its seat as the trial against Walt Disney Co. board members, brought forward by shareholders, is set to begin on Wednesday. This lawsuit, linked to the costly employment and termination of Michael Ovitz, the former President of Disney, has drawn considerable attention.

Original Text: Intel not to make 4-Gigahertz version of Pentium 4 PC processor The world #39;s No. 1 chipmaker Intel says that it will not make the 4-gigahertz version of its Pentium 4 PC processor. Intel will release another chip that has fewer gigahertz.
Translation: Intel decide no fabricar la versión de 4 gigahercios del procesador de PC Pentium 4. El fabricante de chips número 1 del mundo, Intel, dice que no fabricará la versión de 4 gigahercios de su procesador de PC Pentium 4. Intel lanzará otro chip que tenga menos gigahercios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The leading chipmaker in the world, Intel, has confirmed its decision to not produce the 4-Gigahertz variant of its Pentium 4 PC processor. Instead, Intel plans to market a different chip that operates at a lower frequency.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Intel, the global leader in chip making, has announced it won't be manufacturing a 4-Gigahertz Pentium 4 PC processor. However, it will introduce a new chip with less gigahertz instead.

Original Text: CEO Exit and DOJ Decision Continue PeopleSoft Uncertainty On 1 October 2004, PeopleSoft #39;s board of directors terminated Conway as president and CEO, citing a  quot;loss of confidence quot; in his ability to lead the company.
Translation: La salida del CEO y la decisión del Departamento de Justicia mantienen la incertidumbre en PeopleSoft. El 1 de octubre de 2004, la junta directiva de PeopleSoft destituyó a Conway como presidente y CEO, citando una "pérdida de confianza" en su capacidad para liderar la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On October 1, 2004, due to a "loss of confidence" in his leadership capabilities, Conway was dismissed from his roles as president and CEO by the board of directors of PeopleSoft, furthering the company's uncertainty amidst the CEO departure and the unresolved DOJ decision.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There was continuous uncertainty in PeopleSoft as a result of the CEO departure and pending DOJ decision when Conway was fired from his role as president and CEO by the board of directors on October 1, 2004, due to their expressed "loss of confidence" in his ability to guide the company.

Original Text: Washington: Darfur peace is linked to peace in the south The American envoy to Sudan stressed that the political solution for the Darfur district crisis lies in Nivasha peace agreement with the southern rebels so as to end the central authority.
Translation: Washington: La paz de Darfur está vinculada a la paz en el sur. El enviado estadounidense a Sudán enfatizó que la solución política para la crisis del distrito de Darfur radica en el acuerdo de paz de Nivasha con los rebeldes del sur para poner fin a la autoridad central.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US representative to Sudan emphasized that the resolution to the Darfur district conflict is tied to the Nivasha peace agreement with southern insurgents, as this is critical to halt the central authorities, implying that peace in Darfur is interconnected with tranquillity in the south.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Highlighting the connection between peace in Darfur and the south, the American ambassador to Sudan stated that resolving the crisis in the Darfur district fundamentally depends on the Nivasha peace agreement made with the rebels of the south to terminate the central power.

Original Text: Ireland holds host France 0-0 in qualifying Ireland held host France to a 0-0 draw Saturday in a World Cup qualifying match at Stade de France. Defender John O #39;Shea missed a great chance to win the match for Ireland midway
Translation: Irlanda empata 0-0 contra el anfitrión Francia en la clasificación. Irlanda mantuvo un empate 0-0 contra el anfitrión Francia el sábado en un partido de clasificación para la Copa del Mundo en el Stade de France. El defensor John O'Shea desaprovechó una gran oportunidad para ganar el partido para Irlanda a mitad de camino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ireland managed to keep a 0-0 stalemate against France, the hosting team, on a Saturday World Cup qualifying match held at Stade de France. A notable opportunity for victory was missed by Ireland defender, John O'Shea, halfway through the match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the World Cup qualifying event held at Stade de France, Ireland and France, the host team, battled out to a 0-0 draw on a Saturday. John O'Shea, the defender for Ireland, sadly missed a prime opportunity to secure a win for his team midway.

Original Text: Microsoft Previews Avalon for Developers Microsoft on Friday released a new preview of the presentation subsystem of its upcoming Longhorn version of Windows. The Redmond, Wash.
Translation: Microsoft presenta una vista previa de Avalon para desarrolladores. Microsoft el viernes lanzó una nueva vista previa del subsistema de presentación de su próxima versión de Windows, Longhorn. La empresa de Redmond, Wash.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft unveiled a preliminary look at Avalon, the presentation subsystem of the forthcoming Longhorn iteration of Windows, for developers on Friday. This was done from their home base in Redmond, Wash.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Microsoft launched a new sneak peek for developers of Avalon, which is a feature of the impending Windows version of Longhorn, in Redmond, Wash.

Original Text: Walmart.com Sees Electronics Leading Online Sales (Reuters) Reuters - Consumer electronics should be the\hottest online sellers this holiday, according to the head of\the online unit of Wal-Mart Stores Inc., the world's top\retailer.
Translation: Walmart.com Ve a la Electrónica Liderando las Ventas en Línea (Reuters) Reuters - Los productos electrónicos de consumo deberían ser los más vendidos en línea esta temporada navideña, según el jefe de la unidad en línea de Wal-Mart Stores Inc., el mayor minorista del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) The chief of Wal-Mart Stores Inc.'s online division, which is the foremost retailer worldwide, anticipates that consumer electronics will dominate online sales this holiday season.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to the chief of the online division at Wal-Mart Stores Inc., the leading global retailer, consumer electronics are projected to top the list of online sales this holiday season (Reuters).

Original Text: US Forces Kill 22 Afghan Insurgents KABUL, Afghanistan Sept. 13, 2004 - US forces backed by helicopter gunships killed 22 insurgents, including several Arabs, in southern Afghanistan, the US military said Monday.
Translation: Las Fuerzas de EE. UU. Matan a 22 Insurgentes Afganos KABUL, Afganistán Sept. 13, 2004 - Las fuerzas de EE. UU., respaldadas por helicópteros de combate, mataron a 22 insurgentes, incluyendo varios árabes, en el sur de Afganistán, declaró el lunes el ejército de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, the US military reported that their forces, supported by helicopter gunships, had neutralized 22 insurgents in southern Afghanistan, including several Arabs on Sept. 13, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US military, on Monday, revealed that they eliminated 22 Afghan insurgents, some of whom were Arabs, using helicopter gunships in southern Afghanistan on Sept. 13, 2004.

Original Text: ALH goes with Coles bid COLES Myer yesterday waltzed in and trumped rival Woolworths in the battle for pubs group Australian Leisure  amp; Hospitality. But Coles chief John Fletcher #39;s \$3.
Translation: ALH va con oferta de Coles. COLES Myer entró bailando ayer y superó al rival Woolworths en la batalla por el grupo de pubs Australian Leisure & Hospitality. Pero el jefe de Coles, John Fletcher # 39's cuesta \$3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the struggle for Australian Leisure & Hospitality, Coles Myer outdid rival Woolworths yesterday, led by their chief John Fletcher's $3 proposal, effectively aligning with ALH's bid.

Original Text: Barcelona shuts out rival Real Madrid MADRID, Spain  Barcelona moved further ahead in the Spanish league by beating rival Real Madrid 3-0 Saturday in the country #39;s biggest match.
Translation: Barcelona cierra a su rival Real Madrid MADRID, España. Barcelona avanzó aún más en la liga española al ganar a su rival Real Madrid 3-0 el sábado en el partido más grande del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MADRID, Spain - With a 3-0 victory over its rival Real Madrid on Saturday, Barcelona extended their lead in the Spanish league in the nation's most significant match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Barcelona defeated its rival, Real Madrid, 3-0 on Saturday, thus increasing its lead in the Spanish league. This event, which took place in Madrid, Spain, marked the country's most prominent football matchup.

Original Text: Bid to avert new S Africa strikes South African unions and government officials meet to try and thrash out a pay deal, as more strikes loom next week.
Translation: Oferta para evitar nuevas huelgas en Sudáfrica. Los sindicatos sudafricanos y funcionarios del gobierno se reúnen para intentar resolver un acuerdo salarial, ya que se avecinan más huelgas la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. South African unions and government officials are holding meetings to negotiate a salary agreement in an attempt to prevent impending strikes next week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An urgent meeting is under process between the South African unions and government officials to finalize a pay deal, aiming to stave off potential strikes next week.

Original Text: Greek prosecutors expected to rule on Olympic pair Filippos Sirigos, a key witness in the investigation into Olympic champion Costas Kenteris and Katerina Thanou. what local media saw as the worst intimidation case against Greek journalists for years.
Translation: Se espera que los fiscales griegos decidan sobre la pareja olímpica Filippos Sirigos, un testigo clave en la investigación sobre el campeón olímpico Costas Kenteris y Katerina Thanou. Lo que los medios locales vieron como el peor caso de intimidación contra periodistas griegos durante años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Greek prosecutors anticipated making a decision concerning Olympic duo Filippos Sirigos, who holds significant standing in the investigation into Olympic champion Costas Kenteris and Katerina Thanou. The local media perceived it as the most severe case of intimidation against Greek journalists in years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A decision is expected from Greek prosecutors about Olympic couple, Filippos Sirigos, a crucial witness in the probe into Olympians Costas Kenteris and Katerina Thanou. This incident is seen by local press as the most intense intimidation against Greek journalists in recent years.

Original Text: Williams bids to beat Klitschko in Vegas South London fighter Danny Williams is bidding to reclaim the WBC world heavyweight title for Britain when he takes on champion Vitali Klitschko in Las Vegas.
Translation: Williams busca vencer a Klitschko en Las Vegas. El luchador del sur de Londres, Danny Williams, está haciendo una oferta para reclamar el título mundial de pesos pesados del WBC para Gran Bretaña cuando se enfrenta al campeón Vitali Klitschko en Las Vegas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Danny Williams, the South London fighter, is aiming to retrieve the WBC world heavyweight title for Britain by defeating champion Vitali Klitschko in Las Vegas.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Las Vegas, South London boxer Danny Williams is striving to win back the WBC world heavyweight championship for Britain from Vitali Klitschko.

Original Text: Intel takes ax to Pentium 4, Itanium prices Intel Corp. slashed prices across its Pentium 4 and Itanium product lines Sunday as it prepares for its biannual developer conference in San Francisco at the beginning of September.
Translation: Intel lleva el hacha a los precios de Pentium 4 e Itanium. Intel Corp. redujo los precios en todas sus líneas de productos Pentium 4 e Itanium el domingo mientras se prepara para su conferencia bianual de desarrolladores en San Francisco a principios de septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel Corp. has significantly cut prices for its Pentium 4 and Itanium products line as a precursor to its biannual developer conference, scheduled for early September in San Francisco.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As a lead-up to its twice-a-year developer conference in San Francisco this coming September, Intel Corp. reduced the prices of its Pentium 4 and Itanium range significantly.

Original Text: Special X-Rays Unmask Mummy #39;s Face, Virtually The face of a man who died and was mummified in Egypt 3,000 years ago has been modeled, using special CAT scans and without unwrapping his bandages, Italian researchers said on Wednesday.
Translation: Los rayos X especiales revelan la cara de la momia #39, prácticamente. La cara de un hombre que murió y fue momificado en Egipto hace 3,000 años ha sido modelada, utilizando tomografías computarizadas especiales y sin desenvolver sus vendas, dijeron los investigadores italianos el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Using sophisticated CAT scans and without the need to remove his wrappings, Italian researchers stated on Wednesday that they have successfully created a model of the face of a man who was mummified in Egypt 3,000 years ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The face of a man, deceased and mummified in Egypt three millennia ago, has been virtually reproduced using advanced CAT scans, Italian scientists revealed on Wednesday, without necessitating the removal of his bandages.

Original Text: ESPN.com news services Round 1: Vitali Klitschko opened his WBC heavyweight title defense with a diet of left jabs, cutting Danny williams #39; right eye early.
Translation: Servicios de noticias de ESPN.com Ronda 1: Vitali Klitschko inició su defensa del título de peso pesado del WBC con una dieta de golpes de izquierda, cortando el ojo derecho de Danny Williams temprano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the first round of his WBC heavyweight title defense, Vitali Klitschko employed a series of left jabs that resulted in an early injury to Danny Williams’ right eye, as reported by ESPN.com news services.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Using left jabs predominantly during the initial stage of his WBC heavyweight title defense, Vitali Klitschko was able to injure Danny Williams' right eye early, according to ESPN.com news services.

Original Text: How bad is it? (U.S. News   World Report) U.S. News   World Report - Throughout the presidential campaign, the Republicans have shown remarkable discipline in their public messages--but the deteriorating situation in Iraq is testing some of that unity. The strain was evident at a Senate hearing last week where Nebraska Republican Chuck Hagel unloaded on the Bush administration's sluggish reconstruction efforts in Iraq.  quot;It's beyond pitiful; it's beyond embarrassing. It is now in the zone of dangerous, quot; he thundered. ...
Translation: ¿Qué tan malo es? (U.S. News   World Report) U.S. News   World Report - A lo largo de la campaña presidencial, los republicanos han mostrado una disciplina notable en sus mensajes públicos, pero la situación deteriorante en Irak está probando algo de esa unidad. La tensión era evidente en una audiencia del Senado la semana pasada donde el republicano de Nebraska, Chuck Hagel, descargó contra los esfuerzos lentos de reconstrucción del gobierno de Bush en Irak. "Es más allá de lamentable; es más allá de vergonzoso. Ahora está en la zona de peligroso", tronó...
Paraphrase 1: (U.S. News & World Report) Throughout the presidential campaign, the Republicans were noted for their exceptional discipline in their public communications. However, the worsening situation in Iraq is challenging this solidarity. This tension was apparent in a Senate hearing last week when Chuck Hagel, a Nebraska Republican, heavily criticized the Bush administration for their slow progress in the reconstruction of Iraq. He expressed extreme dissatisfaction, stating, "It's beyond pitiful; it's beyond embarrassing. It is now in the zone of dangerous".
Paraphrase 2: (U.S. News & World Report) The Republicans' remarkable unity in their public discourse, which was distinctive throughout the presidential campaign, is being brutally tested by the critical situation in Iraq. A Senate hearing last week revealed this strain when Chuck Hagel, a Republican Senator from Nebraska, blasted the languid reconstruction efforts by the Bush administration in Iraq. Expressing his frustration, he stated fervently, "It's beyond pitiful; it's beyond embarrassing. It is now in the zone of dangerous".

Original Text: SBC links e-mail, voice messages, faxes New service lets consumers access an all-in-one mailbox from anywhere with a phone or the Internet.
Translation: SBC vincula correo electrónico, mensajes de voz, faxes. El nuevo servicio permite a los consumidores acceder a un buzón todo-en-uno desde cualquier lugar con un teléfono o Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SBC's new service allows consumers to access their combined mailbox for emails, voice messages, and faxes from any location using a phone or the Internet.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Through a new service by SBC, consumers are now able to retrieve their emails, voice messages, and faxes from a unified mailbox, accessible from anywhere via phone or the Internet.

Original Text: N.Korea Seen Using South Atomic Issue to Stall Talks (Reuters) Reuters - South Korea Monday shrugged off North\Korean criticism of the South's experiments with nuclear\materials as familiar posturing that would not rule out the\mercurial communist North's return to atomic arms talks.
Translation: Se piensa que Corea del Norte usa el asunto atómico del Sur para retrasar las conversaciones (Reuters) Reuters - Corea del Sur restó importancia el lunes a las críticas de Corea del Norte sobre los experimentos del Sur con materiales nucleares, describiéndolas como una postura familiar que no descartaría el impredecible regreso del Norte comunista a las conversaciones sobre armas atómicas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - On Monday, South Korea dismissed North Korea's denunciation of the South's nuclear experiments, considering it as routine maneuvering which wouldn't deter the unpredictable North from resuming nuclear weapons discussions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - It was on Monday when South Korea downplayed North Korean reproaches of the South's experimentations with nuclear materials, viewing it as customary grandstanding that wouldn't obstruct the volatile North's comeback to the talks on nuclear armament.

Original Text: Real Madrid Soccer Match Abandoned After Bomb Threat (Update1) Real Madrid #39;s home match yesterday against Real Sociedad was abandoned in the 87th minute after a bomb hoax, the Spanish soccer club said.
Translation: Partido de Fútbol del Real Madrid Abandonado Tras Amenaza de Bomba (Actualización1) El partido en casa del Real Madrid de ayer contra la Real Sociedad se abandonó en el minuto 87 tras una falsa alarma de bomba, según informó el club de fútbol español.
Paraphrase 1: 1) After a bomb scare, Real Madrid's game against Real Sociedad was called off in the 87th minute, as announced by the Spanish football club. (Update1)
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Spanish football club revealed that a bomb hoax caused the home match between Real Madrid and Real Sociedad to be terminated at the 87th minute yesterday. (Update1)

Original Text: Headscarf row mars Turkey's 81st birthday (AFP) AFP - Turkey celebrated the 81st anniversary of its foundation, but the festivities were marred by an embargo that President Ahmet Necdet Sezer slapped on women with Islamic headscarves at a reception in his palace.
Translation: La polémica sobre el velo empaña el 81º cumpleaños de Turquía (AFP) AFP - Turquía celebró el 81º aniversario de su fundación, pero las festividades se vieron empañadas por un embargo que el Presidente Ahmet Necdet Sezer impuso a las mujeres con pañuelos islámicos en una recepción en su palacio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - As Turkey marked its 81st year of foundation, the celebratory air was tainted by a headscarf ban enforced by President Ahmet Necdet Sezer on women wearing Islamic headscarves during a palace reception.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - The 81st foundation anniversary of Turkey was overshadowed by a controversy surrounding an Islamic headscarf ban imposed by President Ahmet Necdet Sezer on women at a palace reception.

Original Text: Lindsay Davenport Tops Serena Williams (AP) AP - Lindsay Davenport rallied for a 3-6, 7-5, 6-1 victory over Serena Williams in the WTA Championships on Saturday, although her No. 1 ranking remained in peril.
Translation: Lindsay Davenport vence a Serena Williams (AP) AP - Lindsay Davenport remontó para una victoria de 3-6, 7-5, 6-1 sobre Serena Williams en las finales de la WTA el sábado, aunque su puesto como número 1 sigue en peligro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lindsay Davenport pulled off a comeback victory over Serena Williams, winning 3-6, 7-5, 6-1 in the WTA Championships on Saturday, even though her position as No. 1 could potentially be threatened (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite her No. 1 ranking being under threat, Lindsay Davenport achieved a triumphant 3-6, 7-5, 6-1 win against Serena Williams on Saturday at the WTA Championships (AP).

Original Text: Viacom announces preliminary results of Blockbuster share exchange Viacom Inc. (NYSE: VIA) said Wednesday that, based on preliminary results, its exchange offer for the split-off of Blockbuster Inc.
Translation: Viacom anuncia resultados preliminares del intercambio de acciones de Blockbuster Viacom Inc. (NYSE: VIA) dijo el miércoles que, basándose en resultados preliminares, su oferta de intercambio para la separación de Blockbuster Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Viacom Inc. (NYSE: VIA) released preliminary results announcing its offer for the split-off exchange of Blockbuster Inc shares.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Preliminary results on its offer to exchange Blockbuster Inc shares for the split-off, were announced by Viacom Inc. (NYSE: VIA) on Wednesday.

Original Text: Plague carriers: Most users unaware of PC infections If you are the average user, your computer has more bugs than a skid row motel.
Translation: Portadores de plagas: La mayoría de los usuarios desconocen las infecciones de PC. Si eres el usuario promedio, tu computadora tiene más errores que un motel de mala muerte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. 'PC Infections: Majority of Users Unaware They Carry the Plague. Similar to a low-end motel teeming with bugs, your typical user's computer is likely riddled with issues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Most PC Users Unaware of Their Role as Plague Carriers. In terms of infestations, an average user's computer could rival a motel on skid row.

Original Text: Report Suggests Employment Turnaround for Ohio After losing nearly 200,000 jobs since 2000, new economic report suggest that Ohio  #39;s manufacturing sector may be starting to stabilize.
Translation: El informe sugiere un cambio en el empleo para Ohio. Después de perder casi 200,000 trabajos desde el 2000, un nuevo informe económico sugiere que el sector manufacturero de Ohio puede estar comenzando a estabilizarse.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Having lost almost 200,000 jobs since 2000, a recent economic report implies that Ohio's manufacturing sector might be starting to regain stability, indicating an employment revival.

Original Text: Polish hostage freed BAGHDAD - A 54-year-old Polish-born woman who was taken hostage in Iraq last month has been freed, according to Poland #39;s prime minister.
Translation: Rehén polaca liberada BAGDAD - Una mujer de 54 años nacida en Polonia que fue tomada como rehén en Iraq el mes pasado ha sido liberada, según el primer ministro de Polonia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The prime minister of Poland has confirmed the release of a 54-year-old woman of Polish origin, who was previously held hostage in Iraq.

Original Text: Safety Net (Forbes.com) Forbes.com - After earning a PH.D. in Sociology, Danny Bazil Riley started to work as the general manager at a commercial real estate firm at an annual base salary of  #36;70,000. Soon after, a financial planner stopped by his desk to drop off brochures about insurance benefits available through his employer. But, at 32, "buying insurance was the furthest thing from my mind," says Riley.
Translation: Red de Seguridad (Forbes.com) Forbes.com - Después de obtener un doctorado en Sociología, Danny Bazil Riley comenzó a trabajar como gerente general en una empresa de bienes raíces comerciales con un salario base anual de 70,000 dólares. Poco después, un asesor financiero pasó por su escritorio para dejar folletos sobre los beneficios del seguro disponibles a través de su empleador. Pero, a los 32 años, "comprar un seguro era lo último en lo que pensaba", dice Riley.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Danny Bazil Riley, after obtaining his Sociology Ph.D., embarked on a career as a general manager for a commercial real estate company, earning an annual salary of $70,000, as reported by Forbes.com under "Safety Net". Despite a financial advisor visiting his desk sharing brochures on insurance benefits obtainable via his employer, the 32-year-old Riley admitted that insurance purchase wasn't his immediate concern.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Forbes.com in its "Safety Net" segment reported about a Sociology Ph.D. holder, Danny Bazil Riley, who soon after graduation became a general manager in a commercial real estate firm at a starting salary of $70,000 a year. Even when a financial planner left information about employer-provided insurance benefits at his desk, the notion of insurance didn't catch the attention of Riley, who was 32 years old at the time.

Original Text: UPDATE 1-Fed #39;s Gramlich: Impact from costlier oil inevitable Costlier imported oil is bound to have some negative economic impact on the US economy, but it does not mean policymakers can lose sight of their long-term goal of keeping inflation under control, Federal Reserve Governor
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1- Fed #39; s Gramlich: El impacto del petróleo más caro es inevitable. Un petróleo importado más costoso seguramente tendrá algún impacto económico negativo en la economía de los EE.UU, pero eso no significa que los responsables de las políticas pueden perder de vista su objetivo a largo plazo de mantener la inflación bajo control, dice el Gobernador de la Reserva Federal.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Federal Reserve Governor, Gramlich, asserts that the financial hit from more expensive imported oil on the US economy is inescapable. However, he emphasizes that this should not distract policymakers from their pivotal long term commitment to maintain inflation stability.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Federal Reserve Governor states that it's unavoidable for a higher-priced oil import to have a detrimental effect on the US economic climate. Nonetheless, he argues that this doesn't imply that lawmakers should disregard their enduring objective of managing and suppressing inflation.

Original Text: St. John's Bans Hoops Team From Postseason (AP) AP - St. John's imposed two years of penalties on its men's basketball team Friday after an investigation revealed a former player was given cash by an athletic department employee.
Translation: St. John's Prohíbe al Equipo de Baloncesto de Postemporada (AP) AP - St. John's impuso dos años de sanciones a su equipo masculino de baloncesto el viernes, después de una investigación que reveló que un exjugador recibió dinero en efectivo de un empleado del departamento de deportes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) After discovering that a former player received money from a staff member of the athletic department, St. John's announced on Friday that their men's basketball team would face a two year ban from the postseason.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Penalties for two years have been placed on St. John's men's basketball team following an investigation that revealed an athletic department worker gave cash to a former player. This consequently resulted in a postseason ban.

Original Text: Profit Takers Ambush Treasuries  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. Treasuries turned tail on  Wednesday as recent hefty gains attracted a wave of  profit-taking in an otherwise featureless market.
Translation: Beneficiadores Emboscan los Tesoros NEW YORK (Reuters) - Los Tesoros de los EE.UU. dieron un giro el miércoles cuando las recientes ganancias considerables atrajeron una oleada de toma de beneficios en un mercado por lo demás carente de características destacables.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, U.S. Treasuries experienced a downturn as previous significant profits triggered a surge of profit-taking in a market that was otherwise unremarkable. This happened in New York, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As reported by Reuters in New York, the U.S. Treasuries on Wednesday retreated as a wave of profit-taking swept over the market, following recent large gains in a generally nondescript marketplace.

Original Text: American Home Comforts Suit European Ryder Rookies  BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - For Americans, there  is no place quite like home. Europeans, however, always seem to  enjoy the challenge of foreign lands.
Translation:
La comodidad del hogar americano se adapta a los novatos europeos de Ryder
BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - Para los estadounidenses, no hay lugar como el hogar. Sin embargo, los europeos siempre parecen disfrutar del desafío de las tierras extranjeras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - For Americans, home has a unique charm. However, Europeans consistently seem to relish the challenges presented by foreign terrains.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - There's an unparalleled appeal of home for Americans. Yet, the thrill of confronting foreign lands persistently attracts Europeans.

Original Text: Ivy product climbs in NFL If Lehman Brothers had come through for Eric Johnson, the Seahawks would be breathing easier this afternoon.
Translation: El producto de Ivy asciende en la NFL. Si Lehman Brothers hubiera respaldado a Eric Johnson, los Seahawks estarían más tranquilos esta tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If Eric Johnson had received support from Lehman Brothers, the pressure on the Seahawks would be less intense today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Seahawks could have been in a more comfortable position today if Lehman Brothers had fulfilled their obligation towards Eric Johnson.

Original Text: Security in Sudan Deteriorating, UN Official Warns Throughout November violence in Sudan increased and there has been  quot;a marked deterioration quot; in Darfur, a senior UN official told the Security Council December 7. Undersecretary-General for Political Affairs
Translation: La seguridad en Sudán se deteriora, advierte un oficial de la ONU. A lo largo de noviembre, la violencia en Sudán se incrementó y ha habido "un marcado deterioro" en Darfur, informó un alto funcionario de la ONU al Consejo de Seguridad el 7 de diciembre. Subsecretario General para Asuntos Políticos
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior UN official warned the Security Council on December 7 about the notable degradation of security in Sudan, emphasizing that violence in the region, particularly in Darfur, surged in November.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On December 7, a senior UN official cautioned the Security Council against the escalating violence in Sudan, pointing out a significant deterioration specifically in Darfur throughout November.

Original Text: U.N.: Robot Use to Surge Sevenfold by 2007 (AP) AP - The use of robots around the home to mow lawns, vacuum floors, pull guard duty and perform other chores is set to surge sevenfold by 2007, says a new U.N. survey, which credits dropping prices for the robot boom.
Translation: O.N.U.: Uso de Robots se Disparará Siete Veces para el 2007 (AP) AP - El uso de robots en el hogar para cortar césped, aspirar pisos, hacer guardia y realizar otras tareas está a punto de aumentar siete veces para el 2007, dice una nueva encuesta de la O.N.U., que atribuye la caída de precios al auge de los robots.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) According to a new survey from the U.N., the utilization of robots for domestic chores like mowing lawns, vacuuming floors, security monitoring, and other tasks, is predicted to increase by a multiple of seven by 2007 due to falling prices, leading to a boom in the robot industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The U.N. has forecasted a drastic sevenfold rise in the home usage of robots for tasks such as lawn mowing, floor vacuuming, security duties, and other jobs by 2007, according to a recent survey. This surge in robot usage is attributed to the decline in cost, says the Associated Press (AP).

Original Text: Costs Rise, Profit Falls at Cingular (Reuters) Reuters - Mobile service provider Cingular\Wireless, which is buying AT T Wireless Services  Inc. ,\said on Wednesday its third-quarter operating profit fell as\its costs rose.
Translation: Aumentan los Costos, Cae la Ganancia en Cingular (Reuters) Reuters - El proveedor de servicio móvil Cingular Wireless, que está comprando AT T Wireless Services Inc., dijo el miércoles que su ganancia operativa del tercer trimestre cayó a medida que sus costos aumentaron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - Cingular Wireless, a mobile service provider in the process of acquiring AT&T Wireless Services Inc., reported a fall in their third-quarter operating profit on Wednesday, attributing it to rising costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - Due to increasing costs, mobile service provider Cingular Wireless, currently buying AT&T Wireless Services Inc., witnessed a drop in its third-quarter operating income on Wednesday.

Original Text: Zorilla, St. John's Prep beat Central to the pounce Travis Zorilla recovered two first-half fumbles that led to touchdowns, helping St. John's Prep defeat Central Catholic, 21-14, in a nonleague game in Danvers yesterday.
Translation: Zorilla, St. John's Prep vence a Central en el ataque. Travis Zorilla se recuperó de dos balones perdidos en la primera mitad que llevaron a touchdowns, ayudando a St. John's Prep a derrotar a Central Catholic, 21-14, en un juego fuera de liga en Danvers ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday in Danvers, during a nonleague game, St. John's Prep triumphed over Central Catholic with a score of 21-14, largely thanks to Travis Zorilla - who recovered two fumbles in the first half that resulted in touchdowns.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Two first-half fumbles recovered by Travis Zorilla, leading to touchdowns, assisted St. John's Prep in a 21-14 victory against Central Catholic in a nonleague game in Danvers yesterday.

Original Text: Bush Prepares for Possible GPS Shutdown (AP) AP - President Bush has ordered plans for temporarily disabling the U.S. network of global positioning satellites during a national crisis to prevent terrorists from using the navigational technology, the White House said Wednesday.
Translation: Bush se prepara para un posible apagón GPS (AP) AP - El presidente Bush ha ordenado planes para desactivar temporalmente la red estadounidense de satélites de posicionamiento global durante una crisis nacional para evitar que los terroristas utilicen la tecnología de navegación, dijo la Casa Blanca el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. President Bush Orders Preparations for Potential GPS Shutdown in Case of National Crisis (AP) - According to the White House on Wednesday, President Bush has issued directions for the temporary shutdown of the U.S. Global Positioning Satellites network to halt any possible utilization of the navigational technology by terrorists during a national emergency.
Paraphrase 2: 2. U.S. Prepared for Possible GPS Shutdown Under Bush's Order (AP) - The White House stated on Wednesday that President Bush has ordered for the plans for the potential temporary disabling of the U.S. global positioning satellites in case of a national crisis. The aim is to stop any terrorists from taking advantage of the navigational technology.

Original Text: No. 1 Wake Forest 99, Yale 72 Chris Paul, Eric Williams and Kyle Visser each scored 15 points to lead the Demon Deacons past Yale 99-72 Monday night. Chris Ellis added 14 points for Wake Forest (3-0), which had five players in double figures.
Translation: No. 1 Wake Forest 99, Yale 72 Chris Paul, Eric Williams y Kyle Visser anotaron cada uno 15 puntos para liderar a los Demon Deacons en su victoria contra Yale 99-72 la noche del lunes. Chris Ellis agregó 14 puntos para Wake Forest (3-0), que tuvo cinco jugadores con puntuaciones de dos dígitos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Monday night, Wake Forest, lead by Chris Paul, Eric Williams, and Kyle Visser who all scored 15 points apiece, bested Yale 99-72. This victory was enhanced by Chris Ellis who contributed an additional 14 points for Wake Forest that now stands at 3-0 and featured five of their players scoring in double figures.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Demon Deacons led by the trio of Chris Paul, Eric Williams, and Kyle Visser, each with 15 points, defeated Yale 99-72 on Monday evening. Chris Ellis chipped in with 14 points for the unbeaten Wake Forest (3-0), marking the game with five players recording double-digit scores.

Original Text: Lucas released from hospital KIRKLAND -- Ken Lucas returned to Seattle late yesterday after spending Sunday night in a Bay Area hospital because of a bruised lung.
Translation: Lucas sale del hospital KIRKLAND -- Ken Lucas regresó a Seattle ayer por la noche después de pasar la noche del domingo en un hospital del área de la Bahía debido a un pulmón magullado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. KIRKLAND -- Having spent Sunday night in a Bay Area hospital due to a bruised lung, Ken Lucas was discharged and made his way back to Seattle late yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. KIRKLAND -- After an overnight stay at a Bay Area hospital treating a bruised lung, Ken Lucas was discharged and came back to Seattle late on the previous day.

Original Text: Reversal of fortune: Upon review, go ATHENS - Aaron Peirsol was reminded last night of a lesson he probably learned as a child: It doesn #39;t pay to make the umpire angry.
Translation: Reversión de la fortuna: Tras revisión, vaya a ATENAS - Aaron Peirsol fue recordado anoche de una lección que probablemente aprendió de niño: No vale la pena enfadar al árbitro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Change in luck: Aaron Peirsol was reminded of a childhood lesson last night after a review in Athens - ruffling the umpire's feathers doesn't yield favourable outcomes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A turnaround in destiny: In Athens, upon reconsideration, Aaron Peirsol was reminded last night of a likely lesson from his younger years - provoking the umpire doesn't result in any benefits.

Original Text: Worst-jobs list makes kissing up to the boss sound fun If you #39;re sick of smooching the boss #39;s derriere, start puckering and consider yourself lucky. At least you #39;re not forced to get up close and personal with the infested hind ends of people you don #39;t know.
Translation: La lista de los peores trabajos hace que halagar al jefe suene divertido. Si estás harto de adular el trasero del jefe, comienza a hacer mohines y considérate afortunado. Al menos no estás obligado a tener un contacto directo y personal con los traseros infestados de personas que no conoces.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you find the idea of flattering the boss revolting, embrace it and feel grateful. It's certainly better than having to physically deal with the infested lower bodies of strangers - something highlighted in the list of worst jobs, making your current job sound like a joy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The list of the worst jobs casts the act of currying favor with your boss in a more agreeable light. If you are fed up with brown-nosing your boss, regard yourself as fortunate. After all, you are spared from the repugnant necessity of dealing with unknown people's infested backsides.

Original Text: Celebrating human spirit, in all its impurity What if the Olympic Games --started here 2,780 years ago, right in this fertile, ancient town in the western Peloponnesus some 200 miles from Athens -- really mean something? ...
Translation: Celebrando el espíritu humano, en toda su impureza ¿Y si los Juegos Olímpicos --que comenzaron aquí hace 2,780 años, justo en este fértil y antiguo pueblo del Peloponeso occidental a unas 200 millas de Atenas-- realmente significaran algo?...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Could it be possible that the Olympic Games - initiated here in this fertile, historical town in the western Peloponnesus, about 200 miles from Athens, around 2,780 years ago - genuinely have significance while we honor the imperfect but genuine human spirit?
Paraphrase 2: 2. What if there is greater meaning to the Olympic Games, initiated 2,780 years ago - right here in this fertile, ancient town in the western Peloponnesus, a good 200 miles from Athens - if we see it as a celebration of the imperfectly beautiful human spirit?

Original Text: Era of Dream Team terminated in Athens Twelve years after Michael Jordan, Magic Johnson and Larry Bird led the American senior basketball team to conquer the world, the era of the US Dream Team was terminated in the summer of 2004 at Athens.
Translation: La era del Dream Team terminó en Atenas doce años después de que Michael Jordan, Magic Johnson y Larry Bird lideraran al equipo senior de baloncesto estadounidense para conquistar el mundo, la era del Dream Team de los EE. UU. se terminó en el verano de 2004 en Atenas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The reign of the US Dream Team, which began twelve years earlier with the leadership of Michael Jordan, Magic Johnson, and Larry Bird, came to an end in Athens during the summer of 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The summer of 2004 in Athens marked the end of the US Dream Team's era which had been kick-started twelve years prior, under the guidance of basketball greats like Michael Jordan, Magic Johnson, and Larry Bird.

Original Text: Next generation of DVDs on track to replace today #39;s version Discs offering high-definition images using blue lasers likely will rule the market starting in 2005. By Jonathan Sidener. A pessimist might say that right about the time the last person on the planet buys
Translation: La próxima generación de DVDs en camino para reemplazar la versión actual. Los discos que ofrecen imágenes de alta definición usando láseres azules probablemente dominarán el mercado a partir de 2005. Por Jonathan Sidener. Un pesimista podría decir que justo en el momento en que la última persona en el planeta compra
Paraphrase 1: 1. It is anticipated that the future generation of DVDs, which offer high-definition images via blue lasers, will take over the current market starting 2005. This news may stir some pessimism among people lately entering the DVD ownership. Article by Jonathan Sidener.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The upcoming blue laser-based DVDs, boasting high-definition image quality, are expected to supersede those in circulation today by the year 2005. The last buyer might meet such news with a pessimistic view. Authored by Jonathan Sidener.

Original Text: Hackers reopen stolen code store with Cisco source An anonymous group of malicious hackers reopened an online store that sells the stolen source code of prominent software products and is offering the code for Ciscos PIX firewall software to interested parties for US\$24,000, according to messages
Translation: Un grupo anónimo de hackers maliciosos ha reabierto una tienda online que vende el código fuente robado de prominentes productos de software y está ofreciendo el código para el software del firewall PIX de Cisco a los interesados por unos US\$24,000, de acuerdo a los mensajes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An unidentified group of cyber hackers have relaunched an online store selling pilfered source codes of major software, now providing Cisco's PIX firewall software code at a rate of US$24,000, as stated in recent messages.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Various messages have reported that a clandestine group of hackers has resumed operations of an online shop selling purloined source codes of well-known software. Currently, they are offering the stolen source code of Cisco's PIX firewall software for US$24,000.

Original Text: Fed President Calls Oil Troublesome Record oil prices are creating headwinds for the U.S. economy but do not place its recovery at risk, Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Robert McTeer said on Monday.
Translation: El presidente de la Reserva Federal califica al petróleo como problemático. Los precios récord del petróleo están creando vientos en contra para la economía de EE.UU., pero no ponen en riesgo su recuperación, dijo el lunes el presidente del Banco de la Reserva Federal de Dallas, Robert McTeer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President, Robert McTeer, declared on Monday that despite the hindrances that rising oil prices pose for the U.S. economy, they do not threaten its recovery progress.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Robert McTeer, Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President, stated that even though record oil prices present challenges for U.S. economy, they don't jeopardise its recovery.

Original Text: U.S. Jets Pound Militant Positions in Iraq BAGHDAD, Iraq - U.S. jets pounded suspected Shiite militant positions in the Baghdad slum of Sadr City on Monday, killing at least five people and wounding 40...
Translation: Aviones estadounidenses bombardean posiciones de militantes en Irak BAGDAD, Irak - Aviones estadounidenses bombardearon posiciones sospechosas de militantes chiitas en la barriada pobre de la Ciudad Sadr en Bagdad el lunes, matando al menos a cinco personas y hiriendo a 40...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the impoverished region of Sadr City, Baghdad, Shiite militant locations were heavily bombarded by U.S. jets on Monday, resulting in at least five casualties and forty injuries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, U.S. jets carried out an aggressive strike against suspected Shiite militant hotspots in the Baghdad district of Sadr City, leading to a minimum of five deaths and forty wounded.

Original Text: EU OKs Oracle #39;s Bid for PeopleSoft The European Commission on Tuesday approved Oracle Corp. #39;s (ORCL.O: Quote, Profile, Research) proposed \$7.7 billion hostile takeover
Translation: La Comisión Europea aprueba la oferta de Oracle #39 para adquirir PeopleSoft. El martes, la Comisión Europea aprobó la propuesta de Oracle Corp. #39 (ORCL.O: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) de una adquisición hostil por \$7.7 billones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, the European Commission gave its approval to Oracle Corp's proposed hostile takeover of PeopleSoft, valued at $7.7 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The European Commission sanctioned Oracle Corp's aggressive bid for PeopleSoft, which is estimated to be $7.7 billion, on Tuesday.

Original Text: Microsoft Increases Focus on Entertainment Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) unveiled the latest version of its entertainment-focused operating system Tuesday, seeking a broader audience on a wider array of computers and stoked by partnerships offering music, movies and even recorded books.
Translation: Microsoft Incrementa Enfoque en Entretenimiento Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) presentó la última versión de su sistema operativo enfocado en entretenimiento el martes, buscando un público más amplio en una gama más amplia de computadoras y estimulado por asociaciones que ofrecen música, películas e incluso libros grabados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) announced the new version of its entertainment-centered operating system on Tuesday with an aim to reach out to a broader audience on an extended range of computers. The move is inspired by collaborations that offer music, movies, and audio books.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) revealed an updated version of its operating system, primarily designed for entertainment. The aim is to capture greater market share across various computing platforms, driven by partnerships that provide music, films, and even audio books.

Original Text: Clorox Investors Cheer, Customers Sigh  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Clorox Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CLX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CLX.N</A> gave investors  reason to cheer on Thursday, saying its recent deals with  Germany's Henkel KGaA <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HNKG.DE target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HNKG.DE</A> would help earnings more than  it first thought and that Procter   Gamble is doubling its  stake in their joint venture, sending the shares up 2 percent.
Translation: Inversores de Clorox aplauden, clientes suspiran NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Clorox Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CLX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CLX.N</A> dio a los inversores una razón para aplaudir el jueves, diciendo que sus recientes acuerdos con Henkel KGaA de Alemania <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HNKG.DE target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HNKG.DE</A> ayudarían a las ganancias más de lo que se pensaba inicialmente y que Procter & Gamble está duplicando su participación en su empresa conjunta, enviando las acciones al alza de 2 por ciento.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK (Reuters) - Clorox Co. delighted its investors on Thursday by declaring that its recent transactions with Germany's Henkel KGaA will boost earnings more than initially anticipated. Furthermore, Procter & Gamble is expanding its stake in their collaborative project, leading to a 2 percent increase in share value, much to the investors' delight but not so much to the customers' delight.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In New York, Reuters reported that Clorox Co. gave its investors a reason to celebrate on Thursday. The company announced better-than-expected earnings from its recent agreements with Germany's Henkel KGaA. Adding to the good news, Procter & Gamble is planning to double its share in their shared venture, resulting in a 2 percent rise in shares, much to the investors' pleasure and the consumers' disappointment.

Original Text: Young French woman murdered in London park LONDON, Aug 21 (AFP) - A young Frenchwoman has been bludgeoned to death with a blunt instrument in a park on the outskirts of London and police do not rule out that she was the victim of an unknown serial killer, they said Saturday.
Translation: Joven mujer francesa asesinada en parque de Londres LONDRES, 21 de agosto (AFP) - Una joven francesa ha sido golpeada hasta la muerte con un instrumento contundente en un parque en las afueras de Londres y la policía no descarta que ella fuera la víctima de un asesino en serie desconocido, dijeron el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A young female from France was brutally killed with a blunt object in a suburban park of London, authorities revealed on Saturday. They did not dismiss the possibility that an undiscovered serial killer may be responsible for her death.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On the fringes of London, in a park, a young woman of French origin was violently slain with an unsharp weapon. The police, on Saturday, mentioned that the attacker could potentially be a previously undetected serial killer.

Original Text: China calls on World Bank to help small cotton producers hit by <b>...</b> GENEVA : China called on the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) to help small textile and clothing exporting countries that are threatened by the end of import quotas at the end of the year.
Translation: China solicita al Banco Mundial que ayude a los pequeños productores de algodón afectados por <b>...</b> GINEBRA: China pidió al Banco Mundial y al Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI) que ayuden a los pequeños países exportadores de textiles y ropa que están amenazados por el fin de las cuotas de importación a fin de año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. China urges the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) to assist minor textile and clothing exporting countries, which are facing a threat due to the discontinuation of import quotas by year's end.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It's an appeal from China to the World Bank and IMF, requesting their help for the smaller textile and clothing exporting countries, which are endangered by the upcoming termination of import quotas at the year's end.

Original Text: Crude futures continue freefall, with prices at seven-week lows? <b>...</b> Crude oil futures continued to plummet Wednesday on the belief that fuel supplies in the United States will be adequate to deal with its coming winter.
Translation: Los futuros del petróleo crudo continúan en caída libre, con precios en mínimos de siete semanas. <b>...</b> Los futuros del petróleo crudo continuaron desplomándose el miércoles ante la creencia de que las reservas de combustible en los Estados Unidos serán suficientes para hacer frente al próximo invierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The continuing plunge of crude futures is reflected in the seven-week low of prices. This is due to the perception on Wednesday that the United States has sufficient fuel supplies to endure the approaching winter months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Witnessing a persistent decline, crude futures hit a seven-week price low. This follows Wednesday's speculation about the United States maintaining ample fuel resources to tackle the incoming winter.

Original Text: Germany: A Brighter Sun In The East (BusinessWeek Online) BusinessWeek Online - The jubilation that swept East Germany after the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989 long ago gave way to the sober reality of globalization and market forces. Now a decade of resentment seems to be boiling over. In Eastern cities such as Leipzig or Chemnitz, thousands have taken to the streets since July to protest cuts in unemployment benefits, the main source of livelihood for 1.6 million East Germans. Discontent among reunification's losers fueled big gains by the far left and far right in Brandenburg and Saxony state elections Sept. 19. ...
Translation: Alemania: Un Sol Más Brillante en el Este (BusinessWeek Online) BusinessWeek Online - La jubilación que barrió Alemania Oriental después de la caída del Muro de Berlín en 1989 hace mucho tiempo dio paso a la sobria realidad de la globalización y las fuerzas del mercado. Ahora parece que una década de resentimiento está llegando a su punto de ebullición. En ciudades del Este como Leipzig o Chemnitz, miles de personas han salido a las calles desde julio para protestar por los recortes en los beneficios de desempleo, la principal fuente de sustento para 1.6 millones de alemanes orientales. El descontento entre los perdedores de la reunificación alimentó grandes avances de la extrema izquierda y la extrema derecha en las elecciones estatales de Brandenburgo y Sajonia el 19 de septiembre. ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. BusinessWeek Online reports on the brewing frustration in East Germany, where jubilation post the 1989 Berlin Wall fall has been replaced by the harsh realities of globalization and market dynamics. Tension has been building for a decade, reaching a boiling point recently with protests erupting in Eastern cities like Leipzig and Chemnitz as thousands take a stand against cuts in unemployment welfare – the principal income for 1.6 million East Germans. The growing dissatisfaction among those negatively impacted by reunification has significantly boosted the far left and far right in the state elections of Brandenburg and Saxony that took place on September 19. ...
Paraphrase 2: 2. The initial elation of the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989 in East Germany has been tempered by the stern reality of globalization and market forces as reported by BusinessWeek Online. Following ten years of accumulating resentment, public outrage has escalated with thousands in Eastern cities such as Leipzig and Chemnitz, rallying against unemployment benefits cuts - a critical financial cushion for 1.6 million East Germans. This public disillusionment has led to a surge in support for the extreme left and right in recent state elections within Brandenburg and Saxony, held on September 19. ...

Original Text: Continental adds fees to some ticket purchases Continental Airlines said Wednesday that it was joining other US carriers in imposing new fees on tickets bought at US airport counters and reservation centers.
Translation: Continental agrega tarifas a algunas compras de boletos. Continental Airlines dijo el miércoles que se unía a otras aerolíneas estadounidenses para imponer nuevas tarifas en los boletos comprados en los mostradores de aeropuertos de los Estados Unidos y centros de reservas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Continental Airlines declared that they will impose new charges on tickets purchased at US airport counters and reservation centers, following the trend of other US airlines.

Original Text: UK unemployment total falls again UK unemployment fell by 67,000 in the three months to September to 1.38 million, official figures show.
Translation: La cantidad total de desempleados en el Reino Unido vuelve a disminuir. El desempleo en el Reino Unido cayó en 67,000 en los tres meses hasta septiembre, alcanzando 1.38 millones, según muestran las cifras oficiales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Official data reveals a decline in UK unemployment, with a drop of 67,000 in the three months up to September, bringing the total to 1.38 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The total number of unemployed individuals in the UK dropped by 67,000 from June to September, reducing the total to 1.38 million, according to government statistics.

Original Text: EMC Expands NAS Offerings EMC (Quote, Chart) is expanding its network-attached storage (NAS) offerings with two new midrange options and a high-end product.
Translation: EMC Amplía Ofertas de NAS: EMC (Cotización, Gráfico) está expandiendo sus ofertas de almacenamiento conectado a la red (NAS) con dos nuevas opciones de gama media y un producto de alta gama.
Paraphrase 1: 1. EMC (Quote, Chart) is augmenting their network-attached storage (NAS) offerings by introducing two new midrange options along with a premium product.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Two new midrange options and a high-end product are being added by EMC (Quote, Chart) to bolster their network-attached storage (NAS) offerings.

Original Text: American says US backed his jail KABUL, Afghanistan -- Jonathan Keith Idema, an American accused of running a freelance antiterror operation and private prison in Afghanistan, testified in court yesterday that he could prove US and Afghan authorities were fully aware of his actions, and he accused the FBI of confiscating evidence that would support his contention.
Translation: El estadounidense dice que EE.UU. apoyó su encarcelamiento KABUL, Afganistán -- Jonathan Keith Idema, un estadounidense acusado de dirigir una operación antiterrorista independiente y una prisión privada en Afganistán, testificó en la corte ayer diciendo que podría demostrar que las autoridades estadounidenses y afganas estaban plenamente conscientes de sus acciones, y acusó al FBI de confiscar pruebas que respaldarían su afirmación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. KABUL, Afghanistan - In yesterday's court hearing, Jonathan Keith Idema, an American alleged to have been operating a private antiterrorist initiative and personal jailhouse in Afghanistan, stated his activities were known to both US and Afghan authorities. He also argued that evidence confirming his claims was seized by the FBI.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jonathan Keith Idema, an American citizen who stood accused in a Kabul court yesterday, has claimed to have proof that his alleged independent antiterrorism operation and private prison in Afghanistan were authorized by both American and Afghan authorities. Furthermore, Idema accused the FBI of having taken the evidence that could substantiate his claim.

Original Text: Chirac Says Iraq War Created More Dangerous World Last year #39;s US-led invasion of Iraq and ousting of President Saddam Hussein has made the world more dangerous, French President Jacques Chirac said on the eve of a state visit to key US ally Britain.
Translation: Chirac dice que la guerra en Irak creó un mundo más peligroso. La invasión liderada por Estados Unidos en Irak el año pasado y el derrocamiento del presidente Saddam Hussein han hecho al mundo más peligroso, dijo el presidente francés Jacques Chirac en la víspera de una visita de Estado al principal aliado de Estados Unidos, Gran Bretaña.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "The world has become more dangerous due to last year's US-led invasion of Iraq and the subsequent removal of President Saddam Hussein," declared French President Jacques Chirac on the eve of his state visit to the key US ally, Britain.

Original Text: Home wreckers Religious leaders prayed for the Red Sox to reach baseball's promised land. The mayor appealed for divine intervention. Even comic Jim Dunn led the congregants at the Comedy Connection last night in a prayer service.
Translation: Los destructores de hogares, líderes religiosos, rezaron para que los Red Sox alcanzaran la tierra prometida del béisbol. El alcalde apeló a la intervención divina. Incluso el comediante Jim Dunn dirigió a los congregantes en el Comedy Connection anoche en un servicio de oración.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Religious leaders prayed for the Boston Red Sox to be led to the zenith of baseball, while the mayor sought heavenly interference. Moreover, at the Comedy Connection last night, Jim Dunn, the comedian, guided the audience in a prayer service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Divine guidance for the Red Sox's ascension to the pinnacle of baseball was sought after not only by religious heads but also by the mayor. Furthermore, during last night's event at the Comedy Connection, comedian Jim Dunn led the congregation in a prayer service.

Original Text: Several Mass. Communities Eye Wind Power (AP) AP - Wind power projects are in various stages around the state, from the Atlantic coast in the east to the wooded slopes of the Berkshire Mountains in the west, gigantic towers whose hurtling blades are designed to create clean energy.
Translation: Varias comunidades de Mass. consideran la energía eólica (AP) AP - Los proyectos de energía eólica se encuentran en diversas etapas alrededor del estado, desde la costa atlántica en el este hasta las pendientes boscosas de las montañas Berkshire en el oeste, gigantescas torres cuyas aspas giran rápidamente están diseñadas para crear energía limpia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - Wind power initiatives, ranging from the state's Atlantic coast in the east to the forested slopes of the Berkshire Mountains in the west, are being considered by different communities in Massachusetts. These colossal towers with fast-moving blades aim to generate sustainable energy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Across Massachusetts, many communities are exploring the use of wind power. There are several projects in progress from the eastern seaboard to the forest-ridden slopes of the Berkshire Mountains on the western side. The main purpose of these giant towers with rapidly spinning blades is to produce eco-friendly energy. (AP)

Original Text: Edward C. Baig: Personal Tech - Family tree research can be addictive fun (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - Family tree research can be addictive fun. With my long-lost relative's assistance, help from closer kin and the latest version of Family Tree Maker software, I've been identifying the branches of a Baig family tree.
Translation: Edward C. Baig: Tecnología Personal - La investigación del árbol genealógico puede ser una diversión adictiva (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - La investigación del árbol genealógico puede ser una diversión adictiva. Con la asistencia de mi pariente perdido hace mucho tiempo, ayuda de parientes más cercanos y la última versión del software Family Tree Maker, he estado identificando las ramas de un árbol genealógico de la familia Baig.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Edward C. Baig: Personal Tech (USATODAY.com) - Exploring one's family history through tree research can be captivating and enjoyable. Assisted by a distant relative, along with the aid of my immediate family members and the newest edition of Family Tree Maker software, I have been discovering the different branches of the Baig family tree.
Paraphrase 2: 2. USATODAY.com: Personal Tech by Edward C. Baig - Delving into your ancestry through family tree research can be an enthralling pastime. I've been unravelling the lines of the Baig family tree, thanks to the support from a long-lost kinsman, closer relatives, and the newest update of the Family Tree Maker software.

Original Text: Iran agrees to full uranium enrichment freeze, diplomats say Just a day before an international deadline, Iran agreed Sunday not to test any centrifuges as part of a total suspension of nuclear activities that can yield uranium for atomic weapons.
Translation: Irán accede a congelar completamente el enriquecimiento de uranio, dicen los diplomáticos. Justo un día antes de una fecha límite internacional, Irán acordó el domingo no probar ninguna centrífuga como parte de una suspensión total de las actividades nucleares que pueden producir uranio para armas atómicas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Diplomats announced that Iran has consented to a complete halt of uranium enrichment just a day before an international deadline; Iran committed not to test any centrifuges on Sunday as part of a comprehensive cessation of nuclear activities that can produce uranium for nuclear weapons.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On the eve of an international deadline, Iran signified agreement to stop all uranium enrichment, including the testing of centrifuges, as part of a broad suspension of any nuclear activities that could generate atomic weapon-grade uranium, according to diplomatic sources.

Original Text: EU judge on Microsoft - one month until ruling A European Union judge told a closed meeting on Thursday he plans to rule within a month whether to freeze curbs imposed by the EU #39;s executive on Microsoft, lawyers present said.
Translation: Juez de la UE sobre Microsoft - un mes hasta la sentencia. Un juez de la Unión Europea informó en una reunión privada el jueves que planea dictaminar en un mes si congela las restricciones impuestas por el ejecutivo de la UE a Microsoft, según declararon los abogados presentes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At a confidential gathering on Thursday, a European Union judge shared his intention to decide within a month on whether to suspend the restrictions the EU's executive branch has placed on Microsoft, according to the lawyers present.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lawyers stated that, during a private meeting on Thursday, a judge from the European Union announced plans to make a ruling within the next month on the potential suspension of EU executive's sanctions on Microsoft.

Original Text: Siege at Russian School Over, At least 100 Dead The hostage crisis at a school in southern Russian has ended, after a daylong battle between militants and authorities that left at least 100 people dead, many of them children, and hundreds more wounded.
Translation: Sitio en Escuela Rusa Terminado, Al Menos 100 Muertos. La crisis de rehenes en una escuela al sur de Rusia ha terminado, después de una batalla que duró todo el día entre militantes y autoridades que dejó al menos 100 personas muertas, muchas de ellas niños, y cientos más heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The hostage situation at a southern Russian school, which involved a day-long conflict between militants and officials leading to a minimum of 100 casualties, predominantly children, and numerous injuries, has ultimately been resolved.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After a day of violent confrontation between militants and authorities in a school in Southern Russia, the hostage situation has come to a close with a tragic loss of at least 100 lives, a significant number of them being children, and several hundred more wounded.

Original Text: Chiefs Trim Roster to 53 (AP) AP - The Kansas City Chiefs terminated the contract of kicker Morten Andersen and put middle linebacker Mike Maslowski on injured reserve Sunday.
Translation: Los Chiefs Recortan la Plantilla a 53 (AP) AP - Los Kansas City Chiefs terminaron el contrato del pateador Morten Andersen y colocaron al linebacker central Mike Maslowski en reserva por lesión el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) The Kansas City Chiefs, aiming to reduce their team size to 53, decided to end the contract with kicker Morten Andersen and shifted middle linebacker Mike Maslowski to the injured reserve list on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Kansas City Chiefs ended their relationship with kicker Morten Andersen and transferred middle linebacker Mike Maslowski to the injured reserve on Sunday in an effort to cut down their roster to 53, as per AP reports.

Original Text: Ireland 55 - 6 USA When the public address announcement at Lansdowne Road yesterday put the attendance at 38,376 there was an addendum: thanking those hardy souls for turning out on such a foul day.
Translation: Irlanda 55 - 6 EE. UU. Cuando el anuncio de la dirección pública en Lansdowne Road ayer puso la asistencia en 38,376, hubo un añadido: agradeciendo a esas almas valientes por aparecer en un día tan horrible.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday at Lansdowne Road, despite the poor weather, the public address announcer thank the devoted audience of 38,376 for their attendance as he reported the impressive score of Ireland 55 - 6 USA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the public address system at Lansdowne Road yesterday, an appreciative note was shared for the resilient 38,376 spectators who braved the horrendous weather to witness Ireland's dominant victory of 55 - 6 over the USA.

Original Text: Yanks May Have to Pay to Send Giambi Away Even though the Yankees are trying to develop a case against Jason Giambi, they are skeptical about ever getting his contract voided.
Translation: Los Yankees Pueden Tener que Pagar para Deshacerse de Giambi Aunque los Yankees están intentando armar un caso contra Jason Giambi, son escépticos sobre lograr anular su contrato.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the Yankees' efforts to build a case against Jason Giambi, they remain doubtful about the possibility of annulling his contract, implying that they may have to compensate him to leave.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Yankees, while working on a case against Jason Giambi, are not confident in their ability to reject his contract, indicating they might need to make payments in order to dismiss him.
