Original Text: Dallas Mavericks Team Report - December 10 (Sports Network) - The Dallas Mavericks were knocked off by the Seattle SuperSonics, 107-102, at American Airlines Center. Dirk Nowitzki tallied 27 points and seven rebounds for the Mavs, who have dropped two of three.
Translation: Informe del Equipo Dallas Mavericks - 10 de diciembre (Sports Network) - Los Dallas Mavericks fueron derrotados por los Seattle SuperSonics, 107-102, en el American Airlines Center. Dirk Nowitzki anotó 27 puntos y logró siete rebotes para los Mavs, quienes han perdido dos de tres partidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On December 10, the Seattle SuperSonics defeated the Dallas Mavericks with a score of 107-102 at the American Airlines Center, as reported by the Sports Network. Despite Dirk Nowitzki's impressive performance bagging 27 points and seven rebounds, the Mavs underwent a downfall, having lost two of their last three games.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As per the Sports Network team report dated the 10th of December, the Dallas Mavericks suffered a setback against the Seattle SuperSonics, who conquered them 107-102 at the American Airlines Center. Noteworthy was Dirk Nowitzki's contribution of 27 points and seven rebounds for the Mavs, although they have seen two losses in their last three games.

Original Text: Lots Of Interest in Lucene Desktop \\I've made a few passive mentions of my Lucene  Desktop prototype here on\PeerFear in the last few days and I'm amazed how much feedback I've had.  People\really want to start work on an Open Source desktop search based on Lucene.\\* Current Status *\\I have a prototype implemented that runs from the console and accepts a given\directory to index and writes it to /.lucene-desktop.  It then has a console\searcher that returns the output in grep format:\\file:rank\\I'm trying to get keyword in context to work but I haven't had a chance to hack\on this recently.  I need another 30 minutes to integrate the Lucene Highlighter\and then I should be done.\\At this point I will return:\\file:rank:hit ...\\
Translation: Mucho interés en Lucene Desktop \\He hecho algunas menciones pasivas de mi prototipo de Lucene Desktop aquí en\PeerFear en los últimos días y estoy asombrado de cuánto feedback he recibido. Las personas\realmente quieren empezar a trabajar en una búsqueda en el escritorio de código abierto basada en Lucene.\\* Estado actual *\\Tengo un prototipo implementado que se ejecuta desde la consola y acepta un directorio dado para indexar y lo escribe en /.lucene-desktop. Luego tiene un buscador de consola que devuelve la salida en formato grep:\\archivo:puntuación\\Estoy intentando hacer que las palabras clave en contexto funcionen, pero no he tenido la oportunidad de hackear\en esto recientemente. Necesito otros 30 minutos para integrar el Highlighter de Lucene\y luego debería haber terminado.\\En este punto devolveré:\\archivo:puntuación:aciertos ...\\
Paraphrase 1: During the past few days on PeerFear, I've casually highlighted my Lucene Desktop prototype, and to my surprise, the level of feedback has been incredible. There's a palpable enthusiasm for initiating the development of an Open Source desktop search founded on Lucene. Regarding its current state, I have a functioning prototype that operates from the console by indexing a specified directory and recording it to /.lucene-desktop. It even features a console searcher that outputs the results in grep format. My struggle at the moment lies in integrating keyword context, as I haven't had much time. An approximation of an additional half hour should, however, suffice to amalgamate the Lucene Highlighter and complete the task. The outcome then should be: file: rank: hit.
Paraphrase 2: In recent discussions on PeerFear about my Lucene Desktop prototype, I've subtly slipped in mentions, unexpectedly receiving a substantial amount of feedback. This indicates a major interest by individuals to commence the creation of an Open Source desktop search solution fueled by Lucene. As for its present condition, the prototype can run from the console, accept a directory to index, and record it in /.lucene-desktop. It also provides a console searcher, rendering the output in grep format. Getting the keyword-in-context feature operational has been challenging due to time constraints, but with an estimated extra 30 minutes, I can successfully incorporate the Lucene Highlighter and wrap things up. This will result in: file: rank: hit.

Original Text: China mine blast toll rises to 33 as inspection drive announced (AFP) AFP - The death toll from an explosion at a coal mine in central China has risen to 33 with six injured, as authorities announced plans for an inspection drive in a bid to improve shockingly low safety standards in the nation's mines.
Translation: Sube a 33 el recuento de fallecidos en la explosión de una mina en China mientras se anuncia una campaña de inspección (AFP) AFP - El número de muertos por una explosión en una mina de carbón en el centro de China ha aumentado a 33 con seis heridos, mientras las autoridades anuncian planes para una campaña de inspección en un intento de mejorar los sorprendentemente bajos estándares de seguridad en las minas de la nación.
Paraphrase 1: 1) An explosion at a central China coal mine has tragically claimed 33 lives and left six injured. In response to the poor safety standards exposed by the disaster, authorities have revealed plans for a nation-wide inspection drive.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The fatal explosion in a Chinese coal mine has seen the death count escalate to 33, with six individuals injured. The shockingly low mine safety standards have prompted authorities to initiate a comprehensive inspection drive across China's mines.

Original Text: Poulter celebrates at Valderrama Ian Poulter captured the Volvo Masters at Valderrama with a play-off victory against local favourite Sergio Garcia. Alistair Forsyth, three strokes ahead overnight, bogeyed the first two and was caught by an early Poulter birdie.
Translation: Poulter celebra en Valderrama. Ian Poulter se llevó los Masters de Volvo en Valderrama con una victoria en el desempate contra el favorito local, Sergio García. Alistair Forsyth, quien tenía tres golpes de ventaja durante la noche, hizo bogey en los dos primeros hoyos y fue alcanzado por un temprano birdie de Poulter.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With a play-off victory over local favourite Sergio Garcia, Ian Poulter captured the Volvo Masters at Valderrama and celebrated his triumph. Earlier, Alistair Forsyth, who had a three-stroke lead, faltered with bogeys in the first two rounds, which allowed Poulter to catch up with an early birdie.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ian Poulter clinched a victory at the Volvo Masters at Valderrama, defeating local favourite Sergio Garcia in a play-off. He rejoiced his triumph while Alistair Forsyth, leading by three strokes at the beginning, lost his advantage when he bogeyed the initial two rounds, enabling Poulter to level up with an early birdie.

Original Text: Weis signs a six-year contract at Notre Dame Patriots offensive coordinator Charlie Weis touched down in South Bend, Ind., last night and met with his new team, the Fighting Irish of Notre Dame.
Translation: Weis firma un contrato de seis años con Notre Dame. El coordinador ofensivo de los Patriots, Charlie Weis, aterrizó anoche en South Bend, Ind., y se reunió con su nuevo equipo, los Fighting Irish de Notre Dame.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Charlie Weis, the offensive coordinator of the Patriots, landed in South Bend, Indiana last night where he met his new team, the Fighting Irish of Notre Dame. In addition, he has signed a six-year contract with Notre Dame.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Offensively coordinating for the Patriots, Charlie Weis secured a six-year contract at Notre Dame. As he arrived in South Bend, Indiana last night, he was acquainted with his new team - The Fighting Irish of Notre Dame.

Original Text: Checking system going all-electronic Changes are bringing Americans closer to a checkless society -- changes that could be costly if you aren #39;t careful. The first checks in the United States were
Translation: Revisando el sistema de completo electrónico - los cambios están acercando a los estadounidenses a una sociedad sin cheques, cambios que podrían ser costosos si no tienes cuidado. Los primeros cheques en los Estados Unidos fueron
Paraphrase 1: 1. The transition to a completely electronic checking system is ushering Americans into a society that doesn't rely on checks. However, if one is not careful, this shift could have substantial costs. The United States saw the inception of checks...
Paraphrase 2: 2. America is progressing towards a society without checks due to changes like the checking system becoming entirely electronic. These transformations could, however, prove to be expensive if not handled cautiously. Checks first appeared in the United States...

Original Text: Health Insurance Stocks Climb in Trading Health insurance stocks spiked in trading Tuesday after California Insurance Commissioner John Garamendi withdrew his opposition to the merger between WellPoint Health Networks Inc.
Translation: Las acciones de seguros de salud suben en la negociación. Las acciones de los seguros de salud se dispararon en las negociaciones del martes después de que el Comisionado de Seguros de California, John Garamendi, retiró su oposición a la fusión entre WellPoint Health Networks Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Health insurance stocks experienced a surge in the trading session on Tuesday after John Garamendi, the California Insurance Commissioner, removed his resistance against the merger between WellPoint Health Networks Inc.

Original Text: Dawn of man was a lousy day Scientists took a fresh look at human evolution through tiny hitchhikers that have clung to humans and their relatives for centuries - lice.
Translation: El amanecer del hombre fue un día pésimo. Los científicos echaron una nueva mirada a la evolución humana a través de diminutos polizones que se han aferrado a los humanos y sus parientes durante siglos: los piojos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scientists have started reassessing human evolution by studying minuscule parasites, lice, which have been attached to humans and their kin for hundreds of years. This throws a new light on the dawn of man, which wasn't as pleasant as expected.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By investigating lice, tiny creatures that have adhered to humans and their ancestors throughout the ages, researchers are offering a new perspective on human evolution, demystifying the dawn of man as a rather unpleasant period.

Original Text: Florida #39;s fiscal shape helps cushion Charley #39;s hit WASHINGTON, Aug 17 (Reuters) - Hurricane Charley may have caused up to \$15 billion in damage in Florida, but that is not seen immediately hurting the state #39;s credit picture thanks to strong finances and funds in reserve, analysts said ...
Translation: La solidez fiscal de Florida ayuda a amortiguar el golpe de Charley WASHINGTON, 17 de agosto (Reuters) - El huracán Charley pudo haber causado hasta \$15 mil millones en daños en Florida, pero no se prevé que esto afecte inmediatamente la imagen crediticia del estado gracias a sus fuertes finanzas y fondos en reserva, dijeron los analistas ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts report that despite Hurricane Charley possibly causing up to $15 billion in damages in Florida, it does not immediately impact the state's credit scenario due to their stable finances and reserve funds - WASHINGTON, Aug 17 (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the potential $15 billion damage brought by Hurricane Charley in Florida, the state's credit situation remains unharmed, mainly due to its robust finances and backup funds - WASHINGTON, August 17 (Reuters), say analysts.

Original Text: Iran say IAEA resolution political Iran Saturday blasted a resolution by the Board of Governors of the International Atomic Energy Agency on Iran #39;s nuclear program as a political one.
Translation: Irán califica la resolución de la OIEA como política. El sábado, Irán criticó fuertemente una resolución de la Junta de Gobernadores de la Agencia Internacional de Energía Atómica sobre el programa nuclear de Irán, calificándola como una resolución política.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Iran harshly criticized a resolution from the International Atomic Energy Agency's Board of Governors on its nuclear program as being politically motivated on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Saturday, Iran strongly condemned a resolution by the International Atomic Energy Agency's Board of Governors concerning its nuclear program, labeling it as political.

Original Text: Air crash into lake kills all 53 on board BEIJING -- A small passenger plane carrying 53 people crashed today in a northern lake immediately after takeoff, and the government said there were no survivors. The plane crashed into a frozen lake in Baotou, a city about 330 miles northwest of Beijing, seconds after taking off at about 8:20 a.m., the official Xinhua News Agency said. The China Eastern ...
Translation: El accidente aéreo en el lago mata a las 53 personas a bordo PEKÍN -- Un pequeño avión de pasajeros que transportaba a 53 personas se estrelló hoy en un lago del norte inmediatamente después del despegue, y el gobierno afirmó que no hubo supervivientes. El avión se estrelló en un lago congelado en Baotou, una ciudad situada a unos 530 kilómetros al noroeste de Pekín, segundos después de despegar alrededor de las 8:20 a.m., informó la agencia de noticias oficial Xinhua. La compañía China Eastern ...
Paraphrase 1: 1) BEIJING -- The government has announced that all 53 passengers aboard a small passenger plane have died after the aircraft plummeted into a lake moments following takeoff. The catastrophe occurred at approximately 8:20 a.m., a mere seconds after the plane left the ground at Baotou, a city placed around 330 miles northwest of Beijing. The demise of the China Eastern took place over a frozen lake, as informed by Xinhua News Agency.
Paraphrase 2: 2) BEIJING -- Today, a devastating air accident happened when a small passenger plane, carrying 53 people, nosedived into a frozen lake in Baotou, a city roughly 330 miles northwest of Beijing, instantly killing all aboard. The official Xinhua News Agency stated that the plane, a China Eastern device, had only been airborne for several seconds following its 8:20 a.m. takeoff before the tragic crash occurred. The government has confirmed no survivors.

Original Text: CNNfn going off the air CNN has reported plans to shut down its CNNfn network in mid-December, cutting 60 jobs in the process. Some of the financial news network #39;s programming will shift over to CNN.
Translation: CNNfn se va del aire, CNN ha informado planes para cerrar su red CNNfn a mediados de diciembre, eliminando 60 empleos en el proceso. Parte de la programación de la red de noticias financieras se trasladará a CNN.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CNN has announced that they will be discontinuing the CNNfn network in the middle of December, which will result in a loss of 60 positions. The financial news network's programming will partially move to CNN.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The CNNfn network, owned by CNN, is scheduled for discontinuation in mid-December, leading to the termination of 60 jobs. Consequently, CNN will incorporate some of CNNfn's programming into its own schedule.

Original Text: Payless Sales Drop, President Exits  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Footwear chain Payless ShoeSource Inc.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSS.N</A> on Thursday posted worse-than-expected sales at stores  open at least a year in August and said its president, Duane  Cantrell, will step down effective immediately, sending its  shares down 8 percent.
Translation: Caída de Ventas en Payless, Presidente Renuncia NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - La cadena de calzado Payless ShoeSource Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSS.N</A> publicó el jueves ventas peores de lo esperado en tiendas abiertas al menos un año en agosto y anunció que su presidente, Duane Cantrell, renunciará con efecto inmediato, lo que provocó una caída de sus acciones en un 8 por ciento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Payless ShoeSource Inc., a leading footwear chain, reported a bigger-than-anticipated drop in the sales for August from stores operating for a minimum of a year. Along with this, the company announced that its president, Duane Cantrell, will be resigning with immediate effect. This led to an 8 percent decline in the company's shares on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Payless ShoeSource Inc., based in New York, revealed disappointing sales results from stores running for at least a year in August. Moreover, the company also announced that their president, Duane Cantrell, is stepping down immediately. This news triggered a fall in its stock price by 8 percent (Reuters).

Original Text: Falcons Top Raiders, Win NFC South Title (AP) AP - T.J. Duckett set a team record by rushing for four touchdowns and the Atlanta Falcons clinched just the third division title in franchise history, wrapping up the NFC South with a 35-10 rout of the Oakland Raiders on Sunday.
Translation: Los Halcones superan a los Raiders, ganan el título del NFC Sur (AP) AP - T.J. Duckett establece un récord del equipo al correr para cuatro touchdowns y los Atlanta Falcons aseguran solo el tercer título de división en la historia de la franquicia, cerrando el NFC Sur con una aplastante victoria de 35-10 sobre los Oakland Raiders el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Atlanta Falcons clinch the NFC South division title following their 35-10 victory over Oakland Raiders, setting a franchise record with T.J. Duckett's four-touchdown performance. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) By rushing for an impressive four touchdowns, T.J. Duckett aids the Atlanta Falcons in securing the NFC South title with a commanding 35-10 win against the Oakland Raiders. This marks the third division title in the history of their franchise. (AP)

Original Text: Siebel Systems Delivers Q3 Profit (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Siebel (Nasdaq: SEBL) topped expectations in its \third-quarter earnings results, registering a profit, higher sales and an increase in software-license revenue from the previous quarter.
Translation: Siebel Systems genera beneficios en el tercer trimestre (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Siebel (Nasdaq: SEBL) superó las expectativas en sus resultados de ganancias del tercer trimestre, registrando beneficios, ventas más altas y un aumento en los ingresos por licencias de software respecto al trimestre anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Surpassing predictions with its third-quarter earnings, Siebel Systems (Nasdaq: SEBL) not only achieved profits but recorded increased sales and hiked software-license revenue from the last quarter (NewsFactor).
Paraphrase 2: 2. NewsFactor reports that Siebel Systems (Nasdaq: SEBL) outperformed market predictions in its Q3 results, yielding profits, augmented sales, and a rise in software-license revenue compared to the prior quarter.

Original Text: Venezuelan Officials Agree to Audit Sample (AP) AP - Venezuelan election officials agreed Tuesday to conduct a partial audit of the results of a recall referendum won by President Hugo Chavez, amid opposition charges of election fraud, officials told The Associated Press.
Translation: Funcionarios Venezolanos Acuerdan Auditar Muestra (AP) AP - Funcionarios electorales venezolanos acordaron el martes llevar a cabo una auditoría parcial de los resultados de un referéndum de revocación ganado por el Presidente Hugo Chávez, en medio de acusaciones de fraude electoral por parte de la oposición, dijeron funcionarios a The Associated Press.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Associated Press reported that on Tuesday, the Venezuelan election officials consented to perform a limited examination of the recall referendum results, which were in favor of President Hugo Chavez. This decision emerged as a response to allegations of election manipulation by the opposition.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Under accusations of election fraud by the opposition, Venezuelan election authorities decided on Tuesday to undergo a partial review of the recall referendum's results, won by President Hugo Chavez. They relayed this information to The Associated Press.

Original Text: Morgan Stanley, Bear Stearns profits stumble Morgan Stanley and Bear Stearns Companies posted a drop in quarterly profits on Wednesday, surprising some investors one day after two
Translation: Las ganancias de Morgan Stanley y Bear Stearns tropiezan. Morgan Stanley y Bear Stearns Companies registraron una caída en las ganancias trimestrales el miércoles, sorprendiendo a algunos inversores un día después de dos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, a surprising drop in quarterly profits was reported by Morgan Stanley and Bear Stearns Companies, which startled some investors just a day after two.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A decrease in quarterly profits from Morgan Stanley and Bear Stearns Companies on Wednesday unexpectedly caught some investors off guard, just a single day post two.

Original Text: Kerry to Give Dems Leftover Campaign Cash (AP) AP - Under friendly fire, Sen. John Kerry likely will donate a substantial portion of his excess presidential campaign cash to help elect Democratic candidates in 2005 and 2006, advisers said Thursday.
Translation: Kerry dará a los Demócratas el Sobrante de Dinero de Campaña (AP) AP - Bajo fuego amigo, el Senador John Kerry probablemente donará una parte sustancial de su exceso de dinero de campaña presidencial para ayudar a elegir candidatos demócratas en 2005 y 2006, dijeron asesores el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) According to advisers on Thursday, amid internal criticism, Senator John Kerry is expected to allocate a large part of his remaining presidential campaign funds to support the election of Democratic candidates in 2005 and 2006.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) Advisors revealed on Thursday that Senator John Kerry, currently facing intra-party criticism, is likely set to contribute a sizable chunk of his leftover campaign money from his presidential campaign to assist in the victory of Democratic candidates in the 2005 and 2006 elections.

Original Text: Father of crew chief killed in crash Thompson, CT (Sports Network) - Tom Baldwin, 57, father of Nextel Cup driver Kasey Kahne #39;s crew chief Tommy Baldwin Jr., was killed in a crash at the Thompson International Speedway. He was driving in a Featherlite modified race on Thursday night.
Translation: Padre del jefe de equipo muerto en un accidente en Thompson, CT (Red Deportiva) - Tom Baldwin, de 57 años, padre de Tommy Baldwin Jr., jefe de equipo del piloto de la Copa Nextel, Kasey Kahne #39, murió en un accidente en el Thompson International Speedway. Estaba conduciendo en una carrera modificada de Featherlite el jueves por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thompson, CT (Sports Network) - Tom Baldwin, the 57-year-old father of Tommy Baldwin Jr. who is the crew chief of Nextel Cup driver Kasey Kahne, tragically lost his life in a crash at the Thompson International Speedway. Baldwin was participating in a Featherlite modified race on Thursday evening when the accident occurred.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Thompson, CT (Sports Network), a tragic accident occurred at the Thompson International Speedway leading to the death of 57-year-old Tom Baldwin, the father of Tommy Baldwin Jr., crew chief of Nextel Cup driver Kasey Kahne. Baldwin was competing in a Featherlite modified race on a Thursday night when he was involved in the fatal crash.

Original Text: Search Engines and Block Analysis with Image Retrieval Search Engines and Block Analysis with Image Retrieval\\What are some of the methods to combat the issues with linkage data, that search engines often depend upon for ranking one page over the next? If you're reading this, you most probably know all too well about how sites exchange links with ...
Translation: Motores de Búsqueda y Análisis de Bloques con Motores de Búsqueda de Recuperación de Imágenes y Análisis de Bloques\\ ¿Cuáles son algunos de los métodos para combatir los problemas con los datos de enlace, en los que los motores de búsqueda a menudo dependen para clasificar una página sobre la siguiente? Si estás leyendo esto, probablemente sepas muy bien cómo los sitios intercambian enlaces con...
Paraphrase 1: 1. What are some strategies to tackle the problems associated with link data, which search engines frequently rely on to prioritize one page over another? If you're going through this, chances are you're quite familiar with the way websites interchange links with...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Are there any methods to overcome the challenges posed by linkage data that search engines typically use for page ranking? If this is the material you're perusing, it's likely you're already well-versed with the practice of websites swapping links with...

Original Text: Karstadt calls for staff pay cuts Struggling German department store owner KarstadtQuelle says it must cut staff wages by up to 10 in an effort to avoid job cuts.
Translation: Karstadt solicita recortes salariales para el personal. El propietario alemán del almacén en dificultades, KarstadtQuelle, dice que debe reducir los salarios del personal en hasta un 10% en un esfuerzo por evitar recortes de empleo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. KarstadtQuelle, the troubled German department store owner, announces a necessity to reduce employee salaries by up to 10%, aiming to circumvent layoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a bid to prevent staff layoffs, KarstadtQuelle, the beleaguered owner of a German department store, declares its need to decrease staff salaries by up to 10%.

Original Text: Moody #39;s upgrades JC Penney #39;s debt ratings Moody #39;s Investors Service on Friday upgraded JC Penney Co. Inc. #39;s (JCP.N: Quote, Profile, Research) debt ratings to just one step below investment-grade status, citing factors
Translation: Moody #39;s mejora las calificaciones de deuda de JC Penney #39;s. El Servicio de Inversiones de Moody #39;s el viernes mejoró las calificaciones de deuda de JC Penney Co. Inc. #39;s (JCP.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) a solo un paso por debajo del estado de grado de inversión, citando factores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The debt ratings of JC Penney Co. Inc. have been upgraded by Moody's Investors Service to almost investment-grade status, crediting several factors for this decision.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A recent Moody's upgrade elevated JCPenney Co. Inc.'s debt ratings to near investment-grade status, a change attributed to certain key elements.

Original Text: James Hardie Earnings to Miss Estimates on Boycott (Update2) James Hardie Industries NV, Australia #39;s fourth-biggest building materials maker, said full-year profit will miss analysts #39; estimates because of boycotts by unions protesting the handling of asbestos compensation.
Translation: Las ganancias de James Hardie no cumplirán con las estimaciones debido al boicot (Actualización2) James Hardie Industries NV, el cuarto mayor fabricante de materiales de construcción de Australia, dijo que las ganancias del año completo no cumplirán con las estimaciones de los analistas debido a boicots por parte de los sindicatos que protestan por el manejo de la compensación del asbesto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to union boycotts protesting the management of asbestos compensation, James Hardie Industries NV, Australia's fourth-largest building materials manufacturer, anticipates its full-year profit will fall short of analysts' forecasts (Update2).
Paraphrase 2: 2. James Hardie Industries NV, the fourth most prominent building materials producer in Australia, announced that its annual earnings will not meet analysts' estimates, owing to union boycotts over the asbestos compensation issue (Update2).

Original Text: Violence greets Iraq poll campaign, Saddam meets lawyer, hostage <b>...</b> BAGHDAD (AFP) - An Italian hostage was reported killed in Iraq, adding to the violence as campaigning started for the first post-Saddam Hussein elections, while for the first time since his capture a year ago the ousted president met his family-appointed
Translation: La violencia saluda la campaña electoral de Iraq, Saddam se reúne con abogado, rehén <b>...</b> BAGDAD (AFP) - Se informó que un rehén italiano fue asesinado en Iraq, sumándose a la violencia a medida que comenzó la campaña para las primeras elecciones post-Saddam Hussein, mientras que por primera vez desde su captura hace un año, el ex presidente se reunió con su abogado designado por la familia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An Italian hostage's death adds to the turbulence as the election campaign in Iraq begins, the first since the fall of Saddam Hussein. Meanwhile, the deposed president, a year after his capture, had his inaugural meeting with his personally selected lawyer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the first elections after Saddam Hussein commence amidst escalating violence, the death of an Italian hostage is reported in Iraq. Concurrently, the former president, after a year of captivity, finally meets with his lawyer, appointed by his family.

Original Text: Forget the medal count, Phelps has far exceeded expectations Two-time US Olympian Tom Dolan, who took back-to-back gold medals in the 400 IM at Atlanta and Sydney, will analyze races for SI.com throughout the Games.
Translation: Olvida el conteo de medallas, Phelps ha superado ampliamente las expectativas. El dos veces olímpico estadounidense Tom Dolan, quien ganó medallas de oro consecutivas en los 400 IM en Atlanta y Sydney, analizará las carreras para SI.com durante los Juegos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two-time American Olympian, Tom Dolan, who clinched back-to-back gold medals in the 400 IM during the games in Atlanta and Sydney, will be performing analysis of the races for SI.com throughout the duration of the Games, and Phelps has unquestionably surpassed expectations, making the medal count irrelevant.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Irrespective of the medal tally, Phelps has unequivocally outperformed. Meanwhile, Tom Dolan, who represented US twice in the Olympics and won consecutive gold medals in the 400 IM at Atlanta and Sydney games, is set to analyze the races for SI.com throughout the Games.

Original Text: Xandros rolls out Linux desktop management app (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Linux desktop vendor Xandros Inc. on Tuesday announced the availability of its new Xandros Desktop Management Server (xDMS) application, which gives IT administrators the tools to roll out, configure and maintain mass deployments of Linux-equipped PCs.
Translation: Xandros lanza aplicación de gestión de escritorio Linux (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - El proveedor de escritorios Linux, Xandros Inc., anunció este martes la disponibilidad de su nueva aplicación Xandros Desktop Management Server (xDMS), que proporciona a los administradores de IT las herramientas para implementar, configurar y mantener implementaciones masivas de PC equipadas con Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (InfoWorld) Xandros Inc., a Linux desktop supplier, has launched its new Xandros Desktop Management Server (xDMS) application, enabling IT administrators to configure, manage, and deploy lots of Linux-based computers, as announced on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. InfoWorld - Xandros, the Linux desktop provider, has unveiled the Xandros Desktop Management Server (xDMS), a new application which simplifies the setup, deployment, and management of large numbers of Linux-operated PCs for IT administrators, as declared on Tuesday.

Original Text: Harrop wins silver FORMER Aussie backpacker Kate Allen pipped Australian favourite Loretta Harrop in sight of the finish to win the Olympic women #39;s triathlon today, but will take the gold medal home to Austria.
Translation: Harrop gana plata. La ex mochilera australiana Kate Allen superó a la favorita australiana Loretta Harrop a la vista de la meta para ganar el triatlón olímpico femenino hoy, pero llevará la medalla de oro a casa a Austria.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the women's triathlon at the Olympics today, former Australian backpacker Kate Allen outstripped Australian favorite Loretta Harrop in the final stretch, securing the gold medal to take back to Austria, leaving Harrop with silver.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Loretta Harrop, Australia's favorite, clinched a silver at today's Olympic women's triathlon, with gold going to Kate Allen, a former Aussie backpacker, who is now set to bring the gold medal to her home in Austria.

Original Text: US Envoy Denies Using Influence in Afghan Elections The United States ambassador to Afghanistan denies allegations he is meddling in the country #39;s first direct presidential election, to be held on October 9. US ambassador to Kabul, Zalmay Khalilzad, says that
Translation: El Enviado de EE.UU. Niega el Uso de Influencia en las Elecciones Afganas. El embajador de los Estados Unidos en Afganistán niega las acusaciones de que está interfiriendo en la primera elección presidencial directa del país, que se celebrará el 9 de octubre. El embajador de los EE. UU. en Kabul, Zalmay Khalilzad, dice que.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Zalmay Khalilzad, the United States ambassador to Kabul, refutes claims of intervening in Afghanistan's initial presidential election, scheduled for October 9.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The assertion that he is interfering in Afghanistan's first direct presidential election, set for October 9, is vehemently denied by US ambassador to Kabul, Zalmay Khalilzad.

Original Text: Bombers penetrate Green Zone Bombers in Baghdad took the war to the very heart of United States power in Iraq yesterday with two blasts inside the supposedly impregnable Green Zone, killing five civilians, including three US nationals, and injuring at least 20.
Translation: Los bombarderos penetran en la Zona Verde. Los bombarderos en Bagdad llevaron la guerra al mismísimo corazón del poder de Estados Unidos en Irak ayer con dos explosiones dentro de la supuestamente inexpugnable Zona Verde, matando a cinco civiles, incluyendo a tres estadounidenses, y dejando al menos 20 heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, bombers in Baghdad attacked the symbol of the United States' power in Iraq, the 'impervious' Green Zone, with two explosions. This lethal assault resulted in the death of five civilians, among whom three were US nationals, and inflicted injuries on at least 20 others.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With two detonations inside the alleged invincible Green Zone, bombers in Baghdad conducted a direct attack on the main hub of U.S. authority in Iraq yesterday. The attack claimed five lives, including three American citizens, and left a minimum of 20 injured.

Original Text: More grunt left in BHP: chief BHP Billiton chief executive Chip Goodyear yesterday insisted this week #39;s record profit  quot;isn #39;t as good as it gets quot;, as the market wrestled with how to value the stock amid speculation that its share price was near cycle peaks.
Translation: Queda más empuje en BHP: jefe El director ejecutivo de BHP Billiton, Chip Goodyear, insistió ayer que el récord de ganancias de esta semana "no es lo mejor que puede hacer", mientras el mercado lucha por cómo valorar las acciones en medio de especulaciones de que su precio de las acciones estaba cerca de los picos del ciclo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BHP Billiton's Chief Executive, Chip Goodyear, asserted yesterday that this week's record-breaking profit doesn't represent the company's ultimate potential, even as the market grappled with assessing the stock’s value amid rumors that its share price was approaching cyclical peaks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In speculation of the company's share price nearing its cycle peaks, the market was found struggling to evaluate the stock, meanwhile, Chip Goodyear, the Chief Executive of BHP Billiton, insisted yesterday that this week's record earnings are not the company's absolute best.

Original Text: Renegades trying more conventional approach  quot;Well, quot; says Dallas Mavericks coach Don Nelson, laughing at the question before he even starts answering,  quot;you can #39;t stop people from talking.
Translation: "Renegados intentan un enfoque más convencional" "Bueno", dice el entrenador de los Dallas Mavericks, Don Nelson, riéndose de la pregunta antes de empezar a responder, "no puedes evitar que la gente hable."
Paraphrase 1: "Dallas Mavericks' coach, Don Nelson, chuckles at the question before he begins to respond, 'Well, you can't prevent people from expressing their opinions,' showing a shift towards a more traditional method from the Renegades."
Paraphrase 2: "Don Nelson, the coach of Dallas Mavericks, laughs at the question even before answering, asserting, 'Well, you can't stop people from speaking their minds.' This indicates that the Renegades are adopting a more mainstream approach."

Original Text: IBM Rolls Out New Linux Server Using Power5 Chip (Reuters) Reuters - International Business Machines\Corp  on Sunday announced a new computer server using\its Power5 microprocessor tuned for the popular Linux operating\system, as the No. 1 computer maker aims to broaden the\adoption of Linux in broader corporate computing markets.
Translation: IBM lanza nuevo servidor Linux utilizando el chip Power5 (Reuters) Reuters - La Corporación International Business Machines anunció el domingo un nuevo servidor informático que utiliza su microprocesador Power5 optimizado para el popular sistema operativo Linux, ya que el fabricante de computadoras número 1 busca ampliar la adopción de Linux en mercados corporativos más amplios.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - On Sunday, International Business Machines Corp unveiled a new server powered by its Power5 microprocessor and optimized for the widely-used Linux operating system. The company, which is the leading computer manufacturer, intends this launch to expand the use of Linux in wider corporate computing sectors.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - With the intention to increase the use of Linux in larger corporate computing areas, the top computer manufacturer, International Business Machines Corp, introduced a new computer server on Sunday. This server, specially designed for the prevalent Linux operating system, is equipped with its unique Power5 microprocessor.

Original Text: Johansson cheers Stockholm crowd Thomas Johansson gave the home crowd something to cheer with victory over Xavier Malisse on day one of the Stockholm Open. The Swede came through 7-6 (7-4) 7-6 (7-1) and goes on to face a compatriot in Thomas Enqvist or Robin Soderling.
Translation: Johansson anima a la multitud de Estocolmo. Thomas Johansson dio algo de qué alegrarse a la multitud local con su victoria sobre Xavier Malisse en el primer día del Abierto de Estocolmo. El sueco se impuso 7-6 (7-4) 7-6 (7-1) y pasa a enfrentarse a un compatriota, Thomas Enqvist o Robin Soderling.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thomas Johansson delighted the local audience with a triumphant win against Xavier Malisse on the first day of the Stockholm Open, giving them a reason to celebrate. He went head to head with scores 7-6 (7-4) 7-6 (7-1) and is gearing up to go against either Thomas Enqvist or Robin Soderling, both fellow Swedes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Eliciting cheers from the home crowd, Thomas Johansson triumphed over Xavier Malisse in the opening day of the Stockholm Open. Pulling off scores of 7-6 (7-4) and 7-6 (7-1), he now sets sights on facing his countrymen, either Thomas Enqvist or Robin Soderling.

Original Text: Creditors KO Delta's Bid to Change Debt  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> on Friday  said a group of bond holders refused to change the terms of  their securities, adding to the headwinds the airline faces as  it struggles to avoid bankruptcy.
Translation:
Acreedores NOQUEAN la oferta de Delta para cambiar deuda

NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> dijo el viernes que un grupo de tenedores de bonos se negó a cambiar los términos de sus valores, aumentando los contratiempos a los que se enfrenta la aerolínea mientras lucha para evitar la bancarrota.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Delta Air Lines Inc., already struggling to evade bankruptcy, declared on Friday that a group of bondholders had denied to modify the terms of their securities, creating an additional challenge for the company. This occurred in New York, as reported by Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Delta Air Lines Inc. disclosed on Friday, as reported by Reuters in New York, that its bid to alter the debt conditions was thwarted by a group of creditors. This only exacerbates the difficulties the airline is confronting in its endeavor to avert bankruptcy.

Original Text: Schumacher wins first practice at rain-soaked Suzuka World champion Michael Schumacher drove the quickest time in the first practice on Friday for Sunday #39;s Japanese Formula One Grand Prix in Suzuka.
Translation: Schumacher gana la primera práctica en Suzuka empapado de lluvia. El campeón del mundo Michael Schumacher marcó el tiempo más rápido en la primera práctica del viernes para el Gran Premio de Fórmula Uno de Japón en Suzuka del domingo número 39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, ahead of Sunday's Japanese Formula One Grand Prix in Suzuka, World Champion Michael Schumacher had a triumphant first practice, clocking the fastest time despite the rain-soaked condition.

Original Text: Longhorn Due in 2006 - It #39;s Official Microsoft has set 2006 for the official launch of its Longhorn operating system, which will debut without several of the features originally planned.
Translation: Lanzamiento de Longhorn programado para 2006 - Es oficial Microsoft ha establecido 2006 para el lanzamiento oficial de su sistema operativo Longhorn, que debutará sin varias de las características originalmente planificadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft has officially confirmed that its Longhorn operating system, which will be missing some of the initially intended features, is slated for launch in 2006.

Original Text: Airline Workers See Their Security Quickly Vanish Employees at US Airways, Delta and United are facing the stark realization that the security they hoped their jobs would provide is being taken away.
Translation: Los Trabajadores de Aerolíneas Ven Su Seguridad Desaparecer Rápidamente. Los empleados en US Airways, Delta y United se enfrentan a la dura realidad de que la seguridad que esperaban que sus trabajos proporcionaran está siendo arrebatada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Employees at US Airways, Delta, and United are coming to the harsh understanding that their job security is rapidly diminishing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Staff at US Airways, Delta, and United are confronting the disheartening truth that their anticipated job security is disappearing swiftly.

Original Text: Investigators Find Explosives in Russia Plane Wreck Explosive of a kind used by Chechen rebels has been found in one of two airliners that crashed simultaneously, Russian investigators said, making it look ever likelier that the disaster was a political attack.
Translation: Los investigadores encuentran explosivos en los restos de avión ruso. Un explosivo del tipo utilizado por los rebeldes chechenos fue encontrado en uno de los dos aviones que se estrellaron simultáneamente, dijeron los investigadores rusos, haciendo que parezca cada vez más probable que el desastre fuera un ataque político.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Russian investigators have discovered explosives, similar to those used by Chechen rebels, in the wreckage of one of two planes that crashed simultaneously, suggesting an increasingly strong possibility that the incident was a politically motivated attack.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Upon finding explosives identical to the ones commonly used by Chechen rebels within the wreckage of one of the two simultaneous plane crashes, Russian investigators are leaning more towards the likelihood of the disaster being a result of a political assault.

Original Text: Israel, the US and the Age of Terror THROUGHOUT its first term, the Bush administration held that the road to Jerusalem passed through Baghdad. Even before the 9/11 attacks, but especially after them, it shunned the very term  quot;peace
Translation: Israel, Estados Unidos y la era del terror. DURANTE su primer mandato, la administración Bush sostuvo que el camino a Jerusalén pasaba por Bagdad. Incluso antes de los ataques del 9/11, pero especialmente después de ellos, rechazó incluso el término "paz".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Throughout its inaugural term, the Bush administration maintained the belief that the journey to Jerusalem was via Baghdad, a sentiment both before and notably after the 9/11 attacks, where it refrained from even saying the word "peace". The situation involved Israel, the US and the Age of Terror.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Bush administration, during its first term, projected the stance that Baghdad was a necessary precursor to reach Jerusalem. This viewpoint was held even prior to the 9/11 events and more so following that, as they avoided using the term "peace". This perspective was set against the backdrop of Israel, the US and the era defined by terror.

Original Text: Segway completes transcontinental voyage Tired scooter rider reaches Atlantic seaboad after "slice of life" journey across 14 states.\<br /> Photos: Segway--coast to coast
Translation:
Segway completa viaje transcontinental. Cansado conductor de patinete alcanza costa del Atlántico después de "rebanada de vida" viaje a través de 14 estados.
Fotos: Segway--de costa a costa
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a "slice of life" trip through 14 states, the weary scooter rider makes it to the Atlantic seaboard as Segway accomplishes a transcontinental journey. Photos: A coast to coast Segway adventure.

Original Text: Ronaldo stays in Brazil for engagement SAO PAULO: Brazil set off for the midweek friendly in Germany without Ronaldo on Sunday after he was given permission to stay behind for an engagement dinner with his girlfriend.
Translation: Ronaldo se queda en Brasil por compromiso SAO PAULO: Brasil partió a mitad de semana para un amistoso en Alemania sin Ronaldo el domingo, después de que se le otorgó permiso para quedarse por una cena de compromiso con su novia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAO PAULO: Ronaldo was granted approval to linger in Brazil for a commitment dinner with his girlfriend, as the rest of the Brazilian team departed for a midweek friendly game in Germany.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SAO PAULO: While the Brazilian team left for their friendly match in Germany, Ronaldo was allowed to remain in Brazil to attend an engagement event with his girlfriend.

Original Text: Far-right firebrand Hanson to attempt political comeback (AFP) AFP - Pauline Hanson, the former leader of Australia's xenophobic One Nation party, has announced that she was coming back from political retirement to run for a seat in the Senate next month.
Translation: La provocadora de la extrema derecha, Hanson, intentará un regreso político (AFP) AFP - Pauline Hanson, la antigua líder del partido xenófobo One Nation de Australia, ha anunciado que regresará de su retiro político para postularse para un asiento en el Senado el próximo mes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - The one-time head of Australia's One Nation Party, known for its xenophobic tendencies, Pauline Hanson, has made a surprise announcement that she is coming out of her political retirement and will be running for a Senate seat next month.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - Australian Senate seat is what Pauline Hanson, the controversial ex-leader of the One Nation Party, has her eyes set upon as she announces an end to her political hibernation next month.

Original Text: Saboteurs blow up pipeline in north Iraq Saboteurs blew up a domestic oil pipeline in northern Iraq on Tuesday, sending plumes of smoke leaping into the sky and forcing technicians to shut it down, officials said.
Translation: Saboteadores volaron un oleoducto en el norte de Iraq. Los saboteadores hicieron explotar un oleoducto de petróleo doméstico en el norte de Iraq el martes, enviando columnas de humo que se elevaban al cielo y obligando a los técnicos a cerrarlo, según informaron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials reported that on Tuesday, saboteurs destroyed a local oil pipeline in Northern Iraq, leading to towering smoke clouds in the sky and compelling technicians to cease its operation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, a domestic oil pipeline in Northern Iraq was forcibly shut down by technicians due to an attack by saboteurs, resulting in massive smoke emissions, according to officials.

Original Text: Sun, UT Austin Team for Supercomputer Maverick, the new supercomputer from Sun Microsystems and the University of Texas at Austin, promises speedier data analysis for global weather prediction, emergency response management
Translation: Sol, el equipo de UT Austin para Supercomputadora Maverick, la nueva supercomputadora de Sun Microsystems y la Universidad de Texas en Austin, promete un análisis de datos más rápido para la predicción del clima global, la gestión de respuesta a emergencias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UT Austin and Sun Microsystems collaboration has led to the development of Maverick, a new supercomputer. This advanced system anticipates offering accelerated data analysis for applications such as global weather forecasting and emergency response management.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Maverick, a supercomputer resulting from the joint venture of Sun Microsystems and the University of Texas at Austin, pledges to accelerate data analysis for tasks like global weather forecasting and managing emergency response.

Original Text: Al-Zarqawi Lieutenant Arrested in Mosul (AP) AP - A lieutenant of Iraq's most feared terrorist leader Abu Musab al-Zarqawi was captured a few days ago in Mosul, the government's national security adviser said Thursday.
Translation: Teniente de Al-Zarqawi Arrestado en Mosul (AP) AP - Un teniente del líder terrorista más temido de Iraq, Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, fue capturado hace unos días en Mosul, según dijo el jueves el asesor de seguridad nacional del gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) According to the government's national security adviser, one of the lieutenants of Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, Iraq's notorious terrorist leader, was recently arrested in Mosul.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The national security adviser announced on Thursday that a significant arrest has been made in Mosul - a member of Abu Musab al-Zarqawi's team, who is considered to be Iraq's most dangerous terrorist (AP).

Original Text: Palmeiro signs one-year contract with Orioles Rafael Palmeiro didn #39;t want his homecoming with the Baltimore Orioles to end after just one season, so he took a pay cut and accepted a one-year, \$3 million contract Wednesday.
Translation: Palmeiro firma contrato de un año con los Orioles Rafael Palmeiro no quería que su regreso a los Baltimore Orioles terminara después de solo una temporada, por lo que aceptó un recorte de sueldo y aceptó un contrato de un año por \$3 millones el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Not wanting his reunion with the Baltimore Orioles to conclude after a single season, Rafael Palmeiro agreed to a reduced salary and signed a one-year contract worth $3 million on Wednesday.

Original Text: Poll gives Kerry post-debate lead After the first TV debate in the US presidential campaign, polls give good news for the Democrats.
Translation: La encuesta da a Kerry la delantera después del debate: Después del primer debate televisado en la campaña presidencial de EE.UU, las encuestas traen buenas noticias para los Demócratas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the inaugural TV debate during the US presidential campaign, Democratic candidate Kerry is leading according to the polls.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The initial TV debate of the US presidential campaign results in a surge for Kerry in the polls, providing positive news for the Democrats.

Original Text: Ferguson praise for Boro Manchester United coach Sir Alex Ferguson refused to criticise his side after they were held to a 1-1 draw at home to Middlesbrough.
Translation: Ferguson elogia al Boro El entrenador del Manchester United, Sir Alex Ferguson, se negó a criticar a su equipo después de que empataran 1-1 en casa contra Middlesbrough.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Manchester United's coach, Sir Alex Ferguson, refrained from critiquing his team when they ended up with a 1-1 tie against Middlesbrough at home, instead offering praise for Boro.

Original Text: IBM Settles Part of Giant Pension Lawsuit (Reuters) Reuters - International Business Machines Corp.\ has settled for an undisclosed sum part of a\potentially multi-billion-dollar lawsuit over its pension plan,\a Wednesday court filing shows.
Translation: IBM Resuelve Parte de Gigantesco Juicio de Pensión (Reuters) Reuters - International Business Machines Corp. ha llegado a un acuerdo por una suma no revela para resolver una parte de un juicio potencialmente multimillonario sobre su plan de pensión, según muestra un archivo judicial del miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) A portion of a potentially multi-billion-dollar lawsuit concerning its pension plan has been settled by International Business Machines Corp. for an unspecified amount, according to a court filing on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As shown in a court document filed on Wednesday, an unknown sum has been settled for by International Business Machines Corp., resolving a part of a lawsuit over its pension plan, which could potentially reach into the billions. (Reuters)

Original Text: Euro industrial production slows Industrial production in the eurozone \falls by 0.4 in June from May, with Germany registering the biggest fall.
Translation: La producción industrial del euro se desacelera. La producción industrial en la zona del euro cae un 0.4 en junio respecto a mayo, siendo Alemania el país que registra la mayor caída.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Industrial production within the Eurozone experienced a decrease of 0.4 in June compared to May, with Germany showing the most significant decline.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There was a drop of 0.4 in industrial production in the Euro area from May to June, with Germany recording the largest fall.

Original Text: Fourteen hurt as two bombs rock Thailand Fourteen people have been injured in one of two bomb blasts to strike Thailand #39;s restive Muslim-majority south, police said, while a Buddhist teacher was shot dead in another attack.
Translation: Catorce heridos después de que dos bombas sacudieran Tailandia. Catorce personas han resultado heridas en una de las dos explosiones que han azotado el sur de mayoría musulmana en Tailandia, según informó la policía, mientras que un profesor budista fue asesinado a tiros en otro ataque.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Thailand's volatile Muslim-majority south, two bomb explosions have resulted in injuries to fourteen people, according to the police. Additionally, in a separate incident, a Buddhist teacher was assassinated.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Police reported that two bombings in Thailand's restive Muslim-majority southern region caused injuries to fourteen people, and in a different attack, a Buddhist teacher was fatally shot.

Original Text: Conviction of American in Peru Upheld (AP) AP - The Inter-American Court of Human Rights has upheld the conviction of an American woman imprisoned in Peru for terrorist collaboration with Marxist guerrillas, President Alejandro Toledo confirmed Thursday.
Translation: Convicción de estadounidense en Perú confirmada (AP) AP - La Corte Interamericana de Derechos Humanos ha confirmado la condena de una mujer estadounidense encarcelada en Perú por colaboración terrorista con guerrillas marxistas, confirmó el jueves el presidente Alejandro Toledo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) President Alejandro Toledo confirmed on Thursday that the Inter-American Court of Human Rights has affirmed the conviction of an American woman in Peru, who was sentenced for her terrorist collaboration with the Marxist guerrillas. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) - An American woman, who has been imprisoned in Peru due to her collaborative involvement in terrorist activities with Marxist guerrillas, has had her conviction maintained, President Alejandro Toledo verified on Thursday, as per the Inter-American Court of Human Rights.

Original Text: 0-for-2 in World Cup Russia outhustles the American squad and deals Team USA its second consecutive loss, 3-1, Thursday night.
Translation: 0-de-2 en la Copa Mundial Rusia, supera en esfuerzo al equipo americano y le propina al Equipo USA su segunda derrota consecutiva, 3-1, la noche del jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the World Cup held in Russia, the American team suffers its second consecutive 3-1 defeat to a more determined 0-for-2 team on Thursday night.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 0-for-2 team outperforms the American squad in World Cup Russia, handing Team USA its second straight 3-1 loss on Thursday night.

Original Text: US fails to bring UN into Iran nuclear case VIENNA The United States once again failed Friday to persuade the International Atomic Energy Agency to refer Iran #39;s nuclear program to the United Nations Security Council, accepting instead a repetition of calls for the country to stop uranium enrichment
Translation: EE. UU. fracasa nuevamente en involucrar a la ONU en el caso nuclear de Irán VIENA El viernes, Estados Unidos fracasó una vez más en persuadir a la Agencia Internacional de Energía Atómica para referir el programa nuclear de Irán al Consejo de Seguridad de las Naciones Unidas, aceptando en su lugar una repetición de llamados para que el país detenga el enriquecimiento de uranio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Once again, on Friday, the United States was unsuccessful in its attempt to convince the International Atomic Energy Agency to involve the United Nations Security Council in the case of Iran's nuclear program. Rather, the country accepted repeated demands for Iran to cease uranium enrichment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the International Atomic Energy Agency was yet again not persuaded by the United States to refer the issue of Iran's nuclear program to the United Nations Security Council. Instead, calls for Iran to halt uranium enrichment were reiterated, which the United States accepted.

Original Text: Bolt explosion could delay next Soyuz launch The explosion of a bolt could have damaged the Soyuz spacecraft set to carry a new crew to the International Space Station, and the Russian space agency says resulting safety
Translation: La explosión de un perno podría retrasar el próximo lanzamiento de Soyuz. La explosión de un perno podría haber dañado la nave espacial Soyuz programada para llevar a una nueva tripulación a la Estación Espacial Internacional, y la agencia espacial rusa dice que la seguridad resultante
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Russian space agency has suggested that the upcoming Soyuz launch might be postponed due to a bolt explosion that potentially damaged the spacecraft intended to transport the next crew to the International Space Station.

Original Text: Algonquin Power, Microcell, Telus: Canadian Equity Preview The following is a list of companies whose shares may make gains or losses in the Canadian market. This preview includes news that broke after markets closed Tuesday.
Translation: Algonquin Power, Microcell, Telus: Vista previa de la equidad canadiense La siguiente es una lista de empresas cuyas acciones pueden obtener ganancias o pérdidas en el mercado canadiense. Esta vista previa incluye noticias que surgieron después del cierre de los mercados el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. This preview takes into account the latest news updates after Tuesday's market close and explores potential gain or loss scenarios for Algonquin Power, Microcell, and Telus on the Canadian equity market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Algonquin Power, Microcell, and Telus are among the firms whose stocks may experience rises or falls on the Canadian market. This forecast takes into consideration the latest news that developed after Tuesday's market closure.

Original Text: NAC Breda #39;s Tamas Peto banned for 10 games for doping NAC Breda won #39;t appeal a 10-game ban on Hungarian midfielder Tamas Peto by the Dutch Soccer Association as punishment for alleged doping, the team said Wednesday.
Translation: Tamas Peto del NAC Breda prohibido por 10 partidos por dopaje. NAC Breda no apelará una prohibición de 10 partidos sobre el mediocampista húngaro Tamas Peto por la Asociación de Fútbol Holandesa como castigo por supuesto dopaje, dijo el equipo el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, NAC Breda confirmed that they will not contest the Dutch Soccer Association's punitive 10-game suspension of their Hungarian midfielder, Tamas Peto, for purported doping.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following accusations of doping, Hungarian midfielder Tamas Peto from NAC Breda has been handed a 10-game suspension by the Dutch Soccer Association, a decision that the team will not appeal, they announced on Wednesday.

Original Text: Yen Weighed Down as Oil Prices Hit Highs (Reuters) Reuters - The yen was feeling the heat on Tuesday\as oil prices scaled new record highs, underlining concerns\about Japan's dependence on imported oil.
Translation: El yen se deprecia a medida que los precios del petróleo alcanzan máximos (Reuters) Reuters - El yen estaba sintiendo presión el martes cuando los precios del petróleo alcanzaron nuevos récords históricos, subrayando las preocupaciones sobre la dependencia de Japón del petróleo importado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - Tuesday witnessed the yen struggling because of the pressure from skyrocketing oil prices, emphasizing worries over Japan's reliance on foreign oil.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Rising oil prices spark concern about Japan's reliance on foreign oil, causing the yen to falter on Tuesday, according to Reuters.

Original Text: Bourque, Coffey, Murphy enter hockey hall It #39;s hard to imagine a more deserving trio of defensemen being inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame on the same slate again. The addition of Ray Bourque, Paul
Translation: Bourque, Coffey, Murphy ingresan al salón de la fama del hockey. Es difícil imaginar un trío de defensas más merecedor siendo introducido al Salón de la Fama del Hockey en la misma terna nuevamente. La adición de Ray Bourque, Paul
Paraphrase 1: 1. It's hard to envision another trio of defensemen as meriting induction into the Hockey Hall of Fame simultaneously, as much as Ray Bourque, Paul Coffey, and Murphy. Their addition to the Hockey Hall is quite deserving.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Joining the Hockey Hall of Fame are the deserving trio of defensemen Ray Bourque, Paul Coffey, and Murphy. It would be a challenge to conceive another group of such worthy defensemen being included at the same time.

Original Text: EU to finance over half of African mission in Darfur The European Union will finance over half of the cost of the African Union #39;s (AU) cease fire monitoring and civilian protection force in Sudan #39;s troubled region of Darfur, EU foreign affairs chief Javier Solana said on today.
Translation: La Unión Europea financiará más de la mitad del costo de la fuerza de monitoreo de alto al fuego y protección civil de la Unión Africana (UA) en la conflictiva región de Darfur, en Sudán, dijo hoy el jefe de asuntos exteriores de la UE, Javier Solana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Javier Solana, the EU foreign affairs chief, announced today that the European Union is set to fund more than fifty percent of the African Union's (AU) cease fire monitoring as well as the civilian protection force in Sudan's conflict-ridden Darfur region.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With today's announcement by Javier Solana, chief of EU foreign affairs, it was made known that more than half of the expenses for the AU’s cease-fire surveillance and civilian protection force in Darfur, a volatile region of Sudan, will be borne by the European Union.

Original Text: Arctic Countries Agree on Perils of Climate Change but Not Solution The United States and the seven other countries jointly expressed concern about changes in the Arctic climate, but they did not agree on a strategy to deal with them.
Translation: Los países del Ártico acuerdan sobre los peligros del cambio climático pero no sobre la solución. Los Estados Unidos y los otros siete países expresaron conjuntamente su preocupación por los cambios en el clima del Ártico, pero no acordaron una estrategia para lidiar con ellos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The United States along with seven other nations mutually acknowledged the dangers of Arctic climate shifts, however, couldn't reach a consensus on how to tackle it.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While the United States and seven other nations collectively affirmed the threats posed by changes in the Arctic climate, they failed to agree on a plan of action to combat them.

Original Text: Annus asked to give sample or lose gold Hungarian Olympic hammer gold medallist Adrian Annus must give a fresh urine sample to the IOC by 1400 GMT on Friday or lose his gold medal, a report said.
Translation: Annus pidió dar una muestra o perder el oro del martillo olímpico húngaro. El campeón olímpico húngaro de martillo Adrian Annus debe dar una nueva muestra de orina al COI antes de las 1400 GMT del viernes o perderá su medalla de oro, según un informe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Hungarian Olympic hammer gold medalist, Adrian Annus, has been ordered by the IOC to provide a new urine sample by 1400 GMT on Friday; failure to comply might lead to the forfeiture of his gold medal, according to a report.

Original Text: Latest Trojan delivers SMS spam payload IT security experts have intercepted a previously undocumented Trojan virus with a novel payload that attempts to send spam SMS messages to mobile phones.
Translation: El último troyano entrega carga útil de spam por SMS los expertos en seguridad informática han interceptado un virus troyano previamente no documentado con una carga útil novedosa que intenta enviar mensajes spam por SMS a teléfonos móviles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IT security professionals have detected an unrecorded Trojan virus striving to deliver spam SMS messages to mobile devices, marking a new kind of payload.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A novel payload in the form of a Trojan, previously undocumented and meant to send SMS spam to mobile phones, has been intercepted by IT security experts.

Original Text: Makaay repeats his late goal show Roy Makaay struck in stoppage time for the second time in four days to give Bayern Munich a dramatic 3-2 second round German Cup win Tuesday at third division VfL Osnabruck.
Translation: Makaay repite su espectáculo de gol tardío. Roy Makaay anotó en el tiempo de descuento por segunda vez en cuatro días para darle al Bayern de Múnich una dramática victoria 3-2 en la segunda ronda de la Copa Alemana el martes contra el VfL Osnabruck de la tercera división.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Roy Makaay scored a stoppage time goal for the second time in four days, securing a thrilling 3-2 victory for Bayern Munich in the second round of the German Cup against third division VfL Osnabruck on Tuesday. Makaay continues his streak of late goals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For the second time in four days, Roy Makaay netted a goal during stoppage time, this time leading Bayern Munich to a nerve-wracking 3-2 win over VfL Osnabruck in the second round of the German Cup on Tuesday. Makaay's pattern of late goal scoring continues.

Original Text: Former Aeros bite old teammates The Aeros got a painful reminder of the prowess of a pair of their former teammates Wednesday night. They saw two of their former players combine for a goal and two assists
Translation: Exjugadores de los Aeros muerden a viejos compañeros de equipo. Los Aeros tuvieron un doloroso recordatorio del poderío de un par de sus excompañeros la noche del miércoles. Vieron a dos de sus exjugadores combinar para un gol y dos asistencias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Aeros were painfully reminded of their past teammates' prowess on Wednesday night as two former members scored a goal and two assists against them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A goal and two assists from two of their ex-teammates landed as a stark reminder on Wednesday night for Aeros about the two players' skills.

Original Text: Lilly Adds Warning to Strattera Label (Reuters) Reuters - Eli Lilly and Co  said Friday\it added a warning to the label of its attention\deficit/hyperactivity disorder medicine, advising patients with\jaundice or a liver injury to stop taking the treatment.
Translation: Lilly Agrega Advertencia a la Etiqueta de Strattera (Reuters) Reuters - Eli Lilly y Co anunciaron el viernes que añadieron una advertencia a la etiqueta de su medicamento para el trastorno por déficit de atención/hiperactividad, aconsejando a los pacientes con ictericia o una lesión hepática que dejen de tomar el tratamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Eli Lilly and Co. have announced on Friday that they have placed a warning label on their ADHD medication, Strattera, advising against its use for patients suffering from jaundice or a liver injury, as reported by Reuters.

Original Text: Lampert #39;s potent force in investing branches into retailing DreamWorks SKG co-founder David Geffen laughs when asked what it #39;s like to invest with Edward Lampert, the hedge fund manager and Kmart chairman who startled the
Translation: La poderosa fuerza de Lampert en la inversión se ramifica en el comercio minorista. David Geffen, cofundador de DreamWorks SKG, se ríe cuando le preguntan qué se siente al invertir con Edward Lampert, el gerente de hedge fund y presidente de Kmart, quien sorprendió a...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Edward Lampert, a powerful influence in investment spheres and currently Kmart's chairman, also extends his reach to retailing. This hedge fund manager's unconventional moves often surprise DreamWorks SKG co-founder, David Geffen, who finds it amusing when questioned about investing alongside Lampert.
Paraphrase 2: 2. When probed about the experience of investing with Edward Lampert, the hedge fund manager who also presides over Kmart, DreamWorks SKG co-founder, David Geffen, can't help but laugh. Lampert's investment prowess, which has a strong impact and remarkably extends to retailing, has consistently been a source of surprise.

Original Text: TiVo Unveils Portable Transfer Service (AP) AP - TiVo Inc. pioneered digital video recording as a new way of watching television  #151; when you want it. Now it could be TV where you want it, too.
Translation: TiVo presenta un servicio de transferencia portátil (AP) AP - TiVo Inc. innovó con la grabación de video digital como una nueva forma de ver televisión #151; cuando tú quieras. Ahora también podría ser televisión donde quieras.
Paraphrase 1: 1) TiVo Inc., the company that revolutionized the way we watch television with digital video recording, is now introducing a portable transfer service. With this, you may not only watch what you want when you want, but also where you want. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) Pioneering digital video recording and enabling viewers to watch TV as per their convenience, TiVo Inc. is now unveiling a service for portable transfers. This suggests that TV could be available wherever you want, in addition to whenever you want. (AP)

Original Text: Halliburton Focuses on Brazil Project Halliburton Co. has finalized an agreement to resolve outstanding issues with a troublesome project off the coast of Brazil, the company announced Wednesday.
Translation: Halliburton se concentra en el proyecto de Brasil. Halliburton Co. ha finalizado un acuerdo para resolver problemas pendientes con un proyecto problemático en la costa de Brasil, anunció la compañía el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Halliburton Co. announced that they have successfully finalized an agreement to address unresolved issues with a challenging project located off the coast of Brazil.

Original Text: Janus Capital earnings dip on lower revenue DENVER -- Third-quarter revenue fell 7 percent at Janus Capital Group Inc. as assets under management and investment-management fees fell.
Translation: Las ganancias de Janus Capital disminuyen debido a menores ingresos DENVER - Los ingresos del tercer trimestre cayeron un 7 por ciento en Janus Capital Group Inc. debido a que los activos bajo gestión y las comisiones de gestión de inversiones disminuyeron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Janus Capital Group Inc. experienced a decrease in third-quarter earnings due to a 7 percent drop in revenue. This was a result of decreasing assets under their management and investment-management fees.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A 7 percent decrease in third-quarter revenue, resulting from diminishing assets under management and investment-management fees, caused a dip in earnings for Janus Capital Group Inc. in Denver.

Original Text: TechBrief: Judge clears Google on search ads Google won a major legal victory Wednesday when a US judge said the search engine could continue to sell ads triggered by searches that use trademarked company names.
Translation: Resumen Técnico: Juez absuelve a Google en anuncios de búsqueda. Google logró una importante victoria legal el miércoles cuando un juez de EE.UU. afirmó que el motor de búsqueda podría continuar vendiendo anuncios activados por búsquedas que utilizan nombres de empresas registrados como marca.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TechBrief: Google receives legal victory as Judge approves sale of search ads. On Wednesday, Google secured a substantial legal win when a US judge ruled that the tech giant could persist with its sales of ads prompted by searches utilizing trademarked company names.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jurisdiction Clears Google on Search Ads: Major Legal Win for Google. A US judge granted Google permission on Wednesday to pursue its strategy of selling ads that are initiated by searches involving trademarked company names, representing a significant legal triumph for the company.

Original Text: Redskins #39; Arrington out for Sunday Ashburn, VA (Sports Network) - Washington Redskins star linebacker LaVar Arrington will miss his fourth straight game after having right knee surgery last month.
Translation: Redskins # 39; Arrington fuera para el domingo Ashburn, VA (Sports Network) - La estrella de los Washington Redskins, el linebacker LaVar Arrington, se perderá su cuarto juego consecutivo después de haberse sometido a una cirugía de rodilla derecha el mes pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LaVar Arrington, the star linebacker for the Washington Redskins, will sit out his fourth consecutive game following a surgery on his right knee last month (Sports Network, Ashburn, VA).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Missing his fourth game in a row, Washington Redskins' standout linebacker, LaVar Arrington is out for Sunday due to a right knee surgery he had last month (Ashburn, VA, Sports Network).

Original Text: Microsoft Adds More Intelligence To SQL Server Microsoft has added new business intelligence (BI) capabilities to SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005; according to an announcement today at the 2004 Professional Association for SQL Server community summit in Orlando, USA.
Translation: Microsoft Agrega Más Inteligencia Al SQL Server Microsoft ha agregado nuevas capacidades de inteligencia empresarial (BI) al SQL Server 2000 y SQL Server 2005; según un anuncio hoy en la cumbre comunitaria de la Asociación Profesional para SQL Server 2004 en Orlando, EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a recent announcement at the 2004 Professional Association for SQL Server community summit in Orlando, USA, Microsoft unveiled that it has enriched SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005 with new business intelligence (BI) features.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft has introduced new business intelligence (BI) functionalities to SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005, as revealed at the 2004 Professional Association for SQL Server community conference held in Orlando, USA.

Original Text: Unseeded Vaidisova Wins Vancouver Open (AP) AP - Unseeded teenager Nicole Vaidisova defeated American Laura Granville 2-6, 6-4, 6-2 in the final of the Vancouver Open on Sunday.
Translation: Vaidisova Sin Cabeza de Serie Gana el Abierto de Vancouver (AP) AP - La adolescente Nicole Vaidisova, quien no tenía preclasificación, derrotó a la estadounidense Laura Granville 2-6, 6-4, 6-2 en la final del Abierto de Vancouver el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - Nicole Vaidisova, an unseeded teenager, triumphed over American Laura Granville with scores of 2-6, 6-4, 6-2, nabbing the Vancouver Open on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Sunday, unseeded young player Nicole Vaidisova clinched victory in the Vancouver Open's final by beating American Laura Granville 2-6, 6-4, 6-2 (AP).

Original Text: Paerson wins giant slalom, Kelly 11th SOELDEN, Austria (Ticker) - Sweden #39;s Anja Paerson began the season in the same dominating fashion she ended last season - winning the season-opening giant slalom for the first time in six appearances.
Translation: Paerson gana el slalom gigante, Kelly 11º SOELDEN, Austria (Ticker) - Anja Paerson de Suecia comenzó la temporada de la misma manera dominante en que terminó la última temporada: ganando el slalom gigante de apertura de temporada por primera vez en seis apariciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the same dominating prowess she exhibited at the end of last season, Anja Paerson from Sweden kicked off this season by securing her first victory in the season-opening giant slalom in six tries. Meanwhile, Kelly ranked 11th in SOELDEN, Austria.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Demonstrating the dominance that marked the conclusion of her previous season, Anja Paerson of Sweden won the giant slalom season opener in SOELDEN, Austria, a feat she achieved for the first time in half a dozen appearances. Concurrently, Kelly was positioned 11th.

Original Text: Retail sales rebound Retail sales rose more than expected in October and at their sharpest pace in three months, a survey has shown. The Confederation of British Industry said on Tuesday 37 percent of firms
Translation: Las ventas minoristas se recuperan. Las ventas minoristas aumentaron más de lo esperado en octubre y a su ritmo más rápido en tres meses, según mostró una encuesta. La Confederación de Industrias Británicas dijo el martes que el 37 por ciento de las empresas
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Confederation of British Industry revealed on Tuesday that 37 percent of firms reported an unexpected rise in retail sales for October, marking the highest acceleration in three months, according to a survey.

Original Text: Goodbye SNMP? Hello, WS-Management Laoping writes  quot;News.com has a story about a new Web services management specification designed to simplify network administration across a wide range of devices.
Translation: ¿Adiós SNMP? Hola, WS-Management Laoping escribe "News.com tiene una historia acerca de una nueva especificación de servicios web de gestión diseñada para simplificar la administración de redes en una amplia gama de dispositivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Laoping pens down a piece on a fresh Web services management specification aimed to uncomplicate network administration across versatile devices, as seen on News.com. This might lead to the phasing out of SNMP whilst welcoming WS-Management.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Could SNMP be replaced? News.com features a story about a new web services management standard, penned by Laoping, anticipating to make administering a variety of devices easier, welcoming the era of WS-Management.

Original Text: Opportunistic defense helps Jets improve When Jets coach Herman Edwards started reviewing the many problems that plagued his defense last year, one glaring weakness jumped out at him.
