Translation: La defensa oportunista ayuda a los Jets a mejorar. Cuando el entrenador de los Jets, Herman Edwards, comenzó a revisar los numerosos problemas que aquejaban a su defensa el año pasado, una debilidad flagrante saltó a su vista.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jets coach Herman Edwards, while examining the myriad issues of his defense from the previous year, noticed one prominent defect. This paved the way for an opportunistic defense to facilitate improvement for the Jets.

Original Text: Redskins Trail, 17-14 The Redskins get off to a fast start -- scoring 46 seconds into the game -- but now trail the Eagles, 17-14, in the fourth quarter at FedEx Field.
Translation: Sendero de los Redskins, 17-14 Los Redskins comienzan con un rápido inicio - anotando 46 segundos en el juego - pero ahora van detrás de los Eagles, 17-14, en el cuarto trimestre en el FedEx Field.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a swift start with a score within the first 46 seconds of the game, the Redskins are currently lagging behind the Eagles with a scoreline of 17-14 in the fourth quarter at FedEx field.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even after scoring in the first 46 seconds of the match, the Redskins find themselves trailing the Eagles 17-14 in the fourth quarter at FedEx Field.

Original Text: Italian premier tells EU immigration control top priority Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi said Thursday that the problem of immigration was one of three priority issues facing his government, the day after it resumed mass deportations of illegal immigrants.
Translation: El primer ministro italiano le dice a la UE que el control de la inmigración es la máxima prioridad. El Primer Ministro italiano, Silvio Berlusconi, dijo el jueves que el problema de la inmigración era uno de los tres temas prioritarios que enfrenta su gobierno, el día después de que se reanudaran las deportaciones masivas de inmigrantes ilegales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Silvio Berlusconi, the Italian Prime Minister, announced on Thursday that immigration control is amongst his government's top three priorities, following the resumption of mass deportations of illegal immigrants the day before.

Original Text: Thrilling Relay Win Gets Phelps Third Gold ATHENS, Greece - Now this was a duel in the pool. With Michael Phelps leading off Tuesday night, the United States bested its top rival in the most thrilling race of the Athens Games...
Translation: Emocionante Victoria en Relevo Hace que Phelps Obtenga su Tercer Oro ATENAS, Grecia - Ahora sí, fue un duelo en la piscina. Con Michael Phelps iniciando la competencia el martes por la noche, Estados Unidos superó a su principal rival en la carrera más emocionante de los Juegos de Atenas...
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS, Greece - In an exciting showdown, the United States emerged victorious over their greatest competitor with Michael Phelps at the lead on Tuesday night. This exhilarating relay win resulted in Phelps' third gold medal during the Athens Games...
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a riveting aquatic competition in Athens, Greece - Michael Phelps, leading the race on Tuesday Night, guided the United States to a triumphant win against their toughest adversary, clinching his third gold in the process during the exhilarating Athens Games...

Original Text: Samsung working on tiny drive com September 29, 2004, 6:50 PM PT. With the economy slowly turning up, upgrading hardware has been on businesses radar in the past 12 months as their number two priority.
Translation: Samsung trabaja en una unidad de disco minúscula según Com el 29 de septiembre de 2004, 6:50 PM PT. Con la economía recuperándose lentamente, la actualización de hardware ha estado en el radar de las empresas en los últimos 12 meses como su segunda prioridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As of September 29, 2004, 6:50 PM PT, Samsung has been developing a small drive system. With a gradual improvement in the economy, businesses have placed hardware upgrades high on their agenda, making it their second priority over the last year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Samsung has been involved in the development of a mini drive since September 29, 2004, 6:50 PM PT. Amid a slowly improving economy, hardware advancement has emerged as the second most crucial concern for businesses in the preceding 12 months.

Original Text: NASCAR point dock for swear drops Little E into 2nd in Nextel Cup <b>...</b> (Daytona Beach, Florida-AP) Oct. 5, 2004 - A slip of the tongue has cost Dale Earnhardt, Junior, first place in the Nextel Cup standings.
Translation: La penalización de puntos de NASCAR por maldecir reduce a Little E al 2do lugar en la Copa Nextel <b>...</b> (Daytona Beach, Florida-AP) 5 de octubre de 2004 - Un desliz de la lengua le ha costado a Dale Earnhardt, Junior, el primer lugar en la clasificación de la Copa Nextel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Daytona Beach, Florida-AP) Oct. 5, 2004 - Due to a verbal slip, Dale Earnhardt Jr. has lost his leading position in the Nextel Cup rankings as NASCAR penalizes for swearing, pushing him to second place.

Original Text: Murder police carry out searches Police investigating the murder of a woman in south-west London carry out house-to-house inquiries.
Translation: La policía de homicidios realiza registros. La policía que investiga el asesinato de una mujer en el suroeste de Londres lleva a cabo investigaciones de casa en casa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Police, who are investigating a woman's murder in south-west London, are conducting house-to-house inquiries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. House-to-house inquiries are being conducted by police investigating a murder of a woman in south-west London.

Original Text: BHP to sell interests in Laminaria and Corallina oil fields BHP Billiton Limited (BHP) today announced it has agreed to sell its interests in the Laminaria and Corallina oil fields to Paladin Oil  amp; Gas (Australia) Pty Limited, a fully owned subsidiary of Paladin Resources plc, an independent oil and gas company
Translation: BHP venderá sus intereses en los campos de petróleo Laminaria y Corallina BHP Billiton Limited (BHP) anunció hoy que ha acordado vender sus intereses en los campos de petróleo Laminaria y Corallina a Paladin Oil & Gas (Australia) Pty Limited, una subsidiaria totalmente propiedad de Paladin Resources plc, una compañía independiente de petróleo y gas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BHP Billiton Limited, today, declared that they have consented to pass on their stakes in the Laminaria and Corallina oil fields to Paladin Oil & Gas, a fully owned subsidiary of Paladin Resources, an independent oil and gas firm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Paladin Oil & Gas, an entirely owned subsidiary of Paladin Resources, an independent gas and oil company, is set to acquire the interests in the Laminaria and Corallina oil fields from BHP Billiton Limited, as per the announcement made today.

Original Text: With budget set, NASA plans next move Flush with a newly approved \$16.2 billion budget, NASA will be able to flesh out a way to save the Hubble Space Telescope, choose a new spacecraft and develop new ways to get back to the moon, Administrator Sean O #39;Keefe said Tuesday.
Translation: Con un presupuesto establecido, la NASA planea el siguiente paso. Con un nuevo presupuesto aprobado de 16,2 mil millones de dólares, la NASA podrá perfilar una forma de salvar el Telescopio Espacial Hubble, elegir una nueva nave espacial y desarrollar nuevas formas de volver a la luna, dijo el martes el Administrador Sean O'Keefe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NASA, now having an approved budget of $16.2 billion, is set to devise a strategy to rescue the Hubble Space Telescope, select a new spacecraft, and innovate methods to return to the moon, according to Administrator Sean O'Keefe's Tuesday announcement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Funded by a newly sanctioned $16.2 billion budget, NASA's next steps, as outlined by Administrator Sean O'Keefe on Tuesday, include formulating a plan to preserve the Hubble Space Telescope, picking out a new spacecraft, and creating new paths to make a lunar comeback.

Original Text: Typhoon Nock-ten lashes Taiwan, bringing heavy rain and fierce <b>...</b> Typhoon Nock-ten battered Taiwan on Monday as the storm #39;s eye whirled just off the island #39;s eastern coast, drenching mountainous regions with rain that could trigger deadly mudslides.
Translation: El tifón Nock-ten azota Taiwán, trayendo fuertes lluvias y feroces <b>...</b> El tifón Nock-ten golpeó a Taiwán el lunes mientras el ojo de la tormenta giraba justo en la costa este de la isla, empapando las regiones montañosas con lluvias que podrían desencadenar mortales deslizamientos de tierra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Typhoon Nock-ten hammered Taiwan, the storm's eye rotating dangerously close to the island's east coast, and potential fatal mudslides could be triggered by the rain it dumped on the mountain regions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The eastern coast of Taiwan was just missed by Typhoon Nock-ten's tumultuous eye on Monday, as it threw down heavy rain in the highlands that possess the risk of causing deadly landslides.

Original Text: Dollar Weighed Down by PPI, Trade Reports  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar eased against major  currencies on Friday, as analysts fretted over the U.S. trade  deficit number for July, which came in narrower than expected,  but was still the second-highest on record.
Translation: El Dólar se Deprecia debido al IPP y a los Informes de Comercio NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar se debilitó frente a las principales divisas el viernes, ya que los analistas se preocuparon por el déficit comercial de Estados Unidos para julio, que fue más estrecho de lo esperado, pero aún así fue el segundo más alto registrado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar came under pressure against key currencies on Friday as the U.S. trade deficit for July recorded the second-highest number, although slightly lower than expected, stirring anxiety among analysts.

Original Text: Contractor Maximus Subpoenaed  Maximus Inc., which manages federal programs for state and local governments, disclosed yesterday that federal prosecutors have subpoenaed records connected to Medicaid reimbursement claims it prepared for the District.
Translation: El Contratista Maximus Recibe Citación Judicial: Maximus Inc., que gestiona programas federales para gobiernos estatales y locales, reveló ayer que los fiscales federales han citado registros relacionados con reclamaciones de reembolso de Medicaid que preparó para el Distrito.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Maximus Inc., a contractor that handles federal programs for state and local governments, revealed yesterday that it has been subpoenaed by federal prosecutors for records related to the Medicaid reimbursement claims it processed for the District.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, it was disclosed by Maximus Inc., a firm managing federal programs for state and local governmental bodies, that their records linked to Medicaid reimbursement claims made for the District have been subpoenaed by federal prosecutors.

Original Text: Ukraine votes for new leader as Russia and the West watch <b>...</b> KIEV : Hundreds of thousands of pro-Western and pro-Russian activists mobilized across Ukraine as the former Soviet republic headed into a stormy weekend vote that Washington warned would spark unspecified  quot;measures quot; if rigged by the state.
Translation: Ucrania vota por un nuevo líder mientras Rusia y Occidente observan <b>...</b> KIEV: Cientos de miles de activistas prooccidentales y prorrusos se movilizaron por toda Ucrania mientras la antigua república soviética conducía hacia un voto en un fin de semana tempestuoso que Washington advirtió que provocaría "medidas" no especificadas si es manipulado por el estado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the midst of hundreds of thousands of pro-Russian and pro-Western activists rallying across the country, Ukraine goes to the polls to elect a new leader, under the scrutiny of both Russia and the West. The United States cautions that a rigged outcome by the state would invite undefined 'measures'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The ex-Soviet republic of Ukraine, amidst a tense weekend vote and rallying by numerous pro-Russian and pro-Western activists, elects a new leader while Russia and the West keep a close eye. Washington issues a warning of potential 'measures' should the state wield influence to control the election results.

Original Text: Strong quakes rattle Japan A series of powerful earthquakes rocked northwestern Japan within minutes of each other on Saturday leaving 13 dead and over 700 injured.
Translation: Fuertes terremotos sacuden Japón. Una serie de poderosos sismos sacudieron el noroeste de Japón en cuestión de minutos el sábado, dejando 13 muertos y más de 700 heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Northwestern Japan was severely shaken by a series of potent earthquakes on Saturday, which resulted in the demise of 13 people and injuries to more than 700.

Original Text: High-Tech Hearing Bypasses Ears New consumer devices use bone-conduction technology to produce sound by vibrating the bones around the hearer's ear, so the sound is all in your head. By Laila Weir.
Translation: Aparatos de Audición de Alta Tecnología Evitan los Oídos. Los nuevos dispositivos para el consumidor utilizan la tecnología de conducción ósea para producir sonido vibrando los huesos alrededor del oído del oyente, por lo que el sonido está completamente en tu cabeza. Por Laila Weir.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "New devices for consumers employ bone-conduction technology to generate sound by making the bones surrounding the listener's ears vibrate, producing a sound that's entirely in their head. This high-tech solution bypasses traditional hearing methods. Written by Laila Weir.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Laila Weir writes about the new consumer technology that uses bone-conduction to create sound. The high-tech process works by vibrating the bones near the user's ear, which means the sound is completely internal."

Original Text: Roy Keane charged with assault Manchester United captain Roy Keane has been charged with assault and criminal damage for a fight on September 4, police say. The Ireland international is due to appear before Trafford Magistrates
Translation: Roy Keane acusado de asalto. El capitán del Manchester United, Roy Keane, ha sido acusado de asalto y daños criminales por una pelea ocurrida el 4 de septiembre, según la policía. Se espera que el internacional de Irlanda comparezca ante los magistrados de Trafford.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Manchester United's captain, Roy Keane, is facing charges of assault and criminal damage related to a September 4 fight, as per the police. The Irish international player is expected to present himself before Trafford Magistrates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Police have reported that Roy Keane, the captain of Manchester United and Ireland International, was charged over a fight on September 4, contributing to accusations of assault and criminal damage. He's scheduled to appear before the Trafford Magistrates.

Original Text: Who should win: Buck Showalter Dick Vermeil looks as if he #39;s on the verge of tears, Jon Stewart has finished a bizarre and semi-coherent interview with Desmond Tutu, and the Blog #39;s flight to Atlanta for the Braves-Astros series boards in a few hours.
Translation: ¿Quién debería ganar: Buck Showalter o Dick Vermeil parece estar al borde de las lágrimas, Jon Stewart ha terminado una extraña y semi-coherente entrevista con Desmond Tutu, y el vuelo del Blog a Atlanta para la serie Braves-Astros despega en unas pocas horas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Buck Showalter, on the verge of tears, appears as though he should win; whereas Dick Vermeil has just completed a rather peculiar and somewhat unclear interview with Desmond Tutu. Meanwhile, in a few hours, the flight bound for Atlanta for the Braves-Astros series is set to board according to the Blog.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It seems that Buck Showalter, who is close to crying, should be the winner; concurrently, Jon Stewart concludes a bewildering and semi-understandable conversation with Desmond Tutu. Simultaneously, in some hours, the Blog's airborne journey for the Braves-Astros series in Atlanta is scheduled.

Original Text: Microsoft, Others File More Anti-Spam Lawsuits Microsoft Corp. and other Internet access providers filed three new lawsuits on Thursday to stop the spread of unsolicited e-mail messages touting everything from home refinancing to miracle health cures.
Translation: Microsoft, otros presentan más demandas contra el correo no deseado. Microsoft Corp. y otros proveedores de acceso a Internet presentaron tres nuevas demandas el jueves para detener la propagación de mensajes de correo electrónico no solicitados que promocionan de todo, desde la refinanciación de viviendas hasta curas milagrosas para la salud.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft Corp, along with other Internet access providers, initiated three fresh lawsuits on Thursday with a view to hinder the distribution of unsolicited emails offering a myriad of things, ranging from home refinancing to alleged miracle health cures.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an effort to cease the proliferation of unwanted e-mails promoting everything from home refinancing to supposed miracle health cures, Microsoft Corporation and various other Internet access providers instigated three additional lawsuits on Thursday.

Original Text: 10 Killed by Bombs at Bangladesh Rally DHAKA, Bangladesh Aug. 21, 2004 - A series of bombs exploded as a top Bangladeshi opposition leader was speaking at a rally from atop a truck Saturday, killing at least 14 people and injuring hundreds, witnesses and news reports said.
Translation: 10 muertos por bombas en un mitin en Bangladesh. DHAKA, Bangladesh, 21 de agosto de 2004 - Una serie de bombas explotaron mientras un líder de la oposición de Bangladesh hablaba en un mitin desde lo alto de un camión el sábado, matando al menos a 14 personas e hiriendo a cientos, según testigos e informes de noticias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At a rally in Bangladesh where a key opposition leader was delivering a speech from a truck, multiple bombs detonated, resulting in at least 14 fatalities and hundreds of injuries, according to eyewitnesses and news coverage. This tragic event happened on Saturday, August 21, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A string of bomb explosions occurred at a political rally in Dhaka, Bangladesh on August 21, 2004. These explosions took place while a prominent Bangladeshi opposition leader was addressing the crowd from a truck, killing a minimum of 14 individuals and causing injuries to hundreds more - as reported by witnesses and news outlets.

Original Text: ICANN beats VeriSign #39;s antitrust claim ICANN, the body responsible for the internets domain naming system, has convinced a court to dismiss an antitrust lawsuit filed against it by domain registry VeriSign over its interference with the launch of VeriSign #39;s Site Finder service.
Translation: ICANN gana la demanda de monopolio de VeriSign #39; ICANN, el organismo responsable del sistema de nombres de dominio de internet, ha convencido a un tribunal para desestimar una demanda de monopolio presentada contra él por el registro de dominios VeriSign debido a su interferencia con el lanzamiento del servicio Site Finder de VeriSign #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ICANN, the organization in charge of the internet's domain naming system, successfully persuaded a court to dismiss an antitrust lawsuit lodged against it by domain registry VeriSign pertaining to its obstruction of the launch of VeriSign's Site Finder service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A court has been swayed to reject an antitrust suit against ICANN, the entity governing the internet's domain naming system, which was initiated by domain registry VeriSign in response to the interferences with the commencement of VeriSign's Site Finder service.

Original Text: Henman Makes It Third Time Lucky in Madrid  MADRID (Reuters) - Top seed Tim Henman finally won a match  at the Madrid Masters Wednesday, producing a classy display to  beat Spain's Albert Costa 6-4, 6-2, and reach the third round.
Translation: Henman lo logra a la tercera en Madrid  MADRID (Reuters) - El cabeza de serie Tim Henman finalmente ganó un partido en el Masters de Madrid el miércoles, mostrando un despliegue elegante para vencer al español Albert Costa 6-4, 6-2, y avanzar a la tercera ronda.
Paraphrase 1: 1) MADRID (Reuters) - Securing a victory at the Madrid Masters on Wednesday was top seed Tim Henman, who displayed an impressive performance to defeat Spain's Albert Costa 6-4, 6-2, marking his passage to the third round.
Paraphrase 2: 2) MADRID (Reuters) - At the Madrid Masters, it was triumphant third attempt for top-seeded Tim Henman, who elegantly outperformed Spain's Albert Costa with a 6-4, 6-2 win Wednesday, thus progressing into the third round.

Original Text: Finally, Fall Racing Meaningful If the Chase for the Championship is really supposed to be the elite part of the schedule, why does it include such mundane races as the fall events at New Hampshire, Dover and Martinsville and not the Daytona 500 or Brickyard 400?
Translation: Finalmente, las Carreras de Otoño son Significativas. Si la Carrera por el Campeonato se supone realmente que es la parte élite del calendario, ¿por qué incluye carreras tan mundanas como los eventos de otoño en New Hampshire, Dover y Martinsville y no las 500 millas de Daytona o las 400 del Brickyard?
Paraphrase 1: 1. If the Chase for the Championship is truly considered the pinnacle of the schedule, why does it include seemingly ordinary races like those in New Hampshire, Dover, and Martinsville during fall, yet excludes notable events such as the Daytona 500 or Brickyard 400?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Isn't it strange that the Chase for the Championship, being the ultimate highlight of the schedule, constitutes such typical races as the ones at New Hampshire, Dover, and Martinsville in the fall, but doesn't comprise significant ones like Daytona 500 or Brickyard 400?

Original Text: More GIs, Families Trust Bush, Poll Finds (AP) AP - When asked whom they would trust as commander in chief, people in military service and their families chose President Bush over Sen. John Kerry, a decorated Vietnam veteran, by almost a 3-to-1 margin.
Translation: Más GIs, Familias Confían en Bush, Encuentra Encuesta (AP) AP - Cuando se les preguntó a quién confiarían como comandante en jefe, las personas en servicio militar y sus familias eligieron al Presidente Bush sobre el Sen. John Kerry, un veterano condecorado de Vietnam, por casi un margen de 3 a 1.
Paraphrase 1: (AP) AP - A poll reveals that people serving in the military and their families preferred President Bush, almost three times more than Sen. John Kerry, a decorated Vietnam veteran, as their commander in chief.
Paraphrase 2: (AP) AP - According to a poll, individuals in military service and their relatives were almost thrice as likely to select President Bush as their trusted commander in chief over Sen. John Kerry, a decorated Vietnam veteran.

Original Text: Twins Lead the Yankees 6-5 in 12th NEW YORK Oct. 6, 2004 - Torri Hunter hit a long home run off Tanyon Sturtze in the 12th inning as the Minnesota Twins took a 6-5 lead over the New York Yankees on Wednesday in their best-of-five series in the AL playoffs.
Translation: Los Gemelos lideran a los Yankees 6-5 en el 12° NUEVA YORK, Oct. 6, 2004 - Torri Hunter conectó un largo jonrón contra Tanyon Sturtze en la duodécima entrada, mientras los Gemelos de Minnesota tomaron una ventaja de 6-5 sobre los Yankees de Nueva York el miércoles en su serie al mejor de cinco en los playoffs de la Liga Americana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, October 6, 2004, in their best-of-five series in the AL playoffs, the Minnesota Twins came into a 6-5 lead over the New York Yankees. The lead happened after Torri Hunter hit a spectacular home run off Tanyon Sturtze during the 12th inning.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Minnesota Twins got the better of the New York Yankees with a 6-5 lead in their AL playoffs, part of their best-of-five series, thanks to Torri Hunter's impressive home run off Tanyon Sturtze in the 12th inning. The game took course in New York, on Wednesday, October 6, 2004.

Original Text: Alitalia Holding Relaunch Plan Meeting After winning union backing for job cuts, Alitalia was holding a board of directors meeting Monday to approve a restructuring plan aimed at saving the near-bankrupt Italian carrier from collapse.
Translation: Alitalia Holding celebra reunión para relanzar el plan después de ganar el respaldo del sindicato para los recortes de empleos. Alitalia estaba celebrando una reunión de la junta de directores el lunes para aprobar un plan de reestructuración destinado a salvar al casi en bancarrota transportista italiano del colapso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the attainment of union support for job reductions, Alitalia, which was on the brink of bankruptcy, called for a board of directors meeting on Monday to sanction a revival strategy that intends to rescue the struggling Italian airline.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With union approval for workforce reductions in place, Alitalia, a nearly insolvent Italian carrier, scheduled a board of directors meeting for Monday to endorse a restructuring blueprint designed to avert its imminent crash.

Original Text: F1 back to Mexico Starting 2006 The five-year agreement calls for a new 5-kilometer race track just south of Cancun #39;s international airport. Construction of the \$70 million track is expected to begin in January, with the first race possibly taking place in October 2006.
Translation: F1 regresa a México a partir de 2006. El acuerdo de cinco años establece un nuevo circuito de carreras de 5 kilómetros justo al sur del aeropuerto internacional de Cancún. Se espera que la construcción del circuito de 70 millones de dólares comience en enero, y es posible que la primera carrera tenga lugar en octubre de 2006.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under a five-year contract that began in 2006, F1 returned to Mexico and implemented a new 5-kilometer race track just south of Cancun's international airport. The construction of this $70-million-dollar track started in January, and the inaugural race was anticipated for October 2006.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a five-year deal initiated in 2006, F1 racing made a comeback to Mexico and was set to introduce a new 5-kilometer race track positioned near Cancun's international airport. The project with a budget of $70 million was slated to start construction in January, leading up to the first potential race in October 2006.

Original Text: Health Premiums Rose 5 Times Faster Than Income in 2004 The figures from a survey released today are likely to throw more people into the ranks of the uninsured, analysts said.
Translation: Las primas de salud aumentaron 5 veces más rápido que los ingresos en 2004. Los datos de una encuesta publicada hoy probablemente provocarán que más personas se sumen a las filas de los no asegurados, dijeron los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts, responding to figures released today from a recent survey, suggest that more individuals are likely to be uninsured as health premiums surged at a rate five times quicker than income in 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Surging five times more rapidly than income in 2004, health premiums are predicted to push more individuals into the uninsured bracket, according to a survey's results released today, and as interpreted by analysts.

Original Text: Spammers get taste of their own medicine Internet users are being given the chance to hit back at the spammers that have become the scourge of the web, thanks to free software being distributed by Lycos Europe, the internet portal.
Translation: Los spammers tienen una probada de su propia medicina. Se está dando a los usuarios de Internet la oportunidad de contraatacar a los spammers que se han convertido en la plaga de la web, gracias a un software gratuito que está distribuyendo Lycos Europe, el portal de internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Internet users now have an opportunity to retaliate against the web spammers that have plagued the internet, courtesy of free software provided by Lycos Europe, the internet portal. They are effectively letting spammers experience a dose of their own medicine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lycos Europe, an internet portal, is distributing free software, offering internet users the opportunity to give spammers a taste of their own frustration. This initiative allows users to hit back at web spammers who have been a consistent nuisance.

Original Text: How to Make Millions, Slowly In the best combination of tobacco  #39;n #39; food news since Homer Simpson #39;s tomacco, today Altria Group (NYSE: MO) and its cheesy stepchild Kraft (NYSE: KFT) both upped their dividends.
Translation: Cómo hacer millones, lentamente En la mejor combinación de noticias de tabaco y comida desde el tomacco de Homer Simpson, hoy Altria Group (NYSE: MO) y su hijastro quesero Kraft (NYSE: KFT) ambos aumentaron sus dividendos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an exciting event reminiscent of Homer Simpson's tomacco combination, Altria Group (NYSE: MO) and its subsidiary Kraft (NYSE: KFT) have both decided to increase their dividends, demonstrating how to generate millions at a slow pace.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pottering along the lines of Homer Simpson's extraordinary fusion of tobacco and food, tomacco, Altria Group (NYSE: MO) and its affiliated company Kraft (NYSE: KFT) today took a step towards the gradual accumulation of millions by raising their dividends.

Original Text: Consultant to review United plan; unions drop lawsuit United Airlines agreed Friday to hire a consulting firm to review its pending business plan, a step sought by two unions in exchange for dropping legal action against the carrier.
Translation: Consultor para revisar el plan de United; los sindicatos abandonan la demanda United Airlines acordó el viernes contratar a una firma de consultoría para revisar su plan de negocios pendiente, un paso solicitado por dos sindicatos a cambio de abandonar las acciones legales contra la aerolínea.
Paraphrase 1: 1. United Airlines consented on Friday to engage a consulting firm to evaluate their impending business strategy - a move precipitated by two unions' request in return for abandoning their lawsuit against the airline.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, in an agreement to have a consulting firm scrutinize their anticipated business proposal, United Airlines received assurance from two unions to halt legal proceedings against them.

Original Text: The man who killed Veerappan It is perhaps appropriate that the man who has killed the most-wanted brigand in the country should be called K Vijay Kumar. The 1975 batch police officer from the Tamil Nadu cadre had volunteered in 2000
Translation: Quizás sea apropiado que el hombre que ha matado al bandido más buscado en el país se llame K Vijay Kumar. El oficial de policía de la generación de 1975 de la división de Tamil Nadu se ofreció como voluntario en 2000 para matar a Veerappan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. K Vijay Kumar, a 1975 batch police officer from the Tamil Nadu cadre, is possibly fittingly known as the man who brought down Veerappan, the most-wanted outlaw in the country. He had volunteered for this mission back in 2000.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The officer who ended the reign of Veerappan, the country's most notorious brigand, fittingly goes by the name K Vijay Kumar. Volunteering for this task in 2000, the police officer of the 1975 batch hails from the Tamil Nadu cadre.

Original Text: Athens ticket sales  #39;improving #39; ATHENS, Greece (AP) -- Olympic organizers announced that more than half of available tickets (3.1 million) to the Games have been sold, almost reaching the budget for purchases.
Translation: Venta de entradas en Atenas #39; mejorando #39; ATENAS, Grecia (AP) -- Los organizadores olímpicos anunciaron que se han vendido más de la mitad de las entradas disponibles (3.1 millones) para los Juegos, casi alcanzando el presupuesto para las compras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS, Greece (AP) -- The Olympic organizing committee has revealed that over half the tickets for the Games, equating to 3.1 million, have been sold, which is nearing the expected budget for sales. They indicated an improvement in ticket sales in Athens.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per the Olympic organizers in Athens, Greece (AP), there has been an upgrade in ticket sales, with more than 3.1 million tickets or half of the total availability being sold, almost matching the projected ticket sales budget.

Original Text: Probe of No-Show Reservists Underway A platoon in Iraq is being investigated for allegedly refusing to carry out a convoy mission its members deemed too dangerous, Army officials said Friday.
Translation: Investigación en Curso de Reservistas Ausentes. Se está investigando a un pelotón en Irak por presuntamente rehusar llevar a cabo una misión de convoy que sus miembros consideraron demasiado peligrosa, dijeron el viernes funcionarios del Ejército.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Army officials announced an investigation on Friday into a platoon stationed in Iraq that is accused of declining a convoy mission its members considered excessively perilous, titled as 'Probe of No-Show Reservists'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 'Probe of No-Show Reservists' is currently being conducted, where a platoon located in Iraq is under scrutiny for purported refusal to undertake a risky convoy mission, as announced by Army Officials on Friday.

Original Text: Ireland cracks down on net scams Ireland is taking  quot;extraordinary quot; measures to protect internet users from rogue dialler programs that hijack their modems and run up long-distance phone charges, the country #39;s telecom regulator says.
Translation: Irlanda toma medidas contra las estafas en la red. Irlanda está tomando medidas "extraordinarias" para proteger a los usuarios de internet de los programas de marcación engañosos que secuestran sus módems y acumulan cargos de larga distancia en sus teléfonos, según indica el regulador de telecomunicaciones del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The telecom regulator stated that Ireland is implementing "extraordinary" procedures to defend its internet users from fraudulent diallers that usurp their modems and result in large long-distance phone bills.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Rogue dialler programs that take over modems and cause high long-distance phone charges are being vigorously combated in Ireland through "extraordinary" actions, as revealed by the country's telecom regulator.

Original Text: Arafat to fly to Paris for urgent medical treatment Ramallah, West Bank: Ailing Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat is to fly to France from his West Bank headquarters to treat what doctors have described as a potentially fatal blood disorder.
Translation: Arafat volará a París para un tratamiento médico urgente. Ramallah, Cisjordania: El enfermo líder palestino Yasser Arafat volará a Francia desde su sede en Cisjordania para tratar lo que los médicos han descrito como un trastorno sanguíneo potencialmente mortal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ramallah, West Bank: Yasser Arafat, the sickly Palestinian leader, plans to travel by air from his West Bank office to Paris for major medical intervention related to a serious blood disease which doctors warn could be life-threatening.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, currently in poor health, is slated to leave his base in the West Bank for Paris to receive emergency medical attention for what physicians call a potentially lethal blood ailment. Ramallah, West Bank: This is where Arafat currently resides.

Original Text: Army: May Not Withhold Halliburton Money  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The U.S. Army on Tuesday appeared to  reverse a decision to stop paying a portion of Halliburton  Co.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HAL.N</A> bills in Iraq and gave the company more time to  resolve a billing dispute.
Translation: Ejército: Puede que no retenga dinero de Halliburton WASHINGTON (Reuters) - El martes, el Ejército de los EE. UU. pareció revertir una decisión de dejar de pagar una parte de las facturas de la empresa Halliburton Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HAL.N</A> en Irak y dio a la compañía más tiempo para resolver una disputa de facturación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - On Tuesday, the U.S. Army seemed to overturn a previous decision to cease the partial payment of Halliburton Co.'s bills in Iraq, additionally granting the company extended time to settle a billing disagreement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A previous decision by the U.S. Army to withhold part of the payment to Halliburton Co. in Iraq was backtracked on Tuesday, giving the company additional time to resolve a dispute over the bills.

Original Text: Approval Expected for Big Cellphone Deal Federal regulators will formally approve Cingular Wireless \$41 billion purchase of AT  T Wireless, according to company officials briefed on the matter.
Translation: Se espera aprobación para gran acuerdo de telefonía móvil. Los reguladores federales aprobarán formalmente la compra de AT&T Wireless por $41 mil millones de dólares por parte de Cingular Wireless, según informaron funcionarios de la empresa familiarizados con el asunto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Federal regulators are set to officially sanction Cingular Wireless's acquisition of AT&T Wireless, which is worth $41 billion, as per informed company officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Company officials, who have been briefed about the situation, suggest that Cingular Wireless's $41 billion acquisition of AT&T Wireless will be officially endorsed by federal regulators.

Original Text: Licensing Plan Makes Microsoft a Utility Player Opinion: A decision to continue charging for server software based on CPUs and not cores will make Microsoft server software a much more attractive alternative to utility computing providers.
Translation: Plan de Licencias Hace de Microsoft un Jugador de Utilidades Opinión: Una decisión de continuar cobrando por el software de servidor basado en CPUs y no en núcleos, hará que el software de servidor de Microsoft sea una alternativa mucho más atractiva para los proveedores de computación en la nube.
Paraphrase 1: Opinion: Microsoft's decision to keep its server software licensing costs based on CPUs rather than cores will make it a more appealing option compared to utility computing providers.
Paraphrase 2: Opinion: The decision of Microsoft to persist with server software fees on the basis of CPUs instead of cores positions it as a desirable alternative to utility computing providers.

Original Text: Economy posts surprise growth: 6.2 in 2nd quarter ELECTION spending and increased usage of cellular phones allowed the Philippine economy to grow by 6.2 percent in the April-June quarter despite the government #39;s fragile fiscal position, official data showed Monday.
Translation: La economía registra un crecimiento sorpresa: 6.2 en el 2do trimestre. El gasto electoral y el aumento en el uso de teléfonos celulares permitieron que la economía filipina creciera un 6.2 por ciento en el trimestre de abril a junio a pesar de la frágil posición fiscal del gobierno, mostraron datos oficiales el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Monday's official data revealed that, despite the government's precarious financial state, the Philippine economy experienced an unexpected 6.2 percent growth during the April-June quarter, fueled by election spending and a surge in cellular phone usage.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Election expenditures and heightened use of mobile phones supported the surprising 6.2 percent expansion of the Philippine economy in the second quarter, from April to June, as revealed by official data on Monday, notwithstanding the government's unstable fiscal situation.

Original Text: Virtual veins give nurses a hand \A virtual reality hand, complete with vital veins, that "feels" could help trainee nurses practise their jabs.
Translation: Las venas virtuales facilitan las cosas a las enfermeras. Una mano en realidad virtual, completa con venas vitales, que "siente" podría ayudar a las enfermeras en prácticas a perfeccionar sus inyecciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Virtual veins assist nurses by providing a hand model in virtual reality, offering a "real feel" experience to help nursing students perfect their injections.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The practice of injections for trainee nurses can be improved with the help of a virtual reality hand that features lifelike veins.

Original Text: Real sells 3m tracks at a loss RealNetworks says it increased its share of the online music market after halving the price of tunes.
Translation: Real vende 3 millones de pistas con pérdidas. RealNetworks afirma que aumentó su cuota en el mercado de música en línea después de reducir a la mitad el precio de las canciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. RealNetworks claims its portion of the online music market has grown after it cut the price of its songs in half, even though it resulted in selling 3 million tracks at a loss.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After reducing the price of music tracks by 50%, RealNetworks states that its stake in the digital music sector expanded, despite experiencing a loss in the sales of 3 million tracks.

Original Text: On short rest, it's all up to Santana It's now up to the ace to extend the Twins' season. Putative Cy Young winner Johan Santana will get the call and the ball today, working on only three days' rest to keep Minnesota alive in their Division Series with the Yankees.
Translation: Con poco descanso, todo depende de Santana. Ahora le toca al as prolongar la temporada de los Twins. El supuesto ganador del Cy Young, Johan Santana, recibirá la llamada y la pelota hoy, trabajando con solo tres días de descanso para mantener a Minnesota con vida en su Serie Divisional contra los Yankees.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The responsibility now falls on Santana to prolong the Twins' season. In an attempt to keep Minnesota in their Division Series against the Yankees, presumed Cy Young winner Johan Santana will take the action, operating on only three days' rest.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The duty is on Santana now to carry forward the Twins' season. Johan Santana, the potential Cy Young winner, will be operating today with only three days of rest in an effort to keep Minnesota competitive in their Division series against the Yankees.

Original Text: Enemies unite in plea for CNN man #39;s release IN a rare display of common interest, Palestinian and Israeli officials called yesterday for the freeing of a CNN producer seized by armed men in the Gaza Strip.
Translation: Enemigos se unen en súplica por la liberación de hombre de CNN #39; en una rara muestra de interés común, funcionarios palestinos e israelíes llamaron ayer a la liberación de un productor de CNN secuestrado por hombres armados en la Franja de Gaza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Palestinian and Israeli officials, showing a rare unity due to a shared concern, yesterday demanded the release of a CNN producer who was abducted by gunmen in the Gaza Strip.

Original Text: Santander tightens its grip on Abbey Banco Santander Central Hispano yesterday began to sever its 15-year ties with Royal Bank of Scotland to clear the way for its proposed 8.
Translation: "Santander aprieta su control sobre Abbey. Banco Santander Central Hispano comenzó ayer a romper sus lazos de 15 años con Royal Bank of Scotland para despejar el camino para su propuesta de 8."
Paraphrase 1: 1. Santander Central Hispano Banco commenced the termination of its 15-year association with Royal Bank of Scotland yesterday, in preparing for its suggested takeover of Abbey which will strengthen its hold.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Santander Central Hispano Banco started to cut off its longstanding relationship with Royal Bank of Scotland yesterday, to lay the groundwork for its proposed takeover of Abbey, thereby consolidating its control.

Original Text: Samsung expects to see  #39;05 chip growth halved Annual global semiconductor sales growth will probably fall by half in 2005 and memory chip sales could collapse as a supply glut saps prices, world-leading memory chip maker Samsung Electronics said on Monday.
Translation: Samsung espera que el crecimiento del chip del '05 se reduzca a la mitad. Es probable que el crecimiento anual de las ventas globales de semiconductores disminuya a la mitad en 2005 y las ventas de chips de memoria podrían derrumbarse debido a un exceso de oferta que agota los precios, dijo el lunes el fabricante líder mundial de chips de memoria, Samsung Electronics.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Samsung Electronics, the world's leading memory chip producer, stated on Monday that they foresee a 50% decrease in the annual global semiconductor sales growth in 2005. They further warned that a surfeit of supply could considerably reduce memory chip sales due to decreasing prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Samsung Electronics, the frontrunner in the memory chip industry, projected a drop to half in annual global semiconductor sales growth for 2005. The firm further suggested a potential plummet in memory chip sales due to an expected oversupply leading to a significant reduction in prices.

Original Text: SpaceShipOne Wins the X Prize The age of commercial space flight officially begins Monday as SpaceShipOne completes its second successful flight into space to capture the Ansari X Prize. It's \$10 million to the developers, who look forward to a bright future ahead. Dan Brekke reports from Mojave, California.
Translation: SpaceShipOne gana el Premio X. La era del vuelo espacial comercial comienza oficialmente el lunes cuando SpaceShipOne completa su segundo vuelo exitoso al espacio para capturar el Premio Ansari X. Son \$10 millones para los desarrolladores, quienes esperan un futuro brillante por delante. Dan Brekke informa desde Mojave, California.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Ansari X Prize, marking the commencement of commercial space flight, was officially won by SpaceShipOne on Monday after it successfully conducted its second flight into space. The developers, excited about a prosperous future, secure a prize of \$10 million. The news was reported by Dan Brekke from Mojave, California.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Monday marks the beginning of the commercial space exploration era officially as SpaceShipOne seizes the Ansari X Prize following their second triumphant space venture. The achievement brings \$10 million to the creators, who are optimistic about the coming times. Live from Mojave, California, this is Dan Brekke reporting.

Original Text: Pakistan Prepares Final Push In South Waziristan Pakistan #39;s military says it will remove remaining Al-Qaeda fighters and other Islamic militants from the mountainous region along the country #39;s border with Afghanistan within the next six weeks.
Translation: Pakistán prepara la última ofensiva en South Waziristán. El ejército de Pakistán dice que eliminará a los restantes combatientes de Al-Qaeda y otros militantes islámicos de la región montañosa a lo largo de la frontera del país con Afganistán en las próximas seis semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Pakistan's military has announced its plans to expel the last remnants of Al-Qaeda fighters and other Islamic militants from the country's mountainous border with Afghanistan in South Waziristan within the forthcoming six weeks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Within the next six weeks, Pakistan's military is gearing up for a final push to eradicate Al-Qaeda fighters and other Islamic militants from the mountainous South Waziristan region, situated along the country's Afghanistan border.

Original Text: Iran to respond over nuclear freeze LONDON, Oct 27 (IranMania) - Iran was to respond today to Europe #39;s offer for the Islamic Republic to avoid possible UN sanctions and receive nuclear technology by indefinitely suspending uranium enrichment, but there was little hope of a breakthrough
Translation: Irán responderá sobre la congelación nuclear LONDRES, 27 de octubre (IranMania) - Irán iba a responder hoy a la oferta de Europa para que la República Islámica evite posibles sanciones de la ONU y reciba tecnología nuclear mediante la suspensión indefinida del enriquecimiento de uranio, pero había pocas esperanzas de un avance.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "LONDON, Oct 27 (IranMania) - Today, Iran was set to react to Europe's proposal which involves the Islamic Republic forgoing potential UN penalties and gaining nuclear technology, in exchange for an indefinite halt to uranium enrichment. However, expectations for a positive resolution remained low.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "On Oct 27 in London, (IranMania) - Iran prepared to give its answer today to a deal offered by Europe. The deal included the Islamic Republic escaping potential UN repercussions and acquiring nuclear technology, provided they cease uranium enrichment indefinitely. Nonetheless, there was minimal optimism for any successful resolution.

Original Text: Janus settles; tab is \$226m DENVER -- Janus Capital Group Inc. said yesterday it has finalized a \$226.2 million settlement with state and federal regulators over allegations of improper market-timing trades.
Translation: Janus se instala; la cuenta es de $226m DENVER -- Janus Capital Group Inc. anunció ayer que ha finalizado un acuerdo de $226.2 millones con reguladores estatales y federales sobre las acusaciones de operaciones de sincronización de mercado inadecuadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DENVER -- Janus Capital Group Inc. announced yesterday that it has reached a final settlement worth $226.2 million with state and federal regulators, resolving accusations of unwarranted market-timing trades.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Janus Capital Group Inc. in Denver declared yesterday that it has concluded a settlement agreement amounting to $226.2 million with state and federal regulators, in response to claims of inappropriate market-timing trades.

Original Text: IBM Agrees to Settle Part of Federal Pension Lawsuit (Update3) International Business Machines Corp., the world #39;s largest computer maker, said it will pay at least \$300 million to settle part of a lawsuit that claimed the company #39;s pension plan discriminated against older workers.
Translation: IBM Acuerda Resolver Parte de la Demanda Federal de Pensiones (Actualización3) International Business Machines Corp., el fabricante de computadoras más grande del mundo, dijo que pagará al menos \$300 millones para resolver parte de una demanda que alegaba que el plan de pensiones de la compañía discriminaba a los trabajadores mayores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. International Business Machines Corp., globally the largest computer manufacturer, has announced the settlement of a segment of a federal pension lawsuit by agreeing to pay a minimum of $300 million. The lawsuit alleged that the corporation's pension plan was biased against elderly employees.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The world's leading computer producer, International Business Machines Corp., will disburse no less than $300 million to resolve a portion of a federal pension lawsuit accusing its pension scheme of prejudiced practices against older employees.

Original Text: Bonds Should Get Shot at 700 in Milwaukee (AP) AP - Barry Bonds didn't have to worry about another "not-in-my-ballpark" manager ordering his team to pitch around the San Francisco slugger. Ned Yost of the Milwaukee Brewers swore he wouldn't hold another walk-fest for Bonds, who entered a three-game series at Miller Park on Tuesday night one home run shy of joining Babe Ruth and Hank Aaron in the 700-homer club.
Translation: Los Bonos Deberían Tener Oportunidad de Alcanzar 700 en Milwaukee (AP) AP - Barry Bonds no tuvo que preocuparse por otro mánager de "no-en-mi-estadio" que ordenara a su equipo esquivar al poderoso bateador de San Francisco. Ned Yost de los Milwaukee Brewers juró que no organizaría otra caminata festiva para Bonds, quien entró a una serie de tres juegos en Miller Park el martes por la noche a un solo jonrón de unirse a Babe Ruth y Hank Aaron en el club de los 700 jonrones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bonds Could Get Chance to Hit 700th Home Run in Milwaukee (AP) - AP - Barry Bonds no longer required to fret over yet another manager instructing his team not to pitch to the San Francisco powerhouse. Assured by the Milwaukee Brewers' Ned Yost that he won't be enforcing more intentional walks for Bonds, he approached a three-game series at Miller Park on Tuesday night, just one big blow short of joining the elite 700 home run group, which only includes Babe Ruth and Hank Aaron so far.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Milwaukee, Bonds Could Attempt His 700th Home Run (AP) - AP - Managers unwilling to let their teams pitch to Barry Bonds were no longer a concern for the San Francisco big-hitter. Thanks to Ned Yost of the Milwaukee Brewers promising not to facilitate a walk repetition for Bonds, he headed into a three-game sequence at Miller Park on Tuesday night only one home run behind becoming the third member of the illustrious 700 home run club, alongside legends Babe Ruth and Hank Aaron.

Original Text: O #39;Neal, Heat keep rolling Shaquille O #39;Neal has the Miami Heat off to its best start ever after scoring 20 points, grabbing 9 rebounds and blocking 3 shots in a 103-93 victory over the visiting Washington Wizards on Tuesday night.
Translation: O'Neal, el Heat sigue en racha. Shaquille O'Neal tiene al Miami Heat en su mejor comienzo de siempre después de anotar 20 puntos, capturar 9 rebotes y bloquear 3 tiros en una victoria de 103-93 sobre los Washington Wizards visitantes el martes por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shaquille O'Neal propelled the Miami Heat to its greatest start ever by scoring 20 points, grabbing 9 rebounds, and blocking 3 shots, resulting in a 103-93 win over the Washington Wizards on Tuesday night.

Original Text: Wake Forest and Arizona Reach Final Providence played with sporadic consistency in a 79-67 loss to Wake Forest. The Demon Deacons will play Arizona, which beat Michigan in overtime, 61-60, in Thursday's final.
Translation: Wake Forest y Arizona llegan a la final. Providence jugó con una consistencia esporádica en una pérdida de 79-67 frente a Wake Forest. Los Demon Deacons jugarán contra Arizona, que venció a Michigan en tiempo extra, 61-60, en la final del jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Wake Forest overcame Providence with a performance of 79-67, which was punctuated by Providence's spotty consistency. In the final on Thursday, the Demon Deacons of Wake Forest will play against Arizona, who triumphed over Michigan in overtime with a close call of 61-60.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Providence showing inconsistent play, the Demon Deacons of Wake Forest secured a 79-67 victory. This win guided them to the final against Arizona, scheduled on Thursday, who pulled off an overtime victory against Michigan with a score of 61-60.

Original Text: Deadline threat for Iraq hostages Militants have threatened to kill three Western hostages unless all female Iraqi prisoners are set free by Monday. The men - Briton Kenneth Bigley, and US colleagues Jack Hensley and Eugene Armstrong - were
Translation: Amenaza de límite de tiempo para los rehenes en Irak. Los militantes han amenazado con matar a tres rehenes occidentales a menos que todas las prisioneras iraquíes sean liberadas para el lunes. Los hombres - el británico Kenneth Bigley, y sus colegas estadounidenses Jack Hensley y Eugene Armstrong - estaban
Paraphrase 1: 1. Militants have issued a dire threat to execute three Western hostages - Briton Kenneth Bigley, and US citizens Jack Hensley and Eugene Armstrong, unless all female Iraqi detainees are released by Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The lives of three Western hostages – Briton Kenneth Bigley, and Americans Jack Hensley and Eugene Armstrong, are hanging in the balance as militants demand the release of all female prisoners in Iraq by the Monday deadline.

Original Text: Roundup: It #39;s consolation time on Maui Freshman guard Daniel Gibson scored 19 points and started Texas #39; run of second-half 3-pointers Wednesday, leading the Longhorns to a 95-70 victory over Tennessee in the third-place game of the Maui Invitational.
Translation: Resumen: Es hora de consolación en Maui. El escolta de primer año, Daniel Gibson, anotó 19 puntos e inició la racha de triples de Texas en la segunda mitad del miércoles, llevando a los Longhorns a una victoria de 95-70 sobre Tennessee en el juego por el tercer lugar del torneo invitacional de Maui.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Recap: At the Maui consolation game, Texas' freshman guard Daniel Gibson led the team to a 95-70 win against Tennessee on Wednesday. He scored 19 points and initiated a streak of second-half 3-pointers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Synthesis: In the third-place match of the Maui Invitational, Texas outscored Tennessee 95-70, largely due to the stellar performance of freshman guard Daniel Gibson. He not only scored 19 points but also kick-started the second-half burst of 3-pointers on Wednesday.

Original Text: Blair comes out fighting Tony Blair today urged Labour to unite behind a radical third-term agenda as he sought to heal party wounds over Iraq. The Prime Minister said that he realized the war in Iraq had divided
Translation: Blair sale a luchar: Tony Blair instó hoy a Labour a unirse detrás de una agenda radical para un tercer mandato mientras buscaba curar las heridas del partido por Irak. El Primer Ministro dijo que se daba cuenta de que la guerra en Irak había dividido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Realizing that the Iraq war has caused divisions, Prime Minister Tony Blair, in his pursuit to mend the party's wounds, advocated for Labour's unity behind a transformative agenda for his third term. Blair took a strong stand today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, Prime Minister Tony Blair pushed for solidarity within the Labour party in backing an ambitious agenda for his third term, an effort to mend discord over Iraq. Blair acknowledged the divisive effects of the Iraq war and adopted a combative stance.

Original Text: Jay-Z to Head Def Jam Recordings Label Rap star Jay-Z, who has little corporate experience, will become the chief executive for one of Universal's biggest divisions.
Translation: Jay-Z liderará la discográfica Def Jam Recordings. La estrella del rap Jay-Z, quien tiene poca experiencia corporativa, se convertirá en el director ejecutivo de una de las divisiones más grandes de Universal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jay-Z, a popular rap artist with minimal corporate background, is set to take over as the Chief Executive for one of Universal's major divisions, Def Jam Recordings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With not much corporate experience, rap superstar Jay-Z is poised to become the CEO of Def Jam Recordings, one of the largest branches of Universal.

Original Text: Smithfield #39;s Net Doubles as Pork Demand, Prices Gain (Update4) Smithfield Foods Inc., the world #39;s largest hog producer, said profit in the fiscal first quarter more than doubled as livestock prices and pork demand surged.
Translation: La Ganancia Neta de Smithfield se Duplica a medida que la Demanda de Cerdo y los Precios Aumentan (Actualización4) Smithfield Foods Inc., el mayor productor de cerdos del mundo, dijo que las ganancias en el primer trimestre fiscal se duplicaron debido a que los precios del ganado y la demanda de cerdo se dispararon.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Smithfield Foods Inc., the leading hog producer worldwide, reported that their net profit in the first fiscal quarter has more than doubled on the back of a surge in livestock prices and pork demand. (Update4)
Paraphrase 2: 2. There was a surge in both livestock prices and pork demand, causing Smithfield Foods Inc., the world's biggest hog producer's net profit, to more than double in the fiscal first quarter. (Update4)

Original Text: Sears Sales Rise on Appliance Strength Sears, Roebuck  amp; Co. (SN: Quote, Profile, Research) on Thursday said sales at stores open at least a year rose 1.9 percent in October, breaking a string of six straight monthly declines, helped by growth in appliances.
Translation: Las Ventas de Sears Aumentan Debido a la Fortaleza en Electrodomésticos Sears, Roebuck & Co. (SN: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) dijo el jueves que las ventas en tiendas abiertas al menos un año aumentaron un 1.9 por ciento en octubre, rompiendo una racha de seis meses consecutivos de descensos, ayudado por el crecimiento en electrodomésticos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Sears Roebuck & Co. (SN: Quote, Profile, Research) reported a 1.9 percent rise in sales at stores that have been open for at least a year. This breaks their record of six consecutive monthly declines, which was achieved due to the increased growth in appliances.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sears, Roebuck & Co. (SN: Quote, Profile, Research) revealed on Thursday that monthly sales in stores that have remained open for at least a year increased by 1.9 percent in October. This marks a positive shift from their previous six-month streak of declines, thanks to the surge in appliance sales.

Original Text: London unveils plans for Olympic Games London has unveiled its detailed plans to stage the 2012 Olympics, promising a Games of excellence without extravagance. Bid chief Sebastian Coe said on Friday the city would
Translation: Londres revela planes para los Juegos Olímpicos. Londres ha presentado sus planes detallados para organizar los Juegos Olímpicos de 2012, prometiendo unos Juegos de excelencia sin extravagancias. El jefe de la candidatura, Sebastian Coe, dijo el viernes que la ciudad lo haría.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The detailed plans to host the 2012 Olympics have been unveiled by London, with a promise for an excellent, yet not extravagant, Games. On Friday, bid chief Sebastian Coe declared the city's intention.
Paraphrase 2: 2) London, on Friday, revealed their strategic plans for the 2012 Olympic Games, vowing a high-standard Games without any lavishness, as stated by bid chief Sebastian Coe.

Original Text: Inflation in Check, Bond Prices Rise Briskly Thursday's bond price rally followed a government report that showed that inflation was well restrained in August.
Translation: La inflación bajo control, los precios de los bonos suben rápidamente. El repunte del precio de los bonos del jueves siguió a un informe gubernamental que mostró que la inflación estuvo bien controlada en agosto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bond prices experienced a vigorous rise on Thursday, subsequent to a government report that indicated a firmly controlled inflation in August.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following a government report in August, demonstrating that inflation was effectively kept in check, there was a significant surge in bond prices on Thursday.

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Delta to cut 6,000 to 7,000 jobs, close Dallas hub Delta Air Lines Inc. (DAL.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Wednesday said it will cut 6,000 to 7,000 jobs, or about 10 percent of its work force, over the next 18
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2-Delta recortará de 6,000 a 7,000 empleos, cerrará el centro de Dallas Delta Air Lines Inc. (DAL.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) el miércoles dijo que recortará de 6,000 a 7,000 empleos, o alrededor del 10 por ciento de su fuerza laboral, durante los próximos 18
Paraphrase 1: 1. Delta Air Lines Inc. (DAL.N: Quote, Profile, Research) announced on Wednesday that it plans to terminate 6,000 to 7,000 positions, approximately 10 percent of its employees, and shut down its Dallas hub over the next 18 months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An employment reduction of 6,000 to 7,000 jobs, which makes up about 10 percent of its workforce, along with the closure of its Dallas hub over the forthcoming 18 months has been announced by Delta Air Lines Inc. (DAL.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Wednesday.

Original Text: Productivity growth slows in 3d quarter The productivity of America's workers grew at a 1.8 percent annual rate in the third quarter, the slowest pace in nearly two years, the government reported yesterday. The deceleration, however, raised some hope that employers who have squeezed efficiencies out of existing workforces may boost hiring.
Translation: El crecimiento de la productividad se desacelera en el tercer trimestre. La productividad de los trabajadores de América creció a un ritmo anual del 1,8 por ciento en el tercer trimestre, el ritmo más lento en casi dos años, informó el gobierno ayer. Sin embargo, la desaceleración generó cierta esperanza de que los empleadores que han obtenido eficiencias de sus fuerzas de trabajo actuales puedan aumentar la contratación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The government's recent report disclosed a slowdown in productivity growth to a 1.8 percent annual rate in the third quarter, marking the slowest pace in almost two years for America's workforce. Nevertheless, the slowing rate brought about a glimmer of hope as employers may look to augment their staff after managing to extract efficiencies from their existing teams.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, a report from the government revealed that in the United States, worker productivity increased at a minimal rate of 1.8 percent annually during the third quarter - the least rapid growth in close to two years. However, this deceleration sparked optimism indicating that companies, who have found efficiencies within their current workforces, might increase their hiring efforts.

Original Text: J.P. Morgan Chase Misses Target  NEW YORK (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase   Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A>, the  No. 2 U.S. bank, said  on Wednesday profit fell in the third  quarter, missing analyst expectations, as a result of costs  from its July merger with Bank One Corp. and lower fixed-income  revenues.
Translation: J.P. Morgan Chase no alcanza el objetivo NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A>, el segundo banco más grande de los EE. UU., dijo el miércoles que las ganancias cayeron en el tercer trimestre, no cumpliendo con las expectativas de los analistas, como resultado de los costos de su fusión en julio con Bank One Corp. y menores ingresos de renta fija.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. JPM.N, the second-largest U.S. bank, reported a third quarter profit drop on Wednesday, failing to meet analyst forecasts. The shortfall came as a consequence of costs incurred from its July merge with Bank One Corp and a decrease in fixed-income revenues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. JPM.N, the United States' second biggest bank, announced on Wednesday a decline in profit for the third quarter, falling short of analysts' projected figures. This drop was partly due to expenses from the merger with Bank One Corp in July and decreased fixed-income revenues.

Original Text: Pardon request draws Chechens #39; ire MOSCOW - Amid rising ethnic tensions in the North Caucasus, thousands on Tuesday took to the streets of Grozny, the Chechen capital, to protest the proposed pardon of a Russian army colonel who murdered a young Chechen woman.
Translation: La solicitud de perdón provoca la ira de los chechenos MOSCÚ - En medio de crecientes tensiones étnicas en el Cáucaso Norte, miles de personas salieron a las calles de Grozni, la capital chechena, el martes para protestar contra el indulto propuesto de un coronel del ejército ruso que asesinó a una joven mujer chechena.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thousands gathered in Grozny, the capital of Chechnya, on Tuesday to voice their protest against the suggested pardon of a Russian military colonel accused of killing a young Chechen female, escalating ethnic tensions in the North Caucasus, Moscow reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ethnic tensions in the North Caucasus rose as thousands in Grozny, the Chechen capital, protested on Tuesday against the potential pardon of a Russian army colonel who killed a young Chechen woman.

Original Text: Arctic Melt Accelerates, Governments Split A thaw of the Arctic icecap is accelerating because of global warming but nations in the region including the United States are deadlocked about how to stop it.
Translation: La Fusión del Ártico se Acelera, los Gobiernos se Dividen. Un deshielo de la capa de hielo del Ártico se está acelerando debido al calentamiento global, pero las naciones de la región, incluyendo a los Estados Unidos, están en un punto muerto sobre cómo detenerlo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to global warming, the thawing of the Arctic icecap is speeding up, yet despite this, countries within the region, such as the United States, are encountering a stalemate over measures to halt this process.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Global warming is hastening the rapid melting of the Arctic icecap, but countries like the United States, within the region, are in a deadlock concerning the countermeasures to prevent it.

Original Text: 1,400 Colombian Fighters Begin to Disarm More than a thousand paramilitary fighters began demobilizing Friday in the remote jungles of Colombia, where the main road is marked by crosses, burned vehicles and blown-up bridges - the scars of a protracted and bitter battle between their right-wing faction and leftist rebels for control of the region's cocaine industry.
Translation: 1.400 combatientes colombianos comienzan a desarmarse. Más de mil combatientes paramilitares comenzaron a desmovilizarse el viernes en las remotas selvas de Colombia, donde la carretera principal está marcada por cruces, vehículos quemados y puentes volados: las cicatrices de una batalla prolongada y amarga entre su facción de derechas y los rebeldes de izquierdas por el control de la industria de la cocaína en la región.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over a thousand right-wing paramilitary fighters in Colombia started to disarm on Friday, marking the beginning of their demobilization amidst the remote jungles. This area, plagued by the aftermath of a brutal and enduring fight between these fighters and leftist rebels - comprising of crosses, torched vehicles, and destroyed bridges - is notable as the central zone for control of the region's cocaine industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Starting their demobilization process amidst Colombia's remote jungles on Friday, more than a thousand paramilitary combatants began to disarm. The main road of this area is symbolized by crosses, burned vehicles, and damaged bridges - remnants of an extended and harsh feud between the right-wing faction and leftist rebels over command of the region's cocaine industry.

Original Text: NFL suspends Baltimore running back Jamal Lewis for two games The NFL has suspended Baltimore running back Jamal Lewis for two games for using a cellphone to try to set up a drug deal. Lewis pleaded guilty Thursday and will be sentenced to four months
Translation: La NFL suspende al corredor de Baltimore Jamal Lewis por dos partidos. La NFL ha suspendido al corredor de Baltimore Jamal Lewis por dos partidos por usar un teléfono móvil para intentar organizar un trato de drogas. Lewis se declaró culpable el jueves y será condenado a cuatro meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jamal Lewis, a Baltimore running back, has been suspended from two games by the NFL due to his attempt to set up a drug deal via cellphone. After pleading guilty on Thursday, he is slated for a four-month sentence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The NFL issued a two-game suspension to Jamal Lewis, who plays as a running back for Baltimore, following his guilty plea on Thursday for trying to arrange a drug deal through his cellphone. Lewis is expected to serve a four-month sentence.

Original Text: Packers Edge Lions, 16-13 (AP) AP - The Green Bay Packers only led for two seconds Sunday, and that was enough to keep their stranglehold over the Detroit Lions, who haven't won in Wisconsin since 1991.
Translation: Packers superan a Lions, 16-13 (AP) AP - Los Green Bay Packers sólo lideraron durante dos segundos el domingo, y eso fue suficiente para mantener su control absoluto sobre los Detroit Lions, quienes no han ganado en Wisconsin desde 1991.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Sunday, despite leading for a mere two seconds, the Green Bay Packers managed to maintain their dominance over the Detroit Lions, securing a 16-13 victory (AP). The Lions' losing streak in Wisconsin, which dates back to 1991, continues.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - With a brief two-second lead on Sunday, the Green Bay Packers secured a narrow victory of 16-13 over the Detroit Lions. It extended the Lions' winless record in Wisconsin, which has persisted since 1991.

Original Text: Panel Says Pollution Plagues Great Lakes (AP) AP - Despite improvements in recent decades, the Great Lakes remain a dumping ground for pollution ranging from livestock waste to mercury emissions, a U.S.-Canadian panel said Monday.
Translation: El Panel Declara que la Contaminación Azota los Grandes Lagos (AP) AP - A pesar de las mejoras en las últimas décadas, los Grandes Lagos siguen siendo un vertedero para la contaminación que varía desde los desechos de ganado hasta las emisiones de mercurio, dijo un panel estadounidense-canadiense el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) On Monday, a U.S.-Canadian panel proclaimed that, in spite of improvements over past decades, pollution persists in the Great Lakes, which continue to serve as a disposal site for various sources of pollution, from livestock waste to mercury emissions.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) The Great Lakes continue to be laden with pollution, from livestock waste to mercury emissions, regardless of improvements over the years, disclosed a U.S.-Canadian panel on Monday.

Original Text: Sun Microsystems Rolls Out Much-Awaited Solaris 10 Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Quote, Profile, Research) on Sunday introduced the long-awaited next version of its operating system, Solaris 10, which the network
Translation: Sun Microsystems lanza la muy esperada Solaris 10. Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) presentó el domingo la ansiada próxima versión de su sistema operativo, Solaris 10, que la red.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday, Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Quote, Profile, Research) unveiled the much-anticipated Solaris 10, the latest version of its operating system, marking a milestone for the network.

Original Text: Stocks Higher on Economic Data, Earnings  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks traded higher on Tuesday,  despite oil prices hitting a new high before falling back, as  U.S. economic reports showed an easing of inflationary pressure  and a sharp rebound in the housing market.
Translation: Las acciones suben por los datos económicos y los informes de ganancias NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de EE. UU. se cotizaron al alza el martes, a pesar de que los precios del petróleo alcanzaron un nuevo máximo antes de caer nuevamente, ya que los informes económicos de EE. UU. mostraron una disminución de la presión inflacionaria y un fuerte repunte en el mercado de la vivienda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the flux in oil prices which soared to a new high before subsequently dropping, the U.S. stock market experienced an upturn on Tuesday. This was propelled by encouraging U.S. economic reports that signaled a decrease in inflationary pressures and a significant recovery in the housing sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though oil prices spiked to record highs before declining, Tuesday saw an increase in trade for U.S. stocks. This was attributed to positive economic reports from the U.S., which highlighted a reduction in the pressure of inflation and a robust bounce-back in the housing market.

Original Text: Joy at Silverstone deal SIR Frank Williams led the celebrations after the British Grand Prix was rescued by a last-ditch agreement yesterday. The British Racing Drivers #39; Club, which owns the Silverstone racetrack, had until the close
Translation: Alegría por el acuerdo en Silverstone SIR Frank Williams lideró las celebraciones después de que el Gran Premio Británico fue rescatado por un acuerdo de último momento ayer. El Club de Pilotos de Carreras Británicos # 39, propietario del circuito de Silverstone, tuvo hasta el final
Paraphrase 1: 1. SIR Frank Williams spearheaded the festivities after a last-minute agreement successfully saved the British Grand Prix yesterday. The British Racing Drivers #39; Club, owners of the Silverstone racetrack, had until the end of the day to secure this deal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After the British Grand Prix was salvaged yesterday by a last-minute agreement, SIR Frank Williams was at the forefront of the celebrations. The British Racing Driver #39's Club, the proprietor of the Silverstone racetrack, had till the end to finalize this agreement.

Original Text: Oil Hits New High on Norway Strike Fears  LONDON (Reuters) - Oil scaled a new high above \$55 a barrel  Monday as a threat by Norwegian oil and gas employers to halt  production from the world's third biggest exporter stoked fears  of a winter supply crunch.
Translation: El Petróleo Alcanza Nuevo Máximo debido a los Temores de Huelga en Noruega LONDRES (Reuters) - El petróleo alcanzó un nuevo máximo por encima de los \$55 por barril el lunes debido a la amenaza de los empleadores de petróleo y gas de Noruega de detener la producción del tercer mayor exportador del mundo, lo que avivó los temores de un apretón de suministro durante el invierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - A potential halt in production from the world's third biggest exporter, due to threats by Norwegian oil and gas employers, propelled oil prices to soar past $55 a barrel on Monday, fuelling fears of a winter supply shortage.

Original Text: Ravens tailback likely to serve 2-6 months While the deal will not be announced until some time next week, Baltimore Ravens tailback Jamal Lewis has reached a tentative plea agreement that will allow him to avoid both
Translation: Es probable que el corredor de los Ravens cumpla de 2 a 6 meses de prisión. Aunque el acuerdo no se anunciará hasta la próxima semana, el corredor de los Baltimore Ravens, Jamal Lewis, ha llegado a un acuerdo de culpabilidad tentativo que le permitirá evitar ambos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jamal Lewis, the tailback for the Baltimore Ravens, has reached a tentative plea agreement which will likely necessitate him to serve a 2-6 months sentence. The announcement of the deal, however, will not be made until next week, allowing him to bypass both.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A preliminary plea agreement has been reached by Jamal Lewis, a tailback for the Baltimore Ravens, potentially resulting in a 2-6 months sentence. This deal's formal announcement is set for next week, letting him evade both.

Original Text: No. 16 Iowa 17, Iowa St. 10 Ed Hinkel made a diving, fingertip catch for a key touchdown and No. 16 Iowa stiffened on defense when it needed to most to beat Iowa State 17-10 Saturday.
Translation: No. 16 Iowa 17, Estado de Iowa 10. Ed Hinkel hizo una atrapada clave para un touchdown sumergiéndose y con la punta de los dedos, y el No. 16 de Iowa se fortaleció en defensa cuando más lo necesitaba para vencer al Estado de Iowa 17-10 el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday, Ed Hinkel's pivotal touchdown came from a diving, fingertip catch which, along with No. 16 Iowa's critical defense at the needed moment, led them to a 17-10 victory against Iowa State.

Original Text: Karzai Travels To Campaign Rally Outside Kabul 5 October 2004 -- Afghan Transitional Administration Chairman Hamid Karzai traveled to a campaign rally outside Kabul today, four days ahead of Afghanistan #39;s presidential election.
Translation: Karzai Viaja a Mitin de Campaña Fuera de Kabul 5 de Octubre de 2004 -- El Presidente de la Administración de Transición Afgana, Hamid Karzai, viajó hoy a un mitin de campaña fuera de Kabul, cuatro días antes de las elecciones presidenciales de Afganistán.
