Paraphrase 1: 1. On October 5, 2004, Hamid Karzai, the Chairman of the Afghan Transitional Administration, journeyed to a campaign rally located outside Kabul, four days prior to Afghanistan's presidential election.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, just four days before Afghanistan's presidential election, Hamid Karzai, who serves as chairman of the Afghan Transitional Administration, made a trip to a campaign rally outside the city of Kabul- an event recorded on October 5, 2004.

Original Text: Jags could take two-game lead with win Editor #39;s note: ESPN senior NFL writer John Clayton #39;s weekly  quot;First And 10 quot; column takes you around the league with a look at the best game of the week followed by primers for 10 other games.
Translation: Los Jaguares podrían tomar la delantera de dos juegos con una victoria. Nota del editor: La columna semanal "Primero y 10" del veterano escritor de la NFL en ESPN, John Clayton, te lleva alrededor de la liga con un vistazo al mejor partido de la semana, seguido de introducciones para 10 otros partidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With a victory, Jags could secure a two-game lead. This is according to ESPN senior NFL writer John Clayton's "First And 10" column that provides you with insights from across the league, including a focus on the week's best game and 10 other game primers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. If Jags win, they could potentially lead by two games. This is information drawn from the weekly "First And 10" column by ESPN's senior NFL writer, John Clayton, which features comprehensive information about the league, highlights of the top game of the week and an overview of ten other games.

Original Text: Update 4: FDA Wants More Safety Data on Merck Drug The Food and Drug Administration told Merck  amp; Co. that it requires further safety and efficacy data before it will approve its successor drug to now defunct pain reliever Vioxx, the pharmaceutical maker announced Friday.
Translation: Actualización 4: La FDA solicita más datos de seguridad sobre el medicamento de Merck. La Administración de Alimentos y Medicamentos le comunicó a Merck & Co. que requiere más datos de seguridad y eficacia antes de aprobar su medicamento sucesor al ahora extinto analgésico Vioxx, anunció el fabricante farmacéutico el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Food and Drug Administration has informed Merck & Co. that they require additional data relating to safety and efficacy before they can approve its successor drug to the now discontinued pain reliever, Vioxx, as was declared by the company last Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Merck & Co. received a message from the Food and Drug Administration stating they need more safety and effectiveness data before they can greenlight its new drug, a successor to the discontinued pain reliever Vioxx, the pharmaceutical company revealed on Friday.

Original Text: ABUSE IS TO BLAME SAYS BERTI and then claimed he was driven out by personal abuse.  quot;The major factor in this decision has been the disgraceful abuse I have suffered, quot; said Vogts.
Translation: "EL ABUSO ES CULPABLE DICE BERTI y luego afirmó que fue expulsado por abuso personal. "El factor principal en esta decisión ha sido el vergonzoso abuso que he sufrido", dijo Vogts.
Paraphrase 1: "Berti asserts that abuse is the cause, and he alleges that he was forced to leave due to personal vilification. 'The primary reason for this decision is the deplorable mistreatment I've endured,' Vogts declared.
Paraphrase 2: "Berti pins the blame on abuse and says it pushed him out due to personal belittlement. Vogts stated, 'The crucial element in making this decision was the appalling abuse I had to bear.'"

Original Text: Update 2: Swisscom Confirms May Merge With Firm Telecommunications companies Swisscom AG and Telekom Austria AG are in talks over a possible merger, Swisscom said.
Translation: Actualización 2: Swisscom Confirma Que Podría Fusionarse Con la Empresa Las compañías de telecomunicaciones Swisscom AG y Telekom Austria AG están en conversaciones sobre una posible fusión, dijo Swisscom.
Paraphrase 1: Second Update: Swisscom AG, a major telecommunications company, has acknowledged ongoing discussions with Telekom Austria AG about a potential merger.
Paraphrase 2: Revision 2: In a recent statement, Swisscom AG confirmed that it is currently engaging in negotiations with Telekom Austria AG regarding a prospective merger.

Original Text: Locusts Inspire Technology That May Prevent Car Crashes Locusts are commonly associated with plagues, food shortages, and death. But they are also inspiring what may be the next wave in lifesaving collision-avoidance systems.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Las Langostas Inspiran Tecnología Que Podría Prevenir Accidentes de Coche. Las langostas suelen estar asociadas con plagas, escasez de alimentos y muerte. Pero también están inspirando lo que podría ser la próxima ola en sistemas de prevención de colisiones que salvan vidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Locusts' Behaviour Inspires a Technological Breakthrough Aimed at Avoiding Car Collisions
Paraphrase 2: Usually, the mention of locusts invokes images of plagues, widespread famine, and death. However, these creatures are now providing inspiration for potentially revolutionary collision-avoidance systems.

Original Text: Blue-ray mass market move Singulus Technologies will begin selling machines for mass producing read-only Blu-ray Discs next year. German firm, Singulus, will supply machines that make the discs, called BD-ROMs, by
Translation: El movimiento de masas de Blue-ray por Singulus Technologies iniciará la venta de máquinas para la producción masiva de Discos Blu-ray de solo lectura el próximo año. La empresa alemana, Singulus, suministrará máquinas que fabricarán los discos, llamados BD-ROM, para
Paraphrase 1: 1. Singulus Technologies, a German firm known for their work in the blue-ray mass market, plans to commence sales of machines designed for high volume production of read-only Blu-ray Discs, or BD-ROMs, next year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Next year, the German company Singulus Technologies, a significant entity in the blue-ray mass market, will start distributing machines specifically for manufacturing read-only Blu-ray Discs, also known as BD-ROMs.

Original Text: United reaches tentative deal with pilots United Airlines, the bankrupt carrier, on Tuesday made its first progress in efforts to achieve a second round of labour cost cuts when it said it had reached a tentative agreement
Translation: United alcanza un acuerdo tentativo con los pilotos. United Airlines, la aerolínea en bancarrota, hizo su primer avance en los esfuerzos para lograr una segunda ronda de recortes de costos laborales cuando anunció el martes que había llegado a un acuerdo tentativo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, United Airlines, currently bankrupt, stated it had reached a preliminary agreement with pilots, marking an initial success in its attempt to secure a second wave of labor cost reductions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In its quest to implement a second round of labor cost reductions, United Airlines, despite being a bankrupt carrier, announced on Tuesday that it had tentatively settled a deal with its pilots.

Original Text: Canadian dollar is hit by low inflation rate TORONTO: The Canadian dollar fell hard after Canada #39;s inflation for August came in well shy of expectations and prompted a new debate on the pace of future Bank of Canada interest rate hikes.
Translation: El dólar canadiense se ve afectado por la baja tasa de inflación TORONTO: El dólar canadiense cayó fuertemente después de que la inflación de Canadá para agosto quedó muy por debajo de las expectativas, lo que provocó un nuevo debate sobre el ritmo de las futuras subidas de las tasas de interés del Banco de Canadá.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TORONTO: Following Canada's August inflation results, which were significantly lower than expected, the Canadian dollar took a severe hit. This surprising downturn has reignited discussions regarding future interest rate hikes by the Bank of Canada.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TORONTO: When the inflation rate for August in Canada fell notably short of forecasts, it resulted in a sharp decline of the Canadian dollar. This has sparked fresh disputes concerning the rate at which the Bank of Canada will increase interest rates in the future.

Original Text: Thatcher subpoenaed over coup Former Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher #39;s son Mark has been subpoenaed to formally answer accusations he helped to finance a coup plot in oil-rich Equatorial Guinea, his lawyer says.
Translation: Thatcher citado por golpe de estado: el hijo de la ex primera ministra Margaret Thatcher, Mark, ha sido citado para responder formalmente a las acusaciones de que ayudó a financiar un complot de golpe de estado en la rica en petróleo Guinea Ecuatorial, dice su abogado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mark Thatcher, the son of former Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, has received a subpoena to officially address allegations of his involvement in funding a coup attempt in the oil-rich Equatorial Guinea, according to his attorney.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to his legal representative, Mark Thatcher, son of ex-Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, has been issued a subpoena, requiring him to officially respond to claims that he supported financing a coup in Equatorial Guinea, a country rich in oil.

Original Text: Business Focus: Infecting the world When Alan Greenspan speaks, the markets listen. The 78-year-old chairman of the Federal Reserve Board has had dealers hanging on his every utterance for 17 years, ever since he took the job during the closing months of Ronald Reagans presidency.
Translation: Enfoque Empresarial: Infectando el mundo Cuando Alan Greenspan habla, los mercados escuchan. El presidente de 78 años de la Junta de la Reserva Federal ha tenido a los negociantes pendientes de cada palabra suya durante 17 años, desde que asumió el puesto durante los últimos meses de la presidencia de Ronald Reagan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The global business sphere pays keen attention to Alan Greenspan's remarks. The 78-year-old Federal Reserve Board chairman's wordings have held an incredible sway over dealers for about 17 years, a context that dates back to his appointment during the last few months of President Ronald Reagan's tenure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alan Greenspan, the chairman of the Federal Reserve Board who's now 78, commands international business attention with his speeches, a scenario that's lasted 17 years, beginning from his tenure's inception during the final phase of Ronald Reagan's presidency. Market participants have been engrossed in his every statement since then.

Original Text: Texas Tech Red Raiders NORMAN, Oklahoma (Ticker) -- Adrian Peterson hopes to carry over his stellar start to Big 12 Conference action when second-ranked Oklahoma hosts Texas Tech on Saturday.
Translation: Texas Tech Red Raiders NORMAN, Oklahoma (Ticker) -- Adrian Peterson espera continuar su excelente inicio en la acción de la Conferencia Big 12 cuando el segundo clasificado, Oklahoma, reciba a Texas Tech el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Adrian Peterson, who has had an excellent beginning to the Big 12 Conference, aspires to maintain his performance when the second-ranked Oklahoma entertains Texas Tech this Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. When Oklahoma, currently second-ranked, welcomes Texas Tech on Saturday, Adrian Peterson is eager to continue his exceptional performance from the start of the Big 12 Conference.

Original Text: SportsNetwork Game Preview (Sports Network) - Roger Clemens tries to win his seventh straight decision and possibly vault the Houston Astros into the lead in the National League wild card standings, as they go for a three-game sweep of the NL Central champion St.
Translation: Vista Previa del Juego de SportsNetwork (Sports Network) - Roger Clemens intenta ganar su séptima decisión consecutiva y posiblemente catapultar a los Houston Astros al liderazgo en la clasificación de comodines de la Liga Nacional, mientras buscan una barrida de tres juegos del campeón de la Liga Central de la LN.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Roger Clemens is on the verge of achieving his seventh consecutive victory which could potentially propel the Houston Astros to the top spot in the National League's wild card rankings. The team is poised to score a three-game sweep against the current NL Central champions, St., as presented by Sports Network Game Preview.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As revealed by the Sports Network Game Preview, there is an opportunity for Roger Clemens to claim his seventh win in a row, potentially elevating the Houston Astros to a leading position in the National League wild card standings. They're also set to clinch a three-game victory against the reigning champions of NL Central, St.

Original Text: House Defeats Gay Marriage Ban Amendment (AP) AP - The House emphatically rejected a constitutional amendment banning gay marriage Thursday, the latest in a string of conservative pet causes advanced by Republican leaders in the run-up to Election Day.
Translation: La Cámara derrota la Enmienda para Prohibir el Matrimonio Homosexual (AP) AP - La Cámara rechazó de manera enfática una enmienda constitucional que prohíbe el matrimonio homosexual el jueves, la última en una serie de causas favoritas conservadoras promovidas por los líderes republicanos en la previa al Día de las Elecciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - In a significant move on Thursday, the House categorically turned down a constitutional amendment seeking to prohibit gay marriage. This is yet another setback for conservative movements promoted by Republican leaders as part of their strategy leading to Election Day.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - A constitutional amendment aimed at barring gay marriage was decidedly overruled by the House this Thursday. This marks a continuation in the sequence of failed conservative initiatives propelled by the Republican leaders ahead of the forthcoming Elections.

Original Text: Global Crossing cuts 600 jobs, announces Q1, Q2 results Telecommunications network vendor Global Crossing cut its workforce by 600 workers, or about 15 of its global employees, as it continues to right itself about a year after emerging from bankruptcy.
Translation: Global Crossing despide a 600 empleados, anuncia resultados del primer y segundo trimestre. El proveedor de red de telecomunicaciones Global Crossing redujo su fuerza laboral en 600 trabajadores, o alrededor del 15% de sus empleados a nivel mundial, mientras continúa enderezándose aproximadamente un año después de salir de la bancarrota.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After its emergence from bankruptcy nearly a year ago, telecommunication network vendor Global Crossing has reduced its global workforce by 600 employees, approximately 15% of the total, while presenting results for Q1 and Q2.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Global Crossing, a telecommunications network provider, has announced its Q1 and Q2 results and concurrently reduced its employee count by 600, which is around 15 percent of its world employees, as a year has passed since its recovery from bankruptcy.

Original Text: Economy Continues Sluggish Expansion US manufacturing grew more slowly in August, a research group reported yesterday, adding to other signs that the economic expansion continued to lose steam in recent weeks.
Translation: La economía continúa su lenta expansión. La industria manufacturera de los EE.UU. creció más lentamente en agosto, informó ayer un grupo de investigación, sumándose a otras señales de que la expansión económica continuó perdiendo impulso en las últimas semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A report by a research group yesterday indicated that US manufacturing expansion in August was slower, contributing to the evidence that the economy's growth has been decelerating in the past few weeks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, a research group announced that the sluggish expansion of the U.S. economy carries on, shown by the slowed growth in manufacturing during August, adding to the accumulating signs of the economic slowdown in recent weeks.

Original Text: Ravens Pummel Browns, 27-13 (AP) AP - Burned for a touchdown on the game's first play, it was hard to imagine the Baltimore Ravens would win on the strength of their special teams. A spirited defensive stand, capped by an NFL-record 106-yard interception return by Ed Reed, didn't hurt, either.
Translation: Ravens Aplastan a Browns, 27-13 (AP) AP - Quemados por un touchdown en la primera jugada del juego, era difícil imaginar que los Baltimore Ravens ganarían con la fortaleza de sus equipos especiales. Una defensa animada, rematada por un retorno de intercepción de 106 yardas, el récord de la NFL, por Ed Reed, tampoco dolió.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite initially being scored against in the first play of the game, the Baltimore Ravens managed to secure a win against the Browns with a solid 27-13, aided significantly by their special teams. Their victory was further fortified by a spirited defensive effort, culminating in an NFL-record 106-yard interception return by Ed Reed (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a significant contribution from their special teams and a historic 106-yard interception return by Ed Reed, the Baltimore Ravens muscled their way to a 27-13 victory over the Browns. This comes after a discouraging start where they conceded a touchdown in the game's opening play (AP).

Original Text: Dollar Dips Against Most Major Currencies  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar dipped against most major  currencies on Wednesday after mixed data on U.S. durable goods  orders and weaker-than-expected new home sales did little to  brighten the U.S. economic outlook.
Translation: El dólar cae frente a la mayoría de las principales monedas. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar cayó frente a la mayoría de las principales monedas el miércoles después de que los datos mixtos sobre los pedidos de bienes duraderos en EE. UU. y las ventas de viviendas nuevas más débiles de lo esperado hicieran poco para mejorar las perspectivas económicas de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Following mixed reports on U.S. durable goods orders and less-than-anticipated new home sales, the U.S. economic outlook didn't improve much, causing the dollar to decline against the majority of major currencies on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, the dollar recorded a decline against the majority of major currencies, as per the New York (Reuters) report, this occurred in the wake of indifferent U.S. durable goods orders and new home sales data failing to boost the U.S. economic forecast.

Original Text: Web users addicted to net Surfers are becoming addicted to the internet and suffer from withdrawal symptoms if deprived of web access, a study has found. Yahoo #39;s Internet Deprivation Study tested how emotionally connected consumers
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Los usuarios de la web adictos a la red se están volviendo adictos a Internet y sufren síntomas de abstinencia si se les priva del acceso a la web, ha encontrado un estudio. El Estudio de Privación de Internet de Yahoo #39 probó cuán emocionalmente conectados están los consumidores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a study by Yahoo, Internet Deprivation Study, consumers are significantly emotionally attached to the internet, to the extent that net surfers experience withdrawal symptoms when deprived of web access, indicating an addiction.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A study conducted by Yahoo's Internet Deprivation Study disclosed that consumers have a considerable emotional connection to the web. Internet surfers, in particular, show signs of addiction, with withdrawal symptoms occurring if they are cut off from internet access.

Original Text: Democrat Kerry Slams Bush's 'Excuse Presidency' (Reuters) Reuters - Democratic candidate John Kerry\unleashed a harsh indictment of President Bush's economic\stewardship on Wednesday and urged his Republican rival to take\responsibility instead of playing the victim.
Translation: "El Demócrata Kerry Arremete Contra la 'Presidencia de Excusas' de Bush" (Reuters) Reuters - El candidato demócrata John Kerry lanzó el miércoles un duro alegato contra la gestión económica del presidente Bush e instó a su rival republicano a asumir la responsabilidad en lugar de hacerse la víctima.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) John Kerry, the Democratic candidate, fervently criticized President Bush's economic management on Wednesday. He encouraged his Republican opposition to assume responsibility rather than act like a victim. Kerry termed Bush's term as an 'Excuse Presidency'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) Railing against President Bush's economic governance, Democratic contender John Kerry called on his Republican competitor to step up and be accountable, not to keep playing the victim role. This resulted in Kerry disparagingly branding Bush's term as an 'Excuse Presidency'.

Original Text: Dravid leads with head over heart MUMBAI: Rahul Dravid led India with his head not with the heart. Every decision he took had a chance of back-firing. But in the end he stood vindicated as India, defending Australias victory target of 107
Translation: Dravid lidera con la cabeza por encima del corazón MUMBAI: Rahul Dravid lideró a India con su cabeza, no con el corazón. Cada decisión que tomó tenía la posibilidad de salir mal. Pero al final, se mantuvo reivindicado ya que India, defendiendo el objetivo de victoria de Australia de 107.
Paraphrase 1: 1) MUMBAI: Not letting his heart rule his decisions, Rahul Dravid led India relying on his intellect. Although each decision he made ran the risk of backfiring, he was ultimately vindicated as India successfully defended Australia's victory target of 107.
Paraphrase 2: 2) MUMBAI: Against Australia's victory target of 107, Rahul Dravid, in his leadership role, favoured logic over emotion in every decision he made for India. There was always a risk of his decisions misfiring, but in the end, he was justified as India held their ground.

Original Text: Air Canada Stock Plummets on Review MONTREAL (Reuters) - Shares of Air Canada (AC.TO: Quote, Profile, Research) fell by more than half on Wednesday, after the Toronto Stock Exchange said it was reviewing the company #39;s stock to determine if it meets listing requirements.
Translation: Las acciones de Air Canada se desploman en revisión MONTREAL (Reuters) - Las acciones de Air Canada (AC.TO: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) cayeron a más de la mitad el miércoles, después de que la Bolsa de Valores de Toronto dijo que estaba revisando las acciones de la compañía para determinar si cumplen los requisitos de cotización.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MONTREAL (Reuters) - Air Canada's (AC.TO: Quote, Profile, Research) stocks took a hit of over fifty percent on Wednesday, as the Toronto Stock Exchange is scrutinising the aviation company's share eligibility for listing purposes.

Original Text: Officials test-launch nuclear-capable missile NEW DELHI -- India test-launched a nuclear-capable missile able to carry a 1-ton warhead yesterday, the Defense Ministry said. The weapon has a range of up to 1,560 miles -- easily within striking distance of any of India's near neighbors -- and is designed to carry both conventional and nuclear warheads. The Agni II was launched at India's test range ...
Translation: Funcionarios prueban el lanzamiento de un misil capaz de portar armamento nuclear. NUEVA DELHI -- India probó ayer el lanzamiento de un misil capaz de portar armamento nuclear que puede llevar una ojiva de 1 tonelada, según informó el Ministerio de Defensa. El arma tiene un alcance de hasta 2,500 kilómetros, fácilmente dentro del alcance de golpe para cualquiera de los vecinos cercanos de India, y está diseñada para transportar tanto ojivas convencionales como nucleares. El Agni II fue lanzado en el campo de pruebas de India...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Defense Ministry in India reported yesterday that they had conducted a trial launch of a nuclear-capable missile, named the Agni II. This missile, boasting a range of up to 1,560 miles, can conveniently hit any of India's proximate neighbors. Designed for carrying both nuclear and conventional warheads, the missile can carry a warhead weighing up to 1 ton.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, a nuclear-capable missile that can transport a 1-ton warhead was test-launched by Indian officials, according to the Defense Ministry. The missile, named the Agni II, can cover a distance of up to 1,560 miles, making all of India's neighboring countries viable targets. It has been engineered to carry both nuclear and conventional warheads and was launched at India's test range.

Original Text: Camera phones threat to privacy A human rights group has suggested a mandatory flash on camera mobiles would counter illicit photography.
Translation: Amenaza a la privacidad por teléfonos con cámara. Un grupo de derechos humanos ha sugerido que un flash obligatorio en los móviles con cámara contrarrestaría la fotografía ilícita.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A human rights group has proposed that a compulsory flash on mobile cameras could prevent unauthorized photography, highlighting the threat to privacy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By endorsing a required flash on smartphone cameras, a human rights organization implies a solution to prohibit non-consensual photography and thus address the privacy concern raised by camera phones.

Original Text: Sci-Fi Paints a Pretty Picture Whether you're into science fiction's predicted future or just like bizarre creatures, here's an art show for you. Rachel Metz reports from New York.
Translation: La Ciencia Ficción Pinta un Cuadro Bonito. Ya sea que te guste el futuro predicho por la ciencia ficción o simplemente te gusten las criaturas extrañas, aquí tienes una exposición de arte para ti. Rachel Metz informa desde Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you're a fan of science fiction's envisaged futures or peculiar beings, Rachel Metz brings you a spectacular art exhibition straight from New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Rachel Metz from New York brings an art exhibition that's sure to interest you, whether your fascinations lie within the foretold future of science fiction or within the realm of strange creatures.

Original Text: Ignore arctic warming warnings at our own peril D uring the past few weeks two news events of global importance have occurred that have received extensive international press coverage: the election of George Bush to lead the United States for four more years, and the death of Yasser Arafat, leader of
Translation: Ignorar las advertencias sobre el calentamiento del Ártico a nuestro propio riesgo D urante las últimas semanas han ocurrido dos eventos noticias de importancia global que han recibido una amplia cobertura de prensa internacional: la reelección de George Bush para liderar los Estados Unidos durante cuatro años más, y la muerte de Yasser Arafat, líder de
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the past several weeks, two globally significant events have been extensively covered by the international press: the re-election of George Bush as the United States leader for another four years, and the passing of Yasser Arafat, the leader of... We neglect to heed warnings about arctic warming at our own risk.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Failing to heed alarms on arctic warming jeopardizes us all. In the meantime, the previous weeks have seen thorough international media coverage of two developments of worldwide significance: George Bush winning another four-year term as the leader of the United States, and the departure of Yasser Arafat, the leader of...

Original Text: Typhoon leaves 18 dead, 7 missing Eighteen people have been confirmed dead and seven others remain missing as a result of Typhoon Meari, which swept through Japan and weakened into an extra-tropical depression around noon (local time).
Translation: El tifón deja 18 muertos, 7 desaparecidos. Se ha confirmado la muerte de dieciocho personas y otras siete permanecen desaparecidas como resultado del Tifón Meari, que azotó Japón y se debilitó hasta convertirse en una depresión extra-tropical alrededor del mediodía (hora local).
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a result of Typhoon Meari's devastation in Japan, 18 people have tragically died and another 7 are still unaccounted for. The typhoon has since lost strength and turned into an extra-tropical depression by midday, local time.

Original Text: Researchers say Internet porn is worse than crack Pennsylvania may block Philly's Wi-Fi plan. News.com Extra
Translation: Los investigadores dicen que el porno en Internet es peor que el crack, Pennsylvania puede bloquear el plan de Wi-Fi de Philly. Noticias.com Extra
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scholars claim that Internet pornography is more detrimental than crack, whilst there's a possibility for Pennsylvania to obstruct Philadelphia's Wi-Fi scheme - as reported by News.com Extra.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to News.com Extra, Pennsylvania might impede the Wi-Fi proposal of Philadelphia, and researchers believe Internet porn surpasses crack in its negative impacts.

Original Text: Stocks Close Lower as Energy, J J Weigh  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday as a drop  in oil prices pulled down shares of energy companies and  health-care giant Johnson   Johnson <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNJ.N</A> slipped following a  report that it is in negotiations to take over Guidant Corp.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GDT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GDT.N</A>.
Translation: Las acciones cierran a la baja debido a la energía y a Johnson & Johnson  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones estadounidenses cayeron el martes debido a una caída en los precios del petróleo que arrastró hacia abajo las acciones de las compañías energéticas y el gigante de la atención sanitaria Johnson & Johnson <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNJ.N</A> bajó tras un informe que indica que está en negociaciones para adquirir Guidant Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GDT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GDT.N</A>.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. market shares dipped on Tuesday, mainly due to the declining oil prices impacting energy sector stocks and an unexpected decrease in shares from health-care titan Johnson & Johnson, who reportedly are in talks for acquiring Guidant Corp.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A reduction in oil prices and subsequent slump in energy company shares, coupled with a drop in share value of healthcare behemoth Johnson & Johnson amid rumors of acquiring Guidant Corp., resulted in U.S. stocks closing lower on Tuesday.

Original Text: Seagate Ships World #39;s Largest HD November 17, 2004 - Seagate Technology today announced that it has shipped the world #39;s largest PC hard drive to various retail outlets.
Translation: Seagate Envía el HD Más Grande del Mundo el 17 de Noviembre de 2004 - Seagate Technology anunció hoy que ha enviado el disco duro de PC más grande del mundo a varios puntos de venta minoristas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. November 17, 2004 - Seagate Technology proclaimed today that they've distributed the world's premier PC hard drive to several retail stores.

Original Text: Ian Griffiths Philip Green has never been afraid to redefine conventional wisdom in the worlds in which he operates. But his recrafting of what constitutes a dividend represents his most challenging thinking to date.
Translation: Ian Griffiths Philip Green nunca ha temido redefinir la sabiduría convencional en los mundos en los que opera. Pero su reelaboración de lo que constituye un dividendo representa su pensamiento más desafiante hasta la fecha.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Philip Green, also known as Ian Griffiths, has always dared to disrupt traditional perspectives in his spheres of operation. However, his new interpretation of dividends showcases his most audacious thinking so far.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ian Griffiths, commonly known as Philip Green, has consistently challenged established norms in his fields of expertise. Yet, his latest adjustment to the idea of a dividend marks his most provocative thought process till now.

Original Text: Tech Spending Looks Up in Asia, E.Europe  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Spending in Eastern Europe and Asia  is expected to lead a recovery in the global technology market  over the next three years, according to an industry report  released Tuesday.
Translation: El Gasto en Tecnología Aumenta en Asia y Europa del Este. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Se espera que el gasto en Europa Oriental y Asia lidere la recuperación del mercado tecnológico global durante los próximos tres años, según un informe de la industria publicado el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a recent industry report released on Tuesday, a resurgence in the global technology market over the coming three years is anticipated to be spearheaded by spending in Eastern Europe and Asia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An industry report published Tuesday predicts that increased spending within Eastern Europe and Asia will dominate the revitalization of the global technology market in the next three years.

Original Text: US new home sales race to third-highest on record New home sales in the United States rose by 3.5 percent in September to a seasonally adjusted annual rate of 1.21 million units, registering the third highest level on record, the Commerce Department reported Wednesday.
Translation: Las ventas de nuevas viviendas en EE.UU. se disparan al tercer nivel más alto registrado. Las ventas de viviendas nuevas en los Estados Unidos aumentaron un 3.5 por ciento en septiembre a una tasa anual ajustada estacionalmente de 1.21 millones de unidades, registrando el tercer nivel más alto en la historia, informó el Departamento de Comercio el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Commerce Department reported on Wednesday that new home sales in the United States increased by 3.5 percent in September. This surge led to a seasonally adjusted annual rate of 1.21 million units, reaching the third highest recorded level.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per the reports from the Commerce Department on Wednesday, the annual rate of new home sales in the US witnessed a 3.5 percent rise in September. This surge resulted in an adjustable annual rate of 1.21 million units, which is the third highest level ever recorded.

Original Text: NASA and Russia OK Next Space Station Crew In a separate development, the head of the RKK Energia company, which builds the Soyuz spacecraft, said his company was planning to send a new space shuttle to the space station between 2010 and 2012, depending on funding.
Translation: NASA y Rusia aprueban la próxima tripulación de la Estación Espacial Internacional. En un desarrollo separado, el jefe de la empresa RKK Energia, que construye la nave espacial Soyuz, dijo que su compañía estaba planeando enviar un nuevo transbordador espacial a la estación espacial entre 2010 y 2012, dependiendo de la financiación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The head of RKK Energia, the company responsible for constructing the Soyuz spacecraft, stated a new space shuttle could be dispatched to the space station between 2010 and 2012, contingent on finances. This statement was made separate from the announcement by NASA and Russia giving approval for the next crew of the space station.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Concurrently with the decision by NASA and Russia to approve the next Space Station crew, the CEO of the RKK Energia company announced a plan to dispatch a new space shuttle. Known for building the Soyuz spacecraft, RKK Energia anticipates this mission will happen between 2010 and 2012, provided the necessary funding is available.

Original Text: U.S. and Iraqi Forces Complete Takeover of Samarra U.S. forces said they are beginning the second phase of the operation, turning the city over to Iraqi police and military forces.
Translation: Las Fuerzas de EE.UU. e Irak Completan la Toma de Samarra. Las fuerzas estadounidenses dijeron que están comenzando la segunda fase de la operación, entregando la ciudad a la policía y las fuerzas militares iraquíes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Having completed their takeover of Samarra, U.S. and Iraqi forces announced their transition to the operation's second phase that involves handing over city control to the Iraqi police and military forces.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Following the successful takeover of Samarra by U.S. and Iraqi Forces, the commencement of the operation's second phase, which involves transferring control to Iraqi police and military, has been declared by U.S. forces.

Original Text: Hollinger International to refile  #39;looting #39; case against ex-CEO CHICAGO - Newspaper publisher Hollinger International Inc. said Thursday it intends to refile the bulk of its dismissed case against ousted CEO Conrad Black and associates, intent on winning back hundreds
Translation: Hollinger International reabrirá el caso de 'saqueo' contra el ex CEO CHICAGO - El editor de periódicos Hollinger International Inc. dijo el jueves que tiene la intención de reabrir la mayor parte de su caso desestimado contra el CEO destituido Conrad Black y sus asociados, con la intención de recuperar cientos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Newspaper publisher Hollinger International Inc., based in Chicago, announced on Thursday its plans to reinstate the majority of its dismissed case against their former CEO, Conrad Black, and his associates, with the aim of regaining hundreds. They are pursuing the 'looting' accusations previously made.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Hollinger International Inc. declared its intention to present again a large part of its case against former CEO Conrad Black and his associates, dismissed earlier. This action is stemming from their determination to recover hundreds related to the 'looting' claims. This Chicago-based newspaper publishing company intends to persist until victory.

Original Text: Erickson staying in San Fran after talks with Ole Miss Ashburn, VA (Sports Network) - San Francisco 49ers head coach Dennis Erickson will remain with the team after discussing the head coaching vacancy at Ole Miss with school officials on Tuesday.
Translation: Erickson se queda en San Fran después de conversaciones con Ole Miss Ashburn, VA (Sports Network) - El entrenador en jefe de los San Francisco 49ers, Dennis Erickson, permanecerá con el equipo después de discutir el puesto vacante de entrenador en jefe en Ole Miss con los funcionarios de la escuela el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following his discussion about the head coaching position at Ole Miss with school officials on Tuesday, Dennis Erickson, the head coach of the San Francisco 49ers, has decided to commit to his current team.

Original Text: Edwards sees valve trial delayed Medical device company says FDA not likely to greenlight a clinical trial of heart implant in 2004. CHICAGO (Reuters) - Edwards Lifesciences Corp.
Translation: Edwards ve retraso en ensayo de válvula. Compañía de dispositivos médicos dice que la FDA probablemente no dará luz verde a un ensayo clínico de implante cardíaco en 2004. CHICAGO (Reuters) - Edwards Lifesciences Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The clinical trial for a heart implant by medical device company Edwards Lifesciences Corp is expected to be delayed, as the FDA is unlikely to give approval in 2004, according to a report from Chicago by Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters from Chicago reports that the FDA is unlikely to approve a scheduled clinical trial of a heart implant by Edwards Lifesciences Corp in 2004, implying a delay for the medical device company.

Original Text: Saudi Violence Pushes Oil Prices Higher Oil prices were forced higher today by an outbreak of violence in Saudi Arabia and concerns that Opec may cut output. The cost of a barrel of light, sweet crude oil climbed
Translation: La Violencia en Arabia Saudita Impulsa los Precios del Petróleo al Alza Los precios del petróleo se vieron forzados a aumentar hoy debido a un brote de violencia en Arabia Saudita y preocupaciones de que la OPEP pueda recortar la producción. El costo de un barril de petróleo crudo ligero y dulce subió.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An eruption of violence in Saudi Arabia today, accompanied by worries of OPEC potentially slashing production, resulted in a surge in oil prices. The value of a barrel of light, sweet crude oil experienced an increase.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, upheaval in Saudi Arabia and apprehensions about potential output cuts by OPEC pushed the prices of oil upwards. There was a notable ascension in the pricing of a barrel of light, sweet crude oil.

Original Text: Pedro drives stake into heart of Texas: Ace carries Red Sox to <b>...</b> The arrival of rented yellow trucks in the city and packed minivans heading north over the Sagamore Bridge are a sure sign that Labor Day weekend has arrived in New England.
Translation: Pedro clava la estaca en el corazón de Texas: Ace lleva a Red Sox a <b>...</b> La llegada de camiones amarillos de alquiler a la ciudad y minivans llenas dirigiéndose al norte por el puente Sagamore son una señal segura de que el fin de semana del Día del Trabajo ha llegado a Nueva Inglaterra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The surefire symbol of Labor Day weekend's arrival in New England is the sight of packed minivans cruising north over the Sagamore Bridge and yellow rental trucks showing up in the city.
Paraphrase 2: 2. New England marks the advent of the Labor Day weekend with the influx of rented yellow trucks in the city and minivans filled to the brim heading northward across the Sagamore Bridge.

Original Text: Chicken gives up genetic secrets Scientists have published a detailed analysis of the chicken genome, the biochemical  quot;code quot; in the bird #39;s cells that makes the animal what it is.
Translation: El pollo revela secretos genéticos. Los científicos han publicado un análisis detallado del genoma del pollo, el "código" bioquímico en las células del ave que hacen que el animal sea lo que es.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The genetic code of the chicken, which defines its unique attributes, has been meticulously analyzed and documented by scientists.

Original Text: Microsoft issues SP2 patch com September 22, 2004, 12:09 PM PT. OS Migration has moved to the bottom ranks after making its mark on IT Professional #39;s top five priority last year.
Translation: Microsoft emite el parche SP2 com el 22 de septiembre de 2004, 12:09 PM PT. La migración del sistema operativo ha bajado a los últimos rangos después de dejar su huella en las cinco principales prioridades del profesional de IT el año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft released the SP2 patch on September 22, 2004, at 12:09 PM PT. After making it to the top five priorities of IT professionals last year, OS Migration has now descended to the lower positions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On September 22, 2004, at 12:09 PM PT, Microsoft put out the SP2 patch. Post achieving a spot on last year's top five priorities for IT professionals, OS Migration now finds itself at the lower ends.

Original Text: Citigroup #39;s Krawcheck Named Finance, Strategy Chief (Update1) Citigroup Inc., the world #39;s biggest bank, named Sallie Krawcheck chief financial officer and head of strategy, making her the highest-ranking woman on Wall Street.
Translation: Citigroup #39; nombra a Krawcheck como Jefe de Finanzas y Estrategia (Actualización1) Citigroup Inc., el banco más grande del mundo, nombró a Sallie Krawcheck como directora financiera y jefa de estrategia, convirtiéndola en la mujer de mayor rango en Wall Street.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sallie Krawcheck, made the highest-ranking woman on Wall Street, has been appointed by Citigroup Inc., the world's largest bank, as their Chief Financial Officer and Head of Strategy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the world's foremost bank, Citigroup Inc. has appointed Sallie Krawcheck as their Chief Financial Officer and Head of Strategy, making her the top-ranked female executive on Wall Street.

Original Text: HP beats lowered forecast Hewlett-Packard said Tuesday that quarterly profit topped its own lowered expectations as the computer and printer maker saw record revenues in every business and every region.
Translation: HP supera las previsiones reducidas. Hewlett-Packard dijo el martes que las ganancias trimestrales superaron sus propias expectativas reducidas, ya que el fabricante de computadoras e impresoras vio ingresos récord en todos los negocios y todas las regiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In spite of revised lower forecast, Hewlett-Packard announced on Tuesday that their quarterly earnings surpassed their expectations, thanks to record-breaking revenues in all businesses and regions in which the computer and printer manufacturer operates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having achieved record revenues across all their business segments and regions, Hewlett-Packard reported higher than anticipated profits for the quarter on Tuesday, surpassing even their own reduced forecast.

Original Text: One Small Step as China Opens Space Center (Reuters) Reuters - China\offered a rare glimpse of its manned space flight center\Wednesday, drawing back -- if only slightly -- the veil of\secrecy around China's ambitions in outer space.
Translation: Un Pequeño Paso mientras China Abre Centro Espacial (Reuters) Reuters - China ofreció un vistazo raro de su centro de vuelo espacial tripulado el miércoles, retirando -- aunque solo ligeramente -- el velo de secreto en torno a las ambiciones de China en el espacio exterior.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) - China partially lifted the veil of secrecy around its outer space ambitions as it offered an unusual peek into its manned space flight center on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: (Reuters) - The mystery surrounding China's space ambitions was slightly unveiled on Wednesday, as a seldom sight of its manned flight center was shared by China.

Original Text: Fannie Mae Agrees to Accounting Changes Fannie Mae, the giant mortgage finance company, Monday agreed to stop using accounting methods that its regulator criticized last week and to raise billions of dollars of additional capital as a cushion against potential losses.
Translation: Fannie Mae acepta cambios contables. Fannie Mae, la gigantesca empresa de financiamiento hipotecario, accedió el lunes a dejar de usar los métodos de contabilidad que su regulador criticó la semana pasada y a recaudar miles de millones de dólares de capital adicional como amortiguador contra posibles pérdidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Fannie Mae, the massive mortgage finance firm, consented to cease the use of accounting strategies that were previously disapproved by its regulator and decided to accumulate billions more in capital to safeguard against possible losses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Last week's criticism from its regulator prompted Fannie Mae, a leading mortgage finance company, to revise its accounting practices on Monday and undertake to generate billions in extra capital to protect against any prospective losses.

Original Text: S amp;P frowns on Telecom Italia debt (TheDeal.com) TheDeal.com - The company plans to spend  #36;27 billion to buy the 44 of Telecom Italia Mobile it does not already own.
Translation: S&P muestra descontento por la deuda de Telecom Italia (TheDeal.com) TheDeal.com - La empresa planea gastar 27 mil millones de dólares para comprar el 44% de Telecom Italia Mobile que aún no posee.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TheDeal.com reports that S&P disapproves of Telecom Italia's debt as the company intends to expend $27 billion to purchase the remaining 44% stake in Telecom Italia Mobile it currently doesn't possess.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The company is planning on a whopping $27 billion spending to acquire the 44% shares of Telecom Italia Mobile it does not have, a move frowned upon by S&P, according to TheDeal.com.

Original Text: Blind Students to Help Launch NASA Rocket By ALEX DOMINGUEZ    BALTIMORE (AP) -- A dozen blind students from across the United States are at a summer camp this week working on a project most don't associate with the visually impaired - launching a NASA rocket.    The students are designing and preparing the rocket's payload at the National Federation of the Blind's Jernigan Institute in Baltimore...
Translation:
Estudiantes Ciegos Ayudarán a Lanzar Cohete de la NASA Por ALEX DOMINGUEZ

BALTIMORE (AP) -- Una docena de estudiantes ciegos de todo Estados Unidos están en un campamento de verano esta semana trabajando en un proyecto con el que la mayoría no asocia a las personas con discapacidad visual - el lanzamiento de un cohete de la NASA.

Los estudiantes están diseñando y preparando la carga útil del cohete en el Instituto Jernigan de la Federación Nacional de Ciegos en Baltimore...
Paraphrase 1: 1. By ALEX DOMINGUEZ, BALTIMORE (AP) -- This week, twelve visually impaired students from various parts of the United States are participating in a summer camp. Their project, unlike what many would expect for those with sight loss, is to launch a NASA rocket. At the Jernigan Institute of the National Federation of the Blind in Baltimore, these students are busily designing and preparing the payload for the rocket...
Paraphrase 2: 2. BALTIMORE (AP) -- A group of twelve blind students from diverse regions in the United States are currently engaged in a unique project at a summer camp this week - sending a NASA rocket into space. ALEX DOMINGUEZ reports that these students are conducting their project at the Jernigan Institute, run by the National Federation of the Blind in Baltimore, where they are formulating the design and packing the rocket's payload...

Original Text: Sanz, Rita Big Winners at Latin Grammys LOS ANGELES - It seemed like a rerun of the 2002 Latin Grammys. Once again, Spanish heartthrob singer Alejandro Sanz dominated the show - only this time, Sanz didn't show up to collect his trophies...
Translation: Sanz, Rita los grandes ganadores en los Grammy Latinos LOS ÁNGELES - Parecía una repetición de los Grammy Latinos del 2002. Una vez más, el ídolo español de la música Alejandro Sanz dominó el espectáculo - solo que esta vez, Sanz no se presentó para recibir sus trofeos...
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Latin Grammys, reminiscent of the 2002 event, Alejandro Sanz reigned supreme once more, despite his absence this time around during the trophy collection... Meanwhile, Rita was also amongst the big winners.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mimicking the events of the 2002 Latin Grammys, Alejandro Sanz again emerged victorious. However, unlike last time, he was not in attendance to accept his awards... Meanwhile, Rita also scored big.

Original Text: Casey sets rookie record for Ryder Cup Former Hampton schoolboy Paul Casey played a crucial role in Europe #39;s biggest ever Ryder Cup win last weekend even though he lost one of his two matches, writes Tony Flood.
Translation: Casey establece récord de novato para la Ryder Cup. El ex alumno de la escuela de Hampton, Paul Casey, desempeñó un papel crucial en la mayor victoria de Europa en la Ryder Cup el pasado fin de semana, a pesar de que perdió uno de sus dos partidos, escribe Tony Flood.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Flood reports that former Hampton student, Paul Casey, despite losing one of his two matches, significantly contributed to Europe's most substantial Ryder Cup victory to date, establishing a new record for rookies.

Original Text: Russia Mourns Hostage Deaths, Putin Criticized (Reuters) Reuters - Russia on Monday mourned the\deaths of hundreds of children and adults in its worst hostage\drama as criticism mounted over the way President Vladimir\Putin and his security forces handled the crisis.
Translation: Rusia Lamenta la Muerte de Rehenes, Putin Criticado (Reuters) Reuters - Rusia lamentó el lunes las muertes de cientos de niños y adultos en su peor drama de rehenes, al tiempo que se incrementaban las críticas sobre la forma en que el presidente Vladimir Putin y sus fuerzas de seguridad manejaron la crisis.
Paraphrase 1: (1) Reuters - Russia was in mourning on Monday over the deaths of hundreds of adults and children from its most terrible hostage situation, while President Vladimir Putin faced increasing criticism regarding his and his security forces' handling of the crisis.
Paraphrase 2: (2) Hundreds of adults and children's deaths from Russia's worst hostage incident were mourned by the nation on Monday, as reported by Reuters. There was growing criticism towards President Vladimir Putin and his security forces for their crisis management approach.

Original Text: Sir Alex sharpens axe SIR Alex Ferguson is set to take the axe to his under-performing side after a shambolic start to his 10th Champions League campaign as Manchester United manager.
Translation: El señor Alex afila su hacha. El señor Alex Ferguson está listo para afilar su hacha con su equipo de bajo rendimiento después de un comienzo desastroso en su décima campaña de la Liga de Campeones como entrenador del Manchester United.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a disastrous beginning to his 10th Champions League campaign as Manchester United's manager, Sir Alex Ferguson is ready to drastically overhaul his underperforming team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sir Alex Ferguson, Manchester United's manager, plans to drastically revamp his poorly-performing team after a woeful commencement to his 10th Champions League campaign.

Original Text: Moderate Earthquake Rocks Nicaragua (AP) AP - A moderate earthquake shook the Pacific coast of Nicaragua early Friday, cracking a few walls and sending frightened residents running into the streets, but there were no reports of injuries.
Translation: Temblor Moderado Sacude Nicaragua (AP) AP - Un temblor moderado sacudió la costa del Pacífico de Nicaragua la madrugada del viernes, agrietando algunas paredes y enviando a los residentes asustados a las calles, pero no hubo informes de heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP reports a significant earthquake on the Pacific coast of Nicaragua that resulted in cracked walls and residents fleeing to the streets early Friday. Nevertheless, there have been no reported injuries.

Original Text: British soldier arrested over unlawful killing in Iraq LONDON: A 21-year-old British soldier was arrested Tuesday in connection with the murder of a civilian in Iraq, London #39;s Metropolitan Police said.
Translation: Soldado británico arrestado por asesinato ilegal en Irak LONDRES: Un soldado británico de 21 años fue arrestado el martes en relación con el asesinato de un civil en Irak, dijo la Policía Metropolitana de Londres.
Paraphrase 1: LONDON: A British soldier, aged 21, was detained on Tuesday by the Metropolitan Police in London for the alleged homicide of an Iraqi civilian.
Paraphrase 2: LONDON: The Metropolitan Police announced the arrest of a 21-year-old British serviceman on Tuesday, suspected of an illegal killing in Iraq.

Original Text: Ljubicic advances MADRID, Oct. 22. - Ivan Ljubicic edged No. 7 seed Joachim Johansson in three tough sets on Friday to reach the semi-finals in the \$3 m Madrid Masters.
Translation: Ljubicic avanza MADRID, 22 de Oct. - Ivan Ljubicic superó al séptimo cabeza de serie, Joachim Johansson, en tres duros sets el viernes para llegar a las semifinales en el Masters de Madrid de \$3 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ivan Ljubicic managed to move forward to the semi-finals of the $3m Madrid Masters on Friday, October 22, by barely defeating the 7th seed Joachim Johansson over three grueling sets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, at the Madrid Masters with a grand prize of $3m, Ivan Ljubicic narrowly triumphed over the No. 7 seed, Joachim Johansson, in a match consisting of three challenging sets, thus securing his place in the semi-finals.

Original Text: 35 Pakistanis Held in Cuba Return Home   ISLAMABAD, Pakistan, Sept. 18 -- Thirty-five Pakistani men released from U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay,  Cuba, returned home Saturday, a senior interior ministry official said.
Translation: 35 pakistaníes detenidos en Cuba regresan a casa   ISLAMABAD, Pakistán, 18 de Septiembre -- Treinta y cinco hombres pakistaníes liberados de la prisión militar de los EE.UU. en la Bahía de Guantánamo, Cuba, regresaron a casa el sábado, dijo un alto funcionario del ministerio del interior.
Paraphrase 1: ISLAMABAD, Pakistan, Sept. 18 -- Thirty-five Pakistani detainees freed from the U.S. military jail at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, arrived back in their homeland on Saturday, according to a high-ranking interior ministry spokesperson.
Paraphrase 2: A top official from the interior ministry confirmed on Saturday, Sept. 18, that thirty-five Pakistani men, previously incarcerated at the U.S. military base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, have been released and made their way back to Pakistan.

Original Text: N. Ireland militants' cease-fire OK'd BELFAST -- The outlawed Ulster Defense Association has resumed a credible cease-fire and is eligible to play a formal role again in Northern Ireland's peace process, Britain announced yesterday in a surprise move.
Translation: Se aprueba el cese al fuego de los militantes de Irlanda del Norte BELFAST -- La prohibida Asociación de Defensa de Ulster ha reanudado un cese al fuego creíble y es elegible para desempeñar nuevamente un papel formal en el proceso de paz de Irlanda del Norte, anunció Gran Bretaña ayer en una movida sorpresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an unexpected move yesterday, Britain announced that the banned Ulster Defense Association of Northern Ireland has reinstated a trustworthy cease-fire, thereby qualifying them once again for a formal participation in the peace process of Northern Ireland.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The British government surprisingly declared yesterday that the proscribed Ulster Defense Association in Northern Ireland has effectively reinstated a cease-fire. As a result, the organization is now considered suitable to formally participate in the Northern Ireland peace process again.

Original Text: Pilot talks continue; Delta shares fall ATLANTA -- Shares of Delta Air Lines Inc. fell Monday on the fear among some analysts that the struggling carrier will be forced into bankruptcy if it doesn #39;t get significant wage concessions from its pilots in the next three weeks.
Translation: Las negociaciones con los pilotos continúan; las acciones de Delta caen ATLANTA -- Las acciones de Delta Air Lines Inc. cayeron el lunes debido al temor entre algunos analistas de que la aerolínea en dificultades se verá obligada a declararse en quiebra si no consigue significativas concesiones salariales de sus pilotos en las próximas tres semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Concerns among analysts that Delta Air Lines Inc. may be pushed into bankruptcy if they cannot obtain considerable salary reductions from its pilots within the next three weeks led to a decline in the company's shares on Monday. The pilot negotiations are still ongoing.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Ongoing negotiations with pilots coupled with fears of coming bankruptcy if significant pay cuts aren't achieved soon led to the downfall of Delta Air Lines Inc.'s shares on Monday, according to some industry analysts.

Original Text: Earnings at China Unicom rise 18 HONG KONG China Unicom, the smaller of the nation #39;s two mobile phone companies, said Thursday that first-half profit rose about 18 percent from a year earlier after buying networks from its parent.
Translation: Las ganancias de China Unicom aumentan un 18% HONG KONG China Unicom, la más pequeña de las dos compañías de teléfonos móviles del país, dijo el jueves que las ganancias del primer semestre aumentaron aproximadamente un 18 por ciento con respecto al año anterior después de comprar redes a su empresa matriz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. China Unicom, one of the two primary mobile phone companies in the nation, announced on Thursday that their first-half profit had grown approximately 18 percent from the previous year, following the acquisition of networks from its parent company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After acquiring networks from its parent company, China Unicom, which ranks as the nation's less dominant mobile phone company, reported on Thursday an increase in first-half profit by about 18 percent compared to the same period last year.

Original Text: Indian FM:  #39;Do Not Expect Major Breakthroughs at Pakistan Talks #39; India #39;s Foreign Minister Natwar Singh says both India and Pakistan should not expect major breakthroughs in talks this Sunday aimed at building peace between the rivals.
Translation: Ministro de Exteriores de India: #39;No Esperamos Avances Importantes en las Conversaciones con Pakistán #39; El Ministro de Exteriores de India, Natwar Singh, dice que tanto India como Pakistán no deberían esperar avances importantes en las conversaciones de este domingo destinadas a construir la paz entre los rivales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Anticipate no significant advancements in Pakistan Talks," says Indian FM; Natwar Singh, the Foreign Minister of India, advises that neither India nor Pakistan should anticipate significant progress from the peace talks scheduled this Sunday to improve relations between the two rival nations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Natwar Singh, India's Foreign Minister, warns India and Pakistan not to assume major strides during peace talks taking place this Sunday directed at fostering peace between the contentious neighbors, adding, "Do not expect major breakthroughs at the negotiation with Pakistan".

Original Text: Motorola to Acquire MeshNetworks Motorola Inc. said Tuesday it has signed an agreement to acquire MeshNetworks Inc., a privately held developer of wireless networks.
Translation: Motorola adquirirá MeshNetworks. Motorola Inc. dijo el martes que ha firmado un acuerdo para adquirir MeshNetworks Inc., un desarrollador privado de redes inalámbricas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Motorola Inc. announced that it will be taking over MeshNetworks Inc., a privately-owned firm specializing in the development of wireless networks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Signing an agreement to purchase MeshNetworks Inc., a private entity that creates wireless networks, was confirmed by Motorola Inc. on Tuesday.

Original Text: Intel Abandons Projection TV Chip Intel first unveiled its plans to develop a liquid on crystal silicon chip in January. In August, the company said the chip would not be released by the end of the year.
Translation: Intel Abandona el Chip de TV de Proyección Intel primero reveló sus planes para desarrollar un chip de silicio líquido en cristal en enero. En agosto, la compañía dijo que el chip no sería lanzado antes de fin de año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel, which first announced its intentions to create a liquid on crystal silicon chip in January, declared in August that the chip would not be launched by the year's end. Notably, the company has also decided to abandon their Projection TV Chip.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After initially disclosing its project in January to create a liquid on crystal silicon chip, Intel confirmed in August that the chip's release would be delayed past the close of the year. The company has also ceased its development for the Projection TV Chip.

Original Text: Els and Westwood in Match Play final Ernie Els and Lee Westwood will meet Sunday in the finals of the HSBC World Match Play Championship. Els, looking for a sixth win in this event, posted a 5  amp; 4 victory over Padraig Harrington on Saturday.
Translation: Els y Westwood en la final del Match Play: Ernie Els y Lee Westwood se enfrentarán el domingo en la final del Campeonato Mundial HSBC de Match Play. Els, buscando una sexta victoria en este evento, logró una victoria de 5 y 4 sobre Padraig Harrington el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ernie Els and Lee Westwood are scheduled for a final showdown on Sunday at the HSBC World Match Play Championship, with Els aiming for his sixth victory following a triumphant 5 & 4 win against Padraig Harrington on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sunday sees a face-off between Ernie Els and Lee Westwood at the HSBC World Match Play Championship finals. Els, who's eyeing his sixth title in this event, recently triumphed over Padraig Harrington with a scoreline of 5 & 4 on Saturday.

Original Text: The Steelers try to knock off their second unbeaten team After ending New England #39;s 21-game winning streak last week, the Steelers greet the NFL #39;s last unbeaten team, playing Philadelphia for the Pennsylvania championship in a game that down the line might be a preview of a matchup for a much grander title.
Translation: Los Steelers intentan derribar a su segundo equipo invicto. Después de poner fin a la racha de 21 victorias consecutivas de New England la semana pasada, los Steelers reciben al último equipo invicto de la NFL, jugando contra Filadelfia por el campeonato de Pensilvania en un juego que, a largo plazo, podría ser una previa de un enfrentamiento por un título mucho más grande.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following their success in terminating New England's 21-game winning streak last week, the Steelers are ready to take on the NFL's final undefeated team, Philadelphia. This game could potentially be a glimpse into a bigger title match down the line, signifying a monumental championship for Pennsylvania.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After halting New England's 21-game victory streak last week, the Steelers are gearing up to face Philadelphia, the last unbeaten team in the NFL. This high-stakes match could eventually set the stage for a bigger, more prestigious title fight, underlining a significant championship for Pennsylvania.

Original Text: Blue-Chip Stocks Recover, Oil Retreats  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. blue-chip stocks changed course  and rose late Tuesday afternoon as a drop in oil prices helped  steady the market, although investors remained cautious before  tech bellwether Intel Corp.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A> earnings.
Translation: Las acciones de primera categoría se recuperan, el petróleo retrocede. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de primera categoría de EE. UU. cambiaron de rumbo y subieron a última hora de la tarde del martes, ya que una caída en los precios del petróleo ayudó a estabilizar el mercado, aunque los inversores se mantuvieron cautelosos antes de las ganancias del referente tecnológico Intel Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A>.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. blue-chip stocks experienced a rally on Tuesday afternoon, buoyed by falling oil prices that stabilized the market, despite investors demonstrating caution ahead of the earnings announcement from tech giant Intel Corp.INTC.O. The recovery of these stocks was noted in New York, but the oil market moved in the opposite direction, showing a retreat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A decrease in oil prices on Tuesday afternoon helped lift U.S. blue-chip stocks, although the market still showed cautiousness due to the impending earnings report of Intel Corp.INTC.O. Contrarily, oil prices took a downturn, according to Reuters' report from New York. The blue-chip stocks headed up, while oil fell back.

Original Text: The Fidelity watch Scott DeSano, Fidelity Investments' super-powerful head of stock trading, and his band of traders are suddenly under the gun.
Translation: El reloj de Fidelity observa a Scott DeSano, el jefe súper poderoso de la negociación de acciones de Fidelity Investments, y su banda de comerciantes están de repente bajo presión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scott DeSano, the exceptionally influential head of stock trading at Fidelity Investments, along with his team of traders, are suddenly facing extreme pressure.

Original Text: Wenger: Euro failure spells disaster for Arsenal Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has admitted failure to progress in the Champions League this season would be a financial disaster for the club.
Translation: Wenger: El fracaso en la Eurocopa presagia un desastre para el Arsenal. El jefe del Arsenal, Arsene Wenger, ha admitido que no avanzar en la Liga de Campeones esta temporada sería un desastre financiero para el club.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The manager of Arsenal, Arsene Wenger, concedes that not advancing in this season's Champions League would entail a financial catastrophe for the team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arsene Wenger, Arsenal's chief, acknowledges that Arsenal's financial health would be direly affected if they fail to make progress in the Champions League this season.

Original Text: More talks scheduled as Italy presses Libya on immigration crisis (AFP) AFP - Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi is aiming to make cooperation with Libya a model for Europe's efforts to stem a tide of illegal immigration from Africa, but further talks are still needed between Tripoli, Rome and the EU to resolve the crisis.
Translation: Se programan más conversaciones mientras Italia presiona a Libia sobre la crisis migratoria (AFP) AFP - El Primer Ministro italiano Silvio Berlusconi tiene como objetivo hacer de la cooperación con Libia un modelo para los esfuerzos de Europa para contener la marea de inmigración ilegal desde África, pero aún se necesitan más conversaciones entre Trípoli, Roma y la UE para resolver la crisis.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Silvio Berlusconi, the Italian Prime Minister, is determined to set the cooperation with Libya as a benchmark for Europe's endeavours to curb illegal immigration from Africa. However, resolving the crisis demands further discussions between Tripoli, Rome, and the EU, leading Italy to push for more scheduled talks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - Despite Italy's push towards more talks, additional discussions are still required among Tripoli, Rome, and the EU to find a solution for the immigration crisis. In context, Italian PM Silvio Berlusconi has intentions of using their cooperation with Libya as an example for European efforts to stop illegal African immigration.

Original Text: End to pillow talk on American flights Cash-strapped American Airlines Wednesday said it is trying to take some of the fluff out of its costs: so the world #39;s largest carrier is eliminating pillows on its planes.
Translation: Fin a las charlas en la almohada en los vuelos americanos. La afligida aerolínea American Airlines dijo el miércoles que está intentando eliminar algo de lo superfluo en sus costos: así que la aerolínea más grande del mundo está eliminando las almohadas en sus aviones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Attempting to reduce some of their expenditure, the world's leading carrier, American Airlines announced on Wednesday that they would no longer provide pillows on their flights, in a bid to cut costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an effort to trim down on expenses, American Airlines, the largest carrier globally, is discontinuing its provision of pillows aboard, as declared on Wednesday.

Original Text: Reconstructing the utility storage system vision NOVEMBER 15, 2004 (SNW ONLINE) - Since the late 1990s, leading data storage technology vendors have adopted a myopic and largely self-serving approach for addressing the two central challenges of enterprise storage: resource provisioning and data
Translation: Reconstruyendo la visión del sistema de almacenamiento de utilidades 15 DE NOVIEMBRE DE 2004 (SNW ONLINE) - Desde finales de la década de 1990, los principales proveedores de tecnología de almacenamiento de datos han adoptado un enfoque miope y en gran medida interesado para abordar los dos desafíos centrales del almacenamiento empresarial: la provisión de recursos y los datos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Since the late 1990s, top data storage technology providers have displayed a narrow and predominantly self-interested strategy to tackle the core problems of enterprise storage: resource provisioning and data management. They have been reconstructing the vision of the utility storage system which started on November 15, 2004 as reported by SNW Online.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As reported by SNW Online on November 15, 2004, since the late 1990s, main data storage technology companies have taken a short-sighted and mainly self-beneficial approach towards managing the two key issues of enterprise storage: resource provisioning and data allocation, leading to a revision in the vision for the utility storage system.

Original Text: August Machine Tool Demand Up Sharply  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. machine tool demand in August  rose sharply from a year earlier as manufacturers ratcheted-up  purchases amid signs the economy is improving, two industry  trade groups said in a report released on Sunday.
Translation: Demanda de Máquinas-Herramienta en Agosto Aumenta Bruscamente WASHINGTON (Reuters) - La demanda de máquinas-herramienta en los Estados Unidos en agosto aumentó bruscamente en comparación con el año anterior, ya que los fabricantes incrementaron sus compras ante signos de que la economía está mejorando, según dijeron dos grupos comerciales de la industria en un informe publicado el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - In August, there was a marked increase in machine tool demand on a year-over-year basis in the U.S., as manufacturers heightened their purchases in response to indications of an upgraded economy, according to a report released on Sunday by two industry trade associations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Two industry trade groups reported on Sunday that the demand for machine tools in the U.S. surged significantly in August compared to the same period last year, with manufacturers increasing their purchases due to promising signs of economic recovery.

Original Text: CA Overhauls Key Storage Management Line Computer Associates (Quote, Chart) has completed a major overhaul of its storage management software, updating and packaging its products into one  quot;integrated, intelligent quot; line.
Translation: Computer Associates (Cotización, Gráfico) ha completado una revisión importante de su software de gestión de almacenamiento, actualizando y empaquetando sus productos en una única línea "integrada e inteligente".
Paraphrase 1: 1) Computer Associates (Quote, Chart) has recently finished a significant revamp of its storage management software, assimilating and updating its products into a single "integrated, intelligent" line.
Paraphrase 2: 2) A substantial redesign of its storage management software has been achieved by Computer Associates (Quote, Chart), modernizing and consolidating its products into one "integrated, intelligent" line.

Original Text: HP Virus Throttler not intended to be a silver bullet HP #39;s Virus Throttler technology, due early next year, won #39;t be the killer app, the  quot;silver bullet, quot; that will stop viruses in their tracks, Tony Redmond, vice president and chief technology officer of HP Services, cautioned Tuesday at HP #39;s security event
Translation: El Virus Throttler de HP no pretende ser una bala de plata. La tecnología Virus Throttler de HP, que estará disponible a principios del próximo año, no será la aplicación estrella, la "bala de plata", que detendrá los virus en su camino, advirtió Tony Redmond, vicepresidente y director de tecnología de HP Services, el martes en el evento de seguridad de HP.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Redmond, Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of HP Services, during Tuesday's HP security event, issued a warning that the forthcoming Virus Throttler technology from HP, expected in the early next year, is not intended to be a 'silver bullet' or the ultimate answer to stop all viruses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Expected to be released next year, HP's Virus Throttler technology will not be the decisive solution that will halt viruses, cautioned Tony Redmond, the vice president and chief technology officer of HP Services, at a security event held by HP on Tuesday.

Original Text: U.N. Downplays S. Korean Nuke Experiments (AP) AP - South Korean nuclear experiments revealed earlier this year produced minute amounts of weapons-grade uranium and plutonium, but there was no evidence linking them to an attempt to make weapons, the U.N. atomic watchdog agency said Thursday.
Translation: La ONU minimiza los experimentos nucleares de Corea del Sur (AP) AP - Los experimentos nucleares de Corea del Sur revelados a principios de este año produjeron cantidades minúsculas de uranio y plutonio de grado armamentístico, pero no había evidencia que los vinculara con un intento de fabricar armas, dijo el jueves la agencia de vigilancia atómica de la ONU.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The U.N. atomic watchdog agency stated on Thursday that South Korean nuclear experiments, revealed earlier this year, generated minute quantities of weapons-grade uranium and plutonium. However, there was no conclusive evidence to suggest these were part of an effort to manufacture weapons.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The nuclear experiments conducted by South Korea earlier this year, which produced small amounts of weapons-grade uranium and plutonium, were not linked to any weapons production attempts, according to a statement by the U.N. atomic watchdog agency on Thursday.

Original Text: Motorola to shed 1,000 jobs Telecoms equipment maker Motorola said that it is cutting 1,000 positions globally as it completes the spin-off of its former chip unit, now known as Freescale Semiconductor.
Translation: Motorola eliminará 1,000 empleos. El fabricante de equipos de telecomunicaciones Motorola dijo que está recortando 1,000 puestos a nivel mundial a medida que completa la escisión de su antigua unidad de chips, ahora conocida como Freescale Semiconductor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Motorola, the telecommunications equipment maker, announced that it is eliminating 1,000 jobs worldwide during the completion of the spin-off of its former chip unit, now operating under the name Freescale Semiconductor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amidst the final stages of spinning off its erstwhile chip unit, now called Freescale Semiconductor, the telecoms equipment producing company Motorola, declared its plan to cut a thousand jobs from its global workforce.

Original Text: Bomb Kills Two US Soldiers, Injures One in Afghanistan Two US soldiers were killed and a third was wounded Wednesday when a bomb exploded as they drove through an area of central Afghanistan where Taliban fighters are said
Translation: "Bomba mata a dos soldados estadounidenses, hiere a uno en Afganistán. Dos soldados estadounidenses fueron asesinados y un tercero resultó herido el miércoles cuando una bomba explotó mientras conducían a través de una zona del centro de Afganistán donde se dice que están los combatientes talibanes."
Paraphrase 1: 1. A bomb detonation led to the death of two US soldiers and left another wounded in a Taliban-infiltrated region of central Afghanistan on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday's bomb blast in a central Afghanistan area, known for Taliban presence, resulted in the fatality of two US soldiers and injury to another.

Original Text: Phishing Feeds Internet Black Markets Phishing is a growing form of online fraud that blends old-fashioned confidence scams with innovations in technological trickery. Today and Friday, washingtonpost.com explores the methods phishers use, how e-businesses are dealing with the problem and what phishing has done to its thousands of victims. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Translation: Phishing Alimenta los Mercados Negros de Internet. El Phishing es una creciente forma de fraude en línea que combina estafas de confianza tradicionales con innovaciones en engaños tecnológicos. Hoy y el viernes, washingtonpost.com explora los métodos que utilizan los phishers, cómo los negocios electrónicos están lidiando con el problema y qué ha hecho el phishing a sus miles de víctimas. -washingtonpost.com
