Paraphrase 1: 1) Phishing, a rapidly expanding genre of online fraud that combines traditional scams with modern technological deceit, is the backbone of internet black markets. This combo of trickery is under examination by washingtonpost.com on both today and Friday. The focus will be on the mechanisms employed by phishers, the steps taken by e-businesses to counter these threats, and the aftermath faced by the countless victims of phishing. -washingtonpost.com
Paraphrase 2: 2) Internet black markets are thriving on phishing, which is a sophisticated form of online fraud incorporating conventional swindles and high-tech deceit. An investigation into the intricate workings of phishers, the antidotes implemented by e-businesses, and the outcomes for the many sufferers of phishing is being carried out by washingtonpost.com today and Friday. -washingtonpost.com

Original Text: Bus swept into China river, 3 dead, 41 missing A sudden flood surge on a river in China swept an overcrowded bus full of young students and farmers into a river, killing three people and leaving 41 missing, state media said on Sunday.
Translation: Autobús arrastrado a un río en China, 3 muertos, 41 desaparecidos. Un repentino aumento de la inundación en un río en China arrastró un autobús sobrecargado de jóvenes estudiantes y agricultores a un río, matando a tres personas y dejando a 41 desaparecidas, informó la prensa estatal el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A deluge in a Chinese river suddenly swept a bus packed with students and farmers, resulting in three fatalities and 41 people unaccounted for, according to a report by state media on Sunday.

Original Text: In Brief: Cisco acquires startup BCN Systems (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Cisco Systems has finalized an agreement to purchase privately held BCN Systems, a provider of networking software design. Under the terms of the agreement, Cisco will pay approximately  #36;34 million in cash for BCN. The price could increase by as much as  #36;122 million if BCN meets certain development and product milestones. BCN's architecture will be incorporated across Cisco's broad routing portfolio and will support Cisco's delivery of next-generation data, voice, and video services over a converged network.
Translation: En resumen: Cisco adquiere la startup BCN Systems (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Cisco Systems ha finalizado un acuerdo para comprar BCN Systems, una empresa privada proveedora de diseño de software de red. Bajo los términos del acuerdo, Cisco pagará aproximadamente #36;34 millones en efectivo por BCN. El precio podría aumentar hasta en #36;122 millones si BCN cumple ciertos hitos de desarrollo y producto. La arquitectura de BCN se incorporará a lo largo del amplio portafolio de enrutamiento de Cisco y apoyará la entrega de los servicios de datos, voz y video de próxima generación de Cisco sobre una red convergente.
Paraphrase 1: Summary: Cisco Systems acquires BCN Systems at a potential price of $156 million subject to development and product milestones (InfoWorld)
Paraphrase 2: InfoWorld - BCN Systems, a private startup specializing in network software design, has been bought by Cisco Systems for an upfront cash payment of $34 million. If certain product and development milestones are met, the cost could escalate by another $122 million. Cisco plans to incorporate BCN's unique architecture into its extensive routing portfolio to improve the delivery of next-generation data, voice, and video services on a converged network.

Original Text: Here #39;s a look at Houston #39;s family #39;s companies, lawsuits * Winning Action Investments Inc., real estate investment corporation that filed for bankruptcy in February 2003. Guy Houston signed loan papers as company vice president and was cited with the company by
Translation: Aquí te presentamos una visión de las empresas de la familia Houston, demandas * Winning Action Investments Inc., corporación de inversión inmobiliaria que se declaró en quiebra en febrero de 2003. Guy Houston firmó los documentos de préstamo como vicepresidente de la empresa y fue citado junto con la empresa por
Paraphrase 1: 1. Here's an overview of the companies and lawsuits linked to the Houston family, including Winning Action Investments Inc., a real estate investment corporation which declared bankruptcy in February 2003. Guy Houston, in his capacity as company vice president, was involved with the business by signing loan papers and being jointly cited.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Winning Action Investments Inc., a real estate investment corporation tied to the Houston family and which went bankrupt in February 2003, is among the companies and lawsuits we're examining. Guy Houston, acting as the company's vice president, was implicated by signing the loan documents and being collectively mentioned with the firm.

Original Text: MLB: Angels Take One Game Lead in American West Division In Major League Baseball action Wednesday, the Anaheim Angels took a one-game lead in the American League West Division by beating the Texas Rangers, 8-7.
Translation: MLB: Los Angels Toman la Delantera de un Juego en la División Oeste Americana En acción de la Major League Baseball el miércoles, los Anaheim Angels tomaron una ventaja de un juego en la División Oeste de la Liga Americana al vencer a los Texas Rangers, 8-7.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During Wednesday's Major League Baseball match, the Anaheim Angels claimed a victory against the Texas Rangers, 8-7, which put them one game ahead in the American League West Division.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Anaheim Angels secured an 8-7 win over the Texas Rangers on Wednesday in Major League Baseball, thus gaining a one-game lead in the American League West Division.

Original Text: Briefly: Credit union beefs up database security roundup Plus: Computer scientists slam e-voting machines..."The Sims 2" hits 1 million sales...Adobe, Kodak team on photo printing...Cray promotes two execs.
Translation: En resumen: La cooperativa de crédito refuerza la seguridad de la base de datos. Además: Científicos informáticos critican las máquinas de votación electrónica..."The Sims 2" alcanza 1 millón de ventas...Adobe y Kodak se unen para impresión de fotos...Cray promueve a dos ejecutivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To sum it up: The credit union enhances database security, computer scientists criticize electronic voting machines, "The Sims 2" achieves a milestone of 1 million sales, Adobe and Kodak collaborate on a photo printing project, and Cray elevates two executives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In short: Database security gets an upgrade at the credit union, experts in computer science express disapproval of e-voting machines, "The Sims 2" reaches 1 million in sales figures, Adobe joins hands with Kodak for a photo printing venture, and two executives climb the corporate ladder at Cray.

Original Text: For an Inventor, IM Opens a Window to a World of Games A California software developer turns instant message windows into a platform for video games.
Translation: Para un Inventor, IM Abre una Ventana a un Mundo de Juegos. Un desarrollador de software de California convierte las ventanas de mensajes instantáneos en una plataforma para videojuegos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A California software developer is transforming instant messaging into a gaming platform, opening up a new world of games for inventors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Instant messaging is being converted into a gaming platform by a Californian software developer, presenting a plethora of gaming opportunities to inventors.

Original Text: Sosa responds to Baker criticism Sammy Sosa has fired back at comments made by manager Dusty Baker prior to Sunday #39;s season ending win over the Atlanta Braves.
Translation:
Sosa responde a las críticas de Baker
Sammy Sosa ha respondido a los comentarios hechos por el gerente Dusty Baker antes de la victoria del domingo que marcó el fin de la temporada sobre los Bravos de Atlanta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sammy Sosa counters Dusty Baker's criticisms, with comments made preceding Sunday's season finale victory against the Atlanta Braves.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to the remarks made by manager Dusty Baker before Sunday's season-closing triumph over the Atlanta Braves, Sammy Sosa has retorted.

Original Text: Two-day ASEAN summit opens in Laos Leaders of 10 South East Asian nations have started a two-day summit in the Laos capital, Vientiane. The Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) meeting will focus on deepening economic integration
Translation: Se inaugura la cumbre de dos días de la ASEAN en Laos. Los líderes de 10 naciones del sudeste asiático han iniciado una cumbre de dos días en la capital de Laos, Vientiane. La reunión de la Asociación de Naciones del Sudeste Asiático (ASEAN) se centrará en profundizar la integración económica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Leaders from ten South East Asian nations have initiated a two-day summit in Vientiane, the capital of Laos, aimed at intensifying economic integration. The conference is part of the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN's) activities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) is conducting a summit in Vientiane, the capital city of Laos, which will span two days and aims on strengthening economic integration. This meeting gathers leaders from 10 South East Asian nations.

Original Text: HP Board Pondered Breaking Up the Company  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - The board of Hewlett-Packard Co.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HPQ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HPQ.N</A> discussed breaking up the No. 2 computer maker three  times in the past, yet each time decided to keep it intact,  Chief Executive Carly Fiorina said on Tuesday, defending her  strategy for the company.
Translation: La Junta de HP Consideró Dividir la Compañía  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - La junta de Hewlett-Packard Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HPQ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HPQ.N</A> discutió dividir al fabricante de computadoras número 2 tres veces en el pasado, pero cada vez decidió mantenerlo intacto, dijo el martes la Directora Ejecutiva Carly Fiorina, defendiendo su estrategia para la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - The possibility of splitting up Hewlett-Packard Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HPQ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HPQ.N</A>, the second largest computer manufacturer, had been deliberated upon thrice by its board in the past, Chief Executive Carly Fiorina reported Tuesday. Each time, however, the decision favored keeping the company whole, as an affirmation of her strategic plans for the organization.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - On Tuesday, Chief Executive Carly Fiorina revealed that there had been three occasions in the past when the board of Hewlett-Packard Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HPQ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HPQ.N</A>, currently the world's second largest computer producer, had considered a company split. Despite these discussions, the decision was consistently made to preserve the company's unity, serving as a testament to Fiorina's corporate strategy.

Original Text: Howard may sweep to victory on wave of apathy It should have been a relaxing stroll in the sunshine for John Howard, a chance to press the flesh of friendly voters in Bennelong, his Sydney seat.
Translation: Howard podría barrer hacia la victoria en una ola de apatía. Debería haber sido un paseo relajante bajo el sol para John Howard, una oportunidad para estrechar la carne de los votantes amistosos en Bennelong, su escaño en Sydney.
Paraphrase 1: 1. John Howard might clinch the win riding on indifference. His Sydney seat in Bennelong should have offered him a leisurely walk in the sunlight and an opportunity to mingle with supportive voters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On the wave of apathy, Howard could possibly seize the victory. What should have been a serene amble under the sun and an occasion to connect with well-disposed voters in his Bennelong, Sydney constituency is what John Howard encountered.

Original Text: Factory Orders Dip for First Time in 4 Months Overall, factory orders declined by 0.1 percent in August, following an increase of 1.7 percent in July.
Translation: Las órdenes de fábrica bajan por primera vez en 4 meses. En general, las órdenes de fábrica disminuyeron en un 0.1 por ciento en agosto, después de un aumento del 1.7 por ciento en julio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In August, for the first time in 4 months, there was a slight decrease of 0.1 percent in overall factory orders, contrasting the 1.7 percent increase recorded in July.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The overall factory orders saw a decrease of 0.1 percent in August, marking their first decline in a span of 4 months, this followed a growth of 1.7 percent in the prior month, July.

Original Text: Race driver killed in crash Race car driver Tommy Baldwin was killed in a crash at Thompson International Speedway during a Featherlite modified race.
Translation: El piloto de carreras murió en un accidente. El piloto de coches de carreras Tommy Baldwin murió en un accidente en el Speedway Internacional de Thompson durante una carrera de Featherlite modificada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tommy Baldwin, a race car driver, tragically lost his life in a crash during a Featherlite modified contest at Thompson International Speedway.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During a Featherlite modified race at Thompson International Speedway, race car driver Tommy Baldwin met a fatal crash.

Original Text: Veteran Lewis Seizes Slender Lead in Las Vegas  LAS VEGAS, Nevada (Reuters) - PGA Tour veteran JL Lewis  reeled off seven birdies and an eagle to race into a one-shot  lead after the second round of the \$4 million Las Vegas  Invitational Friday.
Translation: El veterano Lewis se hace con una delgada ventaja en Las Vegas. LAS VEGAS, Nevada (Reuters) - El veterano de la PGA Tour, JL Lewis, logró siete birdies y un águila para tomar una ventaja de un solo golpe después de la segunda ronda del Invitational de Las Vegas de 4 millones de dólares el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) LAS VEGAS, Nevada (Reuters) - On Friday, at the Las Vegas Invitational, JL Lewis, a seasoned pro on the PGA Tour, took a one-shot lead after the second round by clocking in seven birdies and an eagle, boosting him to the top in the $4 million competition.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In the Las Vegas Invitational that boasted a $4 million prize, PGA Tour old hand JL Lewis outpaced the competition, surging into a one-shot lead upon the conclusion of the second round, this Friday. His seven birdies and an eagle fueled his ascension.

Original Text: Haslem, Wade power Miami Heat TAMPA  Ever since Alonzo Mourning #39;s devastating revelation of kidney illness in September 2000, the Heat has been more than aware of life without a dominant big man.
Translation: Haslem, Wade impulsan a Miami Heat TAMPA. Desde la devastadora revelación de la enfermedad renal de Alonzo Mourning en septiembre de 2000, el Heat ha estado más que consciente de la vida sin un hombre grande dominante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Since Alonzo Mourning's shocking disclosure of his kidney disease in September 2000, the Miami Heat, spearheaded by Haslem and Wade, have been cognizant of functioning without a primary big man.

Original Text: Analysts can #39;t peg Google com September 28, 2004, 9:54 AM PT. There #39;s no doubt the Internet will continue to make its mark in the world of business and technology.
Translation: Los analistas no pueden clasificar a Google.com 28 de septiembre de 2004, 9:54 AM PT. No hay duda de que Internet continuará dejando su huella en el mundo de los negocios y la tecnología.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As of September 28, 2004, 9:54 AM PT, it's undeniable that the Internet will maintain its influential role in business and technology, even though analysts still can't pinpoint Google.com's role in this evolution.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Analysts are unable to set Google.com's precise position on the date of September 28, 2004, 9:54 AM PT. Yet, it's unequivocal that in the spheres of technology and business, the Internet will perpetuate its significance.

Original Text: #39;The gaffer has mellowed but his desire to win is still there #39; I was dying to ask. How on earth do you survive 13 full years playing for, arguably, the most demanding manager this country has ever seen?
Translation: "El jefe se ha suavizado, pero su deseo de ganar todavía está allí", estaba deseando preguntar. ¿Cómo diablos sobrevives 13 años completos jugando para, posiblemente, el entrenador más exigente que este país ha visto jamás?
Paraphrase 1: 1. "The boss has become more approachable over time, but his passion for victory remains just as strong," I was so curious to ask. How do you possibly endure an entire 13 years working with, potentially, the harshest manager our nation has ever witnessed?
Paraphrase 2: 2. "The chief has softened a bit, yet his craving for success has not faded," I was practically bursting with the question. How in the world do you last for 13 long years under, what could be considered, the strictest management the country has ever encountered?

Original Text: UPS to Buy Menlo Worldwide for \$150M United Parcel Service Inc., the world #39;s largest package-delivery company, will buy CNF Inc. #39;s Menlo Worldwide Forwarding business for \$150 million, the companies said Tuesday.
Translation: UPS comprará Menlo Worldwide por \$150M United Parcel Service Inc., la compañía de entrega de paquetes más grande del mundo, comprará el negocio de Menlo Worldwide Forwarding de CNF Inc. por \$150 millones, dijeron las compañías el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) United Parcel Service Inc., the foremost package-delivery organization on the globe, has planned to purchase Menlo Worldwide Forwarding, an enterprise owned by CNF Inc., at a price of \$150 million, as announced by both companies this Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The most preeminent package-delivery firm in the world, United Parcel Service Inc., is set to acquire CNF Inc.'s business unit, Menlo Worldwide Forwarding, in a deal worth \$150 million, a joint statement from the two corporations confirmed on Tuesday.

Original Text: Tax bill modified; Harkin, Grassley disagree A key issue in the \$140 billion bill involves removing Food and Drug Administration regulation from tobacco products. Updates in tax law to help agricultural cooperatives.
Translation: Se modificó el proyecto de ley de impuestos; Harkin, Grassley no están de acuerdo. Un tema clave en el proyecto de ley de 140 mil millones de dólares implica eliminar la regulación de la Administración de Alimentos y Medicamentos en los productos de tabaco. Actualizaciones en la ley fiscal para ayudar a las cooperativas agrícolas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst tax bill alterations, Harkin and Grassley find themselves in disagreement, especially over a pivotal matter in the $140 billion legislation that proposes the withdrawal of Food and Drug Administration oversight from tobacco goods. The tax code is also being updated to benefit agricultural cooperatives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A disagreement arises between Harkin and Grassley as modifications are brought about in the tax bill; an issue worth $140 billion directing towards eliminating FDA control on tobacco products predominates. The revised tax provisions also bring aid to agricultural cooperatives.

Original Text: North Korea denies defection of generals December 14, 2004  A North Korean Foreign Ministry spokesman has denied an International Herald Tribune report that hundreds of the country #39;s generals defected to China.
Translation: Corea del Norte niega la deserción de generales el 14 de diciembre de 2004. Un portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Corea del Norte ha negado un informe del International Herald Tribune que señala que cientos de los generales del país desertaron a China.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A spokesperson from North Korea's Foreign Ministry refutes the International Herald Tribune's claim that hundreds of the nation's generals have defected to China, made on December 14, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On December 14, 2004, the International Herald Tribune reported a mass defection of generals from North Korea to China, a claim which has been flatly denied by a North Korean Foreign Ministry spokesperson.

Original Text: Japanese PM stands firm on hostage demand Japan #39;s prime minister today refused to bend to demands by militants who have taken a Japanese civilian hostage in Iraq and threatened to behead him unless Tokyo withdraws its soldiers.
Translation: El primer ministro japonés se mantiene firme ante la demanda de los rehenes. El primer ministro de Japón se negó hoy a ceder ante las exigencias de los militantes que han tomado como rehén a un civil japonés en Irak y amenazaron con decapitarlo a menos que Tokio retire a sus soldados.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Today, the Prime Minister of Japan firmly resisted the demands of Iraqi militants who threatened to decapitate a Japanese civilian hostage unless Tokyo pulls out its troops.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Japanese Prime Minister today held strong against the stipulations presented by militants who have captured a Japanese civilian in Iraq and menaced to execute him if Tokyo doesn't recall its military personnel.

Original Text: The Playoffs/News  amp; Notes: Major League Baseball recalls bad taste <b>...</b> A day before Boston and New York started the American League Championship Series, Major League Baseball recalled a T-shirt it had sanctioned because it rubbed Red Sox fans the wrong way.
Translation: Playoffs/Noticias y Notas: La Major League Baseball recuerda el mal sabor de boca <b>...</b> Un día antes de que Boston y Nueva York iniciaran la Serie de Campeonato de la Liga Americana, la Major League Baseball retiró una camiseta que había aprobado porque irritó a los aficionados de los Red Sox.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A day preceding the start of the American League Championship Series between Boston and New York, Major League Baseball withdrew a previously approved T-shirt which had upset Red Sox fans.

Original Text: A breed apart As a child, Adam Levesque would sit with his grandfather, watching televised nature documentaries featuring exotic animals in their natural habitats. These days, Levesque creates his own wild kingdoms in a Waltham office park with a few clicks of a computer mouse.
Translation: Una raza aparte. Cuando era niño, Adam Levesque se sentaba con su abuelo, viendo documentales de naturaleza en la televisión que presentaban animales exóticos en sus hábitats naturales. Hoy en día, Levesque crea sus propios reinos salvajes en un parque de oficinas en Waltham con solo unos pocos clics del ratón de su computadora.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Adam Levesque, as a young child, would share his time with his grandfather, their eyes glued to the television screen, engrossed in nature documentaries showcasing animals in their untamed habitats. Now, in modern times, Levesque designs his personal wildlife sanctuaries at his Waltham office simply by manipulating his computer mouse.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In his younger years, Adam Levesque sought fascination in the exotic animals featured in nature documentaries that he watched with his grandfather. Now, with the power of technology within his Waltham office, he can create his virtual wilderness with a couple of mouse clicks.

Original Text: Somewhere between gleam and gloom President Bush has been saying that the US economy has ''turned the corner. quot; Democratic presidential candidate Senator John F. Kerry, in the wake of this month's poor jobs report, quipped that it was more like a U-turn.
Translation: En algún lugar entre el brillo y la penumbra, el presidente Bush ha estado diciendo que la economía de los EE.UU ha "doblado la esquina". El candidato presidencial demócrata, el senador John F. Kerry, a raíz del pésimo informe de empleo de este mes, bromeó diciendo que era más bien un giro en U.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst the blend of brightness and gloom, President Bush insists that the US economy has "rounded a bend". However, following this month's dismal jobs report, Democratic presidential contender, Senator John F. Kerry, smartly retorted that it seemed more like a complete U-turn.
Paraphrase 2: 2. President Bush has been asserting that the US economy has "surpassed a hurdle," somewhere within the realm of optimism and despair. On the other hand, in light of a disappointing jobs report this month, Senator John F. Kerry, the Democratic candidate for president, humorously rebutted that it appeared to have taken a U-turn instead.

Original Text: Triple crown When Bode Miller sped down the Lake Louise course 14/100ths of a second faster than Hermann Maier last Sunday, it was a race for the record books. Not only had the Franconia, N.H., resident beaten Austria's famous ace and won on a course where he always has had trouble, but he also became the first male ...
Translation: Triple corona Cuando Bode Miller bajó a toda velocidad por la pista de Lake Louise 14/100ésimas de segundo más rápido que Hermann Maier el último domingo, fue una carrera para los libros de récords. No solo el residente de Franconia, N.H., había vencido al famoso as de Austria y ganado en una pista donde siempre ha tenido problemas, sino que también se convirtió en el primer hombre...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bode Miller, a resident of Franconia, N.H., made history last Sunday when he outraced Austria's legendary Hermann Maier down the challenging Lake Louise course by 14/100ths of a second. This triumph marked him not only as the first male to achieve this, but also the conqueror of a course that had always posed difficulties for him.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Setting a milestone in the record books, Bode Miller from Franconia, N.H., outpaced Austria's renowned Hermann Maier at the infamous Lake Louise course last Sunday by a slim margin of 14/100ths of a second. Not only did he trump a course that had always been troublesome for him, but he also emerged as the premier male to do so.

Original Text: Hostages Face Death in Iraq  BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Several insurgent groups set deadlines  for killing more than a score of hostages in Iraq -- from a  trio of American and British workers to an entire squad of 18  Iraqi soldiers -- unless their various demands are met.
Translation: Rehenes enfrentan la muerte en Irak BAGDAD (Reuters) - Varios grupos insurgentes establecen plazos para matar a más de una veintena de rehenes en Irak, desde un trío de trabajadores estadounidenses y británicos hasta un escuadrón completo de 18 soldados iraquíes, a menos que se cumplan sus diversas demandas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Numerous rebel factions in Iraq have established ultimatums for the execution of more than twenty hostages, comprising three workers from America and Britain as well as a full team of eighteen Iraqi military personnel, contingent upon whether their specific conditions are fulfilled.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Iraq, multiple terrorist entities have set time limits for the slaughter of over twenty captives - ranging from three employees of American and British origin to a full troop of eighteen Iraqi soldiers - if their distinct requirements go unmet.

Original Text: Industry Hires House's Author of Drug Benefit Representative Billy Tauzin will become president of the Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, the chief lobby for brand-name drug companies.
Translation: La Industria Contrata al Autor de la Ley de Beneficios de Medidas Farmacéuticas de la Cámara, el Representante Billy Tauzin se convertirá en presidente de la Investigación Farmacéutica y Fabricantes de América, el principal grupo de cabildeo para las empresas de medicamentos de marca.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Representative Billy Tauzin, the person responsible for the creation of the Drug Benefit House, will take on the position of president for the Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, the major advocacy group for brand-name drug corporations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, the leading lobby for brand-name medical drug companies, is set to welcome Representative Billy Tauzin, the author of the Drug Benefit House, as their new president.

Original Text: Francophone summit ends with resolution on Ivory Coast OUAGADOUGOU (AFP) - Leaders from 36 French-speaking countries wrapped up a summit in Burkina Faso, with a call to the protagonists in the Ivory Coast conflict to implement a French-brokered pact to restore peace.
Translation: Cumbre francófona concluye con resolución sobre Costa de Marfil OUAGADOUGOU (AFP) - Líderes de 36 países francoparlantes concluyeron una cumbre en Burkina Faso, con un llamado a los protagonistas en el conflicto de Costa de Marfil para implementar un pacto negociado por Francia para restaurar la paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The summit involving leaders from 36 Francophone nations conducted in Burkina Faso concluded with a decided resolution concerning the Ivory Coast conflict, urging the involved parties to execute a French-orchestrated peace agreement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A convention involving leaders of 36 French-speaking countries in Burkina Faso finished with an appeal to the parties involved in the Clash of the Ivory Coast to put into action a peace agreement mediated by France.

Original Text: Explorer Again In The News For Wrong Reasons Microsoft #39;s flagship Internet Explorer has once again come under the spotlight, albeit for all the wrong reasons. Two more vulnerabilities were uncovered in the widely used Web browser version 6, according to security firm Secunia.
Translation: El explorador vuelve a estar en las noticias por las razones equivocadas. La insignia de Microsoft, Internet Explorer, ha vuelto a estar bajo el foco de atención, aunque por todas las razones equivocadas. Según la firma de seguridad Secunia, se descubrieron dos vulnerabilidades más en la versión 6 del navegador web ampliamente utilizado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Once more, Microsoft's primary Internet Explorer is attracting negative media attention. Two additional security flaws in the popular Web browser version 6 have been discovered, says security company Secunia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft's Internet Explorer has yet again found itself in a controversy, but unfortunately for the wrong reasons. Security company, Secunia, has reported the discovery of two new vulnerabilities in its widely-used Web browser, version 6.

Original Text: New faces helps Lakers sink Suns LAS VEGAS - Brian Grant had 22 points and 11 rebounds to lead the Los Angeles Lakers over the Phoenix Suns 111-103 in a preseason game Sunday night.
Translation: Las nuevas incorporaciones ayudan a los Lakers a hundir a los Suns LAS VEGAS - Brian Grant anotó 22 puntos y logró 11 rebotes para liderar a los Los Angeles Lakers en su victoria sobre los Phoenix Suns por 111-103 en un partido de pretemporada el domingo por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a preseason clash on Sunday, Brian Grant's impressive tally of 22 points and 11 rebounds gave the Los Angeles Lakers a 111-103 victory over the Phoenix Suns, with new recruits proving pivotal in the Lakers' success.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The recent additions to the Lakers squad made an impact in LA's 111-103 win over the Phoenix Suns in a preseason encounter held in Las Vegas, where Brian Grant posted 22 points and 11 rebounds, leading the charge for the Lakers on Sunday night.

Original Text: HP tells Sun to get its facts straight Sun execs say they're telling it like it is: HP's Unix offering is on its last legs. HP says they're flat-out wrong.
Translation: HP le dice a Sun que aclare sus datos. Los ejecutivos de Sun dicen que están diciendo las cosas tal como son: la oferta Unix de HP está en sus últimos días. HP dice que están completamente equivocados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. HP claims that Sun needs to check their information accurately. Sun executives insist that they are presenting the situation as it is, proclaiming HP's Unix solution is nearing its end. However, HP strongly asserts that Sun's claims are completely incorrect.
Paraphrase 2: 2. HP denies Sun's assertion that their Unix product is failing, advising them to verify their information. Sun executives, on the other hand, maintain that they are being candid about the situation. HP strongly refutes their stance.

Original Text: Mac  #39;Widget #39; App Set to Make Windows Debut As one developer prepares to move his application from Mac to Windows, others reaffirm their commitment to the platformdespite competing directly with Apple Computer Inc.
Translation: La aplicación 'Widget' de Mac está lista para hacer su debut en Windows. Mientras un desarrollador se prepara para mover su aplicación de Mac a Windows, otros reafirman su compromiso con la plataforma a pesar de competir directamente con Apple Computer Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a developer is readying to transition his 'Widget' App from Mac to Windows, other developers are reaffirming their dedication to the platform, even though they compete directly with Apple Computer Inc.

Original Text: Canada Hopes New Beef Rules Will Win Over Japan (Reuters) Reuters - Canada has positioned itself ahead of the\United States to regain share in the lucrative Japanese beef\market, thanks to strict new rules aimed at preventing mad cow\disease, Agriculture Minister Andy Mitchell said on Wednesday.
Translation: Canadá espera que nuevas normas sobre la carne de res conquisten a Japón (Reuters) Reuters - Canadá se ha posicionado por delante de los Estados Unidos para recuperar su cuota en el lucrativo mercado de carne de res japonesa, gracias a las estrictas nuevas normas destinadas a prevenir la enfermedad de las vacas locas, dijo el ministro de Agricultura, Andy Mitchell, el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - According to Agriculture Minister Andy Mitchell's statement on Wednesday, Canada is set to outpace the United States in securing a larger share of the profitable Japanese beef market, due to stringent new regulations designed to eliminate mad cow disease.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - Andy Mitchell, the Agriculture Minister, announced on Wednesday that Canada is on track to outdo the United States in the flourishing Japanese beef market, by implementing rigorous new measures to battle mad cow disease.

Original Text: Today's top 25 games Matchup Comment 1. USC (5-0) vs. No. 15 Arizona St. (5-0) Trojans' Leinart has thrown for 1,187 yards and 10 TDs.
Translation: Comentario del enfrentamiento de los 25 mejores juegos de hoy: 1. USC (5-0) vs. No. 15 Arizona St. (5-0) Leinart de los Trojans ha lanzado para 1,187 yardas y 10 TDs.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today's 25 leading games include a matchup featuring USC (5-0) against No. 15 Arizona St. (5-0) where Trojans' Leinart has achieved a throwing distance of 1,187 yards and 10 touchdowns.

Original Text: Blair Puts Security at Heart of Pre-Election Plans  LONDON (Reuters) - Britain's Tony Blair will spell out this  week his legislative plans for the next session of parliament  -- tantamount to an election manifesto, with the prime minister  expected to go to the polls in May next year.
Translation: Blair Pone la Seguridad en el Corazón de los Planes Pre-electorales LONDRES (Reuters) - El británico Tony Blair explicará esta semana sus planes legislativos para la próxima sesión del parlamento, lo que equivale a un manifiesto electoral, con el primer ministro esperado a ir a las urnas en mayo del próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - Tony Blair of Britain is set to detail, within the week, his proposed legislation for the upcoming parliamentary session. This essentially acts as an election manifesto, as it is anticipated that the Prime Minister will be heading for polls in May next year, with national security being his principal agenda.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - This week, Britain's prime minister, Tony Blair, is preparing to announce his legislative strategy for the forthcoming parliamentary period. This strategy is virtually an election manifesto, with a strong focus on national security, in anticipation of the general elections expected to be held in May of the following year.

Original Text: UN welcomes support of United States for Secretary-General 10 December 2004 - One day after the United States Ambassador to the United Nations John Danforth gave his full backing to Secretary-General Kofi Annan - who had heard calls for his resignation from certain quarters in that country - a UN spokesman
Translation: La ONU agradece el apoyo de Estados Unidos al Secretario General 10 de diciembre de 2004 - Un día después de que el embajador de Estados Unidos ante las Naciones Unidas, John Danforth, brindara su total respaldo al Secretario General Kofi Annan - quien había escuchado llamados a su renuncia de ciertos sectores de ese país - un portavoz de la ONU
Paraphrase 1: 1. On 10th December 2004, a day following the endorsement of Secretary-General Kofi Annan by John Danforth, the United States Ambassador to the United Nations - amidst calls for Annan's resignation in some parts of that nation - a UN spokesperson commended the United States' support.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A UN representative lauded the backing of the United States towards Secretary-General Kofi Annan 10th December 2004 - the day after US Ambassador John Danforth to the UN showed him complete support, despite hearing resignation requests from various groups within his country.

Original Text: Ice collapse speeds up glaciers The Larsen B ice shelf probably blocked the glaciers #39; progress before its collapse in 2002, but now they are able to deposit their loads more freely.
Translation: El colapso del hielo acelera los glaciares. Probablemente, la plataforma de hielo Larsen B bloqueaba el avance de los glaciares antes de su colapso en 2002, pero ahora pueden depositar sus cargas más libremente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The glaciers' progress was likely hindered by the Larsen B ice shelf before its 2002 collapse. However, now they can discharge their deposits more unrestrictedly as the obstruction from ice collapse speeds up the glaciers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It's probable that the glaciers were prevented from moving forward by the Larsen B ice shelf until it collapsed in 2002. Currently, they can release their loads without limitations, accelerating as a result of the ice collapse.

Original Text: ISS Is Falling Down  Russian Mission Control The International Space Station, with two astronauts aboard, has fallen seven kilometers as a result of a severe magnetic storm, Russian space experts announced.
Translation: La ISS está cayendo. Control de Misión Rusa. La Estación Espacial Internacional, con dos astronautas a bordo, ha caído siete kilómetros como resultado de una severa tormenta magnética, anunciaron expertos espaciales rusos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Russian space authorities have declared that a severe magnetic storm caused the International Space Station, housing two astronauts, to descend by seven kilometers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Announced by Russian space specialists, a massive magnetic storm has led to a seven-kilometer descent of the International Space Station, which currently hosts two astronauts.

Original Text: Most terror attacks cost al-Qaida little, report finds The al-Qaida terrorist network spent less than \$50,000 on each of its major attacks except for the Sept. 11, 2001, suicide hijackings, and one of its hallmarks is using
Translation: La mayoría de los ataques terroristas cuestan poco a al-Qaida, encuentra un informe. La red terrorista de al-Qaida gastó menos de $50,000 en cada uno de sus principales ataques, a excepción de los secuestros suicidas del 11 de septiembre de 2001, y una de sus características distintivas es el uso de
Paraphrase 1: 1. The report reveals that al-Qaida typically expended less than $50,000 on each of its major attacks, excluding the Sept. 11, 2001, suicide hijackings, characteristically opting for cost-effective methods.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Except for the suicide hijackings of Sept. 11, 2001, each of al-Qaida's major attacks was executed for less than $50,000, marking a trend of minimal spending, as highlighted in the report.

Original Text: Hedge Funds Ponder New Ways to Make Money  LONDON (Reuters) - Hedge funds, faced with falling profits  and fading opportunities, are pondering fresh ways to make  money, with one new strategy involving trading a company's debt  against its equity, analysts said.
Translation: Los Fondos de Cobertura Contemplan Nuevas Formas de Generar Dinero  LONDRES (Reuters) - Los fondos de cobertura, enfrentados a la caída de las ganancias y a las oportunidades en disminución, están considerando formas novedosas de generar dinero, con una nueva estrategia que implica operar con la deuda de una empresa contra su patrimonio, dijeron los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: LONDON (Reuters) - In the face of declining profits and limited opportunities, hedge funds are exploring innovative money-making strategies, with one such approach being trading a company's debt against its equity, according to analysts.
Paraphrase 2: LONDON (Reuters) - Analysts report that, as hedge funds grapple with diminishing profits and dwindling opportunities, they're considering novel methods to generate revenue; one emergent strategy is to trade a company's debt against its equity.

Original Text: Thailand to Change Farming Ways to End Bird Flu Hard-hit Thailand plans a campaign to change poultry farming methods as it seeks to stamp out the deadly bird flu virus before migrating wildfowl return during the
Translation: Tailandia cambiará los métodos de agricultura para acabar con la gripe aviar. Tailandia, gravemente afectada, planea una campaña para cambiar los métodos de cría de aves de corral ya que busca erradicar el mortal virus de la gripe aviar antes de que las aves silvestres migratorias regresen durante
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the intention of eradicating the fatal bird flu virus before migrating wildfowl return, Thailand, which is greatly affected by the disease, is planning a campaign to alter its poultry farming techniques.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In order to combat the severe bird flu virus before the return of migrating wildfowl, Thailand, a country deeply impacted by the flu, is intending to transform its practices in poultry farming.

Original Text: Verizon, SBC nix access line sales Lack of bidders forces largest US local telephone companies to terminate efforts in small markets. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc.
Translation: Verizon, SBC cancelan ventas de líneas de acceso. La falta de postores obliga a las compañías locales de telefonía más grandes de EE. UU. a terminar esfuerzos en mercados pequeños. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The largest local telephone companies in the US, Verizon and SBC, are forced to cease their efforts in small markets due to a lack of bidders. This has concluded the sales of access lines. Reuters reports from New York that Verizon Communications Inc is among them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Without enough bidders, the major US local telephone companies - including Verizon and SBC, have had to end their undertakings in smaller markets, terminating the sales of access lines. New York (Reuters) - This cessation includes the actions of Verizon Communications Inc.

Original Text: Retail Sales Down; Trade Gap Larger  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. retail sales dipped in August  and the U.S. gap with its international trade partners widened  to a record level in the second quarter of the year, government  reports released on Tuesday showed.
Translation:
Las Ventas Minoristas Bajan; Mayor Brecha Comercial

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Las ventas minoristas en los EE. UU. disminuyeron en agosto y la brecha de los EE. UU. con sus socios comerciales internacionales se amplió a un nivel récord en el segundo trimestre del año, mostraron los informes gubernamentales publicados el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The U.S. experienced a decline in retail sales in August and furthermore, the second quarter of the year saw its trade deficit with international partners ballooning to unprecedented levels, as per governmental reports unveiled on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Tuesday's government data revealed a slump in U.S. retail sales for August, and an all-time high in the nation's trade deficit with global partners during the year's second quarter.

Original Text: Manager's image is sharper He was the dumbest guy in New England. Terry Fran-coma. Gomer Pyle in the dugout. Chewing that giant wad of stuff, making it look like he had a golf ball in his cheek. Not bunting. Not playing smallball. And taking the blame for every mistake his players made.
Translation: La imagen del gerente es más nítida. Era el tipo más tonto en Nueva Inglaterra. Terry Fran-coma. Gomer Pyle en el dugout. Masticando esa enorme bola de cosas, haciendo parecer que tenía una pelota de golf en su mejilla. Sin hacer toque de bola. Sin jugar al smallball. Y asumiendo la culpa por cada error que cometían sus jugadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Portrayed as the dimmest individual in New England, Terry Fran-coma was the manager, appearing smart with his image sharper. He was like Gomer Pyle in the dugout, with his cheek seemingly bloated from a huge wad he was chewing, giving off the semblance of a golf ball. Involved neither in bunting nor playing smallball, he willingly accepted blame for each error made by his team members.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Significantly sharper was the image of the manager, Terry Fran-coma, known as the least bright person in all of New England. Seated in the dugout, he brought to mind Gomer Pyle, a bulging wad in his mouth mimicking a golf ball. He wasn't one for bunting or indulging in smallball. Interestingly, he was always ready to shoulder the responsibility for all the flaws his players committed.

Original Text: It #39;s official: Americans love SUVs NEW YORK (CNN/Money) - Sport/utility vehicle registrations in the United States increased 56 percent in just five years, according to a report released Thursday by the US Census Bureau.
Translation: Es oficial: A los estadounidenses les encantan las SUVs NUEVA YORK (CNN/Money) - Las matriculaciones de vehículos deportivos/utilitarios en los Estados Unidos aumentaron un 56 por ciento en solo cinco años, según un informe publicado el jueves por la Oficina del Censo de los EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The New York's CNN/Money reports that the US Census Bureau released data on Thursday showing a 56% surge in sport/utility vehicle registrations in the United States in just five years, confirming that SUVs are indeed loved by Americans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a report issued by the US Census Bureau on Thursday, it was confirmed that the popularity of SUVs among Americans has surged considerably, with registrations increasing by 56% in a mere five years span, as reported by CNN/Money, New York.

Original Text: Two  #39;collaborators #39; are killed JERUSALEM - Masked Palestinian gunmen killed a suspected collaborator in a public square in Tulkarem in the West Bank yesterday, throwing the bound man from their vehicle and shooting him before hundreds of schoolchildren and other onlookers, witnesses
Translation: Dos 'colaboradores' son asesinados JERUSALÉN - Pistoleros palestinos enmascarados mataron a un presunto colaborador en una plaza pública en Tulkarem en Cisjordania ayer, arrojando al hombre atado desde su vehículo y disparándole frente a cientos de escolares y otros espectadores, según los testigos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Tulkarem, a city in the West Bank, eyewitnesses reported a gruesome scene in a public square yesterday where a suspected collaborator was horrifically killed by masked Palestinian gunmen. The criminals flung the restrained man from their vehicle and shot him in front of hundreds of bystanders, who were largely made up of schoolchildren.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Witnesses in the West Bank city of Tulkarem were shocked by the public murder of an alleged collaborator yesterday. Masked Palestinian gunmen tossed a cuffed man out of their vehicle and shot him, creating a horrifying spectacle for hundreds of observers, including numerous schoolchildren.

Original Text: Boingo, Vonage Team Up SANTA MONICA, Calif. -- Boingo Wireless and Vonage Holdings Corp., the leading broadband telephony provider in North America, today announced a relationship that teams two industry innovators in an effort
Translation: Boingo, Vonage se unen SANTA MONICA, Calif. -- Boingo Wireless y Vonage Holdings Corp., el principal proveedor de telefonía de banda ancha en América del Norte, anunciaron hoy una relación que une a dos innovadores de la industria en un esfuerzo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SANTA MONICA, Calif. - In an attempt to foster innovation, leading broadband telephony provider in North America, Vonage Holdings Corp., and Boingo Wireless announced a collaborative relationship today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today in SANTA MONICA, Calif., a new collaboration was announced by the North America's front-runner in broadband telephony, Vonage Holding Corp., and Boingo Wireless, fusing two industry wizards in a concerted effort.

Original Text: Election Commission Stops Vote Count As Opposition Protests Ukraine #39;s Central Election Commission has suspended vote counting from the 31 October presidential election. The opposition says that #39;s because a complete count would reveal that its leader, Viktor Yushchenko
Translation: La Comisión Electoral detiene el recuento de votos por protestas de la oposición en Ucrania. La Comisión Electoral Central de Ucrania ha suspendido el recuento de votos de las elecciones presidenciales del 31 de octubre. La oposición dice que es porque un recuento completo revelaría que su líder, Viktor Yushchenko.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ukraine's Central Election Commission has halted the vote tallying for the 31 October presidential election amidst opposition protests. The opposition claims this is due to their belief that a full vote count would exhibit their leader, Viktor Yushchenko as the winner.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to protests from the opposition, Ukraine's Central Election Commission put a pause to counting votes from the presidential election held on 31 October. The opposition asserts this is because a comprehensive count would show their leader, Viktor Yushchenko as victorious.

Original Text: #39;Gamble #39; pays off for Trulli and Alonso Jarno Trulli grabbed his second pole position of the season at Spa on Saturday after taking a gamble and qualifying on intermediate tyres.
Translation: 'Gamble #39' resulta favorable para Trulli y Alonso. Jarno Trulli consiguió su segunda pole position de la temporada en Spa el sábado, tras arriesgarse y clasificarse con neumáticos intermedios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jarno Trulli won his second pole position of the season at Spa last Saturday, thanks to his daring decision of qualifying on intermediate tyres.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By opting for intermediate tyres, Jarno Trulli scored his season's second pole position during Saturday's Spa race.

Original Text: Farewell Sir Brian Legends are everywhere these days if you believe the media. We journalists are so fond of hyperbole that we elevate everyone who is anyone up to the level of genius.
Translation: Despedida Señor Brian, las leyendas están en todas partes estos días si crees en los medios. Nosotros, los periodistas, somos tan aficionados a la hipérbole que elevamos a cualquiera que sea alguien al nivel de genio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Goodbye, Sir Brian. According to the press, legends are abundant today. As journalists, we are so captivated by exaggeration that we elevate every notable person to the pinnacle of brilliance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Say goodbye to Sir Brian, for in the modern era as projected by the media, legends are omnipresent. With journalists being enthusiastic of hyperbole, anyone of significance gets promoted to the stature of genius.

Original Text: New Video Game Recreates Kennedy Assassination  LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - A new video game to be released on  Monday allows players to simulate the assassination of U.S.  President John F. Kennedy.
Translation: Nuevo Videojuego Recrea el Asesinato de Kennedy LOS ÁNGELES (Reuters) - Un nuevo videojuego que se lanzará el lunes permite a los jugadores simular el asesinato del presidente de EE.UU, John F. Kennedy.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - An impending video game launch set for Monday offers players the chance to replicate the tragic assassination of U.S. President John F. Kennedy.

Original Text: Madrid Bomb Suspect's Remains Identified (Reuters) Reuters - An Algerian suspected of being a leader\of the Madrid train bombers has been identified as one of seven\people who blew themselves up in April to avoid arrest, Spain's\Interior Ministry said on Friday.
Translation: Restos del Sospechoso de la Bomba de Madrid Identificados (Reuters) Reuters - Un argelino sospechoso de ser un líder de los atacantes del tren de Madrid ha sido identificado como uno de los siete individuos que se inmolaron en abril para evitar ser arrestados, dijo el viernes el Ministerio del Interior de España.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) The remains of an Algerian, who was suspected to be a mastermind behind the Madrid train bombings, have been identified. The Spanish Interior Ministry revealed on Friday that he was among the seven individuals who detonated themselves back in April to evade capture.
Paraphrase 2: Spain's Interior Ministry, on Friday, confirmed that the remains of an Algerian believed to be a leader of the Madrid train bombing culprits were identified. He was one of seven individuals who committed suicide by explosion in April to dodge arrest, reports Reuters.

Original Text: Secular drive challenges Spain's Catholic identity Socialists want to bolster Spain's church-state barrier.
Translation: El impulso laico desafía la identidad católica de España. Los socialistas quieren reforzar la barrera entre la iglesia y el estado en España.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The secular movement is testing Spain's Catholic identity as Socialists aim to strengthen the separation of church and state.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Spain's Catholic identity faces challenges from the secular drive, while socialists call for an enhancement of the church-state divide.

Original Text: Souness appointed Newcastle manager The 51-year-old Scot has been given the St James #39; Park job after his predecessor was shown the door following a poor run of results.
Translation: Souness nombrado entrenador de Newcastle. Al escocés de 51 años le han dado el trabajo en St. James #39; Park tras mostrar la puerta a su antecesor luego de una mala racha de resultados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a series of disappointing results led to the dismissal of his predecessor, 51-year-old Scot, Souness, has been assigned as the new manager for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following a poor streak of results that resulted in his predecessor's dismissal, Souness, a 51-year-old Scot, has assumed the position of Newcastle's manager at St James' Park.

Original Text: Dual-Core Chips May Raise Software Costs Faced with weak demand for PCs and technical limits on the speed of its products, Intel is betting on a future in which every chip it makes contains what amounts to two computers.
Translation: Los Chips de Doble Núcleo Podrían Aumentar los Costos de Software. Enfrentado con una débil demanda de PCs y límites técnicos en la velocidad de sus productos, Intel está apostando por un futuro en el que cada chip que fabrica contiene lo que equivale a dos computadoras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel, grappling with sluggish PC demand and speed restrictions on its products, envisages a future where all its chips effectively embody two computers, potentially escalating software expenses related to dual-core chips.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid low demand for PCs and speed technical constraints, Intel is planning for a future with every chip essentially made up of two computers, a move that may lead to an increase in software costs for dual-core chips.

Original Text: New MyDoom offers 'how to' details "It's like they wanted to help us, which is weird," says one security expert of the latest bizarre twist in the worm's development.
Translation: El nuevo MyDoom ofrece detalles de 'cómo hacerlo' "Es como si quisieran ayudarnos, lo cual es extraño", dice un experto en seguridad sobre el último giro extraño en el desarrollo del gusano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "It appears as if they wanted to assist us, strange as it is," comments a security expert on the latest unexpected turn in the worm's development provided by New MyDoom with 'how to' details.

Original Text: Partner rejects Chiofaro's plan International Place developer Donald J. Chiofaro's ownership partner said in federal bankruptcy court yesterday that it would never agree to the reorganization plan that Chiofaro has proposed to stave off a takeover of the towers by Tishman Speyer Properties of New York.
Translation: El socio propietario de Donald J. Chiofaro, el desarrollador de International Place, declaró ayer en la corte federal de bancarrota que nunca estaría de acuerdo con el plan de reorganización que Chiofaro ha propuesto para evitar la adquisición de las torres por parte de Tishman Speyer Properties de Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Donald J. Chiofaro's ownership partner stated in a federal bankruptcy court yesterday that it would never endorse the reorganization plan introduced by Chiofaro to avoid a takeover of the towers by Tishman Speyer Properties of New York. The partner has ultimately refused Chiofaro's decision for International Place.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In federal bankruptcy court yesterday, Chiofaro's co-owner declared that they would not accept his proposed reorganization plan for International Place, intended to prevent the towers from being taken over by Tishman Speyer Properties from New York.

Original Text: Musharraf Quitting Army Would Be Good Thing, #39; US Govt Says A decision by Pakistan #39;s President Pervez Musharraf to quit as army chief would be a good thing #39; #39; and would encourage progress toward full democracy, US State Department spokesman Richard Boucher said.
Translation: Sería Bueno que Musharraf Dejase el Ejército, Dice el Gobierno de EE.UU., #39; Una decisión del Presidente de Pakistán, Pervez Musharraf, de renunciar como jefe del ejército sería una 'buena cosa' y fomentaría el progreso hacia una democracia plena, dijo el portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU., Richard Boucher.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US Government states that if Pakistan's President Pervez Musharraf were to step down as army chief, it would be beneficial and would promote advancements towards a fully democratic system, as revealed by US State Department spokesman Richard Boucher.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Richard Boucher, the spokesman for the US State Department, expressed that Pervez Musharraf, the President of Pakistan, resigning from his role as army chief would positively affect and bolster progress in achieving complete democracy.

Original Text: Arafat family to get medical file on cause of death PARIS, Nov 18 (AFP) - Family members of the late Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat are preparing a request to obtain medical files detailing his illness and cause of death, which France will grant, the French defense ministry announced Thursday.
Translation: Familia de Arafat conseguirá archivo médico sobre la causa de muerte PARIS, 18 de Nov (AFP) - Los miembros de la familia del fallecido líder palestino Yasser Arafat están preparando una solicitud para obtener los archivos médicos que detallan su enfermedad y causa de muerte, los cuales Francia otorgará, anunció el jueves el ministerio de defensa francés.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The French defense ministry announced on Thursday that they will provide the medical files detailing the illness and cause of death of the late Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, upon request from his family.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, it was announced by the French defense ministry that they are prepared to release medical records outlining the condition and cause of death of Yasser Arafat, the late Palestinian leader, to his family upon their request.

Original Text: ENGLISH CRICKETS NEW TV DEAL The England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) has agreed a deal with pay-TV operator Sky Sports for all home Test matches, one-day internationals, Twenty20 and county action.
Translation: NUEVO ACUERDO DE TELEVISIÓN PARA EL CRÍQUET INGLÉS. El Consejo de Críquet de Inglaterra y Gales (ECB, por sus siglas en inglés) ha acordado un trato con el operador de televisión de pago Sky Sports para todos los partidos de Test en casa, los internacionales de un día, los Twenty20 y las acciones del condado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Sky Sports pay-TV operator has secured an agreement with the England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) for all home Test matches, one-day internationals, Twenty20, and county action.

Original Text: Iran Tells Russia to Expand Nuclear Ties Iran told nuclear partner Russia on Wednesday it would have to show  quot;readiness quot; to expand nuclear ties with Tehran to secure a solid share of Iran #39;s atomic market in face of growing competition from Europe.
Translation: Irán le dice a Rusia que amplíe los lazos nucleares. Irán le dijo a su socio nuclear Rusia el miércoles que tendría que mostrar "disposición" para ampliar los lazos nucleares con Teherán para asegurar una sólida participación en el mercado atómico de Irán frente a la creciente competencia de Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Iran conveyed to its nuclear ally, Russia, that expanding nuclear relations with Tehran would be essential to maintaining a firm hold on Iran's atomic market, given the increasing competition from Europe. Russia was urged to demonstrate its willingness to deepen these ties.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Iran communicated to Russia, its nuclear associate, that it must exhibit preparedness to broaden nuclear affiliations with Tehran to ensure a stable portion of Iran's atomic market, in view of the rising competition from European nations.

Original Text: Malaysian Ruling Party Rejects Anwar (AP) AP - The leaders of Malaysia's ruling party unanimously refused Tuesday to allow one-time rising star Anwar Ibrahim to rejoin the organization, a day before a crucial court ruling that could clear his return to politics.
Translation: Partido gobernante de Malasia rechaza a Anwar (AP) AP - Los líderes del partido gobernante de Malasia se negaron unánimemente el martes a permitir que la antigua estrella en ascenso Anwar Ibrahim se reincorporara a la organización, un día antes de una decisiva sentencia judicial que podría clarificar su regreso a la política.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - On Tuesday, the heads of Malaysia's governing party, with one accord, foreclosed the possibility of erstwhile prodigy, Anwar Ibrahim, rejoining their ranks. This comes just a day before a decisive court decision that has the potential to reinstate his political career.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Anwar Ibrahim, once a promising figure in Malaysia, was categorically denied reinstatement into the ruling party by all its leaders on Tuesday. This happened a day ahead of a critical court judgement that might enable his political comeback.

Original Text: SEC considering disclosure rules for executive pay In the flood of corporate reform unleashed by recent business scandals, one issue has been largely ignored, shareholder activists say: the stratospheric level of executive pay and
Translation: La SEC considera las normas de divulgación para el salario ejecutivo. En la avalancha de reformas corporativas desatada por los recientes escándalos empresariales, un problema ha sido en gran medida ignorado, según los activistas de los accionistas: el nivel estratosférico de la remuneración de los ejecutivos y
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst the wave of corporate reform instigated by recent business scandals, shareholder activists assert that one aspect has been predominantly overlooked - the astronomical levels of executive pay; something the SEC is contemplating to regulate through disclosure rules.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Shareholder activists argue that the exorbitant level of executive pay has been largely sidelined, amidst the surge of corporate changes in response to recent business scandals. The SEC, however, is considering implementing disclosure rules for this same issue.

Original Text: US wholesale prices climb in November US producer prices - a measure of wholesale inflation - rose by a faster than expected 0.5 in November, seasonally adjusted Labor Department figures showed this afternoon.
Translation: Los precios mayoristas de EE.UU. suben en noviembre. Los precios de producción de EE.UU. - una medida de la inflación mayorista - subieron a un ritmo más rápido de lo esperado, un 0.5 en noviembre, ajustado por estacionalidad, según mostraron las cifras del Departamento de Trabajo esta tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US wholesale inflation, measured by producer prices, witnessed an unexpected surge of 0.5 in November, as per the seasonally adjusted figures released by the Labor Department this afternoon.

Original Text: Uninsured patients often face big markups How much does an overnight stay at a Virginia hospital cost? If Medicaid is paying, the answer is \$6,000. If Paul Shipman is paying, it #39;s \$29,500.
Translation: Los pacientes sin seguro a menudo enfrentan grandes aumentos de precio. ¿Cuánto cuesta una estancia nocturna en un hospital de Virginia? Si Medicaid está pagando, la respuesta es \$6,000. Si Paul Shipman está pagando, es \$29,500.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Frequently, uninsured patients are subjected to substantial price increases. For example, an overnight stay at a Virginia hospital can vary greatly in cost. Medicaid covers the cost at \$6,000, but without such coverage, the burden on patients like Paul Shipman can soar to \$29,500.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Large markups for medical services are commonly experienced by patients without insurance. For instance, the cost of a single night in a Virginia hospital for Medicaid patients is \$6,000. For individuals such as Paul Shipman who don't have this sort of coverage, the expense jumps to \$29,500.

Original Text: Rebels massacre 49 Iraqi trainees The bodies of 49 freshly trained Iraqi national guard recruits, lined up and executed by insurgents, were discovered on a roadside about 75 miles northeast of Baghdad, Iraqi officials said Sunday.
Translation: Los rebeldes masacran a 49 reclutas iraquíes. Los cuerpos de 49 reclutas recién entrenados de la guardia nacional iraquí, alineados y ejecutados por insurgentes, fueron descubiertos a un lado de la carretera a unas 75 millas al noreste de Bagdad, dijeron los funcionarios iraquíes el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Iraqi officials reported on Sunday that the corpses of 49 recently trained Iraqi national guard recruits, who were systematically executed by rebel forces, have been found alongside a highway approximately 75 miles northeast of Baghdad.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On a roadside about 75 miles northeast of Baghdad, 49 new Iraqi national guard recruits met their grisly fate at the hands of insurgents, their slain bodies found lined up, as reported by Iraqi officials this Sunday.

Original Text: Glazer Getting Serious Despite Fans Opposition American multi-millionaire Malcolm Glazer is set to intensify his campaign to gain control of Manchester United. The sports club tycoon could be about to launch a formal takeover bid this week, despite staunch opposition from United fans.
Translation: Glazer se pone serio a pesar de la oposición de los aficionados. El multimillonario estadounidense Malcolm Glazer está listo para intensificar su campaña para obtener el control del Manchester United. El magnate del club deportivo podría estar a punto de lanzar una oferta formal de compra esta semana, a pesar de la ferrea oposición de los aficionados del United.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite facing strong resistance from Manchester United fans, American mogul Malcolm Glazer is about to escalate his efforts to gain ownership of the club. As a sports club tycoon, we could expect a formal takeover bid to be launched this week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the firm opposition of Manchester United's passionate fanbase, US entrepreneur Malcolm Glazer is readying to ramp up his quest for the club's control. A formal takeover proposal from the sports tycoon might very well be on the table within this week.

Original Text: Stocks Slide as Insurers' Woes Offset IBM  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday as New  York Attorney General Eliot Spitzer's probe of the insurance  industry widened to the health sector, hammering shares of  health insurers.
Translation: Las Acciones Caen debido a los Problemas de las Aseguradoras que Contrarrestan a IBM NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones estadounidenses cayeron el martes cuando la investigación del Fiscal General de Nueva York, Eliot Spitzer, sobre la industria de seguros se amplió al sector de la salud, golpeando las acciones de las aseguradoras de salud.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. stocks took a hit on Tuesday owing to the ongoing examination of the insurance industry by New York Attorney General, Eliot Spitzer, which extended into the health sector, causing a steep drop in the shares of health insurers. This decline was not buffered by IBM's performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday saw a decline in U.S. stocks, triggered by Eliot Spitzer's expanded inquiry into the insurance industry, including the health sector, which had a significant impact on the shares of health insurers. The plunge was not balanced out by the growth of IBM.

Original Text: Halliburton Warns Against Tender Offer Oilfield services firm Halliburton Co. on Friday advised its shareholders to reject a discounted tender offer from a Canadian investment company that is looking to buy up to 3 million Halliburton shares.
Translation: La firma de servicios petroleros Halliburton Co. advirtió el viernes a sus accionistas que rechacen una oferta pública de adquisición con descuento de una empresa de inversión canadiense que busca comprar hasta 3 millones de acciones de Halliburton.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Halliburton Co., an oilfield services firm, cautioned its shareholders not to accept a below-market value tender offer from a Canadian investment company, who intends to purchase up to 3 million Halliburton shares.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Halliburton Co., an oilfield services company, issued an advisory to its shareholders on Friday, suggesting that they decline a tender offer proposing to buy up to 3 million Halliburton stocks at a reduced rate from a Canadian investment firm.

Original Text: Ancient Bird Fossil May Suggest Link with Dinosaurs Scientists in China have found a 120 million-year-old fossil of a baby bird which is believed to have died just before it hatched and which could shed light on the relationship between dinosaurs and birds.
Translation: El Fósil de Pájaro Antiguo Podría Sugerir una Conexión con los Dinosaurios. Científicos en China han encontrado un fósil de un pájaro bebé de 120 millones de años que se cree murió justo antes de eclosionar y que podría arrojar luz sobre la relación entre los dinosaurios y las aves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A baby bird fossil, estimated to be 120 million years old, has been discovered by scientists in China. It's believed that the bird perished just before hatching and this discovery might provide insightful information on the connection between birds and dinosaurs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Researchers in China have uncovered a fossil of a baby bird that was on the verge of hatching circa 120 million years ago. It is proposed that this finding could offer new perspectives into the evolutionary relationship between dinosaurs and birds.

Original Text: Bill introduced in US Senate, seeking UN action on Myanmar (AFP) AFP - A resolution seeking UN Security Council action against Myanmar was introduced in the US Senate, accusing the Southeast Asian state's military rulers of brutally repressing ethnic minorities and using rape as a weapon of war.
Translation: Proyecto de ley presentado en el Senado de EE.UU, buscando acción de la ONU sobre Myanmar (AFP) AFP - Se presentó una resolución en el Senado de EE.UU. que busca una acción del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU contra Myanmar, acusando a los gobernantes militares del estado del sudeste asiático de reprimir brutalmente a las minorías étnicas y de usar la violación como arma de guerra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Senate received a resolution, backed by Bill, that calls for UN Security Council intervention in Myanmar. This resolution charges the country's military leaders with harshly suppressing ethnic groups and deploying sexual violence in warfare. (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Urging the UN Security Council to react to Myanmar's situation, a resolution was put forward in the US Senate by Bill - it accuses the country's military rulers of severe mistreatment of ethnic minorities and the use of sexual assault as a wartime strategy. (AFP)

Original Text: Andretti drivers earn 1-2-3 sweep NAZARETH, Pa. - Dan Wheldon took advantage of a fiery mishap during a pit stop by leader Sam Hornish Jr. and extended Honda #39;s winning streak to 12 races with a record-setting victory Sunday in the last race at Nazareth Speedway.
Translation: Los pilotos de Andretti logran un barrido de 1-2-3 NAZARETH, Pa. - Dan Wheldon aprovechó un grave percance durante la parada en boxes del líder Sam Hornish Jr. y extendió la racha ganadora de Honda a 12 carreras con una victoria récord el domingo en la última carrera en el Nazareth Speedway.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Taking advantage of a pit stop mishap by leader Sam Hornish Jr., Dan Wheldon clinched a record-breaking victory at Nazareth Speedway, extending Honda #39's winning streak to 12 races. This victory concluded with a 1-2-3 sweep by the Andretti drivers at NAZARETH, Pa.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At Nazareth Speedway in Nazareth, Pa., a fiery pit stop incident involving the leading driver Sam Hornish Jr., paved the way for Dan Wheldon to secure a record-breaking win. This success further pushed Honda #39's win streak to 12 races and marked the final thrilling race at the venue with a remarkable 1-2-3 triumph by the Andretti drivers.

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Arsenal vanquish Villa, Man United lose ground French maestros Robert Pires and Thierry Henry combined to give champions Arsenal a classy 3-1 victory over Aston Villa at Highbury on Saturday.
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2-Arsenal vence a Villa, Man United pierde terreno Los maestros franceses Robert Pires y Thierry Henry se unieron para dar a los campeones del Arsenal una elegante victoria 3-1 sobre Aston Villa en Highbury el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday, French virtuosos Robert Pires and Thierry Henry worked together, leading Arsenal, the champions, to a sophisticated 3-1 triumph over Aston Villa at Highbury in the second update.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The champions, Arsenal, achieved an elegant 3-1 win against Aston Villa at Highbury on Saturday, thanks to the collective efforts of French prodigies Robert Pires and Thierry Henry, as reported in the second update.

Original Text: US Airways Pilots May Be Near Pay Pact  NEW YORK (Reuters) - US Airways Group Inc.'s pilots union  said on Wednesday it may agree this week on a plan to cut wages  and benefits to help the seventh-biggest U.S. airline avoid a  second bankruptcy filing.
Translation: Los pilotos de US Airways podrían estar cerca de un acuerdo salarial. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El sindicato de pilotos de US Airways Group Inc. dijo el miércoles que podría acordar esta semana un plan para recortar salarios y beneficios para ayudar a la séptima aerolínea más grande de Estados Unidos a evitar una segunda declaración de bancarrota.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The pilots union of US Airways Group Inc., the seventh-largest U.S. airline, announced on Wednesday that they could reach an agreement this week on a plan to reduce pay and benefits, in a bid to prevent a second bankruptcy filing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The pilot's union of US Airways Group Inc., ranked as the seventh largest airline in the U.S., informed on Wednesday that they might finalize a wage and benefit reduction plan this week to aid the airline in averting a second bankruptcy declaration.

Original Text: Hopes rise for French hostages in Iraq Hopes that Islamic militants will soon free two French hostages in Iraq are rising, despite confusion over which group is now holding them.
Translation: Las esperanzas aumentan para los rehenes franceses en Irak. Las esperanzas de que los militantes islámicos pronto liberarán a dos rehenes franceses en Irak están aumentando, a pesar de la confusión sobre qué grupo los tiene ahora en su poder.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite uncertainty regarding which group currently has them captive, the hopes for the imminent release of two French hostages in Iraq by Islamic militants are increasing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The uncertainty of which militant group in Iraq is holding two French hostages does not diminish the growing hopes for their imminent release.

Original Text: Tigers drop fifth straight When Tigers manager Alan Trammell described his bullpen #39;s recent struggles on Friday, he compared it to an offense being in a slump.
Translation: Los Tigres pierden el quinto juego consecutivo. Cuando el gerente de los Tigres, Alan Trammell, describió las recientes dificultades de su bullpen el viernes, lo comparó con una ofensiva en una mala racha.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a description of their recent struggles akin to an offensive slump by their manager Alan Trammell on Friday, the Tigers have suffered their fifth consecutive loss.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tigers’ manager, Alan Trammell, compared their recent difficulties to an offense in a slump on Friday, following which the Tigers lost for the fifth time in a row.

Original Text: Spurs 91, Warriors 71 SAN ANTONIO - Tim Duncan had 23 points and 18 rebounds and Manu Ginobili added 22 points to lead San Antonio past winless Golden State.
Translation: Spurs 91, Warriors 71 SAN ANTONIO - Tim Duncan anotó 23 puntos y 18 rebotes y Manu Ginobili agregó 22 puntos para liderar a San Antonio en la victoria sobre Golden State, que aún no ha ganado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN ANTONIO - With Tim Duncan scoring 23 points and collecting 18 rebounds, and Manu Ginobili adding another 22 points, the Spurs triumphed over the Golden State Warriors 91 to 71, keeping the latter winless.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SAN ANTONIO - The combined efforts of Tim Duncan, with 23 points and 18 rebounds, and Manu Ginobili, contributing 22 points, led the Spurs to a decisive 91-71 victory over the yet-to-win Golden State Warriors.

Original Text: Linux not ready for mass market Linux is gaining ground with companies but Windows will continue to dominate consumer PCs in the near future. That is the non-contentious conclusion of the latest IDC research.
Translation: Linux no está listo para el mercado masivo. Linux está ganando terreno con las empresas pero Windows seguirá dominando las PCs de los consumidores en un futuro cercano. Esa es la conclusión no conflictiva de la última investigación de IDC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The latest research by IDC concludes uncontroversially that although Linux is making progress in corporate adoption, Windows will keep ruling the consumer PC realm in the immediate future.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the most recent IDC study, a general agreement has been reached that despite Linux's growing popularity amongst businesses, Windows is projected to maintain its supremacy in the consumer PC market for the forthcoming period.
