Original Text: Most Arab Governments are Putting Their Stock in George Bush for a <b>...</b> Most Arab governments have decided to put their stock in George W. Bush for another term, concluding prematurely that the American presidential elections have been decided in favor of the Republican candidate.
Translation: La mayoría de los gobiernos árabes están depositando su confianza en George Bush para un <b>...</b> La mayoría de los gobiernos árabes han decidido poner su confianza en George W. Bush para otro término, concluyendo prematuramente que las elecciones presidenciales estadounidenses se han decidido a favor del candidato republicano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A large number of Arab governments have prematurely concluded that George W. Bush will secure another term, thus, they're choosing to place their trust in him, assuming that the American presidential elections are already in favor of the Republican candidate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anticipating that the American presidential elections will be decided in favor of the Republican candidate, most Arab governments are erroneously projecting George W. Bush will have another term and are investing their faith in him.

Original Text: Hawaii's Chang Second on NCAA Pass List (AP) AP - Hawaii's Timmy Chang moved into second place on the NCAA career passing yardage list Saturday night.
Translation: Chang de Hawái en Segundo Lugar en la Lista de Pases de la NCAA (AP) AP - Timmy Chang de Hawái ascendió al segundo lugar en la lista de yardas de pases en la carrera de la NCAA el sábado por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Saturday night saw Timmy Chang of Hawaii secure the second position on the NCAA career passing yardage list.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) On Saturday night, Hawaii's Timmy Chang climbed up to the second rank on the NCAA career passing yardage list.

Original Text: Oil barrels toward \$50 Next stop, fifty bucks. Analysts said crude futures could climb that high today, pushed to the psychological barrier of \$50 US a barrel by speculative buying amid escalating threats to Iraq #39;s oil infrastructure.
Translation: El petróleo se dispara hacia los 50 dólares. Próxima parada, cincuenta dólares. Los analistas dijeron que los futuros del crudo podrían subir a ese nivel hoy, empujados a la barrera psicológica de los 50 dólares estadounidenses por barril por compras especulativas en medio de crecientes amenazas a la infraestructura petrolera de Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to analysts, escalating threats to Iraq's oil infrastructure may drive speculative buying, pushing crude futures toward the pivotal threshold of 50 US dollars per barrel today. The oil price is barrelling toward this symbolic 50 dollar mark.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As analysts predict, speculative buying, spurred by rising threats to Iraq's oil infrastructure, could see crude futures soaring to the significant $50 per barrel mark today. Consequently, the oil price is hurtling towards a noteworthy milestone of fifty bucks.

Original Text: Hackers attack Cal database State and federal authorities are investigating a hacker attack at University of California, Berkeley, after someone broke into a computer containing the Social Security numbers
Translation: Los hackers atacan la base de datos de Cal. Las autoridades estatales y federales están investigando un ataque de hackers en la Universidad de California, Berkeley, después de que alguien irrumpió en una computadora que contenía los números de Seguridad Social.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A cyber attack on the University of California, Berkeley, which targeted a computer holding Social Security numbers, is currently under investigation by both state and federal authorities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The state and federal authorities have initiated an investigation regarding a cyber breach at the University of California, Berkeley, where a hacker attacked a computer containing Social Security numbers.

Original Text: Exiles: Iran Hides Secret Military Nuke Site from U.N.  VIENNA (Reuters) - Iran's government is conducting nuclear  activities linked to a covert atomic weapons program at a  military site unknown to U.N. inspectors, says an exiled  opposition group that has given accurate information before.
Translation: Exiliados: Irán Oculta Sitio Militar Nuclear Secreto a la O.N.U. VIENA (Reuters) - El gobierno de Irán está realizando actividades nucleares vinculadas a un programa de armas atómicas oculto en un sitio militar desconocido para los inspectores de la O.N.U., dice un grupo de oposición exiliado que ha proporcionado información precisa anteriormente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. VIENNA (Reuters) - An exiled opposition group, which has previously provided reliable information, alleges that the Iranian government is secretly engaging in atomic weapon-related activities at a military location unknown to United Nations' inspectors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. VIENNA (Reuters) - According to a reliable exiled opposition group, the government of Iran is secretly carrying out nuclear endeavors connected to a concealed atomic weapons initiative within a military site which is not on the radar of U.N. inspectors.

Original Text: Stem Cells May Open Some Eyes Scientists turn embryonic stem cells into retinal cells for the first time. The groundbreaking work could be tested to treat human blindness in two years if all goes well. By Kristen Philipkoski.
Translation: Las Células Madre Pueden Abrir Algunos Ojos. Los científicos convierten células madre embrionarias en células retinianas por primera vez. El trabajo pionero podría ser probado para tratar la ceguera humana en dos años si todo va bien. Por Kristen Philipkoski.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the first time, scientists have successfully transformed embryonic stem cells into retinal cells, according to a groundbreaking study by Kristen Philipkoski. If everything proceeds as planned, within the next two years, this innovative advancement could potentially be deployed to cure human blindness.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Utilizing embryonic stem cells, scientists have managed to create retinal cells for the first time - a groundbreaking discovery by Kristen Philipkoski. If all progresses smoothly, this major breakthrough could be on track to treat human blindness within the next two years.

Original Text: An Arctic alert on global warming Global warming is heating the Arctic at a rapid pace - with impacts that could range from the disappearance of polar bears #39; summer habitat by the century #39;s end to a damaging rise in sea levels worldwide.
Translation: Una alerta Ártica sobre el calentamiento global. El calentamiento global está calentando el Ártico a un ritmo acelerado, con impactos que podrían variar desde la desaparición del hábitat de verano de los osos polares para el final de este siglo, hasta un perjudicial aumento en los niveles del mar a nivel mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Global warming is causing a rapidly increasing temperature in the Arctic, which could lead to outcomes as dire as the obliteration of the summer habitat of polar bears by the end of the century, and a harmful rise in global sea levels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A dramatic increase in Arctic temperatures due to global warming may result in devastating consequences, such as the loss of polar bears' summer habitats by the close of the century and a significant increase in worldwide sea levels.

Original Text: U.N. Agency Demands N. Korea Scrap Nukes (AP) AP - A 137-nation meeting of the atomic watchdog agency demanded on Friday that North Korea scrap nuclear weapons ambitions and urged it to again allow agency inspectors to supervise its return to peaceful activities.
Translation: La Agencia de la ONU Exige que Corea del Norte Abandone las Armas Nucleares (AP) AP - En una reunión de 137 naciones, la agencia de vigilancia atómica exigió este viernes que Corea del Norte deseche las ambiciones de armas nucleares y la instó a permitir nuevamente a los inspectores de la agencia supervisar su retorno a las actividades pacíficas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - An assembly of 137 countries under the atomic surveillance body on Friday urged North Korea to abandon its nuclear weapons objectives and reinstigate the agency's supervision for its return to peaceful actions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AP - The atomic monitoring agency's 137-nation conference on Friday called upon North Korea to abolish its aspirations for nuclear weapons and invited its reinstatement of agency inspectors to oversee its transition back to peaceful pursuits.

Original Text: SportsNetwork Game Preview (Sports Network) - Barry Bonds can join the exclusive 700 club tonight, as the San Francisco Giants begin a three-game series versus the Milwaukee Brewers at Miller Park.
Translation: Vista Previa del Partido de SportsNetwork (Sports Network) - Barry Bonds puede unirse al exclusivo club de los 700 esta noche, mientras los Gigantes de San Francisco comienzan una serie de tres partidos contra los Cerveceros de Milwaukee en el Miller Park.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Barry Bonds has an opportunity to become part of the prestigious 700 club this evening, when the San Francisco Giants kick off a triseries against the Milwaukee Brewers at Miller Park, according to the Sports Network's game preview.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the forthcoming three-game series against the Milwaukee Brewers at Miller Park, Barry Bonds might reach the distinguished 700 club, Sports Network's game preview reveals.

Original Text: Long and the short of it is we are still record breakers A BASSET hound living in Germany has just made it into the 50th anniversary edition of the Guinness Book of Records for possessing the longest canine ears in the world, measuring a fine 33.
Translation: La versión larga y corta de ello es que seguimos siendo rompe récords. Un sabueso BASSET que vive en Alemania acaba de entrar en la edición del 50 aniversario del Libro Guinness de los Récords por poseer las orejas caninas más largas del mundo, midiendo un excelente 33.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Basset hound residing in Germany has recently achieved a record-breaking feat of having the world's longest dog ears, stretching a remarkable 33. This has earned him a spot in the 50th anniversary edition of the Guinness Book of Records, thereby reinforcing our status as record breakers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. We continue to smash records as a Basset hound from Germany makes it into the 50th anniversary edition of the Guinness Book of Records. This dog has set a new record with its extremely long ears, measuring an astonishing 33, the lengthiest canine ears globally.

Original Text: Dell to tighten Linux ties with Novell pact The computer maker is expected to announce a deal to offer Novell's SuSE Linux factory-installed on new servers, CNET News.com has learned.\
Translation: Dell fortalecerá lazos con Linux mediante un pacto con Novell. Se espera que el fabricante de computadoras anuncie un acuerdo para ofrecer el SuSE Linux de Novell preinstalado en nuevos servidores, según ha sabido CNET News.com.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CNET News.com has discovered that Dell, the computer manufacturer, is anticipated to announce an agreement that would allow them to provide Novell's SuSE Linux pre-installed on their new servers, strengthening their relationship with Linux through this Novell pact.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to CNET News.com, Dell is likely to reveal a pact with Novell that will enable it to furnish new servers with a pre-installed SuSE Linux, consequently solidifying Dell's bond with Linux.

Original Text: Commonwealth Bank Affirms EPS Growth at Least 10 Through 2006 Commonwealth Bank of Australia, the nation #39;s second-largest lender, reiterated its forecast for compound annual growth in per-share operating profit of at least 10 percent in the next two years.
Translation: El Commonwealth Bank Confirma Crecimiento del EPS de al Menos 10 Hasta 2006. El Commonwealth Bank de Australia, el segundo prestamista más grande de la nación, reiteró su pronóstico de crecimiento anual compuesto en la ganancia operativa por acción de al menos el 10 por ciento en los próximos dos años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The nation's second-largest lender, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, confirmed its projection for a minimum of 10% compound annual growth in per-share operating profit over the upcoming two years.

Original Text: Tigers Call Up Dingman, Option Novoa (AP) AP - The Detroit Tigers optioned reliever Roberto Novoa to Double-A Erie and called up relief pitcher Craig Dingman from Triple-A Toledo.
Translation: Los Tigres Suben a Dingman, Opcionan a Novoa (AP) AP - Los Tigres de Detroit enviaron al relevista Roberto Novoa a la Double-A Erie y subieron al lanzador de relevo Craig Dingman desde la Triple-A Toledo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - The Detroit Tigers have promoted relief pitcher Craig Dingman from Triple-A Toledo, while demoting Roberto Novoa to Double-A Erie.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - Roberto Novoa, a reliever for the Detroit Tigers, has been optioned to Double-A Erie and in the meantime, Craig Dingman has been promoted from Triple-A Toledo.

Original Text: Corporate governance changed to mollify shareholders SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) - Rupert Murdoch #39;s News Corp., in an attempt to mollify Australian investors who had expressed concerns about its proposed reincorporation in the United States, late Wednesday said its board of directors has outlined a series of
Translation: La gobernanza corporativa cambió para aplacar a los accionistas SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) - News Corp. de Rupert Murdoch, en un intento por aplacar a los inversores australianos que habían expresado preocupaciones sobre su propuesta de reincorporación en los Estados Unidos, dijo tarde el miércoles que su junta de directores ha delineado una serie de
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rupert Murdoch's News Corp, in an effort to appease Australian investors who raised concerns over its proposed reincorporation in the United States, announced late Wednesday that its board of directors has proposed a series of changes to their corporate governance, reported SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW).
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to worries from Australian investors about its intended reincorporation in the United States, Rupert Murdoch's News Corp., late Wednesday announced that its board of directors has extended a series of changes to corporate governance. This information was reported by SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW).

Original Text: Ex-PM  #39;erased #39; Madrid blast files SPAIN #39;S Prime Minister has accused the government he succeeded of ordering the destruction of all computer records on the March 11 Madrid train bombings in an attempt to influence the outcome of the election held three days later.
Translation: El ex-PM # 39; borró # 39; archivos de la explosión de Madrid EL PRIMER Ministro de ESPAÑA ha acusado al gobierno que sucedió de ordenar la destrucción de todos los registros informáticos sobre los atentados en trenes de Madrid del 11 de marzo en un intento de influir en el resultado de las elecciones celebradas tres días después.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Prime Minister of Spain has alleged that the administration preceding him ordered the obliteration of all digital documents concerning the Madrid train bombings that occurred on March 11. This was allegedly done with the purpose of manipulating the results of the election that was held just three days later.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The former government has been accused by Spain's current Prime Minister of authorizing the eradication of all computerized records related to the March 11 train blasts in Madrid. The intended objective, as per the accusations, was to sway the election results which were due to occur three days post the incident.

Original Text: Fed #39;s Santomero Says Rate Rises Have a Way to Go The Federal Reserve still has some way to go to restore official US interest rates to more normal levels, Philadelphia Fed President Anthony Santomero said on Monday.
Translation: El presidente de la Fed de Filadelfia, Anthony Santomero, dice el lunes que la Reserva Federal aún tiene un camino por recorrer para restaurar las tasas de interés oficiales de Estados Unidos a niveles más normales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anthony Santomero, Philadelphia Fed President, asserted on Monday that the Federal Reserve is yet to fully restore the official US interest rates to their typical levels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Philadelphia Fed President, Anthony Santomero, stated that there is still a substantial course for the Federal Reserve to cover before returning the official US interest rates to normal.

Original Text: Secret Service Busts Cyber Gangs The US Secret Service Thursday announced arrests in eight states and six foreign countries of 28 suspected cybercrime gangsters on charges of identity theft, computer fraud, credit card fraud, and conspiracy.
Translation: El Servicio Secreto Detiene a Pandillas Cibernéticas. El Servicio Secreto de los EE. UU. anunció este jueves arrestos en ocho estados y seis países extranjeros de 28 sospechosos de pertenecer a pandillas de cibercrimen por cargos de robo de identidad, fraude informático, fraude con tarjetas de crédito y conspiración.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Secret Service revealed on Thursday the apprehension of 28 alleged cybercrime syndicate members on accusations of identity theft, computer fraud, credit card deceit, and scheming, across eight states and six overseas nations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, the US Secret Service declared the capture of 28 individuals suspected of being part of cybercrime factions, from eight states and six foreign countries, facing charges such as identity theft, computer and credit card fraud, and conspiracy.

Original Text: Victims of Bali Bombings Remembered Australian Prime Minister John Howard, center, his wife Janette, right, and opposition lawmaker Bob McMullan in Canberra, Tuesday, Oct. 12, 2004, laying wreaths in memory of victims of the Bali bombings..Commemorations
Translation: Se recuerda a las víctimas de los atentados en Bali. El primer ministro australiano John Howard, en el centro, su esposa Janette, a la derecha, y el legislador de la oposición Bob McMullan en Canberra, martes, 12 de octubre de 2004, colocando coronas en memoria de las víctimas de los atentados en Bali. Conmemoraciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Australian Prime Minister John Howard, along with his wife Janette and opposition lawmaker Bob McMullan, honored the victims of the Bali bombings by placing wreaths in their memory in Canberra on Tuesday, Oct. 12, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Tuesday, Oct. 12, 2004, John Howard, the Australian Prime Minister, his wife Janette, and Bob McMullan, an opposition lawmaker, participated in a memorial service in Canberra, laying wreaths to remember the victims of the Bali bombings.

Original Text: IBM fuels the need for speed At the SC2004 conference last week, IBM unveiled plans to build a commercial version of its Blue Gene supercomputer intended for businesses and for a number of scientific and research markets.
Translation: IBM impulsa la necesidad de velocidad. En la conferencia SC2004 la semana pasada, IBM reveló planes para construir una versión comercial de su supercomputadora Blue Gene destinada a empresas y para varios mercados científicos y de investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the SC2004 conference that took place last week, IBM announced its intentions to build a commercial edition of the Blue Gene supercomputer oriented towards businesses as well as various scientific and research sectors, affirming their contribution to the demand for speed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Demonstrating a pivotal role in pushing the boundaries of speed, IBM revealed its blueprint for a business-focused version of its Blue Gene supercomputer at last week's SC2004 conference, designed to serve both commercial firms and several scientific and research industries.

Original Text: Sharon Allows 1,000 More Settler Homes in West Bank  JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Prime Minister Ariel Sharon approved  tenders to build 1,000 more Israeli settler homes in the  occupied West Bank, plans that were shelved earlier to avoid  discord with Washington, political sources said Tuesday.
Translation: Sharon Permite 1,000 Viviendas Más para Colonos en Cisjordania JERUSALÉN (Reuters) - El Primer Ministro Ariel Sharon aprobó licitaciones para construir 1,000 viviendas más para colonos israelíes en Cisjordania ocupada, planes que se habían archivado anteriormente para evitar discordias con Washington, dijeron fuentes políticas el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Prime Minister Ariel Sharon gave the green light for proposals to construct an additional 1,000 Israeli settler homes in the West Bank, projects that were previously put on hold to circumvent conflict with Washington, according to political insiders on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) JERUSALEM (Reuters) - On Tuesday, political sources reported that Prime Minister Ariel Sharon conceded to the construction of another 1,000 homes for Israeli settlers in the West Bank. These plans had been previously withdrawn to evade disagreement with Washington.

Original Text: Jonathan #39;s Space Report No. 537 - October 27, 2004 Soyuz TMA-5 docked with the Pirs module on Oct 16 at 0416 UTC. Sharipov, Chiao, Shargin, Padalka and Fincke spent a week aboard the Station and at 1814 UTC on Oct 23 Padalka, Fincke and Shargin entered Soyuz
Translation: Informe Espacial de Jonathan N°. 537 - 27 de Octubre de 2004. Soyuz TMA-5 atracó con el módulo Pirs el 16 de Octubre a las 0416 UTC. Sharipov, Chiao, Shargin, Padalka y Fincke pasaron una semana a bordo de la Estación y a las 1814 UTC del 23 de Octubre, Padalka, Fincke y Shargin entraron en el Soyuz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jonathan's Space Report No. 537, dated October 27, 2004, mentions that Soyuz TMA-5 attached in a synchronized manner with the Pirs module on October 16 at 0416 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The crew which included Sharipov, Chiao, Shargin, Padalka, and Fincke spent seven days on the Station. On October 23 at 1814 UTC, Padalka, Fincke, and Shargin boarded the Soyuz.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In his 537th space report dated October 27, 2004, Jonathan recounts how Soyuz TMA-5 successfully docked with the Pirs module on October 16 at 0416 UTC. For an entire week, the space station was occupied by Sharipov, Chiao, Shargin, Padalka, and Fincke. On October 23, at 1814 UTC, Padalka, Fincke, and Shargin made their ingress into the Soyuz.

Original Text: Sharman counter attacks Sharman Networks launched its counter attack against the record labels in the Australian Federal court yesterday. The company attacked the labels for their anti peer-to-peer tactic of deluging such services with so-called  #39;spoof files #39;.
Translation: Sharman contraataca. Sharman Networks lanzó su contraataque contra las discográficas en el Tribunal Federal australiano ayer. La compañía atacó a las discográficas por su táctica contra el peer-to-peer de inundar dichos servicios con los llamados 'archivos falsos' #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, in the Australian Federal Court, Sharman Networks kicked off its counter offensive against the record labels. The company criticised the labels for their method of inundating peer-to-peer services with what they term 'spoof files'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sharman Networks retaliated against the record labels in the Australian Federal court yesterday, launching their counter attack. They targeted the labels for their strategy of flooding peer-to-peer services with so-called 'spoof files'.

Original Text: Jury rules asbestos danger not hidden from company _ A jury has ruled that Union Carbide was not fraudulent in how it sold asbestos for use by Kelly-Moore Paints in its interior finishing products.
Translation: Un jurado determina que la empresa no ocultó el peligro del asbesto _ Un jurado ha dictaminado que Union Carbide no fue fraudulento en cómo vendió asbesto para su uso por parte de Kelly-Moore Paints en sus productos de acabado interior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A jury decided that there was no deception from Union Carbide in selling asbestos to Kelly-Moore Paints for the production of their interior finishing items, asserting that the dangers of asbestos weren't concealed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It has been determined by jury that Union Carbide did not hide the risks of asbestos when it was provided for use in interior finishing goods by Kelly-Moore Paints.

Original Text: Di claim dismissed LONDON: A former bodyguard of Britain #39;s Princess Diana yesterday said he doubted that one of her alleged lovers had been  quot;bumped off quot; - a claim she made in never-before-seen videotapes broadcast in the US.
Translation: Reclamo desestimado LONDRES: Un ex guardaespaldas de la princesa Diana de Gran Bretaña dijo ayer que dudaba que uno de sus supuestos amantes hubiera sido "eliminado", una afirmación que ella hizo en cintas de video nunca antes vistas transmitidas en Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: LONDON: A previous bodyguard for Britain's Princess Diana expressed his doubts yesterday about the possibility of one of her purported lovers being deliberately eliminated, a claim she made in previously unreleased videotapes aired in the United States.
Paraphrase 2: In London, a man who formerly worked as a bodyguard for Princess Diana of Britain said yesterday that he was skeptical at the idea that one of her suggested lovers had been intentionally gotten rid of - an assertion she made in secret videotapes that had never been shown before in the US.

Original Text: Zingy to Deliver Kanye West, Aaliyah Songs (Reuters) Reuters - Mobile media company Zingy on\Monday said it signed deals to deliver voice recordings by\Grammy-nominated rapper Kanye West and songs from the late R B\singer Aaliyah to mobile phone users.
Translation: Zingy entregará canciones de Kanye West, Aaliyah (Reuters) Reuters - La compañía de medios móviles Zingy dijo el lunes que firmó acuerdos para entregar grabaciones de voz del rapero nominado al Grammy, Kanye West y canciones de la fallecida cantante de R B, Aaliyah, a los usuarios de teléfonos móviles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) On Monday, mobile media firm Zingy announced its recent agreements to provide mobile phone users with voice recordings from Kanye West, a Grammy-nominated rapper, and tracks from the deceased R&B artist Aaliyah.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Zingy, a mobile media business, has entered agreements to supply songs from the late R&B artist, Aaliyah, and voice recordings of Grammy award-nominated rapper, Kanye West to mobile phone consumers, according to an announcement made on Monday by Reuters.

Original Text: Transmeta ships 90-nm processor Transmeta last week announced it had started shipping limited quantities of its x86-compatible Efficeon TM8800 processor, a low-powered CPU fabbed on 90-nanometer silicon.
Translation: Transmeta envía procesador de 90 nm. Transmeta anunció la semana pasada que había comenzado a enviar cantidades limitadas de su procesador Efficeon TM8800 compatible con x86, una CPU de bajo consumo fabricada con silicio de 90 nanómetros.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last week, Transmeta declared that it had begun the shipment of a limited number of its x86-compatible Efficeon TM8800 processors, an energy-efficient CPU composed of 90-nanometer silicon.

Original Text: Exclusive Boxer Quotes: What They #39;re Saying in NYC Lots of buzz in the air with so many of boxing #39;s major players on the scene. Here #39;s what we #39;re hearing: Kali Meehan:  quot;When I say the name Rock Rahman to people, they look at me, Oh, Rock #39;s tough.
Translation: Citas exclusivas de boxeadores: lo que dicen en NYC. Mucho revuelo en el aire con tantos jugadores importantes del boxeo en la escena. Esto es lo que estamos escuchando: Kali Meehan: "Cuando digo el nombre de Rock Rahman a las personas, me miran, Oh, Rock es duro."
Paraphrase 1: 1. Unique Remarks from Boxers: All the Talk in NYC Lots of excitement is swirling with many top figures from boxing being present. This is what we are picking up: Kali Meehan says, "When I mention the name Rock Rahman, people's reaction is usually, 'Oh, Rock is tough'."
Paraphrase 2: 2. Privileged Statements from Boxers: The Buzz in NYC There's a great deal of chatter in the air with numerous main boxing personalities on the spot. Here's the inside scoop: Kali Meehan claims, "People's response when I mention Rock Rahman is generally like, 'Well, Rock's a tough one'."

Original Text: Apple recalls overheating batteries The Mac maker says it will replace about 28,000 batteries in one model of PowerBook G4 and tells people to stop using the notebook.
Translation: Apple retira baterías por sobrecalentamiento. El fabricante de Mac dice que reemplazará alrededor de 28,000 baterías en un modelo de PowerBook G4 y le pide a la gente que deje de usar la notebook.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The manufacturer of Mac, Apple, announces that it will substitute around 28,000 batteries in a model of PowerBook G4, due to overheating issues, and cautions users to refrain from using the laptop.

Original Text: IBM buys content integration developer IBM Corp. has agreed to acquire content integration software maker Venetica Corp., a move that continues IBM's pattern of snapping up its business partners to augment its software portfolio.
Translation: IBM compra desarrollador de integración de contenido. IBM Corp. ha acordado adquirir al fabricante de software de integración de contenido Venetica Corp., un movimiento que continúa el patrón de IBM de adquirir a sus socios comerciales para aumentar su cartera de software.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM Corp has decided to purchase content integration software producer, Venetica Corp, following IBM's trend of acquiring its business associates to enhance its software collection.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Continuing their practice of enhancing their software portfolio through business partner acquisition, IBM Corp has consented to buy the content integration software company, Venetica Corp.

Original Text: Intel announces milestone in shrinking chips SAN JOSE, Calif. Semiconductor company Intel says it has made a breakthrough development in shrinking the size of chips. The Santa Clara-based company announced today it has created a fully functional 70 megabit
Translation: Intel anuncia hito en la reducción de chips SAN JOSE, Calif. La compañía de semiconductores Intel dice que ha logrado un avance importante en la reducción del tamaño de los chips. La empresa con sede en Santa Clara anunció hoy que ha creado un chip completamente funcional de 70 megabits.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Intel, the semiconductor company based in Santa Clara, just declared a milestone. They announced that they've successfully manufactured a completely functional 70 megabit by miniaturizing chips, an impressive development.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Making strides in the semiconductor industry, Intel, located in Santa Clara, has today declared that it has developed a fully functional 70 megabit chip featuring their groundbreaking chip shrinking technology.

Original Text: Microsoft Intros Supercomputing SDK Looking to drive corporate adoption of its high-performance computing version of Windows Server 2003, Microsoft on Monday introduced an SDK (software development kit) for developers alongside a name change for the product.
Translation: Microsoft presenta el SDK de supercomputación buscando impulsar la adopción corporativa de su versión de alta rendimiento de Windows Server 2003, Microsoft introdujo el lunes un SDK (kit de desarrollo de software) para desarrolladores junto con un cambio de nombre para el producto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an effort to promote the corporate adoption of its high-performance computing version of Windows Server 2003, Microsoft unveiled a software development kit (SDK) for developers on Monday. This release was accompanied by a name change for the product.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Microsoft launched a software development kit (SDK) for developers and rebranded its high-performance computing version of Windows Server 2003. This move is aimed at driving its adoption in corporate circles.

Original Text: Missing Russian helicopter found crashed near Chechnya; 2 crew members killed (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - ROSTOV-ON-DON, Russia (AP) - Eight Russian soldiers and police were killed by rebels in Chechnya within a 24-hour period, and a military helicopter crashed on a flight out of the region, killing two of the three crew members aboard, officials said.
Translation: Helicóptero ruso desaparecido encontrado accidentado cerca de Chechenia; 2 miembros de la tripulación muertos (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - ROSTOV-ON-DON, Rusia (AP) - Ocho soldados y policías rusos fueron asesinados por rebeldes en Chechenia en un periodo de 24 horas, y un helicóptero militar se estrelló en un vuelo que salía de la región, matando a dos de los tres miembros de la tripulación a bordo, dijeron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Canadian Press reported from Rostov-On-Don, Russia that a Russian helicopter, previously reported missing, was found crashed near Chechnya. Two out of the three crew members aboard were killed. In an unrelated incident, eight Russian soldiers and police lost their lives within a day to rebel attacks in Chechnya, according to officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the Canadian Press, two crew members were killed when a missing Russian helicopter was discovered crashed near Chechnya. In the same 24-hour span, officials reported that eight Russian law enforcement officers and soldiers were fatally attacked by rebels in Chechnya. The report originated from Rostov-On-Don, Russia.

Original Text: Chiefs #39; offense finally breaks out (October 25, 2004) - The Kansas City Chiefs were overdue for an offensive explosion and visiting Atlanta was the 56-10 victim Sunday.
Translation: La ofensiva de los Chiefs finalmente se destaca (25 de octubre de 2004) - Los Kansas City Chiefs ya necesitaban una explosión ofensiva y Atlanta, que estaba de visita, fue la víctima de 56-10 el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On October 25, 2004, the Kansas City Chiefs' offense belatedly bursts into action, subjecting visiting Atlanta to a devastating 56-10 defeat on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The lackluster offense of the Kansas City Chiefs finally showed signs of life on October 25, 2004. Atlanta, the visiting team, bore the brunt of their renewed vigor and was defeated 56-10 on Sunday.

Original Text: AMD debuts low-cost Net device Company's \$185 machine will debut in India, Mexico and Caribbean and feature browser, e-mail and word processor.
Translation: AMD estrena dispositivo de Internet de bajo costo. La máquina de \$185 de la compañía hará su debut en India, México y el Caribe, y contará con navegador, correo electrónico y procesador de textos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AMD is set to launch an affordable Net Device, priced at $185, and packed with features such as a browser, e-mail, and word processor, in India, Mexico, and the Caribbean.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The new $185 Net device from AMD, which includes a browser, e-mail, and word processor, is making its debut in markets such as India, Mexico, and the Caribbean.

Original Text: Novell spiffs up its desktop Linux software Software maker has its eye on consumers who might be ready to make the switch from Windows.
Translation: Novell mejora su software de Linux para escritorio. El fabricante de software tiene en la mira a los consumidores que podrían estar listos para hacer la transición desde Windows.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Focusing on consumers contemplating a change from Windows, Novell enhances its desktop Linux software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the aim of attracting consumers considering a shift from Windows, the software maker Novell upgrades its Linux desktop software.

Original Text: Wanadoo UK begins major broadband drive France Telecom makes 'substantial and significant' investment
Translation: Wanadoo UK comienza una importante iniciativa de banda ancha, France Telecom realiza una inversión 'sustancial y significativa'.
Paraphrase 1: 1. France Telecom invests 'substantially and significantly' as Wanadoo UK embarks on a major broadband initiative.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A 'substantial and significant' investment is made by France Telecom, initiating Wanadoo UK's major broadband drive.

Original Text: Ochoa wins LPGA Wachovia Classic Lorena Ochoa birdied three of the last four holes Sunday to overcome a five-stroke deficit and win the Wachovia LPGA Classic. Ochoa finished with a 65 to score a 19-under 269 for her second career win.
Translation: Ochoa gana el Clásico de la LPGA Wachovia. Lorena Ochoa embocó el birdie en tres de los últimos cuatro hoyos el domingo para superar un déficit de cinco golpes y ganar el Clásico de la Wachovia LPGA. Ochoa terminó con un 65 para anotar un 19 bajo el par 269 para su segunda victoria en su carrera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lorena Ochoa triumphed over a five-stroke deficit to claim victory at the Wachovia LPGA Classic, by birdieing three of the final four holes on Sunday. By finishing with a score of 65, she achieved a 19-under 269, marking her second professional career win.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Sunday, Lorena Ochoa seized the Wachovia LPGA Classic win by overcoming a five-stroke deficit, aided by three birdies in the last four holes. This marked her second career win, with her finishing with a score of 65, summing up a 19-under 269.

Original Text: 3M drags down Dow Component #39;s weaker results and profit warning weigh on Dow. Slight ease in oil prices helps. NEW YORK (CNN/Money) - An earnings miss and profit warning from 3M kept the Dow in the red Monday morning, but the
Translation: 3M arrastra hacia abajo el componente #39 del Dow debido a resultados más débiles y advertencia de menores ganancias que pesan sobre el Dow. Una ligera disminución en los precios del petróleo ayuda. NUEVA YORK (CNN/Money) - Una pérdida de ganancias y una advertencia de menores ganancias de 3M mantuvieron al Dow en números rojos el lunes por la mañana, pero el
Paraphrase 1: 1. New York (CNN/Money) - Monday morning saw the Dow remain in the negative due to an earnings miss and a profit warning from 3M. Despite this, a slight reduction in oil prices provided some assistance. The weak results and profit warning from 3M, a Dow Component #39, weighed significantly on the Dow.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Dow experienced downward pressure on Monday morning due to poor earnings and a profit alert from the Dow Component 3M, as reported by CNN/Money in New York. The downturn was somewhat alleviated by a marginal drop in oil prices.

Original Text: Time runs out on Redskins A record crowd of 90.367 entered FedEx Field Monday night hoping to witness a new chapter in what has become a lopsided rivalry between the Dallas Cowboys and Washington Redskins.
Translation: El tiempo se acaba para los Redskins. Un récord de multitud de 90.367 personas ingresaron al FedEx Field el lunes por la noche con la esperanza de presenciar un nuevo capítulo en lo que se ha convertido en una rivalidad desequilibrada entre los Dallas Cowboys y los Washington Redskins.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A staggering 90,367 spectators filled the FedEx Field on Monday evening,  anticipating a fresh phase in the historically one-sided competition between the Dallas Cowboys and the Washington Redskins, but time wasn't in Redskins' favor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday night, a record-breaking crowd of 90,367 amassed at FedEx Field. They eagerly expected to witness a turn in tides in the historically unequal rivalry between the Washington Redskins and the Dallas Cowboys, but the Redskins ran out of time.

Original Text: Anthrax hits Ugandan park hippos Scientists struggle to contain an anthrax epidemic which has killed nearly 200 hippos in a Ugandan national park.
Translation: Antrax afecta a los hipopótamos del parque ugandés. Los científicos luchan para contener una epidemia de ántrax que ha matado a casi 200 hipopótamos en un parque nacional de Uganda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nearly 200 hippos in a Ugandan national park have been killed by an anthrax epidemic, with scientists battling to control the outbreak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An anthrax outbreak in a Ugandan national park has caused the death of almost 200 hippos and scientists are finding it challenging to restrain the epidemic.

Original Text: Salvation Army must  #39;target #39; other kettles Officials at The Salvation Army in Bloomington wonder if this Christmas still will be a golden one. The agency, which counts on holiday collections to help fund its services
Translation: El Ejército de Salvación debe 'enfocar' otras colectas. Los funcionarios del Ejército de Salvación en Bloomington se preguntan si esta Navidad seguirá siendo dorada. La agencia, que cuenta con las colectas navideñas para ayudar a financiar sus servicios
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials at The Salvation Army in Bloomington are questioning if this Christmas will remain fruitful. This is because they rely heavily on the collections made during the holiday season to support their services and they may need to 'target' other kettles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the Christmas season in sights, The Salvation Army in Bloomington is speculating if they will have a prosperous year. They might need to 'target' additional kettles, as their services are majorly funded by the donations collected during this season.

Original Text: Goodyear Sees Profit; Stock Up  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Goodyear Tire   Rubber Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GT.N</A> on  Friday said it would report a third-quarter profit, reversing a  year-earlier loss, on higher prices for its products and  stronger sales.
Translation: Goodyear ve ganancias; acciones al alza. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Goodyear Tire Rubber Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GT.N</A> dijo el viernes que reportará ganancias en el tercer trimestre, revirtiendo las pérdidas del año pasado, gracias a los precios más elevados de sus productos y a unas ventas más fuertes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. New York (Reuters) - Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. announced a forthcoming profit report for the third quarter on Friday, following a loss during the same period last year. This turnaround is attributed to increased product prices and improved sales.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. revealed that they are set to report profits for the third quarter, a positive change from the loss experienced the previous year. This upward trend can be credited to higher product prices and a boost in sales, according to the statement from New York (Reuters).

Original Text: Stenson Leads Swedish Charge at the Heritage  WOBURN, England (Reuters) - Henrik Stenson led The Heritage  third round by a stroke from countryman Patrik Sjoland as  Swedes dominated the leaderboard on Saturday.
Translation: Stenson lidera la carga sueca en el Heritage WOBURN, Inglaterra (Reuters) - Henrik Stenson lideró la tercera ronda de The Heritage con un golpe de ventaja sobre su compatriota Patrik Sjoland mientras los suecos dominaban la tabla de clasificación el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WOBURN, England (Reuters) - The Heritage's third round saw Henrik Stenson leading by a stroke, ahead of fellow Swede Patrik Sjoland, making Swedes the dominant force on the leaderboard on Saturday.

Original Text: A Look at U.S. Military Deaths in Iraq (AP) AP - As of Friday, Nov. 5, 2004, at least 1,127 members of the U.S. military have died since the beginning of the Iraq war in March 2003, according to an Associated Press count. At least 865 died as a result of hostile action, the Defense Department said. The figures include three military civilians.
Translation: Un vistazo a las muertes militares de EE.UU. en Irak (AP) AP - Hasta el viernes 5 de noviembre de 2004, al menos 1,127 miembros del ejército de EE.UU. han muerto desde el comienzo de la guerra en Irak en marzo de 2003, según un recuento de Associated Press. Al menos 865 murieron como resultado de acción hostil, dijo el Departamento de Defensa. Las cifras incluyen a tres civiles militares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP Coverage: As of November 5, 2004, the Associated Press reports that from the start of the Iraq war in March 2003, a minimum of 1,127 U.S. military personal have lost their lives. The Defense Department stated that at least 865 of these casualties were the result of hostile action. The count also includes three military civilians.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Iraq War Casualties: Since March 2003 at the beginning of the Iraq War, a minimum of 1,127 U.S. military individuals have been reported dead according to the Associated Press count as of November 5, 2004. The Defense Department attributes at least 865 of these deaths to hostile actions. The death toll also includes three military civilians.

Original Text: Cambodia set to crown new king Cambodians prepare for the coronation of King Sihamoni, amid an array of official festivities.
Translation: Camboya prepara la coronación del nuevo rey Los camboyanos se preparan para la coronación del Rey Sihamoni, entre una serie de festividades oficiales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid a host of official celebrations, Cambodians are getting ready for the enthronement of King Sihamoni, signaling a new reign in Cambodia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. King Sihamoni's coronation is on the horizon, with Cambodia abuzz with official festivities and preparations.

Original Text: Basketball: Gary Payton has change of heart and decides to play <b>...</b> BOSTON, United States : Gary Payton has had a change of heart and reported to the Boston Celtics training camp. After saying a couple of months ago he didn #39;t want to leave California following his August 6
Translation: Baloncesto: Gary Payton cambia de opinión y decide jugar <b>...</b> BOSTON, Estados Unidos : Gary Payton ha cambiado de opinión y se ha presentado en el campo de entrenamiento de los Boston Celtics. Después de decir hace un par de meses que no quería dejar California tras su partida el 6 de agosto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Gary Payton, previously stating he didn't want to leave California post-August 6, goes through a change of mind and decides to participate in the Boston Celtics training camp.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite previously unwilling to leave California after August 6, Gary Payton reverses his decision and shows up for the Boston Celtics training camp.

Original Text: Japan May Have 15th Case of Mad Cow Disease, Kyodo Says Japan may say it found its 15th case of mad cow disease in an animal found in Mie prefecture, Kyodo News said, citing the local government.
Translation: Japón Podría Tener el 15º Caso de Encefalopatía Espongiforme Bovina, dice Kyodo. Japón podría decir que encontró su 15º caso de encefalopatía espongiforme bovina en un animal encontrado en la prefectura de Mie, según dijo Kyodo News, citando al gobierno local.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Kyodo News, citing the local government, reported that Japan may announce its 15th case of mad cow disease, discovered in an animal in Mie prefecture.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An animal in Mie prefecture may be Japan's 15th case of mad cow disease, as per a report by Kyodo News citing the local government.

Original Text: U.S.: High Oil Price Due to Supply Fears  MELBOURNE (Reuters) - Supply and demand in the oil market  are roughly in balance at the moment and current high prices  are due to the possibility of disruptions rather than any  shortage, a U.S. official said on Tuesday.
Translation: EE.UU.: Alto Precio del Petróleo Debido a Temores de Suministro MELBOURNE (Reuters) - El suministro y la demanda en el mercado del petróleo están aproximadamente en equilibrio en este momento y los altos precios actuales se deben a la posibilidad de interrupciones más que a cualquier escasez, dijo un funcionario estadounidense el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MELBOURNE (Reuters) - A U.S. official stated on Tuesday that the current high oil prices in the U.S. are not due to any shortage but instead stem from the potential of supply disruptions, even though the current oil market's supply and demand are relatively balanced.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A U.S. official announced on Tuesday, according to Reuters from Melbourne, that the elevated oil prices currently observed are a result of anticipated supply disturbances, not due to any deficiency, as the oil market presently exhibits an equalized supply and demand.

Original Text: Two IBM services units acquired by GXS owner IBM Global Services has agreed to sell its Electronic Data Interchange and Business Exchange Services businesses to Francisco Partners, the majority owner of electronic data transmission vendor Global eXchange Services Inc.
Translation: Dos unidades de servicios de IBM adquiridas por el dueño de GXS: IBM Global Services ha acordado vender sus negocios de Intercambio de Datos Electrónicos y Servicios de Intercambio Comercial a Francisco Partners, el propietario mayoritario del proveedor de transmisión de datos electrónicos Global eXchange Services Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM Global Services has consented to sell its Electronic Data Interchange and Business Exchange Services departments to Francisco Partners, which is the primary owner of the electronic data transmission vendor, Global eXchange Services Inc.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Electronic Data Interchange and Business Exchange Services of IBM Global Services are set to be sold to Francisco Partners, the main stakeholder of the electronic data transmission vendor known as Global eXchange Services Inc.

Original Text: EU failed to become the world #39;s most competitive economy, report <b>...</b> BRUSSELS Europe #39;s efforts to become the world #39;s most competitive economy have failed, and the European social model faces collapse unless the Continent #39;s governments stimulate growth and create more jobs, according to a report published Wednesday.
Translation: La UE no logró convertirse en la economía más competitiva del mundo, informa <b>...</b> BRUSELAS Los esfuerzos de Europa para convertirse en la economía más competitiva del mundo han fracasado, y el modelo social europeo se enfrenta al colapso a menos que los gobiernos del continente estimulen el crecimiento y creen más empleos, según un informe publicado el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The attempt of the European Union (EU) to establish the globe's most competitive economy has not been successful, warns a report. Published on Wednesday, the report states that the European social model faces an imminent collapse if government authorities across the continent do not adopt policies to induce growth and enhance job creation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The attempt of Europe to rise as the world's most competitive economy was unsuccessful, as described in a report from Wednesday. This report also suggests that there's a looming danger of the European social model failing if the government of the continent doesn't take immediate measures to promote growth and job creation.

Original Text: Red Sox win World Series with 3-0 win Weds. to sweep St. Louis (St. Louis-AP) Oct. 27, 2004 - Curse? What curse? The Boston Red Sox have lifted the Curse of the Bambino by completing a four-game sweep in the World Series, beating the St.
Translation: Los Red Sox ganan la Serie Mundial con una victoria de 3-0 el miércoles, barriendo a St. Louis (St. Louis-AP) 27 de octubre, 2004 - ¿Maldición? ¿Qué maldición? Los Boston Red Sox han levantado la Maldición del Bambino al completar una barrida de cuatro juegos en la Serie Mundial, venciendo a St. Louis.
Paraphrase 1: 1) "The Curse of the Bambino" was shattered on Oct. 27, 2004, as the Boston Red Sox achieved a stunning four-game sweep in the World Series against St. Louis. The team bagged the title with a decisive 3-0 victory on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The long-standing "Curse of the Bambino" was finally eliminated on Oct. 27, 2004, when the Boston Red Sox won the World Series by resoundingly crushing St. Louis in a four-game streak. The final victory, a solid 3-0 win, took place on Wednesday, confirming the sweep over St. Louis.

Original Text: Md. Marine's Love of Outdoors and Adventure Remembered  For  relatives and friends of Kirk Bosselmann, few things the Marine Corps corporal did surprised them.
Translation: El Amor del Marino Md. por el Aire Libre y la Aventura Recordado Para los parientes y amigos de Kirk Bosselmann, pocas cosas que el cabo del Cuerpo de Marines hizo les sorprendieron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The love for nature and exploration that Marine Corporal Kirk Bosselmann had is fondly recollected by his family and friends who were rarely taken aback by his actions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Corporal Kirk Bosselmann's passion for the outdoors and adventure is cherished by his friends and relatives who had grown to expect the unexpected from the Marine.

Original Text: Computers keep Oklahoma BCS #39; No. 2 Oklahoma remained second in the Bowl Championship Series Standings on Monday, holding off Auburn because of a stronger computer ranking.
Translation: Las computadoras mantienen a Oklahoma BCS #39; Oklahoma quedó en segundo lugar en la Clasificación de la Serie de Campeonato de Bowl el lunes, resistiendo a Auburn debido a un ranking de computadora más fuerte.
Paraphrase 1: 1.	Maintaining its second position in the Bowl Championship Series Standings on Monday, Oklahoma relied on its superior computer ranking to hold back Auburn, thereby underscoring the importance of computers in the BCS.
Paraphrase 2: 2.	Oklahoma managed to fend off Auburn and secure its No. 2 position in the Bowl Championship Series Standings on Monday, thanks to a more favorable computer rating.

Original Text: Fans Irked Over Seats The addition of 4,000 seats to the lower bowl at FedEx Field sparked a slew of complaints from ticket holders who feel they were misled.
Translation: Los aficionados molestos por los asientos. La adición de 4,000 asientos a la zona inferior del FedEx Field provocó una avalancha de quejas de los poseedores de entradas que sienten que fueron engañados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The insertion of an additional 4,000 seats in the lower bowl at FedEx Field has led to a barrage of grievances from ticket holders who believe they have been deceived.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ticket holders have expressed their dissatisfaction over the misleading addition of 4,000 seats to the lower bowl at FedEx Field.

Original Text: Homeland Security Names New Cyber Chief By 1:57 PM EDT Fri. Oct. 08, 2004. The Department of Homeland Security Thursday appointed an acting US cybersecurity chief to replace Amit Yoran, who resigned suddenly from the position a week ago.
Translation: Seguridad Nacional nombra nuevo Jefe de Ciberseguridad a las 1:57 PM EDT del viernes 08 de octubre de 2004. El Departamento de Seguridad Nacional designó el jueves a un jefe interino de ciberseguridad de los EE. UU. para reemplazar a Amit Yoran, quien renunció repentinamente a la posición hace una semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Department of Homeland Security announced on Thursday that a new acting cybersecurity chief was appointed to succeed Amit Yoran, who unexpectedly resigned from the role a week prior. This was reported by 1:57 PM EDT on Friday, October 8th, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, an acting US cybersecurity chief was appointed by the Department of Homeland Security, stepping in for Amit Yoran who abruptly left his post a week earlier. This news was made public by 1:57 PM EDT, Friday, October 8, 2004.

Original Text: Separate Genes Responsible for Drinking, Alcoholism By Randy Dotinga, HealthDay Reporter    HealthDayNews -- Some people can drink a lot of alcohol without becoming addicted, and specific genes may help explain why, researchers say.    In a new study of Australian twins, scientists found that separate genes appear to be responsible, to some degree, for dependence on alcohol -- addiction -- and how much people drink...
Translation:
"Genes Separados Responsables por Beber, Alcoholismo" Por Randy Dotinga, Reportero de HealthDay 

HealthDayNews -- Algunas personas pueden beber mucho alcohol sin volverse adictas, y genes específicos podrían ayudar a explicar el por qué, según los investigadores. 

En un nuevo estudio de gemelos australianos, los científicos encontraron que genes separados parecen ser responsables, hasta cierto punto, de la dependencia al alcohol, el alcoholismo, y cuánto bebe la gente...
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Researchers have Discerned Different Genes Responsible for Alcohol Intake and Addiction" by Randy Dotinga, HealthDayNews Reporter. Scientists are suggesting that specific genes may be a potential reason why some individuals can consume substantial amounts of alcohol without forming an addiction. In a recent Australian twins study, researchers discovered that distinct genes seem to play a role in alcohol dependence, or addiction, and the quantity of alcohol consumed...
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Distinct Genes Found to be Involved in Alcohol Consumption and Dependency" by Randy Dotinga, Reporting for HealthDayNews. Some individuals have the ability to consume considerable amounts of alcohol without developing an addiction. This may be due to specific genes, according to researchers. A recent study involving Australian twins has revealed that different genes could, to a certain extent, determine addiction to alcohol and the amount of alcohol people drink...

Original Text: Russian mishap threatens launch schedule The explosion of a small separation bolt aboard the Soyuz spaceship now being prepared for a trip to the international space station may delay that launch for five or 10 days, Russian
Translation: Contratiempo ruso amenaza el calendario de lanzamientos. La explosión de un pequeño perno de separación a bordo de la nave espacial Soyuz, que ahora se está preparando para un viaje a la estación espacial internacional, puede retrasar ese lanzamiento durante cinco o diez días, según los rusos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The launch schedule could be delayed for five or ten days due to a mishap with a small separation bolt explosion on the Soyuz spaceship, currently being readied for a journey to the international space station, as per Russian reports.

Original Text: Mars rovers get new lease on life The Mars rovers, Spirit and Opportunity, received another 6 months of funding from NASA. The two rovers were originally designed to complete a primary mission of three months, but have continued to operate for 5 additional months.
Translation: Los rovers de Marte obtienen una nueva oportunidad de vida. Los rovers de Marte, Spirit y Opportunity, recibieron otros 6 meses de financiación de la NASA. Los dos rovers fueron diseñados originalmente para completar una misión principal de tres meses, pero han continuado operando durante 5 meses adicionales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Mars rovers, Spirit and Opportunity, have been granted an additional six months of funding by NASA, extending their lifespan beyond their original three-month mission by five further months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Spirit and Opportunity, the Mars rovers, initially engineered for a three-month mission, have been operating for an additional five months and recently, they received extended funding from NASA for six more months.

Original Text: Toshiba wins backing for HD-DVD Toshiba has won a major victory in the battle to determine the standard for next-generation DVDs with the endorsement by four Hollywood studios of its High Definition-DVD format.
Translation: Toshiba gana respaldo para el HD-DVD Toshiba ha logrado una gran victoria en la batalla para determinar el estándar de los DVD de próxima generación con el respaldo de cuatro estudios de Hollywood a su formato de DVD de Alta Definición.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Securing a significant triumph in establishing the benchmark for future DVDs, Toshiba's High Definition-DVD format has been endorsed by four major Hollywood studios.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The High Definition-DVD format of Toshiba received endorsement from four Hollywood studios, marking a significant triumph in the struggle to set the standard for upcoming DVDs.

Original Text: OPEC Hawks Want to Keep Prices High Raise prices. Ease production. For weeks ahead of this week #39;s OPEC meeting, hawks in the organization have been talking tough about the need to keep oil revenues high - and lowering output.
Translation: Los halcones de la OPEP quieren mantener los precios altos. Aumentar los precios. Facilitar la producción. Durante semanas antes de la reunión de la OPEP de esta semana, los halcones en la organización han estado hablando duramente sobre la necesidad de mantener altos los ingresos por petróleo - y disminuir la producción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ahead of this week's OPEC meeting, hawks in the organization have been assertive about the necessity to maintain high oil revenues by advocating for a raise in prices and reduction in production.

Original Text: IT firms call for patent protection in EU BRUSSELS -- A group of some of the world's leading IT and telecommunications companies have warned that Europe could become a "haven for plagiarism" if the European Parliament fails to agree to allow patent protection for inventions implemented by computer.
Translation: Las empresas de TI solicitan protección de patentes en la UE BRUSELAS -- Un grupo de algunas de las principales empresas de TI y telecomunicaciones del mundo han advertido que Europa podría convertirse en un "refugio para el plagio" si el Parlamento Europeo no logra acordar permitir la protección de patentes para invenciones implementadas por computadora.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BRUSSELS -- Major global IT and telecommunications corporations are urging for patent protection in the EU, cautioning that without it, Europe is at risk of becoming a breeding ground for plagiarism. This comes as a response to the potential failure of the European Parliament to approve patent protection for computer-implemented inventions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Brussels, world-renowned IT and telecommunications businesses are raising a call for securing patent rights within the EU. They are sounding the alarm that Europe might transform into a hotbed for plagiarism if the European Parliament does not grant patent safeguards for inventions facilitated via computers.

Original Text: Lycos, spammers trade blows over screen saver Just days after releasing a free screen saver program that uses computer downtime to swamp Web sites associated with spam, Lycos Europe has found itself caught in a fight with spammers.
Translation: Lycos y spammers intercambian golpes sobre protector de pantalla. Apenas unos días después de lanzar un programa gratuito de protector de pantalla que utiliza inactividad en la computadora para inundar sitios web asociados con spam, Lycos Europe se ha encontrado atrapado en una pelea con spammers.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Just days following the launch of a free screen saver program designed to use computer downtime to inundate spam-associated websites, Lycos Europe is now engaged in a battle with spammers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A conflict with spammers erupted for Lycos Europe just a few days after they unveiled a free screen saver program, which uses idle computer time to flood websites linked to spam.

Original Text: LSU Tumbles, Auburn Rises in AP Poll (AP) AP - LSU fell out of the top 10 Sunday while Auburn moved in, the result of a one-point game decided by a second-chance extra point.
Translation: LSU cae, Auburn sube en la encuesta AP (AP) AP - LSU salió del top 10 el domingo mientras Auburn entró, el resultado de un partido decidido por un punto gracias a una segunda oportunidad en el punto extra.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - On Sunday, LSU dropped beyond the top 10 as Auburn ascended into it, following the outcome of a game decided by a reattempted extra point leading to a one-point difference.

Original Text: RealNetworks Tries to Core Apple RealNetworks launched round two in its heavyweight digital music match against Apple Computer, slashing the cost of its music downloads to take business away from Apple's iTunes download service. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Translation: RealNetworks intenta competir con Apple RealNetworks lanzó la segunda ronda en su competencia de música digital contra Apple Computer, reduciendo el costo de sus descargas de música para quitarle negocio al servicio de descarga de iTunes de Apple. <FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Paraphrase 1: 1. RealNetworks, in its second major move against Apple Computer in the digital music arena, has dropped the prices of its music downloads to compete with Apple's iTunes service. -washingtonpost.com
Paraphrase 2: 2. By cutting down its music download prices, RealNetworks instigates the second round in its tough digital music competition with Apple Computer, intending to snatch market share from Apple's iTunes download service. -washingtonpost.com

Original Text: Stocks Open Lower as Oil Prices, 3M Weigh  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks opened lower on Monday as  oil prices held near \$55 a barrel and Dow component 3M Co.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMM.N</A> posted results slightly below Wall Street estimates.
Translation: Las Acciones Abren a la Baja debido a los Precios del Petróleo, 3M Tiene Peso NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones estadounidenses abrieron a la baja el lunes debido a que los precios del petróleo se mantuvieron cerca de \$55 por barril y el componente del Dow, 3M Co. MMM.N publicó resultados ligeramente por debajo de las estimaciones de Wall Street.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, U.S. stocks started off at a lower price due to oil prices hovering around $55 a barrel and a slight underperformance in results from the Dow component, 3M Co. against the Wall Street predictions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oil prices being steady near $55 per barrel and slightly below expected results from 3M Co. caused a downturn in the U.S. stock market at the start of Monday.

Original Text: Oracle pushes on apps business again Oracle is taking the wraps off the next generation of its database and business application products at the Oracle OpenWorld 2004 user conference this week, even as it continues its quest to buy out rival PeopleSoft.
Translation: Oracle impulsa nuevamente su negocio de aplicaciones. Oracle está presentando la próxima generación de su base de datos y productos de aplicaciones empresariales en la conferencia de usuarios Oracle OpenWorld 2004 esta semana, incluso mientras continúa su búsqueda para comprar a su rival PeopleSoft.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Oracle OpenWorld 2004 user conference this week, Oracle is unveiling a new generation of its database and business application products, whilst simultaneously pursuing its ambition to acquire its competitor, Peoplesoft.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even as it proceeds with its attempt to purchase rival firm PeopleSoft, Oracle is presenting the next generation of its database and business application products at the Oracle OpenWorld 2004 user conference this week.

Original Text: Start  #39;em or Sit  #39;em: Ravens-Eagles Eagles can be thrown on, but this is Kyle Boller and the Ravens we are talking about. He #39;d be a great start, but losing Jonathan Ogden is a pretty big blow.
Translation: Inicien a #39;em o Sentar a #39;em: Ravens-Eagles se puede lanzar a los Eagles, pero estamos hablando de Kyle Boller y los Ravens. Sería un gran comienzo, pero perder a Jonathan Ogden es un golpe bastante grande.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Initiate or Bench them: Ravens vs Eagles. Eagles are susceptible to passes, however, it's Kyle Boller and the Ravens we speak of. Despite being a fantastic choice to initiate, the loss of Jonathan Ogden strikes a significant blow.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Play or Rest them: Ravens taking on Eagles. Eagles aren't their best against throws, yet we're discussing Kyle Bollerand the Ravens here. He'd make a wonderful starting point, but going without Jonathan Ogden is indeed a substantial setback.

Original Text: 25 killed in mortar attacks on Kufa mosque: World News Najaf, Aug 26 : At least 25 people were killed and over 60 wounded when mortars slammed into a mosque where thousands of supporters of radical Shia cleric Moqtada al-Sadr had gathered in the southern Iraqi town of Kufa Thursday, Xinhua reports
Translation: 25 muertos en ataques con mortero a la mezquita de Kufa: Noticias Mundiales Najaf, 26 de Agosto : Al menos 25 personas murieron y más de 60 resultaron heridas cuando morteros impactaron en una mezquita donde miles de seguidores del clérigo chiíta radical Moqtada al-Sadr se habían reunido en el pueblo iraquí de Kufa el jueves, informa Xinhua.
Paraphrase 1: 1. World News Najaf, Aug 26: As per the reports by Xinhua, a minimum of 25 individuals lost their lives while more than 60 suffered injuries, in the southern Iraqi town of Kufa when a mosque - crowded with thousands of extremist Shia cleric Moqtada al-Sadr's supporters - was hit by mortar attacks on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to Xinhua, in the southern Iraq town of Kufa, a mosque was attacked by mortars on Thursday, leading to the death of no less than 25 individuals and injuring more than 60. This mosque was the gathering spot for thousands of supporters of the radical Shia cleric, Moqtada al-Sadr. The news was reported on Aug 26 from Najaf.

Original Text: Road finally gets easier for Raiders Streak ends at Carolina, but <b>...</b> Charlotte , NC -- The strange sensation of accomplishment, coupled with an odd bit of euphoria and a good measure of relief, was all so new to Tyler Brayton, the Raiders #39; second-year defensive end wasn #39;t sure how to act.
Translation: Finalmente, la carretera se vuelve más fácil para los Raiders. La racha termina en Carolina, pero <b>...</b> Charlotte, NC -- La extraña sensación de logro, combinada con un poco raro de euforia y una buena medida de alivio, era todo tan nuevo para Tyler Brayton, el ala defensiva de segundo año de los Raiders, que no estaba seguro de cómo actuar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The long-awaited improvement for Raiders finally arrives as their streak ends in Carolina. Tyler Brayton, the Raiders' second-year defensive end, found the strange sensation of accomplishment mingled with a peculiar sense of euphoria and significant relief so fresh and unique that he wasn't sure how to respond.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At last, the situation gets better for the Raiders as their sequence of losses concludes in Carolina. For Tyler Brayton, a second-year defensive end of the Raiders, the unusual feeling of success, combined with a weird sort of joy and a substantial sense of relief, was a novel experience that left him unsure about his reactions.

Original Text: Donovan Claims Soccer Player of Year Again (AP) AP - Landon Donovan was voted the U.S. soccer team player of the year Thursday, becoming the first three-time winner.
Translation: Donovan Reclama el título de Futbolista del Año de Nuevo (AP) AP - Landon Donovan fue votado como el jugador del año del equipo de fútbol de los EE.UU el jueves, convirtiéndose en el primer ganador por tres veces.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - For the third time, Landon Donovan has been elected as the U.S. soccer team's player of the year.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Bagging the title for the third time, Landon Donovan has once again emerged as the U.S. soccer team's player of the year.

Original Text: Keeping up with Jones isn #39;t hard Athens -- What a far cry this is from Sydney for Marion Jones. Comparatively speaking, these are the Olympics Lite, a few days of action and no hint of huge things.
Translation: Mantenerse al día con Jones no es difícil en Atenas, qué lejos está esto de Sydney para Marion Jones. En términos comparativos, estos son los Juegos Olímpicos Lite, unos pocos días de acción y sin indicios de grandes cosas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For Marion Jones, keeping pace with Jones in Athens is not difficult at all. Contrarily, this is a stark contrast from her experiences in Sydney. These Olympics are relatively lighter, hosting a few days of activities and showing no evidence of high-scale events.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Contrasting Sidney, Athens presents a less daunting challenge for Marion Jones to keep up with Jones. This lesser degree of intensity is evident in the Olympics here, which consist of minimal action over a few days without the looming prominence of massive events.

Original Text: China claims US textile quota plans violate WTO rules China on Friday protested against US actions to impose quotas on textiles, saying the move violated World Trade Organization principles and would harm bilateral trade.
Translation: China alega que los planes de cuotas de textiles de EE.UU violan las reglas de la OMC. China protestó el viernes contra las acciones de los Estados Unidos para imponer cuotas sobre los textiles, diciendo que la medida viola los principios de la Organización Mundial del Comercio y perjudicará el comercio bilateral.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, China asserted that the US's intentions to enforce textile quotas infringe upon World Trade Organization regulations, potentially damaging both countries' trade relations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The imposed quotas on textiles by the US were criticized by China on Friday, stating that such moves are in violation of the World Trade Organization standards and would be detrimental to their mutual trading relationship.

Original Text: Oil Retreat Deepens Ahead of U.S. Data (Reuters) Reuters - Oil prices extended recent heavy losses\on Wednesday ahead of weekly U.S. data expected to show fuel\stocks rising in time for peak winter demand.
Translation: Profundiza la Retirada del Petróleo Antes de los Datos de EE.UU. (Reuters) Reuters - Los precios del petróleo prolongaron las fuertes pérdidas recientes el miércoles antes de los datos semanales de EE.UU. que se espera muestren un aumento de las existencias de combustible a tiempo para la demanda máxima del invierno.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) Reuters - On Wednesday, ahead of the anticipated weekly U.S. data, oil prices prolonged the latest substantial losses, which is expected to show an increase in fuel stocks in time for the winter demand peak.
Paraphrase 2: (Reuters) Reuters - Prior to the release of weekly U.S. data expected to indicate a surge in fuel stocks for peak winter demand, oil prices on Wednesday continued to intensify their recent significant drops.

Original Text: Insurgent assault feared in Baghdad Insurgents fought US troops in running street battles in the capital Saturday, assassinated three Iraqi officials and their driver, and detonated a car bomb in Baghdad #39;s Liberation
Translation: Se teme un asalto insurgente en Bagdad. Los insurgentes lucharon contra las tropas estadounidenses en batallas callejeras el sábado, asesinaron a tres funcionarios iraquíes y a su conductor, y detonaron un coche bomba en la Liberación de Bagdad #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The capital, Baghdad, became a scene of chaos on Saturday as insurgents engaged in intense street battles with US troops, carried out the assassination of three Iraqi officials along with their driver, and set off a car bomb in Baghdad's Liberation #39.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Saturday, there were fears of an insurgent attack in Baghdad as US troops faced off with rebels in relentless street fights. Additionally, a car bomb was exploded in the city's Liberation #39 and three Iraqi officials and their chauffeur were brutally assassinated.

Original Text: Diamondbacks' Top Pick Enrolls in College (AP) AP - Top Arizona draft pick Stephen Drew enrolled in classes at Florida State on Thursday, a move similar to the one made by older brother J.D. Drew.
Translation: El Mejor Seleccionado de los Diamondbacks se Matricula en la Universidad (AP) AP - Stephen Drew, el mejor seleccionado del draft de Arizona, se matriculó en clases en Florida State el jueves, un movimiento similar al que hizo su hermano mayor, J.D. Drew.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Stephen Drew, the top draft pick from Arizona Diamondbacks, has enrolled in Florida State University, in a move similar to his older brother - J.D. Drew (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Thursday, Stephen Drew, top Arizona Diamondbacks' draft pick, followed his elder brother J.D. Drew's footsteps and enrolled in Florida State University's classes (AP).

Original Text: China eyes foreign software curbs China appears poised to issue rules about the extent to which government departments must favour local software, raising concerns that some overseas vendors could be cut out of the large state procurement market.
Translation: China contempla restricciones a software extranjero. Parece que China está preparada para emitir normas sobre el grado en el que los departamentos gubernamentales deben favorecer el software local, lo que genera preocupaciones de que algunos vendedores extranjeros podrían quedar fuera del gran mercado de adquisiciones estatales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It seems that China is about to implement regulations indicating the degree to which government departments need to prioritize domestic software. This raises apprehensions that certain foreign vendors might be excluded from the massive state procurement market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. China looks set to introduce guidelines determining how much its government departments should prefer homegrown software. This development raises the possibility that some international suppliers could be sidelined from the significant public procurement market.

Original Text: Toyota, Nissan Join to Standardize Car Electronics (Reuters) Reuters - Toyota Motor Corp. and Nissan Motor Co.\will join hands in a bid to save costs and create an\international standard for the software that operates a car's\electronic systems.
Translation: Toyota, Nissan se unen para estandarizar los sistemas electrónicos de los automóviles (Reuters) Reuters - Toyota Motor Corp. y Nissan Motor Co. unirán esfuerzos en un intento de ahorrar costos y crear un estándar internacional para el software que opera los sistemas electrónicos de un automóvil.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Reuters - In a move to reduce expenses and establish a global standard for automotive software, Toyota Motor Corp. and Nissan Motor Co. are uniting their efforts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Toyota Motor Corp. and Nissan Motor Co. have decided to collaborate with the aim of standardizing the software used in car electronics, as part of an initiative to cut down costs. (Reuters)

Original Text: Coca-Cola earnings dip 24 as sales lose fizz The Coca-Cola organisation yesterday blamed poor sales in the US and Europe, bad weather, new recycling laws and a lukewarm welcome for a new  quot;mid-calorie quot; Coke as it issued a profit warning.
Translation: Las ganancias de Coca-Cola caen un 24% ya que las ventas pierden efervescencia. La organización Coca-Cola culpó ayer a las pobres ventas en los EE.UU. y Europa, al mal tiempo, a las nuevas leyes de reciclaje y a la tibia recepción de una nueva Coca-Cola "de media caloría" al emitir una advertencia de beneficios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Coca-Cola company pointed to weak sales in the US and Europe, unfavorable weather conditions, new recycling regulations, and a poor reception for its new "mid-calorie" Coke as it announced a warning of decreased profits, reflecting a 24% earnings dip as its sales went flat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to underwhelming sales in the US and Europe, adverse weather, fresh recycling laws, and a tepid reaction to their new "mid-calorie" coke, the Coca-Cola company issued a caution about dwindling profits, alongside a 24% dip in earnings as its sales experienced a downturn.
