Original Text: Kenya Pushes for Ban on Hunting Lions (AP) AP - Kenya is pushing for an international ban on trade in lion trophies and skins, arguing that the number of the animals has declined sharply over the years as a result of hunting, loss of habitat and lack of prey.
Translation: Kenia Presiona por la Prohibición de la Caza de Leones (AP) AP - Kenia está presionando por una prohibición internacional en el comercio de trofeos y pieles de león, argumentando que el número de estos animales ha disminuido drásticamente a lo largo de los años como resultado de la caza, la pérdida de hábitat y la falta de presas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - Kenya has initiated a move for a global prohibition on the trade of lion trophies and skins, contending that the population of these animals has drastically dwindled over time because of hunting, habitat loss, and prey scarcity.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - The Kenyan government urges international sanctions on the commerce of lion trophies and skins, substantiating their plea with a significant reduction in the lion population due to hunting, habitat degradation, and a decrease in prey.

Original Text: Singer Love denies bottle attack Courtney Love pleads not guilty to assault with a deadly weapon after being accused of an attack with a bottle.
Translation: La cantante Love niega ataque con botella. Courtney Love se declara no culpable de asalto con arma mortal tras ser acusada de un ataque con una botella.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Vocalist Courtney Love rebuts bottle attack allegations, asserting not guilty to the charge of assault with a deadly weapon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Accused of a bottle attack, Courtney Love, the singer, professes her innocence against the assault with a deadly weapon charge.

Original Text: Wenger stays calm despite setback Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger refused to panic after his side were pegged back to a 1-1 draw by Panathinaikos in the Champions League.
Translation: Wenger se mantiene tranquilo a pesar del revés. El entrenador del Arsenal, Arsene Wenger, se negó a entrar en pánico después de que su equipo empatara 1-1 contra Panathinaikos en la Liga de Campeones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a disappointing 1-1 draw with Panathinaikos in the Champions League, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger remained unruffled and refused to succumb to panic.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arsenal's manager, Arsene Wenger, maintained his composure even after his team was held to a 1-1 tie by Panathinaikos in the Champions League match, indicating he's not one to panic easily.

Original Text: Two policemen killed, three injured in Kashmir rebel attack (AFP) AFP - Two policemen were killed and three injured in a Muslim rebel attack on their camp in Indian Kashmir, police said.
Translation: Dos policías muertos, tres heridos en ataque rebelde en Cachemira (AFP) AFP - Dos policías fueron asesinados y tres resultaron heridos en un ataque rebelde musulmán a su campamento en Cachemira india, informó la policía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attack by Muslim rebels on their camp in Indian Kashmir, police reported two policemen were killed, and three were injured. (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Police asserted that a Muslim rebel attack on a camp in Indian Kashmir led to the killing of two policemen and injuries to three others. (AFP)

Original Text: Kidnappers Extend Deadline on British Hostage Militants who claim to be holding Northern Irish United Nations worker Annetta Flanigan hostage in Afghanistan have extended a deadline until tonight to decide her fate.
Translation: Secuestradores Extienden Plazo sobre Rehén Británico. Los militantes que afirman tener a Annetta Flanigan, trabajadora de las Naciones Unidas de Irlanda del Norte, como rehén en Afganistán, han extendido un plazo hasta esta noche para decidir su destino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The deadline has been extended until tonight by militants allegedly holding Northern Irish United Nations employee, Annetta Flanigan, hostage in Afghanistan to determine her fate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The fate of Annetta Flanigan, a Northern Irish United Nations worker held hostage in Afghanistan, will be decided by the militants tonight, as they have extended their deadline.

Original Text: Avon Third-Quarter Profit Rises Avon Products Inc. (AVP.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Friday posted higher quarterly earnings as business in Latin America and Europe helped offset weakness in the United States for the direct seller of cosmetics.
Translation: La Ganancia del Tercer Trimestre de Avon Aumenta. Avon Products Inc. (AVP.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) el viernes reportó un aumento en las ganancias trimestrales ya que el negocio en América Latina y Europa ayudó a compensar la debilidad en los Estados Unidos para el vendedor directo de cosméticos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Avon Products Inc. (AVP.N: Quote, Profile, Research) revealed an increase in its quarterly earnings on Friday, attributed to prosperous business in Latin America and Europe which balanced out the weaker performance in the United States for the cosmetics direct seller.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Benefiting from robust business in Europe and Latin America, Avon Products Inc. (AVP.N: Quote, Profile, Research) reported a rise in its profit for the third quarter on Friday, despite the weak market in the United States for the direct cosmetics seller.

Original Text: Arnesen dismisses reports of a rift with French coach Santini Tottenham sporting director Frank Arnesen denied reports Saturday that Jacques Santini quit as manager because of a dispute over how the club was being run.
Translation: Arnesen descarta informes de un conflicto con el entrenador francés Santini. El director deportivo del Tottenham, Frank Arnesen, negó el sábado los informes que indicaban que Jacques Santini renunció como gerente debido a un conflicto sobre cómo se estaba gestionando el club.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Frank Arnesen, the sporting director of Tottenham, refuted reports on Saturday suggesting that Jacques Santini resigned as manager due to disagreements over the club's administration.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reports of a conflict with coach Jacques Santini leading to his resignation were rejected on Saturday by Frank Arnesen, the sporting director of Tottenham.

Original Text: AMR Forecast Cut by Analysts  DALLAS (Reuters) - Several Wall Street analysts cut their  forecast on earnings for American Airlines parent AMR Corp.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AMR.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AMR.N</A> on Thursday while the airline's chief executive said  high fuel prices had stung the world's largest carrier.
Translation: Recorte de la previsión de AMR por parte de analistas DALLAS (Reuters) - Varios analistas de Wall Street recortaron su pronóstico sobre las ganancias de la empresa matriz de American Airlines, AMR Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AMR.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AMR.N</A> el jueves, mientras que el director ejecutivo de la aerolínea dijo que los altos precios del combustible habían golpeado al mayor transportista del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DALLAS (Reuters) - Overriding high fuel costs has forced the Chief Executive of American Airlines parent AMR Corp. to acknowledge the impact endured by the world's top airline, as a variety of Wall Street analysts downgraded their earnings outlook on them on Thursday.

Original Text: Veritas puts finishing touches on i3 As promised, Veritas has prepped a new release of its i3 management software that will tie into existing applications and give customers sophisticated tools for checking on the performance of server and storage systems.
Translation: Como prometió, Veritas está dando los toques finales a i3. Veritas ha preparado una nueva versión de su software de gestión i3 que se integrará en las aplicaciones existentes y proporcionará a los clientes herramientas sofisticadas para verificar el rendimiento de los sistemas de servidores y almacenamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Keeping its promise, Veritas has prepared a new iteration of its i3 management software. This will integrate with current applications and provide clients with advanced tools to monitor their server and storage systems' performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Veritas has finalised a new version of its i3 management software, as pledged. This will integrate with pre-existing applications and offer users intricate mechanisms for observing the performance of their storage and server systems.

Original Text: Chip sales up 1.5 percent in October Organizations are replacing aging servers with newer more-powerful boxes, often Linux--based, and theyre also investing in storage.
Translation: Las ventas de chips aumentaron un 1.5 por ciento en octubre. Las organizaciones están reemplazando servidores antiguos con cajas más nuevas y poderosas, a menudo basadas en Linux, y también están invirtiendo en almacenamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In October, chip sales increased by 1.5 percent. This growth is associated with various organizations upgrading old servers to newer, more powerful ones, frequently choosing Linux-based systems, in addition to investing in storage enhancement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Organizations have been investing in storage and exchanging their old servers for new, higher-performance boxes, many of which are Linux-based. As a result, chip sales experienced a 1.5 percent rise in October.

Original Text: Pires inspires Arsenal #39;s fightback Robert Pires scored twice and Thierry Henry once as Arsenal hit back to beat Aston Villa 3-1 at Highbury, taking their unbeaten league run to one short of a half-century.
Translation: Pires inspira la remontada del Arsenal #39; Robert Pires anotó dos veces y Thierry Henry una vez, mientras el Arsenal luchaba para vencer a Aston Villa 3-1 en Highbury, llevando su racha de liga invicta a una menos de medio siglo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Robert Pires netted two goals and Thierry Henry added one, enabling Arsenal's 3-1 comeback over Aston Villa at Highbury, one short of extending their unbeaten streak in the league to fifty games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arsenal bounced back to defeat Aston Villa 3-1 at Highbury, with goals from Robert Pires (two) and Thierry Henry (one), inching one match away from attaining an unbeaten league run of fifty games.

Original Text: Ukraine poll marred by fraud and unrest Ukrainians vote for a new president today against a backdrop of explosions, predictions of massive ballot-rigging and fears of widespread violence.
Translation: La encuesta en Ucrania empañada por fraude y disturbios. Los ucranianos votan hoy por un nuevo presidente en medio de explosiones, predicciones de manipulación masiva de votos y temores de violencia generalizada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst an atmosphere of explosions, potential large-scale ballot tampering, and worries of extensive violence, Ukrainians are casting their votes for a new president today, leading to a poll in Ukraine that's tarnished by fraud and unrest.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Election day in Ukraine today is riddled with the sounds of explosions, the threat of significant voting fraud, and the anxiety of severe violence, as Ukrainians engage in a vote for a new president, in a poll that's been blemished by deceit and upheaval.

Original Text: Afghan Leader Faces Huge Task After Inauguration (Reuters) Reuters - Hamid Karzai will be sworn in as his\country's first elected president Tuesday, facing a huge amount\of more work to rebuild a land still traumatized by more than a\quarter century of war.
Translation: Líder Afgano Enfrenta Enorme Tarea Después de la Inauguración (Reuters) Reuters - Hamid Karzai tomará posesión el martes como el primer presidente elegido de su país, enfrentando una enorme cantidad de trabajo para reconstruir una tierra aún traumatizada por más de un cuarto de siglo de guerra.
Paraphrase 1: 1) After Inauguration, Afghan Leader Faces Immense Challenge (Reuters) - On Tuesday, Hamid Karzai will take an oath as the first elected president for his country, confronted with the monumental task of reconstructing a nation still bearing the wounds of over 25 years of war, reports Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Hamid Karzai Encounters Significant Undertaking After Becoming Afghan Leader (Reuters) - Reuters reports that Hamid Karzai will be inaugurated as the initial elected president of his country this Tuesday, staring down the colossal task of mending a nation still deeply scarred from over a quarter-century of conflict.

Original Text: Credit Suisse to integrate CSFB Swiss bank Credit Suisse is to integrate its private investment bank Credit Suisse First Boston (CSFB) with the rest of its banking business.
Translation: Credit Suisse integrará CSFB El banco suizo Credit Suisse integrará su banco de inversión privada Credit Suisse First Boston (CSFB) con el resto de su negocio bancario.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The private investment bank Credit Suisse First Boston (CSFB) is set to integrate with the rest of the banking business of its parent company, Credit Suisse.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As part of a new strategic move, Credit Suisse plans to incorporate its private investment bank, Credit Suisse First Boston (CSFB), into its overall banking operations.

Original Text: Fannie Mae Used Improper Accounting-Probe  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Fannie Mae used improper accounting  to steady its earnings from quarter to quarter, federal  regulators have told the top mortgage finance company, setting  the stage for the industry's second bookkeeping drama in less  than 18 months.
Translation: Fannie Mae utilizó contabilidad indebida, según investigación WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Fannie Mae utilizó una contabilidad inapropiada para estabilizar sus ganancias de trimestre a trimestre, dijeron los reguladores federales a la principal empresa de financiación hipotecaria, preparando el escenario para el segundo drama contable de la industria en menos de 18 meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Federal regulators have informed Fannie Mae, a leading mortgage finance company, that they had utilized incorrect accounting methods to keep their earnings consistent quarter to quarter. This sets the tone for the industry's second accounting controversy in under 18 months, reports Reuters from Washington.

Original Text: Egypt to Host Summit on Iraqi Elections (AP) AP - Iraq's government is planning a conference in late November to promote political stability and seek support for upcoming elections, but U.N. officials say they're worried about the timing and lack of a clear agenda.
Translation: Egipto será el Anfitrión de la Cumbre sobre las Elecciones en Irak (AP) AP - El gobierno de Irak está planeando una conferencia a finales de noviembre para promover la estabilidad política y buscar apoyo para las próximas elecciones, pero los funcionarios de la ONU dicen que están preocupados por el momento y la falta de una agenda clara.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - Iraq's government is gearing up for a conference in Egypt towards the end of November, where they aim to foster political stability and find backing for their imminent elections. However, the timing and absence of a well-defined agenda is causing concern among U.N. officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - A summit aimed at promoting political stability and soliciting support for the future elections is being organized by Iraq's government in Egypt this late November. Yet, U.N. officials express reservations over its schedule and the indistinct framework.

Original Text: Ceefax marks 30 years of service The BBC's teletext service, Ceefax, celebrates 30 years as tributes pour in from the worlds of news and sport.
Translation: Ceefax celebra 30 años de servicio. El servicio de teletexto de la BBC, Ceefax, celebra 30 años mientras llegan homenajes desde los mundos de las noticias y el deporte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Celebrating 30 years of operation, the BBC teletext service known as Ceefax receives accolades from the realms of news and sports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the BBC's Ceefax teletext service commemorates its 30th year, it garners praise from the spheres of news and sport.

Original Text: US troops sue over tours in Iraq A group of US soldiers take legal action to try to prevent the army extending their tours of duty in Iraq.
Translation: Las tropas de EE.UU. demandan por misiones en Irak. Un grupo de soldados estadounidenses toma acciones legales para tratar de prevenir que el ejército extienda sus misiones de servicio en Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A faction of American soldiers initiates a lawsuit to oppose the extension of their Iraq duty tours by the army.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The prolongation of their tours of duty in Iraq has led a collection of U.S. troops to pursue legal measures against the army.

Original Text: New bird flu outbreaks in Malaysia Kuala Lumpur (VNA) - Malaysia #39;s Animal Health Service on Tuesday reported that the country has discovered three more bird flu outbreaks in Kelantan State in the northeastern region.
Translation: Nuevos brotes de gripe aviar en Malasia Kuala Lumpur (VNA) - El Servicio de Salud Animal de Malasia informó el martes que el país ha descubierto tres brotes más de gripe aviar en el estado de Kelantan, en la región noreste.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Tuesday, Malaysia's Animal Health Service announced the discovery of three additional bird flu outbreaks in the northeastern region's Kelantan State.
Paraphrase 2: 2) It was reported by Malaysia's Animal Health Service on Tuesday that three new bird flu occurrences were identified in the northeastern Kelantan State.

Original Text: Iraq Injury Count Rose About 1,100 U.S. soldiers and Marines were wounded during August, by far the highest combat toll for any month since war began.
Translation: El Recuento de Heridos en Irak Aumentó Aproximadamente 1,100 soldados y marines de EE. UU. resultaron heridos durante agosto, con mucho el mayor número de bajas en combate para cualquier mes desde que comenzó la guerra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The number of wounded U.S. soldiers and Marines in Iraq increased significantly in August, marking the highest monthly combat casualty count since the war's inception with approximately 1,100 injuries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Around 1,100 U.S. Marines and soldiers got injured in Iraq during August, representing the most severe monthly combat injuries since the commencement of the war.

Original Text: Wrecked Russian School Is Opened to Public BESLAN, Russia, Sept. 5  Shafts of light passed through the bullet holes in the pupils desks, which had been stacked at windows, makeshift barricades against attack. Grisly scenes awaited behind them.
Translation: Escuela rusa destrozada abre sus puertas al público BESLAN, Rusia, 5 de Septiembre. Los rayos de luz atravesaban los agujeros de bala en los pupitres de los alumnos, que habían sido apilados en las ventanas, barricadas improvisadas contra el ataque. Escenas macabras esperaban detrás de ellas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The public is now allowed to enter the damaged Russian school in Beslan, Russia, as of September 5. The light shone through the bullet holes riddled on students' desks, which were piled up against the windows as improvised barriers during the assault. Horrid sights could be seen lurking behind them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Beslan, Russia, the devastated school has been opened for public access as of September 5. Disturbing settings loomed behind the children's desks, barricaded by windows, dotted with bullet holes through which rays of light were peeking through.

Original Text: 10 Turkish Hostages Freed in Iraq (AP) AP - Islamic insurgents released 10 Turkish hostages in Iraq, and their employer said Tuesday that his company will resume operations in the wartorn country because it was unclear whether the abductions were politically motivated or criminal.
Translation: 10 Rehenes Turcos Liberados en Irak (AP) AP - Insurgentes islámicos liberaron a 10 rehenes turcos en Irak, y su empleador dijo el martes que su empresa reanudará las operaciones en el país devastado por la guerra porque no estaba claro si los secuestros tenían motivaciones políticas o criminales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) Islamic insurgents in Iraq have set free 10 Turkish hostages, the employer announced on Tuesday, suggesting that company operations in the strife-ridden nation will recommence due to the ambiguous nature of the kidnappings - it's not clear whether they were politically driven or merely criminal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. 10 Turkish captives have been liberated in Iraq by Islamic insurgents, (AP) reports. On Tuesday, the employer stated that business activities will carry on in the beleaguered country since the motivations behind the abductions - political or criminal - remained uncertain.

Original Text: Auditors get poor grade Big four accounting firms made several major errors last year, regulator says in first report. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The nation #39;s four biggest accounting firms didn #39;t get very good grades for auditing their
Translation: Los auditores obtienen mala calificación. Las cuatro grandes firmas de contabilidad cometieron varios errores graves el año pasado, dice el regulador en su primer informe. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las cuatro firmas de contabilidad más grandes de la nación no obtuvieron muy buenas calificaciones por auditar sus
Paraphrase 1: 1. Regulators reported in the first documentation that Big four accounting firms committed numerous significant mistakes last year, resulting in auditors receiving poor assessments. According to Reuters in New York, the top four accounting companies in the nation didn't receive satisfactory auditing evaluations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Last year, the Big four accounting firms made a series of substantial blunders as mentioned in the regulator's premier report, causing auditors to score low. The nation's four leading accounting firms weren't applauded for their auditing, as reported by New York's Reuters.

Original Text: It's no easy task for Notre Dame Notre Dame of Hingham , often among the top girls' soccer programs in EMass, expected to compete for the Division 1 title this season. The Cougars didn't expect that they'd begin the season with a new coach.
Translation: No es una tarea fácil para Notre Dame de Hingham, que a menudo se encuentra entre los mejores programas de fútbol femenino en EMass, se esperaba que compitieran por el título de la División 1 esta temporada. Los Cougars no esperaban que comenzaran la temporada con un nuevo entrenador.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Cougars, one of the top girls' soccer programs in EMass, from Notre Dame Notre Dame of Hingham, didn't anticipate starting this season with a new coach, especially as they were poised to contend for the Division 1 title, which is by no means a simple feat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite being consistently one of the leading girls' soccer programs in EMass, this season was set to be particularly challenging for Notre Dame Notre Dame of Hingham, or the Cougars. On top of their expectation to vie for the Division 1 championship, an unexpected occurrence was starting out the season with a new coach in place.

Original Text: CNet gets makeover to broaden its appeal (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - CNet.com - a go-to Web site for tech product reviews - is expanding from geekville to soccer moms and dads. The shift is aimed at showing tired, wired consumers how to make high-tech gadgets work together.
Translation: CNet se renueva para ampliar su atractivo (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - CNet.com - un sitio web de referencia para las reseñas de productos tecnológicos - se está expandiendo desde geekville hasta los padres y madres aficionados al fútbol. El cambio está destinado a mostrar a los consumidores cansados ​​y conectados cómo hacer que los aparatos de alta tecnología funcionen juntos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. USATODAY.com reports that CNet.com, a website predominantly recognized for tech product reviews, is undergoing a transformation in order to broaden its audience. Moving beyond its tech-savvy focus, it aims to provide guidance to everyday consumers, such as soccer parents, on how to integrate high-tech gadgets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the objective of expanding its reach beyond technology enthusiasts to everyday consumers including soccer parents, USATODAY.com reveals CNet.com's upgrades. The modifications aim to demonstrate how consumers overwhelmed with technology can synchronize various high-tech devices.

Original Text: Cash America expands to California Fort Worth-based Cash America International Inc. (NYSE: PWN) said Monday that it bought the operations of 32 cash advance locations in Southern California.
Translation: Cash America se expande a California. La empresa con sede en Fort Worth, Cash America International Inc. (NYSE: PWN) dijo el lunes que compró las operaciones de 32 ubicaciones de avance de efectivo en el sur de California.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Fort Worth-based Cash America International Inc. (NYSE: PWN) announced on Monday that it has acquired the operations for 32 cash advance locations in Southern California, signifying its expansion into California.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The operations of 32 cash advance locations in Southern California have been purchased by Fort Worth-based Cash America International Inc. (NYSE: PWN), marking their expansion to California, as declared on Monday.

Original Text: Best Buy Posts Quarterly Profit Increase (Reuters) Reuters - Top U.S. electronics chain Best Buy\Co. Inc.  on Wednesday reported higher quarterly profit\due to expense control and higher gross margins, offsetting\sluggish sales growth.
Translation: Best Buy Publica Aumento de Ganancias Trimestrales (Reuters) Reuters - La principal cadena de electrónica de EE.UU., Best Buy Co. Inc., informó el miércoles un aumento en las ganancias trimestrales debido al control de gastos y a los márgenes brutos más altos, compensando el lento crecimiento de las ventas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - On Wednesday, Best Buy Co. Inc., the leading electronics chain in the U.S., announced an increase in their quarterly profit. This growth was mainly due to better expense management and improved gross margins, which counterbalanced the slow pace of sales growth.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - Best Buy Co. Inc., America's premier electronics chain, experienced a rise in their quarterly earnings on Wednesday. The upturn was attributed to strict expense control and higher gross margins which compensated for their slower sales expansion.

Original Text: Ulmer wins gold in pursuit cycling Sarah Ulmer of New Zealand continued her dominance of pursuit racing Sunday, breaking her own world record to win the Olympic gold medal.
Translation: Ulmer gana oro en ciclismo de persecución. Sarah Ulmer de Nueva Zelanda continuó su dominio en las carreras de persecución el domingo, rompiendo su propio récord mundial para ganar la medalla de oro olímpica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sarah Ulmer, hailing from New Zealand, once again dominated the pursuit cycling race, smashing her own world record to clinch the Olympic gold medal on Sunday.

Original Text: Six-party Nuclear Talks Likely to be Held in September The South Korean ambassador to the United States says the next round of multilateral talks aimed at resolving the North Korean nuclear impasse will likely happen in September.
Translation: Es probable que las Conversaciones Nucleares de Seis Partes se celebren en Septiembre. El embajador de Corea del Sur en los Estados Unidos dice que la próxima ronda de conversaciones multilaterales dirigidas a resolver el impasse nuclear de Corea del Norte probablemente ocurrirá en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The South Korean ambassador to the United States has unveiled that the forthcoming round of six-party talks with the focus on the North Korean nuclear issue are anticipated to take place in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to the South Korean ambassador to the United States, it is expected that the North Korean nuclear issue will be the focus of the next six-party talks, likely to occur in September.

Original Text: Bonds collects 12th Silver Slugger award Louisville, KY (Sports Network) - San Francisco leftfielder Barry Bonds won his record setting 12th Silver Slugger award on Tuesday.
Translation: Bonds recoge su 12º premio Silver Slugger en Louisville, KY (Sports Network) - El jardinero izquierdo de San Francisco, Barry Bonds, ganó su récord de 12º premio Silver Slugger el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Barry Bonds, the leftfielder from San Francisco, bagged his record-breaking 12th Silver Slugger award. (Sports Network, Louisville, KY)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Breaking records, San Francisco's leftfielder Barry Bonds secured his 12th Silver Slugger award on Tuesday. (Sports Network, Louisville, KY)

Original Text: Swap offer for pirated Windows XP Microsoft is starting a scheme to replace pirate versions of Windows XP with legal ones.
Translation: Oferta de intercambio para Windows XP pirata: Microsoft está iniciando un programa para reemplazar las versiones piratas de Windows XP por unas legales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft is initiating a plan to exchange illicit copies of Windows XP for legitimate ones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft is commencing a program to swap counterfeit Windows XP versions with sanctioned ones.

Original Text: Network Physics adds to management line Network Physics has introduced a new distributed architecture for its network management and performance line aimed at helping enterprises ensure the integrity and security of the entire applications infrastructure.
Translation: Network Physics agrega a la línea de gestión. Network Physics ha presentado una nueva arquitectura distribuida para su línea de gestión de redes y rendimiento, destinada a ayudar a las empresas a garantizar la integridad y seguridad de toda la infraestructura de aplicaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Network Physics has rolled out a new distributed architecture for its network management and performance line, designed to aid enterprises in safeguarding the entirety of their applications infrastructure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new distributed architecture for its network management and performance line has been launched by Network Physics, to aid enterprises in maintaining the security and integrity of the whole applications infrastructure.

Original Text: IronPort updates e-mail security appliances E-mail security systems vendor IronPort Systems Inc. is releasing new versions of its C-Series line of Email Security Appliances, with features that make it easier for administrators to predict new virus outbreaks and manage e-mail security across corporate networks, the company said Monday.
Translation: IronPort actualiza los dispositivos de seguridad de correo electrónico. El proveedor de sistemas de seguridad de correo electrónico, IronPort Systems Inc., está lanzando nuevas versiones de su línea C-Series de Dispositivos de Seguridad de Correo Electrónico, con características que facilitan a los administradores predecir nuevos brotes de virus y gestionar la seguridad del correo electrónico a través de redes corporativas, dijo la compañía el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IronPort Systems Inc., a provider of email security solutions, announced on Monday the launch of their updated C-Series Email Security Appliances. These new versions offer features that simplify the process for administrators to anticipate new virus infections and coordinate email safety throughout corporate networks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, IronPort Systems Inc., an enterprise specializing in email security systems, introduced upgraded versions of its C-Series line of Email Security Appliances. These are equipped with features that assist administrators in predicting forthcoming virus attacks and administering email protection across company networks.

Original Text: Microsoft, Intel Spread Digital Joy Microsoft and Intel are joining forces to conquer US living rooms and make further inroads into the coveted consumer electronics space.
Translation: Microsoft, Intel difunden la alegría digital. Microsoft e Intel están uniendo fuerzas para conquistar las salas de estar de EE. UU. y hacer más incursiones en el codiciado espacio de la electrónica de consumo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft and Intel are collaborating to dominate the consumer electronics sector in US households, making further advancements into this much-desired market.

Original Text: UN Council Votes Ivory Coast Arms Embargo  UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - The U.N. Security Council on  Monday imposed an immediate arms embargo on Ivory Coast and  voted to punish key government and rebel leaders with  additional sanctions next month.
Translation: El Consejo de la ONU vota un embargo de armas a Costa de Marfil NACIONES UNIDAS (Reuters) - El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU impuso el lunes un embargo de armas inmediato a Costa de Marfil y votó para castigar a los líderes clave del gobierno y a los rebeldes con sanciones adicionales el próximo mes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The U.N. Security Council has implemented an immediate arms embargo on Ivory Coast on Monday, with plans to impose further sanctions on key government and rebel leaders next month, as per reports from UNITED NATIONS (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. An immediate arms embargo has been imposed on Ivory Coast by the U.N. Security Council on Monday, with commitments made to enforce additional punishment on significant government and rebel leaders in the following month, according to UNITED NATIONS (Reuters).

Original Text: Yankees back for more Bernie Williams looked out from the on-deck circle at the place he has called home longer than any other of the Yankees. It was the last of the ninth, tie score and the division
Translation: Los Yankees regresan por más. Bernie Williams observaba desde el círculo de espera el lugar que ha llamado hogar más tiempo que cualquier otro de los Yankees. Era el final de la novena entrada, el marcador estaba empatado y estaba en juego la división.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bernie Williams, the longest-serving Yankee who considers his home to be the on-deck circle, looked out as the ninth inning came to an end with a tied score in the division, ready for more action.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the final inning with a tie score in the division, Bernie Williams stood at the on-deck circle - a place he's identified as home more than any other Yankee - eager to make a comeback.

Original Text: Henman crashes out to Novak Tim Henman was defeated in the quarter-finals of the Swiss Indoors in Basle last night by the Czech, Jiri Novak. The British No 1 must now pick up ranking points at the Paris Masters to ensure qualification
Translation: Henman se estrella contra Novak. Tim Henman fue derrotado anoche en los cuartos de final del Swiss Indoors en Basilea por el checo, Jiri Novak. El número 1 británico debe ahora recoger puntos de clasificación en el Paris Masters para asegurar la calificación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last night, at the Swiss Indoors in Basle's quarter-finals, Tim Henman, the British No 1, was beaten by the Czech player, Jiri Novak. In order to guarantee qualification, he is now compelled to gather ranking points at the Paris Masters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jiri Novak from Czech Republic defeated British No. 1 Tim Henman last night during the Swiss Indoors quarter-finals in Basle. Now, Henman is obligated to secure ranking points at the Paris Masters to affirm his qualification.

Original Text: NHL Draft Will Wait on New Contract (AP) AP - There won't be an NHL entry draft before a collective bargaining agreement is reached with the players' association, the director of the league's scouting department said.
Translation: El Draft de la NHL Esperará un Nuevo Contrato (AP) AP - No habrá un sorteo de entrada en la NHL hasta que se alcance un acuerdo de negociación colectiva con la asociación de jugadores, dijo el director del departamento de ojeo de la liga.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The director of the NHL's scouting department declared that the NHL entry draft will be postponed until a collective bargaining agreement is achieved with the players' association. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the director of the NHL's scouting department, the upcoming NHL entry draft will not proceed until a consensus on a collective bargaining agreement is made with the players' association. (AP)

Original Text: NEC launches worlds fastest supercomputer TOKYO, Japan -- Japanese electronics giant NEC Corp., said it has begun selling the worlds fastest supercomputer. NEC claimed its SX-8 is the most powerful vector-type supercomputer, with a sustainable
Translation: NEC lanza la supercomputadora más rápida del mundo TOKIO, Japón - El gigante japonés de la electrónica, NEC Corp., dijo que ha comenzado a vender la supercomputadora más rápida del mundo. NEC afirmó que su SX-8 es la supercomputadora vectorial más potente, con una sostenibilidad
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO, Japan -- NEC Corp., a leading Japanese electronics firm, announced the introduction of the world's fastest supercomputer. It's claimed that their SX-8 model is the most superior vector-type supercomputer capable of sustainable performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Tokyo, Japan, electronics powerhouse NEC Corp., unveils the most powerful and fastest supercomputer in the world. Touted to possess unmatched sustainable performance, their vector-type supercomputer, the SX-8, is now available for purchase.

Original Text: Sun Services CTO talks up Next Generation Data Center (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Hal Stern holds the titles at Sun Microsystems of vice president, Distinguished Engineer, and CTO for Sun Services. He also has co-authored technical books on networking and high-availability techniques and, prior to joining Sun, developed molecular modeling software. InfoWorld Editor at Large Paul Krill met with Stern to discuss Sun #8217;s  #8220;Next Generation Data Center #8221; concept and to talk about subjects such as security, utility computing, and how the company stacks up its services efforts against IBM Global Services.
Translation: El CTO de Sun Services habla sobre el Centro de Datos de Próxima Generación (InfoWorld) InfoWorld: Hal Stern ostenta los títulos en Sun Microsystems de vicepresidente, Ingeniero distinguido, y CTO para Sun Services. También ha coescrito libros técnicos sobre redes y técnicas de alta disponibilidad y, antes de unirse a Sun, desarrolló software de modelado molecular. El editor en jefe de InfoWorld, Paul Krill, se reunió con Stern para discutir el concepto de "Centro de Datos de Próxima Generación" de Sun y hablar sobre temas como la seguridad, la informática de utilidad y cómo la empresa está ejerciendo sus esfuerzos de servicios contra IBM Global Services.
Paraphrase 1: 1. InfoWorld: An Interview with Sun Services CTO on the Future of Data Center
Paraphrase 2: Hal Stern plays multiple significant roles at Sun Microsystems, serving as the vice president, Distinguished Engineer, and CTO for Sun Services. He's distinguished himself further by co-authoring authoritative technical texts on networking and high-availability strategies, and his contributions extend back to his pre-Sun days, where he developed software for molecular modeling. Paul Krill, InfoWorld's Editor at Large, recently sat down with Stern to delve into Sun's "Next Generation Data Center" concept and to engage in a conversation about security, utility computing, and Sun's competitive stance against IBM Global Services.

Original Text: Tennis: Nalbandian, Massu and Henman advance Second seed Tim Henman put a magnesium deficiency behind him to move comfortably into the second round of the Swiss Indoors tournament in Basel on Wednesday.
Translation: Tenis: Nalbandian, Massu y Henman avanzan. El segundo cabeza de serie, Tim Henman, dejó atrás una deficiencia de magnesio para avanzar cómodamente a la segunda ronda del torneo Swiss Indoors en Basilea el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Swiss Indoors tournament in Basel on Wednesday, the second seed, Tim Henman overcame his magnesium deficiency and managed to advance comfortably into the second round along with Nalbandian and Massu in the game of Tennis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Tennis sphere, Tim Henman who is the second seed left behind his magnesium deficiency to successfully proceed to the second round of the Swiss Indoors competition in Basel this Wednesday. This advancement was also enjoyed by Nalbandian and Massu.

Original Text: Zarqawi's militant group declares loyalty to bin Laden BAGHDAD -- Tawhid and Jihad, Iraq's most feared militant group led by terror mastermind Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, declared its allegiance to Osama bin Laden yesterday, saying it had agreed with Al Qaeda over strategy and the need for unity against ''the enemies of Islam. quot;
Translation: El grupo militante de Zarqawi declara lealtad a bin Laden BAGDAD -- Tawhid y Jihad, el grupo militante más temido de Irak liderado por el cerebro del terror Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, declaró su lealtad a Osama bin Laden ayer, diciendo que había acordado con Al Qaeda sobre la estrategia y la necesidad de unidad contra "los enemigos del Islam."
Paraphrase 1: 1. The militant group Tawhid and Jihad, reputed as the most terrifying in Iraq under the leadership of notorious terrorist Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, announced yesterday its pledge of loyalty to Osama bin Laden. It stated having a concurrence with Al Qaeda regarding strategy and the necessity of solidarity against "Islam's adversaries."
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, Iraq's notorious militant group Tawhid and Jihad, guided by the infamous terrorist Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, swore allegiance to Osama bin Laden. They expressed their agreement with Al Qaeda's strategies and emphasized the need for unity in battling the opponents of Islam.

Original Text: Mexican firm 'eyes \$4bn RMC bid' Mexican group Cemex is reportedly set to make a \$4bn takeover bid for RMC, the UK firm that is the world's biggest supplier of ready-mixed concrete.
Translation: La empresa mexicana 'considera una oferta de \$4bn por RMC' Se informa que el grupo mexicano Cemex está listo para hacer una oferta de adquisición de \$4bn por RMC, la empresa británica que es el mayor proveedor mundial de hormigón premezclado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Mexican company Cemex is purportedly preparing to launch a $4bn acquisition bid for RMC, the leading global supplier of ready-mix concrete, based in the UK.

Original Text: UK Terror Suspects Were Building Dirty Bomb - Time  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - British terror suspects arrested in  August were trying to construct a dirty bomb and planned to  attack targets in London, including the Heathrow Express  airport rail line, Time magazine reported.
Translation: Sospechosos de Terrorismo en Reino Unido Estaban Construyendo una Bomba Sucia - Time  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Los sospechosos de terrorismo británicos arrestados en agosto estaban intentando construir una bomba sucia y planeaban atacar objetivos en Londres, incluyendo la línea ferroviaria del aeropuerto Heathrow Express, informó la revista Time.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a report by Time Magazine, the terror suspects from the UK, who were apprehended in August, were plotting to create a dirty bomb for an attack, with particular targets in London including the Heathrow Express airport rail line.

Original Text: ECB, Bank of England Leave Key Rates Alone (AP) AP - The European Central Bank left its key refinancing rate unchanged at 2 percent Thursday amid signs that the recovery in the 12-nation euro zone may be sputtering.
Translation: El BCE, el Banco de Inglaterra Dejan las Tasas Clave Sin Cambios (AP) AP - El Banco Central Europeo mantuvo su tasa de refinanciación clave sin cambios en el 2 por ciento el jueves entre indicios de que la recuperación en la zona euro de 12 naciones podría estar fallando.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid indications that the recovery within the euro zone's 12 nations might be faltering, the European Central Bank (ECB) chose to leave its essential refinancing rate at 2 percent on Thursday, according to AP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The AP reported that the ECB left its crucial refinancing rate steady at 2 percent on Thursday, suggesting potential instability in the economic recovery of the Eurozone's 12 countries.

Original Text: Tigers Beat Razorbacks Marcus Randall runs for two touchdowns and throws two more to Joseph Addai, leading No. 14 LSU to a 43-14 victory over Arkansas on Friday afternoon.
Translation: Los Tigres vencen a los Razorbacks Marcus Randall corre para dos touchdowns y lanza dos más a Joseph Addai, llevando a LSU, número 14, a una victoria de 43-14 sobre Arkansas el viernes por la tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Leading LSU to a 43-14 triumph over Arkansas on Friday afternoon, Marcus Randall, on behalf of the Tigers, runs for two touchdowns and passes two more to Joseph Addai, outpacing the Razorbacks.

Original Text: Wages rise more than expected Wages rose faster than expected in the June-August period but analysts say the increases are still not high enough to cause inflation worries at the Bank of England.
Translation: Los salarios suben más de lo esperado. Los salarios aumentaron más rápido de lo esperado en el período de junio a agosto, pero los analistas dicen que los incrementos todavía no son lo suficientemente altos como para causar preocupaciones de inflación en el Banco de Inglaterra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts suggest that the wage increases during the June-August period, which rose faster than expected, are still not significant enough to cause concerns about inflation at the Bank of England.

Original Text: Ten killed in fresh Assam attack Ten people die in a shooting in a market in Assam, following a weekend of violence in India's north-east.
Translation: Diez muertos en un nuevo ataque en Assam. Diez personas mueren en un tiroteo en un mercado en Assam, tras un fin de semana de violencia en el noreste de India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ten individuals have lost their lives in a new attack in Assam, which took place in a market subsequent to a violent weekend witnessed in North-east India.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After a turbulent weekend in North-east India, a renewed attack in a market in Assam results in the death of ten people.

Original Text: Flaw found in older Office versions Microsoft blasts revelation of vulnerability in Word application.
Translation: Se encontró un defecto en versiones antiguas de Office. Microsoft critica la revelación de vulnerabilidad en la aplicación Word.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft criticizes the exposure of a flaw discovered in outdated Office versions, specifically in the Word application.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft strongly condemns the disclosure of a vulnerability detected in Word, affecting older versions of Office.

Original Text: Davidoff Swiss Indoors, Basel British number one Tim Henman is ready to seek revenge over Jiri Novak of the Czech Republic at the Davidoff Swiss Indoors event in Basel, having lost their last encounter in the first round of the Olympics in Athens.
Translation: En el Davidoff Swiss Indoors de Basilea, el número uno británico Tim Henman está listo para buscar venganza contra Jiri Novak de la República Checa, habiendo perdido su último encuentro en la primera ronda de los Juegos Olímpicos en Atenas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tim Henman, the British number one, is fully prepared to retaliate against Jiri Novak from the Czech Republic during the Davidoff Swiss Indoors event in Basel. He is seeking redemption after a prior defeat by Novak in the first round of the Athens Olympics.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Davidoff Swiss Indoors event in Basel, Tim Henman, Britain's top player, is geared up to avenge his last defeat from Jiri Novak of the Czech Republic, which happened during the first round of the Olympics in Athens.

Original Text: D.C. United Wins Fourth MLS Cup (AP) AP - D.C. United won an unprecedented fourth MLS Cup on Sunday, beating Kansas City 3-2.
Translation: D.C. United Gana Cuarta Copa MLS (AP) AP - D.C. United ganó una cuarta Copa MLS sin precedentes el domingo, venciendo a Kansas City 3-2.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) Achieving an unrivalled victory, D.C. United beat Kansas City 3-2, clinching their fourth MLS Cup on Sunday.

Original Text: I.B.M. Prepares Substitution for Pensions of New Hires I.B.M. is planning to close its employee pension plan to new employees at the end of the year and give all new workers a 401(k) plan instead.
Translation: I.B.M. Prepara Sustitución de Pensiones para Nuevos Contratados. I.B.M. planea cerrar su plan de pensiones para nuevos empleados a fin de año y dar a todos los nuevos trabajadores un plan 401(k) en su lugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I.B.M. is devising a plan to replace the conventional pension for new employees with a 401(k) plan by the end of the year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By the year-end, I.B.M. plans to halt its existing pension plan for new hires, replacing it with a 401(k) plan instead.

Original Text: Time Warner to settle securities fraud charges  Time Warner Inc. agreed yesterday to pay \$210 million to settle criminal securities fraud charges brought by the Justice Department against the company's America Online unit. The media giant also is prepared to pay \$300 million to end another probe by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Translation: Time Warner llega a un acuerdo para resolver los cargos de fraude de valores. Time Warner Inc. acordó ayer pagar $210 millones para resolver los cargos criminales de fraude de valores presentados por el Departamento de Justicia contra la unidad America Online de la compañía. El gigante de los medios también está dispuesto a pagar $300 millones para finalizar otra investigación de la Comisión de Valores y Bolsa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, Time Warner Inc. accepted to settle security fraud charges imposed by the Justice Department by agreeing to pay $210 million. This is linked to their America Online unit. Furthermore, the media powerhouse is also willing to part with $300 million to put a stop to another investigation by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Justice Department's criminal securities fraud charges against America Online, a unit of Time Warner Inc., will be settled by a payment of $210 million, which the company agreed to yesterday. Additionally, Time Warner Inc. has signified its readiness to resolve another Securities and Exchange Commission probe by paying $300 million.

Original Text: Internet Turns 35, Still Work in Progress Thirty-five years after computer scientists at UCLA linked two bulky computers using a 15-foot gray cable, testing a new way for exchanging data over networks, what would ultimately become the Internet remains a work in progress.
Translation: Internet Cumple 35 Años, Aún en Desarrollo. Treinta y cinco años después de que los científicos informáticos de UCLA conectaron dos computadoras voluminosas usando un cable gris de 15 pies, probando una nueva forma de intercambiar datos a través de redes, lo que finalmente se convertiría en Internet sigue siendo un trabajo en progreso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Even after 35 years since the initial test of data exchange over networks by computer scientists at UCLA - involving a 15-foot gray cable linking two cumbersome computers - the Internet, which this experiment ultimately led to, continues to be a work in progress.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Internet, which was birthed 35 years ago when computer scientists at UCLA endeavoured to exchange data between two bulky computers using a 15-foot gray cable, is still evolving and progressing today.

Original Text: Oracle gets Europe's approval to buy PeopleSoft (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - The European Commission on Tuesday cleared Oracle's hostile  #36;7.7 billion bid for rival business-software maker PeopleSoft, lowering the last antitrust hurdle to the contested deal. "There is an absence of sufficient evidence of competitive harm," regulators said in a statement.
Translation: Oracle recibe la aprobación de Europa para comprar PeopleSoft (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - La Comisión Europea dio luz verde el martes a la oferta hostil de Oracle de 7.7 mil millones de dólares para adquirir a su rival fabricante de software empresarial, PeopleSoft, eliminando el último obstáculo antimonopolio para el acuerdo impugnado. "No hay suficiente evidencia de daño competitivo", dijeron los reguladores en un comunicado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European Commission gave its approval for Oracle's hostile $7.7 billion bid on PeopleSoft, saying there is no sufficient evidence of competitive harm. This action dismantles the final anti-trust barrier against the proposed acquisition, according to USATODAY.com.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oracle's buyout bid for PeopleSoft, valued at $7.7 billion, received the green light from European regulators amidst critiques of competitive harm, reports USATODAY.com. The clearance by the European Commission removes the final anti-trust obstacle for the contentious deal.

Original Text: Russo on Football: No. 1 USC shows its flaws The inexperienced receivers had a tough time getting open. The retooled offensive line had some trouble protecting the star quarterback.
Translation: Russo en Fútbol: No. 1 USC muestra sus fallas. Los receptores inexpertos tuvieron dificultades para abrirse. La línea ofensiva reestructurada tuvo algunos problemas para proteger al mariscal de campo estrella.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In "Russo on Football", flaws of the No. 1 USC became apparent as the inexperienced receivers battled to break free and the reconfigured offensive line found difficulty in safeguarding their star quarterback.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Russo's segment on Football exposed USC's imperfections. The amateur receivers struggled to find openings while the revamped offensive line had challenges shielding their praised quarterback.

Original Text: Sanneh: A vital Crew member Despite a complicated injury to his back and pelvis that kept him out of action for most of the 2003-2004 campaign, the US National Team defender played well during the final two months of the season for FC Nurnberg and helped his club earn a promotion to
Translation: Sanneh: Un miembro vital de la tripulación A pesar de una complicada lesión en su espalda y pelvis que le mantuvo fuera de acción durante la mayor parte de la campaña 2003-2004, el defensor del equipo nacional de Estados Unidos jugó bien durante los últimos dos meses de la temporada para FC Nurnberg y ayudó a su club a conseguir una promoción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a major injury to his back and pelvis sidelining him for the majority of the 2003-2004 season, Sanneh, a valuable player of the Crew, exhibited outstanding performance in the last two months of the season for FC Nurnberg. His efforts contributed significantly to his club's promotion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though an intricate back and pelvis injury prevented the critical Crew member, Sanneh, from participating in most of the 2003-2004 season, the US National Team defender demonstrated commendable performance in the concluding two months of the season with FC Nurnberg, aiding his club in securing a promotion.

Original Text: Giants: Warner set in his ways At the end of training camp, when Giants coach Tom Coughlin named Kurt Warner the starting quarterback, he credited the open competition at the position for helping the progress of Warner and No.
Translation: Gigantes: Warner está en sus modos Al final del campo de entrenamiento, cuando el entrenador de los Gigantes, Tom Coughlin, nombró a Kurt Warner como el mariscal de campo titular, atribuyó la competencia abierta en la posición por ayudar al progreso de Warner y al número.
Paraphrase 1: 1. By the conclusion of training camp, Giants coach Tom Coughlin assigned Kurt Warner as the leading quarterback citing that the open competition in that area aided in the progress of Warner and his successor. This action showed Warner's set ways within the Giants.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following the end of training camp, Tom Coughlin, the Giants coach, recognized Kurt Warner as the primary quarterback; praising the unrestricted competition at the position for its contribution towards the development of Warner and his number. This demonstrated Warner's determination and consistency, firmly set within his role for the Giants.

Original Text: Colgate Warns, Shares Hit 4-Year Low  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Colgate-Palmolive Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CL.N</A> on Monday  issued its first formal profit warning in almost a decade,  saying earnings will fall well short of Wall Street forecasts  due to higher marketing spending, sending its shares down 11  percent to a four-year low.
Translation: Colgate advierte, las acciones caen a mínimo de 4 años. CHICAGO (Reuters) - Colgate-Palmolive Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CL.N</A> el lunes emitió su primer aviso formal de ganancias en casi una década, diciendo que las ganancias estarán muy por debajo de las predicciones de Wall Street debido a un mayor gasto en marketing, lo que provocó que sus acciones cayeran un 11 por ciento a un mínimo de cuatro años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Chicago (Reuters) - Colgate-Palmolive Co. issued its inaugural profit warning in nearly ten years on Monday. This was due to an increase in marketing expenditure leading to earnings falling significantly below Wall Street predictions. As a result, its shares dropped 11 percent, reaching a four-year low.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Chicago (Reuters) - As a result of augmented marketing expenses that led to earnings falling far beneath Wall Street's predictions, Colgate-Palmolive Co.'s shares plummeted 11%, hitting a four-year low on Monday. This marked the company's first formal profit warning in close to a decade.

Original Text: MLB: Boston 9, Anaheim 3 The Boston Red Sox erupted for seven runs in the fourth Tuesday and posted a 9-3 win over the Anaheim Angels in Game 1 of their AL Division Series.
Translation: MLB: Boston 9, Anaheim 3 Los Boston Red Sox estallaron con siete carreras en la cuarta entrada el martes y lograron una victoria de 9-3 sobre los Angeles de Anaheim en el Juego 1 de su Serie Divisional de la Liga Americana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Exploding with seven runs in the fourth on Tuesday, the Boston Red Sox triumphed 9-3 over the Anaheim Angels in the first game of their AL Division Series.

Original Text: Off to a strong start Before lineup introductions, NC State men #39;s basketball coach Herb Sendek pulls each one of his starters aside and offers a word.
Translation: Comenzando fuertemente. Antes de las presentaciones del equipo, Herb Sendek, entrenador del equipo masculino de baloncesto de NC State, aparta a cada uno de sus jugadores titulares y ofrece una palabra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prior to the introduction of the lineup, Herb Sendek, the coach of NC State men's basketball team, makes it a point to have a brief conversation with each of his starting players, ensuring a strong start.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To ensure a strong start, every one of the starters on the NC State men's basketball team gets a moment alone with coach Herb Sendek for a quick pep talk prior the player introductions.

Original Text: When Beethoven plays, it #39;s time to take note of the BIOS Whether I #39;m on the Internet or not, there is a noise that comes out of my computer like a cat crying. That #39;s not a cat. It #39;s supposed to be Beethoven.
Translation: Cuando Beethoven toca, es hora de tomar nota de la BIOS. Ya esté en Internet o no, hay un ruido que sale de mi computadora como un gato llorando. Eso no es un gato. Se supone que es Beethoven.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Whether I'm online or offline, a sound akin to a cat's cry emanates from my computer. However, it isn't a feline - it's Beethoven's music. One should pay careful attention to the BIOS when this music plays.
Paraphrase 2: 2. My computer emits a sound similar to a wailing cat, irrespective of my internet connectivity status, but it's really Beethoven playing. Consequently, the BIOS demands consideration when Beethoven's music begins.

Original Text: Federal Court to Hear Microsoft Appeal of Internet Explorer Case Software giant contesting order to pay \$521 million in patent infringement verdict.
Translation: Tribunal Federal escuchará apelación de Microsoft del caso de Internet Explorer. Gigante de software impugna orden de pagar $521 millones en veredicto por infringir patente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Federal Court is set to review Microsoft's appeal against the Internet Explorer case, where the software behemoth is challenging an order to pay $521 million for a patent infringement verdict.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Scheduled to review Microsoft's appeal of the Internet Explorer case, the Federal Court braces as the software titan fights against the order to compensate $521 million due to a patent infringement verdict.

Original Text: Microsoft profit up 11 percent Microsoft made almost \$3 billion in profit in the past quarter, but it was Google that captured investors #39; fancy yesterday. The current and former Wall Street darlings reported their earnings after the stock
Translation: Los beneficios de Microsoft aumentan un 11 por ciento. Microsoft ha obtenido casi 3 mil millones de dólares de beneficio en el último trimestre, pero fue Google quien capturó la atención de los inversores ayer. Las actuales y anteriores estrellas de Wall Street informaron de sus ganancias después del cierre de la bolsa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Notwithstanding Microsoft's impressive 11 percent profit increase totaling nearly $3 billion this past quarter, it was Google that stole the limelight from investors yesterday. Both the current and the erstwhile favorites of Wall Street shared their earnings following the stock market close.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Microsoft's profit rising by 11 percent resulting in almost $3 billion this recent quarter, investors were more taken by Google yesterday. These companies, both past and present Wall Street idols, unveiled their earnings after stock trading concluded.

Original Text: Turkey is warned of more attacks ISTANBUL -- A suspected leader of a cell accused in deadly suicide attacks in Turkey boasted yesterday that he was an ''Al Qaeda warrior quot; and warned in court of future attacks if Turkey continues to support the United States.
Translation: Se advierte a Turquía de más ataques ESTAMBUL -- Un presunto líder de una célula acusada de mortíferos ataques suicidas en Turquía se jactó ayer de ser un ''guerrero de Al Qaeda'' y advirtió en el tribunal de futuros ataques si Turquía continúa apoyando a los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ISTANBUL -- A person speculated to be the head of an alleged cell involved in lethal suicide strikes in Turkey, proudly professed in court yesterday that he was an "Al Qaeda warrior" and cautioned that more assaults would follow if Turkey persisted in supporting the United States.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In court yesterday, a presumed leader of a cell blamed for fatal suicide attacks in Turkey, proudly declared himself an "Al Qaeda warrior", cautioning Turkey that if its support for the United States continues, more attacks are imminent. ISTANBUL.

Original Text: Nationals Sign Cordero The Washington-bound team also agreed to terms with outfielder Jeffrey Hammonds on a minor league contract and selected outfielder Tyrell Godwin and third baseman Tony Blano in the Rule 5 draft.
Translation: Los Nacionales Firman a Cordero. El equipo con destino a Washington también acordó términos con el jardinero Jeffrey Hammonds en un contrato de ligas menores y seleccionó al jardinero Tyrell Godwin y al tercera base Tony Blano en el draft de la Regla 5.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Nationals have secured Cordero, and in addition to this, have agreed on a minor league contract with outfielder Jeffrey Hammonds. Moreover, they have also chosen Tony Blano as their third baseman and outfielder Tyrell Godwin in the Rule 5 draft.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Washington's team - the Nationals, inked a deal with Cordero while also finalizing a minor league contract with outfielder Jeffrey Hammonds. Alongside, the Rule 5 draft saw them picking Tony Blano as a third baseman and Tyrell Godwin as an outfielder.

Original Text: Italy upsets Americans in semifinals US women #39;s water polo coach Guy Baker was seething so much about an unusual call that he could barely speak. His world champion squad was too  quot;crushed quot; to explain what happened.
Translation: Italy sorprende a los estadounidenses en las semifinales. Guy Baker, el entrenador del equipo femenino de waterpolo de EE.UU, estaba tan furioso por una decisión inusual que apenas podía hablar. Su equipo, campeón mundial, estaba demasiado "devastado" para explicar lo que ocurrió.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Guy Baker, US women's water polo team coach, was extremely enraged about an unexpected call during the semifinals against Italy, and barely managed to speak. The overwhelming defeat left his world champion team too devastated to recount the event.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the semifinals, an unexpected ruling greatly irritated Guy Baker, the coach of the US women's water polo team, leaving him almost speechless. Unable to recount the incident, his world champion team was left utterly disheartened after their shocking defeat to Italy.

Original Text: Larry Donald Pounds out a Decision Win over Holyfield 13.11.04 - By Rev. Marc Axelrod: The Real Deal needs to pack it in. Larry beat Evander all over the ring tonight. Evander looked every one of his 42 years, as he was outfought and outsped all night long.
Translation: Larry Donald consigue una victoria por decisión sobre Holyfield 13.11.04 - Por el Rev. Marc Axelrod: The Real Deal necesita retirarse. Larry golpeó a Evander por todo el ring esta noche. Evander pareció cada uno de sus 42 años, ya que fue superado en lucha y velocidad toda la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rev. Marc Axelrod penned a critique on November 13, 2004: Holyfield, aptly named 'The Real Deal', should consider retirement after Larry Donald dealt him a comprehensive defeat. In an emphatic display of superiority, Larry outfought and outpaced Evander across the ring throughout the contest. Pushing 42, Holyfield conspicuously felt his years, unable to match his opponent's vigor and speed for the entire duration of the fight.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On 13th November 2004, Reverend Marc Axelrod asserted that Holyfield, known as 'The Real Deal', ought to retire following a resounding defeat by Larry Donald. Larry dominated the fight, moving and battling faster than Evander, who at 42, seemed to have lost his edge. The bout showed Holyfield appearing every bit of his age, being predictably slower and less resilient than Larry.

Original Text: Friends and curious turn out for goodbye to alleged Montreal Mob boss (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - MONTREAL (CP) - At least 200 people paid their final respects Saturday to Frank Cotroni, the reputed head of the Montreal Mafia who died of cancer at the age of 72.
Translation: Amigos y curiosos se presentan para despedir al supuesto jefe de la Mafia de Montreal (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - MONTREAL (CP) - Al menos 200 personas rindieron su último homenaje el sábado a Frank Cotroni, el supuesto líder de la Mafia de Montreal que murió de cáncer a la edad de 72 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday, at least 200 individuals bid farewell to Frank Cotroni, an alleged boss of the Montreal Mafia who succumbed to cancer at 72, reported by Canadian Press.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Frank Cotroni, the man believed to be the head of Montreal's Mafia, received final salutations from over 200 people this Saturday, following his demise due to cancer at 72, as per a Canadian Press report.

Original Text: Jurors Begin 2nd Phase Of Enron-Merrill Lynch Trial Houston -- Jurors returned to a Houston federal court Thursday to begin the second phase of the Enron-Merrill Lynch fraud and conspiracy trial.
Translation: Los Jurados Inician la 2da Fase del Juicio Enron-Merrill Lynch Houston -- Los jurados regresaron a una corte federal de Houston el jueves para comenzar la segunda fase del juicio por fraude y conspiración de Enron-Merrill Lynch.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thursday saw jurors return to the federal court in Houston, kicking off the second phase of the fraud and conspiracy trial involving Enron and Merrill Lynch.

Original Text: Memos: Bush Refused Order While in Guard WASHINGTON - Addressing questions that have lingered for years, newly unearthed memos state that George W. Bush failed to meet standards of the Texas Air National Guard during the Vietnam war, that he refused a direct order and that his superiors were in a state of turmoil over how to evaluate his performance after he was suspended from flying...
Translation: Memos: Bush se negó a acatar órdenes mientras estaba en la Guardia. WASHINGTON - Abordando preguntas que han persistido durante años, los memorandos recién descubiertos indican que George W. Bush no cumplió con los estándares de la Guardia Aérea Nacional de Texas durante la guerra de Vietnam, que se negó a una orden directa y que sus superiores estaban en un estado de conmoción sobre cómo evaluar su rendimiento después de que fue suspendido de volar...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Uncovered memos address long-standing questions and suggest that George W. Bush did not meet the Texas Air National Guard's standards during the Vietnam war. The documents indicate that he declined a direct order and that after he was suspended from flying, his superiors faced difficulty in assessing his performance...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Recent revelations from newly discovered memos suggest that during the Vietnam war, George W. Bush did not adhere to the Texas Air National Guard's expectations, even disobeying a direct order. These documents indicate that his suspension from flying caused great upheaval among his superiors who struggled to rate his performance...

Original Text: PalmSource Embraces Linux Palm OS merchant PalmSource is buying mobile phone ISV China MobileSoft (CMS) in a \$22.6 million stock deal to tap into the huge Chinese market and the growing popularity of Linux.
Translation: PalmSource Adopta Linux. El comerciante de Palm OS, PalmSource, está comprando al ISV de teléfonos móviles China MobileSoft (CMS) en un acuerdo de acciones de $22.6 millones para acceder al enorme mercado chino y la creciente popularidad de Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PalmSource, the Palm OS merchant, plans to acquire mobile phone ISV China MobileSoft (CMS) for $22.6 million in a stock deal. This move allows PalmSource to infiltrate the enormous Chinese market and leverage the rising prominence of Linux.

Original Text: Former Twins Scout Angelo Giuliani Dies (AP) AP - Angelo Giuliani, who was behind the plate for Joe DiMaggio's first at-bat in the majors and went on to sign Kent Hrbek as a Minnesota Twins scout, died at 91.
Translation: Muere Angelo Giuliani, ex ojeador de los Twins (AP) AP - Angelo Giuliani, quien estuvo detrás del plato para el primer turno al bate de Joe DiMaggio en las Grandes Ligas y luego firmó a Kent Hrbek como ojeador de los Minnesota Twins, murió a los 91 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP reports the passing of Angelo Giuliani, an ex-Twins Scout, aged 91. Giuliani was best known for his involvement in Joe DiMaggio's initial major league at-bat and for recruiting Kent Hrbek to the Minnesota Twins.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The former scout for the Minnesota Twins, Angelo Giuliani, has passed away at age 91, as reported by AP. His notable moments include witnessing Joe DiMaggio's debut at-bat in Major League and signing Kent Hrbek to the Twins.

Original Text: Will your phone become your credit card? com October 12, 2004, 12:23 PM PT. Wired  amp; Wireless continues its reign at the top spot among IT priorities due to widespread IP telephony and wireless deployment.
Translation: ¿Se convertirá tu teléfono en tu tarjeta de crédito? com 12 de octubre de 2004, 12:23 PM PT. Wired & Wireless continúa su reinado en el primer lugar entre las prioridades de TI debido a la amplia implementación de la telefonía IP y la conexión inalámbrica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is it possible that your phone transforms into your credit card? The dominancy of Wired & Wireless persists at the pinnacle amongst IT priorities, largely driven by the ubiquitous adoption of IP telephony and wireless technology, as of October 12, 2004, 12:23 PM PT.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Will a phone evolve to replace a credit card? In the realm of IT priorities, Wired & Wireless maintains its preeminent position, underpinned by an extensive rollout of IP telephony and wireless systems, as recorded on October 12, 2004, at 12:23 PM PT.

Original Text: Epic food convoy crosses Sahara The first convoy of food for Sudanese refugees arrives in Chad from Libya, crossing the Sahara Desert.
Translation: Épico convoy de alimentos cruza el Sahara. El primer convoy de alimentos para los refugiados sudaneses llega a Chad desde Libia, atravesando el desierto del Sahara.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The first food convoy for Sudanese refugees, crossing the Sahara Desert, has reached Chad from Libya.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On its journey from Libya, the first food convoy for Sudanese refugees has crossed the Sahara Desert and arrived in Chad.

Original Text: IBM expands China research site in midmarket push IBM on Thursday opened an expanded research center in China to bulk up its technology portfolio for midsize businesses worldwide. The SMB Innovation Center was added to the company #39;s research lab in Beijing
Translation: IBM amplía sitio de investigación en China en un impulso al mercado medio. IBM abrió el jueves un centro de investigación ampliado en China para fortalecer su cartera de tecnología para las empresas medianas a nivel mundial. El SMB Innovation Center se añadió al laboratorio de investigación de la empresa en Beijing.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a move to augment its technological offerings for midsize businesses globally, IBM inaugurated an extended research center in China on Thursday. The SMB Innovation Center, the new addition to the company's Beijing-based research lab, marks a decisive step towards the midmarket push.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, IBM initiated a major midmarket push by extending its research facility in China, attracting global mid-size businesses. An SMB Innovation Center has been incorporated into their Beijing research lab for this purpose.

Original Text: Fans keeping watchful eye Even as local TV people marveled yesterday at Boston's 49.8 rating (70 audience share) for Tuesday night's Game 6 of the American League Championship Series, speculation had begun about what kind of number last night's Game 7 would earn.
Translation: Los fanáticos mantienen un ojo vigilante Incluso mientras la gente de la televisión local se maravillaba ayer con el índice de audiencia de 49.8 (con una cuota de audiencia del 70%) de Boston para el Juego 6 del martes por la noche de la Serie de Campeonato de la Liga Americana, ya había comenzado la especulación sobre qué tipo de número obtendría el Juego 7 de anoche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As local television experts were impressed by Boston's 49.8 rating and 70 audience share for Tuesday night's Game 6 of the American League Championship Series, fans remained attentive. There was already speculation about the potential numbers that last night's Game 7 could generate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While local TV pundits were amazed at the 49.8 rating and 70 audience share that Boston's Game 6 of the American League Championship Series pulled in, the fans stayed vigilant. Predictions had already started to circulate about the kind of viewership that Game 7 might draw the previous night.

Original Text: Gartner: Chip revenue to see steady growth Worldwide semiconductor revenue is expected to rise by over 27 percent during 2004, according to a new report. Revenue this year will reach \$226 billion, market research company Gartner said Tuesday.
Translation: Gartner: Los ingresos de los chips verán un crecimiento constante. Se espera que los ingresos mundiales de semiconductores aumenten en más del 27 por ciento durante 2004, según un nuevo informe. Los ingresos de este año alcanzarán los $226 mil millones, dijo la compañía de investigación de mercado Gartner el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a recent report, global semiconductor revenue will see a steady increase of over 27 percent in 2004. Gartner, a market research firm, stated on Tuesday that the revenue this year would amount to $226 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Gartner, a market research firm, announced on Tuesday that it expects a steady 27 percent increase in worldwide semiconductor revenue for 2004. Their report predicts that the total income will hit $226 billion this year.

Original Text: Revolving Door Wolfgang Bernhard, former DaimlerChrysler executive once slated to take over Mercedes, as head of Volkswagen #39;s VW division. Jonathan Soros and Robert Soros, as co-deputy chairmen of Soros Fund Management LLC, running dad George Soros #39;s company day to day.
Translation: Puerta Giratoria Wolfgang Bernhard, ex ejecutivo de DaimlerChrysler que estuvo destinado a tomar el control de Mercedes, como jefe de la división VW de Volkswagen. Jonathan Soros y Robert Soros, como copresidentes adjuntos de Soros Fund Management LLC, dirigiendo día a día la empresa de su padre, George Soros.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Former DaimlerChrysler executive Wolfgang Bernhard, who was previously expected to lead Mercedes, is now in charge of the VW division at Volkswagen. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Robert Soros collectively serve as the co-deputy chairmen of Soros Fund Management LLC, managing daily operations of their father, George Soros's company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Serving as the head of Volkswagen's VW division is Wolfgang Bernhard, a former executive of DaimlerChrysler once lined up for the top position at Mercedes. Meanwhile, George Soros's company, Soros Fund Management LLC, is being managed daily by his sons, Jonathan and Robert Soros as the co-deputy chairmen.

Original Text: Kiev back to work in protest lull Ukrainian government workers resume duties as protesters lift blockades ahead of the presidential vote re-run.
Translation: Kiev vuelve al trabajo en pausa de protesta. Los trabajadores del gobierno ucraniano reanudan sus deberes a medida que los manifestantes levantan los bloqueos antes de la repetición de la votación presidencial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ukrainian government employees return to their duties amidst a decrease in protests, as the barriers are removed by the protesters in anticipation of the rerun of the presidential vote in Kiev.

Original Text: Caterpillar Earnings Rise But Shares Fall  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Caterpillar Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CAT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CAT.N</A> said on  Thursday its quarterly earnings more than doubled on strong  demand for its engines and heavy earth-moving equipment, but  concerns about high costs helped drag the shares down more than  4 percent.
Translation: Los beneficios de Caterpillar aumentan pero las acciones caen  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Caterpillar Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CAT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CAT.N</A> dijo el jueves que sus ganancias trimestrales se duplicaron con creces debido a la fuerte demanda de sus motores y equipos pesados de movimiento de tierras, pero las preocupaciones sobre los altos costos ayudaron a arrastrar las acciones a la baja en más del 4 por ciento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHICAGO (Reuters) - Despite Caterpillar Inc. CAT.N disclosing that its quarterly earnings have more than doubled due to strong demand for its engines and heavy machinery, its shares fell by over 4 percent due to concerns about high costs.
