Paraphrase 2: 2. Caterpillar Inc. CAT.N announced on Thursday that its earnings have skyrocketed due to considerable demand for its products, doubling the previous quarter's profits. However, worries around high costs led to a decrease in the share value by more than 4 percent, as reported by Reuters in Chicago.

Original Text: Lloyds TSB transfers 1,000 more jobs to India Lloyds TSB is moving another 1,000 jobs to India, increasing its workforce in Bangalore and Mumbai to 2,500 by the end of next year.
Translation: Lloyds TSB transfiere 1,000 empleos más a India. Lloyds TSB está trasladando otros 1,000 empleos a India, aumentando su fuerza laboral en Bangalore y Mumbai a 2,500 para finales del próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lloyds TSB is adding an extra 1,000 positions to its workforce in India, planning to raise the total number of employees in Bangalore and Mumbai to 2,500 by next year's end.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The total number of jobs at Lloyds TSB in India will rise to 2,500 by the year's end after the banking group opted to shift an additional 1,000 roles to Bangalore and Mumbai.

Original Text: Dairy farmers request milk price hike MONCTON - A dairy farmer in northern New Brunswick says the price of milk and other dairy products should reflect reality. Dairy farmers across the country will find out in the next month or so whether they can charge more money for their milk.
Translation: Los granjeros lecheros solicitan aumento del precio de la leche MONCTON - Un granjero lechero en el norte de New Brunswick dice que el precio de la leche y otros productos lácteos debería reflejar la realidad. Los granjeros lecheros de todo el país sabrán en el próximo mes o así si pueden cobrar más dinero por su leche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MONCTON - Dairy farmers nationwide, including one from northern New Brunswick, insist on an increase in milk price to match current circumstances. They expect to discover in the forthcoming month whether they will be able to ask for more money for their dairy products, including milk.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A dairy farmer from northern New Brunswick and others across the country are making a plea for a rise in the price of milk and other dairy products, claiming it should be more aligned with real conditions. These dairy farmers are set to learn in about a month's time if they will be permitted to increase their milk prices.

Original Text: Sharon Says Incitement to Oppose Disengagement Plan Must End Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon said opponents of his proposal to evacuate settlements in the Gaza Strip and West Bank must stop inciting the military and security forces to reject the withdrawal plan.
Translation: Sharon Dice que la Incitación a Oponerse al Plan de Desvinculación debe Terminar. El Primer Ministro Israelí Ariel Sharon dijo que los opositores a su propuesta de evacuar los asentamientos en la Franja de Gaza y Cisjordania deben dejar de incitar a las fuerzas militares y de seguridad a rechazar el plan de retiro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon has stated that those against his plan to evacuate settlements in the Gaza Strip and West Bank should cease their encouragement of military and security forces to resist the withdrawal plan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ariel Sharon, the Prime Minister of Israel, asserted that the provocation encouraging the military and security forces to oppose his settlement evacuation proposal in the Gaza Strip and West Bank must stop.

Original Text: Aftershocks continue to rattle Japan Aftershocks shook central Japan Monday as the death toll from Saturday #39;s earthquakes rose to 25, with more than 21,000 injured.
Translation: Las réplicas continúan sacudiendo Japón. Las réplicas sacudieron el centro de Japón el lunes mientras la cifra de muertos de los terremotos del sábado subía a 25, con más de 21,000 heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The death toll from Saturday's earthquakes in central Japan has risen to 25, with over 21,000 injuries, as aftershocks persist in shaking the area.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Central Japan experienced ongoing aftershocks on Monday, following Saturday's devastating earthquakes that resulted in 25 deaths and injuries to more than 21,000 people.

Original Text: IBM to pay \$320M to partially settle pension case IBM Corp. said Wednesday it will take a US\$320 million charge this quarter to settle some claims and cap its liability on others in a long-running class-action dispute about changes made in the 1990s to its pension plan.
Translation: IBM pagará \$320M para resolver parcialmente el caso de pensiones. IBM Corp. dijo el miércoles que asumirá un cargo de US \$320 millones este trimestre para resolver algunas reclamaciones y limitar su responsabilidad en otras en una disputa colectiva de larga duración sobre los cambios realizados en la década de 1990 en su plan de pensiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, IBM Corp announced that they will be setting aside $320 million this quarter to settle some allegations and restrict vulnerability to other claims in a longstanding class-action disagreement over alterations made to its pension plan in the 1990s.
Paraphrase 2: 2. IBM Corp revealed on Wednesday that they are preparing to pay $320 million this quarter as a means to settle a portion of claims and limit other liabilities related to a persistent class-action contention surrounding changes to its pension plan during the 1990s.

Original Text: North Korea Looks to Delay Nuclear Talks (AP) AP - North Korea is looking for an extended delay in resuming negotiations over its nuclear weapons program and even told China there was no point in continuing the six-sided talks at all, a senior U.S. official says.
Translation: Corea del Norte busca retrasar las conversaciones nucleares (AP) AP - Corea del Norte está buscando una demora extendida en la reanudación de las negociaciones sobre su programa de armas nucleares e incluso le dijo a China que no tenía sentido continuar con las conversaciones de seis partes en absoluto, dice un alto funcionario de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a high-ranking U.S. official, North Korea is seeking a prolonged postponement of negotiations about its nuclear weapons program and has even informed China that there is no rationale for carrying on with the six-party discussions (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) A US senior official indicates that North Korea is aiming for a long-term postponement in the nuclear discussions, even going as far as expressing to China the uselessness of persisting with the six-party talks.

Original Text: Treasuries Slip in Thin Trade  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. Treasury debt prices were a  sliver lower on Friday, but trading was thin as many investors  took off for an early weekend before next week's Republican  convention.
Translation: Los Tesoros caen en un comercio escaso NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios de la deuda del Tesoro de los EE.UU. estuvieron un poco más bajos el viernes, pero el comercio fue escaso ya que muchos inversores se tomaron un fin de semana anticipado antes de la convención Republicana de la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - With numerous investors departing for an early weekend ahead of the forthcoming Republican convention, U.S. Treasury debt prices dropped slightly on Friday, amidst low trading volume.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Friday, as a large number of investors left for an early weekend due to the upcoming Republican convention, a minor decline was observed in U.S. Treasury debt prices while trading was scanty.

Original Text: Rough Start for U.S. Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson get off to an inglorious start in their better-ball match against Colin Montgomerie and Padraig Harrington.
Translation: Inicio difícil para los estadounidenses Tiger Woods y Phil Mickelson, quienes tienen un comienzo poco glorioso en su partido de mejor bola contra Colin Montgomerie y Padraig Harrington.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson from the U.S. have a less than auspicious beginning in their better-ball match against Colin Montgomerie and Padraig Harrington.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In their better-ball match against Colin Montgomerie and Padraig Harrington, Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson from the U.S. don't get off to a glorious start.

Original Text: Martin in strong position to win Catalunya Rally com staff writers. Markko Martin still has a full day and six special stages to go, but he is now the clear favorite to win Catalunya Rally and follow up his win in the last round of the World Rally Championship, in Corsica a fortnight ago.
Translation: Martin en una fuerte posición para ganar el Rally de Cataluña por escritores del personal. Markko Martin todavía tiene un día completo y seis etapas especiales por delante, pero ahora es el favorito claro para ganar el Rally de Cataluña y seguir su victoria en la última ronda del Campeonato Mundial de Rally, en Córcega hace dos semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Martin is currently in a commanding position to seize victory in the Catalunya Rally, according to the staff writers at com. Despite having a full day and six more special stages to complete, his lead positions him as the likely winner, succeeding his recent win from the previous World Rally Championship round in Corsica just two weeks prior.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per the com staff writers, Markko Martin is primed for a possible win in the Catalunya Rally, notwithstanding an entire day and six special stages left. Following his triumph in Corsica during the last World Rally Championship round a fortnight ago, he's now front and center to clinch another victory.

Original Text: Deciphered chicken genome sheds light on human DNA Here #39;s something to ponder when you eat your next chicken wing: A new study says about 60 of the genes in the critter you #39;re eating have close cousins in your own DNA.
Translation: El genoma del pollo descifrado arroja luz sobre el ADN humano. Aquí tienes algo en qué pensar cuando comas tu próxima ala de pollo: un nuevo estudio dice que alrededor del 60% de los genes en la criatura que estás comiendo tienen parientes cercanos en tu propio ADN.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A recent study reveals that around 60 percent of the genes in the chicken you're consuming have significant similarities to your own DNA, thanks to the decoded chicken genome providing insight into human DNA. The next time you enjoy a chicken wing, consider this fact.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Think about this when eating your subsequent chicken wing: the newly sequenced chicken genome demonstrates that nearly 60% of the chicken's genes have strong counterparts in human DNA.

Original Text: Capital One Financial to Cut 750 Jobs Capital One Financial Corp., the holding company of Capital One Bank, plans to eliminate about 750 jobs as it shifts the majority of its production service operations to a U.S.-based supplier, the company reported Tuesday.
Translation: Capital One Financial recortará 750 empleos. Capital One Financial Corp., la empresa matriz de Capital One Bank, planea eliminar alrededor de 750 empleos mientras traslada la mayoría de sus operaciones de servicio de producción a un proveedor con base en Estados Unidos, informó la compañía el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Capital One Financial Corp., the parent company of Capital One Bank, announced on Tuesday that it would be downsizing by approximately 750 jobs as it aims to shift most of its production service operations to a supplier based in the U.S.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the intention to transfer the bulk of their production service operations to an American supplier, Capital One Financial Corp. is set to axe around 750 jobs, the banking conglomerate disclosed on Tuesday.

Original Text: United Needs \$500 Million More in Cuts nearly 8 percent of its 2003 operating expenses -- even if it terminates its pension plans, which the government estimates are underfunded by \$8.
Translation: United Necesita \$500 Millones Más en Recortes, casi el 8 por ciento de sus gastos operativos de 2003, incluso si termina sus planes de pensiones, que el gobierno estima están insuficientemente financiados por \$8.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Even with the termination of its pension plans, which are underfunded by $8 billion according to government estimates, United still requires an additional $500 million reduction in its 2003 operating expenses, which constitutes nearly 8 percent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the potential termination of its pension plans, believed to be underfunded by $8 billion as per government calculations, United is still faced with the need to cut an extra $500 million, almost 8 percent of its operating expenses from 2003.

Original Text: 21 killed, 96 hurt in Iraq car bombings BAGHDAD - Insurgents detonated two car bombs at the gates of the main US-Iraqi headquarters here and near major hotels yesterday, killing at least 21 people and wounding 96.
Translation: 21 muertos, 96 heridos en atentados con coches bomba en Irak BAGDAD - Insurgentes detonaron dos coches bomba en las puertas de la principal sede estadounidense-iraquí aquí y cerca de grandes hoteles ayer, matando al menos a 21 personas y dejando 96 heridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, a minimum of 21 individuals died and 96 were injured due to two car bombings instigated by insurgents in Iraq. These explosions occurred near the central US-Iraqi base and major hotels in Baghdad.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Baghdad was the scene of a devastating attack when insurgents ignited two car bombs yesterday – one near the main U.S.-Iraqi headquarters, and the other close to significant hotels, resulting in a death toll of at least 21 and injuries for 96 people.

Original Text: U.S.: Bin Laden Likely Issuing Orders BAGRAM, Afghanistan - The trail has gone cold in the hunt for suspected Sept. 11 mastermind Osama bin Laden three years after the audacious attacks, but the al-Qaida chief and his No...
Translation: EE.UU.: Probablemente Bin Laden está dando órdenes BAGRAM, Afganistán - La pista se ha enfriado en la caza del presunto cerebro del 11 de septiembre, Osama bin Laden, tres años después de los audaces ataques, pero el jefe de al-Qaida y su número dos...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The search for Osama bin Laden, the suspected mastermind behind the September 11 attacks, has currently hit a stall, three years post the audacious assaults, according to U.S. sources. However, it is likely that the al-Qaida leader, and his second in command, are still giving out orders from an unknown location, specifically from Afghanistan's Bagram area.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While the pursuit for Osama Bin Laden, the alleged orchestrator of the Sept. 11 attacks, has gone stagnant three years following the shocking incidents, the U.S. holds the theory that the al-Qaida head, along with his deputy, are presumably still promulgating directives, possibly from Bagram, Afghanistan.

Original Text: Conrad Black charged with fraud in US The Securities and Exchange Commission has filed filed civil fraud charges against both Lord Conrad Black and his former deputy at Hollinger International, David Radler.
Translation: Conrad Black acusado de fraude en los EE.UU. La Comisión de Bolsa y Valores ha presentado cargos civiles por fraude tanto contra Lord Conrad Black como contra su antiguo subordinado en Hollinger International, David Radler.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has brought civil fraud charges against Lord Conrad Black and his former Hollinger International deputy, David Radler.

Original Text: Fifa prepares to put Spain in the dock over racism GOVERNMENT ministers led the calls yesterday for strong sanctions against Spain in the wake of the racist abuse of England players on Wednesday night.
Translation: FIFA se prepara para poner a España en el banquillo por racismo. Ministros del gobierno lideraron ayer los llamados a sanciones fuertes contra España tras los abusos racistas a los jugadores de Inglaterra el miércoles por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to the racist mistreatment of England players on Wednesday night, FIFA is preparing to hold Spain accountable. Yesterday, leading government ministers echoed calls for hefty punishments against Spain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After England players endured racist offenses on Wednesday night, FIFA is getting ready to penalize Spain. Government ministers were among the voices demanding stern action against Spain yesterday.

Original Text: Oil Hits \$47 as Supply Worries Linger Oil prices hit a one month-high today as China showed no let-up in its demand and traders worried that U.S. inventories had drawn down heavily due to Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: El petróleo alcanza los \$47 mientras persisten las preocupaciones por el suministro. Los precios del petróleo alcanzaron hoy un máximo de un mes ya que China no mostró ninguna disminución en su demanda y los comerciantes estaban preocupados porque las reservas de EE.UU. se habían reducido considerablemente debido al Huracán Ivan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oil prices reached a one-month high at $47 today as concerns about supply continue. The persistent demand from China and concerns about a significant decrease in U.S. inventories due to Hurricane Ivan leave traders anxious.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With continuous demand from China and concerns over heavy drawdowns in US inventories following Hurricane Ivan, the price of oil has surged to a one-month peak of $47. This is triggering lingering worries about supply.

Original Text: Jobless Claims, Productivity Growth Dip (Reuters) Reuters - Fewer Americans filed jobless claims\last week and growth in worker productivity slowed sharply in\the third quarter, government data showed on Thursday, hinting\that conditions in the sluggish U.S. labor market have\improved.
Translation: Reclamaciones de Desempleo, Disminuye el Crecimiento de la Productividad (Reuters) Reuters - Menos estadounidenses presentaron reclamaciones de desempleo la semana pasada y el crecimiento de la productividad de los trabajadores se desaceleró drásticamente en el tercer trimestre, según mostraron los datos gubernamentales el jueves, insinuando que las condiciones en el lento mercado laboral de EE.UU. han mejorado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) - A decline in jobless claims was witnessed last week, along with a significant slowdown in the third quarter's productivity growth, as per government data released on Thursday. This suggests that the slowly recovering U.S. labor market's situation is getting better.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (Reuters) - Government data released on Thursday indicates a decrease in the number of Americans filing jobless claims last week, and a steep decline in worker productivity growth for the third quarter, hinting at an improvement in the conditions of the sluggish U.S. labor market.

Original Text: Seeded Russians all win at Kremlin Cup MOSCOW (Ticker) - Tuesday was a successful day for seeded Russians at the \$2.3 million Kremlin Cup tennis tournament. All five Russian seeded players - three women and two men - were victorious Tuesday in the first round of the dual-sex indoor event.
Translation: Los rusos cabeza de serie ganan todos en la Copa del Kremlin MOSCÚ (Ticker) - El martes fue un día exitoso para los rusos cabeza de serie en el torneo de tenis de la Copa del Kremlin de \$2.3 millones. Los cinco jugadores rusos sembrados - tres mujeres y dos hombres - resultaron victoriosos el martes en la primera ronda del evento indoor mixto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. All five seeded Russian players, consisting of three women and two men, emerged victorious in the first round of the dual-sex indoor Moscow Kremlin Cup tennis tournament, worth $2.3 million, on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday marked a triumphant day for all five seeded Russians - three females and two males - competing in the first round of the Kremlin Cup in Moscow, a dual-sex indoor tennis tournament with a prize fund of $2.3 million.

Original Text: Update 1: Witness: Eisner Had Authority to Fire Ovitz A Walt Disney Co. director testified Tuesday that he believed Disney chief executive Michael Eisner had the authority to fire Michael Ovitz as the entertainment giant #39;s president.
Translation: Actualización 1: Testigo: Eisner tenía autoridad para despedir a Ovitz. Un director de Walt Disney Co. testificó el martes que creía que el director ejecutivo de Disney, Michael Eisner, tenía la autoridad para despedir a Michael Ovitz como el presidente del gigante del entretenimiento número 39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A director at Walt Disney Co. attested on Tuesday, stating his belief that the company's chief executive, Michael Eisner, possessed the power to dismiss Michael Ovitz from his position as the president of the entertainment behemoth.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A board member of Walt Disney Co declared on Tuesday that it was his belief that the company's CEO, Michael Eisner, had the necessary authority to terminate Michael Ovitz from his role as president.

Original Text: Ganguly wants Sehwag, Yuvraj to strike form Southampton, September 12: The Indian team might have regained its momentum with an easy victory over Kenya in their ICC Champions Trophy opener, but captain Sourav Ganguly wants batsmen Virender Sehwag and Yuvraj Singh to strike form before the crucial
Translation: Ganguly quiere que Sehwag, Yuvraj recuperen la forma, Southampton, 12 de septiembre: El equipo indio pudo haber recuperado su impulso con una fácil victoria sobre Kenia en su partido inaugural de la Copa de Campeones de la ICC, pero el capitán Sourav Ganguly quiere que los bateadores Virender Sehwag y Yuvraj Singh recuperen la forma antes del crucial
Paraphrase 1: 1. Southampton, September 12: Sourav Ganguly, the captain of the Indian team, is hoping for batsmen Virender Sehwag and Yuvraj Singh to find their stride before the crucial matches despite the regained momentum from their ICC Champions Trophy opener victory over Kenya.
Paraphrase 2: 2. September 12, Southampton: While the Indian cricket team's easy win over Kenya in the ICC Champions Trophy opener boosted their momentum, team captain Sourav Ganguly hopes for an upturn in form for Virender Sehwag and Yuvraj Singh ahead of the crucial matches.

Original Text: IBM adds  #39;trusted #39; chip to PCs IBM plans to start shipping its PCs with a new chip designed to thwart hackers by safeguarding passwords and other sensitive identity information.
Translation: IBM agrega un chip 'confiable' a las PCs. IBM planea comenzar a enviar sus PCs con un nuevo chip diseñado para frustrar a los hackers al proteger contraseñas y otra información de identidad sensible.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM is set to begin distribution of its PCs integrated with a novel chip, designed to protect passwords and crucial personal information against hackers.

Original Text: Najaf truce takes hold NAJAF, Iraq - Militiamen loyal to Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr surrendered the sacred shrine of Imam Ali on Friday and then surrendered weapons as well, bringing a largely peaceful end to a ferocious three-week battle with US forces that challenged the
Translation: La tregua en Najaf se establece NAJAF, Iraq - Los milicianos leales al clérigo chiíta Muqtada al-Sadr se rindieron en el sagrado santuario del Imam Ali el viernes y luego también entregaron sus armas, poniendo un fin en gran medida pacífico a una feroz batalla de tres semanas con las fuerzas estadounidenses que desafiaron la
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Najaf, Iraq, the intense three-week battle between US forces and militiamen who follow the Shi'ite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr came to a largely peaceful conclusion on Friday. The militiamen gave up both the revered Imam Ali shrine and their weapons, marking a successful truce in the area.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The faithful followers of Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr in Najaf, Iraq, yielded the holy site of Imam Ali and their weaponry on Friday, helping to establish a largely serene conclusion to the fierce three-week conflict with US forces.

Original Text: India's prime minister offers unconditional talks over Kashmir (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - SRINAGAR, India (AP) - Prime Minister Manmohan Singh vowed Wednesday to press forward with peace talks on the disputed Kashmir region, saying he was ready to hold unconditional talks "with anyone and everyone."
Translation: El primer ministro de India ofrece conversaciones incondicionales sobre Cachemira (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - SRINAGAR, India (AP) - El Primer Ministro Manmohan Singh juró el miércoles avanzar con las conversaciones de paz sobre la disputada región de Cachemira, diciendo que estaba listo para mantener conversaciones incondicionales "con cualquiera y todos".
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Indian Prime Minister pledges to conduct unrestricted discussions on the Kashmir issue," as reported by the Canadian Press. Manmohan Singh, the Prime Minister, affirmed on Wednesday that he is prepared to proceed with open talks involving "any person or party," in attempts to secure peace in the contentious region of Kashmir.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to Canadian Press, the Prime Minister of India, Manmohan Singh, has offered to engage in unconditional conversations on the Kashmir dispute. On Wednesday, PM Singh asserted his readiness to have a dialogue with "all parties" without any conditions, aiming to progress peace talks in the disputed Kashmir area.

Original Text: Penny Miss at Dollar General Dollar General (DG:NYSE - news - research) fell Thursday after reporting cost overruns that left first-quarter earnings a penny shy of Wall Street estimates.
Translation: Penny Miss en Dollar General Dollar General (DG: NYSE - noticias - investigación) cayó el jueves después de informar sobre excesos de costos que dejaron las ganancias del primer trimestre un centavo por debajo de las estimaciones de Wall Street.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After providing a report of cost overruns which led to first-quarter earnings falling a penny short of Wall Street predictions, Dollar General's (DG: NYSE - news - research) stock witnessed a decline on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dollar General's (DG: NYSE - news - research) first-quarter earnings were reported to miss Wall Street's projected estimates by a penny due to cost overruns, leading to a drop in their stocks on Thursday.

Original Text: Joys of summer Signs of a fun-loving team on a rapturous roll: Derek Lowe paying a goofy tribute to Red Sox starter Pedro Martinez by donning a Dominican flag do-rag, wrapping David Ortiz's long chain around his neck, and waving Martinez's toy red bat as the substitute cheerleader; Johnny Damon mimicking the injured Manny Ramirez by triumphantly pointing both index fingers to celebrate ...
Translation: Alegrías del verano. Señales de un equipo amante de la diversión en una racha arrolladora: Derek Lowe rinde un tributo extravagante al abridor de los Red Sox, Pedro Martínez, vistiendo un pañuelo de la bandera dominicana, cubriéndose con la larga cadena de David Ortiz en su cuello y agitando el pequeño bate rojo de Martínez como un animador sustituto; Johnny Damon imita al lesionado Manny Ramirez al señalar triunfalmente con ambos índices para celebrar...
Paraphrase 1: 1) The joys of summer include witnessing a team fervently enjoying themselves: Derek Lowe humorously expressed admiration for Red Sox starter Pedro Martinez by wearing a Dominican flag do-rag. He heightened the parody by embellishing himself with David Ortiz's lengthy chain and playfully brandished Martinez's tiny red toy bat as a makeshift cheerleader. Meanwhile, Johnny Damon cleverly replicated the actions of an injured Manny Ramirez by exuberantly celebrating with pointed index fingers...
Paraphrase 2: 2) A dedicated team having a grand time during the summer creates joyful scenes: By wearing a do-rag featuring the Dominican flag, Derek Lowe showed his playfully quirky appreciation of Pedro Martinez, the Red Sox starter. As further tribute, Lowe hung David Ortiz's extended chain around his neck and held aloft Martinez's frivolous red toy bat, taking on the role of the cheerleader. In a similar jovial spirit, Johnny Damon imitated the victorious gesture of injured Manny Ramirez by raising both index fingers to the sky in celebration...

Original Text: Former Financier Pleads Not Guilty to New Charges Former financier Martin Armstrong pleaded not guilty to expanded charges of fraud on Friday, just days after he challenged a contempt order that has kept him imprisoned for more than four years.
Translation: El ex financiero se declara no culpable de nuevos cargos. El ex financiero Martin Armstrong se declaró no culpable de cargos ampliados de fraude el viernes, solo días después de desafiar una orden de desacato que lo ha mantenido encarcelado durante más de cuatro años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Martin Armstrong, a former financier, declared his innocence on Friday to additional fraud charges and this comes just days after he contested a contempt order that has imprisoned him for over four years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, former financier Martin Armstrong protested his innocence against newly expanded fraud charges. This follows his recent challenge of a contempt order that has detained him for more than four years.

Original Text: Click, and the Deals Arrive at the Doorstep Now that all the holiday presents have been opened, it is time to do some real shopping  for the home, from the home.
Translation: Haz clic y las ofertas llegan a la puerta. Ahora que todos los regalos festivos han sido abiertos, es hora de hacer algunas compras reales para el hogar, desde el hogar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Now that everyone has unwrapped their holiday gifts, it's the perfect time to begin some serious shopping for the home, right from the comfort of your own home. Just click and the deals will be delivered right to your doorstep.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With all the holiday gifts now opened, it's finally time to indulge in some true home shopping, right from your own living space. Simply click, and you'll have fantastic deals arriving at your doorstep.

Original Text: Space crew  #39;using up food supply #39; It seems someone on the International Space Station has been super-sizing their meals: food is running so low that evacuation has been considered.
Translation: Traducir esto al español con precisión: La tripulación del espacio #39; está agotando el suministro de alimentos #39; Parece que alguien en la Estación Espacial Internacional ha estado consumiendo sus comidas en exceso: la comida se está agotando tanto que se ha considerado la evacuación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It appears a member of the International Space Station has been overindulging in their meals, with food supplies depleting to the point where an evacuation is being contemplated.

Original Text: UN slams British jails A United Nations anti-torture body has criticised Britain for the  quot;unsatisfactory quot; conditions in its prisons, including a  quot;substantial number of deaths in custody quot;, urging it to act at once to improve them.
Translation: La ONU critica las cárceles británicas. Un organismo de la ONU contra la tortura ha criticado a Gran Bretaña por las "insatisfactorias" condiciones en sus prisiones, incluyendo un "número sustancial de muertes en custodia", instándola a actuar de inmediato para mejorarlas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A United Nations body against torture has rebuked the UK for the 'unsatisfactory' circumstances in its penitentiaries, which include a significant amount of in-custody fatalities, and has urged immediate action to rectify these conditions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The UN's anti-torture group has expressed severe criticism towards Britain for the poor conditions in its prisons, including a sizable count of prisoner deaths, and has called for immediate action to better these conditions.

Original Text: Court approves Interstate Bakeries financing Bankrupt Interstate Bakeries Corp. (IBC.N: Quote, Profile, Research) , maker of Hostess Twinkies and Wonder Bread, received court approval on Thursday to incur new debt
Translation: El tribunal aprueba la financiación de Interstate Bakeries. La empresa en quiebra Interstate Bakeries Corp. (IBC.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), fabricante de Hostess Twinkies y Wonder Bread, recibió la aprobación del tribunal el jueves para contraer nueva deuda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Interstate Bakeries Corp. (IBC.N: Quote, Profile, Research), known for producing Hostess Twinkies and Wonder Bread, has been green-lighted by the court to acquire new debt, despite its bankruptcy status.

Original Text: Cuba, Russia Agree to Condemn Terrorism (AP) AP - The top diplomats for Russia and Cuba condemned all forms of terrorism Tuesday and renewed Russia's call last week to expand the war against the global scourge.
Translation: Cuba y Rusia acuerdan condenar el terrorismo (AP) AP - Los principales diplomáticos de Rusia y Cuba condenaron todas las formas de terrorismo el martes y renovaron el llamado de Rusia la semana pasada para expandir la guerra contra la plaga global.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Russia and Cuba Unite in the Fight Against Terrorism (AP) AP - Russia and Cuba's leading diplomats jointly denounced all sorts of terrorism on Tuesday, reiterating Russia's plea from last week to widen the combat against this worldwide menace.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Agreement Between Russia and Cuba to Denounce Terrorism (AP) AP - Russia and Cuba's high-ranking diplomats came together on Tuesday to criticize terrorism in all its forms, echoing Russia's earlier appeal to escalate the global battle against terrorism.

Original Text: Security Bytes: Injection flaw in popular browsers com staff. Danish security firm Secunia has reported a  quot;moderately critical quot; window injection vulnerability in Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Safari and Konqueror.
Translation: Bytes de Seguridad: Fallo de inyección en navegadores populares del personal de .com. La firma de seguridad danesa Secunia ha informado de una vulnerabilidad de inyección de ventana "moderadamente crítica" en Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Safari y Konqueror.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Secunia, a Danish security company, has reported a "moderately critical" window injection vulnerability in popular browsers such as Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Safari and Konqueror, according to Security Bytes: Injection Flaw in Popular Browsers com staff.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A "moderately critical" window injection flaw in popular browsers, including Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Safari and Konqueror, has been reported by Secunia, a Danish security firm, as stated by staff from Security Bytes: Injection Flaw in Popular Browsers com.

Original Text: Comcast, Microsoft to Deploy Video Recorder Set-Tops Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O and cable television provider Comcast Corp. CMCSA.O said on Monday that they would begin deploying set-top boxes powered by Microsoft software starting next week.
Translation: Comcast, Microsoft para implementar grabadoras de video en decodificadores. Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O y el proveedor de televisión por cable Comcast Corp. CMCSA.O dijeron el lunes que comenzarían a implementar decodificadores alimentados por software de Microsoft a partir de la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Starting next week, Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O and Comcast Corp. CMCSA.O, the cable television provider, announced on Monday their plan to launch video recorder set-tops powered by Microsoft software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, it was declared that video recorder set-tops powered by Microsoft software would be released by Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O and cable television provider Comcast Corp. CMCSA.O, commencing from the following week.

Original Text: Owen  amp; Becks named on World Player short-list Justice has been served. Following his dynamic season for Liverpool, breathtaking contribution at Euro 2004, and goals-laden start to his career in Spain, Michael Owen has rightly been named on the shortlist for the FIFA World Player of the Year award.
Translation: Owen y Becks nominados en la lista corta para el Jugador Mundial; se ha hecho justicia. Tras su dinámica temporada para Liverpool, su asombrosa contribución en la Euro 2004, y un inicio de carrera lleno de goles en España, Michael Owen ha sido acertadamente nombrado en la lista corta para el premio al Jugador Mundial del Año de la FIFA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a striking season with Liverpool, a pivotal role at Euro 2004, and a prolific beginning in Spain, Michael Owen has justly earned a spot on the shortlist for FIFA's World Player of the Year award. This can only signify that justice has been served with his and Becks' nominations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In virtue of his exceptional performances for Liverpool, valuable input at Euro 2004, and impressive first steps in Spain, Michael Owen is justly placed on the shortlist for the FIFA World Player of the Year award. This along with Becks' nomination surely reflects that justice has been done.

Original Text: Betrusted and TruSecure merge The merged company CyberTrust will service 4,000 clients worldwide and says it expects to have annual revenues of USD160 million. The firm will also employ 1,000 people globally, including 49 in Dublin in its identity management division.
Translation: Betrusted y TruSecure se fusionan. La compañía fusionada, CyberTrust, atenderá a 4,000 clientes en todo el mundo y dice que espera tener ingresos anuales de 160 millones de dólares. La firma también empleará a 1,000 personas a nivel mundial, incluyendo 49 en Dublín en su división de gestión de identidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After merging, Betrusted and TruSecure formed CyberTrust, a company servicing 4,000 clients globally. Projected to yield annual revenues of USD160 million, CyberTrust will employee 1,000 people worldwide, with 49 of them based in Dublin, specifically in its identity management division.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By amalgamating Betrusted and TruSecure, they have established CyberTrust, a company set to generate annual revenues of USD160 million while serving 4,000 clients around the world. The newly formed venture will have a total workforce of 1,000 employees, which comprises 49 staff members in Dublin for their identity management division.

Original Text: Hornets Stand in Way Howard, at 6-4 overall and 3-3 in the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference, can clinch a winning record in the MEAC with a win over Delaware State on Saturday.
Translation: Hornets se interponen en el camino de Howard, que con un total de 6-4 y 3-3 en la Conferencia Atlética del Este Medio, puede asegurar un récord ganador en la MEAC con una victoria sobre Delaware State el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Howard, who has an overall record of 6-4 and a 3-3 score in the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference, could secure a victory in the MEAC by defeating Delaware State this Saturday, overcoming the hurdle of the Hornets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a 6-4 total and a mid-eastern athletic conference score of 3-3, Howard has the opportunity to secure a MEAC win by triumphing over Delaware State on Saturday, with the Hornets being the only obstacle.

Original Text: Tiger #39;s #39; caddie: Woods will return to top of his game A swing change, not romance, caused Tiger Woods to drop to No. 3 in the world rankings. That #39;s the opinion of Woods #39; caddie, Steve Williams, who predicts a revival next year.
Translation: Caddie de Tiger #39;: Woods volverá a la cima de su juego. Un cambio de swing, no el romance, causó que Tiger Woods cayera al número 3 en el ranking mundial. Esa es la opinión del caddie de Woods, Steve Williams, quien predice un resurgimiento el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Tiger Woods' caddie, Steve Williams, it was a change in his swing rather than his personal life that led to his drop to number three in world rankings. Williams is confident that Woods will reclaim his position at the top next year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Steve Williams, the caddie of Tiger Woods, asserts it was an adjustment in his swing, not personal incidents, that dropped him to the third spot in the global rankings. He forecasts Woods' return to his prime in the coming year.

Original Text: G-20 skirts sliding dollar Finance ministers from the Group of 20 rich or emerging countries have wrapped up a two-day summit in Berlin without making explicit reference to the sagging value of the US dollar against the euro.
Translation: Los ministros de finanzas del Grupo de los 20 países ricos o emergentes han cerrado una cumbre de dos días en Berlín sin hacer referencia explícita al receso del valor del dólar estadounidense frente al euro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Finance ministers from the Group of 20, comprising both wealthy and developing countries, have concluded a two-day summit in Berlin without directly addressing the diminishing value of the US dollar against the euro.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The two-day summit in Berlin, involving finance ministers from the Group of 20 affluent and emerging nations, ended without specifically discussing the falling US dollar value against the euro.

Original Text: Majerus to coach USC next season Rick Majerus was hired Wednesday to coach the USC basketball team, but he will not take over the position until the 2005-06 season.
Translation: Majerus será el entrenador de USC la próxima temporada. Rick Majerus fue contratado el miércoles para dirigir al equipo de baloncesto de USC, pero no asumirá el puesto hasta la temporada 2005-06.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rick Majerus was appointed on Wednesday as the USC basketball team's next coach, although he will only begin his tenure in the 2005-06 season.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although Rick Majerus will not assume his new role until the 2005-06 season, he was employed on Wednesday to coach USC's basketball team next season.

Original Text: Circuit City's Sales Short-Circuit The company reports a decline in same-store sales for the third quarter.
Translation: Las ventas de Circuit City sufren un cortocircuito: la empresa informa una disminución en las ventas de las mismas tiendas para el tercer trimestre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The third quarter results show a decline in Circuit City's same-store sales, indicating a sales short-circuit for the company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Circuit City reveals a short-circuit in sales as it reports a drop in its third-quarter same-store sales.

Original Text: Myskinia heads all-Russian final Moscow - The Kremlin Cup final will be an all-Russian affair for the first time after defending champion Anastasia Myskina beat new world No.
Translation: Myskinia lidera la final totalmente rusa en Moscú - La final de la Copa Kremlin será un asunto totalmente ruso por primera vez después de que la campeona defensora Anastasia Myskina venció a la nueva número uno del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Moscow - For the first time ever, the final of the Kremlin Cup will be exclusively Russian, following defending champion Anastasia Myskina's victory over the new world number one.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Moscow - Anastasia Myskina, the defending champion, defeated the new world number one, setting up the first-ever all-Russian final in the Kremlin Cup.

Original Text: Did Humans Jog to Their Destiny? The emergence of modern humans may be tied to the evolution of running, a new study suggests, a new study suggests.
Translation: ¿Corrieron los Humanos Hacia su Destino? La aparición de los humanos modernos puede estar vinculada a la evolución de correr, sugiere un nuevo estudio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Could the evolution of running be linked to the emergence of modern humans? A new study proposes this as a pathway to human destiny.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new study suggests that the destiny of human evolution might be connected to the proliferation of running. Did running lead us to our current state as modern humans?

Original Text: Rules Approved for Broadband over Power Lines Cinergy has a venture with Current Communications to market BPL systems to municipally-owned and rural cooperative utilities. Their plan so far has not been slowed by regulatory uncertainty
Translation: Reglas Aprobadas para Banda Ancha a través de Líneas Eléctricas. Cinergy tiene una empresa conjunta con Current Communications para comercializar sistemas BPL a servicios públicos municipales y cooperativas rurales. Hasta ahora, su plan no se ha visto frenado por la incertidumbre regulatoria.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Despite regulatory uncertainties, Cinergy's collaboration with Current Communications to promote BPL systems to municipally-owned and rural cooperative utilities has not hit any major hurdles. The rules for broadband over power lines have been approved.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The approval of rules for broadband over power lines has not hampered the partnership between Cinergy and Current Communications in their mission to market BPL systems to utilities owned by municipalities and rural cooperatives - Even amidst regulatory unpredictability.

Original Text: SONICS 79, NETS 68 In terms of their inability to score, the Nets are turning back the clock this season, which is not necessarily a good thing. Nor is it aesthetically pleasing.
Translation: SONICS 79, NETS 68 En términos de su incapacidad para anotar, los Nets están retrocediendo en el tiempo esta temporada, lo cual no es necesariamente algo bueno. Tampoco es estéticamente agradable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With their disappointing scoring this season, the Nets are unfortunately reminiscent of past times, which isn't necessarily positive or visually impressive. The Sonics defeated them with a score of 79 to 68.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Nets, who lost 68 to 79 against the Sonics, are regressing to previous seasons' scoring struggles, a deterioration that isn't particularly admirable or pleasing to watch.

Original Text: Ivory Coast Warplanes Kill 9 French Soldiers  ABIDJAN (Reuters) - Ivory Coast warplanes killed nine  French soldiers on Saturday in a bombing raid during the  fiercest clashes with rebels for 18 months and France hit back  by destroying most of the West African country's small  airforce.
Translation: Aviones de guerra de Costa de Marfil matan a 9 soldados franceses ABIDJAN (Reuters) - Los aviones de guerra de Costa de Marfil mataron a nueve soldados franceses el sábado en un ataque aéreo durante los enfrentamientos más fieros con los rebeldes durante 18 meses y Francia contraatacó destruyendo la mayor parte de la pequeña fuerza aérea del país del oeste de África.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ABIDJAN (Reuters) - During the most intense conflict with rebels in 18 months, warplanes from Ivory Coast conducted a bombing raid on Saturday, resulting in the deaths of nine French soldiers. In retaliation, France obliterated the majority of the small airforce of the West African nation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ABIDJAN (Reuters) - Ivory Coast's military aircraft launched a violent strike amidst severe rebel conflicts, which haven't been this intense for a year and a half, leading to the death of nine French servicemen on Saturday. In response, France decimated the majority of this West African country's diminutive airforce.

Original Text: US Supreme Court chief justice hospitalized for cancer (AFP) AFP - US Supreme Court chief justice William Rehnquist has been admitted to a military hospital for cancer treatment, adding a late twist to the presidential election battle.
Translation: Traducir a español: Juez principal del Tribunal Supremo de EE.UU. hospitalizado por cáncer (AFP) AFP - El juez principal del Tribunal Supremo de EE.UU., William Rehnquist, ha sido ingresado en un hospital militar para el tratamiento del cáncer, añadiendo un giro tardío a la batalla de las elecciones presidenciales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. William Rehnquist, the US Supreme Court Chief Justice, has been admitted to a military hospital for cancer therapy, introducing an unexpected element to the fight for the presidential election (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The battle for the presidential election takes an unexpected turn as US Supreme Court chief justice William Rehnquist is hospitalized for cancer treatment, according to AFP.

Original Text: Nokia, Vodafone push for mobile Java standards The world's largest mobile phone manufacturer and Europe's largest wireless operator have launched an initiative to simplify Java standards for mobile devices in a move aimed to help developers create software for multiple Java-enabled devices, thus providing users with a wider choice of Java-based applications.
Translation: Nokia, Vodafone impulsan estándares Java para móviles. El mayor fabricante de teléfonos móviles del mundo y el operador inalámbrico más grande de Europa han lanzado una iniciativa para simplificar los estándares Java para dispositivos móviles en un movimiento destinado a ayudar a los desarrolladores a crear software para múltiples dispositivos habilitados para Java, proporcionando así a los usuarios una mayor elección de aplicaciones basadas en Java.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The largest mobile phone manufacturer globally, Nokia, and Europe's biggest wireless operator, Vodafone, have initiated a move to streamline Java standards for mobile gadgets. This effort is anticipated to assist developers in building software for a variety of Java-enabled devices, thereby offering users an expanded selection of Java-oriented applications.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a goal to aid software developers in creating programs for a broad range of Java-enabled devices, Nokia and Vodafone – the global leader in mobile phone manufacturing and Europe's top wireless operator respectively – have commenced an initiative to simplify the Java standards used in Mobile devices. This effort is likely to result in a larger array of Java-related applications for users.

Original Text: Microsoft Readies Media Center Updates Updated OS, new consumer products expected to be introduced next month.
Translation: Microsoft Prepara Actualizaciones para Media Center; Se espera la introducción del sistema operativo actualizado y nuevos productos para consumidores el próximo mes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft is prepping updates for Media Center that include an updated OS and new consumer products, slated for introduction next month.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Next month, Microsoft plans to introduce updates for Media Center, including a new operating system and novel consumer products.

Original Text: \$10 million space shot A star-spangled rocket plane returned to space yesterday, enabling a team of entrepreneurs to collect a \$10 million prize for developing the first reusable private spacecraft.
Translation: Un avión cohete estrellado volvió al espacio ayer, permitiendo a un equipo de emprendedores recolectar un premio de \$10 millones por desarrollar la primera nave espacial privada reutilizable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A rocket plane adorned with stars made its way back to space yesterday, assisting a group of entrepreneurs in securing a prize of $10 million for creating the first privately owned reusable spacecraft.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, a star-decorated rocket plane returned to space, which allowed a team of entrepreneurs to win a $10 million reward for their development of the first private, reusable spacecraft.

Original Text: Greek anti-war activists protest visit by Powell Greek anti-war organizations and trade unions staged a big demonstration in downtown Athens Friday night to protest the planned visit to Greece by US Secretary of State
Translation: Activistas griegos contra la guerra protestan la visita de Powell. Organizaciones griegas contra la guerra y sindicatos organizaron una gran manifestación en el centro de Atenas el viernes por la noche para protestar la visita planeada a Grecia por el Secretario de Estado de los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S Secretary of State's impending visit to Greece sparked a large demonstration by Greek anti-war groups and trade unions in central Athens on Friday night.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday night, downtown Athens was the stage for a significant demonstration by Greek anti-war entities and trade unions, expressing their protest against the forthcoming visit of the U.S Secretary of State to Greece.

Original Text: Carlyle in talks with Hanjin Carlyle Group, the US private equity fund, is in talks with the Hanjin Group over the purchase of some of the South Korean conglomerate #39;s transport and logistics
Translation: Carlyle en conversaciones con Hanjin. Carlyle Group, el fondo de capital privado de EE.UU., está en conversaciones con el Grupo Hanjin sobre la compra de algunas de las áreas de transporte y logística del conglomerado surcoreano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Carlyle Group, a US private equity fund, is currently in discussion with South Korean conglomerate Hanjin Group regarding the acquisition of some of its transport and logistics sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Discussions are currently in progress between the US private equity fund, The Carlyle Group, and Hanjin Group, a South Korean conglomerate, for the possible purchase of a portion of their transport and logistics business.

Original Text: TransCanada, Petro-Canada to Develop Gas Terminal (Update2) TransCanada Corp., Canada #39;s largest pipeline operator, and oil company Petro-Canada plan to jointly develop aC\$660 million (\$504 million) terminal in Quebec to import liquefied natural gas amid growing demand for the fuel.
Translation: TransCanada, Petro-Canada desarrollarán Terminal de Gas (Actualización2) TransCanada Corp., el operador de tuberías más grande de Canadá, y la compañía petrolera Petro-Canada planean desarrollar conjuntamente una terminal de C$660 millones ($504 millones) en Quebec para importar gas natural licuado ante la creciente demanda de este combustible.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid escalating demand for fuel, TransCanada Corp, the largest pipeline operator in Canada and Petro-Canada, an oil firm, are intending to collaboratively cultivate a C$660 million ($504 million) terminal in Quebec for importing liquefied natural gas.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A joint venture is in place by TransCanada Corp, Canada's leading pipeline operator, and Petro-Canada, an oil company, to create a C$660 million ($504 million) liquefied natural gas import terminal in Quebec, in response to the expanding demand for this fuel.

Original Text: Hecht's Adopts Smarter Look  In the cosmetics department at Hecht's in downtown Washington, construction crews have ripped out the traditional glass display cases, replacing them with a system of open shelves stacked high with fragrances from Chanel, Burberry and Armani, now easily within arm's reach of the impulse buyer.
Translation: Hecht's Adopta un Aspecto más Inteligente. En el departamento de cosméticos de Hecht's en el centro de Washington, los equipos de construcción han arrancado las tradicionales vitrinas de vidrio, reemplazándolas por un sistema de estanterías abiertas llenas de fragancias de Chanel, Burberry y Armani, ahora fácilmente al alcance de los compradores impulsivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The cosmetics department at Hecht's in downtown Washington has undergone a revamp, with construction crews doing away with the usual glass display cases. A new system of accessible, open shelving is now in place, stocked to the brim with Chanel, Burberry, and Armani fragrances that are conveniently at the fingertips of an impulsive shopper.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The conventional glass display cases that once stood in the cosmetics department of downtown Washington's Hecht's store have been replaced. Construction teams have implemented a more approachable system of open shelves that are laden with fragrances from esteemed brands like Chanel, Burberry, and Armani, all strategically placed within the easy reach of spontaneous buyers.

Original Text: Democrat Slams Kerry on Hispanic Outreach (AP) AP - A Democrat whose organization spent about  #36;6 million to get out the Hispanic vote criticized John Kerry's campaign effort Wednesday and said Democrats risk becoming a permanent minority if they don't do a better job.
Translation: Demócrata Critica a Kerry por su Acercamiento a los Hispanos (AP) AP - Un demócrata cuya organización gastó aproximadamente $6 millones para movilizar el voto hispano criticó el miércoles la campaña de John Kerry y dijo que los demócratas corren el riesgo de convertirse en una minoría permanente si no hacen un mejor trabajo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Democrat, belonging to an organization that splurged approximately $6 million for Hispanic voter turnout, expressed criticism towards John Kerry's campaign strategy on Wednesday. He voiced concerns about the Democrats potentially becoming a perpetual minority if they don't enhance their performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, a Democrat, associated with an organization that invested around $6 million to rally the Hispanic vote, reproached John Kerry's campaign endeavors. He cautioned that the Democrats could become an enduring minority unless they elevate their efforts.

Original Text: Prior art claimed for concentration camp invention <strong>Letters</strong> It could only happen in <em>Letters</em>
Translation: La técnica anterior reclamada para la invención del campo de concentración <strong>Cartas</strong> Solo podría suceder en <em>Cartas</em>
Paraphrase 1: 1. The invention for concentration camps cited in prior art was discussed exclusively in the strong context of "Letters". This could happen nowhere else but in the more nuanced perspective provided by "Letters".
Paraphrase 2: 2. The claims of prior art for the invention of concentration camps strictly belong to "Letters", indicating such an event could only transpire within the emphasis of "Letters".

Original Text: Final lap for Silverstone Sports Minister Richard Caborn today categorically ruled out the Government stepping in to provide the cash to save the British Grand Prix at Silverstone.
Translation: Última vuelta para Silverstone El ministro de Deportes Richard Caborn hoy descartó categóricamente que el Gobierno intervenga para proporcionar el efectivo necesario para salvar el Gran Premio de Gran Bretaña en Silverstone.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Richard Caborn, the Sports Minister for Silverstone, emphatically clarified that the Government will not intervene with funds to rescue the British Grand Prix at Silverstone, marking the end of their run.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Government unequivocally refusing to finance the rescue of the British Grand Prix at Silverstone, has been confirmed today by Sports Minister Richard Caborn, signalling a finish to their journey.

Original Text: Intel Pentium M dual core chips? No kidding WEB SITE Digitimes, fresh from its typhoon traumas, reckons that Intel will highlight a dual core Pentium M codenamed Napa when it heralds its future directions at the Intel Developer Forum in September.
Translation: ¿Chips de doble núcleo Intel Pentium M? No es broma. WEB SITE Digitimes, recién recuperado de sus traumas por el tifón, considera que Intel destacará un Pentium M de doble núcleo con nombre en clave Napa cuando anuncie sus futuras direcciones en el Foro de Desarrolladores de Intel en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Digitimes, having recently endured typhoon troubles, suggests that Intel is set to feature a dual core Pentium M, referred to as Napa, as part of its future plans, at the anticipated Intel Developer Forum in September. No joke about the Intel Pentium M dual core chips.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Post its typhoon ordeals, Digitimes believes that a highlight of Intel's future projections at the Intel Developer Forum in September will be a dual core Pentium M dubbed Napa. There's no exaggeration about the dual core chips of Intel Pentium M.

Original Text: Report of First Birth for Cancer Survivor in a Tissue Implant A 32-year-old woman in Belgium has become the first woman ever to give birth after having ovarian tissue removed, frozen and then implanted back in her body.
Translation: Informe del Primer Nacimiento para Sobreviviente de Cáncer en un Implante de Tejido. Una mujer de 32 años en Bélgica se ha convertido en la primera mujer en dar a luz después de haberle extraído tejido ovárico, congelado y luego implantado de nuevo en su cuerpo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A first-time birth event has been recorded for a cancer survivor in Belgium who underwent a tissue implant; she is the first woman to successfully give birth after having her ovarian tissue extracted, frozen, and then reimplanted into her body when she was 32 years old.

Original Text: Newcastle #39;s profits fall Newcastle United #39;s profits for the year ending July 31 dropped more than three million pounds (\$6.7 million Cdn) from the year before, the Premier League club said Thursday.
Translation: Las ganancias del Newcastle caen. Las ganancias del Newcastle United para el año que terminó el 31 de julio cayeron más de tres millones de libras (6.7 millones de dólares canadienses) con respecto al año anterior, dijo el jueves el club de la Premier League.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Premier League club, Newcastle United, announced on Thursday that by the end of July, their annual profits have plummeted by over three million pounds (\$6.7 million Cdn) compared to the previous year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A more than three million pound (\$6.7 million Cdn) drop in annual profits for the year ending July 31 was reported by Newcastle United, the Premier League club, from the preceding year's earnings.

Original Text: Toshack #39;s big plans for Wales John Toshack will leave no stone unturned in his quest to build a Wales team capable of qualifying for the World Cup and European Championships.
Translation: Los grandes planes de Toshack #39 para Gales. John Toshack no dejará piedra sin mover en su búsqueda para construir un equipo galés capaz de clasificarse para la Copa del Mundo y los Campeonatos Europeos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. John Toshack is determined to make every effort to construct a Welsh team with the potential to qualify for the World Cup and European Championships.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In order to form a Wales team that could qualify for the World Cup and European Championships, John Toshack is planning to spare no effort.

Original Text: Syracuse Tops Mississippi St. 71-58 (AP) AP - Syracuse and Mississippi State both struggled in the first half. Hakim Warrick made sure Syracuse had a much better final 20 minutes. Warrick scored 17 of his 21 points in the second half and the fifth-ranked Orange beat No. 12 Mississippi State 71-58 Thursday night in the semifinals of the Coaches vs. Cancer Classic.
Translation: Syracuse Supera a Mississippi St. 71-58 (AP) AP - Syracuse y Mississippi State tuvieron dificultades en la primera mitad. Hakim Warrick se aseguró de que Syracuse tuviera unos últimos 20 minutos mucho mejores. Warrick anotó 17 de sus 21 puntos en la segunda mitad y el Orange, clasificado en quinto lugar, venció al No. 12 Mississippi State 71-58 la noche del jueves en las semifinales del Clásico de entrenadores contra el Cáncer.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - In the beginning, both Syracuse and Mississippi State had a difficult first half, but Hakim Warrick ensured that a much improved performance came from Syracuse in the last 20 minutes. Warrick scored 17 out of his total 21 points in the second half, ultimately helping the fifth-ranked Orange to prevail over 12th-ranked Mississippi State with a score of 71-58 on Thursday night in the semi-finals of the Coaches vs. Cancer Classic.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - The early half of the game was challenging for both the teams - Syracuse and Mississippi State. But Hakim Warrick's excellent performance in the final 20 minutes changed the game for Syracuse. Warrick, who scored 17 out of his 21 points in the latter half, led the Orange, ranked fifth, to a striking 71-58 victory over the twelfth-ranked Mississippi State in the Coaches vs. Cancer Classic semi-finals on Thursday night.

Original Text: Nintendo DS to function as a game server Nintendo today held a touch-and-feel event for its forthcoming DS handheld in Tokyo. One of the interesting tidbits revealed by president Satoru Iwata is that not only will it be possible for multiple users
Translation: Nintendo DS funcionará como un servidor de juegos. Hoy, Nintendo celebró un evento de tocar y sentir para su próxima consola portátil DS en Tokyo. Uno de los datos interesantes revelados por el presidente Satoru Iwata es que no solo será posible para múltiples usuarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, at a touch-and-feel event held in Tokyo for the forthcoming DS handheld, Nintendo's president Satoru Iwata revealed an interesting detail. The Nintendo DS is set to function as a game server, making it possible for multiple users.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During a touch-and-feel function in Tokyo for the soon-to-be-released DS handheld, Satoru Iwata, the president of Nintendo, shared that it will function as a game server for multiple users.

Original Text: Former Kan. Junior College Coach Indicted WICHITA, Kan. Dec 14, 2004 - A former junior college basketball coach was indicted on charges that he provided false academic information about his athletes to Division I schools looking to recruit the players.
Translation: Antiguo Entrenador de Colegio Junior de Kan. Acusado WICHITA, Kan. 14 de Diciembre, 2004 - Un antiguo entrenador de baloncesto de colegio junior fue acusado por cargos de proporcionar información académica falsa sobre sus atletas a escuelas de la División I que buscaban reclutar a los jugadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A past junior college basketball coach from Kansas was charged on the account of providing misleading academic information regarding his athletes when they were getting recruited by Division I schools. This indictment was announced on December 14, 2004, in Wichita, Kansas.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Wichita, Kansas, a onetime basketball coach at a Central Plains junior college was formally accused in December 2004 with the charge of presenting inaccurate academic details concerning his players to Division I schools that were interested in drafting them.

Original Text: Iraq's Forbidding 'Triangle of Death' As the offensive against Fallujah ends, U.S. military commanders have begun turning their attention to other restive regions of Iraq, where an insurgency in Sunni Muslim-dominated areas has proved resilient, possibly endangering nationwide elections scheduled for Jan. 30.
Translation: El Temible 'Triángulo de la Muerte' de Irak. A medida que la ofensiva contra Fallujah termina, los comandantes militares de EE.UU. han comenzado a dirigir su atención hacia otras regiones inquietas de Irak, donde una insurgencia en áreas dominadas por musulmanes sunitas ha demostrado ser resistente, posiblemente poniendo en peligro las elecciones nacionales programadas para el 30 de enero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As the assault on Fallujah concludes, U.S. military leaders are shifting their focus to other volatile regions of Iraq. The persistent insurgent activities in the Sunni Muslim-dominant regions may pose threats to the national elections planned for January 30.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The offensive on Fallujah wrapped up, redirecting the attention of U.S. army officials to other troubled areas of Iraq. The Sunni Muslim territories, where insurgency remains tenacious, could potentially jeopardize the elections to be held nationwide on the 30th of January.

Original Text: Technology Challenges Sprint-Nextel Merger The proposed merger of Sprint Corp. and Nextel Communications Inc. could face a rocky start as the companies work to run and eventually merge two wireless technologies without breaking the bank or losing customers.
Translation:
Los Desafíos Tecnológicos Enfrentan la Fusión de Sprint-Nextel

La fusión propuesta de Sprint Corp. y Nextel Communications Inc. podría enfrentar un inicio difícil a medida que las compañías trabajan para gestionar y eventualmente fusionar dos tecnologías inalámbricas sin romper el banco o perder clientes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The planned unification of Sprint Corp. and Nextel Communications Inc. may encounter initial problems as they strive to operate and ultimately combine two wireless technologies without going bankrupt or alienating clients.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There could be serious hitches at the outset of Sprint Corp.'s proposed merger with Nextel Communications Inc. as they attempt to manage and eventually fuse two distinct wireless technologies without financial ruin or customer loss.

Original Text: Debt Ceiling Could Be Hit This Month The government should hit the national debt #39;s \$7.4 trillion ceiling this month, and the Bush administration told Congress again Monday it should raise the limit.
Translation: Este mes podría alcanzar el límite de la Deuda Pública. Se estima que el Gobierno llegará al techo nacional de la deuda de $7.4 billones este mes, y la administración de Bush le dijo nuevamente al Congreso el lunes que debería aumentar el límite.
Paraphrase 1: 1. This month, the government could reach the national debt's $7.4 trillion limit, and the Bush administration has once again urged Congress on Monday to increase this cap.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It's predicted that the government may reach the national debt ceiling of $7.4 trillion within this month. On Monday, the Bush administration reiterated its appeal to Congress to elevate this limit.

Original Text: Els Sweats Out American Express Victory (AP) AP - The majors over, Ernie Els got a consolation prize Sunday by capturing his first World Golf Championship. Els outlasted Thomas Bjorn in a brilliantly played duel at Mount Juliet, making a 6-foot birdie on the 17th hole for a cushion he desperately needed and closing with a 3-under 69 to win the American Express Championship by one shot.
Translation: Els Suda para Alcanzar la Victoria en el American Express (AP) AP - Terminados los torneos mayores, Ernie Els obtuvo un consuelo el domingo al capturar su primer Campeonato Mundial de Golf. Els superó a Thomas Bjorn en un duelo brillantemente jugado en Mount Juliet, logrando un birdie de 6 pies en el hoyo 17 para obtener el margen que desesperadamente necesitaba y cerró con un 69 bajo par para ganar el Campeonato American Express por un solo golpe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ernie Els Achieves American Express Championship Victory, Excelling Thomas Bjorn (AP) AP - After the conclusion of the majors, Ernie Els bagged a satisfactory trophy on Sunday, winning his initial World Golf Championship. Els beautifully surpassed Thomas Bjorn in an intense competition at Mount Juliet, securing a desperate cushion he urgently required by sinking a 6-foot birdie on the 17th hole and finished with a 3-under 69, clinching the American Express Championship by a slim margin of one shot.
Paraphrase 2: 2. American Express Triumph for Els after Intense Showdown with Bjorn (AP) AP - Post the majors, Sunday saw Ernie Els earning an encapsulating reward with his premiere win at the World Golf Championship. Battling ferociously against Thomas Bjorn on the grounds of Mount Juliet, Els scored a 6-foot birdie at the decisive 17th hole, providing the much-needed lead, and ended the game with a 3-under 69. With this, he narrowly won the American Express Championship by a mere one shot difference.

Original Text: Bills RB Travis Henry Looking to Leave (AP) AP - Travis Henry wants out of Buffalo because he's unhappy with the prospect of spending another season as Willis McGahee's backup.
Translation: El corredor de Bills, Travis Henry, busca irse (AP) AP - Travis Henry quiere salir de Buffalo porque está descontento con la perspectiva de pasar otra temporada como suplente de Willis McGahee.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Travis Henry, the running back for the Bills, wants to depart from Buffalo as he is dissatisfied with the idea of continuing as Willis McGahee's understudy in another season.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Bills' running back, Travis Henry, is contemplating a possible departure from Buffalo. According to AP, he's disgruntled about having to play second fiddle to Willis McGahee for yet another season.

Original Text: Stock benchmarks in Asia fall MUMBAI: Japan #39;s Nikkei 225 Stock Average fell for the first day in four after brokerages cut their ratings on the companies, citing concern that earnings growth may slow.
Translation: Los índices de referencia de la bolsa en Asia caen MUMBAI: El índice Nikkei 225 de Japón cayó por primera vez en cuatro días después de que las corredurías redujeran sus calificaciones sobre las empresas, citando la preocupación de que el crecimiento de las ganancias pueda desacelerarse.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MUMBAI: The Nikkei 225 Stock Average in Japan experienced its first decline in four days as the stock benchmarks in Asia plunged. This came after brokerages downgraded their ratings on the companies, indicating worries about a possible slowdown in earnings growth.

Original Text: Big Upsets Shake Up AP Football Poll (AP) AP - For the first time this season, The Associated Press poll received a serious shake-up  #151; just not at the top. Big wins by Auburn, Georgia, California and Purdue, combined with surprising losses by West Virginia, Ohio State and Fresno State helped to overhaul the media poll released Sunday.
Translation: Grandes Sorpresas Sacuden la Encuesta de Fútbol AP (AP) AP - Por primera vez en esta temporada, la encuesta de Associated Press recibió un fuerte revuelo #151; solo que no en la parte superior. Grandes victorias de Auburn, Georgia, California y Purdue, combinadas con sorprendentes derrotas de West Virginia, Ohio State y Fresno State ayudaron a reformar la encuesta de los medios publicada el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - The Associated Press poll experienced its first major disruption this season, excluding the top rankings. With significant victories from teams like Auburn, Georgia, California and Purdue, and unexpected losses from West Virginia, Ohio State and Fresno State, the media poll released on Sunday saw a substantial reshuffle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - For the inaugural time this season, a considerable reshuffling occurred in The Associated Press Poll, except for the leading positions. The Sunday media poll reflected major changes due to substantial victories by Auburn, Georgia, California and Purdue and astounding defeats of West Virginia, Ohio State and Fresno State.

Original Text: Bush, Blair to Discuss Life After Arafat (Reuters) Reuters - President Bush is expected to give\an outline of his vision for a Middle East without Yasser\Arafat on Friday, with his most loyal ally Tony Blair by his\side.
Translation: Bush, Blair Discutirán la Vida Después de Arafat (Reuters) Reuters - Se espera que el presidente Bush dé un esbozo de su visión para un Medio Oriente sin Yasser Arafat el viernes, con su aliado más leal, Tony Blair, a su lado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) President Bush, accompanied by steadfast ally Tony Blair, is anticipated to elucidate his vision for a Middle-East post Yasser Arafat this Friday.

Original Text: Nokia Offers Slimmed-Down 9300 Communicator (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Nokia (NYSE: NOK) is targeting enterprise and consumer customers with a lighter, slimmed-down version of its 9300 Communicator \smartphone, which will be launched worldwide at the beginning of 2004.
Translation: Nokia ofrece una versión reducida del 9300 Communicator (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Nokia (NYSE: NOK) está dirigido a clientes empresariales y de consumo con una versión más ligera y reducida de su smartphone 9300 Communicator, que se lanzará a nivel mundial a principios de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NewsFactor reports that Nokia (NYSE: NOK) is introducing a lighter, compact version of its 9300 Communicator smartphone for both enterprise and consumer customers. This new model is set to be globally released at the start of 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the beginning of 2004, a sleeker, lighter version of Nokia's 9300 Communicator smartphone will debut globally, targeting both business and consumer customers, as per the report by NewsFactor.

Original Text: Fresh face lift ATHENS -- In a race of attrition that resembled a demolition derby as much as an Olympic final, Joanna Hayes of the United States captured gold in the 100-meter hurdles last night because she managed to keep her feet while others were losing theirs.
Translation: Cambio de imagen fresco ATENAS -- En una carrera de resistencia que se asemejaba tanto a una demolición controlada como a una final olímpica, Joanna Hayes de Estados Unidos consiguió el oro en los 100 metros con vallas anoche porque logró mantenerse en pie mientras otras perdían el suyo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS -- Emulating a destruction derby more than an Olympic final, a challenging race of attrition took place. Joanna Hayes from the United States skillfully kept her balance in the face of adversity to win the gold medal in the 100-meter hurdles last night, as her competitors lost their footing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Joanna Hayes from the United States emerged victorious last night in an intense 100-meter hurdles race that felt more like a demolition derby. Despite the chaos, Hayes kept her composure and won gold, while many others stumbled in the contest in Athens, a city refreshed with a new face.

Original Text: China mine blast kills 56 At least 56 miners were killed in a coal mine gas explosion in China last night that left another 92 missing. There is only a slim chance that those missing after the blast, at the Daping mine in Henan province
Translation: La explosión en una mina en China mata a 56. Al menos 56 mineros murieron en una explosión de gas en una mina de carbón en China anoche, dejando a otros 92 desaparecidos. Solo hay una pequeña posibilidad de que aquellos que desaparecieron después de la explosión, en la mina Daping en la provincia de Henan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a coal mine gas explosion that occurred in China's Henan province at the Daping mine last night, at least 56 miners were killed and another 92 are missing. The chances of finding the missing miners after the blast are incredibly slim.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A deadly blast at the Daping mine in Henan province, China, resulted in the unfortunate death of at least 56 miners last night. Another 92 miners are still unaccounted for and the probability of finding them is significantly low.

Original Text: Is Intel Too Optimistic? Plus, Amazon's British invasion, it's showtime for Martha, and GM's desperation gets noisier.
Translation: ¿Es Intel demasiado optimista? Además, la invasión británica de Amazon, es hora del show para Martha, y la desesperación de GM se vuelve más ruidosa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is Intel Being Overly Positive? Also, Amazon's penetration into the UK, Martha's time to shine, and increasing signs of desperation from GM.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Could Intel be Exhibiting Excessive Optimism? In addition, Amazon's expansion into Britain, the spotlight's on Martha, and GM's desperation is growing louder.

Original Text: Apple Launches ITunes Music Store in Canada Apple Computer Inc. on Thursday launched its iTunes online music store in Canada, the 14th country in which the popular service is available.
Translation: Apple lanza la tienda de música ITunes en Canadá. Apple Computer Inc. lanzó el jueves su tienda de música online iTunes en Canadá, el decimocuarto país en el que el popular servicio está disponible.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Apple Computer Inc. initiated its popular service, the iTunes online music store in Canada, marking it as the 14th country to have this service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The iTunes online music store, a product of Apple Computer Inc., was unveiled in Canada on Thursday, making it the 14th nation to house this popular service.

Original Text: Australia #39;s Sons Of Gwalia Appoints Administrator -2- MELBOURNE (Dow Jones)--Australian gold and tantalum producer Sons of Gwalia Ltd. (SGW.AU) on Monday said it had moved into voluntary administration after being unable to reach agreement with its creditors.
