Translation: Australia #39; Hijos de Gwalia Nombra Administrador -2- MELBOURNE (Dow Jones)-- El productor australiano de oro y tantalio Sons of Gwalia Ltd. (SGW.AU) dijo el lunes que había entrado en administración voluntaria después de no poder llegar a un acuerdo con sus acreedores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sons of Gwalia Ltd., an Australian-based producer of gold and tantalum, announced on Monday that they've transitioned into voluntary administration due to an inability to come to terms with their creditors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, it was reported that the Australian company Sons of Gwalia Ltd., a gold and tantalum producer, had entered voluntary administration after failing to reach a settlement with its creditors.

Original Text: Sainz takes parting shot at world rally set-up Spanish motor rally legend Carlos Sainz took a gentle swipe at the state of the world championship on Thursday after his glorious career ended with a whimper.
Translation: Sainz lanza un golpe de despedida al sistema del campeonato mundial de rally. La leyenda española de los rallys, Carlos Sainz, dio un suave golpe al estado del campeonato mundial el jueves después de que su gloriosa carrera terminara con un suspiro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After his illustrious career concluded unceremoniously, Carlos Sainz, the Spanish legend of motor rallying, subtly criticized the condition of the world championship on Thursday.

Original Text: Yes, Options Really Are an Expense One of my favorite pastimes as the final ruling on expensing stock options came upon us has been to read the increasingly hysterical opinion pages of the San Jose Mercury News, the newspaper of record for Silicon Valley.
Translation: Sí, las Opciones Realmente Son un Gasto. Uno de mis pasatiempos favoritos, al llegar la decisión final sobre la contabilización de las opciones sobre acciones, ha sido leer las cada vez más histéricas páginas de opinión del San Jose Mercury News, el periódico de referencia para Silicon Valley.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Indeed, Stock Options Certainly Count as an Expense. As the definitive decision regarding the expensing of stock options arrived, one of my preferred activities was perusing the progressively frantic opinion pages of the San Jose Mercury News, Silicon Valley's primary newspaper.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Options do indeed Count as an Expense. When the final judgement on the expensing of stock options emerged, one of my favorite hobbies was engaging with the escalatingly frenzied opinion pages of the San Jose Mercury News, the official paper for Silicon Valley.

Original Text: Sharon contacts Labor on govt coalition Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon has approached the opposition Labor party with a tentative offer to join his coalition in hopes of avoiding early elections and saving his Gaza withdrawal plan.
Translation: Sharon se pone en contacto con Labor en la coalición gubernamental. El primer ministro israelí, Ariel Sharon, ha acudido al partido de oposición Labor con una oferta tentativa para unirse a su coalición con la esperanza de evitar elecciones anticipadas y salvar su plan de retirada de Gaza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ariel Sharon, the Israeli Prime Minister, has made a preliminary offer to the opposition Labor party for a potential coalition, with the objective of preventing early elections and preserving his plan for withdrawal from Gaza.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hoping to evade early elections and ensure the preservation of his Gaza withdrawal scheme, Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon has extended a cautious offer to the opposition Labor party for a coalition.

Original Text: Rajasthan oil takes Cairn into FTSE 100 Cairn Energy, the Edinburgh oil and gas group, yesterday became one of Britain #39;s top 100 companies, despite announcing a 40 slump in half-year profits and facing questions over its key oil discovery in India.
Translation: El petróleo de Rajasthan lleva a Cairn al FTSE 100. Cairn Energy, el grupo de petróleo y gas de Edimburgo, se convirtió ayer en una de las 100 mejores compañías de Gran Bretaña, a pesar de anunciar un descenso del 40% en las ganancias de medio año y enfrentar preguntas sobre su principal descubrimiento de petróleo en India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a 40% drop in half-year profits and inquiries over its crucial oil discovery in India, Cairn Energy, an Edinburgh-based oil and gas firm, ascended to the top 100 companies in Britain yesterday, courtesy of its Rajasthan oil.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cairn Energy, an oil and gas company from Edinburgh, joined the ranks of Britain's top 100 companies yesterday. This is in spite of a 40% decline in half-year earnings and skepticism about its significant oil find in India, a move primarily driven by its Rajasthan oil.

Original Text: December 13 Titan Flyby Prelude to Landing The countdown is underway for the next flyby of the Saturian moon Titan for Monday, December 13, 2004 by the Cassini spacecraft expected to yield more detailed imaging
Translation: Preludio al aterrizaje del sobrevuelo de Titán el 13 de diciembre La cuenta atrás ha comenzado para el próximo sobrevuelo de la luna Saturiana Titán para el lunes 13 de diciembre de 2004 por la nave espacial Cassini, se espera obtener imágenes más detalladas
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Cassini spacecraft is set for its next flyby of Saturn's moon, Titan, on Monday, December 13, 2004. The countdown has begun and it is anticipated that this flyby will provide more detailed imaging.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Cassini spacecraft's forthcoming flyby of Titan, the moon of Saturn, is anticipated on Monday, December 13, 2004. The countdown for this vital journey has begun, promising to offer more comprehensive imaging.

Original Text: Administration Shifts On Global Warming A Bush administration report suggests that evidence of global warming has begun to affect animal and plant populations in visible ways, and that rising temperatures in North America are due in part to human activity.
Translation: El Cambio de la Administración sobre el Calentamiento Global Un informe de la administración Bush sugiere que las pruebas del calentamiento global han comenzado a afectar las poblaciones de animales y plantas de maneras visibles, y que el aumento de las temperaturas en América del Norte se debe en parte a la actividad humana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A report from the Bush administration proposes that the increasing global warming, partially driven by human activity, is noticeably impacting plant and animal populations in North America.

Original Text: Hewitt holds off French talent Monfils in Paris Former world number one Lleyton Hewitt held off a strong fightback by French sensation Gael Monfils to move into the third round of the Paris Masters Series indoor tournament on Tuesday.
Translation: Hewitt resiste al talento francés Monfils en París. El ex número uno del mundo, Lleyton Hewitt, resistió una fuerte contraataque de la sensación francesa Gael Monfils para avanzar a la tercera ronda del torneo indoor de la Serie Masters de París el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lleyton Hewitt, former world number one, successfully resisted a vigorous counterattack by French sensation Gael Monfils, advancing to the third round of the Paris Masters Series indoor tournament on Tuesday.

Original Text: France accepts Iraqi conference will be governments only, easing <b>...</b> In a quiet retreat, France on Monday eased off its call to include Iraqi groups that renounce violence in an international conference next month on ways to pacify their war-ravaged country.
Translation: Francia acepta que la conferencia iraquí solo será de gobiernos, aligerando <b>...</b> En un discreto repliegue, Francia el lunes mitigó su petición de incluir grupos iraquíes que renuncien a la violencia en una conferencia internacional el próximo mes sobre formas de pacificar su país devastado por la guerra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a subtle backtracking, France softened their stance on Monday, retracting their request to include groups from Iraq that condemn violence in an international conference next month aimed at finding resolutions for their conflict-stricken country.

Original Text: Ageing time-tomb brings budget angst How #39;s your health? Feeling well? Expecting to live to a ripe old age? If the answers are yes, then economically speaking, you #39;re not helping.
Translation: El envejecimiento y el tiempo-tumba causan angustia presupuestaria. ¿Cómo está tu salud? ¿Te sientes bien? ¿Esperas vivir hasta una edad avanzada? Si las respuestas son sí, entonces, económicamente hablando, no estás ayudando.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you're well and expecting a long and healthy life, then from an economic perspective, it's not beneficial as ageing can bring budgeting concerns. 'Time-tomb' of ageing is indeed a source of financial anxiety, isn't it?
Paraphrase 2: 2. The prospect of living to a ripe old age may be great for your health, but not so much for the economy. It's a financial tension, the 'time-tomb' of ageing often results in budget worries, don't you think?

Original Text: Ferguson bemoans finishing Manchester United boss Sir Alex Ferguson agreed it was handball by Louis Saha that led to their equaliser - but felt his side deserved to win.
Translation: Ferguson lamenta el final. El jefe del Manchester United, Sir Alex Ferguson, admitió que fue mano de Louis Saha la que llevó a su empate, pero sintió que su equipo merecía ganar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sir Alex Ferguson, the Manchester United manager, agreed that Louis Saha's handball led to their equalizer, yet he expressed disappointment as he believed his side should have won.

Original Text: Malnutrition Rising Among Iraq's Children (AP) AP - Malnutrition among Iraq's youngest children has nearly doubled since the U.S.-led invasion of Iraq despite U.N. efforts to deliver food to the war-ravaged country, a Norwegian research group said Monday.
Translation: Aumenta la Desnutrición Entre los Niños de Irak (AP) AP - La desnutrición entre los niños más pequeños de Irak casi se ha duplicado desde la invasión liderada por los EE.UU. a Irak, a pesar de los esfuerzos de la ONU por entregar alimentos al país devastado por la guerra, dijo un grupo de investigación noruego el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Norwegian study group announced on Monday that, despite the U.N.'s attempts to provide food to the devastated nation, the rate of malnutrition in Iraqi children has almost doubled post the U.S.-led invasion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The number of malnourished children in Iraq has soared close to twice its previous number since the U.S. invasion, even with U.N. food relief efforts, according to a report by a Norwegian research group on Monday.

Original Text: Three U.N. Hostages in Afghanistan Freed (AP) AP - Three U.N. workers kidnapped in Afghanistan have been released unharmed after more than three weeks in captivity, Afghan officials said Tuesday.
Translation: Tres Rehenes de la ONU en Afganistán Liberados (AP) AP - Tres trabajadores de la ONU secuestrados en Afganistán han sido liberados ilesos después de más de tres semanas en cautiverio, dijeron funcionarios afganos el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Two and a half weeks after their abduction, Afghan officials confirmed on Tuesday that the three U.N. employees held hostage in Afghanistan have been safely released.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Afghan officials announced on Tuesday that three kidnapped U.N. workers were safely released from over three weeks of captivity in Afghanistan. (AP)

Original Text: Video System Provides Bench Strength (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - World Champion Boston Red Sox employ video cataloguing of every pitch in every game using specialized software.
Translation: El Sistema de Video Proporciona Refuerzos (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - Los Campeones Mundiales, los Boston Red Sox, emplean un catálogo de video de cada lanzamiento en cada juego utilizando software especializado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The World Champion Boston Red Sox utilizes Ziff Davis' specialized software for video cataloguing each pitch in every game.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Using Ziff Davis' specialized software, every pitch in each game is video catalogued by the World Champion Boston Red Sox.

Original Text: A Gift Guide for Game Geeks Buying a game for a hard-core gamer with an extensive collection is a daunting task. You might be better off opting for one of the myriad accessories, soundtracks or tacky souvenirs designed for gaming fanatics. By Lore Sjberg.
Translation: Una Guía de Regalos para Geeks de los Juegos. Comprar un juego para un gamer empedernido con una colección extensa es una tarea desalentadora. Podrías estar mejor optando por uno de los innumerables accesorios, bandas sonoras o souvenirs de mal gusto diseñados para los fanáticos de los juegos. Por Lore Sjberg.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Purchasing a game for an avid gamer who owns an expansive collection can pose a significant challenge. Instead, you may find it more preferable to choose from the countless accessories, soundtracks or kitschy mementos tailored for gaming enthusiasts. Written by Lore Sjoberg.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It can be an intimidating task to buy a game for a serious game geek with a large collection. It may be wiser to consider one of the numerous gaming souvenirs, soundtracks or accessories present in the market. Article by Lore Sjoberg.

Original Text: NHL to reject players #39; latest offer: TSN TSN has obtained a memo showing the NHL will reject the latest offer from its players.  quot;In sum, we believe the Union #39;s December 9 CBA proposal, while offering necessary and significant short-term financial
Translation: La NHL rechazará la última oferta de los jugadores #39;: TSN TSN ha obtenido un memo mostrando que la NHL rechazará la última oferta de sus jugadores. "En resumen, creemos que la propuesta del CBA del Sindicato del 9 de diciembre, aunque ofrece necesaria y significativamente a corto plazo financiera
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to TSN, they have acquired a memo which indicates that the NHL is set to decline the most recent proposal from the players. To sum up, the Union's proposal for December 9 CBA, while providing necessary and significant short-term financial aspects, is believed to be unacceptable.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A memo obtained by TSN reveals that the NHL will turn down its players' newest offer. In gist, the Union's short-term financial offer made on December 9 in the CBA proposal, is seen as necessary and significant but would be rejected.

Original Text: China to launch Shenzhou VI China #39;s first manned spaceship, the Shenzhou V, was launched in October last year with one Chinese astronaut aboard for a one-day flight.
Translation: China lanzará Shenzhou VI. La primera nave espacial tripulada de China, la Shenzhou V, se lanzó en octubre del año pasado con un astronauta chino a bordo para un vuelo de un día.
Paraphrase 1: 1. China launched its first-ever manned spaceship, the Shenzhou V, in October of last year, carrying a single Chinese astronaut for a one-day voyage, and is now preparing to launch Shenzhou VI.

Original Text: Cardinals flip the flailing Dolphins 24-23 Eight seconds into the game, the Arizona Cardinals lost a fumble. They sputtered on offense, committed nine penalties and blew a late lead.
Translation: Los Cardinals voltean a los Dolphins tambaleantes 24-23. A los ocho segundos de comenzado el juego, los Arizona Cardinals perdieron un balón suelto. Tartamudearon en ofensiva, cometieron nueve penalidades y perdieron una ventaja tardía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite losing a fumble just eight seconds into the game, committing nine penalties, and squandering a late lead, the Arizona Cardinals pulled off a narrow 24-23 victory over the struggling Miami Dolphins.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Arizona Cardinals, despite their initial fumble eight seconds into the game, nine penalties, and a threatened late game lead, managed to clinch a 24-23 win against the underperforming Miami Dolphins.

Original Text: A Daily Look at U.S. Iraq Military Deaths (AP) AP - As of Wednesday, Nov. 17, 2004, at least 1,214 members of the U.S. military have died since the beginning of the Iraq war in March 2003, according to an Associated Press count. At least 944 died as a result of hostile action, the Defense Department said as of Wednesday. The figures include three military civilians.
Translation: Un Vistazo Diario a las Muertes Militares de EE.UU. en Irak (AP) AP - Para el miércoles 17 de noviembre de 2004, al menos 1,214 miembros de las fuerzas militares de EE.UU. han muerto desde el comienzo de la guerra en Irak en marzo de 2003, según un recuento de Associated Press. Al menos 944 murieron como resultado de acciones hostiles, dijo el Departamento de Defensa hasta el miércoles. Las cifras incluyen a tres civiles militares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) The Associated Press reports that, as of Wednesday, November 17, 2004, at least 1,214 U.S. military personnel including three military civilians have lost their lives since the inauguration of the Iraq war in March 2003. The Defense Department indicates that hostile action resulted in at least 944 of these deaths.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the Associated Press, as of November 17, 2004, the Iraq War, which started in March 2003, has claimed the lives of at least 1,214 U.S. military members, including three military civilians. The Defense Department reported that a minimum of 944 of these individuals was lost due to hostile encounters.

Original Text: Men of Pitcairn were just following island customs, says Australian author (AFP) AFP - Best-selling Australian author Colleen McCullough has backed the Pitcairn Islanders convicted recently of raping teenage girls, arguing they were merely following the customs of the island community, it was reported here.
Translation: Hombres de Pitcairn simplemente seguían las costumbres de la isla, dice autora australiana (AFP) AFP - La autora australiana de best-seller, Colleen McCullough, ha respaldado a los habitantes de Pitcairn recientemente condenados por violar a jóvenes adolescentes, argumentando que simplemente seguían las costumbres de la comunidad de la isla, se informó aquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australian best-selling author, Colleen McCullough, asserts that the Pitcairn Island men who were recently convicted for sexually assaulting teenage girls were simply adhering to the island's customs, as was reported. (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Best-selling author from Australia, Colleen McCullough, has defended the recent convictions of Pitcairn Islanders who raped teenage girls, citing their acts as adherence to their community customs, according to reports. (AFP)

Original Text: Vick Rallies Falcons Michael Vick throws a 27-yard scoring pass to Alge Crumpler with 1:22 remaining to finish Atlanta's rally with a 24-21 triumph over the Saints.
Translation: Vick Lidera la Remontada de los Falcons. Michael Vick lanza un pase de anotación de 27 yardas a Alge Crumpler con 1:22 restantes para terminar la remontada de Atlanta con un triunfo de 24-21 sobre los Saints.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With just 1:22 left on the clock, Michael Vick completes Atlanta's comeback by throwing a 27-yard touchdown pass to Alge Crumpler, leading the Falcons to a 24-21 victory over the Saints.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Michael Vick helps the Falcons stage a successful rally by tossing a 27-yard touchdown to Alge Crumpler with only 1:22 to spare, resulting in a 24-21 win over the Saints.

Original Text: UPDATE 3-Alpharma launches generic of Pfizer #39;s Neurontin Alpharma Inc. (ALO.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Friday began selling a cheaper generic version of Pfizer Inc. #39;s (PFE.N: Quote, Profile, Research) \$3 billion a
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 3-Alpharma lanza genérico de Neurontin de Pfizer #39; Alpharma Inc. (ALO.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) comenzó a vender una versión genérica más barata de Pfizer Inc. #39's (PFE.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) \$3 mil millones el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Alpharma Inc. (ALO.N: Quote, Profile, Research) initiated the sale of a budget-friendly generic version of Pfizer Inc.'s (PFE.N: Quote, Profile, Research) 3 billion dollar drug Neurontin.

Original Text: UK gets more phone numbers THE RASH OF VoIP services being peddled in the UK has meant that the country has to release a new batch of phone numbers. Telco watchdog Ofcom has barked that it would establish the prefix  quot;056, quot; allowing
Translation: El Reino Unido recibe más números de teléfono. LA OLA de servicios VoIP que se promocionan en el Reino Unido ha significado que el país tiene que liberar un nuevo lote de números de teléfono. El regulador de telecomunicaciones Ofcom ha indicado que establecerá el prefijo "056", permitiendo
Paraphrase 1: 1. The surging demand for VoIP services in the UK has necessitated the release of a new set of phone numbers. Ofcom, the telecom regulatory body, has asserted that it will initiate the "056" prefix.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Given the rising prevalence of VoIP services in the UK, the nation is compelled to disseminate a new series of phone numbers. Telecom regulator Ofcom has declared the establishment of the "056" prefix.

Original Text: Dollar Falls to New Low Vs Euro  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar remained under pressure  against the euro on Wednesday, after falling to a record low in  a selloff that followed a report on a narrowing U.S. trade gap.
Translation: El dólar cae a un nuevo mínimo frente al euro. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar continuó bajo presión contra el euro el miércoles, después de caer a un mínimo histórico en una venta masiva que siguió a un informe sobre una disminución en la brecha comercial de EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Due to a report pointing to a diminishing U.S. trade gap, the dollar experienced a significant selloff, resulting in it reaching a historic low against the euro on Wednesday, thereby maintaining its downward pressure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Following a report on the shrinking U.S. trade gap, the dollar's value against the euro hit an all-time low in a selloff this Wednesday, thereby sustaining its weakening stance.

Original Text: Hibbett 3Q Profit Rises to \$6.3 Million Athletic retailer Hibbett Sporting Goods Inc. said Thursday that profit rose 17 percent in the fiscal third quarter on high sales of footwear and team equipment.
Translation: El beneficio de Hibbett en el tercer trimestre sube a \$6.3 millones. El minorista de artículos deportivos Hibbett Sporting Goods Inc. dijo el jueves que las ganancias aumentaron un 17 por ciento en el tercer trimestre fiscal debido a las altas ventas de calzado y equipamiento de equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Hibbett Sporting Goods Inc. announced a 17 percent increase in profit during the fiscal third quarter, attributing the rise to high sales of footwear and team equipment, which pushed its 3Q profit to $6.3 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reporting a 17 percent profit boost in the fiscal third quarter, Hibbett Sporting Goods Inc. confirmed on Thursday that strong footwear and team equipment sales helped lift its 3Q earnings to $6.3 million.

Original Text: Portsmouth vs Tottenham match preview I don #39;t know about you, but this season really doesn #39;t feel like it #39;s started yet. You just about get into the groove of a couple of matches in a row, and then some sodding international match pops up and that #39;s it - everything goes on hold for two weeks.
Translation: Vista previa del partido Portsmouth vs Tottenham, no sé tú, pero realmente esta temporada no parece que haya comenzado todavía. Apenas te metes en el ritmo de un par de partidos seguidos, y luego aparece algún maldito partido internacional y eso es todo: todo se suspende por dos semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I don't know about your feelings, but for me, the season doesn't seem to have kicked off properly. You barely acclimate to a few consecutive matches, and suddenly an intrusive international match interrupts everything - pausing all for a fortnight. Here's a preview of the Portsmouth versus Tottenham match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Preview of the Portsmouth versus Tottenham match - Doesn't it seem to you like the season hasn't truly begun? One barely settles into the rhythm of a handful of successive games, then - boom - an unexpected international match intrudes and consequently everything is on pause for a fortnight.

Original Text: IDC Forum: Is IT creativity dead? Speaking at the IDC-sponsored European IT Forum in Paris, controversial author Nicholas G. Carr and business consultant Don Tapscott disagreed about whether IT can spark business model changes that help companies gain strategic advantages over competitors.
Translation: Foro IDC: ¿Está muerta la creatividad en TI? Hablando en el Foro Europeo de TI patrocinado por IDC en París, el polémico autor Nicholas G. Carr y el consultor de negocios Don Tapscott discreparon sobre si la TI puede provocar cambios en el modelo de negocio que ayuden a las empresas a obtener ventajas estratégicas sobre sus competidores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the IDC-hosted European IT Forum in Paris, Nicholas G. Carr, a contentious author, and business advisor Don Tapscott had divergent views on if IT can generate changes in business models giving companies competitive edges.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Differences emerged between Nicholas G. Carr, a provocative author, and Don Tapscott, a business consultant, at the European IT Forum sponsored by IDC in Paris; the debate was about the potential of IT to bring about alterations in business models, offering strategic benefits to companies.

Original Text: 'Skulls' Mobile Security Threat Seen Low-McAfee  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - A computer program known as  "Skulls" with potentially destructive capability aimed at  advanced mobile devices was seen as a low threat because it had  not targeted consumers, security software maker McAfee Inc.  said on Monday.
Translation: Amenaza de seguridad móvil 'Skulls' considerada baja-McAfee  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Un programa de computadora conocido como "Skulls" con capacidad potencialmente destructiva dirigida a dispositivos móviles avanzados fue considerado como una amenaza baja porque no había apuntado a los consumidores, dijo el lunes el fabricante de software de seguridad McAfee Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, McAfee Inc., a security software maker, stated that a computer program named "Skulls", which poses potential harm to advanced mobile devices, was considered a low threat as it did not specifically target consumers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A potentially harmful computer program called "Skulls", designed to affect advanced mobile devices, was not deemed a significant threat as it hadn't targeted consumers, according to a statement by security software producer, McAfee Inc. on Monday.

Original Text: Owen Profits in Real Romp Michael Owen continued to profit in the Primera Liga with his sixth goal in eight games for Real Madrid while England team-mate David Beckham allayed concerns over his fitness by starting against Albacete tonight.
Translation: Owen se beneficia en verdadero jolgorio. Michael Owen continuó beneficiándose en la Primera Liga con su sexto gol en ocho partidos para el Real Madrid, mientras que su compañero de equipo en Inglaterra, David Beckham, disipó las preocupaciones sobre su estado físico al comenzar contra Albacete esta noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Michael Owen maintained his profitable streak in the Primera Liga by netting his sixth goal in eight games for Real Madrid. Meanwhile, his England teammate, David Beckham, dispelled fitness worries by participating in tonight's game against Albacete.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Continuing his scoring spree in the Primera Liga, Michael Owen netted his sixth goal in eight matches for Real Madrid. Concurrently, starting against Albacete tonight, David Beckham, his teammate from England, eased fears about his physical condition.

Original Text: Legal action possible in elephant fight The struggle over the fate of two aging elephants at the Detroit Zoo might move to a new battleground, the zoo director said Friday.
Translation: Es posible una acción legal en la pelea por elefantes. La lucha por el destino de dos elefantes envejecidos en el zoológico de Detroit podría trasladarse a un nuevo campo de batalla, dijo el director del zoológico el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The fate of two elderly elephants at the Detroit Zoo might lead to a legal battle, stated the zoo director on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The zoo director on Friday suggested that the dispute concerning two old elephants at the Detroit Zoo might escalate to legal proceedings.

Original Text: UPDATE 1-Everton #39;s Rooney hands in transfer request Everton #39;s teenage England striker Wayne Rooney has handed in a transfer request, the Premier League club announced on Friday. Everton have turned down two bids estimated at 20 million
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1- Rooney del Everton #39 entrega solicitud de transferencia. El joven delantero inglés del Everton, Wayne Rooney, ha entregado una solicitud de transferencia, anunció el club de la Premier League el viernes. Everton ha rechazado dos ofertas estimadas en 20 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Everton's young English striker, Wayne Rooney, has submitted a transfer request, the club confirmed on Friday after rejecting two approximated 20 million bids. This news has created waves in the Premier League.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the Premier League club, Everton, disclosed that their teenage striker from England, Wayne Rooney, has filed for a transfer. Following this, they have declined two purchase propositions estimated to be around 20 million.

Original Text: Delta Halfway Through Restructuring - WSJ  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A>, still hoping  to avoid filing for bankruptcy, has completed about half its  planned restructuring, the Wall Street Journal reported on  Tuesday.
Translation: Delta a Mitad de Camino en la Reestructuración - WSJ NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A>, aún tiene la esperanza de evitar la quiebra, ha completado aproximadamente la mitad de su reestructuración planeada, según informó el Wall Street Journal el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the Wall Street Journal on Tuesday, Delta Air Lines (DAL.N), who is trying to prevent filing for bankruptcy, has achieved approximately 50% of its designated restructuring.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per a Tuesday report from Wall Street Journal, the Delta Air Lines (DAL.N) which is striving to avert bankruptcy, has successfully undergone about half of the planned restructuring.

Original Text: Intel plans for digital planet <strong>IDF Fall '04</strong> Think different, developers told
Translation: Intel planea para el planeta digital <strong>IDF Otoño '04</strong> Piensa diferente, se les dijo a los desarrolladores
Paraphrase 1: 1. Developers were advised to think differently for Intel's digital planet "IDF Fall '04" plan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Intel urges developers to think differently in planning for the "IDF Fall '04" digital planet.

Original Text: Shrek creator makes dream debut Spurred on by a large, green ogre, buoyed by a school of wise-cracking fish and with a podgy superhero helping its cause, DreamWorks Animation yesterday saw its share price rise by 41 on its first day of trading.
Translation: El creador de Shrek hace un debut soñado. Impulsado por un gran ogro verde, animado por una escuela de peces bromistas y con un superhéroe regordete ayudando a su causa, DreamWorks Animation vio ayer su precio de acción subir 41 en su primer día de negociación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DreamWorks Animation's share price soared by 41 percent on its first day of trading, thanks to the influence of its creations - a large green ogre, a group of witty fish, and a chubby superhero.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With successful characters like a hefty green ogre, a swarm of sarcastic fish, and a plus-sized superhero under its belt, DreamWorks Animation experienced a 41% surge in its share price on its premiere trading day.

Original Text: Microsoft #39;s Novell Settlement Clears Hurdles Goldman Sachs maintained an  quot;outperform quot; rating on Microsoft (nasdaq: MSFT - news - people ), saying the software company #39;s \$536 million settlement with Novell (nasdaq: NOVL - news - people ) clears more antitrust hurdles.
Translation: La resolución de Microsoft #39 con Novell supera obstáculos. Goldman Sachs mantuvo su calificación de "rendimiento superior" para Microsoft (nasdaq: MSFT - noticias - personas), indicando que la liquidación de \$536 millones de la empresa de software con Novell (nasdaq: NOVL - noticias - personas) supera más obstáculos antimonopolio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The settlement of Microsoft, amounting to $536 million, with Novell has successfully surpassed more anti-trust obstacles, according to Goldman Sachs, who has retained an "outperform" rating for Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT - news - people).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft's (nasdaq: MSFT - news - people) $536 million settlement with Novell (nasdaq: NOVL - news - people) is successfully overcoming further antitrust challenges, prompting Goldman Sachs to uphold their "outperform" rating on the software giant.

Original Text: Celtic hit by Dons in full spate Resurgent Aberdeen, all of brave, magnificent and lucky, bludgeoned Celtic in their own back yard last night. This was a mesmerising match, distinguished by two impossibly early Aberdeen goals followed by
Translation: El Celtic golpeado por los Dons en plena ebullición. Resurgente Aberdeen, todo valiente, magnífico y afortunado, golpeó al Celtic en su propio patio trasero anoche. Este fue un partido hipnotizante, distinguido por dos goles de Aberdeen imposiblemente tempranos seguidos por
Paraphrase 1: 1. With a stroke of bravery, magnificence, and luck, the resurgent Aberdeen team flouted Celtic in their home ground last night in a fascinating match. It was marked by two early goals from Aberdeen unheard of in recent times, followed by...

Original Text: Gravely Ill Arafat Arrives in France for Treatment  VILLACOUBLAY MILITARY AIRFIELD, France (Reuters) -  Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, weakened by what doctors  think may be leukemia, left the West Bank for the first time in  2-1/2 years on Friday and flew to France for medical treatment.
Translation: Arafat gravemente enfermo llega a Francia para recibir tratamiento. CAMPO DE AVIACIÓN MILITAR VILLACOUBLAY, Francia (Reuters) - El líder palestino Yasser Arafat, debilitado por lo que los médicos creen que puede ser leucemia, salió de Cisjordania por primera vez en 2 años y medio el viernes y voló a Francia para recibir tratamiento médico.
Paraphrase 1: 1) VILLACOUBLAY MILITARY AIRFIELD, France (Reuters) - After a severe illness which doctors suspect could be leukemia, Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat has left the West Bank for the first time in over two years. On Friday, he arrived in France to receive medical treatment.
Paraphrase 2: 2) VILLACOUBLAY MILITARY AIRFIELD, France (Reuters) - Yasser Arafat, the Palestinian leader who is seriously ill with a possible diagnosis of leukemia, flew out of the West Bank on Friday. This is the first time he has left in 2-1/2 years, and he has now arrived in France for medical care.

Original Text: A deadly reversal I hope that newspapers do not represent public opinion. If they do, it means that we consider the Home Secretary #39;s love affair more important than the resumption of the most deadly conflict since the second world war.
Translation: Una reversión mortal espero que los periódicos no representen la opinión pública. Si lo hacen, significa que consideramos el romance del Ministro del Interior más importante que la reanudación del conflicto más letal desde la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I sincerely hope that the opinions expressed in newspapers don't mirror the general public's views. Because if they do, it suggests that people regard the Home Secretary's love affair as being of more significance than the resurgence of the deadliest conflict since World War II.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is my fervent wish that the narrative portrayed in papers is not reflective of the prevailing public sentiment. If it is indeed so, it would imply that the Home Secretary's romantic indiscretions are deemed more noteworthy than what appears to be the most devastating clash since World War II.

Original Text: Microsoft Unveils Windows XP 'Starter Edition' Microsoft announced Wednesday it would offer a low-cost starter edition of its Windows XP operating system in Asia starting in October, as it strives to hold onto market share facing erosion from the open-source Linux system and software piracy.
Translation: Microsoft presenta Windows XP 'Edición de inicio' Microsoft anunció el miércoles que ofrecerá una versión de inicio de bajo costo de su sistema operativo Windows XP en Asia a partir de octubre, ya que se esfuerza por mantener su cuota de mercado frente a la erosión del sistema de código abierto Linux y la piratería de software.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Microsoft publicized its intention to launch a low-budget version of its Windows XP, dubbed 'Starter Edition,' in Asia by October. This is in response to the threats posed by the open-source Linux system and rampant software piracy, as Microsoft aims to maintain its market share.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft declared their plans on Wednesday to introduce a budget-friendly 'Starter Edition' of its Windows XP OS in Asia in October. This move acts as a countermeasure against the inroads of the open-source Linux system and software piracy, preserving their market foothold.

Original Text: Virgin offers music downloads Virgin has become the latest company to launch an online music download service, but UK music fans will have to wait before they can give it a try.
Translation: Virgin ofrece descargas de música. Virgin se ha convertido en la última empresa en lanzar un servicio de descarga de música en línea, pero los fanáticos de la música del Reino Unido tendrán que esperar antes de poder probarlo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Virgin has recently joined the ranks of companies initiating an online music download service, though UK listeners will have to be patient before they can test it out.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The most recent company to introduce an online music download feature is Virgin, however, music enthusiasts in the UK will have to postpone before they can attempt using it.

Original Text: NASA tries to salvage solar dust NASA experts were today studying the debris from the Genesis capsule that crashed as it brought back samples of solar particles - the latest in a series of setbacks for the US space agency as it seeks to get its space program back on course.
Translation: La NASA intenta rescatar polvo solar. Los expertos de la NASA estudiaban hoy los escombros de la cápsula Génesis que se estrelló al traer de vuelta muestras de partículas solares - el último de una serie de contratiempos para la agencia espacial estadounidense mientras busca encauzar nuevamente su programa espacial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, NASA experts are analyzing the wreckage from the Genesis capsule which crashed while returning with solar particle samples, marking the latest hiccup in an ongoing effort to steer the US space program back on track.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As part of attempts by NASA to reorient the US space program after various mishaps, the agency's specialists are currently examining the remnants of the Genesis capsule, which unfortunately crashed while carrying samples of solar dust.

Original Text: Theft charges filed against four former Microsoft workers NOVEMBER 15, 2004 (COMPUTERWORLD) - Four former Microsoft Corp. employees have been charged with theft, conspiracy, mail fraud and money laundering in connection with the alleged theft and resale of \$32 million of Microsoft software.
Translation: Se presentan cargos por robo contra cuatro ex trabajadores de Microsoft NOVIEMBRE 15, 2004 (COMPUTERWORLD) - Cuatro ex empleados de Microsoft Corp. han sido acusados de robo, conspiración, fraude postal y lavado de dinero en relación con el supuesto robo y reventa de $32 millones en software de Microsoft.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Four ex-employees of Microsoft Corp were formally accused on November 15, 2004, of crimes including theft, conspiracy, mail fraud, and money laundering, linked to the alleged stealing and subsequent reselling of Microsoft software worth $32 million (COMPUTERWORLD).
Paraphrase 2: 2. On November 15, 2004, legal charges encompassing theft, conspiracy, mail fraud, and money laundering were levelled against four one-time Microsoft Corp workers. These charges were associated with the suspected theft and resale of Microsoft software totaling $32 million in value (COMPUTERWORLD).

Original Text: Canada PM Says Haiti Election Must Include Lavalas Canadian Prime Minister Paul Martin told Haitian leaders on Sunday that deposed President Jean-Bertrand Aristide #39;s political party must take part in new elections.
Translation: El Primer Ministro de Canadá dice que las elecciones en Haití deben incluir a Lavalas. El Primer Ministro canadiense, Paul Martin, dijo a los líderes haitianos el domingo que el partido político del depuesto presidente Jean-Bertrand Aristide debe participar en las nuevas elecciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Prime Minister of Canada, Paul Martin, insisted to Haitian authorities on Sunday that the political party of ousted President Jean-Bertrand Aristide, Lavalas, has to be involved in the forthcoming elections.

Original Text: FEC is left in limbo by ruling US District Court Judge Colleen Kollar-Kotelly has struck down 15 Federal Election Commission (FEC) regulations governing activities ranging from political coordination to state party fundraising, throwing candidates and election lawyers into confusion 43
Translation: La FEC queda en el limbo por el fallo de la jueza del Tribunal de Distrito de Estados Unidos, Colleen Kollar-Kotelly, quien ha derribado 15 regulaciones de la Comisión Federal de Elecciones (FEC) que rigen actividades que van desde la coordinación política hasta la recaudación de fondos del partido estatal, arrojando a los candidatos y abogados electorales en confusión 43
Paraphrase 1: 1. US District Court Judge Colleen Kollar-Kotelly's ruling, which struck down 15 Federal Election Commission (FEC) regulations governing activities such as political coordination and state party fundraising, has left the FEC in a state of uncertainty and caused confusion among candidates and election lawyers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Federal Election Commission (FEC) is in a state of disarray after US District Court Judge Colleen Kollar-Kotelly nullified 15 of its regulations. These touch on a wide range of activities from political synchronization to state party fundraising, causing a wave of confusion for candidates and election attorneys involved.

Original Text: UPS to buy Menlo arm from CNF NEW YORK (CBS.MW) -- United Parcel Service is buying Menlo Worldwide Forwarding Inc., a global freight-shipping business and subsidiary of CNF Inc.
Translation: UPS comprará la división Menlo de CNF NUEVA YORK (CBS.MW) -- United Parcel Service está comprando Menlo Worldwide Forwarding Inc., un negocio global de envío de mercancías y subsidiaria de CNF Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. United Parcel Service is set to acquire Menlo Worldwide Forwarding Inc., a global freight-shipping subsidiary of CNF Inc., in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In New York, the Menlo Worldwide Forwarding Inc., a global freight-shipping subsidiary of CNF Inc., will be purchased by United Parcel Service.

Original Text: Investors Take a Holiday  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Investors may pack up and leave next  week as the Republican National Convention comes to New York  and many on Wall Street take a vacation, draining U.S. markets  of volume and leaving stocks flopping around with little  direction.
Translation: Los Inversores Se Toman un Descanso NEW YORK (Reuters) - Los inversores podrían empacar y marcharse la próxima semana mientras la Convención Nacional Republicana llega a Nueva York y muchos en Wall Street se toman unas vacaciones, drenando los mercados estadounidenses de volumen y dejando las acciones flotando sin mucha dirección.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - As the Republican National Convention arrives in New York next week, many Wall Street investors may decide to go on vacation. This could result in a lack of volume in the U.S. markets, leading to disoriented stock movements.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The upcoming Republican National Convention in New York might see a decrease in market activity as many investors are likely to be on vacation. The absence of these Wall Street figures could result in a significant drain in U.S. market volume, causing undirected fluctuations in stock values.

Original Text: Macromedia Sells Web Conferencing By The Minute com. Macromedia on Tuesday opened up its Breeze Live hosted Web conferencing service to smaller shops by adding pay-as-you-go pricing to the subscription deals it had earlier offered.
Translation: Macromedia Vende Conferencias Web por Minuto com. Macromedia abrió el martes su servicio de conferencias web alojado Breeze Live a tiendas más pequeñas al agregar precios de pago por uso a las ofertas de suscripción que había ofrecido anteriormente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Macromedia expanded its Breeze Live hosted Web conferencing service to include smaller businesses by introducing a pay-as-you-go option alongside its earlier subscription plans. This new pricing strategy essentially allows customers to purchase web conferencing by the minute.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Macromedia's Breeze Live hosted Web conferencing service was broadened on Tuesday to cater to smaller enterprises, by unveiling a pay-as-you-go pricing method in addition to its previously established subscription packages. They essentially permit web conferencing to be sold by the minute.

Original Text: Virginia 78, No. 10 Arizona 60 Just two games into his college career, Sean Singletary has helped Virginia beat the nation #39;s No. 10 team and created a buzz at University Hall.
Translation: Virginia 78, No. 10 Arizona 60. Apenas dos partidos en su carrera universitaria, Sean Singletary ha ayudado a Virginia a vencer al equipo número 10 de la nación y ha creado un revuelo en University Hall.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Only in his second college basketball match, Sean Singletary has already made a significant impact by assisting Virginia to triumph over the nation's 10th-ranked team, Arizona, with a 78-60 score, creating excitement at University Hall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sean Singletary has quickly sparked excitement at University Hall by aiding Virginia in their victory over Arizona, the nation's No. 10 team, by a score of 78-60 in just his second game of college career.

Original Text: U.S. Women Opens Up 51-44 Lead on Russia (AP) AP - Shannon Johnson's mid-range jumper in the closing seconds of the third quarter helped the United States open up a 51-44 lead over Russia in the semifinals of the Olympic women's basketball tournament Friday.
Translation: EE.UU. abre una ventaja de 51-44 sobre Rusia (AP) AP - El tiro a media distancia de Shannon Johnson en los últimos segundos del tercer cuarto ayudó a Estados Unidos a abrir una ventaja de 51-44 sobre Rusia en las semifinales del torneo de baloncesto femenino olímpico el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shannon Johnson's final shot in the third quarter aids the U.S. Women in securing a 51-44 lead against Russia in the Olympic women's basketball semifinals (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the help of Shannon Johnson's timely shot just before the third quarter ended, the United States' Women team has established a 51-44 lead over Russia in the women's Olympic basketball semifinals on Friday (AP).

Original Text: Serb general faces Hague tribunal A Bosnian Serb general indicted for war crimes is to be transferred to The Hague, the chief UN war crimes prosecutor says.
Translation: Un general serbio se enfrenta al tribunal de La Haya. Un general serbio bosnio acusado de crímenes de guerra será trasladado a La Haya, según dice el fiscal jefe de crímenes de guerra de la ONU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The chief UN war crimes prosecutor says a Bosnian Serb general, who has been indicted for war crimes, is scheduled for transfer to The Hague tribunal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the chief UN war crimes prosecutor, a Bosnian Serb general charged with war crimes is set to be brought before The Hague tribunal.

Original Text: Russians seek Hamilton #39;s gold MOSCOW The Russian Olympic Committee has asked the Court of Arbitration for Sport to strip Tyler Hamilton of his Olympic cycling gold medal and award it to Vyacheslav Ekimov.
Translation: Los rusos buscan el oro de Hamilton #39; MOSCÚ El Comité Olímpico Ruso ha solicitado a la Corte de Arbitraje Deportivo que despoje a Tyler Hamilton de su medalla de oro olímpica en ciclismo y se la otorgue a Vyacheslav Ekimov.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Moscow, the Russian Olympic Committee has appealed to the Court of Arbitration for Sport, wanting Tyler Hamilton's Olympic cycling gold medal rescinded and re-awarded to Vyacheslav Ekimov.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Russian Olympic Committee, based in Moscow, has appealed to the Court of Arbitration for Sport to reassign Tyler Hamilton's Olympic cycling gold medal to Vyacheslav Ekimov.

Original Text: Update 2: Viacom Posts Loss on Blockbuster Charge Viacom Inc., the media conglomerate that owns CBS and MTV, posted a third-quarter loss of \$487.6 million Thursday as its earnings were hit by a \$1.
Translation: Actualización 2: Viacom Registra Pérdidas Debido a Cargos de Blockbuster Viacom Inc., el conglomerado de medios que posee CBS y MTV, registró una pérdida en el tercer trimestre de $487.6 millones el jueves dado que sus ganancias fueron afectadas por un cargo de $1.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Revision 2: Viacom Records Loss Due to Blockbuster Charge, Viacom Inc., the parent company of CBS and MTV, announced a significant third-quarter shortfall of $487.6 million on Thursday, primarily due to a $1 hit on its earnings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Update 2: Viacom Suffers Loss from Blockbuster Charge, Thursday saw CBS and MTV's parent company, Viacom Inc., declare a third-quarter deficit of $487.6 million, impacted by a $1 source of reduction in its earnings.

Original Text: Hard drive with 23,000 Social Security numbers disappears California State University officials believe the data was inadvertently thrown away, triggering a new state law requiring all people whose information was stolen to be notified.
Translation: Desaparece disco duro con 23,000 números de Seguridad Social. Los funcionarios de la Universidad Estatal de California creen que los datos se tiraron inadvertidamente, lo que desencadenó una nueva ley estatal que requiere que todas las personas cuya información fue robada sean notificadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. California State University officials estimate that 23,000 Social Security numbers held on a missing hard drive may have accidentally been disposed of, prompting the implementation of a new state law that mandates notifying all parties whose information was potentially compromised.
Paraphrase 2: 2. University officials from California State believe that a hard drive, containing 23,000 Social Security numbers, was mistakenly discarded. This incident triggered a new state law which mandates notifying everyone whose personal information was at risk.

Original Text: Analysts: Putin Has Squandered Influence (AP) AP - Russian President Vladimir Putin has dented his prestige and squandered influence by backing the wrong side in political clashes in Ukraine and in the breakaway Georgian province of Abkhazia, analysts say.
Translation: Analistas: Putin ha desperdiciado su influencia (AP) AP - El presidente ruso, Vladimir Putin, ha dañado su prestigio y desperdiciado su influencia al respaldar al lado equivocado en los enfrentamientos políticos en Ucrania y en la provincia separatista de Abjasia en Georgia, dicen los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) According to analysts, Vladimir Putin, the Russian President, has tarnished his reputation and wasted his influence by siding with the wrong parties in political conflicts both in Ukraine and the secessionist Georgian region of Abkhazia (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) Putin's support for the opposing factions in political disputes in Ukraine and in Abkhazia, a separatist province in Georgia, has cost him both his reputation and influence, state analysts (AP).

Original Text: Focus: Crisis in Darfur The situation continues to deteriorate in western Sudan more than 18-months after a rebel uprising provoked a harsh government response.
Translation: Enfoque: Crisis en Darfur. La situación continúa deteriorándose en el oeste de Sudán, más de 18 meses después de que un alzamiento rebelde provocara una dura respuesta gubernamental.
Paraphrase 1: 1. More than 18 months following a harsh government rebuttal to a rebel uprising, the crisis in Darfur, western Sudan, persistently worsens.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the passage of over 18 months since a rebellion incited a severe response from the government, the turmoil in Darfur, located in western Sudan, remains on a downward spiral.

Original Text: L.A. Development Unearths Indian Cemetery (AP) AP - It was inevitable that crews building a massive housing development near west Los Angeles wetlands would unearth American Indian remains.
Translation: Desarrollo en L.A. Descubre Cementerio Indio (AP) AP - Era inevitable que los equipos construyendo un enorme desarrollo de viviendas cerca de los humedales del oeste de Los Ángeles descubrieran restos de indígenas americanos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - Given the location near the wetlands of Western Los Angeles, the discovery of American Indian remains by construction crews working on a large residential project was unavoidable.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - The unearthing of American Indian remains was inevitable in the face of the substantial housing construction ongoing near the wetlands in Western L.A.

Original Text: Paper peace doves fall over southern Thailand as violence <b>...</b> PATTANI : Fifty aircraft scattered 120 million paper birds across southern Thailand on Sunday in a peace gesture marred by new killings in the troubled Muslim-majority region.
Translation: Palomas de papel caen sobre el sur de Tailandia en un gesto de paz a medida que aumenta la violencia <b>...</b> PATTANI: Cincuenta aviones esparcieron 120 millones de pájaros de papel por todo el sur de Tailandia el domingo, en un gesto de paz empañado por nuevos asesinatos en la conflictiva región de mayoría musulmana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Fifty aircraft released 120 million paper birds over the southern region of Thailand, to signify a peace gesture amid new acts of violence in the Muslim-dominated troubled area, this Sunday in Pattani. The symbolic paper doves however fell during a period of conflict in South Thailand.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Sunday in Pattani, an act of peace was contradicted by fresh killings in the unstable Muslim-majority region, as fifty aircraft dispersed 120 million paper peace doves across southern Thailand.

Original Text: Microsoft, Swatch Offer New Wireless Watches  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> and watch  maker Swatch <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=UHR.VX qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">UHR.VX</A>  are offering wireless data watches with  faster information updates at lower prices than earlier models,  the companies said on Wednesday.
Translation: Microsoft, Swatch Ofrecen Nuevos Relojes Inalámbricos  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> y el fabricante de relojes Swatch <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=UHR.VX qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">UHR.VX</A> están ofreciendo relojes de datos inalámbricos con actualizaciones de información más rápidas a precios más bajos que los modelos anteriores, dijeron las empresas el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. New wireless watches, offering faster data updates at lower prices than their predecessors, are being introduced by Microsoft Corp. and watch company Swatch, the companies announced on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft Corp. and Swatch are unveiling wireless data watches with quickened information refreshes at more affordable prices compared to previous models, as stated by the firms on Wednesday.

Original Text: EU assembly to describe Darfur crisis as genocide By Reuters <b>...</b> The European Parliament is set to call violence in Sudan #39;s Darfur region  quot;tantamount to genocide quot; later this week, echoing strong statements from the United States and toughening the EU stance.
Translation: La Asamblea de la EU describe la crisis en Darfur como genocidio por Reuters <b>...</b> Se espera que el Parlamento Europeo califique la violencia en la región de Darfur en Sudán #39 como "equivalente a genocidio" a finales de esta semana, haciendo eco de las fuertes declaraciones de los Estados Unidos y endureciendo la postura de la UE.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European Parliament intends to label the violence in Sudan's Darfur region as "tantamount to genocide" in the coming week, reinforcing the powerful assertions made by the United States, and amplifying the EU perspective on the Darfur crisis, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mirroring the forceful declarations of the United States, the European Parliament is preparing to announce this week that the Darfur crisis, a situation of violence in Sudan's region, equates to genocide, thereby strengthening the EU viewpoint, states a report by Reuters.

Original Text: Serena Williams picks China Open title Serena Williams of US holds the championship trophy after defeating Svetlana Kuznetsova of Russia in the inaugural China Open women #39;s final September 26, 2004, in Beijing.
Translation: Serena Williams gana el título del Abierto de China. Serena Williams de EE.UU sostiene el trofeo de campeonato después de derrotar a Svetlana Kuznetsova de Rusia en la final inaugural femenina del Abierto de China el 26 de septiembre de 2004, en Beijing.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Serena Williams, the US tennis player, won the championship title at the inaugural China Open women's final after defeating Russian player, Svetlana Kuznetsova on September 26, 2004, in Beijing.

Original Text: Severn Trent First-Half Net Falls 27 on Pension Cost (Update1) Severn Trent Plc, the UK #39;s second- largest publicly traded water company, said first-half profit fell 27 percent because of higher pension charges and the impact of exchange rates.
Translation: La utilidad neta de la primera mitad del año de Severn Trent cae un 27% debido a los costos de pensiones (Actualización1) Severn Trent Plc, la segunda empresa de agua cotizada en bolsa más grande del Reino Unido, anunció que las ganancias del primer semestre cayeron un 27 por ciento debido a los mayores costos de las pensiones y al impacto de los tipos de cambio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Severn Trent Plc, the second-largest water company in the UK traded publically, announced a 27 percent decline in the first-half net profit due to rising pension charges and currency exchange rate effects.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Because of increased pension expenses and the influence of exchange rates, Severn Trent Plc, which ranks as the UK's second biggest water company listed publicly, witnessed a 27 percent drop in its first-half profit.

Original Text: Pompey #39;s Yakubu Gets The Better Of Spurs Portsmouth deservedly beat Tottenham 1-0 at Fratton Park on Monday night as their forwards Yakubu and Lomana LuaLua came out on top against the previously watertight Tottenham defence.
Translation: Yakubu de Pompey supera a Spurs. Portsmouth merecidamente venció a Tottenham 1-0 en Fratton Park el lunes por la noche, ya que sus delanteros Yakubu y Lomana LuaLua se impusieron ante la previamente infranqueable defensa de Tottenham.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday night, Portsmouth triumphed over Tottenham with a deserved 1-0 victory at Fratton Park. Their strikers, Yakubu and Lomana LuaLua, managed to breakthrough Tottenham's formerly stringent defence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yakubu and Lomana LuaLua of Portsmouth bested Tottenham's hitherto impenetrable defence on Monday night, leading their team to a well-deserved 1-0 victory at the Fratton Park.

Original Text: Kazaa secret command unlocked by court A secret command that showed the number of connected users of the Kazaa file-sharing software was demonstrated to Federal Court on Thursday.
Translation: Un comando secreto de Kazaa fue desbloqueado por el tribunal. Un comando secreto que mostraba el número de usuarios conectados al software de intercambio de archivos Kazaa se demostró en el Tribunal Federal el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A secret feature revealing the count of linked users on the Kazaa file-sharing platform was displayed to the Federal Court on Thursday through the unlocking of a concealed command by the court.

Original Text: Bush, Kerry trade shots on bin Laden, economy, health care (AFP) AFP - US President George W. Bush and Democratic White House hopeful John Kerry battled over Iraq, terrorism, health care, and jobs, hoping their final debate would break their deadlocked race.
Translation: Bush, Kerry intercambian golpes sobre bin Laden, economía, atención médica (AFP) AFP - El presidente de los Estados Unidos, George W. Bush y el aspirante demócrata a la Casa Blanca, John Kerry, lucharon sobre Iraq, terrorismo, atención médica y empleos, con la esperanza de que su último debate rompiera su carrera en punto muerto.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - Hoping that their ultimate argumentation would break their gridlocked race, U.S. President George W. Bush and the Democratic contender for the White House, John Kerry, sparred over issues concerning Iraq, terrorism, health care, and employment.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - John Kerry, the Democratic prospect for the White House, and U.S. President George W. Bush involved in a fierce debate over Iraq, terrorism, jobs, and health care, with hopes that this last confrontation could shatter their current stalemate.

Original Text: Fight on court between Pistons and Pacers leads to ugly brawl in <b>...</b> Players and fans exchanged punches in the stands as an NBA game turned so ugly a police investigation was necessary. Indiana #39;s Ron Artest and Stephen Jackson charged into the stands and fought with fans in
Translation: La pelea en la cancha entre Pistons y Pacers provoca una fea trifulca en <b>...</b> Jugadores y aficionados intercambiaron golpes en las gradas mientras un juego de la NBA se volvía tan feo que era necesaria una investigación policial. Ron Artest y Stephen Jackson de Indiana #39 se lanzaron a las gradas y pelearon con los aficionados en
Paraphrase 1: 1. An ugly brawl ensued on the court between the Pistons and the Pacers, leading to a violent exchange of punches between the players and fans in the stands. The situation escalated to such an extent that it required a police investigation. Notably, Indiana's players, namely Ron Artest and Stephen Jackson, charged into the stands to engage in fights with the fans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A basketball court skirmish between the Pistons and Pacers escalated into an unseemly brawl involving both players and spectators. An NBA game rapidly descended into such chaos and violence that a law enforcement assessment became a necessity. Infamously, amongst the players from Indiana, Ron Artest and Stephen Jackson were the ones who took the fight straight to the stands, battling with fans.

Original Text: Quarterback faceoff a bit of a throwback With precision passing, Joe Montana directed the San Francisco 49ers to four Super Bowl titles. Dan Marino used his amazing arm to amass more than 61,000 passing yards in an unforgettable career with the Miami Dolphins.
Translation: Enfrentamiento de quarterbacks un poco a la antigua. Con pases de precisión, Joe Montana dirigió a los San Francisco 49ers a cuatro títulos del Super Bowl. Dan Marino utilizó su increíble brazo para acumular más de 61,000 yardas de pase en una carrera inolvidable con los Miami Dolphins.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With astute accuracy in his throws, Joe Montana led the San Francisco 49ers to victory in four Super Bowls, a tradition that mirrors the nostalgic quarterback duel. In his reminiscent career, Dan Marino harnessed the power of his incredible arm to accumulate more than 61,000 passing yards while playing for the Miami Dolphins.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Precision throwing was the key to Joe Montana's leadership when the San Francisco 49ers clinched four Super Bowl titles, a notable throwback to the classic faceoff between quarterbacks. Dan Marino's remarkable arm strength allowed him to rack up over 61,000 passing yards in his distinguished career at the Miami Dolphins.

Original Text: Vikings #39; Moss probable with ankle injury Randy Moss left Vikings practice Thursday afternoon with a sore ankle, but the All-Pro wide receiver isn #39;t expected to miss any action Sunday at Houston.
Translation: Es probable que el Vikingo #39; Moss juegue a pesar de la lesión en el tobillo. Randy Moss abandonó la práctica de los Vikingos el jueves por la tarde con un tobillo dolorido, pero no se espera que el receptor abierto All-Pro se pierda ninguna acción el domingo en Houston.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite leaving Thursday's Vikings practice due to an ankle soreness, it's likely that All-Pro wide receiver Randy Moss will not be absent in the Sunday game at Houston.

Original Text: DJ to acquire MarketWatch Dow Jones  amp; Co., publisher of the Wall Street Journal, says it has agreed to buy online news site MarketWatch Inc. in a \$519 million deal that widens its Internet audience.
Translation: DJ para adquirir MarketWatch Dow Jones & Co., el editor del Wall Street Journal, dice que ha acordado comprar el sitio de noticias en línea MarketWatch Inc. en un acuerdo de 519 millones de dólares que amplía su audiencia en Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dow Jones & Co., known for publishing the Wall Street Journal, has announced its agreement to purchase the online news site, MarketWatch Inc., in a deal worth $519 million, thereby expanding its digital readership.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a deal valued at $519 million, Dow Jones & Co., the company behind the Wall Street Journal, has consented to acquire the online news platform, MarketWatch Inc., in an effort to broaden its internet clientele.

Original Text: Facts about Burma Country: Burma, also known as Myanmar, is a Southeast Asian nation bordered by Bangladesh and India to the west, China to the north, and Thailand and Laos to the east and southeast.
Translation: Datos sobre el país de Birmania: Birmania, también conocida como Myanmar, es una nación del sudeste asiático que limita con Bangladesh e India al oeste, China al norte, y Tailandia y Laos al este y sureste.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Southeast Asian nation of Burma, also referred to as Myanmar, is surrounded by Bangladesh and India to its west, China to its north, and Thailand and Laos to its east and southeast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Bordering Bangladesh and India on the west, China on the north, and Thailand and Laos on the east and southeast, Burma is a Southeast Asian country also known as Myanmar.

Original Text: On world stage, no one else compares to Els It was two years ago when Ernie Els explained how it was possible that Tiger Woods could be overtaken in the world rankings. Of course, at the time the South African
Translation: En el escenario mundial, nadie se compara con Els. Fue hace dos años cuando Ernie Els explicó cómo era posible que Tiger Woods pudiera ser superado en el ranking mundial. Por supuesto, en ese momento el sudafricano
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two years prior, Ernie Els, the South African, speculated on the possibility of Tiger Woods losing his top position in the world rankings, stating that on the global platform, Els was unparalleled.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The South African Ernie Els, two years ago, suggested the potential for Tiger Woods to be superseded in the global rankings, emphasizing that no one could compare to Els on the world stage.

Original Text: Putin calls for elimination of elections for key posts Portraying it as a means of combating terrorism, Russian President Vladimir Putin yesterday outlined a plan to eliminate popular elections of governors and individual
Translation: Putin pide la eliminación de las elecciones para puestos clave. Representándolo como un medio para combatir el terrorismo, el presidente ruso Vladimir Putin esbozó ayer un plan para eliminar las elecciones populares de gobernadores e individuos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Portraying it as a part of their fight against terrorism, Russian President Vladimir Putin proposed a plan yesterday which implies removing the popular elections of governors and individuals for key posts.

Original Text: Patterson makes it an all-around sweep for US Two decades later, it #39;s time to make room for Carly Patterson as America #39;s next reigning champion of Olympic women #39;s gymnastics.
Translation: Patterson logra un barrido general para EE.UU. Dos décadas después, es hora de hacer sitio para Carly Patterson como la próxima campeona reinante de gimnasia olímpica femenina de América.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two decades later, Carly Patterson emerges as America's forthcoming champion of Olympic women's gymnastics, thus securing an all-around victory for the US.

Original Text: Shoppers swarm stores across US Shoppers swarmed America #39;s malls and stores yesterday, even before the sun rose, to grab early-bird deals on such hot items as flat-screen TVs and DVD players as the US holiday shopping season officially began.
Translation: Los compradores abarrotan tiendas en todo Estados Unidos. Los compradores inundaron los centros comerciales y tiendas de América ayer, incluso antes de que saliera el sol, para aprovechar las ofertas tempranas en artículos tan populares como televisores de pantalla plana y reproductores de DVD mientras la temporada de compras navideñas en Estados Unidos comenzaba oficialmente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, as the US holiday shopping season officially kicked off, bargain hunters flocked to stores and malls across the entire USA before sunrise seeking great deals, particularly on popular items like flat-screen TVs and DVD players.

Original Text: Independent Probe Sought in Abu Ghraib Case (AP) AP - Amnesty International on Wednesday renewed its call for the United States to set up an independent investigation of the abuse of prisoners in Afghanistan, at Guantanamo Bay and at Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq.
Translation: Se busca investigación independiente en el caso de Abu Ghraib (AP) AP - Amnistía Internacional renovó el miércoles su llamado a los Estados Unidos para establecer una investigación independiente sobre el abuso de prisioneros en Afganistán, en la Bahía de Guantánamo y en la prisión de Abu Ghraib en Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amnesty International Renews Demand for Independent Investigation into Prisoner Abuse at Abu Ghraib (AP) - AP - On Wednesday, Amnesty International reiterated its appeal for the United States to initiate an autonomous probe into the maltreatment of prisoners in Afghanistan, Guantanamo Bay, and Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amnesty International Reissues Call for Independent Inquiry into Abu Ghraib Abuse Case (AP) - AP - Amnesty International, on Wednesday, once again demanded that the United States establish an independent examination of the alleged abuse suffered by prisoners in Afghanistan, Guantanamo Bay, and at the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq.

Original Text: News: New Bagle worm drops in and downloads A new Bagle dropper and downloader, Bagle-AQ, was bulk mailed to numerous internet users yesterday.
Translation:
Noticias: Nuevo gusano Bagle se instala y descarga
Un nuevo propagador y descargador de Bagle, Bagle-AQ, fue enviado en masa a numerosos usuarios de internet ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A new variant of the Bagle worm, known as Bagle-AQ, was widely emailed to multiple internet users yesterday, functioning as both a dropper and a downloader.

Original Text: First probable case of bird flu transmission between humans Bangkok (AsiaNews/Agencies) - The first case of transmission of the H5N1 virus between humans could have taken place in Thailand, this according to Kumara Rai, acting Thailand representative for the World Health Organisation (WHO).
Translation: Primero caso probable de transmisión de gripe aviar entre humanos Bangkok (AsiaNews/Agencias) - El primer caso de transmisión del virus H5N1 entre humanos podría haber tenido lugar en Tailandia, esto según Kumara Rai, representante interino de Tailandia para la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS).
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Kumara Rai, the acting Thailand representative for the World Health Organization (WHO), the first instance of H5N1 virus transmission between humans might have occurred in Thailand, rendering it a probable case of human to human bird flu transmission.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kumara Rai, the interim Thailand representative for the World Health Organisation (WHO), suggests that Thailand might have been the location for the first possible instance of human to human transmission of the H5N1 virus, also known as bird flu.

Original Text: Dollar Falls, Gloom Over Economy Persists  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar fell sharply on Monday,  dropping to within one cent of record lows against the euro as  worries over the state of the U.S. economy persisted.
Translation:
El dólar cae, persiste el pesimismo sobre la economía.

NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar cayó bruscamente el lunes, acercándose a un centavo de sus mínimos históricos frente al euro debido a las preocupaciones continuas sobre el estado de la economía de los EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Mounting concerns about the state of the U.S. economy persisted on Monday and the dollar took a sharp hit, decreasing close to its lowest ever levels against the euro.

Original Text: Nintendo to Bring Music, Video to DS Game Machine  TOKYO (Reuters) - Nintendo Co. will begin selling an  adaptor for its DS and Game Boy Advance handheld game players  to allow them to play music and video, the company said,  matching a popular feature on Sony's portable game machine.
Translation: Nintendo llevará música y video a la consola de juegos DS TOKIO (Reuters) - Nintendo Co. comenzará a vender un adaptador para sus jugadores de juegos portátiles DS y Game Boy Advance para permitirles reproducir música y video, dijo la compañía, igualando una característica popular en la máquina de juegos portátil de Sony.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - Nintendo Co. announced its plan to start selling an adaptor for the DS and Game Boy Advance handheld gaming devices. The adaptor would enable the devices to play music and video, providing a feature similar to Sony's portable game machine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an attempt to match a prominent feature on Sony's portable game machine, Nintendo Co, in Tokyo, revealed that it will soon offer an adaptor for its DS and Game Boy Advance handheld games players that can facilitate music and video playbacks.

Original Text: FOOTBALL: DUBAI BURY ARSENAL are to name their new ground Emirates Stadium after clinching a 100million sponsorship deal with an Arab airline. And Gunners chairman Peter Hill-Wood admitted it was an offer they simply couldn #39;t refuse.
Translation: FÚTBOL: DUBAI BURY ARSENAL está por nombrar su nuevo estadio como Emirates Stadium después de cerrar un acuerdo de patrocinio de 100 millones con una aerolínea árabe. Y el presidente de Gunners, Peter Hill-Wood, admitió que era una oferta que simplemente no podían rechazar.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The new stadium of DUBAI BURY ARSENAL will be named Emirates Stadium, following a 100-million sponsorship deal they have secured with an Arab airline. The Gunners' chairman, Peter Hill-Wood, has conceded that the offer was too good to decline.
Paraphrase 2: 2) After landing a 100 million sponsorship deal with an Arab airline, DUBAI BURY ARSENAL have decided to call their new field Emirates Stadium. According to Gunners chairman Peter Hill-Wood, the proposal was something they simply couldn't turn down.

Original Text: Manchester Utd confirm Glazer raises stake to 27.6 pct US sports tycoon Malcolm Glazer has raised his stake in Manchester United Plc to 27.63 percent from 25.3 percent, the Premier League club said on Tuesday, heightening speculation that he will bid for them.
Translation: Manchester Utd confirma que Glazer aumenta su participación al 27.6 por ciento. El magnate del deporte estadounidense Malcolm Glazer ha aumentado su participación en Manchester United Plc del 25.3 por ciento al 27.63 por ciento, dijo el martes el club de la Premier League, aumentando las especulaciones de que él hará una oferta por ellos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Malcolm Glazer, an American sports billionaire, has increased his share in Manchester United Plc from 25.3 percent to 27.63 percent, as confirmed by the club on Tuesday. This development has intensified talks that he may pursue a complete takeover.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Premier League club revealed on Tuesday that US sports magnate Malcolm Glazer has elevated his ownership in Manchester United Plc from 25.3 percent to 27.63 percent. This news fuels further conjecture that a full-scale bid from him is on the way.

Original Text: Abu Ghraib Soldier Admits to Some Charges HAGERSTOWN, Md. - The highest-ranking Army reservist charged with abusing Iraqi detainees at Abu Ghraib prison said Monday he will plead guilty to some offenses because "what I did was a violation of law."   Staff Sgt...
Translation: Soldado de Abu Ghraib admite algunos cargos HAGERSTOWN, Md. - El reservista del Ejército de mayor rango acusado de abusar de los detenidos iraquíes en la prisión de Abu Ghraib dijo el lunes que se declarará culpable de algunos delitos porque "lo que hice fue una violación de la ley." Sargento Mayor...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Staff Sgt., the highest-ranking Army reservist charged with the abuse of Iraqi detainees at Abu Ghraib prison, confessed his guilt to some offenses on Monday, acknowledging that his actions were against the law.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "What I did was a violation of law," admitted the highest-ranking Army reservist charged over the Abu Ghraib prison abuse scandal on Monday, as he conceded to some of the charges.

Original Text: Oil Off from Record Highs on Nigeria Pact  LONDON (Reuters) - Oil prices eased on Monday after rebels  in Nigeria withdrew a threat to target oil operations, but  lingering concerns over stretched supplies ahead of winter kept  prices close to \$50.
Translation: Alejándose de los Máximos Históricos por Pacto en Nigeria. LONDRES (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo se relajaron el lunes después de que los rebeldes en Nigeria retiraran una amenaza de atacar las operaciones petroleras, pero las persistentes preocupaciones sobre el estiramiento de los suministros antes del invierno mantuvieron los precios cerca de los \$50.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - Oil prices saw a decrease on Monday after threats to oil operations were withdrawn by rebels in Nigeria. However, concerns about supply shortages upcoming winter kept the prices near \$50.
