Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - On Monday, a withdrawal of a threat to oil operations by Nigerian rebels led to a dip in oil prices. Still, due to fears of potential supply limitations ahead of the winter season, prices remained tickling the \$50 mark.

Original Text: No Hanging Up Spectrum Scrap Verizon Wireless is decrying a reported attempt by Nextel to reduce the price tag in its controversial spectrum deal with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC).
Translation: No Desconectar el Espectro. Spectrum Scrap Verizon Wireless está criticando un supuesto intento de Nextel de reducir el precio en su controvertido acuerdo de espectro con la Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones (FCC).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Verizon Wireless is protesting a purported attempt by Nextel to lower the cost of its contentious spectrum deal with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), which has been dubbed as "No Hanging Up Spectrum Scrap".
Paraphrase 2: 2. The alleged effort by Nextel to decrease the cost associated with its contentious deal over the spectrum with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), named "No Hanging Up Spectrum Scrap", is being criticized by Verizon Wireless.

Original Text: China Construction Valued at 194 Bln Yuan on Revamp (Update2) China Yangtze Power Co., Shanghai Baosteel Group and State Grid Corp. will invest 8 billion yuan (\$964 million) in China Construction Bank in a reorganization valuing the nation #39;s third-largest lender at 194 billion yuan.
Translation: Valoración de la Construcción en China en 194 mil millones de Yuanes tras Reestructuración (Actualización2) China Yangtze Power Co., Shanghai Baosteel Group y State Grid Corp. invertirán 8 mil millones de yuanes (\$964 millones) en el Banco de Construcción de China en una reorganización que valora al tercer prestamista más grande de la nación en 194 mil millones de yuanes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As part of a reconfiguration, China Yangtze Power Co., Shanghai Baosteel Group, and State Grid Corp. are set to invest 8 billion yuan (\$964 million) into China Construction Bank, setting its valuation at 194 billion yuan given its status as the nation's third-largest lender.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The revamp values China Construction Bank at 194 billion yuan, and will see a combined investment of 8 billion yuan (\$964 million) from China Yangtze Power Co., Shanghai Baosteel Group, and State Grid Corp, recognizing it as the third-largest lender in the nation.

Original Text: Opening the Living Room Windows Microsoft is going to Tinseltown today to announce plans for its revamped Windows XP Media Center, part of an aggressive push to get ahead in the digital entertainment race. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Translation: Abriendo las Ventanas del Salón, Microsoft se dirige hoy a Tinseltown para anunciar planes para su renovado Windows XP Media Center, parte de un empuje agresivo para adelantarse en la carrera del entretenimiento digital. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft heads to Tinseltown today to reveal their restructured Windows XP Media Center, which is part of their ambitious strategy to lead the digital entertainment market. This announcement involves the conceptual opening of the Living Room Windows.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, Microsoft is journeying to Tinseltown to unveil their upgraded Windows XP Media Center. The move, akin to opening the Living Room Windows, is a potent thrust to secure premier position in the digital entertainment field.

Original Text: Mexico Lawmakers Protest Education Funding (AP) AP - Mexico City legislators from the leftist Democratic Revolution Party, the PRD, stormed into the lower house of congress and seized the speaker's podium Tuesday to prevent discussion of proposed funding changes for local education.
Translation: Legisladores de México Protestan por la Financiación de la Educación (AP) AP - Legisladores de la Ciudad de México del partido de izquierdas del Partido de la Revolución Democrática, el PRD, irrumpieron en la cámara baja del congreso y se apoderaron del podio del orador el martes para evitar la discusión de las propuestas de cambios en la financiación de la educación local.
Paraphrase 1: (AP) - On Tuesday, legislators from Mexico City's leftist Democratic Revolution Party, PRD, forcibly entered Congress's lower house and took control of the speaker's podium to halt discussions concerning proposed alterations to local education funding.
Paraphrase 2: (AP) - In objection to proposed amendments in local education funding, the PRD, a leftist group of Mexico City legislators, staged a takeover of the speaker's podium in the lower house of Congress on Tuesday.

Original Text: USDA Rules Out Mad Cow Disease in Animal The result cheered the beef industry, which had braced itself to hear that a second case of mad cow disease had been discovered in the U.S.
Translation: El USDA Descarta la Enfermedad de las Vacas Locas en Animal. El resultado alegró a la industria de la carne de res, que se había preparado para escuchar que un segundo caso de la enfermedad de las vacas locas había sido descubierto en los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The beef industry sighed with relief as the USDA dismissed the existence of mad cow disease in animals, after expecting another US outbreak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid fears of a second mad cow disease outbreak in the US, the industry was heartened by the USDA ruling out any incidence in animals.

Original Text: Middle East Quartet Laments Lack of Progress on Israeli <b>...</b> US Secretary of State Colin Powell convened Wednesday in New York with his counterparts from Russia, the European Union and the United Nations making up the informal Quartet on the Middle East.
Translation: El Cuarteto para Oriente Medio Lamenta la Falta de Progreso en Israel <b>...</b> El Secretario de Estado de EEUU, Colin Powell, se reunió el miércoles en Nueva York con sus homólogos de Rusia, la Unión Europea y las Naciones Unidas, que conforman el Cuarteto Informal para Oriente Medio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Middle East Quartet, which is informally formed by the US Secretary of State Colin Powell, his peers from Russia, the European Union, and the United Nations, convened in New York on Wednesday. They voiced their disappointment over the lack of progress on the Israeli matter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An informal gathering of the Middle East Quartet was held in New York on Wednesday, led by US Secretary of State Colin Powell with his counterparts from Russia, the European Union, and the United Nations. They expressed regret over the stagnation of progress on Israeli affairs.

Original Text: Erickson to stay with 49ers After discussing a job opening with the University of Mississippi, San Francisco coach Dennis Erickson said Wednesday he would stay with the 49ers.
Translation: Erickson se quedará con los 49ers Después de discutir una oferta de trabajo con la Universidad de Mississippi, el entrenador de San Francisco, Dennis Erickson, dijo el miércoles que se quedaría con los 49ers.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After contemplating a job opportunity at the University of Mississippi, San Francisco's coach, Dennis Erickson, announced on Wednesday that he is committing to continue his tenure with the 49ers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dennis Erickson, the coach of San Francisco's 49ers, confirmed on Wednesday that he has chosen to remain with his current team despite considering an employment offer from the University of Mississippi.

Original Text: Google Update? Dont Panic! Google Update? Don't Panic!\\There has been a great deal of speculation about a shift coming in Google's ranking algorithms over the past few weeks. Several recent pieces of evidence point to a coming shift however it is very difficult to predict what, if anything will happen. It's pretty much a ...
Translation:
¿Actualización de Google? ¿Pánico? ¡No! 
Hubo mucha especulación sobre un cambio en los algoritmos de clasificación de Google durante las últimas semanas. Varias evidencias recientes apuntan a un cambio próximo, sin embargo, es muy difícil predecir qué sucederá, si es que sucede algo. Es prácticamente un...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the past few weeks, there has been substantial conjecture regarding a forthcoming change in Google's ranking algorithms. Various recent indications hint towards a potential shift, but predicting if there is going to be a change, and what that alteration might look like, is extremely challenging. So, should there be a Google update? Don't lose calm, it's pretty much a...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Recent weeks have seen a flurry of guesswork about an imminent alteration in Google's ranking algorithms. A few pieces of fresh evidence suggest that a change could be on the way, yet forecasting such changes, or whether they will occur at all, is notoriously difficult. Therefore, in case of a Google update, there's no need to panic - it's almost a...

Original Text: US Airways names vice president of restructuring US Airways Group Inc. named a vice president to oversee its restructuring efforts, the airline said Thursday. James Schear will handle US Airways #39; organizational restructuring responsibilities and work with
Translation: US Airways nombra a un vicepresidente de reestructuración. US Airways Group Inc. nombró a un vicepresidente para supervisar sus esfuerzos de reestructuración, dijo la aerolínea el jueves. James Schear se encargará de las responsabilidades de reestructuración organizativa de US Airways y trabajará con
Paraphrase 1: 1. James Schear has been appointed by US Airways Group Inc. as the Vice President to supervise the company's restructuring initiatives, the airline announced on Thursday. Schear is tasked with handling the organizational restructuring tasks of US Airways and collaborating with others.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, it was announced by the airline that US Airways Group Inc. has delegated the responsibility of their restructuring operations to James Schear, the newly appointed Vice President. He'll manage the organizational restructuring of US Airways and work alongside others.

Original Text: First European Craft Enters Lunar Orbit (Reuters) Reuters - The first European spacecraft sent to the\moon has entered lunar orbit, the European Space Agency (ESA)\said on Tuesday.
Translation: La Primera Nave Espacial Europea Entra en Órbita Lunar (Reuters) Reuters - La primera nave espacial europea enviada a la luna ha entrado en órbita lunar, anunció la Agencia Espacial Europea (ESA) el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - The first European Space Agency (ESA) vehicle to the moon has reached lunar orbit, as announced by the ESA on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As reported by Reuters on Tuesday, the first spacecraft sent to the moon by European Space Agency (ESA) has successfully entered the lunar orbit.

Original Text: Given chance, West a contributing factor Delonte West was in uniform last night at the FleetCenter, after the Celtics activated the rookie point guard for the first time this season and placed forward Justin Reed (left hip pointer) back on the injured list. Although not fully recovered from the fractured right thumb he suffered the day before the season opener, West felt good enough to play.
Translation: Dada la oportunidad, West un factor contribuyente. Delonte West estaba uniformado anoche en el FleetCenter, después de que los Celtics activaron al base novato por primera vez esta temporada y colocaron al delantero Justin Reed (con una lesión en la cadera izquierda) de vuelta en la lista de lesionados. Aunque no se había recuperado completamente del pulgar derecho fracturado que sufrió el día antes de la apertura de la temporada, West se sintió lo suficientemente bien para jugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite not completely recovering from a fractured right thumb sustained a day prior to the season's start, Delonte West felt fit to play last night at the FleetCenter. The rookie point guard was activated and dressed in his Celtics uniform for the first time this season, due to an opportunity presented by Justin Reed's move to the injured list with a left hip pointer injury. In this situation, West proved to be a contributing factor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Delonte West, although still healing from a right thumb fracture he received on the eve of the season opener, was well enough to participate in the game at FleetCenter last night. For the first time this season, the rookie point guard was suited up and activated for the Celtics, stepping in as Justin Reed, a forward player, was relegated to the injured list owing to an injury to his left hip. Undoubtedly, West became a contributing factor given the chance.

Original Text: Powell, Russian official in Ukraine clash SOFIA, Bulgaria -- The United States and Russia clashed yesterday at a European security forum over the crisis of Ukraine's disputed election, elevating an increasingly tense debate over democracy in former Soviet republics.
Translation: Powell, oficial ruso en enfrentamiento en Ucrania. SOFIA, Bulgaria -- Estados Unidos y Rusia chocaron ayer en un foro de seguridad europeo sobre la crisis de las controvertidas elecciones en Ucrania, intensificando un debate cada vez más tenso sobre la democracia en las antiguas repúblicas soviéticas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At a European security forum yesterday, the United States and Russia had a confrontation over the contested election in Ukraine, intensifying the already heated discussion about democracy in the former Soviet republics. The conflict involved Powell and a Russian official in Ukraine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday in Sofia, Bulgaria, Powell and a Russian official in Ukraine experienced clashes during a European security forum, escalating the ongoing contentious debate over the issue of democracy in the ex-Soviet republics. The opposing views surfaced due to the crisis of disputed elections in Ukraine.

Original Text: Hong Kong #39;s former Gurkhas angry over British nationality move Former Nepalese-born Gurkha soldiers who helped defend Hong Kong under British rule are fuming at London #39;s decision to exclude them from a new law giving the crack fighters British citizenship, a spokesman said Thursday.
Translation: Los antiguos gurkhas de Hong Kong están furiosos por el cambio de nacionalidad británica. Los antiguos soldados gurkhas nacidos en Nepal que ayudaron a defender Hong Kong bajo el dominio británico están furiosos por la decisión de Londres de excluirlos de una nueva ley que otorga la ciudadanía británica a los destacados luchadores, dijo un portavoz el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Former Gurkha soldiers, originally from Nepal, who defended Hong Kong during British reign, are infuriated at London's choice to exclude them from a recent law that grants British citizenship to these elite troops, a representative reported on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Former Nepalese Gurkha soldiers, who once protected Hong Kong during British authority, are expressing anger towards London's decision to keep them out of a new citizenship law targeted at these exceptional warriors, as informed by a spokesperson on Thursday.

Original Text: Fencer Smart can't find winning touch Twice Keeth Smart charged, his opponent attacked and both lights went off. Twice, Smart was left standing on the strip, helmet in hand, after American losses.
Translation: Fencer Smart no puede encontrar el toque ganador. Dos veces Keeth Smart cargó, su oponente atacó y ambas luces se apagaron. Dos veces, Smart quedó de pie en la pista, casco en mano, después de las derrotas estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Twice did Keeth Smart, the fencer, charge and was attacked by the opponent resulting in both lights turning off. Following American losses, Smart found himself on the strip twice, standing with his helmet in his hand, unable to find his path to victory.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Keeth Smart, the fencer, made two charges, both times countered by his opponent that led to both lights going off. On two occasions, after American defeats, Smart was seen standing, helmet in hand, on the strip, unable to secure a win.

Original Text: Titans' Schulters Leaves Game With Injury (AP) AP - Tennessee Titans free safety Lance Schulters hurt his left foot Sunday against the Jacksonville Jaguars and was taken to the locker room. His return was questionable.
Translation: Titánicos' Schulters sale del juego con lesión (AP) AP - El safety libre de los Tennessee Titans, Lance Schulters se lesionó el pie izquierdo este domingo contra los Jacksonville Jaguars y fue llevado al vestuario. Su regreso era cuestionable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - During Sunday's game against the Jacksonville Jaguars, Lance Schulters, the free safety for the Tennessee Titans, injured his left foot and was subsequently escorted to the locker room. Whether or not he will return to the game remains uncertain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Tennessee Titans' Lance Schulters exited the game with a left foot injury on Sunday while playing against the Jacksonville Jaguars. His subsequent reappearance in the game was up in the air as he was led to the locker room for further assessment.

Original Text: Intel Boosts Centrino #39;s Speed Intel gave its Centrino laptop package a speed boost this week with the release of a new, faster Pentium M processor. The Centrino package includes a Pentium M processor, a PC chip set, and a WLAN (wireless LAN) chip set.
Translation: Intel Aumenta la Velocidad de Centrino #39: Intel proporcionó esta semana a su paquete de laptop Centrino un impulso de velocidad con el lanzamiento de un nuevo y más rápido procesador Pentium M. El paquete Centrino incluye un procesador Pentium M, un conjunto de chips para PC, y un conjunto de chips para WLAN (Red Inalámbrica Local).
Paraphrase 1: 1. This week, Intel enhanced the speed of its Centrino laptop package by launching a new and faster Pentium M processor. The Centrino kit comprises a Pentium M processor, a PC chip set, as well as a WLAN (wireless LAN) chip set.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new, faster Pentium M processor was released by Intel this week, bringing an improvement in speed to its Centrino laptop package. This package is made up of a WLAN (wireless LAN) chip set, a PC chip set, and a Pentium M processor.

Original Text: Argentina Wins First Olympic Gold in 52 Years  ATHENS (Reuters) - Argentina won its first Olympic gold  medal in 52 years in the soccer final Saturday, while the U.S.  women's basketball team atoned for their men's failure by  storming to victory.
Translation: Argentina Gana Su Primer Oro Olímpico en 52 Años ATENAS (Reuters) - Argentina ganó su primera medalla de oro olímpica en 52 años en la final de fútbol el sábado, mientras que el equipo de baloncesto femenino de los EE.UU. compensó la falla de sus hombres al arrojarse a la victoria.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS (Reuters) - The Argentinian soccer team ended a 52-year drought by securing their first Olympic gold medal on Saturday, while the U.S. women's basketball team made up for the men's team loss by winning decisively.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ATHENS (Reuters) - After 52 years of anticipation, Argentina clinched their first Olympic gold in soccer final this Saturday, concurrently the U.S. women's basketball team compensated for their male counterparts' defeat by clinching a victorious game.

Original Text: Shuttle on track for launch, panel says Members of the panel monitoring NASA #39;s effort to return the space shuttle to flight said Thursday that despite several open items, they see no reason why Discovery can #39;t be launched in May or June.
Translation: Traducción al español de manera precisa: La lanzadera está en camino para su lanzamiento, dice el panel. Los miembros del panel que supervisan el esfuerzo de la NASA para devolver el transbordador espacial al vuelo dijeron el jueves que, a pesar de varios puntos pendientes, no ven ninguna razón por la cual Discovery no pueda ser lanzado en mayo o junio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The panel overseeing NASA's initiative to resume space shuttle flights stated on Thursday that although there are still some issues to be resolved, they do not foresee any obstacles to launching Discovery in May or June.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, the committee supervising NASA's re-launch programme of the space shuttle announced that despite a few unresolved matters, Discovery's launch in May or June should not face any hindrance.

Original Text: A Rising iPod Lifts All Boats the price is US\$29 for the six-pack, by the way -- to make much of a dent in the \$8.3 billion company #39;s bottom line. But dozens of
Translation: Un iPod en ascenso levanta todos los barcos, el precio es de 29 dólares estadounidenses para el paquete de seis, por cierto, para hacer una gran mella en la línea de fondo de la compañía de 8.3 mil millones de dólares # 39. Pero decenas de
Paraphrase 1: 1. By the way, the cost of the six-pack is US$29 -- unlikely to heavily impact the $8.3 billion company's bottom line. Nevertheless, a rising iPod raises all boats.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The six-pack is priced at US$29 -- not enough to significantly affect the bottom line of the $8.3 billion company. Meanwhile, all boats are lifted by a rising iPod.

Original Text: Indonesians Begin Voting in Landmark Election  JAKARTA (Reuters) - Indonesians began voting on Monday in a  landmark election expected to remove President Megawati  Sukarnoputri and install an ex-general who has vowed firmer  leadership in fighting terror and boosting the economy.
Translation: Los indonesios comienzan a votar en unas elecciones históricas JAKARTA (Reuters) - Los indonesios comenzaron a votar el lunes en unas elecciones históricas que se espera destituyan a la presidenta Megawati Sukarnoputri e instalen a un exgeneral que ha prometido un liderazgo más firme en la lucha contra el terrorismo y en impulsar la economía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. JAKARTA (Reuters) - A historic election commenced on Monday in Indonesia where people started casting their votes. It is anticipated to result in the removal of President Megawati Sukarnoputri and the appointment of a former general who pledges a more stern approach towards countering terror and improving the economy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. JAKARTA (Reuters) - Voting kicked off on Monday in a pivotal Indonesian election that is expected to unseat President Megawati Sukarnoputri and usher in a former general committed to a stronger stance against terrorism and promoting economic growth.

Original Text: U.S. Study Links Human Activity to Global Warming (Reuters) Reuters - Warmer temperatures in North America\since 1950 were probably caused in part by human activity, the\Bush administration said in a report that appeared to\contradict the White House position there was no clear\scientific proof on the causes of global warming.
Translation: Estudio de EE.UU. relaciona la actividad humana con el calentamiento global (Reuters) Reuters - Las temperaturas más cálidas en América del Norte desde 1950 probablemente fueron causadas en parte por la actividad humana, dijo la administración de Bush en un informe que parecía contradecir la posición de la Casa Blanca de que no había pruebas científicas claras sobre las causas del calentamiento global.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) According to a recent report released by the Bush administration, it's probable that the rise in North American temperatures since 1950 has been partially due to human activity, contradicting the White House's previously held belief that there isn't clear scientific evidence linking global warming to human actions.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Bush administration's recent report surmises that human activity is likely a partial contributor to the warmer temperatures recorded in North America post-1950, an assertion that seems to challenge the White House's stance regarding the lack of definitive scientific proof about global warming causes, according to Reuters.

Original Text: Chinese students jailed for running porn sites Beijing, Sept 30. (PTI): A 22-year-old university information technology student and another college student in east China #39;s Zhejiang province have been sentenced by Chinese courts for operating pornographic
Translation: Estudiantes chinos encarcelados por administrar sitios pornográficos. Beijing, 30 de septiembre. (PTI): Un estudiante de tecnología de la información de 22 años de una universidad y otro estudiante de una universidad en la provincia de Zhejiang, al este de China, han sido condenados por los tribunales chinos por operar sitios pornográficos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two Chinese students, one a 22-year-old university information technology major and the other a college student from Zhejiang province in eastern China, have been imprisoned for operating pornographic sites, reported by PTI from Beijing, September 30.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A court in China has sentenced a 22-year-old information technology university student and another college student from Zhejiang province in eastern China, for running pornographic sites, as Tehran Times conveyed from Beijing on September 30.

Original Text: No oil price hike before US polls NEW DELHI: The government on Sunday decided to hold back any hike in fuel prices. Under the price-band mechanism, there #39;s room to raise prices of petrol by 66-67 paise/litre and diesel by Rs 1.88/litre.
Translation: No habrá aumento en el precio del petróleo antes de las elecciones en EE. UU. NUEVA DELHI: El domingo, el gobierno decidió retener cualquier aumento en los precios del combustible. Bajo el mecanismo de banda de precio, hay espacio para aumentar los precios de la gasolina en 66-67 paise/litro y el diesel en Rs 1.88/litro.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW DELHI: The government decreed on Sunday that there will be no increase in fuel prices before the US elections. With the price-band mechanism, the situation allows for a potential increase in petrol price by 66-67 paise/litre and diesel by Rs 1.88/litre.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Sunday, the government in New Delhi announced that any surge in fuel prices is prohibited before the upcoming US elections. The price-band mechanism could permit an increase of 66-67 paise/litre for petrol and Rs 1.88/litre for diesel.

Original Text: Players offer to slash 24 from salaries The NHL Players #39; Association handed the NHL a strong proposal Thursday it believes can not only salvage the season but more importantly address all of the league #39;s economic issues.
Translation: Los jugadores ofrecen recortar 24 de los salarios. La Asociación de Jugadores de la NHL presentó a la NHL una sólida propuesta el jueves que cree que no solo puede salvar la temporada, sino que más importante aún, abordar todos los problemas económicos de la liga.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, the NHL Players' Association put forward a robust proposal to the NHL, which they believe can rescue the season and crucially resolve all the league's financial troubles, by suggesting a 24% cut from player salaries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A significant proposal was submitted by the NHL Players' Association to the NHL on Thursday, proposing a 24% reduction in player salaries. They believe this will not only save the current season but also fundamentally deal with the league's economic challenges.

Original Text: Australia #39;s Fairfax poised for growth if media laws relaxed SYDNEY: Australia #39;s Fairfax newspaper group said it is well placed for expansion if the government goes ahead with a plan to use its newly won control of both houses of parliament to relax media ownership laws.
Translation: Australia #39; Fairfax se prepara para el crecimiento si se relajan las leyes de medios SYDNEY: el grupo de periódicos Fairfax de Australia #39 dijo que está bien posicionado para la expansión si el gobierno sigue adelante con un plan para usar su recién ganado control de ambas cámaras del parlamento para relajar las leyes de propiedad de los medios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Fairfax newspaper group in Australia stated its readiness to grow if the government, having recently gained control of both houses of parliament, decides to ease media ownership laws.
Paraphrase 2: 2. If the government follows through with their plan to loosen media ownership laws using their new control over both parliamentary houses, Australia's Fairfax newspaper group anticipates significant expansion.

Original Text: Hamza Accused of Soliciting Murder of Jews Radical Islamic cleric Abu Hamza appeared in court today charged with a string of offences including soliciting the murder of Jews and other non-believers, stirring
Translation: Hamza acusado de instigar el asesinato de judíos. El clérigo islámico radical Abu Hamza compareció en la corte hoy acusado de una serie de delitos, incluyendo la instigación al asesinato de judíos y otros no creyentes, incitando
Paraphrase 1: 1. Radical Islamic cleric Abu Hamza was in court today, facing numerous charges including the incitement of the murder of Jews and other non-believers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In court today, Abu Hamza, a radical Islamic cleric, faced multiple charges, including those related to encouraging the murder of Jews and other non-believers.

Original Text: Halliburton planning to restructure troubled KBR unit, may look to sell it HOUSTON -- Halliburton Co. said yesterday that it is restructuring its troubled engineering and construction subsidiary, KBR, and would consider selling or spinning it off should the division's stock performance fail to improve once asbestos litigation is resolved.
Translation: Halliburton planea reestructurar la problemática unidad KBR, podría considerar venderla HOUSTON -- Halliburton Co. dijo ayer que está reestructurando su problemática filial de ingeniería y construcción, KBR, y consideraría venderla o desprenderse de ella si el rendimiento de las acciones de la división no mejora una vez que se resuelva la litigación del asbesto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Halliburton Co. revealed recently that it is considering a restructure of its struggling subsidiary, KBR, specializing in engineering and construction. In case the division fails to show improved stock performance post the resolution of asbestos litigation, Halliburton may explore options of selling or spinning off the unit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. HOUSTON -- Halliburton Co. announced yesterday that they are in the process of restructuring KBR, their troubled engineering and construction subsidiary. If the subsidiary's stock performance does not improve following the conclusion of asbestos litigation, possibilities of a sell-off or spin-off of the division could be considered.

Original Text: Singapore makes big 777 order, holds off on 7E7s Boeing #39;s happy confirmation of a \$4 billion order from Singapore Airlines for 18 777s yesterday was tempered by the disappointing news that the prestigious carrier will not be among the first customers for the all-new 7E7.
Translation: Singapur realiza un gran pedido de 777, se abstiene de los 7E7s. La feliz confirmación de Boeing de un pedido de \$4 mil millones de Singapore Airlines por 18 777 ayer se vio empañada por la decepcionante noticia de que la prestigiosa aerolínea no estará entre los primeros clientes para el completamente nuevo 7E7.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The exciting news of Boeing's confirmation about a $4 billion order from Singapore Airlines for 18 of its 777s was somewhat dampened by the revelation that this esteemed airline won't be one of the first customers for their brand new 7E7s.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Boeing positively confirmed a massive order from Singapore Airlines for 18 of its 777s, worth $4 billion. However, the joy was somewhat diminished with the news that this renowned carrier wouldn't be lining up as one of the initial customers for the company's latest 7E7s.

Original Text: Ghana a Model for African Elections Urged to wield the power of the thumb, #39; #39; Ghana #39;s people exercised it in force Tuesday - pressing ink-moistened thumbs to ballots in an presidential election marking the
Translation: Instan a Ghana, modelo para las elecciones africanas, a ejercer el poder del pulgar. Los ciudadanos de Ghana lo ejercieron con fuerza el martes, presionando con pulgares humedecidos en tinta en las papeletas en una elección presidencial que marca la.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Encouraged to leverage their voting power, the people of Ghana strongly participated in the presidential election on Tuesday, imprinting their ink-soaked thumbs on the ballots, making Ghana a benchmark for African elections.

Original Text: Thirteen Players Released The Washington Redskins announced 13 cuts Monday and must make one more roster move today to reach the NFL's limit.
Translation: Trece Jugadores Despedidos Los Washington Redskins anunciaron 13 despidos el lunes y deben hacer un movimiento más en la plantilla hoy para alcanzar el límite de la NFL.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Washington Redskins declared on Monday about letting go of thirteen players and still need to make one more change in the roaster to comply with the NFL's maximum limit.

Original Text: Report: North Korea Cracking Down on Mobile Phones  TOKYO (Reuters) - North Korea is cracking down on the use  of mobile phones in border areas in a bid to stop smuggling and  "spy activities," Japan's Kyodo news agency said on Monday.
Translation:
Informe: Corea del Norte endurece las restricciones sobre los teléfonos móviles
TOKIO (Reuters) - Corea del Norte está endureciendo las restricciones sobre el uso de teléfonos móviles en las zonas fronterizas en un intento por detener el contrabando y las "actividades de espionaje", dijo la agencia de noticias Kyodo de Japón el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. North Korea is intensifying restrictions on the use of mobile phones along its border areas to hinder smuggling and spy activities, stated Japan's Kyodo news agency in a report on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an effort to curb smuggling and spy activities, North Korea is clamping down on the use of mobile phones in its border regions, as reported on Monday by Japan's Kyodo news agency.

Original Text: Rite Aid Posts Profit, Reaffirms Outlook  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Drugstore chain Rite Aid Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RAD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RAD.N</A>  on Thursday reported a quarterly profit, reversing a year-ago  loss, on strong cash flow and a reduction in inventory-related  expenses.
Translation: Rite Aid Publica Ganancias, Reafirma Perspectiva  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - La cadena de farmacias Rite Aid Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RAD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RAD.N</A> informó el jueves una ganancia trimestral, revirtiendo una pérdida del año anterior, gracias a un fuerte flujo de caja y una reducción en los gastos relacionados con el inventario.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Rite Aid Corp., a renowned drugstore chain, declared its quarterly earnings indicating a profit, a reversal from last year's loss, driven by robust cash flow and lower expenses related to inventory, thereby reasserting their financial outlook.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A quarterly profit was recently reported by the drugstore conglomerate Rite Aid Corp., a significant turnaround from the loss experienced a year ago, primarily owing to a stronger cash flow and a decreased in inventory-related costs. This reinforces the company's financial prediction.

Original Text: Lessons of Najaf Iraq #39;s interim government did well to avoid a bloody fight to the finish with Moktada al-Sadr over the Imam Ali Mosque, the country #39;s most sacred Shiite site.
Translation: Lecciones de Najaf Iraq #39; El gobierno interino hizo bien en evitar una lucha sangrienta hasta el final con Moktada al-Sadr sobre la Mezquita Imam Ali, el sitio chiíta más sagrado del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The interim government of Iraq, in Najaf, was successful in avoiding a ferocious and potentially bloody battle against Moktada al-Sadr for control over the Imam Ali Mosque, which is the most sacred Shiite site in the country.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the Imam Ali Mosque - the most sacred Shiite site in the country - Moktada al-Sadr didn't engage in a destructive battle to the end with the interim government of Najaf, Iraq, delivering an important lesson.

Original Text: Bank of America reveals plans to lay off 4,500 Bank of America said Thursday it will layoff 4,500 employees as part of the companys ongoing integration of FleetBoston Financial.
Translation: El Bank of America revela planes de despedir a 4,500 empleados. El jueves, Bank of America dijo que despedirá a 4,500 empleados como parte de la integración continua de FleetBoston Financial por parte de la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Bank of America announced their intention to discharge 4,500 employees, arising from the ongoing incorporation of FleetBoston Financial into their operations.

Original Text: IBM's Open-Source Lovefest "Big Blue" may also earn the nickname "Big Linux Supporter" as IBM continues to embrace open-source efforts to hike its market share and challenge competitors, including Microsoft. \<br><FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Translation: La fiesta del código abierto de IBM "Big Blue" también podrá ganarse el sobrenombre de "Gran Defensor de Linux" a medida que IBM continúa abrazando los esfuerzos de código abierto para aumentar su participación en el mercado y desafiar a los competidores, incluyendo a Microsoft. \<br><FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif, arial, helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</B></FONT>
Paraphrase 1: 1. As IBM increasingly supports open-source initiatives to boost market share and take on competition such as Microsoft, it could earn the new moniker of "Big Linux Supporter" in addition to its well-established nickname "Big Blue". (source: washingtonpost.com)
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Big Blue", also known as IBM, could be dubbed as "Big Linux Supporter" as it continually shows keen interest in open-source movements, aiming to increase its market leverage and challenge its rivals, including the likes of Microsoft. (source: washingtonpost.com)

Original Text: NASA Chief O #39;Keefe to Resign NASA Administrator Sean O #39;Keefe, whose tenure has been shadowed by the 2003 Columbia disaster, plans to resign as head of the US space agency, an official familiar with the decision said on Sunday.
Translation: El Jefe de la NASA, O'Keefe, presentará su renuncia. El Administrador de la NASA, Sean O'Keefe, cuyo mandato ha estado marcado por el desastre del Columbia en 2003, planea renunciar como jefe de la agencia espacial estadounidense, dijo el domingo un funcionario familiarizado con la decisión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US space agency's Director, Sean O'Keefe, who has been under scrutiny since the 2003 Columbia disaster, has planned to resign his position, disclosed an anonymous official on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sean O'Keefe, the NASA Administrator whose term was marred by the 2003 Columbia disaster, intends to step down from his role, according to an official acquainted with the matter, who revealed this on Sunday.

Original Text: Oracle raps PeopleSoft customer refund program Oracle tells a judge the anti-takeover measure is unnecessary and ties the hands of a future board of directors.
Translation: Oracle critica el programa de reembolso al cliente de PeopleSoft. Oracle le dice a un juez que la medida antiadquisición es innecesaria y ata las manos de una futura junta directiva.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oracle criticizes PeopleSoft's customer refund program, arguing to a judge that the anti-takeover measure is unneeded and restricts the actions of future boards of directors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oracle communicates to a judge the redundancy of PeopleSoft's customer refund program, claiming that it hinders potential decisions by future board of directors.

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Dynegy cuts 2004 profit view, shares slide Electricity wholesaler Dynegy Inc. (DYN.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Wednesday slashed its 2004 profit forecast and said it expects a loss next year due to costs
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2-Dynegy reduce la previsión de beneficios para 2004, las acciones caen. El mayorista de electricidad Dynegy Inc. (DYN.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) el miércoles redujo su pronóstico de beneficios para 2004 y dijo que espera una pérdida el próximo año debido a los costos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dynegy Inc., an electricity wholesaler, has announced on Wednesday a reduction in its 2004 profit expectations, causing share prices to drop. They also anticipate a loss in the coming year, attributed to increasing costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, Dynegy Inc., a wholesaler of electricity, lowered its profit predictions for 2004, resulting in a decrease in its share prices. In addition, the company expects to incur a loss next year due to raising costs.

Original Text: Chiefs' Offense on a Roll Again (AP) AP - Crowd the line of scrimmage to stop the Pro Bowl running back, and the star quarterback finds the Pro Bowl tight end.
Translation: Ofensiva de los Chiefs en Racha de Nuevo (AP) AP - Acosan la línea de golpeo para detener al corredor del Pro Bowl, y el mariscal de campo estrella encuentra al ala cerrada del Pro Bowl.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Double-team the Pro Bowl backfield star, and their ace quarterback locates the Pro Bowl tight end. The Chiefs' offensive line is on another winning streak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Block the Pro Bowl rusher and the star quarterback connects with the Pro Bowl tight end. Once again, the offense of the Chiefs is hitting its stride.

Original Text: Soccer: Old flame Robertson back to rekindle Hearts EDINBURGH : Hearts have appointed John Robertson as their new manager to succeed Craig Levein at the Scottish Premiership club where he became a goalscoring legend during his playing career.
Translation: Fútbol: El antiguo amor Robertson vuelve para reavivar Hearts EDIMBURGO: Hearts ha nombrado a John Robertson como su nuevo gerente para suceder a Craig Levein en el club de la Premiership escocesa, donde se convirtió en una leyenda de los goleadores durante su carrera como jugador.
Paraphrase 1: 1. EDINBURGH: Hearts has named John Robertson, a renowned goalscoring legend during his playing days, as the new manager to take over from Craig Levein at the Scottish Premiership club where he used to play.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In EDINBURGH: John Robertson, a legendary goalscorer during his time as a player, has been appointed by Hearts as their new manager succeeding Craig Levein at the Scottish Premiership club where he made his mark.

Original Text: Manila appeals for storm relief; weather improves The Philippines put the toll at more than 1,000 dead or missing in four storms in two weeks but, even with a break in the weather on Saturday
Translation: Manila solicita ayuda para el alivio de tormentas; mejora el clima. Filipinas cifra en más de 1,000 los muertos o desaparecidos en cuatro tormentas en dos semanas pero, incluso con una pausa en el clima el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over a thousand individuals are reported dead or missing in the Philippines after four storms within two weeks. However, Saturday offered some respite as the weather improved. The country's capital, Manila, is now pleading for storm relief.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The toll from four storms in two weeks has exceeded 1,000 in terms of fatalities and missing individuals in the Philippines. A break in the weather was seen on Saturday, meanwhile Manila continues their call for storm relief.

Original Text: Baghdad Car Bomb Kills at Least 5 and Leaves Up to 29 Wounded A car bomb exploded today near the Ministry of Education in a busy Baghdad commercial area, killing at least five people and wounding up to 29, officials said.
Translation: Una bomba en un coche en Bagdad mata al menos a 5 y deja hasta 29 heridos. Una bomba en un coche explotó hoy cerca del Ministerio de Educación en una concurrida zona comercial de Bagdad, matando al menos a cinco personas y dejando hasta 29 heridos, dijeron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials announced that a car bomb detonated near the Ministry of Education in a bustling commercial zone in Baghdad, resulting in a minimum of five fatalities and up to 29 injuries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A car explosion occurred in a heavily populated commercial district in Baghdad close to the Ministry of Education, leading to five confirmed deaths and possibly wounding up to 29 individuals, according to officials.

Original Text: War Crime Trials Against Saddam to Start Next Week Iraq's interim Prime Minister Ayad Allawi announced that proceedings would begin against former Baath Party leaders.
Translation: Juicios por Crímenes de Guerra Contra Saddam Comenzarán la Próxima Semana El Primer Ministro interino de Irak, Ayad Allawi, anunció que comenzarán los procedimientos contra los antiguos líderes del Partido Baath.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Iraq's interim Prime Minister Ayad Allawi has announced that the trials for war crimes against Saddam and former Baath Party leaders are set to commence next week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ayad Allawi, the interim Prime Minister of Iraq, declared that the war crime trials targeting Saddam and other leaders of the Baath Party are slated to kick off the following week.

Original Text: Computer glitch delays Air Canada departures After splashing out with Celine Dion concerts and parties for staff, it was as if Air Canada woke with a hangover Wednesday morning, when the reservation computer crashed.
Translation: Un fallo informático retrasa las salidas de Air Canada. Después de celebrar a lo grande con conciertos de Celine Dion y fiestas para el personal, parecía como si Air Canada se despertara con resaca el miércoles por la mañana, cuando el sistema informático de reservas se colapsó.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After indulging in Celine Dion concerts and staff parties, Air Canada seemed to face the consequences Wednesday morning, experiencing a virtual 'hangover' when their reservation system computer broke down, causing delays in departures due to a glitch.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday morning, Air Canada seemingly faced repercussions of its Celine Dion concerts and staff revelries in the form of a hangover: their computer malfunctioned, causing a delay in flights. This came just after the airline had splashed out, and now, their reservation system had crashed.

Original Text: China war games may be off China has withdrawn 3,000 soldiers from a military exercise on an island facing Taiwan, prompting speculation that Beijing may have cancelled its annual war games, the Taiwan defence ministry says.
Translation: Los juegos de guerra de China podrían cancelarse. China ha retirado 3,000 soldados de un ejercicio militar en una isla frente a Taiwán, lo que genera especulaciones de que Pekín podría haber cancelado sus juegos de guerra anuales, según dice el ministerio de defensa de Taiwán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Taiwan defence ministry indicated that Beijing might have called off its annual war games as China has pulled out 3,000 soldiers from a military drill on an island near Taiwan, sparking conjecture.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the Taiwan defence ministry, the possible cancellation of China's annual war games is being speculated after the withdrawal of 3,000 Chinese soldiers from a military exercise on an island close to Taiwan.

Original Text: Water-methane link strengthen life-on-Mars clues The European Space Agency(ESA) says it has found concentrations of water vapour and the gas methane in the same places on Mars, which strengthen speculation that the Red Planet could be a haven for microbial life.
Translation: La conexión agua-metano refuerza las pistas de vida en Marte. La Agencia Espacial Europea (ESA) dice que ha encontrado concentraciones de vapor de agua y el gas metano en los mismos lugares en Marte, lo que refuerza la especulación de que el Planeta Rojo podría ser un refugio para la vida microbiana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European Space Agency (ESA) reports that the detection of water vapour and methane gas in identical locations on Mars bolsters the theory that the Red Planet may potentially host microbial life.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Discoveries of both water vapour and methane gas in the same regions on Mars have intensified the debate about potential microbial life on the Red Planet, according to the European Space Agency (ESA).

Original Text: Supreme Court challenges lawyer for Rwandan accused of triggering slaughter (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - A Supreme Court justice challenged a lawyer Wednesday who defended his Rwandan client's call in 1992 for the extermination of ethnic Tutsis prior to a bloody genocide in the African country.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: La Corte Suprema desafía al abogado del acusado ruandés de provocar matanza (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - OTTAWA (CP) - Un juez de la Corte Suprema desafió el miércoles a un abogado que defendía la llamada de su cliente ruandés en 1992 para exterminar a los tutsis étnicos antes de un sangriento genocidio en el país africano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - On Wednesday, a Supreme Court judge questioned a lawyer, who was defending his client from Rwanda accused of inciting the extermination of ethnic Tutsis before the horrific genocide occurred in the African nation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - A defence lawyer battled with a Supreme Court judge on Wednesday over his client in Rwanda, who was accused of provoking the mass murder of the Tutsi ethnic group, preceding a tragic genocide in the country.

Original Text: North Fork to Sell GreenPoint Credit Commercial bank North Fork Bancorp Inc. said Friday that it agreed to sell manufactured housing finance unit GreenPoint Credit LLC to Green Tree Servicing LLC.
Translation: El banco comercial North Fork Bancorp Inc. dijo el viernes que había acordado vender la unidad de financiamiento de viviendas prefabricadas GreenPoint Credit LLC a Green Tree Servicing LLC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. North Fork Bancorp Inc., a commercial bank, announced on Friday that it has consented to selling its manufactured housing finance unit, GreenPoint Credit LLC, to Green Tree Servicing LLC.

Original Text: Two blocks too far to walk for coffee, Starbucks says Java junkies must often journey more than two blocks to find a Starbucks, which the company sees as a problem, its chief executive said on Thursday.
Translation: "Demasiado lejos para caminar dos cuadras por café", dice Starbucks. Los adictos al café a menudo deben viajar más de dos cuadras para encontrar un Starbucks, lo cual la compañía ve como un problema, dijo su director ejecutivo el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Starbucks' Chief Executive expressed concern on Thursday about the difficulty of Java enthusiasts often needing to traverse more than two blocks to locate a Starbucks, deeming it a problem considering the distance is seen as too far to walk for coffee.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Starbucks CEO noted on Thursday that the company finds it problematic that avid coffee drinkers often have to travel beyond two blocks to find a Starbucks shop, suggesting that this distance is generally seen as too far to walk for a cup of coffee.

Original Text: Summary: Student Finds New Amphibian (AP) AP - THE DISCOVERY: A University of Pittsburgh geology student on a field trip stumbles across the fossil of an oversized, salamander-like creature that lived about 300 million years ago.
Translation: Resumen: Estudiante Descubre Nuevo Anfibio (AP) AP - EL DESCUBRIMIENTO: Un estudiante de geología de la Universidad de Pittsburgh, durante una excursión, se topa con el fósil de una criatura parecida a una salamandra de tamaño sobredimensionado que vivió hace unos 300 millones de años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Headline: New Amphibian Unearthed by University Student (AP) - AP - DETAILING THE FIND: On a field trip, a geology student from the University of Pittsburgh unexpectedly discovered the fossilized remains of a large, salamander-esque organism, believed to be approximately 300 million years old.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Recap: University Student Discovers New Prehistoric Amphibian (AP) - AP - THE FIND: A geology student from the University of Pittsburgh made an accidental discovery of an enormous, salamander-like fossil during a field trip, which dates back to around 300 million years ago.

Original Text: Ukrainian CEC announces elections results: Yushchenko overtakes <b>...</b> Ukrainian PM Viktor Yanukovich has received 40.03 of the vote (10,807,068 votes), and Viktor Yushchenko has 39.16 (10,572,530) in the Ukrainian presidential election.
Translation: La CEC ucraniana anuncia los resultados de las elecciones: Yushchenko supera a <b>...</b> El primer ministro ucraniano Viktor Yanukovich ha recibido el 40.03% de los votos (10,807,068 votos), y Viktor Yushchenko ha obtenido el 39.16% (10,572,530) en las elecciones presidenciales ucranianas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Ukrainian CEC declared the results of the elections: Viktor Yushchenko surpassed <b>...</b> with Ukrainian Prime Minister Viktor Yanukovich obtaining 40.03% of the votes (10,807,068), while Viktor Yushchenko achieved 39.16% (10,572,530) in the Ukrainian presidential election.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Ukrainian presidential election, the Ukrainian CEC disclosed the results: Viktor Yushchenko moved ahead of <b>...</b> Ukrainian PM Viktor Yanukovich, who secured 40.03% (10,807,068 votes), while Viktor Yushchenko gained 39.16% (10,572,530 votes).

Original Text: King Abdullah pessimistic on Iraqi elections Jordanian monarch warns elections in violence-ravaged Iraq are impossible in current state of insecurity. By Hugh Schofield - PARIS.
Translation: El rey Abdullah pesimista sobre las elecciones iraquíes. El monarca jordano advierte que las elecciones en un Irak devastado por la violencia son imposibles en el estado actual de inseguridad. Por Hugh Schofield - PARÍS.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Jordanian King Abdullah expresses a pessimistic view on Iraqi elections, warning that the current state of insecurity makes it impossible for elections to take place in violence-stricken Iraq. - Hugh Schofield, PARIS.
Paraphrase 2: 2) King Abdullah of Jordan warns that the elections in the violence-torn Iraq are not feasible due to the present state of insecurity, expressing a pessimistic outlook on the situation. - Reporter, Hugh Schofield, PARIS.

Original Text: Hartford listed as nation #39;s seventh-most dangerous city _ Hartford has been named the nation #39;s seventh-most dangerous city, while Danbury and Stamford have been recognized for their safety, according to a company #39;s annual ranking based on crime statistics.
Translation: Hartford figura como la séptima ciudad más peligrosa del país: Hartford ha sido nombrada la séptima ciudad más peligrosa de la nación, mientras que Danbury y Stamford han sido reconocidas por su seguridad, según el ranking anual de una compañía basado en estadísticas de delitos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a company's annual ranking that evaluates crime statistics, Hartford has earned the title of the seventh-most dangerous city in the nation, whereas Danbury and Stamford are celebrated for their safety.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Going by a company's yearly report which uses crime data for evaluation, Hartford ranks as the seventh-most dangerous city in the country. In contrast, Danbury and Stamford have gained recognition due to their safety.

Original Text: Torre's filly packs a Punch' in win Sugar Punch, a 3-year-old filly owned in part by New York Yankees manager Joe Torre, held off Beautiful America by a neck yesterday afternoon to win the inaugural running of the \$66,500 Union Avenue for New York-bred fillies and mares at 6 furlongs.
Translation: 'La potranca de Torre asesta un golpe' en la victoria. Sugar Punch, una potranca de 3 años parcialmente propiedad del manager de los New York Yankees, Joe Torre, logró mantener a raya a Beautiful America por un cuello ayer por la tarde para ganar la edición inaugural de la carrera de $66,500 Union Avenue para potrancas y yeguas nacidas en Nueva York a 6 cuadras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday afternoon, Sugar Punch, a 3-year-old filly partly owned by Joe Torre, the New York Yankees manager, narrowly beat Beautiful America to secure victory in the inaugural running of the \$66,500 Union Avenue. This race is exclusively for New York-bred fillies and mares, and it covers a distance of 6 furlongs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Joe Torre's 3-year-old filly, named Sugar Punch, delivered an assertive win yesterday afternoon. It managed to hold off Beautiful America by just a neck in the initial running of the \$66,500 Union Avenue, a race intended only for New York-bred fillies and mares that runs over 6 furlongs.

Original Text: Expos move presents a capital opportunity Now that the Montreal Expos have a new home -- Washington -- they need a new owner. Owned by the other 29 major-league franchises for the past three years, the Expos will be sold in the coming months.
Translation: La mudanza de los Expos presenta una oportunidad capital Ahora que los Montreal Expos tienen un nuevo hogar -- Washington -- necesitan un nuevo propietario. Propiedad de las otras 29 franquicias de las grandes ligas durante los últimos tres años, los Expos serán vendidos en los próximos meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Now that the Montreal Expos have relocated to Washington, it creates an excellent opportunity for new ownership. Over the past three years, the team has been owned by the remaining 29 major-league franchises but is set to be sold in the upcoming months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The relocation of Montreal Expos to Washington opens up a golden chance for a change in ownership. The team have been in the collective ownership of the other 29 major-league franchises over the past three years and is expected to be put up for sale soon.

Original Text: Douglas cut, then lands with Eagles Just a week after releasing their all-time sack leader, Tony Brackens, the Jacksonville Jaguars yesterday cut three-time Pro Bowler Hugh Douglas, leaving them without their starting defensive ends from last season.
Translation: Douglas cortado, luego aterriza con Eagles. Solo una semana después de liberar a su líder de todos los tiempos en sacks, Tony Brackens, los Jacksonville Jaguars ayer cortaron al tres veces Pro Bowler Hugh Douglas, dejándolos sin sus defensas titulares de la temporada pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Just a week after dismissing Tony Brackens, their all-time sack leader, the Jacksonville Jaguars declared yesterday the release of three-time Pro Bowler Hugh Douglas - a move that leaves them bereft of their key defensive ends from the preceding season. Curiously, soon after his release, Douglas found a new home with the Eagles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Jacksonville Jaguars yesterday announced the release of three-time Pro Bowler Hugh Douglas, a move that comes swiftly on the heels of their termination of Tony Brackens, their all-time sack leader. The situation results in the Jaguars losing their starting defensive ends from the previous season, while Douglas quickly found refuge with the Eagles.

Original Text: 44 Apparent N. Korean Asylum Seekers Enter Canadian Embassy in <b>...</b> Diplomats in Beijing say at least 44 people claiming to be North Koreans have stormed the Canadian embassy in an apparent bid for asylum.
Translation: 44 aparentes solicitantes de asilo de Corea del Norte ingresan a la embajada canadiense en <b>...</b> Los diplomáticos en Beijing dicen que al menos 44 personas que afirman ser norcoreanos irrumpieron en la embajada canadiense en un aparente intento por solicitar asilo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Diplomats in Beijing reported that at least 44 individuals, purportedly North Korean, have rushed into the Canadian embassy, seemingly in search of asylum.

Original Text: Gates At Berkeley: Thoughts On Research, Overseas Innovation <b>...</b> In the spirit of being at the university, the Microsoft chairman also talked about when open-source licenses make sense. By Aaron Ricadela.
Translation: Puertas en Berkeley: Reflexiones sobre Investigación, Innovación en el Extranjero <b>...</b> En el espíritu de estar en la universidad, el presidente de Microsoft también habló sobre cuándo las licencias de código abierto tienen sentido. Por Aaron Ricadela.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reflections on Research and Overseas Innovation: Gates at Berkeley
Paraphrase 2: While embodying the university spirit, the Microsoft Chairman also discussed the appropriateness of open-source licenses. Article penned by Aaron Ricadela.

Original Text: Messina upsets AC Milan; Juventus leads Serie A Messina upset defending champion AC Milan 2-1 Wednesday, while Juventus won its third straight game to stay alone atop the Italian league standings.
Translation: Messina hace tambalear al AC Milan; Juventus lidera la Serie A. Messina sorprendió al campeón defensor AC Milan 2-1 el miércoles, mientras que Juventus ganó su tercer partido consecutivo para permanecer solo en la cima de la clasificación de la liga italiana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Messina secured a 2-1 victory over AC Milan, the defending champion, while Juventus continued its winning streak to maintain its solo position at the top of the Italian league standings.

Original Text: The Value of Star Power Coca-Cola lets basketball star LeBron James create a new version of Powerade.
Translation: El Valor del Poder de una Estrella: Coca-Cola permite a la estrella de baloncesto LeBron James crear una nueva versión de Powerade.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Coca-Cola allows LeBron James, the basketball icon, to develop a new variant of Powerade, emphasizing the significance of celebrity appeal.

Original Text: US rowers advances in photo finish SCHINIAS, Greece (AP)  The early success of the first black Olympic rower on the US men #39;s team and his Navy officer partner was supposed to end Wednesday.
Translation: Los remeros estadounidenses avanzan en final de fotografía SCHINIAS, Grecia (AP) El éxito temprano del primer remero olímpico negro en el equipo masculino de Estados Unidos y su compañero, oficial de la Marina, se suponía que terminaría el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SCHINIAS, Greece (AP) - The anticipated conclusion of the early achievements of the first black Olympic rower from the US men's team and his Navy officer teammate was on Wednesday.

Original Text: Ten Palestinians, 3 Israelis Killed in Gaza Violence (Reuters) Reuters - Ten Palestinians and three Israelis were\killed in Gaza on Thursday as Israeli forces thrust deep into\the largest Palestinian refugee camp after a rocket attack\killed two Israeli children in a border town.
Translation: Diez palestinos, 3 israelíes muertos en violencia en Gaza (Reuters) Reuters - Diez palestinos y tres israelíes fueron asesinados en Gaza el jueves, cuando las fuerzas israelíes se adentraron en el mayor campo de refugiados palestinos tras un ataque con cohetes que mató a dos niños israelíes en una ciudad fronteriza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Israeli forces advanced deeply into the largest Palestinian refugee camp in Gaza on Thursday, an action that resulted in the deaths of ten Palestinians and three Israelis following a rocket attack which claimed the life of two Israeli children in a border town.

Original Text: Hollywood Wants BitTorrent Dead The film studios' lobbying arm files lawsuits against the operators of sites and servers that help users of file-sharing networks locate movies and songs. By Xeni Jardin.
Translation: Hollywood Quiere a BitTorrent Muerto. El brazo de cabildeo de los estudios de cine presenta demandas contra los operadores de sitios y servidores que ayudan a los usuarios de redes de intercambio de archivos a localizar películas y canciones. Por Xeni Jardin.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Xeni Jardin reports that Hollywood's film studios are filing legal suits through their lobbying arm against services enabling file-sharing network users to find movies and songs, aiming to put an end to BitTorrent.

Original Text: Attackers storm Russian school Armed men and women seize a secondary school in southern Russia, taking up to 200 pupils hostage.
Translation: Atacantes asaltan escuela rusa. Hombres y mujeres armados toman una escuela secundaria en el sur de Rusia, tomando como rehenes hasta 200 estudiantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An estimated 200 students are held hostage after a group of armed individuals, both men and women, take over a secondary school in southern Russia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Initiating a takeover of a secondary school in southern Russia, armed assailants, comprising men and women, have potentially taken up to 200 students as hostages.

Original Text: Patriot League capsules DUXBURY Coach: Don Dellorco (22d year, 143-72-9). Last year's record: 9-1-2. Returning starters (6): Peter Bizinkauskas, TE, 6-1, 190, Sr.; Tim Confer, TB/CB, 6-0, 180, Sr.; Shaun Croscup, C, 6-0, 225, Sr.; Matt Johnston, NG, 5-10, 180, Sr.; Ryan Mullin, FB/LB, 5-8, 170, Jr.; Chris Nixon, TB, 5-10, 170, Jr. Returning lettermen (11): Steve Ahern, S, Sr.; Tim Griswold, OT/DT, ...
Translation: Cápsulas de la Liga Patriota DUXBURY Entrenador: Don Dellorco (22º año, 143-72-9). Récord del año pasado: 9-1-2. Titulares que regresan (6): Peter Bizinkauskas, TE, 6-1, 190, Sr.; Tim Confer, TB/CB, 6-0, 180, Sr.; Shaun Croscup, C, 6-0, 225, Sr.; Matt Johnston, NG, 5-10, 180, Sr.; Ryan Mullin, FB/LB, 5-8, 170, Jr.; Chris Nixon, TB, 5-10, 170, Jr. Cartas de regreso (11): Steve Ahern, S, Sr.; Tim Griswold, OT/DT, ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Duxbury's team in the Patriot League is coached by Don Dellorco, who is in his 22nd year with a career record of 143-72-9. Following a 9-1-2 record last year, the team welcomes back six starters namely Peter Bizinkauskas who is a 6-1, 190 lb, senior tight end; Tim Confer, a 6-0, 180 lb, senior tail back/corner back; Shaun Croscup, a 6-0, 225 lb, senior center; Matt Johnston, a 5-10, 180 lb, senior nose guard; Ryan Mullin, a 5-8, 170 lb, junior full back/line backer; and Chris Nixon, a 5-10, 170 lb, junior tail back. Among the returning lettermen, there are eleven players including senior Steve Ahern who is a safety and Tim Griswold who is a senior offensive tackle/defensive tackle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Patriot league, the Duxbury team is under the leadership of Coach Don Dellorco. It's his 22nd year of leadership and he has an impressive record of 143-72-9. Last season, they scored a commendable 9-1-2 record. The team's returning lineup includes six starters - Peter Bizinkauskas, a senior tight end who stands 6-1 and weighs in at 190 lbs; Tim Confer, a senior tail back/corner back standing 6-0 and weighing 180 lbs; Shaun Croscup who is a 6-0, 225 lb, senior center; Matt Johnston, a senior nose guard who measures 5-10 and weighs 180 lbs; junior full back/line backer Ryan Mullin who stands at a height of 5-8 and weighs 170 lbs, and junior tail back Chris Nixon, who is 5-10, 170 lbs. The team also includes eleven returning lettermen, such as the senior safety, Steve Ahern, and Tim Griswold, the senior offensive tackle/defensive tackle.

Original Text: Microsoft Pads 64-bit Support in SQL Server Microsoft (Quote, Chart) has released its second Community Technology Preview (CTP) for SQL Server 2005, adding greater performance and 64-bit support for SQL Server 2005 Analysis Services and SQL Server 2005 Integration Services.
Translation: Microsoft mejora el soporte de 64 bits en SQL Server. Microsoft (Cotización, Gráfico) ha lanzado su segunda Vista Previa de Tecnología Comunitaria (CTP) para SQL Server 2005, añadiendo mayor rendimiento y soporte de 64 bits para los Servicios de Análisis e Integración de SQL Server 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft (Quote, Chart) has launched the second Community Technology Preview (CTP) for SQL Server 2005, which now includes enhanced performance and 64-bit support for both SQL Server 2005 Analysis and Integration Services.

Original Text: Schwarzenegger Vetoes E-Mail Monitoring Disclosure (Reuters) Reuters - California Gov. Arnold\Schwarzenegger vetoed on Wednesday a bill that would have\required the state's employers to give workers written\notification if e-mail and other Internet activity is being\monitored at work.
Translation: Schwarzenegger Veta la Divulgación de Monitoreo de Correos Electrónicos (Reuters) Reuters - El gobernador de California, Arnold Schwarzenegger, vetó el miércoles un proyecto de ley que habría requerido que los empleadores del estado proporcionen a los trabajadores una notificación escrita si el correo electrónico y otras actividades de Internet están siendo monitoreadas en el trabajo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Reuters - A bill necessitating California's employers to inform their employees in writing of any e-mail and Internet activity monitoring at work was vetoed by Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) Reuters - On Wednesday, Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger of California rejected a bill that would have mandated employers in the state to provide written notification to their employees if their e-mails and other online activities were under surveillance at work.

Original Text: Diplomats Question Ukraine on Election (AP) AP - The United States urged the Ukrainian government on Tuesday not to certify pro-Russia Prime Minister Viktor Yanukovych as winner of disputed presidential elections in the former Soviet republic because of suspected widespread fraud.
Translation: Diplomáticos Interrogan a Ucrania sobre Elecciones (AP) AP - El martes, Estados Unidos instó al gobierno ucraniano a no certificar al pro-ruso Primer Ministro Viktor Yanukovych como ganador de las disputadas elecciones presidenciales en la antigua república soviética debido a sospechas de fraude generalizado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US diplomats urged the government of Ukraine on Tuesday to refrain from declaring Viktor Yanukovych, the pro-Russia Prime Minister, as the victor of the disputed presidential elections amidst allegations of extensive fraud (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, American diplomats cautioned the Ukrainian government against formally recognizing the victory of pro-Russian Prime Minister, Viktor Yanukovych, in disputed presidential elections due to suspicions of significant election fraud (AP).

Original Text: Rumsfeld, 18 Allies Discuss War on Terror (AP) AP - In a cramped war room below deck, Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld on Saturday joined 18 of his counterparts from an unusual collection of U.S. partners in the terrorism fight in discussing the way ahead in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Translation: Rumsfeld y 18 aliados discuten la guerra contra el terrorismo (AP) AP - En una sala de guerra abarrotada bajo cubierta, el Secretario de Defensa Donald H. Rumsfeld se unió el sábado a 18 de sus homólogos de una colección inusual de socios estadounidenses en la lucha contra el terrorismo para discutir el camino a seguir en Irak y Afganistán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld, in a tight war room below deck, spoke with 18 of his fellow defense leaders from an unexpected group of US allies about the future strategy in Iraq and Afghanistan on Saturday. The discussion was focused on combating terrorism.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Donald H. Rumsfeld, the US Secretary of Defense, gathered with 18 counterparts from a diverse set of US allies in a confined war room to discuss forthcoming plans for Iraq and Afghanistan, focusing on the war against terrorism. This meeting took place on Saturday (AP).

Original Text: Is US Wireless Industry Catching Up on 3G? SAN FRANCISCOWireless software developers and content producers attending the CTIA Wireless show here say the United States is on the verge of catching up with Europe and Japan in the deployment of the latest wireless technology and content.
Translation: ¿Está la industria inalámbrica de EE.UU alcanzando el 3G? SAN FRANCISCO: Los desarrolladores de software inalámbrico y productores de contenido presentes en el show de CTIA Wireless aquí opinan que Estados Unidos está a punto de alcanzar a Europa y Japón en la implementación de la última tecnología inalámbrica y contenido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is the American Wireless Industry Nearing Parity with 3G Technology? Developers and producers of wireless software and content, who are participating in the CTIA Wireless show in San Francisco, have expressed that the US is close to being on par with Europe and Japan regarding the latest wireless technology and content deployment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Is the US Closing the Gap in 3G Tech with its Wireless Industry? At the CTIA Wireless exhibition in San Francisco, US-based developers and producers of wireless software and content have reported that their country is on the brink of matching the latest wireless technology and content achievements of Europe and Japan.

Original Text: Costco Is Accused of Sex Bias n employee at the Costco Wholesale Corporation filed a national class-action lawsuit against the company yesterday, accusing it of discriminating against women in promotions to store manager.
Translation: Costco es acusado de sesgo de género. Una empleada de la Corporación Mayorista Costco presentó ayer una demanda colectiva nacional contra la compañía, acusándola de discriminar a las mujeres en las promociones para gerente de tienda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An employee of Costco Wholesale Corporation initiated a nationwide class-action lawsuit yesterday, alleging that the company practices sex discrimination in its promotion processes to store manager.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A worker at the Costco Wholesale Corporation launched a national class-action legal suit against the firm, claiming it favors men over women while promoting employees to the position of the store manager.

Original Text: Dvoracek will not play vs. Oregon NORMAN, Okla. -- Oklahoma suspended starting defensive tackle Dusty Dvoracek indefinitely Friday pending an investigation into an incident that ended with one of Dvoracek #39;s high school teammates in the hospital.
Translation: Dvoracek no jugará contra Oregon NORMAN, Okla. -- Oklahoma suspendió de forma indefinida el viernes al defensor inicial Dusty Dvoracek en espera de una investigación sobre un incidente que terminó con uno de los compañeros de equipo de la escuela secundaria de Dvoracek en el hospital.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dusty Dvoracek, a starting defensive tackle for Oklahoma, has been suspended indefinitely as an investigation into an incident that led to one of Dvoracek's high school teammates being hospitalized is pending. Consequently, Dvoracek will not be playing against Oregon, as confirmed on Friday in Norman, Oklahoma.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, in Norman, Oklahoma, an announcement was made about the indefinite suspension of Oklahoma's starting defensive tackle, Dusty Dvoracek. This action was taken in light of an ongoing investigation of an incident that resulted in one of Dvoracek's high school teammates landing up in the hospital. This means that Dvoracek will be sitting out of the game against Oregon.

Original Text: Blocking out the bad QUESTION: What is the best approach to protecting me from ID theft and related activities? Will a software package work best, or must I go to a hardware firewall?
Translation: Eliminando lo malo PREGUNTA: ¿Cuál es el mejor enfoque para protegerme del robo de identidad y actividades relacionadas? ¿Funcionará mejor un paquete de software o debo ir a un firewall de hardware?
Paraphrase 1: 1. QUESTION: What's the most effective strategy to safeguard against identity theft and similar activities? Would a software solution be more efficient, or should I opt for a hardware firewall instead?

Original Text: College Basketball Wrap: Washington Beats Loyola-Marymount  LOS ANGELES (Sports Network) - Nate Robinson scored a  game-high 28 points to lead 16th-ranked Washington to a 100-93  win over Loyola-Marymount at Gersten Pavilion.
Translation: Resumen del Baloncesto Universitario: Washington Derrota a Loyola-Marymount. LOS ÁNGELES (Red Deportiva) - Nate Robinson anotó un total máximo en el juego de 28 puntos para liderar a Washington, el decimosexto clasificado, a una victoria de 100-93 sobre Loyola-Marymount en el Gersten Pavilion.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a game of college basketball, Washington, under the efficient leadership of Nate Robinson scoring a game-high 28 points, emerged victorious against Loyola-Marymount with a score of 100-93 at Gersten Pavilion, Los Angeles (as reported by Sports Network).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sports Network reported from Los Angeles' Gersten Pavilion, where Nate Robinson's impressive 28-point performance helped 16th-ranked Washington secure a 100-93 win over Loyola-Marymount in a thrilling college basketball showdown.

Original Text: Calhoun not fond of loss But Calhoun likes his players and his university and the fact that the Huskies are the defending national champions a lot more. Calhoun was livid with himself and the collective
Translation: Calhoun no está contento con la pérdida. Pero a Calhoun le gustan sus jugadores y su universidad, y el hecho de que los Huskies son los campeones nacionales defensores mucho más. Calhoun estaba furioso consigo mismo y con el colectivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Although Calhoun is not happy about the loss, his affection for his players, the university, and the status of the Huskies as current national champions outweigh this. He was very angry with himself and the team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Calhoun certainly doesn't enjoy a loss, yet his love for his players, the university, and the Huskies' recent title win as national champions take precedence. He was immensely upset with himself and the group.

Original Text: JPEG virus found circulating via IM program AOL Instant Messenger message directs victims to Web sites that host the dangerous images.
Translation: Se encontró un virus JPEG circulando a través del programa de mensajería instantánea AOL. El mensaje dirige a las víctimas a sitios web que alojan las imágenes peligrosas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Through AOL Instant Messenger, victims are directed to websites containing hazardous images by a circulating JPEG virus.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A JPEG virus is reportedly being spread through AOL Instant Messenger, leading victims to websites that harbor perilous images.

Original Text: NASCAR driver T. Labonte to drive limited schedule in Nextel Cup <b>...</b> Labonte, a native of Corpus Christi, Texas, announced Tuesday that he will compete in at least 10 races with Hendrick Motorsports in 2005 and 2006 before retiring from the series.
Translation: El piloto de NASCAR T. Labonte conducirá un programa limitado en la Copa Nextel ... Labonte, originario de Corpus Christi, Texas, anunció el martes que competirá en al menos 10 carreras con Hendrick Motorsports en 2005 y 2006 antes de retirarse de la serie.
Paraphrase 1: 1. T. Labonte, a NASCAR driver and Corpus Christi, Texas local, revealed on Tuesday his plans to race in a minimum of 10 events with Hendrick Motorsports in 2005 and 2006 as a part of a limited schedule in the Nextel Cup, prior to his retirement from the series.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Native to Corpus Christi, Texas, T. Labonte, a racer in NASCAR, proclaimed his plan on Tuesday to engage in at least 10 contests with Hendrick Motorsports in the years 2005 and 2006 under a restricted Nextel Cup schedule, before he concludes his participation in the series.

Original Text: No Changes to the Induce Act Please! \\Just let it die!\\The amount of damage this will cause our economy and to the Technology industry\is staggering.\\Let this argument evolve.
