The RIAA/MPAA doesn't speak for the entire country.\All this will do is push P2P development offshore.\\"The U.S. Copyright Office has drafted a new version of the Induce Act that it\believes will ban networks like Kazaa and Morpheus while not putting hardware\such as portable hard drives and MP3 players on the wrong side of the law."\\"The original Induce Act has been severely criticized for possibly jeopardizing\products such Apple Computer's iPod that could "induce" people to commit piracy."\\
Translation: ¡No se hagan cambios a la Ley Induce por favor! \\¡Solo déjenla morir!\\El daño que esto causará a nuestra economía y a la industria de la Tecnología\es asombroso.\\Dejen que este argumento evolucione. La RIAA/MPAA no habla por todo el país.\Todo lo que esto hará es impulsar el desarrollo P2P en el extranjero.\\"La Oficina de Derechos de Autor de los EE. UU. ha redactado una nueva versión de la Ley Induce que cree\que prohibirá redes como Kazaa y Morpheus sin poner hardware\como discos duros portátiles y reproductores MP3 en el lado equivocado de la ley." \\"La Ley Induce original ha sido duramente criticada por poner potencialmente en peligro\productos como el iPod de Apple Computer que podría "inducir" a las personas a cometer piratería."\\
Paraphrase 1: 1. Please refrain from making any amendments to the Induce Act, allow it to cease naturally! The significant harm it will inflict upon our economy and the technology sector is overwhelming. Allow this debate to progress naturally. It must be remembered that voices like the RIAA/MPAA do not represent the whole nation. This Act will only result in Peer-to-peer development being moved to foreign nations. The U.S. Copyright Office has prepared a revised version of the Induce Act, in belief that it will prohibit networks like Kazaa and Morpheus while ensuring devices such as portable hard drives and MP3 players don't fall foul of the law. The initial Induce Act faced heavy criticism for potentially endangering products like Apple Computer's iPod, which it was claimed could "induce" piracy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Don't alter the Induce Act, instead let it fade away organically! It is shocking the amount of harm it can cause to our economic system and the technology field. Allow this discussion to develop. The RIAA/MPAA's opinions do not reflect those of the entire country. The only thing this will accomplish is outsourcing peer-to-peer development. The U.S. Copyright Office has drafted a new form of the Induce Act, hoping that it will outlaw networks like Kazaa and Morpheus while leaving hardware like portable hard drives and MP3 players within the legal boundaries. The original Induce Act faced severe backlash for the potential risk it posed to products such as Apple's iPod, which are feared to "induce" people to engage in piracy.

Original Text: Sun: MS truce clears way to open source Solaris <strong>LinuxWorld</strong> If that's selling out, we want to sell out more often
Translation: Sol: La tregua de Microsoft abre camino para convertir Solaris a código abierto <strong>LinuxWorld</strong> Si eso es venderse, queremos vendernos más a menudo
Paraphrase 1: 1. "LinuxWorld: The truce with Microsoft paves the way for Solaris to become open source. If this is what it means to sell out, we should do it more often."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "If being a sellout involves enabling Solaris to be open source through a truce with Microsoft, as seen in LinuxWorld, we would desire such outcomes more frequently."

Original Text: Erickson plans to stick with Niners for now Coach Dennis Erickson is in no hurry to leave the San Francisco 49ers just yet. Erickson responded to the circling rumors about his future Monday, saying he thinks he #39;ll still be employed by the 2-11 Niners at least until January.
Translation: Erickson planea quedarse con los Niners por ahora. El entrenador Dennis Erickson no tiene prisa por dejar a los San Francisco 49ers todavía. Erickson respondió a los rumores circulantes sobre su futuro el lunes, diciendo que cree que seguirá siendo empleado por los Niners de 2-11 al menos hasta enero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Coach Dennis Erickson, who currently coaches the San Francisco 49ers, has expressed that he does not plan on leaving anytime soon. Despite the rumors regarding his future, Erickson voiced on Monday that he believes he will remain with the 2-11 Niners till at least January.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The San Francisco 49ers' coach, Dennis Erickson, dismisses the widespread speculations about his impending departure from the team. In a response to these rumors on Monday, Erickson stated that he anticipates to continue his tenure with the struggling 2-11 Niners till the turn of the year.

Original Text: Intel CTO: New Protocol Needed For Next-Gen  #39;Net Intel #39;s chief technologist called for an overlay network to be applied to the Internet infrastructure to allow new protocols and services to be enabled.
Translation: CTO de Intel: Se necesita un nuevo protocolo para la próxima generación de Internet #39; Net. El jefe tecnólogo de Intel pidió que se aplique una red de superposición a la infraestructura de Internet para permitir la habilitación de nuevos protocolos y servicios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel's Chief Technologist argues for a new protocol necessary for Next-Generation internet and suggests an overlay network for the existing internet infrastructure to support new services and protocols.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the view of Intel's Chief Technologist, the Next-Generation internet requires a new protocol; he recommends implementing an overlay network on the current Internet framework to facilitate these new services and protocols.

Original Text: Bush Shrugs Off Bad Polls on Iraq Outlook (AP) AP - President Bush on Thursday shrugged off polls that suggest most Iraqis see Americans as occupiers not liberators. "I saw a poll that said the right track-wrong track in Iraq was better than here in America," he told reporters.
Translation: Bush Ignora las Malas Encuestas sobre la Perspectiva de Irak (AP) AP - El jueves, el presidente Bush ignoró las encuestas que sugieren que la mayoría de los iraquíes ven a los estadounidenses como ocupantes y no como liberadores. "Vi una encuesta que decía que el camino correcto-incorrecto en Irak era mejor que aquí en América", dijo a los periodistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) President Bush Neglects Negative Iraq Poll Results (AP) AP - Disregarding polls indicating that a majority of Iraqis perceive Americans as occupiers as opposed to liberators, President Bush confided to reporters on Thursday, "I observed a poll that revealed the right or wrong direction in Iraq was superior than it is here in America."
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) President Bush Ignores Unfavourable Iraq Polls, AP - Despite consistent polls outlining the perception of Americans as occupiers rather than liberators among Iraqis, President Bush maintained a positive outlook on Thursday. Bringing to the fore a different poll, he shared with the reporters, "There was a poll demonstrating a better right or wrong track record in Iraq as compared to America."

Original Text: Des Kelly: D-Day looms for embattled Fergie He knows there is silverware inside somewhere, but the combination to the lock eludes him. Sir Alex Ferguson has been tinkering with different permutations for so long that nobody can now predict how Manchester
Translation: Des Kelly: El Día D se acerca para un Fergie asediado. Sabe que dentro hay algún trofeo, pero la combinación para abrir la cerradura se le escapa. Sir Alex Ferguson ha estado jugueteando con diferentes permutaciones durante tanto tiempo que ahora nadie puede prever cómo en Manchester
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sir Alex Ferguson, who is currently under pressure, knows there's a potential victory within reach, but the formula to unlock it has been escaping him. With D-Day approaching, as specified by Des Kelly, he has been experimenting with numerous combinations to such extent that no one now foresees Manchester United's strategy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Immersed with the anticipation of the D-Day, Sir Alex Ferguson is struggling to find the right combination for the hidden success, noted by Des Kelly. Undeterred, Ferguson has been juggling with several variables for such a long time that predicting what Manchester United will do next has become unpredictable.

Original Text: Wisconsin State Journal Someday, we may see Wednesday as being one of the most important dates in the history of aviation. The flight of  quot;SpaceShipOne, quot; however, seemed almost routine - at least until one thought about how miraculous it was.
Translation: El periódico estatal de Wisconsin: Algún día, podríamos ver el miércoles como una de las fechas más importantes en la historia de la aviación. Sin embargo, el vuelo de "SpaceShipOne" parecía casi rutinario, al menos hasta que uno pensaba en cuán milagroso era.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the annals of aviation history, Wednesday may someday be recognized as a crucial date. However, the flight of "SpaceShipOne" seemed almost mundane, until we truly appreciated its extraordinary nature.
Paraphrase 2: 2. We may eventually regard Wednesday as a pivotal date in aviation history because of the "SpaceShipOne" flight. Though this flight seemed common, upon reflection, its miraculousness was apparent.

Original Text: Karzai is President After the First Round Indications show that Afghanistan #39;s Interim President Hamid Karzai has won the first presidential elections in the country #39;s history.
Translation: Las indicaciones muestran que el Presidente interino de Afganistán, Hamid Karzai, ha ganado las primeras elecciones presidenciales en la historia del país después de la primera ronda. Karzai es Presidente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the initial round, indications suggest that Hamid Karzai, Afghanistan's Interim President, has emerged victorious in the country's first presidential elections.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The preliminary indications indicate that Hamid Karzai, the Interim President of Afghanistan, is the winner of the country's inaugural presidential elections after the first round.

Original Text: Egypt's Walls Come Tumbling Down  CAIRO -- Two outer walls are cracked and crumbling, the bathroom walls have fallen down in a heap of brick, the steps to the second floor wiggle like loose teeth. Groundwater seeps into a little courtyard to form an unwanted wading pool. The whole two-story structure sags in the middle, as if suspended from a rope attached to the buildings next door.
Translation: Las Paredes de Egipto se Derrumban  EL CAIRO -- Dos muros exteriores están agrietados y desmoronándose, las paredes del baño se han derrumbado en un montón de ladrillos, los escalones hacia el segundo piso se tambalean como dientes sueltos. El agua subterránea se filtra en un pequeño patio para formar una piscina no deseada. Toda la estructura de dos pisos se hunde en el medio, como si estuviera suspendida de una cuerda atada a los edificios de al lado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CAIRO -- Two exterior walls of an Egyptian building are showing severe signs of damage and disrepair. The walls of the bathroom have toppled over, resulting in a pile of bricks, while the stairs to the upper floor tremble, bearing a resemblance to shaky teeth. The entire building, which spans two floors, droops in the center, giving off an impression of being held by a rope tied to adjacent buildings. Moreover, groundwater is slowly infiltrating, accruing in a small courtyard and unintentionally creating a shallow pool.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Cairo, two peripheral walls are found to be fissured and decaying, while the walls of the bathroom have completely caved in, leaving behind a brick residue. The stairway leading to the second floor exhibits instability, similar to unsettled teeth. The complete two-floor edifice gives off a drooping exterior in the center, as if tied to the neighboring structures by a cord. An unwelcome paddling pool has emerged in a petite courtyard as a result of groundwater leakage.

Original Text: Wachovia reports boost in 3rd-quarter profits CHARLOTTE, NC - Financial services firm Wachovia Corp. said Friday that third-quarter earnings increased as declining retail brokerage activity was offset by higher revenue in wealth management and investment banking segments.
Translation: Wachovia informa aumento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre CHARLOTTE, NC - La empresa de servicios financieros Wachovia Corp. dijo el viernes que las ganancias del tercer trimestre aumentaron a medida que la disminución de la actividad de corretaje minorista fue compensada por mayores ingresos en los segmentos de gestión de patrimonio y banca de inversión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHARLOTTE, NC - On Friday, Wachovia Corp., a financial services company, announced a surge in third-quarter profits. Despite a drop in retail brokerage activity, higher gains from the wealth management and investment banking sections balanced the results.

Original Text: Sudan talks stall on security issues PEACE talks between the Sudanese government and rebel groups from the troubled region of Darfur have stalled. The talks, brokered by the African Union, are being held in Nigeria, are deadlocked over disarmament and other security issues.
Translation: Las conversaciones de Sudán se estancan por cuestiones de seguridad. Las conversaciones de paz entre el Gobierno sudanés y los grupos rebeldes de la problemática región de Darfur se han estancado. Las negociaciones, mediadas por la Unión Africana, que se llevan a cabo en Nigeria, están en punto muerto por el desarme y otras cuestiones de seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Peace negotiations between the Sudanese government and Darfur rebel factions are at a standstill, particularly over disarmament and several other security matters. These discussions, facilitated by the African Union and held in Nigeria, are currently making no headway.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The African Union-brokered peace negotiations in Nigeria between the Sudanese government and rebel groups from Darfur are at an impasse. Disarmament and other security-related concerns have caused the talks to stall.

Original Text: Microsoft Shares More Source Code Trying to head off growing competition from open-source rivals, Microsoft is expanding a program to give government organizations access to some of its tightly guarded software blueprints.
Translation: Microsoft comparte más código fuente. Intentando adelantarse a la creciente competencia de los rivales de código abierto, Microsoft está expandiendo un programa para dar acceso a algunas de sus preciadas bases de código de software a las organizaciones gubernamentales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to curb increased competition from open-source contenders, Microsoft is broadening a scheme to enable government entities to access some of its closely protected software source codes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Striving to mitigate the rising competition from open-source competitors, Microsoft is enhancing a program that allows government agencies to view some of their closely held software blueprints.

Original Text: SEC proposes tighter IPO regulations Artificially boosting demand for initial public stock offerings and ramping up related commissions would be restricted under rules proposed yesterday by the US Securities and Exchange Commission.
Translation: La SEC propone regulaciones más estrictas para las IPO. Inflar artificialmente la demanda de ofertas públicas iniciales de acciones y aumentar las comisiones relacionadas, sería restringido bajo las reglas propuestas ayer por la Comisión de Valores y Bolsa de Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Securities and Exchange Commission suggested new rules yesterday aimed at limiting the practice of artificially enhancing demand for initial public offerings and increasing their associated commissions.

Original Text: FCC asks high court to rule on broadband The federal government is challenging an appeals court ruling that, officials fear, would stifle the expansion of cable broadband services by burdening the providers with new regulations.
Translation: La FCC solicita a la corte suprema que se pronuncie sobre el ancho de banda. El gobierno federal está desafiando un fallo de la corte de apelaciones que, temen los funcionarios, sofocaría la expansión de los servicios de banda ancha por cable al gravar a los proveedores con nuevas regulaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Federal government is contesting an appellate court decision that could potentially hinder the growth of cable broadband services due to the imposition of fresh regulations, a request has been made to the high court by the FCC for a ruling on this matter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to apprehensions that new regulations, resulting from an appeals court decision, may inhibit cable broadband services expansion, the FCC has sought a ruling from the high court, thereby representing a challenge by the federal government.

Original Text: Beetles used to make Smarties THERE are green ones, yellow ones and even blue ones. But how many beetle-coloured Smarties have you tried? Red Smarties get their bright colour from a dye made from dried and crushed insects.
Translation: Los escarabajos solían usarse para hacer Smarties. Hay de color verde, amarillo e incluso azul. ¿Pero cuántos Smarties de color escarabajo has probado? Los Smarties rojos obtienen su brillante color de un tinte hecho de insectos secos y triturados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Have you ever tasted Smarties that are beetle-colored? Smarties come in a range of colors such as green, yellow, and even blue. Interestingly, the vibrant hue of Red Smarties is derived from a colorant produced by crushing dry beetles.

Original Text: Schilling to appear with Bush in NH One of the heros of the World Series will be in the political spotlight Friday in New Hampshire. Boston Red Sox pitching ace Curt Schilling is appearing with President Bush Friday.
Translation: Schilling aparecerá con Bush en NH. Uno de los héroes de la Serie Mundial estará en el centro de atención política el viernes en New Hampshire. El as de los lanzadores de los Boston Red Sox, Curt Schilling, aparecerá con el Presidente Bush el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. One of the World Series' heroes, Boston Red Sox's pitching star Curt Schilling, is slated to join President Bush this Friday in New Hampshire.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This Friday, Curt Schilling, the Boston Red Sox pitching sensation and World Series hero, will share the political stage with President Bush in New Hampshire.

Original Text: Company Making Fake Urine for Researchers (AP) AP - In Kevin Dyches' mind, the future is yellow. Dyna-Tek Industries, a company Kevin and his wife, Sandra, bought five years ago, has developed synthetic urine for the research industry.
Translation: Compañía Fabrica Orina Falsa para Investigadores (AP) AP - En la mente de Kevin Dyches, el futuro es amarillo. Dyna-Tek Industries, una compañía que Kevin y su esposa, Sandra, compraron hace cinco años, ha desarrollado orina sintética para la industria de la investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Kevin Dyches, along with his wife Sandra, took over Dyna-Tek Industries five years ago. They have now successfully created artificial urine, destined for use within the research sector. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) For research purposes, Dyna-Tek Industries, acquired by Kevin Dyches and his wife Sandra half-a-decade ago, has invented counterfeit urine. (AP)

Original Text: Briton Jailed for Arms Dealings  HARARE, Zimbabwe, Sept. 10 -- A Zimbabwean court jailed a former British special services officer for seven years Friday in a case prosecutors linked to a foiled coup attempt in the oil-rich country of Equatorial Guinea.
Translation: Británico encarcelado por tráfico de armas HARARE, Zimbabwe, 10 de septiembre -- Un tribunal de Zimbabwe encarceló el viernes durante siete años a un ex oficial de los servicios especiales británicos en un caso que los fiscales vincularon a un intento de golpe de estado frustrado en el rico en petróleo país de Guinea Ecuatorial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. HARARE, Zimbabwe, Sept. 10 -- The Zimbabwean judiciary, on Friday, sentenced a previous British special services officer to prison for seven years in a case which, according to prosecutors, was connected to an averted coup in the affluent oil nation of Equatorial Guinea. He had been implicated in arms dealings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Sept. 10th, in Zimbabwe's capital Harare, a former officer of the British special services was put behind bars for seven years. Prosecutors related his actions to an unsuccessful attempt to overthrow the government in the oil-rich nation, Equatorial Guinea. His sentence was due to his involvement in arms trade.

Original Text: Hamilton #39;s gold medal safe Tyler Hamilton will keep his title as an Olympics cycling champion, but he faces an uphill climb to restore his reputation and avoid a ban from his sport.
Translation: La medalla de oro de Hamilton está a salvo. Tyler Hamilton mantendrá su título como campeón de ciclismo olímpico, pero enfrenta una cuesta empinada para restaurar su reputación y evitar una prohibición en su deporte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tyler Hamilton, the Olympics cycling champion, will retain his gold medal, however, maintaining his reputation and evading a suspension from his sport appear to be challenging tasks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though Tyler Hamilton is poised to hold onto his title of Olympics cycling champion, he confronts a challenging journey towards rehabilitating his reputation and preventing a ban from his sport.

Original Text: Crude oil prices on the rise, airlines squeezed further Crude oil prices rose back up over \$53 a barrel Tuesday, signaling more bad news for an airline industry already facing record-high fuel prices.
Translation: Los precios del petróleo crudo en aumento, las aerolíneas se ven aún más presionadas. Los precios del petróleo crudo volvieron a subir a más de $53 por barril el martes, señalando más malas noticias para una industria de aerolíneas que ya enfrenta precios de combustible récord.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The surge in crude oil prices to over $53 a barrel on Tuesday presages additional challenges for the airline industry that is already grappling with sky-high fuel costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With crude oil prices climbing to over $53 a barrel on Tuesday, it spells more troubles for the beleaguered airline industry which is currently burdened with all-time high fuel charges.

Original Text: Ericsson Warns on Growth A predicted slowdown in future market growth has taken the shine off Ericsson AB #39;s (Nasdaq: ERICY - message board) impressive third quarter results today, sending its share price spiraling down (see Ericsson Ups Q3 Profit).
Translation: Ericsson advierte sobre el crecimiento. Una desaceleración prevista en el crecimiento futuro del mercado ha opacado los impresionantes resultados del tercer trimestre de Ericsson AB #39; (Nasdaq: ERICY - foro de mensajes) hoy, enviando su precio de las acciones en caída libre (ver Ericsson aumenta beneficio del tercer trimestre).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ericsson AB's impressive third quarter results today were overshadowed by a forecasted market growth slowdown, causing a significant drop in its share price (see Ericsson Ups Q3 Profit).

Original Text: Power failure hits Bahrain A total power blackout has hit Bahrain, leaving the entire country without electricity and air conditioning at a time when temperatures have risen above 50C.
Translation: Un fallo eléctrico afecta a Bahréin. Un apagón total ha golpeado a Bahréin, dejando a todo el país sin electricidad y aire acondicionado en un momento en que las temperaturas han subido por encima de los 50C.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bahrain is grappling with a total power blackout that has left the country devoid of electricity and air conditioning, amidst temperatures soaring above 50C.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At a time when temperatures are climbing beyond 50C, Bahrain has been struck by a complete power failure, resulting in a lack of electricity and air conditioning throughout the country.

Original Text: IBM buys Canadian project portfolio management vendor IBM Corp. has agreed to buy Montreal software developer Systemcorp ALG for an undisclosed sum, the companies said Tuesday.
Translation: IBM compra el proveedor canadiense de gestión de carteras de proyectos IBM Corp. ha acordado comprar el desarrollador de software de Montreal Systemcorp ALG por una suma no revelada, dijeron las compañías el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, the companies announced that IBM Corp. has finalized an agreement to acquire Montreal-based software developer Systemcorp ALG, although the financial details of the transaction remain undisclosed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Systemcorp ALG, a software developer located in Montreal, has been purchased by IBM Corp. for an undisclosed amount, as confirmed by the companies on Tuesday.

Original Text: Dell touts in-home services Dell offers to install its PCs, televisions and networks, and provide extra phone support for stopping viruses and spyware.
Translation: Dell promociona servicios a domicilio. Dell ofrece instalar sus PC, televisores y redes, y proporciona soporte telefónico adicional para detener virus y spyware.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dell promotes its in-home services, which includes installing personal computers, televisions, and networks, and an additional phone support to thwart viruses and spyware.

Original Text: U.N. Food Agency Steps Up Sudan Aid (AP) AP - The United Nations' food relief agency is gearing up for a "critical stage" in feeding refugees in western Sudan as more people flee ethnic violence there and the rainy season peaks, U.N. officials said Wednesday.
Translation: Agencia de Alimentos de la ONU intensifica ayuda a Sudán (AP) AP - La agencia de asistencia alimentaria de las Naciones Unidas se está preparando para una "etapa crítica" en la alimentación de los refugiados en el oeste de Sudán a medida que más personas huyen de la violencia étnica en esa zona y la temporada de lluvias alcanza su punto máximo, dijeron funcionarios de la ONU el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) U.N. officials announced on Wednesday that the United Nations' food relief agency is ramping up efforts to provide aid in Sudan during a crucial period. The escalating ethnic violence and the peak of the rainy season have caused an increase in the number of refugees in Western Sudan relying on this help.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The food relief agency under the United Nations is preparing for an important phase in assisting refugees in Western Sudan on Wednesday. As ethnic violence intensifies and the rainy season reaches its peak, more people are being displaced, necessitating increased aid efforts, according to U.N. officials.

Original Text: Glaxo Defends Testing AIDS Drugs in Children  LONDON (Reuters) - GlaxoSmithKline Plc Tuesday defended  trials of AIDS/HIV drugs in children in care homes, saying  clinical studies involving children were legal and not unusual.
Translation: Glaxo Defiende Pruebas de Medicamentos para el SIDA en Niños LONDRES (Reuters) - GlaxoSmithKline Plc defendió el martes los ensayos de medicamentos para el SIDA/VIH en niños en hogares de cuidado, diciendo que los estudios clínicos que involucran a niños son legales y no son inusuales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - On Tuesday, GlaxoSmithKline Plc stood up for its conduct in testing AIDS/HIV drugs on children in care homes, stating that such clinical trials are both lawful and common.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a recent statement issued from London, GlaxoSmithKline Plc reaffirms the legality and prevalence of their testing processes involving AIDS/HIV drugs on children in care homes.

Original Text: Sony Begins Mass Production of OLED Displays Sony announced today that they will start mass production of a full-color Organic Light Emitting Diode (OLED) display. The new displayed will be first used in their new CLIE PEG-VZ90 handheld.
Translation: Sony comienza la producción masiva de pantallas OLED. Sony anunció hoy que comenzarán la producción masiva de una pantalla de Diodo Orgánico Emisor de Luz (OLED) a todo color. La nueva pantalla se utilizará por primera vez en su nuevo dispositivo portátil CLIE PEG-VZ90.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony declared today that it would soon start mass manufacturing of a full-color Organic Light Emitting Diode (OLED) display, the first use of which would be in their latest handheld device, the CLIE PEG-VZ90.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The mass production of a full-color Organic Light Emitting Diode (OLED) display has commenced at Sony, as announced today, initially catered towards their new handheld, CLIE PEG-VZ90.

Original Text: John Deere, iRobot team on military vehicle BOSTON -- In a pairing of robotics and tractor companies, iRobot and John Deere disclosed plans yesterday to build a 9-foot-long semi-autonomous battlefield vehicle.
Translation: John Deere, iRobot se unen en vehículo militar BOSTON -- En una asociación de empresas de robótica y tractores, iRobot y John Deere revelaron planes ayer para construir un vehículo de campo de batalla semi-autónomo de 9 pies de largo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BOSTON -- iRobot, a robotics company, and John Deere, a tractor company, revealed yesterday their joint plan to construct a semi-autonomous battlefield vehicle that measures 9 feet in length.

Original Text: For Sale: The Ultimate Status Symbol With the country in need of cash and rich people dying to show off their wealth, Mr. Stein proposes a unique solution: having the government sell titles of nobility.
Translation: En Venta: El Símbolo de Estatus Definitivo. Con el país necesitando dinero y las personas adineradas deseosas de lucir su riqueza, el Sr. Stein propone una solución única: que el gobierno venda títulos de nobleza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mr. Stein suggests an innovative resolution as the nation demands money and affluent individuals seek to flaunt their opulence: he encourages the government to auction honors of nobility. This is the ultimate status symbol for sale.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In light of the nation's cash crunch and the wealthy's eagerness to display their fortune, Mr. Stein recommends an extraordinary strategy: the government should put up aristocratic titles for sale as the paramount emblem of status.

Original Text: Montreal Expos Fans Set to Bid Adieu to Team Fans of the Montreal Expos prepared to bid adieu on Wednesday, as Canada #39;s first big league baseball team appeared set to move to Washington.
Translation: Los aficionados de los Expos de Montreal se preparan para despedirse del equipo Los aficionados de los Expos de Montreal se prepararon para decir adiós el miércoles, ya que el primer equipo de béisbol de las grandes ligas de Canadá parecía listo para mudarse a Washington.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Supporters of the Montreal Expos are readying themselves to say goodbye on Wednesday, with signs indicating that the first major Canadian baseball team is likely relocating to Washington.

Original Text: Dollar Slides Versus Yen  LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar fell two thirds of a percent  against the yen to within sight of seven-month lows and edged  toward recent record lows against the euro on Friday as worries  persisted about the U.S. current account deficit.
Translation: El Dólar Cae Frente al Yen LONDRES (Reuters) - El dólar cayó dos tercios de un porcentaje frente al yen, acercándose a mínimos de siete meses y se aproximó a los mínimos históricos recientes frente al euro el viernes, ya que las preocupaciones persisten sobre el déficit en cuenta corriente de Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - On Friday, concerns about the U.S. current account deficit persisted, leading to a two-thirds percent drop of the dollar against the yen, nearing seven-month lows. Additionally, the dollar also edged closer to its recent record lows against the euro.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - Due to ongoing concerns about the U.S. current account deficit, the dollar declined by two-thirds of a percent against the yen on Friday, approaching an almost seven-month low. It also moved closer to its recent historical lows against the euro.

Original Text: Voters checking out other sides #39; sites Are right-leaning voters spending all their online time on Rushlimbaugh.com? Are left-leaning voters locked into the like-minded Talkingpointsmemo.
Translation: ¿Están los votantes comprobando los sitios de los otros lados? ¿Los votantes de derechas están pasando todo su tiempo en línea en Rushlimbaugh.com? ¿Están los votantes de izquierdas encerrados en el igualmente inclinado Talkingpointsmemo?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Are right-leaning voters devoting all their time on the internet to Rushlimbaugh.com, and are left-leaning voters only browsing sites with similar ideologies like Talkingpointsmemo?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Is it accurate to say that voters who lean to the right are solely browsing Rushlimbaugh.com online, while those who lean left are continually active on similar platforms like Talkingpointsmemo?

Original Text: High-tech start-ups feel push to outsource Venture capitalists have a pressing new question for high-tech entrepreneurs who come looking for money: What's your India plan?
Translation: Las empresas emergentes de alta tecnología sienten la presión de tercerizar. Los capitalistas de riesgo tienen una nueva pregunta urgente para los empresarios de la tecnología que buscan financiamiento: ¿Cuál es tu plan para India?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Venture capitalists are increasingly asking high-tech start-ups looking for funding about their outsourcing strategy, specifically, their plans for India.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For tech entrepreneurs seeking investments, venture capitalists are now insisting on understanding their India-centric outsourcing plans.

Original Text: Ape Learning Center Welcoming 'Students' DES MOINES, Iowa - Azy and Indah are heading to school this week - a unique experience for two clever orangutans whose classroom will eventually encompass more than 200 acres of lowlands, river forest and lakes. On Tuesday, the inquisitive primates will become the first residents of the Great Ape Trust of Iowa...
Translation: Centro de Aprendizaje para Simios da la Bienvenida a 'Estudiantes' DES MOINES, Iowa - Azy e Indah van a la escuela esta semana - una experiencia única para dos inteligentes orangutanes cuyo aula eventualmente abarcará más de 200 acres de tierras bajas, bosque fluvial y lagos. El martes, los primates curiosos serán los primeros residentes del Gran Fideicomiso de Simios de Iowa...
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Ape Learning Center, in Des Moines, Iowa, Azy and Indah, two intelligent orangutans, are preparing to begin their education. They will study in an unconventional school that includes over 200 acres of lowlands, river forests and lakes. Starting Tuesday, these curious apes will be the inaugural inhabitants of the Great Ape Trust of Iowa...
Paraphrase 2: 2. This week, Azy and Indah, two intellectually bright orangutans, will embark on a unique academic journey at the Ape Learning Center located in Des Moines, Iowa. Their learning environment features an impressive 200 acres of lowlands, river forests, and lakes. They'll soon be recognized as the first residents of Iowa's Great Ape Trust, with their enrollment set to begin on Tuesday...

Original Text: More bodies found in Mosul US forces uncovered more bodies in the northern city of Mosul on Friday, apparent victims of an intimidation campaign by insurgents against Iraq #39;s fledgling security forces.
Translation: Se encontraron más cuerpos en Mosul. Las fuerzas estadounidenses descubrieron más cuerpos en la ciudad norteña de Mosul el viernes, aparentes víctimas de una campaña de intimidación de insurgentes contra las incipientes fuerzas de seguridad de Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Mosul, a city located in the north, US forces discovered additional bodies on Friday. These individuals seemingly fell victim to an insurgent's intimidation drive against Iraq's evolving security forces.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US forces discovered further bodies in the northern city of Mosul on Friday, presumed casualties of a fearmongering campaign carried out by insurgents against Iraq's emerging security forces.

Original Text: Alcohol good after heart surgery A tipple or two can aid recovery from heart surgery,  research suggests.
Translation: El alcohol es beneficioso después de una cirugía de corazón. Un trago o dos pueden ayudar en la recuperación de una cirugía de corazón, sugiere la investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Research indicates that a drink or two may be beneficial in the recuperation process after heart surgery.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to research, post-heart surgery recovery can be assisted by consuming a moderate amount of alcohol.

Original Text: Woolmer, Inzamam in firing line Karachi - Captain Inzamam ul-Haq and coach Bob Woolmer came under fire on Thursday for choosing to bat first on a tricky pitch after Pakistan #39;s humiliating defeat in the ICC Champions Trophy semi-final.
Translation: Woolmer, Inzamam en la línea de fuego Karachi - El capitán Inzamam ul-Haq y el entrenador Bob Woolmer fueron criticados el jueves por elegir batear primero en un campo complicado tras la humillante derrota de Pakistán en la semifinal del Trofeo de Campeones de la ICC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Captain Inzamam ul-Haq and coach Bob Woolmer of Karachi faced criticism on Thursday for their decision to bat first on a challenging pitch, leading to Pakistan's shameful loss in the ICC Champions Trophy semi-final.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After Pakistan's disastrous defeat in the ICC Champions Trophy semi-final, both Captain Inzamam ul-Haq and coach Bob Woolmer found themselves under scrutiny on Thursday due to their decision to open batting on a difficult pitch in Karachi.

Original Text: Audit Finds No Fraud In Venezuelan Election The referendum on Aug. 15, 2004 rejected the petition to revoke the mandate of President Hugo Chavez. The observation of The Carter Center mission confirms the results announced by the National Election Council
Translation: La Auditoría No Encuentra Fraude en las Elecciones Venezolanas. El referéndum del 15 de agosto de 2004 rechazó la petición para revocar el mandato del presidente Hugo Chávez. La observación de la misión del Centro Carter confirma los resultados anunciados por el Consejo Nacional Electoral.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Carter Center mission's observation validates the results declared by the National Election Council, which confirm that there was no fraud in the Venezuelan election audit. The petition to depose President Hugo Chavez was repudiated in the Aug. 15, 2004 referendum.
Paraphrase 2: 2. No evidence of fraud was found in the Venezuelan election audit, as affirmed by the observation of The Carter Center mission, in line with the results publicized by the National Election Council. This confirms the rejection of the attempt to unseat President Hugo Chavez, as determined by the referendum on Aug. 15, 2004.

Original Text: Soldiers kill Palestinian near Gaza-Israel fence Israeli soldiers shot and killed a Palestinian as he approached a security fence between Israel and the Gaza Strip, Israeli military sources said today.
Translation: Soldados matan a palestino cerca de la valla entre Gaza e Israel. Soldados israelíes dispararon y mataron a un palestino mientras se acercaba a una valla de seguridad entre Israel y la Franja de Gaza, dijeron hoy fuentes militares israelíes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Israeli military sources today, a Palestinian who was nearing the security fence between Israel and the Gaza Strip, was shot dead by Israeli soldiers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A Palestinian was fatally shot by Israeli soldiers near the Gaza-Israel security fence, as reported by Israeli military sources today.

Original Text: Heinz Kerry Recovers, Attends Parade (AP) AP - Teresa Heinz Kerry was back on the campaign trail at Labor Day parades in Pittsburgh and Philadelphia after a brief hospitalization over the weekend in Iowa because of an upset stomach.
Translation: Heinz Kerry se recupera, asiste a desfile (AP) AP - Teresa Heinz Kerry retomó la campaña en los desfiles del Día del Trabajo en Pittsburgh y Filadelfia después de una breve hospitalización durante el fin de semana en Iowa debido a un malestar estomacal.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) After a short stay in an Iowa hospital over the weekend due to a stomach upset, Teresa Heinz Kerry returned to the campaign trail and took part in the Labor Day parades in both Pittsburgh and Philadelphia.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Overcoming a brief hospitalization in Iowa for a stomach upset over the weekend, Teresa Heinz Kerry (AP) resumed her campaign activities, attending Labor Day parades in Pittsburgh and Philadelphia.

Original Text: Montreal Expos to Become the Nationals With Move to Washington The Expos would become the Nationals with a move to Washington next season and wear red, white and blue uniforms, Major League Baseball and team officials said during a press conference.
Translation: Los Expos de Montreal se convertirán en los Nationals con su traslado a Washington. Los Expos se convertirán en los Nationals la próxima temporada y usarán uniformes rojos, blancos y azules, dijeron los oficiales de la Major League Baseball y del equipo durante una conferencia de prensa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Major League Baseball and team officials announced in a press conference that the Montreal Expos will be rebranded as the Nationals and will relocate to Washington next season, complete with a new uniform in red, white, and blue.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a move confirmed by Major League Baseball and team officials during a press briefing, the Montreal Expos are set to transform into the Nationals by relocating to Washington in the forthcoming season, and they will don new uniforms in the national colors of red, white, and blue.

Original Text: Mortgage loan fall points to slowdown MORTGAGE lending fell again last month, a further sign that the housing bubble has burst. About 25.4bn was lent by banks and building societies last month, down 4 on August and the second monthly fall in
Translation: La caída en los préstamos hipotecarios apunta a una desaceleración. El préstamo hipotecario volvió a caer el mes pasado, una señal más de que la burbuja inmobiliaria ha estallado. Alrededor de 25.4bn fueron prestados por bancos y cajas de ahorros el mes pasado, un 4% menos que en agosto y la segunda caída mensual consecutiva.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last month, mortgage lending experienced another decline, suggesting the housing market's bubble has indeed burst. In the previous month, banks and construction societies loaned about 25.4bn, which is a decrease of 4 from August and the second consecutive fall in mortgage loan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A decrease in mortgage lending for the second month in a row has been reported, confirming suspicions that the housing market bubble has popped. Banks and building societies witnessed a drop of 4 in loaned amounts, down to around 25.4bn, reveling a general slowdown.

Original Text: Glazer #39;s bid for Manchester United not over yet Malcolm Glazer #39;s bid for Manchester United isn #39;t over, despite being turned away by the British soccer club #39;s board of directors over concerns that his proposed buyout requires too much debt.
Translation: La oferta de Glazer #39 para el Manchester United aún no ha terminado. La oferta de Malcolm Glazer #39 por el Manchester United aún no ha terminado, a pesar de haber sido rechazado por la junta de directores del club de fútbol británico por preocupaciones de que su propuesta de compra requiere demasiada deuda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the rejection from the board of directors of Manchester United due to worries about excessive debt from his proposed takeover, Malcolm Glazer's bid for the British soccer club is yet to be concluded.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The proposed buyout of Manchester United by Malcolm Glazer, which was rejected by the board of directors due to high debt concerns, has not come to an end yet.

Original Text: Federal Reserve Raises Key Interest Rate The Federal Reserve boosted a key short-term interest rate by one-quarter percentage point Wednesday, the fourth increase this year.
Translation:
La Reserva Federal Aumenta la Tasa de Interés Clave

La Reserva Federal incrementó una tasa de interés a corto plazo clave en un cuarto de punto porcentual el miércoles, el cuarto aumento de este año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, the Federal Reserve incremented a crucial short-term interest rate by a quarter of a percentage point, marking the fourth hike this year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The key short-term interest rate underwent a rise of one-quarter percentage point on Wednesday, as escalated by the Federal Reserve, making it their fourth such move within the year.

Original Text: Investigators Seek Clues in Ark. Bus Crash WEST MEMPHIS, Ark. - While relatives kept vigil at hospitals and church parishioners prayed for the dead, investigators scoured the crash site where a bus packed with gamblers overturned, killing 14 passengers...
Translation: Investigadores Buscan Pistas en Accidente de Autobús en Ark. WEST MEMPHIS, Ark. - Mientras los familiares mantenían vigilias en los hospitales y los feligreses de la iglesia rezaban por los muertos, los investigadores examinaron minuciosamente el lugar del accidente donde un autobús lleno de jugadores volcó, matando a 14 pasajeros...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In West Memphis, Ark., relatives maintained a vigilant watch over hospitalized victims, while churchgoers prayed for those who perished when a bus, filled with gamblers, toppled over. Meanwhile, investigators diligently combed through the accident scene, searching for clues to understand the crash that claimed 14 lives...
Paraphrase 2: 2. As relatives kept a watchful eye on the injured in hospitals, and prayers for the deceased echoed through churches, a meticulous investigation was underway at the scene of the catastrophic Ark. bus accident. A bus brimming with gamblers had flipped, resulting in the tragic fatalities of 14 people...

Original Text: Stocks Seen Higher Despite Oil Price  NEW YORK (Reuters) -  U.S. stocks looked to open slightly  higher on Tuesday, despite oil prices above \$50 a barrel, as  the market readies to extend its streak of gains in four of the  last five sessions.
Translation: Se prevé que las acciones suban a pesar del precio del petróleo  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Se espera que las acciones estadounidenses abran ligeramente al alza el martes, a pesar de los precios del petróleo por encima de los \$50 por barril, ya que el mercado se prepara para extender su racha de ganancias en cuatro de las últimas cinco sesiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite oil prices surpassing $50 a barrel, U.S. stocks on Tuesday appeared likely to open marginally higher as the market prepares to continue its trend of profits in four out of the past five sessions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although oil prices have crossed the $50 a barrel mark, there's an expectation for U.S. stocks to marginally rise at Tuesday's start, keeping the market on track with its recent trend of recording gains in four of the last five sessions.

Original Text: Oil Knocks Yen, Dents Dollar  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The yen fell to a six-week low against  the dollar on Tuesday as investors worried that soaring oil  prices could jeopardize Japan's economic recovery.
Translation: El petróleo golpea al Yen, daña al Dólar NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El yen cayó a su nivel más bajo en seis semanas frente al dólar el martes, ya que los inversores temían que el disparo de los precios del petróleo pudiera poner en peligro la recuperación económica de Japón.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The yen plummeted to its lowest in six weeks against the dollar on Tuesday, driven by concern among investors that skyrocketing oil prices could threaten Japan's economic resurgence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - With soaring oil prices causing unease among investors about the potential impact on Japan's economic bounce back, the yen plunged to a six-week trough against the dollar this Tuesday.

Original Text: Netflix, TiVo Aim to Offer Online Service (AP) AP - Home entertainment trendsetters Netflix Inc. and TiVo Inc. hope to link up on a service that will use high-speed Internet connections to pipe DVD-quality movies into the homes of their mutual subscribers.
Translation: Netflix, TiVo pretenden ofrecer servicio en línea (AP) AP - Los innovadores en entretenimiento para el hogar Netflix Inc. y TiVo Inc. esperan unirse en un servicio que usará conexiones de Internet de alta velocidad para transmitir películas de calidad DVD en las casas de sus suscriptores mutuos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Netflix and TiVo Plan to Provide Online Service (AP) AP- Netflix Inc. and TiVo Inc., both pioneers in home entertainment, aim to collaborate on a service that will deliver DVD-quality films to their shared subscribers through fast internet connections.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Netflix and TiVo Intend to Launch Internet-based Service (AP) AP - Leading the way in home entertainment, Netflix Inc. and TiVo Inc. are planning to offer a service that will stream DVD-quality movies to the households of their joint subscribers via high-speed Internet.

Original Text: US, Airlines Agree on New Water Testing Guidelines (Reuters) Reuters - Most big U.S. airlines will more\frequently test and disinfect aircraft storage and delivery\systems to ensure water used for drinking and washing meets\federal standards, the government and industry said on Tuesday.
Translation: EE.UU., Aerolíneas Acuerdan Nuevas Directrices de Prueba de Agua (Reuters) Reuters - La mayoría de las grandes aerolíneas estadounidenses probarán y desinfectarán con más frecuencia los sistemas de almacenamiento y entrega de aeronaves para garantizar que el agua utilizada para beber y lavar cumple con los estándares federales, dijo el gobierno y la industria el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - On Tuesday, the government and industry announced that the majority of major U.S. airlines have agreed to carry out more frequent testing and sanitization of their aircraft's storage and delivery systems. This measure is aimed to ensure the water used for drinking and washing purposes aligns with federal standards.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - To confirm adherence to federal standards for water used in drinking and washing activities, most large U.S. airlines have consented to enhance the frequency of examining and disinfecting their aircraft storage and delivery systems, revealed the government and industry on Tuesday.

Original Text: In the Battle of the Browsers '04, Firefox Aims at Microsoft Microsoft's browser dominates the Web, but it is facing new competition from Firefox, an open-source project by a new generation of software developers.
Translation: En la Batalla de los Navegadores del '04, Firefox apunta a Microsoft. El navegador de Microsoft domina la web, pero está enfrentando una nueva competencia de Firefox, un proyecto de código abierto de una nueva generación de desarrolladores de software.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst the 'Battle of the Browsers '04', Firefox, an open-source initiative led by a new wave of software developers, aims to challenge Microsoft's currently dominant browser on the Web.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the 2004's 'Battle of the Browsers', Firefox, a project crafted by innovative software developers, is setting out to compete against the prevalent Microsoft browser on the Web.

Original Text: ATHENS OLYMPICS 2004 / Japan bags bronze medal Japan hustled, hurled, homered--and what would it be if it didn #39;t bunt a few times--to a face-saving Olympic bronze medal in baseball.
Translation: OLIMPIADAS DE ATENAS 2004 / Japón se lleva la medalla de bronce. Japón se esforzó, lanzó, hizo homeruns, y qué sería si no tocase unas pocas veces, para obtener una medalla de bronce olímpica que salva su honor en béisbol.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the 2004 Athens Olympics, Japan exerted remarkable efforts, threw, scored home runs, and yes, even bunted several times, ultimately securing a respectable bronze medal in baseball.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Japan won a bronze medal in baseball, preserving their pride, at the Athens Olympics in 2004. They demonstrated their skill by playing intensely, throwing, hitting home runs, and not forgetting to include a few bunts.

Original Text: Swiss Glaciers on the Slippery Slope Switzerlands glaciers are melting faster than previously thought, losing almost a fifth of their total area between 1985 and 2000, experts said today.
Translation: Los Glaciares Suizos en la Pendiente Resbaladiza. Los glaciares de Suiza se están derritiendo más rápido de lo que se pensaba anteriormente, perdiendo casi una quinta parte de su área total entre 1985 y 2000, dijeron los expertos hoy.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Experts today announced that Swiss glaciers have been melting at a speedier rate than initially estimated, resulting in nearly a fifth of their overall area diminishing between 1985 and 2000.

Original Text: Britain condemns racist taunts; FIFA calls for probe The British government condemned racist taunts by fans in Spain aimed at black players on England #39;s team during an exhibition game, and soccer #39;s governing body ordered an investigation Thursday.
Translation: Gran Bretaña condena insultos racistas; FIFA pide investigación. El gobierno británico condenó los insultos racistas de los aficionados en España dirigidos a los jugadores negros del equipo de Inglaterra durante un partido de exhibición, y el jueves el organismo rector del fútbol ordenó una investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The government of Britain has publicly criticized the racist insults hurled by Spanish fans at black English team members during a friendly match, resulting in FIFA, the global authority on soccer, mandating an inquiry on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Racist jeering from Spanish fans against black players in England's team during a non-competitive match was denounced by the British government, and subsequently, an investigation was commissioned by soccer's controlling organization, FIFA, on Thursday.

Original Text: Window Dressing for Nudists Cosmetically altered mutual funds don't make sense -- and they're ugly, too.
Translation: Decoración de Ventanas para Nudistas Los fondos mutuos alterados cosméticamente no tienen sentido, y además son feos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Beautifying mutual funds for nudists doesn't seem logical -- and it's unattractive as well.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cosmetically modifying mutual funds for nudists is illogical – and aesthetically displeasing to boot.

Original Text: McDonald's Quarterly Earnings Rise  CHICAGO (Reuters) - McDonald's Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MCD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MCD.N</A> third-quarter  earnings rose a higher-than-expected 42 percent on a  preliminary basis, the world's largest restaurant chain said on  Wednesday, citing strong sales in the United States and a lower  tax rate.
Translation: Aumentan las ganancias trimestrales de McDonald's  CHICAGO (Reuters) - McDonald's Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MCD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MCD.N</A> anunció que sus ganancias del tercer trimestre aumentaron un 42 por ciento más que lo esperado en base preliminar, dijo el miércoles la cadena de restaurantes más grande del mundo, citando fuertes ventas en los Estados Unidos y una tasa impositiva más baja.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHICAGO (Reuters) - The world's largest restaurant chain, McDonald's Corp., MCD.N announced on Wednesday that their third-quarter earnings have surged by an unexpected 42 percent, mainly due to robust sales in the United States and favourable tax rates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. McDonald's Corp. MCD.N, from CHICAGO (Reuters), revealed that its earnings for the third quarter had increased by an impressive 42 percent, exceeding expectations. The significant rise, as reported on Wednesday, is attributed to increasing US sales and reduced tax liabilities.

Original Text: Cowboys Rally to Beat Raiders, 21-20 (AP) AP - Kerry Collins' one completion covered almost as many yards as Rich Gannon's seven. That's one reason why he might be a better fit in the Oakland Raiders' new offense. Collins' 89-yard scoring strike to Doug Gabriel in the third quarter was the biggest play of the game before the Dallas Cowboys rallied to beat Oakland 21-20 on Tony Romo's 1-yard keeper with six seconds left Saturday night.
Translation: "Los Cowboys se Recuperan para Vencer a los Raiders, 21-20 (AP) AP - El único pase de touchdown de Kerry Collins cubrió casi tantas yardas como los siete de Rich Gannon. Esa es una razón por la que podría ser una mejor opción en el nuevo ataque de los Oakland Raiders. El golpe anotador de 89 yardas de Collins a Doug Gabriel en el tercer cuarto fue la jugada más importante del juego antes de que los Dallas Cowboys se recuperaran para vencer a Oakland 21-20 con un acarreo de 1 yarda de Tony Romo cuando faltaban seis segundos para terminar el sábado por la noche."
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - In Oakland Raiders' new offense, Kerry Collins might be a better fit, seeing as his single completion covered nearly the same distance as Rich Gannon's seven. The major highlight of the game was Collins' 89-yard touchdown pass to Doug Gabriel in the third quarter. Despite this, the Dallas Cowboys managed a comeback and clinched a 21-20 victory over Oakland with a 1-yard keeper by Tony Romo, happening with just six seconds remaining in the game on Saturday night. Cowboys managed to rally and beat the Raiders, 21-20.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Considering his single completion spanned almost as many yards as Rich Gannon's seven, Kerry Collins might potentially mesh better with the Oakland Raiders' revamped offense. Collins' 89-yard touchdown connection with Doug Gabriel was the standout moment in the game until the Dallas Cowboys orchestrated a comeback. They overcame the Raiders 21-20, thanks to Tony Romo's decisive 1-yard keeper in the dying seconds of the game on Saturday night. This led to a triumphant rally by the Cowboys by a margin of 21-20 against the Raiders.

Original Text: Iran rejects European demands over nuclear standoff TEHRAN : Iran rejected European demands that it halt all uranium enrichment activities and described a proposal aimed at ending Tehran #39;s nuclear standoff with the international community as  quot;unbalanced.
Translation: TEHERÁN: Irán rechaza las demandas europeas sobre el enfrentamiento nuclear. Irán rechazó las demandas europeas de que detenga todas las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio y describió una propuesta destinada a poner fin al enfrentamiento nuclear de Teherán con la comunidad internacional como "desequilibrada".
Paraphrase 1: 1. TEHRAN: Iran dismissed the demands made by Europe to cease all uranium enrichment activities, characterizing the proposal designed to resolve Tehran's nuclear confrontation with the international community as "unbalanced".
Paraphrase 2: 2. TEHRAN: European demands for a halt to all uranium enrichment activities were rejected by Iran, who labeled the proposal intended to diffuse the nuclear tension between Tehran and the international community as being "unbalanced".

Original Text: Outspoken Winslow Makes Impression at Camp (AP) AP - Hot-tempered and outspoken, Kellen Winslow Jr. isn't toning it down just because he's a rookie.
Translation: Winslow Expresivo Causa Impresión en el Campamento (AP) AP - De temperamento caliente y expresivo, Kellen Winslow Jr. no va a moderarse solo porque es un novato.
Paraphrase 1: 1) At the Camp, Outspoken Winslow Leaves a Strong Impression (AP) AP - Kellen Winslow Jr., known for his hot temper and frankness, doesn't tame his attitude, despite being a newbie.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Impressively Outspoken, Winslow Stands Out at The Camp (AP) AP - Even as a fresh recruit, Kellen Winslow Jr. makes no attempt to restrain his fiery temperament and candidness.

Original Text: U.S. Study Says a Nuclear Iran Would Aid More Terror  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Iran could acquire a nuclear bomb in  the next one to four years and would become more willing to aid  terrorist groups once it has an atomic capability, according to  a U.S. study released on Tuesday.
Translation: El estudio de EE. UU. sostiene que un Irán nuclear apoyaría más al terrorismo. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Irán podría adquirir una bomba nuclear en el próximo uno a cuatro años y estaría más dispuesto a ayudar a los grupos terroristas una vez que tenga capacidad atómica, según un estudio de EE. UU. publicado el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters, Washington) - A U.S. study released on Tuesday suggests that Iran might possess a nuclear bomb within the next one to four years, increasing its likelihood to support terrorist organizations upon gaining nuclear capabilities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a recent U.S. study unveiled on Tuesday, Iran is potentially within one to four years of acquiring nuclear weaponry which, the study posits, could amplify its readiness to back terrorist factions.

Original Text: Australia Village: Weak Catwoman Results To Hurt Pft -2- SYDNEY (Dow Jones)--Village Roadshow Ltd. (VRL.AU) said Friday that results for its movie Catwoman were below expectations and will hurt film profits for the 2005 financial year.
Translation: Australia Village: Los Débiles Resultados de Catwoman Resultan en Pérdidas para Pft -2- SYDNEY (Dow Jones)--Village Roadshow Ltd. (VRL.AU) dijo el viernes que los resultados de su película Catwoman estuvieron por debajo de las expectativas y afectarán las ganancias de películas para el año fiscal 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Village Roadshow Ltd. (VRL.AU) announced that the poor performance of their film Catwoman is expected to negatively impact the company's film profits for the 2005 fiscal year, as the movie's results were not up to par. Sydney (Dow Jones) - Australia Village: Catwoman's disappointing outcome to affect Pft -2-.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sydney (Dow Jones) - Village Roadshow Ltd. (VRL.AU), based in Australia, stated on Friday that the film Catwoman didn't meet their expected results, which will lead to a decrease in the film profits for the financial year of 2005. Underperforming Catwoman to reduce Pft -2-.

Original Text: Debating the Dinosaur Extinction At least 50 percent of the world's species, including the dinosaurs, went extinct 65 million years ago. While most scientists now blame this catastrophe on a large meteorite impact, others wonder if there is more to the story.
Translation: Debatiendo la Extinción de los Dinosaurios Al menos el 50 por ciento de las especies del mundo, incluyendo a los dinosaurios, se extinguieron hace 65 millones de años. Mientras que la mayoría de los científicos ahora culpabilizan a este desastre de un gran impacto de meteorito, otros se preguntan si hay más en la historia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Many believe a massive meteorite impact was responsible for the extinction of over half of the world's species, including dinosaurs, about 65 million years ago, though some scientists question if there are other factors involved in this disaster.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is generally accepted by scientists that the extinction of dinosaurs and at least 50% of all species 65 million years ago was likely due to a massive meteorite impact, however, some have raised doubts about the completeness of this explanation.

Original Text: On-Demand Video Game Services Vary Internet downloads are nothing new when it comes to buying music and software online. So why does video game shopping still mostly involve either shlepping to a store or waiting for the delivery truck after you order online?
Translation: Los servicios de videojuegos bajo demanda varían. Las descargas de Internet no son algo nuevo cuando se trata de comprar música y software en línea. Entonces, ¿por qué la compra de videojuegos todavía implica principalmente ir a una tienda o esperar el camión de entrega después de hacer un pedido en línea?
Paraphrase 1: 1. The concept of internet downloads isn't unfamiliar especially in relation to online music and software purchases. Yet, the buying process for video games predominantly requires a trip to a physical retail store or waiting for an online order to be delivered. Why does this disparity still exist in on-demand video game services?
Paraphrase 2: 2. With music and software, online downloading has been common practice for purchases. However, it's puzzling why obtaining video games still largely consists of journeys to a brick-and-mortar store or waiting for delivery after shopping online. What could be causing this variation in on-demand video game services?

Original Text: All Ords get help from gold, Dr Money THE sharemarket should take heart from US Federal Reserve chairman Alan Greenspan #39;s comment that sky-high oil prices won #39;t harm the US economy - as long as they don #39;t go any higher.
Translation: Todos los Ords obtienen ayuda del oro, Dr. Money EL mercado de valores debería alentarse con el comentario del presidente de la Reserva Federal de los EE. UU., Alan Greenspan #39, que afirma que los precios del petróleo por las nubes no dañarán la economía de los EE. UU., siempre y cuando no suban más.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The share market should find solace in the statements of US Federal Reserve Chairman, Alan Greenspan, who stated that the US economy will not be damaged by the steep oil prices, given they don't rise further. This circumstance should assist the All Ords, reinforced by the aid from gold, according to Dr. Money.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to Dr. Money, the All Ords should feel reassured with the support from gold and the comments of US Federal Reserve Chairman, Alan Greenspan. He mentioned that the soaring oil prices wouldn't negatively impact the US economy as long as they remain at the current level, a sentiment that should strengthen the share market.

Original Text: Virgin 'seeking Indian airline' Richard Branson says his Virgin Group is talking to a number of Indian airlines about taking a 49 stake in some carriers.
Translation: "Buscando aerolínea india", dice Richard Branson que su Grupo Virgin está hablando con varias aerolíneas indias acerca de tomar una participación del 49% en algunas aerolíneas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Richard Branson has announced that his Virgin Group is in discussions with several Indian airlines about acquiring a 49% stake in some of them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Conversations around purchasing a 49% stake in certain carriers are ongoing between Richard Branson's Virgin Group and a number of Indian airlines.

Original Text: Apple could pay more to Apple The row has been brewing almost as long as Steve Job #39;s computer outfit existed. In 1978 Apple Records sued Jobs and got an agreement that Apple Computer would never enter the music business.
Translation: Apple podría pagar más a Apple. La disputa ha estado gestándose casi tanto tiempo como existió la empresa de computadoras de Steve Job. En 1978, Apple Records demandó a Jobs y obtuvo un acuerdo por el cual Apple Computer nunca entraría en el negocio de la música.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Since its inception alongside Steve Job's computing enterprise, there has been a longstanding dispute, peaking in 1978 when Apple Records filed a lawsuit against Jobs, resulting in an agreement that Apple Computer would abstain from venturing into the music industry. Apple could potentially disburse more to Apple Records in this aspect.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The controversy between Apple Records and Steve Job's Apple Computer has been simmering nearly as long as Job's company has existed. Apple Records, back in 1978, had filed a lawsuit against Jobs leading to a pact that Apple Computer would steer clear of the music sector. This might put Apple Computer in a position to shell out more to Apple Records.

Original Text: OPEC will keep reference prices unchanged. The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries, OPEC, will maintain the oil prices reference band unchanged in the coming meeting scheduled for September 15 in Vienna, said Purnomo Yusgiantoro, OPECs president.
Translation: La OPEP mantendrá los precios de referencia sin cambios. La Organización de Países Exportadores de Petróleo, OPEP, mantendrá la banda de referencia de precios del petróleo sin cambios en la próxima reunión programada para el 15 de septiembre en Viena, dijo Purnomo Yusgiantoro, presidente de la OPEP.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Purnomo Yusgiantoro, the president of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC), stated that OPEC plans to preserve the existing reference prices for oil at their upcoming Vienna gathering on September 15.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It has been disclosed by Purnomo Yusgiantoro, OPEC's president, that there will be no change in oil reference prices by the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) in the ensuing meeting on September 15 in Vienna.

Original Text: Judge Strikes Down Section of Patriot Act A federal judge ruled that the provision broadly violated the Constitution by giving federal authorities unchecked powers to obtain private information.
Translation: Juez Anula Sección de la Ley Patriot Un juez federal dictaminó que la disposición violaba ampliamente la Constitución al otorgar a las autoridades federales poderes ilimitados para obtener información privada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A federal judge has declared a section of the Patriot Act unconstitutional, stating that it allows federal authorities unfettered access to private information.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The constitutionality of a section of the Patriot Act has been negated by a federal judge, who argued that it provided federal authorities with unregulated power to access private information.

Original Text: Alitalia to slash 5000 jobs MANAGEMENT at the Italian national airline Alitalia put forward a rescue plan today to trade unions that foresees slashing 5000 jobs and splitting the struggling carrier into two in order to keep it aloft.
Translation: La dirección de la aerolínea nacional italiana Alitalia presentó hoy un plan de rescate a los sindicatos que contempla la eliminación de 5000 empleos y la división de la alicaída aerolínea en dos para mantenerla a flote.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, the management of Italian national airline Alitalia proposed a recovery plan to the trade unions that involves cutting 5000 jobs and breaking the ailing carrier into two pieces to ensure its survival.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To keep the failing airline afloat, the management at Alitalia, Italy's national carrier, today proposed a recovery scheme to the trade unions. The scheme includes terminating 5000 jobs and splitting the company into two entities.

Original Text: UK to speak on Iraq command The UK's defence secretary is to address parliament on proposals to put some troops under US command in Iraq.
Translation: Reino Unido hablará sobre el mando en Iraq. El secretario de defensa del Reino Unido se dirigirá al parlamento con propuestas para poner a algunas tropas bajo el mando de Estados Unidos en Iraq.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UK's defense secretary will present plans to put some of the country's troops under US command in Iraq to parliament.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Proposals for placing some UK troops under US command in Iraq will be discussed by the UK's defense secretary in parliament.

Original Text: UPDATE 1 - Barnes  amp; Noble selling GameStop stake GameStop Corp. (GME.N: Quote, Profile, Research) , a video game and entertainment software retailer, said Monday it bought 6,107,338 shares of its Class B Common Stock held by book store chain Barnes  amp; Noble Inc.
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1 - Barnes & Noble vende participación en GameStop. GameStop Corp. (GME.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), un minorista de videojuegos y software de entretenimiento, anunció el lunes que compró 6,107,338 acciones de su Clase B de acciones comunes, en posesión de la cadena de librerías Barnes & Noble Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GameStop Corp., a company specialising in video games and entertainment software, announced on Monday that it has purchased 6,107,338 shares of its Class B Common Stock, previously owned by the bookstore chain Barnes & Noble Inc.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Barnes & Noble Inc. sold its stake in GameStop Corp. This was confirmed by the video game and entertainment software retail company, which bought 6,107,338 shares of its Class B Common Stock from Barnes & Noble on Monday.

Original Text: Powell Arrives in Israel in Latest Push for Peace Secretary of State Colin L. Powell, arriving in Israel for his first visit in a year and a half, said he would work with Palestinian leaders to come up with an American
Translation: Powell llega a Israel en el último esfuerzo por la paz El Secretario de Estado, Colin L. Powell, al llegar a Israel por primera vez en un año y medio, dijo que trabajaría con los líderes palestinos para idear un plan estadounidense.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In his first visit in eighteen months, Secretary of State Colin L. Powell has arrived in Israel, expressing his commitment to collaborate with Palestinian leaders for an American-led peace initiative.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Secretary of State Colin L. Powell has set foot in Israel following a year and a half, promising to collaborate with Palestinian authorities to devise an American peace solution on his most recent visit.

Original Text: Dodgers: We Have Options if Beltre Exits (AP) AP - Los Angeles Dodgers general manager Paul DePodesta believes several options will be available if star third baseman Adrian Beltre decides to play elsewhere.
Translation: Dodgers: Tenemos opciones si Beltre se va (AP) AP - Paul DePodesta, gerente general de los Dodgers de Los Angeles, cree que varias opciones estarán disponibles si la estrella de la tercera base, Adrian Beltre, decide jugar en otro lugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1) "Should Adrian Beltre depart, we do have alternatives," states Paul DePodesta, General Manager of Los Angeles Dodgers. (AP)

Original Text: Sudan Resumes Peace Talks with Southern Rebels (Reuters) Reuters - Sudan's government and southern rebels\resumed talks on a final peace deal on Thursday amid fears that\tensions in the oil-producing south and the newer Darfur crisis\could plunge Africa's biggest country into chaos. Underscoring\the external pressures on Khartoum to end its 21-year-old\southern civil war, U.N. Secretary-General Kofi Annan's special\representative to Sudan, Jan Pronk, warned both sides not to\re-open previous agreements signed in May.
Translation: "Sudán reanuda conversaciones de paz con rebeldes del sur (Reuters) Reuters - El gobierno de Sudán y los rebeldes del sur reanudaron las conversaciones sobre un acuerdo de paz definitivo el jueves, en medio de temores de que las tensiones en el sur productor de petróleo y la reciente crisis de Darfur puedan sumergir al país más grande de África en el caos. Subrayando las presiones externas sobre Jartum para poner fin a su guerra civil de 21 años en el sur, el representante especial del Secretario General de la ONU, Kofi Annan, en Sudán, Jan Pronk, advirtió a ambas partes que no volvieran a abrir los acuerdos previos firmados en mayo."
Paraphrase 1: 1. Peace negotiations have been resumed between the Sudanese government and southern rebels (Reuters), with Thursday's return to the dialogue table raising fears that volatility in the oil-rich south and the escalating Darfur crisis could throw the largest nation in Africa into disarray. Drawing attention to the international weight pressing on Khartoum to terminate its 21-year-long internal conflict, Jan Pronk, the special representative of U.N. Secretary-General Kofi Annan to Sudan, cautioned both factions against reneging on previously agreed terms in May.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Sudan, talks aimed at peacemaking have been renewed between the government and rebels in the south (Reuters). Concerns are growing that the strife in the oil-endowed southern region, amplified by the mounting Darfur predicament, might drag the continent's biggest nation into upheaval. Amid such circumstances, Jan Pronk, the Sudan-dedicated representative of U.N's Secretary-General Kofi Annan, admonished both parties to uphold the May agreements, emphasizing the external influence urging Khartoum to conclude its long-standing civil war that has lasted for 21 years.

Original Text: Unilever admits to weak results as sales fall Unilever, the consumer goods group, revealed yesterday that its sales dropped 4 in the past three months, a performance it called  quot;unacceptably weak quot;.
Translation: Unilever admite resultados débiles al caer las ventas. Unilever, el grupo de bienes de consumo, reveló ayer que sus ventas cayeron un 4% en los últimos tres meses, un rendimiento que calificó de "inaceptablemente débil".
Paraphrase 1: 1) Unilever, the consumer goods conglomerate, acknowledged a disappointing performance yesterday, stating its sales have plunged 4% over the previous quarter, a result it branded as "unacceptably weak".
Paraphrase 2: 2) Yesterday, Unilever confessed to having "unacceptably weak" sales, seeing a 4% drop over the last three months, a development that underscores a lackluster performance for the consumer goods group.

Original Text: Easy pickings The defending champions are finally in the World Cup of Hockey win column. Granted, their 3-1 victory last night came against Slovakia, the team that #39;s been the weakest in the North American pool so far.
Translation: Cosecha fácil. Los campeones defensores finalmente están en la columna de ganadores de la Copa Mundial de Hockey. Concedido, su victoria 3-1 de anoche se produjo contra Eslovaquia, el equipo que hasta ahora ha sido el más débil en el grupo norteamericano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The defending champions of the World Cup of Hockey have finally made it to the win column, albeit their 3-1 triumph was against Slovakia, the North American pool's so far weakest team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Slovakia, currently the weakest team within the North American pool, lost 3-1 last night, granting the defending champions their long-awaited entry into the World Cup of Hockey win column.

Original Text: February check on 2012 bid Inspectors will assess London #39;s bid for the 2012 Olympics during a visit to the capital early in 2005. The International Olympic Committee said its evaluation commission will be in London from 16 to 19 February.
Translation: Comprobación de febrero sobre la oferta de 2012: Los inspectores evaluarán la oferta de Londres para los Juegos Olímpicos de 2012 durante una visita a la capital a principios de 2005. El Comité Olímpico Internacional dijo que su comisión de evaluación estará en Londres del 16 al 19 de febrero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The International Olympic Committee's evaluation commission will visit London from February 16 to 19, 2005, to scrutinize London's bid for the 2012 Olympics. The committee confirmed that the inspectors will be doing an early check on the 2012 bid during this visit to the capital.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Olympic bid for 2012 by London will be evaluated by inspectors during a visit to the city in early 2005. The International Olympic Committee has stated that its evaluation commission will be assessing the bid from February 16 to 19.

Original Text: Contact Center Today Cisco Strengthens IP-Service Offerings with P <b>...</b> Cisco Systems is buying IP-service control vendor P-Cube in a deal valued at \$200 million. P-Cube #39;s products help service providers identify subscribers, classify applications, improve service performance and charge for multiple IP services.
