Translation: Centro de Contacto Hoy Cisco Fortalece las Ofertas de Servicios IP con P <b>...</b> Cisco Systems está comprando al proveedor de control de servicios IP P-Cube en un acuerdo valorado en \$200 millones. Los productos de P-Cube ayudan a los proveedores de servicios a identificar a los suscriptores, clasificar aplicaciones, mejorar el rendimiento del servicio y cobrar por múltiples servicios IP.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Cisco Systems expands its IP-service offerings through the acquisition of IP-service control vendor, P-Cube which is valued at $200 million. This buyout will boost service providers' ability to recognize subscribers, categorize applications, amplify their service performance, and bill for various IP services.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Enhancing its IP-service offerings, Cisco Systems has purchased P-Cube, an IP-service control vendor, in a substantial deal worth $200 million. This acquisition enriches their ability, enabling service providers to identify subscribers, sort applications, upgrade service performance, and impose charges for multiple IP services.

Original Text: Moya Masters Gaudio to Keep Title Hopes Alive <p></p><p> By Steve Keating</p><p> HOUSTON (Reuters) - Carlos Moya of Spain eased pastArgentina's Gaston Gaudio, 6-3, 6-4, on Wednesday, ending theFrench Open champion's hopes of picking up the Masters Cuptitle.</p>
Translation: Moya domina a Gaudio para mantener viva la esperanza del título <p></p><p> Por Steve Keating</p><p> HOUSTON (Reuters) - Carlos Moya de España superó con facilidad al argentino Gaston Gaudio, 6-3, 6-4, el miércoles, acabando con las esperanzas del campeón del Abierto de Francia de conseguir el título de la Copa Masters.</p>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Steve Keating reports from Houston that Carlos Moya from Spain comfortably defeated Argentina's Gaston Gaudio with a score of 6-3, 6-4 on Wednesday. This marked the end of the French Open champion's pursuit for the Master's Cup title.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a report by Steve Keating, Spanish athlete Carlos Moya triumphed over Gaston Gaudio of Argentina on Wednesday with a scoreline of 6-3, 6-4, effectively ending the French Open champion's ambitions for the Master's Cup title.

Original Text: Last man standing And lo, the hawk begat the dove. At least that is how one imagines Private Eye might soon be recording the remarkable events unfolding in Gaza in The Book of Sharon, its inimitable account of the travails of the modern Holy Land.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: El último hombre en pie. Y he aquí, el halcón engendró a la paloma. Al menos eso es lo que uno imagina que Private Eye podría estar registrando pronto los notables eventos que se están desarrollando en Gaza en El Libro de Sharon, su inigualable relato sobre las tribulaciones de la moderna Tierra Santa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Private Eye may soon be narrating the astonishing happenings in Gaza in its unique account called "The Book of Sharon," representing the trials of the contemporary Holy Land. It could picture the hawk giving birth to the dove, symbolically referring to the survival of the fittest.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Considering the surprising events unfolding in Gaza, they might soon serve as material for the unique narrative of Private Eye in its "The Book of Sharon," which represents the challenges faced in the present-day Holy Land. In their imagination, a hawk could symbolically yield to a dove, a metaphor for the survival of the last man standing.

Original Text: Kerry and Bush Election Popularity Tracked on Blog Monitor Kerry and Bush Election Popularity Tracked on Blog Monitor\\The Democratic and Republican Conventions respectively cast John Kerry and George W. Bush into the eyes of those who are in their election day decision making. Besides helping to define the candidates' campaigns, the conventions also legitimized and gave respect to bloggers ...
Translation: Seguimiento de la popularidad de la elección entre Kerry y Bush en el Monitor de Blogs\\El Seguimiento de la popularidad de la elección entre Kerry y Bush en el Monitor de Blogs\\Las Convenciones Democrática y Republicana respectivamente pusieron a John Kerry y George W. Bush en la mira de aquellos que están en su día de decisión electoral. Además de ayudar a definir las campañas de los candidatos, las convenciones también legitimaron y dieron respeto a los bloggers...
Paraphrase 1: 1) The election popularity of John Kerry and George W. Bush is being monitored on a blog. The Democratic and Republican conventions elevated both candidates into the spotlight for those finalizing their decisions on election day. Besides shaping the candidates' campaigns, these conventions also conferred legitimacy and respect to bloggers...
Paraphrase 2: 2) The popularity of Kerry and Bush in the election is tracked via a blog monitor. Both the Democratic and Republican conventions played a crucial role in introducing John Kerry and George W. Bush to potential voters struggling with their election decisions. In addition to moulding the individual campaigns of the candidates, these events have also provided bloggers with heightened credibility and respect...

Original Text: Oil Closes Above \$50 Oil prices closed above \$50 a barrel for the first time yesterday as concerns linger about damage to oil production in the Gulf of Mexico from Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: El petróleo cierra por encima de los \$50. Los precios del petróleo cerraron por encima de los \$50 por barril por primera vez ayer, ya que persisten las preocupaciones sobre los daños a la producción de petróleo en el Golfo de México a causa del huracán Ivan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the first time yesterday, oil prices exceeded $50 a barrel, prompted by worries regarding the impact of Hurricane Ivan on oil production in the Gulf of Mexico.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Concerns about Hurricane Ivan's damage to the oil production in the Gulf of Mexico drove the prices of oil to close at over $50 a barrel for the first time yesterday.

Original Text: Old Course humbled Graeme McDowell matched a course record with a 10-under-par 62 on the famed Old Course yesterday to take the first-round lead in the Dunhill Links Championship at St.
Translation: El Viejo Campo intimidó a Graeme McDowell, quien igualó un récord del curso con 10 bajo par 62 en el famoso Viejo Campo ayer para tomar la delantera en la primera ronda del Campeonato de Enlaces Dunhill en St.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, Graeme McDowell tied the course record with a magnificent 10-under-par 62 on the renowned Old Course, attaining the first-round lead in the Dunhill Links Championship at St. Andrews, the venue which once humbled him.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Graeme McDowell, once humbled by the Old Course, bounced back to match the course record with a stunning 10-under-par 62. His performance yesterday won him the first-round lead in the Dunhill Links Championship at St. Andrew's.

Original Text: Emperor with flair for extravagance Seven years ago, after Lakshmi Mittal took his fledgling steel group public, he was asked how he could compete in a global industry undergoing huge upheavals.
Translation: Emperador con gusto por lo extravagante Hace siete años, después de que Lakshmi Mittal llevó a su incipiente grupo de acero a cotizar en bolsa, se le preguntó cómo podía competir en una industria global que estaba experimentando enormes trastornos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Seven years prior, when Lakshmi Mittal made his emergent steel conglomerate public, he faced questions about his ability to stay competitive in an industry experiencing massive changes, despite his knack for lavishness as an Emperor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Upon taking his budding steel corporation public seven years ago, Lakshmi Mittal -- known for his extravagant Emperor-like lifestyle -- was questioned on how he planned to remain competitive amidst the massive turmoils in the global industry.

Original Text: Who will be PGAs first \$100 million man? At first glance, Vijay Singh and Harry  quot;Lighthorse quot; Cooper might not seem to have much in common with each other, except that both were fairly successful golf professionals during their eras.
Translation: ¿Quién será el primer hombre de la PGA que gane 100 millones de dólares? A primera vista, Vijay Singh y Harry "Lighthorse" Cooper podrían no parecer tener mucho en común, excepto que ambos fueron profesionales de golf bastante exitosos durante sus respectivas épocas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Who is set to become the first PGA player to earn \$100 million? It may not appear that Vijay Singh and Harry "Lighthorse" Cooper share many similarities at first, aside from both being notably prosperous professional golfers in their times.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The question of who will first reach the \$100 million milestone in the PGA seems intriguing. Despite their apparently different career paths, Vijay Singh and Harry "Lighthorse" Cooper are linked by their relative success as professional golf players during their respective periods.

Original Text: AirTran to acquire ATA #39;s Chicago gates AirTran Airways plans to assume the Chicago Midway Airport gate leases and acquire other related assets including takeoff and landing slots at New York #39;s LaGuardia and Washington #39;s Ronald Reagan National airports from ATA Airlines for approximately \$87.
Translation: AirTran adquirirá las puertas de ATA #39 en Chicago. AirTran Airways planea asumir los arrendamientos de las puertas del Aeropuerto Midway de Chicago y adquirir otros activos relacionados, incluyendo los espacios de despegue y aterrizaje en los aeropuertos LaGuardia de Nueva York y Ronald Reagan National de Washington de ATA Airlines por aproximadamente $87.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AirTran Airways intends to take over the gate leases at Chicago Midway Airport from ATA Airlines and purchase other related assets such as takeoff and landing slots at both New York's LaGuardia and Washington's Ronald Reagan National airports. The planned acquisition costs around $87.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AirTran Airways is poised to assume control of ATA Airlines' gate leases at Chicago Midway Airport and acquire other assets, including slots at LaGuardia in New York and Ronald Reagan National Airport in Washington, for an estimated cost of $87.

Original Text: Strict security for moonlit viewing of Taj : Agra, Nov 26 : Strict security arrangements have been put in place for night viewing of the Taj Mahal tomorrow and Sunday following the Supreme Court #39;s decision to allow opening of the monument of love on moonlit nights.
Translation: Estricta seguridad para la observación nocturna bajo la luz de la luna del Taj: Agra, 26 de noviembre: Se han establecido rigurosas medidas de seguridad para la observación nocturna del Taj Mahal mañana y el domingo, tras la decisión de la Corte Suprema de permitir la apertura del monumento del amor en noches iluminadas por la luna.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Agra, Nov 26: In light of the Supreme Court's decision to permit the monument of love, Taj Mahal, to be open on moonlit nights for viewing, heavy security measures have been implemented for the upcoming Saturday and Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following the Supreme Court's approval for moonlit viewings of the Taj Mahal, stringent security protocols are established for the event scheduled for tomorrow and Sunday in Agra, dated Nov 26.

Original Text: No agreement on Iraq debt relief WASHINGTON The world #39;s economic powers, which ended three days of meetings yesterday, insisted they are moving closer to a deal on debt relief for Iraq and other poor nations even though an agreement has proved elusive.
Translation: Sin acuerdo sobre la condonación de la deuda de Irak. WASHINGTON Las potencias económicas del mundo, que concluyeron tres días de reuniones ayer, insistieron en que se están acercando a un acuerdo sobre la condonación de la deuda para Irak y otras naciones pobres, aunque un acuerdo ha resultado esquivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite no agreement on relieving Iraq's debt, the world's economic powerhouses, who concluded a three-day meeting yesterday, maintained that a deal is nearing. This comes even as arriving at an agreement has been challenging for both Iraq and other impoverished countries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON - An agreement on Iraq's debt relief has remained out of reach despite the world's economic giants wrapping up their three-day meeting yesterday. However, they continue to claim progress towards accomplishing a deal for Iraq and other economically disadvantaged nations.

Original Text: US Vetoes UN Measure Demanding Israel Leave Gaza The United States on Tuesday vetoed a draft UN Security Council resolution demanding an immediate end to Israeli military operations in the Gaza strip that have cost some 68 Palestinian lives.
Translation: EE.UU. Veta Medida de la ONU que Exige a Israel Abandonar Gaza. Estados Unidos vetó el martes un borrador de resolución del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que exigía un fin inmediato a las operaciones militares israelíes en la franja de Gaza que han costado unas 68 vidas palestinas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, the United States rejected a proposed UN Security Council resolution that insisted Israel stop its military actions in the Gaza strip, which have reportedly claimed around 68 Palestinian lives.

Original Text: Fulham Could Face Severe Punishment Fulham face the prospect of severe punishment after the Football Association threw the book at the club following Saturdays stormy match against West Brom.
Translation: Fulham Podría Enfrentar un Castigo Severo. Fulham enfrenta la posibilidad de un castigo severo después de que la Asociación de Fútbol sancionara al club tras el agitado partido del sábado contra West Brom.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following Saturday's tumultuous match against West Brom, the Football Association has taken severe action against Fulham, who now stand on the precipice of stringent punishment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Football Association's harsh reaction to the volatile match against West Brom on Saturday has left Fulham potentially facing grave penalization.

Original Text: Ireland Cracks Down on Internet Scams (PC World) PC World - Calls to 13 other countries will be blocked to thwart auto-dialer software.
Translation: Irlanda toma medidas enérgicas contra las estafas en Internet (PC World) PC World - Las llamadas a otros 13 países serán bloqueadas para frustrar el software de marcado automático.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PC World - To counteract auto-dialer software, calls to 13 different countries will be blocked as part of Ireland's intensified actions against internet scams.
Paraphrase 2: 2. PC World - In an effort to hinder auto-dialer software, Ireland puts a halt on calls to 13 various countries, thereby intensifying its crackdown on internet scams.

Original Text: UN ex-hostages' joy at release Three UN workers released after being held hostage in Afghanistan speak of their joy at being freed.
Translation: La alegría de los ex rehenes de la ONU tras ser liberados. Tres trabajadores de la ONU liberados después de ser retenidos como rehenes en Afganistán expresan su alegría al ser liberados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Three UN employees, who were previously held captive in Afghanistan express their happiness after being released.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Joy is voiced by three UN workers who were released after their captivity in Afghanistan.

Original Text: Myanmar Frees Prominent Political Prisoners Myanmar #39;s junta freed at least two dozen members of democracy icon Aung San Suu Kyi #39;s political party on Friday during a mass release of 4,000 people detained  quot;inappropriately
Translation: Myanmar libera a prominentes prisioneros políticos. La junta de Myanmar liberó al menos a dos docenas de miembros del partido político de la icono de la democracia Aung San Suu Kyi el viernes durante una liberación masiva de 4,000 personas detenidas "inapropiadamente".
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, the Myanmar junta released at least two dozen members of the political party of democracy advocate Aung San Suu Kyi, as part of a mass liberation of 4,000 individuals who were wrongly detained.

Original Text: Greek comes from nowhere to win women #39;s hurdles To the roar of an adoring home crowd, Fani Halkia completed her unexpected romp through the Olympics on Wednesday with a victory in the women #39;s 400-meter hurdles.
Translation: La griega aparece de la nada para ganar los obstáculos femeninos. Ante el rugir de una multitud de su hogar que la adoraba, Fani Halkia completó su sorpresiva carrera a través de los Juegos Olímpicos el miércoles con una victoria en los 400 metros con obstáculos femeninos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid the cheers of a rapturous home crowd, Fani Halkia shocked everyone by winning the women's 400-meter hurdles at the Olympics on Wednesday, which was a wholly unexpected accomplishment for the Greek competitor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, to the jubilant reactions of her native crowd, Fani Halkia delivered a surprise victory in the women's 400-meter hurdles at the Olympics, marking a remarkable achievement for the initially unanticipated Greek contender.

Original Text: American Airlines Says More Job Cuts Arriving FORT WORTH, Texas -- American Airlines says more job cuts are on the way after the airline had already planned about 1,000 layoffs.
Translation: American Airlines Dice que Llegan Más Recortes de Empleos FORT WORTH, Texas -- American Airlines dice que se avecinan más recortes de empleo después de que la aerolínea ya había planeado alrededor de 1,000 despidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. American Airlines, based in Fort Worth, Texas, confirms that additional job cuts are to follow, over and above the previously planned 1,000 layoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Beyond the 1,000 layoffs already scheduled, American Airlines from Fort Worth, Texas announces that more reductions in workforce are forthcoming.

Original Text: Sound of success: Israel strikes gold For many Israelis, the Olympics evoke memories of a terrorist massacre and political boycotts, but windsurfer
Translation: Sonido del éxito: Israel encuentra oro. Para muchos israelíes, los Juegos Olímpicos evocan recuerdos de una masacre terrorista y boicots políticos, pero el windsurfista
Paraphrase 1: 1. Windsurfing triumphs as Israel claims gold, leaving behind haunting memories of the Olympics related to terrorist attacks and political boycotts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Israel reaps golden success in windsurfing at the Olympics, opposed to traditional recollections of terror and boycotts.

Original Text: Iraq War Crime Trials Could Begin Next Week Iraq #39;s interim government says war crime trials of members of the former regime of Saddam Hussein could begin as early as next week.
Translation: Los juicios por crímenes de guerra en Irak podrían comenzar la próxima semana. El gobierno interino de Irak dice que los juicios por crímenes de guerra a miembros del antiguo régimen de Saddam Hussein podrían comenzar tan temprano como la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Trials for war crimes related to the Iraq war could commence as soon as next week, according to Iraq's interim government, targeting members of Saddam Hussein's former regime.

Original Text: Crude oil sets new mark by topping Crude oil topped \$50 per barrel during Asian trading today, pushing past the psychological milestone for the first time then surging further to new record levels likely to unsettle oil-consuming nations.
Translation: El petróleo crudo establece una nueva marca al superar los \$50 por barril durante la negociación asiática de hoy, superando por primera vez el hito psicológico para luego aumentar aún más a nuevos niveles récord que probablemente perturbarán a las naciones consumidoras de petróleo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During Asian trading today, crude oil surged past the \$50 per barrel mark for the first time, setting a new high that could potentially worry oil-consuming nations. Later, it ascended even more, reaching unprecedented record levels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For the first time, crude oil exceeded the \$50 per barrel benchmark, during today's Asian trading. This significant milestone was followed by another surge to record levels, a situation that could create unease among oil-consuming countries.

Original Text: Verizon to Build New Fiber Optic Network Verizon announced Thursday it is digging up streets and stringing wire in six states, including Maryland and Virginia, to deliver high-speed Internet service and cable-style television to customers.
Translation: Verizon construirá nueva red de fibra óptica. Verizon anunció el jueves que está excavando calles y tendiendo cables en seis estados, incluyendo Maryland y Virginia, para ofrecer servicio de Internet de alta velocidad y televisión al estilo de cable a los clientes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thursday saw Verizon announce their intent to construct a new fiber optic network. They are set to commence stringing wire and excavation operations in six states, among them Maryland and Virginia, with the focus on providing customers with rapid internet services and TV similar to cable.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Verizon declared its plans to establish a new fiber optic network. The telecom giant is undertaking projects which involve wire stringing and digging up roads in six states, Maryland and Virginia included, aiming to offer high-speed Internet connectivity and a level of television service on par with cable to its customers.

Original Text: Intrawest enjoys strong finish to fiscal year Vancouver #39;s Intrawest Corp. returned to profitability in its fourth-quarter results released Tuesday as stronger results from its management services and real estate development operations made up for a poor showing from its resort operations.
Translation: Intrawest disfruta de un fuerte final del año fiscal. Intrawest Corp. de Vancouver volvió a la rentabilidad en sus resultados del cuarto trimestre publicados el martes, ya que los mejores resultados de sus servicios de gestión y operaciones de desarrollo inmobiliario compensaron un mal rendimiento de sus operaciones en los complejos turísticos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intrawest Corp., based in Vancouver, bounced back to profitability according to their fourth-quarter results released on Tuesday. This turnaround was due to their management services and real estate development operations seeing strong gains, counterbalancing lackluster performance from their resort operations, thereby wrapping up their fiscal year on a strong note.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Concluding their fiscal year powerfully, Intrawest Corp. of Vancouver demonstrated a return to profitability in their fourth-quarter results, released this Tuesday. Despite the underwhelming performance of its resort operations, the impressive results from the management services and real estate development sectors facilitated this financial recovery.

Original Text: A glimpse of SpaceShipOne's historic flight Despite a literally screwy launch, the spacecraft pulls off a successful flight, leaving one more between it and \$10 million.
Translation: Un vistazo al histórico vuelo de SpaceShipOne. A pesar de un lanzamiento literalmente desviado, la nave espacial logra un vuelo exitoso, dejando solo uno más entre ella y los \$10 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a launch that was literally filled with glitches, SpaceShipOne achieved a successful flight during its historic journey. Now, it is just one flight away from earning a $10 million prize.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SpaceShipOne successfully pulled off its flight in spite of a quite chaotic launch, marking a significant point in history. There's only one more flight required for it to win the $10 million reward.

Original Text: Blair to shift focus from Iraq BRITAIN #39;S Prime Minister Tony Blair hoped to switch attention from the unrelenting bloodshed in Iraq to his campaign for a third term in office with his address today to the Labour Party #39;s annual conference.
Translation: Blair para cambiar el enfoque de Irak. El Primer Ministro de GRAN BRETAÑA, Tony Blair, esperaba desviar la atención de la constante masacre en Irak hacia su campaña para un tercer mandato en la oficina con su discurso de hoy en la conferencia anual del Partido Laborista.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prime Minister of Britain, Tony Blair, is eager to divert attention from the ongoing violence in Iraq towards his bid for a third term in office via his address at the Labour Party's yearly conference today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With his speech at the Labour Party's annual conference today, Britain's Prime Minister, Tony Blair, is seeking to change the focus from the continuous conflict in Iraq to his third-term office campaign.

Original Text: IFOP: French and Germans are against Turkey #39;s EU Membership The French Institute of Public Opinion (IFOP) announced that the majority of the public in France and Germany were definitely against Turkey #39;s European Union (EU) membership.
Translation: IFOP: Los franceses y alemanes están en contra de la membresía de Turquía en la UE. El Instituto Francés de Opinión Pública (IFOP) anunció que la mayoría del público en Francia y Alemania está definitivamente en contra de la membresía de Turquía en la Unión Europea (UE).
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a declaration by The French Institute of Public Opinion (IFOP), a significant part of the French and German populace firmly opposes Turkey's potential membership in the European Union (EU).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The French Institute of Public Opinion (IFOP) revealed that most people in France and Germany are decidedly against the idea of Turkey becoming a member of the European Union (EU).

Original Text: Yellow Roadway Raises Profit Outlook (Reuters) Reuters - Yellow Roadway Corp.  on\Tuesday raised its third-quarter earnings outlook, citing\higher prices for its trucking services and better cost\controls.
Translation: Yellow Roadway Aumenta la Previsión de Ganancias (Reuters) Reuters - Yellow Roadway Corp. aumentó su previsión de ganancias del tercer trimestre el martes, citando precios más altos por sus servicios de camiones y mejores controles de costos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yellow Roadway Corp Boosts its Profit Forecast on Tuesday (Reuters) - Citing improved cost controls and higher charges for its lorry services, Yellow Roadway Corp increased its earnings prediction for the third quarter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday Sees an Uplifted Profit Prediction by Yellow Roadway Corp (Reuters) - Yellow Roadway Corp has upped its forecasted earnings for the third quarter, attributing it to higher pricing for their trucking services and more efficient cost management.

Original Text: Vandy #39;s List gets in final of Amateur MAMARONECK, NY - Luke List has already made it further than he ever thought, so why stop now? That #39;s the attitude of the 19-year-old Vanderbilt sophomore, who continued his string of US Amateur upsets with
Translation: La Lista de Vandy # 39 llega a la final del torneo amateur MAMARONECK, NY - Luke List ya ha llegado más lejos de lo que jamás pensó, ¿entonces por qué detenerse ahora? Esa es la actitud del estudiante de segundo año de Vanderbilt de 19 años, quien continuó su racha de sorpresas en el Amateur de los EE.UU. con
Paraphrase 1: 1. Luke List, the 19-year-old Vanderbilt sophomore who made it to the finals of Vandy #39's List in the Amateur MAMARONECK, NY, is surpassing his own expectations. So, why would he stop now? His streak of US Amateur upsets continues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Already surpassing his own expectations, Luke List, a 19-year-old sophomore from Vanderbilt, won't stop now. He's made it to the final rounds of the Vandy #39's List amateur championship in MAMARONECK, NY, and continues to upset in the US Amateur arena.

Original Text: Phelps targets six golds Michael Phelps will bid to repeat his feat of six Olympic gold medals when he competes in the Fina swimming short course world championships.
Translation: Phelps apunta a seis oros. Michael Phelps intentará repetir su hazaña de seis medallas de oro olímpicas cuando compita en los campeonatos mundiales de natación en corta distancia de la Fina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Michael Phelps aims for half a dozen golds again, as he prepares to participate in the Fina swimming short course world championships, attempting to replicate his previous achievement of six Olympic gold medals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Striving to match his accomplishment of six Olympic gold medals, Michael Phelps sets his sights on six golds in the forthcoming Fina swimming short course world championships.

Original Text: Samsung unveils 2-gigabyte chip Samsung Electronics announced three breakthroughs in key technologies that promise greater data storage and faster processing for computers and mobile devices such as MP3 audio players.
Translation: Samsung presenta un chip de 2 gigabytes. Samsung Electronics anunció tres avances en tecnologías clave que prometen un mayor almacenamiento de datos y un procesamiento más rápido para computadoras y dispositivos móviles como reproductores de audio MP3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Samsung Electronics publicized three major technological advancements assuring enhanced data storage and expedited processing for computers and mobile gadgets including MP3 audio players, along with the introduction of a 2-gigabyte chip.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alongside the revelation of a 2-gigabyte chip, Samsung Electronics has declared three significant innovations in crucial technologies, all of which predict an improvement in storage capacity and processing speed for devices like computers and MP3 players.

Original Text: Nigeria General Strike May Be Extended - Union  ABUJA (Reuters) - A general strike in oil exporter Nigeria  may be extended beyond Thursday if the government continues to  crack down on protesters violently, union chief Adams  Oshiomhole said on Tuesday.
Translation: La Huelga General en Nigeria Podría Extenderse - Sindicato ABUJA (Reuters) - Una huelga general en el país exportador de petróleo Nigeria podría extenderse más allá del jueves si el gobierno continúa reprimiendo violentamente a los manifestantes, dijo el martes el jefe del sindicato Adams Oshiomhole.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Union leader, Adams Oshiomhole announced on Tuesday that the general strike in Nigeria, a significant oil exporter, may prolong beyond Thursday if the government pursues its violent repression of demonstrators.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Adams Oshiomhole, the union chief, stated on Tuesday that if the government continues its violent response to protests, the ongoing general strike in the oil-exporting nation of Nigeria may be stretched beyond Thursday.

Original Text: St. Louis puts end to LA #39;s upset hopes The Cardinals had been waiting for someone to step up and deliver the finishing blow, to squash the Dodgers #39; upset dreams and return them to St.
Translation: San Luis pone fin a las esperanzas de sorpresa de Los Ángeles. Los Cardenales habían estado esperando a alguien que diera el golpe final, para aplastar los sueños de sorpresa de los Dodgers y devolverlos a San Luis.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Cardinals from St. Louis dashed the LA Dodgers' hopes of an upset, waiting for someone to secure the decisive victory and send them back to St. Louis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LA Dodgers' chances of an upset were finally obliterated by St. Louis Cardinals, who had been poised to land a shocking blow and send them packing back to St. Louis.

Original Text: Enter your e-mail: The MultiMediaCard Association (MMCA) has just announced that its super-small MMC cards will be adopting new logos and capabilities.
Translation: Ingrese su correo electrónico: La Asociación de Tarjetas MultiMediaCard (MMCA) acaba de anunciar que sus tarjetas MMC super pequeñas adoptarán nuevos logotipos y capacidades.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The MultiMediaCard Association (MMCA) just revealed that they will be implementing new logos and capabilities to their super-small MMC cards. Please enter your email.

Original Text: Notice: IE  #39;worm #39; targets IOL ad supplier Every 30th or so request for an advert was redirected to another compromised server, which in turn tried to execute the Bofra Internet Explorer exploit in an attempt to infect the user #39;s machine.
Translation: Aviso: El 'gusano' IE #39; apunta al proveedor de anuncios de IOL. Cada 30ª solicitud o así de un anuncio era redirigida a otro servidor comprometido, que a su vez intentaba ejecutar el exploit de Internet Explorer Bofra en un intento de infectar la máquina del usuario #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Be aware that the 'worm' IE #39 aims at the IOL ad provider approximately every 30th request, directing it to a different compromised server. This server then attempts to implement the Bofra Internet Explorer exploit in an effort to infiltrate the user's computer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 'worm' dubbed as IE #39 targets the ad supplier of IOL. Roughly every 30th ad request is being redirected to an alternative server that has been compromised and then attempts to run the Bofra Internet Explorer exploit, with the objective to infect the user's machine.

Original Text: Firefox 1.0 open-source Web browser After a year in development, The Mozilla Foundation has finally released the full  #39;official #39; version of its already popular open-source Web browser, Firefox.
Translation: Navegador web de código abierto Firefox 1.0 Después de un año en desarrollo, The Mozilla Foundation finalmente ha lanzado la versión 'oficial' completa de su ya popular navegador web de código abierto, Firefox.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a year of development, The Mozilla Foundation has at last launched the complete 'official' version of its well-liked open-source Web browser, Firefox 1.0.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Mozilla Foundation has eventually launched the definitive 'official' version of Firefox 1.0, its acclaimed open-source Web browser, following a year in development.

Original Text: Australia boosts anti-terror defences with new maritime security zone (AFP) AFP - Australia is to boost its defence against terrorism by creating a 1000-nautical mile security zone around its coast to protect its shipping, ports and oil rigs from attack, it was reported here.
Translation: Australia refuerza sus defensas contra el terrorismo con nueva zona de seguridad marítima (AFP) AFP - Australia incrementará su defensa contra el terrorismo creando una zona de seguridad de 1000 millas náuticas alrededor de su costa para proteger su navegación, puertos y plataformas petroleras de ataques, se informó aquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP reports that Australia is enhancing its anti-terrorism efforts by establishing a new 1000-nautical mile maritime security zone around its coastline to safeguard its shipping, ports, and oil rigs from potential attacks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It has been reported by AFP that a 1000-nautical mile security zone is being set up by Australia around its coastline as a part of its heightened defense measures against terror, aiming to protect its shipping, ports, and oil rigs from potential threats.

Original Text: Heart Op Over, UK's Blair Now Risks Succession War  LONDON (Reuters) - Britain's Prime Minister Tony Blair  underwent successful heart surgery on Friday and returned home  looking relaxed following a surprise vow to serve a record  third term and deny rivals power for five more years.
Translation: Operación de corazón terminada, Blair de Reino Unido ahora se arriesga a una guerra de sucesión. LONDRES (Reuters) - El Primer Ministro de Gran Bretaña, Tony Blair, se sometió a una exitosa cirugía de corazón el viernes y volvió a casa luciendo relajado después de una promesa sorpresa de servir un tercer mandato récord y negar a los rivales el poder durante cinco años más.
Paraphrase 1: 1) LONDON (Reuters) - After undergoing successful heart operation, Britain's Prime Minister Tony Blair returned home looking relaxed on Friday. Despite suddenly pledging to serve an unprecedented third term, he may now face a power struggle over succession, as he seeks to keep rivals at bay for five more years.
Paraphrase 2: 2) LONDON (Reuters) - Prime Minister Tony Blair of the UK looked relaxed as he returned home from successful heart surgery this Friday. However, following his unexpected promise to deny rivals power by serving a historic third term, he could now be poised for a succession battle.

Original Text: Deal Still in Works Peter Angelos will meet with officials again with a goal toward concluding a compensation package.
Translation: El Acuerdo Aún se Está Negociando, Peter Angelos se reunirá nuevamente con los funcionarios con el objetivo de concluir un paquete de compensación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Peter Angelos is set to meet with officials again, aiming to finalize a compensation package; the deal is still in progress.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With an objective to conclude a compensation package, Peter Angelos will have another meeting with officials; the deal is not yet finished.

Original Text: Feaster stings Monarchs Allison Feaster responded to a challenge from Charlotte Sting coach Trudi Lacey. Feaster converted two free throws in the final seconds and finished with 23 points as the host Sting moved into a tie for first place in the Eastern Conference with a 74-69 victory over the Sacramento Monarchs last night.
Translation: Feaster pica a las Monarcas. Allison Feaster respondió a un desafío del entrenador de Charlotte Sting, Trudi Lacey. Feaster convirtió dos tiros libres en los últimos segundos y terminó con un total de 23 puntos, mientras que Sting, en casa, se colocó en un empate por el primer puesto de la Conferencia Este con una victoria de 74-69 sobre las Monarcas de Sacramento la noche pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After being challenged by Charlotte Sting's coach, Trudi Lacey, Allison Feaster stepped up to the plate. Feaster scored two critical free throws in the final moments, contributing to her total of 23 points. As a result, the host Sting managed a 74-69 triumph over the Sacramento Monarchs last night, bringing them into a tie for the top spot in the Eastern Conference.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Allison Feaster, answering a challenge from Charlotte Sting's coach Trudi Lacey, played a crucial role in her team's victory. She scored two decisive free throws during the closing seconds and rounded off with a total of 23 points. The Sting hosted and defeated the Sacramento Monarchs with a score of 74-69, moving into a joint lead in the Eastern Conference.

Original Text: Marvel's Unseen Superheroes Marvel's movies mean nothing to the bottom line without the right talent behind them.
Translation: Los Superhéroes Invisibles de Marvel. Las películas de Marvel no significan nada para el balance final sin el talento adecuado detrás de ellas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Without the correct talent backing them, Marvel's films have no substantial significance to the financial outcome, despite the invisibility of these superheroes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The unsung heroes behind Marvel's movies, the right talent, are essential for the success of their bottom line.

Original Text: Inflation slows across euro region BRUSSELS Inflation in the 12 countries sharing the euro slowed for a second month in July as faltering consumer demand deterred companies from passing on rising energy costs. But economists said higher oil prices may fuel a reversal of that trend as the ...
Translation: La inflación se desacelera en toda la región del euro BRUSELAS La inflación en los 12 países que comparten el euro se desaceleró por segundo mes consecutivo en julio debido a que la disminución de la demanda del consumidor impidió que las empresas trasladaran los crecientes costos energéticos. Sin embargo, los economistas dijeron que los precios más altos del petróleo podrían alimentar una inversión de esa tendencia ya que...
Paraphrase 1: 1) In BRUSSELS, the euro region which includes 12 countries experienced a deceleration in inflation for the second consecutive month in July. This happened as companies were dissuaded from transferring the increasing energy costs to consumers due to weakening consumer demand. However, economists warn there could be a reversal due to high oil prices...
Paraphrase 2: 2) Inflation decelerated for the second month in a row in July across the euro region in Brussels, comprising of 12 countries. Companies were discouraged from transferring the burden of soaring energy costs because of the declining consumer demand. But, a possible reversal of this trend could be brought by rising oil prices, according to economists...

Original Text: WTO OKs Trade Sanctions Against U.S. (Reuters) Reuters - The European Union and its  allies got\the go-ahead on Tuesday to impose some  #36;150 million in\sanctions on U.S. goods in a dispute that could stir trade\tensions ahead of the U.S. elections.
Translation: La OMC aprueba sanciones comerciales contra EE.UU. (Reuters) Reuters - La Unión Europea y sus aliados obtuvieron el martes luz verde para imponer alrededor de 150 millones de dólares en sanciones sobre los productos estadounidenses en un conflicto que podría avivar las tensiones comerciales antes de las elecciones en EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) The World Trade Organisation has approved trade sanctions against the U.S., allowing the European Union and allies to charge $150 million in penalties on American products. This action occurs amidst an ongoing dispute that might exacerbate trade tensions prior to the U.S. elections.

Original Text: Barghouti Registers to Run for Palestinian President (Update1) Marwan Barghouti, a leader of the late Yasser Arafat #39;s Fatah faction who is serving a life sentence in an Israeli jail, is registering to run for president of the Palestinian Authority.
Translation: Barghouti se registra para postularse a la presidencia palestina (Actualización1) Marwan Barghouti, líder de la facción Fatah del fallecido Yasser Arafat que está cumpliendo una condena de cadena perpetua en una cárcel israelí, se está registrando para postularse a la presidencia de la Autoridad Palestina.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Marwan Barghouti, leader of Yasser Arafat's Fatah faction currently serving a life sentence in an Israeli jail, signs up to contest the Palestinian Authority's presidency.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Imprisoned Fatah faction leader, Marwan Barghouti, enters the race for the presidency of the Palestinian Authority despite serving a life sentence in Israel.

Original Text: World Needs More Oil Capacity -Watchdog An extra 3 million barrels per day (bpd) of production capacity worldwide is needed to avoid another year of blistering oil prices, International Energy Agency (IEA) executive director Claude Mandil warned on Sunday.
Translation: El Mundo Necesita Más Capacidad de Petróleo - Vigilante. Se necesita una capacidad de producción adicional de 3 millones de barriles por día (bpd) a nivel mundial para evitar otro año de precios del petróleo desorbitados, advirtió el domingo Claude Mandil, director ejecutivo de la Agencia Internacional de Energía (AIE).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Claude Mandil, executive director of the International Energy Agency (IEA), warned on Sunday that an additional three million barrels per day of global production capacity is necessary to prevent yet another year of skyrocketing oil prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The International Energy Agency (IEA)'s executive director, Claude Mandil, cautioned on Sunday that the world requires an addition of three million barrels per day to its oil production capacity to steer clear of another year filled with exorbitant oil prices.

Original Text: Loeb claims Rally of Britain lead CARDIFF, Wales -- Citroen #39;s championship leader Sebastien Loeb made a flying start to the Rally of Britain on Friday to seize the lead from Ford #39;s overnight front-runner Francois Duval.
Translation: Loeb reclama la delantera en el Rally de Gran Bretaña CARDIFF, Gales -- El líder del campeonato de Citroen, Sebastien Loeb, tuvo un arranque volador en el Rally de Gran Bretaña el viernes para tomar la delantera de François Duval, el líder de la noche anterior de Ford.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CARDIFF, Wales -- On Friday, Sebastien Loeb, the championship leader from Citroen, got off to an excellent start in the Rally of Britain, taking the lead from Francois Duval of Ford, who was the front-runner overnight.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Rally of Britain on Friday, Citroen's front-runner Sebastien Loeb, off to a roaring start, overtook Ford's Francois Duval for the lead. This event took place in Cardiff, Wales.

Original Text: Yemen sentences one to death, 14 to jail on terror charges A Yemeni court on Saturday sentenced one militant to death and 14 others to prison terms of three to 10 years on terror charges, according to local reports.
Translation: Un tribunal yemení sentenció a muerte a un militante y a 14 más a términos de prisión de tres a 10 años por cargos de terrorismo el sábado, según informes locales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Yemeni court pronounced verdict on Saturday, sentencing a militant to death and incarcerating 14 more with jail terms ranging from three to 10 years for allegations of terrorism, as per local reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Local reports confirmed that a militant was sentenced to death and 14 others were handed down prison sentences of three to 10 years on terror charges by a Yemeni court on Saturday.

Original Text: Coulthard signs for Red Bull team The deal, thought to be worth 2 million, could prove more lucrative if Coulthard hits performance targets. That, however, is a big  quot;if quot;, given the return of only seven points managed by Mark Webber last term.
Translation: Coulthard firma con el equipo Red Bull. Se cree que el trato, que puede valer 2 millones, podría ser más lucrativo si Coulthard alcanza los objetivos de rendimiento. Sin embargo, eso es un gran "si", dado el retorno de solo siete puntos logrado por Mark Webber el último periodo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Having signed with the Red Bull team, Coulthard's deal is speculated to be valued at 2 million, with potential for increased earnings if he meets certain performance objectives. Still, the fact that Mark Webber only earned seven points last season raises questions about the feasibility of such performance targets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Red Bull team has managed to secure Coulthard in a deal that's believed to be worth 2 million. However, the deal might prove even more beneficial for Coulthard if he can meet the proposed performance goals. Albeit, this remains a significant "if" owing to Mark Webber's mere seven points return last season.

Original Text: nForce chipsets for Intel-based platforms  quot;Nvidia #39;s nForce chipset will extend its reach beyond the currently supported platforms of AMD #39;s Athlon 64 FX, Athlon 64, and Sempron processors.
Translation: "Chipsets nForce para plataformas basadas en Intel" "El chipset nForce de Nvidia ampliará su alcance más allá de las plataformas actualmente compatibles con los procesadores Athlon 64 FX, Athlon 64 y Sempron de AMD".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nvidia is planning to extend the nForce chipset's compatibility, which currently supports AMD's Athlon 64 FX, Athlon 64, and Sempron processors, to Intel-based platforms.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The nForce chipset developed by Nvidia, presently compatible with AMD's Athlon 64 FX, Athlon 64, and Sempron processors, will soon expand its support to platforms based on Intel.

Original Text: Saudis: Bin Laden associate surrenders \\"(CNN) -- A longtime associate of al Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden surrendered to\Saudi Arabian officials Tuesday, a Saudi Interior Ministry official said."\\"But it is unclear what role, if any, Khaled al-Harbi may have had in any terror\attacks because no public charges have been filed against him."\\"The Saudi government -- in a statement released by its embassy in Washington --\called al-Harbi's surrender "the latest direct result" of its limited, one-month\offer of leniency to terror suspects."\\This is great!  I hope this really starts to pay off.  Creative solutions to\terrorism that don't involve violence.  \\How refreshing! \\Are you paying attention Bush administration?\\
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Saudíes: Se rinde el asociado de Bin Laden "(CNN) -- Un asociado de larga data del líder de al Qaeda, Osama bin Laden, se rindió a los funcionarios saudíes el martes, dijo un funcionario del Ministerio del Interior de Arabia Saudita." "Pero no está claro qué papel, si tuvo alguno, pudo haber tenido Khaled al-Harbi en cualquier ataque terrorista porque no se han presentado cargos públicos contra él." "El Gobierno saudí -- en una declaración emitida por su embajada en Washington -- llamó a la rendición de al-Harbi "el último resultado directo" de su oferta limitada de un mes de clemencia a los sospechosos de terrorismo." ¡Esto es genial! Espero que realmente comienza a dar resultados. Soluciones creativas al terrorismo que no implican violencia. ¡Qué refrescante! ¿Estás prestando atención administración Bush?
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Khaled al-Harbi, a person known to be connected with Osama bin Laden, has turned himself in to Saudi Arabian authorities, according to a Saudi Interior Ministry official. It is, however, not clear what part he played in any terrorist attacks, given that no charges have been publicly brought against him. The Saudi government, in a statement disseminated by its embassy in Washington, named al-Harbi's surrender as a direct outcome of its one-month program of offering clemency to terrorism suspects. This peaceful approach to counter-terrorism is very innovative and hopefully will yield positive results. It would be beneficial if the Bush administration took note of this."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "A well-known companion of Osama bin Laden, Khaled al-Harbi, gave himself up to officials in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday, shared a representative from the Saudi Interior Ministry. As of yet, it is uncertain what involvement al-Harbi had in any terrorist activities because no formal allegations have been made against him. The embassy of Saudi Arabia in Washington circulated a directives on behalf of the government, announcing that al-Harbi's capitulation was the most recent successful outcome of its temporary leniency program for terrorism suspects. One can only hope that this non-violent approach to combating terrorism begins to reap rewards. It would be advantageous for the Bush administration to take such promising strategies into consideration."

Original Text: Settlers mass against Gaza plan TENS of thousands of Jewish settlers and their supporters demonstrated yesterday against a plan to remove all Gaza settlements and four from the West Bank.
Translation: Decenas de miles de colonos judíos y sus seguidores se manifestaron ayer contra un plan para eliminar todos los asentamientos de Gaza y cuatro de Cisjordania.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, tens of thousands of Jewish settlers and their advocates protested against a proposal to evacuate all settlements in Gaza and four from the West Bank.

Original Text: Hotspot operators strike international roaming deal Five international wireless operators, including BT, have signed a series of roaming agreements to provide Wi-Fi access at 20,000 hotspots across eleven countries.
Translation: Los operadores de puntos de acceso llegan a un acuerdo de roaming internacional. Cinco operadores inalámbricos internacionales, incluyendo BT, han firmado una serie de acuerdos de roaming para proporcionar acceso Wi-Fi en 20,000 puntos de acceso en once países.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Five global wireless operators, BT included, have entered into several roaming agreements to supply Wi-Fi access in eleven countries, spanning 20,000 hotspots.

Original Text: Microsoft loses FAT patent, wins Smart Tag case Microsoft is fighting a rejection by US patent authorities of a patent for its FAT filesystem, the company said on Thursday. Meanwhile, it #39;s celebrating a jury decision clearing it of patent infringement charges
Translation: Microsoft pierde la patente de FAT, gana el caso Smart Tag. Microsoft está luchando contra un rechazo de las autoridades de patentes de EE.UU. de una patente para su sistema de archivos FAT, dijo la compañía el jueves. Mientras tanto, está celebrando una decisión del jurado que lo absuelve de los cargos de infracción de patente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Microsoft announced that it is contesting a denial from US patent regulators concerning its FAT filesystem patent. Concurrently, the company is rejoicing after a jury verdict acquitted it of patent infringement charges.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US patent authorities rejected a patent for Microsoft's FAT filesystem, a decision which the company is currently disputing, as they stated on Thursday. On a positive note, the company is cheering a jury's ruling that exonerates it from charges of patent infringement.

Original Text: Israeli FM cautions EU not to back new UN vote on barrier Foreign Minister Sylvan Shalom cautioned the European Union Sunday to not back any Palestinian moves to condemn Israel at the United Nations for its controversial West Bank separation barrier.
Translation: El Ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Israel, Sylvan Shalom, advirtió el domingo a la Unión Europea que no respalde ninguna acción palestina para condenar a Israel en las Naciones Unidas por su controvertido muro de separación en Cisjordania.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Foreign Minister Sylvan Shalom of Israel warned the European Union on Sunday not to support any actions by Palestine to censure Israel at the United Nations over the contentious West Bank segregation wall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sylvan Shalom, the Israeli Foreign Minister, advised the European Union against endorsing Palestinian attempts to denounce Israel at the United Nations for the disputed separation barrier in the West Bank on Sunday.

Original Text: Storm scuttles Sun Betty Lennox had another huge night, scoring 23 points to lead the Seattle Storm to their first WNBA title with a 74-60 victory over the Connecticut Sun last night.
Translation: La tormenta hunde a Sun Betty Lennox tuvo otra noche enorme, anotando 23 puntos para liderar a la Seattle Storm a su primer título de la WNBA con una victoria de 74-60 sobre el Connecticut Sun anoche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last night, Betty Lennox led the Seattle Storm to their initial WNBA victory by scoring 23 points in their 74-60 win over the Connecticut Sun, marking another impressive performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Driven by Betty Lennox's significant performance, the Seattle Storm achieved their maiden WNBA championship last night, prevailing over the Connecticut Sun 74-60. Lennox displayed another impressive night by contributing 23 points.

Original Text: Blunkett plans tough new terror laws Tough new laws on terrorism could be passed if Labour wins a third term in power, Home Secretary David Blunkett has indicated. Mr Blunkett said officials were looking at a range of measures - from jury-less
Translation: Blunkett planea nuevas leyes antiterroristas duras. Podrían aprobarse nuevas leyes duras sobre el terrorismo si el Partido Laborista gana un tercer mandato en el poder, ha indicado el Secretario del Interior, David Blunkett. El señor Blunkett dijo que los funcionarios están considerando una serie de medidas, desde juicios sin jurado
Paraphrase 1: 1. David Blunkett, Home Secretary, has suggested tough new anti-terrorism laws could be imposed should Labour secure their third term in control. He has said that the officials are exploring many measures, including jury-less trials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. If Labour secures a third term in power, tough new legislation against terrorism could be enacted, as indicated by Home Secretary David Blunkett. These measures might range from jury-less trials onwards, as per Mr. Blunkett's statements.

Original Text: IBM Retakes Top Supercomputer Rank as NEC Slips (Reuters) Reuters - IBM , the world's biggest\computer maker, has regained its position at the head of the\Top 500 list of supercomputer installations, dislodging rival
Translation: IBM recupera el primer puesto en el ránking de supercomputadoras mientras NEC decae (Reuters) Reuters - IBM, el fabricante de computadoras más grande del mundo, ha recuperado su posición al frente de la lista Top 500 de instalaciones de supercomputadoras, desbancando a su rival.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) Reuters - IBM, the global leader in computer production, has reclaimed its leading position in the Top 500 list of supercomputer installations, ousting rival NEC.
Paraphrase 2: OR

Original Text: Klitschko retains title VITALI Klitschko successfully defended his World Boxing Council heavyweight crown here on Saturday, stopping Britain #39;s Danny Williams one minute and 26 seconds into the eighth round of their scheduled 12-round fight.
Translation: Klitschko retiene el título. VITALI Klitschko defendió con éxito su corona de peso pesado del Consejo Mundial de Boxeo aquí el sábado, deteniendo al británico Danny Williams un minuto y 26 segundos en el octavo asalto de su pelea programada a 12 asaltos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the weekend, Vitali Klitschko successfully protected his World Boxing Council heavyweight title, halting Britain's Danny Williams one minute and 26 seconds into the eighth round of their anticipated 12-round fight.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During a scheduled 12-round match on Saturday, Vitali Klitschko managed to maintain his title as the World Boxing Council heavyweight champion by defeating Britain's Danny Williams in the eighth round, one minute and 26 seconds in.

Original Text: BHP Billiton leads London on bigger share buyback LONDON (CBS.MW) -- Anglo-Aussie miner BHP Billiton (BHP) (UK:BLT) climbed 2.8 percent to lead FTSE 100 components after it increased its share buyback to A\$2.27 billion (US\$1.78 billion) from the A\$1 billion to A\$1.5 billion it had predicted it would buy
Translation: BHP Billiton lidera Londres en la recompra de acciones más grande LONDRES (CBS.MW) -- El minero anglo-australiano BHP Billiton (BHP) (UK:BLT) subió un 2.8 por ciento encabezando los componentes del FTSE 100 después de que aumentó su recompra de acciones a A\$2.27 mil millones (US\$1.78 mil millones) desde los A\$1 mil millones a A\$1.5 mil millones que había pronosticado que compraría.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After augmenting its share buyback from A$1 billion to A$1.5 billion, to A$2.27 billion (US$1.78 billion), Anglo-Aussie mining firm, BHP Billiton (BHP) (UK:BLT) saw a 2.8 percent increase and subsequently led the FTSE 100 components in London.
Paraphrase 2: 2. London's FTSE 100 components was led by BHP Billiton (BHP) (UK:BLT), an Anglo-Aussie mining firm, as a 2.8 percent increase was observed following their raise in share buyback from its originally predicted A$1 billion to A$1.5 billion to A$2.27 billion (US$1.78 billion).

Original Text: Clear Channel tunes in Fox News as primary news provider Clear Channel Radio has inked a five-year deal to have Fox News Radio serve as its primary national news service for more than 100 of its news/talk stations beginning in 2005.
Translation: Clear Channel sintoniza Fox News como principal proveedor de noticias. Clear Channel Radio ha firmado un contrato de cinco años para que Fox News Radio sirva como su principal servicio de noticias nacionales para más de 100 de sus estaciones de noticias/charlas a partir de 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Clear Channel Radio has established a five-year agreement that designates Fox News Radio as its main national news service. This deal, starting in 2005, will affect over 100 of Clear Channel's news/talk stations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. From 2005 onwards, Fox News Radio will be the primary national news service for more than 100 news/talk stations, as a result of a five-year agreement with Clear Channel Radio.

Original Text: INTERVIEW: DVD Format Winner May Be Set This Yr-Toshiba TOKYO (Dow Jones)--The battle over the high-definition successor to the current generation of DVDs is escalating with a winner possibly declared within the year, an executive at Toshiba Corp.
Translation: ENTREVISTA: El Ganador del Formato de DVD Podría Establecerse Este Año-Toshiba TOKIO (Dow Jones)--La batalla por el sucesor de alta definición de la generación actual de DVDs se está intensificando con un posible ganador declarado dentro del año, según un ejecutivo de Toshiba Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An executive at Toshiba Corp revealed in an interview that the competition to determine the high-definition successor of the current DVD format is intensifying. A clear winner could possibly be announced within this year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The contest for the next-generation high-definition DVD format is heating up, with the possibility of a winner being established this year, according to a top executive from Toshiba Corp in a recent interview.

Original Text: On brink of \$10 million year, ho-hum Singh talk, toast of golf No cheering in the press box. This is the first, second and third commandment of sports journalism, at least until Vijay Singh #39;s approach shot on a Sunday back nine appears to be sailing a tad too long.
Translation: Al borde de un año de \$10 millones, pláticas aburridas de Singh, el favorito del golf. No hay celebraciones en la sala de prensa. Este es el primer, segundo y tercer mandamiento de periodismo deportivo, al menos hasta que el tiro de acercamiento de Vijay Singh en un domingo por la tarde parece estar yendo un poco demasiado largo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As Vijay Singh's approach shot seems slightly off on a Sunday back nine, no cheering is allowed in the press box - the primary, secondary, and tertiary rules of sports journalism. This holds true, even as Singh stands on the cusp of a $10 million year, nonchalantly being talked about and celebrated in the world of golf.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Vijay Singh's shot potentially overshooting the mark on a Sunday back nine, cheering within the press box is strictly forbidden - this is the unwritten rule number one, two and three in sports journalism. Meanwhile, Singh, seemingly unaffected, is being widely discussed and praised in golf, possibly poised for a whopping $10 million year.

Original Text: Anil speaks, refuses to join issue Reliance Energy Chairman Anil Ambani on Thursday refused to join issue with his elder brother Mukesh Ambani on the battle raging between them.
Translation: Anil habla, se niega a unirse al conflicto. El jueves, el presidente de Reliance Energy, Anil Ambani, se negó a unirse al conflicto con su hermano mayor Mukesh Ambani en la batalla que se está librando entre ellos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Reliance Energy Chairman Anil Ambani declined to engage in a dispute with his elder brother, Mukesh Ambani, amidst their ongoing feud.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anil Ambani, the Chairman of Reliance Energy, withheld from joining issue with his elder sibling Mukesh Ambani on their ongoing clash this Thursday.

Original Text: Cricket: Spotlight back on Fleming as Black Caps take charge Chittagong - The Black Caps 2004 cricket tour of Bangladesh is quickly turning into a benefit gala for Stephen Fleming. Through some significant statistics and some classy batting, Fleming has again been thrust
Translation: Críquet: El foco regresa a Fleming mientras los Black Caps toman el control en Chittagong - La gira de críquet de los Black Caps por Bangladesh en 2004 se está convirtiendo rápidamente en una gala benefica para Stephen Fleming. A través de algunas estadísticas significativas y un bateo elegante, Fleming ha sido nuevamente impulsado
Paraphrase 1: 1. Chittagong - Stephen Fleming is once more in the limelight as the Black Caps take the lead in the 2004 cricket tour of Bangladesh, chiefly due to his classy batting and noteworthy statistics.

Original Text: Mladin Does the Double Yoshimura Suzukis Mat Mladin swept both races of the Suzuki Superbike Showdown at Road Atlanta in Braselton, Georgia, the points tally the best he could hope for heading into the final
Translation: Mladin Hace el Doble Yoshimura Suzukis Mat Mladin se llevó ambas carreras del Suzuki Superbike Showdown en Road Atlanta en Braselton, Georgia, el recuento de puntos es lo mejor que podría esperar al entrar en la final.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Suzuki Superbike Showdown held in Braselton, Georgia, Mladin, representing Double Yoshimura Suzukis, dominated both races. As he headed into the final, this was the most advantageous points accumulation he could anticipate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Double Yoshimura Suzukis team's Mat Mladin conquered twice at the Suzuki Superbike Showdown at Road Atlanta in Braselton, Georgia, which implies the peak points count he could wish for progressing into the final.

Original Text: Frances Fouls Up Phones, Power Florida's power and telecommunications infrastructure suffered a serious blow when Hurricane Frances blew in over Labor Day weekend. Portable cellular phone service stations and generators offer only a temporary fix. By Jacob Ogles.
Translation: La infraestructura de energía y telecomunicaciones de Florida recibió un fuerte golpe cuando el huracán Frances llegó durante el fin de semana del Día del Trabajo. Las estaciones de servicio de telefonía celular portátil y los generadores sólo ofrecen una solución temporal. Por Jacob Ogles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over Labor Day weekend, Hurricane Frances dealt a striking blow to Florida's telecommunications and power infrastructure, with portable cell phone stations and generators providing just a temporary solution. Article by Jacob Ogles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jacob Ogles reports that Hurricane Frances severely disrupted Florida's power and telecommunications systems over the Labor Day weekend. Auxiliary cellular service stations and generators are only providing a short-term solution.

Original Text: US soldier sentenced for murdering Iraqi: World News Baghdad, Sep 26 : An American soldier has been sentenced to 25 years in prison for killing a soldier of the Iraqi National Guard, Xinhua reported Sunday quoting US military sources.
Translation: Condenan a soldado estadounidense por asesinar a iraquí: Noticias mundiales Bagdad, 26 de septiembre: Un soldado estadounidense ha sido condenado a 25 años de prisión por matar a un soldado de la Guardia Nacional Iraquí, informó Xinhua el domingo citando fuentes militares estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As reported by Xinhua on Sunday, quoting US military sources, an American serviceman has received a 25-year prison sentence for the murder of an Iraqi National Guard soldier, according to World News Baghdad dated Sep 26.
Paraphrase 2: 2. World News Baghdad announced on Sep 26 that an American serviceman has been issued a 25-year sentence for the murder of a member of the Iraqi National Guard, according to information from US military sources as reported by Xinhua on Sunday.

Original Text: IBM Stops Offering Cash-Balance Pension International Business Machines Corp., taken to court by workers over changes it made to its traditional pension plan, has decided to stop offering any such plan to new employees.
Translation: IBM detiene la oferta de Pensiones por Balance en Efectivo - International Business Machines Corp., llevada a juicio por sus empleados debido a los cambios que realizó en su plan de pensiones tradicional, ha decidido dejar de ofrecer dicho plan a los nuevos empleados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The International Business Machines Corporation has chosen to discontinue their cash-balance pension plan for newly hired employees after facing legal action from employees over adjustments to the traditional pension plan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After being sued by employees due to modifications in its conventional pension program, IBM has made the decision to cease providing this pension scheme to any incoming workers.

Original Text: Frances Strikes, Knocks Out Power to 4M STUART, Fla. - Hurricane Frances pounded Florida with high wind and heavy rain Sunday after it smashed across the state's east coast, knocking out power to 4 million people, shredding roofs and uprooting trees...
Translation: Frances ataca, deja sin energía a 4M STUART, Fla. - El huracán Frances azotó Florida con fuertes vientos y lluvia intensa el domingo después de cruzar violentamente la costa este del estado, dejando sin energía a 4 millones de personas, destrozando techos y arrancando árboles...
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday, Hurricane Frances hammered Florida with intense wind and torrential downpour, it moved in fierce across the state's east coast, leaving 4 million individuals without electricity. The hurricane caused substantial damage by tearing apart roofs and pulling out trees...
Paraphrase 2: 2. An interruption of power for 4 million residents of Florida was caused on Sunday by Hurricane Frances, which unleashed high wind and severe rain on the state. After barreling across the east coast, the storm led to destruction of roofs and trees being uprooted...

Original Text: Ole Miss officials interview Erickson San Francisco 49ers coach Dennis Erickson met with Mississippi #39;s athletics director and chancellor for two hours Tuesday night to discuss the school #39;s vacant head coaching position.
Translation: Los funcionarios de Ole Miss entrevistan a Erickson, entrenador de los San Francisco 49ers. Dennis Erickson se reunió con el director de deportes y el rector de Mississippi durante dos horas el martes por la noche para discutir la posición vacante de entrenador en jefe de la escuela.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dennis Erickson, coach of the San Francisco 49ers, had a two-hour discussion with the athletic director and chancellor of Mississippi's Ole Miss on Tuesday night about their open head coaching position.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday night, a meeting took place between Mississippi's Ole Miss athletic director and chancellor and Dennis Erickson, the coach for the San Francisco 49ers, to talk about their empty head coaching position; the conversation lasted for two hours.

Original Text: Chiefs' Holmes on Track for 32 Touchdowns (AP) AP - One year after scoring an NFL-record 27 touchdowns, Priest Holmes sometimes has trouble getting out of bed the morning after a game.
Translation: Chiefs' Holmes en camino para 32 Touchdowns (AP) AP - Un año después de anotar un récord de la NFL de 27 touchdowns, a veces a Priest Holmes le cuesta levantarse de la cama la mañana después de un partido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Priest Holmes, who made an NFL record with 27 touchdowns last year, occasionally finds it difficult to get out of bed the morning following a game, yet he's still on pace for 32 touchdowns for the Chiefs this season.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Even though Priest Holmes, who set an NFL record with 27 touchdowns last year, struggles to rise from bed on the mornings following games, he is still projected to achieve 32 touchdowns this season for the Chiefs.

Original Text: Iraqi resistance pushes the US back Iraqi resistance fighters are steadily rolling back the US-led occupation of their country, turning one city after another into a no-go zone for the occupation troops.
Translation: La resistencia iraquí hace retroceder a los EE.UU. Los luchadores de resistencia iraquíes están haciendo retroceder progresivamente la ocupación liderada por los EE.UU. en su país, convirtiendo una ciudad tras otra en una zona prohibida para las tropas de ocupación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US-led occupation of Iraq is progressively being pushed back by Iraqi resistance fighters, who are successfully transforming each city into a territory inaccessible to the occupation troops.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Resistance fighters in Iraq are forcing the US-led troops to retreat; city after city is being turned into an area off-limits to the occupying forces.

Original Text: Shareholders rubber-stamp Microsoft payout Approval of changes to employee stock compensation paves way for \$32 billion bonanza for shareholders.
Translation: Los accionistas ratifican el desembolso de Microsoft. La aprobación de los cambios en la compensación de acciones a los empleados allana el camino para un bonanza de 32 mil millones de dólares para los accionistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Approval of alterations to employee stock compensation cleared the path for a $32 billion windfall for shareholders, effectively receiving a rubber-stamp from Microsoft's shareholders.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft's shareholders have given approval to changes in employee stock compensation, paving the path for a whopping $32 billion benefit to them.

Original Text: Dent wins as rain disrupts China Open Torrential rain caused havoc at the China Open as American Taylor Dent and Noam Okun of Israel were the only players to reach the second round on Tuesday.
Translation: Dent gana mientras la lluvia interrumpe el Abierto de China. Las intensas lluvias causaron estragos en el Abierto de China ya que el estadounidense Taylor Dent y Noam Okun de Israel fueron los únicos jugadores que lograron llegar a la segunda ronda el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Noam Okun of Israel and American Taylor Dent were the only ones who made it to the second round on Tuesday, as the China Open was thrown into disarray by torrential rain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday saw only Taylor Dent from America and Noam Okun from Israel advance to the second round at the China Open, due to the severe disruption caused by a torrential downpour.

Original Text: Israel and Russia agree to fight terrorism JERUSALEM: Israel and Russias foreign ministers inked a deal Monday to step up intelligence cooperation after the Beslan school tragedy, branding terrorism as the biggest challenge facing the international community.
Translation: Israel y Rusia acuerdan luchar contra el terrorismo JERUSALÉN: Los ministros de relaciones exteriores de Israel y Rusia firmaron un acuerdo el lunes para intensificar la cooperación de inteligencia después de la tragedia escolar de Beslan, calificando al terrorismo como el mayor desafío que enfrenta la comunidad internacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the tragedy at Beslan school, Israel and Russia's foreign ministers signed an agreement on Monday to strengthen intelligence collaboration, stating that terrorism is the greatest threat to the international community.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to the distressing events at Beslan school, the foreign ministers of Israel and Russia came to an agreement on Monday to enhance their intelligence sharing, identifying terrorism as the international community's most significant challenge.

Original Text: Oracle extends deadline on PeopleSoft bid Oracle has extended the deadline for PeopleSoft investors to tender their shares in its hostile bid to acquire its business software rival--the 11th extension of the offer since Oracle launched the bid more than 15 months ago.
Translation: Oracle extiende el plazo de oferta sobre PeopleSoft. Oracle ha extendido el plazo para que los inversores de PeopleSoft oferten sus acciones en su oferta hostil para adquirir a su rival de software empresarial, la 11ª extensión de la oferta desde que Oracle lanzó la oferta hace más de 15 meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In its ongoing attempt to acquire its business software competitor PeopleSoft, Oracle has again extended the offer deadline for PeopleSoft shareholders to contribute their shares. This marks the 11th time that the deadline has been extended since the hostile bid was initiated over 15 months ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oracle's hostile takeover bid for rival business software company PeopleSoft has just witnessed the 11th deadline extension in more than a year, allowing more time for PeopleSoft investors to tender their shares.

Original Text: Fish and Wildlife Service delays panther protection plan The US Fish and Wildlife Service has delayed the adoption of a plan designed to protect Florida panthers from encroaching development.
Translation:
El Servicio de Pesca y Vida Silvestre aplaza el plan de protección para panteras
El Servicio de Pesca y Vida Silvestre de los EE. UU. ha retrasado la adopción de un plan diseñado para proteger a las panteras de Florida del avance del desarrollo urbanístico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The implementation of a plan aimed at protecting Florida panthers from intrusive development has been postponed by the US Fish and Wildlife Service.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US Fish and Wildlife Service has put on hold a plan that was set up to defend Florida panthers against upcoming development.

Original Text: Sun to Give Out Operating System for Free (AP) AP - After investing roughly  #36;500 million and spending years of development time on its next-generation operating system, Sun Microsystems Inc. on Monday will announce an aggressive price for the software  #151; free.
Translation: Sol Regalará Sistema Operativo Gratis (AP) AP - Después de invertir aproximadamente $500 millones y años de desarrollo en su sistema operativo de próxima generación, Sun Microsystems Inc. anunciará el lunes un precio agresivo para el software - gratis.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems to Offer Next-Generation Operating System at No Cost (AP) AP - After investing approximately $500 million and devoting numerous years to its future operating system, Sun Microsystems Inc. will reveal on Monday that the software will be available at an extremely competitive price - zero charge.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sun Unveils Free Operating System After $500M Investment (AP) AP - Having poured around $500 million and years of effort into its newest operating system, Sun Microsystems Inc. is set to break the news on Monday about its bold pricing strategy for the software - it's absolutely gratis.

Original Text: UPDATE 3-Winnebago earns up on diesel mobile-home demand Recreational vehicle maker Winnebago Industries Inc. (WGO.N: Quote, Profile, Research) reported stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings on Thursday as more people
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 3-Winnebago aumenta sus ganancias debido a la demanda de autocaravanas diésel. El jueves, el fabricante de vehículos recreativos, Winnebago Industries Inc. (WGO.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), informó que sus ganancias trimestrales fueron más fuertes de lo esperado ya que más personas
Paraphrase 1: 1. Winnebago Industries Inc., a producer of recreational vehicles, reported impressive quarterly earnings on Thursday due to an increased demand for diesel mobile-homes, a fact represented in the third update.

Original Text: Body Resembling Japanese Hostage Found in Iraq A body resembling a Japanese hostage has been found in Iraq and will be flown to Kuwait or Qatar for identification, officials said on Saturday, after Tokyo refused a demand by his captors to pull out its troops.
Translation: Se encontró un cuerpo parecido al de un rehén japonés en Iraq. Un cuerpo que se asemeja al de un rehén japonés ha sido encontrado en Iraq y será trasladado a Kuwait o Qatar para su identificación, dijeron los oficiales el sábado, después de que Tokio se negara a cumplir con la demanda de sus captores de retirar sus tropas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A body, which is believed to be of a Japanese hostage, was discovered in Iraq and is set to be transported either to Kuwait or Qatar for identification, as stated by officials on Saturday. This follows Tokyo's resistance to the captors' demands to withdraw its troops.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Officials revealed on Saturday that a body, possibly belonging to a Japanese hostage, has been discovered in Iraq. The body will be sent to either Kuwait or Qatar for identification. This comes after Tokyo disregarded requests from the hostage-takers to remove its troops.

Original Text: Sun-Microsoft Pact Excludes OpenOffice Users Microsoft Corp. and Sun Microsystems Inc. have agreed not to sue each other or their customers for patent infringements, but the pact announced in April specifically states that the protection does not apply
