Translation: El Pacto Sun-Microsoft Excluye a los Usuarios de OpenOffice. Microsoft Corp. y Sun Microsystems Inc. han acordado no demandarse mutuamente ni a sus clientes por infracciones de patentes, pero el pacto anunciado en abril especifica específicamente que la protección no aplica.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Microsoft Corp. and Sun Microsystems Inc. have settled on an agreement in April, exempting each other and their customers from patent infringement lawsuits. However, it distinctly mentions that OpenOffice users do not fall under this protection.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As stated in their April agreement, Microsoft Corp. and Sun Microsystems Inc. will refrain from filing patent infringement lawsuits against each other or their customers, yet this shield specifically excludes OpenOffice users.

Original Text: US Average Gasoline Pump Price Falls to \$1.96, Lundberg Says US gasoline pump prices fell about five cents in the past two weeks to an average of \$1.96 a gallon, Trilby Lundberg said, citing a survey of about 7,000 filling stations by her Camarillo, California, research firm.
Translation: El precio promedio de la gasolina en EE.UU. cae a $1.96, dice Lundberg. Los precios de la gasolina en las bombas de EE.UU. cayeron alrededor de cinco centavos en las últimas dos semanas a un promedio de $1.96 por galón, dijo Trilby Lundberg, citando una encuesta de aproximadamente 7,000 estaciones de servicio realizada por su firma de investigación en Camarillo, California.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Trilby Lundberg, who informed from a survey conducted by her Camarillo-based research firm on roughly 7,000 petrol stations, the average gasoline pump price in the US has dropped approximately five cents in the past fortnight, now standing at $1.96 per gallon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Trilby Lundberg's California research firm surveyed about 7,000 fueling stations and concluded that the average US gasoline pump prices have dipped by approximately five cents in the last two weeks, hitting an average price of $1.96 per gallon.

Original Text: WTO confirms ruling against US in gambling dispute with Antigua The World Trade Organization confirmed that a US prohibition the cross-border gaming and gambling over the Internet was illegal under global trade rules.
Translation: La OMC confirma fallo en contra de EE.UU. en disputa de juego con Antigua. La Organización Mundial del Comercio confirmó que una prohibición de EE.UU. sobre el juego y las apuestas transfronterizas a través de Internet era ilegal según las normas globales de comercio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The World Trade Organization has affirmed that the prohibition of cross-border online gaming and gambling by the US is contrary to international trade regulations.

Original Text: Brown: Ask and you will receive He has always done whatever they've wanted. Troy Brown has run back kickoffs, returned punts, caught passes. He has been the primary receiver, a decoy, a spot rusher. He has been asked to be a team leader, then asked to take a step back and be a team player.
Translation: Brown: Pide y recibirás. Siempre ha hecho lo que han querido. Troy Brown ha devuelto patadas de salida, ha recibido despejes, ha atrapado pases. Ha sido el receptor principal, un señuelo, un corredor ocasional. Se le ha pedido que sea un líder de equipo, luego se le ha pedido que dé un paso atrás y sea un jugador de equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Troy Brown never turns down a request; he always fulfills what they want from him. He's given stellar performances as a kickoff returner, a punt returner, and a catch passer. Serving as the principal receiver, a diversion, or even a situational rusher hasn't been beyond him. He willingly stepped up to be a team leader when requested, and also accepted, without hesitation, the request to stand down and simply be a team player.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Always willing to do whatever is asked of him, Troy Brown has performed a plethora of roles. He's demonstrated his skills in running back kickoffs, returning punts, and catching passes. He's taken on primary receiver duties, been used as a decoy, and has even been a spot rusher. Leadership roles came naturally to him, but when he was asked to step down and take on the role of a regular team player, he responded positively.

Original Text: Toy safety warnings issued for holiday shoppers Megan Blanck-Weiss of the Washington Public Interest Research Group demonstrates in Seattle on Tuesday how the yo-yo water ball toy - a water-filled ball on an elastic-like cord
Translation: Advertencias de seguridad de juguetes emitidas para compradores durante las vacaciones. Megan Blanck-Weiss del Grupo de Investigación de Interés Público de Washington demuestra en Seattle el martes cómo funciona el juguete de bola de agua tipo yo-yo - una bola llena de agua en un cordón elástico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Megan Blanck-Weiss from the Washington Public Interest Research Group gave a live demonstration in Seattle. The purpose was to show the hazards associated with the yo-yo water ball toy - a water-filled ball on an elastic-like cord, as part of the toy safety warnings for festive season shoppers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Megan Blanck-Weiss, a member of the Washington Public Interest Research Group, took the initiative of illustrating the potential danger of the yo-yo water ball toy, a water-containing ball attached to an elastic-like cord, in Seattle on Tuesday. This was part of the toy safety alerts issued for holiday shoppers.

Original Text: Olympians pursuit of marketing gold begins long before medals <b>...</b> For millions of Americans, gymnast Paul Hamm #39;s fame began only when the broad-shouldered Olympian shrugged off a fall in the vaulting competition last week and made an inspired comeback to win gold.
Translation: La búsqueda de los olímpicos del oro de marketing comienza mucho antes de las medallas <b>...</b> Para millones de estadounidenses, la fama del gimnasta Paul Hamm #39 comenzó solo cuando el olímpico de anchos hombros desestimó una caída en la competencia de salto la semana pasada e hizo una inspirada remontada para ganar oro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Long before the medals are awarded, Olympians start their quest for marketing gold. For instance, the fame of Paul Hamm, a prominent gymnast, started making waves among millions of Americans only after he recovered gallantly from a fall in the vaulting competition last week to secure a gold medal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Olympians embark on their marketing gold journey well before any medals are won. Notably, the well-built Olympian, Paul Hamm, started becoming a household name to millions of Americans when he overcame a previous fall in the vaulting contest to make a phenomenal comeback and clinch the gold medal last week.

Original Text: Pakistan committed to peace talks \Pakistan Prime Minister Shaukat Aziz says his country stands for peace and dialogue ahead of a visit to India.
Translation: "Pakistán se compromete a conversaciones de paz" \El primer ministro de Pakistán, Shaukat Aziz, dice que su país aboga por la paz y el diálogo antes de una visita a la India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shaukat Aziz, the Prime Minister of Pakistan, stated that his country is dedicated to peace and discussion prior to his visit to India.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ahead of his trip to India, the Prime Minister of Pakistan, Shaukat Aziz, expressed his country's commitment to peace and dialogue.

Original Text: Phnom Penh counts on donors as it braces for a tough economic year PHNOM PENH : Cambodia, one of the world #39;s poorest countries, is counting on international donors to make new financial commitments next week to prepare the nation for what is destined to be a harsh new economic year.
Translation: Phnom Penh cuenta con donantes mientras se prepara para un año económico difícil PHNOM PENH : Camboya, uno de los países más pobres del mundo, está contando con los donantes internacionales para que hagan nuevos compromisos financieros la próxima semana para preparar a la nación para lo que está destinado a ser un nuevo año económico duro.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As it anticipates a challenging economic year, Phnom Penh relies on the contributions of donors. Cambodia, among the world's neediest nations, hopes for fresh financial assistance from global benefactors in the coming week to equip the country for the impending economic hardships.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Phnom Penh, in preparation for a strenuous economic year, is heavily dependent on donor support. Being one of the world's less economically developed countries, Cambodia is awaiting new financial pledges from international donors in the proceeding week, setting the stage for a tough economic period ahead.

Original Text: Quarterly profit climbs for Dell Dell, the world #39;s largest personal computer maker, posted a higher quarterly profit Thursday, helped by market share gains and lower component costs despite slowing demand for corporate PCs.
Translation: El beneficio trimestral sube para Dell. Dell, el fabricante de ordenadores personales más grande del mundo, publicó un beneficio trimestral más alto el jueves, ayudado por las ganancias en cuota de mercado y la reducción de los costos de componentes a pesar de la desaceleración en la demanda de PC corporativos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the slowing demand for corporate PCs, Dell, the world's top maker of personal computers, announced a rise in its quarterly profit on Thursday, aided by market share increases and reduced component expenses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dell, which holds the title as the largest personal computer manufacturer globally, reported a boost in quarterly profit this Thursday. This was facilitated by both an increase in market share and a decrease in component costs, even with the downturn in demand for corporate PCs.

Original Text: Artest Suspended for Remainder of Season (Indianapolis-November 22, 2004) -- The Pacers will concentrate today on forming a new game plan for the season, one that doesn #39;t involve three of its top players.
Translation: Artest Suspendido por el Resto de la Temporada (Indianápolis-22 de noviembre de 2004) -- Los Pacers se concentrarán hoy en formar un nuevo plan de juego para la temporada, uno que no involucre a tres de sus mejores jugadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Indianapolis-November 22, 2004) -- Three of the Pacers' key players, including Artest who has been suspended for the rest of the season, will be absent in today's formation of a new game strategy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Pacers, minus Artest who will miss the rest of the season due to suspension, and two of their major players, are revisiting their game strategy today (Indianapolis-November 22, 2004).

Original Text: Israeli cabinet approves compensation for Gaza settlers JERUSALEM, Oct 24 (AFP) - The Israeli cabinet approved Sunday a compensation package for settlers who are set to be uprooted from their homes on the eve of a crunch debate on Prime Minister Ariel Sharon #39;s plan to pull out of the Gaza Strip.
Translation: El gabinete israelí aprueba la compensación para los colonos de Gaza JERUSALÉN, 24 de octubre (AFP) - El gabinete israelí aprobó el domingo un paquete de compensación para los colonos que están a punto de ser desarraigados de sus hogares en vísperas de un debate crucial sobre el plan del Primer Ministro Ariel Sharon para retirarse de la Franja de Gaza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday, the Israeli cabinet gave the green light for a compensation plan to aid settlers who will be displaced from their homes due to Prime Minister Ariel Sharon's impending initiative to withdraw from the Gaza Strip, just ahead of a critical debate. JERUSALEM, Oct 24 (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. JERUSALEM, Oct 24 (AFP) - Ahead of a crucial discussion regarding Prime Minister Ariel Sharon's proposal to exit the Gaza Strip, the Israeli cabinet consented on Sunday to a compensation scheme for the settlers who will have to leave their homes.

Original Text: Google's Value Tops Yahoo (Reuters) Reuters - Shares of Google Inc. hit\a new high on Monday, giving the Web search leader a bigger\market value than rival Yahoo Inc., as traders who had shorted\the stock scrambled to buy back scarce shares after Google's\better-than-expected quarterly results last week.
Translation: El valor de Google supera a Yahoo (Reuters) Reuters - Las acciones de Google Inc. alcanzaron un nuevo récord el lunes, otorgando al líder de búsqueda en la web un valor de mercado mayor que su rival Yahoo Inc. Los comerciantes que habían vendido en corto las acciones se apresuraron a comprar de nuevo las escasas acciones después de los resultados trimestrales de Google, mejores de lo esperado la semana pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) According to Reuters, the shares of Google Inc. soared to a record high on Monday, surpassing its competitor Yahoo Inc. in market value. This surge was primarily due to investors rushing to repurchase limited shares following Google's impressive quarterly results which exceeded expectations last week.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (Reuters) After Google Inc.'s better-than-expected quarterly results last week, its shares reached a new peak on Monday, says Reuters. This spike in value put them ahead of their competitor Yahoo Inc. in terms of market value, as investors who had previously sold the stock in anticipation of a drop scrambled to buy back the limited shares available.

Original Text: N. Korea Accused of Trying to Delay Talks (AP) AP - North Korea is plotting an extended delay in resuming talks on its nuclear weapons program and has told China there was no point in continuing the six-sided talks at all, a senior U.S. official said Tuesday.
Translation: N. Corea Acusada de Intentar Retrasar las Conversaciones (AP) AP - Corea del Norte está tramando un retraso prolongado para reanudar las conversaciones sobre su programa de armas nucleares y ha dicho a China que no tiene sentido continuar con las conversaciones de seis partes en absoluto, dijo un alto funcionario de los EE.UU. el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior U.S. official stated on Tuesday that North Korea, according to information given to China, has no intention of resuming the six-party talks on its nuclear arms program, suggesting a prolonged delay.

Original Text: Fannie Mae Slides on Accounting Issues  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Fannie Mae <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=FNM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">FNM.N</A> shares fell as much  as 3.5 percent on Friday, bringing losses for the week to about  16 percent, as investors grew wary of potential widespread  accounting problems at the No. 1 U.S. housing finance company.
Translation: Fannie Mae se Desliza por Problemas de Contabilidad NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de Fannie Mae <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=FNM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">FNM.N</A> cayeron hasta un 3.5 por ciento el viernes, acumulando pérdidas durante la semana de cerca del 16 por ciento, a medida que los inversores se mostraban cautelosos ante posibles problemas generalizados de contabilidad en la compañía de financiación de viviendas número 1 de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In New York, Reuters reported a considerable decline in Fannie Mae's shares, dropping as much as 3.5 percent on Friday, marking an overall weekly loss of about 16 percent. This large decrease was due to rising investor concerns about possible extensive accounting issues at America's leading housing finance company.

Original Text: Justin Smith apologizes for DUI arrest Defensive end Justin Smith apologized to Cincinnati Bengals teammates and fans Wednesday for his drunken driving arrest. With a Bengals cap on his head and coach Marvin Lewis at his side, Smith sat at a table
Translation: Justin Smith se disculpa por su arresto por conducir ebrio. El ala defensiva Justin Smith se disculpó ante sus compañeros de equipo de los Cincinnati Bengals y los aficionados el miércoles por su arresto por conducir en estado de ebriedad. Con una gorra de los Bengals en su cabeza y el entrenador Marvin Lewis a su lado, Smith se sentó en una mesa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, defensive end Justin Smith expressed his apologies to his teammates and fans of the Cincinnati Bengals for his arrest due to driving under the influence. Flanked by Coach Marvin Lewis, and donning a Bengals cap, Smith delivered his apology while seated at a table.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having confessed to a DUI arrest, Justin Smith, the defensive end, sought forgiveness from his Cincinnati Bengals colleagues and supporters on Wednesday. With Marvin Lewis, the coach, by his side and a Bengals cap on his head, Smith made his contrite apology while sitting at a table.

Original Text: High court asked to hear case forcing unfaithful husband to continue support (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - VANCOUVER (CP) - A man who the B.C. Court of Appeal found was "carrying on behind his wife's back" and must continue spousal support payments will contest the ruling in the country's highest court because it contravenes the Divorce Act and could have national importance, his lawyer said Monday.
Translation: Traducir esto al español de manera precisa: Tribunal Supremo solicitado para escuchar caso que obliga a esposo infiel a continuar con soporte (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - VANCOUVER (CP) - Un hombre a quien el Tribunal de Apelaciones de B.C. encontró "engañando a espaldas de su esposa" y debe continuar con los pagos de soporte conyugal, impugnará el fallo en el tribunal más alto del país porque contradice la Ley de Divorcio y podría tener importancia nacional, dijo su abogado el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Canadian Press - VANCOUVER (CP) - A husband accused by the B.C. Court of Appeal of infidelity, and being ordered to maintain support payments, is taking the ruling to the Supreme Court, arguing it defies the Divorce Act and potentially carries national significance, stated his attorney on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. VANCOUVER (CP) - The Supreme Court has been appealed by a man judged by the B.C. Court of Appeal to have been "unfaithful" and is required to persist with spousal support payments. He challenges the decision citing inconsistency with the Divorce Act and its potential national implications, his legal representative announced on Monday.

Original Text: Hollywood Wants File Sharers to Fade Out The movie industry announced today it will launch its first wave of lawsuits later this month against those it alleges are illegally sharing copyrighted films on the Internet, following its
Translation: Hollywood Quiere que los Compartidores de Archivos Desaparezcan. La industria cinematográfica anunció hoy que lanzará su primera ola de demandas a finales de este mes contra aquellos a los que acusa de compartir ilegalmente películas con derechos de autor en Internet, siguiendo su
Paraphrase 1: 1. The movie industry revealed plans today to launch its inaugural series of lawsuits against alleged illegal sharers of copyrighted movies on the internet, replicating an approach Hollywood desires to phase out.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following a strategy which Hollywood aims to eradicate, the movie industry today announced the upcoming initiation of its first legal actions against individuals it accuses of illegally disseminating copyrighted films online.

Original Text: Pension hit adds to woes at Severn Severn Trent said last night it was still investigating alleged wrongdoing by its staff as it reported a 6.5 slump in first-half profits and predicted lower second-half growth from its services side.
Translation: Severn Trent dijo anoche que todavía estaba investigando supuestas irregularidades de su personal mientras informaba una caída del 6.5 en las ganancias del primer semestre y predecía un crecimiento menor en el segundo semestre desde su lado de servicios. El impacto en la pensión agrega más problemas a Severn.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Severn Trent revealed its ongoing investigation into supposed staff misconduct last night. This announcement was accompanied by a reported 6.5% decrease in its first-half profits. Additionally, the company foresees a dip in growth from its services sector in the second half, further increasing its difficulties following the pension hit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Last evening, Severn Trent disclosed that they are still probing allegations of impropriety among its staff. This was on top of a report showing a 6.5% drop in profits for the first half of the year, and an expectation of slowed growth in their services sector for the second half. This escalating situation adds to their struggles resulting from the pension crisis.

Original Text: Foreign direct investment outlook good Foreign direct investment (FDI) inflows decreased by 18 percent in 2003 to USD560 billion, compared to a 17 percent decrease in 2002 according to the latest report from the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).
Translation: Perspectiva positiva para la inversión extranjera directa. Los flujos de inversión extranjera directa (IED) disminuyeron en un 18 por ciento en 2003 a 560 mil millones de USD, en comparación con una disminución del 17 por ciento en 2002 según el último informe de la Conferencia de las Naciones Unidas sobre Comercio y Desarrollo (UNCTAD).
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the latest report from the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD), there was a decrease in Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) inflows by 18 percent to USD560 billion in 2003, following a decrease of 17 percent in 2002, but the outlook for foreign direct investment is positive.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The latest report from the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) indicates that Foreign Direct Investment inflows fell by 18 percent to USD560 billion in 2003, following a 17 percent decrease in the previous year. Nonetheless, the forecast for foreign direct investment appears promising.

Original Text: Robot Telescopes Comb the Skies RoboNet-1.0, an automatically controlled series of telescopes, has two prime directives: search the heavens for the next big flash and spot an Earth-like planet that could hold intelligent life. By Lakshmi Sandhana.
Translation: Telescopios Robotizados Peinan los Cielos RoboNet-1.0, una serie de telescopios controlados automáticamente, tiene dos directivas principales: buscar en los cielos la próxima gran explosión y localizar un planeta similar a la Tierra que podría albergar vida inteligente. Por Lakshmi Sandhana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Authored by Lakshmi Sandhana: RoboNet-1.0, a system of automated telescopes, has two main objectives: to scan celestial spaces for the next significant flash and identify any Earth-similar planets which could potentially habour intelligent life forms.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lakshmi Sandhana reports that the robotically controlled network of telescopes known as RoboNet-1.0 is primarily tasked with two missions: to discover the impending massive cosmic flash and to detect planets similar to Earth that could be habitats for intelligent life.

Original Text: Nintendo DS Launches in the US 300-plus people lineup at the EB Games in Universal City. And then the PictoChatting begins. November 21, 2004 - Who says Nintendo doesn #39;t know how to throw a party?
Translation: Nintendo DS se lanza en los EE.UU. Más de 300 personas hacen cola en la tienda EB Games en Universal City. Y luego comienza el PictoChat. 21 de noviembre de 2004 - ¿Quién dice que Nintendo no sabe cómo organizar una fiesta?
Paraphrase 1: 1. On November 21, 2004, the Nintendo DS was launched in the US. Over 300 people formed a line at Universal City's EB Games store to purchase it, and subsequently, PictoChatting kicked off. This event showed Nintendo's knack for throwing a great party.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The launch of Nintendo DS in the US on November 21, 2004, was quite a party! The event saw a queue of over 300 people at the EB Games store in Universal City, proving Nintendo's event organizing prowess. Post launch, the attendees dived into the fun of PictoChatting.

Original Text: Rose wields the axe as M amp;S slide continues Marks  amp; Spencer chief executive Stuart Rose yesterday took hands-on control of the underperforming retailer, announcing the departure of four main board directors and two other senior executives.
Translation: Rose maneja el hacha mientras continúa el deslizamiento de M&S: el director ejecutivo de Marks & Spencer, Stuart Rose, tomó ayer el control directo del minorista con bajo rendimiento, anunciando la salida de cuatro directores principales de la junta y dos otros altos ejecutivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Stuart Rose, the chief executive of Marks & Spencer, stepped in to take direct control of the struggling retailer yesterday. He announced the exit of four main board directors and two senior executives, reflecting the continuing downfall of M&S.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The chief executive of Marks & Spencer, Stuart Rose, began actively managing the poorly-performing retailer directly yesterday, and signaled the leave of four major board directors along with two other high-ranking executives, while M&S's decline continues.

Original Text: Apple deepens Sony #39;s woes as iPod takes off Juliana Sasaki did not bother checking out Sony Corp #39;s digital music player in Tokyo before buying her green iPod mini.  quot;I knew Sony and other companies had MP3 players, but
Translation: Apple agrava los problemas de Sony mientras el iPod despega. Juliana Sasaki no se molestó en revisar el reproductor de música digital de Sony Corp en Tokio antes de comprar su iPod mini verde. "Sabía que Sony y otras empresas tenían reproductores de MP3, pero
Paraphrase 1: 1) Juliana Sasaki, before purchasing her green iPod mini, ignored Sony Corp's digital music player in Tokyo. "I was aware Sony and other firms produce MP3 players, but" - this further escalated Sony's troubles as Apple's iPod garnered popularity.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As Apple's iPod begins to soar, it further exacerbates Sony's problems. Sony Corp's digital music player in Tokyo wasn't even considered by Juliana Sasaki before she bought her green iPod mini. "Yes, I knew about Sony and other company's MP3 players, but..."

Original Text: PeopleSoft keeps up fight PeopleSoft said Thursday that it would begin meeting with investors to lobby for their rejection of Oracle #39;s hostile \$8.8 billion acquisition offer.
Translation: PeopleSoft sigue luchando. PeopleSoft dijo el jueves que comenzaría a reunirse con los inversores para hacer campaña por su rechazo a la hostil oferta de adquisición de \$8.8 mil millones de Oracle.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, PeopleSoft announced its intention to start discussions with its investors, seeking their refusal of Oracle's unsolicited acquisition offer worth $8.8 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. PeopleSoft declared on Thursday that they will initiate conversations with shareholders to persuade them to reject Oracle's aggressive bid of $8.8 billion.

Original Text: J.P. Morgan Cancels IBM Outsourcing Deal  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase   Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A> said  on Wednesday it was canceling a \$5 billion outsourcing deal  with IBM Corp., <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IBM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IBM.N</A> and planned to rehire about 4,000  workers who had been transferred to IBM under the pact.
Translation: J.P. Morgan Cancela Acuerdo de Subcontratación con IBM  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase   Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A> anunció el miércoles que estaba cancelando un acuerdo de subcontratación de \$5 mil millones con IBM Corp., <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=IBM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">IBM.N</A> y planeaba recontratar a cerca de 4,000 trabajadores que habían sido transferidos a IBM bajo el pacto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - On Wednesday, J.P. Morgan Chase Co. announced the cancellation of a $5 billion outsourcing agreement with IBM Corp. The firm also intends to employ again about 4,000 workers who were previously transferred to IBM as part of the deal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A $5 billion outsourcing contract with IBM Corp. was annulled by J.P. Morgan Chase Co. on Wednesday. The company also detailed plans to reintegrate about 4,000 employees who had moved to IBM under the agreement.

Original Text: Man wanted for violent home invasion in U.S. arrested outside Toronto (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - TORONTO (CP) - A man wanted for allegedly tying up three adults and setting fire to their car in Washington state was scheduled to appear in a Toronto court Tuesday after Canadian officials found him hiding in a Newmarket, Ont., home.
Translation: Hombre buscado por violenta invasión a hogar en EE.UU. es arrestado a las afueras de Toronto (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - TORONTO (CP) - Un hombre buscado por presuntamente atar a tres adultos y prender fuego a su coche en el estado de Washington estaba programado para comparecer en un tribunal de Toronto el martes después de que funcionarios canadienses lo encontraron escondido en una casa en Newmarket, Ont.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Canadian Press reports - In Newmarket, Ont., Toronto, officials discovered a man who was sought-after for a violent domestic break-in that occurred in the U.S. In Washington state, he allegedly restrained three individuals and ignited their vehicle. He is set to appear in a Toronto court this Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As reported by the Canadian Press - A fugitive, who was on the run for a violent home intrusion in the U.S., has been apprehended in a dwelling in Newmarket, Ont., Toronto. The man was accused of binding three people and setting their car on fire back in Washington state. His hearing is scheduled for Tuesday in a Toronto courtroom.

Original Text: Israel Charges Iran Replaces Saddam as Terror Exporter Israel charged on Thursday that Iran had replaced Saddam Hussein as the world #39;s primary exporter of  quot;terror, hate and instability.
Translation: Israel Acusa a Irán de Reemplazar a Saddam como Exportador de Terror. Israel acusó el jueves que Irán había reemplazado a Saddam Hussein como el principal exportador mundial de "terror, odio e inestabilidad".
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Israel alleged that Iran has stepped into the shoes of Saddam Hussein as the main source of "terror, hate, and instability" globally.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Israel accused Iran on Thursday of filling the role once occupied by Saddam Hussein as the leading global supplier of "terror, hate, and instability."

Original Text: Rocky way ahead of Karzai to implement ambitious agenda Though the Afghanistan #39;s new head of the state Hamid Karzai easily swept the Oct. 9 presidential elections and took oath as first-elected national leader Tuesday
Translation: Camino rocoso por delante de Karzai para implementar agenda ambiciosa Aunque el nuevo jefe de estado de Afganistán, Hamid Karzai, ganó fácilmente las elecciones presidenciales del 9 de octubre y prestó juramento como el primer líder nacional elegido el martes
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hamid Karzai, the new head of state in Afghanistan, who convincingly won the presidential elections on Oct. 9 and was inaugurated as the nation's first-elected leader on Tuesday, faces a challenging path ahead to achieve his ambitious objectives despite his victory over Rocky.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite a decisive victory over Rocky in the October 9th presidential elections and his subsequent swearing-in as the first elected national leader on Tuesday, Hamid Karzai, Afghanistan's new state head, has a steep journey ahead in realizing his bold plans.

Original Text: Board Defeats Bid to Unionize Wal-Mart Wal-Mart Canada Corp. declared victory Wednesday in its defense against unionization at a store in British Columbia. The Canadian branch of the world #39;s largest retailer, Wal-Mart Stores Inc.
Translation: Junta Derrota Propuesta para Sindicalizar Wal-Mart. Wal-Mart Canada Corp. declaró victoria el miércoles en su defensa contra la sindicalización en una tienda en Columbia Británica. La rama canadiense del mayor minorista del mundo, Wal-Mart Stores Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Wal-Mart Canada Corp. Successfully Resists Unionization Attempt in British Columbia Store"
Paraphrase 2: Wal-Mart Stores Inc.'s Canadian branch proudly announced their win on Wednesday against an attempt to unionize a store in British Columbia.

Original Text: DOD Chooses Linux Clusters Linux Networx has announced that two Department of Defense centers will be using Linux cluster supercomputers from the company to conduct battlefield simulations. The clusters are part of an initiative to modernize the DOD #39;s ...
Translation: DOD elige Clusters de Linux Linux Networx ha anunciado que dos centros del Departamento de Defensa estarán utilizando supercomputadoras en clusters de Linux de la compañía para realizar simulaciones de campo de batalla. Los clusters son parte de una iniciativa para modernizar el DOD #39...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Linux Networx has declared that their Linux cluster supercomputers will be utilized by two Department of Defense centers to execute battlefield simulations. These clusters form an integral part of the initiative to update the Department of Defense's systems.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The company, Linux Networx, has reported that the Department of Defense has chosen to use their Linux cluster supercomputers for battlefield simulation in two of its centers. This is part of a broader effort to modernize the Department of Defense's system.

Original Text: SBC, Microsoft in \$400 million deal SAN ANTONIO -- SBC Communications Inc., the second-largest local phone company in the United States, said Wednesday it signed a 10-year, \$400 million agreement with Microsoft Corp.
Translation: SBC, Microsoft en un acuerdo de \$400 millones SAN ANTONIO -- SBC Communications Inc., la segunda compañía de teléfonos locales más grande en los Estados Unidos, dijo el miércoles que firmó un acuerdo de 10 años y \$400 millones con Microsoft Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN ANTONIO -- Announcing a 10-year deal worth $400 million with Microsoft Corp., SBC Communications Inc., the United States' second-largest local phone company, confirmed the agreement on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, SBC Communications Inc, the number two local phone company in the USA, announced they have entered into a 10-year contract with Microsoft Corp, valuated at $400 million.

Original Text: Nagging Questions Dog Georgia Opener (AP) AP - Beginning a season of high expectations, the Georgia Bulldogs still have a few questions to answer.
Translation: Preguntas Insistentes Acechan el Inicio de Georgia (AP) AP - Al iniciar una temporada de altas expectativas, los Bulldogs de Georgia todavía tienen algunas preguntas por responder.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As the Georgia Bulldogs kickstart a season brimming with high hopes, several queries remain unresolved. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Georgia Bulldogs, anticipating a promising season, are still left with several uncertainties to address. (AP)

Original Text: Owners are likely to vote no During a negotiating session today in Toronto, NHL owners are expected to turn thumbs-down on last week #39;s proposal from the NHL Players Association.
Translation: Es probable que los propietarios voten en contra. Durante una sesión de negociación hoy en Toronto, se espera que los propietarios de la NHL rechacen la propuesta de la semana pasada de la Asociación de Jugadores de la NHL.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During a negotiation meeting in Toronto today, it is anticipated that the NHL owners will reject the proposal submitted by the NHL Players Association last week.

Original Text: Applebee's Sees Room for More Outlets  LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Restaurant chain Applebee's  International Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=APPB.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">APPB.O</A> on Thursday said there was room for  at least 3,000 of its namesake restaurants in the United  States, nearly double the existing number.
Translation: Applebee's Ve Espacio para Más Locales LOS ÁNGELES (Reuters) - La cadena de restaurantes Applebee's International Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=APPB.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">APPB.O</A> dijo el jueves que había espacio para al menos 3,000 de sus restaurantes homónimos en los Estados Unidos, casi el doble del número actual.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LOS ANGLES (Reuters) - Applebee's International Inc. claimed on Thursday that the potential exists for expanding its restaurants in the United States to at least 3,000, almost twofold the current quantity.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Los Angeles (Reuters) - According to a statement on Thursday by restaurant corporation Applebee's International Inc., there's sufficient scope to almost double their current number of outlets, reaching a total of at least 3,000 restaurants across the United States.

Original Text: RIM Introduces Breakthrough Keyboard Technology for Smaller <b>...</b> The new keyboard technology from Research In Motion has garnered early praise for its ingenuity and effectiveness. The BlackBerry 7100(TM) Series handsets are the first wireless devices with
Translation: RIM presenta tecnología de teclado innovadora para dispositivos más pequeños <b>...</b> La nueva tecnología de teclado de Research In Motion ha recibido elogios tempranos por su ingenio y efectividad. Los teléfonos de la serie BlackBerry 7100 (TM) son los primeros dispositivos inalámbricos con
Paraphrase 1: 1. Research In Motion (RIM) has launched a revolutionary keyboard technology for smaller devices, specifically the BlackBerry 7100(TM) Series handsets, which have received an impressive initial reaction for their inventive and efficient design.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new keyboard technology, lauded for its cleverness and efficiency, has been unveiled by Research In Motion (RIM) and has been introduced for smaller devices, starting with the BlackBerry 7100(TM) Series handsets.

Original Text: Birding Column: "Blind" Views of Quail and Jays Birder Mathew Tekulsky reveals the effectiveness of a concealed location for viewing birds, as he describes the behavior of quail and jays in his yard.
Translation: Columna de Observación de Aves: Visiones "a ciegas" de Codornices y Urracas. El observador de aves Mathew Tekulsky revela la efectividad de una ubicación oculta para observar aves, mientras describe el comportamiento de las codornices y las urracas en su jardín.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Birding Column: Mathew Tekulsky, a seasoned birder, enlightens bird lovers about the efficacy of a hidden spot for observing quail and jays in his backyard.

Original Text: Italy summons Libyan ambassador to discuss latest illegal migrants ROME - Almost 1,000 illegal immigrants have arrived at a southern Italian island over the weekend. Most are believed to be from North Africa.
Translation: Italia convoca al embajador Libio para discutir sobre los últimos migrantes ilegales ROMA - Casi 1,000 inmigrantes ilegales han llegado a una isla del sur de Italia durante el fin de semana. Se cree que la mayoría provienen de África del Norte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ROME - Approximately 1,000 illegal immigrants, believed to be predominantly from North Africa, have reached a southern Italian island over the weekend. As a response, Italy has called in the Libyan ambassador for a discussion regarding the latest influx of migrants.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following the arrival of nearly 1,000 illegal immigrants - mostly from North Africa - on a southern Italian island over the weekend, the Libyan ambassador has been summoned by Italy for talks about the recent surge in migrants. ROME reports.

Original Text: Knicks swat Hornets 86-79 Stephon Marbury had 22 points and nine assists to help the New York Knicks end a three-game losing streak with an 86-79 victory over New Orleans on Wednesday night, dropping the Hornets to 0-9 at home.
Translation: Los Knicks golpean a los Hornets 86-79. Stephon Marbury tuvo 22 puntos y nueve asistencias para ayudar a los New York Knicks a poner fin a una racha de tres derrotas consecutivas con una victoria de 86-79 sobre New Orleans el miércoles por la noche, dejando a los Hornets con 0-9 en casa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The New York Knicks triumphed over the New Orleans Hornets with a victory of 86-79, thanks to Stephon Marbury's contribution of 22 points and nine assists. This feat put an end to Knicks' three-game losing streak and further deepened the Hornets' home loss record to 0-9 on Wednesday night.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday night, Stephon Marbury reinforced a victory for the New York Knicks with 22 points and nine assists, closing their three-game loss series with an 86-79 win over the New Orleans Hornets. This only amplified the Hornets' home disadvantage, rendering them 0-9.

Original Text: Peru's Shining Path Leaders to Face Trial Peru plans to hold a new trial next month before a civilian court for imprisoned Shining Path founder Abimael Guzman and 17 other top leaders of the Maoist insurgency, court officials said Monday.
Translation: Líderes del Sendero Luminoso de Perú enfrentarán juicio. Perú planea llevar a cabo un nuevo juicio el próximo mes ante un tribunal civil para el fundador encarcelado del Sendero Luminoso, Abimael Guzmán, y otros 17 líderes principales de la insurgencia maoísta, dijeron funcionarios de la corte el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Abimael Guzman, the founder of Shining Path, along with 17 other paramount leaders of the Maoist insurgency, are scheduled to be tried in a Peruvian civilian court next month, according to court officials who reported this on Monday.

Original Text: Video May Show Deaths of Nepalese Hostages Description: Video is posted on a website that could show the execution in Iraq of 12 hostages from Nepal. The hostages came to Iraq to work as cooks and cleaners for a Jordanian firm.
Translation: El video podría mostrar las muertes de rehenes nepalíes Descripción: Se publica un video en un sitio web que podría mostrar la ejecución en Irak de 12 rehenes de Nepal. Los rehenes llegaron a Irak para trabajar como cocineros y limpiadores para una empresa jordana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A video posted on a website might depict the execution of 12 Nepalese hostages in Iraq, who were employed as cooks and cleaners by a Jordanian company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The execution of 12 Nepalese hostages in Iraq, who were serving as cooks and cleaners for a Jordanian firm, may have been captured and shared in a video on a website.

Original Text: Long-Distance Sports Thanks to new high-tech gear, opponents in golf and racket sports can be across town - or across the country.
Translation: Deportes de Larga Distancia Gracias a los nuevos equipos de alta tecnología, los oponentes en golf y deportes de raqueta pueden estar al otro lado de la ciudad, o al otro lado del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the aid of advanced gadgets, competitors in golf and racket games can compete from differing locations - they could be anywhere in the city or even across the nation.

Original Text: Hurricane Blows Dolphins vs. Titans to Saturday The Miami Dolphins' opening game against the Tennessee Titans will be played Saturday instead of Sunday because of approaching Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: El Huracán Obliga a Postergar el Partido de Delfines vs. Titanes al Sábado. El primer partido de los Delfines de Miami contra los Titanes de Tennessee se jugará el sábado en lugar del domingo debido a la aproximación del Huracán Iván.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to the imminent arrival of Hurricane Ivan, the inaugural game between the Miami Dolphins and the Tennessee Titans has been rescheduled to Saturday from Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The initial match between the Miami Dolphins and the Tennessee Titans, originally scheduled for Sunday, has been moved to Saturday on account of the incoming Hurricane Ivan.

Original Text: MSN and Yahoos Overture Extend Paid Search Relationship MSN and Yahoo's Overture Extend Paid Search Relationship\\Yahoo's Overture is going to continue to serve ads on MSN Search for the next 18 months. Overture today announced that they have extended its sponsored search distribution relationship with Microsoft Corp. in the United States and internationally through June 2006.\\Under the terms ...
Translation:
MSN y la Overture de Yahoo Extienden la Relación de Búsqueda Pagada
MSN y la Overture de Yahoo Extienden la Relación de Búsqueda Pagada \\ La Overture de Yahoo va a continuar sirviendo anuncios en MSN Search durante los próximos 18 meses. Overture anunció hoy que han extendido su relación de distribución de búsqueda patrocinada con Microsoft Corp. en los Estados Unidos e internacionalmente hasta junio de 2006. \\ Según los términos ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. MSN and Yahoo's Overture have decided to continue their paid search relationship, ensuring that Overture will continue providing ad services on MSN Search for an additional 18 months. The extension of the sponsored search distribution relationship, both in the United States and internationally, was officially announced by Overture and this will be the case until June 2006.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Through an extension, MSN and Yahoo's Overture have decided to sustain their paid search relationship. This means Overture will continue to be the ad service provider for MSN Search for the forthcoming 18 months. The extension of this sponsored search distribution relationship was announced by Overture, outlining that this arrangement stands valid until June 2006, both within the United States and internationally.

Original Text: Pay for Sun's Schwartz jumps 56 percent Sun Microsystems' new president pulls in \$677,000 in fiscal 2004, as the company tries to return to prosperity.
Translation: El salario de Schwartz de Sun aumenta un 56 por ciento. El nuevo presidente de Sun Microsystems recibe \$677,000 en el año fiscal 2004, mientras la compañía intenta volver a la prosperidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems' new president earns $677,000 in fiscal 2004, a 56 percent increase from the previous period, as the company aims to regain its prosperity.

Original Text: Federer seeks grand finale to season For Roger Federer, simple equates to sanity. Simple is his stated game plan. He has put a box around his life, and only the important things are allowed in.
Translation: Federer busca el gran final de la temporada. Para Roger Federer, lo sencillo equivale a cordura. Lo sencillo es su plan de juego declarado. Ha puesto un límite a su vida, y solo las cosas importantes están permitidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Roger Federer is in pursuit of a grand season finale. For him, simplicity equates to sanity. He keeps his game plan simple as stated. He has set boundaries around his life, with only space for what truly matters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Striving for a grand end to the season, for Federer, equates to striving for simplicity, a factor he believes is key to sanity. His game plan, modest by his own admission, is a reflection of his life, which is cordoned off to entertain only what's important.

Original Text: T-Mobile Flashes Flarion Trial Wireless carrier T-Mobile International AG today confirmed it is carrying out trials of Flarion Technologies Flash OFDM equipment in European air space.
Translation: El operador de telefonía móvil T-Mobile International AG confirmó hoy que está realizando pruebas con el equipo Flash OFDM de Flarion Technologies en el espacio aéreo europeo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. T-Mobile International AG, a wireless carrier, declared today that it is testing Flarion Technologies Flash OFDM equipment in European air space.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, wireless carrier T-Mobile International AG disclosed that they are conducting tests with Flarion Technologies Flash OFDM equipment in Europe's airspace.

Original Text: Jeter catches first Gold Glove Derek Jeter #39;s diving grab against the Red Sox in July caught the attention of all of baseball and perhaps earned him his first American League Gold Glove.
Translation: Jeter atrapa su primer Guante de Oro. La atrapada en buceo de Derek Jeter contra los Red Sox en julio captó la atención de todo el béisbol y quizás le valió su primer Guante de Oro de la Liga Americana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Derek Jeter's extraordinary diving grab against the Red Sox in July garnered universal attention throughout baseball, possibly securing him his first American League Gold Glove.

Original Text: Schuettler First Seeded Casualty in Madras  MADRAS, India (Reuters) - Germany's Rainer Schuettler  became the first seeded casualty at the \$400,000 Chennai Open  on Monday, knocked out by unfancied Frenchman Olivier Patience  in the first round.
Translation: Primera Baja Sembrada en Madras: Schuettler. MADRAS, India (Reuters) - El alemán Rainer Schuettler se convirtió en la primera baja sembrada en el Chennai Open de \$400,000 el lunes, eliminado por el francés poco apreciado Olivier Patience en la primera ronda.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In the first round of the $400,000 Chennai Open, German Rainer Schuettler, was the first seeded player to be eliminated, defeated by unlikely victor, Frenchman Olivier Patience.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Olivier Patience of France surprisingly ejected Germany's Rainer Schuettler, the first seeded player, in the first round of the Chennai Open, which has a purse of $400,000.

Original Text: Goergl ends Miller #39;s winning streak at World Cup Super-G Austrian Stephan Goergl of Austria won a World Cup Super-G race, ending American Bode Miller #39;s three-race winning streak Thurday in the Colorado Rockies.
Translation: Goergl termina la racha de victorias de Miller nº39 en la Copa del Mundo Super-G. El austríaco Stephan Goergl de Austria ganó una carrera de la Copa del Mundo Super-G, poniendo fin a la racha de tres victorias consecutivas del estadounidense Bode Miller el jueves en las Rocosas de Colorado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Stephan Goergl from Austria was victorious in a World Cup Super-G race, concluding American Bode Miller's triple-race winning streak in the Colorado Rockies on Thursday.

Original Text: US Global's Holmes Mines Commodity Stocks  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Frank Holmes would have loved to  become a boxer, but he hung up his gloves at an early age and  took a jab at money management instead.
Translation: Las acciones de materias primas de Holmes Mines de US Global NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - A Frank Holmes le habría encantado convertirse en boxeador, pero colgó sus guantes a una edad temprana y optó por probar suerte en la gestión de dinero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Frank Holmes, having retired his boxing gloves at a young age, opted for a career in financial management, an endeavor he would have thoroughly enjoyed. This led him to be part of US Global's Holmes Mines Commodity Stocks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Aspiring to be a boxer, Frank Holmes had to abandon his dream at an early age. But he made a swift pivot into the world of money management, ultimately leading him to US Global's Holmes Mines Commodity Stocks.

Original Text: Fresh violence erupts in Haiti PORT-AU-PRINCE, Haiti - Violence erupted again today in Port-au-Prince and the decapitated bodies of two police officers were found, the day after they were killed in a clash with protesters demanding the return of ousted president Jean-Bertrand Aristide
Translation: Estalla nueva violencia en Haití PORT-AU-PRINCE, Haití - Hoy volvió a estallar la violencia en Port-au-Prince y se encontraron los cuerpos decapitados de dos agentes de policía, un día después de que fueran asesinados en un enfrentamiento con manifestantes que exigían el regreso del presidente derrocado Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Port-au-Prince, Haiti, there's a resurgence of violence today during which the beheaded remains of two police officers were discovered, a day post their demise in a conflict with protestors calling for the reinstatement of deposed president Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Another outbreak of violence occurred today in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, and immediately following the event, two decapitated police officers were discovered, presumably killed in a previous day's confrontation with demonstrators advocating for ex-president Jean-Bertrand Aristide's return.

Original Text: Spam e-mails tempt net shoppers People continue to ignore warnings about spam and are being lured into buying goods, a report suggests.
Translation: Los correos electrónicos de spam tientan a los compradores en línea. La gente continúa ignorando las advertencias sobre el spam y están siendo seducidos para comprar bienes, sugiere un informe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a report, despite continuous warnings about spam, individuals are still being enticed by spam emails to purchase products online.

Original Text: India says U.S. lifts nuclear, space export curbs (Reuters) Reuters - India said on Saturday the United States had lifted export restrictions on equipment for India's commercial space programme and nuclear power facilities, opening the way for greater cooperation in the two sectors.
Translation: India dice que EE.UU. levanta las restricciones de exportación nuclear y espacial (Reuters) Reuters - India dijo el sábado que Estados Unidos había levantado las restricciones de exportación sobre equipos para el programa espacial comercial de India y las instalaciones de energía nuclear, abriendo el camino para una mayor cooperación en los dos sectores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - On Saturday, India announced that the United States had removed export restrictions on tools needed for India's commercial space programme and nuclear power facilities, promoting enhanced cooperation in both domains.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a Saturday report from Reuters, India indicated that the U.S. has decided to lift export bans on equipment used for India's space-based commercial ventures and nuclear power infrastructures, paving the path for deeper collaboration in these sectors.

Original Text: US aid enters Indonesia BANDA ACEH, Indonesia -- After the devastation wreaked by the seas, a deluge from the skies deepened the misery for tsunami-stricken areas yesterday, triggering flash floods in Sri Lanka that sent evacuees fleeing and increasing the threat of deadly disease as survivors shivered in relief centers. The death toll was likely to hit 150,000.
Translation: La ayuda de EE.UU. llega a Indonesia BANDA ACEH, Indonesia -- Después de la devastación causada por los mares, un diluvio desde los cielos agravó ayer la miseria de las áreas azotadas por el tsunami, provocando inundaciones repentinas en Sri Lanka que hicieron huir a los evacuados y aumentando la amenaza de enfermedades mortales mientras los supervivientes temblaban en los centros de ayuda. Es probable que el número de muertos alcance los 150.000.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The misery for regions affected by the tsunami in Indonesia, BANDA ACEH, was heightened yesterday due to a influx of rains, leading to flash floods in Sri Lanka and provoking evacuations. The threat of deadly diseases was also on the rise as survivors grappled with the cold in relief centers. Amidst all these, U.S. aid began to arrive in the country. The death count was projected to reach 150,000.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BANDA ACEH, Indonesia received aids from the US following the severe destruction caused by a tsunami. However, the hardship of the survivors escalated following the flash floods triggered by rains in Sri Lanka which resulted in more evacuations. The chilling weather at relief centers further raised health concerns. An estimated death toll of around 150,000 was expected.

Original Text: WHY DO ARSENAL PLAYERS PICK ON LAUREN? PATRICK VIEIRA insists his bust-up with Lauren will not damage Arsenal #39;s Premiership title challenge and maintains there is no dressing-room split at Highbury.
Translation: ¿POR QUÉ LOS JUGADORES DEL ARSENAL SE METEN CON LAUREN? PATRICK VIEIRA insiste en que su enfrentamiento con Lauren no afectará al desafío por el título de la Premier League del Arsenal y mantiene que no hay división en el vestuario de Highbury.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Patrick Vieira assures that his recent conflict with Lauren won't affect Arsenal's run for the Premiership title, and strongly believes that there isn't any division amongst players within Highbury. He questions why Arsenal players target Lauren.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Patrick Vieira refutes claims of a divide in the Highbury dressing room and insists that his altercation with Lauren doesn't jeopardize Arsenal's Premiership title pursuit. He's puzzled as to why Lauren is singled out by Arsenal players.

Original Text: AstraZeneca #39;s Nexium Gets US Approval for New Use (Update1) AstraZeneca Plc, the UK #39;s second largest drugmaker, said US regulators approved its ulcer treatment Nexium for use in reducing the risk of stomach ulcers in patients taking certain painkillers
Translation: AstraZeneca #39; Nexium obtiene aprobación de EE.UU. para Nuevo Uso (Actualización1) AstraZeneca Plc, el segundo mayor fabricante de medicamentos del Reino Unido, dijo que los reguladores estadounidenses aprobaron su tratamiento para úlceras Nexium para su uso en la reducción del riesgo de úlceras estomacales en pacientes que toman ciertos analgésicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AstraZeneca's Ulcer Medication Nexium Secures US Approval for Additional Use (Update1) - AstraZeneca Plc of UK, ranking second in pharmaceuticals, announced that US regulatory bodies have greenlit Nexium, its ulcer cure, to be used for lessening stomach ulcer risks in individuals on specific analgesics.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Nexium of AstraZeneca Bags US Endorsement for a Novel Application (Update1) - The United States' regulatory authorities have sanctioned a new therapeutic use for Nexium, an ulcer remedy by AstraZeneca Plc, the second biggest pharmaceutical company in the UK. This will aid in diminishing stomach ulcer probabilities in patients administering certain pain medications.

Original Text: West Indies thrashed by England JUST yesterday, it looked as though West Indies had a chance to finally win their first match in 2004 against England. How quickly that faded away! Simply put, West Indies lost the plot. England, behind on first innings, did just enough to ...
Translation: Las Indias Occidentales arrasadas por Inglaterra JUSTO ayer, parecía como si las Indias Occidentales tuvieran la oportunidad de ganar finalmente su primer partido en 2004 contra Inglaterra. ¡Qué rápido se desvaneció eso! En pocas palabras, las Indias Occidentales perdieron la trama. Inglaterra, a pesar de estar por debajo en las primeras entradas, hizo lo justo para...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Just yesterday, it seemed like West Indies were on the brink of securing their first victory against England in 2004. However, that possibility swiftly vanished as they were decisively defeated by England. Despite their initial lag, England managed to...
Paraphrase 2: 2. It appeared yesterday that the West Indies were on their way to a long-awaited win against England in 2004. Yet, that hope quickly evaporated when they were soundly beaten by England. Facing an initial deficit, England put in just the right effort to...

Original Text: Parmalat Sues Ex-Auditors in Chicago  MILAN (Reuters) - Parmalat sued its former auditors  Deloitte   Touche and Grant Thornton on Wednesday, broadening a  legal battle to claw back billions of euros from ex-allies the  food group says helped drive it into insolvency.
Translation: Parmalat Demanda a Ex-Auditores en Chicago MILAN (Reuters) - Parmalat demandó a sus ex auditores Deloitte Touche y Grant Thornton el miércoles, ampliando una batalla legal para recuperar miles de millones de euros de ex-aliados que el grupo alimentario alega que ayudaron a llevarlo a la insolvencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MILAN (Reuters) - Parmalat initiated a lawsuit against its previous auditors Deloitte Touche and Grant Thornton on a Wednesday, intensifying their pursuit of legal recourse to retrieve billions of euros from former collaborators whom the food corporation accuses of pushing it into bankruptcy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a legal fight to recover billions of euros from its former partners, whom they blame for their insolvency, Parmalat levied a lawsuit against its erstwhile auditors, Deloitte Touche and Grant Thornton in Milan, on Wednesday, as reported by Reuters.

Original Text: Digital sales honour for OutKast OutKast become the first act to be awarded a multi-platinum award for paid-for music downloads.
Translation: Reconocimiento a las ventas digitales para OutKast. OutKast se convierte en el primer acto en recibir un premio multi-platino por música descargada de pago.
Paraphrase 1: 1. OutKast has become the first ever band to earn a multi-platinum award for paid music downloads, a significant achievement in digital sales.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In acknowledgement of their digital sales, OutKast gets honoured with a multi-platinum award, becoming the first performer to achieve this for paid music downloads.

Original Text: JPMorgan Fleming Eyes Stake in Highbridge  NEW YORK (Reuters) - JPMorgan Fleming Asset   Wealth  Management on Monday said it plans to buy a majority interest  in and enter into a partnership with Highbridge Capital  Management, a hedge funds manager, to bolster its presence  among hedge funds and attract a broader audience of investors  to hedge funds.
Translation: JPMorgan Fleming busca una participación en Highbridge NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - JPMorgan Fleming Asset Wealth Management dijo el lunes que planea comprar una participación mayoritaria y entrar en sociedad con Highbridge Capital Management, un gestor de hedge funds, para reforzar su presencia entre los hedge funds y atraer a un público de inversores más amplio hacia los hedge funds.
Paraphrase 1: 1. JPMorgan Fleming Asset Wealth Management expressed its intention on Monday to acquire majority shares in and collaborate with Highbridge Capital Management. This move is aimed at strengthening its foothold in the hedge fund space and drawing a more diverse group of investors to these funds.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To reinforce its influence in hedge funds and widen the reach to more investors, JPMorgan Fleming Asset Wealth Management stated on Monday that they are set to purchase a notable share and form a partnership with Highbridge Capital Management, a manager of hedge funds.

Original Text: VNU to sell World Directories Group SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) VNU (NL:38987) , the Dutch media group that owns TV ratings group Nielsen, said early Monday it has signed a definitive agreeement to sell its World Directories Group to World Directories Acquisition Corp.
Translation: VNU venderá World Directories Group SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) VNU (NL:38987), el grupo de medios holandés que posee el grupo de calificación de televisión Nielsen, dijo el lunes temprano que ha firmado un acuerdo definitivo para vender su grupo de World Directories a World Directories Acquisition Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Dutch media group VNU, also the proprietor of Nielsen TV ratings group, announced on Monday that they have finalized an agreement to sell their World Directories Group to World Directories Acquisition Corp. (CBS.MW, SAN FRANCISCO)
Paraphrase 2: 2. SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) - Early Monday, VNU (NL:38987), a Dutch media conglomerate which includes the Nielsen TV ratings group in its portfolio, confirmed that it has signed a firm agreement to transfer ownership of its World Directories Group to World Directories Acquisition Corp.

Original Text: G7 Countries: Oil Prices Threat to Economy WASHINGTON - Declaring that high oil prices are a threat to the global economy, the world's industrialized countries urged producers Friday to provide price relief by boosting supplies.    The Group of Seven countries - the United States, Japan, Germany, France, Britain, Italy and Canada - also resolved to agree on providing battered Iraq with relief from its massive debt burden while also working on a deal to increase debt relief for the world's poorest countries...
Translation:
Países del G7: Las amenazas del precio del petróleo a la economía WASHINGTON - Declarando que los altos precios del petróleo son una amenaza para la economía mundial, los países industrializados del mundo instaron a los productores el viernes a proporcionar alivio de precios mediante el aumento de las reservas.

El Grupo de los Siete países - Estados Unidos, Japón, Alemania, Francia, Gran Bretaña, Italia y Canadá - también se comprometieron a acordar proporcionar al devastado Irak alivio de su enorme carga de deuda, mientras también trabajaban en un acuerdo para aumentar el alivio de la deuda para los países más pobres del mundo...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Group of Seven industrialized countries - United States, Japan, Germany, France, Britain, Italy, and Canada, expressed concern on Friday over high oil prices, warning that they pose a threat to the global economy. They then called on oil producers to increase their supply to help alleviate prices. In addition, they agreed to work towards providing debt relief for Iraq, which is struggling with a huge debt burden, and also to expand debt relief for the world's poorest nations...
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the leading industrial nations, the Group of Seven - comprising of the United States, Japan, Germany, France, Britain, Italy, and Canada, expressed their apprehensions about the high oil prices and their potential to harm the global economy. They publicly encouraged oil producers to raise their output, aiming to provide some price relief. Additionally, they pledged to assist Iraq, which is confronting a massive debt load, with debt relief and are in discussions to enlarge debt relief efforts for the world's most impoverished countries...

Original Text: Pennsylvania Turnpike workers go on strike Toll collectors and other Pennsylvania Turnpike workers went on strike Wednesday, union officials said. The strike began in the pre-dawn hours of the day before Thanksgiving, one of the busiest travel days of the year.
Translation: Los trabajadores de Pennsylvania Turnpike se van a huelga. Los recaudadores de peaje y otros trabajadores de Pennsylvania Turnpike se declararon en huelga el miércoles, dijeron los funcionarios sindicales. La huelga comenzó en las horas previas al amanecer del día antes de Acción de Gracias, uno de los días de mayor tráfico del año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, union officials announced that toll collectors and other staff from the Pennsylvania Turnpike initiated a strike. The work stoppage started in the early hours of the day prior to Thanksgiving - one of the year's most hectic travel days.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Union officials reported a strike by toll collectors and other workers from the Pennsylvania Turnpike on Wednesday. Beginning in the wee hours of the day preceding Thanksgiving, which is one of the busiest travel days annually, the strike was put into action.

Original Text: US industrial production rises 0.4 percent in July (AFP) AFP - American industry lifted output moderately in July, the Federal Reserve said, a sign the economy may be finding its feet after a mid-summer slip.
Translation: Producción industrial de EE.UU. aumenta un 0,4 por ciento en julio (AFP) AFP - La industria estadounidense incrementó moderadamente su producción en julio, dijo la Reserva Federal, un indicio de que la economía puede estar encontrando su equilibrio luego de una caída a mediados de verano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Federal Reserve reported a moderate increase in American industry output in July, a potential indication of economic resurgence after a mid-summer dip (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. In July, a 0.4 percent increase was observed in American industrial production, signaling an economic recovery from a mid-summer fall, according to the Federal Reserve (AFP).

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Citigroup hits back at Parmalat with court move Citigroup (CN: Quote, Profile, Research) on Friday launched a legal challenge against Parmalat #39;s restructuring plan, hitting back after the bankrupt food group
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2 - Citigroup contraataca a Parmalat con un movimiento en la corte. Citigroup (CN: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) el viernes lanzó un desafío legal contra el plan de reestructuración de Parmalat, contraatacando después de que el grupo de alimentos en quiebra
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Citigroup (CN: Quote, Profile, Research) responded to Parmalat's restructuring plan with a legal challenge, counteracting after the insolvency of the food group.

Original Text: US pension agency posts \$23.3B deficit The government agency that insures the private pensions of 44.4 million workers said Monday that its deficit more than doubled in 2004 to a record \$23.
Translation: La agencia de pensiones de EE.UU. registra un déficit de $23.3B. La agencia gubernamental que asegura las pensiones privadas de 44.4 millones de trabajadores dijo el lunes que su déficit se más que duplicó en 2004 para llegar a un récord de $23.3B.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Monday saw the government agency which safeguards the private pensions of 44.4 million workers announce that the deficit had escalated to a record $23.3 billion in 2004, surging more than two times.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The deficit of the government body that provides insurance for the private pensions of 44.4 million workers significantly inflated to an unprecedented $23.3 billion in 2004, marking more than a two-fold increase, as stated on Monday.

Original Text: Ten Percent of Bird Species to Disappear - US Study Ten percent of all bird species are set to disappear by the end of this century -- and with them the services they provide such as cleaning up carcasses and spreading seeds, US researchers said on Monday.
Translation:
Desaparecerá el Diez por Ciento de las Especies de Aves - Estudio de EE.UU. 

El diez por ciento de todas las especies de aves está previsto que desaparezcan para finales de este siglo, y con ellas los servicios que proporcionan, como limpiar cadáveres y esparcir semillas, dijeron los investigadores estadounidenses el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US researchers reported on Monday that by the conclusion of this century, approximately 10% of bird species are set to become extinct, wiping out the services they offer like carcass decay management and seed distribution.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Monday's report from US researchers highlighted the looming extinction of 10% of bird species by century's end, which will also result in the loss of their crucial roles in nature, including the disposal of dead bodies and the dispersion of seeds.

Original Text: Mass. Gets Electronic Gun Fingerprinting With a quick electronic scan of a fingerprint, gun shop owners in Massachusetts will know immediately if a customer is eligible to buy a weapon, using a system that officials say is the first of its kind in the nation.
Translation: Massachusetts implementa la huella digital electrónica para armas. Con un rápido escaneo electrónico de una huella digital, los dueños de tiendas de armas en Massachusetts sabrán inmediatamente si un cliente es elegible para comprar un arma, utilizando un sistema que los funcionarios dicen que es el primero de su tipo en la nación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Massachusetts, a novel system will allow gun store owners to instantly determine a customer's eligibility for weapon purchase with a simple electronic fingerprint scan. Officials claim it's the nation's first such system.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the roll out of an innovative system in Massachusetts, gun retailers can now instantaneously verify a customer's ability to purchase firearms via a fast electronic scan of their fingerprint. This is said to be the first system of this nature in the US, according to officials.

Original Text: Car Attack on President Inflames Serb Suspicions  BELGRADE (Reuters) - Serbian President Boris Tadic called  for a rapid investigation on Wednesday after a man in a car  tried several times to ram his limousine as it sped through the  streets of Belgrade in a night-time convoy.
Translation: Ataque con Auto al Presidente Inflama Sospechas Serbias BELGRADO (Reuters) - El presidente serbio Boris Tadic pidió una investigación rápida el miércoles después de que un hombre en un auto intentó varias veces embestir su limusina mientras se desplazaba a través de las calles de Belgrado en un convoy nocturno.
Paraphrase 1: 1) BELGRADE (Reuters) - After a man in a car made multiple attempts to ram into his speeding limousine during a night-time convoy through the streets of Belgrade, Serbian President Boris Tadic demanded a swift investigation on Wednesday. This incident prompted further Serb suspicions amidst an already tense climate following a vehicular assault on the President.
Paraphrase 2: 2) BELGRADE (Reuters) – Serbian President Boris Tadic urged for a speedy inquiry on Wednesday, following an intense incident where his limousine was targeted by a car attempting to hit it multiple times as they raced through the nighttime streets of Belgrade. This vehicular attack on the President only enhanced the underlying suspicions among the Serbian citizens.

Original Text: Powell Expresses Concern Over Possible N.Korean Test  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Secretary of State Colin Powell on  Thursday expressed concern after reports that North Korea might  carry out a new missile test but said it would not change the  U.S. effort to persuade Pyongyang through diplomacy to abandon  its nuclear ambitions.
Translation: Powell Expresa Preocupación por Posible Prueba de N. Corea NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El Secretario de Estado, Colin Powell, expresó su preocupación el jueves tras informes de que Corea del Norte podría realizar una nueva prueba de misiles, pero dijo que no cambiaría los esfuerzos de los EE.UU. para persuadir a Pyongyang a través de la diplomacia de abandonar sus ambiciones nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Reports of a potential new missile test by North Korea have elicited expressions of concern from Secretary of State Colin Powell this Thursday. He stressed, however, that such an event would not impact the U.S. diplomatic efforts aimed at dissuading Pyongyang from its nuclear aspirations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Secretary of State Colin Powell, on Thursday, aired his apprehensions over North Korea possibly conducting a new missile test, according to NEW YORK (Reuters). Despite this, he affirmed it wouldn't shift the U.S. strategy of using diplomacy to convince Pyongyang to relinquish its nuclear goals.

Original Text: Insurgents Warn Iraqis to Stay Home (AP) AP - A posting on an Islamist Web site warned Iraqis to stay at home Wednesday in Baghdad and other cities or they would be "putting their lives in danger."
Translation: Insurgentes advierten a los iraquíes que se queden en casa (AP) AP - Una publicación en un sitio web islamista advirtió a los iraquíes que se queden en casa el miércoles en Bagdad y otras ciudades o estarían "poniendo sus vidas en peligro".
Paraphrase 1: 1. A notice on an Islamist website cautions Iraqis in Baghdad and other cities to remain indoor on Wednesday, declaring that they would "risk their lives" if they didn't do so. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a message posted on an Islamist Web site, Iraqis are dissuaded from leaving their homes in Baghdad and various cities on Wednesday as it could "endanger their lives." (AP)

Original Text: IBM shrugs off industry blues in Q3 IBM dispelled some of the gloom surrounding the tech industry #39;s third quarter performance yesterday, when it reported strong results for the period and raised expectations for the full year performance on the back of the just finished period.
Translation: IBM ignora las penurias de la industria en el tercer trimestre. IBM disipó algo de la sombra que rodea el rendimiento del tercer trimestre de la industria tecnológica ayer, cuando reportó sólidos resultados para el período y aumentó las expectativas para el rendimiento del año completo respaldado por el período recién concluido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM reported robust results for the third quarter and elevated full year performance predictions, alleviating some of the pessimism overshadowing the technology industry's quarterly performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Performing distinctly well in the third quarter, IBM managed to defy the tech industry's downturn and presented an optimistic outlook for the overall annual performance based on the results of the recently concluded quarter.

Original Text: Blast rocks Islamabad Marriott A powerful explosion rocked the Marriott Hotel in Islamabad, Pakistan, Thursday, the BBC reported. The number of casualties was not yet known, but a BBC correspondent
Translation: Una poderosa explosión sacude el Marriott de Islamabad. Una potente explosión sacudió el Hotel Marriott en Islamabad, Pakistán, el jueves, informó la BBC. Aún no se conocía el número de víctimas, pero un corresponsal de la BBC
Paraphrase 1: 1. The BBC reported a severe explosion at the Marriott Hotel in Islamabad, Pakistan, on Thursday. The number of casualties remains uncertain, according to a BBC correspondent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the BBC, there was a major explosion at Islamabad's Marriott Hotel this Thursday. The BBC correspondent stated that the casualty count was still unknown.

Original Text: Hopes rest on issue of leadership PALESTINIAN leaders stepping into the power vacuum left by the death of Yasser Arafat face one of the most daunting challenges in their people #39;s troubled history.
Translation: Las esperanzas se depositan en el problema del liderazgo. Los líderes PALESTINOS que intervienen en el vacío de poder dejado por la muerte de Yasser Arafat se enfrentan a uno de los desafíos más desalentadores en la turbulenta historia de su pueblo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Palestinian leaders, who are filling the power gap created by Yasser Arafat's death, confront one of the most formidable difficulties in their nation's tumultuous past, with hopes hinging on the matter of leadership.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The responsibility of leadership weighs heavy on Palestinian leaders as they step into the void left by Yasser Arafat's demise, facing one of the most complex tasks their people have confronted throughout their problematic history.

Original Text: Firefox takes torch from Microsoft browser Web surfing has belonged almost exclusively to Microsoft Corp. #39;s Internet Explorer ever since it buried Netscape #39;s pioneering browser.
Translation: Firefox toma la antorcha del navegador de Microsoft. La navegación web ha pertenecido casi exclusivamente a Internet Explorer de Microsoft Corp. desde que enterró el navegador pionero de Netscape.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Web browsing has been predominantly carried out through Microsoft Corporation's Internet Explorer since it outperformed Netscape's original browser, but now Firefox is taking over.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Firefox is now becoming the dominant browser, replacing Microsoft Corp's Internet Explorer, which had been the primary choice for web surfing ever since it overtook Netscape's innovative browser.

Original Text: Focus brings US vaulters gold and silver  quot;When I vault, I don #39;t think about winning and I don #39;t think about losing, quot; Mack said.  quot;I just think about two things: the bar and using my arms.
Translation: La concentración brinda a los saltadores de EE. UU. oro y plata. "Cuando salto, no pienso en ganar y no pienso en perder", dijo Mack. "Solo pienso en dos cosas: la barra y el uso de mis brazos."
