Paraphrase 1: 1. "The concentration has rewarded American vaulters with gold and silver. Mack enlightens, "During my vaulting, my mind isn't engaged with victory or defeat. The only things I concentrate on are the bar and engaging my arms."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "American vaulters earn gold and silver through sheer focus. "I am not consumed with thoughts of triumph or loss whenever I vault," conveyed Mack. "My only attention is fixed upon the bar and the usage of my arms."

Original Text: Wizards, United Prepare for Showdown (AP) AP - The Kansas City Wizards and D.C. United plan to play the same scrappy style in the MLS championship game that they used to get that far.
Translation: Magos, United se preparan para el enfrentamiento (AP) AP - Los Kansas City Wizards y D.C. United planean jugar con el mismo estilo aguerrido en la final de la MLS que utilizaron para llegar tan lejos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - The MLS championship game will witness the Kansas City Wizards and D.C. United encounter each other, both aiming to use the same vigorous playstyle that led them to the finals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Kansas City Wizards and D.C. United, preparing for a head-on collision in the MLS championship, anticipate maintaining the rugged style of play which got them to this decisive match. (AP)

Original Text: Arizona Gets RB Hambrick and DE Zellner from Raiders (Reuters) Reuters - The Arizona Cardinals\Tuesday acquired running back Troy Hambrick and defensive end\Peppi Zellner from the Oakland Raiders for an undisclosed 2005\draft pick.
Translation: Arizona Obtiene al RB Hambrick y al DE Zellner de los Raiders (Reuters) Reuters - Los Arizona Cardinals adquirieron el martes al corredor Troy Hambrick y al ala defensiva Peppi Zellner de los Oakland Raiders a cambio de una selección no revelada del draft 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) The Arizona Cardinals have secured running back Troy Hambrick and defensive end Peppi Zellner, trading with the Oakland Raiders for an unspecified 2005 draft pick on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Oakland Raiders have traded running back Troy Hambrick and defensive end Peppi Zellner to the Arizona Cardinals in exchange for an unidentified 2005 draft pick, according to a Tuesday statement by Reuters.

Original Text: Stocks Move Lower on Employment Report NEW YORK - Stocks were modestly lower in Friday as investors sorted through an uninspiring employment report and Intel Corp.'s weak profit outlook hit technology shares hard.    Investors were satisfied with - but not impressed by - the Labor Department's latest reading on unemployment, which fell to 5.4 percent from 5.5 percent in July, and the 144,000 jobs created in August was close to the 150,000 Wall Street had expected...
Translation:
Las Acciones Bajan Por El Informe De Empleo
NUEVA YORK - Las acciones bajaron moderadamente este viernes, ya que los inversores analizaron un informe de empleo poco inspirador y las débiles perspectivas de beneficios de Intel Corp. afectaron fuertemente a las acciones de tecnología.

Los inversores quedaron satisfechos, pero no impresionados, con la última lectura del Departamento de Trabajo sobre el desempleo, que cayó al 5.4 por ciento desde el 5.5 por ciento en julio, y los 144,000 empleos creados en agosto se acercaron a los 150,000 que Wall Street había esperado...
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK - Friday saw a small dip in stocks as investors evaluated a rather lackluster employment report. This, coupled with Intel Corp.’s gloomy profitability forecast, greatly impacted technology shares. The slight decrease in unemployment from 5.5 percent in July to 5.4 percent in August, as reported by the Labor Department, and the creation of 144,000 jobs in August, a figure close to Wall Street's anticipation of 150,000, was well-received but did not overly excite investors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK - In the wake of a less than thrilling employment report and a bleak earning prediction from Intel Corp., stocks on Friday took a minor hit, especially within the technology sector. The recently released unemployment figures from the Labor Department, showing a 0.1 percent decrease from 5.5 percent in July to 5.4 percent in August, and a close match to the predicted 150,000 Wall Street jobs in August with an actual 144,000, was met with satisfactory, if not enthusiastic, responses from investors.

Original Text: Dollar Builds on Gains Versus Yen  TOKYO (Reuters) - The dollar edged up against the yen on  Friday, building on a rebound from a five-year low ahead of  closely watched U.S. jobs data.
Translation: El Dólar Aumenta sus Ganancias Frente al Yen. TOKIO (Reuters) - El dólar subió frente al yen el viernes, construyendo sobre un repunte de un mínimo de cinco años antes de los muy esperados datos de empleo de EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - On Friday, the dollar experienced a slight increase against the yen, enhancing a recovery from a five-year low in anticipation of the forthcoming U.S. employment statistics.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TOKYO (Reuters) - The dollar saw a marginal uplift against the yen on Friday, furthering its bounce back from its five-year bottom, as it anticipates the much-observed U.S. jobs report.

Original Text: Football: Spain 1-0 England Asier del Horno's early goal gives Spain victory in an ill-tempered friendly.
Translation: Fútbol: España 1-0 Inglaterra El temprano gol de Asier del Horno otorga a España la victoria en un amistoso malhumorado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An early goal from Asier del Horno led Spain to triumph over England 1-0 in a heated friendly football match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a tense friendly football game, Spain clinched a victory against England 1-0, thanks to an early goal by Asier del Horno.

Original Text: Oracle moves to monthly patching schedule After coming under criticism for sitting on patches for multiple holes in its database software, Oracle has announced that it will move to a monthly patch release schedule, though it hasn't said when.
Translation: Oracle cambia a un calendario de parches mensual Después de ser criticado por retener parches para múltiples vulnerabilidades en su software de base de datos, Oracle ha anunciado que se cambiará a un calendario de lanzamiento de parches mensual, aunque no ha dicho cuándo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following criticism for delaying patches for several vulnerabilities in its database software, Oracle has declared its decision to adopt a monthly patch release schedule. However, it has not specified when this will begin.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Oracle, receiving backlash for not promptly addressing multiple flaws in its database software, has decided to implement a monthly patch release schedule - though the commencement date hasn't been disclosed yet.

Original Text: Chinas new face Just back from three weeks in China, Ill spare you the boring slides except for two observations. First, China presents amazing contrasts. You can bounce over mountain roads and still enjoy four bars of reception on your cell phone. (In general, Chinas cell coverage makes that of the United States seem Third World.) Second, China has a great future in IT.
Translation: El nuevo rostro de China. Acabo de regresar de tres semanas en China, te ahorraré las diapositivas aburridas excepto por dos observaciones. Primero, China presenta contrastes asombrosos. Puedes ir brincando por carreteras montañosas y aún así disfrutar de cuatro barras de recepción en tu teléfono celular. (En general, la cobertura celular de China hace que la de Estados Unidos parezca del tercer mundo.) Segundo, China tiene un gran futuro en la tecnología de la información (IT).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Just returned from a three-week tour in China. I'll save you from the uninteresting slideshow, however, there are two noteworthy aspects I want to share. Initially, the remarkable contrasts in China are staggering. Even while traveling on rugged mountain pathways, you're likely to get full reception on your mobile. In comparison, China’s cellular network puts the United States’ to shame. Moreover, the future of Information Technology in China appears incredibly promising.
Paraphrase 2: 2. I've just come back from spending three weeks in China, and while I won't bore you with tedious slides, I would like to highlight two observations. Foremost, the astonishing contrasts in China are very intriguing. Remarkably, you can still get full signal on your mobile phone even if you're journeying on mountainous roads. Comparatively, China's mobile phone coverage is far superior to that of the United States. As my last point, I foresee an exceptional future for China in the field of Information Technology.

Original Text: Photo: Dell's Inspiron 9200 The notebook comes with a 17-inch screen, the company's first at that size.
Translation: Foto: Inspiron 9200 de Dell. El portátil viene con una pantalla de 17 pulgadas, la primera de esa talla para la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Picture: The Inspiron 9200, a Dell notebook, is the company's first one to feature a 17-inch screen.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Image: With a 17-inch screen, the Inspiron 9200 notebook is Dell's inaugural model of that size.

Original Text: Microsoft offers more time to test XP Service Pack 2 Faced with concerns from IT professionals, Microsoft Corp. gave users more time to prepare for Windows XP Service Pack 2 by doubling the time a special registry key will prevent PCs from automatically downloading and installing the mammoth update.
Translation: Microsoft ofrece más tiempo para probar XP Service Pack 2. Ante las preocupaciones de los profesionales de TI, Microsoft Corp. dio a los usuarios más tiempo para prepararse para Windows XP Service Pack 2, duplicando el tiempo que una clave de registro especial evitará que las PC descarguen e instalen automáticamente la enorme actualización.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a response to concerns raised by IT professionals, Microsoft Corporation has decided to provide users with more time to ready themselves for Windows XP Service Pack 2. This has been achieved by extending the duration during which a particular registry key will stop PCs from automatically downloading and installing the substantial update.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft Corp, acknowledging the worries of IT professionals, has extended the time for users to gear up for the Windows XP Service Pack 2. This has been done through increasing the life span of a unique registry key that stops automatic download and installation of the huge update on PCs.

Original Text: PeopleSoft fires CEO, clearing way for bid by Oracle PeopleSoft Inc., the business software-maker, unexpectedly fired Craig Conway, its chief executive, dumping the feisty leader who engineered the company #39;s dogged resistance to Oracle Corp.
Translation: PeopleSoft despide al CEO, allanando el camino para la oferta de Oracle. PeopleSoft Inc., el fabricante de software para empresas, despidió inesperadamente a Craig Conway, su director ejecutivo, descartando al líder combativo que orquestó la tenaz resistencia de la compañía a Oracle Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an unexpected move, business software-maker PeopleSoft Inc. terminated its chief executive, Craig Conway, the dynamic leader who was instrumental in the company's vigorous opposition to Oracle Corp., thus paving the way for Oracle's bid.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The way has been cleared for Oracle Corp's bid following the surprising dismissal of Craig Conway, the chief executive of business software-maker PeopleSoft Inc., who is known for his determined resistance to Oracle.

Original Text: Syneron stock falls after approval delayed NEW YORK -- Syneron Medical Ltd. stock fell Tuesday after the US Food and Drug Administration delayed approval of the medical device maker #39;s cellulite product.
Translation: Las acciones de Syneron caen después de que se retrasa la aprobación NUEVA YORK -- Las acciones de Syneron Medical Ltd. cayeron el martes después de que la Administración de Alimentos y Medicamentos de los Estados Unidos retrasó la aprobación del producto para la celulitis del fabricante de dispositivos médicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the postponement of approval by the US Food and Drug Administration, Syneron Medical Ltd.'s cellulite product diminished the stock value of the medical device company on Tuesday.

Original Text: Chelsea Ties Arsenal, 2-2 Chelsea #39;s Eidur Gudjohnsen celebrates after scoring during the Premiership game between Arsenal and Chelsea FC, London, Sunday Dec. 12, 2004.
Translation: Chelsea empata con Arsenal, 2-2. Eidur Gudjohnsen de Chelsea #39 celebra después de anotar durante el juego de la Premiership entre Arsenal y Chelsea FC, Londres, el domingo 12 de diciembre de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the 2004 Premiership game held on Sunday, Dec. 12 in London, Chelsea and Arsenal ended the match in a 2-2 tie, with Chelsea's Eidur Gudjohnsen rejoicing post his goal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Eidur Gudjohnsen of Chelsea celebrated scoring at the Premiership game between Arsenal and Chelsea FC in London, held on Sunday, Dec. 12, 2004, which concluded in a 2-2 draw.

Original Text: Gas Prices Highest Ever for Thanksgiving  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. drivers traveling this week  will pay the highest gasoline prices on record heading into a  Thanksgiving holiday, the Energy Department said on Monday.
Translation: Precios del Gas Más Altos de la Historia para Acción de Gracias WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Los conductores estadounidenses que viajen esta semana pagarán los precios de gasolina más altos registrados entrando a las vacaciones de Acción de Gracias, dijo el Departamento de Energía el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - As per the Energy Department's statement on Monday, U.S. motorists journeying in this Thanksgiving week will be faced with unprecedented gasoline prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Energy Department stated on Monday that U.S. drivers embarking on their travels for this week's Thanksgiving holiday will encounter the steepest gasoline prices ever recorded.

Original Text: These robots are positively bestial NAHANT, Mass. - Joseph Ayers was crouched over a laptop computer in a cool cinder-block shed barely big enough to house a riding lawn mower, watching a black lobster through a rectangular acrylic window.
Translation: Estos robots son positivamente bestiales NAHANT, Mass. - Joseph Ayers estaba agachado sobre un ordenador portátil en un fresco cobertizo de bloques de ceniza apenas lo suficientemente grande como para albergar una cortacésped de montar, observando una langosta negra a través de una ventana rectangular de acrílico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Joseph Ayers was observed hunched over a laptop within a chilly, sparse cinder-block outbuilding, hardly spacious enough to store a riding lawn mower, in Nahant, Mass. His focus was locked onto a black lobster observed through a clear, rectangular acrylic window - an indication of the robots exhibiting strikingly beast-like behavior.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a minuscule, cool cinder-block shed in Nahant, Mass., capacious enough only for housing a riding lawn mower, Joseph Ayers was keenly monitoring a black lobster. He was utilizing a laptop computer, peering through a rectangular acrylic window as the robots demonstrated remarkably animalistic behavior.

Original Text: IBM loosens its blade IBM IS to share the designs of its blade servers in a bid to boost their popularity among developers. It follows moves to open up the companys microprocessor business and give partners more access to its
Translation: IBM relaja su restricción sobre IBM IS para compartir los diseños de sus servidores blade en un intento de aumentar su popularidad entre los desarrolladores. Esto sigue a las iniciativas para abrir el negocio de microprocesadores de la compañía y dar a los socios más acceso a este.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a strategy to amplify their appeal to developers, IBM is liberalizing its blade IBM IS, allowing for the sharing of its blade server designs. This decision is part of the company's wider action to broaden the reach of its microprocessor business and provide its partners with more access.
Paraphrase 2: 2. IBM is choosing to open up the designs of its blade servers, part of its blade IBM IS, in an effort to attract more developers. This step aligns with earlier actions to increase accessibility stakeholder exposure to its microprocessor enterprise.

Original Text: Consumer goods giants sweep Indian hinterland (Reuters) Reuters - She's not quite the Avon Lady, but Sujathamma Jella represents the new face of direct selling in India, trudging down muddy roads every day with a bag filled with soap, shampoo and skin-lightening cream.
Translation: Gigantes de bienes de consumo arrasan el interior de India (Reuters) Reuters - Ella no es exactamente la Señora Avon, pero Sujathamma Jella representa la nueva cara de la venta directa en India, caminando todos los días por caminos embarrados con una bolsa llena de jabón, champú y crema para aclarar la piel.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) - Not entirely an Avon Lady embodiment, Sujathamma Jella is nonetheless the emerging representation of direct sales in India. She walks down dirt-soaked roads daily, her bag brimming with soap, shampoo, and skin-lightening cream, presenting a testament to the invasion of consumer goods behemoths into India's hinterland.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (Reuters) - Sujathamma Jella, trekking along muddied roads daily with a bag loaded with soap, shampoo, and skin-lightening cream, is not precisely an Indian Avon Lady. Yet, she indicates the shift of direct selling in India towards the new horizon, highlighting the incursion of massive consumer goods companies into the remote areas of the country.

Original Text: Gay Advocates Examine Role in Election (AP) AP - Gay and lesbian advocates have been doing some soul-searching since President Bush's election victory, wondering if same-sex wedding marches through San Francisco and Massachusetts tipped the scales to Republicans promising to restore traditional values.
Translation: Defensores de los Gays Examinan su Rol en las Elecciones (AP) AP - Los defensores de los gays y lesbianas han estado haciendo una introspección desde la victoria electoral del Presidente Bush, preguntándose si las marchas por el matrimonio entre personas del mismo sexo en San Francisco y Massachusetts inclinaron la balanza hacia los republicanos que prometían restaurar los valores tradicionales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Following President Bush's Electoral win, advocates for the gay and lesbian community have been introspecting, contemplating whether their public support for same-sex marriage in San Francisco and Massachusetts influenced the election in favor of Republicans who pledged to return to traditional values.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - In the wake of President Bush's election triumph, LGBTQ+ advocates are exploring the potential influence their advocacy for same-sex marriage in San Francisco and Massachusetts may have had on voting outcomes, particularly considering the Republican's vow to reestablish traditional values.

Original Text: Oil prices at high on Norway fear US oil prices hit fresh record levels after Norwegian ship owners threaten to cut off supplies from the world's third biggest exporter.
Translation: Los precios del petróleo están en alza debido al temor a Noruega. Los precios del petróleo en los Estados Unidos alcanzan niveles récord después de que los propietarios de barcos noruegos amenazan con cortar los suministros del tercer exportador más grande del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In response to threats from Norwegian ship owners to cut off supplies from the world's third largest exporter, US oil prices have reached new record levels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US oil prices ascend to all-time highs due to concerns stemming from Norwegian ship owners considering halting supplies from the world's third largest exporter.

Original Text: Outpost Firewall Pro Supports Microsoft Windows XP SP2 The upcoming Outpost Firewall Pro 2.5 operates seamlessly with XP SP2 to improve security and privacy.
Translation: Outpost Firewall Pro es compatible con Microsoft Windows XP SP2. El próximo Outpost Firewall Pro 2.5 funciona sin problemas con XP SP2 para mejorar la seguridad y la privacidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft Windows XP SP2 is compatible with Outpost Firewall Pro.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The forthcoming 2.5 version of Outpost Firewall Pro enhances security and privacy effortlessly on XP SP2.

Original Text: New Microsoft software targets small companies Microsoft launched a new software product aimed at small and midsize businesses on Monday to strengthen its position in a fragmented market it sees as ripe for growth.
Translation: El nuevo software de Microsoft se dirige a pequeñas empresas. Microsoft lanzó un nuevo producto de software el lunes destinado a pequeñas y medianas empresas para fortalecer su posición en un mercado fragmentado que ve como listo para crecer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Seeking to maximize its reach in a fragmented yet burgeoning market, Microsoft unveiled a new software tailored for small and midsize businesses on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Envisioning growth in a scattered market, Microsoft introduced a fresh software product on Monday, specifically designed for small to midsize enterprises.

Original Text: Shanks a lot BATON ROUGE, La. -- Louisiana State can thank an Oregon State kicker who could not make extra points for its season-opening victory.
Translation: Muchas gracias BATON ROUGE, La. -- El estado de Louisiana puede agradecer a un pateador de Oregon State, quien no pudo hacer puntos extra, por su victoria en el inicio de temporada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BATON ROUGE, La. -- The season-opening triumph of Louisiana State can be credited to an Oregon State kicker who failed at making extra points.

Original Text: Torrential British Rain Set to Cause More Chaos  LONDON (Reuters) - After torrential rain caused flash  flooding in southern England and a landslide in Scotland this  week, meteorologists on Thursday forecast more heavy downpours  and urged people to heed bad weather warnings.
Translation: La Torrencial Lluvia Británica Amenaza con Causar Más Caos  LONDRES (Reuters) - Después de que una lluvia torrencial provocara inundaciones repentinas en el sur de Inglaterra y un deslizamiento de tierra en Escocia esta semana, los meteorólogos pronosticaron más fuertes aguaceros el jueves e instaron a las personas a prestar atención a las advertencias de mal tiempo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - Meteorologists on Thursday predicted additional heavy rainstorms that might intensify the havoc, following the recent flash floods in southern England and a landslide in Scotland due to severe rain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - The uproar caused by torrential rain resulting in flash floods in southern England and a landslide in Scotland is expected to worsen, as weather experts on Thursday projected more heavy rains and asked people to pay attention to weather alerts.

Original Text: Sony To Begin Mass Production of Full-Color OLED Displays OLED or Organic LED is not made of semiconductors. It #39;s made from carbon-based molecules. That is the key science factor that leads to potentially eliminating LEDs #39; biggest drawback - size.
Translation: Sony comenzará la producción masiva de pantallas OLED a todo color. OLED u Organic LED no está hecho de semiconductores. Está hecho de moléculas a base de carbono. Ese es el factor clave de la ciencia que podría eliminar potencialmente la mayor desventaja de los LED: el tamaño.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Sony is set to initiate large-scale manufacturing of full-color OLED displays. OLEDs, short for Organic LED, distinguishes itself in the science by being made of carbon-based molecules rather than semiconductors. Crucially, this could potentially eradicate the primary downside of LEDs -- their size.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Full-color OLED displays are about to enter mass production at Sony. These Organic LEDs are innovative as they're composed of carbon-based molecules, unlike standard semiconductors. This fundamental scientific attribute could be a breakthrough in significantly reducing the main disadvantage of LEDs, which is their size.

Original Text: Sudanese peace talks open African Union-sponsored peace talks between Sudan #39;s government and rebel leaders from its war-torn Darfur region began on Monday amid disagreement over the deployment of peacekeepers.
Translation: Las conversaciones de paz sudanesas abren las negociaciones de paz patrocinadas por la Unión Africana entre el gobierno de Sudán y los líderes rebeldes de su región devastada por la guerra, Darfur, comenzaron el lunes en medio de desacuerdos sobre el despliegue de fuerzas de paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sponsored by the African Union, peace negotiations between Sudan's government and the rebel leaders from Darfur, its war-ravaged region, launched on Monday, even with differing views regarding the placement of peacekeepers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though there are conflicting opinions about the distribution of peacekeepers, the Sudanese peace discussions, sponsored by the African Union and involving the government and Darfur's rebel leaders, started on Monday.

Original Text: Pakistan says US claim that bin Laden near capture is politicking (AFP) AFP - Pakistan rejected as  quot;politicking quot; a US official's weekend claim that Osama bin Laden was close to being captured.
Translation: Pakistán dice que la afirmación de EE. UU. de que Bin Laden está cerca de ser capturado es politiquería (AFP) AFP - Pakistán rechazó como "politiquería" la afirmación de un funcionario estadounidense de que Osama bin Laden estaba cerca de ser capturado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Pakistan dismissed a US official's weekend proclamation that Osama bin Laden was on the brink of capture as mere "politics".

Original Text: IBM recalls notebook power adapters IBM, maker of the popular Thinkpad notebook computers, released a statement announcing the recall of 553,000 notebook computer power adapters.
Translation: IBM retira adaptadores de corriente para portátiles. IBM, fabricante de las populares computadoras portátiles Thinkpad, emitió un comunicado anunciando la retirada de 553,000 adaptadores de corriente para computadoras portátiles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM, the manufacturer of the acclaimed Thinkpad notebook computers, has publicly announced the call back of 553,000 notebook power adapters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Releasing a statement, IBM, who produces the widely-used Thinkpad notebook computers, declared a recall of 553,000 notebook computer power adapters.

Original Text: China Motor, Quanta, Techtronic: Asia Ex-Japan Equity Preview The following stocks may rise or fall in Asian markets, excluding Japan, today. Prices are as of the local market #39;s close. Stock symbols are in parentheses after company names.
Translation: China Motor, Quanta, Techtronic: Vista previa de acciones de Asia excluyendo Japón. Las siguientes acciones pueden subir o bajar en los mercados asiáticos, excluyendo Japón, hoy. Los precios son al cierre del mercado local. Los símbolos de las acciones están entre paréntesis después de los nombres de las empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The stocks of China Motor, Quanta, Techtronic might either ascend or descend in today's Asian markets, except for Japan. The prices are based on the local market's closing rates, with stock symbols mentioned post the respective company names in the Asia Ex-Japan Equity Preview.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In today's Asia Ex-Japan Equity Preview, China Motor, Quanta, Techtronic could experience a rise or fall in their stock prices in the Asian markets, but this does not include Japan. The values are determined according to the closing prices in the local markets, and handy stock symbols are provided following the names of the companies.

Original Text: Israel behind attack on Hamas member - reports An Israeli television station has reported that Israel was behind the car bombing that killed a senior member of the Hamas group in Damascus this morning.
Translation: Israel detrás del ataque a miembro de Hamas - informes Una cadena de televisión israelí ha informado que Israel estuvo detrás del atentado con coche bomba que mató a un alto miembro del grupo Hamas en Damasco esta mañana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior Hamas member in Damascus was reportedly killed this morning in a car bombing, and a television station in Israel has claimed that the attack was staged by Israel itself.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This morning in Damascus, a car bombing incident claimed the life of a top-ranking Hamas member. According to reports from an Israeli TV station, Israel orchestrated the attack.

Original Text: Kidnappers in Iraq Free Seven Truckers (AP) AP - Militants released seven foreign hostages Wednesday after their employer paid  #36;500,000 ransom, while France mustered support from Muslims at home and abroad to push for the release of two French journalists still held captive in Iraq.
Translation: Secuestradores en Iraq liberan a siete camioneros (AP) AP - Militantes liberaron el miércoles a siete rehenes extranjeros después de que su empleador pagó un rescate de $500,000, mientras que Francia reunió apoyo de los musulmanes en el país y en el extranjero para presionar por la liberación de dos periodistas franceses que aún están cautivos en Iraq.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Seven truckers held hostage in Iraq have been freed by their abductors following a ransom payment of $500,000 (AP). In the meantime, France is rallying support from both local and international Muslims to aid in the liberation of two French journalists still in captivity in Iraq.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After the payment of a $500,000 ransom, militants in Iraq released seven foreign truckers they had been holding hostage (AP). Concurrently, France is leveraging support from Muslims domestically and globally to facilitate the release of two French journalists who continue to be captive in Iraq.

Original Text: AOL, E-Mail Companies Sue Spammers The nation's largest e-mail providers today filed a new round of lawsuits against Internet spammers allegedly responsible for shoveling millions of junk e-mail messages into computer users' in-boxes and their instant messaging screens. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Translation: AOL, compañías de correo electrónico demandan a spammers. Los proveedores de correo electrónico más grandes de la nación presentaron hoy una nueva serie de demandas contra los spammers de Internet supuestamente responsables de enviar millones de mensajes de correo electrónico basura a las bandejas de entrada de los usuarios de computadoras y sus pantallas de mensajería instantánea. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, the leading email services in the country have launched fresh lawsuits against Internet spammers who are purportedly accountable for flooding users' inboxes and instant messaging screens with millions of unwanted emails - as reported by washingtonpost.com.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Internet spammers, who are allegedly guilty of inundating computer users' inboxes and their instant messaging scenes with myriad of unsolicited emails, are being sued again today by the United States' top email providers, reported the washingtonpost.com.

Original Text: Hilfiger shares plunge on news of probe NEW YORK -- Clothing designer Tommy Hilfiger Corp. saw its stock unravel as much as 26 percent in Monday trading after the company last week said a federal grand jury is investigating commissions it has paid since 1990.
Translation: Las acciones de Hilfiger se desploman ante la noticia de investigación NUEVA YORK -- La empresa de diseño de ropa Tommy Hilfiger Corp. vio cómo sus acciones se desmoronaban hasta un 26 por ciento en la negociación del lunes tras anunciar la compañía la semana pasada que un gran jurado federal está investigando las comisiones que ha pagado desde 1990.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the announcement last week about a federal grand jury investigating commissions paid since 1990 by clothing designer Tommy Hilfiger Corp., their shares fell dramatically on Monday, diving as much as 26%.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tommy Hilfiger Corp., a clothing design company, experienced a sharp 26% drop in stock during Monday's trading following their previous week's disclosure of a federal grand jury probe into the commissions they've been paying since 1990.

Original Text: Russian President Turns on Washington Over Ukraine The political crisis in Ukraine has touched off a fresh debate inside the White House and foreign policy offices over how President Bush should handle Russian President Vladimir Putin #39;s increasingly
Translation: El presidente ruso se enfrenta a Washington por Ucrania. La crisis política en Ucrania ha desencadenado un nuevo debate dentro de la Casa Blanca y las oficinas de política exterior sobre cómo el presidente Bush debería manejar al cada vez más
Paraphrase 1: 1. The political crisis currently unfolding in Ukraine has ignited a new discussion within the White House and foreign policy offices regarding President Bush's approach to the escalating assertiveness of Russian President Vladimir Putin.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The ongoing political perturbation in Ukraine has sparked a renewed debate among White House and foreign policy departments about the manner in which President Bush should tackle the rising belligerence of Russian President Vladimir Putin.

Original Text: Tests Continue on Arafat Yasser Arafat spent Sunday talking to colleagues in the West Bank, reading telegrams from well-wishing world leaders and sipping tea.
Translation: Las pruebas continúan sobre Arafat Yasser Arafat pasó el domingo hablando con colegas en Cisjordania, leyendo telegramas de líderes mundiales que deseaban su bienestar y bebiendo té.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yasser Arafat passed his Sunday engaged in discussions with associates in the West Bank, perusing telegrams sent by supportive global leaders, and leisurely enjoying tea amidst ongoing tests.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As testing continues, Yasser Arafat dedicated his Sunday to conversing with his West Bank colleagues, reading telegrams from encouraging world leaders, and drinking tea.

Original Text: Sadr Militia Still Controls Iraq Shrine -- Witnesses  NAJAF, Iraq (Reuters) - Shi'ite fighters appeared to be in  control of a holy shrine in Najaf Friday hours after Iraq's  interim government said it had overcome a bloody uprising by  seizing the Imam Ali mosque without a shot being fired.
Translation: La Milicia de Sadr aún controla el Santuario en Iraq -- Testigos  NAJAF, Iraq (Reuters) - Los combatientes chiítas parecían estar en control de un santuario sagrado en Najaf el viernes, horas después de que el gobierno interino de Iraq afirmara que había superado un sangriento levantamiento al tomar la mezquita del Imam Alí sin que se disparara un solo tiro.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Despite Claims from Iraq's Interim Government, Shi'ite Fighters Retain Control Over Najaf Shrine -- Eyewitnesses Report
Paraphrase 2: NAJAF, Iraq (Reuters) - Contrary to the interim government's announcement of quelling a violent rebellion by taking Imam Ali mosque bloodlessly, Shi'ite militants seemed to hold dominion over the holy site in Najaf as of Friday.

Original Text: EUROPEAN SPACECRAFT ENTERS LUNAR ORBIT The first European spacecraft to be sent to the moon has entered lunar orbit, according to the European Space Agency. The SMART-1 spacecraft has reached its closest point from the moon so far, coming within 5,000 kilometres of the lunar surface.
Translation: LA NAVE ESPACIAL EUROPEA ENTRA EN ÓRBITA LUNAR. La primera nave espacial europea enviada a la luna ha entrado en órbita lunar, según la Agencia Espacial Europea. La nave espacial SMART-1 ha alcanzado su punto más cercano a la luna hasta ahora, acercándose a 5,000 kilómetros de la superficie lunar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the European Space Agency, the SMART-1 spacecraft, the first of its kind from Europe to be sent to the moon, has now entered lunar orbit. It has approached within 5,000 kilometres of the moon's surface, the closest it has been so far.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The European Space Agency has reported that the SMART-1 spacecraft, being the first European craft to make a lunar journey, is now in the moon's orbit. The spacecraft has managed to come as close as 5,000 kilometres to the surface of the moon.

Original Text: Easyjet reports passenger jump UK budget airline Easyjet sees passenger numbers jump by 24 in August compared with the same month last year
Translation: Easyjet reporta aumento de pasajeros. La aerolínea de bajo costo del Reino Unido, Easyjet, ve un aumento del 24% en el número de pasajeros en agosto en comparación con el mismo mes del año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In August, UK budget airline Easyjet reported a 24% rise in passenger numbers compared to the same month the previous year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Compared to the same month last year, Easyjet, the UK budget airline, experienced a 24% surge in passenger numbers in August.

Original Text: NL Wrap: Rallying Reds Make Braves Wait for East Title (Reuters) Reuters - Javier Valentin smacked a three-run\homer in a five-run ninth inning off John Smoltz to carry the\rallying Cincinnati Reds to an 11-8 victory over the Atlanta\Braves in the National League Wednesday.
Translation: Resumen NL: Los Reds Enérgicos Hacen Esperar a los Braves por el Título del Este (Reuters) Reuters - Javier Valentín golpeó un jonrón de tres carreras en la novena entrada de cinco carreras contra John Smoltz para llevar a los Cincinnati Reds en pleno auge a una victoria de 11-8 sobre los Atlanta Braves en la Liga Nacional el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Javier Valentin hit a three-run homer in the final inning, leading the Cincinnati Reds to a comeback with a 11-8 win over the Atlanta Braves in the National League on Wednesday, slowing down the Braves' quest for the East Title (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - The Cincinnati Reds, led by Javier Valentin and his three-run homer, mounted a ninth inning rally to defeat the Atlanta Braves 11-8 in a Wednesday National League match, delaying the Braves' Eastern Title achievement.

Original Text: Meteor shower peaks tonight The Geminid meteor shower is one of the annual meteor showers that pull professional and amateur astronomers alike out into the cold night air.
Translation: La lluvia de meteoritos alcanza su punto máximo esta noche. La lluvia de meteoritos Geminid es una de las lluvias de meteoritos anuales que atraen tanto a astrónomos profesionales como aficionados al frío aire nocturno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tonight, the peak of the Geminid meteor shower will draw both professional and amateur astronomers into the cold night air, a part of its annual occurrence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Geminid meteor shower, an annual event, reaches its peak tonight, attracting both professional and amateur astronomers to brave the chilly night.

Original Text: Synnex 3Q Profit Rises 50 Percent Synnex Corp., a provider of technology supply chain services, on Wednesday said its third-quarter profit jumped 50 percent, helped by higher revenue and a settlement gain from the acquisition of its British subsidiary.
Translation: El Beneficio del 3T de Synnex Aumenta un 50 Por Ciento. Synnex Corp., un proveedor de servicios de cadena de suministro tecnológico, dijo el miércoles que su beneficio del tercer trimestre se disparó un 50 por ciento, ayudado por mayores ingresos y una ganancia de liquidación por la adquisición de su filial británica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, Synnex Corp., a supplier of tech supply chain services, reported a 50 percent surge in its third-quarter profit, aided by increased revenue and a settlement gain from the purchase of its UK subsidiary.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Synnex Corp., a company offering supply chain services for technology, declared a 50 percent increase in its profit for the third quarter on Wednesday. This was primarily due to a rise in revenue and an acquisition settlement gain from its subsidiary in the UK.

Original Text: Another typhoon near Japan, 260 flights cancelled TOKYO - Another strong typhoon was approaching Japans southwestern-most prefecture of Okinawa Tuesday morning, causing the cancellation of 260 domestic flights, authorities said.
Translation: Otro tifón cerca de Japón, 260 vuelos cancelados TOKIO - Otro fuerte tifón se acercaba a la prefectura más al suroeste de Japón, Okinawa, el martes por la mañana, lo que provocó la cancelación de 260 vuelos domésticos, dijeron las autoridades.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Authorities announced on Tuesday morning that 260 domestic flights were cancelled as another powerful typhoon approached Okinawa, Japan's southwestern-most prefecture.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A strong typhoon targeting the southwestern-most prefecture of Okinawa in Japan caused the cancellation of 260 local flights on Tuesday morning, as reported by the authorities.

Original Text: S.Korea #39;s Ruling Party Head Resigns on Father #39;s Past SEOUL (Reuters) - The chairman of South Korea #39;s ruling Uri Party resigned on Thursday after saying his father had served as a military police officer during Japan #39;s 1910-1945 colonial rule on the peninsula.
Translation: Renuncia el jefe del partido gobernante de Corea del Sur debido al pasado de su padre SEÚL (Reuters) - El presidente del partido gobernante Uri de Corea del Sur renunció el jueves después de decir que su padre había servido como oficial de policía militar durante el dominio colonial de Japón en la península de 1910 a 1945.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The head of the reigning Uri Party in South Korea stepped down from his position on Thursday; this comes after he disclosed that his father was a military police officer during the period of Japanese colonial rule from 1910 to 1945.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Upon revealing that his father held the position of a military police officer during Japan's control over the peninsula from 1910-1945, the chairman of South Korea's ruling Uri Party tendered his resignation on Thursday.

Original Text: Microsoft desktop-search announcement due Microsoft #39;s MSN division is expected to announce a test version of its long-awaited desktop-search software this morning in a conference call with reporters.
Translation: Se espera que la división de MSN de Microsoft anuncie esta mañana una versión de prueba de su esperado software de búsqueda en el escritorio en una conferencia telefónica con periodistas, debido al anuncio de búsqueda en el escritorio de Microsoft #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. This morning, in a conference call with reporters, Microsoft's MSN division is anticipated to disclose a test version of its much-anticipated desktop-search software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A test version of the much awaited desktop-search software is set to be announced this morning in a conference call with reporters by the MSN division of Microsoft.

Original Text: Microsoft Offers Users Legal Protection Software giant expands its indemnification program to cover the majority of its customers.
Translation: Microsoft Ofrece a los Usuarios Protección Legal. El gigante del software expande su programa de indemnización para cubrir a la mayoría de sus clientes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Through the expansion of its indemnification program, software giant Microsoft is providing extensive legal protection to the majority of its users.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The majority of Microsoft customers are now covered under its enlarged indemnification program, enhancing their legal protection.

Original Text: Retail predictions for 2004 shopping season n Overall fourth-quarter retail sales this year are expected to be 6.5 percent higher than last year #39;s -- the biggest increase since 1999.
Translation: Predicciones minoristas para la temporada de compras 2004 n Se espera que las ventas minoristas del cuarto trimestre de este año sean un 6.5 por ciento más altas que las del año pasado # 39; s, siendo este el mayor aumento desde 1999.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Expectations for the 2004 shopping season suggest a 6.5 percent increase in overall fourth-quarter retail sales compared to the last year, marking the most significant rise since 1999.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 2004 shopping season forecasts show that this year's overall retail sales for fourth-quarter are anticipated to surge by 6.5 percent from last year, which is the largest growth since 1999.

Original Text: Notebook: Law might miss 4-6 weeks New England cornerback Ty Law will be out from four to six weeks with a broken bone in his left foot, his agent told The Boston Globe.
Translation: Cuaderno: Ley podría estar ausente de 4 a 6 semanas. El esquinero de New England, Ty Law, estará fuera entre cuatro a seis semanas debido a un hueso roto en su pie izquierdo, según le informó su agente a The Boston Globe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ty Law, New England cornerback, is expected to be sidelined for four to six weeks due to a broken bone in his left foot, according to his agent in a statement to The Boston Globe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Boston Globe reported, as informed by his agent, that Ty Law, the cornerback for New England, will be unable to play for a period of four to six weeks because of a broken bone in his left foot.

Original Text: Vitual Flowers \\This is cool.\\Hotornot just added a new feature to send a "virtual flower".  For \$2 (or so)\you can send a flower to a girl who you haven't yet met.\\I love it!  Awesome!\\\(16:44:01) metameta8080: dude, what a waste of money\\(16:44:15) metameta8080: virtual flowers are FREE\\(16:44:50) metameta8080: I will start an open source service for sending W3C\compliant virtual flowers, which are licenced under the creative commons.\\\
Translation: Flores Virtuales \\Esto es genial.\\Hotornot acaba de agregar una nueva función para enviar una "flor virtual". Por \$2 (o algo así) puedes enviar una flor a una chica que aún no has conocido.\\¡Me encanta! ¡Fabuloso!\\\(16:44:01) metameta8080: tío, qué pérdida de dinero\\(16:44:15) metameta8080: las flores virtuales son GRATIS\\(16:44:50) metameta8080: Voy a empezar un servicio de código abierto para enviar flores virtuales W3C\conformes, que están licenciadas bajo las licencias Creative Commons.\\\
Paraphrase 1: 1. Virtual Blossoms: This is an exciting development! Hotornot recently introduced a feature that allows you to send a "virtual flower" to a lady you've not even met, for approximately $2. I'm thrilled – how awesome! (16:44:01) metameta8080: Mate, that seems like a squander of resources. (16:44:15) metameta8080: You can get virtual flowers for no cost. Original Text: UN suspends aid operations in South Darfur after killing of workers (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - KHARTOUM, Sudan (AP) - The United Nations has suspended its humanitarian operations in Sudan's troubled South Darfur area following a shooting that killed two aid workers, the agency said Monday.
Translation: La ONU suspende las operaciones de ayuda en el sur de Darfur después del asesinato de trabajadores (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - JARTUM, Sudán (AP) - Las Naciones Unidas han suspendido sus operaciones humanitarias en el problemático área del sur de Darfur en Sudán tras un tiroteo que mató a dos trabajadores de ayuda, dijo la agencia el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the tragic shooting of two aid workers, the United Nations declared the suspension of its humanitarian operations in the conflict-heavy South Darfur area of Sudan, according to a Monday announcement reported by Canadian Press - KHARTOUM, Sudan (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The United Nations announced on Monday, as reported by Canadian Press - KHARTOUM, Sudan (AP), that it has ceased its aid operations in South Darfur, Sudan, due to a shooting incident that resulted in the deaths of two of its workers.

Original Text: Saving grace Matt Reis has never easily accepted the apprentice goalkeeper's role. Reis has been battling the label of backup, though that has been his position for most of his collegiate and professional career. But Reis's profile could be changing after he saved two penalty kicks as the Revolution eliminated the Columbus Crew from the MLS playoffs last Sunday. Reis ...
Translation: Salvar la gracia Matt Reis nunca ha aceptado fácilmente el papel de portero aprendiz. Reis ha estado luchando contra la etiqueta de suplente, aunque esa ha sido su posición durante la mayor parte de su carrera colegial y profesional. Pero el perfil de Reis podría estar cambiando después de que paró dos penaltis y la Revolución eliminó al Columbus Crew de los playoffs de la MLS el pasado domingo. Reis...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Matt Reis, a godsend for any team, has always refused to settle for the role of an understudy goalkeeper. Despite his history of serving mostly as a backup in both his college and professional career, Reis has constantly challenged this designation. After he impressively blocked two penalty kicks, leading to the elimination of the Columbus Crew in the MLS playoffs last Sunday, there's a possibility that his image could be reshaping.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Matt Reis, often considered a saving grace, has never complacently acknowledged his role as second-string goalkeeper. While this has been his status throughout much of his academic and professional journey, he has constantly sought to shed this tag. Following his pivotal role in the Revolution's victory over the Columbus Crew during the MLS playoffs last Sunday, where he saved two penalty kicks, Reis's public image may be on the verge of transformation.

Original Text: SanDisk plays up digital audio devices SanDisk releases first digital audio players as it looks to expand the market for flash memory.
Translation: SanDisk promociona dispositivos de audio digital. SanDisk lanza sus primeros reproductores de audio digital mientras busca expandir el mercado para la memoria flash.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As it aims to broaden the flash memory market, SanDisk unveils its first digital audio players.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SanDisk initiates the release of their first digital audio players, envisioning expansion in the flash memory market.

Original Text: Tendulkar equals world record for test centuries (Reuters) Reuters - Sachin Tendulkar smashed his 34th test century to equal Sunil Gavaskar's world record in the first test against Bangladesh on Saturday.
Translation: Tendulkar iguala el récord mundial de siglos de prueba (Reuters) Reuters - Sachin Tendulkar logró su siglo de prueba número 34 para igualar el récord mundial de Sunil Gavaskar en el primer test contra Bangladesh el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the first test against Bangladesh on Saturday, Sachin Tendulkar hit his 34th test century, matching Sunil Gavaskar's world record, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sachin Tendulkar tied Sunil Gavaskar's world record of test centuries, securing his 34th during the first test against Bangladesh, Reuters reported.

Original Text: Fiercely-contested Old Trafford game goalless at halftime Manchester United had the better chances but Arsenal defended superbly as a pulsating opening half of their Premier League match ended goalless at Old Trafford on Sunday.
Translation: El ferozmente disputado partido en Old Trafford se quedó sin goles al medio tiempo. Manchester United tuvo las mejores oportunidades, pero Arsenal defendió de manera soberbia en una emocionante primera mitad de su partido de la Premier League que terminó sin goles en Old Trafford el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite Manchester United's numerous opportunities, Arsenal's exceptional defense kept the Premier League match in a goalless stalemate during the first half at Old Trafford on Sunday. The opening half of the game was intensely competitive.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The premier league game between Manchester United and Arsenal at Old Trafford on Sunday saw a riveting and staunchly fought first half, ending with no goals scored. While Manchester United was presented with better opportunities, Arsenal's stellar defense foiled all attempts.

Original Text: Brussels clears 3.4bn nuclear bail-out for British Energy British Energy won approval from Brussels yesterday for its 3.4bn government-backed bail-out, under the condition that the cash is used exclusively for decommissioning nuclear power plants.
Translation: Bruselas aprueba un rescate nuclear de 3.4 mil millones para British Energy. British Energy obtuvo la aprobación de Bruselas ayer para su rescate respaldado por el gobierno de 3.4 mil millones, bajo la condición de que el dinero se utilice exclusivamente para el desmantelamiento de las centrales nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, British Energy received approval from Brussels for its government-backed 3.4bn bail-out intended solely for the decommissioning of nuclear power plants.

Original Text: Jobless Claims Rise Unexpectedly (Reuters) Reuters - The number of Americans filing\initial claims for jobless pay grew unexpectedly last week to\357,000, Labor Department data showed on Thursday, but an\official said an increase in the week after a public holiday\was typical.
Translation: Aumentan Inesperadamente las Solicitudes de Desempleo (Reuters) Reuters - El número de estadounidenses que presentaron solicitudes iniciales para el subsidio por desempleo creció inesperadamente la última semana a 357,000, mostraron los datos del Departamento de Trabajo el jueves, pero un funcionario dijo que un incremento en la semana después de un feriado público era típico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Unexpected rise was seen in jobless claims last week, with 357,000 Americans filing initial claims for jobless support, according to the data from the Labor Department revealed on Thursday. An official explained this increase as a normal occurrence in the week following a public holiday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reports from Reuters indicate an unforeseen increase in claims for jobless pay last week, reaching 357,000 according to data from the Labor Department unveiled on Thursday. The rise, which happened following a public holiday, was described as typical by an official.

Original Text: BusinessWeek editor to CUNY Stephen B. Shepard, the longtime editor in chief of BusinessWeek magazine, will retire in April to become the founding dean of the new Graduate School of Journalism at the City University of New York.
Translation: El editor de BusinessWeek, Stephen B. Shepard, el veterano editor en jefe de la revista BusinessWeek, se jubilará en abril para convertirse en el decano fundador de la nueva Escuela de Posgrado de Periodismo en la Universidad de la Ciudad de Nueva York (CUNY).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Stephen B. Shepard, who had a long tenure as the editor-in-chief of BusinessWeek magazine, is set to retire in April. Following his retirement, he will take up the role of the inaugural dean at the newly formed Graduate School of Journalism at the City University of New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In April, Stephen B. Shepard, BusinessWeek magazine's longstanding editor-in-chief, is set for retirement. Subsequently, he will pioneer as the founding dean of the new Graduate School of Journalism at the City University of New York.

Original Text: Defense method Saints acquire CB McKenzie The New Orleans Saints completed their long-anticipated trade for Green Bay cornerback Mike McKenzie on Monday. The Saints swapped third-string quarterback JT O #39;Sullivan and their second
Translation: Método de defensa Santos adquieren al CB McKenzie Los New Orleans Saints completaron su largamente anticipado intercambio por el esquinero de Green Bay, Mike McKenzie, el lunes. Los Santos intercambiaron al tercer mariscal de campo JT O'Sullivan y su segunda opción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, the New Orleans Saints finally confirmed their expected trade for Green Bay cornerback Mike McKenzie. The deal involved swapping their third-string quarterback JT O'Sullivan and their second defense method saints to secure McKenzie.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The long-anticipated trade of Green Bay cornerback Mike McKenzie to the New Orleans Saints was finalized on Monday. In exchange, the Saints traded JT O'Sullivan, their third-string quarterback, along with their second defense method saints.

Original Text: EU, Russia fail to reach accord at summit  THE HAGUE -- Russia and the European Union failed yesterday to complete negotiations on a  quot;strategic partnership quot; because of disagreements over security and other issues at a summit overshadowed by the Ukraine political crisis. The two sides said they were confident a final pact will be reached next May, however.
Translation: La UE y Rusia no logran alcanzar un acuerdo en la cumbre  LA HAYA -- Rusia y la Unión Europea fracasaron ayer en completar las negociaciones sobre una "asociación estratégica" debido a desacuerdos sobre seguridad y otros temas en una cumbre ensombrecida por la crisis política de Ucrania. Sin embargo, ambas partes dijeron que estaban seguras de que se llegará a un pacto final el próximo mayo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. THE HAGUE -- Yesterday, disagreements over security and other issues, magnified by the political crisis in Ukraine, resulted in the failure of Russia and the European Union to finalize a "strategic partnership" at a summit. Nevertheless, both sides expressed optimism about securing a final agreement by May next year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At a summit in THE HAGUE, hindered by the political turmoil in Ukraine and various security disagreements, the European Union and Russia were unable to wrap up negotiations on a 'strategic partnership' yesterday. Despite this stumble, both entities conveyed assurance that a conclusive pact would be attained by the upcoming May.

Original Text: Cisco hurt on worries about sector #39;s recovery Shares of Cisco Systems fell sharply Wednesday after the company #39;s chief executive, John Chambers, said sales growth would slow this quarter and that it was too early to say whether customers were more optimistic about the economy.
Translation: Cisco se ve afectado por las preocupaciones sobre la recuperación del sector. Las acciones de Cisco Systems cayeron bruscamente el miércoles después de que el director ejecutivo de la compañía, John Chambers, dijera que el crecimiento de las ventas se ralentizaría este trimestre y que era demasiado pronto para decir si los clientes eran más optimistas acerca de la economía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, shares of Cisco Systems experienced a significant drop due to fears about the sector's recovery. This came after John Chambers, the company's CEO, stated that sales growth would decelerate this quarter, and it was uncertain if their clients were becoming more hopeful about the economy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following an announcement by its CEO, John Chambers, on expected slowdown in sales growth this quarter and uncertainty over customer outlook on economy, shares of Cisco Systems dropped sharply on Wednesday amidst concerns about the sector's recovery.

Original Text: Special jet flies Bell to family FORMER McDonald #39;s boss Charlie Bell will be flown home to Australia in a specially-equipped jet at a cost of nearly \$400,000. The Sydney boy who grew up to run the world #39;s biggest fast food franchise was diagnosed
Translation: El antiguo jefe de McDonald's, Charlie Bell, será trasladado a Australia en un jet especialmente equipado a un costo de casi $400,000. El chico de Sydney que creció para dirigir la franquicia de comida rápida más grande del mundo fue diagnosticado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Charlie Bell, the former CEO of McDonald's, will be transported back to his native Australia in a specially-equipped jet priced roughly at $400,000. Bell, the Sydney-based youth who climbed the ladder to eventually manage the world's premier fast food chain, received a diagnosis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The former head of McDonald's, Charlie Bell, originating from Sydney and rising to helm the world's top fast food franchise, has been diagnosed and will be airlifted to Australia in a special jet, costing around $400,000.

Original Text: Cocoa Drops, Metals Jump on Weak Dollar  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Cocoa prices sank on Wednesday as  exporters in top-grower Ivory Coast kept up with the arrival of  the new crop, which was halted several times this month by an  outbreak of civil violence and a farmers strike.
Translation: Caída del cacao, salto de los metales debido al debilitamiento del dólar. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios del cacao se desplomaron el miércoles, ya que los exportadores en Costa de Marfil, el mayor productor, mantuvieron el ritmo con la llegada de la nueva cosecha, la cual se vio interrumpida varias veces este mes debido a un brote de violencia civil y una huelga de agricultores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Wednesday, cocoa prices dropped as exporters from Ivory Coast, the leading producer, maintained pace with the arrival of the new crop. The new crop's release was delayed multiple times this month due to civil unrest and a strike by farmers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - With recurring interruptions by civil strife and farmer strikes, the new crop's arrival saw a dip in cocoa prices on Wednesday, despite the continued efforts by exporters in Ivory Coast, the nation known for its largest production.

Original Text: Time Warner 3rd-Qtr Profit Falls 7.8 on Legal Costs (Update5) Time Warner Inc., the world #39;s largest media company, said third-quarter profit fell 7.8 percent after it set aside \$500 million to resolve government investigations into its accounting practices at America Online.
Translation: La ganancia del tercer trimestre de Time Warner cae un 7.8 debido a costos legales (Actualización5) Time Warner Inc., la compañía de medios más grande del mundo, dijo que la ganancia del tercer trimestre cayó un 7,8 por ciento después de reservar 500 millones de dólares para resolver investigaciones gubernamentales sobre sus prácticas contables en America Online.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Time Warner Inc., the world's biggest media corporation, reported a 7.8% decline in third-quarter profits due to setting aside \$500 million to deal with government audits into the accounting practices at America Online.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to spending \$500 million for the resolution of government probes into fiscal irregularities at America Online, Time Warner Inc., the most substantial media firm worldwide, witnessed a 7.8% drop in profits in the third quarter.

Original Text: House G.O.P. Voids Rule It Adopted Shielding Leader After fierce criticism, House Republicans reversed a rule change that would have allowed a party leader to retain his position even if indicted.
Translation: La Casa G.O.P. Anula la Norma que Adoptó para Proteger al Líder Después de fuertes críticas, los republicanos de la Cámara revirtieron un cambio de regla que habría permitido a un líder del partido mantener su posición incluso si fuera acusado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following intense backlash, House Republicans rolled back a previously adopted rule that permitted a party leader to keep his role, regardless of an indictment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The House Republicans, under heavy scrutiny, revoked an established protocol that enabled a party leader to maintain his position even when facing an indictment.

Original Text: TV rights wrangle threatens India v Australia coverage A major wrangle over TV rights for Indian cricket is threatening to mar the build-up to a mouth-watering home test series against Australia next month.
Translation: La disputa por los derechos de televisión amenaza la cobertura de India contra Australia. Un importante enfrentamiento por los derechos de televisión del cricket indio amenaza con empañar la preparación para una emocionante serie de pruebas en casa contra Australia el próximo mes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The thrill of the upcoming home test series between India and Australia next month is under risk of being overshadowed due to a significant dispute over Indian cricket's TV rights.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A significant disagreement over the television rights of Indian cricket is poised to disrupt the anticipation of a highly anticipated home test series next month, against Australia.

Original Text: Ex-head of BBC blasts Blair on Iraq The BBC continued to make news rather than merely report it as its former director launched a bitter attack on Prime Minister Tony Blair and its new chief tried to lay out a
Translation: El exdirector de la BBC critica a Blair por Irak. La BBC continuó haciendo noticias en lugar de simplemente informarlas, ya que su exdirector lanzó un duro ataque contra el primer ministro Tony Blair y su nuevo jefe intentó establecer un
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prime Minister Tony Blair was severely criticized by the former BBC chief, as continuing to headline the news was the BBC's goal while its new chief attempted to devise a plan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The former chief of the BBC fiercely criticized Tony Blair, amidst the corporation's attempts to keep making the news under the guidance of its new leader.

Original Text: EMI's download music sales soar EMI sees download music sales rise by nearly 600 in the six months to the end of September and says they are becoming a major part of its business.
Translation: Las ventas de música descargable de EMI se disparan. EMI ve cómo las ventas de música descargable aumentan casi un 600% en los seis meses hasta finales de septiembre y dice que se están convirtiendo en una parte importante de su negocio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. EMI reports a nearly 600 percent increase in download music sales, becoming a significant aspect of its business, for the six-month period ending in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The download music sales of EMI have rocketed nearly 600 percent in the six months leading to the end of September, making it a considerable part of its operations.

Original Text: Banned Sprinter Chambers Trys Football (AP) AP - Dwain Chambers will be studying pass patterns and playbooks instead of competing against the world's top sprinters in the Olympics this weekend.
Translation: Sprinter Prohibido Chambers Prueba Fútbol (AP) AP - Dwain Chambers estará estudiando patrones de pase y libros de jugadas en lugar de competir contra los mejores velocistas del mundo en las Olimpiadas este fin de semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Sprinter Dwain Chambers, Who is Banned, Switches to Football (AP) AP - This weekend, instead of racing against the world's elite sprinters at the Olympics, Dwain Chambers will be immersed in playbooks and pass patterns.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Banned from Sprinting, Chambers Shifts Focus to Football (AP) AP - Dwain Chambers will forego competing with the world's foremost sprinters at the Olympics this weekend, and instead, delve into the study of pass patterns and playbooks.

Original Text: Mbeki Ready to Present Ivory Coast Peace Proposals South African President Thabo Mbeki said Sunday he was ready to make concrete proposals to revive a peace process in Ivory Coast after visiting the rebel-held north of the country on a mediation mission.
Translation: Mbeki Listo para Presentar Propuestas de Paz para Costa de Marfil El presidente sudafricano, Thabo Mbeki, dijo el domingo que estaba listo para hacer propuestas concretas para reavivar un proceso de paz en Costa de Marfil después de visitar el norte del país, controlado por los rebeldes, en una misión de mediación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. South African President Thabo Mbeki announced on Sunday that he is prepared to offer solid proposals to rekindle the peace process in Ivory Coast, following a mediatory visit to the rebel-controlled northern region of the country.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After his trip to the rebel-occupied north of Ivory Coast on a mediation mission, South African President Thabo Mbeki confirmed on Sunday his readiness to introduce substantial proposals for the resurgence of a peace process in the country.

Original Text: Nvidia will supply graphics chip for new PlayStation Nvidia will supply the graphics chip for the successor to the PlayStation 2 games console being developed by Sony Computer Entertainment (SCEI), the companies announced on Tuesday.
Translation: Nvidia proporcionará el chip gráfico para la nueva PlayStation. Nvidia suministrará el chip gráfico para el sucesor de la consola de videojuegos PlayStation 2 que está siendo desarrollado por Sony Computer Entertainment (SCEI), anunciaron las compañías el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The companies announced on Tuesday that the graphics chip for Sony Computer Entertainment's (SCEI) upcoming PlayStation successor to the PlayStation 2 console will be supplied by Nvidia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sony Computer Entertainment (SCEI) and Nvidia made an announcement on Tuesday that Nvidia will be responsible for providing the graphics chip for the new PlayStation, which is set to be the successor of the PlayStation 2 games console.

Original Text: NHL Lockout's First Week Produces No Talks NEW YORK - It's been a week without progress in the NHL lockout. So far, there have been no overtures from the league or the players to resume talks to save a season that is already starting to slip away...
Translation: La Primera Semana del Cierre Patronal de la NHL No Produce Conversaciones NUEVA YORK - Ha pasado una semana sin progresos en el cierre patronal de la NHL. Hasta ahora, no ha habido acercamientos ni por parte de la liga ni de los jugadores para reanudar las conversaciones y salvar una temporada que ya está comenzando a escaparse...
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK - The initial week of the NHL lockout has not seen any progress, with no communication efforts from either the players or the league in order to revive the rapidly evaporating season.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK - The NHL lockout has completed its first week without any developments; neither the players nor the league have initiated discussions to salvage the quickly fading season.

Original Text: Letters: Palestinian leadership The decision by Marwan Barghouti, an imprisoned Palestinian leader, to run for president of the Palestinian Authority should be welcomed by all who want to see real democracy emerge in Palestine ( quot;Barghouti faces Fatah opposition, quot; Dec. 3).
Translation: Cartas: Liderazgo palestino. La decisión de Marwan Barghouti, un líder palestino encarcelado, de postularse para presidente de la Autoridad Palestina debería ser bienvenida por todos aquellos que quieren ver surgir una verdadera democracia en Palestina ("Barghouti se enfrenta a la oposición de Fatah", 3 de diciembre).
Paraphrase 1: 1. All those who hope for the development of genuine democracy in Palestine should applaud Marwan Barghouti, an incarcerated Palestinian leader, for his choice to run for the presidency of the Palestinian Authority ("Barghouti faces Fatah opposition," Dec. 3).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Marwan Barghouti, a jailed Palestinian leader, has made the commendable decision to vie for the presidency of the Palestinian Authority. This move ought to be cheered by anyone desiring the rise of true democracy in Palestine ("Barghouti faces Fatah opposition," Dec. 3).

Original Text: Garcia and Poulter in play-off Ryder Cup team-mates Sergio Garcia and Ian Poulter went into a play-off for the Volvo Masters at Valderrama today after a tie on the seven-under-par mark of 277.
Translation: García y Poulter en el desempate: los compañeros de equipo de la Ryder Cup, Sergio García e Ian Poulter, entraron en un desempate por los Masters de Volvo en Valderrama hoy, después de un empate en la marca de siete bajo par de 277.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After reaching a tie at the seven-under-par mark of 277, Ryder Cup teammates Sergio Garcia and Ian Poulter headed into a play-off for the Volvo Masters at Valderrama today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sergio Garcia and Ian Poulter, who are team-mates in the Ryder Cup, proceeded to a play-off at the Volvo Masters in Valderrama today following a tie at the seven-under-par score of 277.

Original Text: E.U. Announces Settlement of Coke Case The European Union reached a settlement Tuesday of its long-running antitrust case against The Coca-Cola Co. under which the U.S. titan agreed to change sales practices that helped it win roughly half of the soft drink market in Europe.
Translation: La U.E. Anuncia Acuerdo en el Caso Coca-Cola. La Unión Europea llegó a un acuerdo el martes en su caso a largo plazo de antimonopolio contra The Coca-Cola Co., bajo el cual el gigante estadounidense accedió a cambiar las prácticas de venta que le ayudaron a ganar aproximadamente la mitad del mercado de bebidas no alcohólicas en Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European Union, on Tuesday, confirmed the conclusion of a persistent antitrust case against The Coca-Cola Co. As per the settlement, the U.S. giant conceded to alter its sales practices that had previously earned it about half of the soft drink market share in Europe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, a longstanding antitrust case between The European Union and The Coca-Cola Co. was resolved, with the American behemoth consenting to modify the sales strategies that previously enabled it to dominate approximately half of Europe's soft drink market.

Original Text: Nordstrom and Costco dodge September #39;s retail doldrums Two of the region #39;s best-known retail brands -- Costco Wholesale Corp. and Nordstrom Inc. -- bucked a national trend of lukewarm sales in September and posted significant gains over the same period last year.
Translation: Nordstrom y Costco esquivan el marasmo minorista de septiembre #39. Dos de las marcas minoristas más conocidas de la región: Costco Wholesale Corp. y Nordstrom Inc., desafiaron una tendencia nacional de ventas tibias en septiembre y registraron ganancias significativas en comparación con el mismo período del año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two renowned retail brands from the region, Costco Wholesale Corp. and Nordstrom Inc., defied the nationwide trend of sluggish September sales, achieving notable growth compared to the same period the previous year.

Original Text: US Airways, pilots seek common ground Pilots and management at US Airways continue talks Friday in hopes of making a deal to help save the struggling carrier. Negotiations might continue into the Labor Day weekend, says pilots union spokesman Jack Stephan.
Translation: US Airways, pilotos buscan puntos en común. Los pilotos y la dirección de US Airways siguen con las conversaciones el viernes con la esperanza de llegar a un acuerdo para ayudar a salvar a la aerolínea en dificultades. Las negociaciones podrían continuar durante el fin de semana del Día del Trabajo, dice el portavoz del sindicato de pilotos, Jack Stephan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Pilots and executives at US Airways remain engaged in discussions this Friday, aiming to strike a compromise that could potentially rescue the beleaguered airline. The pilots union representative, Jack Stephan, mentions that these negotiations may extend through the Labor Day weekend.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At US Airways, ongoing negotiations between the pilots and management are planned for Friday, with the objective of reaching an agreement to salvage the troubled airline. The dialogue might persist over the Labor Day weekend, according to the pilot union's spokesperson, Jack Stephan.

Original Text: Whats Next For Google - ISP, Browser, Desktop Search? What's Next For Google - ISP, Browser, Desktop Search?\\Google has had a meteoric rise to stardom. I remember an article I saw in PC World Indian Edition in the year 1999 which mentioned this small startup with a funny name. I passed it on like yet another search engine which ...
Translation: ¿Qué sigue para Google - ISP, navegador, búsqueda en el escritorio? ¿Qué sigue para Google - ISP, navegador, búsqueda en el escritorio?\\Google ha tenido un ascenso meteórico a la fama. Recuerdo un artículo que vi en la edición india de PC World en el año 1999 que mencionaba a esta pequeña startup con un nombre gracioso. Lo pasé por alto como si fuera otro motor de búsqueda que ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. What's in the Pipeline for Google - ISP, Browser, Desktop Search? This giant has experienced a rapid ascend to fame. Recalling an article I came across in PC World's Indian Edition back in 1999, it talked about this tiny startup with an unusual name. Like any other search engine of the time, I overlooked it...
Paraphrase 2: 2. What's the Future Hold for Google - ISP, Browser, Desktop Search? Google's journey to success has been extraordinarily swift. It brings back memories of an article in the 1999 Indian Edition of PC World, discussing about this little-known startup with a quirky name. Like just another search engine then, I casually dismissed it...

Original Text: Bush vows action over troops' kit President Bush says claims that US troops going to Iraq have  poor armour protection are being addressed.
Translation: Bush promete acciones sobre el equipo de las tropas. El presidente Bush dice que las afirmaciones de que las tropas estadounidenses que van a Irak tienen una protección blindada deficiente están siendo abordadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. President Bush has pledged to take action regarding allegations surrounding the inadequate armor protection of US troops deploying to Iraq.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Promising to confront issues over the inadequate armour protection of US troops heading to Iraq, President Bush has stated that these concerns are being duly handled.

Original Text: Jobless Claims Up on Impact of Charley WASHINGTON - The number of new people signing up for jobless benefits rose last week, reflecting the impact of hurricane Charley, which recently tore through Florida.    The Labor Department reported Thursday that new applications for unemployment insurance increased by a seasonally adjusted 10,000 to 343,000 for the week ending Aug...
Translation:
Solicitudes de desempleo aumentan por impacto de Charley WASHINGTON - El número de nuevas personas que se inscriben para recibir beneficios de desempleo aumentó la semana pasada, reflejando el impacto del huracán Charley, que recientemente arrasó Florida. 

El Departamento de Trabajo informó el jueves que las nuevas solicitudes de seguro de desempleo aumentaron en 10,000 ajustadas estacionalmente a 343,000 para la semana que terminó en agosto...
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a result of Hurricane Charley's devastating path through Florida, the number of newly unemployed individuals increased last week, according to the Labor Department's report on Thursday. The total number had a seasonally adjusted rise of 10,000, pushing it to 343,000 for the week ending in August.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The recent Hurricane Charley, after rampaging Florida, led to a spike in people applying for jobless benefits, as per the Labor Department's announcement on Thursday. An increase of 10,000 was reported, adjusting the total to 343,000 for the week concluding in August.

Original Text: Sudan: UN Must Extend Arms Embargo The United Nations Security Council must immediately increase the international presence in Darfur and impose an extended arms embargo to stop continuing atrocities there, Human Rights Watch said in a letter to members of the Security Council.
Translation: Sudán: La ONU debe extender el embargo de armas. El Consejo de Seguridad de las Naciones Unidas debe incrementar inmediatamente la presencia internacional en Darfur e imponer un prolongado embargo de armas para detener las continuas atrocidades en esa región, dijo Human Rights Watch en una carta a los miembros del Consejo de Seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a letter sent to the Security Council members by Human Rights Watch, an extended arms embargo must be imposed by the United Nations Security Council in Sudan's Darfur region, where ongoing atrocities persist, and an immediate surge in international presence should be enforced.
