Paraphrase 2: 2. Human Rights Watch has addressed the United Nations Security Council in a letter, pressing for an immediate augmentation of international forces in Sudan's Darfur and enforcement of a prolonged arms embargo to prevent the perpetuation of atrocities.

Original Text: Update 1: Report: Tax Bill Presented to Yukos Unit The key production unit of beleaguered Russian oil giant Yukos was handed a back taxes bill for nearly \$1 billion, the Interfax news agency reported Wednesday, apparently increasing the likelihood that the unit would be sold at auction.
Translation: Actualización 1: Informe: Se presenta proyecto de ley de impuestos a la unidad de Yukos. La principal unidad de producción del atribulado gigante petrolero ruso Yukos recibió una factura de impuestos atrasados por casi \$1 mil millones, informó la agencia de noticias Interfax el miércoles, aparentemente aumentando la probabilidad de que la unidad sea vendida en subasta.
Paraphrase 1: The Interfax news agency reported on Wednesday that a back taxes bill of almost $1 billion was given to the primary production sector of the troubled Russian oil behemoth, Yukos. This event seems to elevate the chances of the sector being put up for sale at an auction.
Paraphrase 2: On Wednesday, the principal operation segment of the financially-strained Russian oil company, Yukos, received a nearly $1 billion back taxes bill, according to the Interfax news agency. This development appears to heighten the possibility of the segment heading towards an auction sale.

Original Text: EBay shelves plan to axe Half.com unit Citing user concerns, eBay has dropped plans to close its Half.com unit in mid-October and move the online used merchandise store's buyers and sellers onto eBay's main site.
Translation: Citando preocupaciones de los usuarios, eBay ha descartado los planes de cerrar su unidad Half.com a mediados de octubre y trasladar a los compradores y vendedores de la tienda en línea de artículos usados al sitio principal de eBay.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In response to user feedback, eBay has reversed its decision to shut down the Half.com unit in mid-October. The original plan was to transition the online secondhand goods store's consumers and vendors to eBay's primary platform.
Paraphrase 2: 2. eBay, addressing users' concerns, has decided not to proceed with its plan to terminate the Half.com unit by mid-October. The company had initially intended to shift its online resale store's buyers and sellers to eBay's main website.

Original Text: Hostage talks postponed Mrs Flanigan and two other UN officials were snatched in the capital Kabul last week while monitoring the countrys presidential election.
Translation: Las negociaciones sobre los rehenes se posponen; la Sra. Flanigan y dos otros funcionarios de la ONU fueron secuestrados en la capital, Kabul, la semana pasada mientras supervisaban las elecciones presidenciales del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mrs. Flanigan, along with two other United Nations officials, were kidnapped in Kabul, the capital city, during their surveillance of the country's presidential election. As a result, discussions related to hostages had to be delayed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While supervising the presidential election in Afghanistan, Mrs. Flanigan and two of her UN colleagues were abducted in Kabul, leading to a deferral of the hostage negotiations.

Original Text: 54 dead, million flee homes as rains lash northeast India, Bangladesh (AFP) AFP - At least 54 people have died and more than a million have fled their homes as torrential rains lashed parts of India and Bangladesh, officials said.
Translation: 54 muertos, un millón huyen de sus hogares debido a las lluvias torrenciales en el noreste de India, Bangladesh (AFP) AFP - Al menos 54 personas han muerto y más de un millón han huido de sus hogares debido a las lluvias torrenciales que azotaron partes de India y Bangladesh, dijeron funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials indicated that at least 54 individuals lost their lives and over a million were forced to leave their homes due to heavy rainfall hitting parts of India and Bangladesh (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per official reports from AFP, severe rains in northeast India and Bangladesh have caused at least 54 fatalities, and forced over a million people to evacuate their homes.

Original Text: Prso stars in leading role Rangers #39; revival continued with victory over a stubborn and game Motherwell side at Fir Park - courtesy of two Dado Prso strikes, six minutes from the end of each half -o keep them on
Translation: Prso protagoniza un papel principal en la resurrección de los Rangers, que continuó con la victoria sobre un resistente y luchador Motherwell en Fir Park, gracias a dos goles de Dado Prso, seis minutos antes del final de cada mitad, para mantenerlos en
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rangers' resurgence persisted as they defeated a determined Motherwell team at Fir Park, thanks to two successful strikes by Dado Prso, each occurring six minutes before the end of both halves, maintaining their lead.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The revival of Rangers carried on following a win against a resilient Motherwell squad at Fir Park, attributed largely to two goals achieved by Prso, each in the last six minutes of each half, ensuring their continued prominence.

Original Text: Asian Stocks Slip as Oil Moves Above  #36;55 (Reuters) Reuters - Asian share markets fell on Monday\after oil hit a record above  #36;55 a barrel, with investors\cautious ahead of earnings reports from bellwether firms IBM\and Texas Instruments later in the day.
Translation: Las Acciones Asiáticas Caen a Medida que el Petróleo Supera los  #36;55 (Reuters) Reuters - Los mercados de acciones asiáticos cayeron el lunes después de que el petróleo alcanzara un récord por encima de  #36;55 por barril, con los inversores cautelosos antes de los informes de ganancias de las empresas pioneras, IBM y Texas Instruments, más tarde en el día.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - On Monday, Asian stock markets declined as the oil prices climbed above $55 per barrel, a historical peak. Investors displayed caution anticipating the day's release of earnings reports from pivotal companies including IBM and Texas Instruments.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With oil prices soaring beyond $55 per barrel, Asian stock markets experienced a drop on Monday, according to Reuters. Investors were notably cautious in view of forthcoming earnings reports from leading companies, namely IBM and Texas Instruments, to be released later that day.

Original Text: Series of small explosions shake Madrid The explosions hit five gas stations simultaneously, after a telephone warning from the armed Basque separatist group ETA. Two police officers were slightly wounded by one of the bombs.
Translation: Serie de pequeñas explosiones sacuden Madrid. Las explosiones golpearon simultáneamente a cinco gasolineras, tras una advertencia telefónica del grupo separatista vasco armado ETA. Dos policías resultaron levemente heridos por una de las bombas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After receiving a telephonic warning from the armed Basque separatist group ETA, five gas stations in Madrid were simultaneously shook by a series of minor explosions. One of the bombs slightly injured two police officers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A chain of minor explosions rattled Madrid, targeting five gas stations at the same instant, following a phone alert from the Basque separatist group ETA. A couple of law enforcement officers suffered minimal injuries from one of the blasts.

Original Text: IBM announces high capacity storage servers IBM, one of the key leaders in the enterprise server market, annouced two additions to its family of high storage products yesterday.
Translation: IBM anuncia servidores de almacenamiento de alta capacidad. IBM, uno de los principales líderes en el mercado de servidores empresariales, anunció ayer dos nuevas incorporaciones a su familia de productos de almacenamiento de alta capacidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As a leading player in the enterprise server market, IBM recently declared the introduction of two new high-capacity storage products to its repertoire.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, IBM, renowned in the enterprise server market, proclaimed the incorporation of two high storage product additions to its existing line.

Original Text: Americans Win Video Game Gold Medal (AP) AP - Amid fanfare fit for actual world-class athletes, five Americans with really quick fingers took home the gold medal Sunday in the popular "Counter Strike" competition of the World Cyber Games championships, capping five days of intense gaming by the world's elite.
Translation: Los estadounidenses ganan la medalla de oro en videojuegos (AP) AP - Entre fanfarrias dignas de atletas de clase mundial, cinco estadounidenses con dedos realmente rápidos se llevaron a casa la medalla de oro el domingo en la popular competición "Counter Strike" de los campeonatos de los World Cyber Games, culminando cinco días de intenso juego por parte de la elite mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - In an environment reminiscent of a global sports event, five American gamers clinched the gold medal on Sunday in the esteemed "Counter Strike" competition at the World Cyber Games championships after five grueling days of high-level gaming.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The prestigious "Counter Strike" contest in the World Cyber Games championships ended on Sunday with five American players claiming the gold medal amidst an atmosphere akin to a world-class sports gala, following five days of relentless gaming. (AP) AP

Original Text: British ambassador visits DPRK blast site British Foreign Office minister Bill Rammell said Thursday that British ambassador to the Democratic People #39;s Republic of Korea (DPRK) has visited the site of a huge explosion that raised fears of a nuclear weapons test.
Translation: El embajador británico visita el sitio de la explosión de la RPDC. El ministro del Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores británico, Bill Rammell, dijo el jueves que el embajador británico en la República Popular Democrática de Corea (RPDC) ha visitado el sitio de una enorme explosión que suscitó temores de una prueba de armas nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The site of a massive explosion, which sparked concerns of a nuclear weapons test, has been visited by the British ambassador to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), confirmed Bill Rammell, a British Foreign Office minister, on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Bill Rammell, a minister from the British Foreign Office, confirmed that the British ambassador to the DPRK has visited the location of a massive explosion that ignited suspicions of a nuclear weapons test.

Original Text: Congress OKs foreigners #39; jobs WASHINGTON - Congress is letting employers hire an additional 20,000 foreign high-tech workers under a special visa program after businesses reached the annual ceiling on the first day of the government #39;s fiscal year.
Translation: El Congreso aprueba empleos para extranjeros #39; WASHINGTON - El Congreso está permitiendo a los empleadores contratar a 20,000 trabajadores extranjeros adicionales en alta tecnología bajo un programa especial de visas después de que las empresas alcanzaron el límite anual en el primer día del año fiscal del gobierno #39;.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Congressional approval has been granted for employers to employ an additional 20,000 foreign high-tech workers under a specific visa program. This decision comes as businesses hit the government's annual limit on the first day of the fiscal year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The first day of the government's fiscal year saw businesses reaching the annual cap, leading Congress to permit the hiring of an extra 20,000 foreign employees in the high-tech sector under a unique visa scheme.

Original Text: Sun, Microsoft Cite Progress, Not Perfection Microsoft and Sun Microsystems say they are warming up to each other, but it will take more time to deliver on the grand promises of platform interoperability announced last spring.
Translation: Sol, Microsoft Cita Progreso, No Perfección Microsoft y Sun Microsystems dicen que se están acercando el uno al otro, pero tomará más tiempo cumplir con las grandes promesas de interoperabilidad de plataformas anunciadas la primavera pasada.
Paraphrase 1: Microsoft and Sun Microsystems are gradually growing more congenial towards each other; however, they assert that achieving the extensive platform interoperability promised last spring will necessitate more time.
Paraphrase 2: Even though Microsoft and Sun Microsystems have reported progress in their relationship, they suggest perfection in terms of platform interoperability, announced last spring, still requires more time for fulfillment.

Original Text: Commodities Rise, ConAgra Profit Falls  CHICAGO (Reuters) - ConAgra Foods Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CAG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CAG.N</A> on Wednesday  posted lower quarterly profits due to higher ingredient costs  and the sale of its chicken and agricultural products  businesses.
Translation: Las Materias Primas Suben, Las Ganancias de ConAgra Caen  CHICAGO (Reuters) - ConAgra Foods Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CAG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CAG.N</A> el miércoles reportó ganancias trimestrales más bajas debido a los altos costos de los ingredientes y la venta de sus negocios de productos de pollo y agrícolas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHICAGO (Reuters) - On Wednesday, ConAgra Foods Inc. reported a decline in quarterly profits due to increased ingredient prices and the divestiture of their chicken and agriculture products divisions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to rising ingredient costs and the offloading of its poultry and farming products businesses, ConAgra Foods Inc. announced a drop in its quarterly revenues this Wednesday, as reported by Reuters in Chicago.

Original Text: O #39;Rourke more then stats and hairstyles Soccer is a sport with a field 80 yards wide by 120 yards long, and 22 players running for 90 minutes. Often times the only players that stand out are the ones that put up  #39;big #39; numbers, scoring goals and setting up others.
Translation: O'Rourke es más que estadísticas y estilos de peinado. El fútbol es un deporte con un campo de 80 yardas de ancho por 120 yardas de largo, y 22 jugadores corriendo durante 90 minutos. Muchas veces, los únicos jugadores que destacan son aquellos que obtienen números 'grandes', anotando goles y ayudando a otros.
Paraphrase 1: Soccer, a game stretched out on an expanse of 80 yards by 120 yards with 22 athletes hustling for 90 minutes, usually only illuminates the players contributing big numbers through goal scoring and setting up teammates. It is about more than just statistics and hairstyles as presented by O'Rourke.
Paraphrase 2: O'Rourke emphasizes that soccer is not merely about statistics and hairstyles. Infact, it's a game played on a wide 80-yard by 120-yard field by 22 individuals who run for 90 minutes. Often, only players who score goals or assist others, thus stacking huge numbers, are highlighted.

Original Text: Questions Posed to Potential Bryant Jurors (AP) AP - Some of the questions appearing on the 82-item questionnaire given to prospective jurors in the Kobe Bryant rape case:
Translation: Preguntas realizadas a los posibles jurados de Bryant (AP) - AP - Algunas de las preguntas que aparecen en el cuestionario de 82 ítems entregado a los jurados potenciales en el caso de violación de Kobe Bryant:
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - In the Kobe Bryant rape case, here are some of the questions from the 82-item questionnaire presented to the potential jurors:
Paraphrase 2: 2. Some of the inquiries from the 82-item questionnaire provided to prospective jurors in the Kobe Bryant rape case, as reported by AP:

Original Text: US planes bomb Najaf, hopes of peace fade Iraq: US planes pounded Najaf #39;s cemetery and historic centre near the Imam Ali shrine on Monday, dimming hopes of a peaceful end to a near three-week stand-off between US-led Iraqi troops and Shiite militia.
Translation: Aviones de EE.UU bombardean Najaf, las esperanzas de paz se desvanecen Irak: Aviones estadounidenses bombardearon el cementerio y el centro histórico de Najaf, cerca del santuario del Imam Ali, el lunes, disminuyendo las esperanzas de un final pacífico a un enfrentamiento de casi tres semanas entre las tropas iraquíes lideradas por EE.UU y la milicia chiíta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, the hope for peace in Iraq seemed to fade as US planes bombed the historic centre and cemetery near the Imam Ali shrine in Najaf, further escalating the almost three-week-long standoff between the Shiite militia and US-led Iraqi troops.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US-led Iraqi forces and the Shiite militia's tension escalated on Monday as US planes striking Najaf's cemetery and the area around the Imam Ali shrine signaled a grim outlook for a peaceful resolution, following almost three weeks of conflict.

Original Text: Prolific spammer given nine years jail A United States man convicted of violating anti-spam laws by sending out tens of thousands of unsolicited emails using fake addresses faces nine years in prison in Virginia.
Translation: Spammer prolífico condenado a nueve años de cárcel. Un hombre de Estados Unidos ha sido condenado por violar las leyes anti-spam mediante el envío de decenas de miles de correos electrónicos no solicitados utilizando direcciones falsas, enfrenta nueve años de prisión en Virginia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A man from the United States, who has been found guilty of violating anti-spam laws by sending tens of thousands of unwanted emails using phony addresses, is looking at a nine-year prison sentence in Virginia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A United States resident, declared guilty of infringing anti-spam regulations through the dissemination of tens of thousands of unrequested emails from counterfeit addresses, has been handed a nine-year incarceration term in Virginia.

Original Text: Indonesia poll cheers investors Jakarta stocks end on record highs as incoming results show Susilo Yudhoyono will be Indonesia's next leader.
Translation: La encuesta de Indonesia anima a los inversores: las acciones de Yakarta cierran en máximos históricos ya que los resultados entrantes muestran que Susilo Yudhoyono será el próximo líder de Indonesia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jakarta stocks reach an all-time high, exciting investors as incoming poll results indicate Susilo Yudhoyono's victory as Indonesia's upcoming leader.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As preliminary results predict Susilo Yudhoyono will be the future leader of Indonesia, Jakarta stocks hit record highs, bringing joy to investors.

Original Text: Gill Fears Glazer Intervention Manchester United chief executive David Gill will head into the clubs annual general meeting tomorrow fearing the possibility of another confrontation with Malcolm Glazer.
Translation: Gill teme la intervención de Glazer. El director ejecutivo del Manchester United, David Gill, se dirigirá a la asamblea general anual de los clubes mañana, temiendo la posibilidad de otro enfrentamiento con Malcolm Glazer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. David Gill, Manchester United's chief executive, is apprehensive about a potential encounter with Malcolm Glazer at the club's annual general meeting tomorrow.

Original Text: Farmers  #39;Cry Wolf #39; Over Losses to Predators Sept. 23, 2004 - Cougars, wolves, lions and other predators inflict relatively few losses on livestock and farmers gain only a temporary boost if these marauders are culled, the British weekly New Scientist announced Wednesday.
Translation: "Los agricultores 'Lloran Lobo' por las pérdidas debido a los depredadores 23 de septiembre de 2004 - Los pumas, lobos, leones y otros depredadores infligen relativamente pocas pérdidas en el ganado y los agricultores sólo obtienen un impulso temporal si estos merodeadores son sacrificados, anunció el miércoles la revista semanal británica New Scientist."
Paraphrase 1: 1. The British weekly, New Scientist, announced on Wednesday, September 23, 2004, that despite farmers' claims of substantial losses due to predators like cougars, wolves, and lions, the actual damage inflicted on livestock is relatively minimal, and any benefit gained from culling these predators is only temporary.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On September 23, 2004, New Scientist, a British weekly, reported that farmers' oft-cited claims of losses due to predators such as cougars, wolves, and lions, are exaggerations. In actuality, the damage to livestock is relatively minor and the relief brought by culling these animals is temporarily beneficial at best.

Original Text: Sharp net profit up 40 percent in first half on robust LCD TV sales (AFP) AFP - Leading electronics maker Sharp said interim net profit rose 40.7 percent to a record high on robust sales of liquid crystal display TVs and camera-equipped cellphones but it cautioned on the outlook due to the possible impact of high oil prices on global economic growth.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: El beneficio neto de Sharp aumentó un 40 por ciento en el primer semestre gracias a las robustas ventas de televisores LCD (AFP) AFP - La principal empresa de electrónica, Sharp, anunció que el beneficio neto intermedio aumentó un 40,7 por ciento hasta alcanzar un récord gracias a las sólidas ventas de televisores de cristal líquido y teléfonos móviles con cámara, pero advirtió sobre las perspectivas debido al posible impacto de los altos precios del petróleo en el crecimiento económico mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - Top electronics company, Sharp, has announced a notable 40.7 percent increase in their interim net profit, citing strong sales of their liquid crystal display TVs and camera-equipped mobile phones. Despite this success, the company expressed concern about future prospects due to the potential influence of rising oil prices on worldwide economic expansion.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - Sharp, a frontrunner in the electronics industry, reported a record growth with a 40.7 percent rise in its net earnings for the first half, driven by strong sales in LCD TVs and camera-integrated cellphones. However, the firm conveyed apprehension about upcoming prospects, warning that high oil prices may pose a threat to global economic growth.

Original Text: Yukos CFO tells court of threats Yukos chief financial officer Bruce Mismore on Thursday testified that Russian authorities were threatening him with legal action and possible extradition
Translation: El director financiero de Yukos le dice al tribunal sobre las amenazas. El jefe de finanzas de Yukos, Bruce Mismore, testificó el jueves que las autoridades rusas lo estaban amenazando con acciones legales y posible extradición.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bruce Mismore, the chief financial officer of Yukos, testified in court on Thursday about facing threats of legal action and potential extradition from Russian authorities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Yukos' CFO, Bruce Mismore, relayed to the court that he was being threatened with legal reprisals and perhaps extradition by the Russian officials.

Original Text: Johnny Damon Complains of Migraines (AP) AP - Boston Red Sox center fielder Johnny Damon is having a recurrence of migraine headaches that first bothered him after a collision in last year's playoffs.
Translation: Johnny Damon se Queja de Migrañas (AP) AP - El jardinero central de los Boston Red Sox, Johnny Damon, está teniendo una recurrencia de dolores de cabeza por migraña que le molestó por primera vez después de una colisión en los playoffs del año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - Recurrent migraines are bothering Boston Red Sox center fielder Johnny Damon, a problem first noticed following a collision in last year's playoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Johnny Damon, the center fielder for Boston Red Sox, is experiencing a return of the migraine headaches that first troubled him after a playoff collision last year.

Original Text: Rescuers search for Sinai blasts survivors TABA: Rescue workers sifted through the wreckage of an Egyptian Red Sea hotel yesterday, hoping to find survivors after a series of three bombs targeting Israeli tourists in the Sinai Peninsula killed at least 33 people.
Translation: Los rescatistas buscan a sobrevivientes de las explosiones en Sinaí TABA: Ayer, los trabajadores de rescate tamizaron los escombros de un hotel egipcio en el Mar Rojo, con la esperanza de encontrar sobrevivientes después de una serie de tres bombas dirigidas a turistas israelíes en la península de Sinaí que mataron al menos a 33 personas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Taba, rescuers delved into the debris of a Red Sea hotel in Egypt, optimistic about finding survivors from the Sinai Peninsula triple bombing aimed at Israeli tourists, which claimed a minimum of 33 lives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, rescue operators rummaged through the ruins of a Red Sea hotel in Egypt, looking for survivors from a three-fold bomb attack targeting Israeli visitors in the Sinai Peninsula that resulted in at least 33 fatalities.

Original Text: Half-Life 2 set for mid-November One of the most anticipated computer games of the year, Half-Life 2, is seeing the light of day in November. The game is due to go on sale worldwide on 16 November, its publisher Vivendi have announced.
Translation: La fecha de lanzamiento de Half-Life 2 se establece para mediados de noviembre. Uno de los videojuegos de computadora más esperados del año, Half-Life 2, verá la luz del día en Noviembre. El juego saldrá a la venta a nivel mundial el 16 de noviembre, ha anunciado su editor, Vivendi.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The publisher Vivendi has announced that one of this year's most eagerly awaited computer games, Half-Life 2, is scheduled for release worldwide on 16th November.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It has been announced by Vivendi that Half-Life 2, one of the hottest computer games of the year, is slated to be released globally on November 16th.

Original Text: Immediate upside for Yankees If the Randy Johnson deal gets done, the Yankees will have the best rotation in the American League - if it gets done. The Yankees continued discussions yesterday with Arizona and Los Angeles
Translation: Inmediata ventaja para los Yankees si se concreta el trato de Randy Johnson. Los Yankees tendrán la mejor rotación en la Liga Americana - si se realiza. Los Yankees continuaron ayer las discusiones con Arizona y Los Ángeles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If the Yankees finalize the deal for Randy Johnson, it would ensure they have the finest pitching rotation in the American League. This depends on the conclusion of the transaction, for which the Yankees continued their negotiations yesterday with both Arizona and Los Angeles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Should the Yankees succeed in securing Randy Johnson, it would position them with the superior rotation in the American League, provided the deal is realized. Yesterday saw further talks between the Yankees, Arizona, and Los Angeles.

Original Text: US Upholds Tariffs on Shrimp Imports The Bush administration on Tuesday upheld the imposition of penalty tariffs on shrimp imports from China and Vietnam, handing a victory to beleaguered US shrimp producers.
Translation: EE. UU. Mantiene Aranceles a las Importaciones de Camarones. La administración de Bush el martes respaldó la imposición de aranceles punitivos a las importaciones de camarones de China y Vietnam, otorgando una victoria a los agobiados productores de camarones de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, the Bush administration continued supporting penalty tariffs on shrimp imports from China and Vietnam, providing significant relief for struggling US shrimp producers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Maintaining the penalty tariffs on shrimp imports from China and Vietnam was the decision made by the Bush administration on Tuesday, marking a win for the distressed US shrimp producers.

Original Text: DISNEY BOARD BACKED OVITZ Directors at Walt Disney nominated Michael Ovitz to serve on its board for three years at a 1996 meeting just weeks before forcing him out of his job as president, Ovitz told a Delaware court yesterday.
Translation: LA JUNTA DE DISNEY RESPALDÓ A OVITZ Los directores de Walt Disney nominaron a Michael Ovitz para servir en su junta durante tres años en una reunión de 1996, solo semanas antes de obligarlo a salir de su puesto como presidente, Ovitz le dijo a un tribunal de Delaware ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Michael Ovitz revealed to a Delaware court yesterday that weeks before he was ousted from his post as president, he was nominated by Walt Disney's board directors to serve a three-year term on the board, during a meeting in 1996.
Paraphrase 2: 2) At a 1996 meeting, Michael Ovitz was nominated for a three-year term on Walt Disney's board of directors - a nomination that came just weeks before he was compelled to leave his position as president, as Ovitz unveiled in a Delaware court yesterday.

Original Text: IBM Launches Global Computing Grid to Support Research The project will tap into the power of home PCs to create a virtul supercomputer. By Paul McDougall. As part of a broader effort to spur collaborative research in key industries, IBM on Tuesday launched a project
Translation: IBM lanza Red Global de Computación para Apoyar la Investigación. El proyecto aprovechará el poder de las PCs domésticas para crear una supercomputadora virtual. Por Paul McDougall. Como parte de un esfuerzo más amplio para impulsar la investigación colaborativa en industrias clave, IBM lanzó un proyecto el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM initiated a global computing grid project on Tuesday as a part of a broader push to accelerate cooperative research in vital sectors; this project aims to harness the power of personal computers at home to build a virtual supercomputer. The announcement was made by Paul McDougall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A project was launched by IBM on Tuesday - a worldwide computing grid specifically designed to aid research. The scheme is set to utilize the capabilities of domestic PCs for the construction of a virtual supercomputer as a means to promote research collaboration within pivotal industries. This news was relayed by Paul McDougall.

Original Text: Dell tightens Linux ties Novell's SuSE software is set to join Red Hat as a server option. Also: Is AMD in Dell's future?
Translation: Dell estrecha lazos con Linux. El software SuSE de Novell está configurado para unirse a Red Hat como opción de servidor. Además: ¿Está AMD en el futuro de Dell?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dell strengthens its connection with Linux as Novell's SuSE software is poised to stand alongside Red Hat as a server option. Plus, could AMD be a part of Dell's future plans?
Paraphrase 2: 2. The bond between Dell and Linux intensifies as Novell's SuSE software prepares to accompany Red Hat as a server alternative. In addition, could AMD be on the horizon for Dell?

Original Text: Linux cluster companies attract new funds Venture capitalists are lavishing money on the fashionable Linux supercomputing concept--but smaller firms face much larger rivals.
Translation: Las empresas de clústeres de Linux atraen nuevos fondos. Los capitalistas de riesgo están derrochando dinero en el moderno concepto de supercomputación Linux, pero las empresas más pequeñas se enfrentan a rivales mucho más grandes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Venture capitalists are generously investing in the trendy concept of Linux supercomputing, though smaller firms are up against much larger competitors. New funds are being drawn in by Linux cluster businesses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Linux cluster enterprises are receiving new investments as venture capitalists pour money into the popular concept of Linux supercomputing. However, these smaller firms are contending with much bigger adversaries.

Original Text: UK: M amp;S reports lower profit, reshuffles management UK food and clothing retailer Marks  amp; Spencer has reported lower profits for the first half, and announced management changes as it tries to turn around its business.
Translation: Reino Unido: M amp; S informa menores ganancias y reorganiza la administración. El minorista de alimentos y ropa británico Marks & Spencer ha informado sobre menores beneficios en la primera mitad del año, y ha anunciado cambios en la gestión mientras intenta dar un giro a su negocio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Marks & Spencer, a food and clothing retailer from the UK, announced management changes while reporting a decrease in profits for the first half, as they strategize to revive their business.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As it aims to rejuvenate its business, the UK-based food and clothing retailer, Marks & Spencer, has declared a fall in the first half profits and initiated management modifications.

Original Text: Stocks Fall As Oil Climbs Past \$55 Mark NEW YORK - Nervous investors sent stocks mostly lower Monday as a barrel of crude topped \$55 per barrel, yet another record. Only the Nasdaq composite index posted a meager gain...
Translation: Las acciones caen mientras el petróleo supera la marca de los \$55 NUEVA YORK - Los inversores nerviosos enviaron las acciones principalmente a la baja el lunes mientras un barril de crudo superó los \$55 por barril, otro récord más. Solo el índice compuesto Nasdaq registró una ganancia modesta...
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, jittery investors largely brought about a decline in stocks as crude barrel prices escalated beyond the $55 benchmark, marking a new record. The only marginal rise was showcased by the Nasdaq composite index in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In New York, apprehensive investors primarily caused a decrease in stock value as the price per barrel of crude reached an unprecedented level of $55. Apart from a slight increase in the Nasdaq composite index, Monday saw stocks mostly in the red.

Original Text: Cardinals show their power with 5 homers against Dodgers ST. LOUIS, Missouri Larry Walker savored the moment - make that moments - from the top step of the St. Louis Cardinals #39; dugout.
Translation: Los Cardenales muestran su poder con 5 jonrones contra los Dodgers ST. LOUIS, Missouri Larry Walker saboreó el momento - hagan esos momentos - desde el primer escalón del dugout de los St. Louis Cardinals #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Larry Walker cherished the moments, all from the top step of St. Louis Cardinals' dugout, as the Cardinals demonstrated their strength with 5 home runs against the Dodgers, in ST. LOUIS, Missouri.
Paraphrase 2: 2. From the top step of the ST. LOUIS, Missouri based Cardinals' dugout, Larry Walker relished the moments when the Cardinals showcased their prowess by hitting 5 home runs against the Dodgers.

Original Text: Ex-General Defeats Indonesia's Megawati, Test Awaits  JAKARTA (Reuters) - Former general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono  has triumphed over incumbent Megawati Sukarnoputri in  Indonesia's first direct presidential vote, but now must  deliver promised tighter security, better government and more  jobs.
Translation: Ex-general Derrota a Megawati de Indonesia, Prueba Espera JAKARTA (Reuters) - El ex general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono ha triunfado sobre la titular Megawati Sukarnoputri en el primer voto presidencial directo de Indonesia, pero ahora debe cumplir con la prometida mayor seguridad, mejor gobierno y más trabajos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. JAKARTA (Reuters) - Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, a former general, has emerged victorious over the current president, Megawati Sukarnoputri, in Indonesia's inaugural direct presidential election. Yet, his victory brings with it the challenges of fulfilling his assurances for enhanced security, improved governance, and increased employment opportunities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. JAKARTA (Reuters) - The first direct presidential vote in Indonesia has been won by former general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, defeating the sitting President Megawati Sukarnoputri. Having achieved this victory, he now faces the task of making good on his promises of heightened security, enhanced government function and job growth.

Original Text: Defense was up for challenge CLEVELAND -- The Patriots' defense wasn't tested much while the outcome was in doubt during a 42-15 victory over the Cleveland Browns yesterday. The Patriots allowed one first down and picked off a Luke McCown pass in taking a 14-0 lead in the first quarter.
Translation: La defensa estaba preparada para el desafío CLEVELAND -- La defensa de los Patriots no fue probada en gran medida mientras el resultado estaba en duda durante una victoria de 42-15 sobre los Cleveland Browns ayer. Los Patriots permitieron un primer down y interceptaron un pase de Luke McCown, tomando una ventaja de 14-0 en el primer cuarto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, in a staggering 42-15 win over the Cleveland Browns, the Patriots' defense was infrequently challenged when the game's result was still uncertain. During the first quarter, the Patriots managed to limit the Browns to a solitary first down and intercepted a pass from Luke McCown, securing an early 14-0 advantage.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During their 42-15 triumph over the Cleveland Browns yesterday, the Patriots' defense faced minimal challenge as the game's direction was still debatable. The Patriots managed to intercede a pass from Luke McCown and kept the Browns to a single first down, swiftly establishing their dominance with a first-quarter 14-0 lead.

Original Text: Tick, tock: Clock #39;s running on Coughlin #39;s methods I want to understand what it #39;s like to play for Tom Coughlin. So I file this column at 5:30 pm Friday -- 28 hours before deadline -- and the Times Union fines me 63 cents for writing in my home office in boxer
Translation: Tic, tac: El reloj corre sobre los métodos de Coughlin. Quiero entender qué se siente al jugar para Tom Coughlin. Así que presento esta columna a las 5:30 pm del viernes, 28 horas antes de la fecha límite, y el Times Union me multa con 63 centavos por escribir en mi oficina en casa en bóxer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I wish to comprehend what it feels like playing for Tom Coughlin. Thus, I'm submitting this article at 5:30 pm on Friday, 28 hours before the deadline. For working from my home office in boxers, the Times Union charges me a 63-cent penalty. The clock is ticking on Coughlin's procedures.
Paraphrase 2: 2. I'm eager to learn what playing under Tom Coughlin entails. Therefore, I've completed this column 28 hours ahead of the deadline, specifically at 5:30 pm on Friday. However, my decision to write from my home office in my boxers resulted in a 63-cent fine from the Times Union. Time is running out to explore Coughlin's approach.

Original Text: Notre Dame #39;s firing isn #39;t case of black, white Now that Notre Dame has fired Tyrone Willingham, that #39;s how many black head coaches there are at America #39;s 117 Division IA universities.
Translation: El despido de Notre Dame no es un caso de blanco y negro. Ahora que Notre Dame ha despedido a Tyrone Willingham, ese es el número de entrenadores principales negros que hay en las 117 universidades de la División IA de América.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Now that Tyrone Willingham has been dismissed by Notre Dame, the number of black head coaches at America's 117 Division IA universities has reduced to 39; it's not merely a case of black and white.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With Notre Dame's sacking of Tyrone Willingham, this symbolizes the tally of black head coaches in the 117 Division IA universities in America, and the situation isn't as straightforward as black and white.

Original Text: Here's a Hot Tip... Perhaps the most important question you can ask when receiving a hot tip: "Why are you telling me this?"
Translation: Aquí tienes un consejo valioso... Quizás la pregunta más importante que puedes hacer al recibir un consejo valioso: "¿Por qué me estás diciendo esto?"
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hot Tip Reinvented... The vital question to inquire when someone offers a hot tip could be: "What's the reason for sharing this with me?"
Paraphrase 2: 2. Regarding a Hot Tip... The most significant question you might consider when handed a hot tip is: "What's your motive for informing me?"

Original Text: Giants Beat Astros, Boost Playoff Hopes (AP) AP - Barry Bonds and the San Francisco Giants can reach the playoffs two ways. They certainly boosted both chances Tuesday night. Brett Tomko won his sixth consecutive decision and San Francisco beat the visiting Houston Astros 9-2 to maintain their wild-card lead and move within 1 1/2 games of first-place Los Angeles in the NL West.
Translation: Los Gigantes Vencen a los Astros, Aumentan Esperanzas de Playoffs (AP) AP - Barry Bonds y los Gigantes de San Francisco pueden llegar a los playoffs de dos maneras. Sin duda aumentaron ambas posibilidades la noche del martes. Brett Tomko ganó su sexta decisión consecutiva y San Francisco derrotó a los Houston Astros, visitantes, por 9-2 para mantener su liderato en el comodín y acercarse a 1 1/2 juegos del primer lugar de Los Ángeles en el Oeste de la Liga Nacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - As the San Francisco Giants, along with Barry Bonds, defeated the Houston Astros 9-2 at their home ground on Tuesday night, their chances of reaching the playoffs significantly improved. This victory not only upheld their wild-card lead but also brought them a step closer to Los Angeles, thereby narrowing the gap to merely 1 1/2 games in the NL West. Brett Tomko led the team to a victory for the sixth time in a row.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - The San Francisco Giants, with Barry Bonds at the helm, scored an undeniable victory against the Houston Astros in their own turf, winning by an impressive scoreline of 9-2, which considerably enhanced their playoff prospects. As a result of this triumph not only their wild-card advantage was preserved, but they also closed in on Los Angeles in the NL West, being only 1 1/2 games behind. The credit of this sixth straight successful outing goes to Brett Tomko.

Original Text: London begins to believe the impossible It was Jonathan Edwards who best summed up the overriding mood when he helped London officially unveil its candidature for the 2012 Olympic Games yesterday.
Translation: Londres comienza a creer en lo imposible. Fue Jonathan Edwards quien mejor resumió el ánimo predominante cuando ayudó a Londres a presentar oficialmente su candidatura para los Juegos Olímpicos de 2012 ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, during the official unveiling of London's candidacy for the 2012 Olympic Games, Jonathan Edwards aptly encapsulated the prevailing attitude of the city beginning to embrace the seemingly impossible.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jonathan Edwards encapsulated the dominant mood of London finally accepting the impossible perfectly, as he helped the city officially announce its bid for the 2012 Olympic Games yesterday.

Original Text: Warriors hold on against Celtics Troy Murphy had his fourth straight double-double with a career-high 30 points and 15 rebounds, and the Golden State Warriors won consecutive games for the first time this
Translation: Los Guerreros resisten contra los Celtics. Troy Murphy tuvo su cuarto doble-doble consecutivo con una máxima en su carrera de 30 puntos y 15 rebotes, y los Golden State Warriors ganaron juegos consecutivos por primera vez este año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Troy Murphy achieved his fourth successive double-double, scoring a record 30 points with 15 rebounds, leading the Golden State Warriors to their second win in a row against the Celtics for the first time this season.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a personal-best of 30 points and 15 rebounds, Troy Murphy secured his fourth back-to-back double-double and helped the Golden State Warriors secure back-to-back victories against the Celtics for the first time this season.

Original Text: ID Biomedical wins major US flu vaccine deal TORONTO - Shares of flu vaccine maker ID Biomedical surged more than 10 per cent Monday after it announced US distribution deals that could bring \$2.3 billion US in revenue for the company.
Translation: ID Biomedical gana un importante contrato de vacuna contra la gripe en EEUU TORONTO - Las acciones del fabricante de vacunas contra la gripe ID Biomedical se dispararon más del 10 por ciento el lunes después de anunciar acuerdos de distribución en EEUU que podrían generar 2.3 mil millones de dólares en ingresos para la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The flu vaccine manufacturer, ID Biomedical, witnessed a surge of over 10 per cent in their shares on Monday following the announcement of major US distribution deals, potentially generating $2.3 billion US for the firm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the breakthrough of achieving significant US distribution deals likely to yield $2.3 billion US, ID Biomedical, a flu vaccine producer, saw an increase of more than 10 per cent in their shares on Monday.

Original Text: Chargers lose their leading wide receiver SAN DIEGO - The San Diego Chargers lost a wide receiver Tuesday, the same day they acquired Keenan McCardell from the Buccaneers. While they were finalizing the deal for McCardell just before the NFL trading
Translation: Los Chargers pierden a su principal receptor abierto SAN DIEGO - Los Chargers de San Diego perdieron a un receptor abierto el martes, el mismo día que adquirieron a Keenan McCardell de los Buccaneers. Mientras estaban finalizando el trato por McCardell justo antes del cierre de intercambios de la NFL.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN DIEGO - On Tuesday, while they were ironing out Keenan McCardell's acquisition from the Buccaneers, San Diego Chargers suffered a blow by losing their best wide receiver.

Original Text: Towns Celebrate and Hope Amir Can Strike Gold Amir Khans victory sparked scenes of celebration tonight in the two towns where the boxing sensation lives and trains. Family and friends in Bolton and Bury heaped praise on the
Translation: Las ciudades celebran y esperan que Amir pueda conseguir oro. La victoria de Amir Khan provocó escenas de celebración esta noche en las dos ciudades donde vive y entrena la sensación de boxeo. Familiares y amigos en Bolton y Bury alabaron a Amir.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The triumph of Amir Khan prompted festive scenes tonight in Bolton and Bury, where the celebrated boxer resides and practices. His family and friends in these two towns were filled with admiration and high praise for him.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tonight, Amir Khan's win triggered jubilant celebrations in both towns he calls home - Bolton and Bury. People who know him personally, such as friends and family, were overflowing with compliments for him.

Original Text: H R Block Faces Fraud Over Enron Bonds (Reuters) Reuters - H R Block Inc.'s  financial\advisers unit misrepresented the risks of  #36;16.4 million in\bonds from Enron Corp  before the energy trader sank\into bankruptcy, the NASD said in a civil fraud complaint\seeking restitution for more than 800 investors.
Translation: H R Block enfrenta fraude por bonos de Enron (Reuters) Reuters - La unidad de asesores financieros de H R Block Inc. tergiversó los riesgos de 16,4 millones de dólares en bonos de Enron Corp antes de que el operador de energía cayera en bancarrota, dijo la NASD en una denuncia de fraude civil buscando la restitución para más de 800 inversores.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters reports that the NASD lodged a civil fraud complaint against H R Block Inc.'s financial advising segment, claiming that it misrepresented the risks tied to $16.4 million worth of Enron Corp bonds before the energy firm fell into bankruptcy, thereby deceiving over 800 investors.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - H R Block Inc.'s financial advisers division is facing a civil fraud lawsuit from the NASD. It's alleged that the division concealed the risks of Enron Corp's $16.4 million bonds, prior to the energy company's bankruptcy, causing losses for more than 800 investors.

Original Text: August Chip Sales Growth Slows on High Inventory Global semiconductor sales growth slowed to 1 percent in August as electronics makers reacted to growing inventories in Asia by limiting orders of chips, an industry trade group said on Thursday.
Translation: El crecimiento de las ventas de chips en agosto se desacelera debido al alto inventario. El crecimiento de las ventas globales de semiconductores se ralentizó al 1 por ciento en agosto, ya que los fabricantes de electrónicos reaccionaron ante el crecimiento de los inventarios en Asia limitando los pedidos de chips, dijo un grupo comercial de la industria el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The growth of global semiconductor sales in August decelerated to 1 percent due to electronics manufacturers controlling chip orders in response to the increasing inventories in Asia, according to an industry trade group statement on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, an industry trade group revealed that the upscale in global semiconductor sales had dialed down to 1 percent in August. This was due to electronics manufacturers in Asia scaling back on chip orders as a result of increasing inventories.

Original Text: Mauresmo through to Advanta final Amelie Mauresmo was handed a place in the Advanta Championships final after Maria Sharapova withdrew from their semi-final because of injury.
Translation: Mauresmo avanza a la final de Advanta. Amelie Mauresmo obtuvo un lugar en la final del Campeonato Advanta después de que Maria Sharapova se retiró de su semifinal debido a una lesión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After Maria Sharapova had to withdraw from their semi-final match due to an injury, Amelie Mauresmo gained a spot in the final of the Advanta Championships.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A spot in the Advanta Championships' final was secured by Amelie Mauresmo following Maria Sharapova's withdrawal from their semi-final match because of an injury.

Original Text: Insurgents claim responsibility for Baghdad raid MAXINE McKEW: In Iraq, the group led by the country #39;s most wanted insurgent has claimed responsibility for a deadly attack on a police station in western Baghdad.
Translation: Los insurgentes se atribuyen la responsabilidad del asalto en Bagdad. MAXINE McKEW: En Irak, el grupo liderado por el insurgente más buscado del país se ha atribuido la responsabilidad de un mortal ataque a una estación de policía en el oeste de Bagdad.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In Iraq, the faction under the leadership of the nation's most pursued insurgent has taken accountability for a lethal assault on a police station in western Baghdad, reports MAXINE McKEW.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The group led by Iraq's most sought-after insurgent has stated they are responsible for a devastating attack on a western Baghdad police station, according to MAXINE McKEW.

Original Text: NFL: Parcells bests Gibbs LANDOVER, Maryland The coaches are older and grayer, and Lawrence Taylor and Mark Rypien are long retired. But on the football field little else has changed in the rivalry between Bill Parcells and Joe Gibbs.
Translation: NFL: Parcells supera a Gibbs LANDOVER, Maryland Los entrenadores son más viejos y canosos, y Lawrence Taylor y Mark Rypien se han retirado hace tiempo. Pero en el campo de fútbol, poco más ha cambiado en la rivalidad entre Bill Parcells y Joe Gibbs.
Paraphrase 1: NFL: Parcells outperforms Gibbs in LANDOVER, Maryland - Although the coaches have aged and greyed, and despite the retirement of Lawrence Taylor and Mark Rypien, the competition on the football field between Bill Parcells and Joe Gibbs remains as intense as ever.
Paraphrase 2: NFL: In LANDOVER, Maryland, Parcells triumphs over Gibbs - The coaches may have aged, their hair turned greyer, and Lawrence Taylor and Mark Rypien may have retired long ago, but the enduring rivalry on the football field between Bill Parcells and Joe Gibbs is as potent as ever.

Original Text: Iraq extends al-Jazeera ban and raids offices Iraqi security officers stormed al-Jazeera #39;s Baghdad offices and sealed the newsroom with red wax at the weekend after the US-backed interim government banned the Arabic television station from broadcasting in the country.
Translation: Irak extiende la prohibición a al-Jazeera y allana las oficinas. Los oficiales de seguridad iraquíes irrumpieron en las oficinas de al-Jazeera en Bagdad y sellaron la sala de redacción con cera roja durante el fin de semana, después de que el gobierno interino respaldado por los EE.UU. prohibiera a la estación de televisión árabe transmitir en el país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the weekend, Iraqi security officers launched a raid on al-Jazeera's Baghdad offices, culminating in the sealing of the newsroom with red wax. This act followed the decision by the US-supported interim government to prohibit the Arabic television station from airing its broadcasts within the nation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following a ban by the US-backed interim government on the Arabic TV station al-Jazeera, Iraqi security officers stormed its Baghdad offices. They subsequently sealed the newsroom with red wax over the course of the weekend.

Original Text: Blair fine after heart operation : World News  gt; London, Oct 01 : British Prime Minister Tony Blair today underwent a non-surgical operation to correct a heart flutter and is  quot;doing ok quot;.
Translation: Blair está bien después de la operación del corazón: Noticias Mundiales > Londres, Oct 01: El Primer Ministro británico Tony Blair se sometió hoy a una operación no quirúrgica para corregir un aleteo cardíaco y está "bien".
Paraphrase 1: 1. "British Prime Minister Tony Blair has successfully undergone a non-surgical procedure to rectify a heart flutter in London today, October 01, and his condition is fine," according to World News.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tony Blair, serving as British Prime Minister, has today on October 01, undergone a non-invasive operation in London to manage a heart flutter and is currently in stable condition, reports World News.

Original Text: #39;Winky #39; again sets sights on Mosley It would be easy to dismiss a fighter known as  quot;Winky. quot; It also would be a mistake. The first fighter in 29 years to unify the junior middleweight division, Ronald Lamont Wright is slightly
Translation: #39;Winky' de nuevo establece su objetivo en Mosley. Sería fácil descartar a un boxeador conocido como "Winky". También sería un error. El primer luchador en 29 años en unificar la división de peso medio junior, Ronald Lamont Wright es ligeramente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ronald Lamont Wright, also known as "Winky" who's the first fighter to unify the junior middleweight division in 29 years, again targets Mosley. It's simple to underestimate a fighter by the name of "Winky," however, that could be an error.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It would be misleading to belittle a boxer named "Winky," but it could also lead to an error. Ronald Lamont Wright, the first person to unify the junior middleweight division in nearly three decades, once again aims toward Mosley.

Original Text: Oil Eases as Supplies Offset Winter Fears  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Oil prices eased on Friday as swelling  crude stockpiles countered worries over a cold snap in the U.S.  Northeast that is expected to keep furnaces fired up until the  middle of next week.
Translation: El petróleo se suaviza a medida que los suministros compensan los temores invernales NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo se suavizaron el viernes ya que la creciente acumulación de reservas de crudo contrarrestó las preocupaciones por una ola de frío en el noreste de los EE. UU. que se espera mantenga las calderas encendidas hasta mediados de la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK (Reuters) - The increase in crude oil inventories alleviated concerns of rising oil prices on Friday, despite expectations of high furnace usage due to a severe cold spell in the U.S. Northeast until mid-next week.
Paraphrase 2: 2) NEW YORK (Reuters) - Despite the anticipation of relentless cold in the U.S. Northeast requiring high furnace use until next week, a surge in crude oil supply resulted in softer oil prices on Friday.

Original Text: A Google Cheat Sheet By the time this column is published, Google may or may not have launched its initial public offering, which may or may not have gone out at more than \$100 per share and which may or may not have either fallen drastically or spiked upward during its first
Translation: Una Chuleta de Google Para cuando se publique esta columna, Google puede o no haber lanzado su oferta pública inicial, la cual puede o no haber salido a más de \$100 por acción y que puede o no haber caído drásticamente o disparado al alza durante su primer día.
Paraphrase 1: 1. By the time this article is released, the release of Google's initial public offering might have occurred, and it could possibly have been valued over $100 per share. The value, however, could potentially have drastically dropped or dramatically risen during its initial phase.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Google's initial public offering could have been launched, possibly at a cost exceeding $100 per share, by the time this article goes live. It is uncertain whether the price then dipped substantially or soared high immediately after its launch.

Original Text: Central America Said on Alert for Attack (AP) AP - All of Central America is on alert for a possible al-Qaida attack against El Salvador for its support of the U.S.-led mission in Iraq, the head of the Nicaraguan army said Friday.
Translation: Centroamérica en Alerta por Ataque (AP) AP - Toda Centroamérica está en alerta por un posible ataque de al-Qaida contra El Salvador por su apoyo a la misión liderada por Estados Unidos en Irak, dijo el viernes el jefe del ejército nicaragüense.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Nicaraguan army's chief declared on Friday that entire Central America is on high alert for a possible al-Qaida attack directed at El Salvador due to its involvement in the U.S.-led mission in Iraq, according to AP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AP reports a warning issued on Friday by the head of the Nicaraguan army. He stated that a probable al-Qaida offensive on El Salvador is making Central America vigilant, particularly given El Salvador's backing of the U.S. mission in Iraq.

Original Text: Randall Makes Difference One person not surprised by Virginia Tech's successful season is Ralph Friedgen, who says quarterback Bryan Randall is the key.
Translation: Randall marca la diferencia. Una persona que no se sorprende por la exitosa temporada de Virginia Tech es Ralph Friedgen, quien dice que el mariscal de campo Bryan Randall es la clave.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ralph Friedgen is not shocked by Virginia Tech's prosperous season and credits their success to quarterback Bryan Randall, whom he considers instrumental.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The flourishing season of Virginia Tech doesn't surprise Ralph Friedgen, as he believes their quarterback Bryan Randall plays a pivotal role.

Original Text: Ontario Teachers #39; Pension Plan buying Alliance Laundry Holdings <b>...</b> TORONTO (CP) - The Ontario Teachers #39; Pension Plan has signed an agreement to buy Alliance Laundry Holdings LLC, a US laundry equipment maker, in a deal worth \$450 million US.
Translation: Plan de Pensiones de Maestros de Ontario comprando Alliance Laundry Holdings ... TORONTO (CP) - El Plan de Pensiones de Maestros de Ontario ha firmado un acuerdo para comprar Alliance Laundry Holdings LLC, una fabricante estadounidense de equipos de lavandería, en un trato valorado en \$450 millones de dólares estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan confirmed their intent to purchase Alliance Laundry Holdings LLC, an American laundry equipment manufacturer, for a deal valued at 450 million US dollars.

Original Text: Darfur talks to seek political deal amid fighting Sudanese officials and Darfur rebels arrived in Nigeria on Friday for talks on a political deal to end two years of conflict in the vast desert region which observers say is slipping deeper into chaos.
Translation: Los funcionarios sudaneses y los rebeldes de Darfur llegaron a Nigeria el viernes para conversaciones sobre un acuerdo político para poner fin a dos años de conflicto en la vasta región desértica que, según los observadores, se está sumergiendo cada vez más en el caos. Las conversaciones de Darfur buscan alcanzar un acuerdo político en medio de la lucha.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Sudanese officials and Darfur rebels convened in Nigeria with the aim of discussing a political agreement to terminate the two-year conflict in the vast desert region of Darfur, a location many claim is descending into greater turmoil.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an attempt to conclude the persistent dispute in Darfur, a sprawling desert region observed to be increasingly chaotic, delegates of Sudanese officials and Darfurian rebels landed in Nigeria for discussions concerning a political resolution this Friday.

Original Text: Dot-Coms Get Back in IPO Game (washingtonpost.com) washingtonpost.com - The successful bidders for Google shares won't be the only ones watching eagerly to see how much the IPO excites the stock market. Dozens of dot-com companies are hoping that Google's initial public offering marks a reawakening of all things Internet.
Translation: Dot-Coms Regresan al Juego de IPO (washingtonpost.com) washingtonpost.com - Los licitadores exitosos para las acciones de Google no serán los únicos que estén esperando ansiosos para ver cuánto emociona la IPO al mercado de valores. Docenas de empresas punto-com esperan que la oferta pública inicial de Google marque un despertar de todas las cosas de Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Washingtonpost.com - Those who scored Google shares are not the only ones monitoring the potential stir the IPO may bring to the stock market. Several internet-based companies anticipate that Google's IPO could signify a revival of all internet-related affairs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. washingtonpost.com - Google's stock's successful purchasers are not the only ones keeping a keen eye on the IPO's impact on the stock market. Numerous internet companies are banking on Google's IPO to trigger a resurgence of everything related to the Internet.

Original Text: Car Bomb Kills 7 U.S. Marines Near Iraqi Town of Falluja The deadliest attack on Americans in Iraq since May came as Iraqi officials announced that Saddam Hussein's deputy had not been captured on Sunday.
Translation: Un coche bomba mata a 7 infantes de marina estadounidenses cerca de la ciudad iraquí de Falluja. El ataque más mortífero sobre los estadounidenses en Iraq desde mayo ocurrió mientras los funcionarios iraquíes anunciaban que el subalterno de Saddam Hussein no había sido capturado el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Near the Iraqi town of Falluja, a car bomb that took the lives of 7 U.S. Marines marked the most lethal assault on Americans in Iraq since May. Meanwhile, Iraqi authorities stated on Sunday that Saddam Hussein's associate had evaded capture.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a lethal attack, the deadliest on Americans in Iraq since May, a car bomb claimed the lives of 7 US Marines near Falluja, an Iraqi town. In other developments, Iraqi officials refuted claims that Saddam Hussein's deputy was captured on Sunday.

Original Text: MLB Deal Favorable To Orioles #39; Angelos  Bud Selig announces that the troubled Montreal Expos will move to Washington, returning baseball to the nation #39;s capital for the 2005 season.
Translation: Acuerdo de la MLB favorable para Angelos de los Orioles #39; Bud Selig anuncia que los problemáticos Montreal Expos se trasladarán a Washington, devolviendo el béisbol a la capital de la nación para la temporada 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bud Selig pronounces that the embattled Montreal Expos are relocating to Washington, giving the nation's capital its own baseball team again for the 2005 season, in a MLB deal that benefits Orioles' Angelos.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Orioles' Angelos is favored by a MLB agreement as Bud Selig declares that the struggling Montreal Expos will be shifted to Washington, reinstating baseball in the nation's capital for the season of 2005.

Original Text: Britains Prince Harry scuffles with photographer outside <b>...</b> LONDON - Prince Harry, fast gaining a reputation as Britains most unruly royal, was involved in a scuffle with a photographer outside a London nightclub early Thursday, palace officials and witnesses said.
Translation: El Príncipe Harry de Gran Bretaña se enfrenta con un fotógrafo fuera de <b>...</b> LONDRES - El Príncipe Harry, ganándose rápidamente una reputación como el miembro más rebelde de la realeza británica, estuvo involucrado en un enfrentamiento con un fotógrafo fuera de un club nocturno de Londres el jueves por la madrugada, según dijeron funcionarios del palacio y testigos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prince Harry of Britain, who's quickly earning a name as the most disobedient royal, was complicit in a clash with a photographer outside a London club early on Thursday, according to palace representatives and spectators.

Original Text: Consumer Prices Fall As Gas Costs Drop WASHINGTON - Consumer prices, which have been buffeted this year by soaring energy costs, fell by 0.1 percent in July as gasoline costs posted their biggest decline in eight months, the government reported Tuesday.    The Labor Department said the decline in its closely watched Consumer Price Index was the first decrease since a 0.2 percent drop last November, a decline which also reflected a decline in energy costs...
Translation: Los Precios al Consumidor Caen a Medida que Bajan los Costos de Gasolina WASHINGTON - Los precios al consumidor, que han sido sacudidos este año por los altos costos de energía, cayeron un 0.1 por ciento en julio, ya que los costos de la gasolina registraron su mayor descenso en ocho meses, informó el gobierno el martes. El Departamento de Trabajo dijo que la disminución en su índice de precios al consumidor, que es seguido de cerca, fue la primera disminución desde una caída del 0.2 por ciento el pasado noviembre, una disminución que también reflejó una disminución en los costos de energía...
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON - As reported by the government on Tuesday, a significant dip in gasoline costs led to a 0.1 percent decrease in consumer prices in July, marking the most considerable decline in eight months. These prices had previously been significantly impacted by escalating energy costs throughout the year. The initial decline since the 0.2 percent drop last November was noted in the Consumer Price Index, closely monitored by the Labor Department, which was similarly influenced by falling energy costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a Tuesday government report, consumer prices decreased by 0.1 percent in July - a first since a 0.2 percent reduction last November, largely attributable to the reduced energy costs. WASHINGTON - This year, energy costs had been pushing consumer prices up, but in July, they witnessed their most substantial downswing in eight months, primarily due to a decrease in gasoline costs, as revealed by the Consumer Price Index tracked carefully by the Labor Department.

Original Text: Fox, Traded by Lakers to Celtics, Retires (AP) AP - Rick Fox retired Thursday, ending a 13-year pro career during which he was part of three NBA championship teams with the Los Angeles Lakers.
Translation: Zorro, Cambiado por Lakers a Celtics, se Retira (AP) AP - Rick Fox se retiró el jueves, poniendo fin a una carrera profesional de 13 años durante la cual fue parte de tres equipos de campeonato de la NBA con los Lakers de Los Ángeles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rick Fox, who was part of three NBA championship teams with the Los Angeles Lakers and was traded to the Celtics, announced his retirement on Thursday, concluding a 13-year professional career (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ending a 13-year professional career that included three NBA championship wins with the Los Angeles Lakers, Rick Fox, who was traded from the Lakers to the Celtics, has announced his retirement (AP).

Original Text: Top Russian Official: Plane Terror Likely (AP) AP - A top Russian official acknowledged Thursday what many citizens already suspected  #151; that terrorism was the most likely cause of two jetliners crashing minutes apart, a feeling reflected in a newspaper headline warning that "Russia now has a Sept. 11."
Translation: Alto Funcionario Ruso: Probable Terrorismo en Avión (AP) AP - Un alto funcionario ruso reconoció el jueves lo que muchos ciudadanos ya sospechaban #151; que el terrorismo fue la causa más probable de que dos aviones chocaran con minutos de diferencia, un sentimiento reflejado en el titular de un periódico que advertía que "Rusia ahora tiene un 11 de septiembre".
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) A senior official from Russia confirmed on Thursday what had been suspected by many - that terrorism was potentially the main cause of the two planes that crashed within minutes of each other. This sentiment was encapsulated in a newspaper headline stating, "Russia now has a Sept. 11."
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) The possibility of a terror attack being the principal cause of the two plane crashes that occurred minutes apart was acknowledged by a prominent Russian official on Thursday, a suspicion already held by many individuals. This fear was echoed in a newspaper headline declaring, "Russia now has a Sept. 11."

Original Text: P2P Networks Score Legal Victory Against Studios Some advocates involved in the case were arguing that even though their legal argument may fail, the entertainment industry will actually win in the long run, as P2P networks will evolve, as
Translation: Las redes P2P logran una victoria legal contra los estudios. Algunos defensores involucrados en el caso argumentaban que, aunque su argumento legal puede fallar, la industria del entretenimiento realmente ganará a largo plazo, ya que las redes P2P evolucionarán, ya que
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite potentially losing their legal battles, some supporters engaged in the lawsuit contend that, ultimately, the entertainment industry is destined to triumph. They believe this because P2P networks are likely to advance, as some P2P networks have won a legal achievement against studios.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While their legal dispute might not succeed, some proponents in the case have argued that the entertainment sector will, in fact, be the real winners over time, due to the evolution of P2P networks. This idea comes in the wake of P2P networks celebrating a legal victory against studios.

Original Text: Opportunity Rover Stumbles Upon Rocky, Maybe Watery, Find Almost by accident, NASA #39;s Mars rover Opportunity has found a rock that may point to a second water event in the red planet #39;s past.
Translation: Casi por accidente, el Rover Opportunity de la NASA se encuentra con un hallazgo rocoso, quizás acuoso, que puede apuntar a un segundo evento acuático en el pasado del planeta rojo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Opportunity Rover from NASA, almost accidentally, discovered a rock on Mars that might indicate a second instance of water presence in the planet's history.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A rock potentially hinting at a second water event in the history of Mars has been found, almost incidentally, by NASA's Opportunity Rover.

Original Text: Apple Unveils iPod Photo  amp; U2 iPod in India Apple has launched two new variations of the iPod - the Apple iPod Photo and the U2 iPod. A digital music player with a high-resolution color screen, the iPod Photo can hold up to 25,000 digital photos, alongside a music library.
Translation: Apple presenta iPod Photo y U2 iPod en India. Apple ha lanzado dos nuevas variaciones del iPod: el Apple iPod Photo y el U2 iPod. Un reproductor de música digital con una pantalla de alta resolución en color, el iPod Photo puede almacenar hasta 25,000 fotos digitales, junto con una biblioteca de música.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Apple has introduced two innovative variants of the iPod in India, namely the Apple iPod Photo and the U2 iPod. The iPod Photo is a digital music player that offers a high-resolution color display, and it has the capacity to store up to 25,000 digital pictures along with your music collection.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In India, Apple has rolled out two fresh versions of their iconic iPod - the U2 iPod and iPod Photo. Accompanying a music library, the iPod Photo is a digital music player which boasts a high-resolution colour display, capable of storing as many as 25,000 digital images.

Original Text: Avon Profit Up on International Sales  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Avon Products Inc. on Friday posted a  better-than-expected 33 percent increase in third-quarter  profit as business in Latin America and Europe helped offset  weakness in the United States for the direct seller of  cosmetics.
Translation: Las ganancias de Avon aumentan debido a ventas internacionales  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Avon Products Inc. reportó este viernes un incremento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre mejor de lo esperado en un 33 por ciento, ya que los negocios en América Latina y Europa ayudaron a compensar la debilidad en los Estados Unidos para el vendedor directo de cosméticos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHICAGO (Reuters) - On Friday, Avon Products Inc. recorded a third-quarter profit increase of 33% which exceeded expectations, due to strong business performance in Europe and Latin America, which balanced the weaker results in the U.S for the direct cosmetics sales company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. CHICAGO (Reuters) - Boosted by strong international sales in Latin America and Europe, Avon Products Inc. revealed a robust 33% third-quarter profit increase on Friday, surpassing forecasted figures. This substantial boost helped counterbalance the lull in performance within the U.S for the direct cosmetics selling market leader.

Original Text: Koalas to get contraceptives in Australia Koalas in Australia #39;s southeastern state of Victoria will receive contraceptive implants to keep their numbers down. Up to 2,000 female koalas will be implanted with a slow-releasehormone
Translation: Traducir esto al español con precisión: A los koalas de Australia se les proporcionarán anticonceptivos. Los koalas en el estado sureste de Victoria en Australia recibirán implantes anticonceptivos para controlar su población. Se implantará una hormona de liberación lenta a hasta 2,000 koalas hembra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to control their population, up to 2,000 female koalas in Victoria, a southeastern state of Australia, will be given contraceptive implants which gradually release hormones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To maintain population balance, a maximum of 2,000 female koalas in Victoria state, situated in the southeast of Australia, will be implanted with slow-releasing hormone contraceptives.

Original Text: Perth to host Super 14 franchise The Australian Rugby Union (ARU) announced on Friday that Perth will host the fourth Australian team in a Super 14 competition to begin in the 2006 season.
Translation: Perth será anfitrión de la franquicia Super 14. La Unión de Rugby Australiana (ARU) anunció el viernes que Perth acogerá al cuarto equipo australiano en una competición Super 14 que comenzará en la temporada 2006.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Australian Rugby Union (ARU) declared on Friday that Perth has been chosen to be the venue for the fourth Australian team in the Super 14 competition, commencing in the 2006 season.

Original Text: Update 1: AirAsia Makes Solid Stock Market Debut AirAsia Bhd., the first low-cost carrier to be listed in Southeast Asia, made a solid debut Monday on the Malaysian stock exchange, while company officials said they #39;ll decide within two months on plans to acquire 40 new aircraft.
Translation: Actualización 1: AirAsia tiene un sólido debut en el mercado de valores. AirAsia Bhd., el primer transportista de bajo costo que se cotiza en el sudeste de Asia, tuvo un sólido debut el lunes en la bolsa de valores de Malasia, mientras los funcionarios de la compañía dijeron que decidirán en dos meses sobre los planes para adquirir 40 nuevas aeronaves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AirAsia Bhd., recognized as Southeast Asia's first low-cost airline on the stock exchange, had a successful first day on Monday at the Malaysian stock market. The firm's officials reported that a decision regarding the acquisition of 40 new aircrafts would be made in the forthcoming two months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, AirAsia Bhd, the pioneering listed low-cost carrier in Southeast Asia, made an impressive entrance on the Malaysian stock exchange. Decisions on the procurement of 40 new planes are to be confirmed within a timeframe of two months, as articulated by the company's representatives.

Original Text: Big Australian buyback BHP Billiton shareholders are about to be rewarded directly from the torrents of cash coursing through the giant resources group. Perversely, that may make some of them quite unhappy.
Translation: Los grandes accionistas de recompra australianos de BHP Billiton están a punto de ser recompensados directamente de las corrientes de efectivo que fluyen a través del gran grupo de recursos. Paradójicamente, eso podría hacer que algunos de ellos estén bastante descontentos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BHP Billiton shareholders in Australia are about to directly receive rewards from the large amounts of cash flowing through the enormous resources group. Surprisingly, this could lead to dissatisfaction among some of them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There is a substantial amount of money flowing through the multinational mining company, BHP Billiton, and its shareholders are on the brink of being rewarded directly. Ironically, this might upset a few of them.

Original Text: Heralded Lady Vols #39; Freshman Has Surgery KNOXVILLE, Tenn. - Heralded Tennessee freshman Candace Parker underwent knee surgery and could miss the upcoming women #39;s college basketball season.
Translation: Alabada Novata de Lady Vols # 39; Se somete a Cirugía KNOXVILLE, Tenn. - La aclamada novata de Tennessee, Candace Parker, se sometió a una cirugía de rodilla y podría perderse la próxima temporada de baloncesto universitario femenino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Candace Parker, the much-acclaimed Lady Vols #39; freshman, has had knee surgery in Knoxville, Tennessee. There's a possibility that she may miss the approaching season of women's college basketball.

Original Text: N.Korea Vows to Boost Deterrent, U.S. Rejects Demand (Reuters) Reuters - North Korea threatened on Saturday\to double the size of its nuclear deterrent and the United\States rejected its conditions for a resumption of talks,\leaving the two nations in a dangerous stalemate.
Translation: Corea del Norte Promete Aumentar su Deterrente, EE.UU. Rechaza la Demanda (Reuters) Reuters - Corea del Norte amenazó el sábado a duplicar el tamaño de su disuasivo nuclear y los Estados Unidos rechazaron sus condiciones para la reanudación de las conversaciones, dejando a las dos naciones en un peligroso punto muerto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - On Saturday, North Korea promised to enhance its nuclear deterrent, a move to which the United States responded by refusing its prerequisites for resuming dialogue. This ensuing impasse between the two nations poses a serious risk.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - A declaration by North Korea to intensify its nuclear deterrent on Saturday was met by the United States denying its terms for reopening discussions. This has resulted in a precarious deadlock between the two countries.

Original Text: Microsoft Renews Push for Living Room PC (Reuters) Reuters - Microsoft Corp.  is making a\renewed push this week to get its software into living rooms\with the launch of a new version of its Windows XP Media\Center, a personal computer designed for viewing movies,\listening to music and scrolling through digital pictures.
