Translation: Microsoft Renueva Impulso para PC en la Sala de Estar (Reuters) Reuters - Microsoft Corp. está haciendo un nuevo impulso esta semana para introducir su software en las salas de estar con el lanzamiento de una nueva versión de su Windows XP Media Center, una computadora personal diseñada para ver películas, escuchar música y navegar por fotos digitales.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. embarks on revitalizing its quest in sprawling into living rooms this week through the introduction of an updated version of Windows XP Media Center, a personal computer specifically fashioned to cater to entertainment needs such as movie viewing, music listening, and digital picture browsing.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (Reuters) - This week, Microsoft Corp. is redoubling its efforts to infiltrate living rooms around the globe, as it rolls out an innovative rendition of its Windows XP Media Center. This personal computer is engineered to facilitate movie watching, music appreciation, and browsing of digital images.

Original Text: Hurricane Ivan Damages Parts of Barbados ST. GEORGE #39;S, Grenada Sept. 7, 2004 - Packing ferocious winds, Hurricane Ivan made a direct hit on Grenada Tuesday, blasting apart scores of homes and hurling hundreds of the island #39;s landmark red zinc roofs through the air.
Translation: Daños del Huracán Iván en Partes de Barbados. ST. GEORGE'S, Granada, 7 de septiembre de 2004 - Empacando vientos feroces, el Huracán Iván hizo un golpe directo en Granada el martes, destrozando decenas de hogares y lanzando cientos de los emblemáticos techos de zinc rojo de la isla por el aire.
Paraphrase 1: 1. St. George's, Grenada Sept. 7, 2004 - Hurricane Ivan tore through Grenada with lethal winds on Tuesday, destroying numerous houses and propelling hundreds of the island's characteristic red zinc roofs into the sky, causing significant damage to parts of Barbados.
Paraphrase 2: 2. St. George's, Grenada Sept. 7, 2004 - Unleashing fierce winds, Hurricane Ivan directly struck Grenada on Tuesday, shattering many homes and sending hundreds of the island's distinct red zinc roofs airborne, directly impacting parts of Barbados.

Original Text: Weakening Sadr is easier than it seems On Thursday, in what could be a breakthrough for the interim Iraqi government and the coalition forces, a representative of Moqtada al-Sadr, the 30-something Shiite seminary student, announced
Translation: Debilitar a Sadr es más fácil de lo que parece. El jueves, en lo que podría ser un avance para el gobierno provisional iraquí y las fuerzas de la coalición, un representante de Moqtada al-Sadr, el estudiante de seminario chiíta de treinta y tantos años, anunció.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, a representative of Moqtada al-Sadr, the young Shiite seminary student in his thirties, announced, in what may present a critical advancement for the interim Iraqi government and the coalition forces. It seems the task of diminishing Sadr's power may be easier than assumed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A statement was made on Thursday by a spokesperson for Moqtada al-Sadr, a Shiite seminary student in his thirties, suggesting the possibility of a significant development for the Interim Iraqi government and coalition forces - that the process of debilitating Sadr might be less challenging than expected.

Original Text: Google Scores Court Victory Over GEICO  ALEXANDRIA (Reuters) - A federal judge on Wednesday  dismissed a key element of insurer GEICO's trademark  infringement case against online search engine Google Inc.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A>.
Translation: Google Consigue Victoria Judicial Contra GEICO ALEXANDRIA (Reuters) - Un juez federal desestimó el miércoles un elemento clave del caso de infracción de marca registrada de la aseguradora GEICO contra el motor de búsqueda en línea Google Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GOOG.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GOOG.O</A>.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ALEXANDRIA (Reuters) - Google Inc., an online search engine, won a court victory as a federal judge dismissed a significant part of the trademark infringement lawsuit filed by insurer GEICO on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ALEXANDRIA (Reuters) - A noteworthy component of GEICO's trademark infringement lawsuit against Google Inc. was rejected by a federal judge on Wednesday, marking a courtroom win for the online search engine company.

Original Text: Davenport out of WTA Championships Lindsay Davenport #39;s world number one ranking is in doubt after she failed to make the finals of the WTA Tour Championships in Los Angeles.
Translation: La clasificación como número uno del mundo de Lindsay Davenport está en duda después de que no logró llegar a las finales del Campeonato del Tour WTA en Los Ángeles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lindsay Davenport's position as the world number one in rankings might not hold, as she didn't reach the finals of the WTA Tour Championships in Los Angeles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lindsay Davenport, currently ranked number one in the world, may lose her spot after her failure to enter the finals of the WTA Tour Championships in Los Angeles.

Original Text: Microsoft faces lawsuit for selling  quot;defective quot; game systems A man in Los Angeles filed a class action suit against US software giant Microsoft Wednesday, claiming that the company manufactured and sold thousands of defective Xbox video game systems.
Translation: Microsoft enfrenta una demanda por vender sistemas de juegos "defectuosos". Un hombre en Los Ángeles presentó una demanda colectiva contra el gigante del software estadounidense Microsoft el miércoles, alegando que la compañía fabricó y vendió miles de sistemas de videojuegos Xbox defectuosos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Los Angeles citizen filed a collective legal action against American software behemoth Microsoft on Wednesday, alleging that the company produced and distributed thousands of faulty Xbox gaming consoles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An individual in Los Angeles initiated a class action lawsuit against software powerhouse Microsoft on Wednesday, asserting that the corporation is responsible for creating and marketing thousands of flawed Xbox gaming systems.

Original Text: CBA poised to move into China THE Commonwealth Bank is set to become the first Australian financial institution to enter mainland China #39;s commercial and retail banking sector.
Translation: CBA preparado para entrar en China EL Commonwealth Bank está listo para convertirse en la primera institución financiera australiana en ingresar al sector bancario comercial y minorista de China continental #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Commonwealth Bank, the first Australian financial entity, is on the verge of penetrating mainland China's commercial and retail banking sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Set to make history, The Commonwealth Bank is about to become the first Australian financial institution making its way into the commercial and retail banking sector of mainland China.

Original Text: Back to the roots There #39;s a busy week in store for those with an interest in both English and Spanish football. With this in mind, the Independent England Fans Group invited me over to London last Thursday to talk at their
Translation: Regreso a las raíces. Hay una semana ajetreada en perspectiva para aquellos con interés tanto en el fútbol inglés como en el español. Con esto en mente, el Grupo Independiente de Aficionados de Inglaterra me invitó a Londres el pasado jueves para hablar en su...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Those with a keen interest in both English and Spanish football have a hectic week ahead, and considering this, the Independent England Fans Group extended an invitation to me last Thursday to address them in London, harking back to the roots.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For those passionate about English and Spanish football, a bustling week is awaiting. Being aware of this, I was asked to speak at a gathering in London last Thursday, hosted by the Independent England Fans Group, taking us back to the roots.

Original Text: Honeywell Outsources Chip Design to IBM The ten-year deal is a major win for IBM #39;s young Engineering  amp; Technical Services unit. By Paul McDougall. Aerospace giant Honeywell International Inc.
Translation: Honeywell Subcontrata el Diseño de Chips a IBM. El acuerdo de diez años es una gran victoria para la joven unidad de Servicios Técnicos e Ingeniería de IBM #39. Por Paul McDougall. El gigante aeroespacial Honeywell International Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Honeywell International Inc., the aerospace giant, has outsourced its chip design to IBM in a ten-year deal that marks a significant victory for the emerging Engineering and Technical Services division of IBM. This report is by Paul McDougall.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The young Engineering & Technical Services unit of IBM achieved a major success as they secured a ten-year chip design outsourcing deal from the aerospace behemoth, Honeywell International Inc. Paul McDougall reports.

Original Text: Scientist Envisions Small-Scale Hydropower (AP) AP - A scientist says the United States could more than double its hydropower supply by harnessing the energy of smaller streams.
Translation: Científico Visualiza Hidroenergía a Pequeña Escala (AP) AP - Un científico dice que los Estados Unidos podrían más que duplicar su suministro de hidroenergía al aprovechar la energía de los arroyos más pequeños.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A scientist predicts that simply by utilizing the energy from smaller streams, the United States can more than double its current hydropower supply, according to AP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - By tapping into the power of smaller streams, a scientist believes that the U.S. has the potential to more than double its supply of hydropower.

Original Text: As Nationwide Strike Begins Today... President of the Nigeria Labour Congress, Adams Oshiomhole, yesterday made his first public appearance after his arrest on Saturday by men of the State Security Service (SSS) and vowed that today #39;s nationwide strike would continue as scheduled.
Translation: A medida que la Huelga Nacional Comienza Hoy... El presidente del Congreso Laboral de Nigeria, Adams Oshiomhole, hizo ayer su primera aparición pública después de su arresto el sábado por hombres del Servicio de Seguridad del Estado (SSS) y juró que la huelga nacional de hoy continuaría según lo programado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The President of the Nigeria Labour Congress, Adams Oshiomhole, emerged publicly for the first time yesterday after his Saturday arrest by the State Security Service (SSS). Defiantly, he pledged that today's nationwide strike would proceed as planned, despite the commencement of the strike today...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Adams Oshiomhole, the President of the Nigeria Labour Congress, made a public appearance yesterday for the first time since his arrest on Saturday by the State Security Service (SSS). He firmly declared that the nationwide strike scheduled for today would go ahead as planned, coinciding with the start of the strike today...

Original Text: DIY firm settles sex bias lawsuit US decorating store chain Home Depot agrees to pay \$5.5m to settle a lawsuit alleging sexual and racial discrimination against staff.
Translation: La empresa de bricolaje resuelve demanda por sesgo sexual. La cadena de tiendas de decoración de EE.UU., Home Depot, acepta pagar \$5.5 millones para resolver una demanda que alega discriminación sexual y racial contra el personal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Home Depot, the US decorating store chain, has agreed to pay $5.5m to resolve a lawsuit accusing it of racial and sexual discrimination towards its employees.

Original Text: The Weirdest Games of 2004 (PC World) PC World - Our favorite genre-busters will roll, creep, slither, bounce, and wriggle their way into your free time--if you give them a try.
Translation: Los Juegos más Extraños de 2004 (PC World) PC World - Nuestros géneros favoritos sorprendentes se abrirán camino, se deslizarán, reptarán, rebotarán y se retorcerán en tu tiempo libre, si les das una oportunidad.
Paraphrase 1: (PC World) PC World's Best of the Peculiar 2004 - A variety of unique games are set to invade your leisure if you're willing to give them a shot; expect them to roll, creep, slither, bounce and wriggle.
Paraphrase 2: The Strangest Games of 2004 from PC World - Be ready for an array of outlandish games that will roll, creep, slither, bounce, and writhe into your idle time, provided you give them an opportunity.

Original Text: Policeman  #39;saw fatal train crash #39; An off-duty policeman watched as a high-speed train hit a car on a level crossing killing six people, including the car driver on Saturday evening.
Translation: Un policía fuera de servicio #39;vio un accidente de tren fatal #39; Un policía fuera de servicio observó cómo un tren de alta velocidad golpeó un automóvil en un cruce a nivel, matando a seis personas, incluyendo al conductor del automóvil el sábado por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday evening, an off-duty policeman witnessed a high-speed train striking a car on a level crossing, resulting in the fatalities of six individuals, including the car's driver.

Original Text: Investors in Treasuries Grow More Bearish Before Jobs Report US Treasury note investors became more bearish last week on speculation a government report will show November employment improved enough to keep the Federal Reserve from slowing the pace of interest rate increases.
Translation: Los inversores en Tesoros se vuelven más pesimistas antes del informe de empleo. Los inversores en notas del Tesoro de EE.UU. se volvieron más pesimistas la semana pasada debido a especulaciones de que un informe gubernamental mostrará que el empleo en noviembre mejoró lo suficiente como para evitar que la Reserva Federal reduzca el ritmo de los aumentos de las tasas de interés.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US Treasury note investors demonstrated increased pessimism last week, forecasting that the forthcoming November employment report might reflect strong results. These anticipated improvements could deter the Federal Reserve from reducing the rate of interest rate hikes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The outlook of the investors in US Treasury notes turned more negative last week, following conjecture that November's employment data could signal strong performance. Such uptick could dissuade the Federal Reserve from decelerating the rhythm of interest rate increments.

Original Text: Mozilla #39;s e-Mail Client Thunderbird 1.0 Launched The Mozilla Foundation released the final version of Thunderbird 1.0, the standalone open source e-mail client application, which is available for public download.
Translation: Mozilla #39 lanzó el Cliente de Correo Electrónico Thunderbird 1.0. La Fundación Mozilla lanzó la versión final de Thunderbird 1.0, la aplicación de cliente de correo electrónico de código abierto independiente, que está disponible para su descarga pública.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The final version of Thunderbird 1.0, an independent open-source e-mail client application, was unveiled to the public by The Mozilla Foundation.

Original Text: Thousands missing from Thai town In one tsunami-hit Thai town, more than half of the 5,000-strong population are missing, police say.
Translation: Miles desaparecidos de ciudad tailandesa. En una ciudad tailandesa golpeada por el tsunami, se dice que más de la mitad de la población de 5,000 está desaparecida, según la policía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Police report that over half of the population, from an affected Thai town hit by a tsunami, is missing - which amounts to more than 2000 out of the 5000 residents.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a Thai town that was struck by a tsunami, police have identified that more than half of its 5,000 residents are unaccounted for.

Original Text: British police granted more time to quiz radical cleric Abu Hamza (AFP) AFP - British police were granted more time to quiz radical Islamic cleric Abu Hamza al-Masri, who was arrested the day before on suspicion of committing or preparing acts of terrorism.
Translation: La policía británica obtuvo más tiempo para interrogar al clérigo radical Abu Hamza (AFP) AFP - La policía británica obtuvo más tiempo para interrogar al clérigo islámico radical Abu Hamza al-Masri, quien fue arrestado el día anterior por sospecha de cometer o preparar actos de terrorismo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) British law enforcement received additional time to question the extreme religious teacher, Abu Hamza al-Masri, who was apprehended the previous day under suspicion of either committing or planning acts of terrorism (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - More time was accorded to British police to interrogate radical Islamic preacher Abu Hamza al-Masri, previously arrested on allegations of terrorist activities or planning.

Original Text: Update 1: Beazer Homes #39; Profit Soars on New Homes Beazer Homes USA Inc., a homebuilder based in Atlanta, on Friday posted a 40 percent surge in profit for its latest quarter amid growth in new-home orders.
Translation: Actualización 1: El Beneficio de Beazer Homes #39; se Dispara con las Nuevas Casas. Beazer Homes USA Inc., un constructor de viviendas con sede en Atlanta, publicó el viernes un aumento del 40 por ciento en sus ganancias para su último trimestre debido al crecimiento de las órdenes de nuevas casas.
Paraphrase 1: First Update: Beazer Homes USA Inc., an Atlanta-based homebuilding company, reported a significant 40 percent increase in profits for its recent quarter, driven by a rise in orders for new homes.
Paraphrase 2: Initial Update: Experiencing a robust growth, Beazer Homes USA Inc., headquartered in Atlanta, announced a substantial 40 percent jump in its latest quarterly profits, largely due to an upsurge in new home orders.

Original Text: Stenson grit wins the day The simplest agenda at the Heritage tournament at Woburn has been the winning one, which was achieved yesterday by Henrik Stenson, the deadpan Swede, who played magnificently to finish on 19 under par.
Translation: La tenacidad de Stenson gana el día. La agenda más sencilla en el torneo Heritage en Woburn ha sido la ganadora, que fue lograda ayer por Henrik Stenson, el sueco impasible, que jugó magníficamente para terminar con 19 bajo par.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Heritage tournament at Woburn, the most straightforward game plan proved to be the victorious one. It was executed to perfection yesterday by the stoic Swede, Henrik Stenson, whose resilient performance led him to a magnificent finish at 19 under par.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The no-nonsense strategy at the Heritage tournament at Woburn ended up being the most successful yesterday. The victory belonged to the stone-faced Swedish player, Henrik Stenson, whose superb play led him to a phenomenal final score of 19 under par.

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Milan and Inter held on Serie A opening day Italian champions AC Milan and title challengers Inter Milan were both held to 2-2 draws against unfancied opponents as the Serie A season got off to a surprising start on Saturday.
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2-Milán e Inter empataron en la jornada inaugural de la Serie A. Los campeones italianos AC Milan y los aspirantes al título Inter Milan quedaron ambos empatados con un resultado de 2-2 contra rivales poco conocidos, dado que la temporada de la Serie A arrancó con un sorprendente comienzo el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a surprising commencement of the Serie A season on Saturday, title contenders Inter Milan and reigning champions AC Milan were both unexpectedly held to 2-2 draws against underdog opponents.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Starting the Serie A season off unexpectedly on Saturday, both the Italian champions AC Milan and their title rivals Inter Milan were stalled with 2-2 ties against their less favored rivals.

Original Text: Xerox Quarterly Profit Rises (Reuters) Reuters - Xerox Corp. on Thursday said\third-quarter profit rose as it cut costs and sales of its\copiers and printers improved.
Translation: Aumenta la Ganancia Trimestral de Xerox (Reuters) Reuters - Xerox Corp. anunció el jueves que las ganancias del tercer trimestre aumentaron debido a que redujo costos y las ventas de sus fotocopiadoras y impresoras mejoraron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Xerox Corp. reported a surge in their quarterly profit on Thursday, owing to cost-cutting measures and increased sales of its printers and copiers (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - On Thursday, Xerox Corp. announced a rise in their third-quarter earnings due to improved sales of copiers and printers, coupled with efficient cost-cutting measures.

Original Text: Paneer is easy. Paneer is a kind of soft cheese used in Indian cuisine.  It's a bit like ricotta.  It takes minutes to make, and you can experiment with it.  This recipe is neither particularly original, nor particularly authentic.  But, you get stuff that looks and tastes like the paneer you get in Indian restaurants, so it must be pretty close.  It doesn't use rennet, so it's vegetarian-safe.  It isn't vegan-safe.
Translation: El paneer es fácil. El paneer es un tipo de queso suave utilizado en la cocina india. Es un poco como la ricota. Se hace en minutos, y puedes experimentar con él. Esta receta no es especialmente original, ni particularmente auténtica. Pero obtienes algo que parece y sabe como el paneer que consigues en los restaurantes indios, por lo que debe estar bastante cerca. No usa cuajo, por lo que es seguro para vegetarianos. No es seguro para veganos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Paneer, resembling ricotta, is a variety of mild soft cheese utilized in Indian cooking. It's simple to prepare and allows room for culinary experimentation. This recipe may not be exceptionally original or exceptionally genuine, yet the end product is convincingly similar to what you'd get in Indian restaurants, indicating its accuracy. Rennet is not employed in its creation, making it acceptable for vegetarians. However, it is not suitable for vegans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An Indian cuisine staple, Paneer, bears a semblance to ricotta and is very simple to prepare, with the added benefit of being highly adaptable. While this recipe doesn't boast of being either innovative or truly authentic, the finished product bears a striking resemblance, both in appearance and taste, to the Paneer served in Indian eateries. It is made without rennet, therefore, it is a safe option for vegetarians but not for vegans.

Original Text: US, Afghan Soldiers Arrest 10 Suspects US and Afghan troops detained 22 suspected Taliban fighters during a major search operation after a gunbattle in a southern Afghan mountain range, officials said Saturday.
Translation: Traducción al español: Soldados estadounidenses y afganos arrestan a 10 sospechosos. Las tropas estadounidenses y afganas detuvieron a 22 supuestos combatientes talibanes durante una importante operación de búsqueda después de un tiroteo en una cordillera del sur de Afganistán, dijeron oficiales el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials reported on Saturday that 22 suspected Taliban combatants were arrested by American and Afghan forces during a comprehensive search operation following a firefight in a mountain range in southern Afghanistan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the aftermath of a southern Afghan mountain range skirmish, American and Afghan military personnel conducted a significant search operation, resulting in the detention of 22 individuals suspected to be Taliban fighters, as announced by officials on Saturday.

Original Text: 'Extinct' pine marten in comeback Wildlife experts believe the pine marten, once declared extinct in England, is on the comeback trail.
Translation: 'Extinto' Marta de los pinos en regreso Los expertos en vida silvestre creen que la marta de los pinos, una vez declarada extinta en Inglaterra, está en camino de regreso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Wildlife specialists think that the pine marten, previously thought to be extinct in England, is making a return.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The pine marten, formerly declared extinct in England, is believed by wildlife experts to be making a resurgence.

Original Text: Report Identifies Dangerous Toys There are still lots of dangerous toys lurking on store shelves across the United States, says a nationwide survey released Tuesday by the US Public Interest Research Group (US PIRG).
Translation: El informe identifica juguetes peligrosos. Todavía hay muchos juguetes peligrosos acechando en los estantes de las tiendas en todo Estados Unidos, dice una encuesta a nivel nacional publicada el martes por el Grupo de Investigación de Interés Público de los Estados Unidos (US PIRG).
Paraphrase 1: 1. A nationwide survey released on Tuesday by the US Public Interest Research Group (US PIRG) reveals that numerous dangerous toys continue to be freely available on store shelves across America.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The presence of a large number of dangerous toys on US store shelves was confirmed by a study published by the US Public Interest Research Group (US PIRG) on Tuesday.

Original Text: U.S. Seeks to Throw Out Terror Convictions WASHINGTON - The Justice Department has asked a judge to throw out the convictions of a suspected terror cell in Detroit because of prosecutorial misconduct, reversing course in a case the Bush administration once hailed as a major victory in the war on terrorism, legal sources said Tuesday.    The department told U.S...
Translation: EE.UU. Busca Anular las Condenas por Terrorismo WASHINGTON - El Departamento de Justicia ha solicitado a un juez que desestime las condenas de una presunta célula terrorista en Detroit debido a mala conducta del fiscal, revirtiendo el rumbo en un caso que la administración de Bush una vez elogió como una gran victoria en la guerra contra el terrorismo, dijeron fuentes jurídicas el martes. El departamento informó a EE.UU...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a stunning turn of events, the Justice Department is pushing for the annulment of terror cell convictions in Detroit on accounts of prosecutorial misconduct. The Bush administration originally celebrated this case as a significant triumph in the anti-terror campaign, according to legal sources. The department has made it known they're seeking a discrepant approach on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Justice Department, deviating from the path previously praised by the Bush administration as a large step forward in the terrorist battle, has requested a judge to dismiss the convictions of a suspect terror group in Detroit due to alleged prosecutorial misconduct. Legal sources revealed this shift in strategy on Tuesday.

Original Text: DreamWorks Animation hits Street running Impeccably timed to take full advantage of the success of  quot;Shark Tale, quot; the initial public offering of DreamWorks Animation SKG went off swimmingly Thursday, floating 38 higher in its first day of trading.
Translation: "Impecablemente cronometrado para aprovechar al máximo el éxito de "Shark Tale", la oferta pública inicial de DreamWorks Animation SKG se llevó a cabo de manera excelente el jueves, flotando un 38% más alto en su primer día de negociación."
Paraphrase 1: 1. With perfect timing following the success of "Shark Tale", DreamWorks Animation SKG's initial public offering happened smoothly on Thursday, surging 38% higher in its inaugural trading day.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having efficiently capitalized on "Shark Tale's" success, the initial public offering for DreamWorks Animation SKG on Thursday proved to be a triumph, with an immediate rise of 38% in its debut day of trading.

Original Text: Anarchists Emerge as the Convention's Wild Card New York police consider self-described anarchists the unknown factor in whether the Republican convention demonstrations remain under control.
Translation: Los Anarquistas Surgen como el Comodín de la Convención. La policía de Nueva York considera a los autodenominados anarquistas como el factor desconocido en si las manifestaciones de la convención Republicana permanecerán bajo control.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The New York police regard self-proclaimed anarchists as the unpredictable element that could determine if the demonstrations at the Republican convention stay in check - they're emerging as the convention's wild card.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anarchists are surfacing as the unpredictable variable in the upcoming Republican convention demonstrations according to New York police, adding a level of uncertainty as to whether things will stay under control.

Original Text: Malaysia sets up sanctuary in Terengganu to protect endangered turtles TERENGGANU : Malaysia has gazetted 60 hectares of land off the east coast state of Terengganu to help conserve the dwindling number of endangered sea turtles.
Translation: Malasia establece un santuario en Terengganu para proteger a las tortugas en peligro de extinción. TERENGGANU: Malasia ha reservado 60 hectáreas de tierra en la costa este del estado de Terengganu para ayudar a conservar el número cada vez menor de tortugas marinas en peligro de extinción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Malaysia has designated a 60-hectare marine sanctuary in the coastal state of Terengganu to safeguard the declining population of endangered sea turtles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To counteract the reduction in the number of endangered sea turtles, Malaysia has established a wildlife sanctuary spanning 60 hectares in the east coast state of Terengganu.

Original Text: BMW Sees Strong Industry Sales Growth Passenger vehicle sales should strengthen nearly 20 percent by the end of the decade to about 70 million vehicles annually, spurred by growth not only in developing markets
Translation: BMW ve un fuerte crecimiento en las ventas de la industria. Se espera que las ventas de vehículos de pasajeros se fortalezcan en casi un 20 por ciento para fines de la década, llegando a alrededor de 70 millones de vehículos anualmente, impulsado no solo por el crecimiento en los mercados en desarrollo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) By the close of the decade, BMW anticipates a surge of nearly 20% in passenger vehicle sales, reaching approximately 70 million vehicles yearly. This significant growth is expected mainly due to the emerging markets.
Paraphrase 2: 2) BMW forecasts a robust rise in passenger vehicle sales of around 20% by the decade's conclusion, hitting close to 70 million vehicles each year, which is primarily driven by growth in developing markets.

Original Text: 'Gloria' Singer Laura Branigan Dies at 47 EAST QUOGUE, N.Y. - Laura Branigan, a Grammy-nominated pop singer best known for her 1982 platinum hit "Gloria," has died...
Translation: Muere a los 47 años Laura Branigan, la cantante de 'Gloria' EAST QUOGUE, N.Y. - Laura Branigan, una cantante pop nominada al Grammy y mejor conocida por su éxito de platino de 1982 "Gloria", ha muerto...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Laura Branigan, the Grammy-nominated artist famous for her platinum 1982 hit "Gloria," has passed away at the age of 47 in East Quogue, N.Y.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The famed pop vocalist of the 1982 platinum song "Gloria", Laura Branigan, who also received Grammy nominations, has met her untimely end at 47 in East Quogue, N.Y.

Original Text: Microsoft lands US Air Force The US Air Force has awarded a multiyear contract that calls for Microsoft to consolidate 38 various software license agreements and tighten security features.
Translation: Microsoft se asegura la Fuerza Aérea de los EE.UU. La Fuerza Aérea de los EE.UU. ha otorgado un contrato plurianual que exige a Microsoft consolidar 38 diferentes acuerdos de licencia de software y mejorar las características de seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft has been awarded a multiyear contract by the US Air Force, which requires the tech giant to consolidate 38 diverse software license agreements and enhance security features.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US Air Force has engaged Microsoft on a multiyear contract to unify 38 different software license agreements and improve security features.

Original Text: Young Given Lifetime Ban for Second Offense  COLORADO SPRINGS, Colorado (Reuters) - World 400 meters  champion Jerome Young has been given a lifetime ban from  athletics for a second doping offense, the U.S. Anti-Doping  Agency (USADA) said Wednesday.
Translation: Prohibición de por vida para Young por segunda infracción  COLORADO SPRINGS, Colorado (Reuters) - El campeón mundial de 400 metros, Jerome Young, ha recibido una prohibición de por vida del atletismo por una segunda ofensa de dopaje, dijo el miércoles la Agencia Antidopaje de los EE. UU. (USADA).
Paraphrase 1: 1. The U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) announced on Wednesday that Jerome Young, the World 400 meters champion, has been issued a permanent ban from athletics due to a second incidence of doping, Reuters reports from Colorado Springs, Colorado.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jerome Young, renowned World 400 meters champion, has received a lifetime suspension from athletics for his second drug offense, according to a statement released on Wednesday by the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) in Colorado Springs, Colorado.

Original Text: U.S. Would Respect Fair Iraq Election (AP) AP - Secretary of State Colin Powell said Thursday the United States would recognize the election of a Shiite Muslim government in Iraq provided the voting is free, fair and open.
Translation: EE.UU. Respetaría Elecciones Justas en Irak (AP) AP - El Secretario de Estado, Colin Powell, dijo el jueves que los Estados Unidos reconocerían las elecciones de un gobierno musulmán chiíta en Irak siempre que la votación sea libre, justa y abierta.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Colin Powell, Secretary of State, affirmed on Thursday that the United States would acknowledge the election of a Shiite Muslim government in Iraq, as long as the electoral procedure is unbiased, free and transparent (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) Should the voting process in Iraq be impartial, free, and open, Secretary of State Colin Powell stated on Thursday that the United States would accept the election of a Shiite Muslim government (AP).

Original Text: Australia's central bank says financial system sound, stable (AFP) AFP - Australia's central bank said the country's financial system is sound and ongoing economic growth has created a favourable outlook for financial stability.
Translation: El banco central de Australia dice que el sistema financiero es sólido, estable (AFP) AFP - El banco central de Australia dijo que el sistema financiero del país es sólido y el continuo crecimiento económico ha creado una perspectiva favorable para la estabilidad financiera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - The central bank of Australia has stated that the nation's financial system is not only sound but also stable, and the continuous economic growth is predicting a favorable perspective towards financial stability.

Original Text: Vikings' Bennett Out for Season Opener  Eden Prairie, Minn. (Sports Network) - Minnesota Vikings  starting running back Michael Bennett will miss the team's  season opener against the Dallas Cowboys on September 12 with a  sprained right knee.
Translation: Bennett, de los Vikingos, se Pierde el Partido de Apertura de la Temporada. Eden Prairie, Minn. (Red Deportiva) - Michael Bennett, el corredor titular de los Vikingos de Minnesota, se perderá el partido de apertura de la temporada del equipo contra los Dallas Cowboys el 12 de septiembre debido a una lesión en la rodilla derecha.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Eden Prairie, Minn. (Sports Network) - Michael Bennett, the starting running back for Minnesota Vikings, is set to miss the season opener against the Dallas Cowboys on September 12 due to a sprained right knee.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Eden Prairie, Minn. (Sports Network) - The season opener of the Minnesota Vikings against the Dallas Cowboys on September 12 will not see their starting running back Michael Bennett, who has a sprained right knee.

Original Text: CDs to Dominate for Years Over Net Downloads-Study (Reuters) Reuters - The compact disc has at least another\five years as the most popular music format before online\downloads chip away at its dominance, a new study said on\Tuesday.
Translation: Los CDs Dominarán Durante Años Sobre las Descargas de Internet-Estudio (Reuters) Reuters - El disco compacto tiene al menos otros cinco años como el formato de música más popular antes de que las descargas en línea erosionen su dominio, dijo un nuevo estudio el martes.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) According to a recent study, compact discs are predicted to remain the prevalent music format for at least another five years before the rise of online downloads begins to challenge its superiority.
Paraphrase 2: (Reuters) A recent study announced on Tuesday states that the dominance of compact discs in the music format will continue for about five more years, ahead of online downloads starting to erode its lead.

Original Text: Companies Forced to Fight Phishing Phishing is a growing form of online fraud that blends old-fashioned confidence scams with innovations in technological trickery. In the second part of our two-part series, washingtonpost.com explores how banks, Internet service providers and other online businesses are trying to make e-commerce safe for their customers.<br><FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Translation: Las empresas se ven obligadas a luchar contra el phishing. El phishing es una forma creciente de fraude en línea que combina estafas de confianza a la antigua con innovaciones en engaños tecnológicos. En la segunda parte de nuestra serie de dos partes, washingtonpost.com explora cómo los bancos, los proveedores de servicios de Internet y otros negocios en línea están intentando hacer que el comercio electrónico sea seguro para sus clientes. <br><FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif, arial, helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1) In the sequel of our two-part series, washingtonpost.com delves into the strategies employed by banks, Internet service providers, and other online businesses to combat phishing, a escalating type of online fraud that fuses traditional deceit scams with technological deceit advancements, in attempts to ensure e-commerce safety for their clients.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As phishing increasingly becomes a prevalent form of online fraud, combining traditional scam techniques with sophisticated technology tricks, banks, internet service providers and other online businesses are taking necessary measures for customer safety in e-commerce. In our two-part series' concluding part, washingtonpost.com discusses these countermeasures.

Original Text: The end is here for once-great Bledsoe FOXBOROUGH -- The end came, for all intents and purposes, at 11:20 last night. It was at that moment, in another losing effort against the Patriots, that Drew Bledsoe was yanked from the game in favor of rookie J.P. Losman, who is still recovering from a broken leg. Bills coach Mike Mularkey's decision to risk his still-healing No. 1 pick ...
Translation: El fin ha llegado para el otrora grande Bledsoe FOXBOROUGH -- El fin llegó, a todos los efectos, a las 11:20 de la noche pasada. Fue en ese momento, en otro esfuerzo perdedor contra los Patriots, que Drew Bledsoe fue retirado del juego en favor del novato J.P. Losman, quien aún se recupera de una pierna rota. La decisión del entrenador de los Bills, Mike Mularkey, de arriesgar a su primera elección aún en recuperación...
Paraphrase 1: 1. FOXBOROUGH -- The conclusion arrived definitively last night at 11:20 for the once magnificent Bledsoe. Despite participating in another game against the Patriots that was heading for a loss, it was at this point that he was substituted by rookie J.P. Losman, a player still in the healing process from a leg fracture. The call was made by Bills coach Mike Mularkey to gamble with his top recovering draft pick...
Paraphrase 2: 2. The era of former star, Bledsoe, reached its end, signaled last night at 11:20 at FOXBOROUGH amid another likely defeat to the Patriots. Drew Bledsoe's place in the game was taken by J.P. Losman, a rookie who's coming back from a leg injury. The daring decision of introducing his convalescing first-round choice was made by Bills coach Mike Mularkey....

Original Text: CORRECTED: Stocks Rise Before Earnings Blitz US stocks advanced on Monday as investors showed optimism that corporate earnings reports may come in better than expected, but crude oil prices at a fresh record near \$54 a barrel curbed gains.
Translation: CORREGIDO: Las acciones suben antes del aluvión de ganancias. Las acciones estadounidenses avanzaron el lunes, ya que los inversores mostraron optimismo de que los informes de ganancias corporativas podrían superar las expectativas, pero los precios del petróleo crudo en un récord nuevo cercano a los \$54 por barril limitaron las ganancias.
Paraphrase 1: REVISED 1: Optimism over potential better-than-expected corporate earnings reports led to an advance in US stocks on Monday. However, the record increase in crude oil prices to nearly $54 a barrel limited these gains.
Paraphrase 2: REVISED 2: On Monday, US stocks prospered as investors expressed hope for corporate earnings reports to surpass expectations. This notwithstanding, the upward trajectory was dampened by crude oil prices hitting a new high close to $54 per barrel.

Original Text: PeopleSoft devotees in denial? With software tycoon Larry Ellison poised to dismantle PeopleSoft, why are PeopleSoft customers so relaxed?
Translation: ¿Aficionados de PeopleSoft en negación? Con el magnate del software Larry Ellison listo para desmantelar PeopleSoft, ¿por qué los clientes de PeopleSoft están tan relajados?
Paraphrase 1: 1. With software magnate Larry Ellison on the verge of disassembling PeopleSoft, why do PeopleSoft's clients exhibit such nonchalance? Are PeopleSoft enthusiasts refusing to acknowledge the reality?

Original Text: Florida VARs, Distributors Close Shop Hurricane Frances has lost some of its bluster, but not enough to bring solution providers back to work. Calls were not answered at about a dozen Miami-area solution providers Friday, who no doubt were home bracing for the storm.
Translation: Los VARs y Distribuidores de Florida cierran sus negocios debido al huracán Frances que ha perdido algo de su bravuconería, pero no lo suficiente como para hacer que los proveedores de soluciones vuelvan a trabajar. No se atendieron las llamadas en aproximadamente una docena de proveedores de soluciones en el área de Miami el viernes, quienes sin duda estaban en casa preparándose para la tormenta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hurricane Frances may have subsided a bit, but it hasn't lost enough intensity to persuade solution providers in Florida to return to work. It was observed on Friday that roughly a dozen Miami-based solution providers, likely at home in anticipation of the storm, were not responding to calls.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although Hurricane Frances' force has slightly decreased, it remains powerful enough to keep solution providers from resuming work in Florida. On Friday, calls made to approximately a dozen solution providers in the Miami area went unanswered, likely due to them staying home to prepare for the approaching storm.

Original Text: National League Preview from The Sports Network (Sports Network) - Barry Bonds can equal two huge baseball milestones tonight. However, aside from personal achievements, the San Francisco slugger is more focused on his team #39;s drive to the playoffs, and
Translation: Vista previa de la Liga Nacional de The Sports Network (Sports Network): Barry Bonds puede igualar dos grandes hitos del béisbol esta noche. Sin embargo, aparte de los logros personales, el bateador de San Francisco está más centrado en el empuje de su equipo hacia los playoffs, y
Paraphrase 1: 1. Barry Bonds from the San Francisco team has the opportunity to match two significant baseball records tonight, as reported in the National League Preview by The Sports Network. Nevertheless, Bonds is more concerned with his team's goal of making it to the playoffs, rather than his personal accomplishments.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Sports Network's National League Preview notes that Barry Bonds has the chance to reach two significant landmarks in baseball this evening. However, Bonds' primary focus remains on helping his team, the San Francisco, on their quest towards the playoffs, rather than prioritizing his personal feats.

Original Text: Ponting leads tributes to Miller Australia captain Ricky Ponting has led the tributes to great all-rounder Keith Miller, who died on Monday. Miller, who played in Donald Bradman #39;s Invincibles team, died in Melbourne at the age of 84.
Translation: Ponting lidera los homenajes a Miller. El capitán de Australia, Ricky Ponting, ha liderado los homenajes al gran jugador polifacético Keith Miller, quien murió el lunes. Miller, quien jugó en el equipo Invencibles de Donald Bradman, murió en Melbourne a la edad de 84 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ricky Ponting, the captain of Australia, has spearheaded the tributes for the remarkable all-rounder Keith Miller, who passed away on Monday at the age of 84 in Melbourne. Miller was a celebrated member of Donald Bradman's invincible team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Australia's captain, Ricky Ponting, has taken the lead in paying tribute to the late all-rounder great, Keith Miller. Known for his tenure on Donald Bradman's Invincibles team, Miller passed away this Monday in Melbourne at the advanced age of 84.

Original Text: Prince Charles leaves Turkey after touring historic sites (AFP) AFP - Prince Charles left Turkey after touring religious and historic sites in this ancient southeastern city on the last leg of a two-day, three-stop visit.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Príncipe Carlos abandona Turquía después de recorrer sitios históricos (AFP) AFP - El príncipe Carlos dejó Turquía después de recorrer sitios religiosos e históricos en esta antigua ciudad del sureste en la última etapa de una visita de dos días y tres paradas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After visiting various religious and historic locations of this ancient southeastern city, Prince Charles has departed from Turkey, marking the end of a two-day, three-stop visit (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Prince Charles concluded his visit to Turkey, having explored its religious and historic landmarks in an ancient southeastern city, marking the end of his two-day, three-stop tour (AFP).

Original Text: Brunell Rests Injury Mark Brunell spent most of Thursday's practice on the sideline because of a left hamstring injury, while backup Patrick Ramsey took most of the snaps in preparation for Monday's game against Dallas.
Translation: Brunell Descansa por Lesión: Mark Brunell pasó la mayor parte del entrenamiento del jueves en la banda debido a una lesión en el tendón de la corva izquierda, mientras que el suplente Patrick Ramsey tomó la mayoría de las jugadas en preparación para el partido del lunes contra Dallas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mark Brunell, due to a left hamstring injury, was mostly sidelined during Thursday's practice, allowing backup Patrick Ramsey to take most snaps in readiness for the Monday game against Dallas.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Because of an injury to his left hamstring, Mark Brunell had to take most of Thursday's practice off, leading to backup Patrick Ramsey getting most of the snaps in preparation for the game against Dallas on Monday.

Original Text: New York Times Co. cuts earnings outlook The New York Times Co. told investors yesterday that its fourth-quarter and full-year earnings would miss Wall Street estimates on weaker-than-expected advertising in the fourth quarter and higher costs for promotion, printing, distribution, and newsprint.
Translation: La compañía New York Times Co. reduce la previsión de ganancias. La New York Times Co. informó ayer a los inversores que sus ganancias del cuarto trimestre y del año completo no cumplirían con las estimaciones de Wall Street debido a una publicidad más débil de lo esperado en el cuarto trimestre y a mayores costos para la promoción, impresión, distribución y papel de prensa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, through its advisory to investors, the New York Times Co. announced that its fourth-quarter and annual earnings would fall short of Wall Street predictions. This is due to unanticipated lags in advertising during the fourth quarter and increased expenditure on promotional activities, printing, distribution, and newsprint.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The New York Times Co. communicated to its investors yesterday that both its fourth-quarter and yearly earnings would not meet the estimates given by Wall Street, mainly because of the unexpectedly poor advertising yield in the fourth quarter and elevated costs related to promotion, printing, distribution and the purchase of newsprint.

Original Text: Fresh Philippine Flooding Kills at Least 26  GAPAN, Philippines (Reuters) - Floods and landslides caused  by heavy rains killed at least 26 people in the northern  Philippines, disaster officials said Tuesday, a week after  storms left about 160 dead or missing.
Translation: Inundaciones recientes en Filipinas mata a al menos 26 personas. GAPAN, Filipinas (Reuters) - Las inundaciones y deslizamientos de tierra causados por fuertes lluvias mataron al menos a 26 personas en el norte de Filipinas, dijeron funcionarios de desastres el martes, una semana después de que las tormentas dejaran alrededor de 160 muertos o desaparecidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Disaster officials reported on Tuesday that a minimum of 26 individuals have lost their lives due to floods and landslides in the northern Philippines triggered by heavy rains. This happens just a week following storms which accounted for approximately 160 people either dead or missing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Heavy rains triggering floods and landslides in the northern Philippines have reportedly led to the death of at least 26 people, according to disaster officials on Tuesday. This catastrophe occurs just a week after storms resulted in about 160 reported casualties or missing persons.

Original Text: Chilean Judge Charges Pinochet in Rights Case  SANTIAGO, Chile (Reuters) - A Chilean judge on Monday  formally charged former dictator Augusto Pinochet with homicide  and kidnapping in one of many pending cases related to human  rights abuses committed during his 17-year rule.
Translation: Juez Chileno Acusa a Pinochet en Caso de Derechos Humanos  SANTIAGO, Chile (Reuters) - Un juez chileno acusó formalmente el lunes al ex dictador Augusto Pinochet de homicidio y secuestro en uno de los muchos casos pendientes relacionados con abusos a los derechos humanos cometidos durante su gobierno de 17 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1) SANTIAGO, Chile (Reuters) - On Monday, a judge from Chile officially accused former tyrant Augusto Pinochet of homicide and kidnapping. These are just a few of numerous outstanding cases tied to the human rights violations perpetrated throughout his 17-year reign.
Paraphrase 2: 2) SANTIAGO, Chile (Reuters) - Augusto Pinochet, a former dictator, was officially indicted on charges of murder and abduction by a Chilean judge on Monday. This is one of several ongoing cases concerning the breaches of human rights that occurred during his 17-year dictatorship.

Original Text: Netflix, TiVo to Develop Joint Product (Reuters) Reuters - Online DVD rental service Netflix Inc.\and TiVo Inc., maker of a digital video recorder, on Thursday\said they have agreed to develop a joint entertainment\offering, driving shares of both companies higher.
Translation: Netflix, TiVo para Desarrollar Producto Conjunto (Reuters) Reuters - El servicio de alquiler de DVD en línea Netflix Inc. y TiVo Inc., fabricante de un grabador de video digital, dijeron el jueves que han acordado desarrollar una oferta conjunta de entretenimiento, impulsando las acciones de ambas compañías al alza.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - On Thursday, Netflix Inc., an online DVD rental service, and TiVo Inc., a digital video recorder manufacturer, announced their collaboration to create a combined entertainment product. This news led to an increase in the share prices of both companies.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to Reuters, both Netflix Inc., a leading online DVD rental service, and TiVo Inc., a digital video recorder producer, stated on Thursday that they are partnering to design a joint entertainment solution. This collaboration resulted in a surge of their individual stock market values.

Original Text: US warned over Boeing subsidies BRUSSELS: The European Union yesterday demanded Washington explain more clearly how it subsidises Boeing Co and warned it would counter any US challenge targeting EU rival Airbus Industrie before the World Trade Organisation.
Translation: EE.UU. advertido sobre las subvenciones a Boeing BRUSELAS: La Unión Europea exigió ayer a Washington que explique de manera más clara cómo subsidia a Boeing Co y advirtió que contrarrestaría cualquier desafío de EE.UU. dirigido al rival de la UE, Airbus Industrie, antes de la Organización Mundial del Comercio.
Paraphrase 1: BRUSSELS: Yesterday, the European Union requested that the United States provide further clarification on its financial support for Boeing Co. It also cautioned that it would respond to any US objections against EU competitor, Airbus Industrie, in front of the World Trade Organisation.
Paraphrase 2: BRUSSELS: The European Union urged the United States yesterday to explicitly disclose its subsidy scheme for Boeing Co and issued a warning that any US issues against European rival Airbus Industrie would be met with resistance at the World Trade Organisation.

Original Text: Clorox Swaps \$2.1 Bln, Two Brands to Get Henkel Stake (Correct) Clorox Co., the largest US household- bleach maker, agreed to swap \$2.1 billion in cash, the Soft Scrub and Combat brands and a stake in a joint venture to buy back 61.
Translation: Clorox intercambia \$2.1 mil millones, dos marcas para obtener participación en Henkel (Correcto) Clorox Co., el mayor fabricante de lejía para el hogar de EE. UU., acordó intercambiar \$2.1 mil millones en efectivo, las marcas Soft Scrub y Combat y una participación en una empresa conjunta para recomprar 61.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Clorox Co., the major US household- bleach manufacturer, has decided to trade \$2.1 billion in cash alongside the Soft Scrub and Combat brands, and a share in a joint venture to repurchase a 61% stake in Henkel.

Original Text: Qaeda link seen as bid to deflect criticism MOSCOW -- President Vladimir V. Putin depicts rebels in Chechnya as part of the international terrorist threat spearheaded by Al Qaeda. But analysts say the Chechen insurgency remains largely a nationalist movement aimed at winning independence from Russia.
Translation: Vínculo con Al Qaeda visto como intento de desviar críticas MOSCÚ - El presidente Vladimir V. Putin describe a los rebeldes en Chechenia como parte de la amenaza terrorista internacional encabezada por Al Qaeda. Pero los analistas dicen que la insurgencia chechena sigue siendo en gran medida un movimiento nacionalista destinado a ganar la independencia de Rusia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MOSCOW -- In an apparent attempt to fend off criticism, President Vladimir V. Putin portrays the Chechen rebels as a faction of the global terrorist threat led by Al Qaeda. However, experts argue that the Chechen uprising is primarily a nationalist effort with goals of earning independence from Russia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. MOSCOW -- With an intention to ward off condemnation, President Vladimir V. Putin characterizes Chechen insurgents as contributors to the worldwide terrorist menace steered by Al Qaeda. Contrarily, specialists assert that the insurgency in Chechnya is mainly a nationalist motion striving for independency from Russia.

Original Text: E-university's record 'abysmal' The failure of the UK's e-university was blamed on weak marketing by the higher education minister.
Translation: El registro de la E-universidad es 'abominable'. El fracaso de la E-universidad del Reino Unido se atribuyó a un marketing débil por parte del ministro de educación superior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UK's Higher Education Minister attributed the failure of e-University to inadequate marketing, labeling its performance 'abysmal'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The e-University's dismal record in the UK was attributed to poor marketing strategies, as criticized by the Higher Education Minister.

Original Text: Cosgrove wants Huskers to put loss behind them One day after the most lopsided loss in the 115 years of Nebraska football, the coaching staff told the Cornhuskers to forget about it.
Translation: Cosgrove quiere que los Huskers dejen atrás la derrota. Un día después de la pérdida más desequilibrada en los 115 años de fútbol en Nebraska, el cuerpo técnico le dijo a los Cornhuskers que lo olvidaran.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A day following Nebraska football's heaviest defeat in its 115-year history, Coach Cosgrove urged the Huskers to move past their loss.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After experiencing the most devastating loss in Nebraska football's 115 years, the team was advised by the coaching staff, led by Cosgrove, to leave it behind them.

Original Text: Brown to start Game 3 for Yankees Kevin Brown was picked over Orlando Hernandez to start for the New York Yankees in Friday #39;s Game 3 of their first-round AL playoff series against Minnesota.
Translation: Brown comenzará el Juego 3 para los Yankees. Kevin Brown fue escogido por encima de Orlando Hernández para comenzar por los Yankees de Nueva York el viernes en el Juego 3 de su serie de playoffs de la primera ronda de la Liga Americana contra Minnesota.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Kevin Brown, rather than Orlando Hernandez, has been selected to start Game 3 for the New York Yankees in their first-round AL playoff series against Minnesota this Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For Friday's Game 3 of the Yankees' first-round AL playoff series against Minnesota, Kevin Brown was chosen as the starting pitcher over Orlando Hernandez.

Original Text: Report: Delta to Slash Fares  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A>, the No.  3 U.S. carrier which has been restructuring in efforts to avoid  a bankruptcy filing, is expected to slash fares and remove  restrictive rules such as Saturday-night stays, Time magazine  reported in its online edition on Sunday.
Translation: Informe: Delta reducirá las tarifas NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Se espera que Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A>, el tercer transportista más grande de los EE. UU. que ha estado reestructurando en esfuerzos para evitar una declaración de quiebra, reduzca las tarifas y elimine las reglas restrictivas como las estancias de sábado por la noche, informó la revista Time en su edición en línea del domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a bid to prevent a bankruptcy filing, major U.S. carrier, Delta Air Lines Inc., is due to significantly reduce fares and eliminate restrictive rules, such as requirements for Saturday-night stays, according to an online report by Time magazine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Time magazine's online version reported on Sunday that Delta Air Lines Inc., the third-largest U.S. carrier, is anticipated to cut fares and eliminate regulations like Saturday-night stay requirements, as part of its restructuring measures to sidestep bankruptcy.

Original Text: Volunteer Links Anti-Kerry Flier to GOP (AP) AP - A volunteer for John Kerry said Friday he picked up a flier in Bush-Cheney headquarters in Gainesville, Fla., promoting Swift Boat Veterans for Truth, a group the Bush campaign has insisted for weeks it has no connection to.
Translation: Un voluntario vincula un folleto anti-Kerry al GOP (AP) AP - Un voluntario para John Kerry dijo el viernes que recogió un folleto en la sede de Bush-Cheney en Gainesville, Fla., que promociona a Swift Boat Veterans for Truth, un grupo al que la campaña de Bush ha insistido durante semanas que no tiene ninguna conexión.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A John Kerry volunteer disclosed on Friday that he obtained a flier from the Bush-Cheney headquarters in Gainesville, Florida, supporting Swift Boat Veterans for Truth, a group that the Bush campaign has continuously denied having any association with (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Friday, a promotional flier for Swift Boat Veterans for Truth - a group that the Bush campaign denies any association with - was identified by a John Kerry volunteer within Bush-Cheney's Gainesville, Florida headquarters (AP).

Original Text: Bomber Hits Near Baghdad Airport A car bomb exploded at an airport checkpoint, a Lebanese American was reported kidnapped from his home, three headless bodies were found under a bridge and a US soldier was
Translation: Bombardeo cerca del Aeropuerto de Bagdad. Un coche bomba explotó en un puesto de control del aeropuerto, se informó que un estadounidense libanés fue secuestrado de su hogar, se encontraron tres cuerpos decapitados bajo un puente y un soldado estadounidense fue
Paraphrase 1: 1. A car bomb detonated at a checkpoint near Baghdad Airport, the kidnapping of a Lebanese American from his residence took place, three decapitated bodies were located under a bridge, and one US soldier was reported.

Original Text: Stem Cells Feed Brain Tumors Researchers discover stem cells that initiate and maintain the growth of brain cancer tumors. The study could lead to new treatments for many types of cancer. By Kristen Philipkoski.
Translation: Las Células Madre Alimentan Tumores Cerebrales. Los investigadores descubren células madre que inician y mantienen el crecimiento de los tumores de cáncer cerebral. El estudio podría conducir a nuevos tratamientos para muchos tipos de cáncer. Por Kristen Philipkoski.
Paraphrase 1: 1. By Kristen Philipkoski. The contribution of stem cells to the development and sustainment of brain cancer tumors has been uncovered by researchers. The findings present potential pathways for novel cancer treatments across various types.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kristen Philipkoski reports that researchers have found stem cells acting as the driving force behind both the establishment and progression of brain cancer tumors. This research could potentially open doors to new therapies for a wide range of cancers.

Original Text: Wrigley buys Kraft unit for \$1.48 bn Wrigley, the world #39;s largest maker of chewing gum, on Monday took a step towards diversifying into other confectionery products with the acquisition for \$1.48bn in cash of Kraft Foods #39; sugar confectionery business.
Translation: Wrigley compra la unidad Kraft por \$1.48 mil millones. Wrigley, el fabricante de chicles más grande del mundo, dio un paso hacia la diversificación hacia otros productos de confitería el lunes con la adquisición por \$1.48 mil millones en efectivo del negocio de confitería de azúcar de Kraft Foods.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Wrigley, the globally largest chewing gum manufacturer, broadened its confectionery product portfolio through a \$1.48bn cash acquisition of Kraft Foods' sugar confectionery division.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The sugar confectionery division of Kraft Foods was procured by Wrigley, the leading global chewing gum manufacturer, via a cash transaction worth \$1.48bn, marking their diversification into other confectionery products on Monday.

Original Text: German man regrows jawbone in his back in surgical breakthrough PARIS (AFP) - A German man has been able to eat his first solid meal in nine years, thanks to a pioneering surgical technique in which the patient incubated a replacement jawbone in a muscle on his back.
Translation: Hombre alemán regenera mandíbula en su espalda en avance quirúrgico PARÍS (AFP) - Un hombre alemán ha podido comer su primera comida sólida en nueve años, gracias a una técnica quirúrgica pionera en la que el paciente incubó una mandíbula de reemplazo en un músculo de su espalda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PARIS (AFP) - After nine years of being unable to consume solid food, a German man has finally managed to do so, courtesy of an innovative surgical procedure. This involved growing a substitute jawbone within a muscle on his back - a remarkable medical breakthrough.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Through a trailblazing surgical procedure, a German man incubated a new jawbone in a muscle on his back, permitting him to eat solid food for the first time in nine years, as reported by PARIS (AFP). This marks an impressive advancement in surgical methods.

Original Text: Captain Gerrard Helps Liverpool Overcome Champions League Odds Liverpool captain Steven Gerrard said he thought his team was heading out of the Champions League midway through yesterday #39;s match against Olympiakos.
Translation: El Capitán Gerrard ayuda al Liverpool a superar las probabilidades de la Liga de Campeones. El capitán del Liverpool, Steven Gerrard, dijo que pensaba que su equipo estaba saliendo de la Liga de Campeones a mitad del partido de ayer contra el Olympiakos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In yesterday's Champions League match against Olympiakos, Captain Steven Gerrard admitted he believed Liverpool was on their way out midway, but he managed to help them defy the odds.

Original Text: Titan Photos Mystifying Scientists Scientists are delighted, fascinated and thoroughly perplexed by the Cassini spacecraft's first close-up pictures of Titan, the smoggy giant moon of Saturn.
Translation: Fotos de Titán desconciertan a los científicos. Los científicos están encantados, fascinados y completamente perplejos por las primeras fotos de primer plano que la nave espacial Cassini ha tomado de Titán, la gigantesca luna nebulosa de Saturno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The first close-up images of Titan, Saturn's smoggy giant moon, taken by the Cassini spacecraft, are sparking delight, fascination, and significant confusion among scientists.

Original Text: Serbian PM snubs Hague tribunal The Serbian PM insists his country's courts should try war crimes suspects wanted by the tribunal in The Hague.
Translation: El primer ministro serbio desaira al tribunal de La Haya. El primer ministro serbio insiste en que los tribunales de su país deberían juzgar a los sospechosos de crímenes de guerra buscados por el tribunal en La Haya.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Serbian Prime Minister refutes the jurisdiction of The Hague tribunal, arguing that war crimes suspects sought by the tribunal should be tried in his country's courts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Prime Minister of Serbia firmly believes that suspects of war crimes, whom The Hague tribunal is after, should face legal proceedings in the Serbian courts, thereby sidelining The Hague tribunal.

Original Text: U.S. Soldiers and Iraqis Raid Mosque in Baghdad, Killing 3 The operation by U.S. and Iraqi troops may have been aimed at a cleric said to have incited insurgent violence.
Translation: Soldados de EE.UU. e iraquíes irrumpen en una mezquita en Bagdad, matando a 3. Es posible que la operación de las tropas de EE.UU. e Irak haya estado dirigida a un clérigo al que se le acusa de incitar a la violencia insurgente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An operation intended to target a cleric allegedly encouraging insurgent violence led U.S. and Iraqi soldiers to raid a mosque in Baghdad, resulting in the death of three individuals.

Original Text: Dolphins finally get a victory Former Miami Dolphins running back Ricky Williams was ordered yesterday to repay the team more than \$8.6 million for breaching his contract when he suddenly quit before training camp.
Translation: Finalmente, los delfines consiguen una victoria. Ayer se ordenó al ex corredor de los Miami Dolphins, Ricky Williams, que devolviera al equipo más de $8.6 millones por incumplimiento de su contrato cuando renunció repentinamente antes del campamento de entrenamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ricky Williams, ex-running back for the Miami Dolphins, was commanded to return over $8.6 million to the team following a sudden departure prior to training camp, which constituted a breach of his contract, thereby marking an ultimate win for the Dolphins.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After Ricky Williams, the former running back for the Miami Dolphins, abruptly left before training camp and broke his contract, the team achieved a victory as he was instructed to reimburse them over $8.6 million.

Original Text: FDA questions AstraZeneca #39;s Exanta NEW YORK, September 9 (New Ratings) - The FDA has raised questions regarding AstraZenecas (AZN.NYS) blood thinner, Exanta. The leading pharmaceutical companys hopes had been pinned on Exanta, which
Translation: La FDA cuestiona Exanta de AstraZeneca NUEVA YORK, 9 de septiembre (Nuevas Clasificaciones) - La FDA ha planteado preguntas sobre el anticoagulante de AstraZeneca (AZN.NYS), Exanta. Las esperanzas de la compañía farmacéutica líder habían sido depositadas en Exanta, el cual
Paraphrase 1: 1) On September 9 in New York, the FDA brought up queries about AstraZeneca's blood thinner, Exanta. AstraZeneca, a top pharmaceutical company, has been depending greatly on this drug.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The top pharmaceutical firm, AstraZeneca, has faced queries from the FDA about its blood thinner, Exanta. These queries were made public on September 9 in New York, a significant blow as the company had been highly reliant on Exanta.

Original Text: Sudan Postpones Decision to Expel Oxfam and Save the Children Sudan has decided to postpone a decision to expel the heads of two British aid agencies - Oxfam and Save the Children - citing administrative difficulties and humanitarian grounds.
Translation: Sudán Pospone la Decisión de Expulsar a Oxfam y Save the Children. Sudán ha decidido posponer una decisión para expulsar a los jefes de dos agencias de ayuda británicas - Oxfam y Save the Children - citando dificultades administrativas y razones humanitarias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to administrative hurdles and humanitarian concerns, Sudan has delayed the decision to oust the leaders of two British aid organizations, Oxfam and Save the Children.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The decision to remove the leaders of Oxfam and Save the Children, two British aid groups, has been held off by Sudan, pointing to administrative issues and humanitarian reasons.

Original Text: Whole Foods Quarterly Profit Rises 27 Pct  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Grocery retail chain Whole Foods  Market Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WFMI.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WFMI.O</A> on Wednesday reported a 27 percent rise in  quarterly profit as demand for organic and natural food  outstripped rising expenses.
Translation: La ganancia trimestral de Whole Foods aumenta un 27 por ciento SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - La cadena de supermercados Whole Foods Market Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WFMI.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WFMI.O</A> informó el miércoles un aumento del 27 por ciento en la ganancia trimestral debido a que la demanda de alimentos orgánicos y naturales superó el aumento de los gastos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Whole Foods Market Inc., a retail grocery chain, announced a 27% increase in their quarterly profits on Wednesday, demonstrating that the demand for organic and natural food continues to exceed soaring expenses.
Paraphrase 2: 2) SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - On Wednesday, the grocery retail chain, Whole Foods Market Inc., disclosed a 27 percent boost in quarterly profit, as the desire for organic and natural food triumphs higher costs.

Original Text: U.S., G7 Allies Agree on Iraq Debt Relief  BERLIN (Reuters) - The United States, Germany and other G7  nations agreed on Saturday to write off up to 80 percent of  Iraq's \$120 billion foreign debt in a move that could pave the  way for a wider international accord, officials said.
Translation: EE.UU., Aliados del G7 Acuerdan el Alivio de la Deuda de Irak BERLÍN (Reuters) - Los Estados Unidos, Alemania y otras naciones del G7 acordaron el sábado condonar hasta el 80 por ciento de la deuda externa de Irak de \$120 mil millones en una movida que podría allanar el camino para un acuerdo internacional más amplio, dijeron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BERLIN (Reuters) - G7 nations, including the United States and Germany, reached consensus on Saturday to forgive as much as 80 percent of Iraq's substantial foreign debt of $120 billion, a decision that could facilitate a broader international agreement, according to officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BERLIN (Reuters) - A consensus was reached among G7 nations, inclusive of Germany and the United States, on Saturday to cancel nearly 80 percent of the $120 billion foreign debt of Iraq, a move that holds the potential to lead to a more extensive international settlement, as per officials' statements.

Original Text: Owens makes Bears sit up and take notice Told that he ticked off the Chicago Bears with his latest touchdown celebration, Terrell Owens shrugged.  quot;Oh, well, quot; the Eagles wide receiver said today after his team #39;s 19-9 victory over the Bears at Soldier Field.
Translation: Owens hace que los Bears se pongan alerta Se le informó que había molestado a los Chicago Bears con su última celebración de touchdown, Terrell Owens se encogió de hombros. "Bueno, qué más da", dijo el receptor abierto de los Eagles hoy después de la victoria de su equipo por 19-9 sobre los Bears en Soldier Field.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Terrell Owens dismissed the Chicago Bears' annoyance at his recent touchdown celebration, casually responding with "Oh, well" post his team's 19-9 triumph at Soldier Field. The Eagles wide receiver's actions certainly had the Bears paying attention.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After leading his team, the Eagles, to a 19-9 win over the Chicago Bears at Soldier Field, Terrell Owens responded nonchalantly to the Bears' irritation about his latest touchdown jubilation. "Oh, well", were his words, making it clear that he managed to get the Bears' undivided attention.

Original Text: U.S. Open Puts Serve in Server Sure, the players get all the attention at the U.S. Open championship. But hidden in the depths of the tournament stadium, a team of techies and their servers keep the whole event running. Michael Myser reports from New York.
Translation: El U.S. Open Incorpora Servicio en Servidor Seguro. Claro, los jugadores se llevan toda la atención en el campeonato del U.S. Open. Pero oculto en las profundidades del estadio del torneo, un equipo de expertos tecnológicos y sus servidores mantienen todo el evento en funcionamiento. Informa Michael Myser desde Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Indeed, the spotlight during the U.S. Open championship is always on the players. However, in the background, a group of tech enthusiasts and their servers work hard to ensure everything operates smoothly within the tournament stadium. Covered by Michael Myser from New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is true that in the U.S. Open championship, players garner all the attention. But largely unnoticed within the enormity of the tournament stadium, a tech crew and their servers tirelessly keep the entire event going. Report from New York by Michael Myser.

Original Text: Oil Steady After U.S. Data  SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Oil prices held steady on Thursday as  data showing stubbornly low U.S. heating fuel supplies ahead of  winter stemmed a rout of nearly \$10 since late October.
Translation: Aceite estable después de los datos de EE.UU. SINGAPUR (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo se mantuvieron estables el jueves, ya que los datos que muestran suministros obstinadamente bajos de combustible para calefacción en EE.UU. antes del invierno frenaron una caída de casi $10 desde finales de octubre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SINGAPORE (Reuters) - On Thursday, oil prices remained stable as persistently low U.S. heating fuel supplies, in anticipation of winter, halted a nearly $10 decrease since the end of October.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters, SINGAPORE - Stubbornly low supplies of U.S. heating fuel in anticipation for winter managed to stop a decline of nearly $10 in oil prices since late October, resulting in steady oil prices on Thursday.

Original Text: Stock Futures Rise as Oil Prices Ease  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks pointed to a slightly  higher open on Monday as investors seek bargains and oil prices  stay below last week's record high of nearly \$50 a barrel.
Translation: Los Futuros de Acciones Suben a Medida que los Precios del Petróleo Disminuyen  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de EE.UU. apuntaban a una apertura ligeramente al alza el lunes mientras los inversores buscan gangas y los precios del petróleo se mantienen por debajo del récord de la semana pasada de casi \$50 por barril.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Monday, the U.S. stock market indicated a marginal increase at the open as oil prices remained under the record high of almost $50 a barrel from last week, prompting investors to look for deals.
Paraphrase 2: 2) NEW YORK (Reuters) - With oil prices not exceeding last week's nearly $50 a barrel record, bargain-seeking investors prompted a minor upward trend in the U.S. stock market opening on Monday.

Original Text: Adobe patches Acrobat Reader Security flaws in Adobe Acrobat Reader that could allow an attacker to take over a user #39;s system have been dealt with, as Adobe has patched the software.
Translation: Adobe parchea las fallas de seguridad de Acrobat Reader. Las fallas de seguridad en Adobe Acrobat Reader que podrían permitir a un atacante tomar el control del sistema de un usuario han sido solucionadas, ya que Adobe ha parcheado el software.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Security vulnerabilities in Adobe Acrobat Reader, which could potentially let an attacker take control of a user's system, have been addressed, since Adobe has released patches for the software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Adobe has rectified the security flaws in Adobe Acrobat Reader that could potentially let an attacker seize a user's system by releasing patches for the software.

Original Text: Capgemini plans 500 more jobs in India by April Indian subsidiary has grown from around 300 staff early last year to about 2,000 today, and serves over 100 customers around the world.
Translation: Capgemini planea 500 empleos más en India para abril. La subsidiaria india ha crecido desde alrededor de 300 empleados a principios del año pasado hasta unos 2,000 hoy en día, y atiende a más de 100 clientes alrededor del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Indian subsidiary of Capgemini has grown dramatically from roughly 300 employees at the start of last year to around 2,000 today, catering to over 100 global clients. Additionally, they intend to further expand by creating 500 more job opportunities in India by April.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Capgemini's Indian branch has surged in growth, evolving from just 300 employees at the beginning of last year to nearly 2000 today, and it caters to more than 100 international clients. They have future expansion plans of adding 500 more job positions in India by April.

Original Text: Virgin to offer space flights High-flying Brit entrepreneur Richard Branson today announced the imminent take-off of the  quot;VSS Virgin quot; - a scaled-up version of Burt Rutan #39;s SpacShipOne - which will offer well-to-do wannabe astronauts the chance of zero-grav flights for a mere 100,000
Translation: Virgin ofrece vuelos espaciales. El emprendedor británico de alto vuelo Richard Branson anunció hoy el despegue inminente del "VSS Virgin" - una versión ampliada de SpacShipOne de Burt Rutan - que ofrecerá a los aspirantes a astronautas adinerados la oportunidad de vuelos de gravedad cero por unos meros 100,000.
