Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Richard Branson, the ambitious British entrepreneur, unveiled plans to launch the "VSS Virgin" - a larger model of Burt Rutan's SpaceShipOne. The venture aims to provide affluent aspiring astronauts an opportunity to experience zero-gravity flights, all for a modest sum of 100,000.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The "VSS Virgin", an enlarged variant of Burt Rutan's SpaceShipOne, is expected to provide zero-gravity flights, as announced today by high-profile British businessman, Richard Branson. The space flights, targeted at wealthy individuals dreaming of becoming astronauts, will be available for a mere 100,000.

Original Text: Search half-finished at Saskatchewan reserve, still no clues to Tamra's fate (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - BALGONIE, Sask. (CP) - Police combing a Saskatchewan reserve  said Wednesday they've covered about half of the search area without finding any clues to the fate of a young Regina girl missing for two months.
Translation: Búsqueda a medio terminar en la reserva de Saskatchewan, aún no hay pistas sobre el destino de Tamra (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - BALGONIE, Sask. (CP) - La policía que peina una reserva de Saskatchewan dijo el miércoles que han cubierto aproximadamente la mitad del área de búsqueda sin encontrar ninguna pista sobre el destino de una joven chica de Regina desaparecida durante dos meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The search for Tamra continues on a Saskatchewan reserve with no evidence discovered, covering half of the land so far (Canadian Press). Canadian Press - BALGONIE, Sask. (CP) - As confirmed by the police on Wednesday, a young girl from Regina who has been missing for two months continues to remain a mystery with no trace found, despite reaching midway through the search effort on a Saskatchewan reserve.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Investigations at Saskatchewan reserve are halfway done, yet no leads on Tamra's whereabouts (Canadian Press). Canadian Press - BALGONIE, Sask. (CP) - On Wednesday, law enforcement involved in the search operation on a Saskatchewan reserve mentioned they have scoured approximately half the area but have yet to come across any indications about the destiny of the young girl, Tamra, who has been missing from Regina for the past two months.

Original Text: Volunteers sought for Mozilla preview push com September 14, 2004, 11:36 AM PT. This fourth priority #39;s main focus has been improving or obtaining CRM and ERP software for the past year and a half.
Translation: Se buscan voluntarios para el impulso de vista previa de Mozilla. Com 14 de septiembre de 2004, 11:36 AM PT. Esta cuarta prioridad # 39; su principal enfoque ha sido mejorar u obtener software CRM y ERP durante el último año y medio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mozilla has been seeking volunteers to participate in a preview push, as communicated on September 14, 2004, at 11:36 AM PT. The main emphasis of this fourth priority has majorly been the enhancement and acquisition of CRM and ERP software over the previous eighteen months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mozilla has been on a lookout for volunteers for a preview push, dated September 14, 2004, 11:36 AM PT. The primary goal of this fourth priority has been directed towards the betterment and procurement of CRM and ERP software for the last year and a half.

Original Text: Intel: The Return of Stuart Smalley Intel smiles and proclaims all is well. Or is it a daily affirmation designed to keep angry investors at bay?
Translation: Intel: El Regreso de Stuart Smalley. Intel sonríe y proclama que todo está bien. ¿O es una afirmación diaria diseñada para mantener a raya a los inversores enfadados?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel: Stuart Smalley Strikes Back. Intel cheerfully declares all is okay. But could this just be a routine assertion meant to pacify upset shareholders?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Intel: The Stuart Smalley Comeback. Intel asserts with a smile that everything is fine. However, could it be a daily reassurance formulated to quell the displeasure of investors?

Original Text: LATEST FUTURES NEWS SAN FRANCISCO (AFX) -- Oil futures fell again Tuesday, nearing a five-week low and ending the month with a loss of more than 2 percent amid new signs that key oil-producing countries will safeguard supply levels.
Translation: ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS DE FUTUROS SAN FRANCISCO (AFX) -- Los futuros del petróleo volvieron a caer el martes, acercándose a un mínimo de cinco semanas y terminando el mes con una pérdida de más del 2 por ciento ante nuevas señales de que los principales países productores de petróleo garantizarán los niveles de suministro.
Paraphrase 1: SAN FRANCISCO (AFX) -- Another drop occurred in oil futures on Tuesday, nearing a low not seen in five weeks and finalizing the month at over 2 percent loss due to emerging indications that major oil-producing nations will maintain their supply levels.
Paraphrase 2: Oil futures recorded new falls on Tuesday in San Francisco (AFX). They are now close to a five-week low, marking the end of the month with more than 2 percent loss. This drop is propelled by fresh signals that essential oil-producing nations will ensure steady supply levels.

Original Text: Removal of Vioxx Shifts Drug Landscape The Pfizer painkillers Celebrex and Bextra experienced a jump in sales immediately after rival Merck #39;s Vioxx was pulled from the market in late September, but the gains appear to be short
Translation: La eliminación de Vioxx cambia el panorama farmacéutico. Los analgésicos de Pfizer, Celebrex y Bextra, experimentaron un aumento en las ventas inmediatamente después de que el rival Merck # 39; retirase Vioxx del mercado a fines de septiembre, pero las ganancias parecen ser breves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The elimination of Vioxx from the market in late September had a transformative effect on the pharmaceutical sector. Consequently, Pfizer's pain relievers, Celebrex and Bextra, experienced a significant boost in sales, though it seems to be temporary.

Original Text: US hard line on cloning back at UN The United States was set to bring its call for a total ban on human cloning back to the UN on Thursday as the world community again struggled for consensus on the divisive issue.
Translation: La línea dura de EE. UU. sobre la clonación vuelve a la ONU. Estados Unidos estaba listo para llevar su llamado a una prohibición total de la clonación humana de nuevo a la ONU el jueves, mientras la comunidad mundial lucha nuevamente por un consenso sobre el tema divisivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, the United States planned to return to the United Nations with its demand for an absolute prohibition on human cloning, as the global community continued to search for common ground on this controversial matter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the global community wrestled once again to find common ground on the contentious topic of human cloning, the United States was ready to bring forward its plea for a total ban to the United Nations on Thursday.

Original Text: Ukraine Parliament Votes for Sweeping Electoral Changes In the biggest shift, legislators gave themselves the power to elect the premier, removing that choice from the president.
Translation: El Parlamento de Ucrania vota por cambios electorales radicales. En el cambio más significativo, los legisladores se otorgaron el poder de elegir al primer ministro, quitándole esa opción al presidente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an unprecedented shift, the Ukrainian Parliament has approved broad-ranging electoral reforms that include the ability of legislators to elect the premier - a choice that was formerly the responsibility of the president.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Legislators in the Ukrainian Parliament have voted for extensive electoral amendments, the most significant of which transfers the power to elect the premier from the president to themselves.

Original Text: Update 2: EU Is Willing to Cut Airbus Subsidies The European Union said Tuesday it will accept cuts in subsidies for Airbus Industries only if Washington reduces aid for its main trans-Atlantic competitor, Boeing Co.
Translation: Actualización 2: La UE está dispuesta a recortar las subvenciones a Airbus. La Unión Europea dijo el martes que aceptará recortes en las subvenciones para Airbus Industries solo si Washington reduce la ayuda para su principal competidor transatlántico, Boeing Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an announcement on Tuesday, the European Union conveyed a willingness to decrease Airbus Industries subsidies, but only if the American government concurrently lowers its aid for Boeing Co., Airbus's primary competitor across the Atlantic.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The European Union agreed on Tuesday to cut subsidies given to Airbus Industries, contingent on the US responding similarly for its trans-Atlantic competition, Boeing Co.

Original Text: U.N. Hopeful Iraqi Elections on Schedule (AP) AP - The United Nations is hopeful elections in Iraq can be held on schedule in January 2005 despite escalating violence  #151; but the level of U.N. electoral assistance will depend on security, the top U.N. envoy to Iraq says.
Translation: La ONU espera que las elecciones en Irak se realicen a tiempo (AP) AP - Las Naciones Unidas tienen la esperanza de que las elecciones en Irak se puedan llevar a cabo según lo programado en enero de 2005 a pesar de la creciente violencia #151; pero el nivel de asistencia electoral de la ONU dependerá de la seguridad, dice el principal enviado de la ONU a Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) The top U.N. envoy to Iraq expresses hope that the scheduled Iraqi elections in January 2005 will be held on time despite the increasing violence, with the caveat that the level of U.N. electoral support will be influenced by the security situation.

Original Text: Spa is  #39;magic #39; track - Schumacher It #39;s no F1 secret, but Spa-Francorchamps - not far from Michael Schumacher #39;s German birthplace - is his favourite track. Ferrari #39;s champion won last time out in Belgium (2002) and will probably wrap-up title number seven in the Ardennes on Sunday.
Translation: El spa es la pista 'mágica' #39 de Schumacher. No es un secreto de la F1, pero Spa-Francorchamps, no muy lejos del lugar de nacimiento alemán de Michael Schumacher, es su pista favorita. El campeón de Ferrari ganó la última vez en Bélgica (2002) y probablemente concluirá su séptimo título en las Ardenas el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Schumacher tells that the 'magic' track, Spa, has a special place in his heart. Born not far from Spa-Francorchamps in Germany, he's no stranger to its unique charms. As the last time's winner of the race in Belgium(2002), Schumacher, Ferrari's champion, is likely to secure his seventh title this Sunday in the Ardennes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Schumacher refers to the Spa track as 'magic' and it is known fact in F1. His German hometown is not too distant from Spa-Francorchamps, making it a favorite of his. Ferrari's motorsport titan, who triumphed in Belgium in the last race(2002), is speculated to clinch his seventh championship title this coming Sunday at the Ardennes.

Original Text: Asset Writedown Hurts MCI Between them, the three carriers have cut back the value of their long distance networks by \$18.4 billion (AT amp;T #39;s writedown was \$11.
Translation: La depreciación de activos perjudica a MCI. Entre las tres operadoras, han reducido el valor de sus redes de larga distancia en \$ 18.4 mil millones (la depreciación de AT&T fue de \$11 mil millones).
Paraphrase 1: 1. MCI is negatively impacted by asset writedown. The combined reduction in the value of the long-distance networks of the three carriers, inclusive of AT&T's writedown which was $11 billion, amounts to $18.4 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The three carriers, including AT&T, whose writedown was $11 billion, have depreciated their long-distance networks collectively by $18.4 billion, which has adversely affected MCI due to the asset writedown.

Original Text: Live: GB v Austria All the action as Tim Henman and Greg Rusedski take on Julian Knowle and Alexander Peya in the doubles of the Davis Cup qualifier between Great Britain and Austria.
Translation: En vivo: GB contra Austria. Toda la acción mientras Tim Henman y Greg Rusedski se enfrentan a Julian Knowle y Alexander Peya en los dobles del clasificatorio de la Copa Davis entre Gran Bretaña y Austria.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Watch live as Tim Henman and Greg Rusedski face Julian Knowle and Alexander Peya in the doubles match of the Davis Cup qualifier between Great Britain and Austria.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tune in live for all the excitement as Tim Henman and Greg Rusedski compete against Julian Knowle and Alexander Peya in the doubles segment of the Davis Cup qualifier, with Great Britain up against Austria.

Original Text: Wait a minute MIAMI The Miami Dolphins are putting their courtship of LSU coach Nick Saban on hold. A team source tells The Associated Press that they want to comply with the NFL #39;s hiring policy by interviewing a minority candidate,.
Translation: Espera un minuto MIAMI. Los Miami Dolphins están aplazando su cortejo al entrenador de LSU, Nick Saban. Una fuente del equipo le dice a The Associated Press que quieren cumplir con la política de contratación de la NFL al entrevistar a un candidato de minoría.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Miami Dolphins are momentarily pausing their pursuit of LSU coach Nick Saban, as a team source has informed The Associated Press. They aim to adhere to the NFL's hiring policy by seeking an interview with a minority candidate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Miami Dolphins have temporarily stopped their endeavor to secure LSU coach Nick Saban, according to a source within the team who spoke with The Associated Press. Their intention is to follow the NFL's hiring guidelines by interviewing a candidate from a minority background.

Original Text: Milosevic #39;s new defense may curb his offense THE HAGUE The ghosts that have long threatened Slobodan Milosevic have finally appeared in court, fundamentally altering the war crimes trial of the former Yugoslav president.
Translation: La nueva defensa de Milosevic puede frenar su ofensiva LA HAYA Los fantasmas que durante mucho tiempo han amenazado a Slobodan Milosevic finalmente han aparecido en la corte, alterando fundamentalmente el juicio por crímenes de guerra del antiguo presidente yugoslavo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The long-feared ghosts that haunted Slobodan Milosevic have ultimately surfaced in court, dramatically changing the course of the war crimes trial of the ex-Yugoslav president; this might undermine Milosevic's aggressive defense. THE HAGUE.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The apparitions that have for long been a menace to Slobodan Milosevic have at last shown up in court, essentially transforming the former Yugoslav president's war crimes trial. This could weaken Milosevic's vigorous defense strategy. THE HAGUE.

Original Text: New oldies approach a boon for WCBS-FM ratings, WCBS-FM (101.1) is convinced that its new, tighter mix of  #39;60s and  #39;70s oldies is the way to go.  quot;As we #39;ve said all along, we don #39;t feel WCBS-FM needs drastic changes, quot; says vice president Chad Brown.
Translation: El nuevo enfoque de viejos éxitos es una bendición para las calificaciones de WCBS-FM, WCBS-FM (101.1) está convencida de que su nueva y más ajustada mezcla de éxitos de los años 60 y 70 es el camino a seguir. "Como hemos dicho desde el principio, no creemos que WCBS-FM necesite cambios drásticos", dice el vicepresidente Chad Brown.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WCBS-FM (101.1) is confident that their fresh, focused selection of '60s and '70s oldies is the right path. "We've maintained from the start that drastic changes aren't required for WCBS-FM", remarks Vice President Chad Brown. This method has proved beneficial for the radio station's ratings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "WCBS-FM does not necessitate major alterations," asserts Vice President Chad Brown, backing their new strategy of playing an exclusive blend of '60s and '70s oldies on WCBS-FM (101.1). This reboot has indeed proven to be a blessing for the channel's ratings.

Original Text: Bank of England Leaves Rate Unchanged It was the third month in a row that the bank #39;s Monetary Policy Committee has frozen the rate. The decision was widely expected following indications that Britain #39;s economy has slowed.
Translation: El Banco de Inglaterra mantiene la tasa sin cambios. Fue el tercer mes consecutivo en que el Comité de Política Monetaria del banco ha congelado la tasa. La decisión era ampliamente esperada tras las señales de que la economía de Gran Bretaña se ha desacelerado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Bank of England kept the interest rate unaltered for three consecutive months as the Monetary Policy Committee opts for a freeze. The move came as no surprise as the signs of a slowing British economy had been prevalent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For the third month straight, the Monetary Policy Committee of the Bank of England has decided to maintain the same interest rate. This expected move aligns with the observed downtrend in Britain's economy.

Original Text: Iran Arrests Dozens on Suspicion of Spying on its Nukes Iran says it has arrested dozens of alleged spies, including several it accuses of sending nuclear secrets abroad to Iran #39;s enemies.
Translation: Irán detiene a decenas bajo sospecha de espiar sus armas nucleares. Irán dice que ha detenido a decenas de presuntos espías, incluyendo a varios a los que acusa de enviar secretos nucleares al extranjero a los enemigos de Irán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dozens have been arrested in Iran under suspicion of spying on the nation's nuclear facilities, with Iran claiming that several sent nuclear secrets to their enemies.

Original Text: Toymakers Disappoint, Warn on Holidays (Reuters) Reuters - The two top U.S. toymakers posted\disappointing third-quarter results on Monday, citing\uncertainty in the economy and cautious retailers, and tempered\expectations for the crucial holiday season.
Translation: Fabricantes de Juguetes Decepcionan, Advierten sobre las Vacaciones (Reuters) Reuters - Los dos principales fabricantes de juguetes de EE. UU. publicaron resultados decepcionantes del tercer trimestre el lunes, citando incertidumbre en la economía y minoristas cautelosos, y moderaron las expectativas para la crucial temporada de vacaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The leading pair of U.S. toy manufacturers reported underwhelming results for the third quarter on Monday, attributing this to economic instability and cautious retailers. They also moderated prospects for the critical holiday season, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to Reuters, on Monday, disappointing third-quarter results were posted by the two top-ranked U.S. toy producers. The unimpressive results were attributed to an uncertain economy and cautious retailers, leading to subdued expectations for the important holiday season.

Original Text: Update 2: Crude Slips on Nigeria Worries Crude oil futures in New York gained Thursday for the ninth time in 10 days, but again failed to settle above \$50, as questions remained about the progress of truce talks in Nigeria and the recovery of production in the Gulf of Mexico.
Translation: Actualización 2: El Crudo Cae debido a las Preocupaciones por Nigeria. Los futuros del petróleo crudo en Nueva York ganaron el jueves por novena vez en 10 días, pero nuevamente no lograron establecerse por encima de los $50, ya que quedaron preguntas sobre el progreso de las conversaciones de tregua en Nigeria y la recuperación de la producción en el Golfo de México.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Revision 2: Anxiety Over Nigeria Causes Dip in Crude's Value
Paraphrase 2: Despite crude oil futures in New York experiencing an increase for the ninth time out of 10 days on Thursday, they yet again did not manage to exceed a $50 closing price. Uncertainty lingers about the progress of peace negotiations in Nigeria and the resurrection of production in the Gulf of Mexico, causing this dip in value.

Original Text: Stocks Set to Open Lower; Greenspan Eyed  NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks were headed lower on  Wednesday as investors await remarks by Federal Reserve  Chairman Alan Greenspan and may take some profits a day after  major indexes rose to 2-month highs.
Translation: Las acciones apuntan a abrir a la baja; se vigila a Greenspan NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de EE. UU. estaban orientadas a la baja el miércoles mientras los inversionistas esperan los comentarios del presidente de la Reserva Federal, Alan Greenspan, y podrían tomar algunas ganancias un día después de que los índices principales subieron a máximos de 2 meses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, U.S. stocks are predicted to open at a lower value. This comes as investors eagerly anticipate comments from Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan and consider reaping some profits as significant indexes elevated to two-month peaks the previous day. (Reuters, New York)
Paraphrase 2: 2. In anticipation of a potential profit-taking following the rising of significant indexes to two-month highs, there is an expectation for U.S. stocks to join the market on a lower note this Wednesday. Meanwhile, investors are also keenly awaiting insight from Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan. (New York, Reuters)

Original Text: Oil Back Over \$50, Market Eyes Nigeria  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Oil prices pierced the \$50-a-barrel  mark again on Friday amid concern over possible conflict in  Nigeria's oil-producing delta region, where a two-day truce  between rebel militia and government forces is holding.
Translation: El petróleo vuelve a superar los \$50, el mercado pone la mirada en Nigeria NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo perforaron nuevamente la marca de \$50 por barril el viernes ante la preocupación por un posible conflicto en la región del delta productora de petróleo de Nigeria, donde se mantiene una tregua de dos días entre la milicia rebelde y las fuerzas gubernamentales.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK (Reuters) - The oil prices surged over $50 per barrel once more on Friday, due to the worries about potential conflict in Nigeria's oil-rich delta region. The area is currently experiencing a fragile two-day ceasefire between the rebels and governmental troops.
Paraphrase 2: 2) NEW YORK (Reuters) - Amid the anxiety surrounding the possible conflict in the oil-producing region of Delta, Nigeria, the oil prices climbed back over the $50-a-barrel mark on Friday. Currently, a two-day peace agreement between the rebel militia and the government's military forces remains intact.

Original Text: Belarus' President Announces Referendum (AP) AP - Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko announced a referendum asking voters to remove term limits so he can seek five more years in office, a change that will almost certainly isolate him even more from foreign governments that have condemned his authoritarian rule.
Translation: El Presidente de Bielorrusia Anuncia un Referéndum (AP) AP - El presidente bielorruso Alexander Lukashenko anunció un referéndum pidiendo a los votantes eliminar los límites de mandato para que pueda buscar cinco años más en el cargo, un cambio que casi seguramente lo aislará aún más de los gobiernos extranjeros que han condenado su gobierno autoritario.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) The President of Belarus, Alexander Lukashenko, has declared a referendum. The goal is to ask the electorate to do away with term limits, allowing him to vie for an additional five years in office. This move is likely to further estrange him from abroad administrations condemning his autocratic style of leadership.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) Alexander Lukashenko, Belarusian President, has proclaimed a referendum which seeks to eliminate term limits, giving him the chance to extend his tenure by another five years. However, this will possibly escalate his isolation from international governments that have criticized his despotic governance.

Original Text: ING to Withdraw \$5 Bln from Janus Funds  NEW YORK (Reuters) - ING U.S. Financial Services said it  will withdraw about \$5 billion from Janus Capital Group Inc.  funds by year-end.
Translation: ING retirará \$5 mil millones de los fondos de Janus NEW YORK (Reuters) - ING U.S. Financial Services anunció que retirará aproximadamente \$5 mil millones de los fondos de Janus Capital Group Inc. para fin de año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ING U.S. Financial Services announced its plan to pull out approximately $5 billion from Janus Capital Group Inc. funds by the end of the year.

Original Text: Ex-NetScreen CEO joins start-up The former CEO of NetScreen Technologies has moved on to a new upstart. Can he make the same magic work again?
Translation: El ex CEO de NetScreen se une a una start-up. El antiguo CEO de NetScreen Technologies se ha mudado a una nueva empresa emergente. ¿Podrá hacer que la misma magia funcione de nuevo?
Paraphrase 1: 1. The past CEO of NetScreen Technologies has taken a new role at a start-up company. Will he be able to recreate his previous success?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having previously led NetScreen Technologies, the ex-CEO has now joined a budding start-up. Is it possible for him to repeat his earlier triumph?

Original Text: A trio of television technologies AUSTRALIANS went into a television-buying frenzy the run-up to the Athens Olympics, suggesting that as a nation we could easily have scored a gold medal for TV purchasing.
Translation: Un trío de tecnologías de televisión AUSTRALIANAS provocó un frenesí de compra de televisores en la antesala de los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas, sugiriendo que como nación fácilmente podríamos haber obtenido una medalla de oro en la compra de televisores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the lead-up to the Athens Olympics, Australians indulged in a frenzy of buying television technologies, implying that the nation would have effortlessly won a gold medal if TV purchasing was a sport.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Australians triggered a TV-purchasing pandemonium prior to the Athens Olympics, pointing to the fact that the country could have easily bagged a gold medal, given a competition in television buying.

Original Text: Kabul kidnappers demand foreign troop pullout ISN SECURITY WATCH (01/11/04) - The breakaway Taliban group Jaish-e-Muslimeen (Army of Muslims) has threatened to execute three foreign hostages unless all international troops leave Afghanistan and all Muslim prisoners are freed from US jails.
Translation: Secuestradores de Kabul exigen la retirada de tropas extranjeras ISN SECURITY WATCH (01/11/04) - El grupo talibán disidente Jaish-e-Muslimeen (Ejército de Musulmanes) ha amenazado con ejecutar a tres rehenes extranjeros a menos que todas las tropas internacionales abandonen Afganistán y todos los prisioneros musulmanes sean liberados de las cárceles estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The renegade Taliban faction, Jaish-e-Muslimeen (Army of Muslims), has warned that three foreign captives risk execution if all foreign military forces do not withdraw from Afghanistan and all Muslim inmates are not released from U.S. prisons. ISN SECURITY WATCH - (01/11/04).
Paraphrase 2: 2. ISN SECURITY WATCH (01/11/04) reports that Jaish-e-Muslimeen (Army of Muslims), a breakaway group from the Taliban, is threatening to kill three international hostages unless all international military personnel evacuate Afghanistan and Muslim prisoners are liberated from U.S. detention facilities.

Original Text: RadioShack Announces 3-Year Growth Plan (AP) AP - Electronics retailer RadioShack Corp. announced a three-year growth plan Wednesday that it said should increase earnings per share up to 21 percent and includes a stock repurchase program up to  #36;250 million.
Translation: RadioShack Anuncia Plan de Crecimiento de 3 Años (AP) AP - El minorista de electrónica, RadioShack Corp., anunció un plan de crecimiento de tres años el miércoles que, según dijo, debería aumentar las ganancias por acción hasta un 21 por ciento e incluye un programa de recompra de acciones por hasta #36; 250 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. RadioShack Corp., an electronics retail company, unveiled a plan for growth over the next three years on Wednesday. This plan, which includes a $250 million buyback of its stock, promises to elevate earnings per share by a maximum of 21% as per the Associated Press (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to AP, electronics retailer RadioShack Corp. revealed its growth strategy for the coming three years on Wednesday. The plan, including a stock buyback program worth up to $250 million, aims to boost the earnings per share by up to 21%.

Original Text: Hamm Admits He Will Be Shocked if He Loses Gold  LONDON (Reuters) - Olympic all-round champion Paul Hamm  admitted he would be stunned if he lost the gold medal he was  awarded in Athens following a judging error.
Translation: Hamm Admite Que Estará Sorprendido si Pierde el Oro  LONDRES (Reuters) - El campeón olímpico de la categoría integral, Paul Hamm, admitió que estaría atónito si perdiera la medalla de oro que le fue otorgada en Atenas tras un error en el arbitraje.
Paraphrase 1: 1) LONDON (Reuters) - Paul Hamm, the Olympic all-around champion, confessed that losing the gold medal, which he received in Athens due to a judging mishap, would leave him astounded.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Declaring that losing the gold medal he was granted in Athens owing to a judge's mistake would surprise him greatly, Olympic all-round champion Paul Hamm made his admission in London, reported by Reuters.

Original Text: Bundesliga round-up A headed goal from Lucio in the 88th minute was followed by another from Makaay two minutes into extra time to leave a shocked Dortmund ruing a lost opportunity to beat their arch rivals from the south.
Translation: Resumen de la Bundesliga: Un gol de cabeza de Lucio en el minuto 88 fue seguido por otro de Makaay dos minutos en tiempo extra, dejando a un sorprendido Dortmund lamentando una oportunidad perdida de vencer a sus archirrivales del sur.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lucio's header in the 88th minute and another goal from Makaay during the extra time left Dortmund stunned, missing an invaluable chance to defeat their fierce rivals from the south in the Bundesliga round-up.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the Bundesliga round-up, a surprising turnaround occurred when Lucio netted a header in the 88th minute, and Makaay added another in the extra time, leaving Dortmund in dismay over a squandered chance to triumph over their southern adversaries.

Original Text: Annan calls for urgent action over Sudan United Nations secretary-general Kofi Annan has opened a special session of the Security Council in the Kenyan capital Nairobi. It is the first time in 14 years that the UN Security Council has met outside New York.
Translation: Annan pide acción urgente sobre Sudán. El secretario general de las Naciones Unidas, Kofi Annan, ha inaugurado una sesión especial del Consejo de Seguridad en la capital de Kenia, Nairobi. Es la primera vez en 14 años que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU se ha reunido fuera de Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Kofi Annan, the United Nations Secretary-General, has initiated a distinctive session of the Security Council in Nairobi, the capital of Kenya, requesting immediate response concerning Sudan. This is the first occurrence in 14 years that the UN Security Council has convened beyond New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Urging swift intervention on the issue of Sudan, Kofi Annan, the secretary-general of the United Nations, has commenced a significant Security Council meeting in Nairobi, Kenya. This marks the first instance in over a decade, 14 years to be exact, that such a session of the UN Security Council has taken place outside of New York.

Original Text: Stocks Fall as Oil Hits High (Reuters) Reuters - Exporters led a fall in Asian shares\on Monday as oil prices set new highs near  #36;47 and data showing\the U.S. trade deficit widened to a record raised fresh concern\about the health of the world's largest economy.
Translation: Las Acciones Caen a Medida que el Petróleo Alcanza su Máximo (Reuters) Reuters - Los exportadores lideraron una caída en las acciones asiáticas el lunes, a medida que los precios del petróleo establecieron nuevos máximos cerca de #36; 47 y los datos que mostraban que el déficit comercial de EE. UU. se amplió a un récord, generaron nuevas preocupaciones sobre la salud de la economía más grande del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Reuters - As oil prices surged to nearly $47, sparking unease, Asian shares took a hit on Monday, with Exporters at the lead. This, coupled with data illustrating a widening U.S. trade deficit, incited fresh worries about the robustness of the world's biggest economy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) Reuters - On Monday, Asian shares, led by exporters, experienced a decline as oil prices closed in on $47. The revelation of an escalating U.S. trade deficit generated renewed apprehension about the stability of the world's principal economy.

Original Text: Story is too good for words Every once in a while an Oscar winner gets up there and wings an acceptance speech because  quot;I never thought I'd win, so I didn't prepare anything. quot;
Translation: La historia es increíblemente buena para describirla con palabras. De vez en cuando, un ganador del Oscar sube al escenario y improvisa un discurso de agradecimiento porque "Nunca pensé que ganaría, así que no preparé nada."
Paraphrase 1: 1. Occasionally, an award recipient at the Oscars delivers an impromptu acceptance speech because they'd say, "I never thought I'd win, so I didn't prepare anything." Yet, their story is simply too incredible for words.
Paraphrase 2: 2. From time to time, someone wins an Oscar and improvises an acceptance speech, claiming, "I hadn't prepared anything as I didn't expect to win." Such is their story's brilliance that it defies verbal expression.

Original Text: Stocks sink on profit taking The Dow Jones industrial average fell 106 points to 10,440. Decliners on the New York Stock Exchange outnumbered advancers by a three-to-one margin.
Translation: Las acciones se hunden por la toma de beneficios. El promedio industrial Dow Jones cayó 106 puntos a 10,440. Los declinantes en la Bolsa de Valores de Nueva York superaron en número a los avances en un margen de tres a uno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 106 points, settling at 10,440 as dealers took profits. The New York Stock Exchange recorded a decline - with the number of decliners exceeding the advancers at a ratio of three-to-one.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Profit-taking led to a slump in stocks, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average plummeting 106 points down to 10,440. On the New York Stock Exchange, equities in decline outnumbered those advancing with a ratio of three to one.

Original Text: Nokia combats counterfeit batteries In an effort to combat (now common) counterfeit batteries, Nokia has launched a new program that will allow consumers to accurately tell if a battery is made by Nokia.
Translation: Nokia combate las baterías falsificadas. En un esfuerzo por combatir las baterías falsificadas (ahora comunes), Nokia ha lanzado un nuevo programa que permitirá a los consumidores determinar con precisión si una batería está fabricada por Nokia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nokia has initiated a new program, aiming to fight the proliferation of counterfeit batteries, which enables customers to verify the authenticity of Nokia-made batteries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To counter the issue of rampant counterfeit batteries, Nokia has unveiled a new initiative which empowers consumers to confirm if a battery genuinely originates from Nokia.

Original Text: Vijay #39;s officially The Man Legendary golfer Jack Nicklaus had Vijay Singh in mind recently when he talked about why some players endured and others did not.  quot;There are some guys who play as a means to an end, quot; Nicklaus said.
Translation: Vijay #39 es oficialmente El Hombre. El legendario golfista Jack Nicklaus tenía a Vijay Singh en mente recientemente cuando habló sobre por qué algunos jugadores perduraban y otros no. "Hay algunos chicos que juegan como un medio para alcanzar un fin", dijo Nicklaus.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Legendary golfer, Jack Nicklaus, recently mentioned Vijay Singh while discussing why some players last longer than others in the sport. "Some individuals play with a certain goal in mind," explained Nicklaus, effectively crowning Vijay as the man.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Speaking about the longevity of certain players in golf, legend Jack Nicklaus recently referenced Vijay Singh. He observed, "Some individuals approach the sport as a tool to achieve a specific goal," thus substantiating Vijay's official standing as 'The Man'.

Original Text: Supporting cast out to nail star Els WORLD No.3 Ernie Els may feel like a hunted man this week when he takes on a largely unknown field in the Dunhill Championship at the Leopard Creek Country Club in South Africa.
Translation: Elenco de apoyo decidido a derrotar al estrella Els. El número 3 del mundo, Ernie Els, puede sentirse como un hombre perseguido esta semana cuando se enfrente a un campo en gran parte desconocido en el Campeonato Dunhill en el Leopard Creek Country Club en Sudáfrica.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Ernie Els, ranked third in the world, could experience the feeling of being pursued this week at Leopard Creek Country Club in South Africa for the Dunhill Championship, where he will be competing mostly against a relatively unknown line-up of players.
Paraphrase 2: 2) When he competes in the Dunhill Championship this week at the Leopard Creek Country Club in South Africa, world number three, Ernie Els, may find himself the prime target of a relatively unfamiliar supporting cast.

Original Text: Ronaldo's Early Goal Sparks Brazil (AP) AP - Ronaldo scored less than a minute into the game, and Brazil rolled over Bolivia 3-1 in World Cup qualifying Sunday.
Translation: El temprano gol de Ronaldo anima a Brasil (AP) AP - Ronaldo anotó a menos de un minuto de comenzado el partido, y Brasil arrasó a Bolivia 3-1 en la clasificación para la Copa del Mundo el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Ronaldo's initial goal kickstarts Brazil's triumph; AP announces that Ronaldo's score in the first minute led Brazil to a 3-1 victory over Bolivia in a World Cup qualifier on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP reports - Ronaldo's opening minute goal propels Brazil to a 3-1 victory against Bolivia in Sunday's World Cup qualifying match.

Original Text: MSN Toolbar Suite Beta The MSN Toolbar Suite combines several great programs that speed up your search tasks and help you surf the Web. There #39;s now an MSN Toolbar for Microsoft Office Outlook, the MSN Deskbar in the Windows taskbar
Translation: Beta de Suite de Barra de Herramientas MSN. La Suite de Barra de Herramientas de MSN combina varios programas geniales que aceleran tus tareas de búsqueda y te ayudan a navegar por la Web. Ahora hay una Barra de Herramientas MSN para Microsoft Office Outlook, y la Deskbar de MSN en la barra de tareas de Windows.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Beta version of the MSN Toolbar Suite amalgamates numerous top-notch programs, aiming to expedite your search functions and enhance the ease of web surfing. It also features an MSN Toolbar for Microsoft Office Outlook and the MSN Deskbar in the Windows taskbar.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Facilitating quicker search operations and easier web navigation, the MSN Toolbar Suite Beta integrates several beneficial software. Additionally, it now includes the MSN Toolbar tailored for Microsoft Office Outlook and the MSN Deskbar located in the Windows taskbar.

Original Text: Spyware Bill Gets House Nod Anti-spyware legislation sails through the House of Representatives, with the bill's sponsor pressing to have both houses approve a law to reign in invasive computer programs by the end of the year. By Michael Grebb.
Translation: El Proyecto de Ley contra Spyware Recibe Aprobación de la Cámara. La legislación contra spyware navega sin dificultades a través de la Cámara de Representantes, con el patrocinador del proyecto de ley instando a que ambas cámaras aprueben una ley para controlar los programas informáticos invasores antes de finalizar el año. Por Michael Grebb.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anti-spyware legislature gets green light from the House of Representatives, as the bill's advocate pushes for approval from both houses to enact a law to control intrusive computer programs before year end. Reported by Michael Grebb.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Michael Grebb reports that the House of Representatives swiftly approves anti-spyware legislation, with the individual sponsoring the bill advocating its passage in both houses to curtail invasive computer programs by the year's close.

Original Text: UN backs Lebanon sovereignty call The Security Council calls for foreign troops to leave Lebanon -  a move aimed at reducing Syrian influence.
Translation: La ONU respalda el llamado a la soberanía de Líbano. El Consejo de Seguridad pide que las tropas extranjeras abandonen Líbano, una medida destinada a reducir la influencia siria.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UN Security Council supports Lebanon's sovereignty, urging foreign troops to exit the region with an objective of minimizing Syrian impact.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Advocating for Lebanese autonomy, the UN Security Council urges the withdrawal of foreign military presence in an intended reduction of Syrian dominance.

Original Text: Monsanto Posts Loss on Herbicide Sales  KANSAS CITY, Mo. (Reuters) - Agrochemical company Monsanto  Co. on Wednesday posted a quarterly net loss on a drop in U.S.  sales of the herbicide Roundup.
Translation: Monsanto Registra Pérdidas por Ventas de Herbicidas  KANSAS CITY, Mo. (Reuters) - La empresa agroquímica Monsanto Co. registró el miércoles una pérdida neta trimestral debido a una caída en las ventas en EE. UU. del herbicida Roundup.
Paraphrase 1: 1) KANSAS CITY, Mo. (Reuters) - On Wednesday, Monsanto Co., an agrochemical firm, reported a quarterly net loss due to a decrease in U.S. Roundup herbicide sales.
Paraphrase 2: 2) A decline in U.S. sales of the herbicide Roundup has led to a quarterly net loss for the agrochemical company Monsanto Co., as announced on Wednesday, KANSAS CITY, Mo. (Reuters) reported.

Original Text: Seattle DH Martinez Wins 2004 Roberto Clemente Award (Reuters) Reuters - For the second year in a row,\a member of the Seattle Mariners has captured the Roberto\Clemente Award, as Major League Baseball awarded Mariners\designated hitter Edgar Martinez the 2004 honor on Tuesday.
Translation: Seattle DH Martinez gana el Premio Roberto Clemente 2004 (Reuters) Reuters - Por segundo año consecutivo, un miembro de los Seattle Mariners ha obtenido el Premio Roberto Clemente, ya que la Major League Baseball otorgó el honor 2004 al bateador designado de los Mariners, Edgar Martinez, el martes.
Paraphrase 1: (1) Reuters - Major League Baseball has named Edgar Martinez, the designated hitter from the Seattle Mariners, as the winner of the Roberto Clemente Award for 2004, marking the second consecutive year that a member of the Mariners has won this prize.
Paraphrase 2: (2) Edgar Martinez, a designated hitter for the Seattle Mariners, has won the 2004 Roberto Clemente Award. Reuters reported that this is the second year in a row that a player from the Mariners has been awarded this honor by Major League Baseball.

Original Text: NBA Suspends Four After Bulls-Wizards Fight  NEW YORK (Sports Network) - NBA vice president Stu Jackson  Wednesday handed out suspensions for four players involved in a  fight during Monday's preseason game between the Washington  Wizards and Chicago Bulls.
Translation:
La NBA Suspende a Cuatro Después de la Pelea entre Bulls-Wizards 
NUEVA YORK (Sports Network) - El vicepresidente de la NBA, Stu Jackson, entregó el miércoles suspensiones para cuatro jugadores involucrados en una pelea durante el partido de pretemporada del lunes entre los Washington Wizards y los Chicago Bulls.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a fight between the Chicago Bulls and Washington Wizards during Monday's preseason game, NBA Vice President Stu Jackson issued suspensions to four involved players.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Four players participating in a fight during the preseason game on Monday between the Washington Wizards and Chicago Bulls have received suspensions, as announced by NBA Vice President Stu Jackson.

Original Text: Texaco to appeal Sunburst ruling ChevronTexaco, ordered to pay more than \$41 million to more than 75 Sunburst residents who filed a pollution-liability suit, will file a motion for a new trial in the next month, a company spokesman said.
Translation: Texaco apelará el fallo de Sunburst. ChevronTexaco, ordenada a pagar más de $41 millones a más de 75 residentes de Sunburst que presentaron una demanda por responsabilidad por contaminación, presentará una moción para un nuevo juicio en el próximo mes, dijo un portavoz de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After being mandated to pay an excess of $41 million to over 75 residents of Sunburst on grounds of a pollution-liability lawsuit, ChevronTexaco is set to contest the ruling by filing for a new trial within a month, as confirmed by a company representative.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A spokesperson from ChevronTexaco declared the company's intention to request a new trial following a decision that obligated them to pay over $41 million to more than 75 Sunburst inhabitants who had launched a pollution-liability lawsuit.

Original Text: Oil Up on Rosy U.S. Economic Data  LONDON (Reuters) - Oil prices rose close to a record high  on Tuesday on U.S. economic data showing that inflationary  pressure was held in check in July and ahead of weekly  inventory due out on Wednesday and forecast to show a draw in  crude stocks.
Translation: Sube el Petróleo Debido a los Positivos Datos Económicos de EE.UU. LONDRES (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo subieron cerca de un máximo histórico el martes debido a los datos económicos de EE.UU. que mostraban que la presión inflacionaria se mantuvo bajo control en julio y antes del inventario semanal que se publicará el miércoles, se pronostica que mostrará una disminución en las reservas de crudo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - Oil prices were on the verge of reaching record highs on Tuesday due to U.S. economic data. The data demonstrated that inflationary pressures were kept under control in July. This, along with the anticipation of the weekly inventory scheduled for release on Wednesday, projected to show a reduction in crude stocks, contribute to the escalation in prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - On Tuesday, American economic data showing controlled inflationary pressure in July propelled oil prices towards record highs. Further contributing to the rise was the projection of a decrease in crude stocks in the weekly inventory report due out on Wednesday.

Original Text: Saboteurs Hit Iraq Internal Oil Pipeline (Reuters) Reuters - Saboteurs blew up an internal oil\pipeline on the edge of Baghdad Monday, the latest in a series\of attacks on the country's internal and export pipeline\network, witnesses said.
Translation: Saboteadores Atacan Oleoducto Interno de Iraq (Reuters) Reuters - Saboteadores hicieron explotar un oleoducto interno en las afueras de Bagdad el lunes, el último de una serie de ataques a la red de oleoductos interna y de exportación del país, según testigos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) On the outskirts of Baghdad on Monday, vandals detonated an explosive at an internal oil pipeline, according to eyewitness accounts. This is the most recent in a sequence of assaults on Iraq's domestically-focused and export oil pipelines.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the most recent series of attacks on Iraq's internal and export pipeline network, saboteurs targeted and exploded an internal oil pipeline on the fringes of Baghdad this Monday, as reported by witnesses to Reuters.

Original Text: Guarding of Ukraine central election commission relieved KIEV, November 3 (Itar-Tass) - Water cannons and armoured personnel carriers were removed from the territory of the Ukrainian central election commission on Wednesday.
Translation: La vigilancia de la Comisión Central Electoral de Ucrania se alivió KIEV, 3 de noviembre (Itar-Tass) - Los cañones de agua y los vehículos blindados de transporte de personal fueron retirados del territorio de la Comisión Central Electoral de Ucrania el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, water cannons and armoured personnel carriers were withdrawn from the Ukrainian central election commission's premises, as the security was lessened in Kiev, the news revealed on November 3 (Itar-Tass).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The removal of water cannons and armoured personnel carriers from the Ukrainian central election commission's territory marked the easing of security measures in Kiev, as reported by Itar-Tass on November 3.

Original Text: SEC Sues JB Oxford in Fund Trading The Securities and Exchange Commission filed a lawsuit on Wednesday against the brokerage firm JB Oxford Holdings and its National Clearing Corporation unit, accusing them of improper mutual fund trading.
Translation: La SEC Demanda a JB Oxford por Negociación de Fondos. La Comisión de Valores y Bolsa presentó una demanda el miércoles contra la firma de corretaje JB Oxford Holdings y su unidad de National Clearing Corporation, acusándolas de negociación inadecuada de fondos mutuos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, the Securities and Exchange Commission took legal action against JB Oxford Holdings and its National Clearing Corporation unit, alleging them of illegal mutual fund transactions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. JB Oxford Holdings alongside its National Clearing Corporation unit, were accused of illicit mutual fund trading in a lawsuit filed against them by the Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday.

Original Text: Apple iMac G5: a first look The half-dome base is gone, and the iMac G5 is iPod-white in colour. Get more of our first impressions of Apple #39;s redesigned iMac.
Translation: Apple iMac G5: una primera mirada. La base de medio domo ha desaparecido, y el iMac G5 es de color blanco iPod. Obtén más de nuestras primeras impresiones del iMac rediseñado de Apple #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Taking a first glimpse at the Apple iMac G5, we notice the absence of the half-dome base and an iPod-white colour scheme. Continue reading for our initial thoughts on Apple's revamped iMac.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Our initial review of the Apple iMac G5 reveals a noticeable change - the half-dome base has disappeared, and it now dons an iPod-white shade. Find more about our first reactions to this redesigned Apple iMac.

Original Text: Cricket: Kumble hits milestone Indian spinner Anil Kumble takes his 400th Test wicket but Australia reach 316-5 at the close in Bangalore.
Translation: Críquet: Kumble alcanza un hito. El lanzador indio Anil Kumble consigue su boleto de prueba número 400, pero Australia llega a 316-5 al cierre en Bangalore.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Bangalore, Indian Spinner Anil Kumble achieved his 400th Test wicket milestone, however, Australia managed to hit 316-5 at the close of the cricket match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Anil Kumble, the Indian spinner, achieving his 400th Test wicket milestone, Australia was still able to reach a score of 316-5 at the end of the game in Bangalore.

Original Text: Opera Lands on Windows Mobile (PC World) PC World - Alternative browser will be available on portable devices running Microsoft's OS.
Translation: Opera aterriza en Windows Mobile (PC World) PC World - El navegador alternativo estará disponible en dispositivos portátiles que ejecuten el sistema operativo de Microsoft.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PC World: Opera Browser To Be Accessible on Microsoft's Windows Mobile for Portable Devices
Paraphrase 2: 2. Opera To Run On Windows Mobile According To PC World: Alternative Browser Availability Announced for Microsoft's OS Devices.

Original Text: Univision Drops Lawsuit Against Nielsen Univision Communications Inc. said Monday it dropped a lawsuit against Nielsen Media Research Inc. over the firm's new TV rating system, which the Spanish-language broadcaster claimed miscounts its viewers.
Translation: Univision Retira Demanda Contra Nielsen. Univision Communications Inc. anunció el lunes que retiró una demanda contra Nielsen Media Research Inc. por el nuevo sistema de calificación de televisión de la empresa, que el emisor en lengua española afirmaba que contabiliza erróneamente a sus espectadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Univision Communications Inc. announced that it has withdrawn its lawsuit against Nielsen Media Research Inc. The Spanish-language broadcaster had previously alleged that its viewers were being miscounted due to the company's new TV rating system.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Univision Communications Inc. reported on Monday that it has dismissed a lawsuit it had filed against Nielsen Media Research Inc. The Spanish-language network had accused the firm of inaccurately counting its audience through a new TV rating system.

Original Text: quot;Sudan coup plotters planned to kill 38 officials quot; : Sudanese authorities accused an opposition party Saturday of plotting to abduct and kill more than three dozen senior government officials and blow up key sites in the capital, where the army was out in force.
Translation: "Los conspiradores del golpe en Sudán planeaban matar a 38 funcionarios": Las autoridades sudanesas acusaron el sábado a un partido de oposición de planificar el secuestro y asesinato de más de tres docenas de altos funcionarios del gobierno y de atentar contra sitios clave en la capital, donde el ejército estaba en pleno despliegue.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Plotters of the Sudanese coup had a plan to assassinate 38 officials."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "The scheme of the coup plotters in Sudan involved the murder of 38 high-ranking officials."

Original Text: BP Profits  #39;1m A Day #39; Oil giant BP today said record fuel prices and better refining margins had helped it to bank nearly 1 million a day in profits. BP posted profits of 3.94 billion US
Translation: Ganancias de BP '1m al día' La gigante petrolera BP dijo hoy que los precios récord del combustible y los mejores márgenes de refinación le han ayudado a depositar casi 1 millón al día en ganancias. BP reportó ganancias de 3.94 mil millones de dólares estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Oil behemoth BP reported that the record-high fuel prices and improved refining margins enabled it to garner almost 1 million dollars in profit daily. The company disclosed profits amounting to 3.94 billion US.
Paraphrase 2: 2) BP, the massive oil company, today revealed that with superior refining margins and unprecedented fuel prices, it managed to make nearly a million dollars worth of profits each day. The company announced it had total profits of 3.94 billion US.

Original Text: Europe's Mission to Moon Nears Lunar Orbit (AP) AP - A dishwasher-sized spacecraft on Europe's first mission to the moon was set to enter lunar orbit, a key milestone in its 13-month trip into space, the European Space Agency said.
Translation: La Misión de Europa a la Luna se Acerca a la Órbita Lunar (AP) AP - Una nave espacial del tamaño de un lavaplatos, en la primera misión de Europa a la luna, estaba a punto de entrar en la órbita lunar, un hito clave en su viaje de 13 meses al espacio, dijo la Agencia Espacial Europea.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) - The European Space Agency announced that a dishwasher-sized spacecraft, undertaking Europe's inaugural mission to the moon, is set to achieve a significant milestone by entering the lunar orbit, marking a notable point in its 13-month journey through space.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) - A key accomplishment in its 13-month space journey, a European spacecraft of dishwasher size is approaching lunar orbit. This mission marks Europe's foremost expedition to the moon, as stated by the European Space Agency.

Original Text: Microsoft, Cisco Partner on Security Improvements Microsoft and Cisco Systems today said they will share security and network health technologies in an effort to stop, isolate and eliminate viruses and other malicious software on Windows-based networks.
Translation: Microsoft, Cisco se Asocian en Mejoras de Seguridad. Microsoft y Cisco Systems dijeron hoy que compartirán tecnologías de seguridad y salud de la red en un esfuerzo por detener, aislar y eliminar virus y otro software malicioso en redes basadas en Windows.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft and Cisco Systems have announced that they will jointly enhance security measures. They aim to combat, isolate, and remove viruses and other harmful software on networks running on Windows by sharing their security and network health technologies.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Both Microsoft and Cisco Systems today declared their partnership and plan to unite their security and network health technologies. Their collaborative goal is to thwart, isolate, and eradicated viruses, along with other harmful software on networks based on Windows.

Original Text: Coach gets his chance to build on team's success  While running drills at the annual high school football conditioning camp in Woburn last week, John Fiore of Reading High School was the guy with the smile on his face, and quite possibly the little extra burden strapped on his shoulders.
Translation: El entrenador obtiene su oportunidad para construir sobre el éxito del equipo. Mientras realizaba ejercicios en el campamento anual de acondicionamiento de fútbol de la escuela secundaria en Woburn la semana pasada, John Fiore de la Escuela Secundaria Reading era el tipo con la sonrisa en su rostro, y posiblemente con la pequeña carga extra en sus hombros.
Paraphrase 1: 1) At the annual high school football conditioning camp in Woburn last week, John Fiore from Reading High School stood out with a grin on his face. As a coach, he now has the opportunity to further enhance the team's success, although this might come with added pressure.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Sporting a beaming smile and potentially carrying an additional weight of responsibility, John Fiore of Reading High School seized his chance to augment his team's success during the recent high school football conditioning camp in Woburn.

Original Text: Bills Edge Into Playoff Contention (AP) AP - Coach Mike Mularkey refuses to do the playoff math because it's way too complicated to consider where his Buffalo Bills might fit into the equation.
Translation: Los Bills se Colocan en Contienda para los Playoffs (AP) AP - El entrenador Mike Mularkey se niega a hacer las matemáticas para los playoffs porque es demasiado complicado considerar dónde podrían encajar sus Buffalo Bills en la ecuación.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Buffalo Bills Circle Playoff Potential, Coach Mularkey Avoids Complicated Calculations (AP) - AP; Coach Mike Mularkey deliberately stays away from playoff calculations, deeming them too complex to decipher his team's potential in the upcoming playoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Bills Nudge Towards Playoff Spot (AP); AP - Despite the complexity of playoff calculations, Coach Mike Mularkey of the Buffalo Bills avoids tackling where his squad may stand in the upcoming games.

Original Text: Fight for Aristide continues Supporters demanding the return of ousted president Jean-Bertrand Aristide hurled stones and fired shots in the air yesterday, the third straight day of violent protests that have killed 12 people so far.
Translation: La lucha por Aristide continúa. Los partidarios que exigen el regreso del presidente depuesto Jean-Bertrand Aristide lanzaron piedras y dispararon al aire ayer, el tercer día consecutivo de violentas protestas que han causado la muerte de 12 personas hasta ahora.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Supporters who demand the reinstatement of Jean-Bertrand Aristide, the deposed president, carried on with violent protests for the third consecutive day, manifesting their agitation by throwing stones and firing gunshots into the air. Such acts of violence have already resulted in the death of 12 individuals.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The protest for the return of the exiled president Jean-Bertrand Aristide persists, with violent outbursts involving stone-throwing and aerial firing marking the third day of unrest. These incidents have, thus far, led to the tragic death of 12 people.

Original Text: Ukraine to have second round of election anyway  official KIEV, October 31 (Itar-Tass) -- Ukraine will have the second round of the presidential election, no matter what results of exit polls may be.
Translation: Ucrania tendrá la segunda ronda de elecciones de todos modos oficial KIEV, 31 de octubre (Itar-Tass) -- Ucrania tendrá la segunda ronda de las elecciones presidenciales, sin importar cuáles sean los resultados de las encuestas a pie de urna.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Regardless of the exit poll outcomes, Ukraine will proceed with the second round of the presidential election, confirmed an official in Kiev on October 31 (Itar-Tass).

Original Text: Budget math deflating many Bush initiatives (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - A number of spending initiatives promoted by President Bush as he seeks re-election are set to get less money than he wants from the Republicans who control Congress.
Translation: Matemáticas presupuestarias desinflan muchas iniciativas de Bush (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - Varias iniciativas de gasto promovidas por el presidente Bush mientras busca la reelección están destinadas a recibir menos dinero del que quiere de los republicanos que controlan el Congreso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. USATODAY.com reports that President Bush's envisioned spending initiatives, amid his re-election bid, are slated to receive fewer funds than desired from the Congress dominated by Republicans.

Original Text: Peeping Tom filter lets phones see through bikinis A third party developer in Tokyo, Yamada Denshi, has developed an add-on to Vodafone handsets, intended to be used as a night filter to allow Big Red #39;s customers to take pictures with their phones in the dark.
Translation: El filtro del Mirón permite que los teléfonos vean a través de los bikinis. Un desarrollador de terceros en Tokio, Yamada Denshi, ha desarrollado un complemento para los teléfonos de Vodafone, destinado a ser utilizado como un filtro nocturno para permitir a los clientes de Big Red #39 tomar fotografías con sus teléfonos en la oscuridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The 'Peeping Tom' filter, a third-party development by Yamada Denshi in Tokyo, is an add-on designed for Vodafone handsets. Its initial intent was to function as a night filter, enabling Big Red #39's customers to capture photos in darkness with their phones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yamada Denshi, a third-party developer based in Tokyo, has created an add-on for Vodafone handsets known as the 'Peeping Tom' filter. Its purpose was to serve as a night filter for Big Red #39's customers, permitting them to take photos using their phones even in low light conditions.

Original Text: Flintoff, Collingwood lead England to win Andrew Flintoff hit a typically brutal 99 and took the final wicket Friday as England cruised to a comfortable, series-clinching victory over India in the second one-day cricket international at the Oval.
Translation: Flintoff, Collingwood lideran a Inglaterra hacia la victoria. Andrew Flintoff golpeó un brutal 99 y tomó el último wicket el viernes mientras Inglaterra navegaba hacia una cómoda victoria, asegurando la serie contra India en el segundo encuentro internacional de cricket de un día en el Oval.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Andrew Flintoff's aggressive 99 and final wicket guided England to a smooth, series-sealing triumph over India in the second one-day cricket international at the Oval - a victory largely powered by the combined efforts of Flintoff and Collingwood.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Andrew Flintoff's impressive performance, scoring a near-century and securing the final wicket, was instrumental in England's decisive win against India in the second one-day cricket international at the Oval, leading to the series win, with Collingwood as the other leading player.

Original Text: Eagles lose Ritchie for the season Philadelphia, PA (Sports Network) - Philadelphia Eagles fullback Jon Ritchie was placed on injured reserve Monday and will miss the remainder of the season after suffering a torn ACL during Sunday #39;s game versus Detroit.
Translation: Las Águilas pierden a Ritchie para la temporada Filadelfia, PA (Sports Network) - El fullback de las Águilas de Filadelfia, Jon Ritchie, fue colocado en la lista de reservas por lesiones el lunes y se perderá el resto de la temporada después de sufrir un desgarro de ACL durante el juego del domingo #39 contra Detroit.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jon Ritchie, fullback for the Philadelphia Eagles, will no longer participate in this season's games, having been placed on the injured reserve on Monday. He sustained an ACL tear during the game against Detroit on Sunday, as reported by the Sports Network from Philadelphia, PA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After experiencing an ACL tear during the Sunday game against Detroit, Philadelphia Eagles' Jon Ritchie was laid off for the rest of the season. He was listed on the injured reserve on Monday, as confirmed by the Sports Network based out of Philadelphia, PA.

Original Text: Giants,  #39;Skins, Fins change QBs The wait for Eli Manning is over, and not at the request of the New York Giants ownership. The Giants #39; quarterback of the future was given the starting job Monday after two-time MVP Kurt Warner was benched after New York #39;s third loss in four games.
Translation: Gigantes, 'Skins, Fins cambian de QBs. La espera para Eli Manning ha terminado, y no por petición de los propietarios de los New York Giants. El quarterback del futuro de los Giants recibió el puesto de titular el lunes después de que Kurt Warner, dos veces MVP, fuera relegado al banquillo tras la tercera derrota de Nueva York en cuatro partidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The New York Giants have finally decided to bring Eli Manning into the starting position, not due to any pressure from the team's ownership. This shift in quarterbacks occurred on Monday, following the benching of Kurt Warner—a two-time MVP—after the Giants experienced their third defeat in the last four games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The torch has officially been passed to Eli Manning as the starting quarterback for the New York Giants, and it wasn't a decision spurred by the owners of the team. After the Giants lost three out of four recent games, two-time MVP Kurt Warner was relegated to the bench, making room for Manning's promotion on Monday.

Original Text: Auburn Converts Second Chance to Stun L.S.U. Jason Campbell hit Courtney Taylor for a 16-yard touchdown pass with 1 minute 14 seconds to play and No. 14 Auburn got two chances to kick the winning extra point.
Translation: Auburn convierte la segunda oportunidad para asombrar a L.S.U. Jason Campbell lanzó un pase de touchdown de 16 yardas a Courtney Taylor con 1 minuto y 14 segundos para jugar y Auburn, número 14, tuvo dos oportunidades para patear el punto extra ganador.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jason Campbell threw a 16-yard touchdown pass to Courtney Taylor, with just 74 seconds to spare, enabling No.14 Auburn to stun L.S.U. after getting two opportunities to kick the crucial, match-winning extra point.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an unexpected turn of events, L.S.U. was left stunned as Auburn, ranked 14th, converted their second opportunity to kick a winning extra point. This occurred after Jason Campbell successfully connected a 16-yard touchdown pass to Courtney Taylor with only 1 minute and 14 seconds left on the clock.

Original Text: NASA Chief Sees Mandate for Bush Space Program The budget increase Congress just voted for NASA is a clear endorsement of President Bush's plan to send astronauts back to the Moon and later Mars, said Sean O'Keefe.
Translation: El Jefe de la NASA ve un Mandato para el Programa Espacial de Bush. El aumento de presupuesto que el Congreso acaba de votar para la NASA es un claro respaldo al plan del presidente Bush para enviar astronautas de vuelta a la Luna y después a Marte, dijo Sean O'Keefe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Sean O'Keefe stated that the budget hike for NASA, recently approved by Congress, shows obvious support for President Bush's initiative to send astronauts to the Moon and eventually Mars, highlighting it as a mandate for Bush's Space Program.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "The recent Congressional vote which increased NASA's budget is being viewed as a direct approval for President Bush's ambition to return astronauts to the Moon and subsequently to Mars, as per Sean O'Keefe, deciphering the act as a mandate for the Bush Space Program."

Original Text: Lawyer 'barred from Peru rebel' The lawyer for Abimael Guzman, ex-leader of Peru's Shining Path rebels, says he is denied access to his client.
Translation: "Abogado 'prohibido de rebelde peruano' El abogado de Abimael Guzmán, ex líder de los rebeldes Sendero Luminoso de Perú, dice que se le niega el acceso a su cliente."
Paraphrase 1: 1. The attorney for Abimael Guzman, former head of Peru's Shining Path rebels, reports being prohibited from seeing his client.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Access to his client Abimael Guzman, the ex-chief of Shining Path rebels in Peru, has been denied according to the lawyer.

Original Text: Marines defend soldier #39;s killing of Iraqi US marines yesterday rallied around their colleague who is being investigated for shooting an unarmed, wounded insurgent in a Falluja mosque, as a senior UN human rights official called for an inquiry into alleged abuses in the city.
Translation: Los marines defienden el asesinato del soldado número 39 de un iraquí. Los marines estadounidenses se unieron ayer en torno a su colega que está siendo investigado por disparar a un insurgente desarmado y herido en una mezquita de Faluya, mientras un alto funcionario de derechos humanos de la ONU solicitaba una investigación sobre presuntos abusos en la ciudad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US Marines came to the support of their fellow Marine yesterday, who is under investigation for the alleged shooting of a defenseless, injured insurgent in a Falluja mosque. This incident prompted a senior UN human rights official to demand an investigation into purported abuses in the city.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, US Marines stood in support of a fellow Marine, under scrutiny for shooting an unarmed, injured insurgent within a Falluja mosque. Meanwhile, a high-ranking UN human rights official has called for an examination of potential abuses taking place within the city.

Original Text: Schwarzenegger Shows Eco-Friendly Hummer (AP) AP - Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger has introduced an environmentally friendly Hummer  #151; but not the converted hydrogen-powered car he promised voters he would build when he campaigned for office.
Translation: Schwarzenegger Presenta Hummer Ecológico (AP) AP - El Gobernador Arnold Schwarzenegger ha presentado un Hummer respetuoso con el medio ambiente #151; pero no el coche convertido a hidrógeno que prometió a los votantes que construiría cuando hizo campaña para el cargo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger has debuted an eco-friendly Hummer, although it isn't the hydrogen-powered vehicle he pledged to construct during his political campaign.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Schwarzenegger unveils 'green' Hummer for the environment, but it doesn't fulfill his campaign promise of developing a vehicle powered by hydrogen. (AP)

Original Text: Kerry Attacks Bush's Handling of Campaign Against Terror Senator John Kerry said attacks were on the rise and the Bush administration was "in confusion" about how to respond.
Translation: Kerry Ataca el Manejo de la Campaña Contra el Terrorismo de Bush. El senador John Kerry dijo que los ataques estaban en aumento y que la administración de Bush estaba "en confusión" sobre cómo responder.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Senator John Kerry criticized Bush's approach to the Campaign Against Terror, stating that attacks were increasing and the Bush administration seemed unsure of their response strategy.

Original Text: Federer #39;s fresh start WORLD No. 1 Roger Federer sees his title defence at the ATP Masters Cup in Houston as the start of his 2005 campaign rather than the end of a season that saw him capture three Grand Slam crowns.
Translation: Federer #39; un nuevo comienzo. El número 1 del mundo, Roger Federer, ve su defensa del título en la Copa Masters ATP en Houston como el inicio de su campaña 2005 en lugar del fin de una temporada que lo vio capturar tres coronas de Grand Slam.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Roger Federer, the world's No.1, perceives his title defense at the ATP Masters Cup in Houston as the commencement of his 2005 campaign, not the finale of a victorious season where he won three Grand Slam titles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Rather than viewing it as the closing of a season that witnessed him seize three Grand Slam victories, World No.1, Roger Federer, perceives his ATP Masters Cup title defense in Houston as the onset of his 2005 campaign.

Original Text: IBM promotes open-source in India The new Open Source Software Resource Centre will be funded with \$1.2 million over three years and will try to promote open-source software by establishing a portal for exchanging information on the subject and initiating proof-of-concept projects.
Translation: IBM promueve el código abierto en India. El nuevo Centro de Recursos de Software de Código Abierto será financiado con $1.2 millones durante tres años e intentará promover el software de código abierto estableciendo un portal para intercambiar información sobre el tema y iniciando proyectos de prueba de concepto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Open Source Software Resource Centre, set to be financed by IBM with $1.2 million over a three-year span, aims to boost open-source software in India by creating an information exchanging portal and launching proof-of-concept projects.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Encouraging open-source in India, IBM will be allocating $1.2 million across three years to fund the brand-new Open Source Software Resource Centre that aims to foster open-source software through the inception of an information exchange portal and the initiation of proof-of-concept projects.

Original Text: Cal Coach Gets Five-Year Contract Deal California football coach Jeff Tedford looks up at the scoreboard in the fourth quarter as their game against Southern Mississippi winds up in Hattiesburg, Miss.
Translation: El Entrenador de Cal consigue un contrato por cinco años. El entrenador de fútbol de California, Jeff Tedford, mira el marcador en el cuarto trimestre mientras su juego contra Southern Mississippi concluye en Hattiesburg, Miss.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jeff Tedford, the California football coach, secures a five-year contract deal. He glances at the scoreboard in the fourth quarter of their game against Southern Mississippi in Hattiesburg, Mississippi.

Original Text: Portsmouth players make Shaka favourite to join Southampton Portsmouth players have installed goalkeeper Shaka Hislop as favourite to follow Harry Redknapp to south coast rivals Southampton.
Translation: Los jugadores de Portsmouth hacen a Shaka el favorito para unirse a Southampton. Los jugadores de Portsmouth han posicionado al portero Shaka Hislop como el favorito para seguir a Harry Redknapp a los rivales de la costa sur, Southampton.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shaka Hislop, the goalkeeper, is the top choice among Portsmouth players to join Harry Redknapp at Southampton, their rivals on the south coast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Portsmouth team members are favoring their goalkeeper, Shaka Hislop, to join their cross-town rivals Southampton with Harry Redknapp.

Original Text: U.S. Official: No Prospect of Bargain on Iran Nukes  BRUSSELS (Reuters) - The United States sees no reason to  offer Iran incentives to ensure its nuclear program remains  peaceful, a U.S. government official said on Tuesday.
Translation: Funcionario de EE.UU.: No hay Perspectiva de Negociación sobre Armas Nucleares de Irán BRUSELAS (Reuters) - Estados Unidos no ve ninguna razón para ofrecer a Irán incentivos para garantizar que su programa nuclear permanezca pacífico, dijo un funcionario del gobierno de EE.UU. el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "There is no perceived need to propose any incentives to Iran for the peaceful continuance of its nuclear program, according to a government official from the United States, reported on Tuesday."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "A U.S. government representative has stated this Tuesday that the United States does not envision providing Iran with incentives to guarantee the peaceful nature of its nuclear projects."

Original Text: MR FIXIT: GO FOR LOW SCORE BORE but surely that term no longer exists if we are the opposition. After dismal displays against Slovenia and Norway at Hampden, we simply must win or face World Cup heartache.
Translation: MR FIXIT: APOSTAR POR UN ABURRIDO PUNTAJE BAJO pero seguramente ese término ya no existe si somos la oposición. Después de desastrosas actuaciones contra Eslovenia y Noruega en Hampden, simplemente debemos ganar o enfrentarnos a la desilusión de la Copa Mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mr. Fixit asserts that a low score bore game should be our aim, but this concept may be invalid if we're the opposition. Given the lackluster performances against Slovenia and Norway at Hampden, winning is a must, else we face devastation in the World Cup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per Mr. Fixit's suggestion, we aim for a low-scoring game, however, if we are the rival team, such a term might not be applicable. Taking into account our past underwhelming exhibits against Slovenia and Norway at Hampden, it's crucial for us to attain victory, or we risk suffering major disappointment in the World Cup.

Original Text: World ban on human cloning, UK stands up to US pressure Great Britains best scientists are standing up to American government pressure to get a worldwide ban on all types of human cloning by backing an international campaign against American efforts.
Translation: Prohibición mundial de la clonación humana, el Reino Unido se resiste a la presión de los Estados Unidos. Los mejores científicos de Gran Bretaña se están resistiendo a la presión del gobierno estadounidense para obtener una prohibición mundial de todos los tipos de clonación humana, respaldando una campaña internacional contra los esfuerzos estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the pressure from the US for a global ban on human cloning, the UK's top scientists are resisting and supporting an international campaign against the American initiative.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The leading scientists of the United Kingdom are resisting American governmental pressure advocating for a global prohibition on human cloning, instead siding with a global campaign opposing US efforts.

Original Text: Antibiotic hope for Parkinson's \An antibiotic used to treat leprosy and tuberculosis is showing promise as a therapy for Parkinson's disease.
Translation: Esperanza de antibiótico para el Parkinson \ Un antibiótico utilizado para tratar la lepra y la tuberculosis muestra promesa como terapia para la enfermedad de Parkinson.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An antibiotic typically used to combat tuberculosis and leprosy is demonstrating potential as a treatment method for Parkinson's disease.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Parkinson's disease treatment could potentially be improved by an antibiotic that is usually employed to tackle leprosy and tuberculosis.

Original Text: Guantanamo trails set to begin Military court proceedings for four detainees from the US-led war in Afghanistan are due to start on Tuesday at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
