Translation: Los juicios de Guantánamo están programados para comenzar. Los procedimientos judiciales militares para cuatro detenidos de la guerra liderada por Estados Unidos en Afganistán están programados para iniciar el martes en la base naval de Estados Unidos en la Bahía de Guantánamo, Cuba.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Military court trials for four detainees, captured during the US-led war in Afghanistan, are scheduled to commence this Tuesday at the Guantanamo Bay US naval base in Cuba.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is set to start military court proceedings for four individuals detained during the US-led Afghan war.

Original Text: ATA Bankruptcy October 29, 2004 -Des Moines - Their planes may be small, but ATA Connection plays a vital role in keeping air fares low for flights to Chicago and the East Coast.
Translation: Quiebra de ATA 29 de octubre de 2004 -Des Moines- Sus aviones pueden ser pequeños, pero ATA Connection juega un papel vital en mantener las tarifas aéreas bajas para los vuelos a Chicago y la Costa Este.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the size of their planes, ATA Connection, which declared bankruptcy on October 29, 2004 in Des Moines, is crucial in maintaining affordable fares for flights heading to Chicago and the East Coast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ATA Connection, a carrier with smaller planes, made a significant contribution to keeping flight costs low to Chicago and the East Coast, even though they filed for bankruptcy on October 29, 2004 in Des Moines.

Original Text: Schroeder meeting with Gaddafi announced after deal German Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder will travel to Tripoli on October 15 for a meeting with Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi, government sources said on Saturday.
Translation: Se anunció la reunión de Schroeder con Gaddafi después del acuerdo. El canciller alemán Gerhard Schroeder viajará a Trípoli el 15 de octubre para una reunión con el líder libio Muammar Gaddafi, dijeron fuentes gubernamentales el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a recent deal, government sources revealed on Saturday that German Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder is scheduled to meet the Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi in Tripoli on October 15.

Original Text: ICANN making available new domain names The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) has given preliminary approval to two new domain names. The  quot;.
Translation: ICANN pone a disposición nuevos nombres de dominio. La Corporación de Internet para la Asignación de Nombres y Números (ICANN) ha dado aprobación preliminar a dos nuevos nombres de dominio. La cotización; ".
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) has provisionally approved the introduction of two new domain names.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Two new domain names have received preliminary approval for availability by the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN).

Original Text: PREVIEW-Italy cannot afford another World Cup slip-up Smarting from their defeat to Slovenia, Italy face Belarus on Wednesday in Parma knowing they can ill-afford to let their World Cup qualifying campaign get further off track.
Translation: PREVIA-Italia no puede permitirse otro tropiezo en la Copa del Mundo. Aún resentidos por su derrota ante Eslovenia, Italia se enfrenta a Bielorrusia el miércoles en Parma, sabiendo que no pueden permitirse que su campaña de clasificación para la Copa del Mundo se desvíe aún más.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reflecting on their loss to Slovenia, Italy is aware that they can hardly afford another mistake in their World Cup qualifying journey, as they gear up to face Belarus in Parma this coming Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Italy, still reeling from their loss against Slovenia, realizes that another misstep on their World Cup qualification course cannot be tolerated, as they prepare to clash with Belarus in Parma on Wednesday.

Original Text: Choose your own adventure I got fired from my job last night. To celebrate I threw a party where I flirted with three women and danced with two men. I then trashed my house and, in a fit of angry spite, stole my neighbor #39;s garden gnome.
Translation: Elige tu propia aventura. Me despidieron de mi trabajo anoche. Para celebrarlo, organicé una fiesta donde coqueteé con tres mujeres y bailé con dos hombres. Luego destrocé mi casa y, en un arranque de enojo y rencor, robé el gnomo de jardín de mi vecino número 39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An unexpected termination from my employment occurred last night, prompting me to host a celebratory social gathering. During the party, I engaged in flirtatious interactions with three females and danced jovially with two males. Subsequently, the premises of my home were left in a chaotic state. However, in a moment of passionate fury, I decided to pilfer my neighbour's garden gnome - my personal adventure of choice.
Paraphrase 2: 2. I was sacked from my occupation just last night which led me to throw quite the festivity. My adventurous spirit found me mingling with three ladies and twirling across the dancefloor with two gentlemen. The event concluded with my home in a disruptive mess, after which, in a moment of bitter resentment, I nabbed my neighbor's cherished garden gnome.

Original Text: Paying an ARM and a Leg Shares of Motley Fool Stock Advisor recommendation ARM Holdings (Nasdaq: ARMHY) tumbled 19 on Monday in response to the company #39;s buyout offer initially valued at \$913 million
Translation: Pagando un brazo y una pierna las acciones de ARM Holdings (Nasdaq: ARMHY), recomendación de Stock Advisor de Motley Fool, se desplomaron 19 el lunes en respuesta a la oferta de compra de la compañía inicialmente valorada en $913 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shares in ARM Holdings, a recommendation from Motley Fool Stock Advisor, (Nasdaq: ARMHY) nosedived by 19 on Monday after the company's buyout offer, which was originally estimated to be worth $913 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A hefty slump of 19 was experienced by Motley Fool Stock Advisor-endorsed ARM Holdings shares (Nasdaq: ARMHY) on Monday, influenced by the company's buyout proposal that was initially valued at around $913 million.

Original Text: Get the lowdown on FreeBSD <strong>Site Offer</strong> 30 off this and other open source titles
Translation: Obtén información detallada sobre FreeBSD <strong>Oferta del sitio</strong> 30 de descuento en este y otros títulos de código abierto
Paraphrase 1: 1. Receive detailed information on FreeBSD's Site Offer; enjoy a 30% discount on this and other open source titles.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Learn all about FreeBSD and take advantage of a 30% discount Site Offer on this and several other open source titles.

Original Text: Yeltsin #39;s grandson joins Russian Midland F1 team The Russian-backed Midland Formula One team planned for 2006 has hired the grandson of former Russian president Boris Yeltsin as marketing director, Kommersant daily newspaper said on Wednesday.
Translation: El nieto de Yeltsin se une al equipo ruso Midland F1. El equipo Midland Formula One respaldado por Rusia, planeado para 2006, ha contratado al nieto del ex presidente ruso Boris Yeltsin como director de marketing, dijo el miércoles el periódico diario Kommersant.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Kommersant daily newspaper announced on Wednesday that the grandson of former Russian president Boris Yeltsin has been appointed as the Marketing Director of the Russian-based Midland Formula One team, slated to launch in 2006.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Russian-supported 2006 Midland Formula One team recruited Boris Yeltsin's grandson for the role of Marketing Director, as reported in Wednesday's issue of the Kommersant daily newspaper.

Original Text: Tiffany sells stake in Aber Diamond, discount arrangement ends TORONTO (CP) - US jewelry retailer Tiffany  amp; Co. has sold its nearly 14 per cent stake in Aber Diamond Corp., part owner of Canada #39;s second diamond mine, Diavik.
Translation: Tiffany vende participación en Aber Diamond, finaliza el acuerdo de descuento TORONTO (CP) - La joyería estadounidense Tiffany & Co. ha vendido su participación de casi el 14 por ciento en Aber Diamond Corp., copropietaria de la segunda mina de diamantes de Canadá, Diavik.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US jewelry retailer, Tiffany & Co., has let go of its approximately 14% stake in Aber Diamond Corporation, joint owner of Diavik, Canada's secondary diamond mine. This concludes their discount arrangement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The discount deal between Tiffany & Co. and Aber Diamond Corp. has come to an end, with Tiffany selling its almost 14% stake in Aber. Aber is a significant shareholder in Diavik, which is the second diamond mine in Canada.

Original Text: Windows XP SP2 -- test your applications Learn about the plethora of security enhancements included in Windows XP Service Pack 2, as well as how these security features could impair the functionality of some applications.
Translation: Windows XP SP2 -- prueba tus aplicaciones. Aprende sobre la multitud de mejoras de seguridad incluidas en Windows XP Service Pack 2, así como cómo estas características de seguridad podrían afectar la funcionalidad de algunas aplicaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Discover the numerous security upgrades included in Windows XP Service Pack 2 and investigate how these improvements might affect the performance of some applications.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Get familiar with the myriad of security updates incorporated into Windows XP Service Pack 2 and learn how these enhancements may potentially disrupt the operation of certain applications.

Original Text: Liberty Beat by Nat Hentoff Kofi Annan vs. Me The United Nations is useless to blacks in Darfur. China will veto any meaningful action. his land stinks of fear and death. Nicholas Kristof, The New York Times, from Darfur, October 20.
Translation: "Liberty Beat" por Nat Hentoff Kofi Annan vs. Yo Las Naciones Unidas son inútiles para los negros en Darfur. China vetará cualquier acción significativa. Esta tierra apesta a miedo y muerte. Nicholas Kristof, The New York Times, desde Darfur, 20 de octubre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nat Hentoff's Liberty Beat portrays Kofi Annan and myself against the standpoint that The United Nations is ineffective for the black community in Darfur. Further predicting that China will block any substantial steps, he indicates that the territory reeks of terror and mortality. This statement was made by Nicholas Kristof from The New York Times, dated Darfur, October 20.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The United Nations proves to be futile for the blacks in Darfur, a view presented in Nat Hentoff's Liberty Beat comparing Kofi Annan and me. It's anticipated that China will obstruct any significant progress. This land, filled with the stench of fear and death, was reported by Nicholas Kristof for The New York Times, on October 20 from Darfur.

Original Text: Hamas May Accept Statehood in West Bank (AP) AP - The militant group Hamas will accept a Palestinian state in the West Bank and Gaza Strip and a long-term truce with Israel, a leader said Friday, apparently softening Hamas' hardline stance and boosting hopes for renewed peace efforts after Yasser Arafat's death.
Translation: Hamas Podría Aceptar la Creación de un Estado en Cisjordania (AP) AP - El grupo militante Hamas aceptará un estado palestino en Cisjordania y la Franja de Gaza y una tregua a largo plazo con Israel, dijo un líder el viernes, aparentemente suavizando la postura dura de Hamas e impulsando las esperanzas de renovados esfuerzos de paz después de la muerte de Yasser Arafat.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - A shift in stance may be underway in the militant group Hamas, as a leader announced on Friday that they may agree to the establishment of a Palestinian state in the West Bank and Gaza Strip, including a long-term cease-fire with Israel. This change could potentially rekindle hopes for peace talks following Yasser Arafat's demise.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Acceptance of Palestinian statehood in the West Bank and Gaza Strip, as well as a long-lasting truce with Israel, may be on the horizon from the previously hardline position of Hamas, according to a statement from a group leader on Friday. This softening standpoint brings a boost to hopes for resumed peace negotiations after the passing of Yasser Arafat.

Original Text: Sprint beats forecasts on strength of wireless (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - Bolstered by its fast-growing wireless business, Sprint reported solid third-quarter results Tuesday that beat Wall Street's expectations by 3 cents a share. Sprint also took a  #36;3.5 billion charge to write down network equipment that's been rendered obsolete.
Translation: Sprint supera las previsiones gracias a la fortaleza de su negocio de telefonía inalámbrica (USATODAY.com) USATODAY.com - Impulsada por su negocio de telefonía inalámbrica de rápido crecimiento, Sprint reportó sólidos resultados para el tercer trimestre el martes, que superaron las expectativas de Wall Street en 3 centavos por acción. Sprint también tomó un cargo de 3.5 mil millones de dólares para depreciar equipos de red que se han vuelto obsoletos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) USATODAY.com - On Tuesday, Sprint presented impressive third-quarter results, surpassing Wall Street's predictions by 3 cents per share, primarily due to its rapidly expanding wireless division. Furthermore, Sprint recognized a $3.5 billion expense to devalue out-of-date network equipment.
Paraphrase 2: 2) USATODAY.com - On the strength of its burgeoning wireless sector, Sprint reported robust third-quarter figures on Tuesday that exceeded Wall Street analysts' estimates by 3 cents per share. Additionally, Sprint accounted for a $3.5 billion depreciation for network tools that have become obsolete.

Original Text: Manufacturing Sector Grows in October NEW YORK - Activity in the nation #39;s manufacturing sector grew in October for the 17th straight month, but at a slower pace than the previous month, the Institute for Supply Management reported Monday.
Translation: El Sector Manufacturero Crece en Octubre NUEVA YORK - La actividad en el sector manufacturero de la nación creció en octubre por 17º mes consecutivo, pero a un ritmo más lento que el mes anterior, informó el Instituto para la Gestión de Suministros el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK - The Institute for Supply Management announced on Monday that the nation's manufacturing sector experienced growth for the seventeenth consecutive month in October, albeit at a slower rate than the preceding month.

Original Text: Junk 'Tree' Testifies to Beirut's Waste Problem (Reuters) Reuters - Environmentalists built a giant\Christmas tree out of garbage in Beirut on Thursday to pressure\the government into cleaning up Lebanon's waste problem.
Translation: "Árbol" de Basura Testifica el Problema de Residuos en Beirut (Reuters) Reuters - Ambientalistas construyeron un gigantesco árbol de Navidad a partir de basura en Beirut el jueves para presionar al gobierno a solucionar el problema de desperdicios de Líbano.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) Reuters - In an attempt to compel the government to tackle Lebanon's garbage issue, environmentalists in Beirut constructed a massive Christmas tree from trash on Thursday.

Original Text: Sheffield Says He Unknowingly Used Steroids New York Yankees slugger Gary Sheffield says he unknowingly used an illegal steroid obtained from BALCO during the 2002 season, Major League Baseball #39;s official Web Site said Tuesday quoting a magazine article.
Translation:
Sheffield Dice Que Usó Esteroides Sin Saberlo

El bateador de los New York Yankees, Gary Sheffield, dice que usó sin saberlo un esteroide ilegal obtenido de BALCO durante la temporada 2002, dijo el martes el sitio web oficial de Major League Baseball citando un artículo de revista.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Gary Sheffield, a renowned slugger from the New York Yankees, has stated that he unknowingly used illegal steroids sourced from BALCO during the 2002 season. This information was shared on Major League Baseball's official website on Tuesday, citing a magazine article.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday's report from Major League Baseball's official website quoted a magazine article stating Gary Sheffield, the star slugger of the New York Yankees, unknowingly used a prohibited steroid from BALCO in the 2002 season.

Original Text: Nationality saved captured Aussie A JOURNALIST kidnapped in Baghdad was probably released because he was Australian and there was no hatred of Australians in the country, Iraq #39;s national security adviser said today.
Translation: "La nacionalidad salvó a un australiano capturado. UN PERIODISTA secuestrado en Bagdad probablemente fue liberado porque era australiano y no había odio hacia los australianos en el país, dijo hoy el asesor de seguridad nacional de Irak."
Paraphrase 1: 1. A journalist who was kidnapped in Baghdad was likely set free due to his Australian nationality, as Iraq's national security adviser suggests that there is no animosity towards Australians in the country.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The national security adviser of Iraq suggested today that a journalist, who was previously captured in Baghdad, was most likely released thanks to his Australian nationality, citing no prevalent hatred for Australians in the locale.

Original Text: First snapshot of a distant planet? In what could be a breakthrough in the search for worlds, an international team of astronomers claims to have made an image of a planetlike object beyond our solar system.
Translation: ¿Primera instantánea de un planeta lejano? En lo que podría ser un avance en la búsqueda de mundos, un equipo internacional de astrónomos afirma haber realizado una imagen de un objeto similar a un planeta más allá de nuestro sistema solar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An international group of astronomers, fueling the search for other worlds, claims to have captured an image of an object that resembles a planet, situated outside our solar system. Could this be the first snapshot of a distant planet?
Paraphrase 2: 2. An astronomical breakthrough could potentially be in sight, as an image of what seems to be a planet beyond our solar system has reportedly been captured by an international team of astronomers, thereby forwarding the quest for other worlds. Could this be the inaugural photograph of a far-off planet?

Original Text: Arafat's Health Crisis Prompts Questions (AP) AP - Yasser Arafat's latest health crisis  #151; a severe flu, gallstones, a battery of cancer tests  #151; has exposed how unprepared the Palestinians are for their leader's death, making a chaotic transition period all but inevitable.
Translation: La Crisis de Salud de Arafat Provoca Preguntas (AP) AP - La última crisis de salud de Yasser Arafat #151; una gripe severa, cálculos biliares, una serie de pruebas de cáncer #151; ha revelado cuán despreparados están los palestinos para la muerte de su líder, haciendo que un período de transición caótico sea prácticamente inevitable.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - The recent health crisis of Yasser Arafat - a severe case of flu, gallstones, a multitude of cancer tests - has revealed the level of unpreparedness among Palestinians for their leader's demise, making a disordered transition phase almost certain.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Palestinians are seen to be under-prepared for their leader, Yasser Arafat's death as suggested by his current health issues like severe flu or gallstones - The Associated Press. These issues, combined with numerous cancer tests are making a disorderly transition phase almost unavoidable.

Original Text: MCI Offers to Pay Part of States' Claims  NEW YORK (Reuters) - MCI Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MCIP.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MCIP.O</A> has offered to pay  states from 2 cents to 30 cents on the dollar to settle charges  it owes them as much as \$2 billion in back taxes, people  familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
Translation: MCI Ofrece Pagar Parte de las Reclamaciones de los Estados NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - MCI Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MCIP.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MCIP.O</A> ha ofrecido pagar a los estados desde 2 centavos hasta 30 centavos por dólar para saldar cargos que les adeuda tanto como $2 mil millones en impuestos atrasados, dijeron personas familiarizadas con el asunto el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MCI Inc. has proposed a settlement to the states for alleged back taxes it owes, agreeing to pay between 2 to 30 cents on the dollar which could total up to $2 billion, according to sources close to the issue on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, individuals in the know reported that MCI Inc. has suggested a resolution of states' claims against them by offering to pay a segment of the back taxes it owes, varying from 2 to 30 cents on the dollar with a potential total of as much as $2 billion.

Original Text: Earnhardt takes Sharpie 500 Dale Earnhardt Jr. broke out of a six-week slump last night with a convincing victory in the Sharpie 500, giving him a weekend sweep at Bristol (Tenn.) Motor Speedway and momentum for the upcoming championship chase.
Translation: Earnhardt se lleva el Sharpie 500. Anoche, Dale Earnhardt Jr. rompió una racha de seis semanas sin victorias con un triunfo convincente en el Sharpie 500, lo que le dio una barrida de fin de semana en el Bristol (Tenn.) Motor Speedway y un impulso para la próxima persecución del campeonato.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a six-week streak of underperforming, Dale Earnhardt Jr. rebounded last night as he claimed a compelling victory in the Sharpie 500. This triumph offered him a weekend clean sweep at the Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee and boosted his momentum in anticipation of the approaching championship run.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Last night, Dale Earnhardt Jr. won the Sharpie 500 in a remarkable victory that ended his six-week slump. This win marked a double success for him at the Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee over the weekend, and also built up his confidence for the championship chase on the horizon.

Original Text: Expos 6, Mets 1 Tony Batista homered twice to reach 30 this season, Livan Hernandez pitched another complete game and the Montreal Expos beat the New York Mets 6-1 Tuesday night before just 3,839 at Olympic Stadium.
Translation: Expos 6, Mets 1 Tony Batista bateó dos jonrones para alcanzar los 30 en esta temporada, Livan Hernandez lanzó otro juego completo y los Montreal Expos vencieron a los New York Mets 6-1 el martes por la noche ante solo 3,839 en el Estadio Olímpico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Batista hit two home runs, reaching a total of 30 for the season, and Livan Hernandez led another full game, resulting in the Montreal Expos winning over the New York Mets with a score of 6-1. The game, hosted at Olympic Stadium on Tuesday night, drew a mere crowd of 3,839.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday night, at the Olympic Stadium, a sparse crowd of 3,839 watched as Tony Batista's two home runs brought his season total to 30 and Livan Hernandez pitched a complete game, helping the Montreal Expos triumph over the New York Mets with a scoreline of 6-1.

Original Text: Real vs. Artificial: Shoppers love  #39;em both Real or fake? Natural or artificial? Such is the great Christmas tree debate. To put it in Shakesperian terms, it unfolds like this: To clean up pine needles or not to clean up pine needles?
Translation: Real vs. Artificial: A los compradores les encantan ambos ¿Real o falso? ¿Natural o artificial? Ese es el gran debate del árbol de Navidad. Para ponerlo en términos shakesperianos, se desarrolla así: ¿Limpiar las agujas de pino o no limpiar las agujas de pino?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Whether real or artificial, shoppers hold a fondness for both kinds of Christmas trees. The ongoing debate - what's better; natural or artificial? Clearly puts one in a Shakespearean dilemma; to deal with falling pine needles or avoid them?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Buying decisions are divided between real and artificial, showing that shoppers enjoy both equally. The hard-hitting dilemma is comparable to a Shakespearean discourse - Does the prospect of cleaning up pine needles dissuade one from selecting a real Christmas tree or not?

Original Text: Microsoft tops its earnings expectations September quarter was a good one, but software maker's revenue forecast for current period falls short of analysts' expectations.
Translation: Microsoft supera sus expectativas de ganancias, el trimestre de septiembre fue bueno, pero la previsión de ingresos del fabricante de software para el periodo actual no cumple con las expectativas de los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft exceeded its earnings predictions in the September quarter, however, its revenue forecast for the current period did not meet the expectations of analysts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite surpassing earnings estimates in the September quarter, Microsoft's projected revenue fell behind financial analysts' forecasts for the current period.

Original Text: Image flaw exposes Windows PCs Millions of computer users are at risk of attack because flaws in the way Windows handles some images.
Translation: El defecto en la imagen expone a las PCs de Windows. Millones de usuarios de computadoras están en riesgo de ataque debido a los defectos en la forma en que Windows maneja algunas imágenes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to flaws in the processing of certain images by Windows, millions of PC users are susceptible to potential attacks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A vulnerability associated with how Windows manages specific images has jeopardized millions of computer users, exposing them to the risk of an attack.

Original Text: Target soars, but misses estimates MINNEAPOLIS -- Target reported a 78 percent jump in third-quarter earnings on Thursday on strong revenue growth and the sale of its Mervyn #39;s discount chain, but it just missed analyst estimates.
Translation: Target se dispara, pero no alcanza las estimaciones MINNEAPOLIS -- Target informó un salto del 78 por ciento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre el jueves debido al fuerte crecimiento de los ingresos y la venta de su cadena de descuentos Mervyn # 39, pero apenas no alcanzó las estimaciones de los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MINNEAPOLIS - Despite missing analyst estimates, Target reported a noteworthy 78% increase in third-quarter earnings on Thursday, driven by robust revenue growth and the successful sale of its Mervyn's discount chain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Target announced a significant 78% leap in third-quarter earnings due to increased revenue and the disposal of its Mervyn's discount chain in Minneapolis. However, the achievement narrowly fell short of analyst predictions.

Original Text: Automakers Sue to Block Emissions Law in California Toyota, General Motors and seven other automakers filed suit to block California's new greenhouse gas regulation, which was approved by the state in September.
Translation: Los fabricantes de automóviles demandan para bloquear la ley de emisiones en California. Toyota, General Motors y otros siete fabricantes de automóviles presentaron una demanda para bloquear la nueva regulación de gases de efecto invernadero de California, que fue aprobada por el estado en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Toyota, General Motors, along with seven other car manufacturers, have lodged a lawsuit against the new greenhouse gas rule in California, which the state sanctioned in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new greenhouse gas regulation in California, passed in September, has led to a legal challenge from Toyota, General Motors, and seven other auto manufacturers.

Original Text: Israel Moves Quietly to Bolster Palestinian Vote Under American encouragement and, in some cases, pressure, Israel has quietly taken steps aimed at strengthening the standing of Palestinian moderates.
Translation: Israel se mueve discretamente para fortalecer el voto palestino bajo el estímulo estadounidense y, en algunos casos, presión, Israel ha tomado medidas silenciosas destinadas a fortalecer la posición de los moderados palestinos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under the encouragement and occasional pressure from America, Israel has discreetly initiated measures to enhance the position of Palestinian moderates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Israel, influenced and sometimes pressured by America, has subtly taken action to boost the influence of moderate Palestinians.

Original Text: Singapore #39;s Temasek to increase exposure to Asia, reshape <b>...</b> SINGAPORE : Temasek Holdings wants to increase its exposure to Asia as the region prospers, so it is reshaping its investment portfolio to have equal emphasis on Singapore, Asia and the rest of the world.
Translation: Singapur #39; Temasek aumentará la exposición a Asia, remodelará <b>...</b> SINGAPUR: Temasek Holdings quiere aumentar su exposición a Asia a medida que la región prospera, por lo que está remodelando su cartera de inversiones para tener un énfasis igual en Singapur, Asia y el resto del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Temasek Holdings, based in Singapore, plans to heighten its exposure to Asia due to the region's prosperity. In order to achieve this, it's modifying its investment portfolio to give equal importance to Singapore, Asia, and the rest of the world.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As Asia thrives economically, Singapore's Temasek Holdings plans to augment its involvement in the region. The company is intending to realign its investment portfolio to evenly focus on Singapore, Asia, and the global market.

Original Text: United States tops Brazil 2-1 in extra time to win gold medal in <b>...</b> Mia Hamm and the rest of the Fab Five of women #39;s soccer from the United States had just enough left in their thirtysomething legs for one more title, beating Brazil 2-1 on Thursday in extra time to win the Olympic gold medal in their final
Translation: Estados Unidos supera a Brasil 2-1 en tiempo extra para ganar la medalla de oro en <b>...</b> Mia Hamm y el resto del Fabuloso Quinteto femenino de fútbol de Estados Unidos tuvieron suficiente energía en sus piernas treintañeras para un título más, venciendo a Brasil 2-1 el jueves en tiempo extra para ganar la medalla de oro olímpica en su última
Paraphrase 1: 1. By topping Brazil 2-1 in extra time, the United States, led by Mia Hamm and the rest of the distinguished Fab Five women's soccer team, secured the Olympic gold medal on Thursday. Despite being in their thirties, their legs had just enough energy to secure them one more title in their final effort.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mia Hamm, alongside the rest of the Fab Five women's soccer team from the United States, proved their thirtysomething legs could still carry them to victory with a 2-1 win over Brazil in extra time on Thursday. This win enabled them to clinch the Olympic gold medal in their final tenure.

Original Text: Delta to Cut Wages 10 Percent  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> said on  Tuesday it will cut wages by 10 percent and its chief executive  will go unpaid for the rest of the year, but it still warned of  bankruptcy within weeks unless more cuts are made.
Translation: Delta reducirá salarios en un 10 por ciento CHICAGO (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> dijo el martes que reducirá los salarios en un 10 por ciento y su director ejecutivo no recibirá pago por el resto del año, pero aún así advirtió sobre la bancarrota en las próximas semanas a menos que se hagan más recortes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Delta Air Lines Inc. announced its decision to reduce wages by 10 percent, with its CEO forgoing his salary for the remainder of the year. However, the firm warned that bankruptcy could still be imminent in the coming weeks without further cuts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Revealing an intention to slash wages by 10 percent, Delta Air Lines Inc. stated on Tuesday that its chief executive will not receive any payment for the rest of the year. Nonetheless, the company cautioned about possible bankruptcy on the horizon within weeks unless it applies more cutbacks.

Original Text: Markets upbeat on Australia vote Share prices in Sydney are boosted by hopes of a fresh round of economic liberalisation, following the re-election of Australian prime minister John Howard.
Translation: Los mercados se muestran optimistas tras la votación en Australia. Los precios de las acciones en Sídney se ven impulsados por las esperanzas de una nueva ronda de liberalización económica, tras la reelección del primer ministro australiano John Howard.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the re-election of Australian Prime Minister John Howard, the anticipation of a new wave of economic liberalisation has lead to a surge in Sydney's share prices, leaving markets optimistic.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The re-election of John Howard as Australian Prime Minister and the expected subsequent wave of economic liberalisation, has instilled a sense of optimism in the markets, causing an increase in Sydney's share prices.

Original Text: Spain Holds Syrian, Alleges Militant Islamist Links  MADRID (Reuters) - A Spanish judge leading the probe into  the Madrid train bombings on Saturday ordered a Syrian man to  be held pending trial on suspicion of involvement with a  militant Islamist group, court documents showed.
Translation: España Detiene a Sirio, Alega Vínculos con Militantes Islamistas MADRID (Reuters) - Un juez español a cargo de la investigación sobre los atentados en los trenes de Madrid ordenó el sábado que un hombre sirio fuera detenido a la espera de juicio por sospecha de implicación con un grupo militante islamista, mostraron documentos judiciales.
Paraphrase 1: 1) MADRID (Reuters) - A Syrian man suspected of having connections with a militant Islamist group linked to the Madrid train bombings has been detained by a Spanish judge pending trial, according to court files.
Paraphrase 2: 2) MADRID (Reuters) - On Saturday, a Spanish judge, leading the investigation into the Madrid train bombings, decided to keep a Syrian man in custody until his trial, based on suspicions of his association with a militant Islamist group, as revealed by court records.

Original Text: Kidd Hopes to Practice Next Month (AP) AP - Jason Kidd's recovery from surgery on his left knee is on schedule and the All-Star point guard hopes to practice next month with the struggling New Jersey Nets.
Translation: Kidd Espera Practicar el Próximo Mes (AP) AP - La recuperación de Jason Kidd de su cirugía en la rodilla izquierda va según lo programado y el base All-Star espera practicar el próximo mes con los atribulados New Jersey Nets.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - Jason Kidd, the All-Star point guard, is optimistically looking forward to practicing next month with the New Jersey Nets, following his recovery from a left knee surgery that is going as planned.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - Jason Kidd, an All-Star point guard, is progressing well from his left knee operation and he's hopeful to join the New Jersey Nets for practice next month. The team has been going through a rough phase.

Original Text: Branson #39;s Virgin Group Plans to Offer Space Flights in 2007 Virgin Group Ltd., owned by billionaire entrepreneur Sir Richard Branson, said it formed a company called Virgin Galactic to offer commercial space flights starting in 2007.
Translation: Branson #39; Virgin Group planea ofrecer vuelos espaciales en 2007. Virgin Group Ltd., propiedad del empresario multimillonario Sir Richard Branson, dijo que ha formado una empresa llamada Virgin Galactic para ofrecer vuelos comerciales al espacio a partir de 2007.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Virgin Group Ltd, under the proprietorship of billionaire entrepreneur Sir Richard Branson, announced the creation of a new company, Virgin Galactic, with the intention of providing commercial space flights from 2007.

Original Text: Sadr calls for Najaf ceasefire NAJAF, Iraq (Reuters) - Radical Shi #39;ite cleric Moqtada al-Sadr has agreed to disarm his Iraqi militia and leave a holy shrine but only after a truce with encircling US marines.
Translation: Sadr pide un alto al fuego en Najaf NAJAF, Irak (Reuters) - El clérigo chiíta radical Moqtada al-Sadr ha accedido a desarmar a su milicia iraquí y abandonar un santuario sagrado, pero solo después de una tregua con los marines estadounidenses que lo rodean.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Radical Shi'ite cleric, Moqtada al-Sadr, from Najaf, Iraq, according to Reuters, has consented to lay down weapons for his Iraqi militia and vacate a religious shrine, but he puts a condition that a ceasefire with the surrounding US marines must happen first.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Moqtada al-Sadr, a radical Shi'ite cleric in Najaf, Iraq, is willing to disarm his militia and exit a sacred shrine on the condition that a truce is established with the US Marines encircling the area, Reuters reported.

Original Text: Davis dismisses report Lee Suggs has been cleared to practice beginning Wednesday after missing the last two games with a neck injury. Coach Butch Davis said a report on ESPN speculating Suggs has stenosis, which is a narrowing of the spinal column, is untrue.
Translation: Davis descarta el informe que Lee Suggs ha sido autorizado para practicar a partir del miércoles después de perderse los dos últimos partidos por una lesión en el cuello. El entrenador Butch Davis dijo que un informe en ESPN especulando que Suggs tiene estenosis, que es un estrechamiento de la columna vertebral, no es cierto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Coach Butch Davis has debunked an ESPN report that speculated Lee Suggs suffers from stenosis, a condition involving the narrowing of the spinal column. According to Davis, Suggs, who missed the last two games due to a neck injury, has received clearance to start practicing from Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Contrary to a report aired on ESPN, speculating that Lee Suggs suffers from stenosis - a condition that narrows the spinal column - Coach Butch Davis asserts that it is false. Suggs, who was sidelined for the previous two games due to a neck injury, is set to resume practice from Wednesday, as stated by Davis.

Original Text: Sunday Without Favorite Comic? Not So Funny Newspapers across the country have been engaging in discussions about whether their current rosters of comics are a luxury, given the current dreary economics of the newspaper business.
Translation: ¿Domingo sin cómic favorito? Los periódicos no son tan graciosos. Periódicos de todo el país han estado participando en discusiones sobre si su actual plantilla de cómics es un lujo, dada la actual sombría economía del negocio de los periódicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid the grim economics of the newspaper industry, national papers are debating whether keeping their existing slate of comics is a superfluous luxury. Is a Sunday without the popular comic really so amusing?
Paraphrase 2: 2. The gloomy economic climate of the newspaper business is forcing nationwide papers to question if maintaining their current lineup of comics is justified. A Sunday lacking a favorite comic— is that really humorous?

Original Text: Schmidt #39;s gem is golden for Giants Bonds #39; blast also helps SF take <b>...</b> Phoenix -- Barry Bonds hit his 699th home run Sunday, one of his sweet-mother-of-creation, look-at-it-go blows that soared 460 feet before it smacked the giant video board that towers over center field at Bank One Ballpark.
Translation: La joya de Schmidt es de oro para los Giants, la explosión de Bonds también ayuda a SF a tomar <b>...</b> Phoenix - Barry Bonds dio su 699º jonrón el domingo, uno de sus golpes mira-cómo-vuela, madre-dulce-de-la-creación, que recorrió 460 pies antes de golpear la gigantesca pantalla de video que se alza sobre el campo central en el Bank One Ballpark.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Sunday, Barry Bonds secured his 699th home run - a striking shot that flew an impressive 460 feet before hitting the giant video screen towering over the center field at the Bank One Ballpark in Phoenix. The golden performance of Schmidt and the explosive help from Bonds led the SF Giants to take a significant victory; certainly a sight to behold.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Barry Bonds achieved another milestone in Phoenix by scoring his 699th home run, the ball impressively flying as far as 460 feet before striking the enormous video board above the center field at Bank One Ballpark. In a thrilling match-up, both Schmidt's golden play and Bond's powerful blast significantly contributed to the SF Giants' success.

Original Text: Chelsea chief: We #39;re right to sack Mutu Chelsea chief Peter Kenyon says the club had no option but to sack Adrian Mutu last week. Kenyon claimed today that Mutu rejected offers of assistance from the club and lied to his employers, leaving Chelsea
Translation: Jefe de Chelsea: Hicimos lo correcto al despedir a Mutu. El jefe de Chelsea, Peter Kenyon, dice que el club no tuvo otra opción que despedir a Adrian Mutu la semana pasada. Kenyon afirmó hoy que Mutu rechazó las ofertas de ayuda del club y mintió a sus empleadores, dejando a Chelsea.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "We did the right thing in firing Mutu," says Chelsea's head, Peter Kenyon. He affirms that the club was compelled to let Adrian Mutu go the previous week. Today, Kenyon asserted that Mutu turned down help offered by the club and deceived his bosses, putting Chelsea in a difficult position.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Confirming the dismissal of Adrian Mutu last week, Peter Kenyon, the chief at Chelsea, stated that the club had no alternative. Kenyon alleged today that Mutu denied any aid provided by Chelsea and misrepresented facts to his superiors, putting the club in a bind.

Original Text: LG Wins DMB Satellite Handset Race LG Electronics has unveiled the worlds first terrestrial digital broadcasting cell phone this week. The Digital Multimedia Broadcasting (DMB) handset will allow people to receive satellite broadcasts to watch consumer programs.
Translation: LG gana la carrera de terminales de satélite DMB. LG Electronics ha presentado esta semana el primer teléfono móvil con difusión de televisión digital terrestre del mundo. El terminal de radiodifusión multimedia digital (DMB) permitirá a las personas recibir transmisiones vía satélite para ver programas de consumo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LG Electronics has released the world's inaugural terrestrial digital broadcasting cell phone this week, placing them at the fore of the Digital Multimedia Broadcasting (DMB) Satellite Handset competition. This DMB handset provides a gateway for users to view consumer programs via satellite broadcasts.

Original Text: Pakistan, India agree to resume 2nd rail link Pakistan and India agreed Friday to resume the second rail link between the two nations. According to a statement jointly issued by technical teams fromboth sides at the conclusion
Translation: Pakistán e India acuerdan reanudar la 2ª conexión ferroviaria. Pakistán e India acordaron el viernes reanudar la segunda conexión ferroviaria entre las dos naciones. Según un comunicado emitido conjuntamente por equipos técnicos de ambas partes al finalizar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Both Pakistan and India, on Friday, have agreed to reestablish the second railway connection between the two countries, as stated in a mutual declaration issued by technical teams from both sides at their meeting's end.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A joint statement released by the technical teams from India and Pakistan at the end of their meeting confirmed that they have consented to resume the secondary rail link between the two countries on Friday.

Original Text: AIG Says Unit Faces U.S. Criminal Probe  NEW YORK (Reuters) - American International Group Inc.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AIG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AIG.N</A>, the world's largest insurer by market value, on  Wednesday said the U.S. Department of Justice opened a criminal  probe into one of its units over possible securities law  violations.
Translation: AIG Dice Que Una Unidad Enfrenta Investigación Criminal En EE.UU. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - American International Group Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AIG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AIG.N</A>, la aseguradora más grande del mundo por valor de mercado, anunció el miércoles que el Departamento de Justicia de los EE. UU. inició una investigación criminal sobre una de sus unidades por posibles violaciones a la ley de valores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. American International Group Inc., identified as the biggest insurer globally in terms of market value, announced on Wednesday that the U.S. Department of Justice has initiated a criminal investigation into one of its subsidiaries for potential violations of securities laws.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The U.S. Department of Justice has commenced a criminal investigation into a division of American International Group Inc., the world's leading insurer based on market value, in relation to suspected violations of securities legislation, as stated by the company on Wednesday.

Original Text: Gregan agrees Wallabies contract Australia captain George Gregan is set to sign a new three-year contract to take him through to the 2007 World Cup. Sydney #39;s Daily Telegraph newspaper claimed the 31-year-old scrum-half is ready to put pen to paper on the deal.
Translation: Gregan acepta contrato con los Wallabies El capitán de Australia, George Gregan, está listo para firmar un nuevo contrato de tres años que lo llevará hasta la Copa del Mundo 2007. El diario Daily Telegraph de Sydney afirmó que el medio melé de 31 años está listo para estampar su firma en el acuerdo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australia's captain, George Gregan, is poised to sign a new three-year contract with the Wallabies, extending his tenure through the 2007 World Cup, according to Sydney's Daily Telegraph. The paper reported that the 31-year-old scrum-half is set to finalize the deal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sydney's Daily Telegraph has reported that George Gregan, the 31-year-old scrum-half and captain of Australia's national team, is preparing to sign a fresh three-year contract. This new agreement will ensure his continued leadership up until the 2007 World Cup.

Original Text: London shares close flat on NY losses, new record high in oil prices (AFP) AFP - Leading British shares pared earlier gains to close almost unchanged, weighed by losses on Wall Street, where renewed oil price concerns and earnings disappointments took their toll, dealers said.
Translation: Las acciones de Londres cierran planas por las pérdidas en Nueva York, nuevo récord en los precios del petróleo (AFP) AFP - Las principales acciones británicas recortaron las ganancias anteriores para cerrar casi sin cambios, lastradas por las pérdidas en Wall Street, donde las renovadas preocupaciones sobre los precios del petróleo y las decepciones en las ganancias cobraron su peaje, dijeron los comerciantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Dealers remarked that London's top shares, which cut back early increases, closed almost without change as losses in New York's Wall Street, driven by renewed concerns about oil prices and below-par earnings, exerted pressure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - Market dealers reported that leading UK stocks marginally altered from their openings, ending close to being stationary, influenced by Wall Street's downturn due to the surging apprehension over oil prices and profits falling short of expectations.

Original Text: Oracle may cut its offer for PeopleSoft as much as one-third Oracle Corp. is thinking about cutting its offer for PeopleSoft by one-third to a one-fourth. Oracle Co-president Safra Catz made the statement Monday, citing PeopleSoft #39;s 2004 performance as the chief reason
Translation: Oracle podría reducir su oferta por PeopleSoft hasta en un tercio. Oracle Corp. está considerando reducir su oferta por PeopleSoft en un tercio a un cuarto. La copresidenta de Oracle, Safra Catz, hizo la declaración el lunes, citando el rendimiento de PeopleSoft en 2004 como la principal razón.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Oracle Corp. is contemplating reducing its offer for PeopleSoft by 25% to 33%, according to the company's Co-President Safra Catz. He made this declaration on Monday, attributing PeopleSoft's 2004 performance as the primary reason.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Due to PeopleSoft's 2004 performance, Oracle's Co-President Safra Catz, announced on Monday that Oracle Corporation is considering lowering its bid for PeopleSoft by approximately 33% to 25%.

Original Text: Gartner: Lower prices, new users keep mobile phones hot In traditionally weak quarter, sales increased 26 compared to last year.
Translation: Gartner: Los precios más bajos, los nuevos usuarios mantienen los teléfonos móviles en auge. En un trimestre tradicionalmente débil, las ventas aumentaron un 26 en comparación con el año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Gartner reports that the sustained popularity of mobile phones is due to lowered prices and new users, even in a typically weak quarter, sales escalated by 26 percent in comparison to the previous year.

Original Text: AT T looks into closing Windows A team of researchers is evaluating how Linux and Mac OS X stack up against Windows for internal use.
Translation: AT&T examina el cierre de Windows. Un equipo de investigadores está evaluando cómo se comparan Linux y Mac OS X con Windows para uso interno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A team of researchers at AT&T are examining the efficiency of Linux and Mac OS X in comparison to Windows for their internal applications.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At AT&T, a research team is investigating the performance of Linux and Mac OS X as opposed to Windows for usage in their internal systems.

Original Text: Lord of the Ring: Kostya Tszyu stops Mitchell in three For two years, many have contended that Kostya Tszyus absence from the ring had kept the rest of the junior welterweight division on hold.
Translation: Señor del Anillo: Kostya Tszyu detiene a Mitchell en tres. Durante dos años, muchos han sostenido que la ausencia de Kostya Tszyu del ring había mantenido al resto de la división de peso súper ligero en espera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Many people have argued for the past two years that the junior welterweight division was in standby due to Kostya Tszyu's absence from the ring; this theory holds more weight after the 'Lord of the Ring', Tszyu, stopped Mitchell in just three.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As Kostya Tszyu, the 'Lord of the Ring', halted Mitchell in three rounds, the belief that his two-year absence had held back the entire junior welterweight division gains more followers.

Original Text: Williams offers to swap securities to cut debt Williams Cos. Inc. (WMB.N: Quote, Profile, Research) is offering to exchange up to 43.9 million of its Feline PACS securities in a bid to reduce its overall debt, the natural gas company said on Friday.
Translation: Williams ofrece intercambiar valores para reducir la deuda. Williams Cos. Inc. (WMB.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) está ofreciendo intercambiar hasta 43.9 millones de sus valores de Feline PACS en un intento de reducir su deuda total, dijo la compañía de gas natural el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to decrease its overall debt, Williams Cos. Inc. (WMB.N: Quote, Profile, Research) announced on Friday that it is proposing an exchange of up to 43.9 million of its Feline PACS securities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Friday saw Williams Cos. Inc. (WMB.N: Quote, Profile, Research), a natural gas company, announce its plan to offer a trade of up to 43.9 million of its Feline PACS securities in a measure to curb its cumulative debt.

Original Text: Virtual veins give nurses a hand \A virtual reality hand, complete with vital veins, that "feels" could help trainee nurses practice their jabs.
Translation: Las venas virtuales ayudan a las enfermeras \Una mano de realidad virtual, completa con venas vitales, que se "siente" podría ayudar a las enfermeras en formación a practicar sus pinchazos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Virtual reality veins in a hand aid nurses with their practice."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Trainee nurses can practice their jabs using a virtual reality hand with vital veins."

Original Text: PeopleSoft board opens up to Oracle SAN FRANCISCO - While it has so far rejected each of Oracle Corp.'s takeover offers, PeopleSoft Inc.'s board of directors is willing to talk about a deal at the right price, a member of PeopleSoft's board said Tuesday.
Translation: La junta de PeopleSoft se abre a Oracle SAN FRANCISCO - Aunque hasta ahora ha rechazado cada una de las ofertas de adquisición de Oracle Corp., la junta de directores de PeopleSoft Inc. está dispuesta a hablar de un acuerdo al precio correcto, dijo un miembro de la junta de PeopleSoft el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A member of PeopleSoft Inc.'s board confirmed on Tuesday, despite consistently dismissing Oracle Corp's acquisition proposals in the past, the PeopleSoft board is open to discussions regarding a deal if the price is right. This comes from a meeting held in San Francisco.
Paraphrase 2: 2. PeopleSoft Inc.'s board of directors, having until now turned down every takeover attempt by Oracle Corp, is not averse to discussing an agreement, as long as the price is satisfactory. This statement was made by a PeopleSoft board member on Tuesday in San Francisco.

Original Text: Tech Briefs SourceLabs has raised \$3.5 million in a first round of funding from Ignition Partners and Index Ventures. The Seattle startup, which was founded earlier this year, will help companies integrate and deploy open source software.
Translation: Tech Briefs informa que SourceLabs ha recaudado \$3.5 millones en una primera ronda de financiación de Ignition Partners e Index Ventures. La startup de Seattle, que se fundó a principios de este año, ayudará a las empresas a integrar y desplegar software de código abierto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Seattle-based startup, Tech Briefs SourceLabs, which was established earlier this year, has secured \$3.5 million in its initial funding round, courtesy of Ignition Partners and Index Ventures. This startup aims to help firms integrate and initiate open source software deployments.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Securing \$3.5 million in its first round of funding from Ignition Partners and Index Ventures, the Seattle startup Tech Briefs SourceLabs, established earlier this year, is set to aid companies in integrating and deploying open source software.

Original Text: Up to 25 killed in two attacks in Baghdad At least 14 people were killed and 19 were wounded when a car bomb went off in a Sunni area in the north of the city. The target of the attack is still not clear.
Translation: Hasta 25 personas murieron en dos ataques en Bagdad. Al menos 14 personas fueron asesinadas y 19 resultaron heridas cuando un coche bomba explotó en una zona suní en el norte de la ciudad. Aún no está claro el objetivo del ataque.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It remains unclear who the intended target was, but a car bomb detonated in a north Baghdad Sunni area resulted in at least 14 people losing their lives and another 19 getting injured. Additionally, in Baghdad, there were two occurrences of violence that claimed up to 25 lives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the northern part of the city, in a Sunni area of Baghdad, a car bombing incident led to a minimum of 14 fatalities and 19 others sustaining injuries, with the attack's objective still unknown. Moreover, two separate attacks in the city resulted in a total of up to 25 deaths.

Original Text: Radical cleric Abu Hamza makes brief court appearance (AFP) AFP - Radical Islamic cleric Abu Hamza al-Masri, who is charged with 16 alleged offences including incitement to murder Jews, appeared briefly by video link in court.
Translation: Traducir al español de forma precisa: El clérigo radical Abu Hamza hace una breve aparición en la corte (AFP) AFP - El clérigo islámico radical Abu Hamza al-Masri, quien está acusado de 16 presuntos delitos incluyendo la incitación al asesinato de judíos, apareció brevemente por videoconferencia en la corte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Charged with 16 alleged crimes, including encouraging the murder of Jews, Radical cleric Abu Hamza al-Masri made a short appearance in court via video link (AFP).

Original Text: Group claims to kill kidnapped Iraq troops BAGHDAD: An Iraqi militant group said on its web site Thursday that it had killed 11 Iraqi troops taken hostage south of Baghdad and posted video of the bound men being shot or beheaded.
Translation: El grupo afirma matar a las tropas iraquíes secuestradas BAGDAD: Un grupo militante iraquí anunció en su sitio web el jueves que había matado a 11 soldados iraquíes que habían sido secuestrados al sur de Bagdad y publicó un video de los hombres atados siendo disparados o decapitados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD: A militant group in Iraq stated on their online platform on Thursday that they had executed 11 kidnapped Iraqi soldiers south of Baghdad, providing video evidence of the hostages being either shot or decapitated.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD: Thursday saw a militant group from Iraq announcing on its website that they had murdered 11 of their hostaged Iraqi troops south of Baghdad, and they've presented a video showing these men tied up and either shot or beheaded.

Original Text: Russian recruits tell of beatings, torture and sex assaults Russia #39;s once mighty armed forces are riddled with Clockwork Orange-style sadism where senior soldiers subject their junior colleagues to vicious beatings, torture, sexual violence and death threats, a report claimed yesterday.
Translation: Los reclutas rusos hablan de golpizas, torturas y agresiones sexuales. Se afirma que las poderosas fuerzas armadas de Rusia, alguna vez poderosas, están plagadas de un sadismo al estilo de La Naranja Mecánica, donde los soldados superiores someten a sus colegas junior a brutales golpizas, torturas, violencia sexual y amenazas de muerte, según un informe publicado ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A recent report alleges that Russia's formerly powerful military is now infested with brutalism reminiscent of "Clockwork Orange," with senior members subjecting their subordinates to severe physical abuse, torture, sexual assault and life-threatening intimidation, based on accounts from Russian recruits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Recounted instances of physical assault, torture, sexual harassment, and death threats from Russian recruits suggest a severe issue within the once formidable Russian armed forces. According to yesterday's report, there is a "Clockwork Orange" level of sadism prevalent, perpetuated by senior soldiers onto their junior peers.

Original Text: Prince Charles visits Petra day after crash The Prince of Wales has travelled to Petra a day after nine British pilgrim tourists were killed in a coach crash near the ancient Jordanian city.
Translation: El Príncipe Carlos visita Petra un día después del accidente. El Príncipe de Gales ha viajado a Petra un día después de que nueve turistas peregrinos británicos murieran en un accidente de autobús cerca de la antigua ciudad jordana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A day following a severe coach accident that claimed the lives of nine British pilgrim tourists near the historic Jordanian city, the Prince of Wales journeyed to Petra.

Original Text: J.C. Penney Taps Former Macy's, LVMH Head (AP) AP - J.C. Penney Co. Inc. named a former chairman and chief executive of both Macy's and luxury retailer LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton, to lead the department store company, replacing Allen Questrom.
Translation: J.C. Penney Elige al Exdirector de Macy's, LVMH (AP) AP - J.C. Penney Co. Inc. ha nombrado a un ex presidente y director ejecutivo de ambos Macy's y el minorista de lujo LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton, para liderar la compañía de tiendas por departamento, reemplazando a Allen Questrom.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The former Chairman and CEO of Macy's and LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton has been appointed by J.C. Penney Co. Inc, as their new leader, succeeding Allen Questrom.
Paraphrase 2: 2. J.C. Penney Co. Inc. has announced the appointment of a past top executive from both Macy's and LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton as their new chief, taking over from Allen Questrom.

Original Text: Do They Know It's Simplistic? Band Aid's intentions are good, but Africa needs more than just a Christmas jingle
Translation: ¿Saben que es simplista? Las intenciones de Band Aid son buenas, pero África necesita más que solo un villancico navideño.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Although Band Aid's intentions are commendable, Africa requires more than just a holiday tune. Is the group aware of how simplistic this seems?

Original Text: Al-Qaida Aims to Disrupt Afghan Elections KABUL, Afghanistan - U.S.-led forces trying to protect landmark Afghan elections face a rising wave of violence from about 2,000 insurgents, including al-Qaida militants slipping in from Pakistan, an American general said Saturday.    In the latest bloodshed, Afghan police said suspected Taliban gunmen killed nine militia soldiers in two attacks on checkpoints in a troubled southern province...
Translation: Al-Qaida busca interrumpir las elecciones afganas KABUL, Afganistán - Las fuerzas lideradas por Estados Unidos que intentan proteger las históricas elecciones afganas se enfrentan a una creciente ola de violencia de unos 2,000 insurgentes, incluyendo militantes de al-Qaida que se infiltran desde Pakistán, dijo un general estadounidense el sábado. En el último derramamiento de sangre, la policía afgana informó que se sospecha que los pistoleros talibanes mataron a nueve soldados de la milicia en dos ataques a puestos de control en una problemática provincia del sur...
Paraphrase 1: 1. An American general declared on Saturday that around 2,000 insurgents, which include al-Qaida militants infiltrating from Pakistan, initiate a surge of violence aimed at disrupting the crucial Afghan elections. US-led forces are therefore struggling to safeguard these landmark polls. Additionally, the Afghan police recently reported that they suspect Taliban gunmen to be responsible for slaughtering nine militia soldiers during two assaults at checkpoints in a problematic southern province...
Paraphrase 2: 2. The landmark Afghan elections are under threat by escalating violence from approximately 2,000 insurgents, among which are al-Qaida militants crossing over from Pakistan, according to an announcement made by an American general on Saturday. These challenges are faced by the U.S.-led forces who strive to maintain the integrity of the elections. In an episode of the latest violence, suspected Taliban gunmen were reported by Afghan police to have launched attacks on checkpoints in a southern province known for its troubles, resulting in the death of nine militia soldiers...

Original Text: Phil Knight to resign as CEO of Nike Worldwide athletic-goods giant Nike, Inc. announced Thursday that University alumnus and current Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Philip H. Knight will step down as CEO, effective Dec. 28.
Translation: Phil Knight renuncia como CEO de Nike. El gigante mundial de artículos deportivos, Nike, Inc., anunció el jueves que el ex alumno de la Universidad y actual Presidente y Director Ejecutivo, Philip H. Knight, dejará su cargo como CEO, a partir del 28 de diciembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The global sports merchandise behemoth, Nike Inc., revealed this Thursday that their current Chairman and CEO, Philip H. Knight, an alumnus of the University, is set to resign as CEO, which will be enacted on the 28th of December.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, a declaration came from Nike Inc., a titan in the athletics goods industry globally, stating that Philip H. Knight, who is a University graduate and holds the positions of Chairman and CEO, is scheduled to relinquish his role as CEO, taking effect from December 28.

Original Text: U.S. Retail Sales Slip on Auto Weakness  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. retail sales posted a  larger-than-expected decline in August, a Commerce Department  report on Tuesday showed, but the drop was mostly confined to  the automotive sector.
Translation: Las ventas minoristas de EE. UU. caen debido a la debilidad del sector automotriz. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Las ventas minoristas de EE. UU. mostraron una caída mayor de la esperada en agosto, según un informe del Departamento de Comercio publicado el martes, pero la caída se centró principalmente en el sector automotriz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A report from the Commerce Department released on Tuesday demonstrated an unexpected drop in U.S. retail sales in August, with the primary cause being a downfall in the auto industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As shown in the Tuesday's Commerce Department report, a significant drop occurred in U.S. retail sales during August, primarily due to a weakness in the automotive market.

Original Text: Q A: Sun's Marissa Peterson on the company's IT services plans Marissa Peterson, who heads Sun Microsystems' services division, talked this week about the company's efforts to help its managed services partners broaden their reach.
Translation: P: Marissa Peterson de Sun sobre los planes de servicios de TI de la compañía Marissa Peterson, quien lidera la división de servicios de Sun Microsystems, habló esta semana sobre los esfuerzos de la compañía para ayudar a sus socios de servicios gestionados a ampliar su alcance.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Marissa Peterson, the division head of Sun Microsystems' services, discussed the company's plans to expand its managed services partners' scopes in the IT services sector this week.

Original Text: Man Mostly to Blame for 2003 Heatwave Human activity has increased greenhouse gases in the atmosphere and more than doubled the risk of record-breaking hot European summers, like that of 2003, according to a new study by Peter Stott from the Met Offices Hadley Centre, and Daithi Stone and
Translation: El Hombre es Principalmente Responsable de la Ola de Calor de 2003. La actividad humana ha incrementado los gases de efecto invernadero en la atmósfera y ha más que duplicado el riesgo de veranos europeos récord en calor, como el de 2003, según un nuevo estudio de Peter Stott del Centro Hadley de la Oficina Met, y Daithi Stone y
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a new study by Peter Stott from the Met Office’s Hadley Centre and Daithi Stone, human activities that have led to an increase in greenhouse gases in the atmosphere are substantially responsible for the risk of record-high temperatures during European summers, such as the heatwave observed in 2003.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Peter Stott from the Met Office's Hadley Centre and Daithi Stone have concluded in a new study that human activity, by accelerating the increase of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere, has significantly increased the likelihood of extreme hot summers in Europe, as was observed in 2003.

Original Text: EU hits back over Boeing #39;s  quot;massive quot; aid The EU has hit back after Washington filed a case at the World Trade Organisation over state aid for aircraft maker Airbus EAD.PA , filing its own case over what it called  quot;massive illegal quot; aid for Boeing BA.
Translation: La UE responde a la "enorme" ayuda a Boeing. La UE ha respondido después de que Washington presentó un caso en la Organización Mundial del Comercio por la ayuda estatal al fabricante de aviones Airbus EAD.PA, presentando su propio caso sobre lo que denominó "enorme ayuda ilegal" a Boeing BA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reacting to Washington's case filed at the World Trade Organisation against Airbus EAD.PA over state aid, the EU retaliated by filing their own case against what they termed as "massive illegal" aid for aircraft manufacturer, Boeing BA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to a case launched by Washington at the World Trade Organisation concerning state aid for Airbus EAD.PA, the European Union fought back by lodging its own case against what it described as "massive illegal" aid towards Boeing BA.

Original Text: Linux Doesn't Make Sense for Desktops (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - Longhorn's woes may open a door for Linux #151;a very tiny door #151;but Linux just isn't a good choice for desktops. Instead, desktop Linux proponents should wake up and switch to the Mac OS.
Translation: Linux No Tiene Sentido para Escritorios (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - Los problemas de Longhorn pueden abrir una puerta para Linux #151; una puerta muy pequeña #151; pero Linux simplemente no es una buena elección para los escritorios. En cambio, los defensores de Linux para escritorio deberían despertar y cambiar a Mac OS.
Paraphrase 1: (Ziff Davis) While Longhorn's issues might potentially provide a slight opportunity for Linux, Ziff Davis believes it's not the optimal choice for desktops; advocates of desktop Linux would be better served by transitioning to the Mac OS.
Paraphrase 2: In light of the problems with Longhorn, there might be a slim chance for Linux, however, Ziff Davis argues that Linux is not suitable for desktop use; supporters of Linux for desktops should consider changing to the Mac OS instead.

Original Text: Infineon execs get to serve time over price-fixing Four senior executives of German chipmaker Infineon Technologies will serve jail time and pay steep fines for their role in a scheme to fix prices in the memory chip market, said the US Department of Justice.
Translation: Los ejecutivos de Infineon cumplirán tiempo en prisión por manipulación de precios. Cuatro altos ejecutivos de la empresa alemana de semiconductores Infineon Technologies cumplirán tiempo en prisión y pagarán fuertes multas por su papel en un plan para manipular los precios en el mercado de chips de memoria, dijo el Departamento de Justicia de Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Department of Justice has reported that four senior executives of Infineon Technologies, a German chipmaker, will face imprisonment and hefty fines for their involvement in a price-fixing plot in the memory chip market.

Original Text: Verizon  to Buy NextWave Licenses Verizon Wireless announced Friday that it plans to buy airwave licenses from NextWave Telecom Inc. for \$3 billion in cash, giving the cellular phone giant the ability to carry more calls in some of the nation's largest cities.\<FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-The Washington Post</B></FONT>
Translation: Verizon comprará licencias de NextWave. Verizon Wireless anunció el viernes que planea comprar licencias de ondas aéreas de NextWave Telecom Inc. por 3 mil millones de dólares en efectivo, brindando al gigante de la telefonía móvil la capacidad de gestionar más llamadas en algunas de las ciudades más grandes de la nación. -The Washington Post.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Verizon Wireless proclaimed its intention on Friday to acquire NextWave Telecom Inc.'s airwave licenses for $3 billion cash, enabling them to accommodate more calls in some of the biggest cities in the country - The Washington Post.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Friday saw an announcement from Verizon Wireless stating their plan to purchase airwave licenses from NextWave Telecom Inc., shelling out a whopping $3 billion cash, which places them in a position to handle an increased volume of calls in some of the nation's major cities - The Washington Post.

Original Text: Roadside Bomb Targets Baghdad Governor, 1 Killed  BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Guerrillas tried to assassinate  Baghdad's governor on Tuesday, opening fire on his convoy and  then detonating a bomb in a van parked by the roadside, police  and government officials said.
Translation: Bomba al Borde del Camino Ataca al Gobernador de Bagdad, 1 Muerto  BAGDAD (Reuters) - Guerrilleros intentaron asesinar al gobernador de Bagdad el martes, abriendo fuego contra su convoy y luego detonando una bomba en una camioneta estacionada al borde del camino, dijeron funcionarios de la policía y del gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1) BAGHDAD (Reuters) - On Tuesday, guerrillas initiated an assassination attempt on Baghdad's governor. Their methods involved shooting at his convoy and setting off an explosive device in a van stationed on the roadside, according to the police and government authorities. One person was killed in the attack.
Paraphrase 2: 2) BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Police and government officials reported an assassination attempt on the governor of Baghdad on Tuesday. A group of guerrillas attacked his convoy by shooting at it and detonating a bomb in a roadside-parked van. The attack resulted in one fatality.

Original Text: Heavy Rains Wash Out Mets-Rockies Game (AP) AP - Heavy rains washed out Wednesday night's game between the New York Mets and the Colorado Rockies before it ever started.
Translation: Lluvias intensas cancelan el juego entre los Mets y los Rockies (AP) AP - Las lluvias intensas cancelaron el juego del miércoles por la noche entre los New York Mets y los Colorado Rockies antes de que pudiera comenzar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP: The Wednesday night game involving the New York Mets and the Colorado Rockies was cancelled due to heavy downpours, even prior to its start.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Before the match could start, Wednesday night's game between the New York Mets and the Colorado Rockies was called off because of severe rainfalls. (AP)

Original Text: Cleric Who Died in Pakistan Custody  #39;Tortured #39; ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - An Afghan Islamic cleric who died in custody in Pakistan on Wednesday had signs of torture on his body, an intelligence official said.
Translation: Clero que murió en custodia de Pakistán #39;Torturado #39; ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Un clérigo islámico afgano que murió en custodia en Pakistán el miércoles presentaba signos de tortura en su cuerpo, dijo un oficial de inteligencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Indications of torture were found on the body of an Afghan Islamic cleric that perished while in Pakistan custody, according to an intelligence officer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A statement by an intelligence official revealed that an Afghan Islamic cleric, who recently died under Pakistan's custody, displayed evidences of torture on his body, as reported by Reuters in Islamabad.

Original Text: Saints-Chargers game blacked out The San Diego Chargers #39; home game against the New Orleans Saints on Sunday will not be shown on local TV because 9,500 general admission tickets remained unsold at Thursday #39;s deadline.
Translation: El partido Saints-Chargers no será transmitido. El partido en casa de los San Diego Chargers contra los New Orleans Saints el domingo no se mostrará en la televisión local porque quedaron 9,500 boletos de admisión general sin vender en la fecha límite del jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The home game of San Diego Chargers versus New Orleans Saints scheduled for this Sunday won't be aired on local television, since 9,500 general admission tickets remained unsold by the deadline on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Because 9,500 general admission tickets were left unsold by Thursday's deadline, the Sunday game between the San Diego Chargers and the New Orleans Saints will be blacked out on local TV.

Original Text: Fergie may rest Ruud until European campaign Alex Ferguson is willing to write Ruud van Nistelrooy out of Manchester Uniteds Premiership title push for the next two months to ensure he is ready for their assault on Europe.
Translation: Fergie puede descansar a Ruud hasta la campaña europea. Alex Ferguson está dispuesto a excluir a Ruud van Nistelrooy del empuje por el título de la Premier League del Manchester United durante los próximos dos meses para asegurarse de que esté listo para su asalto a Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Alex Ferguson is considering sidelining Ruud van Nistelrooy from Manchester United's Premiership title drive for the upcoming two months, so that he is fully prepared for their European campaign.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In preparation for their European campaign, Alex Ferguson might keep Ruud van Nistelrooy off the Manchester United's Premiership title pursuit for the next two months.

Original Text: US extends an olive branch to Taliban's 'moderates' KABUL, Afghanistan -- Since the US military expelled the Taliban three years ago, it has battled the regime's diehard fighters in the barren mountains and dusty wastes of southern Afghanistan. Now the United States is extending an olive branch to moderate elements of its shadowy foe.
Translation: EE.UU. le tiende una rama de olivo a los 'moderados' del Talibán KABUL, Afganistán -- Desde que el ejército de EE.UU. expulsó al Talibán hace tres años, ha luchado contra los combatientes acérrimos del régimen en las montañas desérticas y los desechos polvorientos del sur de Afganistán. Ahora, Estados Unidos está extendiendo una rama de olivo a los elementos moderados de su enemigo en las sombras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. KABUL, Afghanistan -- The United States is reaching out with a gesture of peace towards the moderate components of its elusive enemy, the Taliban. This comes after three years of conflict with the regime's hardened fighters in southern Afghanistan's inhospitable terrains, post their expulsion by the US military.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After expelling the Taliban three years ago and fighting through difficult combat against their steadfast fighters, the US military is now looking to accommodate and approach more moderate factions of the Taliban. This move signifies an olive branch offered by the United States in the harsh landscape of southern Afghanistan.

Original Text: Quakes keep playoff hopes alive The game drew a crowd of 25,311 to give San Jose an average attendance of 13,001, its best Spartan Stadium attendance since 1999. In other games, Jovan Kirovski scored two goals to lead
Translation: Los temblores mantienen vivas las esperanzas de playoffs. El juego atrajo a una multitud de 25,311 personas, dando a San José una asistencia promedio de 13,001, la mejor asistencia al Estadio Spartan desde 1999. En otros partidos, Jovan Kirovski anotó dos goles para liderar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Quakes' chance of advancing in the playoffs continues, attracting a substantial crowd of 25,311 to the game, marking the best attendance at Spartan Stadium for San Jose since 1999, with an average turnout of 13,001. In separate matches, Jovan Kirovski emerged as a key player, netting two goals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With 25,311 spectators, the Quakes stayed hopeful for playoffs, registering the highest average attendance at the Spartan Stadium in San Jose since 1999, which is around 13,001. Additionally, Jovan Kirovski contributed significantly to other matches by scoring two goals.

Original Text: Energised Henman downs Dupuis Basel - Two-time Swiss Indoors champion Tim Henman bounced back from his disappointing Madrid Masters performance last week to ease through his first round match at the ATP event here on Wednesday, overwhelming Frenchman Antony Dupuis 6-3, 6-4.
Translation: Henman lleno de energía derrota a Dupuis en Basilea - El dos veces campeón del Swiss Indoors, Tim Henman, se recuperó de su decepcionante actuación en el Masters de Madrid la semana pasada para pasar con facilidad su primer partido de la ronda en el evento de la ATP aquí el miércoles, abrumando al francés Antony Dupuis 6-3, 6-4.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two-time Swiss Indoors champion, Tim Henman, rebounded from his underwhelming performance at the Madrid Masters last week to effortlessly advance in his opening match at the ATP event here on Wednesday, convincingly defeating French opponent Antony Dupuis with a score of 6-3, 6-4.
