Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday's ATP event saw a rejuvenated performance from Tim Henman: the double Swiss Indoors victor effortlessly won his first-round match against France's Antony Dupuis, scoring 6-3, 6-4. This comes after his disappointing display at the Madrid Masters just a week prior.

Original Text: NCAA Game Summary - Iowa vs. Louisville Maui, HI (Sports Network) - Jeff Horner scored 18 points and Pierre Pierce added 16, as Iowa knocked off 12th-ranked Louisville, 76-71, in the opening round of the Maui Invitational at the Lahaina Civic Center.
Translation: Resumen del Juego de la NCAA - Iowa contra Louisville Maui, HI (Red de Deportes) - Jeff Horner anotó 18 puntos y Pierre Pierce agregó 16, ya que Iowa derrotó a Louisville, clasificado en el puesto 12, 76-71, en la ronda de apertura del Invitacional de Maui en el Centro Cívico de Lahaina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Maui Invitational's first round at the Lahaina Civic Center, Iowa triumphed over the 12th-ranked Louisville, with a score of 76-71. This victory was driven by Jeff Horner and Pierre Pierce, who contributed 18 and 16 points respectively. The game summary was provided by the Sports Network.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jeff Horner and Pierre Pierce were instrumental in Iowa's upset of 12th-ranked Louisville in the Maui Invitational's inaugural round, held at the Lahaina Civic Center. Scoring 18 and 16 points respectively, they led their team to a 76-71 victory. The coverage of this NCAA game came courtesy of Sports Network.

Original Text: Erickson staying put - for now On second thought, Ole Miss didnt look that good to Dennis Erickson after all. So now its back to where it was earlier this week on the Erickson-Is-Out-As-49ers-Coach front: Hell be coaching San Francisco
Translation: Erickson se queda - por ahora. Pensándolo bien, Ole Miss no parecía tan bueno para Dennis Erickson después de todo. Así que ahora vuelve a donde estaba a principios de esta semana en el frente Erickson-Is-Out-As-49ers-Coach: Seguirá entrenando a San Francisco.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dennis Erickson has decided to remain for the time being, after considering and then rejecting a position at Ole Miss. Therefore, he will continue coaching San Francisco, bringing things back to where they stood earlier this week regarding him no longer being the 49ers' coach.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After reevaluation, Ole Miss didn't seem as appealing to Dennis Erickson as he initially thought. Thus, for the time being, he has decided to stay put and will continue his coaching tenure with San Francisco 49ers, returning to the earlier status quo concerning his departure as coach.

Original Text: Germany Arrests 4th Suspect in Allawi Plot (AP) AP - German authorities Saturday arrested a fourth man on suspicion of involvement in an al-Qaida-linked group's alleged plot to attack Iraqi Prime Minister Ayad Allawi during his visit to Berlin this week.
Translation: Alemania Arresta a un Cuarto Sospechoso en el Complot contra Allawi (AP) AP - Las autoridades alemanas arrestaron el sábado a un cuarto hombre bajo sospecha de estar involucrado en el supuesto plan de ataque de un grupo vinculado a al-Qaida contra el Primer Ministro iraquí Ayad Allawi durante su visita a Berlín esta semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) A fourth individual has been arrested by German authorities on Saturday, suspected of being part of an al-Qaida-linked group's purported attack plot against Iraqi Prime Minister Ayad Allawi during his recent visit to Berlin.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) On Saturday, German officials detained a fourth man who they suspect of participating in a plot reputedly by an al-Qaida-affiliated group to assault Iraqi premier Ayad Allawi during his trip to Berlin this week.

Original Text: Kennedy, Kendall Suspended for Brawling (AP) AP - Colorado Rockies pitcher Joe Kennedy was suspended Friday for five games and Pittsburgh Pirates catcher Jason Kendall four for their parts in a bench-clearing brawl Sunday.
Translation: Kennedy, Kendall suspendidos por pelear (AP) AP - El lanzador de los Rockies de Colorado, Joe Kennedy, fue suspendido el viernes por cinco partidos y el receptor de los Piratas de Pittsburgh, Jason Kendall, cuatro por su participación en una pelea que vació las bancas el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP reported that Joe Kennedy, a pitcher for the Colorado Rockies, received a five-game suspension, while Jason Kendall, catcher for the Pittsburgh Pirates, was suspended for four games following their involvement in a bench-clearing brawl on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) After participating in a major brawl on Sunday, Colorado Rockies' pitcher Joe Kennedy and Pittsburgh Pirates' catcher Jason Kendall were suspended for five and four games respectively, according to AP.

Original Text: SCO Web site hack mocks company's legal claims Hackers compromised The SCO Group's Web page today and yesterday and posted messages apparently mocking the company's claims that it owns parts of the Linux operating system.
Translation: El hackeo del sitio web de SCO se burla de las reclamaciones legales de la compañía. Los hackers comprometieron la página web de The SCO Group hoy y ayer y publicaron mensajes que aparentemente se burlan de las afirmaciones de la compañía de que posee partes del sistema operativo Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today and yesterday, hackers infiltrated The SCO Group's website and put up messages that seem to ridicule the company's assertions of owning parts of the Linux operating system.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The SCO Group's web page was hacked today and yesterday, with messages showing scorn towards the company's claim to possess components of the Linux operating system.

Original Text: Intel Pushes Further into Mobile Space (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Intel has served notice that it will be a major player in the emerging\smartphone market, announcing a collaboration with leading handset maker
Translation: Intel Avanza Más en el Espacio Móvil (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Intel ha dado aviso de que será un jugador importante en el emergente mercado de smartphones, anunciando una colaboración con el principal fabricante de teléfonos móviles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As per NewsFactor, Intel has expressed its aspirations to be a significant contender in the rising smartphone industry by announcing a collaboration with a prominent handset maker; thereby, deepening its foothold in the mobile sector.

Original Text: Rivals Boeing, Northrop find common ground in space Northrop Grumman and Boeing said yesterday they will bid as a team to compete for NASA #39;s planned manned and robotic space-exploration program.
Translation: Los rivales Boeing, Northrop encuentran un terreno común en el espacio. Northrop Grumman y Boeing dijeron ayer que presentarán una oferta conjunta para competir por el programa de exploración espacial, tanto tripulado como robótico, planeado por la NASA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Northrop Grumman and Boeing, long-standing rivals, jointly announced their plans to bid on NASA's planned manned and robotic space-exploration program yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, Northrop Grumman and Boeing put their rivalry aside to team up and compete for NASA's upcoming manned and robotic space-exploration program.

Original Text: Dropped Fly Lets Mets Nip Giants in 12th (AP) AP - Dustan Mohr allowed two runs to score when he dropped a fly ball in the 12th inning, and the New York Mets overcame a shaky return by Tom Glavine and a team-record six double plays to beat the San Francisco Giants 11-9 Saturday.
Translation: Traducción al español de manera precisa: Un batazo de elevación soltado permite a Mets derrotar a Giants en el 12do (AP) AP - Dustan Mohr permitió que dos carreras se anotaran cuando soltó un batazo de elevación en la 12da entrada, y los New York Mets superaron un tembloroso regreso de Tom Glavine y un récord del equipo de seis doble plays para vencer a los San Francisco Giants 11-9 el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - An error by Dustan Mohr, who dropped a fly ball, allowed the New York Mets to score two runs in the 12th inning, leading to an 11-9 victory over the San Francisco Giants on Saturday. This was despite a patchy return by Tom Glavine and a team-record of six double plays.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AP - The New York Mets triumphed over the San Francisco Giants with an 11-9 score on Saturday, after a costly dropped fly ball by Dustan Mohr in the 12th inning resulted in two runs. This win was attained in spite of Tom Glavine's unstable comeback and a record-setting six double plays by the team.

Original Text: Microsoft sets licensing policy for dual-core chips Microsoft Corp., world #39;s largest software maker, announced a new licensing policy for dual-core microprocessors from Intel and AMD.
Translation: Microsoft establece política de licencias para chips de doble núcleo Microsoft Corp. el fabricante de software más grande del mundo, anunció una nueva política de licencias para los microprocesadores de doble núcleo de Intel y AMD.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft Corporation, the largest software manufacturer globally, has rolled out a new licensing policy for dual-core microprocessors designed by Intel and AMD.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new licensing policy for dual-core microprocessors from Intel and AMD has been announced by Microsoft Corporation, the world's biggest software maker.

Original Text: iMac G5 goes after the iPod set APPLE Computer #39;s new iMac G5 Macintosh may be the first desktop computer that doesn #39;t need a desktop: you can hang the thing on a wall and operate it using wireless keyboard and mouse.
Translation: El iMac G5 persigue el set de iPod. La nueva computadora iMac G5 Macintosh de APPLE podría ser la primera computadora de escritorio que no necesita un escritorio: puedes colgar la cosa en la pared y operarla usando teclado y ratón inalámbricos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the aim at the iPod audience, Apple Computer's innovative iMac G5 Macintosh could be the premier desktop computer that doesn't actually require a desktop: it's possible to mount it on a wall and use it with a wireless keyboard and mouse.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The new iMac G5 Macintosh from Apple Computer, targeting the iPod users, stands out as potentially the first desktop computer that's not bound to a desk: it's designed to hang on a wall and run with a wireless keyboard and mouse.

Original Text: WWE Nearly Triples 1Q Profit World Wrestling Entertainment Inc. nearly tripled its first-quarter profit on higher revenue from airing two more pay-per-view television events than last year, but was slammed by declining live-event attendance
Translation: WWE casi triplica las ganancias del primer trimestre. World Wrestling Entertainment Inc. casi triplicó sus ganancias del primer trimestre gracias a mayores ingresos por la emisión de dos eventos de televisión de pago por ver más que el año pasado, pero se vio golpeada por la disminución de la asistencia a eventos en vivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. World Wrestling Entertainment Inc. managed to almost triple its profit from the first-quarter thanks to increased revenue from two additional pay-per-view TV events compared to the previous year, however, disappointing live-event attendance pulled their numbers down.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although there was a decrease in live-event attendance, World Wrestling Entertainment Inc. nearly tripled their first-quarter profit due to higher earnings from airing two more pay-per-view events than the previous year.

Original Text: Rowing: Cracknell takes year out to seek new challenges James Cracknell confirmed yesterday that he will be taking a year out from his rowing career, a day before his fellow gold medallist from the Olympic fours at this year #39;s Olympics, Matthew
Translation: Remo: Cracknell se toma un año sabático para buscar nuevos desafíos. James Cracknell confirmó ayer que se tomará un año sabático en su carrera de remo, un día antes de que su compañero medallista de oro en los cuatros olímpicos de este año, Matthew
Paraphrase 1: 1. James Cracknell, a prominent gold medallist from this year's Olympic fours rowing competition alongside Matthew, announced yesterday his plans to take a one-year hiatus from rowing in pursuit of new challenges.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Confirming the news yesterday, Olympic gold medalist in rowing, James Cracknell, revealed his decision to step away from his rowing career for a year to explore new opportunities, just a day before his fellow Olympian Matthew from this year's Olympic fours.

Original Text: Oracle Posts Higher Second-Quarter Profit (Reuters) Reuters - Business software maker Oracle Corp.\ on Monday posted a higher quarterly profit on firm\demand for its market-leading database software.
Translation: Oracle Publica Mayor Ganancia en el Segundo Trimestre (Reuters) Reuters - El fabricante de software empresarial Oracle Corp.\ el lunes publicó una mayor ganancia trimestral debido a la firme demanda de su software de base de datos líder en el mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oracle Corp., a business software manufacturer, reported an increased profit for the second quarter due largely to solid demand for its top-tier database software, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters reports that Oracle Corp., the producer of business software, has experienced an upturn in their second-quarter profits, owing to the strong demand for its industry-dominant database software.

Original Text: VoIP Gains Ground With Bank Of America Deal The largest voice-over-IP business deployment revealed to date presents new opportunities, for both the bank that #39;s using it and the services provider that #39;s implementing it.
Translation: VoIP gana terreno con el acuerdo del Bank Of America. El despliegue de negocio de voz por IP más grande revelado hasta la fecha presenta nuevas oportunidades, tanto para el banco que lo está utilizando como para el proveedor de servicios que lo está implementando.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The most significant voice-over-IP business implementation revealed till now, unveils novel prospects for both the employing bank which is Bank of America, and the service provider who's carrying it out.

Original Text: Barghouti backs Abbas as next head of the PA The imprisoned leader of Fatah #39;s Tanzim in the West Bank, Marwan Barghouti, announced on Friday that he will not run for the post of Palestinian Authority chairman.
Translation: Barghouti respalda a Abbas como próximo jefe de la AP. El líder encarcelado de Tanzim de Fatah en Cisjordania, Marwan Barghouti, anunció el viernes que no se postulará para el puesto de presidente de la Autoridad Palestina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Marwan Barghouti, the incarcerated leader of Fatah's Tanzim in the West Bank, proclaimed on Friday that he will not contest the position of Palestinian Authority chairman and supports Abbas as the next leader.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the jailed Fatah's Tanzim leader in the West Bank, Marwan Barghouti, declared he wouldn't stand for the role of Palestinian Authority chairman, endorsing Abbas instead.

Original Text: Muslims Appeal to Iraqi Captors BAGHDAD, 30 August 2004 - Muslim leaders in Iraq and France yesterday appealed for the release of two kidnapped French journalists facing death.
Translation: Los musulmanes apelan a los captores iraquíes BAGDAD, 30 de agosto de 2004 - Líderes musulmanes en Irak y Francia apelaron ayer por la liberación de dos periodistas franceses secuestrados que enfrentan la muerte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On 30th August 2004, in Baghdad, Muslim authorities from Iraq and France implored the Iraqi captors to release two abducted French journalists who were under the threat of death.

Original Text: Scotiabank 4th-Qtr Profit Rises on Capital Markets (Update1) Bank of Nova Scotia, Canada #39;s third- largest bank, said profit climbed for a sixth consecutive quarter, driven by capital markets-related fees and international banking.
Translation: La Ganancia del 4to Trimestre de Scotiabank Aumenta debido a los Mercados de Capitales (Actualización1) El Banco de Nueva Escocia, el tercer banco más grande de Canadá, dijo que las ganancias aumentaron por sexto trimestre consecutivo, impulsadas por las tarifas relacionadas con los mercados de capitales y la banca internacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Bank of Nova Scotia, ranking third largest in Canada, announced a rise in 4th-quarter profit for the sixth consecutive time, primarily due to fees related to capital markets and international banking.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Experiencing six consecutive quarters of profit growth, Canada's third biggest bank, The Bank of Nova Scotia, reported a rise in its 4th-quarter profit, aided by capital markets-related fees and overseas banking.

Original Text: Baghdad deputy governor shot dead Hatim Kamil was assassinated in a drive-by shooting, said Baghdad Governor Ali al-Haidari. Interior Ministry spokesman Colonel Adnan Abdul-Rahman said Mr Kamil was killed when gunmen opened fire on his car in the southern Doura neighbourhood.
Translation: El vicegobernador de Bagdad, Hatim Kamil, fue asesinado a tiros. Kamil fue asesinado en un tiroteo desde un automóvil, dijo el gobernador de Bagdad, Ali al-Haidari. El portavoz del Ministerio del Interior, el coronel Adnan Abdul-Rahman, dijo que el Sr. Kamil murió cuando unos pistoleros dispararon contra su coche en el barrio sureño de Doura.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The deputy governor of Baghdad, Hatim Kamil, was tragically assassinated in a drive-by shooting, confirmed Baghdad Governor Ali al-Haidari. According to Colonel Adnan Abdul-Rahman, a spokesperson for the Interior Ministry, Mr Kamil met his untimely death when his car, located in the southern Doura neighbourhood, was targeted by gunmen.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ali al-Haidari, the Governor of Baghdad, confirmed that deputy governor Hatim Kamil was the victim of a drive-by assassination. Gunmen in Doura's southern neighbourhood reportedly targeted and shot at Mr. Kamil's car, resulting in his death, said Colonel Adnan Abdul-Rahman, the Interior Ministry's spokesman.

Original Text: Iran Apparently Agrees to Stop Enrichment Iranian President Mohammad Khatami, right, talks with Iraqi Vice-President, Ibrahim al-Jafari, during their official meeting in Tehran, Iran, Saturday Nov. 27, 2004.
Translation: Al parecer, Irán acepta detener el enriquecimiento. El presidente iraní, Mohammad Khatami, a la derecha, conversa con el vicepresidente iraquí, Ibrahim al-Jafari, durante su reunión oficial en Teherán, Irán, el sábado 27 de noviembre de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During their official meeting in Tehran, Iran, on Saturday, Nov. 27, 2004, Iranian President Mohammad Khatami and Iraqi Vice-President Ibrahim al-Jafari had a discussion, following which Iran seemingly consented to halt enrichment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It seems that Iran has agreed to cease enrichment, a development emerging from an official meeting between Iranian President Mohammad Khatami and Iraqi Vice-President Ibrahim al-Jafari in Tehran, Iran on Saturday, November 27, 2004.

Original Text: BP and Sinopec in retail tie-up Oil giants BP and Sinopec are to open 500 petrol stations in Zhejiang, east China, as part of a joint venture.
Translation: Los gigantes del petróleo BP y Sinopec abrirán 500 estaciones de servicio en Zhejiang, al este de China, como parte de una empresa conjunta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BP and Sinopec, oil giants, are establishing a joint venture with plans to inaugurate 500 petrol stations in Zhejiang, East China as part of a retail collaboration.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a retail collaboration, BP and Sinopec plan to launch 500 petrol stations in East China's Zhejiang province as part of a collective enterprise.

Original Text: Heart Disease Should Not Come As A Surprise Bill Clinton was an active, jogging, jovial time bomb. Like thousands of others, he had no idea how close he was to a heart attack and possibly death - even though he had years of presidential health care and continued checkups.
Translation: La Enfermedad Cardíaca No Debería Ser Una Sorpresa. Bill Clinton era una bomba de tiempo activa, alegre, que trotaba. Al igual que miles de personas, no tenía idea de lo cerca que estaba de un infarto y posiblemente la muerte, a pesar de que contaba con años de atención médica presidencial y chequeos continuos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Even with years of presidential health care and constant medical examinations, Bill Clinton, energetic, jogging and always in high spirits, was unaware of his impending heart disease, just like countless others. Unbeknownst to him, he was a ticking time bomb, alarmingly close to a heart attack and potentially death. Heart disease, therefore, should not be a shocking revelation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Like countless others, Bill Clinton was a lively, jogging, cheerful ticking time bomb. Despite having access to extensive presidential healthcare and consistent medical check-ups over the years, he was oblivious to the looming heart disease and potential death threat. Thus, a heart disease diagnosis shouldn't really be a bolt from the blue.

Original Text: Militant Wanted in Pearl Abduction Killed (AP) AP - An Islamic militant wanted in connection with the murder of American Journalist Daniel Pear was killed in a shootout with police, according to Pakistani authorities on Wednesday, who also announced the arrest of a suspect in the deadly bombing near the U.S. Consulate in Karachi two years ago.
Translation: Militante buscado en secuestro de Pearl asesinado (AP) AP - Un militante islámico buscado en conexión con el asesinato del periodista estadounidense Daniel Pearl fue asesinado en un tiroteo con la policía, de acuerdo con las autoridades paquistaníes el miércoles, quienes también anunciaron el arresto de un sospechoso en el mortal atentado cerca del Consulado de EE.UU. en Karachi hace dos años.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) - Pakistani authorities revealed on Wednesday that an Islamic extremist, sought for his alleged role in the murder of American Journalist Daniel Pearl, was gunned down in a police encounter. In related news, they also declared the apprehension of a suspect involved in the lethal bombing near the U.S. Consulate in Karachi which took place two years ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) - An Islamic radical linked with the homicide of American journalist Daniel Pearl has been killed in a police firefight, confirmed Pakistani officials on Wednesday. They further reported the capture of an individual suspected in the fatal bombing close to the U.S. Consulate in Karachi a couple of years prior.

Original Text: Treasuries Fall for Fifth Day Running  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Treasuries backtracked for a fifth  session running on Monday, extending a rout that has seen  benchmark yields jump a quarter of a percentage point in just a  week.
Translation: Los Bonos del Tesoro Caen por Quinto Día Consecutivo NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los bonos del tesoro retrocedieron por quinta sesión consecutiva el lunes, extendiendo una caída que ha visto rendimientos de referencia saltar un cuarto de punto porcentual en solo una semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Treasuries experienced a decline for the fifth consecutive session on Monday, continuing a significant slump that resulted in a quarter of a percentage point increase in benchmark yields over the past week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - For the fifth day in a row, Monday witnessed a decrease in Treasuries, furthering a steep drop that has caused benchmark yields to rise by a quarter of a percent within a single week.

Original Text: Mourinho: No love lost when we play old team Porto LONDON: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho insists there will be no love lost when he comes face to face with Porto, the Champions League winners he quit.
Translation: Mourinho: No hay amor perdido cuando jugamos contra el viejo equipo Porto LONDON: El entrenador del Chelsea, Jose Mourinho, insiste en que no habrá amor perdido cuando se encuentre cara a cara con el Porto, los ganadores de la Liga de Campeones de los que renunció.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mourinho maintains that his past connection with Porto, the team he left behind as Champions League winners, would not interfere with the competition when Chelsea clashes with them. He confirms that there won't be any sentimentality involved in the game at London.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In London, Jose Mourinho, the manager of Chelsea, is adamant that his previous relationship with Porto won't affect their competitive spirit during their encounter. The Champions League winners he formerly managed would be treated with no sentimentality.

Original Text: 49ers notes: Rattay #39;s forearm is sore again Bee Staff Writer. SANTA CLARA - The 49ers were hoping to return from their week off with a roster full of healthy bodies. Instead, they went through Wednesday #39;s practice with their most
Translation: Notas de los 49ers: El antebrazo de Rattay está dolorido nuevamente. Escrito por el personal de Bee. SANTA CLARA - Los 49ers estaban esperando regresar de su semana libre con un equipo lleno de cuerpos saludables. En cambio, pasaron el entrenamiento del miércoles con su más
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bee Staff Writer, Santa Clara - Post their week off, the 49ers had hoped for a roster buoyed with health. However, their Wednesday practice unfolded with their central player, Rattay #39, nursing a sore forearm again.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SANTA CLARA - After taking a week off, the 49ers aspired to have a team full of fit players. However, their lead player's condition was not as expected, with Rattay #39's forearm getting inflamed once more during Wednesday's practice, reports Bee Staff Writer.

Original Text: Photo gallery: Microsoft revs car Windows The software juggernaut that conquered the desktop is racing to get Windows into your next car.
Translation: Galería de fotos: Microsoft acelera las ventanillas de los coches. El gigante del software que conquistó el escritorio está haciendo carreras para introducir Windows en tu próximo coche.
Paraphrase 1: Image Collection: Microsoft Accelerates Car Windows - The software titan that dominated the desktop is hastily pushing to incorporate Windows into your upcoming vehicle.
Paraphrase 2: Picture Exhibit: Microsoft Speeds Up Car Windows - The software powerhouse that took over the desktop is hastening to get Windows integrated into your succeeding car.

Original Text: Sun launches Solaris 10 Sun Microsystems launched the much-anticipated new version of its Solaris operating system this week, and announced an overhauled pricing model designed to compete with Linux.
Translation: Sun lanza Solaris 10. Sun Microsystems lanzó la esperada nueva versión de su sistema operativo Solaris esta semana, y anunció un modelo de precios completamente renovado, diseñado para competir con Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. This week, Sun Microsystems debuted the highly awaited new iteration of its Solaris operating system, Solaris 10, along with a revamped pricing model aiming to rival Linux.

Original Text: More injuries, another QB option for woeful Bears Coping with another inept offensive showing, the Chicago Bears were ready to change quarterbacks again Friday, while trying to patch up an injury-depleted line.
Translation: Más lesiones, otra opción de QB para los lamentables Bears. Lidiando con otra inepta demostración ofensiva, los Chicago Bears estaban listos para cambiar de quarterback nuevamente el viernes, mientras intentaban reparar una línea desgastada por las lesiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following yet another woeful offensive performance, the Chicago Bears were set on switching quarterbacks once again on Friday and grappling with the task of repairing an injury-ravaged line.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dealing with another deficient offensive display, the Chicago Bears prepared to once again alter their quarterback choice on Friday, in addition to attempting to mend a heavily injured line.

Original Text: Jeter has no problem with Pedro; Red Sox still want Martinez back When Derek Jeter came across Pedro Martinez at Legends Field last month, the Yankees #39; captain wasn #39;t surprised the longtime Boston ace was meeting with New York owner George Steinbrenner.
Translation: Jeter no tiene ningún problema con Pedro; los Red Sox todavía quieren que Martínez regrese. Cuando Derek Jeter se encontró con Pedro Martínez en el Legends Field el mes pasado, al capitán de los Yankees no le sorprendió que el as de Boston de mucho tiempo estuviera reunido con el dueño de New York, George Steinbrenner.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At Legends Field last month, Yankees' captain Derek Jeter wasn't taken by surprise to discover that Pedro Martinez, Boston's longstanding ace, was having a meeting with New York's owner, George Steinbrenner. Nonetheless, Jeter held no grudge against Pedro, while the Red Sox were still intent on having Martinez back.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Derek Jeter, the Captain of the Yankees, experienced no shock last month when he found Pedro Martinez, Boston's renowned pitcher, in a meeting with George Steinbrenner, the owner of New York. Despite this, Jeter bore no ill will towards Pedro; on the other hand, the Red Sox were still keen to return Martinez to their lineup.

Original Text: Catching West Coast action can be tough, but it #39;s worth the effort Vin Scully, if you haven #39;t heard, has a tendency to go on a bit. It #39;s more than a tendency, really. It #39;s practically a trademark.
Translation: Capturar la acción de la Costa Oeste puede ser difícil, pero vale la pena el esfuerzo. Vin Scully, si no lo has oído, tiene la tendencia de alargarse un poco. Es más que una tendencia, realmente. Es prácticamente una marca registrada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It might be challenging to keep up with the West Coast action, but the effort is definitely valuable. Vin Scully is known for his propensity to elaborate extensively; it's more than just a predilection, it almost serves as his unique signature.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Engaging in West Coast activities can be challenging, however, the outcome justifies the strain. If you are unaware, Vin Scully often tends to overly express himself. It is truly more than just a habit, practically a defining characteristic.

Original Text: PalmOne ponders Microsoft, Linux options Handheld maker looks beyond Palm OS with quiet tests of other operating systems, News.com has learned.
Translation: PalmOne considera opciones de Microsoft, Linux. El fabricante de dispositivos portátiles mira más allá del sistema operativo Palm OS con pruebas silenciosas de otros sistemas operativos, según ha sabido News.com.
Paraphrase 1: 1. News.com has discovered that PalmOne, the handheld manufacturer, is exploring options beyond Palm OS by quietly testing Microsoft and Linux systems.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As News.com found out, PalmOne, a producer of handheld devices, is discreetly experimenting with options like Microsoft and Linux, looking beyond its traditional Palm OS.

Original Text: Bad times boost efforts to align IT, business goals CIOs from three organizations this week outlined steps they're taking to align IT with business goals and detailed some of the results they are seeing from their efforts.
Translation: Los malos tiempos impulsan los esfuerzos para alinear la informática y los objetivos empresariales. Los CIOs de tres organizaciones esta semana delinearon los pasos que están tomando para alinear la informática con los objetivos empresariales y detallaron algunos de los resultados que están viendo de sus esfuerzos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During tough times, efforts to synchronize IT with business objectives are intensified. This week, CIOs from three different organizations revealed the measures they're implementing to achieve this alignment and discussed the outcomes arising from their initiatives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During challenging periods, there's an increased push to bring IT and business goals into alignment. This week, Chief Information Officers from three entities provided an insight into the actions they're pursuing to match IT with business objectives, as well as some emerging results from their labor.

Original Text: 13 killed in hospital car bomb AT least 13 people were killed and about 60 injured when a car bomb exploded outside the emergency unit of one of Baghdad #39;s main hospitals, medical officials said today.
Translation: Al menos 13 personas murieron y cerca de 60 resultaron heridas cuando una bomba de coche explotó fuera de la unidad de emergencias de uno de los principales hospitales de Bagdad, según dijeron hoy funcionarios médicos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A car bomb exploded outside the emergency ward of a major Baghdad hospital today, resulting in the deaths of at least 13 individuals and injuring nearly 60, according to medical officials.

Original Text: Experts Warn of Net Flu Vaccine Scam Vaccines for sale online can be dangerous, and sellers could be perpetrating credit card fraud.
Translation: Los expertos advierten sobre la estafa de la vacuna contra la gripe en la red. Las vacunas a la venta en línea pueden ser peligrosas, y los vendedores podrían estar perpetrando un fraude con tarjetas de crédito.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Professionals caution against an internet scam involving flu vaccines, highlighting potential credit card fraud as well as the risks associated with purchasing these vaccines online.

Original Text: Iraqi president on landmark visit to Kuwait KUWAIT CITY : Iraqi President Ghazi al-Yawar was received by Kuwait #39;s ruler after arriving in the oil-rich emirate on the first ever official visit by an Iraqi head of state.
Translation: El presidente iraquí realiza una visita histórica a Kuwait CIUDAD DE KUWAIT: El presidente iraquí, Ghazi al-Yawar, fue recibido por el gobernante de Kuwait después de llegar al emirato rico en petróleo en la primera visita oficial jamás realizada por un jefe de estado iraquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ghazi al-Yawar, the president of Iraq, was welcomed by the ruler of Kuwait upon his arrival in the oil-abundant emirate, marking the first official visit by any Iraqi state leader.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With his arrival in the opulent oil-driven emirate, Iraqi President Ghazi al-Yawar was greeted by the Kuwaiti ruler, a landmark event as it is the first official visit from an Iraqi head of state.

Original Text: Space Station Astronaut to Vote From Orbit (AP) AP - The space station's newest astronaut will cast his ballot in the presidential election from 225 miles up, with NASA's help.
Translation: Astronauta de la Estación Espacial votará desde Órbita (AP) AP - El astronauta más nuevo de la estación espacial emitirá su voto en las elecciones presidenciales desde 225 millas de altura, con la ayuda de la NASA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the assistance from NASA, the newest astronaut onboard the space station will exercise his right to vote in the presidential election, even from his location 225 miles above Earth. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - The latest astronaut to join the space station, with support from NASA, is planning to participate in the forthcoming presidential election, casting his vote from an elevation of 225 miles.

Original Text: Cable  amp; Wireless sets up US\$1m relief fund THE LEADING communications provider in the Caribbean, Cable  amp; Wireless, has announced the establishment of a US\$1 million relief fund to assist victims of Hurricane Ivan.
Translation: Cable & Wireless establece un fondo de ayuda de US$1 millón. EL PRINCIPAL proveedor de comunicaciones en el Caribe, Cable & Wireless, ha anunciado la creación de un fondo de ayuda de US$1 millón para asistir a las víctimas del Huracán Iván.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The top Caribbean communications provider, Cable & Wireless, has confirmed the creation of a US$1 million relief fund for aid to the victims of Hurricane Ivan.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A US$1 million relief fund to help the victims of Hurricane Ivan has been instituted by Cable & Wireless, a prominent communications provider in the Caribbean.

Original Text: Flash floods force huge rescue bid LONDON: Rescue workers combed an English coastal village in north Cornwall yesterday for people missing after a flash flood caused by torrential rain hit Britain #39;s southwestern Atlantic coast.
Translation: Inundaciones repentinas fuerzan un gran esfuerzo de rescate. LONDRES: Ayer, los trabajadores de rescate rastrearon un pueblo costero inglés en el norte de Cornualles en busca de personas desaparecidas después de que una inundación repentina causada por una lluvia torrencial golpeó la costa suroeste atlántica de Gran Bretaña #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the wake of a flash flood brought about by heavy rainfalls hitting Britain's southwestern Atlantic coast, intense rescue efforts were undertaken in a northern Cornwall village to locate people who've gone missing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, a sizable search operation unfolded in a north Cornwall coastal village in England, following a flash flood triggered by persistent rain on Britain's southwestern Atlantic coast, leaving some people unaccounted for.

Original Text: Future Economic Activity Gauge Falls A closely watched gauge of future business activity fell in August for a third consecutive month, evidence that companies and consumers continue to navigate an uncertain economic climate.
Translation: El Indicador de Actividad Económica Futura Cae. Un indicador de actividad empresarial futura muy observado cayó en agosto por tercer mes consecutivo, prueba de que las empresas y consumidores continúan navegando en un clima económico incierto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A gauge that is extensively monitored, revealing the state of future business activity, dropped for the third successive month in August. This indicates that both companies and individuals are consistently dealing with an unstable economic environment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In August, for the third straight month, a popular indicator of future economic conduct exhibited a decline. This establishes the ongoing struggle faced by businesses and consumers in this unpredictable economic atmosphere.

Original Text: A missed chance RBI could rue OIL continues to set new records by the day. Last Friday, it was in whispering distance of \$50 a barrel as Iraq and the woes of the giant Russian producer, Yukos, kept markets on tenterhooks.
Translation: Un RBI perdido podría lamentar que el PETRÓLEO continúa estableciendo nuevos récords día tras día. El último viernes, estaba a una distancia susurrante de los 50 dólares el barril, mientras que Irak y las dificultades del gigante productor ruso, Yukos, mantenían a los mercados en vilo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An opportunity squandered by RBI could be deeply regretted as OIL continues to shatter records day after day. On the previous Friday, it was nearly hitting $50 a barrel as the issues in Iraq and with the giant Russian producer Yukos kept the markets highly strained.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A missed RBI opportunity could lead to serious regret as OIL keeps making unprecedented records every day. Just last Friday, it came extremely close to the $50 a barrel mark, while instability in Iraq along with troubles faced by the massive Russian producer Yukos, kept the markets on edge.

Original Text: AT T looks into closing its Windows A team of researchers is evaluating how Linux and Mac OS X stack up against Windows for internal use.
Translation: AT&T investiga cerrar sus ventanas. Un equipo de investigadores está evaluando cómo se comparan Linux y Mac OS X frente a Windows para uso interno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AT&T is considering shutting down its Windows usage as a research team examines the effectiveness of Linux and Mac OS X for internal applications.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An evaluation is being conducted by a research team at AT&T on Linux and Mac OS X, in comparison to Windows, for internal use as the company contemplates phasing out Windows.

Original Text: KC runs over Vick, Falcons It was the kind of complete game Chiefs fans had been dreaming of throughout the course of a nightmare season.  quot;This is how (people thought) we could score points and dominate
Translation: KC atropella a Vick, Falcons. Fue el tipo de juego completo que los aficionados de los Chiefs habían estado soñando durante el transcurso de una temporada de pesadilla. "Así es como (la gente pensaba) que podríamos anotar puntos y dominar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Throughout a challenging season, the comprehensive victory over Vick and the Falcons was the kind of game Chiefs fans had been hoping for. "This exemplifies how we were expected to score points and exert dominance," they thought.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Chiefs fans had envisioned their team performing dominantly and scoring points like they did in the complete mauling of Vick and his Falcons, which came as a dream come true in an otherwise unpleasant season. It represented exactly how everyone had hoped they'd perform.

Original Text: Sanofi Wins Contract for Flu Shot Vaccine (Reuters) Reuters - The U.S. government on Tuesday\awarded Sanofi-Aventis  a contract worth up to  #36;41\million through 2008 to ensure enough eggs are available for\future flu vaccine production.
Translation: Sanofi gana contrato para vacuna contra la gripe (Reuters) Reuters - El gobierno de EE.UU. otorgó el martes a Sanofi-Aventis un contrato valorado en hasta 36;41 millones de dólares hasta 2008 para garantizar que haya suficientes huevos disponibles para la producción futura de la vacuna contra la gripe.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Sanofi-Aventis procures flu vaccination contract worth up to $41 million from the U.S. government to secure adequate egg supply required for future production. (Reuters)
Paraphrase 2: 2) Sanofi-Aventis has been granted a $41 million government contract to provide enough eggs for future flu vaccine production. (Reuters)

Original Text: Data center firms settle cookie suit F5 Networks and Radware have come to terms in a patent dispute over "cookie persistence" technology.
Translation: Las empresas de centros de datos llegan a un acuerdo en demanda por cookies. F5 Networks y Radware han llegado a términos en una disputa de patentes sobre la tecnología de "persistencia de cookies".
Paraphrase 1: 1. F5 Networks and Radware, two data center companies, have resolved a patent disagreement involving "cookie persistence" technology.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Cookie persistence" technology patent conflict between data center companies, F5 Networks and Radware, has been settled.

Original Text: Adventurers prepay for journey into space Thrill seekers are paying 100,000 to ride rockets that haven #39;t even been built yet, and new airline Virgin Galactic promises to be up and soaring in the next three years.
Translation: Los aventureros pagan por adelantado por viaje al espacio. Los buscadores de emociones están pagando 100,000 para viajar en cohetes que aún no han sido construidos, y la nueva aerolínea Virgin Galactic promete estar en funcionamiento y volando en los próximos tres años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Enthusiasts of adventure are shelling out $100,000 in advance for a space journey, even before the rockets are fully constructed. The forthcoming airline, Virgin Galactic, assures that they will be operational and sky-bound within the coming three years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Virgin Galactic, a new airline, ensures that they will be flying within the next three years. Meanwhile, voyagers with a thirst for the thrill are upfront paying a whopping $100,000 for a future space trip on rockets yet to be constructed.

Original Text: Storm Defeat Monarchs 66-54 (AP) AP - Lauren Jackson scored 23 points and the Seattle Storm forced a decisive third game in the Western Conference finals, beating the Sacramento Monarchs 66-54 Sunday night.
Translation: Derrota de la Tormenta a las Monarcas 66-54 (AP) AP - Lauren Jackson anotó 23 puntos y la Storm de Seattle forzó un decisivo tercer juego en las finales de la Conferencia Oeste, venciendo a las Monarcas de Sacramento 66-54 la noche del domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - The Western Conference finals will see a pivotal third game as the Seattle Storm, powered by Lauren Jackson's 23 points, clinched a victory on Sunday night against the Sacramento Monarchs, with a score of 66-54.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Earning a decisive 66-54 victory over the Sacramento Monarchs on Sunday night, the Seattle Storm, with Lauren Jackson leading the scoreboard with 23 points, managed to push the Western Conference finals to a crucial third game.

Original Text: Annan backs US bidon Sudan resolution UNITED NATIONS Annan backs US bid on Sudan resolution Secretary General Kofi Annan yesterday threw his weight behind a US-drafted resolution on Sudan's Darfur region, saying the Security Council should adopt it immediately to stop atrocities.  quot;It is urgent to act now. Civilians are still being attacked and fleeing their villages as we speak, quot; Annan told reporters of the resolution ...
Translation: Annan respalda la propuesta de EE.UU sobre la resolución de Sudán. NACIONES UNIDAS Annan respalda la oferta de EE.UU sobre la resolución de Sudán. El Secretario General Kofi Annan respaldó ayer una resolución redactada por Estados Unidos sobre la región de Darfur en Sudán, afirmando que el Consejo de Seguridad debería adoptarla inmediatamente para detener las atrocidades. "Es urgente actuar ahora. Los civiles siguen siendo atacados y huyen de sus aldeas mientras hablamos", dijo Annan a los periodistas sobre la resolución...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Secretary General Kofi Annan supported a US-proposed resolution concerning Sudan's Darfur region at the United Nations, emphasizing the urgency of its adoption by the Security Council to halt ongoing atrocities. "Action is required urgently. As we converse, civilians are facing attacks and running from their villages," Annan informed the reporters regarding the resolution.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kofi Annan, as the Secretary General, endorsed a resolution drafted by the US on the Darfur issue in Sudan yesterday at the United Nations. He expressed to reporters, "We need to act right now. Civilians continue to be under attack and are forced to escape their villages," emphasizing the essentialness of the Security Council accepting the resolution promptly to end the atrocities.

Original Text: Be careful, that e-card may be a virus IF you were planning to save on postage this year by sending electronic greeting cards, think again. And be careful when opening any you get.
Translation: Ten cuidado, esa tarjeta electrónica podría ser un virus SI planeabas ahorrar en gastos de envío este año enviando tarjetas de felicitación electrónicas, piénsalo de nuevo. Y ten cuidado al abrir cualquier que recibas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you intended to cut costs on postage this year by distributing e-cards, reconsider your plan. Additionally, exercise caution while opening any that you receive. They might contain viruses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reconsider if you had plans of saving postage this year by circulating e-greetings, and remember to be cautious while opening any that you get, as they could potentially carry a virus.

Original Text: Team USA Beats Russia 2-0 in Exhibition (AP) AP - Now that the preliminaries are over, Team USA appears ready for the World Cup of Hockey.
Translation: Equipo de Estados Unidos vence a Rusia 2-0 en Exhibición (AP) AP - Ahora que los preliminares han terminado, parece que el Equipo de Estados Unidos está listo para la Copa Mundial de Hockey.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) After completing the preliminary rounds, Team USA seems poised for the World Cup of Hockey, having defeated Russia 2-0 in an exhibition match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the exhibition match concluding in a 2-0 victory against Russia, Team USA is sufficiently prepared for the World Cup of Hockey, post their preliminaries, reports AP.

Original Text: Hurricanes May Affect Florida Presidential Contest A trio of fierce hurricanes have pushed presidential politics to the back burner in Florida, the epicenter of the 2000 election, and could affect voter attitudes and turnout in the Nov. 2 race, analysts say.
Translation: Los Huracanes Podrían Afectar la Contienda Presidencial de Florida. Un trío de feroces huracanes ha relegado la política presidencial a un segundo plano en Florida, el epicentro de las elecciones del 2000, y podrían afectar las actitudes de los votantes y la participación en la carrera del 2 de Noviembre, dicen los analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts suggest that the upcoming presidential race on November 2 in Florida, the vital region of the 2000 election, may witness a shift in voter attitudes and turnout owing to the trio of robust hurricanes that have eclipsed presidential politics.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Presidential politics in Florida, the heart of the 2000 election, have been overshadowed by three severe hurricanes, prompting analysts to speculate possible changes in voter sentiments and participation in the November 2nd contest.

Original Text: Suzuki charts ambitious plans for Maruti New Delhi, Sep 13.(PTI): Suzuki today announced an investment of over Rs 1,000 crore to set up a diesel engine manufacturing unit in the country and said the firm has formed a joint venture with Maruti for a new car plant besides it would enter the
Translation: Suzuki traza planes ambiciosos para Maruti Nueva Delhi, 13 de Sep.(PTI): Suzuki anunció hoy una inversión de más de 1,000 crores de rupias para establecer una unidad de fabricación de motores diésel en el país y dijo que la empresa ha formado una empresa conjunta con Maruti para una nueva planta de automóviles, además de que ingresará.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Suzuki proclaimed an investment exceeding Rs 1,000 crore for the establishment of a diesel engine manufacturing division in the country. They also disclosed that a joint venture with Maruti has been formed for creating a new car plant, and furthermore, they will foray into the...
Paraphrase 2: 2. An over Rs 1,000 crore investment for a new diesel engine manufacturing unit in the country has been declared by Suzuki today. In addition, they have collaborated with Maruti to set up a new car plant and have plans to break in to the...

Original Text: U.S. Iraq Death Toll Hits 1,000, Two Italians Seized  BAGHDAD (Reuters) - The U.S. military death toll in Iraq  reached 1,000 on Tuesday nearly 18 months after the invasion to  topple Saddam Hussein, making its mark on the U.S. presidential  election campaign.
Translation: La cifra de muertos de EE.UU. en Irak alcanza los 1,000, secuestran a dos italianos BAGDAD (Reuters) - La cifra de muertos militares de EE.UU. en Irak alcanzó el martes los 1,000, casi 18 meses después de la invasión para derrocar a Saddam Hussein, dejando su marca en la campaña electoral presidencial de EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Approximately 18 months subsequent to the invasion meant to overthrow Saddam Hussein, the U.S. military death toll in Iraq hit 1,000 on Tuesday, influencing the U.S. presidential election campaign. Simultaneously, two Italians have been taken hostage.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD (Reuters) - The number of U.S. military casualties in Iraq hit the grim milestone of 1,000 on Tuesday, nearly a year and a half post the effort to dethrone Saddam Hussein, and has now become a significant issue in the U.S. presidential election campaign. In related news, two Italian nationals have been captured.

Original Text: Malaysia #39;s Anwar launches bid to clear his name, return to <b>...</b> PUTRAJAYA, Malaysia : Former deputy premier Anwar Ibrahim launched a final bid to completely clear his name, a challenge rare in Malaysia #39;s legal system and a move which could lead to his immediate return to politics.
Translation: Anwar de Malasia #39 lanza una oferta para limpiar su nombre, regresar a <b>...</b> PUTRAJAYA, Malasia : El ex primer ministro adjunto Anwar Ibrahim lanzó una oferta final para limpiar completamente su nombre, un desafío raro en el sistema legal de Malasia #39, y una movida que podría llevar a su regreso inmediato a la política.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anwar, the former deputy premier of Malaysia, has initiated a final effort to fully vindicate himself, a seldom-seen challenge in Malaysia's legal proceedings, possibly paving the way for his immediate political comeback.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anwar Ibrahim, former deputy premier of Malaysia, has made a final attempt to completely exonerate his reputation, an endeavor uncommon in Malaysia's judicial system, making a swift return to politics feasible.

Original Text: Oracle sets PeopleSoft deadline Oracle yesterday raised its hostile takeover offer for rival software company PeopleSoft by 14, to \$8.8bn (4.37bn), and for the first time set a deadline for acceptance of the bid.
Translation: Oracle establece la fecha límite para PeopleSoft. Oracle aumentó ayer su oferta de adquisición hostil para la empresa competidora de software PeopleSoft en un 14%, a $8.8 mil millones (4.37 mil millones), y por primera vez estableció una fecha límite para la aceptación de la oferta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oracle escalated its hostile acquisition bid for its competitor, PeopleSoft, by 14, increasing it to $8.8bn (4.37bn) yesterday, and imposed an acceptance deadline for the offer for the first time.

Original Text: May-Walsh beat McPeak-Youngs in Olympic semis The all-American matchup at the Olympic beach volleyball semifinals turned out to be no match at all. Top-ranked Misty May and Kerri Walsh made friendly rivals Holly McPeak and Elaine Youngs scramble for every
Translation: May-Walsh venció a McPeak-Youngs en las semifinales olímpicas. El enfrentamiento totalmente estadounidense en las semifinales de voleibol de playa olímpico resultó no ser ningún partido en absoluto. Las mejor clasificadas, Misty May y Kerri Walsh, hicieron que las amigables rivales Holly McPeak y Elaine Youngs lucharan por cada
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Olympic semi-finals, Misty May and Kerri Walsh, also known as May-Walsh, outpaced Holly McPeak and Elaine Youngs, known as McPeak-Youngs in an all-American matchup of beach volleyball. The top-ranked duo had their friendly rivals scrambling for every point.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The all-American showdown at the Olympic beach volleyball semi-finals saw May-Walsh, consisting of Misty May and Kerri Walsh, decisively win over McPeak-Youngs, the pair of Holly McPeak and Elaine Youngs. The high-ranked May-Walsh team put their affable competitors through a rigorous scramble throughout their match.

Original Text: Top seed Suarez loses at SEAT Open Spain #39;s Anabel Medina Garrigues eliminated Paola Suarez in the top-seeded Argentine #39;s opening match at the US\$225,000 (euro176,000) SEAT Open, rallying to win 3-6, 6-3, 6-4 on Thursday and reach the quarterfinals.
Translation: La cabeza de serie Suarez pierde en el SEAT Open España. Anabel Medina Garrigues de España eliminó a Paola Suarez en el primer partido de la argentina cabeza de serie en el SEAT Open, con un premio de 225,000 dólares (176,000 euros), remontando para ganar 3-6, 6-3, 6-4 el jueves y alcanzar los cuartos de final.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the SEAT Open, Anabel Medina Garrigues from Spain ousted top seed, Paola Suarez of Argentina, in her opening match, fighting back to secure a 3-6, 6-3, 6-4 victory on Thursday. Garnering a place in the quarterfinals, Garrigues triumphed in this US\$225,000 (euro176,000) tournament.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, at the US\$225,000 (euro176,000) SEAT Open, Anabel Medina Garrigues of Spain managed to eliminate the top-seeded Argentine, Paola Suarez in the opening game. Garrigues turned the match around to win 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, advancing herself to the quarterfinals.

Original Text: Turnpike runs free on 1st day of strike The first strike in the 64-year history of the Pennsylvania Turnpike meant free rides for about 650,000 vehicles yesterday, the first travel day of the Thanksgiving weekend.
Translation: La autopista es gratuita el primer día de huelga. La primera huelga en los 64 años de historia de la autopista de Pennsylvania significó viajes gratuitos para unos 650,000 vehículos ayer, el primer día de viaje del fin de semana de Acción de Gracias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The first strike in the 64-year history of the Pennsylvania Turnpike allowed about 650,000 vehicles a free journey yesterday, marking the start of the Thanksgiving weekend travel.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Roughly 650,000 vehicles enjoyed unpaid journeys on the Pennsylvania Turnpike yesterday, the initial day of the Thanksgiving weekend, due to the first strike ever in its 64-year history.

Original Text: Crawford is Golden Amid a Chorus of Boos  ATHENS (Reuters) - Shawn Crawford denied fellow American  Justin Gatlin a sprint double Thursday as he set up a United  States clean sweep in a controversial Olympic men's 200 meters  final.
Translation: Crawford es Oro en Medio de una Lluvia de Abucheos ATENAS (Reuters) - Shawn Crawford negó a su compatriota estadounidense Justin Gatlin un doble triunfo en la carrera este jueves mientras establecía un barrido limpio para Estados Unidos en una polémica final olímpica de los 200 metros para hombres.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS (Reuters) - On Thursday, Shawn Crawford foiled his opponent and fellow American, Justin Gatlin's attempt at a sprint double, leading to a controversy-filled clean sweep for the United States in the Olympic men's 200 meters final, despite being largely frowned upon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ATHENS (Reuters) - Despite surrounding controversies and widespread disapproval, Shawn Crawford emerged victorious against his American counterpart, Justin Gatlin, preventing him from accomplishing a sprint double and thereby facilitating a completely American podium finish at the Olympic men's 200 meter finals on Thursday.

Original Text: Mello Upsets Fish at Delray Beach (AP) AP - Ricardo Mello upset second-seeded Mardy Fish 5-7, 6-4, 6-4 Wednesday and advanced to the third round of the Millennium International Tennis Championships.
Translation: Mello Sorprende a Fish en Delray Beach (AP) AP - Ricardo Mello desbancó al segundo favorito, Mardy Fish, con un marcador de 5-7, 6-4, 6-4 el miércoles y avanzó a la tercera ronda del Campeonato Internacional de Tenis del Milenio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the Millennium International Tennis Championships, Ricardo Mello managed to advance to the third round after unexpectedly beating the second-seeded Mardy Fish with a score of 5-7, 6-4, 6-4 on Wednesday at Delray Beach (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday's round of the Millennium International Tennis Championships at Delray Beach (AP) saw an unexpected victory as Ricardo Mello defeated the second-seeded Mardy Fish with scores of 5-7, 6-4, 6-4, subsequently moving on to the third round.

Original Text: Bilonog Wins Olympia Shot Put Gold Competing under a flawless blue sky in the tree-lined grove devoted to Zeus, the European gold medallist equaled American champion Adam Nelson #39;s opening mark of 2.16 to capture his first major title on a countback.
Translation: Bilonog Gana el Oro en Lanzamiento de Bala en Olympia Competiendo bajo un impecable cielo azul en el bosque consagrado a Zeus, el medallista de oro europeo igualó la marca inicial del campeón americano Adam Nelson #39 de 2.16 para capturar su primer título importante en un desempate.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under a perfect blue sky in the grove dedicated to Zeus, Bilonog won the Olympia Shot Put Gold. The European gold medallist matched the opening mark of 2.16, the same as American champion Adam Nelson #39, and secured his first major title through a countback.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Competing in the tree-lined grove dedicated to Zeus under a clear blue sky, the European gold medallist Bilonog claimed the Olympia Shot Put Gold. He matched the initial 2.16 mark of American champion Adam Nelson #39, winning his premier major title on a countback.

Original Text: ADB sees stronger growth in Asia Asian economies are heading for robust economic growth in 2004, followed by a slight slowdown in 2005, the Asian Development Bank has said.
Translation: El ADB ve un crecimiento más fuerte en Asia. Las economías asiáticas están encaminadas hacia un robusto crecimiento económico en 2004, seguido de una ligera desaceleración en 2005, ha dicho el Banco de Desarrollo Asiático.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Asian Development Bank has stated that Asian economies are gearing up for substantial economic advancement in 2004, albeit expecting a minor deceleration in 2005.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the Asian Development Bank, 2004 is set for a surge in economic growth in Asian economies, with a minor fluctuation downward forecasted for 2005.

Original Text: Iraq Sets Election Date But Unrest Threatens Poll Iraq chose Jan. 30 for its first democratic election in decades on Sunday, but violence in Sunni Muslim areas underlined the challenge of holding polls on time.
Translation: Irak establece la fecha de las elecciones pero los disturbios amenazan la votación. Irak eligió el 30 de enero para su primera elección democrática en décadas el domingo, pero la violencia en las áreas musulmanas sunitas subrayó el desafío de llevar a cabo las elecciones a tiempo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday, Iraq slated January 30 for its inaugural democratic election after many decades, although the feasibility of timely polls is challenged by continued unrest in Sunni Muslim regions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite ongoing turbulence in Sunni Muslim territories threatening the timely conduct of polls, Iraq designates January 30 as the day for conducting its first democratic election in years on Sunday.

Original Text: N.M. Church May Use Special Tea for Now (AP) AP - The U.S. Supreme Court sided Friday with a New Mexico church that wants to use hallucinogenic tea as part of its Christmas services, despite government objections that the tea is illegal and potentially dangerous.
Translation: La Iglesia de N.M. Podría Usar Té Especial Por Ahora (AP) AP - El Tribunal Supremo de los Estados Unidos decidió el viernes a favor de una iglesia de Nuevo México que quiere usar té alucinógeno como parte de sus servicios navideños, a pesar de las objeciones del gobierno que el té es ilegal y potencialmente peligroso.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) On Friday, the U.S. Supreme Court favoured a church in New Mexico that wishes to incorporate hallucinogenic tea into their Christmas rituals, notwithstanding the government's concerns over its illegality and potential risks.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) In spite of legal and safety concerns raised by the government, the U.S. Supreme Court on Friday ruled in favor of a New Mexico-based church wishing to include hallucinogenic tea in its Christmas ceremonies.

Original Text: Tiffany Profit Slips on Weak Japan Sales (AP) AP - Jewelry retailer Tiffany  amp; Co., dragged down by weaker-than-expected sales in Japan and higher precious metal and diamond costs, recorded a 26 percent drop in third-quarter earnings.
Translation: La Ganancia de Tiffany cae debido a débiles ventas en Japón (AP) AP - El minorista de joyería Tiffany & Co., arrastrado por ventas en Japón más débiles de lo esperado y mayores costos de metales preciosos y diamantes, registró una caída del 26 por ciento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Tiffany & Co., a jewelry retailer, observed a 26% decline in profits for the third quarter, burdened by subdued sales in Japan and escalating costs for precious metals and diamonds. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) Third-quarter earnings of Tiffany & Co., a jewelry retailer, plummeted by 26% due to lackluster sales in Japan and an increase in the cost of precious stones and metals. (AP)

Original Text: Myanmar Still Irritant as Asia, Europe Heads Meet  HANOI (Reuters) - The absent member will be the one holding  center-stage at a meeting in Hanoi of leaders of Asia and  Europe. In a hard-fought compromise, Myanmar's ruling junta  will not send its government head.
Translation: Myanmar sigue siendo un irritante mientras se encuentran los líderes de Asia y Europa. HANOI (Reuters) - El miembro ausente será el que ocupe el centro del escenario en una reunión en Hanoi de líderes de Asia y Europa. En un arduo compromiso, la junta gobernante de Myanmar no enviará a su jefe de gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Even as the heads of Asia and Europe convene in Hanoi, the non-attendance of Myanmar, who continues to stir tension, is prominently noticed. Myanmar's ruling junta, after a difficult negotiation, has decided not to send their government leader.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Myanmar's provocation remaining a sticking point as leaders from Asia and Europe meet in Hanoi, their ruling junta's head will be absent, a stance adopted after strenuous discussion. This absence will nonetheless be at the forefront of the summit's attention.

Original Text: US Movie Industry Gets Tough with Pirates The new president of the Motion Picture Association of America, Dan Glickman, says his industry is getting tough on movie piracy. Mr.
Translation: La industria cinematográfica de EE. UU. se pone dura con los piratas. El nuevo presidente de la Asociación Cinematográfica de América, Dan Glickman, afirma que su industria se está volviendo dura contra la piratería de películas. Sr.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Motion Picture Association of America's new president, Dan Glickman, proclaims a stricter stance on movie piracy within the US movie industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US film industry is escalating its actions against pirates, according to the Motion Picture Association of America's new president, Dan Glickman.

Original Text: Sun posts \$174 million loss for the quarter SAN FRANCISCO - With \$190 million in charges on its balance sheet related to restructuring and its recent patent lawsuit settlement with Eastman Kodak Co., Sun Microsystems Inc. on Thursday posted a net loss of \$174 million for its the first quarter of its fiscal 2005 year, which ended September 26.
Translation: Sun registra una pérdida de \$174 millones para el trimestre SAN FRANCISCO - Con \$190 millones en cargos en su balance relacionados con la reestructuración y su reciente acuerdo de demanda por patentes con Eastman Kodak Co., Sun Microsystems Inc. registró una pérdida neta de \$174 millones para su primer trimestre de su año fiscal 2005, que finalizó el 26 de septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems Inc. reported a net loss of $174 million for the first quarter of its fiscal 2005 year, ending September 26. San Francisco-based Sun's losses can be attributed to $190 million in charges due to restructuring and settling a recent patent lawsuit with Eastman Kodak Co.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Incurring $190 million in charges from restructuring and a patent lawsuit settlement with Eastman Kodak Co., Sun Microsystems Inc. declared on Thursday a $174 million loss for the first quarter of the fiscal 2005 year, which concluded on September 26.

Original Text: Chrysler to recall 600,000 SUVs, pick-ups DETROIT, United States (AFP) - Under pressure from US regulators, DaimlerChrysler #39;s Chrysler Group said it would recall more than half a million trucks over ball joint defects that can cause the wheels of the vehicle to separate from the body.
Translation: Chrysler va a retirar 600,000 SUVs, pick-ups DETROIT, Estados Unidos (AFP) - Bajo la presión de los reguladores de EE. UU., El Grupo Chrysler de DaimlerChrysler #39 anunció que retiraría más de medio millón de camiones debido a defectos en las articulaciones de las bolas que pueden causar que las ruedas del vehículo se separen del cuerpo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under pressure from American regulators, Chrysler Group of DaimlerChrysler has announced a recall of over half a million trucks, including SUVs and pick-ups based in Detroit, United States due to defects in the ball joints that could lead to the detachment of the wheels from the body.
Paraphrase 2: 2. DaimlerChrysler's Chrysler Group, in response to US regulators' pressure, has stated that it will conduct a recall of more than 600,000 trucks, including SUVs and pick-ups from Detroit, United States, primarily because of ball joint flaws which can result in the vehicle's wheels separating from its body.

Original Text: Elizabeth Edwards Has Breast Cancer (AP) AP - Elizabeth Edwards, wife of former Democratic vice presidential candidate John Edwards, was diagnosed with breast cancer the day her husband and Sen. John Kerry conceded the presidential race.
Translation: Elizabeth Edwards tiene cáncer de mama (AP) AP - Elizabeth Edwards, esposa del ex candidato a la vicepresidencia demócrata John Edwards, fue diagnosticada con cáncer de mama el día que su esposo y el senador John Kerry admitieron la derrota en la carrera presidencial.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - After the concession of the presidential race by Sen. John Kerry and her husband, John Edwards, a previous Democratic vice presidential nominee, Elizabeth Edwards received a diagnosis of breast cancer.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - On the day when Sen. John Kerry and her husband, former Democratic Vice Presidential candidate John Edwards, admitted defeat in the presidential race, Elizabeth Edwards was diagnosed with breast cancer.

Original Text: Nationals Cancel Unveiling of Uniforms The Washington Nationals have postponed a news conference for Wednesday to unveil their new uniforms. A team spokesman tells The Associated Press they #39;ll issue a statement later Wednesday about why the event is being delayed.
Translation: Los Nacionales Cancelan la Presentación de los Uniformes. Los Washington Nationals han pospuesto una conferencia de prensa para el miércoles para presentar sus nuevos uniformes. Un portavoz del equipo le dice a The Associated Press que emitirán un comunicado más tarde el miércoles sobre por qué se está retrasando el evento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Washington Nationals have delayed their news conference set on Wednesday to showcase their new uniforms, with a declaration to explain the reason for the postponement set to be released later, according to a team spokesman.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A team spokesman informed The Associated Press about the postponement of the Wednesday's news conference, where the Washington Nationals were supposed to present their new uniforms. The reason behind the delay will be clarified in a statement later in the day.

Original Text: Yale in way of Harvard #39;s chance for perfection He should save the tears: Unlike most senior quarterbacks at Harvard, he might not be saying good bye to football after The Game against Yale on Saturday.
Translation: Yale en camino del intento de perfección de Harvard #39; Debería ahorrar las lágrimas: A diferencia de la mayoría de los quarterbacks senior en Harvard, podría no estar diciendo adiós al fútbol después del Juego contra Yale el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In the path of Harvard's chase for perfection, is Yale. The senior quarterback shouldn't part with his football career just yet; unlike his predecessors, his final game against Yale on Saturday might not signify the end.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Yale stands as a hurdle in Harvard's pursuit of flawlessness. Most senior quarterbacks at Harvard bid farewell to football after The Game against Yale on Saturday, but he shouldn't be quick to shed tears - his journey might not be over.

Original Text: Chavez Allies Name Supreme Court Justices President Hugo Chavez's allies in Congress appointed 17 new justices to the supreme court Monday as opposition parties accused the leader of stacking the nation's highest court with government-friendly magistrates.
Translation: Los aliados de Chávez nombran a los jueces del Tribunal Supremo. Los aliados del Presidente Hugo Chávez en el Congreso nombraron a 17 nuevos jueces para el Tribunal Supremo el lunes mientras los partidos de oposición acusaban al líder de llenar el tribunal más alto de la nación con magistrados afines al gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As allegations of political bias unfold, President Hugo Chavez's Congressional allies appointed 17 new justices to the supreme court on Monday, with opposition parties charging the leader of filling the nation's top court with justices supportive of his government.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid accusations from opposition parties that President Hugo Chavez is loading the nation's superior court with government-loyal magistrates, his allies in Congress named 17 new justices to the Supreme Court on Monday.

Original Text: Call of the mild More than 250 scientists from eight nations ended four years of study last month by releasing a report warning that Arctic ice is melting rapidly because of global warming.
Translation: Llamado de lo suave Más de 250 científicos de ocho naciones concluyeron cuatro años de estudio el mes pasado al publicar un informe advirtiendo que el hielo del Ártico se está derritiendo rápidamente debido al calentamiento global.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After completing four years of study, over 250 scientists from eight different countries released a report last month, warning about the rapid melt of Arctic ice due to global warming.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Last month, a report warning about the rapid melting of Arctic ice due to global warming was published by more than 250 scientists from eight nations who had spent four years on the study.

Original Text: DreamWorks Animation Will Sell 29 Million Shares Katzenberg is taking the animation unit public in a year that has seen box office success for the studio:  quot;Shrek 2 quot; has brought in \$876.
Translation: DreamWorks Animation venderá 29 millones de acciones. Katzenberg está llevando la unidad de animación a la bolsa de valores en un año que ha visto un éxito de taquilla para el estudio: "Shrek 2" ha recaudado \$876.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DreamWorks Animation is going public this year with Katzenberg aiming to sell 29 million shares, following the box office success of "Shrek 2" which earned \$876 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In light of the box office success from "Shrek 2," bringing in \$876 million, Katzenberg plans to take DreamWorks Animation public by selling 29 million shares this year.

Original Text: Fed pushes interest rates up again The Federal Reserve boosted a key short-term interest rate by one-quarter percentage point today, marking the third increase this year.
Translation: La Fed vuelve a subir las tasas de interés. La Reserva Federal aumentó hoy un cuarto de punto porcentual una tasa de interés a corto plazo clave, marcando el tercer aumento en lo que va de año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, with an increase of a quarter percentage point, the Federal Reserve has raised a crucial short-term interest rate, which is the third time this year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A key short-term interest rate was increased by a quarter percentage point today by the Federal Reserve, signifying the third rate hike this year.

Original Text: 'Final hours' for Yasser Arafat Palestinians prepare for the funeral and burial of their veteran leader as officials warn of his imminent death.
Translation: 'Horas finales' para Yasser Arafat. Los palestinos se preparan para el funeral y el entierro de su veterano líder mientras los funcionarios advierten de su muerte inminente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As officials caution about the impending demise of their seasoned leader Yasser Arafat, Palestinians are gearing up for his funeral and burial during these 'final hours'.

Original Text: Wash. Scientists Study Whale Watchers (AP) AP - Killer whales get the superstar treatment every summer off the Washington coast, where tourists fill up whale-watch boats to catch a glimpse of the majestic animals. Now, researchers are studying whether all the attention could be a bad thing.
Translation: Lavado. Científicos estudian a los observadores de ballenas (AP) AP - Las orcas reciben el tratamiento de superestrellas cada verano en la costa de Washington, donde los turistas llenan los barcos de observación de ballenas para vislumbrar a estos majestuosos animales. Ahora, los investigadores están estudiando si toda esta atención podría ser perjudicial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Every summer, killer whales bask in the limelight off the coast of Washington, drawing a multitude of tourists aboard whale-watching boats to witness their grandeur. Scientists are now investigating whether this intense popularity might be harmful.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Researchers Examine Potential Impact of Whale-Watching on Killer Whales (AP) AP - Along the Washington coast, killer whales are a star attraction each summer, pulling tourists onto whale-watch boats to admire their majesty. At present, scientists are studying the potential negative effects of this large-scale attention.

Original Text: HP drops plans to put Compaq technology into HP-UX Hewlett-Packard has dropped plans to add a number of technologies acquired in its purchase of Compaq Computer to its flagship HP-UX operating system, and will instead partner with Veritas Software on new file system and clustering capabilities.
Translation: HP cancela planes para incorporar la tecnología de Compaq en HP-UX. Hewlett-Packard ha cancelado planes para agregar una serie de tecnologías adquiridas en su compra de Compaq Computer a su sistema operativo insignia HP-UX, y en su lugar se asociará con Veritas Software en nuevas capacidades de sistema de archivos y agrupamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hewlett-Packard has abandoned its intentions to incorporate several technologies, gained from its acquisition of Compaq Computer, into its top-tier HP-UX operating system, and will now collaborate with Veritas Software on emerging file system and clustering abilities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Plans to integrate Compaq-acquired technologies into its leading HP-UX operating system have been cancelled by Hewlett-Packard. The company has chosen to team up with Veritas Software for the development of new file system and clustering features.

Original Text: UN Council Adopts New Anti-Terror Resolution  UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - The U.N. Security Council voted  unanimously on Friday for a Russian-initiated resolution that  seeks to expand the prosecution and extradition of terrorist  groups and suspects, such as Chechen separatists.
Translation: Consejo de la ONU Adopta Nueva Resolución Contra el Terrorismo NACIONES UNIDAS (Reuters) - El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU votó unánimemente el viernes por una resolución iniciada por Rusia que busca expandir la persecución y extradición de grupos y sospechosos terroristas, como los separatistas chechenos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - On Friday, the U.N. Security Council, in agreement with a resolution initiated by Russia, cast a unanimous vote aiming to broaden the legal actions including prosecution and extradition against terrorist groups and suspects, including Chechen separatists.
Paraphrase 2: 2. UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - A resolution initiated by Russia that aims to extend the process of prosecuting and extraditing terrorist outfits and suspects like Chechen separatists, was unanimously endorsed by the U.N. Security Council on Friday.

Original Text: No End in Sight to Supply of Cheap TV's Industry experts say that the financial trouble of one of the biggest Chinese makers of television sets will not affect the market much.
Translation: No hay final a la vista para el suministro de televisores baratos. Los expertos de la industria dicen que los problemas financieros de uno de los mayores fabricantes chinos de conjuntos de televisión no afectarán mucho al mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Industry professionals claim that the financial crisis of one of China's largest TV manufacturers will not significantly impact the abundant supply of inexpensive television sets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The economic difficulty faced by one of China's major television producers is unlikely to disturb the continuous supply of low-cost TVs, as per industry specialists.
