Original Text: Hungary Wins Gold in Olympic Water Polo Tamas Kasas was born the same month Hungary won its sixth Olympic water polo gold medal. For two decades, Hungarians waited for somebody like him to revive its dominance in a sport
Translation: Hungría gana oro en el Polo Acuático Olímpico. Tamas Kasas nació el mismo mes en que Hungría ganó su sexta medalla de oro olímpica de polo acuático. Durante dos décadas, los húngaros esperaron a alguien como él para revivir su dominio en el deporte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the month that Tamas Kasas was born, Hungary secured its sixth Olympic gold medal in water polo. The country had been yearning for a person like him for over twenty years to return Hungary to its former glory in the sport.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tamas Kasas, born in the same month as Hungary's sixth Olympic water polo gold medal victory, was the person his country spent two decades waiting for, in hopes of reigniting their supremacy in the sport.

Original Text: Bulger unlikely to play Sunday Rams quarterback Marc Bulger still has soreness in his sprained right shoulder, making it unlikely that he will play Sunday against Arizona.
Translation: Es improbable que Bulger juegue el domingo. El mariscal de campo de los Rams, Marc Bulger, todavía tiene dolor en su hombro derecho torcido, lo que hace poco probable que juegue el domingo contra Arizona.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It seems improbable that the Rams' quarterback, Marc Bulger, will participate in Sunday's game against Arizona, given that his sprained right shoulder is still causing him discomfort.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to the persisting pain in his sprained right shoulder, Rams' quarterback Marc Bulger is expected to sit out the upcoming Sunday's match against Arizona.

Original Text: Protesters March Across Brooklyn Bridge (AP) AP - Thousands of abortion-rights activists marched across the Brooklyn Bridge and demonstrators rang handbells at the World Trade Center site Saturday, the latest in a growing procession of protests leading up to the Republican National Convention.
Translation: Manifestantes Marchan a Través del Puente de Brooklyn (AP) AP - Miles de activistas pro-derechos al aborto marcharon a través del Puente de Brooklyn y los manifestantes tocaron campanas de mano en el sitio del World Trade Center el sábado, el último de una creciente procesión de protestas previas a la Convención Nacional Republicana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - On Saturday, ahead of the Republican National Convention, thousands of individuals supporting abortion rights took part in a march over the Brooklyn Bridge. Additionally, at the World Trade Center site, protesters rang handbells, extending the ongoing series of demonstrations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Demonstrations leading to the Republican National Convention continued to grow as thousands of individuals advocating for abortion rights marched over the Brooklyn Bridge on Saturday. Activists also rang handbells at the World Trade Center site, contributing to the rising series of protests.

Original Text: Pakistan launches attack on suspected militants near Afghan border; 50 killed (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - WANA, Pakistan (AP) - Pakistani warplanes pummelled a suspected al-Qaida training facility near the border with Afghanistan on Thursday, flattening a vast mud-brick compound and killing at least 50 fighters, the military said.
Translation: Pakistan lanza ataque contra presuntos militantes cerca de la frontera afgana; 50 muertos (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - WANA, Pakistán (AP) - Aviones de guerra paquistaníes bombardearon una presunta instalación de entrenamiento de al-Qaida cerca de la frontera con Afganistán el jueves, arrasando un extenso complejo de ladrillos de barro y matando al menos a 50 combatientes, dijo el ejército.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Canadian Press) Pakistani military announces taking down a possible al-Qaida training base near Afghan frontier with air strikes, marking 50 militant deaths. The vast site, known to be a mud-brick compound, was destroyed completely on Thursday, as per the reports in WANA, Pakistan (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. WANA, Pakistan (AP) - According to the Canadian Press, the Pakistani military launched an offensive on a suspected al-Qaida training site near the Afghan border. The assault, which involved airstrike, led to the death of at least 50 suspected fighters and the annihilation of the sizeable mud-brick complex.

Original Text: Indian peace move brightens hope for Kashmir peace Kashmiris weary of years of violence welcomed on Friday India #39;s surprising offer to reduce the number of its troops in the Himalayan territory, a move that could prompt old foe Pakistan to respond similarly.
Translation: La iniciativa de paz de India ilumina la esperanza por una paz en Cachemira. Los cachemires, cansados de años de violencia, dieron la bienvenida el viernes a la inesperada propuesta de India de reducir el número de sus tropas en el territorio del Himalaya, un movimiento que podría impulsar al antiguo enemigo, Pakistán, a responder de manera similar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The surprise proposition by India to decrease its troop presence in the Himalayan region, welcomed by Kashmiris tired from years of unrest, revitalizes hopes for peace in Kashmir. This move may stimulate Pakistan, India's long-time adversary, to take similar steps.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, India's unexpected decision to cut down its military presence in the Himalayan territory raised optimism for peace in Kashmir, a development warmly accepted by the Kashmiris who have suffered years of conflict. This gesture might lead to a reciprocal response from Pakistan, an old rival.

Original Text: Nine Britons confirmed dead in Jordanian coach crash Nine Britons are confirmed dead following a coach crash near the Jordanian tourist attraction of Petra yesterday. According to reports, a tyre of the tour bus blew out on a stretch of the Desert Highway motorway
Translation: Nueve británicos confirmados muertos en un accidente de autobús en Jordania. Se ha confirmado la muerte de nueve británicos tras un accidente de autobús cerca de la atracción turística jordana de Petra ayer. Según los informes, un neumático del autobús turístico estalló en un tramo de la autopista Desert Highway.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Following a coach crash near Petra, a well-known tourist attraction in Jordan, it has been confirmed that nine Britons tragically lost their lives. Reports indicate the accident was caused by the blowout of a tyre on the tour bus as it travelled along a stretch of the Desert Highway motorway.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Nine British citizens have been confirmed deceased after their tour bus experienced a tyre blowout, leading to a crash on a segment of the Desert Highway motorway near Petra in Jordan.

Original Text: Tom Plate The Latest China Syndrome You can bet they have been salivating, waiting patiently for the delicious, divisive moment: for Cultural Revolution Two or Tiananmen Square Two.
Translation: Tom Plate El Último Síndrome de China Puedes apostar que han estado salivando, esperando pacientemente el delicioso y divisivo momento: para la Segunda Revolución Cultural o la Segunda Plaza de Tiananmen.
Paraphrase 1: 1) You can be certain that they have been eagerly anticipating the enthralling, polarizing instance such as the second Cultural Revolution or another Tiananmen Square.
Paraphrase 2: 2) They have surely been craving, standing by calmly for the appetising, contentious moment: akin to a second Cultural Revolution or a replay of Tiananmen Square.

Original Text: Seagate Sees Results Above Estimates  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Seagate Technology, the top U.S. maker  of computer hard-disc drives, on Tuesday forecast quarterly  earnings and revenue above Wall Street estimates amid stronger  demand for its products than in the previous quarter.
Translation: Seagate ve resultados superiores a las estimaciones  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Seagate Technology, el principal fabricante estadounidense de discos duros para computadoras, pronosticó el martes ganancias trimestrales e ingresos superiores a las estimaciones de Wall Street debido a una demanda más fuerte de sus productos que en el trimestre anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Tuesday, Seagate Technology, the leading U.S. manufacturer of computer hard-disc drives, projected its quarterly earnings and revenue would surpass Wall Street estimates, due to an increased demand for its products compared to the last quarter.
Paraphrase 2: 2) NEW YORK (Reuters) - Foreseeing a higher demand for their products compared to the last quarter, Seagate Technology, America's premier computer hard-disc drive firm, advanced a Tuesday projection of quarterly earnings and revenue that outstrips Wall Street estimates.

Original Text: Watney moves to the front Former Fresno State standout Nick Watney recovered from a double-bogey on the seventh hole to shoot 1 under and tie for the third-round lead Saturday in the Nationwide Tour Championship at the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail in Prattville, Ala.
Translation: Watney se mueve al frente. El ex-destacado de Fresno State, Nick Watney, se recuperó de un doble bogey en el séptimo hoyo para disparar 1 por debajo e igualar para la tercera ronda de liderazgo el sábado en el Campeonato Nationwide Tour en el Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail en Prattville, Ala.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Overcoming a double-bogey on the seventh hole, former Fresno State star Nick Watney shot 1 under and attained a tie for the lead in the Nationwide Tour Championship's third round on Saturday, held at the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail in Prattville, Ala.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite a double-bogey setback on the seventh hole, Nick Watney, renowned for his time at Fresno State, managed to secure a tie for the top spot in the third round of the Nationwide Tour Championship on Saturday. The event took place at the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail in Prattville, Ala.

Original Text: Darfuris Fleeing Villages, Report Govt Attacks (Reuters) Reuters - Darfuri Dowsa Ahmed Hassan\said he was standing in the market place when he heard the\Antonov plane's drone and watched it drop three bombs on his\village, killing a mother and her three children.
Translation: Darfuríes huyen de sus aldeas, reportan ataques gubernamentales (Reuters) Reuters - Darfuri Dowsa Ahmed Hassan dijo que estaba en el mercado cuando escuchó el zumbido del avión Antonov y vio cómo dejaba caer tres bombas en su aldea, matando a una madre y sus tres hijos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - Dowsa Ahmed Hassan, a native of Darfur, reported standing in the marketplace, hearing the droning of an Antonov plane, and witnessing it deploy three bombs on his village, leading to the demise of a woman and her three children.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to Reuters, a mother and her three children were killed in Darfur when three bombs were dropped on their village by an Antonov plane, as recounted by local resident Dowsa Ahmed Hassan, who was present in the market at the time.

Original Text: IT Services, Jets Lift Lockheed Profit  NEW YORK (Reuters) - No. 1 U.S. defense contractor Lockheed  Martin Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=LMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">LMT.N</A> reported a 41 percent rise in quarterly  profit on Tuesday, beating Wall Street forecasts, as demand  soared for its combat aircraft and information technology  services.
Translation:
Servicios de TI, Ventas de Jets Aumentan las Ganancias de Lockheed 

NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El principal contratista de defensa de EE. UU., Lockheed Martin Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=LMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">LMT.N</A> informó un aumento del 41 por ciento en las ganancias trimestrales el martes, superando las previsiones de Wall Street, ya que la demanda se disparó por sus aviones de combate y servicios de tecnología de la información.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Lockheed Martin Corp., the leading U.S. defense contractor, announced a 41% quarterly profit increase on Tuesday, surpassing Wall Street's expectations. This surge in profit was attributed to increasing demand for their information technology services and combat aircraft."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "On Tuesday, the United States' premier defense contractor, Lockheed Martin Corp., revealed an impressive rise in quarterly profits of 41 percent. This beats Wall Street predictions, with a surge in demand for its IT services and combat aircraft playing a major role."

Original Text: Evolution and Religion Can Coexist, Scientists Say In some corners, popular belief holds that science and religion are incompatible, but scientists may be just as likely to believe in God as other people, according to surveys.
Translation: La Evolución y la Religión pueden Coexistir, según los Científicos. En algunos sectores, la creencia popular sostiene que la ciencia y la religión son incompatibles, pero los científicos pueden ser tan propensos a creer en Dios como cualquier otra persona, según las encuestas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Contrary to common perceptions in some quarters that science and religion clash, scientists suggest that it's possible for evolution and religion to coexist. Surveys reveal that the probability of scientists believing in God may be as much as anyone else.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite prevailing notions in certain areas that there's a conflict between science and religion, the view that religion and evolution can harmoniously coexist is backed by scientists. As per surveys, the inclination of scientists towards a belief in God could align with that of the general populace.

Original Text: Fund insiders: Lavish gifts abound Mutual fund companies in Boston say they have strict prohibitions against employees getting the kind of wining and dining and luxe entertainment that government regulators are investigating at Fidelity Investments, but industry officials and attorneys in the field contend such extravagance is nonetheless common in the investment world.
Translation: Insiders de fondos: Abundantes regalos lujosos Las empresas de fondos de inversión en Boston dicen que tienen estrictas prohibiciones contra que los empleados reciban el tipo de agasajos y entretenimientos lujosos que los reguladores gubernamentales están investigando en Fidelity Investments, pero los funcionarios de la industria y los abogados en el campo sostienen que tal extravagancia es, sin embargo, común en el mundo de la inversión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the strict restrictions against employees receiving extravagant gifts within Boston's mutual fund companies, such as the ones being probed at Fidelity Investments, industry executives and lawyers argue that such lavishness is still prevalent in the investment sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even though mutual fund organizations in Boston strongly discourage their staff from accepting luxurious indulgences like those currently under regulatory scrutiny at Fidelity Investments, industry authorities and legal experts insist that such opulence is far from rare in the world of investment.

Original Text: Secrets of a Salty Survivor You can learn a lot from a microbe. Right now, a tiny critter from the Dead Sea is teaching scientists new things about biotechnology, cancer, possible life on other worlds. And that's just for starters.
Translation: Secretos de un superviviente salado: puedes aprender mucho de un microbio. En este momento, una pequeña criatura del Mar Muerto está enseñando a los científicos cosas nuevas sobre biotecnología, cáncer, y la posible vida en otros mundos. Y eso es solo el comienzo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A miniscule organism from the Dead Sea can serve as an enlightening tutor, providing new scientific insights in areas such as biotechnology, oncology, and potential extraterrestrial life - just to name a few. This "salty survivor's" secrets are a treasure trove of knowledge.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The "Salty Survivor", a microbe from the Dead Sea, is presently instructing scientists on novel aspects of biotechnology, cancer, and the potential existence of life on other planets. And these areas are just the tip of the iceberg.

Original Text: Hurricane Jeanne Washes Out Rays/Jays Game for Sunday  ST. PETERSBURG, Florida (Sports Network) - The threat of  Hurricane Jeanne has forced the cancellation of Sunday's game  between the Tampa Bay Devil Rays and the Toronto Blue Jays at  Tropicana Field.
Translation: El Huracán Jeanne Cancela el Partido de Rays/Jays para el Domingo  ST. PETERSBURG, Florida (Red Deportiva) - La amenaza del Huracán Jeanne ha obligado a cancelar el partido del domingo entre los Tampa Bay Devil Rays y los Toronto Blue Jays en el Tropicana Field.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ST. PETERSBURG, Florida (Sports Network) - The impending danger of Hurricane Jeanne has led to the call-off of the baseball match between the Tampa Bay Devil Rays and Toronto Blue Jays at Tropicana Field on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sunday's baseball game at Tropicana Field between the Tampa Bay Devil Rays and the Toronto Blue Jays has been cancelled, due to the impending arrival of Hurricane Jeanne in St. Petersburg, Florida, as reported by the Sports Network.

Original Text: \$149 million lottery winner:  #39;No idea #39; what comes next Newly minted multimillionaire Juan Rodriguez, who won the \$149 million Mega Millions lottery jackpot, said Sunday he hasn #39;t quit his job at a midtown Manhattan parking garage yet.
Translation: Ganador de la lotería de \$149 millones: # 39;No tiene idea #39; de lo que viene a continuación. El recién acuñado multimillonario Juan Rodríguez, que ganó el premio mayor de la lotería Mega Millions de \$149 millones, dijo el domingo que aún no ha renunciado a su trabajo en un estacionamiento en el centro de Manhattan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Juan Rodriguez, the winner of the $149 million Mega Millions lottery, who is now a multimillionaire, admitted Sunday he has 'no clue about his next steps and hasn't resigned from his job at a parking garage in midtown Manhattan.

Original Text: Palmeiro, Orioles reach terms CBC SPORTS ONLINE - The Baltimore Orioles reached terms Wednesday with first baseman Rafael Palmeiro on a one-year, \$3-million US contract.
Translation: Palmeiro, Orioles alcanzan términos CBC DEPORTES EN LÍNEA - Los Orioles de Baltimore llegaron a términos el miércoles con el primera base Rafael Palmeiro en un contrato de un año, con un valor de 3 millones de dólares estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CBC SPORTS ONLINE reports that the Baltimore Orioles and first baseman Rafael Palmeiro have come to an agreement on a one-year contract, worth $3 million US, on Wednesday.

Original Text: Henry puts Arsenal on road to victory THIERRY HENRY inspired Arsenal to a victorious start to their Champions League campaign as Arsene Wenger #39;s side proved patience is a virtue at home to a cautious PSV Eindhoven side.
Translation: Henry pone al Arsenal en camino a la victoria. THIERRY HENRY inspiró al Arsenal a un comienzo victorioso en su campaña de la Liga de Campeones, ya que el equipo de Arsene Wenger demostró que la paciencia es una virtud en casa frente a un cauteloso equipo del PSV Eindhoven.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Primarily due to Thierry Henry's inspiration, Arsenal initiated their Champions League journey with a win, demonstrating the value of patience as Arsene Wenger's team faced a defensive PSV Eindhoven team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Guided by the inspiring performance of Thierry Henry, Arsenal embarked on a successful start to their Champions League endeavours. Arsene Wenger's squad demonstrated that patience can pay off when playing against a defensive-minded PSV Eindhoven side at home.

Original Text: United eliminating some US routes, expanding overseas to increase profits United Airlines, increasingly squeezed by discount carriers in the US market, is cutting back its domestic flight schedule and expanding its international presence in the push to become profitable again.
Translation: United elimina algunas rutas en EE. UU., se expande en el extranjero para aumentar las ganancias. United Airlines, cada vez más presionada por las aerolíneas de descuento en el mercado estadounidense, está reduciendo su horario de vuelos nacionales y expandiendo su presencia internacional en el esfuerzo por volver a ser rentable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. United Airlines, feeling the competitive pressure from discount airlines in the US, is reducing its domestic flights while enhancing its international reach in a bid to regain profitability.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Pressured by the rise of discount carriers in the US, United Airlines is scaling back on its domestic routes and broadening its global footprint, as it strives to turn profits once more.

Original Text: Bush, Cheney Concede Iraq Had No WMDs WASHINGTON - President Bush and his vice president conceded Thursday in the clearest terms yet that Saddam Hussein had no weapons of mass destruction, even as they tried to shift the Iraq war debate to a new issue - whether the invasion was justified because Saddam was abusing a U.N. oil-for-food program...
Translation: Bush, Cheney Admiten que Irak No Tenía ADMs WASHINGTON - El Presidente Bush y su vicepresidente admitieron el jueves en los términos más claros hasta ahora que Saddam Hussein no tenía armas de destrucción masiva, incluso mientras intentaban desviar el debate sobre la guerra en Irak hacia un nuevo tema - si la invasión estaba justificada porque Saddam estaba abusando de un programa de petróleo por alimentos de la ONU...
Paraphrase 1: 1. President Bush and Vice President Cheney, for the first time, explicitly admitted that Saddam Hussein did not possess weapons of mass destruction. However, they transitioned the discussion surrounding the Iraq war justification to Saddam's misuse of a U.N. oil-for-food program.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, in the most definite terms thus far, President Bush along with his Vice President Cheney acknowledged that there were no weapons of mass destruction in Iraq under Saddam Hussein. Simultaneously, they attempted to divert the conversation about the Iraq war towards Saddam's exploitation of a U.N. oil-for-food program as the potential justification.

Original Text: Teleportation goes long distance Physicists have successfully teleported particles of light over a distance of 600m across the River Danube in Austria, the journal Nature reports.
Translation: La teleportación recorre largas distancias. Físicos han logrado teleportar partículas de luz a una distancia de 600 metros a través del río Danubio en Austria, informa la revista Nature.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As reported in the journal Nature, physicists have managed to teleport light particles across a span of 600m over the River Danube in Austria, marking a significant achievement in long-distance teleportation.

Original Text: Hhg Offloads Pearl and London Life Financial group HHG today announced the 1.03 billion sale of its UK life insurance business, which includes the Pearl and London Life brands.
Translation: Hhg traspasa Pearl y el grupo financiero London Life. Hoy, HHG anunció la venta de su negocio de seguros de vida en el Reino Unido, una transacción que asciende a 1.03 billones, e incluye las marcas Pearl y London Life.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The sale of its UK life insurance business, which includes the Pearl and London Life brands, was announced by HHG today, with the transaction amounting to 1.03 billion.

Original Text: With friends like these ... Choose well, and you are assured a lifetime of good cheer and support, with only the occasional passenger-side regurgitation cleanup.
Translation: Con amigos como estos... Elige bien, y te aseguras toda una vida de buen humor y apoyo, con solo la ocasional limpieza del vómito del lado del pasajero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you choose your friends wisely like these, you can guarantee a lifetime filled with happiness and assistance, experienced with only the occasional need for cleaning up vomit from the passenger side.

Original Text: Sony #39;s PlayStation Portable sold out on its first day! Sony #39;s anticipated PlayStation Portable (PSP) has virtually sold out on its debut day in Japan - the launch outside Japan will follow next year.
Translation: ¡La PlayStation Portable de Sony se agotó en su primer día! La esperada PlayStation Portable (PSP) de Sony se ha agotado prácticamente en su día de lanzamiento en Japón; el lanzamiento fuera de Japón se producirá el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The much-awaited PlayStation Portable (PSP) by Sony sold out almost instantly on its launch day in Japan, with the international release slated for next year.

Original Text: Q amp;A: Terry Labonte and friends. Terry Labonte announced his plan for retirement during a special media breakfast at Hendrick Motorsports on Tuesday. Hosted by Fox #39;s Mike Joy, featured guest speakers included NASCAR #39;s Mike Helton, Team Owner
Translation: Preguntas y Respuestas: Terry Labonte y amigos. Terry Labonte anunció su plan de jubilación durante un desayuno especial para medios en Hendrick Motorsports el martes. Presentado por Mike Joy de Fox, los invitados especiales incluyeron a Mike Helton de NASCAR, el dueño del equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At a special media breakfast held at Hendrick Motorsports, Terry Labonte disclosed his retirement plans. Fox's Mike Joy hosted the gathering, with guest speakers like Mike Helton from NASCAR and Team Owner attending.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Terry Labonte unveiled his intentions to retire at a unique media breakfast event at Hendrick Motorsports on Tuesday. This event saw the participation of guest speakers including Mike Helton of NASCAR and Team Owner, all under the hosting of Fox's Mike Joy.

Original Text: Vincent, Reed out for Sunday #39;s game Orchard Park, NY (Sports Network) - Veteran cornerback Troy Vincent and wide receiver Josh Reed will not play Sunday when the Buffalo Bills host the St.
Translation: Vincent, Reed se ausentan para el juego del domingo #39 Orchard Park, NY (Red Deportiva) - El veterano esquinero Troy Vincent y el receptor abierto Josh Reed no jugarán este domingo cuando los Buffalo Bills reciban al St.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Troy Vincent, an experienced cornerback, and Josh Reed, a wide receiver, won't be participating in this Sunday's game in Orchard Park, NY where the St. is hosting the Buffalo Bills, according to the Sports Network.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Sports Network reports that the Buffalo Bills' veteran cornerback Troy Vincent and wide receiver Josh Reed will be absent from the upcoming Sunday's game held in Orchard Park, NY, against the St.

Original Text: Standing firm, Arafat seen to counter his critics JERUSALEM -- Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat appears to have faced down the biggest challenge to his leadership in years without giving ground on demands to overhaul his administration, while Prime Minister Ariel Sharon of Israel struggles to chart a new political course amid rising dissent in his party, officials and analysts say.
Translation: Manteniéndose firme, se ve a Arafat contrarrestando a sus críticos JERUSALÉN -- Parece que el líder palestino Yasser Arafat ha enfrentado el mayor desafío a su liderazgo en años sin ceder terreno en las demandas de reestructuración de su administración, mientras que el primer ministro Ariel Sharon de Israel lucha por trazar un nuevo rumbo político en medio de un creciente descontento en su partido, según dicen funcionarios y analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Jerusalem, it seems that Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat has effectively withstood the most significant threat to his leadership in years by adamantly refusing to yield to calls for the reform of his administration. In the meantime, Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon finds it difficult to map out a fresh political direction due to increasing opposition within his party, according to officials and analysts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yasser Arafat, the Palestinian leader, standing his ground against administrative overhaul demands, appears to successfully counter the greatest challenge to his reign in years, report officials and analysts in Jerusalem. On the other hand, Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon seems to be grappling with the task of establishing a new political trajectory amidst escalating discord within his party.

Original Text: The Philadelphia Inquirer University of Pennsylvania researchers have figured out how to produce a continuous supply of sperm stem cells from mice, a technique that could one day be used to save endangered species or treat infertility in men.
Translation: Investigadores de la Universidad de Pennsylvania, según el Philadelphia Inquirer, han descubierto cómo producir un suministro continuo de células madre de esperma de ratones, una técnica que podría usarse algún día para salvar especies en peligro o tratar la infertilidad en hombres.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Researchers from the University of Pennsylvania, as reported by The Philadelphia Inquirer, have developed a method to generate an ongoing production of sperm stem cells in mice. This approach could potentially aid in the conservation of endangered species or the treatment of male infertility in the future.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to The Philadelphia Inquirer, a team at the University of Pennsylvania has discovered how to continuously create sperm stem cells using mice. This technique has the potential to either assist in the preservation of at-risk species or address male infertility issues.

Original Text: When Models Explode Behind every good business plan, there's a dynamite shack waiting for a box of matches.
Translation: Cuando los Modelos Explotan: Detrás de cada buen plan de negocio, hay una choza de dinamita esperando una caja de cerillas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A dynamite shack poised for a matchbox is always tucked behind every successful business plan, symbolizing a potential for explosive models.
Paraphrase 2: 2) For every effective business strategy, there lurks a metaphorical shack of dynamite, ready to go off with the encounter of a hypothetical box of matches, signifying the possibility of models exploding.

Original Text: Serb War Crimes Suspect Surrenders -- Del Ponte (Reuters) Reuters - A Serb officer indicted for war crimes\in the siege of Sarajevo during the 1992-95 Bosnian war was on\his way to the U.N. war crimes tribunal in The Hague on Friday,\chief prosecutor Carla Del Ponte said.
Translation: Sospechoso de Crímenes de Guerra Serbio se Rinde -- Del Ponte (Reuters) Reuters - Un oficial Serbio acusado de crímenes de guerra durante el asedio de Sarajevo durante la guerra de Bosnia de 1992-95 estaba en camino al tribunal de crímenes de guerra de la ONU en La Haya el viernes, dijo la fiscal jefe Carla Del Ponte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Carla Del Ponte, the chief prosecutor, announced on Friday that a Serbian officer, who was charged with war crimes in the Sarajevo siege during the Bosnian war from 1992-95, had surrendered and was in transit to the U.N. war crimes tribunal in The Hague (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2. A Serbian officer implicated in war crimes during the 1992-95 siege of Sarajevo in the Bosnian war has surrendered himself and is currently en route to the U.N. war crimes tribunal in The Hague, confirms Chief Prosecutor Carla Del Ponte (Reuters).

Original Text: Sears Canada fires top exec -- parent #39;s CFO takes over as chair Sears Canada fired its top executive Thursday over what it characterized as  #39; #39;strategic differences #39; #39; and enlisted the chief financial officer of parent company Sears, Roebuck Co.
Translation: Sears Canadá despide a su principal ejecutivo - el CFO de la empresa matriz #39 toma el control como presidente. Sears Canadá despidió a su ejecutivo principal el jueves debido a lo que caracterizó como "#39; #39;diferencias estratégicas #39; #39;" y enlistó al director financiero de la empresa matriz Sears, Roebuck Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sears Canada dismissed its top executive on Thursday due to what it described as 'strategic differences,' with the CFO of its parent company, Sears, Roebuck Co., stepping in to assume the chair role.

Original Text: Foreign investment into China up 18.8 percent in first eight months (AFP) AFP - China remained an attractive destination for foreign investors who poured in 43.6 billion dollars during the first eight months of the year, 18.8 percent more than the same period last year, the government said.
Translation: Traducción al español: Inversión extranjera en China aumenta un 18.8 por ciento en los primeros ocho meses (AFP) AFP - China siguió siendo un destino atractivo para los inversores extranjeros, que invirtieron 43.6 mil millones de dólares durante los primeros ocho meses del año, un 18.8 por ciento más que en el mismo período del año pasado, según informó el gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1) According to the government, China continues to entice foreign investors, with foreign investments rising by 18.8 percent to reach 43.6 billion dollars in the initial eight months of the year, a significant increase over the same period last year (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Chinese government reports an 18.8 percent increase in foreign investments, totaling 43.6 billion dollars over the first eight months of the year, underlining the sustained appeal of China as an investment destination for foreign investors (AFP).

Original Text: Clearly Carly in women #39;s all-around As Carly Patterson waited for her final routine Thursday night, her coach looked into her eyes and saw a fire that burned brighter than the Olympic flame.
Translation: Claramente, Carly en el todo alrededor de mujeres. Mientras Carly Patterson esperaba su última rutina la noche del jueves, su entrenador miró en sus ojos y vio un fuego que ardía más brillante que la llama olímpica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As Carly Patterson prepared for her last performance on Thursday night in the women's all-around, her coach noticed a spark in her eyes, a spark brighter than the Olympic flame itself.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday night, waiting for her final routine in the women's all-around, Carly Patterson had a fire in her eyes, observed by her coach, that outshone even the Olympic flame.

Original Text: Dutch: Top teams earn easy victories Mauro Rosales scored two goals as Ajax Amsterdam moved into fourth place in the Dutch First Division soccer league with a 3-1 win over Willem II Tilburg on Sunday.
Translation: Holandés: Los equipos de primera ganan victorias fáciles. Mauro Rosales anotó dos goles mientras que Ajax Amsterdam ascendió al cuarto lugar en la liga de fútbol de la Primera División holandesa con una victoria de 3-1 sobre Willem II Tilburg el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mauro Rosales netted a pair of goals to help Ajax Amsterdam secure a 3-1 triumph against Willem II Tilburg. This victory propelled them to fourth position in the Dutch First Division football league.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By defeating Willem II Tilburg with a score of 3-1 on Sunday, wherein Mauro Rosales made two goals, Ajax Amsterdam ascended to the fourth spot in the Dutch First Division soccer league.

Original Text: Ebookers job cuts reduce losses Internet-based holiday company Ebookers says cutting 360 jobs during the year has helped reduce its losses by 39.
Translation: La empresa de vacaciones basada en Internet, Ebookers, dice que el recorte de 360 puestos de trabajo durante el año ha ayudado a reducir sus pérdidas en un 39%.
Paraphrase 1: 1. By slashing 360 positions during the year, Ebookers, an online holiday company, stated that its losses have been diminished by 39%.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The internet holiday firm Ebookers confirmed that its decision to eliminate 360 jobs over the year has resulted in a 39% reduction in its losses.

Original Text: Google's New PC Search Tool Poses Risks NEW YORK - People who use public or workplace computers for e-mail, instant messaging and Web searching have a new privacy risk to worry about: Google's free new tool that indexes a PC's contents for quickly locating data.    If it's installed on computers at libraries and Internet cafes, users could unwittingly allow people who follow them on the PCs, for example, to see sensitive information in e-mails they've exchanged...
Translation: La Nueva Herramienta de Búsqueda de PC de Google Presenta Riesgos NUEVA YORK - Las personas que usan computadoras públicas o del lugar de trabajo para el correo electrónico, mensajería instantánea y búsqueda en la web tienen un nuevo riesgo de privacidad del que preocuparse: la nueva herramienta gratuita de Google que indexa los contenidos de una PC para localizar datos rápidamente. Si se instala en computadoras en bibliotecas y cibercafés, los usuarios podrían permitir sin saberlo que las personas que los siguen en las PC, por ejemplo, vean información sensible en los correos electrónicos que han intercambiado...
Paraphrase 1: 1) Google's latest free search tool for PCs that indexes content to promptly locate data has raised serious concerns about privacy. Those who rely on public or office computers for web searching, emailing, and instant messaging might unintentionally expose sensitive information in their emails to subsequent users, particularly if this tool is installed on PCs in locations like libraries or internet cafes in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2) A new privacy issue is on the horizon for individuals who use communal or work computers for various web activities, such as online searching, emailing and IMing. It comes with Google's newly released free tool designed to index a computer's content for quick data retrieval. If this tool is utilized on public computers, like those in libraries or cafes, it could accidentally make delicate details in their email exchanges viewable to later users.

Original Text: Conn. Man Charged with Selling Secret Windows Code A Connecticut man was arrested on Tuesday on charges that he illegally sold a secret source code used for Microsoft Corp. #39;s MSFT.
Translation: Hombre de Conn. Acusado de Vender Código Secreto de Windows Un hombre de Connecticut fue arrestado el martes bajo cargos de que vendió ilegalmente un código fuente secreto utilizado para Microsoft Corp. #39; s MSFT.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A man from Connecticut was apprehended on Tuesday, accused of unlawfully marketing Microsoft Corp.'s confidential source code.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, a Connecticut individual was taken into custody for allegations of illicitly trading a proprietary source code associated with Microsoft Corp. MSFT.

Original Text: Hibernia to Sell Mortgage Portfolio Hibernia Corp., the holding company for Hibernia National Bank, said Thursday that it signed a letter of intent to sell its \$10 billion, third-party residential mortgage servicing portfolio to a unit of Citigroup Inc.
Translation: Hibernia vende su cartera de hipotecas. Hibernia Corp., la compañía matriz del Hibernia National Bank, dijo el jueves que firmó una carta de intención para vender su cartera de servicios hipotecarios residenciales de terceros valorada en \$10 mil millones a una unidad de Citigroup Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hibernia Corp., the parent company of Hibernia National Bank, announced on Thursday its plans to sell its $10 billion residential mortgage servicing portfolio to a Citigroup Inc. division, as marked by a signed letter of intent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A letter of intent, confirming the promise to sell its third-party residential mortgage servicing portfolio valued at $10 billion, has been signed by Hibernia Corp., the holding firm for Hibernia National Bank, planning to sell to a subsidiary of Citigroup Inc., as reported on Thursday.

Original Text: HCA 3rd-Qtr Net Falls, Hurt by Hurricanes  NEW YORK (Reuters) - HCA Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HCA.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HCA.N</A>, the largest U.S.  hospital chain, said on Friday its third-quarter earnings fell,  hurt by hurricanes that hit the southeastern United States  earlier this year, causing disruption and a drop in admissions  at the company's hospitals in Florida.
Translation: La Ganancia Neta de HCA del 3er Trimestre Cae, Afectada por Huracanes NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - HCA Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HCA.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HCA.N</A>, la cadena de hospitales más grande de EE. UU., dijo el viernes que sus ganancias del tercer trimestre cayeron, afectadas por los huracanes que golpearon el sureste de Estados Unidos a principios de este año, causando interrupciones y una disminución en las admisiones en los hospitales de la compañía en Florida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. HCA Inc., the biggest hospital chain in US, disclosed on Friday that their net earnings in the 3rd quarter took a hit, partly attributed to the hurricanes which struck the southeastern United States. These natural disasters led to operational disruptions and a decrease in patient admissions particularly in their Florida facilities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 3rd-quarter profit of HCA Inc., America's largest hospital network, dropped due to the impact of hurricanes in the southeastern part of the country earlier this year. Revealed on Friday, the severe weather conditions led to a lesser number of patient admissions and caused disruptions in their Florida hospitals.

Original Text: Blue Chips Slip as Earnings Disappoint (Reuters) Reuters - U.S. blue chip stocks fell on\Wednesday after Honeywell International Inc.  and J.P.\Morgan Chase   Co.  had quarterly reports that\disappointed investors, while oil prices hovering at  #36;55 per\barrel sparked fresh worry about higher corporate energy costs.
Translation: Las Acciones de Primera Categoría Caen dado que las Ganancias Decepcionan (Reuters) Reuters - Las acciones de primera categoría de EE.UU. cayeron el miércoles después de que Honeywell International Inc. y J.P. Morgan Chase Co. tuvieron informes trimestrales que decepcionaron a los inversores, mientras que los precios del petróleo ubicados en $55 por barril provocaron nuevas preocupaciones sobre los costos energéticos corporativos más altos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) U.S. blue chip stocks underwent a decline on Wednesday as Honeywell International Inc. and J.P. Morgan Chase Co. revealed quarterly reports that failed to meet investor expectations. Furthermore, oil prices, at an unsettling $55 per barrel, fueled newfound concerns about increased energy expenses in the corporate sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) On Wednesday, disappointments over quarterly reports from Honeywell International Inc. and J.P. Morgan Chase Co. lead to a decrease in U.S. blue chip stocks. Additionally, oil prices lingering around $55 per barrel stirred additional anxieties regarding escalating corporate energy expenditures.

Original Text: North Korea Reactor Plan Suspended  Until 2005  NEW YORK, Nov. 26 -- An international consortium said Friday that it has extended for another year a freeze on a project to build two light-water nuclear reactors in North Korea.
Translation: Plan de Reactor de Corea del Norte Suspendido Hasta 2005 NUEVA YORK, 26 de Noviembre -- Un consorcio internacional dijo el viernes que ha extendido por otro año la suspensión de un proyecto para construir dos reactores nucleares de agua ligera en Corea del Norte.
Paraphrase 1: 1) NEW YORK, Nov. 26 -- The plan to construct two light-water nuclear reactors in North Korea has been put on hold until 2005, according to an announcement made by an international group on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) An international group declared on Friday, Nov. 26, in New York that the project of creating two light-water nuclear reactors in North Korea has been postponed and will remain idle until 2005.

Original Text: Strong sales forecast for digital audio players Sales of portable digital audio players like Apple Computer Inc. #39;s trendy iPod are booming and are expected to generate \$58 billion in revenue worldwide by 2008, according to a research report released Tuesday.
Translation: Pronóstico de fuertes ventas para reproductores de audio digital. Las ventas de reproductores de audio digital portátiles como el moderno iPod de Apple Computer Inc. están en auge y se espera que generen $58 mil millones en ingresos a nivel mundial para 2008, según un informe de investigación publicado el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a research report released on Tuesday, portable digital audio players' sales, such as Apple Computer Inc.'s popular iPod, are surging. It is anticipated that they will produce a worldwide revenue of $58 billion by 2008.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A recent research report released Tuesday predicts a booming market for portable digital audio players like Apple Computer Inc.'s iPod. The report suggests that by 2008, these products could generate as much as $58 billion in global revenue.

Original Text: Federer and Roddick Ease Into Thailand Semi-Finals  BANGKOK (Reuters) - Top seeds Roger Federer and Andy  Roddick reached the Thailand Open semi-finals with  straight-sets wins on Friday.
Translation: Federer y Roddick avanzan fácilmente a las semifinales en Tailandia. BANGKOK (Reuters) - Los principales sembrados, Roger Federer y Andy Roddick, llegaron a las semifinales del Abierto de Tailandia con victorias en sets corridos el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Roger Federer and Andy Roddick, the top seeds, effortlessly advanced to the semi-finals of the Thailand Open with victories on Friday in straight sets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Roger Federer and Andy Roddick sailed through to the semi-finals of the Thailand Open after winning their respective matches in straight sets.

Original Text: Haiti Doctors Operate Without Electricity (AP) AP - Doctors are performing amputations without electricity or running water while waste from this city's shattered sewage system contaminates mud and floodwaters, infecting wounds that threaten to turn gangrenous.
Translation: Doctores de Haití Operan Sin Electricidad (AP) AP - Los médicos están realizando amputaciones sin electricidad ni agua corriente, mientras que los residuos del destrozado sistema de alcantarillado de esta ciudad contaminan el barro y las aguas de inundación, infectando heridas que amenazan con volverse gangrenosas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Amidst a lack of electricity, doctors in Haiti are conducting surgeries, dealing with floodwaters and mud contaminated by the broken city sewage system which risks turning wounds gangrenous. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2) Performing in conditions devoid of electricity and running water, doctors in Haiti operate amidst threats of gangrenous infections caused by wounds exposed to contaminated mud and floodwaters from the city's damaged sewage system. (AP)

Original Text: Clarke and Gilchrist flay sorry New Zealand After two days where neither side took control of this match, Australia finally grabbed it by the scruff of the neck and by the close on the third day at Brisbane were in a commanding position.
Translation: Clarke y Gilchrist vapulean a una lamentable Nueva Zelanda. Tras dos días en los que ninguno de los equipos tomó el control de este partido, finalmente Australia lo agarró por el cuello y al finalizar el tercer día en Brisbane estaban en una posición dominante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After an initial two days of evenly matched gameplay, Australia significantly outpaced New Zealand by the end of the third day in Brisbane, with Clarke and Gilchrist leading the way to a commanding position.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The tug of war between Australia and New Zealand ended by the third day in Brisbane, as Clarke and Gilchrist stepped up their game to put Australia at an advantageous position, after two days of shared control in the match.

Original Text: Botswana elections to hand victory to party in power since <b>...</b> GABORONE (AFP) - Queues of voters in diamond-rich Botswana waited patiently to cast their ballots in elections that are expected to hand victory to the party in power since independence in 1966 in one of Africa #39;s most stable countries.
Translation: Las elecciones de Botsuana otorgan la victoria al partido en el poder desde <b>...</b> GABORONE (AFP) - Filas de votantes en la rica en diamantes Botsuana esperaron pacientemente para emitir sus votos en las elecciones que se espera que otorguen la victoria al partido en el poder desde la independencia en 1966 en uno de los países más estables de África #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GABORONE (AFP) - In diamond-laden Botswana, the voters lined up calmly to participate in the elections anticipated to give triumph to the ruling party, which has been in power post the country's independence in 1966, in what is considered one of Africa's most stable nations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. GABORONE (AFP) - Patient queues of voters steadily formed in Botswana, a diamond-rich country, ready in elections likely to result in a victory for the party that has maintained power since 1966, demonstrating the stability of one of Africa's most resilient nations.

Original Text: Exit Blog, Enter Legg Now that hundreds of Google (Nasdaq: GOOG) employees hit the jackpot following the company #39;s initial public offering and subsequent run-up in share price, what #39;s to keep them from coming to work and plugging away with the same vigor as before the millions
Translation: Salir del Blog, Entrar a Legg. Ahora que cientos de empleados de Google (Nasdaq: GOOG) han ganado el premio gordo tras la oferta pública inicial de la compañía y la subsiguiente subida del precio de las acciones, ¿qué les impide continuar trabajando y esforzándose con el mismo vigor que antes de los millones?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Now that hundreds of Google (Nasdaq: GOOG) employees have secured their fortunes following the company's initial public offering and surge in share price, one may wonder what's motivating them to continue working with the same intensity as they did before they became millionaires. Trading their blog for the launch 'Legg.'
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having hit the jackpot due to Google's (Nasdaq: GOOG) IPO and impressive increase in share price, what's preventing these hundreds of employees from continuing to work as hard as they did before becoming millionaires? From being engrossed in their blogs, they are now pivoting to a new project named 'Legg.'

Original Text: Isiah giving Crawford his shot to score with fans The new young guy for the Knicks, this season #39;s new young guy, fast and hungry and talented, is Jamal Crawford. He knows all about bad teams, because he has played his whole NBA career with the Bulls.
Translation: Isiah le da a Crawford su oportunidad de anotar con los fanáticos. El nuevo chico joven para los Knicks, el chico joven de esta temporada #39, rápido, hambriento y talentoso, es Jamal Crawford. Él sabe todo sobre equipos malos, porque ha jugado toda su carrera en la NBA con los Bulls.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jamal Crawford, this season's key rookie for the Knicks, who's known for his speed, hunger, and talent, is getting his chance to impress the fans thanks to Isiah. Having spent his entire NBA career with the Bulls, he's well-versed with the struggles of subpar teams.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Knicks' new star, Jamal Crawford, known for his speed, talent, and drive, is provided a golden opportunity to win the fans over by Isiah. His experience with less successful teams originates from his entire NBA career with the Bulls.

Original Text: Texas Instruments is unconvinced WiMax will replace DSL Despite all of the hype surrounding WiMax, chip maker Texas Instruments Inc. remains unconvinced the technology will revolutionize the way that broadband Internet services are delivered to homes and offices, according to a company executive.
Translation: Texas Instruments no está convencida de que WiMax reemplazará a DSL. A pesar de todo el revuelo que rodea a WiMax, el fabricante de chips Texas Instruments Inc. sigue sin estar convencido de que la tecnología revolucionará la forma en que se entregan los servicios de Internet de banda ancha a hogares y oficinas, según un ejecutivo de la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the considerable buzz around WiMax, Texas Instruments Inc. is skeptical about its potential to transform the delivery of broadband Internet services to residential and commercial areas, as stated by a company executive.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A company executive reports that, despite the increasing hype, Texas Instruments Inc. does not believe that WiMax technology will significantly alter the delivery of broadband Internet services to homes and offices.

Original Text: Germany, 15 Years After the Wall Today, Germans remember the fall of the Berlin wall - an ecstatic night of pure joy when the communist East German government allowed its citizens unhindered access to the bright lights, well-stocked department stores, and warmhearted greetings of
Translation: Alemania, 15 años después del Muro Hoy, los alemanes recuerdan la caída del Muro de Berlín - una noche extática de pura alegría cuando el gobierno comunista de Alemania del Este permitió a sus ciudadanos un acceso sin obstáculos a las brillantes luces, los grandes almacenes bien abastecidos, y los saludos cordiales
Paraphrase 1: 1. Today, Germans commemorate the thrilling night 15 years after the fall of the Berlin wall, when the communist East German government permitted its citizens unrestricted access to the vibrant environment, well-supplied retail outlets, and wholehearted welcome of Germany.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Fifteen years post the demolition of the Berlin wall, citizens of Germany relive the euphoric night when they were freely given access by the East German communist government to the city's lively ambiance, extensively stocked department stores, and cordial reception.

Original Text: INTER VISIT SURPRISE PACKAGE Internazionale boss Roberto Mancini has challenged his players not to drop any points between now and next month #39;s game against Juventus, but immediately faces a stiff test when they travel to high-flying Lecce on Wednesday.
Translation: PAQUETE SORPRESA DE LA VISITA INTERNAZIONAL El jefe del Internazionale, Roberto Mancini, ha desafiado a sus jugadores a no perder ningún punto entre ahora y el partido del próximo mes contra la Juventus, pero inmediatamente enfrenta una dura prueba cuando viajen a Lecce, que está en alto vuelo, el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an unexpected twist, Inter Milan coach, Roberto Mancini, has urged his team to maintain a flawless record up until their match against Juventus next month. However, they are up for a tough game on Wednesday when they head for a face-off with the in-form team, Lecce.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Roberto Mancini, the boss of Internazionale, has set a challenge for his squad to not lose any points leading up to next month's Juventus game, yet a challenging task lies ahead as they are set to meet high-performing Lecce this coming Wednesday.

Original Text: A BRAVE NEW ENGLAND Okay, England v Wales doesn #39;t have the sense of rivalry as playing against Scotland. Out of 97 matches against England, Wales have won only 14.
Translation: UNA NUEVA INGLATERRA VALIENTE Bueno, el partido Inglaterra contra Gales no tiene el sentido de rivalidad como jugar contra Escocia. De 97 partidos contra Inglaterra, Gales sólo ha ganado 14.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Alright, the England versus Wales game doesn't incite the same competitive spirit as when they face Scotland. Wales has only secured 14 victories out of the 97 matches they've played against England.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Indeed, the tension isn't quite as high in England versus Wales matches as it is against Scotland. With only 14 victories out of their 97 encounters with England, Wales pales in comparison.

Original Text: Mountain-sized rock passes Earth The giant Toutatis asteroid passes by the Earth on Wednesday at distance of less than 1.6 million km. This is roughly four times the distance from the Earth to the Moon and closer than this 4.6km-wide rock has come to us since at least the 12th century.
Translation: Una roca del tamaño de una montaña pasa por la Tierra. El gigantesco asteroide Toutatis pasa cerca de la Tierra el miércoles a una distancia menor de 1.6 millones de km. Esto es aproximadamente cuatro veces la distancia de la Tierra a la Luna y más cerca de lo que esta roca de 4.6 km de ancho ha estado de nosotros desde al menos el siglo XII.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, the enormous Toutatis asteroid, almost mountain-sized with a diameter of 4.6km, made a close approach to Earth at a distance of fewer than 1.6 million km. This space rock has not been this close since the 12th century at least, and it is approximately four times the distance between Earth and the Moon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Earth had a close encounter on Wednesday with the vast Toutatis asteroid, a mountain-like rock that's 4.6km across. Its approach was closer than any since the 12th century at least, passing within nearly four times the distance between our planet and its Moon, which is less than 1.6 million km.

Original Text: Hungary to remove 300 troops In a blow to the US effort to hold the Iraq multinational forces together, Hungary announced yesterday that it will withdraw its 300 noncombat troops by the end of March.
Translation: En un golpe al esfuerzo de los EE.UU para mantener unidas las fuerzas multinacionales en Irak, Hungría anunció ayer que retirará sus 300 tropas no combatientes para finales de marzo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday Hungary declared its plan to withdraw its 300 noncombat forces by the end of March, a move that could undermine US attempts to maintain unity among the multinational troops in Iraq.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a setback to the US's endeavor to keep the Iraq multinational forces united, Hungary confirmed their decision to pull out their 300 noncombat troops by the conclusion of March.

Original Text: Nokia launches new camera phone with NFC Nokia, one of the largest mobile devices producer, has unveiled a tri-band 3220 camera phone with NFC or Near Field Communication functionality with support from Philips and Sony.
Translation: Nokia lanza nuevo teléfono con cámara y NFC. Nokia, uno de los mayores productores de dispositivos móviles, ha presentado un teléfono con cámara tri-banda 3220 con funcionalidad de NFC o Comunicación de Campo Cercano, con el apoyo de Philips y Sony.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nokia, a major mobile device manufacturer, has introduced a new 3220 camera phone that features Near Field Communication (NFC) technology, backed by Philips and Sony.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the support of Philips and Sony, Nokia, a leading producer of mobile devices, has made public its latest innovation - a 3220 camera phone equipped with Near Field Communication (NFC) capabilities.

Original Text: ADV: Investment Letter Performance Leaders Looking for independent stock research with results?  Fredhager.com portfolio B was up 187 #37; in 2003.  Hager is setting the pace for performance again in 2004.
Translation: ADV: Líderes en Rendimiento de Cartas de Inversión ¿Buscas investigación de acciones independiente con resultados? La cartera B de Fredhager.com subió un 187% en 2003. Hager está marcando el ritmo para el rendimiento nuevamente en 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Are you seeking autonomous stock research that delivers? Fredhager.com's Portfolio B demonstrated an impressive increase of 187% in 2003. Once more, Hager is pioneering exceptional performance in 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In search of standalone, results-oriented stock investigation? In 2003, Portfolio B at Fredhager.com saw a remarkable growth of 187%. Hager is once again leading the way in performance for 2004.

Original Text: Olympians Put On Show There were no judges, and there was no pressure. Best of all, there was no Olympic-sized controversy at MCI Center on Thursday as the stars of the U.S. gymnastics team tumbled, twirled and gyrated.
Translation: Los Olímpicos Dan un Espectáculo. No había jueces y no había presión. Lo mejor de todo es que no hubo ninguna controversia del tamaño de las Olimpiadas en el MCI Center el jueves, mientras las estrellas del equipo de gimnasia de los EE. UU. daban volteretas, giraban y se agitaban.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Thursday at the MCI Center, stars from the U.S. gymnastics team effortlessly tumbled, twirled, and gyrated in a spectacular display devoid of Olympic-sized controversy or any pressure from judges.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It was a scene of unpressured performances from the U.S. gymnastics team at the MCI Center on Thursday. The Olympians put on a show, tumbling, twirling, and gyrating without the presence of judges or any Olympic-scale controversy.

Original Text: Storms leave at least 350 dead in Philippines The death toll from landslides and flash floods in the eastern Philippines jumped to nearly 350 with 150 others missing yesterday, most of them from a region still reeling from last week #39;s deadly typhoon.
Translation: Las tormentas dejan al menos 350 muertos en Filipinas. El número de muertos por deslizamientos de tierra e inundaciones repentinas en el este de Filipinas aumentó a casi 350 con otros 150 desaparecidos ayer, la mayoría de ellos de una región que todavía se tambalea tras el mortífero tifón de la semana pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Philippines, landslides and flash floods in the eastern region resulted in a death toll close to 350, with another 150 reported missing yesterday. This is particularly devastating as the area is still recovering from last week's fatal typhoon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The eastern region of the Philippines, already struggling from last week's destructive typhoon, saw its death toll surge to around 350 due to landslides and flash floods, with an additional 150 people missing as of yesterday.

Original Text: Kerry Assails Deficit As Bush's Fault GREENSBORO, N.C. - Democratic presidential candidate John Kerry said Tuesday's projection of a record budget deficit this election year and the continuing movement of U.S...
Translation: Kerry Ataca el Deficit Como Culpa de Bush GREENSBORO, N.C. - El candidato presidencial demócrata John Kerry dijo el martes que la proyección de un déficit presupuestario récord este año electoral y el continuo movimiento de EE.UU...
Paraphrase 1: 1. GREENSBORO, N.C. - The forecasted record budget deficit this election year and the persistent relocation of U.S... are being blamed on Bush by John Kerry, the Democratic Presidential candidate.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In GREENSBORO, N.C., John Kerry, who is running as a candidate in the Democratic Presidential election, condemned Bush's role in the predicted all-time high budget deficit this voting year, as well as the ongoing shifting of U.S...

Original Text: Lebanon #39;s lost sovereignty When it comes to occupied Arab territory, Syria applies a brazen double standard: In Iraq, the Golan Heights, the West Bank and Gaza, every day of foreign occupation is seen as intolerable.
Translation: La soberanía perdida de Líbano. Cuando se trata de territorio árabe ocupado, Siria aplica un descarado doble rasero: En Irak, los Altos del Golán, la Cisjordania y Gaza, cada día de ocupación extranjera se ve como intolerable.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Syria exhibits a flagrant double standard in relation to occupied Arab regions like Iraq, the Golan Heights, the West Bank and Gaza, viewing each day of foreign occupation as unbearable, while simultaneously disregarding Lebanon's lost sovereignty.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Regarding the issue of occupied Arab territories, such as Iraq, the Golan Heights, the West Bank and Gaza, Syria unashamedly demonstrates a double standard. They perceive every day of foreign dominance as insufferable, yet they fail to acknowledge the loss of sovereignty in Lebanon.

Original Text: Shakeout seen for high-tech businesses Industry watchers say a report that IBM Corp. has put its once-dominant personal computer business up for sale could signal the first move in a broader consolidation destined to shrink the number of PC manufacturers by about a third over the next couple of years.
Translation: Se anticipa una reestructuración para las empresas de alta tecnología. Los observadores de la industria aseguran que un informe que indica que IBM Corp. ha puesto a la venta su negocio de computadoras personales, que en su momento fue dominante, podría ser la primera señal de una consolidación más amplia destinada a reducir el número de fabricantes de PC en aproximadamente un tercio en los próximos años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Industry observers suggest that IBM Corp's report about the potential sale of its formerly leading personal computer business may trigger a wider fusion in the market. This could significantly reduce the count of PC manufacturers, likely by one-third in the future few years, indicating an imminent shakeout for high-tech businesses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A report indicating the possible sale of the once-preeminent personal computer business of IBM Corp. could forecast the initial phase of a larger consolidation. This is expected to diminish the quantity of PC manufacturers by an estimated third in the upcoming years, foreseeing a shakeout within high-tech business circles, according to industry insiders.

Original Text: Microsoft Revises Anti-Spam Standard  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> on Monday  said it had revised its proposal to weed out "spam" e-mail to  win over skeptical Internet engineers who have been reluctant  to adopt technology owned by the dominant software company.
Translation: Microsoft Revisa Estándar Anti-Spam WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=MSFT.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">MSFT.O</A> dijo el lunes que había revisado su propuesta para eliminar el correo "spam" con el objetivo de ganarse a los ingenieros de Internet escépticos que han sido reacios a adoptar la tecnología propiedad de la compañía de software dominante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Microsoft Corporation declared its decision to amend its plan of warding off "spam" email to convince doubtful internet engineers, reluctant to incorporate the technology owned by the powerful software company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft Corp., the software industry leader, announced a revision of its anti-spam standard on Monday in a bid to persuade skeptical internet engineers who have been hesitant to utilize technology under Microsoft's ownership.

Original Text: #39;Two systems #39; tested in Hong Kong On Sunday, voters will have a limited chance to elect members to the city #39;s parliament. By Robert Marquand  Staff writer of The Christian Science Monitor.
Translation: "Se prueban 'Dos sistemas' en Hong Kong El domingo, los votantes tendrán una oportunidad limitada para elegir a miembros para el parlamento de la ciudad. Por Robert Marquand, escritor del personal de The Christian Science Monitor."
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Hong Kong, 'Two systems' will be put to the test as voters get a restricted opportunity to choose members for the city's parliament on Sunday. This is reported by Robert Marquand, a staff writer for The Christian Science Monitor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 'Two systems' will undergo testing in Hong Kong when limited electoral rights are granted to voters to select their city parliament members this coming Sunday. The news is covered by Robert Marquand on behalf of The Christian Science Monitor.

Original Text: Record Labels Support Filesharing Three major record companies have signed on to a new service which will allow their music to be sold via file-swapping. The new project is an attempt to lure fans away from filesharing services which are technically
Translation: Las Discográficas Apoyan el Intercambio de Archivos: Tres grandes compañías discográficas se han unido a un nuevo servicio que permitirá vender su música a través del intercambio de archivos. El nuevo proyecto es un intento de atraer a los fanáticos lejos de los servicios de intercambio de archivos que técnicamente
Paraphrase 1: 1. Three prominent record companies have agreed to a new service enabling the sale of their music through file-swapping. This project is a new effort to attract fans from technically file sharing services, which are fully supported by record labels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Record labels are backing file sharing, with three leading companies joining a new service that facilitates their music sale through file-swapping. This new initiative aims to divert fans from such file-sharing platforms which are technically oriented.

Original Text: CA #39;s Open-Source Ingres Now Available The company is shipping the open-source database for Linux and Windows to revive its usage. By Darrell Dunn. Computer Associates on Monday will take the next step in its open-source strategy with the announcement
Translation: El Open-Source Ingres de CA # 39 ya está disponible. La compañía está distribuyendo la base de datos de código abierto para Linux y Windows para revivir su uso. Por Darrell Dunn. El lunes, Computer Associates dará el siguiente paso en su estrategia de código abierto con el anuncio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Computer Associates will reveal the latest move in their open-source approach on Monday, when they announce the launch of their Open-Source Ingres for use on Linux and Windows systems, in a bid to stimulate its use. The proposition comes from Darrell Dunn.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Computer Associates is set to take its open-source plan to the next level by unveiling the availability of its Open-Source Ingres. The open-source database will be shipped for usage with Linux and Windows to rejuvenate its application, as reported by Darrell Dunn.

Original Text: Japan to Seek Missile Info at Talks with N.Korea Japan will seek an explanation at weekend talks with North Korea on activity indicating Pyongyang may be preparing a missile test, although Tokyo does not think a launch is imminent, Japan #39;s top government spokesman said.
Translation: Japón buscará información sobre misiles en las conversaciones con Corea del Norte. Japón buscará una explicación en las conversaciones del fin de semana con Corea del Norte sobre la actividad que indica que Pyongyang podría estar preparando una prueba de misiles, aunque Tokio no cree que un lanzamiento sea inminente, dijo el portavoz principal del gobierno de Japón.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the forthcoming weekend discussions with North Korea, Japan aims to clarify Pyongyang's activities that signal a potential missile test preparation, even though Tokyo anticipates no immediate launch, as stated by Japan's chief government spokesperson.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As declared by Japan's top government spokesman, despite no immediate launch feared by Tokyo, Japan will seek clarification on North Korea's suspected missile test preparations during scheduled talks over the weekend.

Original Text: Harrington Plays Second Fiddle to Quarterback Cousin  BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - As Europe's  top-ranked golfer, Padraig Harrington might well have expected  the sight of autograph seekers as he went through his first  Ryder Cup practice round on Tuesday.
Translation: Harrington Juega un Segundo Plano para su Primo Quarterback BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - Como el golfista mejor clasificado de Europa, Padraig Harrington bien podría haber esperado la vista de buscadores de autógrafos mientras realizaba su primera ronda de práctica de la Ryder Cup el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - Despite being Europe's best-ranked golfer, Padraig Harrington wasn't surprised to witness autograph hunters during his inaugural Ryder Cup practice session on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan (Reuters) - As the highest-ranking golfer in Europe, Padraig Harrington's first Ryder Cup practice round on Tuesday inevitably attracted autograph collectors.

Original Text: Astros, the opportunity to pitch his team into the World Series. <b>...</b> down to walk-off home runs. St. Louis won the first two contests at Busch. when Jeff Kent belted a three-run homer in the bottom of the ninth.
Translation: Astros, la oportunidad de lanzar a su equipo a la Serie Mundial. <b>...</b> hasta los jonrones de caminar a casa. San Luis ganó los dos primeros encuentros en Busch. Cuando Jeff Kent conectó un jonrón de tres carreras en la parte baja de la novena.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Astros had the chance to propel their team into the World Series but ended up losing to walk-off home runs. Despite St. Louis winning the first two games at Busch, Jeff Kent made a comeback with a three-run homer in the bottom of the ninth.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Astros were given a chance to carry their team into the World Series, but walk-off home runs defeated them. The first two matches at Busch were won by St. Louis, until a three-run homer was hit by Jeff Kent in the bottom of the ninth.

Original Text: Time Warner Shares Rise on Talks Report  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Shares of Time Warner Inc <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=TWX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">TWX.N</A> rose  2 percent on Tuesday after a report that the world's largest  media company was near a settlement with regulators that could  limit potential shareholder lawsuits over probes into  accounting at its America Online unit.
Translation: Las acciones de Time Warner suben tras informe sobre conversaciones NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de Time Warner Inc TWX.N subieron un 2 por ciento el martes después de un informe que indicaba que la compañía de medios más grande del mundo estaba cerca de un acuerdo con los reguladores que podría limitar las posibles demandas de los accionistas sobre investigaciones en la contabilidad de su unidad America Online.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a report suggesting the impending settlement with regulators that may curb potential shareholder lawsuits related to the America Online unit's accounting investigation, shares of Time Warner Inc, the world's biggest media corporation, increased by 2% on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Time Warner Inc, witnessed a 2% rise in its shares triggered by a report stating that the largest media company globally is close to reaching a deal with regulators, effectively limiting potential investor litigations concerning accounting probes in its America Online division.

Original Text: The Red Sox-Cardinals Legacy Description: A look at the Boston Red Sox and St. Louis Cardinals in the World Series, past and present. The Red Sox and this evening and same date on the last day in the season players on a nice day between a Polish champagne.
Translation: Descripción del Legado de los Red Sox-Cardinals: Un vistazo a los Boston Red Sox y los St. Louis Cardinals en la Serie Mundial, pasado y presente. Los Red Sox y esta noche y la misma fecha en el último día de la temporada, jugadores en un bonito día entre un champán polaco.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Legacy Overview of Red Sox-Cardinals: An exploration of the past and present World Series games between the Boston Red Sox and St. Louis Cardinals. Together with the Red Sox, this evening and on the season's last date, players enjoy a fine day with Polish champagne.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Legacy of Red Sox-Cardinals: Examining the history and present of the World Series, featuring the Boston Red Sox and St. Louis Cardinals. The Red Sox and the season's concluding date witness players relishing a pleasant day with Polish Champagne this evening.

Original Text: Orthodox Church leader dies in helicopter accident (AFP) AFP - The Patriarch of Alexandria, Peter VII, one of the most senior figures in the Greek Orthodox Church, was killed along with 16 others in a helicopter crash in the Aegean Sea, Church sources said.
Translation: Líder de la Iglesia Ortodoxa muere en accidente de helicóptero (AFP) AFP - El Patriarca de Alejandría, Pedro VII, una de las figuras más destacadas de la Iglesia Ortodoxa Griega, murió junto con otras 16 personas en un accidente de helicóptero en el Mar Egeo, según informaron fuentes de la Iglesia.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP reports that the Greek Orthodox Church's Patriarch of Alexandria, Peter VII, a highly esteemed figure, tragically died in a helicopter crash in the Aegean Sea along with 16 other individuals, according to Church insiders.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Peter VII, the Patriarch of Alexandria, is among the 17 fatalities of a helicopter accident in the Aegean Sea. This is a significant loss for the Greek Orthodox Church, as Peter was one of its most prominent leaders, Church authorities informed AFP.

Original Text: OPEC Poised to Stamp Out Excess Supply (Reuters) Reuters - OPEC oil producers were poised on Friday\to stamp out excess supply that has lowered world prices from\record highs.
Translation: La OPEP lista para eliminar el exceso de suministro (Reuters) Reuters - Los productores de petróleo de la OPEP estaban listos el viernes para erradicar el exceso de suministro que ha reducido los precios mundiales desde máximos históricos.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) On Friday, OPEC oil producers were set to eradicate the surplus supply that led to a decrease in global prices from their peak level.
Paraphrase 2: (Reuters) The excess supply causing the reduction of world prices from their record highs was set to be eradicated by OPEC oil producers on Friday.

Original Text: Private Rocket Ship Earns \$10 Million in New Space Race A private rocket ship shot into space on Monday morning and won a coveted \$10 million aviation prize for its creators.
Translation: Cohete Privado Gana \$10 Millones en Nueva Carrera Espacial Un cohete privado fue lanzado al espacio el lunes por la mañana y ganó un codiciado premio aeroespacial de \$10 millones para sus creadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A private rocket ship, launched into space on Monday morning, clinched a sought-after aviation award of $10 million for its manufacturers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The creators of a private rocket ship were awarded a prestigious $10 million aviation prize after it successfully launched into space on Monday morning.

Original Text: Sun: UltraSparc IV doubles server oomph Sun Microsystems on Tuesday will detail "Panther," which promises more high-speed cache memory and higher clock speeds.
Translation: Sol: UltraSparc IV duplica la potencia del servidor. Sun Microsystems detallará el martes "Panther", que promete más memoria caché de alta velocidad y velocidades de reloj más altas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Tuesday, Sun Microsystems is set to provide more specific information about "Panther" - a development that ensures more high-speed cache memory and elevated clock speeds, thereby doubling server performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2) With the introduction of "Panther" promising higher clock speeds and more high-speed cache memory, Sun Microsystems is geared up to double server efficacy this Tuesday.

Original Text: Battle ended with a single phone call Oracles 18-month hostile takeover battle for PeopleSoft came to an end on Friday evening with a single phone call. A PeopleSoft director, through an attorney, contacted Oracle with the lucky number: \$26.50
Translation: La batalla terminó con una sola llamada telefónica. La batalla hostil de 18 meses de Oracle por tomar el control de PeopleSoft llegó a su fin el viernes por la noche con una sola llamada telefónica. Un director de PeopleSoft, a través de un abogado, contactó a Oracle con el número afortunado: \$26.50
Paraphrase 1: 1. Oracle's hostile takeover battle for PeopleSoft, which lasted 18 months, concluded on Friday evening when an attorney representing a PeopleSoft director called Oracle with the final figure of $26.50.
