Paraphrase 2: 2. After an 18-month long hostile takeover battle for PeopleSoft, Oracle saw an end to the struggle on a Friday evening when a single phone call was received, conveying the crucial figure of $26.50 from a PeopleSoft director via his lawyer.

Original Text: Santomero Says Rates 'Still Stimulative' (Reuters) Reuters - U.S. interest rates are still\stimulative but should return to "more normal levels" as\expansion continues, Philadelphia Federal Reserve President\Anthony Santomero said on Saturday.
Translation: Santomero Dice que las Tasas 'Siguen siendo Estimulativas' (Reuters) Reuters - Las tasas de interés de EE.UU. todavía son estimulativas pero deberían volver a "niveles más normales" a medida que continúe la expansión, dijo el sábado el presidente de la Reserva Federal de Filadelfia, Anthony Santomero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Philadelphia Federal Reserve President, Anthony Santomero, stated on Saturday that U.S. interest rates continue to be stimulative, but should revert to "more normal levels" as the economy carries on expanding, Reuters reported.
Paraphrase 2: 2. U.S. interest rates remain stimulative, however, Anthony Santomero, President of the Philadelphia Federal Reserve, believes that they should return to "more normal levels" amidst continuing expansion, as reported by Reuters on Saturday.

Original Text: Constellation Bids \$970 Mln for Mondavi  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Constellation Brands Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=STZ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">STZ.N</A> on  Tuesday said it launched an unsolicited \$970 million offer for  Robert Mondavi Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MOND.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MOND.O</A>, which is in the midst of a  management shake-up and shifting corporate strategy, in a bid  to bolster its wine portfolio.
Translation: Constellation ofrece 970 millones de dólares por Mondavi NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Constellation Brands Inc. STZ.N dijo el martes que lanzó una oferta no solicitada de 970 millones de dólares para Robert Mondavi Corp. MOND.O, que está en medio de un reajuste de gestión y cambio de estrategia corporativa, en un intento por reforzar su cartera de vinos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the ongoing management reorganization and shifting corporate strategy of Robert Mondavi Corp., an unsolicited offer of $970 million has been proposed by Constellation Brands Inc. on Tuesday to strengthen their wine portfolio.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the motive of enhancing its wine assortment, Constellation Brands Inc. announced an unexpected bid of $970 million for Robert Mondavi Corp. on Tuesday, a company currently undergoing a management overhaul and strategic change.

Original Text: Microsoft's Xbox Live Usage Takes Off in Asia  HONG KONG (Reuters) - One-in-seven Asian Xbox video gamers  plays on the Internet just six months after the regional launch  of Microsoft's Xbox Live Internet software, a company executive  said on Wednesday.
Translation: El uso de Xbox Live de Microsoft despega en Asia HONG KONG (Reuters) - Uno de cada siete jugadores de videojuegos de Xbox en Asia juega en Internet solo seis meses después del lanzamiento regional del software de Internet Xbox Live de Microsoft, dijo un ejecutivo de la empresa el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) HONG KONG (Reuters) - A Microsoft executive confirmed on Wednesday that, within six months of Xbox Live Internet software's regional launch in Asia, one out of every seven Asian Xbox video gamers has begun playing on the Internet.
Paraphrase 2: 2) HONG KONG (Reuters) - Six months post the regional launch of Microsoft's Xbox Live Internet software and one-in-seven Asian Xbox video gamers have already started online playing, as reported by a company executive on Wednesday.

Original Text: IBM in server joint venture with China Great Wall Computer (AFP) AFP - China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co Ltd has signed an agreement to establish a new joint venture with IBM to produce computer servers for the Asian region, the company said.
Translation: IBM en empresa conjunta de servidores con China Great Wall Computer (AFP)  AFP - China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co Ltd ha firmado un acuerdo para establecer una nueva empresa conjunta con IBM para producir servidores de computadora para la región asiática, dijo la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP reports that China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co Ltd has entered into an agreement with IBM for a joint venture. This collaboration is aimed at manufacturing computer servers for the Asian market, as confirmed by the company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A joint venture to manufacture computer servers for the Asian region has been established between China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co Ltd and IBM, as reported by AFP and officially announced by the company.

Original Text: World icons Hamm, Foudy take their last kicks tonight After 18 years, 785 games, 230 goals, two Women #39;s World Cup championships, two Olympics gold medals - and an unparalleled sociological legacy - Mia Hamm, Julie Foudy
Translation: Íconos mundiales Hamm, Foudy dan sus últimas patadas esta noche. Después de 18 años, 785 partidos, 230 goles, dos campeonatos de la Copa Mundial Femenina, dos medallas de oro en los Juegos Olímpicos - y un legado sociológico sin paralelo - Mia Hamm, Julie Foudy.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After 18 years where they played 785 games, scored 230 goals, won two Women's World Cup championships and two Olympic gold medals - leaving an unmatched sociological legacy - Mia Hamm and Julie Foudy, world icon footballers, are set for their final performance tonight.

Original Text: Genetic Factors Influence Male Homosexuality-Study (Reuters) Reuters - Genetic factors, along with cultural and\early experiences, influence male homosexuality, Italian\scientists said on Wednesday.
Translation: Factores Genéticos Influyen en la Homosexualidad Masculina-Estudio (Reuters) Reuters - Los factores genéticos, junto con la cultura y las experiencias tempranas, influyen en la homosexualidad masculina, dijeron científicos italianos el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - Italian scientists asserted on Wednesday that male homosexuality is influenced by genetic factors, as well as cultural and early life experiences.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - According to Italian researchers on Wednesday, both genetic factors and aspects such as cultural exposure and experiences during formative years play a role in affecting male homosexuality.

Original Text: Cincinnati Reds Re-Sign Catcher LaRue (AP) AP - Catcher Jason LaRue and the Cincinnati Reds agreed Friday to a  #36;3 million, one-year contract, a  #36;400,000 raise.
Translation: Los Rojos de Cincinnati vuelven a contratar al receptor LaRue (AP) AP - El receptor Jason LaRue y los Rojos de Cincinnati acordaron el viernes un contrato de un año por #36;3 millones, un aumento de #36;400,000.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to AP, Catcher Jason LaRue has accepted a one-year contract with the Cincinnati Reds on Friday, for a sum of #36;3 million, increasing his pay by #36;400,000.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AP reports that the Cincinnati Reds and their Catcher Jason LaRue have reached an agreement for a #36;3 million, one-year contract on Friday, which is a #36;400,000 pay raise for him.

Original Text: SE Asia Forges Closer Ties with China, Japan, S.Korea Leaders of 13 Southeast and Northeast Asian states Monday underlined their determination to turn growing economic power into political influence by establishing a new summit-level grouping.
Translation: El sudeste de Asia estrecha lazos con China, Japón y líderes de Corea del Sur. El lunes, los líderes de 13 estados del sudeste y noreste de Asia subrayaron su determinación para convertir su creciente poder económico en influencia política mediante la creación de un nuevo grupo de nivel cumbre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Leaders from 13 Southeast and Northeast Asian countries emphasized their resolve on Monday to leverage their increasing economic power into political influence by initiating a new summit-level alliance, fostering tighter connections with China, Japan, and South Korea.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, leaders of 13 Southeast and Northeast Asian nations confirmed their intent to convert their expanding economic strength into political power by creating a high-level summit group, further strengthening their bonds with China, Japan, and South Korea.

Original Text: From soup to nuts with Microsoft #8217;s collaboration chief <strong>Interview</strong> Anoop Gupta
Translation: Desde la sopa hasta las nueces con el jefe de colaboración de Microsoft #8217;s <strong>Entrevista</strong> Anoop Gupta
Paraphrase 1: 1) An exclusive interview with Anoop Gupta, Microsoft's collaboration chief, covering all aspects from soup to nuts.

Original Text: Mozilla could form base of a Google browser Analysts agree that it would be of little benefit for Google to create a browser from scratch, but it could add value by adding components onto the open-source browser Mozilla.
Translation: Mozilla podría formar la base de un navegador de Google. Los analistas coinciden en que sería de poco beneficio para Google crear un navegador desde cero, pero podría agregar valor añadiendo componentes al navegador de código abierto Mozilla.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts concur that creating a browser from the ground up would offer minimal advantage for Google, but they could augment its value by enhancing the open-source browser Mozilla with additional components.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is generally agreed upon by analysts that Google would gain little by building a browser from square one. However, there could be added value if they incorporated extra features into the open-source Mozilla browser.

Original Text: Creditors Wrap Up Sale of Hynix Chip Unit to Citigroup  quot;All administrative work has been completed to sell Hynix #39;s non-memory chip unit to Citigroup Venture Equity Partners LP, quot; Hynix #39;s primary creditor bank said.
Translation: Los acreedores concluyen la venta de la unidad de chips Hynix a Citigroup: "Todo el trabajo administrativo ha sido completado para vender la unidad de chips no memorables de Hynix a Citigroup Venture Equity Partners LP," dijo el banco acreedor principal de Hynix.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The main creditor bank of Hynix announced that all necessary paperwork has been finalized for the sale of Hynix's non-memory chip unit to Citigroup Venture Equity Partners LP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The sale of the non-memory chip unit of Hynix to Citigroup Venture Equity Partners LP has been fully facilitated, as all administrative tasks are finished, says Hynix's chief creditor bank.

Original Text: Sun closer to open source Solaris with draft license The ostensible confusion within Sun over the relationship between its first-born Solaris and sibling-rival Linux won #39;t be cleared up by the open source license it submitted to the Open Source Initiative (OSI).
Translation: Sun se acerca más a Solaris de código abierto con licencia preliminar. La confusión aparente dentro de Sun sobre la relación entre su primogénito Solaris y su rival hermano Linux no se aclarará con la licencia de código abierto que presentó a la Iniciativa de Código Abierto (OSI).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the apparent uncertainty within Sun about the relationship between its original product, Solaris, and its competitive sibling Linux, the open-source license it submitted to the Open Source Initiative (OSI) will not resolve the issue; this move does, however, brings Sun closer to making Solaris open-source.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sun's submission of an open-source license to the Open Source Initiative (OSI) will not dispel the evident confusion regarding the relationship between Solaris, its initial product, and Linux, its competing counterpart; though it signifies Sun's approach towards making Solaris open-source.

Original Text: Start-up banks on Java hardware boost Hardware expected to begin selling next year is designed to make it faster and more efficient to run Java programs.
Translation: Los bancos de inicio apuestan por el impulso del hardware de Java. Se espera que el hardware, que empezará a venderse el próximo año, esté diseñado para agilizar y hacer más eficiente la ejecución de programas Java.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The start-up is depending on the boost of Java hardware that is projected to start sales next year, which is designed to maximize efficiency and speed when running Java programs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A boost in Java hardware is what the start-up bank is relying on, with the hardware set to be sold next year and designed to optimise the running of Java programs for speed and efficiency.

Original Text: OPEC Raises Output by 1 Million bpd.; Tries to Gain Consumer <b>...</b> A meeting of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has resulted in an increase of the cartels official oil production ceiling by one million barrels per day (bpd).
Translation: La OPEP aumenta la producción en 1 millón de bpd.; Intenta ganar consumidores <b>...</b> Una reunión de la Organización de Países Exportadores de Petróleo (OPEP) ha resultado en un aumento del techo de producción oficial de petróleo del cártel en un millón de barriles por día (bpd).
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) implemented a surge in the official oil production roof by one million barrels per day (bpd) during a recent meeting.

Original Text: Williams to Fight World Champion Klitschko in New York World Boxing Council (WBC) heavyweight champion Vitali Klitschko will defend his title against Britain #39;s Danny Williams in New York on December 11, Williams #39;s promoter said on Thursday.
Translation: Williams peleará contra el campeón mundial Klitschko en el Consejo Mundial de Boxeo de Nueva York (WBC) El campeón de peso pesado Vitali Klitschko defenderá su título contra el británico Danny Williams en Nueva York el 11 de diciembre, dijo el promotor de Williams el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On December 11, Britain's Danny Williams will challenge the current World Boxing Council heavyweight champion, Vitali Klitschko, in New York. This was announced by Williams's promoter on Thursday.

Original Text: Leader seeks to end violence in Kashmir HYDERABAD -- Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, who heads for Kashmir on Wednesday, said yesterday his visit is aimed at putting an end to years of violence in the troubled Himalayan region. Singh's comments came as thousands of Kashmiri Muslims, scarred by 15 years of violence, celebrated Eid al-Fitr days after India announced it would reduce the number of troops in ...
Translation: El líder busca poner fin a la violencia en Cachemira HYDERABAD -- El Primer Ministro Manmohan Singh, quien se dirige a Cachemira el miércoles, dijo ayer que su visita tiene como objetivo poner fin a años de violencia en la problemática región del Himalaya. Los comentarios de Singh llegaron cuando miles de musulmanes cachemires, marcados por 15 años de violencia, celebraron el Eid al-Fitr días después de que India anunciara que reduciría el número de tropas en...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Original Text: Annan UN Council Should Vote 'Yes' on Sudan Draft (Reuters) Reuters - U.N. Secretary-General Kofi\Annan on Thursday threw his weight behind a U.S.-drafted\resolution on Sudan's Darfur region, saying the Security\Council should adopt it immediately to stop atrocities.
Translation: "Annan: El Consejo de la ONU debería votar 'Sí' al borrador sobre Sudán (Reuters) Reuters - El Secretario General de la ONU, Kofi Annan, el jueves respaldó una resolución redactada por EE.UU. sobre la región de Darfur en Sudán, diciendo que el Consejo de Seguridad debería adoptarla inmediatamente para detener las atrocidades."

Secretary-General Kofi Annan stood in support of a resolution proposed by the U.S. concerning the Darfur region in Sudan. To stop the ongoing atrocities, he stressed that the Security Council should promptly adopt the resolution.

Original Text: IATA Sees Strong Passenger, Cargo Growth International airline passenger numbers are set to grow by six per cent year-on-year to the end of 2008, driven by economic expansion in China and India, the industry #39;s global body IATA said on Wednesday.
Translation: La IATA ve a un fuerte crecimiento de pasajeros y carga. Se espera que el número internacional de pasajeros de aerolíneas crezca un seis por ciento interanual hasta finales de 2008, impulsado por la expansión económica en China e India, dijo el miércoles el organismo global de la industria, la IATA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As per a Wednesday announcement by IATA, the industry's global body, international air passenger numbers are anticipated to rise by six per cent yearly until the end of 2008, propelled by China's and India's economic growth.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Industry global body IATA announced on Wednesday that due to the economic growth in China and India, a strong growth in passenger and cargo is expected, with international airline passenger numbers expected to increase by six per cent year-on-year through the end of 2008.

Original Text: Hurricane Ivan Devastates Grenada ST. GEORGE #39;S, Grenada Sept. 8, 2004 - Hurricane Ivan made a direct hit on Grenada, killing at least three people as it turned concrete homes into piles of rubble and hurled the island #39;s landmark red zinc roofs through the air.
Translation: El huracán Iván Devasta Grenada ST. GEORGE'S, Grenada 8 de septiembre de 2004 - El huracán Iván golpeó directamente a Grenada, matando al menos a tres personas mientras convertía las casas de concreto en montones de escombros y lanzaba los emblemáticos techos de zinc rojo de la isla por el aire.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On September 8, 2004, Grenada was severely hit by Hurricane Ivan, resulting in at least three fatalities. This direct hit turned the island's concrete houses into debris and cast its iconic red zinc roofs into the sky, exhibiting its destructive power in St. George's, Grenada.
Paraphrase 2: 2. St. George's, Grenada witnessed the horrific devastation caused by Hurricane Ivan on September 8, 2004. The hurricane's brute force killed at least three individuals, transformed concrete residences into mere rubble, and catapulted the island's distinctive red zinc rooftops through the air.

Original Text: New Hope in the Fight Against Breast Cancer Mammograms have become a rite of passage for 40-year-old American women, and a compulsory exercise for those over 40. But as rote as those annual screenings might seem, there's nothing routine about a diagnosis of breast cancer.
Translation: Nueva Esperanza en la Lucha Contra el Cáncer de Mama. Las mamografías se han convertido en un rito de iniciación para las mujeres americanas de 40 años, y un ejercicio obligatorio para aquellas mayores de 40. Pero por rutinarias que puedan parecer esas revisiones anuales, no hay nada rutinario en un diagnóstico de cáncer de mama.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mammograms, a familiar procedure for American women starting from the age of 40 and mandatory for those above 40, have taken on a significant role in combating breast cancer. Regardless of the routine nature of these annual check-ups, receiving a breast cancer diagnosis is always a notable event.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As American women cross the threshold of 40, they often start their journey of annual mammograms, becoming compulsory for those above 40, marking a new hope in battling breast cancer. Nevertheless, despite the regularity of these screenings, a breast cancer diagnosis is far from ordinary.

Original Text: Brand name isn #39;t always better _ at least when it comes to <b>...</b> Chances are, if your employees are using Microsoft Corp. #39;s Internet Explorer to surf the Web or Outlook to check e-mail, your company is more exposed to viruses and spyware, some security experts say.

Original Text: Serena, Sharapova move into Beijing quarters Beijing, China (Sports Network) - Top-seeded American Serena Williams and Wimbledon winner Maria Sharapova of Russia both posted second-round wins Wednesday and moved into the quarterfinals at the inaugural \$585,000 China Open.
Translation: Serena, Sharapova avanzan a cuartos de final en Beijing, China (Red Deportiva) - La estadounidense Serena Williams, cabeza de serie, y la ganadora de Wimbledon, Maria Sharapova de Rusia, ambos lograron victorias en la segunda ronda el miércoles y avanzaron a los cuartos de final en el torneo inaugural de \$585,000 del Abierto de China.

(Sports Network, Beijing, China) - Serena Williams, America's top-seeded player, along with Russia's Maria Sharapova, who won at Wimbledon, both advanced to the quarterfinals of the inaugural China Open, which has a prize money of $585,000, following their victories in the second round on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Both the No.1 American seed, Serena Williams, and the champion of Wimbledon, Maria Sharapova from Russia, recorded second-round victories on Wednesday, progressing to the quarterfinals of the debut China Open in Beijing, a tournament with a prize pool of $585,000. (Sports Network, Beijing, China)

Translation: Kodak, IBM fabricarán sensores para cámaras digitales ROCHESTER, NY Kodak e IBM han acordado desarrollar y fabricar sensores de imagen para cámaras digitales y teléfonos con cámara. Original Text: Al-Qaida Magazine Appeals to Iraq Fighters (AP) AP - An online al-Qaida magazine is urging Sunni Muslim fighters in Iraq to join hands with Osama bin Laden to defeat its enemies.
Translation: Revista de Al-Qaida hace un llamado a los combatientes en Irak (AP) AP - Una revista en línea de al-Qaida está instando a los combatientes musulmanes sunitas en Irak a unir fuerzas con Osama bin Laden para derrotar a sus enemigos.

Original Text: China Rejects Powell Call for Dialogue with Taiwan China rejected on Wednesday Secretary of State Colin Powell #39;s call to resume dialogue with Taipei, saying Taiwan President Chen Shui-bian #39;s overtures
Translation: China rechaza el llamado de Powell al diálogo con Taiwán. China rechazó el miércoles el llamado del Secretario de Estado Colin Powell a reanudar el diálogo con Taipei, diciendo que los acercamientos del Presidente de Taiwán, Chen Shui-bian,
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, China dismissed Secretary of State Colin Powell's request to recommence dialogue with Taipei, asserting that Taiwan President Chen Shui-bian's advances are unacceptable.

Original Text: Consumer Confidence Falls Again in Sept. US consumer confidence edged lower again in September after falling in August, as persistent worries about the job market weighed on sentiment, a report on Tuesday said.
Translation: La Confianza del Consumidor Cae Nuevamente en Septiembre. La confianza del consumidor en los EE.UU. disminuyó ligeramente de nuevo en septiembre después de haber caído en agosto, ya que las preocupaciones persistentes sobre el mercado laboral afectaron el sentimiento, según un informe del martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A report on Tuesday revealed that US consumer confidence experienced another decline in September following a drop in August, with enduring concerns about the job market dampening sentiment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Persistent concerns about the job market resulted in a further decrease in US consumer confidence in September, following a dip in August, according to a Tuesday report.

Original Text: ICC Champions Trophy final today LONDON: England seeks to cap a successful summer with its first major one-day cricket tournament win when it faces the West Indies in the Champions Trophy final today at the Oval.
Translation: Final del Trofeo de Campeones de la ICC hoy LONDRES: Inglaterra busca culminar un verano exitoso con su primera gran victoria en un torneo de cricket de un día cuando se enfrente a las Indias Occidentales en la final del Trofeo de Campeones hoy en el Oval.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON: The Champions Trophy final is today, and England is hoping to conclude a triumphant summer season with a victory in their premier one-day cricket competition. They will compete against the West Indies at the Oval.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Oval today, England aims to wrap up a prosperous summer by achieving their first significant triumph in a one-day cricket tournament, the Champions Trophy final. They are set to go up against the West Indies in LONDON.

Translation: GM, luchando en Europa, establece grandes recortes de empleos. Europa ha sido un lugar frío para los fabricantes de automóviles estadounidenses en los últimos años. El jueves, la Corporación General Motors dejó claro cuán frío, al anunciar que
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst challenges in Europe, General Motors Corporation announces substantial layoffs. The American carmaker illustrated the harsh climate endured by US auto manufacturers in Europe over recent years, announcing its targets on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Encountering hardships in Europe, General Motors Corporation takes decisive action with massive job reductions. It unveiled on Thursday the severity of the situation, reflecting the recent years of difficulty for American carmakers in Europe.

Original Text: Digital Angel Renews Distribution Deal Digital Angel Corp., which makes implantable microchips used to track animals, said Thursday that it renewed a contract with a unit of Schering-Plough Corp. for exclusive distribution of its US pet-identification products.
Translation: Digital Angel renueva acuerdo de distribución. Digital Angel Corp., que fabrica microchips implantables utilizados para rastrear animales, anunció el jueves que renovó un contrato con una unidad de Schering-Plough Corp. para la distribución exclusiva de sus productos de identificación de mascotas en Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Digital Angel Corp., a manufacturer of implantable microchips for animal tracking, announced the renewal of an exclusive US pet-identification products distribution contract with a Schering-Plough Corp. subsidiary.

Original Text: SUPERWEBINAR: Cisco #39;s 40-Gig CRS-1- Light Reading Test Results Overview: This webinar will provide insight into the results of the first independent industry evaluation of Cisco #39;s 40-Gig core router, the Carrier Routing System (CRS-1).

Translation: McDonald #39; s designa a Destiny #39; s Child Company, nombrando al trío femenino de pop como la nueva cara de la campaña de marketing para ampliar el atractivo entre los niños y las madres. LOS ÁNGELES (Reuters) - Corp de McDonald #39; s.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an endeavor to enhance their appeal among children and mothers, McDonald's Corporation engages Destiny's Child Company and appoints the famed female pop trio as the fresh representatives of their marketing campaign. (Reuters, Los Angeles)

Original Text: Sri Lanka should be easy pickings Modest mission accomplished against Zimbabwe, England are through to what is in effect a quarter-final against Sri Lanka at the Rose Bowl on Friday.
Translation: Sri Lanka debería ser presa fácil. Misión modesta cumplida contra Zimbabwe, Inglaterra ha avanzado a lo que en efecto es un cuarto de final contra Sri Lanka en el Rose Bowl el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After their modest achievement against Zimbabwe, England has advanced to something akin to a quarter-final against Sri Lanka at the Rose Bowl on Friday. It is expected that the match against Sri Lanka would be comparatively easy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having successfully completed a modest assignment against Zimbabwe, England now moves towards what can be compared to a quarter-final against Sri Lanka, scheduled at the Rose Bowl on Friday. This game is predicted to be relatively easy for them.

Original Text: US tech execs more optimistic about spending: Study New York, August 31: US technology executives are increasingly optimistic about the business climate, although plans for increased technology spending remain modest, according to a study released on Monday.
Translation: Los ejecutivos de tecnología de EE.UU. cada vez más optimistas acerca del gasto: Estudio Nueva York, 31 de agosto: Los ejecutivos de tecnología de Estados Unidos están cada vez más optimistas acerca del clima de negocios, aunque los planes para aumentar el gasto en tecnología siguen siendo moderados, según un estudio publicado el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: New York, August 31: A recent study released on Monday suggests that, despite their plans for technology expenditure remaining moderate, US technology executives are becoming more positive about the business landscape.
Paraphrase 2: Monday's study reveals a growing optimism among US technology executives about the business climate, while their planned increase in technology expenses stays modest, New York, August 31.

Original Text: Tariff raises financial hopes for area shrimpers Carolinas fishermen and those in the shrimp industry hope tariffs on imported shrimp, passed Tuesday by the Commerce Department, will boost the prices local shrimpers get for their catch.
Translation: La tarifa aumenta las esperanzas financieras para los camarones de la zona. Los pescadores de las Carolinas y aquellos en la industria del camarón esperan que las tarifas sobre los camarones importados, aprobadas el martes por el Departamento de Comercio, aumenten los precios que los camarones locales obtienen por su captura.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Carolinas fishermen and those belonging to the shrimp industry are hoping for financial enhancement through tariffs on imported shrimp approved on Tuesday by the Commerce Department. They foresee this move could increase the rates local shrimpers receive for their harvest.

Original Text: Suicide blast toll rises, Afghan poll count near end An American woman and an Afghan girl died from wounds suffered in a Taliban suicide attack in a popular Kabul shopping street, US embassy and hospital officials said on Sunday.
Translation: El número de víctimas por explosión suicida aumenta, recuento de votos casi finalizado en Afganistán. Una mujer estadounidense y una niña afgana murieron a causa de las heridas sufridas en un ataque suicida de los Talibanes en una popular calle comercial de Kabul, informaron el domingo funcionarios de la embajada estadounidense y del hospital.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An American woman and an Afghan girl succumbed to their injuries on Sunday resulting from a Taliban suicide blast in a bustling shopping street in Kabul. The death count is rising as the Afghan poll tally nears completion, as confirmed by US embassy and hospital officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US embassy and hospital officials revealed on Sunday that a suicide attack conducted by the Taliban in a widely-frequented shopping street in Kabul led to the deaths of an American woman and an Afghan girl. This news came as the tallying process for the Afghan polls drew close to its conclusion, escalating the overall death toll.

Original Text: Music industry asks Napster founder, former arch foe, for help LOS ANGELES: The recording industry has turned to its former arch-nemesis, the founder of online music file-swapping service Napster, to help it beat the piracy that it once accused him of spawning.
Translation: La industria musical pide ayuda al fundador de Napster, antiguo archienemigo, en LOS ÁNGELES: La industria discográfica ha recurrido a su antiguo archienemigo, el fundador del servicio de intercambio de archivos de música en línea Napster, para ayudarla a combatir la piratería de la que una vez lo acusó de generar.
Paraphrase 1: LOS ANGELES: The creator of Napster, once regarded as the music industry's chief adversary, is now sought by the recording industry for assistance in combating the very piracy they previously accused him of instigating.
Paraphrase 2: The founder of Napster, previously labeled as the music industry's main rival, is now being approached by the recording industry in Los Angeles to assist in fighting the piracy they believed he once encouraged.

Original Text: Nigerian Govt Aims to Avert Strike  ABUJA (Reuters) - The Nigerian government agreed to cut  gasoline pump prices by 8 percent on Monday and called on  unions to call off an indefinite general strike over fuel due  to start on Tuesday, a top lawmaker said.
Translation: El Gobierno Nigeriano Busca Evitar la Huelga ABUJA (Reuters) - El gobierno nigeriano acordó reducir los precios de la gasolina en un 8 por ciento el lunes y llamó a los sindicatos a cancelar una huelga general indefinida por el combustible que se prevé comience el martes, dijo un alto legislador.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A prominent legislator stated that the Nigerian government, in a bid to prevent an indefinite general strike scheduled to start on Tuesday, consented on Monday to an 8 percent reduction in gasoline pump prices and urged the unions to halt their strike.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To avoid the commencement of an indefinite general strike by unions on Tuesday, the Nigerian government took the step of reducing gasoline pump prices by 8 percent on Monday, according to a senior lawmaker. They also appealed to the unions to discontinue the planned strike.

Original Text: Bucs outrun Chiefs If every Sunday was Christmas and every defense had as many holes as the Kansas City Chiefs, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers would regularly be racking up five touchdowns, 418 total yards, 130 yards
Translation: Los Bucs superan a los Chiefs. Si cada domingo fuera Navidad y cada defensa tuviera tantos huecos como los Kansas City Chiefs, los Tampa Bay Buccaneers estarían anotando regularmente cinco touchdowns, acumulando 418 yardas en total y 130 yardas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If every Sunday resembled Christmas, and all defenses were as gap-riddled as the Kansas City Chiefs, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers would consistently accumulate five touchdowns, along with 418 total yards and 130 yards in their running games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Should each Sunday equate to Christmas and all other defenses mirror the porousness of the Kansas City Chiefs, then Tampa Bay Buccaneers would unfailingly score five touchdowns and amass 418 total yards and 130 running yards on a regular basis.

And it saves money to boot, says Dr...
Translation:
Nuevo Anticoagulante Salva Vidas y Dinero Por Ed Edelson, Reportero de HealthDay

Y de paso, también ahorra dinero, dice el Dr...
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a study reported by Ed Edelson, HealthDay Reporter, a new anti-clotting drug has multiple benefits. The drug, which is used for artery-opening procedures, not only reduces the rate of complications but also shortens hospital stays, which likely improves survival rates. In addition, Dr... highlighted that the drug also brings about financial savings.

Original Text: State police look for answers behind former NFL player #39;s death HERKIMER, NY -- State police said Friday they may never know what pushed a former NFL player to lead them on a dramatic highway chase ending with a fiery head-on crash that took his life.
Translation: La policía estatal busca respuestas tras la muerte del exjugador de la NFL número 39 en HERKIMER, NY -- La policía estatal dijo el viernes que puede que nunca sepan qué impulsó a un exjugador de la NFL a liderar una persecución dramática en la autopista que terminó con un choque frontal en llamas que le quitó la vida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Herkimer, NY -- State police announced Friday that the reasons prompting a former NFL player to initiate an intense highway pursuit that culminated in a fatal head-on collision might forever remain a mystery. They're seeking to understand the circumstances surrounding his death.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Herkimer, NY, authorities admitted on Friday that the motives of a past NFL athlete, who led them on a high-speed car chase before dying in a fiery crash, may continue to elude them. They are investigating the details surrounding the ex-player's tragic demise.

Original Text: Burst.com Claims Microsoft Destroyed Evidence Top managers at Microsoft told employees to destroy evidence contained in old e-mail during 2000, even as the company faced several antitrust lawsuits at the time, court documents filed by Burst.
Translation: Burst.com Acusa a Microsoft de Destruir Pruebas. Los altos directivos de Microsoft ordenaron a los empleados destruir pruebas contenidas en correos electrónicos antiguos durante el año 2000, incluso cuando la compañía enfrentaba varias demandas antimonopolio en ese momento, según documentos judiciales presentados por Burst.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Court documents filed by Burst.com allege that Microsoft's top executives instructed their staff to get rid of evidence in old emails in 2000, at a time when the company was embroiled in numerous antitrust cases.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During 2000, amidst a number of antitrust lawsuits against Microsoft, the company's high-ranking officials allegedly directed workers to eliminate evidence stored in old emails, according to court filings by Burst.com.

Original Text: Thaksin to meet Malaysian, Indonesian leaders about Muslim unrest VIENTIANE (AFP): Thailand #39;s prime minister will meet the leaders of Malaysia and Indonesia on Sunday to explain his refusal to allow a major summit here to broach Muslim unrest in his country, an official said.
Translation: Thaksin se reunirá con los líderes de Malasia e Indonesia acerca de la inquietud musulmana VIENTIANE (AFP): El primer ministro de Tailandia se reunirá con los líderes de Malasia e Indonesia el domingo para explicar su negativa a permitir que se aborde la inquietud musulmana en su país en una cumbre importante aquí, dijo un funcionario.
Paraphrase 1: 1. VIENTIANE (AFP): An official has revealed that Thailand's prime minister is scheduled to meet with Malaysian and Indonesian leaders this Sunday, where he will clarify his refusal to discuss the Muslim unrest in his country at a major summit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. VIENTIANE (AFP): On Sunday, the Prime Minister of Thailand is expected to meet with his Malaysian and Indonesian counterparts, where he will elucidate his decision not to delve into the issue of Muslim unrest in his country during a major summit, according to an official statement.

Original Text: Abbas promises to coordinate with Syria A top-level Palestinian delegation yesterday promised Syria #39;s leader that it would coordinate with the country in future peace negotiations with Israel, but stopped short
Translation: Abbas promete coordinar con Siria Un alto nivel de la delegación palestina prometió ayer al líder de Siria que se coordinaría con el país en futuras negociaciones de paz con Israel, pero se quedó corto
Paraphrase 1: 1. A high-ranking Palestinian delegation, while limiting their commitment, vowed to collaborate with Syria during future peace talks with Israel, as promised by Abbas yesterday.

Original Text: UnitedHealth to Buy Definity Health UnitedHealth Group Inc. (UNH.N: Quote, Profile, Research) on Monday said it would buy Definity Health Corp. for \$300 million, as the No.
Translation: UnitedHealth comprará Definity Health. UnitedHealth Group Inc. (UNH.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) dijo el lunes que comprará Definity Health Corp. por 300 millones de dólares, posicionándose como el número uno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, UnitedHealth Group Inc. announced their plans to acquire Definity Health Corp. for $300 million, making its mark as the No.

Original Text: MLB: Cincinnati 6, Chicago Cubs 5 Wily Mo Pena hit two home runs Saturday to give the Cincinnati Reds a 6-5 victory over the Chicago Cubs. D #39;Angelo Jimenez also homered for the Reds, who snapped a three-game losing streak.
Translation: MLB: Cincinnati 6, Chicago Cubs 5 Wily Mo Pena bateó dos jonrones el sábado para darle a los Cincinnati Reds una victoria de 6-5 sobre los Chicago Cubs. D#39;Angelo Jiménez también bateó un jonrón para los Reds, quienes rompieron una racha de tres derrotas consecutivas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday, Wily Mo Pena contributed two home runs leading to the Cincinnati Reds' 6-5 win against the Chicago Cubs, ending the Reds' three-game downfall in MLB. D'Angelo Jimenez added to this achievement by also hitting a home run for the Reds.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the MLB, Cincinnati Reds achieved a 6-5 win over Chicago Cubs, thanks to Wily Mo Pena's two home runs last Saturday. The victory marked the end of the Reds' three-game losing run, which was further highlighted by a home run from D'Angelo Jimenez.

Original Text: Dollar gains after G-7 meetingCurrency market awaits US payrolls <b>...</b> CHICAGO (CBS.MW) - The dollar moved higher Monday in the wake of little new policy direction from a weekend meeting of finance ministers and central bankers from the world #39;s economic powers.
Translation: El dólar se fortalece después de la reunión del G-7. El mercado de divisas espera las nóminas de pago de EE. UU. ... CHICAGO (CBS.MW) - El dólar se fortaleció el lunes a raíz de la escasa nueva dirección política de una reunión de fin de semana de ministros de finanzas y banqueros centrales de las principales potencias económicas del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the G-7 meeting, the dollar surges, with the currency market eagerly waiting for US payrolls. The Monday saw a rise in the dollar, with not much new policy direction emerging from a weekend gathering of finance ministers and central bankers from the globe's economic powerhouses (CHICAGO, CBS.MW).
Paraphrase 2: 2. The dollar experienced a boost following a G-7 meeting, as the currency market anticipated US payrolls. Despite a lack of new policy guidance from a weekend convention of global economic leaders, comprising of finance ministers and central bankers, the dollar still managed to escalate on Monday (CHICAGO, CBS.MW).

Original Text: Stocks drop as wholesale prices surge A huge jump in wholesale prices sent stocks falling yesterday as investors worried that rising oil prices were taking a toll on the overall economy.
Translation: Las acciones caen a medida que los precios al por mayor se disparan. Un enorme aumento en los precios al por mayor provocó una caída en las acciones ayer, ya que los inversores estaban preocupados de que el aumento de los precios del petróleo estuviera afectando a la economía en general.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A significant increase in wholesale prices yesterday caused a decline in stocks, with investors expressing concern that the escalating oil prices might be negatively impacting the overall economy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, following a significant surge in wholesale prices, the stocks took a dive as the climbing oil prices fuelled investor concerns regarding possible detrimental effects on the broader economy.

Original Text: Somalis vie to be new president Twenty-eight candidates are approved to contest next week's elections to be Somalia's new leader.
Translation: Los somalíes compiten para ser el nuevo presidente. Veintiocho candidatos han sido aprobados para participar en las elecciones de la próxima semana para ser el nuevo líder de Somalia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Twenty-eight candidates, all Somalis, are set to compete in the upcoming election next week for the position of the new president.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For the position of Somalia's new leader next week, twenty-eight approved candidates are competing in the election.

Original Text: OMX has no interest in buying London Stock Exchange FRANKFURT (AFP) - OMX -- the European stock market group made up of the Stockholm, Helsinki and Baltic stock exchanges -- does not intend to get into in a bidding war with Deutsche Boerse for the London Stock Exchange, OMX #39;s president designate said in a
Translation: OMX no tiene interés en comprar la Bolsa de Londres FRANKFURT (AFP) - OMX, el grupo de mercados bursátiles europeos compuesto por las bolsas de Estocolmo, Helsinki y Bálticas, no tiene intención de entrar en una guerra de ofertas con Deutsche Boerse por la Bolsa de Londres, dijo el presidente designado de OMX en una
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European stock market group, OMX - which includes the Stockholm, Helsinki, and Baltic stock exchanges - has no plans to engage in a bidding contest with Deutsche Boerse over the London Stock Exchange, according to OMX's incoming president.
Paraphrase 2: 2. OMX's president-elect announced that the European stock market consortium, OMX (comprising the Stockholm, Helsinki, and Baltic stock exchanges) won't participate in a bidding war with Deutsche Boerse for ownership of the London Stock Exchange.

Original Text: Benign inflation lifts bonds Consumer prices remain in line, boosting bond prices; dollar flat vs. euro, down against yen. NEW YORK (Reuters) - US Treasury prices rose slightly Thursday after a key economic report pointed to tame inflation
Translation: La inflación benigna eleva los bonos. Los precios al consumidor se mantienen en línea, impulsando los precios de los bonos; el dólar se mantiene estable frente al euro, pero baja contra el yen. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios de los bonos del Tesoro de EE.UU. subieron ligeramente el jueves después de que un informe económico clave indicara una inflación moderada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After a key financial report indicated mild inflation, US Treasury prices experienced a minor increase on Thursday. This benign inflation which keeps consumer prices stable, boosts bond prices, while causing the dollar to remain stable against the euro and decline against the yen.

Original Text: Gold Cup all Perfect Drift The wheel has made a full revolution, and Perfect Drift is back in the Hawthorne Gold Cup. He runs like one of the best horses in the country, and has earned more than a half-million
Translation: Copa de Oro todo Perfect Drift La rueda ha completado una revolución completa, y Perfect Drift está de vuelta en la Copa de Oro de Hawthorne. Corre como uno de los mejores caballos del país, y ha ganado más de medio millón.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Perfect Drift, one of the country's finest horses who has earned more than a half-million, has made a full cycle and returned to the Hawthorne Gold Cup. His performance exemplifies perfection.

Original Text: Blast hits Pakistani mosque ISLAMABAD, PAKISTAN - A suicide attacker detonated a bomb at a Shia mosque in the eastern Pakistani city of Lahore Sunday, killing at least four people.
Translation: Una explosión golpea la mezquita paquistaní ISLAMABAD, PAKISTÁN - Un atacante suicida detonó una bomba en una mezquita chiíta en la ciudad oriental paquistaní de Lahore el domingo, matando al menos a cuatro personas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Lahore, an eastern city in Pakistan, a suicide bomber triggered an explosion at a Shia mosque on Sunday, resulting in at least four fatalities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At least four individuals lost their lives in Lahore, a city in eastern Pakistan, when a suicide bomber set off a blast in a Shia mosque on Sunday.

Original Text: Israel kills Islamic Jihad leader in Gaza strike withdrawal of troops and settlers from occupied Gaza next year. Militants seek to claim any pullout as a victory.  quot;Islamic Jihad will not be broken by this martyrdom, quot; said Khaled al-Batsh, a senior political leader in Gaza.
Translation: Israel asesina al líder de la Yihad Islámica en un ataque en Gaza, retirada de tropas y colonos del Gaza ocupado el próximo año. Los militantes buscan reclamar cualquier retirada como una victoria. "La Yihad Islámica no se quebrará con este martirio", dijo Khaled al-Batsh, un líder político senior en Gaza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Islamic Jihad's leader in Gaza was killed by Israel in a strike; there's potential they will withdraw troops and settlers from Gaza, which is currently occupied, next year. Militants are intending to label any potential pullout as their triumph. "Islamic Jihad will not be weakened by this martyrdom," Khaled al-Batsh, a top political figure in Gaza voiced.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Khaled al-Batsh, an influential political leader in Gaza, mentioned, "The martyrdom will not deflate Islamic Jihad," following the killing of Gaza's Islamic Jihad leader by Israel. The Israelites are considering the withdrawal of their troops and settlers from the presently occupied Gaza next year. Militants are on the lookout to brand any such withdrawal as a victory symbol.

Original Text: Watchdog takes on rogue diallers Eleven firms are barred as part of action against scams which left dial-up net users with big bills.
Translation: El organismo de vigilancia se enfrenta a marcadores automáticos deshonestos. Once empresas son bloqueadas como parte de una acción contra estafas que dejaron a los usuarios de internet por marcación con facturas altas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to counter scams leaving dial-up internet users with substantial bills, the watchdog has taken action against rogue diallers, barring eleven firms.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Rogue diallers are being addressed by the watchdog, with eleven firms prohibited in action against scams causing large bills for dial-up internet users.

Original Text: Air Force Contract Has Windfall Potential Eight government contractors are readying to vie for specific task orders to update the Air Force's communication systems under an umbrella contract worth up to \$9B.<br><FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-The Washington Post</b></font>
Translation: El Contrato de la Fuerza Aérea tiene un Potencial de Beneficios Inesperados. Ocho contratistas gubernamentales están preparándose para competir por órdenes de trabajo específicas para actualizar los sistemas de comunicación de la Fuerza Aérea bajo un contrato paraguas que vale hasta $9B. <br><FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif, arial, helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-The Washington Post</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Eight government contractors are preparing to compete for specific task orders to upgrade the Air Force's communication systems, under a contract, potentially worth up to $9B, which is proving to be a windfall. - The Washington Post
Paraphrase 2: 2. A prospective windfall Air Force contract avail, as eight government contractors gear up to compete for particular task orders, with the aim to modernize the Air Force's communication system. This umbrella contract could fetch up to $9B. - The Washington Post

Original Text: Kidnapped British Woman Begs for Life The kidnapped British director of CARE International has made another plea urging Britain to withdraw troops from Iraq. In a video aired on Arab TV, Margaret Hassan asked for the aid organization to close its offices in Iraq.
Translation: Mujer británica secuestrada suplica por su vida. La directora británica secuestrada de CARE International ha hecho otro llamado urgente a Gran Bretaña para que retire sus tropas de Irak. En un video emitido en televisión árabe, Margaret Hassan pidió a la organización de ayuda que cerrara sus oficinas en Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The abducted British head of CARE International, Margaret Hassan, has once again called for the UK to pull out its forces from Iraq. She made this plea in a video broadcasted on Arab television, where she also requested the aid organization to shut down its offices in the country.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Margaret Hassan, the kidnapped director of CARE International from Britain, has appealed again for British troops to leave Iraq. Her request was put forward in a video shown on Arab TV, where she also urged for the closure of the aid organisation's offices in Iraq.

Original Text: Official: OPEC to Cut Production Next Year OPEC will cut back on oil production early next year in a bid to stave off a further decline in the world price, Kuwait's oil minister said Thursday.
Translation: Oficial: la OPEP reducirá la producción el próximo año. La OPEP reducirá la producción de petróleo a principios del próximo año en un intento por evitar un descenso adicional en el precio mundial, dijo el jueves el ministro de petróleo de Kuwait.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an attempt to prevent further drops in the global oil price, Kuwait's oil minister stated on Thursday that OPEC intends to reduce oil production starting from the beginning of next year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kuwait's oil minister announced on Thursday that OPEC plans to scale down oil production in the early part of the next year, aiming to offset a decline in global oil rates.

Original Text: Clijsters sets for comeback Former world number one Kim Clijsters will make her long-awaited return to action after a five-month injury absence at this week #39;s Gaz de France Stars in Belgium, China Radio International reported on Monday.
Translation: Clijsters se prepara para el regreso. La ex número uno del mundo, Kim Clijsters, hará su esperado regreso a la acción después de una ausencia de cinco meses por lesión en el Gaz de France Stars de esta semana en Bélgica, informó el lunes Radio Internacional de China.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After being absent from action for five months due to an injury, former world number one Kim Clijsters is set to make a much-anticipated comeback at the Gaz de France Stars event in Belgium this week, according to a report by China Radio International on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. China Radio International reported on Monday that Kim Clijsters, the former world number one, is all set to return to the court after a five-month injury hiatus. Her return will be at this week's Gaz de France Stars event in Belgium, marking her much-awaited comeback.

Original Text: Sun partners for high-speed Ethernet Sun Microsystems will integrate drivers for S2io's Xframe 10 Gigabit Ethernet Adapter into the Solaris operating system for Sparc, AMD Opteron, and Intel Xeon servers. In addition, S2io will partner with Sun to develop a TCP/IP offload engine with remote direct memory access functionality to enhance performance and scalability in intense computer and server environments.
Translation: Sun se asocia para Ethernet de alta velocidad. Sun Microsystems integrará controladores para el adaptador Ethernet de 10 gigabits Xframe de S2io en el sistema operativo Solaris para servidores Sparc, AMD Opteron e Intel Xeon. Además, S2io se asociará con Sun para desarrollar un motor de descarga TCP/IP con funcionalidad de acceso directo a memoria remota para mejorar el rendimiento y la escalabilidad en entornos de computadoras y servidores intensos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems will incorporate S2io's Xframe 10 Gigabit Ethernet Adapter drivers into the Solaris operating system for Sparc, AMD Opteron, and Intel Xeon servers. Furthermore, Sun will collaborate with S2io to create a TCP/IP offload engine with remote direct memory access feature, aiming to improve performance and scalability in extreme computing and server conditions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Sun Microsystems is set to integrate S2io's Xframe 10 Gigabit Ethernet Adapter drivers into its Solaris operating system targeting Sparc, AMD Opteron, and Intel Xeon servers. S2io will also cooperate with Sun in crafting a TCP/IP offload engine furnished with remote direct memory access capability to boost performance and scalability in high-demand computer and server environments.

Original Text: Yahoo Builds New Mobile Portal Yahoo! has announced the debut of a new suite of search services for mobile users at the CTIA conference. This new search offering enables mobile consumers to search for local information, images and Web resources on mobile devices.
Translation: Yahoo Construye Nuevo Portal Móvil Yahoo! ha anunciado el debut de un nuevo conjunto de servicios de búsqueda para usuarios móviles en la conferencia CTIA. Esta nueva oferta de búsqueda permite a los consumidores móviles buscar información local, imágenes y recursos web en dispositivos móviles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yahoo! recently launched a new suite of search services catering to mobile users, as announced at the CTIA conference. This new system allows mobile users to search local information, images, and web resources directly via their mobile devices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the CTIA conference, Yahoo! unveiled a new search service suite for mobile users. This fresh offering lets individuals search for local data, web resources, and images using their mobile devices.

Original Text: Oil Holds Firm, Heating Fuel Woes Persist  LONDON (Reuters) - Oil prices held strong above \$53 a  barrel on Wednesday as worries over a winter supply crunch  countered expectations that high fuel costs would curb growth  in petroleum demand next year.
Translation: El Petróleo se Mantiene Firme, Persisten los Problemas de Combustible para Calefacción  LONDRES (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo se mantuvieron fuertes por encima de los \$53 por barril el miércoles debido a las preocupaciones sobre una escasez de suministro en invierno que contrarrestó las expectativas de que los altos costos del combustible frenarían el crecimiento en la demanda de petróleo el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1) LONDON (Reuters) - Despite expectations that increasing fuel costs might dampen petroleum demand growth next year, oil prices remained robust over $53 a barrel on Wednesday due to concerns about a potential supply squeeze during winter.
Paraphrase 2: 2) LONDON (Reuters) - Concerns about a potential winter supply shortfall kept oil prices sturdy over $53 a barrel on Wednesday, overpowering anticipations that escalated fuel expenses would slow down the escalation of petroleum demand in the coming year.

Original Text: Moon #39;s eclipse like a  #39;rusty ball #39; Stargazers were able to catch a fleeting glimpse of a total eclipse of the moon in the early hours today. The clouds cleared to allow a rusty ball to be seen, despite bad weather, between 3.23am and 4.44am.
Translation: Traducción en español: El eclipse de la luna #39, como una 'bola oxidada' #39; Los aficionados a la astronomía pudieron captar un breve vistazo de un eclipse total de la luna en las primeras horas de hoy. Las nubes se despejaron para permitir que se viera una bola oxidada, a pesar del mal tiempo, entre las 3.23 a.m. y las 4.44 a.m.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the poor weather, stargazers got a brief view of a total lunar eclipse in today's early hours. As the clouds parted between 3:23 am and 4:44 am, a 'rusty ball' like appearance of the moon was visible.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the wee hours of today, the clouds made way for the total lunar eclipse to be observed, albeit briefly, amid adverse weather conditions. The moon appeared as a 'rusty ball' from 3:23 am to 4:44 am for the stargazers.

Original Text: Parker spurs San Antonio to superb NBA start (AFP) AFP - Tony Parker sparked a game-opening 17-2 run and the San Antonio Spurs routed Chicago 91-75 here, extending their best start in club history to a National Basketball Association-leading 16-3 record.
Translation: Parker impulsa a San Antonio a un excelente inicio en la NBA (AFP) AFP - Tony Parker desató una racha de 17-2 al inicio del juego y los San Antonio Spurs arrasaron a Chicago 91-75 aquí, extendiendo su mejor inicio en la historia del club a un récord líder en la Asociación Nacional de Baloncesto de 16-3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Parker triggers a fantastic NBA start for San Antonio Spurs, sparking a 17-2 run at the start of the game and driving the Spurs to a resounding 91-75 victory over Chicago, pushing their club-best record to an NBA-best 16-3 (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a remarkable 17-2 run initiated by Tony Parker at the start of the game, the San Antonio Spurs defeated Chicago 91-75, pushing their historical best start to a superior NBA-leading 16-3 (AFP).

Original Text: Humana #39;s Quarterly Earnings Rise Health insurer Humana Inc. posted a rise in quarterly profit on Monday as the company #39;s Medicare business gained and it kept health premiums ahead of soaring underlying medical costs.
Translation: Las Ganancias Trimestrales de Humana Aumentan. El asegurador de salud Humana Inc. registró un aumento en las ganancias trimestrales el lunes debido a que el negocio de Medicare de la compañía tuvo ganancias y mantuvo las primas de salud por delante de los crecientes costos médicos subyacentes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Humana Inc., a health insurance company, reported an increase in its quarterly earnings, attributing the rise to gains in its Medicare sector and the management of health premiums in face of surging medical costs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Health insurance firm, Humana Inc., saw a boost in its quarterly profits on Monday, credited to growth in its Medicare business and the successful execution of keeping health premiums higher than the skyrocketing underlying medical expenses.

Original Text: AstraZeneca feeds CAT The UK drug maker AstraZeneca today agreed to take a 20 stake in Cambridge Antibody Technology (CAT), one of Britain #39;s leading biotechnology companies.
Translation: AstraZeneca alimenta a CAT. El fabricante de medicamentos británico AstraZeneca acordó hoy tomar una participación del 20% en Cambridge Antibody Technology (CAT), una de las principales empresas de biotecnología de Gran Bretaña.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UK pharmaceutical corporation AstraZeneca has consented today to acquire a 20% interest in Cambridge Antibody Technology (CAT), a prominent British biotechnology firm.

Original Text: Tracy hopes club can take advantage of opportunities Aside from Steve Finley, no Dodgers position starter had postseason experience before Tuesday. By comparison, every member of the Cardinals #39; starting lineup came into the series having played in October.
Translation: Tracy espera que el club pueda aprovechar las oportunidades. Aparte de Steve Finley, ningún titular de posición de los Dodgers tenía experiencia en postemporada antes del martes. En comparación, cada miembro de la alineación inicial de los Cardenales entró en la serie habiendo jugado en octubre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prior to Tuesday, Steve Finley was the only position starter for the Dodgers with postseason experience, unlike the Cardinals, every member of whose starting lineup had October series exposure. Tracy hopes the club can capitalize on the opportunities this presents.

Original Text: Shell Scraps Dual Ownership  LONDON/AMSTERDAM (Reuters) - Oil major Royal Dutch/Shell  Group <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RD.AS target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RD.AS</A><SHEL.L> plans to move to a unified corporate  structure, ditching a century-old dual-ownership system blamed  for contributing to a reserves overbooking scandal.
Translation: Shell Deshecha la Doble Propiedad LONDRES/ÁMSTERDAM (Reuters) - El principal productor de petróleo Royal Dutch/Shell Group <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RD.AS target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RD.AS</A><SHEL.L> planea trasladarse a una estructura corporativa unificada, abandonando un sistema de doble propiedad de un siglo de antigüedad al que se le atribuye la contribución a un escándalo de sobre reserva de recursos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON/AMSTERDAM (Reuters) - Royal Dutch/Shell Group, a significant oil corporation, proposes to transition to a consolidated corporate structure, abandoning a hundred-year-old dual-ownership model that's been implicated in an overstatement of reserves scandal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON/AMSTERDAM (Reuters) - Aiming to leave behind a reserves overbooking scandal, the oil giant Royal Dutch/Shell Group plans to shift from its century-old dual ownership structure to a unified corporate framework.

Original Text: OPEC unable to influence market as oil prices scale new heights <b>...</b> LONDON, Oct 11 (AFP) - The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries says it is doing everything possible to help cool record high oil prices but its inability to meet markets #39; wishes reduces its credibility and influence, analysts said Monday.
Translation: La OPEC incapaz de influir en el mercado mientras los precios del petróleo alcanzan nuevos máximos <b>...</b> LONDRES, 11 de octubre (AFP) - La Organización de Países Exportadores de Petróleo dice que está haciendo todo lo posible para ayudar a enfriar los precios récord del petróleo, pero su incapacidad para satisfacer los deseos del mercado reduce su credibilidad e influencia, dijeron analistas el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Despite the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries' (OPEC) efforts to mitigate the record high oil prices, analysts on Monday pointed out that its inability to meet market demands decreases its credibility and impact, as oil prices continue to skyrocket." - LONDON, Oct 11 (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Analysts on Monday suggested that OPEC's credibility and influence are dwindling as it struggles to control market demands and decreasing oil prices, despite its claims to be doing everything possible to manage the soaring oil prices" - LONDON, Oct 11 (AFP)

Original Text: Google: Searching for the desktop? According ZDNet #39;s survey of IT professionals in August, application development is the last priority, but nonetheless an important one.
Translation: Google: ¿Buscando el escritorio? Según la encuesta de ZDNet a profesionales de TI en agosto, el desarrollo de aplicaciones es la última prioridad, pero aún así es una importante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ZDNet's survey of IT professionals in August indicated that application development is their least priority, yet still significant. Are you searching for the desktop on Google?
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a ZDNet survey conducted in August among IT professionals, the lowest priority is given to application development, but it's still of essential importance. Use Google to search for the desktop.

Original Text: Mining the Moon, the Gateway to Mars GOLDEN, COLORADO -- Any high hopes of sustaining expeditions on the Moon, Mars or beyond will depend on getting  quot;down and dirty quot; on those worlds -- in the form of using on-the-spot resources.
Translation: Extrayendo la Luna, la Puerta a Marte, GOLDEN, COLORADO -- Cualquier gran esperanza de mantener expediciones en la Luna, Marte o más allá dependerá de "bajar y ensuciarse" en esos mundos, en la forma de usar los recursos disponibles en el lugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GOLDEN, COLORADO -- For expeditions on the Moon, Mars or even further to be sustainable, it will be crucial to exploit local resources on these celestial bodies - which can be seen as delving "down and dirty."

Original Text: Aide: Arafat Not In Coma, In ICU PARIS (CBS) A senior aide to Yasser Arafat said early Sunday that the ailing Palestinian leader was not comatose but still in intensive care.
Translation: Asistente: Arafat no está en coma, está en la UCI PARÍS (CBS) Un asistente superior de Yasser Arafat dijo el domingo temprano que el líder palestino enfermo no estaba en coma, pero aún se encontraba en cuidados intensivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior aide to Yasser Arafat stated early Sunday that despite being in intensive care, the unwell Palestinian leader was not in a coma (CBS, PARIS).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Contrary to some reports, a senior aide to Yasser Arafat announced early Sunday in Paris that the seriously ill Palestinian leader was in Intensive Care Unit (ICU), but not in a comatose state (CBS).

Original Text: Lenovo, IBM May Soon Reveal PC Unit Deal  HONG KONG (Reuters) - China's largest personal computer  maker, Lenovo Group Ltd., could announce as early as Tuesday  that it is buying control of IBM's PC-making business for up to  US\$2 billion, a source familiar with the situation said.
Translation: Lenovo, IBM podrían revelar pronto el acuerdo de la unidad de PC HONG KONG (Reuters) - El mayor fabricante de computadoras personales de China, Lenovo Group Ltd., podría anunciar tan pronto como el martes que está comprando el control del negocio de fabricación de PC de IBM por hasta US\$2 mil millones, dijo una fuente familiarizada con la situación.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Lenovo Group Ltd., which happens to be China's biggest personal computer maker, may declare their acquisition of IBM's PC production business for potentially up to US$2 billion as early as Tuesday, noted a source who is aware of the matter.
Paraphrase 2: 2) A source knowledgeable of the situation has reported that China's top personal computer manufacturer, Lenovo Group Ltd., might make a proclamation by Tuesday about their purchase of IBM's PC design unit for a sum which could reach US$2 billion.

Original Text: England skipper Beckham escapes FA rap October 22, 2004. England captain David Beckham has escaped disciplinary action by the Football Association for his deliberate yellow card against Wales.
Translation: El capitán de Inglaterra, Beckham, escapa de la sanción de la FA el 22 de octubre de 2004. El capitán de Inglaterra, David Beckham, ha evitado una acción disciplinaria de la Asociación de Fútbol por su tarjeta amarilla deliberada contra Gales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On October 22, 2004, England's Captain, David Beckham, managed to avoid any disciplinary repercussions from the Football Association for his intentional yellow card in the match against Wales.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite receiving a deliberate yellow card in the game against Wales, England's team leader, David Beckham, did not receive any disciplinary measures from the Football Association on October 22, 2004.

Original Text: Jak of All Trades, Master of Fun The latest installment in this PlayStation 2 action series tries to be all games to all players. To its credit, Jak 3 largely succeeds. By Chris Kohler.
Translation: "Jak de Todas las Profesiones, Maestro de la Diversión. La última entrega de esta serie de acción para PlayStation 2 intenta ser todos los juegos para todos los jugadores. En su mérito, Jak 3 tiene mucho éxito. Por Chris Kohler."
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Jak 3: A Jack of All Trades and a Master of Fun", the newest release in this PlayStation 2 action series, admirably aims at satisfying every player's preferences. Commendably, it largely achieves that aim, as stated by Chris Kohler.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The most recent addition to this PlayStation 2 action series, Jak 3, attempts to cater to everyone's gaming tastes, striving to be a 'Jack of All Trades, Master of Fun' - a feat it greatly does justice to, according to Chris Kohler.

Original Text: Tailbacks take back seat in Iron Bowl TUSCALOOSA, ALABAMA - The Iron Bowl didn #39;t come close to providing the anticipated showcase of top tailbacks. Instead, the quarterbacks and two of the nation #39;s best defenses dominated No.
Translation: Los corredores pasan a un segundo plano en el Iron Bowl TUSCALOOSA, ALABAMA - El Iron Bowl no llegó ni de cerca a proporcionar el esperado despliegue de los mejores corredores. En cambio, los mariscales de campo y dos de las mejores defensas de la nación dominaron el Nº.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TUSCALOOSA, ALABAMA - The much-anticipated prominence of tailbacks in the Iron Bowl was not observed. Rather, the game was notably dominated by quarterbacks and two of the nation's leading defenses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Instead of a predicted display of superior tailbacks, the Iron Bowl in TUSCALOOSA, ALABAMA saw the commanding performances from quarterbacks and two of the top defenses in the nation.

Original Text: Bill Clinton Helps Launch Search Engine NEW YORK Dec 6, 2004 - Former president Bill Clinton on Monday helped launch a new Internet search company backed by the Chinese government which says its technology uses artificial intelligence to produce better results than Google Inc.
Translation: Bill Clinton ayuda a lanzar motor de búsqueda NUEVA YORK, 6 de diciembre de 2004: El expresidente Bill Clinton ayudó a lanzar el lunes una nueva compañía de búsqueda en internet respaldada por el gobierno chino, la cual afirma que su tecnología utiliza inteligencia artificial para producir mejores resultados que Google Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Backed by the Chinese government, a new Internet search company using artificial intelligence to yield better results than Google Inc. was launched with the help of Bill Clinton, the former US president, in New York on December 6, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On December 6, 2004 in New York, Bill Clinton, the former president, participated in the launch of an innovative Internet search company. This company, supported by the Chinese government, claims its technology, which employs artificial intelligence, can outclass Google Inc. in search results.

Original Text: A Nokia Smartphone With An Edge NEW YORK - It #39;s a little early to tell which camera phone features will resonate with US users in the long term. Americans may never embrace picture and video messaging to the same degree that consumers in South Korea and Japan have.
Translation: Un teléfono inteligente Nokia con una ventaja NUEVA YORK - Es un poco pronto para determinar qué características de la cámara del teléfono resonarán con los usuarios estadounidenses a largo plazo. Los estadounidenses pueden que nunca adopten la mensajería de imágenes y videos en la misma medida que los consumidores de Corea del Sur y Japón.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK - It's still too soon to predict the camera phone functionalities that will truly appeal to US users in the future. It's possible that American consumers might not adopt picture and video messaging as fervently as those in South Korea and Japan, regardless of the advanced features of a Nokia smartphone with an edge.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A Nokia smartphone with an edge has been introduced in New York. However, it's premature to assert which camera phone characteristics will be a hit with American users over time. There's a likelihood that US consumers may not get as attached to photo and video messaging as users in South Korea and Japan have.

Original Text: Keegan Tips Downing for England Honours Former England boss Kevin Keegan has joined the campaign for Middlesbrough winger Stewart Downing to be given his chance at senior international level.
Translation: Keegan Apuesta por Downing para Premios de Inglaterra. El ex entrenador de Inglaterra, Kevin Keegan, se ha unido a la campaña para que el extremo del Middlesbrough, Stewart Downing, tenga su oportunidad a nivel internacional senior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Former England manager Kevin Keegan is advocating for Middlesbrough winger Stewart Downing to be given an opportunity at the senior international level, endorsing him for England honours.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Kevin Keegan, the former England boss, is supporting the idea of Stewart Downing, the winger from Middlesbrough, being afforded a shot at senior international recognition.

Original Text: Apple iTunes dubbed  #39;rip-off #39; for Brits The world #39;s first legitimate music download service, Apple iTunes, is to be investigated by a government watchdog for overcharging its British customers by up to 20 per cent.
Translation: Apple iTunes, el primer servicio legítimo de descarga de música en el mundo, ha sido etiquetado como "#39;estafa #39;" para los británicos. Este servicio será investigado por un organismo gubernamental de vigilancia por cobrar excesivamente a sus clientes británicos hasta en un 20 por ciento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The global pioneer of legal music download service, Apple iTunes, is under scrutiny by a government oversight body for allegedly inflating prices for its British consumers by as much as 20 per cent, earning it the label 'rip-off'.

Original Text: Qualcomm May Change Accounting,Shares Off  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=QCOM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">QCOM.O</A>, a maker of  chips used in mobile phones, on Friday said it may change the  way it recognizes royalties from licensees, which would reduce  fourth-quarter pretax income by \$298 million.
Translation: Qualcomm Podría Cambiar Contabilidad, Acciones Caen  CHICAGO (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=QCOM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">QCOM.O</A>, un fabricante de chips utilizados en teléfonos móviles, dijo el viernes que podría cambiar la forma en que reconoce las regalías de los licenciatarios, lo que reduciría los ingresos antes de impuestos del cuarto trimestre en \$298 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Qualcomm Inc., a company that manufactures chips for mobile phones, announced on Friday that it is considering a revision in their accounting method for licensee royalties. If implemented, this adjustment could decrease the fourth-quarter pretax income by $298 million, leading to a drop in shares.

Original Text: Hackers join dark side SECURITY EXPERTS MessageLabs say that there is evidence that virus writers are working hand in hand with spammers.
Translation: Los hackers se unen al lado oscuro. Los EXPERTOS EN SEGURIDAD de MessageLabs dicen que hay evidencia de que los creadores de virus están trabajando mano a mano con los spammers.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MessageLabs, the security experts, reveal that there seems to be a collusion between virus creators and spammers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Evidence suggests a collaboration between spammers and virus authors, according to cybersecurity specialists from MessageLabs.

Original Text: Rossi rushing towards world title Italy #39;s Valentino Rossi, riding a Yamaha, won the Portuguese MotoGP race for the fourth year in a row to close on the world championship crown.
Translation: Rossi acelera hacia el título mundial. El italiano Valentino Rossi, conduciendo una Yamaha, ganó la carrera de MotoGP de Portugal por cuarto año consecutivo para acercarse a la corona del campeonato mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Riding a Yamaha, Italy's Valentino Rossi claimed victory in the Portuguese MotoGP race for the fourth consecutive year, edging closer to the world championship title.

Original Text: U.S. Funds Chat-Room Surveillance Study A Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute computer science professor hopes to develop mathematical models that can uncover structure within the scattershot traffic of online public forums.  <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-The Associated Press</B></FONT>
Translation: Estados Unidos financia estudio de vigilancia en salas de chat. Un profesor de ciencias de la computación del Instituto Politécnico Rensselaer espera desarrollar modelos matemáticos que puedan descubrir la estructura dentro del tráfico disperso de foros públicos en línea. <FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif, arial, helvetica" size="-2"\ color="#666666"><B>-The Associated Press</B></FONT>
Paraphrase 1: 1. A professor of computer science at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute is aiming to create mathematical algorithms that can reveal the inherent structure within the chaotic traffic in online public forums, as part of a U.S. funded study focusing on chat-room surveillance - The Associated Press.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A U.S. funded research for monitoring chat-rooms is underway, with a computer science professor from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute hoping to devise mathematical models that could analyze and extract structure from the seemingly random flow of data in online public forums - The Associated Press.

Original Text: CEOs  #39;too trusting #39; of outsourcer #39;s security com October 8, 2004, 8:28 AM PT. Most IT Managers won #39;t question the importance of security, but this priority has been sliding between the third and fourth most important focus for companies.
Translation: Los directores ejecutivos son 'demasiado confiados' en la seguridad del proveedor de outsourcing. 8 de octubre de 2004, 8:28 AM PT. La mayoría de los gerentes de IT no cuestionarán la importancia de la seguridad, pero esta prioridad ha estado oscilando entre el tercer y el cuarto enfoque más importante para las empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "CEOs tend to overly trust the security of outsourcers, according to com's report on October 8, 2004, 8:28 AM PT. Although most IT Managers do not underestimate the significance of security, it slips between being the third and fourth top priority for firms."
