Paraphrase 2: 2. "On October 8, 2004, at 8:28 AM PT, com reported that CEOs exhibited an excessive trust in outsourcer's security. While most IT Managers acknowledge the crucial role of security, it has been toggling between being the third and fourth crucial focus for businesses."

Original Text: Europe Is Warned of Changing Climate (AP) AP - Rising sea levels, disappearing glaciers in the Alps and more deadly heat waves are coming for Europeans because of global warming, Europe's environmental agency warned Wednesday.
Translation: Europa es advertida sobre el cambio climático (AP) AP - Niveles crecientes del mar, desaparición de glaciares en los Alpes y olas de calor más mortales están en camino para los europeos debido al calentamiento global, advirtió la agencia medioambiental de Europa el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Associated Press reports that the environmental agency of Europe issued a warning on Wednesday about the impending threat of rising sea levels, vanishing Alpine glaciers, and increased fatal heat waves as a result of global warming.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Wednesday, Europe's environmental agency issued a caution by the Associated Press about global warming effects like threatening rise in sea levels, the disappearance of glaciers in the Alps, and an increase in lethal heat waves.

Original Text: McDonald takes one-shot lead over Els in Dunhill Championship Bruce McDonald of Zimbabwe shot a 6-under 66 Thursday to take a one-shot lead over South Africa #39;s Ernie Els at the PGA European Tour #39;s season-opening Dunhill Championship.
Translation: McDonald toma la delantera por un golpe sobre Els en el Campeonato Dunhill. Bruce McDonald de Zimbabue realizó un tiro de 6 bajo par el jueves para tomar una ventaja de un golpe sobre Ernie Els de Sudáfrica en el evento inaugural de la temporada del PGA European Tour, el Campeonato Dunhill.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bruce McDonald from Zimbabwe fired a 6-under 66 on Thursday, securing a one-stroke advantage over South Africa's Ernie Els in the season-opening Dunhill Championship of the PGA European Tour.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the PGA European Tour's Dunhill Championship kick-off, Bruce McDonald of Zimbabwe moved into the lead by one stroke over South Africa's Ernie Els, after shooting a 6-under 66 on Thursday.

Original Text: Italy Races to Save Hostages Before Deadline (Reuters) Reuters - Italian Foreign Minister Franco Frattini\appealed to Arab countries on Monday to help win the release of\two Italian hostages as an apparent deadline to kill them drew\near.
Translation: Italia se apresura para salvar a los rehenes antes de la fecha límite (Reuters) Reuters - El Ministro de Asuntos Exteriores italiano Franco Frattini apeló a los países árabes el lunes para ayudar a conseguir la liberación de dos rehenes italianos, mientras se acercaba una aparente fecha límite para matarlos.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - Franco Frattini, the Italian Foreign Minister, implored for assistance from Arab nations on Monday, to secure the release of two Italian captives as the proclaimed deadline for their execution approached.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - With a looming threat to their lives, two Italian captives were the focus of urgent appeals by the Italian Foreign Minister, Franco Frattini, to Arab nations on Monday, seeking help to ensure their release.

Original Text: Dell gets Philips order Philips might have started selling PCs again, but they are still outsourcing their internal PC needs. And Dell is the lucky one to get the deal worth around USD 700 millions!
Translation: Dell recibe un pedido de Philips. Philips puede haber comenzado a vender PCs nuevamente, pero todavía están externalizando sus necesidades internas de PC. ¡Y Dell es el afortunado que consigue el trato valorado en alrededor de 700 millones de dólares!
Paraphrase 1: 1) Despite Philips resuming their PC sales, they continue to outsource their internal PC requirements. Dell has been fortunate enough to secure this lucrative order, estimated to be worth approximately 700 million USD.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Even as Philips has resumed selling PCs, they are outsourcing their internal PC necessities. Dell has been privileged to win this contract, which is roughly valued at a whooping 700 million USD!

Original Text: Tennis: Dent Advances in Japan Open Seventh-seed Taylor Dent of the United States advanced with a 6-3, 6-4 over Tomas Zib of the Czech Republic in second-round action at the Japan Open tennis tournament in Tokyo.
Translation: Tenis: Dent Avanza en el Abierto de Japón. El séptimo sembrado, Taylor Dent de los Estados Unidos, avanzó con un 6-3, 6-4 sobre Tomas Zib de la República Checa en la acción de la segunda ronda en el torneo de tenis Abierto de Japón en Tokio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Taylor Dent from United States, seeded seventh in the Japan Open, progressed to the next round by scoring 6-3, 6-4 against Tomas Zib from the Czech Republic during the second-round tennis tournament held in Tokyo.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Japan Open tennis tournament in Tokyo, American seventh-seed player Taylor Dent moved forward, defeating Tomas Zib of the Czech Republic with a score of 6-3, 6-4 in the second round.

Original Text: Langer's pairings apparent Unlike US captain Hal Sutton, who kept his pairings for the opening matches of the 35th Ryder Cup guarded like a state secret, it was easy to read into Bernhard Langer's mind-set. All you had to do was track the way the final practice groups were organized by the European captain.
Translation: Es evidente el emparejamiento de Langer, a diferencia del capitán de Estados Unidos, Hal Sutton, quien mantuvo sus emparejamientos para los partidos inaugurales de la 35ª Copa Ryder como un secreto de estado, era fácil leer la mentalidad de Bernhard Langer. Todo lo que tenías que hacer era seguir la forma en la que el capitán europeo organizó los grupos de práctica finales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Unlike US captain Hal Sutton who kept his pairings for the inaugural games of the 35th Ryder Cup a closely guarded secret, understanding Bernhard Langer's intentions was a straightforward process. All that was required was to follow the layout of the last practice groups organized by the European captain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Contrary to Hal Sutton, the US captain who kept his pairings for the first matches of the 35th Ryder Cup hush-hush, deciphering Bernhard Langer's strategies was simple. One only needed to keep an eye on the arrangement of the final practice groups by the lead of the European team.

Original Text: Arab League to hold emergency meeting The Arab League says it will hold an emergency session to discuss the violence in Gaza, which has claimed at least 56 Palestinians this week.
Translation: La Liga Árabe celebrará una reunión de emergencia. La Liga Árabe dice que convocará una sesión de emergencia para discutir la violencia en Gaza, que ha cobrado la vida de al menos 56 palestinos esta semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An emergency session to discuss the ongoing violence in Gaza, which has resulted in the death of at least 56 Palestinians this week, will be held by the Arab League, it has announced.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Arab League has confirmed it is set to conduct an emergency meeting, focusing on the Gaza violence that has tragically taken the lives of a minimum of 56 Palestinians within this week.

Original Text: Colgate to Cut 12 Percent of Work Force (Reuters) Reuters - Colgate-Palmolive Co.  said on\Tuesday it would cut about 12 percent of its 37,000-person work\force as part of a four-year restructuring plan for which it\anticipates after-tax charges of  #36;550 million to  #36;650 million.
Translation: Colgate recortará el 12 por ciento de su fuerza laboral (Reuters) Reuters - Colgate-Palmolive Co. anunció el martes que recortará alrededor del 12 por ciento de su fuerza laboral de 37,000 personas como parte de un plan de reestructuración de cuatro años para el cual anticipa cargos después de impuestos de #36;550 millones a #36;650 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters)- Colgate-Palmolive Co. announced on Tuesday that a restructuring plan will lead to a reduction of approximately 12 percent of its 37,000-strong workforce, taking place across a four-year span. This strategy is predicted to bring about after-tax charges ranging from $550 million to $650 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Colgate-Palmolive Co. disclosed its plans on Tuesday of a projected cutback that entails relieving 12 percent of its workforce, a total of 37,000 employees, over a period of four years (Reuters). The initiative, aimed at restructuring the company, is expected to lead to after-tax charges amounting between $550 million and $650 million.

Original Text: Improved Numbers Shelter CBS From the Fallout The CBS news division still anticipates serious fallout. Still, it is hard to wipe the grins off the faces of CBS's top executives.
Translation: Números Mejorados Protegen a CBS de las Repercusiones. La división de noticias de CBS aún anticipa serias repercusiones. Sin embargo, es difícil borrar las sonrisas de los rostros de los altos ejecutivos de CBS.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the expected serious fallout, the news division of CBS is showing considerable improvement in numbers, which has the top executives of CBS in a jubilant mood.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although CBS news division forecasts severe fallout, their improved ratings keep them safe, much to the pleasure of their top executives.

Original Text: Sears Posts a Loss, Cuts Full-Year View Sears, Roebuck  amp; Co (SN: Quote, Profile, Research) , the largest US department store chain, on Thursday posted a third-quarter loss as its clothing sales continued to slide and cuts its forecast for the full year.
Translation: Sears Registra una Pérdida, Reduce la Proyección para Todo el Año Sears, Roebuck & Co (SN: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación), la cadena de tiendas por departamentos más grande de EE. UU., registró una pérdida del tercer trimestre el jueves ya que sus ventas de ropa continuaron cayendo y redujo su pronóstico para todo el año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Sears, Roebuck & Co (SN: Quote, Profile, Research), the leading US department store chain, reported a third-quarter loss due to dwindling clothing sales and revised its full-year outlook downwards.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having suffered a decline in clothing sales, the biggest US department store chain, Sears, Roebuck & Co (SN: Quote, Profile, Research), revealed a loss for the third quarter on Thursday, while also reducing its annual forecast.

Original Text: Pitt escapes 1-AA Furman Josh Cummings kicked a 37-yard field goal in overtime and host Pittsburgh needed 21 points in the fourth quarter yesterday to beat Division 1-AA Furman, 41-38.
Translation: Pitt escapa 1-AA Furman Josh Cummings pateó un gol de campo de 37 yardas en tiempo extra y el anfitrión Pittsburgh necesitó 21 puntos en el cuarto trimestre ayer para vencer a la División 1-AA Furman, 41-38.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Joshua Cummings' 37-yard field goal in overtime helped Pittsburgh narrowly defeat Division 1-AA Furman yesterday, 41-38, after rallying with 21 points in the fourth quarter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, after scoring 21 points in the fourth quarter, host team Pittsburgh overcame Division 1-AA Furman with a score of 41-38, thanks to a 37-yard field goal from Josh Cummings in overtime.

Original Text: Mortgages fall as house market cools Home loan approvals in October fell to their lowest levels in nearly five years, according to figures released this morning by the Bank of England, confirming that the housing
Translation: Las hipotecas caen a medida que se enfría el mercado de la vivienda. Las aprobaciones de préstamos hipotecarios en octubre cayeron a sus niveles más bajos en casi cinco años, según las cifras publicadas esta mañana por el Banco de Inglaterra, confirmando que el mercado de la vivienda
Paraphrase 1: 1. As the housing market cools, mortgages have declined, with home loan approvals in October reaching their lowest point in almost five years, as evidenced by data presented today by the Bank of England.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Bank of England announced this morning that home loan approvals have dropped to their lowest levels in approximately five years in October, corroborating the slowdown in the housing market as mortgage rates decrease.

Original Text: Revolution hope history repeats itself Based on their finishes in the last two MLS regular seasons, the Revolution could be in a position of strength. Though the Revolution (5-11-9) are in last place in the overall standings, their recent track record in the final five games of the season provides hope.
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: La esperanza de la Revolución es que la historia se repita. Basándose en sus resultados en las dos últimas temporadas regulares de la MLS, la Revolución podría estar en una posición de fortaleza. Aunque la Revolución (5-11-9) está en el último lugar en la clasificación general, su historial reciente en los últimos cinco partidos de la temporada proporciona esperanza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With their performance in the last two MLS regular seasons, the Revolution could be poised for success despite being in last place in the overall standings. Their historical track record of finishing strong in the final five matches lends a certain degree of optimism, reflecting the age-old saying 'history repeats itself'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Revolution's performance in the previous two MLS regular seasons suggest they may yet excel, notwithstanding their current last place in the league standings. Their record of performing well in the season's last five games offers some beacon of hope, embodying the popular sentiment, that history tends to repeat itself.

Original Text: Nations demand study of quotas Governments from nearly 30 countries demanded Friday that the World Trade Organization undertake an urgent review of what might happen when textile quotas end Jan. 1. The
Translation: Las naciones exigen estudio de cuotas. Gobiernos de casi 30 países exigieron el viernes que la Organización Mundial del Comercio emprenda una revisión urgente de lo que podría suceder cuando las cuotas de textiles finalicen el 1 de enero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Almost 30 governments nationally have made an urgent request to the World Trade Organization this Friday to comprehensively review the potential effects of the termination of textile quotas from the 1st of January.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The potential implications of lifting textile quotas on January 1st have led to an urgent call from nearly 30 country governments this Friday for a detailed study by the World Trade Organization.

Original Text: Al-Qaida threatens Lebanon, Syria Al-Qaida reportedly warned the Lebanese and Syrian authorities against harassing Muslim extremists captured in Lebanon for planning terrorist attacks.
Translation: Al-Qaida amenaza a Líbano, Siria. Según informes, Al-Qaida advirtió a las autoridades libanesas y sirias contra el acoso a extremistas musulmanes capturados en Líbano por planificar ataques terroristas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Al-Qaida has reportedly issued a warning to the authorities of Lebanon and Syria against persecuting Muslim extremists who were apprehended in Lebanon for allegedly plotting terrorist assaults.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reportedly, Al-Qaida has cautioned the Syrian and Lebanese authorities not to maltreat the captured Muslim extremists in Lebanon who are suspected of orchestrating terror attacks.

Original Text: Annual ranking of  #39;most dangerous #39; cities TRENTON, NJ Camden, New Jersey, has become the nation #39;s most-dangerous city, according to a Kansas company #39;s yearly ranking based on crime statistics.
Translation: Clasificación anual de las ciudades 'más peligrosas' TRENTON, NJ Camden, Nueva Jersey, se ha convertido en la ciudad más peligrosa de la nación, según la clasificación anual de una empresa de Kansas basada en estadísticas de crimen.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Camden, New Jersey, is now deemed the most dangerous city in the nation, as per the yearly ranking on crime statistics by a company from Kansas. This annual ranking lists out the "most dangerous" cities, and this year, unfortunately, Camden topped the list.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an annual list of dangerous cities, Camden, New Jersey has been ranked as the most hazardous in the country. This ranking is determined by a Kansas-based company that evaluates cities based on crime statistics every year.

Original Text: SPAMMER IN THE SLAMMER A CONMAN who made 13.8million with spam emails offering non-existent money-making schemes has been jailed for nine years. Dubbed a  quot;modern day snake oil salesman quot;, Jeremy Jaynes ripped off thousands of internet customers.
Translation: UN ESTAFADOR EN LA CÁRCEL. Un timador que ganó 13.8 millones con correos electrónicos no deseados ofreciendo planes de hacer dinero inexistentes ha sido encarcelado por nueve años. Apodado como un "vendedor de aceite de serpiente de la era moderna", Jeremy Jaynes estafó a miles de clientes de internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jeremy Jaynes, a conman who swindled 13.8 million through spam emails selling imaginary money-making schemes, has been sentenced to nine years in prison. Known as a "modern day snake oil salesman," he deceived thousands of online customers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having defrauded thousands of internet customers with spam emails promoting fictitious money-making strategies, conman Jeremy Jaynes, also referred to as a "modern-day snake oil salesman," earned 13.8 million and has now been imprisoned for nine years.

Original Text: Dollar Up Vs. Most Except Yen NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar rose against almost every one of its main counterparts except the yen on Friday, as technically focused investors shifted positions and considered the implications of spiking oil prices.
Translation: El dólar sube frente a la mayoría excepto el yen NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar aumentó contra casi todos sus principales contrapartes excepto el yen el viernes, ya que los inversores técnicamente centrados cambiaron de posición y consideraron las implicaciones de los precios del petróleo en alza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Friday, the dollar appreciated against nearly all its major counterparts, with the exception of the yen, as investors primarily interested in technical analysis adjusted their positions and speculated on the effects of surging oil prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Except for the yen, the dollar surged against the majority of its key rivals on Friday, with technically oriented investors repositioning and pondering over the potential impacts of skyrocketing oil prices.

Original Text: Ex-soldier, warlord becomes Somali leader A former soldier, rebel and warlord was sworn in Thursday as the new president of Somalia in the latest attempt to unite the nation under a central government for the first time since 1991.
Translation: Exsoldado y señor de la guerra se convierte en líder somalí. Un antiguo soldado, rebelde y señor de la guerra juró el jueves como el nuevo presidente de Somalia, en el último intento por unificar la nación bajo un gobierno central por primera vez desde 1991.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A new chapter unfolded in Somalia on Thursday, as an ex-soldier, who was once a rebel and warlord, was inaugurated as the president in an effort to solidify the country under one governing body, something that hasn't occurred since 1991.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ascending the presidency of Somalia on Thursday was a former soldier, notably both a rebel and a warlord. This development marks the most recent attempt the country has made to establish a centralized government, a feat not managed since 1991.

Original Text: US Air Seeks Cost Cuts in 2nd Bankruptcy  ALEXANDRIA, Va., Sept 13 (Reuters) - US Airways plans to  slash costs under its second bankruptcy of the decade, in a bid  to become more like the discount airlines that threaten its  survival.
Translation: US Air busca recortes de costos en la 2ª Bancarrota  ALEXANDRIA, Va., 13 de septiembre (Reuters) - US Airways planea reducir costos bajo su segunda bancarrota de la década, en un intento por volverse más parecido a las aerolíneas de descuento que amenazan su supervivencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ALEXANDRIA, Va., Sept 13 (Reuters) - In the face of its second bankruptcy of the decade, US Airways intends to reduce expenses significantly, aiming to model the economic efficiency of the budget airlines that currently challenge its existence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ALEXANDRIA, Va., Sept 13 (Reuters) - Amidst its second bankruptcy in ten years, US Airways is set to make substantial cost reductions in an effort to emulate the economical operations of the low-cost airlines putting its survival at risk.

Original Text: Dodgers 7, Braves 4 Los Angeles, Ca. -- Shawn Green belted a grand slam and a solo homer as Los Angeles beat Mike Hampton and the Atlanta Braves 7-to-4 Saturday afternoon.
Translation: Dodgers 7, Braves 4 Los Ángeles, Ca. -- Shawn Green conectó un grand slam y un jonrón en solitario mientras Los Ángeles vencía a Mike Hampton y a los Atlanta Braves 7 a 4 el sábado por la tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shawn Green smashed a grand slam and a solo homer, leading Los Angeles to a 7-4 victory over Mike Hampton and the Atlanta Braves on Saturday afternoon in Los Angeles, CA; the final score being Dodgers 7, Braves 4.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Los Angeles, CA on Saturday afternoon, the Dodgers, led by Shawn Green's grand slam and solo home run, triumphed over the Atlanta Braves and Mike Hampton with a score of 7-to-4.

Original Text: Pfizer #39;s Vioxx Problem NEW YORK - The withdrawal of the arthritis drug Vioxx two weeks ago was a disaster for Merck. But it also put rival Pfizer in a fix.
Translation: Problema de Vioxx de Pfizer NUEVA YORK - La retirada del medicamento para la artritis Vioxx hace dos semanas fue un desastre para Merck. Pero también puso a su rival Pfizer en un aprieto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Pfizer experienced a predicament due to the withdrawal of Merck's arthritis drug, Vioxx, two weeks ago from the New York market, which proved to be disastrous for Merck.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The abandonment of the arthritis medication Vioxx by Merck two weeks ago was a major setback for them in New York. Concurrently, this step proved to be a challenging situation for their competitor, Pfizer.

Original Text: Saudi Arabia bans tinted car windows Saudi Arabia banned tinted car windows on Sunday in a move aimed at preventing militants escaping detection on the kingdom #39;s roads.
Translation: Arabia Saudita prohíbe las ventanas de coche tintadas. Arabia Saudita prohibió las ventanas de coche tintadas el domingo en un movimiento dirigido a prevenir que los militantes evadan la detección en las carreteras del reino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an initiative to hinder militants from escaping detection on the kingdom's roads, Saudi Arabia established a ban on tinted car windows this Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To prevent the possibility of militants evading identification on the nation's roads, Saudi Arabia enacted a prohibition on tinted car windows this past Sunday.

Original Text: Update 1: China Aviation Execs Surrender Passports China Aviation Oil (Singapore) Corp. on Tuesday said four key company officials have surrendered their passports to prosecutors amid a probe into a massive trading loss by the Beijing-backed jet fuel trader.
Translation: Actualización 1: Ejecutivos de Aviación de China Entregan Pasaportes. China Aviation Oil (Singapur) Corp. afirmó el martes que cuatro altos funcionarios de la empresa han entregado sus pasaportes a los fiscales en medio de una investigación sobre una enorme pérdida comercial por parte del comerciante de combustible para jets respaldado por Beijing.
Paraphrase 1: Revision 1: China Aviation Oil (Singapore) Corp. announced on Tuesday that amidst a major trading loss investigation, four significant executive figures from the company have handed in their passports to the legal authorities.
Paraphrase 2: Revision 2: Amid an investigation into a large trading loss, four executive authorities of China Aviation Oil (Singapore) Corp., a jet fuel trader backed by Beijing, reported on Tuesday that they had given up their passports to prosecutors.

Original Text: Sorenstam Wins Mizuno to Match Record Swedish Annika Sorenstam is all smiles as she holds winner #39;s trophy following her victory on the final round of the US \$ 1million (euro 780,000) LPGA Mizuno classic at Seta golf course in Otsu western Japan, Sunday, Nov 7, 2004.
Translation: Sorenstam gana el Mizuno para igualar el récord. La sueca Annika Sorenstam sonríe al sostener el trofeo del ganador tras su victoria en la ronda final del clásico LPGA Mizuno con un valor de 1 millón de dólares (780,000 euros) en el campo de golf Seta en Otsu, al oeste de Japón, el domingo, 7 de noviembre de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Annika Sorenstam, the record-matching Swedish player, is elated as she raises the victor's trophy, following her triumph in the final round of the one million US dollars (780,000 euros) LPGA Mizuno classic. This significant event was held at the Seta Golf Course in Western Otsu, Japan, on Sunday, November 7, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Swedish golfer Annika Sorenstam could not contain her joy as she lifted the winner's trophy after her win at the final round of the LPGA Mizuno classic. This competition, worth one million US dollars (about 780,000 euros), took place at Seta Golf Course in Otsu, western Japan, on the 7th of November, 2004, enabling her to tie the record.

Original Text: AOL abandons exclusivity in favor of ad-supported model In a move both risky and essential, AOL is abandoning its strategy of exclusivity and will free much of its music, sports and other programming to non-subscribers in hopes of boosting ad sales.
Translation: AOL abandona la exclusividad en favor de un modelo respaldado por publicidad. En un movimiento que es tanto arriesgado como esencial, AOL está abandonando su estrategia de exclusividad y liberará gran parte de su música, deportes y otros programas para no suscriptores con la esperanza de impulsar las ventas de publicidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With both a mixture of risk and necessity, AOL is steering away from its exclusivity plan. Hoping to surge ad sales, it will make a substantial part of its music, sports and other programming available freely to non-subscribers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Taking a bold yet crucial step, AOL is opting out of its original tactic of exclusivity. Aiming at increasing ad sales, the company plans to offer its wide range of music, sports, and other content to those who are not subscribers.

Original Text: Exploit posted for Microsoft JPEG flaw Computer code that takes advantage of a flaw in the way many Microsoft Corp. applications process JPEG images has been published on the Internet and could be a precursor to actual attacks on vulnerable PCs, experts said.
Translation: Se ha publicado un exploit para la falla en JPEG de Microsoft. El código informático que se aprovecha de un defecto en la forma en que muchas aplicaciones de Microsoft Corp. procesan imágenes JPEG ha sido publicado en Internet y podría ser un precursor de posibles ataques a PC vulnerables, según expertos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Experts have reported that computer code exploiting a vulnerability in many Microsoft Corp. applications' JPEG image processing has been released on the internet. This may potentially lead to real-time attacks on susceptible computers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Experts have warned about an exploitable computer code that's been published online. This code capitalizes on a flaw in how Microsoft Corp.'s applications process JPEG images and could pave the way for actual attacks on vulnerable PCs.

Original Text: No deal, but I #39;ll work for unity: Anwar KUALA LUMPUR (AFP) - Malaysia #39;s former deputy prime minister Anwar Ibrahim has reiterated that there was no political deal to secure his freedom from prison but has promised to work for unity in Malaysia.
Translation: Sin trato, pero trabajaré por la unidad: Anwar KUALA LUMPUR (AFP) - El ex viceprimer ministro de Malasia, Anwar Ibrahim, ha reiterado que no hubo ningún acuerdo político para garantizar su libertad de prisión, pero ha prometido trabajar por la unidad en Malasia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anwar Ibrahim, Malaysia's former deputy prime minister, has confirmed he did not strike a political deal for his release from prison, and committed to striving for Malaysian unity. (AFP) KUALA LUMPUR.
Paraphrase 2: 2. KUALA LUMPUR (AFP) - Anwar Ibrahim, the ex-deputy prime minister of Malaysia, reassured that his prison release was not a result of any political bargain and pledged his efforts towards fostering unity in Malaysia.

Original Text: Flight attendants get OK to strike PITTSBURGH - The board of the nation #39;s largest flight attendants union unanimously approved a resolution authorizing a strike on Tuesday after its president accused the industry of using the bankruptcy process to cut workers #39; pay and other benefits.
Translation: Las azafatas reciben la aprobación para la huelga PITTSBURGH - La junta del sindicato de asistentes de vuelo más grande de la nación aprobó unánimemente una resolución que autoriza una huelga el martes después de que su presidente acusara a la industria de utilizar el proceso de quiebra para reducir el salario y otros beneficios de los trabajadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PITTSBURGH - On Tuesday, the board of the country's biggest flight attendants union gave unanimous approval for a strike. This decision came after the union president alleged that the aviation industry was exploiting the bankruptcy process to reduce employee wages and benefits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After the president of the largest union for flight attendants in the US claimed that the industry is using bankruptcy proceedings to decrease workers' compensation and benefits, the union board in Pittsburgh has unanimously voted to sanction a strike.

Original Text: Tigers pull out 7-3 win in mistake-filled game The Detroit Tigers were rusty on Monday after two days off, but they didn #39;t make as many miscues as their opponents. Therefore, the Tigers defeated the Kansas City Royals 7-3.
Translation: Los Tigres logran una victoria de 7-3 en un partido lleno de errores. Los Detroit Tigers estaban oxidados el lunes después de dos días libres, pero no cometieron tantos errores como sus oponentes. Por lo tanto, los Tigres derrotaron a los Kansas City Royals 7-3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite a game riddled with errors, the Detroit Tigers managed to secure a 7-3 victory over the Kansas City Royals after coming off a rest period of two days.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After a two-day hiatus, the Detroit Tigers returned to the field with a less-than-perfect game but made fewer mistakes than the Kansas City Royals, leading to a 7-3 triumph.

Original Text: Top brass warns of Iraqi civil war LISBON: US army chief General Richard Myers said in an interview that civil war could erupt in Iraq after forthcoming elections. However, General Myers, the chairman of the US joint chiefs of staff, told the
Translation: Brass superior advierte de la guerra civil iraquí. LISBOA: El jefe del ejército estadounidense, el general Richard Myers, dijo en una entrevista que podría estallar una guerra civil en Irak después de las próximas elecciones. Sin embargo, el general Myers, presidente del Estado Mayor Conjunto de los Estados Unidos, dijo a la
Paraphrase 1: 1) General Richard Myers, US army chief and chairman of the US joint chiefs of staff, expressed his concerns in an interview in Lisbon about the potential of a civil war breaking out in Iraq following the upcoming elections.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In an interview from Lisbon, General Richard Myers, who leads the US army and serves as the chairman of the US joint chiefs of staff, warned about the possibility of civil conflict flaring up in Iraq after the impending elections.

Original Text: Spain: Valencia crush Deportivo at Riazor A CORUA, Sep 22 (SW) - Valencia CF have confirmed their title aspirations by crushing Deportivo la Corua 1-5 at Riazor stadium, while Levante surprised Atletico de Madrid, winning 2-1.
Translation: España: Valencia aplasta al Deportivo en Riazor A CORUÑA, 22 de Sep (SW) - Valencia CF ha confirmado sus aspiraciones al título al aplastar al Deportivo la Coruña 1-5 en el estadio Riazor, mientras que Levante sorprendió al Atlético de Madrid, ganando 2-1.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Valencia CF has solidified their desire to claim the title by decisively defeating Deportivo la Corua 1-5 at their home ground, Riazor stadium. Meanwhile, a surprising turnaround occurred when Levante emerged victorious over Atletico de Madrid with a 2-1 score, on 22nd September at A Corua, Spain (as per SW reports).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Confirming their pursuit of the title, Valencia CF delivered a thorough 5-1 drubbing to Deportivo la Corua at Riazor stadium. Additionally, Levante managed a surprising upset, winning against Atletico de Madrid with a 2-1 score, according to the report made on Sep 22 in A Corua, Spain (as mentioned by SW).

Original Text: National Airport Tests Boarding Pass Screens Passengers identified for additional security screening will now have their passes checked for explosives using document-scanning machines.
Translation: El Aeropuerto Nacional Prueba Pantallas de Tarjetas de Embarque. Los pasajeros identificados para un control de seguridad adicional ahora tendrán sus pases revisados en busca de explosivos usando máquinas de escaneo de documentos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Passengers who are singled out for extra security screening at the National Airport will now have their boarding passes checked for explosives with document-scanning devices.

Original Text: Speakers debate RFID benefits, challenges Several speakers at this week's EPCglobal conference talked about how RFID tagging can help companies track products, cut down on theft and reduce supply chain costs. But analysts said U.S. companies are moving cautiously on the technology.
Translation: Los oradores debaten los beneficios y desafíos de RFID. Varios oradores en la conferencia de EPCglobal de esta semana hablaron sobre cómo el etiquetado RFID puede ayudar a las empresas a rastrear productos, reducir el robo y disminuir los costos de la cadena de suministro. Pero los analistas dijeron que las empresas estadounidenses están avanzando con cautela en la tecnología.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Several speakers at the EPCglobal conference this week discussed how RFID tagging can assist businesses in product tracking, theft prevention, and supply chain cost reduction. However, analysts mention that US companies are being careful while adopting this technology.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At this week's EPCglobal conference, the benefits and challenges of RFID tagging – such as improved product tracking, decreased theft, and lower supply chain costs - were debated by several speakers. Nevertheless, the slow and cautious approach of US companies towards this technology was noted by analysts.

Original Text: Hynix to build chip plant in China South Korean memory-chip maker Hynix Semiconductor Inc. announced Wednesday that it reached an agreement to construct a wafer fabrication plant (fab) to manufacture chips in Wuxi, China.
Translation: Hynix construirá planta de chips en China. El fabricante surcoreano de chips de memoria, Hynix Semiconductor Inc., anunció el miércoles que llegó a un acuerdo para construir una planta de fabricación de obleas (fab) para fabricar chips en Wuxi, China.
Paraphrase 1: 1. South Korean memory-chip producer, Hynix Semiconductor Inc., confirmed on Wednesday that they have achieved a deal to establish a wafer fabrication factory in Wuxi, China to produce chips.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An agreement has been reached by Hynix Semiconductor Inc., a South Korean company that manufactures memory-chips, to build a wafer fabrication plant in Wuxi, China for chip production, which they announced on Wednesday.

Original Text: Enron #39;s interimboss seeking \$25 million fee nron Corp. #39;s interim chief executive has asked a federal bankruptcy judge to award his firm a \$25 million  quot;success fee quot; for stabilizing the fallen Houston energy giant.
Translation: El jefe interino de Enron Corp. #39 ha solicitado a un juez federal de bancarrota que otorgue a su empresa una "tarifa de éxito" de $25 millones por estabilizar al gigante energético de Houston que ha caído.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The interim chief executive of Enron Corp. has appealed to a federal bankruptcy judge, hoping to acquire a "success fee" of $25 million for his firm due to their role in stabilizing the distressed Houston-based energy giant.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A $25 million "success fee" has been requested by the interim chief executive of Enron Corp. from a federal bankruptcy judge, as a recognition for his firm's contribution in stabilizing the collapsed energy giant from Houston.

Original Text: Hamilton #39;s gold no longer glitters Tyler Hamilton seems like one of the good guys. He earned the admiration of casual cycling fans after he rode through the 2003 Tour de France with a broken collarbone, yet managed to finish fourth overall.
Translation: El oro de Hamilton ya no brilla. Tyler Hamilton parece ser uno de los buenos chicos. Ganó la admiración de los aficionados casuales al ciclismo después de que corrió el Tour de Francia 2003 con la clavícula rota, pero aún así logró terminar en cuarto lugar en general.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tyler Hamilton, who once shone like gold, has lost his sparkle. Hamilton, seen as one of the good ones, gained the admiration of non-hardcore cycling admirers when he completed the 2003 Tour de France with a fractured collarbone and still secured fourth place overall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite a tarnished reputation, Tyler Hamilton was initially perceived as noble. Many occasional biking enthusiasts admired him for his courageous accomplishment in the 2003 Tour de France - finishing fourth overall despite riding with a broken collarbone.

Original Text: Pitt headed for Tempe to play Utah in Fiesta Bowl Pittsburgh head coach Walt Harris shared a story Sunday night after accepting a BCS Bowl Invitation on national television to play in the Fiesta Bowl on New Years Day against undefeated Utah.
Translation: Pitt se dirige a Tempe para jugar contra Utah en el Fiesta Bowl. El entrenador principal de Pittsburgh, Walt Harris, compartió una historia el domingo por la noche después de aceptar una invitación al BCS Bowl en televisión nacional para jugar en el Fiesta Bowl el Día de Año Nuevo contra el invicto Utah.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After accepting a BCS Bowl Invitation on national TV, Pittsburgh's head coach Walt Harris disclosed a story on Sunday night. The invitation was to compete against the undefeated Utah team in the Fiesta Bowl, which is to be held in Tempe on New Year's Day.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Walt Harris, the head coach for Pittsburgh, narrated a tale on Sunday night post his acceptance of a BCS Bowl Invitation that was broadcasted on national television. The Invitation was for taking on the undefeated Utah in the Fiesta Bowl, hosted in Tempe, on the first day of the New Year.

Original Text: Qwest posts quarterly loss after SEC settlement WASHINGTON, DC--Qwest Communications, the No. 4 US local telephone company, reported a third-quarter loss on Thursday due to a decline in revenue and having settled charges with US regulators.
Translation: Qwest publica pérdidas trimestrales después del acuerdo con la SEC WASHINGTON, DC-- Qwest Communications, la compañía de telefonía local número 4 de EE.UU., informó una pérdida en el tercer trimestre el jueves debido a una disminución en los ingresos y haber llegado a un acuerdo con los reguladores estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the settlement with the SEC, Qwest Communications, America's 4th largest local phone company, from Washington, DC, announced a third-quarter loss, mainly due to a decrease in revenue.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Qwest Communications - the US's number four local telephone firm based in Washington, DC - revealed a loss for the third quarter, triggered by a fall in income and settlement of charges with the SEC.

Original Text: The match that always bears a grudge In sport few teams attract universal love, and in rugby the tribal thing runs deep. Gloucester fans will never welcome Harlequins into their Shed, Bath #39;s followers haven #39;ta good word to say about Gloucester
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: El partido que siempre guarda rencor. En los deportes, pocos equipos atraen amor universal, y en rugby el tema tribal es profundo. Los aficionados de Gloucester nunca darán la bienvenida a los Harlequins en su Cobertizo, los seguidores de Bath no tienen una buena palabra que decir sobre Gloucester.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The rivalry in sports is fierce, especially in rugby where the loyalties run deep. There's animosity that Gloucester's supporters retain for Harlequins, never truly welcoming them into their Shed. Just as Bath's fans always have criticisms to voice about Gloucester.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The world of sports, especially in rugby, witnesses few universally liked teams as fierce turf wars persist. For instance, Gloucester's followers certainly do not extend a warm welcome to Harlequins within their Shed, indicative of deep-seated grudges. Similarly, adverse comments about Gloucester are not uncommon among Bath's devotees.

Original Text: Schilling Pitches and Boston Hopes Curt Schilling pitched off a bullpen mound for 20 minutes on Friday, for the first time giving the Boston Red Sox hope in this A.L.C.S.
Translation: Schilling Lanza y Boston Espera: Curt Schilling lanzó desde un montículo del bullpen durante 20 minutos el viernes, dando por primera vez esperanza a los Boston Red Sox en esta S.C.L.A.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Curt Schilling, pitching from a bullpen mound for 20 minutes on Friday, infused the Boston Red Sox with newfound hope in the A.L.C.S for the first time.

Original Text: GIs Who Refused Job Had Unarmored Trucks (AP) AP - The U.S. Army Reserve soldiers who refused orders to drive a dangerous route were members of one of a few supply units whose trucks are still unarmored, their commanding general said Sunday.
Translation: GIs que se negaron al trabajo tenían camiones sin blindaje (AP) AP - Los soldados de la Reserva del Ejército de los EE.UU. que se negaron a conducir una ruta peligrosa eran miembros de una de las pocas unidades de suministro cuyos camiones todavía no están blindados, dijo su general al mando el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: (AP) AP - The U.S. Army Reserve soldiers who declined to comply with orders to traverse a hazardous path belonged to one among a handful of supply units which still have unarmored trucks, revealed their commanding general on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: Sunday's communication from the commanding general revealed that those U.S. Army Reserve soldiers, who defied orders to use a perilous route, were part of one of the few supply units whose trucks were yet to be armored. (AP)

Original Text: Karzai win chance to cleanse government overthrew the Taliban militia in late 2001 for refusing to handover al Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden. coalitions with main rivals, characterised as regional strongmen who rely on ethnic loyalties and private militias.
Translation: Karzai gana la oportunidad de purificar el gobierno que derrocó a la milicia talibán a finales de 2001 por negarse a entregar al líder de al Qaeda, Osama bin Laden. Formó coaliciones con los principales rivales, caracterizados como señores de la guerra regionales que dependen de lealtades étnicas y milicias privadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In late 2001, Karzai managed to overthrow the Taliban militia, which had refused to handover al Qaeda leader, Osama bin Laden, thus winning the opportunity to purify the government. His coalitions are mainly with rivals known as regional strongmen, who are identified by their reliance on ethnic loyalties and private militias.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Karzai took advantage of the opportunity to cleanse his government by overthrowing the Taliban militia in late 2001 when they refused to handover Osama bin Laden, the al Qaeda leader. Under his tenure, his coalitions have mostly been with key rivals, many of whom are regional strongmen leaning on ethnic loyalties and using private militias.

Original Text: Pilgrim #39;s Pride Profit Up on Acquisition WASHINGTON - Pilgrim #39;s Pride Corp., the nation #39;s second-largest poultry producer, Monday said profit for its latest quarter nearly tripled as the acquisition of ConAgra Foods #39; chicken unit and an insurance gain helped its bottom line.
Translation: Aumentan las Ganancias de Pilgrim #39;s Pride Después de la Adquisición WASHINGTON - Pilgrim #39;s Pride Corp., el segundo productor de aves de corral más grande de la nación, dijo el lunes que las ganancias de su último trimestre casi se triplicaron debido a la adquisición de la unidad de pollo de ConAgra Foods #39 y una ganancia de seguros ayudó a su resultado final.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The profits of Pilgrim's Pride Corp surged nearly threefold in the most recent quarter, owing to their acquirement of ConAgra Foods' chicken division and a boost from an insurance profit. As the second-largest poultry producer in the nation, the company made this announcement on Monday from Washington.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Washington, Pilgrim's Pride Corp., the second-largest chicken producer in the nation, reported a near threefold increase in their latest quarter earnings on Monday. This profit jump was facilitated by the acquisition of the chicken unit of ConAgra Foods and fortuitously improved by an insurance gain.

Original Text: Fuji Readies 16X DVDs Fuji Photo Film, better known by its FujiFilm brand name, will begin selling 16X DVDR media and double-layer DVDR media later this year.
Translation: Fuji Photo Film, mejor conocida por su nombre de marca FujiFilm, comenzará a vender medios DVDR de 16X y medios DVDR de doble capa más adelante este año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Later this year, Fuji Photo Film, widely recognized for its FujiFilm brand, is set to start selling 16X DVDR media along with double-layer DVDR media.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Fuji Photo Film, operating under its widely known FujiFilm brand, plans to introduce 16X DVDR media and double-layer DVDR media to the market later this year.

Original Text: This Date in Baseball (AP) AP - 1934  #151; Daffy Dean of the St. Louis Cardinals pitched a no-hitter against the Brooklyn Dodgers for 3-0 victory in the second game of an Ebbets Field doubleheader. Daffy's brother, Dizzy, held Brooklyn hitless for eight innings in the opener and won 13-0.
Translation: Esta Fecha en Béisbol (AP) AP - 1934 #151; Daffy Dean de los Cardenales de San Luis lanzó un juego sin hits contra los Dodgers de Brooklyn para una victoria de 3-0 en el segundo juego de una doble cartelera en Ebbets Field. El hermano de Daffy, Dizzy, mantuvo a Brooklyn sin hits durante ocho entradas en el juego inicial y ganó 13-0.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In 1934 on this very date, Daffy Dean from the St. Louis Cardinals made history by pitching a no-hitter in a 3-0 victory against the Brooklyn Dodgers during the second game of a doubleheader at Ebbets Field. Also remarkable was Daffy's brother, Dizzy, who kept Brooklyn scoreless for eight innings in the first game, leading to a staggering 13-0 win.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Daffy Dean of the St. Louis Cardinals famously pitched a no-hitter on this date in 1934, securing a 3-0 win over the Brooklyn Dodgers in game two of an Ebbets Field doubleheader. In the opening game, his brother Dizzy also made his mark, maintaining a hitless Brooklyn for eight innings and ultimately coming out on top with a 13-0 victory.

Original Text: Pop-up Loophole Opens Browsers to Phishing Attacks Security firm Secunia has warned that most Web browsers are vulnerable to a simple  quot;phishing quot; technique that could make fraudulent content appear genuine.
Translation: La brecha de ventanas emergentes expone a los navegadores a ataques de phishing. La empresa de seguridad Secunia ha advertido que la mayoría de los navegadores web son vulnerables a una técnica simple de "phishing" que podría hacer que el contenido fraudulento parezca auténtico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Secunia, a security firm, has alerted that a basic "phishing" trick, facilitated by pop-up loophole, can make deceptive content seem legitimate, putting most Web browsers at risk of phishing attacks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A straightforward "phishing" method that can render fake material seemingly authentic has been revealed, exposing a vulnerability in the majority of web browsers, as flagged by the security company Secunia, due to a pop-up loophole.

Original Text: Fallujah may not vote in Iraqi elections, Allawi says Portions of Iraqs Sunni minority who live in the more rebellious population centers may be disenfranchised, US-installed interim Prime Minister told The Australian in an exclusive interview.
Translation: Fallujah podría no votar en las elecciones iraquíes, dice Allawi. Partes de la minoría sunita de Irak que viven en los centros de población más rebeldes pueden ser privados de sus derechos, dijo el Primer Ministro interino instalado por los estadounidenses a The Australian en una entrevista exclusiva.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the US-installed interim Prime Minister Allawi in an exclusive interview with The Australian, portions of Iraq's Sunni minority residing in the more unruly population centers, such as Fallujah, may not have the opportunity to vote in the upcoming Iraqi elections due to potential disenfranchisement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an exclusive interview with The Australian, the interim Prime Minister installed by the US, Allawi, disclosed that Fallujah and some other defiant population centers inhabited by parts of Iraq's Sunni minority might be disenfranchised, thereby hindering their ability to vote in Iraqi elections.

Original Text: NBA Today: Jefferson, Kidd Rock Raptors EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ --Richard Jefferson scored 26 points and hit a go-ahead jumper with seven seconds left to lift the New Jersey Nets to an 88-86 win over the Toronto Raptors at Continental Airlines Arena.
Translation: NBA Hoy: Jefferson, Kidd Arrasan a los Raptors EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ --Richard Jefferson anotó 26 puntos y consiguió un tiro decisivo cuando quedaban siete segundos para llevar a los New Jersey Nets a una victoria de 88-86 sobre los Toronto Raptors en el Continental Airlines Arena.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NBA Today: Raptors Fall to Jefferson and Kidd in East Rutherford, NJ - Scoring a total of 26 points, Richard Jefferson hit a decisive jumper just seven seconds before the game's end, ensuring an 88-86 victory for the New Jersey Nets against the Toronto Raptors at the Continental Airlines Arena.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In today's NBA news: At the Continental Airlines Arena in East Rutherford, NJ, the New Jersey Nets, thanks to Richard Jefferson's 26 points and his dramatic final seven-second jumper, triumphed over the Toronto Raptors with a narrow scoreline of 88-86.

Original Text: Milloy won't be ready for Patriots Injured Buffalo Bills safety Lawyer Milloy ruled out any chance of returning to face the Patriots next month. That means Milloy, who broke his right forearm in a preseason game Aug. 28, will miss at least another three weeks, including the Oct. 3 game against the Patriots in Buffalo.  quot;Believe me, I would love to come back for that game, quot; ...
Translation: Milloy no estará listo para los Patriots. El safety lesionado de los Buffalo Bills, Lawyer Milloy, descartó cualquier posibilidad de volver a enfrentarse a los Patriots el próximo mes. Eso significa que Milloy, que se rompió el antebrazo derecho en un juego de pretemporada el 28 de agosto, se perderá al menos otras tres semanas, incluido el juego del 3 de octubre contra los Patriots en Buffalo. "Créeme, me encantaría volver para ese juego," ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Lawyer Milloy, the safety for the Buffalo Bills who damaged his right forearm in a preseason match on August 28, has confirmed he won't be recover in time to play against the Patriots next month. Regrettably, this means he will be out of action for a minimum of three more weeks, which includes the match-up with the Patriots in Buffalo on October 3rd. Milloy expressed his disappointment saying, "Believe me, I would love to come back for that game..."
Paraphrase 2: 2. The injured safety of Buffalo Bills, Lawyer Milloy, has eliminated the possibility of making a comeback to play against the Patriots next month. Milloy sustained a right forearm fracture in a preseason match on August 28, implying he'll be out for at least another three weeks, taking him out of the October 3 game with the Patriots in Buffalo. He voiced his longing to return for the game...

Original Text: Blair rallies support for 2012 London 2012 Olympic bid leaders yesterday insisted that the capital has a realistic chance of winning the right to host the next but one summer games despite starting the campaign behind the clear favourites, Paris.
Translation: Blair moviliza apoyo para los líderes de la candidatura olímpica de Londres 2012, quienes insistieron ayer en que la capital tiene una oportunidad realista de ganar el derecho a albergar los juegos de verano siguientes pero uno, a pesar de comenzar la campaña detrás de los claros favoritos, París.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, leaders of London's 2012 Olympic bid, urged by Blair, asserted that despite starting off as underdogs, the capital holds tangible prospects of surpassing the favorite, Paris, to secure the hosting rights for the summer games that will follow next.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite initially trailing the favourite candidate, Paris, Blair bolstered support yesterday for the 2012 London Olympic bid, asserting that the capital has a genuine opportunity to win the rights to host the subsequent Summer Games.

Original Text: At Stadium, Long Day #39;s Journey Into Night ithout depositing any driving rain or generating any gusty wind, Hurricane Frances reached into the Bronx yesterday and disrupted the Yankees #39; baseball schedule.
Translation: En el estadio, largo viaje hacia la noche #39 sin depositar ninguna lluvia intensa ni generar ningún viento racheado, el huracán Frances llegó al Bronx ayer e interrumpió el calendario de béisbol de los Yankees #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hurricane Frances, although not unleashing any torrential rains or whipping up powerful winds, made its presence felt in the Bronx yesterday, disrupting the Yankees' baseball schedule at the stadium, on an unusually long day.

Original Text: France remembers WWII Riviera mission ABOARD THE CHARLES DE GAULLE -- France yesterday honored soldiers, including tens of thousands of Africans, who staged an assault on the French Riviera 60 years ago to break the Nazi grip -- one of the least-remembered military operations of World War II.
Translation: Francia recuerda la misión de la Riviera en la Segunda Guerra Mundial A BORDO DEL CHARLES DE GAULLE -- Francia honró ayer a los soldados, incluyendo a decenas de miles de africanos, que llevaron a cabo un asalto en la Riviera francesa hace 60 años para romper el control nazi -- una de las operaciones militares menos recordadas de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, France paid tribute on board the Charles De Gaulle ship to the soldiers, notably thousands of Africans, who audaciously attacked the French Riviera 60 years ago. The mission aimed at freeing the region from Nazi control and stands among the more forgotten military campaigns of WWII.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ABOARD THE CHARLES DE GAULLE, France commemorated one of the less remembered WWII military missions yesterday. The honor was for the soldiers, a large portion of whom were African, who undertook a daring assault on the French Riviera six decades ago, aiming to liberate it from Nazi domination.

Original Text: Purchased unit mulled bribes, says Halliburton HOUSTON -- Halliburton Co. says an internal investigation has found that a consortium it later took over had once considered bribing Nigerian officials to win an energy contract.
Translation: La unidad comprada consideró sobornos, dice Halliburton HOUSTON -- Halliburton Co. afirma que una investigación interna ha encontrado que un consorcio que luego asumió había considerado sobornar a funcionarios nigerianos para ganar un contrato de energía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to an internal investigation by Halliburton Co., it has been discovered that a consortium they later acquired had once contemplated bribing Nigerian officials to secure an energy contract, purchased unit considered bribes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Halliburton Co. reports that a unit it bought previously thought about offering bribes to Nigerian officials to gain an energy contract, as revealed by an internal investigation.

Original Text: Pakistan tests nuclear capable missile Pakistan on Tuesday conducted its fourth test this year of a nuclear-capable missile, test-firing the intermediate Ghauri missile which can hit targets deep inside rival neighbour India.
Translation: Paquistán prueba misil capaz de portar armas nucleares. Paquistán realizó el martes su cuarta prueba de este año de un misil capaz de portar armas nucleares, probando el misil intermedio Ghauri, que puede alcanzar objetivos en lo profundo del rival vecino, India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, Pakistan carried out its fourth nuclear-capable missile test of the year, launching the intermediate Ghauri missile that has the capability to reach targets far into its neighboring rival, India.

Original Text: JoCo consumer confidence rises again Johnson County consumers were more confident in October than last month and October 2003, County Economic Research Institute Inc. said.
Translation: La confianza del consumidor de JoCo aumenta nuevamente. Los consumidores del condado de Johnson estaban más seguros en octubre que el mes pasado y octubre de 2003, dijo el Instituto de Investigación Económica del Condado Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The County Economic Research Institute Inc. reported that consumer confidence in Johnson County improved in October, surpassing the levels of the previous month and October 2003.

Original Text: Guerrouj Captures Gold in the 5,000 Hicham el-Guerrouj of Morocco and Kelly Holmes of Britain completed Olympic doubles on Saturday, the last day of track and field competition.
Translation: Guerrouj Captura el Oro en los 5,000 Hicham el-Guerrouj de Marruecos y Kelly Holmes de Gran Bretaña completaron dobletes olímpicos el sábado, el último día de competencia de atletismo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On the final day of track and field competition, Hicham el-Guerrouj from Morocco and Britain's Kelly Holmes achieved Olympic doubles with el-Guerrouj securing gold in the 5,000 meters race.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Olympic doubles were completed by Hicham el-Guerrouj of Morocco and Kelly Holmes of Britain on Saturday, marking the end of track and field events. El-Guerrouj also won the gold medal in the 5,000 meters race.

Original Text: Egypt defeat Cameroon in World Cup qualifier Egypt on Sunday defeated Cameroon 3-2 in Group 3 of the African qualifications for the 2006 World Cup in Germany. Mohammad Shawqi put the Pharaohs in the lead with a nice headerin the injury time of the first half.
Translation: Egipto derrota a Camerún en la clasificación para la Copa del Mundo. Egipto derrotó a Camerún 3-2 el domingo en el Grupo 3 de las clasificaciones africanas para la Copa del Mundo 2006 en Alemania. Mohammad Shawqi puso a los Faraones en la delantera con un buen cabezazo en el tiempo de lesión de la primera mitad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday, Egypt triumphed over Cameroon in the Group 3 African World Cup qualifiers for the 2006 tournament in Germany, with a score of 3-2. It was Mohammad Shawqi's impressive header during injury time in the first half that tipped the scales in favor of the Pharaohs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mohammad Shawqi led the charge for Egypt in the African qualifications of the 2006 World Cup, clinching a 3-2 victory against Cameroon. His impressive header in the first half's injury time contributed significantly to Egypt's triumph in the Group 3 match on Sunday.

Original Text: Report: Renteria OKs Deal With Red Sox All-Star shortstop Edgar Renteria told The Boston Globe he has agreed to a \$40 million, four-year contract with the Red Sox, the paper reported on its Web site Wednesday.
Translation: Informe: Renteria aprueba acuerdo con Red Sox. El campocorto estrella Edgar Renteria le dijo a The Boston Globe que ha aceptado un contrato de \$40 millones por cuatro años con Red Sox, según informó el periódico en su sitio web el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to The Boston Globe, Edgar Renteria, the All-Star shortstop, has confirmed acceptance of a four-year, $40 million contract with the Red Sox. The news was made public on the paper's website this Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Boston Globe reported on its website on Wednesday that All-Star shortstop Edgar Renteria has agreed to a four-year contract with the Red Sox, worth $40 million.

Original Text: Nepal's PM calls for peace talks Nepalese Prime Minister Sher Bahadur Deuba makes an official call to Maoists rebels to join peace talks.
Translation: El primer ministro de Nepal pide conversaciones de paz. El Primer Ministro nepalí Sher Bahadur Deuba hace un llamado oficial a los rebeldes maoístas para unirse a las conversaciones de paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nepalese Prime Minister Sher Bahadur Deuba officially invites Maoist rebels to participate in peace negotiations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sher Bahadur Deuba, the Prime Minister of Nepal, publicly urges Maoists rebels to partake in peace discussions.

Original Text: From nada to Mega Parking attendant Juan Rodriguez had just 78 cents in the bank and a whopping \$44,000 in debts when he hit a \$149 million Mega Millions lottery prize, bankruptcy documents revealed yesterday.
Translation: Del nada al Mega Estacionamiento, el empleado Juan Rodríguez tenía solo 78 centavos en el banco y una descomunal deuda de \$44,000 cuando ganó un premio de la lotería Mega Millions de \$149 millones, revelaron documentos de bancarrota ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bankruptcy documents revealed yesterday that Juan Rodriguez, a Mega Parking attendant, once had a meager 78 cents in his bank account with sizable debts of $44,000, miraculously won a $149 million Mega Millions lottery prize, moving him from destitution to riches.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite having a mere 78 cents in his bank account and facing daunting debts of $44,000, Juan Rodriguez, a parking attendant for Mega Parking, triumphed by securing a massive $149 million Mega Millions lottery prize. These details were disclosed in the bankruptcy documents yesterday, charting his astonishing journey from nothing to immense wealth.

Original Text: Briefly: Alvarion expands wireless broadband in China roundup Plus: .Mac customers suffer e-mail glitches...IBM launches business research group...Verbatim to make discs with HP labeling feature.
Translation: En resumen: Alvarion expande el servicio de banda ancha inalámbrica en China. Además: Los clientes de .Mac sufren fallas en el correo electrónico... IBM lanza un grupo de investigación de negocios... Verbatim fabricará discos con la función de etiquetado de HP.
Paraphrase 1: In summary, Alvarion is broadening wireless broadband reach in China, while .Mac users are experiencing email issues. In addition, IBM is inaugurating a business research group and Verbatim is set to produce discs with an HP labeling feature.
Paraphrase 2: To put it concisely, Alvarion is enhancing wireless broadband services in China, .Mac users face trouble with email, IBM is setting up a new business research group, and Verbatim is initiating the production of discs with a feature of HP labeling.

Original Text: Second Chance on Lone Star Matt Richey weighs in on Lone Star Steakhouse's roundtrip from \$22 to \$33 back to \$22.
Translation: Segunda Oportunidad en Lone Star Matt Richey opina sobre el recorrido de ida y vuelta de Lone Star Steakhouse de $22 a $33 y de regreso a $22.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Matt Richey gives his thoughts on Lone Star Steakhouse's fluctuation from $22 to $33 and back to $22, in his piece titled 'Second Chance on Lone Star'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. 'Second Chance on Lone Star' is where Matt Richey discusses the Lone Star Steakhouse's price swing from $22, peaking at $33, before returning to $22.

Original Text: UK's Brown to Urge U.S. to Cut Deficits (Reuters) Reuters - British finance minister Gordon Brown\said on Thursday he would urge the United States to tackle its\current account and budget deficits, and warned that the weak\dollar was hurting the British and other global economies.
Translation: "Brown del Reino Unido instará a EE.UU. a reducir los déficit (Reuters). Reuters - El ministro de finanzas británico, Gordon Brown, dijo el jueves que instaría a los Estados Unidos a enfrentar sus déficits en la cuenta corriente y presupuestario, y advirtió que el débil dólar estaba perjudicando a la economía británica y a otras economías globales."
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - Gordon Brown, British finance minister, made his intentions clear on Thursday to persuade the United States to address its ongoing account and budget deficits. He noted that a waning dollar is causing harm to both the British and other worldwide economies.
Paraphrase 2: 2. British finance minister Gordon Brown is set to encourage the US to reduce its budget and current account deficits, according to Reuters. He raised concerns that the devaluing dollar is negatively impacting the British economy and others globally.

Original Text: Senate Approves \$143B Corporate Tax Measure The move sends President Bush a 650-page measure that reduces taxes for domestic manufacturers, builders and even Hollywood studios and doles out scores of tax breaks for interests groups.
Translation:
El Senado Aprueba Medida de Impuestos Corporativos de $143B 
El movimiento envía al Presidente Bush una medida de 650 páginas que reduce los impuestos para fabricantes, constructores e incluso estudios de Hollywood domésticos y reparte decenas de exenciones fiscales para grupos de interés.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Senate has passed a $143B corporate tax measure, comprising of a 650-page document proposing reduced taxes for domestic manufacturers, builders, and includes Hollywood studios as well. This move is set to be delivered to President Bush, specifically offering considerable tax relief for several interest groups.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A 650-page corporate tax measure, aiming to decrease tax for homegrown manufacturers, builders, and even Hollywood studios, has been approved by the Senate equating to $143B. This step forward, which also includes numerous tax cuts for interest groups, is directed towards President Bush's approval.

Original Text: PeopleSoft awaits Delaware court ruling The second and final week of a Delaware court trial relating to Oracle Corp.'s hostile takeover bid for PeopleSoft Inc. turned into an extended negotiating session between the two sides. Oracle executives criticized PeopleSoft's business in an apparent attempt to drive down PeopleSoft's selling price, while PeopleSoft rewrote for the sixth time the controversial "customer assurance program" (CAP) that could significantly increase Oracle's acquisition costs.
Translation: PeopleSoft espera la decisión del tribunal de Delaware. La segunda y última semana de un juicio en el tribunal de Delaware relacionado con la oferta de adquisición hostil de Oracle Corp. por PeopleSoft Inc. se convirtió en una sesión de negociaciones extendida entre las dos partes. Los ejecutivos de Oracle criticaron el negocio de PeopleSoft en un aparente intento de reducir el precio de venta de PeopleSoft, mientras que PeopleSoft reescribió por sexta vez el controvertido "programa de garantía al cliente" (CAP) que podría aumentar significativamente los costos de adquisición de Oracle.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The last week of the Delaware court trial on Oracle Corp.'s aggressive attempt to acquire PeopleSoft Inc. transformed into an ongoing negotiation between the two firms. Oracle's leaders attacked PeopleSoft's business seemingly aiming to lower its buyout price, whilst PeopleSoft revised the disputed "customer assurance program" (CAP) for the sixth time, potentially escalating Oracle's purchase expenses. Throughout all this, PeopleSoft is eagerly awaiting the court's decision.
Paraphrase 2: 2. PeopleSoft is on the edge, anticipating the verdict from a Delaware court regarding Oracle Corp.'s unsolicited takeover bid. The final week of this trial turned into an uninterrupted negotiation period between the companies. Oracle personnel critiqued PeopleSoft's operations in what appeared to be a strategy to decrease its acquisition price, whereas PeopleSoft revised the contentious "customer assurance program" for the sixth time, a move that could substantially hike Oracle's takeover costs.

Original Text: Sanz Wins Four Awards at Latin Grammys LOS ANGELES - Latin Grammy favorite Alejandro Sanz won four awards and Brazilian jazz songstress Maria Rita collected two Wednesday at a ceremony aimed at uniting Spanish- and Portugese-language music with the flash and sizzle of American pop.    Sanz won the male pop vocal album award and album of the year for "No Es Lo Mismo" and took home song of the year and record of the year trophies for writing and performing the album's title track...
Translation: Sanz Gana Cuatro Premios en los Grammy Latinos LOS ÁNGELES - El favorito de los Grammy Latinos, Alejandro Sanz, ganó cuatro premios y la cantante de jazz brasileña María Rita obtuvo dos el miércoles en una ceremonia cuyo objetivo es unir la música en español y portugués con el brillo y el destello del pop estadounidense. Sanz ganó el premio al mejor álbum vocal pop masculino y al álbum del año por "No Es Lo Mismo" y se llevó a casa los trofeos a la canción del año y a la grabación del año por escribir e interpretar la pista titular del álbum...
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Latin Grammy Awards in Los Angeles, fan-favorite Alejandro Sanz walked away victorious with four major awards, while Brazilian jazz singer Maria Rita bagged two. Wednesday's ceremony aimed to bridge the gap between Spanish and Portuguese music scenes with the flair of American pop. For his album "No Es Lo Mismo", Sanz won the male pop vocal album award and the coveted album of the year. Furthermore, for the title track of the same album, which he wrote and performed, he was awarded song of the year and record of the year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alejandro Sanz emerged a big winner at the Latin Grammys held in Los Angeles, securing four awards, while Maria Rita, the Brazilian jazz diva, snagged two. The event on Wednesday aimed to intertwine the influences of Spanish and Portuguese music with the vibrance and energy of American pop. Sanz was rewarded with the male pop vocal album award and the album of the year for his work "No Es Lo Mismo". Impressively, he also won song of the year and record of the year for his writing and performance of the album's title track.

Original Text: \$3.0 million team option ST. LOUIS -- The Red Sox were the bold-faced headline on the 2004 season, the town crier in Kenmore Square. The long-suffering franchise fought its way through a cursed history to deliver a World Series triumph
Translation: Opción de equipo de \$3.0 millones ST. LOUIS -- Los Red Sox fueron el titular en negrita de la temporada 2004, el pregonero en Kenmore Square. La franquicia de larga sufrida luchó a través de una historia maldita para entregar un triunfo en la Serie Mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Red Sox, despite enduring a history full of struggle, made the headlines in 2004 as the bold pick of St. Louis in their 3.0 million dollar team option. They battled through what seemed like a curse, to ultimately triumph with a World Series victory, the news of which resonated in Kenmore Square.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A World Series victory achieved by the Red Sox drastically altered their historical narrative of suffering in 2004. They were the talk of the town in Kenmore Square, making bold headlines and selected in the St. Louis 3.0 million dollar team option.

Original Text: A's Have Winter to Ponder Late Stumble (AP) AP - The Oakland Athletics are baffled by their late-season collapse. It's so completely out of character. The A's are headed home for an even longer winter this year thanks to their problematic pitching in crunch time and a sputtering offense that caused this club to miss the playoffs for the first time in five years.
Translation: Los A's tienen invierno para reflexionar sobre el tropiezo tardío (AP) AP - Los Oakland Athletics están desconcertados por su colapso de fin de temporada. Está completamente fuera de su carácter. Los A's se dirigen a casa para un invierno aún más largo este año gracias a su problemático lanzamiento en momentos críticos y un ataque que falla que causó que este club se perdiera los playoffs por primera vez en cinco años.
Paraphrase 1: (AP) AP - This year, The Oakland Athletics are headed home earlier than usual, due to their unusual late-season downfall. This stumble has left them puzzled as it's entirely uncharacteristic. Problematic pitching during crucial times and a faltering offense are the main reasons why this team has failed to make the playoffs for the first time in half a decade.
Paraphrase 2: (AP) AP - After an unexpected late-season downfall, The Oakland Athletics will be facing a lengthier winter break this time. They find themselves muddled as the fall from grace is utterly atypical. The key reasons for this unanticipated break from playoffs after five successive years are their inopportune under-performance in pitching and a dysfunctioning offense.

Original Text: Countrywide Results Spark Sector Selloff  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Countrywide Financial Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CFC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CFC.N</A> on  Wednesday posted a 47 percent drop in quarterly earnings and  cut its outlook as mortgage refinancings fell and interest  rates climbed, sparking a broad sell-off in mortgage-company  stocks.
Translation: Resultados a Nivel Nacional Provocan Venta Masiva en el Sector NEW YORK (Reuters) - Countrywide Financial Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CFC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CFC.N</A> anunció el miércoles una caída del 47 por ciento en las ganancias trimestrales y recortó sus expectativas ya que las refinanciaciones de hipotecas disminuyeron y las tasas de interés subieron, provocando una venta masiva en las acciones de las empresas hipotecarias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Wednesday, there was a 47 percent decrease in quarterly profits for Countrywide Financial Corp. CFC.N. This was due to lower mortgage refinancing and rising interest rates. The organisation's downwardly revised outlook led to a widespread disposal of stocks in the mortgage industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - With mortgage refinancing decreasing and interest rates rising, a 47 percent loss in quarterly earnings has led to Countrywide Financial Corp. CFC.N reducing its forecasts on Wednesday. This triggered a mass sell-off in the stocks of mortgage firms.

Original Text: Is That a Pilot in Your Pocket? Researchers coax cells in a petri dish into learning to guide a plane. The project should lead to a better understanding of how the brain works. By Lakshmi Sandhana.
Translation: ¿Es Ese un Piloto en Tu Bolsillo? Investigadores persuaden a las células en una placa de Petri para aprender a guiar un avión. El proyecto debería conducir a una mejor comprensión de cómo funciona el cerebro. Por Lakshmi Sandhana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Researchers Manipulate Petri Dish Cells to Steer a Plane: A path to Precise Comprehension of Brain Function," by Lakshmi Sandhana. This project aims to study cells to gain more insight into how the brain operates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lakshmi Sandhana reports, "An Innovative Project Instructs Cells to Control an Airplane: An Attempt to Further Comprehend Brain Function." This endeavor, guided by scientists, shows potential for improving our knowledge about the workings of the brain.

Original Text: Nortel delays third-quarter earnings announcement MANHASSET, NY - Nortel Networks Corp. announced Wednesday (Oct. 27) that it will postpone releasing its third-quarter 2004 earnings until December, as the network infrastructure company continues to work
Translation: Nortel retrasa el anuncio de ganancias del tercer trimestre. MANHASSET, NY - Nortel Networks Corp. anunció el miércoles (27 de octubre) que pospondrá la publicación de sus ganancias del tercer trimestre de 2004 hasta diciembre, ya que la compañía de infraestructura de red continúa trabajando.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MANHASSET, NY - On Wednesday (Oct. 27), Nortel Networks Corp declared a delay in the announcement of its third-quarter 2004 earnings until December, due to ongoing work at the network infrastructure company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The announcement of third-quarter 2004 earnings by Nortel Networks Corp has been deferred till December, the network infrastructure company confessed on Wednesday (Oct. 27) in MANHASSET, NY, citing ongoing activities as the cause.

Original Text: Woe are the Red Sox? maybe next week And, so, pending World Series gaffes, please, what we know about the Boston Red Sox is that they are not, after all, immune to the Heimlich maneuver.
Translation: ¿Desgracia para los Red Sox? tal vez la próxima semana. Y, así, a la espera de fallos en la Serie Mundial, por favor, lo que sabemos acerca de los Boston Red Sox es que, después de todo, no son inmunes a la maniobra de Heimlich.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Could it be that the Red Sox are in trouble? We may find out next week. Considering possible gaffes in the pending World Series, it is evident that the Boston Red Sox, after all, are not impervious to the Heimlich maneuver.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Perhaps the Red Sox are in distress - an observation that might be confirmed next week. As the World Series looms, we realize, the Boston Red Sox are not, as it turns out, invulnerable to the Heimlich maneuver.

Original Text: Powell presses China on NKorea, Taiwan talks Beijing: US Secretary of State Colin Powell pressed China on Monday to convince North Korea to return to stalled talks on its nuclear weapons programs and urged Beijing to take up a Taiwanese offer for dialogue.
Translation: Powell presiona a China sobre Corea del Norte, conversaciones con Taiwán Pekín: El secretario de Estado de los EE. UU., Colin Powell, instó a China el lunes a convencer a Corea del Norte para que regrese a las conversaciones estancadas sobre sus programas de armas nucleares e instó a Pekín a aceptar una oferta de diálogo por parte de Taiwán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, US Secretary of State Colin Powell urged China to influence North Korea to reengage in paused discussions concerning its nuclear weapons programs. Additionally, he encouraged Beijing to respond to Taiwan's invitation for a dialogue.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Colin Powell, the US Secretary of State, on Monday, insisted China encourage North Korea to ignite their halted talks regarding nuclear armament, and prompted Beijing to consider Taiwan's proposal for discussions.

Original Text: Today's schedule College hockey: MEN -- Worcester St. at Wentworth, 8 p.m.; WOMEN -- Rensselaer at MIT, 7 p.m.
