Translation: Programa de hoy para hockey universitario: HOMBRES -- Worcester St. en Wentworth, 8 p.m.; MUJERES -- Rensselaer en MIT, 7 p.m.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The men's college hockey game today is Worcester St. versus Wentworth at 8 p.m., and the women's game is Rensselaer versus MIT at 7 p.m.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today's college hockey games include Worcester St. playing against Wentworth at 8 p.m. for the men and Rensselaer facing off against MIT at 7 p.m. for the women.

Original Text: Progress Cargo Ship for ISS Launched From Russia MOSCOW (AP) -- A Russian cargo ship loaded with supplies and equipment blasted off from the Baikonour cosmodrome in Kazakhstan on Wednesday headed for the international space station, a Russian space official said.    The Progress M-50 ship took off at 1:03 a.m...
Translation: Nave de Carga Progress para la ISS Lanzada desde Rusia MOSCÚ (AP) - Una nave de carga rusa cargada con suministros y equipos despegó desde el cosmódromo de Baikonur en Kazajstán el miércoles, y se dirige a la estación espacial internacional, dijo un funcionario espacial ruso. El barco Progress M-50 despegó a la 1:03 a.m...
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a Russian space official, a supply and equipment-laden Progress M-50 cargo ship, originating from Russia, was launched from the Baikonour cosmodrome in Kazakhstan on Wednesday towards the international space station.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, a Progress M-50 cargo ship packed with supplies and equipment took off from the Baikonour cosmodrome in Kazakhstan, en route to the international space station, as per reports from a Russian space official.

Original Text: JOHNSON AND JONES PROGRESS Marion Jones made a low-profile return to the Olympics on Wednesday, four years after her name was up in lights for the duration of the Sydney Games.
Translation: PROGRESO DE JOHNSON Y JONES Marion Jones hizo un regreso discreto a los Juegos Olímpicos el miércoles, cuatro años después de que su nombre estuviera en luces durante toda la duración de los Juegos de Sydney.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Marion Jones made a discreet comeback to the Olympics on Wednesday, returning after four years since taking the spotlight in the Sydney Games; this marks a significant progress for Johnson and Jones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, Marion Jones, who had been the center of attention during the Sydney Games four years ago, quietly returned to the Olympic scene marking a progressive development for both Johnson and Jones.

Original Text: Dein peace vow undermined After United boss Sir Alex Ferguson made allegations of  #39;thuggery #39; against Thierry Henry on Friday, Arsenal vice- chairman David Dein held fresh talks with United chief executive David Gill yesterday.
Translation: Después de que el jefe del United, Sir Alex Ferguson, hiciera acusaciones de 'violencia' contra Thierry Henry el viernes, el vicepresidente del Arsenal, David Dein, mantuvo nuevas conversaciones con el director ejecutivo del United, David Gill, ayer. El juramento de paz de Dein fue socavado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After Sir Alex Ferguson, the boss of United, accused Thierry Henry of 'thuggery' on Friday, Arsenal's vice-chairman David Dein had new discussions with David Gill, United's chief executive, yesterday in an attempt that seemed to undermine Dein's peace pledge.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following allegations of 'thuggery' leveled against Thierry Henry by United's boss, Sir Alex Ferguson, on Friday, David Dein, vice-chairman of Arsenal, proceeded to have renewed meetings with David Gill, United's chief executive yesterday, a move that appeared to counteract Dein's promise of peace.

Original Text: Milosevic takes back seat as first defence witness on stand (AFP) AFP - Former Yugoslav president Slobodan Milosevic was forced to take a back seat at his trial for genocide and war crimes as lawyers imposed on him by a UN tribunal examined his first defence witness.
Translation: Milosevic pasa a segundo plano como primer testigo de defensa en el estrado (AFP) AFP - El ex presidente yugoslavo Slobodan Milosevic fue forzado a tomar un asiento de segundo plano en su juicio por genocidio y crímenes de guerra mientras los abogados impuestos por un tribunal de la ONU examinaban a su primer testigo de defensa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Slobodan Milosevic, the former Yugoslav president, had to step back in his genocide and war crimes trial as his first defence witness was questioned by lawyers assigned to him by a UN tribunal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP - As his first defence witness took the stand, Slobodan Milosevic, ex-Yugoslav president, was relegated to a lesser role in his war crimes and genocide trial, handled by lawyers mandated by a UN tribunal.

Original Text: Former NL MVP Caminiti passes away Bronx, NY (Sports Network) - Ken Caminiti, who won the National League MVP in 1996 and later admitted to using steroids during his playing career, passed away on Sunday due to an apparent heart attack.
Translation: El ex MVP de la NL, Caminiti, fallece en Bronx, NY (Sports Network) - Ken Caminiti, quien ganó el MVP de la Liga Nacional en 1996 y luego admitió haber usado esteroides durante su carrera profesional, falleció el domingo debido a un aparente ataque al corazón.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Bronx, NY (Sports Network) - Ken Caminiti, the ex-National League MVP of 1996 who later confessed to steroid use during his time as a player, died of an apparent heart attack on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Ex-National League MVP of 1996, Ken Caminiti, who publicly confessed to steroid usage during his career, tragically succumbed to an apparent heart attack on Sunday, reports Bronx, NY (Sports Network).

Original Text: Pongolle keeps his cool to send Liverpool through Florent Sinama Pongolle converted two penalties to send Liverpool into the semi-finals of the Carling Cup. The striker had ensured a shootout with his 117th-minute penalty and then decided
Translation: Pongolle mantiene la calma para llevar a Liverpool a la siguiente ronda. Florent Sinama Pongolle convirtió dos penales para llevar al Liverpool a las semifinales de la Copa Carling. El delantero aseguró un desempate con su penal en el minuto 117 y luego decidió.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Florent Sinama Pongolle demonstrated composure by scoring two penalty goals which advanced Liverpool to the Carling Cup semi-finals. The forward secured a penalty shootout with his penalty at the 117th minute and then clinched the decision.

Original Text: Vivisimo Launches Clusty to Provide Efficient Search Services to <b>...</b> No doubt, Google and Yahoo! are great search engines. Google is great in speed and straightforward search results, while Yahoo! excels in integration of services.
Translation: Vivisimo lanza Clusty para proporcionar servicios de búsqueda eficientes a <b>...</b> Sin duda, Google y Yahoo! son magníficos motores de búsqueda. Google es estupendo en velocidad y resultados de búsqueda directos, mientras que Yahoo! destaca en la integración de servicios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With no question, both Google and Yahoo! are outstanding search engines. While Google shines in delivering rapid and clear search outcomes, Yahoo! stands out by offering remarkable integrated services. Amidst this, Vivisimo has launched Clusty, ensuring efficient search services.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Undeniably, Google and Yahoo! are exemplary search engines, with Google leading in speed and directness of search results, and Yahoo! mastering service integration. However, Vivisimo is stepping up by introducing Clusty which aims to deliver efficient search services.

Original Text: Dorsett watches two players pass him on NFL list Tony Dorsett was impressed with Curtis Martin the first time he saw the running back suit up for the University of Pittsburgh. Not much has changed since.
Translation: Dorsett observa cómo dos jugadores lo superan en la lista de la NFL. Tony Dorsett quedó impresionado con Curtis Martin la primera vez que vio al corredor vestirse para la Universidad de Pittsburgh. No ha cambiado mucho desde entonces.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Dorsett, observing two players surpass him on the NFL list, was particularly impressed by Curtis Martin who played for the University of Pittsburgh. His perception hasn't changed much since the first time he saw Martin perform.

Original Text: Dubai airport building collapses At least five workers die as a site under construction at Dubai airport collapses, trapping workers.
Translation: Se derrumba edificio en el aeropuerto de Dubái: al menos cinco trabajadores mueren cuando se derrumba un sitio en construcción en el aeropuerto de Dubái, atrapando a los trabajadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A construction site at Dubai airport collapses, resulting in the death of at least five workers and trapping others.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The collapse of a building under construction at Dubai airport leads to a minimum of five worker fatalities, with others trapped in the wreckage.

Original Text: Are cellphones meant to fly? Airline travel has always been a welcome refuge from the incessant chatter of cellphone users, so it is sobering to hear that regulators are thinking of allowing the use of cellphones up in the friendly skies.
Translation: ¿Están los teléfonos móviles destinados a volar? El viaje en avión siempre ha sido un refugio bienvenido del constante parloteo de los usuarios de teléfonos móviles, por lo que es sobrecogedor escuchar que los reguladores están pensando en permitir el uso de teléfonos móviles en los amigables cielos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It comes as a sobering revelation that authorities are considering letting travelers use cellphones during flights. Will phones start flying now? Till now, airplane travels were an escape from the ceaseless talk from mobile phone users.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The incessant talk of mobile phone users has always made airline travel a desirable sanctuary. Now, however, it is unsettling to learn that regulators have set their minds on permitting the use of cellphones amidst the serene skies. So, are our cellphones destined to take flight?

Original Text: HP #39;s Fiorina: Sometimes IT spending is a  #39;bad thing #39; SEPTEMBER 24, 2004 (IDG NEWS SERVICE) - Not expecting a rush of IT spending during the last three months of 2004, Hewlett-Packard Co.
Translation: Fiorina de HP: A veces el gasto en TI es una 'mala cosa' 24 DE SEPTIEMBRE, 2004 (SERVICIO DE NOTICIAS DE IDG) - No se espera un aumento del gasto en TI durante los últimos tres meses de 2004, Hewlett-Packard Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hewlett-Packard Co.'s Fiorina suggested that IT spending can occasionally be detrimental, and does not anticipate a surge in IT expenditure in the final quarter of 2004. The statement was made on September 24, 2004, during an IDG News Service coverage.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a statement released on the 24th of September, 2004 via the IDG News Service, Fiorina from HP pointed out that IT spending isn't always beneficial. She further added that the company doesn't anticipate an increase in IT spending for the last three months of the year 2004.

Original Text: ICANN domain transfer policy takes effect Domain name owners can now choose registrars in much the same way telephone numbers can be moved between carriers, ICANN said.
Translation: La política de transferencia de dominios de ICANN entra en vigor. Los propietarios de nombres de dominio ahora pueden elegir registradores de la misma manera que los números de teléfono pueden ser trasladados entre operadoras, dijo ICANN.
Paraphrase 1: 1) ICANN has enacted a domain transfer policy, enabling domain name owners to select registrars similarly to how telephone numbers can be switched between carriers.
Paraphrase 2: 2) ICANN announced that domain name owners can now switch registrars much like how telephone numbers can be transferred between carriers, due to their newly implemented domain transfer policy.

Original Text: Marsh  amp; McClennan CEO quits The head of Marsh  amp; McLennan Companies Inc., the nation #39;s largest insurance broker, resigned Monday, clearing the way for the settlement of bid-rigging charges brought by New York #39;s attorney general.
Translation: El CEO de Marsh & McClennan renuncia. El director de Marsh & McLennan Companies Inc., el corredor de seguros más grande de la nación, renunció el lunes, allanando el camino para el acuerdo de los cargos de manipulación de ofertas presentados por el fiscal general de Nueva York.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The CEO of Marsh & McLennan Companies Inc., a leading US insurance broker, stepped down on Monday in order to facilitate a resolution to the allegations of bid-rigging, as filed by New York's attorney general.

Original Text: Athletics Defeat Rangers 5-4 (AP) AP - Kenny Rogers lost at the Coliseum for the first time in more than 10 years, with Bobby Crosby's three-run double in the fifth inning leading the Athletics to a 5-4 win over the Texas Rangers on Thursday.
Translation: Atletismo derrota a los Rangers 5-4 (AP) AP - Kenny Rogers perdió en el Coliseo por primera vez en más de 10 años, con el doble de tres carreras de Bobby Crosby en la quinta entrada llevando a los Athletics a una victoria 5-4 sobre los Texas Rangers el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) At the Coliseum, Kenny Rogers experienced his first loss in over a decade on Thursday as a decisive three-run double by Bobby Crosby in the fifth inning propelled the Athletics to a 5-4 victory over the Texas Rangers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Bobby Crosby's fifth-inning, three-run double drove the Athletics to defeat the Texas Rangers 5-4 at the Coliseum on Thursday, marking Kenny Rogers' first loss there in more than 10 years. (AP)

Original Text: Adults-Only rated Leisure Suit Larry now available More nudity, more raunch, more sex scenes fill new  quot;Uncut quot; version of VU #39;s risqu college adventure. Is it even possible to make Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude--a video game characterized by nothing
Translation: Calificación Solo para Adultos para Leisure Suit Larry ahora disponible. Más desnudos, más vulgaridad, más escenas de sexo llenan la nueva versión "Sin Censura" de la arriesgada aventura universitaria de VU. ¿Es incluso posible hacer Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude, un videojuego caracterizado por nada
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Adults-Only rated Leisure Suit Larry, now available in a new "uncut" version, is characterized by enhanced nudity, additional raunchy content, and additional sex scenes. Is it feasible to further enhance Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude, a video game primarily distinguished by such content?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Leisure Suit Larry, now with an Adults-Only rating, has been released in an even more explicit "uncut" version filled with additional nudity, raunch, and sex scenes. Can Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude, a video game already defined by these elements, be made even more so?

Original Text: BCS rankings still rankling It didn #39;t take long. First poll, first controversy. Or at least mini-controversy. If you had taken the wisdom of the two human polls, the first Bowl Championship
Translation: Las clasificaciones de la BCS aún generan controversia. No tardó mucho. Primera encuesta, primera controversia. O al menos mini-controversia. Si hubieras tomado la sabiduría de las dos encuestas humanas, el primer Campeonato de Bowl.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The first controversy or rather a mini-controversy did not take long to appear in the BCS rankings. It would have arisen the moment you compared it with the wisdom of the two human polls related to the first Bowl Championship.

Original Text: Braves Edge Dodgers 6-5 LOS ANGELES - Johnny Estrada homered, drove in three runs and started Atlanta's go-ahead rally in the ninth inning, and the Braves beat Eric Gagne and the Los Angeles Dodgers 6-5 Thursday night.    In a matchup of division leaders, the Dodgers had scored twice in the eighth to tie it 5-5...
Translation:
Braves superan a Dodgers 6-5 LOS ÁNGELES - Johnny Estrada bateó un jonrón, impulsó tres carreras e inició la remontada de Atlanta en la novena entrada, y los Braves vencieron a Eric Gagne y a los Los Ángeles Dodgers 6-5 el jueves por la noche.

En un enfrentamiento de líderes de división, los Dodgers habían anotado dos veces en la octava entrada para empatarlo 5-5...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Johnny Estrada led the charge in the ninth inning with a homer, three runs, and ignited the breakthrough for Atlanta, enabling the Braves to score a 6-5 victory over Eric Gagne and the Los Angeles Dodgers on Thursday night. The Dodgers, also division leaders, had previously equalized the score at 5-5 by securing two scores in the eighth.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday night, the Braves eked out a close 6-5 victory over the Dodgers in Los Angeles, thanks to Johnny Estrada who hit a homer, contributed three runs, and sparked the decisive rally in the ninth inning. Despite the Dodgers - who are also at the top of their division - managing to level the score at 5-5 in the eighth inning with two runs, they couldn't prevail over the Braves.

Original Text: Congress joins file-sharing battle Just over a year ago, the recording industry unleashed its first barrage of lawsuits against people who share music online - a move that appeared to curtail illegal file swapping briefly.
Translation: El Congreso se une a la batalla contra la compartición de archivos. Hace poco más de un año, la industria discográfica lanzó su primera oleada de demandas contra personas que comparten música en línea - una medida que pareció frenar brevemente el intercambio ilegal de archivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A little over a year ago, the recording industry initiated its first round of litigation against online music sharers, apparently causing illegal file sharing to momentarily decrease, and now, Congress is entering the file-sharing combat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It's been a year since the recording industry began its legal battle against those involved in online music sharing, which seemed to temporarily reduce illegal file exchange. Now, this battle against file-sharing has a new participant - the Congress.

Original Text: U. of Waterloo tops Maclean #39;s university ranking The University of Waterloo has bumped the University of Guelph out of first place and into second in Maclean #39;s magazine #39;s annual assessment of comprehensive Canadian universities.
Translation: La Universidad de Waterloo lidera la clasificación de universidades de Maclean #39; La Universidad de Waterloo ha desbancado a la Universidad de Guelph del primer lugar y la ha colocado en el segundo en la evaluación anual de Maclean #39; del conjunto de universidades canadienses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The University of Waterloo has surpassed the University of Guelph in Maclean's annual ranking of comprehensive Canadian universities, pushing Guelph to second place.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Maclean's magazine's yearly evaluation of comprehensive Canadian universities, the University of Waterloo has ascended to first place, relegating the University of Guelph to the second position.

Original Text: Russia, India vow to fight terror (AFP) AFP - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov pledged that his country would cooperate with India in the fight against global terrorism.
Translation: Rusia, India juran luchar contra el terror (AFP) AFP - El Ministro de Asuntos Exteriores ruso, Sergei Lavrov, prometió que su país cooperaría con India en la lucha contra el terrorismo global.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov, representing Russia, has pledged cooperation with India in combating global terrorism (As per AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to AFP, Sergei Lavrov, the Russian Foreign Minister, assures India of Russia's commitment to jointly battle global terrorism.

Original Text: Nation #39;s manufacturing segment shows continued growth Economic activity in the manufacturing sector grew in October for the 17th consecutive month, albeit at a slower rate than in September, the Institute for Supply Management (ISM) reported Monday.
Translation: El segmento de fabricación de la Nación #39 muestra un crecimiento continuo. La actividad económica en el sector manufacturero creció en octubre por decimoséptimo mes consecutivo, aunque a un ritmo más lento que en septiembre, informó el Instituto para la Gestión de Suministros (ISM) el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Institute for Supply Management (ISM) reported on Monday that the country's manufacturing sector's economic activity expanded for the 17th month in a row in October, despite the growth rate being slower than that of September.

Original Text: Durable Goods Orders Up; Homes Sales Down  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Orders for U.S. durable goods posted  a larger-than-expected rise in July, but new home sales showed  signs of buckling under the weight of higher interest rates,  two government reports showed on Wednesday.
Translation:
Órdenes de Bienes Duraderos Aumentan; Ventas de Viviendas Bajan
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Las órdenes de bienes duraderos en los EE.UU. registraron un aumento mayor de lo esperado en julio, pero las ventas de nuevas viviendas mostraron señales de ceder bajo el peso de las tasas de interés más altas, según mostraron dos informes gubernamentales el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A significant increase, surpassing expectations, was observed in July for orders of U.S. durable goods, according to two government reports released on Wednesday. In contrast, there appeared to be a decline in new home sales, ostensibly due to the pressure of heightened interest rates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - According to two government reports revealed on Wednesday, July saw an unexpected surge in orders for U.S. durable goods, in stark contrast with new home sales, which appeared to be wavering under the impact of increased interest rates.

Original Text: Spitzer alleges corruption in insurance trade ALBANY, NY -- The man who made Wall Street reform its ways is now charging widespread corruption in the insurance industry. He alleged that brokers have been taking payoffs from insurance companies to steer
Translation: Spitzer alega corrupción en el comercio de seguros. ALBANY, NY -- El hombre que hizo que Wall Street reformara sus formas, ahora acusa de corrupción generalizada en la industria de seguros. Alegó que los corredores han estado recibiendo sobornos de las compañías de seguros para dirigir
Paraphrase 1: 1) ALBANY, NY -- The individual renowned for inducing reformation in Wall Street is currently attributing extensive corruption to the insurance sector. He insists that brokers have been accepting bribes from insurance firms to guide their decisions.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In Albany, NY, the man known for making Wall Street change its methods is now accusing the insurance industry of prevalent corruption. His allegations suggest that insurance companies have been bribing brokers to influence their choices.

Original Text: Clippers Beat Nets 101-88 (AP) AP - Marko Jaric scored 23 points to lead Los Angeles' balanced scoring and the Clippers beat New Jersey 101-88 Thursday night to run the Nets' losing streak to seven games.
Translation: Los Clippers vencen a los Nets 101-88 (AP) AP - Marko Jaric anotó 23 puntos para liderar el equilibrado ataque de Los Angeles y los Clippers vencieron a Nueva Jersey 101-88 la noche del jueves, extendiendo la racha de derrotas de los Nets a siete partidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP reported that the Clippers, with Marko Jaric scoring 23 points as part of Los Angeles' evenly distributed scoring, outmatched the Nets 101-88 on Thursday night. This victory extended the Nets' losing streak to seven games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday night, the Los Angeles Clippers overpowered the New Jersey Nets 101-88, led by Marko Jaric's 23-point contribution. This victory, reported by AP, marked the Nets' seventh consecutive defeat.

Original Text: Hassan #39;s Family, Officials, Respond To Apparent Killing The husband of Iraqi aid worker Margaret Hassan has asked Islamic militants to return his wife #39;s body to him so that she can, in his words, rest in peace.
Translation: La familia de Hassan #39, funcionarios, responden a la aparente asesinato. El esposo de la trabajadora humanitaria iraquí Margaret Hassan ha pedido a los militantes islámicos que le devuelvan el cuerpo de su esposa para que ella pueda, en sus palabras, descansar en paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The husband of Margaret Hassan, an Iraqi aid worker, has pleaded with Islamic militants to return her body so she can "rest in peace", in response to her apparent assassination. This plea has been echoed by Hassan's family members and officials.

Original Text: Anxious France Accelerates Bid for Iraq Hostages  AMMAN (Reuters) - An anxious French government accelerated  its diplomatic bid to save two French reporters held hostage in  Iraq on Tuesday as a fresh kidnapper deadline neared for Paris  to scrap a ban on Muslim headscarves in schools.
Translation: Francia Ansiosa Acelera la Propuesta para los Rehenes en Irak AMMAN (Reuters) - Un gobierno francés ansioso aceleró su propuesta diplomática para salvar a dos reporteros franceses retenidos en Irak el martes, ya que se acercaba una nueva fecha límite de los secuestradores para que París descarte la prohibición de los pañuelos en la cabeza musulmanes en las escuelas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) As the deadline for a new kidnapping looms, the French government, anxious and agitated, speeds up its diplomatic efforts to secure the release of two French reporters being held hostage in Iraq, in an attempt to cancel the ban concerning Muslim headscarves in schools.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Tuesday, with a fresh kidnapper deadline approaching, the apprehensive French government hastened its attempts to save two of its reporters who are held captive in Iraq. These attempts are focused on abandoning the ban on Muslim headscarves in schools.

Original Text: AP: Kids Left in Africa Begged for Change IBADAN, Nigeria - Allegedly abandoned by their American mother in Africa, seven children from Texas begged small change to buy food and shuttled from a neglectful stranger's care to a concrete-block orphanage, Nigerians said Thursday.    Eventually, the children proved their American citizenship to a passing missionary from Texas by singing "The Star-Spangled Banner." He notified U.S...
Translation:
AP: Niños abandonados en África suplicaban por cambio IBADAN, Nigeria - Presuntamente abandonados por su madre estadounidense en África, siete niños de Texas suplicaban por pequeñas monedas para comprar comida y eran trasladados del cuidado negligente de un extraño a un orfanato construido con bloques de concreto, según declararon los nigerianos el jueves.

Finalmente, los niños demostraron su ciudadanía estadounidense a un misionero de Texas que pasaba por allí cantando "The Star-Spangled Banner". Él notificó a los Estados Unidos...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reportedly abandoned by their US-based mother in Africa, seven Texan children were reportedly found begging for loose change to purchase food in Nigeria. They oscillated between being in the care of an indifferent stranger and a cinder-block orphanage, according to Nigerian sources on Thursday. By singing the US national anthem, "The Star-Spangled Banner", they confirmed their American nationality to a passing Texan missionary, who subsequently alerted the US authorities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Ibadan, Nigeria, seven Texan children were found pleading for handouts to feed themselves after they were seemingly deserted by their American mother. Nigerian locals reported on Thursday that the children alternated between the indifferent care of a local stranger and lodging in a concrete-block orphanage. They managed to demonstrate their US citizenship to a Texan missionary who happened to be passing by when they sang "The Star-Spangled Banner." Consequently, the missionary contacted the US authorities.

Original Text: Safety Isn't Optional According to auto industry regulators and executives worldwide, new criteria for vehicle performance must include a car's or truck's ability to protect its occupants in a crash.
Translation: La Seguridad No Es Opcional Según los reguladores y ejecutivos de la industria automotriz en todo el mundo, los nuevos criterios para el rendimiento de los vehículos deben incluir la capacidad de un automóvil o camión para proteger a sus ocupantes en caso de accidente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Global auto industry regulators and executives assert that the new standards for vehicle performance must incorporate the capacity of a car or truck to shield its occupants during a collision; emphasizing that safety isn't optional.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to authorities and leaders in the global auto industry, whether a car or truck can safeguard its passengers in the event of a crash must be part of the new benchmarks for automobile performance, indicating that safety can't be seen as a choice.

Original Text: Microsoft fixes date for desktop search tool com October 22, 2004, 1:56 PM PT. This fourth priority #39;s main focus has been enterprise directories as organizations spawn projects around identity infrastructure.
Translation: Microsoft fija la fecha para la herramienta de búsqueda en el escritorio como el 22 de octubre de 2004, 1:56 PM PT. El principal enfoque de esta cuarta prioridad ha sido los directorios empresariales a medida que las organizaciones generan proyectos en torno a la infraestructura de identidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On October 22, 2004, at 1:56 PM PT, Microsoft scheduled a date for the launch of their desktop search tool. This has been the main concern for priority #39, especially focusing on enterprise directories, as organizations initiate projects surrounding identity infrastructure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. October 22, 2004, 1:56 PM PT, marked the date when Microsoft established a timeline for their desktop search tool. The primary concentration of the fourth priority has been on enterprise directories due to the role they play as organizations start identity infrastructure projects.

Original Text: Sluman shoots ahead in Florida Jeff Sluman fired a nine-under 62 yesterday to take a two-stroke lead after the first round of the \$5 million Chrysler Championship in Florida.
Translation: Sluman se adelanta en Florida. Jeff Sluman disparó un nueve bajo par 62 ayer para tomar una ventaja de dos golpes después de la primera ronda del Campeonato Chrysler de 5 millones de dólares en Florida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, Jeff Sluman took a two-stroke lead in the first round of the $5 million Chrysler Championship in Florida, by scoring a nine-under 62.
Paraphrase 2: 2. By shooting a nine-under 62 yesterday, Jeff Sluman gained a two-stroke lead in the opening round of the $5 million Chrysler Championship in Florida.

Original Text: Nokia launches  #39;fashion #39; phones At the Totally Fashion event in Shanghai, China, Nokia unveiled its latest mobile phones -- the 7280, 7270 and 7260. With sleek designs and interesting quirks, the phones -- which are more like fashion accessories
Translation: Nokia lanza teléfonos 'de moda' En el evento Totalmente de Moda en Shanghai, China, Nokia presentó sus últimos teléfonos móviles: el 7280, 7270 y 7260. Con diseños elegantes e interesantes peculiaridades, los teléfonos, que son más como accesorios de moda.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Totally Fashion event in Shanghai, China, Nokia introduced its latest mobile phones - the 7280, 7270, and 7260. These phones, with their sleek designs and unique features, are being regarded more as fashion accessories.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nokia revealed its newest mobile phones, the 7280, 7270, and 7260 at the Totally Fashion event in Shanghai. These phones have been designed uniquely, exhibiting sleek structures and interesting peculiarities, positioning them more as a fashion statement.

Original Text: Damon was into this game early FOXBOROUGH -- Red Sox owner John W. Henry lugged the World Series trophy, but Johnny Damon walked off with the Oscar here last night when a small contingent of Red Sox Nation visited Gillette Stadium before the Patriots-Bills game.
Translation: Damon se interesó pronto en este juego FOXBOROUGH -- El dueño de los Red Sox, John W. Henry, cargó el trofeo de la Serie Mundial, pero fue Johnny Damon quien se llevó el Oscar aquí anoche cuando un pequeño contingente de la Nación Red Sox visitó el Estadio Gillette antes del juego Patriots-Bills.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the Patriots-Bills game at Gillette Stadium, Red Sox owner John W. Henry carried the World Series trophy to greet a small group of Red Sox Nation. However, it was Johnny Damon that stole the show and won the Oscar earlier this evening.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even before the Patriots-Bills game at Gillette Stadium began, Johnny Damon had already grabbed headlines and won the Oscar. John W. Henry, the Red Sox owner, was also present, hauling the World Series trophy amidst a select gathering from the Red Sox Nation.

Original Text: UBS Net Falls on Investment Banking; Fund Unit Gains (Update1) UBS AG, Europe #39;s biggest bank, said third-quarter profit fell 1 percent as gains from managing funds for millionaires cushioned a drop in investment-banking earnings.
Translation: La Red UBS cae en la Banca de Inversión; la Unidad de Fondos Gana (Actualización1) UBS AG, el banco más grande de Europa, dijo que las ganancias del tercer trimestre cayeron un 1 por ciento debido a que las ganancias derivadas de la administración de fondos para millonarios amortiguaron una caída en las ganancias de la banca de inversión.
Paraphrase 1: 1) UBS AG, the largest bank in Europe, reported a decrease of 1 percent in third-quarter profits due to lower earnings from investment banking, but revenue rises in the wealth management sector softened this impact.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Despite a 1% dip in third-quarter profits owing to lower investment-banking earnings, UBS AG - Europe's leading bank, managed to mitigate this loss through revenue increases within its fund management unit.

Original Text: Consumer Prices Drop, Industry Output Up  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. consumer prices dropped in July  for the first time in eight months as a sharp run up in  gasoline costs reversed, the government said on Tuesday in a  report suggesting the U.S. Federal Reserve can stick to a plan  of gradual interest-rate rises.
Translation: Caen los Precios al Consumidor, Sube la Producción Industrial  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Los precios al consumidor en EE.UU. disminuyeron en julio por primera vez en ocho meses debido a un agudo repunte en los costos de la gasolina que se revirtió, informó el gobierno el martes en un informe que sugiere que la Reserva Federal de EE.UU. puede continuar con un plan de incrementos graduales de las tasas de interés.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - In July, U.S. consumer prices saw a decline for the first time in eight-months due to a significant decrease in gasoline costs, the government announced on Tuesday. This report implies that the U.S. Federal Reserve might continue with its plan for slow advancement of interest rates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The government revealed on Tuesday that for the first time in eight months, there was a drop in U.S. consumer prices in July, mainly as a result of a sudden decrease in the costs of gasoline. This suggests that the U.S. Federal Reserve is likely to adhere to its plan of implementing gradual rises in interest rates.

Original Text: Riddick raises the stakes The Chronicles of Riddick is not only one of the most satisfying movie tie-ins ever, but also perhaps the best-looking game the Xbox has yet seen.
Translation: Riddick aumenta las apuestas. Las Crónicas de Riddick no solo es uno de los vínculos con películas más satisfactorios que ha existido, sino que también, tal vez, es el juego con mejor apariencia que la Xbox ha visto hasta ahora.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Not only does Riddick set new standards with The Chronicles of Riddick as one of the most gratifying movie tie-ins, it might also be considered the finest graphical game on the Xbox thus far.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Chronicles of Riddick doesn't just stand out as one of the most rewarding movie tie-ins, it could also potentially be the most visually impressive game the Xbox has ever showcased.

Original Text: After six-month grind, three races left to be decided in season #39;s <b>...</b> SAN FRANCISCO -- Peter Magowan knows all of the schedules by heart -- when everybody plays, who they play, where they play. He knows the standings, too, obviously.
Translation: Después de seis meses de esfuerzo, quedan tres carreras por decidir en la temporada nº 39, ... SAN FRANCISCO -- Peter Magowan conoce todos los calendarios de memoria -- cuándo juega todo el mundo, contra quién juegan, dónde juegan. Obviamente, también conoce las clasificaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Peter Magowan, an expert on the timelines of games, knows the details of every match - who's playing, where, and when they play in season #39. Even the standings are clear to him. This comes after a strenuous six-month period, with only three matches of the season remaining to be decided. The scene is set in San Francisco.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In San Francisco, Peter Magowan is familiar with all game schedules – he knows who, when and where everyone plays as part of season #39. He is also well-versed with the standings. This knowledge follows a laborious six-month journey, and now the season is hanging only on the results of three more races.

Original Text: Senate weighing work-visa changes U.S. senators are debating a controversial measure to exempt foreign student graduates from the cap on H-1B visas.
Translation: El Senado considera cambios en las visas de trabajo. Los senadores de EE. UU. están debatiendo una medida controvertida para eximir a los graduados de estudiantes extranjeros del límite en las visas H-1B.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. senators are currently in discussion over a contentious proposal designed to exclude foreign student graduates from the H-1B visa limit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A heated debate is underway in the Senate about a polemic plan to remove the cap on H-1B visas for graduates from foreign countries.

Original Text: US drafts resolution demanding Syrian withdrawal from Lebanon The United States has circulated a draft resolution to other Security Council members demanding that Syrian forces withdraw  quot;without delay quot; from Lebanon.
Translation: EE.UU. redacta una resolución exigiendo la retirada siria de Líbano. Estados Unidos ha circulado un borrador de resolución entre los demás miembros del Consejo de Seguridad, exigiendo que las fuerzas sirias se retiren "sin demora" de Líbano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The United States has introduced a draft resolution to the Security Council, asserting an immediate need for Syria to withdraw its troops from Lebanon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A draft resolution has been proposed by the United States to the Security Council, insisting on an immediate withdrawal of Syrian forces from Lebanon.

Original Text: Oracle Softens up PeopleSoft Larry Ellison might not wear a red suit and a white beard, but he sure knows how to deliver the goods for his investors. Next stop after the PeopleSoft acquisition? Germany, the home base of rival SAP. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Translation: Oracle Suaviza a PeopleSoft. Larry Ellison podría no llevar un traje rojo y una barba blanca, pero definitivamente sabe cómo entregar resultados para sus inversores. ¿Próxima parada después de la adquisición de PeopleSoft? Alemania, la base de su rival SAP. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-washingtonpost.com</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Larry Ellison, though not clad in a red suit and white beard, is adept at rewarding his investors. After procuring PeopleSoft, his next target is Germany, where competitor SAP is based. This information is from washingtonpost.com.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite lacking a Santa-esque appearance with a white beard and red suit, Larry Ellison unmistakably understands how to yield returns for his shareholders. Following the takeover of PeopleSoft, he sets his sights on Germany, where his competition SAP resides. Source: washingtonpost.com.

Original Text: Slowing Housing Market May Stir Inflation (Reuters) Reuters - As U.S. home purchases slow, an\expected rise in demand for rentals will result in a spike in\inflation, analysts say, citing studies showing housing costs\have been under-reported by the government.
Translation: Desaceleración del Mercado Inmobiliario Puede Estimular la Inflación (Reuters) Reuters - A medida que las compras de viviendas en EE.UU. se ralentizan, un aumento esperado en la demanda de alquileres resultará en un repunte de la inflación, dicen los analistas, citando estudios que demuestran que los costos de la vivienda han sido subestimados por el gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Analysts forecast a surge in inflation as they anticipate increased demand for rentals due to the slowing down of U.S. home purchases, stating that the government has been underestimating housing costs in studies.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - A downturn in the U.S. housing market could trigger inflation, foresee analysts. They argue that the decline in home purchases leads to rental demand, with studies suggesting that the government has been reporting less than actual housing costs.

Original Text: Shiite Group Reveals Some Iraq Candidates (AP) AP - Iraq's future political landscape began to take shape Friday, as a coalition led by powerful Shiite Muslim groups revealed a few of its candidates in next month's parliamentary election. They include former exiles, a prominent cleric and members of the interim government.
Translation: Grupo Chiíta Revela Algunos Candidatos de Irak (AP) AP - El futuro panorama político de Irak comenzó a tomar forma el viernes, cuando una coalición liderada por poderosos grupos musulmanes chiítas reveló a algunos de sus candidatos para las elecciones parlamentarias del próximo mes. Incluyen a exiliados anteriores, un prominente clérigo y miembros del gobierno interino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Some Candidates for Iraq's Upcoming Election Unveiled by Shiite Group (AP) - On Friday, the future political scene of Iraq took form as a coalition spearheaded by influential Shiite Muslim factions unveiled several candidates for the imminent parliamentary election next month. The list comprises notable exiles, a distinguished cleric, and members of the provisional government.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Powerful Shiite Coalition Reveals Initial Candidates for Iraq Election (AP) - A glimpse into the prospective political terrain of Iraq was unveiled on Friday. A few candidates, including former exiles, a renowned cleric and elements of the present interim government, were shown for the forthcoming parliamentary election by a coalition driven by strong Shiite Muslim groups.

Original Text: Investors may see more put on trial GREENVILLE, SC - After nearly two years and two trials, Attorney General Henry McMaster said the investigation is continuing into the collapse of Carolina Investors Inc.
Translation: Los inversores podrían ver a más personas llevadas a juicio GREENVILLE, SC - Después de casi dos años y dos juicios, el Fiscal General Henry McMaster dijo que la investigación continúa sobre el colapso de Carolina Investors Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GREENVILLE, SC - Following roughly two years and two trials, more investors could potentially face trial, according to Attorney General Henry McMaster, as the investigation into Carolina Investors Inc's collapse continues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Attorney General Henry McMaster, expressing that the probe into the fallout of Carolina Investors Inc. is ongoing—after about two years and two trials—suggested that further trials involving investors could be expected in GREENVILLE, SC.

Original Text: Schwab Paying \$350,000 Fine in Settlement Brokerage Charles Schwab  amp; Co. has agreed to pay a \$350,000 civil fine to settle federal regulators #39; allegations that it illegally allowed certain customers to change mutual fund trade orders after the market #39;s close.
Translation: Schwab pagando una multa de \$350,000 en un Acuerdo de Corretaje. Charles Schwab & Co. ha acordado pagar una multa civil de \$350,000 para resolver las acusaciones de los reguladores federales de que permitió ilegalmente a ciertos clientes cambiar órdenes de comercio de fondos mutuos después del cierre del mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Agreeing to a settlement, Charles Schwab & Co. has decided to pay a civil fine of $350,000 for allegations brought by federal regulators, who claim they permitted certain clientele to modify mutual fund trade orders after the market closed, which is deemed illegal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Charles Schwab & Co. is set to pay a $350,000 fine in response to allegations made by federal regulators that it unlawfully allowed a select group of customers to alter mutual fund trade orders after the market had closed, as part of a settlement agreement.

Original Text: Wolfmeyer acquitted in murder-for-hire plot CBC SPORTS ONLINE - A Missouri woman was acquitted of charges she helped NHL player Mike Dantion hire a hit man in a failed plot to kill his agent.
Translation: Wolfmeyer absuelta en complot de asesinato por encargo CBC DEPORTES ONLINE - Una mujer de Missouri fue absuelta de los cargos de haber ayudado al jugador de la NHL Mike Dantion a contratar a un asesino a sueldo en un complot fallido para matar a su agente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CBC SPORTS ONLINE reports that a Missouri woman, Wolfmeyer, was found not guilty of the allegations that she aided NHL player Mike Dantion in a bungled plan to hire an assassin to murder his agent.

Original Text: A Kinder, Gentler Type of War World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer game, so you should expect some dying, but Blizzard has managed to make even that pleasant. Game review by Lore Sjberg.
Translation: Un Tipo de Guerra Más Amable y Suave: World of Warcraft es un juego multijugador masivo, por lo que deberías esperar algo de muerte, pero Blizzard ha logrado hacer incluso eso agradable. Reseña del juego por Lore Sjberg.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With its mammoth multiplayer format, World of Warcraft certainly anticipates a fair amount of character death. However, the game developers at Blizzard have ingeniously made this experience quite enjoyable. Game critique by Lore Sjberg.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the colossal multiplayer game World of Warcraft, dying is an expectation but Blizzard has successfully created a more agreeable way to face it. Reviewed by Lore Sjberg.

Original Text: Swiss Voters Back Stem-Cell Research In the first national referendum on an issue that has divided both the European Union and the United States, Swiss voters have backed proposals to allow stem-cell research.
Translation: Los votantes suizos respaldan la investigación con células madre. En el primer referéndum nacional sobre un tema que ha dividido tanto a la Unión Europea como a los Estados Unidos, los votantes suizos han apoyado las propuestas para permitir la investigación con células madre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Proposals permitting stem-cell research have garnered the support of Swiss voters, in the first ever national referendum addressing the divisive issue, which has caused contention within both the United States and the European Union.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Through a national referendum that first addressed this controversial issue splitting the US and the EU, stem-cell research has received approval from Swiss voters.

Original Text: OPEC chief sees relief The head of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries forecast on Monday that global crude prices would soon fall, partly because of expected supply increases from Iraq.
Translation: El jefe de la OPEP ve alivio. El líder de la Organización de Países Exportadores de Petróleo pronosticó el lunes que los precios globales del crudo pronto caerían, en parte debido al esperado aumento del suministro desde Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The leader of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) predicted on Monday that a likely increase in supply from Iraq would contribute to a decrease in worldwide crude oil prices soon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The chief of OPEC projected a reduction in global crude prices on Monday, attributing it in part to the anticipation of escalated supplies from Iraq.

Original Text: Red Bull Close to Deal with Jaguar Formula One Team  LONDON (Reuters) - Austrian energy drink company Red Bull  is poised to take over the Jaguar Formula One team after weeks  of negotiations.
Translation: Red Bull cerca de cerrar un acuerdo con el equipo Jaguar de la Fórmula Uno. LONDRES (Reuters) - La empresa austriaca de bebidas energéticas Red Bull está a punto de hacerse cargo del equipo Jaguar de la Fórmula Uno después de semanas de negociaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - Red Bull, the Austrian energy drink company, is on the verge of finalizing a deal with the Jaguar Formula One team, following weeks of discussions.

Original Text: Palestinians in Israeli Jails Start Hunger Strike (Reuters) Reuters - Thousands of Palestinian\prisoners in Israeli jails began a hunger strike for better\conditions Sunday, but Israel's security minister said he\didn't care if they starved to death.
Translation: Palestinos en Prisiones Israelíes Comienzan Huelga de Hambre (Reuters) Reuters - Miles de prisioneros palestinos en cárceles israelíes comenzaron una huelga de hambre para obtener mejores condiciones el domingo, pero el ministro de seguridad de Israel dijo que no le importaba si morían de inanición.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Thousands of Palestinian prisoners housed in Israeli jails have initiated a hunger strike for improved conditions on Sunday, though the Israeli Security Minister showed disregard for their potential starvation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to Reuters, many Palestinian prisoners in Israeli detention centers instigated a hunger strike in a fight for better conditions this Sunday, however, the Israeli Security Minister expressed indifference to the prospect of their starvation.

Original Text: NBA Wrap: Heat Stay Unbeaten with Win Over Wizards  WASHINGTON (Sports Network) - Dwyane Wade continued his hot  start to the 2004-05 campaign with a career-high 37 points, as  the Miami Heat improved to 3-0 on the young season with a  118-106 win over the Washington Wizards.
Translation: Resumen de la NBA: El Heat Permanece Invicto tras Derrotar a los Wizards  WASHINGTON (Red Deportiva) - Dwyane Wade continuó su excelente inicio en la temporada 2004-05 con un récord personal de 37 puntos, mientras los Miami Heat se consolidaron con un 3-0 en el inicio de la temporada con una victoria de 118-106 sobre los Washington Wizards.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Sports Network) - Dwyane Wade's stellar performance and a career-best 37 points helped the Miami Heat continue their unbeaten streak at 3-0 in the 2004-05 season by defeating the Washington Wizards with a score of 118-106 in the latest NBA series.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the NBA's latest showdown, the Miami Heat extended their undefeated record to 3-0 with help from Dwyane Wade who contributed a record-breaking 37 points, leading to a 118-106 victory over the Washington Wizards in the 2004-05 season, as reported by Washington (Sports Network).

Original Text: CNN employee abducted as violence waxes in Gaza JERUSALEM Palestinian gunmen in Gaza City abducted an Israeli Arab working for CNN, according to the network, stopping a taxi carrying a news crew and seizing the man, Riad Ali, a producer.
Translation: Un empleado de CNN secuestrado a medida que aumenta la violencia en Gaza JERUSALÉN. Según la cadena, hombres armados palestinos en la ciudad de Gaza secuestraron a un árabe israelí que trabajaba para CNN, detuvieron un taxi que transportaba a un equipo de noticias y se llevaron al hombre, Riad Ali, un productor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Riad Ali, a producer working for CNN, was kidnapped in Gaza City by Palestinian gunmen as the unrest in Gaza intensifies, as stated by the network. The news crew was traveling in a taxi when it was intercepted and Ali, an Israeli Arab, was taken.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid escalating violence in Gaza, Palestinian gunmen have kidnapped Riad Ali, an Israeli Arab and CNN producer, in Gaza City. According to the news network, the abduction took place when a taxi carrying a news crew was halted and Ali was seized.

Original Text: NetSuite smartens up CRM InfoWorld reviewer says Version 10 a good fit for smaller businesses looking for a strong CRM app, and especially those in need of integrated financial and inventory management.
Translation: NetSuite hace más inteligente la gestión de relaciones con los clientes. El revisor de InfoWorld afirma que la versión 10 es adecuada para pequeñas empresas en busca de una sólida aplicación de CRM, y especialmente para aquellas que necesitan una gestión financiera e inventario integrada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to an InfoWorld reviewer, NetSuite's CRM Version 10 is an excellent choice for smaller businesses seeking a robust CRM application, and is particularly suitable for those who require integrated financial and inventory management.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Smaller businesses that require a powerful CRM application, particularly if integrated financial and inventory management is necessary, will find a suitable solution in NetSuite's CRM Version 10, according to a review by InfoWorld.

Original Text: Astros Defeat Cardinals 6-5 to Tie NLCS (AP) AP - By the time Carlos Beltran's shot landed in Houston's bullpen, this much was clear: At least baseball had one competitive playoff series still going. Beltran did it again, homering in a record fifth straight postseason game and lifting the Astros over the St. Louis Cardinals 6-5 Sunday to even the NL championship series at 2-all.
Translation: Astros derrotan a los Cardinals 6-5 para empatar la Serie de Campeonato de la Liga Nacional (AP) AP - Para cuando el disparo de Carlos Beltrán aterrizó en el bullpen de Houston, estaba claro: Al menos el béisbol todavía tenía una serie de playoffs competitiva en juego. Beltrán lo hizo de nuevo, conectando un jonrón en un quinto juego consecutivo de postemporada, un récord, y llevando a los Astros a una victoria sobre los St. Louis Cardinals 6-5 el domingo para igualar la Serie de Campeonato de la Liga Nacional 2 a 2.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Carlos Beltran continued to impress, launching a homer in an unprecedented fifth consecutive postseason match and leading the Astros to a triumph over the St. Louis Cardinals, 6-5, on Sunday. This victory brought the NL championship series to a 2-2 tie, ensuring baseball’s playoff season remained suspenseful.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Hitting a homer for the fifth consecutive postseason game, a new record, Carlos Beltran was instrumental in the Astros’ 6-5 win over the St. Louis Cardinals on Sunday. This crucial win equalized the NL championship series at 2-all, turning it into a fiercely competitive playoff battle.

Original Text: Ivory Coast Bombs Rebel Zone Again, War Fears Rise  BOUAKE (Reuters) - Government warplanes and helicopter  gunships pounded rebel-held towns in northern Ivory Coast for a  second day on Friday, fueling fears of a slide into all-out war  in the world's top cocoa grower.
Translation: Costa de Marfil Bombardea Zona Rebelde de Nuevo, Temores de Guerra Aumentan BOUAKE (Reuters) - Aviones de guerra gubernamentales y helicópteros de combate azotaron las ciudades controladas por rebeldes en el norte de Costa de Marfil por segundo día consecutivo el viernes, avivando los temores de una espiral en una guerra total en el principal productor mundial de cacao.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BOUAKE (Reuters) - A fearsome resurgence of imminent war anxiety arises as government warplanes and helicopter gunships persist in bombing the rebel-controlled areas in northern Ivory Coast, the world's leading cocoa producer, for the second day in a row.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an alarming indication of impending warfare, government military aircraft intensify their assaults on the rebel-occupied towns in North Ivory Coast, the globe's premier cocoa cultivation nation, for a successive second day on Friday.

Original Text: Haiti floods spark disease fears There are warnings of a serious outbreak of disease in Haiti following the recent devastating floods.
Translation: Las inundaciones en Haití desencadenan temores de enfermedades. Hay advertencias de un grave brote de enfermedades en Haití a raíz de las recientes inundaciones devastadoras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the recent catastrophic floods in Haiti, there are concerns about a potential major disease outbreak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The devastating floods in Haiti have led to serious disease outbreak warnings.

Original Text: Saturn Mission to Benefit Earth: UK Technology Will Help <b>...</b> UK technology that will safely guide a spacecraft to Saturns largest moon is being adapted to land aeroplanes, help emergency services reach accidents quickly and improve safety on our roads.
Translation: Misión a Saturno para Beneficiar a la Tierra: La Tecnología del Reino Unido será de Ayuda <b>...</b> La tecnología del Reino Unido que guiará de manera segura una nave espacial a la luna más grande de Saturno está siendo adaptada para aterrizar aviones, ayudar a los servicios de emergencia a llegar rápidamente a accidentes y mejorar la seguridad en nuestras carreteras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. UK Technology Developed for Saturn Mission to Benefit Earth Safety: The technology designed to safely guide a spacecraft to the largest moon of Saturn is set to be adapted for a variety of uses on Earth. These include landing aeroplanes, aiding emergency services to swiftly access accident sites, and enhancing road safety.
Paraphrase 2: 2. UK Technology for Saturn Exploration Could Improve Safety Measures on Earth: The technology which is engineered to navigate a spacecraft to the largest moon of Saturn securely, is being modified for applications like landing aircraft, enabling fast response from emergency services during accidents, and boosting safety on our roads.

Original Text: Yankees See New Chance to Make Deal for Johnson Two agents said that the Yankees were on the verge of acquiring Randy Johnson from the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Translation: Los Yankees ven una nueva oportunidad para hacer un trato por Johnson. Dos agentes dijeron que los Yankees estaban al borde de adquirir a Randy Johnson de los Diamondbacks de Arizona.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two representatives reported that the Yankees are close to securing a deal to acquire Randy Johnson from the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The opportunity for the Yankees to strike a deal for Randy Johnson from the Arizona Diamondbacks has been made apparent, according to reports from two agents.

Original Text: Australia Sets World Record in Women #39;s 400-Meter Medley Relay Australia set a world record in the women #39;s 400-meter medley relay at the Olympics, as Giaan Rooney, Leisel Jones, Petria Thomas and Jodie Henry covered the distance in 3 minutes, 57.
Translation: Australia Establece Récord Mundial en el Relevo de Medley de 400 Metros Femenil. Australia estableció un récord mundial en el relevo de medley de 400 metros femenino en las Olimpiadas, ya que Giaan Rooney, Leisel Jones, Petria Thomas y Jodie Henry cubrieron la distancia en 3 minutos, 57.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Giaan Rooney, Leisel Jones, Petria Thomas, and Jodie Henry -- an Australian team, completed the women's 400-meter medley relay at the Olympics in 3 minutes, 57 seconds, setting a new world record.

Original Text: Bush, Kerry Court Voters in New Mexico President Bush and Democratic challenger John Kerry were both campaigning in New Mexico Monday in tandem swings through the Southwest on their way to Wednesday night's final debate in Arizona. Bush shifted his harsh rhetoric to focus on Kerry's record on domestic issues, while Kerry promised to work for the middle class and energy independence...
Translation: Bush, Kerry Cortejan Votantes en Nuevo México. El presidente Bush y el retador demócrata John Kerry estuvieron haciendo campaña en Nuevo México el lunes en movimientos simultáneos a través del Suroeste en su camino hacia el último debate del miércoles por la noche en Arizona. Bush cambió su dura retórica para concentrarse en el historial de Kerry en asuntos internos, mientras que Kerry prometió trabajar para la clase media y la independencia energética...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Both President Bush and the Democratic contender, John Kerry, were engaged in respective campaigns in New Mexico on Monday. This was part of their combined journeys through the Southwest, heading towards the ultimate debate in Arizona on Wednesday night. The emphasis of Bush's previously severe rhetoric changed to scrutinize Kerry's domestic policies, whereas Kerry pledged to advocate for the middle class and energy self-sufficiency.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In tandem trips through the Southwest, President Bush and his Democratic opponent, John Kerry, were actively campaigning in New Mexico on Monday, targeting the upcoming final Wednesday night's debate in Arizona. Bush modified his severe language to scrutinize Kerry's domestic issue track record, while Kerry, on the other hand, assured to support the middle class and endorse energy independence.

Original Text: Voices: Iranian Judo scandal Iran #39;s Judo champion, a favourite at the Athens Games, has disqualified himself rather than face an Israeli opponent, apparently on the instruction of Iran #39;s Olympic Committee. So far the International Olympic Committee has been silent. What #39;s your view? ...
Translation: Voces: Escándalo iraní de Judo. El campeón de Judo de Irán, favorito en los Juegos de Atenas, se ha descalificado a sí mismo en lugar de enfrentarse a un oponente israelí, aparentemente por instrucciones del Comité Olímpico de Irán. Hasta ahora, el Comité Olímpico Internacional ha guardado silencio. ¿Cuál es tu opinión? ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Iranian Judo champion, a touted favorite in the Athens Games, has chosen to disqualify himself instead of competing against an Israeli competitor, seemingly under the direction of Iran's Olympic Committee. The International Olympic Committee has yet to comment on the scandal. What's your opinion on this matter? ...
Paraphrase 2: 2. An apparent fallout in the world of Judo, as Iran's acclaimed champion decides to disqualify himself at the Athens Games instead of facing an Israeli rival. This decision seems to have been advocated by Iran's Olympic Committee. The International Olympic Committee has yet remained quiet about this issue. What are your thoughts? ...

Original Text: Stadler partners up Junior amateur Aaron Woodard learned one of golf #39;s truisms this weekend at the First Tee Open at Pebble Beach Golf Links.  quot;The better you putt, the lower your score, quot; Woodard said.
Translation: Stadler se asocia con el aficionado junior Aaron Woodard, quien aprendió una de las verdades del golf este fin de semana en el First Tee Open en Pebble Beach Golf Links. "Cuanto mejor pateas, más baja es tu puntuación", dijo Woodard.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "The more efficiently you putt, the lower your score will be", said Aaron Woodard, a Junior amateur who partnered with Stadler, learning valuable golf advice at Pebble Beach Golf Links during the First Tee Open.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the First Tee Open at Pebble Beach Golf Links, junior amateur Aaron Woodard, Stadler's partner, discovered a truism in golf over the weekend. In his words, "Improving your putting skills decreases your score."

Original Text: Isiah Thomas Speaks, and Declares Support for Houston Isiah Thomas emerged from the Madison Square Garden shadows yesterday morning, gushed about his team #39;s break-even pace and swatted away the trade rumors that have chased the Knicks through the first quarter of the season.
Translation: Isiah Thomas habla y declara su apoyo a Houston. Isiah Thomas salió de las sombras del Madison Square Garden ayer por la mañana, habló efusivamente sobre el ritmo de su equipo para el equilibrio de victorias y derrotas, y desestimó los rumores de traspaso que han perseguido a los Knicks durante el primer trimestre de la temporada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Coming out of the obscurity of Madison Square Garden, Isiah Thomas voiced his support for Houston, expressing excitement over his team maintaining a break-even pace and dismissing the trade speculations that have been following the Knicks since the season's commencement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Isiah Thomas made an appearance from Madison Square Garden's shadows earlier in the day, enthusiastically praising his team's average performance rate while brushing off the circulating trade rumors that have been dogging the Knicks at the start of the season, all while voicing his support for Houston.

Original Text: DORTMUND YOUTH FACE UP TO BAYERN Borussia Dortmund coach Bert van Marwijk may have to select a number of inexperienced players for Saturday #39;s Bundesliga clash against Bayern Munich at the Westfalenstadion.
Translation: LOS JÓVENES DE DORTMUND SE ENFRENTAN A BAYERN El entrenador del Borussia Dortmund, Bert van Marwijk, puede tener que seleccionar a una serie de jugadores inexpertos para el choque de la Bundesliga del sábado contra el Bayern de Munich en el Westfalenstadion.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the upcoming Bundesliga clash against Bayern Munich scheduled on Saturday at Westfalenstadion, Borussia Dortmund's coach, Bert van Marwijk might be compelled to include various unseasoned players in the team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There may be a contingent of young, less experienced players on Borussia Dortmund's team selected by coach, Bert van Marwijk for the forthcoming Saturday's Bundesliga game against Bayern Munich at the Westfalenstadion.

Original Text: Sikhs Gather to Celebrate 400-Year-Old Holy Book Thousands of Sikhs have gathered in the northern Indian city of Amritsar to mark the 400th anniversary of the installation there of Sikhism #39;s holiest book.
Translation: Los Sikhs se reúnen para celebrar el libro sagrado de 400 años. Miles de Sikhs se han reunido en la ciudad india del norte de Amritsar para conmemorar el 400 aniversario de la instalación allí del libro más sagrado del sijismo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To commemorate the 400th anniversary of the installation of Sikhism's most sacred book, thousands of Sikhs have congregated in Amritsar, a northern Indian city.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A northern Indian city, Amritsar, witnesses the assembly of several Sikhs celebrating the quadricentennial anniversary of the placement of Sikhism's holiest book.

Original Text: GOP to Bolster Bush Image As Strong Leader NEW YORK - Republicans marshaled their forces to bolster President Bush's image as a strong leader in treacherous times as they open their national convention in the city that felt the brunt of the worst terrorist attacks in U.S. history...
Translation: GOP para Reforzar la Imagen de Bush como Líder Fuerte NUEVA YORK - Los republicanos movilizaron sus fuerzas para reforzar la imagen del Presidente Bush como un líder fuerte en tiempos peligrosos mientras abren su convención nacional en la ciudad que sufrió el mayor impacto de los peores ataques terroristas en la historia de los EE.UU...
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK - With the commencement of their national convention in the city that experienced the most severe terrorist attack in U.S. history, the Republicans are rallying their resources to enhance President Bush's reputation as a powerful leader during precarious times.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As they initiate their national convention in the city most impacted by the deadliest terror attacks in U.S history, the Republicans are mobilizing their strength to reinforce the image of President Bush as a formidable leader in challenging times. New York - GOP to Ramp up Bush's Image as Decisive Leader.

Original Text: BBC Says Deceived by Dow Impersonator on Bhopal  LONDON (Reuters) - BBC World said on Friday it was duped in  an "elaborate deception" by a man who claimed to be a Dow  Chemical Co. spokesman and said the U.S. company accepted  responsibility for India's Bhopal disaster.
Translation: La BBC Dice ser Engañada por un Suplantador de Dow en Bhopal LONDRES (Reuters) - BBC World dijo el viernes que fue engañada en "una elaborada estafa" por un hombre que afirmaba ser un portavoz de Dow Chemical Co. y declaró que la compañía estadounidense asumía responsabilidad por el desastre de Bhopal en la India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - BBC World disclosed on Friday that they were tricked by a detailed ruse, involving a man pretending to be a spokesperson for Dow Chemical Co., who announced that the U.S. firm accepted fault for the Bhopal catastrophe in India.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A man pretending to represent Dow Chemical Co. successfully fooled BBC World into believing that the company acknowledged its accountability for the Bhopal disaster in India, the media outlet admitted on Friday from London.

Original Text: Feds reopen probe of Honda CR-V fires NEW YORK (CNN/Money) - The federal government is again looking at why the Honda CR-V compact sport/utility vehicle sometimes catches fire after an initial oil change, according to a published report.
Translation: Las autoridades federales reabren la investigación sobre los incendios de Honda CR-V NUEVA YORK (CNN/Money) - El gobierno federal está nuevamente examinando por qué el vehículo deportivo/utilitario compacto Honda CR-V a veces se incendia después de un cambio inicial de aceite, según un informe publicado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a reported publication, the Federal government has once again initiated an investigation into why the Honda CR-V compact sport/utility vehicle occasionally ignites following the first oil change.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A publication indicates that the U.S. Federal government has reopened its investigation into the reasons behind the occasional post-initial oil change fires in Honda’s CR-V compact sport/utility vehicle.

Original Text: Device Allows Doctors to Practice Deliveries The birth simulator has now been used to determine the best way to deliver a baby whose shoulders become stuck in the birth canal.
Translation: Dispositivo permite a los médicos practicar partos. El simulador de nacimiento ahora ha sido utilizado para determinar la mejor manera de dar a luz a un bebé cuyos hombros se quedan atascados en el canal de parto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the help of a birth simulator, doctors can now hone their skills in delivering babies who encounter difficulty due to their shoulders being stuck in the birth canal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Doctors are now utilizing a birth simulator to explore the most effective method for delivering a baby when their shoulders are lodged in the birth canal.

Original Text: DirecTV to Sell Half of Hughes Systems Rupert Murdoch's DirecTV Group Inc. will sell half its stake in Hughes Network Systems Inc. to SkyTerra, a company controlled by a New York private equity firm, the companies said Monday. <br><FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-Michael S. Rosenwald</b></font>
Translation: DirecTV venderá la mitad de Hughes Systems. El Grupo DirecTV Inc. de Rupert Murdoch venderá la mitad de su participación en Hughes Network Systems Inc. a SkyTerra, una empresa controlada por una firma de capital privado de Nueva York, dijeron las empresas el lunes. <br><FONT face="verdana, MS Sans Serif, arial, helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><b>-Michael S. Rosenwald</b></font>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rupert Murdoch's DirecTV Group Inc. announced its decision on Monday to offload half of its ownership in Hughes Network Systems Inc. to SkyTerra, a company under the umbrella of a New York-based private equity firm. - Michael S. Rosenwald
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, it was stated that half of DirecTV Group Inc.'s equity in Hughes Network Systems Inc. would be sold to SkyTerra. This comes from Rupert Murdoch's firm and will go to a company managed by a private equity firm in New York. - Michael S. Rosenwald

Original Text: Molecule offers Alzheimer's hope Scientists say they have engineered a molecule which could lead to new treatments for Alzheimer's disease.
Translation: Los científicos dicen que han diseñado una molécula que podría conducir a nuevos tratamientos para la enfermedad de Alzheimer. La molécula ofrece esperanza para el Alzheimer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scientists have reportedly developed a molecule that may pave the way for innovative treatments for Alzheimer's disease, offering a ray of hope.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There's potential hope for Alzheimer's with the creation of a new molecule by scientists, which could aid in developing new treatments for the disease.

Original Text: Briefly: Samsung to put hard drives in phones roundup Plus:  IDC says external disk storage up...Lawmakers to vote on spyware, piracy bills...Microsoft tests Windows Marketplace...Nortel delays financials again.
Translation: En resumen: Samsung integrará discos duros en teléfonos. Además: IDC informa que el almacenamiento en disco externo está en aumento... Legisladores votarán sobre leyes de spyware y piratería... Microsoft prueba Windows Marketplace... Nortel retrasa nuevamente sus informes financieros.
Paraphrase 1: In short: Samsung plans to incorporate hard drives into phones. Additionally, IDC reports an increase in external disk storage. Legislators are preparing to vote on spyware and piracy bills. Trials for Windows Marketplace are being conducted by Microsoft, and Nortel postpones their financial reports yet again.
Paraphrase 2: To summarize: Samsung is set to integrate hard drives into their phones. In related news, external disk storage sees a rise according to IDC. Upcoming votes are planned on bills related to spyware and piracy. Meanwhile, Microsoft is experimenting with Windows Marketplace and once again, Nortel's financial disclosures are delayed.

Original Text: Sprint certifies QuickTime, Xserve G5 for phone media (MacCentral) MacCentral - Telecommunications company Sprint on Thursday announced that it has certified Apple's Xserve G5 and QuickTime as mobile multimedia delivery platforms for Sprint's own PCS Vision Multimedia Services. This enables content service providers to use Xserve G5 systems and QuickTime to deliver streaming audio and video clips to Sprint customers whose phones support Sprint's new Vision Multimedia Service. The service provides content from CNN, NBC, Fox Sports, The Weather Channel, E! Entertainment, mFlix and other companies. ...
Translation: Sprint certifica QuickTime, Xserve G5 para medios de comunicación en el teléfono (MacCentral) MacCentral - La compañía de telecomunicaciones Sprint anunció el jueves que ha certificado la Xserve G5 de Apple y QuickTime como plataformas de entrega de multimedia móvil para los propios Servicios Multimedia PCS Vision de Sprint. Esto permite a los proveedores de servicios de contenido utilizar los sistemas Xserve G5 y QuickTime para entregar clips de audio y video en streaming a los clientes de Sprint cuyos teléfonos admiten el nuevo Servicio Multimedia Vision de Sprint. El servicio proporciona contenido de CNN, NBC, Fox Sports, The Weather Channel, E! Entertainment, mFlix y otras compañías. ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. MacCentral reports that Sprint, a notable telecommunications firm, has given its approval to Apple's Xserve G5 and QuickTime for their utility in mobile multimedia provision. These certifications are specifically for the PCS Vision Multimedia Services offered by Sprint. As a result, organizations providing content services can utilize QuickTime and Xserve G5 systems to stream audio and video clips to patrons who have access to Sprint's newly introduced Vision Multimedia Service. The service carries content from notable sources including CNN, NBC, Fox Sports, The Weather Channel, E! Entertainment, mFlix, among others.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sprint has endorsed QuickTime and Xserve G5 from Apple to serve as mobile multimedia distribution platforms on Thursday, as confirmed by MacCentral. This certification is intended specifically for Sprint's PCS Vision Multimedia Services, which paves the way for content service companies to leverage Xserve G5 systems and QuickTime in providing streams of audio and video clips to Sprint subscribers. These subscribers should have phones that are compatible with the recently rolled out Vision Multimedia Service from Sprint, which offer content from various entities such as CNN, NBC, Fox Sports, The Weather Channel, E! Entertainment, mFlix and more.

Original Text: Japanese sent scrambling as earthquakes inflict heavy toll OJIYA, Japan -- Overturned cars, crumbled homes and shattered roads greeted rescue workers Sunday after Japan #39;s deadliest earthquake in almost a decade stunned residents used to bearing up through the nation #39;s frequent tremors.
Translation: Los japoneses se ponen en marcha mientras los terremotos causan un alto costo OJIYA, Japón -- Los trabajadores de rescate encontraron autos volteados, casas derruidas y carreteras destrozadas el domingo después de que el terremoto más mortal de Japón en casi una década dejó atónitos a los residentes acostumbrados a soportar los frecuentes temblores de la nación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Ojiya, Japan, significant destruction awaited rescue teams on Sunday, with flipped cars, destroyed houses and broken roads being the aftermath of Japan's most lethal earthquake in nearly ten years; an event that left the typically resilient residents, accustomed to frequent seismic activities, in shock.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The people of Japan, despite being accustomed to the nation's regular tremors, were taken aback by the deadliest earthquake the country has experienced in almost a decade. Rescue workers arrived in Ojiya on Sunday, only to be met with the disheartening sight of overturned vehicles, collapsed houses, and damaged roads.

Original Text: OPEC Frets Over Excess Supply  CAIRO (Reuters) - Nervous OPEC oil producers on Wednesday  sized up how rapidly this week's ministerial meeting should  rein in a supply surge that has helped drag crude prices down  by a quarter in barely six weeks.
Translation: La OPEP se preocupa por el exceso de suministro. CAIRO (Reuters) - Los nerviosos productores de petróleo de la OPEP evaluaron el miércoles qué tan rápido la reunión ministerial de esta semana debería frenar un aumento de suministro que ha contribuido a arrastrar los precios del crudo hacia abajo en un cuarto en apenas seis semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CAIRO (Reuters) - Anxious OPEC oil manufacturers on Wednesday are evaluating at what speed the ministerial meeting this week should control a sharp increase in supply that has contributed to a 25% drop in oil prices in just under six weeks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. CAIRO (Reuters) - On Wednesday, uneasy OPEC oil producers are determining how swiftly the current week's ministerial gathering should curb a spike in supply that has driven crude prices down by a quarter in roughly six weeks.

Original Text: RIAA files 761 new file-trading lawsuits The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) has filed new lawsuits against 761 people who allegedly use peer-to-peer (P-to-P) software to trade music files without permission, the trade group announced Thursday.
Translation: La RIAA presenta 761 nuevas demandas por intercambio de archivos.
