La Asociación de la Industria de Grabación de América (RIAA) ha presentado nuevas demandas contra 761 personas que supuestamente utilizan software de igual a igual (P-to-P) para intercambiar archivos de música sin permiso, anunció el grupo comercial el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) announced on Thursday that it has launched fresh legal suits against 761 individuals purportedly involved in music file trading without authorization using peer-to-peer (P-to-P) software.

Original Text: Freed Anwar Maneuvers to Re-Enter Politics (AP) AP - Former Deputy Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim savored his first full day of freedom in six years Friday after his dramatic release from prison and he tested the waters for a comeback in Malaysian politics.
Translation: Anwar Liberado Maniobra para Reingresar a la Política (AP) AP - El ex viceprimer ministro Anwar Ibrahim saboreó su primer día completo de libertad en seis años este viernes después de su dramática liberación de prisión y probó las aguas para un regreso en la política malasia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After completing his first full day of freedom following six years in prison, former Deputy Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim began exploring the possibility of a political comeback within Malaysia (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anwar Ibrahim, the former Deputy Prime Minister, tasted freedom for the first time in six years on Friday, and is now considering a return to the Malaysian political scene (AP).

Original Text: US Military Says Iraq #39;s Tareq Aziz Still Alive The US military said on Saturday it had  quot;absolute confirmation quot; that Tareq Aziz, Iraq #39;s former deputy prime minister, was still alive.
Translation: El Ejército de Estados Unidos Dice que Tareq Aziz de Irak Todavía Está Vivo. El ejército de Estados Unidos dijo el sábado que tenía una "confirmación absoluta" de que Tareq Aziz, el ex primer ministro adjunto de Irak, todavía estaba vivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US military confirmed with certainty on Saturday that Tareq Aziz, the former deputy prime minister of Iraq, is still living.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tareq Aziz, the former deputy prime minister of Iraq, is still alive as confirmed by the US military on Saturday.

Original Text: 1,600 internet cafes closed in China The Chinese local governments have closed 1600 Internet cafes and fined operators a total of 100m yuan (\$12m) between February and August this year.
Translation: 1,600 cibercafés cerrados en China. Los gobiernos locales chinos han cerrado 1600 cibercafés y han multado a los operadores con un total de 100 millones de yuanes (\$12 millones) entre febrero y agosto de este año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Between February and August this year, the local governments in China have shut down 1,600 Internet cafes, imposing a total fine of 100m yuan (\$12m) on the operators.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This year, from February to August, 1,600 Internet cafes in China have been closed by the local governments, with operators being collectively fined a sum of 100m yuan (\$12m).

Original Text: North Korea Demands Change in US Policy North Korea said today it could resume six-nation talks on its nuclear weapons programmes if the US agrees to change its policy toward the communist state.
Translation: Corea del Norte exige cambio en la política de Estados Unidos. Corea del Norte dijo hoy que podría reanudar las conversaciones a seis bandas sobre sus programas de armas nucleares si Estados Unidos acepta cambiar su política hacia el estado comunista.
Paraphrase 1: 1. North Korea today announced that it could revisit the six-nation dialogue concerning its nuclear weapons initiatives, on the condition that the US revises its current policy towards the communist nation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Asserting a possibility to reinitiate the six-nation negotiations revolving around its nuclear weapons, North Korea today demanded a shift in US policy towards its communist regime.

Original Text: UNDATED: LSU (708). Janel McCarville had 16 points and 12 rebounds to lead Minnesota over previously unbeaten Wisconsin-Green Bay. It was the sixth straight victory for Minnesota (7-1), which got 12 points
Translation: SIN FECHA: LSU (708). Janel McCarville tuvo 16 puntos y 12 rebotes para guiar a Minnesota en su victoria sobre el anteriormente invicto, Wisconsin-Green Bay. Fue la sexta victoria consecutiva para Minnesota (7-1), que obtuvo 12 puntos.
Paraphrase 1: DATE UNKNOWN: LSU (708). Minnesota, led by Janel McCarville's 16 points and 12 rebounds, managed to defeat the previously unbeaten Wisconsin-Green Bay. This was the sixth consecutive win for Minnesota (7-1), where another player contributed 12 points.
Paraphrase 2: WITHOUT A DATE: LSU (708). Minnesota triumphed over the undefeated Wisconsin-Green Bay, thanks to Janel McCarville who scored 16 points and made 12 rebounds. This marked the sixth win in a row for Minnesota (7-1), with another player adding 12 points to the tally.

Original Text: Shia leader Sadrs movement insists on Iraq election boycott BAGHDAD - Radical Shiite cleric Muqtada Sadrs movement will not participate in the national Iraqi elections due on January 30, Sadrs senior assistant asserted on Friday.
Translation: El líder chiíta Sadr insiste en el boicot a las elecciones en Irak BAGDAD - El movimiento del clérigo chiíta radical Muqtada Sadr no participará en las elecciones nacionales iraquíes previstas para el 30 de enero, afirmó el asistente principal de Sadr el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The movement spearheaded by Shia leader Sadr has declared its intent to boycott the upcoming national Iraqi elections, according to an announcement from Sadr's senior assistant on Friday. The elections are scheduled for January 30.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD - Muqtada Sadr, a radical Shiite cleric, and his movement are committed to not participating in the national Iraqi elections, due to be held on January 30, as confirmed by Sadr's senior assistant last Friday.

Original Text: Scholar disputes claim in hacking attack A visiting scholar whose computer has been linked to a hacker attack at the University of California, Berkeley, released a statement late Friday saying she believed her equipment
Translation: Una académica disputa reclamo en ataque de hackers. Una académica visitante, cuya computadora ha sido relacionada con un ataque de hackers en la Universidad de California, Berkeley, emitió un comunicado el viernes por la noche diciendo que creía que su equipo
Paraphrase 1: 1. A visiting scholar at the University of California, Berkeley, who found her computer connected to a hacking activity, issued a late Friday statement asserting her belief that her equipment was implicated in the attack.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Late on Friday, a scholar visiting the University of California, Berkeley, whose computer was implicated in a hacking attack, released a statement claiming that she thinks her equipment was involved.

Original Text: US 'hurting' anti-mine campaign Anti-landmine activists meeting in Nairobi say the US is setting a  bad example by not joining a worldwide ban.
Translation: EE. UU. 'daña' la campaña contra las minas. Activistas contra las minas terrestres reunidos en Nairobi dicen que EE. UU. está dando un mal ejemplo al no unirse a la prohibición mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anti-landmine activists gathered in Nairobi have expressed that the US, by not conforming to the global prohibition, is negatively impacting the anti-mine campaign.

Original Text: Cleveland has nothing to lose vs. Patriots This area is footballs mecca -he Hall of Fame is about an hour away, in Canton  - the fans here have been deprived of good football for so long.
Translation: Cleveland no tiene nada que perder contra los Patriots. Esta área es la meca del fútbol: el Salón de la Fama está a una hora de distancia, en Canton. Los aficionados aquí han estado privados de buen fútbol durante tanto tiempo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite having nothing to lose in their match against the Patriots, Cleveland is situated close to the epicentre of football - the Hall of Fame in Canton, just an hour's ride away. The fans in this region have been yearning for quality football for a considerable period of time.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Situated about an hour from Canton's Hall of Fame, the quintessence of football, Cleveland enters a game with the Patriots with nothing on the line. The local fans, who have long suffered a drought of commendable football, dwell here.

Original Text: Americans forces bomb Fallujah, battle insurgents in Baghdad American forces unleashed an air strike against a suspected insurgent hideout in Fallujah on Tuesday, the latest in a string of attacks aimed at associates of guerrilla leader Abu Musab al-Zarqawi.
Translation: Las fuerzas estadounidenses bombardean Fallujah y combaten insurgentes en Bagdad. Las fuerzas estadounidenses desataron un ataque aéreo contra un presunto escondite insurgente en Fallujah el martes, el último de una serie de ataques dirigidos a asociados del líder guerrillero Abu Musab al-Zarqawi.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, American forces launched an aerial assault on a suspected insurgent hideout in Fallujah, continuing a series of attacks targeting associates of guerrilla leader Abu Musab al-Zarqawi, while also combating insurgents in Baghdad.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Engaged in warfare in both Fallujah and Baghdad, American forces initiated an air strike on a hideout suspected to house insurgents in Fallujah this Tuesday, as part of their ongoing offensive against followers of guerrilla leader Abu Musab al-Zarqawi.

Original Text: Tennis Needs Instant Replay Blame a chair umpire named Mariana Alves for professional tennis going to the use of instant replay, because it #39;s coming. When you screw up as badly as Alves did Tuesday night at the US Open
Translation: El Tenis Necesita Repeticiones Instantáneas. Cúlpese a una árbitro de silla llamada Mariana Alves por llevar al tenis profesional hacia el uso de repeticiones instantáneas, porque está llegando. Cuando cometes un error tan grave como Alves lo hizo el martes por la noche en el US Open.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mariana Alves, a chair umpire, can be held responsible for professional tennis adopting the use of instant replay due to her significant blunder on Tuesday night at the US Open. It's inevitable to see instant replay coming to tennis.

Original Text: Arafat condemns Tel Aviv attack Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, hospitalized in Paris, condemned Monday a suicide bombing which killed three civilians and the bomber in Tel Aviv, his senior advisor Nabil Abu Rudeina said.
Translation: Arafat condena el ataque en Tel Aviv: El líder palestino Yasser Arafat, hospitalizado en París, condenó este lunes un atentado suicida que mató a tres civiles y al terrorista en Tel Aviv, según dijo su asesor principal Nabil Abu Rudeina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Arafat censures Tel Aviv assault: From his hospital bed in Paris, Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat denounced the Monday suicide bombing in Tel Aviv that claimed the lives of three civilians and the bomber, according to his senior advisor Nabil Abu Rudeina.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The bombing in Tel Aviv, which resulted in the deaths of three civilians and the bomber, was harshly criticized by Yasser Arafat. The Palestinian leader, currently hospitalized in Paris, expressed his condemnation on Monday, as reported by his top advisor Nabil Abu Rudeina.

Original Text: Chelsea pair reveal Mutu backing Chelsea striker Mateja Kezman and club keeper Petr Cech have come out in support of team-mate Adrian Mutu.  quot;It was a shock for all of us, quot; said Kezman about Mutu failing a drug test.
Translation: La pareja del Chelsea revela apoyo a Mutu. El delantero del Chelsea, Mateja Kezman, y el portero del club, Petr Cech, han mostrado su apoyo al compañero de equipo Adrian Mutu. "Fue un shock para todos nosotros", dijo Kezman sobre Mutu al fallar una prueba de drogas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Chelsea striker Mateja Kezman and goalkeeper Petr Cech have publically expressed their support for their teammate Adrian Mutu, following the shock of his drug test failure. Kezman commented, "It was a shock for all of us."
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following Adrian Mutu's failed drug test, his Chelsea teammates Mateja Kezman and Petr Cech have openly supported him. Kezman remarked on the incident, saying, "It was a shock for all of us."

Original Text: Blue Coat jackets networks from spyware With concerns about spyware rapidly mounting, Blue Coat Systems is introducing a proxy appliance to combat the problem.
Translation: Blue Coat protege las redes de spyware. Con preocupaciones sobre el spyware aumentando rápidamente, Blue Coat Systems está introduciendo un dispositivo proxy para combatir el problema.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With growing concerns about spyware, Blue Coat Systems is deploying a proxy appliance to shield networks from such threats.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In response to the escalating worries around spyware, Blue Coat Systems presents a proxy appliance designed to protect networks.

Original Text: Carnival sails to higher 3Q profit Carnival Corp., the world #39;s biggest cruise group, said Friday its quarterly earnings rose sharply, citing the merger with P amp;O Princess Cruises last year.
Translation: Carnival navega hacia mayores ganancias en el tercer trimestre. Carnival Corp., el grupo de cruceros más grande del mundo, anunció el viernes que sus ganancias trimestrales aumentaron considerablemente, citando la fusión con P&O Princess Cruises el año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Carnival Corp., the world's largest cruise group, announced a significant increase in its quarterly earnings, attributing the growth to their merger with P&O Princess Cruises last year, thereby sailing to higher 3Q profits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Carnival Corp., the preeminent cruise group globally, stated on Friday that their 3rd quarter profits surged significantly, primarily due to their consolidation with P&O Princess Cruises the previous year.

Original Text: Polish walker wins fourth Olympic gold Robert Korzeniowski of Poland added to his record collection of gold medals in race walking with his unprecedented third consecutive Olympic victory Friday in the 50-kilometer walk.
Translation: El caminante polaco gana su cuarto oro olímpico. Robert Korzeniowski de Polonia añadió a su colección récord de medallas de oro en marcha atlética con su tercera victoria olímpica consecutiva sin precedentes el viernes en la caminata de 50 kilómetros.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Robert Korzeniowski from Poland achieved an unprecedented third consecutive Olympic victory in the 50-kilometer walk on Friday, adding another gold medal to his impressive record in race walking.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Earning his third successive Olympic victory in the 50-kilometer walk on Friday, Polish walker Robert Korzeniowski expanded his unparalleled collection of gold medals.

Original Text: Lexar's for Pros; Investors Get Hose The flash memory maker does fine in camera, but doesn't deliver for investors.
Translation: Lexar es para profesionales; Los inversores son perjudicados. El fabricante de memoria flash funciona bien en la cámara, pero no ofrece resultados para los inversores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. While Lexar performs well for professionals with its flash memory for cameras, it falls short for investors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although Lexar's flash memory is impressive for camera professionals, it disappoints its investors.

Original Text: Philips and Cirrus cut forecasts as chip gloom deepens Clouds continued to gather over the chip sector last week after Philips confirmed a bleaker outlook for sales, and analog and DSP chip vendor Cirrus Logic Inc sharply downgraded its forecast for the current quarter because customers want to reduce
Translation: Philips y Cirrus reducen las previsiones debido a la creciente desolación en el sector de los chips. Las nubes continuaron acumulándose sobre el sector de los chips la semana pasada después de que Philips confirmara un pronóstico más sombrío para las ventas, y el proveedor de chips analógicos y DSP, Cirrus Logic Inc, redujo drásticamente su pronóstico para el trimestre actual porque los clientes quieren reducir.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The pessimistic outlook on the chip sector continues to intensify as Philips and Cirrus Logic Inc., a provider of analog and DSP chips, downgrade their sales forecasts. Last week Philips confirmed an increasingly dismal forecast for sales, and Cirrus also significantly lowered its third-quarter projections due to consumers' desire to decrease purchases.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the troubles in the chip sector exacerbate, Philips and the analog and DSP chip manufacturer Cirrus Logic Inc significantly reduced their forecasts. The negative prediction for sales was affirmed by Philips last week, and Cirrus also revised its current quarter forecast drastically lower due to the customers' intention to cut back on consumption.

Original Text: AOL fraud charges settled for \$210 mil WASHINGTON - Time Warner Inc. agreed Wednesday to pay \$210 million to settle criminal securities-fraud charges brought by the Justice Department against the company #39;s America Online unit.
Translation: Acusaciones de fraude de AOL resueltas por \$210 millones WASHINGTON - Time Warner Inc. acordó el miércoles pagar \$210 millones para resolver las acusaciones de fraude criminal en valores presentadas por el Departamento de Justicia contra la unidad America Online de la compañía #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Justice Department's criminal securities-fraud charges against Time Warner Inc.'s America Online unit were resolved on Wednesday as the company agreed to a settlement of $210 million.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Time Warner Inc. consented to pay $210 million on Wednesday to settle the criminal securities-fraud charges filed by the Justice Department against its unit, America Online, thus resolving the AOL fraud charges.

Original Text: Marks  amp; Spencer Dumps Execs Marks  amp; Spencer reported after-tax profits of \$260 million for the six month period ending October 2nd, compared to \$436 million a year earlier.
Translation: Marks & Spencer Despide Ejecutivos. Marks & Spencer informó ganancias después de impuestos de $260 millones para el período de seis meses que terminó el 2 de octubre, en comparación con los $436 millones del año anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After-tax profits of $260 million were reported by Marks & Spencer for the six-month period ending October 2nd; this is significantly lower compared to $436 million from the previous year, leading to the displacement of some executives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Comparing to $436 million a year earlier, Marks & Spencer's after-tax profits dropped to $260 million for the six months ending on October 2nd, resulting in the removal of certain executives.

Original Text: Goodyear to cut 340 jobs AKRON, Ohio - Goodyear Tire  amp; Rubber Co. has announced the elimination of 340 jobs in its engineered products and chemical businesses a month after posting its first profitable quarter since 2002.
Translation: Goodyear recortará 340 empleos AKRON, Ohio - Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. ha anunciado la eliminación de 340 empleos en sus negocios de productos de ingeniería y químicos un mes después de haber publicado su primer trimestre rentable desde 2002.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AKRON, Ohio - After posting its first profitable quarter since 2002, Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. recently declared its decision to eliminate 340 positions within its engineered products and chemical businesses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A month subsequent to reporting its first quarter of profitability since 2002, Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co., based in Akron, Ohio, has revealed plans to terminate 340 jobs in its chemical and engineered products sectors.

Original Text: ICANN enters negotiations on .mobi, .jobs domains ICANN has begun commercial and technical negotiations with the applicant registries, bringing the number of domains in this second stage of evaluations to four. The other two are the .post and .travel domains.
Translation: ICANN entra en negociaciones sobre los dominios .mobi, .jobs. ICANN ha comenzado negociaciones comerciales y técnicas con los registros solicitantes, llevando el número de dominios en esta segunda etapa de evaluaciones a cuatro. Los otros dos son los dominios .post y .travel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ICANN has initiated business and technical discussions with applicant registries concerning .mobi and .jobs domains, escalating the count of domains to four in this continuing evaluation phase. The remaining two include the .post and .travel domains.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ICANN is in the process of negotiating on .mobi and .jobs domains with the applying registries, increasing the tally of domains under this second stage of review to four. The .post and .travel domains make up the other two.

Original Text: Russian school attack offers difficult lessons to learn President Bush was quick to express solidarity with the Russian people last week after the terrorist attack on a Russian school that left more than 330 dead.
Translation: El ataque a una escuela rusa ofrece difíciles lecciones que aprender. El presidente Bush fue rápido en expresar su solidaridad con el pueblo ruso la semana pasada después del ataque terrorista a una escuela rusa que dejó más de 330 muertos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the terrorist attack on a Russian school that resulted in over 330 fatalities, President Bush swiftly showed support for the Russian people, highlighting the arduous lessons to be taken from this tragic incident.

Original Text: Arafat in Serious Condition, Foreign Medics Arrive  RAMALLAH, West Bank (Reuters) - Foreign doctors on Thursday  tended to seriously ill Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, who  for decades has symbolized his people's struggle for statehood.
Translation: Arafat en estado grave, llegan médicos extranjeros RAMALLAH, Cisjordania (Reuters) - Médicos extranjeros atendieron el jueves al gravemente enfermo líder palestino Yasser Arafat, quien durante décadas ha simbolizado la lucha de su pueblo por la independencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. RAMALLAH, West Bank (Reuters) - Yasser Arafat, the Palestinian leader who has long been a symbol of his people's quest for statehood, is gravely sick and is receiving care from foreign doctors who arrived on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. RAMALLAH, West Bank (Reuters) - On Thursday, foreign medical experts arrived to assist Yasser Arafat, a longtime symbol of the Palestinian fight for statehood, who is currently battling severe illness.

Original Text: Woodgate suffers further injury setback Real Madrid centre-back Jonathan Woodgate had to retire from a practice match on Thursday after suffering a recurrence of his thigh muscle injury.
Translation: Woodgate sufre otro contratiempo por lesión. El defensa central del Real Madrid, Jonathan Woodgate, tuvo que retirarse de un partido de práctica el jueves después de sufrir una recaída de su lesión en el músculo del muslo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jonathan Woodgate, the Real Madrid centre-back, had to withdraw from a practice game on Thursday due to a relapse of his thigh muscle injury, indicating another injury setback for Woodgate.

Original Text: Nations unite as boats collide Anyone gazing out to sea from the east Kent coast on Tuesday will have seen an unusual flurry of lifeboats and helicopters. Two miles off Deal a disaster was unfolding - two 100ft boats
Translation: Las naciones se unen cuando los barcos chocan. Cualquiera que miraba hacia el mar desde la costa este de Kent el martes habría visto una agitación inusual de botes salvavidas y helicópteros. A dos millas de Deal, se estaba gestando un desastre: dos barcos de 100 pies.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Anyone looking towards the sea from the east coast of Kent on Tuesday would have witnessed an extraordinary gathering of lifeboats and helicopters. It was two miles off Deal, a catastrophe was playing out between two 100ft boats.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An unexpected surge of lifeboats and helicopters would've caught an observer's eye from the East Kent shoreline on Tuesday. Over at a distance of two miles from Deal, a catastrophic incident was taking place involving two immense 100ft boats.

Original Text: Many Amphibians on the Verge of Extinction Eye of newt and toe of frog may one day be gone from witches grog. Indeed, not just frogs and newts but amphibians in general are rapidly becoming threatened worldwide, a new study shows.
Translation: Traducción al Español: Muchos Anfibios al Borde de la Extinción. El ojo de tritón y el dedo de rana podrían algún día desaparecer del brebaje de las brujas. De hecho, no solo las ranas y los tritones, sino los anfibios en general, están amenazados rápidamente a nivel mundial, muestra un nuevo estudio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Numerous amphibians worldwide are nearing extinction, suggests a new study. This includes not only frogs and newts, implying that ingredients like eye of newt and toe of frog might one day disappear from witches' brew.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new study has illustrated that amphibians, including frogs and newts, are globally at the brink of extinction. This means that witch's concoctions like eye of newt or toe of frog might soon vanish.

Original Text: ANZ Australia Newspaper Job Ads 5.0 In Oct Vs Sep SYDNEY (Dow Jones)--The number of job advertisements in Australian newspapers rose 5.0 in October from September, and climbed 5.2 from a year earlier, Australia  amp; New Zealand Banking Group Ltd.
Translation: Anuncios de empleo en periódicos de Australia de ANZ aumentan un 5.0 en octubre en comparación con septiembre SYDNEY (Dow Jones)--El número de anuncios de empleo en periódicos australianos aumentó un 5.0 en octubre en comparación con septiembre, y subió un 5.2 en comparación con el año anterior, según el Banco de Australia y Nueva Zelanda Ltd.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Australia & New Zealand Banking Group Ltd reported that job advertisements in Australian newspapers increased by 5.0 in October, compared to September, and amplified by 5.2 compared to the same month of the previous year.
Paraphrase 2: 2) In October, there was a 5.0 increase in job advertisements in Australian newspapers compared to September, and a 5.2 increase compared to the the same period last year, as revealed by the Australia & New Zealand Banking Group Ltd.

Original Text: Kite still on top in rainy Sonoma Sonoma, CA (Sports Network) - Tom Kite battled heavy rain and cold temperatures on Saturday to shoot an even-par 72 and take the third-round lead of the Champions Tour #39;s season-ending Charles Schwab Cup Championship.
Translation: Cometa sigue en lo alto en la lluviosa Sonoma Sonoma, CA (Red de Deportes) - Tom Kite luchó contra una intensa lluvia y bajas temperaturas el sábado para disparar un par de 72 y tomar la delantera en la tercera ronda del torneo final de la temporada del Champions Tour, el Campeonato de la Copa Charles Schwab.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the heavy rain and cold temperatures in Sonoma, CA, Tom Kite managed to shoot an even-par 72, taking the lead in the third round of the Champions Tour's season-ending Charles Schwab Cup Championship on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Sonoma's adverse weather conditions, Tom Kite excelled by scoring an even-par 72 on Saturday. This achievement placed him on top during the third round of the season-ending Charles Schwab Cup Championship of the Champions Tour.

Original Text: Pop Secret 500 Race Notes  amp; Quotes Notes and quotes from various drivers following California Speedway #39;s Pop Secret 500. Jeff Gordon slipped to second in points following an engine failure while Jimmie Johnson moved back into first.
Translation: Notas y citas de la carrera Pop Secret 500 amp; Notas y citas de varios pilotos tras el California Speedway #39;s Pop Secret 500. Jeff Gordon bajó al segundo lugar en puntos tras un fallo del motor mientras que Jimmie Johnson volvió a estar en el primer lugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the Pop Secret 500 race at California Speedway, various drivers shared their remarks and observations. Jeff Gordon fell to the second position in points due to an engine malfunction, allowing Jimmie Johnson to reclaim the first place.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Quotes and input from drivers followed the Pop Secret 500 race at California Speedway. An engine mishap led Jeff Gordon to drop to the second spot in the ranking while Jimmie Johnson regained his position at the top.

Original Text: TechLove With Mr. Roboto Q: I recently installed Service Pack 2 on my Windows XP machine, and now the system #39;s gone all screwy: Internet Explorer won #39;t display animations right, I can #39;t play WarCraft III, and Yahoo Instant Messenger is toast.
Translation: TechLove Con Mr. Roboto P: Recientemente instalé el Service Pack 2 en mi máquina con Windows XP, y ahora el sistema está completamente descontrolado: Internet Explorer no muestra correctamente las animaciones, no puedo jugar a WarCraft III, y Yahoo Instant Messenger no funciona.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the recent installation of Service Pack 2 on my Windows XP, my system has been behaving abnormally; animations don't properly load on Internet Explorer, WarCraft III is unplayable, and Yahoo Instant Messenger no longer functions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. My Windows XP machine has been acting oddly ever since I installed Service Pack 2; the issues range from Internet Explorer not correctly displaying animations to not being able to run WarCraft III and Yahoo Instant Messenger anymore.

Original Text: Warren the do-it-yourself type Defensive end Ty Warren , who played behind veteran Bobby Hamilton as a rookie last year and had 33 tackles, has eclipsed that total with 48 stops this season in 12 starts. Throw in a pass deflection, a couple of forced fumbles, and 4 1/2 sacks, and it's been a promising turnaround for the 13th overall pick in ...
Translation: Warren, el tipo de defensa al estilo "hazlo tú mismo", Ty Warren, quien jugó detrás del veterano Bobby Hamilton como novato el año pasado y tuvo 33 placajes, ha superado ese total con 48 detenciones esta temporada en 12 partidos como titular. Añade una desviación de pase, un par de balones sueltos forzados, y 4 1/2 capturas, y ha sido un prometedor giro para la 13ava selección global en...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ty Warren, a defensive end who played as a backup to veteran Bobby Hamilton and made 33 tackles in his rookie year, has made considerable progress this season. With 12 starts, he's managed to outdo his previous record, registering 48 stops. Moreover, he's added a pass deflection, a few forced fumbles, and 4.5 sacks to his stats, demonstrating impressive progress for the 13th overall pick.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Coming from a rookie season where he played secondary to Bobby Hamilton, the defensive end Ty Warren has taken a notable leap this season, with his tackles increasing from 33 to 48 in just 12 starts. Furthermore, his stats also include a pass deflection, multiple forced fumbles and 4.5 sacks, marking a substantial improvement for the 13th overall selection.

Original Text: Iraqis, U.S. Officials Meet in Peace Bid BAGHDAD, Iraq - U.S. military officials and representatives of rebel Shiite cleric Muqtada al-Sadr held talks Sunday aimed at reducing violence in the restive Baghdad slum of Sadr City, a day after clashes there killed 10 people, officials said...
Translation: Iraquíes y Oficiales de EE.UU. Se Reúnen en Intento de Paz BAGDAD, Irak - Oficiales militares de EE.UU. y representantes del clérigo chiíta rebelde Muqtada al-Sadr sostuvieron conversaciones el domingo con el objetivo de reducir la violencia en el conflictivo barrio marginal de Sadr City en Bagdad, un día después de los enfrentamientos allí que dejaron 10 personas muertas, dijeron los funcionarios...
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD, Iraq - Aiming to pacify the volatile Sadr City slum, U.S. military officials engaged in dialogue on Sunday with representatives of the rebel Shiite cleric, Muqtada al-Sadr. The talks came a day after a violent clash in the area which led to the death of 10 people, according to officials...
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD, Iraq - In an effort to diminish conflict in Sadr City, a volatile slum, U.S. military officials communicated with envoys of the Shiite dissident cleric, Muqtada al-Sadr on Sunday. This meeting happened just a day after a hostile encounter resulted in the demise of 10 individuals, as confirmed by the officials...

Original Text: Teen boosts women #39;s soccer squad The  quot;Win One for Mia and the Gang quot; speech US women #39;s soccer coach April Heinrichs delivered before Monday #39;s Olympic semifinal match got the job done.
Translation: La adolescente mejora el equipo de fútbol femenino. El discurso "Gana uno por Mia y la pandilla" que la entrenadora del equipo de fútbol femenino de Estados Unidos, April Heinrichs, pronunció antes del partido semifinal olímpico del lunes, hizo el trabajo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Win One for Mia and the Gang" - a motivational speech given out by US women's soccer coach April Heinrichs prior to Monday's Olympic semifinal match, evidently energized the teen in the women's soccer team.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A teenager brought a significant improvement to the women's soccer squad after being inspired by a talk, "Win One for Mia and the Gang", made by April Heinrichs, the US women's soccer coach, before the semifinals of the Olympic match on Monday.

Original Text: Oil Hits \$53 on Winter Worries, Nigeria Oil prices scaled new heights at \$53 for U.S. crude Thursday on concerns over tight winter heating fuel supplies and an unexpected strike at Nigerian oil terminals.
Translation: El petróleo alcanza los \$53 por preocupaciones de invierno, los precios del petróleo en Nigeria alcanzaron nuevos máximos a \$53 para el crudo estadounidense el jueves debido a preocupaciones sobre el ajustado suministro de combustible para calefacción de invierno y una huelga inesperada en los terminales de petróleo nigerianos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Concerns about limited winter heating fuel supplies and a surprise strike at Nigerian oil terminals triggered U.S. crude oil prices to climb to a new peak of $53 on Thursday.

Original Text: Hurricane Damage to Hurt Allstate Profit  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Allstate Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ALL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ALL.N</A>, the No. 2 U.S.  home and auto insurer, warned on Wednesday its third-quarter  profits would fall well short of expectations due to more than  \$1 billion in hurricane-related payouts.
Translation: Daño del Huracán Perjudicará las Ganancias de Allstate  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Allstate Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ALL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ALL.N</A>, el segundo asegurador de hogar y auto más grande de EE. UU., advirtió el miércoles que sus ganancias del tercer trimestre estarían muy por debajo de las expectativas debido a más de \$1 mil millones en pagos relacionados con el huracán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Allstate Corp, the second largest home and auto insurer in the U.S., announced on Wednesday that their third-quarter profits would significantly fall below expectations due to over $1 billion in payments related to hurricane damages.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Due to over $1 billion worth of hurricane-related payouts, Allstate Corp., the second-ranked home and auto insurer in the U.S., sounded a warning on Wednesday about a sharp decrease in its third-quarter profits, falling well short of initial forecasts.

Original Text: Subscription-based licensing lacking corporate excitement A new study sponsored by Macrovision, the Software and Information Industry Association, and the Centralized Electronic Licensing User Group has found that there is a discrepancy between where software companies think software licensing is heading and
Translation: La licencia basada en suscripciones carece de entusiasmo corporativo. Un nuevo estudio patrocinado por Macrovision, la Asociación de la Industria del Software y la Información, y el Grupo de Usuarios de Licencias Electrónicas Centralizadas ha encontrado que existe una discrepancia entre donde las compañías de software creen que se dirige la licencia de software y
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a recent study by Macrovision, the Software and Information Industry Association, and the Centralized Electronic Licensing User Group, there's a gap in perception among software companies regarding the future direction of subscription-based licensing, which lacks corporate enthusiasm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. When it comes to the future of subscription-based licensing which is devoid of corporate excitement, a recent study initiated by Macrovision, the Software and Information Industry Association, and the Centralized Electronic Licensing User Group, reveals a disagreement in perceptions among software firms.

Original Text: Arms dealer says Thatcher wanted to buy two military helicopters An arms dealer, who is the key state witness in the attempted coup in an oil-rich African state, said that he had talks with Sir Mark Thatcher who wanted to buy two military helicopters, it was revealed yesterday.
Translation: Un traficante de armas dice que Thatcher quería comprar dos helicópteros militares. Un traficante de armas, quien es el testigo clave del estado en el intento de golpe de estado en un país africano rico en petróleo, dijo que tuvo conversaciones con Sir Mark Thatcher, quien quería comprar dos helicópteros militares, se reveló ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The key state witness in the attempted coup of an oil-rich African state, an arms dealer, revealed yesterday that he had discussions with Sir Mark Thatcher about his interest in purchasing two military helicopters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As divulged yesterday, discussions about buying two military helicopters were held between an arms dealer - the principal state witness in the attempted overthrow of an oil-rich African country - and Sir Mark Thatcher.

Original Text: Twins swept away; Yankees #39; dominance deceptive yet telling The Minnesota Twins might have moved two steps back toward a return to Yankee Stadium next week for the first round of the playoffs when they got swept by the New York Yankees in a rain
Translation: Translation: Gemelos arrastrados; El dominio de los Yankees es engañoso pero revelador. Los Minnesota Twins podrían haber dado dos pasos atrás hacia un regreso al Yankee Stadium la próxima semana para la primera ronda de los playoffs cuando fueron barridos por el New York Yankees en un partido lluvioso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Minnesota Twins possibly dashed their hopes of a rematch at Yankee Stadium next week for the playoffs' first round, having fallen prey to a sweep by the New York Yankees in a rain-affected game. This evidences the Yankees' dominance, a phenomenon that is both misleading and revealing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Owing to a rain-affected game sweep by the New York Yankees, the Minnesota Twins might have jeopardized their chance of revisiting the Yankee Stadium for the upcoming playoff's initial round. The Yankees indeed display a dominating performance, one that could be seen as deceptive and yet informative.

Original Text: Again, no word on Expos MILWAUKEE Major League Baseball #39;s executive council met for three hours yesterday but made no formal recommendation on whether the Montreal Expos should move to Washington next season.
Translation: De nuevo, ninguna noticia sobre los Expos MILWAUKEE El consejo ejecutivo de las Grandes Ligas de Béisbol se reunió durante tres horas ayer, pero no hizo ninguna recomendación formal sobre si los Montreal Expos deberían trasladarse a Washington la próxima temporada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite meeting for three hours yesterday, the executive council of Major League Baseball did not give any formal suggestions concerning the relocation of the Montreal Expos to Washington in the next season.

Original Text: Scientists Obtain Evidence Earth #39;s Spin Twists Space-Time Around <b>...</b> An international research team has found the first direct evidence that the Earth is dragging space and time around itself as it rotates, like a spoon spinning in honey.
Translation: Los científicos obtienen evidencia de que la rotación de la Tierra retuerce el espacio-tiempo a su alrededor <b>...</b> Un equipo internacional de investigación ha encontrado la primera evidencia directa de que la Tierra está arrastrando el espacio y el tiempo a su alrededor a medida que gira, como una cuchara girando en miel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An international team of researchers has garnered firsthand evidence suggesting that the rotation of the Earth is twisting space-time in its vicinity, akin to a spoon swirling honey.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Evidence has emerged, thanks to a global team of scientists, proving that the rotation of the Earth bends space-time around itself, analogous to how a spinning spoon stirs honey.

Original Text: quot;February election quot; report played down Downing Street has played down reports that the Prime Minister may call an early election in February. Most political commentators expect Mr Blair to seek a new mandate in May 2005 since to go to the polls
Translation: "El informe de las 'elecciones de febrero' minimizado; Downing Street ha minimizado los informes de que el Primer Ministro podría convocar elecciones anticipadas en febrero. La mayoría de los comentaristas políticos esperan que el Sr. Blair busque un nuevo mandato en mayo de 2005, ya que ir a las urnas
Paraphrase 1: 1. Downing Street has downplayed speculation that the Prime Minister may instigate an early February election. Most political pundits anticipate Mr Blair will aim for a new endorsement in May 2005 instead of hosting the polls.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Prime Minister might propose an early election in February, a notion that Downing Street has dismissed. The majority of political analysts predict that Mr Blair would instead pursue a renewed mandate in May 2005.

Original Text: Parmalat sues bank MILAN: Parmalat #39;s administrators sued Bank of America yesterday, the latest of several lawsuits against some of the world #39;s biggest financial institutions over the food group #39;s 14 billion-euro bankruptcy.
Translation: Parmalat demanda al banco MILÁN: Los administradores de Parmalat demandaron al Bank of America ayer, la última de varias demandas contra algunas de las instituciones financieras más grandes del mundo por la quiebra de 14 mil millones de euros del grupo de alimentos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MILAN: Bank of America was sued yesterday by the administrators of Parmalat, marking the most recent in a series of legal actions against some of the world's largest financial institutions in relation to the food group's 14 billion-euro bankruptcy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In MILAN, Parmalat's administrators filed a lawsuit against Bank of America yesterday. This represents the continuing trend of several lawsuits filed against major global financial institutions concerning the food group's bankruptcy worth 14 billion euros.

Original Text: Car Bombs Kill 5 US Troops In Iraq BAGHDAD (CBS) Five US servicemen lost their lives to car bombs in Iraq, the US military said Saturday, the latest in a string of such attacks at the start of the Islamic holy month of Ramadan.
Translation: Bombas de Coche Matan a 5 Soldados de EEUU en Irak BAGDAD (CBS) Cinco militares de EEUU perdieron sus vidas a causa de bombas de coche en Irak, según dijo el sábado el ejército de EEUU, el más reciente de una serie de dichos ataques al inicio del sagrado mes islámico del Ramadán.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid the commencement of the Islamic holy month of Ramadan, Baghdad witnessed yet another horrific car bombing incident which claimed the lives of five US soldiers, as confirmed by the US military on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US military confirmed on Saturday that five of their servicemen were fatally injured due to car bombings in Iraq. This recent string of terror attacks has occurred at the beginning of the Islamic holy month of Ramadan.

Original Text: Sharon Says Gaza Settlers to Leave Homes JERUSALEM - Prime Minister Ariel Sharon said Thursday all 8,200 Jewish settlers will be pulled out of the Gaza Strip starting next summer, and he ordered a troop withdrawal from a refugee camp - signaling that a bloody two-week offensive in northern Gaza could be easing.    Sharon said next year's settlement evacuation would be completed within 12 weeks despite opposition from settlers and their backers...
Translation: Sharon Dice que los Colonos de Gaza Dejarán sus Hogares JERUSALÉN - El primer ministro Ariel Sharon dijo el jueves que todos los 8,200 colonos judíos serán retirados de la Franja de Gaza a partir del próximo verano, y ordenó la retirada de las tropas de un campo de refugiados, lo que indica que una sangrienta ofensiva de dos semanas en el norte de Gaza podría estar disminuyendo. Sharon dijo que la evacuación de los asentamientos del próximo año se completará dentro de 12 semanas a pesar de la oposición de los colonos y sus partidarios...
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Thursday, Prime Minister Ariel Sharon announced that all 8,200 Jewish settlers in the Gaza Strip will be relocated starting from the coming summer. Sharon ordered a halt to military operations in a refugee camp, indicating that the fierce two-week campaign in northern Gaza may soon subside. Despite the resistance from settlers and their supporters, Sharon assured that the evacuation process of the settlement would be finished within three months next year.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Prime Minister Ariel Sharon of Jerusalem stated on Thursday that a removal of all 8,200 Jewish settlers from the Gaza Strip will commence next summer. Additionally, he directed a halt to military occupation in a refugee camp, hinting at a possible easing of a two-week violent conflict in northern Gaza. He predicted the completion of the settler eviction next year within a 12-week period, despite anticipated objections from the settlers and their allies.

Original Text: Web Site Helps Undecided Voters Choose (PC World) PC World - Presidential Guidester polls voters, matches their positions with those of candidates.
Translation: Sitio Web Ayuda a los Votadores Indecisos a Elegir (PC World) PC World - La encuesta del Guía Presidencial sondea a los votantes, haciendo coincidir sus posturas con las de los candidatos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PC World - Guidester, a website, aids indecisive voters in making choices by comparing their views with those of candidates.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Undecided voters get assistance from a website which compares their standpoints to those of Presidential candidates (PC World).

Original Text: Yao Ming and Rockets Arrive in Shanghai Houston Rockets #39; Yao Ming answers a question from journalists during a press conference for the NBA China 2004 game Tuesday, Oct. 12, 2004 in Shanghai, China.
Translation: Yao Ming y los Rockets llegan a Shanghai. Yao Ming de los Houston Rockets responde a una pregunta de los periodistas durante una conferencia de prensa para el partido de la NBA China 2004 el martes, 12 de octubre de 2004 en Shanghai, China.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yao Ming of the Houston Rockets responds to a press inquiry during a conference for the NBA China 2004 game in Shanghai, China, on Tuesday, Oct. 12, 2004, upon his and his team's arrival.

Original Text: King Tut Exhibit Could Prove to Be Gold Mine (Reuters) Reuters - The gilded treasures of King\Tutankhamun are on their way back to the United States in what\could prove a gold rush for Egypt and big business.
Translation: Exposición del Rey Tut Podría Demostrar Ser Una Mina de Oro (Reuters) Reuters - Los tesoros dorados del Rey Tutankamón están en camino de regreso a los Estados Unidos en lo que podría resultar ser un auge de oro para Egipto y un gran negocio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Egypt Could Benefit Greatly from the King Tut Exhibition, Predicts Reuters - The United States is set to receive the golden antiquities of King Tutankhamun again, potentially resulting in a lucrative business endeavor and economic boost for Egypt.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Exhibition of King Tut's Treasures May Be Highly Profitable, as Suggested by Reuters - King Tutankhamun's golden artifacts are en route to the United States once more, potentially offering a financial windfall for Egypt and major businesses.

Original Text: Duke University Welcomes Freshmen With New iPods Newly arrived Duke University freshmen got something considerably snazzier than the usual Blue Devils T-shirts and ball caps: Their goodie bags included a free iPod digital music player engraved with the school's crest and the words "Class of 2008."
Translation: La Universidad Duke da la bienvenida a los estudiantes de primer año con nuevos iPods. Los recién llegados a la Universidad Duke recibieron algo considerablemente más elegante que las habituales camisetas y gorras de los Blue Devils: Sus bolsas de regalos incluían un iPod digital gratuito grabado con el escudo de la escuela y las palabras "Clase de 2008".
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Class of 2008" freshmen at Duke University were greeted with a distinctive surprise in their welcome kits - there was a stylish iPod digital music player inside, etched with the school's crest, a step up from the typical Blue Devils T-shirts and ball caps.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An iPod digital music player, branded with the school's crest and the "Class of 2008", was a deluxe addition to the welcome kits for freshmen at Duke University, outshining the usual Blue Devils gear like T-shirts and ball caps.

Original Text: Clinton to return to campaign trail Monday (AFP) AFP - Bill Clinton will return to the campaign trail on behalf of Democratic candidate John Kerry, party officials said, six weeks after the still-popular former president underwent heart surgery to bypass blocked arteries.
Translation: Clinton regresará al camino de la campaña el lunes (AFP) AFP - Bill Clinton regresará a la campaña en nombre del candidato demócrata John Kerry, dijeron funcionarios del partido, seis semanas después de que el aún popular ex presidente se sometiera a una cirugía de corazón para desbloquear arterias obstruidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Party officials announced that Bill Clinton, the still-beloved former president who underwent a heart bypass operation six weeks ago, will be resuming campaign duties in support of Democratic candidate John Kerry come Monday, according to the AFP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After having heart surgery to treat blocked arteries six weeks prior, the ever-admired ex-president Bill Clinton is set to resume campaigning for John Kerry, the Democratic candidate, this coming Monday, party officials informed the AFP.

Original Text: Astros #39; Oswalt will pitch through pain Before Astros righthander Roy Oswalt starts today #39;s Game 4 of the NLCS, he #39;ll need a painkiller injection for an aggravated left rib cage muscle.
Translation: Antes de que el lanzador derecho de los Astros, Roy Oswalt, comience el Juego 4 de la NLCS de hoy, necesitará una inyección de analgésico por un músculo de la caja torácica izquierda agravado. Los Astros #39; Oswalt lanzará a pesar del dolor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prior to starting today's Game 4 of the NLCS, Astros' right-handed pitcher Roy Oswalt, wearing jersey number 39, will require an injection to numb his aggravated left rib cage muscle, indicating his determination to pitch through the pain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In spite of his irritated left rib cage muscle, Roy Oswalt of the Astros, number 39, is set to play through the pain in Game 4 of the NLCS today, but not before receiving a painkiller injection.

Original Text: Marathon RePorter extends USB, FireWire, more (MacCentral) MacCentral - Marathon Computer on Friday introduced its RePorter Port Extender. The spherical device features a flat front face with two USB Type A ports, a FireWire 400 port, a FireWire 800 port, audio in through a 1/8-inch stereo mini jack and audio out through a 1/8-inch stereo mini jack. The device connects to a Mac or PC using a single 1.5-meter cable that splits apart into one-foot lengths. The Marathon RePorter is shipping now and costs US #36;59.
Translation: Marathon RePorter expande USB, FireWire, y más (MacCentral) MacCentral - Marathon Computer presentó el viernes su Extensor de Puertos RePorter. El dispositivo esférico presenta una cara frontal plana con dos puertos USB Tipo A, un puerto FireWire 400, un puerto FireWire 800, audio entrada a través de una mini clavija estéreo de 1/8 de pulgada y salida de audio a través de una mini clavija estéreo de 1/8 de pulgada. El dispositivo se conecta a una Mac o PC utilizando un único cable de 1.5 metros que se divide en longitudes de un pie. El Marathon RePorter ya está en envío y tiene un costo de US$59.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MacCentral announced that Marathon Computer launched its RePorter Port Extender on Friday. This orb-shaped device contains two USB Type A ports, a FireWire 400 port, a FireWire 800 port, and audio in and out via 1/8-inch stereo mini jacks on its flat front panel. This device is paired with a Mac or PC with a single cable of 1.5 meters that extends into one-foot sections. The Marathon RePorter is now available for purchase at a price of US $59.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the RePorter Port Extender was introduced by Marathon Computer, according to MacCentral. The device, which has a round shape and a flat front part, is equipped with two USB Type A ports, a FireWire 400 port, a FireWire 800 port, and 1/8-inch stereo mini jacks for audio input and output. The RePorter is connected to a Mac or PC by a 1.5-meter cable that can be split into lengths of one foot. The device is currently available for shipping and can be bought for US $59.

Original Text: Pittsburgh vs. Arizona PHOENIX (Ticker) -- Jack Wilson lofted a sacrifice fly in the top of the 10th inning to lift the Pittsburgh Pirates to a wild 8-7 victory over the Arizona Diamondbacks. In the 10th, Jose Castillo drew leadoff walk against Greg Aquino (0-1) and stole ...
Translation: Pittsburgh vs. Arizona PHOENIX (Ticker) -- Jack Wilson elevó un fly de sacrificio en la parte superior de la décima entrada para catapultar a los Piratas de Pittsburgh a una frenética victoria de 8-7 sobre los Diamondbacks de Arizona. En la décima, José Castillo recibió una base por bolas al inicio contra Greg Aquino (0-1) y robó ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In an intense match against Arizona, Jack Wilson of Pittsburgh Pirates managed to hit a sacrifice fly during the 10th inning, ensuring an 8-7 triumph for the Pirates. Jose Castillo started the 10th inning with a leadoff walk versus Greg Aquino (0-1), subsequently making a steal...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jack Wilson, a player for the Pittsburgh Pirates, secured an exciting 8-7 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks by hitting a sacrifice fly in the 10th inning. As the 10th inning got underway, Jose Castillo confronted Greg Aquino (0-1) with a leadoff walk and successfully stole...

Original Text: 10 Afghans Released From Guatanamo Bay At least 10 Afghans, including a nomad leader who fought with the Taliban, have been released from a U.S. prison in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, officials said Wednesday.
Translation: Liberados 10 Afganos de la Bahía de Guantánamo: Al menos 10 afganos, incluyendo a un líder nómada que luchó con los talibanes, han sido liberados de una prisión de Estados Unidos en la Bahía de Guantánamo, Cuba, dijeron funcionarios el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Wednesday saw the release of at least 10 Afghans, among them a nomadic leader who once battled alongside the Taliban, from the U.S. detention center situated in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, according to officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Officials confirmed on Wednesday that a U.S. penitentiary in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, has released a minimum of 10 Afghans. Included in this group was a nomadic leader known for his past involvement with the Taliban.

Original Text: Briefly: Microsoft updates home PC package roundup Plus: LookSmart buys Furl.net...Pentagon expands access to voting site...Ad campaign touts multimedia cards...T-Mobile sells Sidekick II.
Translation: Breve resumen: Microsoft actualiza el paquete para PC doméstica. Además: LookSmart compra Furl.net...Pentágono amplía el acceso al sitio de votaciones...La campaña publicitaria promociona las tarjetas multimedia...T-Mobile vende Sidekick II.
Paraphrase 1: In summary: Microsoft rolls out updates for home PC packages; LookSmart acquires Furl.net; the Pentagon increases access to their voting site; an advertising campaign praises multimedia cards, and T-Mobile is selling Sidekick II.
Paraphrase 2: To put it briefly, Microsoft is introducing updates for home PC package roundup, LookSmart makes a purchase of Furl.net, the Pentagon widens access to its voting site, multimedia cards are being promoted through an ad campaign, and T-Mobile has Sidekick II for sale.

Original Text: Els edges away from Harrington Ernie Els took a three shot lead against Padraig Harrington at the HSBC World Match Play at Wentworth today. The South African is three up on the Irishman after 17 holes of their semi-final this afternoon.
Translation: Els se aleja de Harrington. Ernie Els tomó una ventaja de tres golpes contra Padraig Harrington en el HSBC World Match Play en Wentworth hoy. El sudafricano está tres arriba del irlandés después de 17 hoyos de su semifinal esta tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the HSBC World Match Play at Wentworth today, Els advanced with a three-shot lead against Harrington. After 17 holes of their semi-final this afternoon, the South African holds a three-point advantage over the Irishman.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In today's semi-final of the HSBC World Match Play at Wentworth, Ernie Els turned the tables on Padraig Harrington, establishing a three-shot lead. With 17 holes completed this afternoon, Els from South Africa is three shots ahead of his Irish competitor.

Original Text: African leaders gather Tuesday to assess NEPAD development program (AFP) AFP - African leaders are to gather in Algiers to review the progress of the New Partnership for African Development (NEPAD), a wide-ranging strategy for ensuring good governance and building the economies of the world's poorest continent.
Translation: Los líderes africanos se reúnen el martes para evaluar el programa de desarrollo de NEPAD (AFP) AFP - Los líderes africanos se reunirán en Argel para revisar el progreso de la Nueva Alianza para el Desarrollo de África (NEPAD), una estrategia de amplio alcance para garantizar una buena gobernanza y construir las economías del continente más pobre del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP reports that African leaders will convene on Tuesday in Algiers to evaluate the advancement of the New Partnership for African Development (NEPAD), an extensive strategy with a purpose to encourage good governance and boost the economic growth of the world's most impoverished continent.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters reports that there will be a meeting involving African leaders in Algiers on Tuesday, dedicated to evaluating the progress of the New Partnership for African Development (NEPAD). NEPAD is a comprehensive plan aimed at fostering good governance and stimulating economic growth in the poorest continent in the world.

Original Text: Huygens Probe Test Successful European Space Agency -- ESAs Huygens probe, now orbiting Saturn on board the NASA/ESA/ASI Cassini spacecraft, is in good health and successfully passed its fifteenth In-Flight Checkout on 14 September 2004.     This in-flight checkout procedure was the last but one planned before separation of the Huygens probe from Cassini in December this year, and it included some specific activities that were intended to prepare for the separation...
Translation: Prueba de la sonda Huygens exitosa - Agencia Espacial Europea -- La sonda Huygens de la ESA, que ahora orbita Saturno a bordo de la nave espacial Cassini de la NASA / ESA / ASI, está en buen estado de salud y superó con éxito su decimoquinto chequeo en vuelo el 14 de septiembre de 2004. Este procedimiento de chequeo en vuelo fue el penúltimo planeado antes de la separación de la sonda Huygens de Cassini en diciembre de este año, e incluyó algunas actividades específicas que tenían como objetivo prepararse para la separación...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The European Space Agency has confirmed the successful testing of the Huygens probe, which is currently onboard the NASA/ESA/ASI Cassini spacecraft in Saturn's orbit. Its fifteenth In-Flight Checkout was successfully executed on 14 September 2004, ensuring the probe's good health. This particular procedure, the second-last planned before the Huygens probe separates from Cassini in December, included several specific tasks aimed at preparing for the upcoming separation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On 14 September 2004, the Huygens probe completed its fifteenth In-Flight Checkout while orbiting Saturn in the NASA/ESA/ASI Cassini spacecraft. The European Space Agency expressed satisfaction with the successful test, confirming the good health of the probe. This checkout, one of the final ones prior to the probe's scheduled detachment from Cassini in December, incorporated specific preparatory tasks for the separation.

Original Text: Women #39;s volleyball: Russia defeats Brazil to reach finals Russia defeated Brazil in five sets in Athens on Thursday to cruise into the final of the women #39;s volleyball in the Athens Olympics.
Translation: Voleibol femenino: Rusia vence a Brasil para llegar a las finales. Rusia venció a Brasil en cinco sets en Atenas el jueves para avanzar a la final del voleibol femenino en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Athens Olympics, Russian women's volleyball team overcame Brazil in a five-set match on Thursday, advancing them to the finals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Successful in a gruelling five-set match against Brazil, the Russian women's volleyball team sailed into the finals at the Athens Olympics on Thursday.

Original Text: IBM in pension settlement talks NEW YORKIBM said yesterday it is in talks to settle a mammoth lawsuit alleging a pension plan adopted by the firm in the 1990s discriminated against 140,000 older workers.
Translation: IBM en negociaciones para liquidar una pensión NUEVA YORK IBM dijo ayer que está en conversaciones para resolver una demanda gigantesca que alega que un plan de pensiones adoptado por la empresa en la década de 1990 discriminó a 140,000 trabajadores mayores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM, yesterday, announced that it is engaged in discussions to resolve a massive lawsuit case. The lawsuit alleges that a pension scheme adopted by the company during the 1990s was prejudiced against 140,000 of its senior workers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Engaged in discussions to settle a colossal lawsuit, IBM announced yesterday. The lawsuit claims that a pension strategy implemented by the corporation in the 90s was biased against 140,000 elder employees.

Original Text: Australian-Scottish Stem Cell Sciences Offers Researchers Free <b>...</b> Stem Cell Sciences, an Australian biotechnology company which recently moved its headquarters to Edinburgh, Scotland, is offering scientists worldwide, unconditional access to a new embryonic stem-cell line.
Translation: Stem Cell Sciences, una empresa australiana de biotecnología que recientemente trasladó su sede a Edimburgo, Escocia, ofrece a los investigadores de todo el mundo acceso incondicional a una nueva línea de células madre embrionarias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Stem Cell Sciences, an Australian biotech firm that recently relocated its main office to Edinburgh, Scotland, is providing unconditional access to a novel embryonic stem-cell line for researchers around the globe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Unconditional access to a freshly developed embryonic stem-cell line is being offered by Stem Cell Sciences, an Australian biotechnology firm that has just moved its headquarters to Edinburgh, Scotland, to scientists all over the world.

Original Text: Pirated copies of Windows XP cannot install Service Pack 2 Paying customers only: Microsoft. Company has blocked registration codes that are known to be from illegal copies. Q: I thought that Microsoft was going to make Service Pack 2 available to all XP users, licensed or unlicensed.
Translation: Las copias piratas de Windows XP no pueden instalar el Service Pack 2 Solo clientes de pago: Microsoft. La compañía ha bloqueado los códigos de registro que se sabe provienen de copias ilegales. P: Pensé que Microsoft iba a hacer el Service Pack 2 disponible para todos los usuarios de XP, con licencia o sin licencia.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Only paying customers can install Service Pack 2 on Windows XP since Microsoft has implemented a block on registration codes that are identified as being from pirated copies. There seems to be a misconception that Microsoft was planning to provide Service Pack 2 to all XP users, regardless of whether they have a legal license or not.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Microsoft's Service Pack 2 for Windows XP is exclusively available for legitimate customers. They have barred the known illegal codes from pirated versions. There's a query regarding Microsoft's announcement to give Service Pack 2 access to every XP user, whether they have bought a license or not.

Original Text: Takeover Bid For Struggling Sainsbury #39;s A corporate dealmaker and former Tory Party treasurer is reportedly planning a 5bn takeover bid for struggling supermarket chain Sainsbury #39;s.
Translation: Oferta de Adquisición para el Afligido Sainsbury #39;s. Se informa que un creador de negocios corporativos y ex tesorero del Partido Tory tiene planeada una oferta de adquisición de 5 mil millones para la cadena de supermercados en apuros Sainsbury #39;s.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It's reported that a business tycoon and previous treasurer of the Tory Party is considering a £5bn acquisition proposal for the ailing supermarket chain, Sainsbury's.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A £5bn takeover plan for the economically challenged supermarket chain Sainsbury's, is purportedly being mapped out by a business magnate who once served as the treasurer for the Tory Party.

Original Text: US Airways Pilots Resume Negotiations US Airways pilots resumed negotiations Wednesday with management on a new labor contract with the bankrupt airline, even as the company made clear that it will now be seeking greater concessions.
Translation: Los pilotos de US Airways reanudan las negociaciones. Los pilotos de US Airways reanudaron el miércoles las negociaciones con la dirección sobre un nuevo contrato laboral con la aerolínea en quiebra, incluso cuando la compañía dejó claro que ahora buscará mayores concesiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Negotiations regarding a new labor contract with the bankrupt airline were resumed by the US Airways pilots on Wednesday, in spite of the company stating that they will now require more concessions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, pilots from US Airways went back to the negotiating table with the airline's management over a new labor contract, regardless of the airline, now bankrupt, stating its intention to seek additional concessions.

Original Text: But caution and fears of hard landing are the same TOKYO (CBS.MW) - When it comes to the success of China #39;s steps to slow down its booming economy, Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan and the International Monetary Fund are reading from different pages.
Translation: Pero la cautela y los temores de un aterrizaje duro son los mismos TOKIO (CBS.MW) - Cuando se trata del éxito de los pasos de China para frenar su economía en auge, el presidente de la Reserva Federal, Alan Greenspan y el Fondo Monetario Internacional, están leyendo desde diferentes páginas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (CBS.MW) - Concerning the effectiveness of China #39's measures to decelerate its surging economy, there is a divergence in the perspectives of Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan and the International Monetary Fund, as caution and apprehension of a severe landing are the same.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan and the International Monetary Fund are interpreting China #39's measures to curb its thriving economy in different ways, while the concerns about a harsh economic landing remain the same, reports TOKYO (CBS.MW).

Original Text: EU tentatively agrees to lift embargo on Libya BRUSSELS : European Union (EU) officials agreed in principle to lift an arms embargo on Libya after pressure from Italy. Italy has for several months been pressing its EU counterparts to lift the embargo imposed
Translation: La UE acuerda tentativamente levantar el embargo a Libia BRUSELAS: Los funcionarios de la Unión Europea (UE) acordaron en principio levantar un embargo de armas a Libia después de la presión de Italia. Italia ha estado presionando durante varios meses a sus homólogos de la UE para que levanten el embargo impuesto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under pressure from Italy, European Union officials have tentatively agreed to lift the arms embargo on Libya that had been in place for several months. This decision was made in Brussels, where Italy had been forcefully advocating for such a measure for quite some time.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After numerous months of lobbying by Italy, the European Union has preliminarily decided in Brussels to remove the arms embargo on Libya. EU officials gave their consent in theory to end the ban that had been instituted for several months.

Original Text: O'Neal Takes Shot Shaquille O'Neal dismissed as "ridiculous" Kobe Bryant's allegations that O'Neal had paid up to \$1 million in hush money to various women and then took his own shot at his former teammate.
Translation: O'Neal Dispara: Shaquille O'Neal calificó de "ridículas" las acusaciones de Kobe Bryant de que O'Neal había pagado hasta \$1 millón en dinero de silencio a varias mujeres, y luego lanzó su propio golpe contra su ex compañero de equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shaquille O'Neal dismissed Kobe Bryant's accusations of paying hush money to multiple women as "ridiculous", and then retaliated with a criticism towards his ex-teammate.

Original Text: Firefox browser takes on Microsoft Few people get excited when some new software is released, especially when the program is not a game or a music or movie player. But the release of the first full version of a web browser called Firefox has
Translation: El navegador Firefox se enfrenta a Microsoft. Pocas personas se emocionan cuando se lanza un nuevo software, especialmente cuando el programa no es un juego o un reproductor de música o películas. Pero el lanzamiento de la primera versión completa de un navegador web llamado Firefox ha
Paraphrase 1: 1. The unveiling of Firefox, a web browser, seems to be challenging Microsoft, sparks excitement unexpectedly even though it's not a music or movie player or a game, something that usually doesn't happen when new software is introduced.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the fact that it's neither a game nor an audio or video player—software releases that typically stir excitement—Firefox, a new web browser, has managed to catch people's interest and appears to compete with Microsoft.

Original Text: Playing Games in Your 20's? Nintendo Is Onto You Nintendo is hoping that the Nintendo DS will win over older, more sophisticated gamers.
Translation: ¿Jugando videojuegos en tus 20's? Nintendo te ha detectado. Nintendo espera que el Nintendo DS conquiste a los jugadores mayores y más sofisticados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Are you in your 20s and love playing games? Nintendo thinks they have something for you. They believe their Nintendo DS will appeal to a more mature and discerning gamers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nintendo understands if you are in your 20s and gaming is your passion. They're counting on the Nintendo DS to captivate the interest of older and more refined gamers.

Original Text: Ichiro draws media crowd OAKLAND - The Seattle Mariners won #39;t get to the postseason this year, but they #39;re being covered as if they #39;re already there.
Translation: Ichiro atrae a la multitud de medios OAKLAND - Los Marineros de Seattle no llegarán a la postemporada este año, pero se les está cubriendo como si ya estuvieran allí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. OAKLAND - Despite not progressing to this year's postseason, the Seattle Mariners are getting media attention as though they already have, with Ichiro being the main attraction.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the Seattle Mariners not making it to the postseason this year, Ichiro is drawing in media crowds in Oakland as if they had made it to the playoffs.

Original Text: FRITO-LAY dumps jobs Downriver economic development officials geared up Thursday to deal with the latest blow to area manufacturing workers, the closing of the Frito-Lay plant in Allen Park with its loss of nearly 400 jobs.
Translation: Los funcionarios de desarrollo económico de Downriver se prepararon el jueves para enfrentar el último golpe a los trabajadores de la industria manufacturera, el cierre de la planta de FRITO-LAY en Allen Park con su pérdida de casi 400 empleos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Economic development officials Downriver braced themselves on Thursday for another hit to the local manufacturing sector, as Frito-Lay plans to close its Allen Park plant - a move that will lead to the loss of almost 400 jobs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The impending closure of the Frito-Lay factory in Allen Park, which will result in a loss of approximately 400 jobs, caused Downriver economic development officials to spring into action on Thursday, preparing to tackle this new challenge to the area's manufacturing workforce.

Original Text: Viacom, Disney Settle with FCC Children #39;s cable TV channels owned by Viacom Inc. (VIAb.N: Quote, Profile, Research) and Disney Corp. (DIS.N: Quote, Profile, Research) have agreed to settle allegations they violated
Translation: Viacom, Disney llegan a un acuerdo con la FCC. Los canales de televisión por cable para niños propiedad de Viacom Inc. (VIAb.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) y Disney Corp. (DIS.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) han acordado resolver las acusaciones de que violaron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Children's cable TV channels that are run by Viacom Inc. (VIAb.N: Quote, Profile, Research) and Disney Corp. (DIS.N: Quote, Profile, Research) have come to terms with the FCC allegations of violations.

Original Text: Canada #39;s Environmental Record Bad-Official Report The Canadian government is not doing enough to protect the environment because of a lack of leadership and political will, a senior official said in a scathing report released on Tuesday.
Translation: Registro Ambiental Malo de Canadá - Informe Oficial. El gobierno de Canadá no está haciendo lo suficiente para proteger el medio ambiente debido a la falta de liderazgo y voluntad política, dijo un alto funcionario en un duro informe publicado el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A senior official declared in a critical report issued on Tuesday that Canada's environmental performance is poor, attributing it to the inadequacy in governmental efforts and lack of political resolution and leadership.

Original Text: Alkhanov calls restoration of Chechen economy top priority GROZNY. Aug 30 (Interfax) - Alu Alkhanov, who according to initial vote counts is believed to have won Sunday #39;s Chechen presidential election, said he is going to concentrate on accelerating the restoration
Translation: Alkhanov llama a la restauración de la economía chechena la máxima prioridad GROZNY. Aug 30 (Interfax) - Alu Alkhanov, quien según los recuentos de votos iniciales se cree que ha ganado las elecciones presidenciales chechenas del domingo # 39, dijo que va a concentrarse en acelerar la restauración.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GROZNY, Aug 30 (Interfax) - Alu Alkhanov, believed to be the victor of Sunday's Chechen presidential election based on initial vote counts, stated he will focus on expediting the restoration of Chechen economy, calling it a top priority.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Aug 30, GROZNY (Interfax) - Alu Alkhanov, the projected winner of Sunday's presidential election in Chechnya based on early vote counts, declared his primary agenda is speeding up the recovery of Chechen economy.

Original Text: Hoax bomb threat forces flight to Stansted (AFP) AFP - A Virgin Atlantic flight from Hong Kong to London was forced to divert to a less busy airport by what turned out to be a hoax bomb threat.
Translation: Falsa amenaza de bomba obliga a vuelo a desviarse a Stansted (AFP) AFP - Un vuelo de Virgin Atlantic de Hong Kong a Londres se vio obligado a desviar a un aeropuerto menos concurrido debido a lo que resultó ser una falsa amenaza de bomba.
Paraphrase 1: 1) A false bomb threat compelled a Virgin Atlantic flight traveling from Hong Kong to London to reroute to Stansted, a less congested airport (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) Following a hoax bomb threat, a Virgin Atlantic flight heading from Hong Kong to London had to be redirected to the less crowded Stansted airport (AFP).

Original Text: IBM Brings High-Performance Computing to Houston (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - The company's third supercomputing center will focus on the energy industry.
Translation: IBM lleva la computación de alto rendimiento a Houston (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - El tercer centro de supercomputación de la compañía se centrará en la industria energética.
Paraphrase 1: 1. IBM Expands High-Performance Computing in Houston to cater to the Energy Sector: Ziff Davis
Paraphrase 2: Ziff Davis - The energy industry will be the focal point of the company's third supercomputing center.

Original Text: Prickly solution to slimmers #39; woes A plant used to stem the hunger pangs of African tribes could soon be added to the meals of obese westerners desperate to lose their excess pounds.
Translation: Solución espinosa a los problemas de los adelgazantes #39; Una planta utilizada para aliviar los dolores de hambre de las tribus africanas podría pronto ser añadida a las comidas de los occidentales obesos desesperados por perder sus libras de más.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A prickly plant, utilized by African tribes to suppress hunger, may soon become a key ingredient in meals of overweight westerners eager to shed extra weight.

Original Text: Death Watch (Forbes.com) Forbes.com - Soka University in Japan trains students for government employment exams and touts their success. Might a presence of followers in the civil service be of more than spiritual use to Soka Gakkai? Consider this case from the files of the Tokyo civil courts.
Translation: Vigilancia de la Muerte (Forbes.com) Forbes.com - La Universidad Soka en Japón prepara a los estudiantes para los exámenes de empleo gubernamentales y promociona su éxito. ¿Podría una presencia de seguidores en el servicio civil ser de más utilidad espiritual para Soka Gakkai? Considere este caso de los archivos de los tribunales civiles de Tokio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Forbes.com's Death Watch reveals that Soka University in Japan offers preparatory training for government exams to its students, and highlights their accomplishments. Could having its followers in the civil service sector prove beneficial to Soka Gakkai beyond a spiritual aspect? Reflect on a case study found in the Tokyo civil courts' archives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As per Forbes.com's Death Watch, Soka University in Japan guides students towards success in government employment tests and applauds their achievements. The school's influence in the civil service through its followers could potentially extend beyond spiritual benefits for Soka Gakkai. Ponder on a particular case from the records of Tokyo's civil courts.

Original Text: Cincinnati QB Expects to Start in Bowl (AP) AP - Cincinnati quarterback Gino Guidugli has the cast off his broken throwing hand and expects to start when the Bearcats play in the Fort Worth Bowl next week.
