Translation: El QB de Cincinnati espera comenzar en el Bowl (AP) AP - El mariscal de campo de Cincinnati, Gino Guidugli, se ha quitado el yeso de su mano de lanzamiento rota y espera comenzar cuando los Bearcats jueguen en el Fort Worth Bowl la próxima semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - Gino Guidugli, Cincinnati's quarterback, anticipates to be the start-off player in the Fort Worth Bowl next week, having removed the cast from his previously injured throwing hand.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - After removing the cast from his broken throwing hand, quarterback Gino Guidugli of Cincinnati is forecasting a start in the forthcoming Fort Worth Bowl next week.

Original Text: Ship owners float a vacation home idea Four years after buying the Nantucket Lightship on eBay , Bill and Kristen Golden want to sell vacationers an interest in a onetime rust bucket that has been transformed into a floating pleasure palace.
Translation: Los propietarios de barcos proponen una idea de casa de vacaciones. Cuatro años después de comprar el Nantucket Lightship en eBay, Bill y Kristen Golden quieren vender a los vacacionistas un interés en lo que una vez fue un balde de óxido y que ha sido transformado en un palacio de placer flotante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Having purchased the Nantucket Lightship on eBay four years ago, Bill and Kristen Golden are now proposing an idea to sell a share of the previously deteriorated ship, which has now been renovated into a luxurious floating vacation home.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Four years subsequent to their acquisition of the Nantucket Lightship on eBay, Bill and Kristen Golden are planning to offer vacationers a stake in what was once a rusting vessel but is now a lavish floating holiday residence.

Original Text: Strong U.S. Economy Attracts Dollar Buyers (Investor's Business Daily) Investor's Business Daily - After fretting for months about the bulging U.S. deficit, in recent days currency traders have turned their attention to the health of the world's other economies.
Translation: Economía Fuerte de EE.UU. Atrae Compradores de Dólares (Investor's Business Daily) Investor's Business Daily - Después de preocuparse durante meses por el creciente déficit de EE.UU., en los últimos días los operadores de divisas han dirigido su atención a la salud de las otras economías del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Investor's Business Daily - Having harbored concerns about the growing U.S. deficit for a considerable period, currency traders in the past few days have redirected their focus towards the wellness of other global economies, bolstered by the robust U.S. economy enticing dollar investors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Investor's Business Daily - Currency traders, who've been anxious about the escalating U.S. deficit for some time, recently shifted their sights to the state of other economies across the globe, with a strong U.S. economy drawing dollar investors.

Original Text: Sun proposes new open-source license Sun Microsystems has quietly begun seeking official open-source status for a new software license that likely will be used to govern its Solaris operating system.
Translation: Sun propone una nueva licencia de código abierto. Sun Microsystems ha comenzado discretamente a buscar un estatus oficial de código abierto para una nueva licencia de software que probablemente se utilizará para gobernar su sistema operativo Solaris.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems has silently started to pursue official open-source certification for a new software license, which is expected to be applied to its Solaris operating system.

Original Text: Sri Lanka rebuffs rebels #39; demands Sri Lanka #39;s government has rejected demands from Tamil Tiger rebels to unconditionally resume peace talks. The rebels threatened at the weekend to return to military action unless discussions based on their blueprint for self-rule began again.
Translation: Sri Lanka rechaza las demandas de los rebeldes #39; Sri Lanka #39; El gobierno ha rechazado las demandas de los rebeldes Tigres Tamiles para reanudar las conversaciones de paz de manera incondicional. Los rebeldes amenazaron el fin de semana con volver a la acción militar a menos que las discusiones basadas en su plan para el autogobierno comenzaran de nuevo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The government of Sri Lanka has disregarded the demands of Tamil Tiger rebels, who urge the unconditional recommencement of peace talks. Over the weekend, the rebels issued threats to resort to militancy if their blueprint for autonomy is not considered in resumed discussions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sri Lanka's administration has turned down the requests from Tamil Tiger rebels to restart peace dialogues without conditions. The rebels warned that they would revert to armed action if there isn't a discussion based on their self-rule proposal.

Original Text: Firefox: The revolution begins here You know how sometimes you find a product or service and just have to evangelize it to everyone you know? Maybe you really like the Braun Oral-B electric toothbrush.
Translation: Firefox: La revolución comienza aquí. ¿Sabes cómo a veces encuentras un producto o servicio y simplemente tienes que evangelizarlo a todos los que conoces? Quizás te gusta mucho el cepillo de dientes eléctrico Braun Oral-B.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Firefox: This is where the revolution starts. You ever discover a product or service that's so good, you just feel obligated to spread the word to everyone you know? For instance, you might be significantly impressed by the Braun Oral-B electric toothbrush.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Firefox: Here commences the revolution. Have you ever come across a product or service that's so impressive, you feel compelled to recommend it to everyone you know? Like, maybe you're particularly fond of your Braun Oral-B electric toothbrush.

Original Text: Three Barcelona players suffer by serious knee injuries Three FC Barcelona defensive players have suffered serious knee injuries in the opening rounds of the Spanish league season, leaving coach Frank Rijkaard with only four healthy fullbacks.
Translation: Tres jugadores de Barcelona sufren graves lesiones de rodilla. Tres defensas del FC Barcelona han sufrido graves lesiones de rodilla en las primeras rondas de la temporada de la liga española, dejando al entrenador Frank Rijkaard con solo cuatro laterales completamente sanos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Three defensive players from FC Barcelona have incurred severe knee injuries in the initial rounds of the Spanish league season, leaving Frank Rijkaard, the coach, with merely four fit fullbacks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Serious knee injuries have affected three players of FC Barcelona's defensive line at the beginning of the Spanish league season, diminishing coach Frank Rijkaard's options to only four uninjured fullbacks.

Original Text: US bankruptcy judge promises Yukos ruling this week Russian oil company Yukos, possibly making its last stand to prevent Russia from selling its main production unit in a tax dispute, asked a US bankruptcy judge Thursday to block a scheduled auction of the unit.
Translation: El juez de quiebras de EE.UU. promete un fallo sobre Yukos esta semana. La petrolera rusa Yukos, posiblemente haciendo su último intento para evitar que Rusia venda su principal unidad de producción en una disputa fiscal, pidió el jueves a un juez de quiebras de EE.UU. que bloquee una subasta programada de la unidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a possible final attempt to prevent the sale of its primary production unit amidst tax disputes with Russia, Russian oil firm Yukos appealed to a US bankruptcy judge on Thursday to halt the planned auction for the unit. The judge has assured a ruling on this within the week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thursday saw Yukos, a Russian oil company, appealing to a US bankruptcy judge for the halting of an impending auction of its main production unit, which is part of a tax dispute with Russia. The company might be making its final attempt to avoid the sale. A decision is assured from the judge in the coming week.

Original Text: YUKOS Calls Meeting to Mull Bankruptcy Oil major YUKOS will hold a shareholders meeting on Dec. 20 to decide whether to file for bankruptcy or liquidate the firm after it was hit with huge new
Translation: YUKOS Convoca Reunión para Considerar la Bancarrota. La importante petrolera YUKOS llevará a cabo una reunión de accionistas el 20 de diciembre para decidir si presenta una solicitud de quiebra o liquida la empresa después de ser golpeada con enormes nuevas cargas financieras.
Paraphrase 1: 1) YUKOS, the major oil company, will conduct a meeting with shareholders on December 20th to consider either filing for bankruptcy or dissolving the company, in response to a significant new financial setback.
Paraphrase 2: 2) After being faced with a substantial financial blow, YUKOS, a leading oil firm, has scheduled a shareholders' meeting on December 20th to discuss the possibilities of either bankruptcy filing or dissolution of the company.

Original Text: Latest Tungsten T5 Adds Power, Resolution PalmOne (Quote, Chart), maker of the lower-priced Zire handheld and the Treo smartphone, unveiled the Tungsten T5 handheld Monday, which adds heaps of memory and an Intel 416MHz XScale processor.
Translation: El último Tungsten T5 añade potencia, resolución PalmOne (Cotización, Gráfico), fabricante del Zire de mano de precio más bajo y el smartphone Treo, presentó el lunes el Tungsten T5 de mano, que añade montones de memoria y un procesador Intel 416MHz XScale.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PalmOne (Quote, Chart), the manufacturer of the inexpensive Zire handheld and the Treo smartphone, introduced the Tungsten T5 handheld on Monday that comes with a generous amount of memory and an Intel 416MHz XScale processor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, PalmOne (Quote, Chart), known for producing the budget-friendly Zire handheld and the Treo smartphone, released the new Tungsten T5 handheld, equipped with a large amount of memory and an Intel 416MHz XScale processor.

Original Text: Threats could force England to cancel trip As England departed on a three-month tour of southern Africa yesterday, their captain, Michael Vaughan, suggested that his team could yet refuse to fulfil their commitment to the Zimbabwe section of the trip.
Translation: Las amenazas podrían obligar a Inglaterra a cancelar el viaje. A medida que Inglaterra partió ayer en una gira de tres meses por el sur de África, su capitán, Michael Vaughan, sugirió que su equipo todavía podría negarse a cumplir con su compromiso con la sección de Zimbabue del viaje.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Michael Vaughan, the captain of England's team, hinted that the Zimbabwe leg of their three-month southern Africa tour that kicked off yesterday, might be cancelled due to threats.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As they started their three-month tour of southern Africa, England could potentially back out from the Zimbabwe part of the trip due to threats, indicated their captain, Michael Vaughan.

Original Text: Score one against activism? The removal of the president of California #39;s largest public pension fund has raised questions about whether pension funds, endowments and other big activist investors can keep wielding clout in corporate governance campaigns.
Translation: ¿Un punto en contra del activismo? La destitución del presidente del fondo de pensiones público más grande de California #39 ha planteado preguntas sobre si los fondos de pensiones, dotaciones y otros grandes inversores activistas pueden seguir ejerciendo influencia en las campañas de gobernanza corporativa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The dismissal of the president of the biggest public pension fund in California has sparked concerns over the continued influence of pension funds, endowments, and other significant activist investors in corporate governance initiatives. Is this a setback for activism?
Paraphrase 2: 2. Activism might have suffered a blow with the termination of the president of the largest public pension fund in California – it casts doubt on whether big activist investors such as pension funds and endowments can continue to exercise power in campaigns for corporate governance.

Original Text: New Zealand releases Israeli spies Two Israelis who were jailed for two months for trying to obtain a New Zealand passport were released from prison and deported Wednesday, Prime Minister Helen Clark said.
Translation: Nueva Zelanda libera a espías israelíes. Dos israelíes que fueron encarcelados durante dos meses por intentar obtener un pasaporte de Nueva Zelanda fueron liberados de la prisión y deportados el miércoles, dijo la primera ministra Helen Clark.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prime Minister Helen Clark announced on Wednesday that two Israelis, who had served two months in a New Zealand prison for attempting to acquire a New Zealand passport, were released and subsequently deported.

Original Text: Scottie Pippen Retires After 17 Seasons DEERFIELD, Ill. - Scottie Pippen announced his retirement from the Chicago Bulls, the team he and Michael Jordan led to six NBA titles in the 1990s...
Translation: Scottie Pippen se Retira Tras 17 Temporadas DEERFIELD, Ill. - Scottie Pippen anunció su retiro de los Chicago Bulls, el equipo que él y Michael Jordan llevaron a seis títulos de la NBA en la década de 1990...
Paraphrase 1: 1. After 17 seasons, Scottie Pippen retires from the Chicago Bulls - a team he and Michael Jordan steered to six NBA championships in the 1990s, from his base at DEERFIELD, Ill.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Scottie Pippen, from his location in DEERFIELD, Ill., declared his retirement concluding 17 seasons with the Chicago Bulls, where he and Michael Jordan collectively guided the team to six NBA victories in the 1990s.

Original Text: Broker sued in bid-rig inquiry A San Diego insurance brokerage has been sued by New York Attorney General Elliot Spitzer for allegedly soliciting payoffs in exchange for steering business to preferred insurance companies.
Translation: Corredor demandado en investigación de manipulación de ofertas. Una correduría de seguros de San Diego ha sido demandada por el Fiscal General de Nueva York, Elliot Spitzer, por presuntamente solicitar sobornos a cambio de dirigir negocios a compañías de seguros preferidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A San Diego insurance brokerage has faced a lawsuit initiated by Elliot Spitzer, the New York Attorney General, over claims of illicitly steering business to favored insurance companies in exchange for payoffs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Accused of taking payoffs to direct business to selected insurance companies, a San Diego-based insurance brokerage is now under a lawsuit by Elliot Spitzer, the New York Attorney General.

Original Text: Thailand declines to back shark proposal at CITES meeting Thailand has refused to support a proposal at the ongoing CITES meeting to strict the trade in greatwhite sharks due to concern over the possible adverse effect on its shark
Translation: Tailandia se niega a respaldar la propuesta sobre tiburones en la reunión de CITES. Tailandia ha rechazado apoyar una propuesta en la reunión actual de CITES para restringir el comercio de tiburones blancos importantes debido a la preocupación por el posible efecto adverso en su población de tiburones.
Paraphrase 1: 1) At the ongoing CITES meeting, Thailand has chosen not to endorse a proposal to regulate the trade in great white sharks, expressing fears over potential negative impacts on its own shark industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Thailand has declined to lend its support to a proposal for stricter control of the great white shark trade at the current CITES meeting, due to concerns about the potential negative repercussions on its shark industry.

Original Text: Antiterrorism device inspired by near miss LEXINGTON -- Michael Y. Lu and Jonathan Morrone, two Boston area businessmen, planned a meeting at the World Trade Center in New York on the morning of Sept. 11, 2001. But Morrone had a last-minute scheduling change, and they both missed the appointment.
Translation: Dispositivo antiterrorista inspirado por un casi accidente LEXINGTON -- Michael Y. Lu y Jonathan Morrone, dos hombres de negocios del área de Boston, planearon una reunión en el World Trade Center en Nueva York la mañana del 11 de septiembre de 2001. Pero Morrone tuvo un cambio de agenda de último minuto, y ambos perdieron la cita.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two Boston businessmen, Michael Y. Lu and Jonathan Morrone, had planned a meeting at New York's World Trade Center on the fateful morning of September 11, 2001. Due to an unexpected change in Morrone's schedule, however, they both failed to make the meeting, inspiring them to create an antiterrorism device.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A sudden change in scheduling prevented Boston area entrepreneurs, Michael Y. Lu and Jonathan Morrone, from attending their planned meeting at the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001. The near miss inspired them to develop a device aimed at combatting terrorism.

Original Text: NASA Software Allows Satellites to Troubleshoot in Space Goddard Space Flight Center -- NASA scientists recently successfully radioed artificial intelligence (AI) software to a satellite. They tested the software's ability to find and analyze errors in the spacecraft's systems...
Translation: El Software de NASA Permite a los Satélites Solucionar Problemas en el Espacio en el Centro de Vuelo Espacial Goddard -- Científicos de la NASA han logrado recientemente enviar por radio un software de inteligencia artificial (IA) a un satélite. Probaron la capacidad del software para encontrar y analizar errores en los sistemas de la nave espacial...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Artificial intelligence software that enables satellites to perform troubleshooting in space was recently successfully transmitted to a satellite by scientists at NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center. The software was tested for its capability to identify and scrutinize faults within the spacecraft's systems...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Scientists at Goddard Space Flight Center of NASA have recently accomplished sending artificial intelligence software to a satellite. The testing of this software was carried out to determine its competence in detecting and examining glitches in the satellite's systems...

Original Text: Fox #39;s Ratings for World Series Opener Are Highest Since 1999 Boston #39;s victory over St. Louis in Game 1 of the World Series last night attracted the best television ratings for the opener of Major League Baseball #39;s championship round since 1999.
Translation: Las calificaciones de Fox para el inicio de la Serie Mundial son las más altas desde 1999. La victoria de Boston sobre St. Louis en el Juego 1 de la Serie Mundial anoche atrajo las mejores calificaciones de televisión para el inicio de la ronda de campeonato de las Grandes Ligas de Béisbol desde 1999.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The first game of the World Series last night, where Boston triumphed over St. Louis, drew the highest television ratings for the championship's opening game since 1999, according to Fox's ratings.

Original Text: Arsenal Football Club and Manchester United Football Club hold <b>...</b> The top brass at Arsenal Football Club and Manchester United Football Club have met in the wake of Sundays game at Old Trafford.
Translation: El Arsenal Football Club y el Manchester United Football Club mantienen <b>...</b> Los altos mandos del Arsenal Football Club y del Manchester United Football Club se han reunido a raíz del partido del domingo en Old Trafford.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the aftermath of Sunday's game at Old Trafford, the top executives of Arsenal Football Club and Manchester United Football Club have convened.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After the Sunday's match at Old Trafford, a meeting has been held between the high-ranking officials of Arsenal Football Club and Manchester United Football Club.

Original Text: Prime Ministers Call for IRA Disbandment LEEDS CASTLE, England Sept. 16, 2004 - The leaders of Britain and Ireland appealed Thursday to the Irish Republican Army to disarm and disband as part of a new diplomatic push to bring stable Catholic-Protestant government to Northern Ireland.
Translation: Los Primeros Ministros piden la disolución del IRA CASTILLO DE LEEDS, Inglaterra 16 de septiembre de 2004 - Los líderes de Gran Bretaña e Irlanda apelaron el jueves al Ejército Republicano Irlandés para que se desarme y se disuelva como parte de un nuevo empuje diplomático para traer un gobierno católico-protestante estable a Irlanda del Norte.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, the British and Irish leaders implored the Irish Republican Army to disarm and dissolve, in a fresh diplomatic bid to establish a stable government between Catholics and Protestants in Northern Ireland. This appeal happened at Leeds Castle, England, and was announced on September 16, 2004, under the title "Prime Ministers Call for IRA Disbandment."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Prime Ministers Call for IRA Disbandment" — on September 16, 2004, in Leeds Castle, England, the premiers of Britain and Ireland made a strong appeal to the Irish Republican Army. Their request was for the Army to disband and disarm, laying the groundwork for a renewed diplomatic effort to install a strong and peaceful coexistence between Catholics and Protestants in Northern Ireland.

Original Text: Henman progresses at Swiss Indoors AP - Second-seeded Tim Henman of Britain overcame fatigue to beat Anthony Dupuis of France 6-3, 6-4 in the opening round of the \$US1.
Translation: Henman avanza en el Swiss Indoors AP - El segundo sembrado, Tim Henman de Gran Bretaña, superó la fatiga para vencer a Anthony Dupuis de Francia 6-3, 6-4 en la ronda inicial del \$US1.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Swiss Indoors AP, Britain's second-seeded Tim Henman fought off tiredness to defeat France's Anthony Dupuis 6-3, 6-4 in the first round of the US$1 tournament.

Original Text: Faqs! Facts! Fax! I read with interest the recent Boot Camp article on the new Service Pack (SP2) for Windows XP. I have a dial-up connection to the Internet so I imagine that it would be impossible to download such a large file.
Translation: ¡Preguntas frecuentes! ¡Hechos! ¡Fax! Leí con interés el reciente artículo de Boot Camp sobre el nuevo Paquete de Servicio (SP2) para Windows XP. Tengo una conexión por módem a Internet, por lo que imagino que sería imposible descargar un archivo tan grande.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I found the latest Boot Camp article about the new Service Pack (SP2) for Windows XP to be quite intriguing. Given my dial-up internet connection, I anticipate that downloading a file this large would be unfeasible. FAQs! Facts! Fax!
Paraphrase 2: 2. I avidly read the recent article from Boot Camp on the newly released Service Pack (SP2) for Windows XP. However, as I only possess a dial-up internet connection, I presume that downloading such a voluminous file would be quite an impossible task. Faqs! Facts! Fax!

Original Text: SBS journo released by captors in Iraq Australian journalist John Martinkus has been released unharmed after being detained by an unknown group in Iraq, SBS television says.
Translation: El periodista de SBS liberado por secuestradores en Irak. El periodista australiano John Martinkus ha sido liberado sin daños después de ser retenido por un grupo desconocido en Irak, según dice la televisión SBS.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to SBS television, Australian journalist John Martinkus was set free unharmed by his captors in Iraq, following his detention by an unidentified group.

Original Text: Eurotunnel to cut workforce LONDON: Subsea rail operator Eurotunnel unveiled yesterday a  quot;Project Dare quot; plan to cut jobs and services as it tries to dig its way out of a mountain of debt in the face of falling revenues and market share.
Translation: Eurotunnel reducirá plantilla LONDRES: El operador de ferrocarril subacuático Eurotunnel presentó ayer un plan "Project Dare" para recortar empleos y servicios mientras intenta salir de una montaña de deudas ante la caída de los ingresos y la cuota de mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON: Eurotunnel presented the "Project Dare" plan which aims to reduce jobs and services in its attempt to climb out of significant debt, amidst declining revenues and market share, as announced yesterday by the subsea rail operator.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In London, Eurotunnel, the subsea rail operator, revealed the "Project Dare" plan yesterday, aiming to reduce the number of jobs and services to manage their enormous debt, as a result of decreased revenues and market share.

Original Text: Lowe #39;s Sees 15.5 Percent Q3 Earnings Spike No. 2 US home improvement company Lowe #39;s earned \$522 million in the three months ended October 29th, surpassing Wall Street expectations.
Translation: Lowe #39;s ve un aumento del 15.5 por ciento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre. La segunda compañía de mejoras para el hogar en los Estados Unidos, Lowe #39;s, ganó 522 millones de dólares en los tres meses finalizados el 29 de octubre, superando las expectativas de Wall Street.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The second-largest home improvement company in the US, Lowe's, exceeded Wall Street forecasts by earning $522 million in the quarter ending on October 29th, marking a 15.5 percent increase in Q3 earnings.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Lowe's, the United States' number two home improvement firm, reported a 15.5 percent surge in Q3 earnings, raking in $522 million by the end of October, outperforming Wall Street predictions.

Original Text: Arsenal unveil mega 100M Emirates deal Arsenal have confirmed they have struck a lucrative deal with Emirates Airlines for the naming rights of their new Ashburton stadium.
Translation: Arsenal presenta el mega acuerdo de 100M con Emirates. Arsenal ha confirmado que ha cerrado un lucrativo acuerdo con Emirates Airlines para los derechos de nombre de su nuevo estadio en Ashburton.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Arsenal has revealed a grand 100M deal with Emirates Airlines for the naming rights of their new Ashburton stadium.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A significant deal of 100M with Emirates Airlines for the naming rights of their new Ashburton arena has been officially announced by Arsenal.

Original Text: Taking the Express Train to Venus To celebrate the hardware completion of the next orbiter to Venus, the European team of scientists hope toasting to a toasty planet will broaden astrobiology's view of our neighbor. Because on the surface, Venus is hot enough to melt lead...
Translation: Tomando el Tren Expreso a Venus Para celebrar la finalización del hardware del próximo orbitador a Venus, el equipo europeo de científicos espera que brindar por un planeta tostado amplíe la visión de la astrobiología de nuestro vecino. Porque en la superficie, Venus es lo suficientemente caliente como para derretir el plomo...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In anticipation of the completion of the next Venus orbiter, a European team of scientists plans to raise a toast to the scorching planet, expressing their hope this event could expand astrobiology's perspective on our neighboring celestial body. Venus, after all, possesses a surface hot enough to liquefy lead.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A toast to Venus, our nearby plant that boasts a surface that can dissolve lead, is planned by a European team of scientists once the hardware for the next orbiter is complete. They are optimistic that the celebration will enhance the astrobiology's understanding of our planetary neighbor.

Original Text: Johnson  amp; Johnson to Pay \$25.4 Billion for Guidant Johnson  amp; Johnson agreed to acquire Guidant Corp. for \$25.4 billion, adding electrical devices for treating heart disease to a lineup of thousands of health products including Band-Aids and cardiac stents.
Translation: Johnson & Johnson pagará $25.4 mil millones por Guidant, Johnson & Johnson acordó adquirir Guidant Corp. por $25.4 mil millones, añadiendo dispositivos eléctricos para tratar enfermedades del corazón a una gama de miles de productos de salud incluyendo Band-Aids y stents cardíacos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An acquisition agreement of Guidant Corp. amounting to $25.4 billion has been made by Johnson & Johnson, expanding their health product portfolio that already ranges from Band-Aids to cardiac stents, to include electrical devices for heart disease treatments.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a deal worth $25.4 billion, Johnson & Johnson is set to purchase Guidant Corp., thereby adding heart disease treating electrical gadgets to their vast collection of healthcare offerings, which extend from cardiac stents to Band-Aids.

Original Text: ADV: Free Weeks of The Wall Street Journal Global events, financial markets, your personal finances - The Wall Street Journal is the one source that tells you how all the pieces fit together. Subscribe now and get up to 8 free weeks!
Translation: ADV: Semanas gratis de The Wall Street Journal Eventos globales, mercados financieros, tus finanzas personales - The Wall Street Journal es la única fuente que te muestra cómo todas las piezas encajan juntas. ¡Suscríbete ahora y obtén hasta 8 semanas gratis!
Paraphrase 1: 1. Subscribe to The Wall Street Journal, your definitive source for understanding the interconnections of global events, financial markets, and your personal finances. Benefit now from our offer of up to 8 weeks subscription at no cost!
Paraphrase 2: 2. Uncover the intricate interplay of global events, financial markets, and your personal finance with The Wall Street Journal - your comprehensive source. Avail our current deal of up to 8 weeks free subscription now!

Original Text: Petrova Out, Kuznetsova Advances at WTA Moscow Russians were winners in four of five matches played Wednesday at the ATP stop in Moscow, with the only upset caused by Italian Francesca Schiavone knocking out No.
Translation: Petrova Eliminada, Kuznetsova Avanza en el WTA Moscú. Los rusos fueron ganadores en cuatro de los cinco partidos jugados el miércoles en la parada del ATP en Moscú, con la única sorpresa causada por la italiana Francesca Schiavone al eliminar a la número No.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the ATP stop in Moscow on Wednesday, Russian players secured victories in four out of five matches. The only surprise came when Italian Francesca Schiavone ousted No. Petrova, while Kuznetsova moved forward at the WTA Moscow.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday's ATP stop in Moscow saw four out of five matches won by Russians. The sole upset came from Italian Francesca Schiavone, as she knocked out Petrova of the WTA Moscow, but Kuznetsova successfully advanced.

Original Text: Redskins 27, Falcons 0 Mark Brunell opened the game with a touchdown drive and was done for the night. Michael Vick opened with an interception and never did produce a play for positive yardage.
Translation: Redskins 27, Falcons 0 Mark Brunell abrió el juego con un avance que culminó en touchdown y acabó su noche. Michael Vick empezó con una intercepción y nunca logró realizar una jugada para ganar yardas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Beginning the game with a touchdown drive, Mark Brunell finished his part as soon as the night arrived, accomplishing a 27-0 win for the Redskins over the Falcons. In contrast, Michael Vick started with an interception and was unable to produce any play resulting in positive yardage throughout the game.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Mark Brunell started the game by leading a touchdown drive for the Redskins, concluding his night, and the Redskins won over the Falcons 27-0. On the other hand, Michael Vick's first play resulted in an interception, and he didn't manage to contribute any positive yardage during the game.

Original Text: Weathermen to get Visualization Supercomputer Maverick combines highly sophisticated visualization technology with a high-bandwidth next generation network to tackle some of the nation #39;s most pressing concerns, including Emergency Response Management and Flood Modeling (specifically for the state of
Translation: Los meteorólogos obtendrán la supercomputadora de visualización Maverick que combina una tecnología de visualización altamente sofisticada con una red de alta capacidad de próxima generación para abordar algunas de las preocupaciones más urgentes de la nación, incluyendo la Gestión de Respuestas a Emergencias y la Modelización de Inundaciones (específicamente para el estado de
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Visualization Supercomputer Maverick, which merges advanced visualization technology with a high-bandwidth next generation network, has been procured by meteorologists. This supercomputer will address some of the country's most urgent issues, specifically in areas like Emergency Response Management and Flood Modeling, chiefly for the state.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sophisticated visualization technology and a high-bandwidth next generation network have been combined to develop the Visualization Supercomputer Maverick, to be used by weather predictors. This powerful resource will be particularly useful in dealing with key national issues, notably, Emergency Response Management and Flood Modeling for a specific state.

Original Text: Going With the Flow Forward Antawn Jamison is expected to be the team's No. 1 offensive threat while working within the framework of the offense.
Translation: Se espera que Antawn Jamison sea la principal amenaza ofensiva del equipo, trabajando dentro del marco del ataque en su avance con el flujo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Antawn Jamison, advancing with the flow, is anticipated to be the primary offensive threat for the team, while still operating within the offense's structure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Within the offense's structure, Antawn Jamison is projected to be the main offensive powerhouse for the team as he moves with the flow.

Original Text: DC City Council Weighs Revised Baseball Plan Washington, DC, City Council committees will consider a revised stadium funding package on Wednesday that includes a \$450 million community investment fund financed with bonds, according to the mayor #39;s staff.
Translation: El Consejo Municipal de DC Considera Revisar el Plan de Béisbol de Washington, los comités del Concejo Municipal de Washington, DC, considerarán el miércoles un paquete de financiamiento revisado para el estadio que incluye un fondo de inversión comunitaria de \$450 millones financiado con bonos, según el personal del alcalde #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The city council committees in Washington, DC, are set to ponder over an updated stadium funding proposal this Wednesday. The mayor's team announced that the plan would incorporate a $450 million community investment fund, supported by bonds.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Committees of the Washington, DC, City Council will be examining an amended funding plan for the stadium this Wednesday. A community investment fund of $450 million, backed by bonds, is included in the package as per the information from the mayor's office.

Original Text: Rodney White, two others accused of shooting guns while driving Free-agent forward Rodney White and two other men face weapons charges after a uniformed Secret Service officer reported seeing them randomly shooting into the air early Sunday.
Translation: Rodney White, dos más acusados de disparar armas mientras conducían. El delantero agente libre Rodney White y dos hombres más enfrentan cargos de armas después de que un oficial del Servicio Secreto uniformado informó que los vio disparando al azar al aire el domingo temprano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Early on Sunday, a uniformed Secret Service officer reported that he witnessed Rodney White, a free-agent forward and two other people, indiscriminately firing guns into the air while driving. They are now facing charges related to weapons.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Charges of weapon misuse have been imposed on free-agent forward Rodney White and two others who were reportedly seen discharging firearms into the air from a moving vehicle on early Sunday, as per a uniformed Secret Service officer.

Original Text: EU Court to Revisit WorldCom's Deals  BRUSSELS (Reuters) - A European Union court is set to rule  this week on a \$120 billion deal MCI-WorldCom made during the  height of the go-go years that still resonates today.
Translation: Tribunal de la UE Revisará los Acuerdos de WorldCom BRUSELAS (Reuters) - Se espera que un tribunal de la Unión Europea dictamine esta semana sobre un acuerdo de \$120 mil millones que MCI-WorldCom hizo durante el apogeo de los años dorados que aún resuena hoy.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BRUSSELS (Reuters) - A ruling is expected from a European Union court this week concerning a $120 billion deal made during the peak of the go-go years by MCI-WorldCom, which continues to have an impact today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BRUSSELS (Reuters) - This week, a $120 billion agreement by MCI-WorldCom, originating from the zenith of the go-go years and still impactful today, is up for review within a European Union court.

Original Text: ESPN to Launch Mobile Phone Service in Sprint Deal  LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co.'s <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=DIS.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">DIS.N</A> ESPN  sports television network is launching its own brand of mobile  telephone service in a deal with Sprint Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=FON.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">FON.N</A> catering  to sports fans with news and game highlights on a  next-generation network, the companies said on Wednesday.
Translation: ESPN lanzará servicio de telefonía móvil en acuerdo con Sprint LOS ÁNGELES (Reuters) - La red de televisión deportiva ESPN de Walt Disney Co. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=DIS.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">DIS.N</A> está lanzando su propia marca de servicio telefónico móvil en un acuerdo con Sprint Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=FON.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">FON.N</A> que se enfoca en los fanáticos del deporte con noticias y destacados de partidos en una red de próxima generación, dijeron las compañías el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Walt Disney Co.'s ESPN sports TV network, under a partnership with Sprint Corp, is set to roll out its distinctive mobile telephone service that provides sports news and game recaps to fans on an advanced network, the firms announced on Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In an agreement with Sprint Corp, ESPN - owned by Walt Disney Co., plans to unveil its own mobile phone service. This service will be aimed at sports enthusiasts, delivering them news and game highlights over a next-generation network, a statement from both companies confirmed on Wednesday.

Original Text: Japan says mystery sub was Chinese Japan is to formally protest to China after saying a submarine found in its waters on Wednesday was Chinese.
Translation: Japón dice que el submarino misterioso era chino. Japón va a formular una protesta formal a China después de afirmar que un submarino encontrado en sus aguas el miércoles era chino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After identifying a submarine discovered in its waters on Wednesday as Chinese, Japan is planning to lodge an official protest with China.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Japan is set to officially voice its protest to China, having proclaimed that a mystery submarine located in its waters on Wednesday was Chinese.

Original Text: With Eye on Storm, Skittish Floridians Search for Safety With a third hurricane bearing down on Florida, thousands spent the weekend uncertain whether, when or where to flee.
Translation: Con la mirada puesta en la tormenta, los inquietos floridanos buscan seguridad. Con un tercer huracán acercándose a Florida, miles pasaron el fin de semana inciertos de si, cuándo o dónde huir.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As Florida braced for the impact of a third hurricane, thousands of anxious residents spent the weekend in uncertainty, uncertain about the timing and location of their evacuation.

Original Text: Ferrari - from the firing pan into the fire The Ferrari team did not bother to attend the meeting of the Formula 1 team bosses in London today and so it could not take part in the discussions surrounding the subject of testing.
Translation: Ferrari - de la sartén al fuego. El equipo Ferrari no se molestó en asistir a la reunión de los jefes de equipo de Fórmula 1 en Londres hoy y, por lo tanto, no pudo participar en las discusiones sobre el tema de las pruebas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite not attending today's meeting of the Formula 1 team bosses in London, the Ferrari team, consequently, missed out on the discussions about testing, further increasing their challenges.

Original Text: Small Gains, Led by Energy Shares, Ahead of the Election Blue-chip stocks ended higher yesterday, helped by gains in energy companies, although investors showed caution before next week #39;s presidential election.
Translation: Pequeñas ganancias, lideradas por acciones de energía, antes de las elecciones. Las acciones de primera categoría terminaron al alza ayer, ayudadas por las ganancias en las empresas de energía, aunque los inversores mostraron cautela antes de la elección presidencial de la próxima semana #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, blue-chip stocks ended on a high note, driven by increases in energy shares, although the impending presidential election made investors cautious.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Investor caution was apparent ahead of next week's presidential election, yet energy shares leading small gains culminated in a positive close for blue-chip stocks yesterday.

Original Text: Zardari may lead pro-democracy rallies ISLAMABAD: After the historical Supreme Court verdict to free Zardari on bail, PPP stalwarts have stepped-up efforts to persuade the spouse of ex-premier Benazir Bhutto to lead anti-government rallies slated to begin from Peshawar on December 6, under the
Translation: Zardari podría liderar las manifestaciones prodemocráticas ISLAMABAD: Tras el histórico fallo del Tribunal Supremo para liberar a Zardari bajo fianza, los pesos pesados del PPP han intensificado los esfuerzos para persuadir al cónyuge de la ex primera ministra Benazir Bhutto de liderar las manifestaciones contra el gobierno que se prevé comenzarán desde Peshawar el 6 de diciembre, bajo el
Paraphrase 1: ISLAMABAD: Following the landmark decision by the Supreme Court to release Zardari on bail, PPP stalwarts are increasing efforts to encourage Benazir Bhutto's spouse to lead anti-government rallies. These rallies, intended to promote democracy, will begin in Peshawar on December 6.
Paraphrase 2: In Islamabad, after Zardari was given legal relief by the Supreme Court, PPP heavyweights are intensifying their persuasion for the husband of the former Prime Minister Benazir Bhutto to spearhead planned anti-government demonstrations. These pro-democracy rallies are set to kick off from Peshawar on the 6th of December.

Original Text: Truex locks up Busch crown Dale Earnhardt Jr. liked the blue-and-yellow threads his Busch Series driver was sporting in yesterday #39;s Bi-Lo 200. He liked the silver hardware he was hoist- ing afterward even better.
Translation: Truex asegura la corona de Busch. A Dale Earnhardt Jr. le gustaron los hilos azul y amarillo que su conductor de la Serie Busch lucía en el Bi-Lo 200 de ayer. Le gustó aún más el hardware plateado que estaba levantando después.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dale Earnhardt Jr. was quite fond of the blue and yellow uniform his Busch Series driver, Truex, wore at the Bi-Lo 200 yesterday. However, he was even more pleased with the silver trophy he lifted later, marking Truex's winning of the Busch crown.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At yesterday's Bi-Lo 200, Truex, dressed in a blue-and-yellow outfit, clinched the Busch crown, much to the delight of Dale Earnhardt Jr., his Busch Series manager. But what Earnhardt Jr. appreciated even more was hoisting the subsequent silver trophy.

Original Text: Open Source Apps Developer SugarCRM Releases Sugar.Sales 1.1 (TechWeb) TechWeb - News - August 13, 2004
Translation: Desarrollador de Aplicaciones de Código Abierto SugarCRM Lanza Sugar.Sales 1.1 (TechWeb) TechWeb - Noticias - 13 de Agosto, 2004
Paraphrase 1: 1. SugarCRM, an open source apps developer, announces the release of Sugar.Sales 1.1 (TechWeb) TechWeb - News - August 13, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TechWeb News, August 13, 2004 - SugarCRM, a developer of open source apps, has released Sugar.Sales 1.1.

Original Text: Carter leads Kiwi 1-2 punch in Athens Hamish Carter and fellow Kiwi Bevan Docherty shook off the long-shot Swiss youngster, Sven Riederer, with 800 meters to go, then had a friendly duel to the line for Olympic gold on Thursday.
Translation: Carter lidera el doble golpe 1-2 de Kiwi en Atenas. Hamish Carter y su compañero Kiwi Bevan Docherty sacudieron al joven promesa suizo, Sven Riederer, a falta de 800 metros, luego tuvieron un duelo amistoso hasta la línea de meta por la medalla de oro olímpica el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hamish Carter, paired with his fellow New Zealander Bevan Docherty, overtook the underdog from Switzerland, Sven Riederer, with 800 meters remaining. Subsequently, a friendly competition emerged between the two Kiwis as they raced for the Olympic gold on Thursday.

Original Text: U.S. May Use Iraq Meeting to Engage Iran  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Secretary of State Colin Powell may  use a conference on Iraq later this month as an opportunity to  engage directly with Iran, officials said on Friday, despite a  looming nuclear crisis.
Translation: EE.UU. Podría Utilizar Reunión sobre Irak para Involucrar a Irán  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - El Secretario de Estado, Colin Powell, podría utilizar una conferencia sobre Irak a finales de este mes como una oportunidad para involucrarse directamente con Irán, dijeron funcionarios el viernes, a pesar de una inminente crisis nuclear.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Despite the impending nuclear crisis, officials revealed on Friday that Secretary of State Colin Powell might seize the upcoming Iraq conference later this month as a chance to directly interact with Iran.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Secretary of State Colin Powell could utilize an impending meeting about Iraq as a platform to establish direct engagement with Iran, revealed officials on Friday, notwithstanding a brewing nuclear crisis.

Original Text: Molson-Coors Merger Gets Canadian Competition Bureau Clearance Molson Inc., Canada #39;s biggest beer maker, and Adolph Coors Co., the third-largest US brewer, won clearance from Canada #39;s Competition Bureau for their planned \$3.
Translation: La fusión de Molson-Coors obtiene la aprobación de la Oficina de Competencia de Canadá. Molson Inc., el mayor fabricante de cerveza de Canadá, y Adolph Coors Co., el tercer mayor cervecero de Estados Unidos, obtuvieron la aprobación de la Oficina de Competencia de Canadá para su planeada fusión por \$3.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Canadian Competition Bureau has given clearance to Molson Inc., the largest beer maker in Canada, and Adolph Coors Co., the third largest US brewer, for their intended merger worth $3.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The proposed $3 merger between Molson Inc., Canada's leading beer manufacturer, and Adolph Coors Co., the third biggest brewer in the US, has been approved by the Canadian Competition Bureau.

Original Text: Brazil Starts to Crack Down on Counterfeit Goods Brazil stands to lose billions of dollars in trade benefits from the United States if it does not prove by the end of September that it is making progress in combating copyright piracy.
Translation: Brasil Comienza a Tomar Medidas Contra los Bienes Falsificados. Brasil podría perder miles de millones de dólares en beneficios comerciales de los Estados Unidos si no demuestra antes de finales de septiembre que está progresando en la lucha contra la piratería de derechos de autor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If Brazil doesn't demonstrate progress in fighting copyright piracy by the end of September, it risks losing billions of dollars in trade benefits from the United States. Brazil is currently initiating a movement against counterfeit goods.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Brazil is taking action against fake products as the United States has threatened to withdraw billions of dollars' worth of trading benefits if it fails to show forward strides in the attack on copyright piracy by September's end.

Original Text: Retail in Review: More Bah Than Sis-Boom Analysts have offered their latest judgment of the Christmas shopping season: good, but not great, although online sales set records.
Translation: Resumen del Comercio Minorista: Más Bah que Sis-Boom Los analistas han ofrecido su última valoración de la temporada de compras navideñas: buena, pero no excelente, aunque las ventas en línea establecieron récords.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In the Retail Review, analysts have concluded that, although the Christmas shopping season was decent but not outstanding, online sales achieved record highs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Christmas shopping season's latest evaluation by analysts has been defined as satisfactory, but not spectacular, despite online sales establishing new records, as observed in the retail review.

Original Text: On Local Sites, Everyone's a Journalist Several notable ventures have launched or raised money this year to create local news sites online in which readers contribute all or most of the news.<FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-Leslie Walker</b></font>
Translation: En Sitios Locales, Todos son Periodistas. Varias iniciativas notables se han lanzado o han recaudado dinero este año para crear sitios de noticias locales en línea en los que los lectores contribuyen con todas o la mayoría de las noticias. -Leslie Walker
Paraphrase 1: 1. Several remarkable initiatives have been embarked upon or funded this year, aiming at establishing local news websites where the readers form the entirety, or at least the majority of the reporting community - essentially turning everyone into a journalist on such local platforms. -Leslie Walker
Paraphrase 2: 2. This year has seen significant ventures either initiate or secure funding to develop local news websites, whereby all or majority of the news content comes directly from the readers themselves, essentially transforming every reader into a journalist on these local platforms. -Leslie Walker

Original Text: Suicide Bomber Kills 18 Iraqi Troops, 1 Civilian  BAGHDAD, Iraq (Reuters) - A suicide car bomber hit a bus  carrying Iraqi National Guards on Sunday, killing 19 people in  the deadliest attack of its kind in nearly four months on  Iraqis cooperating with U.S. forces to secure a Jan. 30  election.
Translation: Atacante suicida mata a 18 soldados iraquíes, 1 civil BAGDAD, Irak (Reuters) - Un atacante suicida con coche bomba impactó un autobús que transportaba a la Guardia Nacional iraquí el domingo, matando a 19 personas en el ataque más mortal de su tipo en casi cuatro meses contra iraquíes que cooperan con las fuerzas estadounidenses para garantizar una elección el 30 de enero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD, Iraq (Reuters) - A suicide car bomber struck a bus transporting Iraqi National Guards on Sunday, resulting in the demise of 19 people, including 18 troops and one civilian, in the most lethal assault of this nature in almost four months on Iraqis collaborating with American forces for the upcoming January 30 election security.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD, Iraq (Reuters) - On Sunday, a suicide car bombing on a bus carrying Iraqi National Guards led to 19 casualties, which include 18 Iraqi troops and one civilian. This marks the most catastrophic attack of its sort in the past four months, targeting Iraqis who are aligning with U.S. forces to ensure security for the January 30 election.

Original Text: Oil Could Help Japan Resolve Territorial Fight With Russia Wearing a white windbreaker to protect him from the Siberian wind, Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi stood on the bridge of a Japanese Coast Guard patrol boat on Thursday
Translation: El Petróleo Podría Ayudar a Japón a Resolver la Disputa Territorial con Rusia. Vistiendo una chaqueta cortavientos blanca para protegerse del viento siberiano, el Primer Ministro Junichiro Koizumi estuvo de pie sobre el puente de una patrulla de la Guardia Costera Japonesa el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi, secured with a white windbreaker against the Siberian wind, took his position on the bridge of a Japanese Coast Guard patrol boat on Thursday, wherein oil might be a decisive factor in resolving Japan's territorial dispute with Russia.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, dressed in a white windbreaker amidst the Siberian breeze, Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi was on the deck of a Japanese Coast Guard patrol vessel, where oil could potentially be used as a catalyst to settle the territorial conflict between Japan and Russia.

Original Text: Motorola Third-Quarter Earnings Rise (Reuters) Reuters - Motorola Inc. , the world's No.\2 maker of cell phones, on Tuesday said its quarterly profit\rose sharply, helped by improving sales of a host of new\handset models.
Translation: Ganancias del tercer trimestre de Motorola aumentan (Reuters) Reuters - Motorola Inc., el segundo fabricante más grande de teléfonos móviles del mundo, dijo el martes que su beneficio trimestral aumentó considerablemente, ayudado por la mejora en las ventas de una serie de nuevos modelos de teléfonos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Motorola Inc., globally ranked second in cell phone production, announced on Tuesday that their third-quarter profits significantly escalated, credited to increased sales from a range of newly released handset models. (Reuters)
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Motorola Inc., the second largest mobile phone manufacturer worldwide, revealed a substantial increase in their third-quarter profits, thanks to the surge in sales of their new handset models. (Reuters)

Original Text: News.com Extra: Experts warn of Net flu vaccine scam Also: Nintendo threatens Suicidegirls over IP use.
Translation: Noticias.com Extra: Expertos advierten sobre estafa de vacuna contra la gripe en la red. Además: Nintendo amenaza a Suicidegirls por uso de propiedad intelectual.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Extra on News.com: Warnings from experts about online flu vaccine scams, and Nintendo takes on Suicidegirls over Intellectual Property usage.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Experts caution about Internet flu vaccine fraud on News.com Extra. In other news, Nintendo challenges Suicidegirls for using their intellectual property.

Original Text: BRIT HOSTAGE NO 2: BLAIR FACES A MAULING TONY Blair faces a mauling in the Commons today from Labour backbenchers furious at a plea for British troops to bail out the Americans.
Translation: REHÉN BRITÁNICO Nº 2: BLAIR ENFRENTA UN ACOSO. Tony Blair enfrenta un acoso en la Cámara de los Comunes hoy por parte de los diputados del banquillo trasero del Partido Laborista, furiosos por una petición para que las tropas británicas rescate a los estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tony Blair is set to be heavily criticized in the Commons today by Labour backbenchers, who are irate over his plea for British troops to assist the Americans. The situation has been referred to as "Brit Hostage No 2."
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tony Blair is expected to undergo intense scrutiny today in the Commons from angry Labour backbenchers due to his call for British soldiers to relieve American forces. This event has been tagged as the second "Brit Hostage" scenario.

Original Text: Scientists Hope to Find More Tiny Indonesia Hominids (Reuters) Reuters - Australian scientists who found a new\species of hobbit-sized humans who lived about 13,000 years ago\on an Indonesian island said on Thursday they expect to\discover more new species of hominids on neighboring islands.
Translation: Científicos Esperan Encontrar Más Pequeños Homínidos en Indonesia (Reuters) Reuters - Científicos australianos que descubrieron una nueva especie de humanos del tamaño de un hobbit que vivieron hace unos 13,000 años en una isla de Indonesia dijeron el jueves que esperan descubrir más nuevas especies de homínidos en islas vecinas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - Anticipating further discoveries on neighboring islands, Australian researchers who recently identified a new species of miniature humans in Indonesia, dated approximately 13,000 years old, are hopeful of finding more hominids.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - Australian scientists who have unearthed a new species of tiny human-like creatures that inhabited an Indonesian island around 13,000 years ago shared on Thursday their expectation to discover more hominid species in the nearby islands.

Original Text: In our view: North Korea #39;s ominous blast explosion in North Korea wasn #39;ta nuclear bomb doesn #39;t mean the world community should ignore it. Secretary of State Colin Powell said evidence supports North Korea #39;s statement that the blast was to remove part of a mountain for a hydroelectric.
Translation: Desde nuestro punto de vista: La ominosa explosión en Corea del Norte #39; no fue una bomba nuclear, eso no significa que la comunidad mundial deba ignorarla. El Secretario de Estado Colin Powell dijo que las pruebas respaldan la declaración de Corea del Norte #39; de que la explosión fue para eliminar parte de una montaña para una hidroeléctrica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to our perspective, even though North Korea's frightening explosion wasn't a nuclear bomb, the global community must not neglect it. Secretary of State Colin Powell has indicated that there's evidence backing North Korea's claim that the blast was aimed at eliminating a segment of a mountain for a hydroelectric project.
Paraphrase 2: 2. We believe that though the menacing explosion in North Korea wasn't a nuclear devastation, it doesn't imply the international community should disregard it. Evidence supporting North Korea's claim that the explosion was for the purpose of mountain removal for a hydroelectric scheme is affirmed by Secretary of State Colin Powell.

Original Text: Volkswagen, German Union OK Pay Freeze A Volkswagen worker protests with a sign reading  quot;Captain Hartz, it #39;s a trip on the Titanic for us quot; during a warning strike at the Volkswagen factory in Hanover, northern Germany, on Tuesday, Nov. 2, 2004.
Translation: Volkswagen, sindicato alemán aprueban congelación de salarios. Un trabajador de Volkswagen protesta con un cartel que dice "Capitán Hartz, para nosotros es un viaje en el Titanic" durante una huelga de advertencia en la fábrica de Volkswagen en Hanover, norte de Alemania, el martes 2 de noviembre de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Volkswagen employee, during a warning strike at the factory in Hanover, Northern Germany on Tuesday, Nov. 2, 2004, demonstrated with a placard stating "Captain Hartz, it's a trip on the Titanic for us". This was following Volkswagen and the German Union's approval of a wage freeze.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Protesting the pay freeze approved by both Volkswagen and the German Union, a worker at the Volkswagen factory in Hanover, Northern Germany, expressed his discontentment on Tuesday, Nov. 2, 2004. He held a sign reading "Captain Hartz, it's a trip on the Titanic for us" during a warning strike.

Original Text: PMC-Sierra Issues Revenues Warning PMC-Sierra Inc. warned Wall Street third-quarter revenues won #39;t meet expectations, but that wasn #39;t enough to persuade investors to pull out of the beleaguered chip sector.
Translation:
PMC-Sierra emite una advertencia de ingresos
PMC-Sierra Inc. advirtió a Wall Street que los ingresos del tercer trimestre no cumplirán con las expectativas, pero eso no fue suficiente para persuadir a los inversores a abandonar el atribulado sector de los chips.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PMC-Sierra Inc. cautioned Wall Street that their third-quarter revenues will fail to meet the predicted figures, though this didn't compel investors to withdraw from the struggling chip sector.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite PMC-Sierra Inc's alert to Wall Street that their third-quarter revenues are not going to meet expectations, investors remained undeterred to abandon the distressed chip industry.

Original Text: Mugabe hints at woman successor Harare - Joyce Mujuru, who was elected vice president of Zimbabwe #39;s ruling party at the weekend, is the first woman to hold a post of high political office in the southern African country.
Translation: Mugabe insinúa a una sucesora mujer Harare: Joyce Mujuru, quien fue elegida vicepresidenta del partido gobernante de Zimbabue durante el fin de semana, es la primera mujer en ocupar un cargo de alta oficina política en el país del sur de África.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Joyce Mujuru, the first woman to occupy a high-ranking political role in Zimbabwe, was recently elected as the Vice President of the country's governing party, sparking suggestions by Mugabe that a female successor may be on the cards in Harare.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Zimbabwe, a southern African nation, Joyce Mujuru has become the first woman to ascend to a position of high political standing, having been elected Vice President of the ruling party over the weekend. This has led to Mugabe alluding to a potential female successor in Harare.

Original Text: Radio operators OK rules on Net over power lines For critics of power-line broadband access, new FCC rules mean "the glass is both half-full and half-empty."
Translation: Los operadores de radio aprueban reglas sobre Internet a través de líneas de electricidad. Para los críticos del acceso a banda ancha a través de líneas de electricidad, las nuevas reglas de la FCC significan que "el vaso está tanto medio lleno como medio vacío".
Paraphrase 1: 1. FCC regulations on internet access over power lines receive approval from radio operators, though critics of power-line broadband view these rules as both beneficial and problematic.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While critics hold a mixed view on the new FCC regulations for power-line broadband, describing the situation as both "half-full and half-empty", radio operators have given their approval to these rules.

Original Text: Eriksson Looking for Butt Deputy Sven-Goran Eriksson heralded a three-way contest for the vacant spot in Englands midfield after Nicky Butt was ruled out of this weekends opening 2006 World Cup qualifier in Austria.
Translation: Eriksson busca un sustituto para Butt. Sven-Goran Eriksson anticipó una competencia de tres vías por el puesto vacante en el mediocampo de Inglaterra después de que Nicky Butt fuera descartado para el primer partido clasificatorio para la Copa del Mundo 2006 en Austria este fin de semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sven-Goran Eriksson announced a three-way competition for the empty midfield position on England's team for this weekend's opening 2006 World Cup qualifier in Austria, following a ruling that stops Nicky Butt from participating.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After Nicky Butt was declared out for the initial 2006 World Cup qualifier in Austria, a three-way race for the vacant midfield place in England's team was prompted by Sven-Goran Eriksson.

Original Text: Russian Governor Backs Colonel's Pardon (AP) AP - The fate of an army colonel convicted of murdering a Chechen woman will be decided by President Vladimir Putin following a Russian governor's decision to support pardoning the officer, Russian media reported Monday.
Translation: Gobernador Ruso Apoya el Indulto del Coronel (AP) AP - El destino de un coronel del ejército condenado por asesinar a una mujer chechena será decidido por el presidente Vladimir Putin tras la decisión de un gobernador ruso de apoyar el indulto del oficial, según informaron los medios rusos el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Russian media reported on Monday that an army colonel, who has been found guilty of murdering a woman in Chechnya, may have his fate determined by President Vladimir Putin, after receiving support for his pardon from a Russian governor.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - A Russian governor has endorsed the pardoning of an army colonel convicted of killing a Chechen woman, and President Vladimir Putin is expected to decide the officer's fate, as reported by Russian media on Monday.

Original Text: World growth highest since 1973 The world's economy should grow at its fastest rate in 30 years in 2004, despite rising oil prices, the IMF says.
Translation: Crecimiento mundial más alto desde 1973. La economía mundial debería crecer a su ritmo más rápido en 30 años en 2004, a pesar del aumento de los precios del petróleo, según dice el FMI.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite escalating oil prices, the IMF predicts that global economic growth will reach its peak since 1973 in 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The IMF proclaims 2004 will see the most substantial worldwide economic growth since 1973, even amidst increasing oil prices.

Original Text: BA boss to work in departures as airline battles staff shortages Rod Eddington, the head of British Airways, and his boardroom colleagues will work alongside terminal employees at Heathrow this weekend as the airline pulls out all the stops to cope with a chronic shortage of ground staff.
Translation: El jefe de BA trabajará en salidas mientras la aerolínea lucha contra la escasez de personal. Rod Eddington, el jefe de British Airways, y sus colegas de la sala de juntas trabajarán junto a los empleados del terminal en Heathrow este fin de semana, mientras la aerolínea hace todo lo posible para lidiar con una grave escasez de personal de tierra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In order to deal with severe ground staff shortages, Rod Eddington, the leader of British Airways along with his boardroom associates, will join terminal employees at Heathrow this weekend, putting in every effort to make up for the lack of personnel.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As British Airways struggles with a critical deficiency of ground staff, Rod Eddington and his boardroom team are set to join forces with terminal workers at Heathrow this weekend in a bid to mitigate the situation.

Original Text: EU Approves Refugee Camp Pilot Schemes After debating proposals put forward by Germany #39;s Otto Schily, the European Commission has agreed to set up pilot schemes in five North African countries to cope with the influx of refugees heading to Europe.
Translation: La UE aprueba proyectos piloto de campos de refugiados tras debatir las propuestas presentadas por Otto Schily de Alemania #39; la Comisión Europea ha acordado establecer proyectos piloto en cinco países del norte de África para hacer frente a la afluencia de refugiados que se dirigen a Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After deliberating over suggestions presented by Otto Schily from Germany, the European Commission has consented to initiate pilot programs in five North African nations to manage the rising number of refugees making their way to Europe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The European Commission has come to an agreement to establish pilot projects in five countries in North Africa to deal with the influx of refugees flowing into Europe, after discussion on Germany's Otto Schily's plans.

Original Text: Conservatives say they'll move to protect traditional definition of marriage (Canadian Press) Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - The federal Conservatives are girding for a same-sex battle with Paul Martin's Liberals, saying they will move to protect the traditional definition of marriage.
Translation: Los conservadores dicen que tomarán medidas para proteger la definición tradicional del matrimonio (Prensa Canadiense) Prensa Canadiense - OTTAWÁ (CP) - Los conservadores federales se están preparando para una batalla sobre el matrimonio entre personas del mismo sexo con los liberales de Paul Martin, diciendo que tomarán medidas para proteger la definición tradicional del matrimonio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Canadian Press - OTTAWA (CP) - The federal Conservatives, ready for a battle on same-sex marriage with Paul Martin's Liberals, have announced their intent to preserve the traditional definition of marriage.

Original Text: Musharraf terms talks with Singh gain for peace AMSTERDAM: President General Pervez Musharraf has described the progress made during his talks with the Indian Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in New York as a gain for peace.
Translation: Musharraf califica las conversaciones con Singh como un avance para la paz AMSTERDAM: El Presidente General Pervez Musharraf ha descrito el progreso realizado durante sus conversaciones con el Primer Ministro indio, el Dr. Manmohan Singh en Nueva York, como un avance para la paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AMSTERDAM: The progress achieved in his conversations with Indian Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in New York has been characterized as a peace advancement by President General Pervez Musharraf.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Amsterdam, President General Pervez Musharraf spoke about his discussions with India's Prime Minister, Dr. Manmohan Singh, in New York, referring to their progress as a step forward for peace.

Original Text: South Korea calls for resumption of nuclear talks (AFP) AFP - South Korean Foreign Minister Ban Ki-Moon called at the United Nations for a swift resumption of talks aimed at convincing North Korea to shelve its nuclear weapons programme.
Translation: Traducción al español: Corea del Sur pide la reanudación de las conversaciones nucleares (AFP) AFP - El Ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Corea del Sur, Ban Ki-Moon, ha instado en las Naciones Unidas a una rápida reanudación de las conversaciones destinadas a convencer a Corea del Norte de poner fin a su programa de armas nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AFP - South Korean Foreign Minister Ban Ki-Moon at the United Nations, advocated for a quick recommencement of discussions that focus on persuading North Korea to abandon its nuclear weapons program.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AFP - Ban Ki-Moon, the South Korean Foreign Minister, urged for immediate renewal of negotiations at the United Nations with the intention of coaxing North Korea into discontinuing its nuclear weapons pursuit.

Original Text: Kodak, Sun settle potential \$1B lawsuit (October 7, 2004) - Eastman Kodak Co. and Sun Microsystems Inc. have settled their contentious legal dispute over Java programming language, skirting a trial on financial damages that could have brought Kodak more than \$1 billion.
Translation: Kodak, Sun resuelven potencial demanda de \$1B (7 de octubre de 2004) - Eastman Kodak Co. y Sun Microsystems Inc. han resuelto su polémica disputa legal sobre el lenguaje de programación Java, evitando un juicio sobre daños financieros que podría haber reportado a Kodak más de \$1 mil millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (October 7, 2004): The legal disagreement over Java programming language between Eastman Kodak Co. and Sun Microsystems Inc., which had the potential to result in over $1 billion in damages for Kodak, has been resolved, avoiding a court trial.

Original Text: #39;Culture change #39; required at AstraZeneca after key drug fails Astrazeneca Admitted yesterday to an over-optimistic culture within its drug development division as it revealed its recently launched lung cancer pill did not improve patients #39; life expectancy.
Translation: Se requiere un '#39;Cambio de cultura #39;' en AstraZeneca después de que un medicamento clave falla. AstraZeneca admitió ayer tener una cultura excesivamente optimista dentro de su división de desarrollo de medicamentos, ya que reveló que su recién lanzada píldora para el cáncer de pulmón no mejoró la expectativa de vida de los pacientes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following the failure of a key medicine, AstraZeneca has acknowledged the need for a 'culture change' within its drug development division, admitting to an overconfident approach. The confirmation followed the revelation that their newly released lung cancer pill did not enhance patient life expectancy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AstraZeneca conceded to having an excessively hopeful culture within its drug development division and agreed to a necessary 'culture change' following the unsuccessful performance of an important lung cancer medication. The admission came as the company disclosed that their newly introduced pill failed to extend patients' life expectancy.

Original Text: Germany, Poland play down reparations row BERLIN - German and Polish politicians have played down a resolution by the Polish parliament calling on the government to take legal action aimed at making Germany pay war reparations for Nazi Germany #39;s World War II invasion of Poland.
Translation: Alemania, Polonia minimizan la disputa sobre reparaciones BERLÍN - Políticos alemanes y polacos han restado importancia a una resolución del parlamento polaco que insta al gobierno a tomar medidas legales dirigidas a hacer que Alemania pague reparaciones de guerra por la invasión de la Alemania nazi a Polonia durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In BERLIN, politicians from Germany and Poland have dismissed a resolution made by the Polish parliament. The resolution is intended to push the government to take legal measures to demand Germany to compensate for the invasion of Poland by Nazi Germany during World War II.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Polish and German lawmakers, in Berlin, have sought to diminish the importance of a Polish parliament resolution. The resolution urges the government to legally compel Germany to pay war reparations for invading Poland during the World War II era under Nazi Germany's rule.

Original Text: Is Mercury the Incredible Shrinking Planet? MESSENGER Spacecraft May Find Out (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - With a new spacecraft bound for Mercury, that tiny planet nbsp;near the heart of the solar system, researchers are hoping to solve a slew of riddles about the small world.
Translation: ¿Es Mercurio el increíble planeta encogido? La nave espacial MESSENGER podría averiguarlo (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - Con una nueva nave espacial destinada a Mercurio, ese pequeño planeta ubicado cerca del corazón del sistema solar, los investigadores esperan resolver una serie de enigmas sobre este pequeño mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The MESSENGER spacecraft, primed for a journey to Mercury, may help us decrypt some mysteries about the gradually shrinking planet at the core of our solar system (Courtesy of SPACE.com). Researchers are anticipating to resolve numerous puzzles relating to this little globe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The minuscule planet Mercury, interestingly presumed to be shrinking, may disclose its secrets via the MESSENGER Spacecraft according to SPACE.com. With a new probe heading towards it, scientists are optimistic about unraveling the numerous enigmas of this smallest planet in our solar system.

Original Text: Tories take tough line on crime A Tory government would take tough action on crime and introduce random drug-testing in schools, shadow home secretary David Davis will say.
Translation: Los Tories adoptan una línea dura contra el crimen. Un gobierno tory tomaría medidas enérgicas contra el crimen e introduciría pruebas de drogas aleatorias en las escuelas, dirá el secretario de interior en la sombra, David Davis.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shadow home secretary David Davis will claim, under a Tory government, strong measures would be implemented on crime, including the introduction of random drug-testing in schools.
Paraphrase 2: 2. David Davis, the shadow home secretary, is preparing to announce that if the Tories come to power, they will tackle crime rigorously and impose random drug-tests in schools.

Original Text: Issing sees inflation above target Inflation rates in Europe are unlikely to fall below the European Central Bank #39;s 2 percent target for the rest of the year because of high oil prices, ECB board member Ottmar Issing said Sunday.
Translation: Issing ve la inflación por encima del objetivo. Es poco probable que las tasas de inflación en Europa caigan por debajo del objetivo del 2 por ciento del Banco Central Europeo durante el resto del año debido a los altos precios del petróleo, dijo el domingo el miembro de la junta del BCE, Ottmar Issing.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ottmar Issing, a board member of the ECB, stated on Sunday that due to high oil prices, it's improbable for the inflation rates in Europe to drop below the ECB's 2 percent target for the remaining of the year, implying inflation is likely above target.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ECB board member, Ottmar Issing, predicted on Sunday that high oil prices would cause inflation rates in Europe to stay above the bank's 2 percent target for the remainder of the year, indicating that he sees inflation surpassing the target.

Original Text: Dollar Pauses Near Record Low Vs Euro  LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar hit an eight-month low  against the euro on Tuesday, coming within a cent of a record  low, and set its lowest level in eight years versus Swiss franc  on concerns about the U.S. economy and current account gap.
Translation: El Dólar Hace una Pausa Cerca de un Récord Bajo Contra el Euro  LONDRES (Reuters) - El dólar alcanzó su nivel más bajo en ocho meses contra el euro el martes, acercándose a solo un centavo de un récord mínimo, y estableció su nivel más bajo en ocho años frente al franco suizo debido a las preocupaciones sobre la economía de los EE.UU. y el déficit en la cuenta corriente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar approached a record low against the euro, being just a cent shy on Tuesday and hitting an eight-year low against the Swiss franc, amidst concerns about the U.S. economy and current account deficit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - On Tuesday, the dollar dipped to its weakest level in eight months against the euro, nearing a record low and reached its lowest in eight years relative to the Swiss franc, on the backdrop of growing fears about the status of the U.S. economy and its current account gap.

Original Text: Doctor: Arafat May Have Died from Poison One of the doctors that treated Yasser Arafat before his death is expressing frustration while discussing how the Palestinian leader died.
Translation: Doctor: Arafat Podría Haber Muerto por Envenenamiento. Uno de los médicos que trató a Yasser Arafat antes de su muerte está expresando frustración mientras discute cómo murió el líder palestino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. One of Yasser Arafat's treating doctors is voicing annoyance while deliberating about the possible poisoning of the Palestinian leader leading to his death.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A doctor who provided treatment to Yasser Arafat before his demise expresses his frustration about the proposition that the Palestinian leader might have died from poisoning.

Original Text: Contract chip makers spared Intel #39;s woes, for now Singapore/Taipei, September 6: The world #39;s top contract chip makers are not yet feeling the slowdown in demand that led Intel Corp to cut its third-quarter forecasts, but analysts say the relief may be just temporary.
Translation: Fabricantes de chips por contrato se salvaron de los problemas de Intel #39, por ahora Singapur/Taipei, 6 de septiembre: Los principales fabricantes de chips por contrato del mundo aún no están sintiendo la desaceleración en la demanda que llevó a Intel Corp a reducir sus pronósticos para el tercer trimestre, pero los analistas dicen que el alivio podría ser solo temporal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Singapore/Taipei, September 6: Despite the demand slowdown causing Intel Corp to lower their third-quarter predictions, the world's leading contract chip manufacturers have not been affected yet. However, according to analysts, this reprieve might only be momentary.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Currently, the world's premier contract chip manufacturers, unlike Intel Corp that had to reduce its forecasts for the third quarter due to declining demand, are not experiencing a slowdown. Analysts, however, suggest that the situation could be short-lived, September 6, Singapore/Taipei.
