Original Text: Red Sox tie series at three games apiece (New York-AP) Oct. 20, 2004 - For the second straight year, the New York Yankees and the Boston Red Sox will go to a seventh game, a winner-take-all battle for the American League pennant.
Translation: Los Red Sox empatan la serie a tres juegos por lado (Nueva York- AP) 20 de Oct. de 2004 - Por segundo año consecutivo, los Yankees de Nueva York y los Red Sox de Boston irán a un séptimo juego, una batalla donde el ganador se lleva todo por el banderín de la Liga Americana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (New York-AP) Oct. 20, 2004 - The New York Yankees and the Boston Red Sox are once again set for a nail-biting seventh game, just as they were last year, each vying for the American League pennant- it's a decisive battle where the winner gets everything, and the series is currently tied at three games each.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For the consecutive year, the Boston Red Sox and the New York Yankees will head into a decisive seventh game, battling it out to claim the American League pennant at stake; the series currently stands evenly at three games for each (New York-AP) Oct. 20, 2004.

Original Text: Fed Reports Continuing Economic Growth (AP) AP - The U.S. economy continued to grow in the early fall despite being buffeted by rising energy costs and hurricanes, the Federal Reserve said Wednesday, providing its last snapshot of business conditions before Election Day.
Translation: Informes de la Fed sobre el crecimiento económico continuo (AP) AP - La economía de los EE.UU. continuó creciendo en el otoño temprano a pesar de ser azotada por el aumento de los costos de energía y los huracanes, dijo la Reserva Federal el miércoles, proporcionando su última instantánea de las condiciones comerciales antes del Día de las Elecciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Federal Reserve announced on Wednesday that the U.S. economy saw ongoing growth in the early autumn, even amidst escalating energy prices and the impact of hurricanes. This update is the final one prior to Election Day, shedding light on the current state of business conditions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite dealing with the challenges of increased energy costs and hurricanes, the U.S economy sustained its growth during the early part of fall, according to the Federal Reserve's Wednesday statement. This provides the last glimpse of the business environment prior to Election Day.

Original Text: Pak test fires Hatf V missile Islamabad: As Pervez Musharraf completed five years of his rule, Pakistan today  quot;successfully quot; testfired its  quot;indigenously built quot; intermediate range ballistic missile  #39;Hatf-V #39; capable of carrying nuclear warheads with a strike range of 1500 km, that could
Translation: Prueba de Pakistán lanza el misil Hatf V Islamabad: Según Pervez Musharraf completó cinco años de su mandato, Pakistán hoy "exitosamente" probó su misil balístico de alcance intermedio "construido de manera autóctona" 'Hatf-V' capaz de transportar ojivas nucleares con un alcance de ataque de 1500 km, que podría
Paraphrase 1: 1. As Pervez Musharraf marked his five-year leadership milestone, Pakistan successfully launched its own intermediate-range ballistic missile 'Hatf-V' today from Islamabad. The missile, capable of carrying nuclear warheads, demonstrated a strike range of 1500 km.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, coinciding with the fifth anniversary of Pervez Musharraf's reign, Pakistan successfully conducted a test fire of Hatf V, their indigenously developed intermediate-range ballistic missile in Islamabad. The missile, with its potential to carry nuclear warheads, is capable of striking a range of 1500 km.

Original Text: Clemens Helps Astros Take 1-0 Series Lead Over Braves Roger Clemens pitched seven innings and Carlos Beltran homered, had three hits and scored three runs to help the Houston Astros rout the Atlanta Braves 9-3 in the opening game of their National League Divisional Series Wednesday.
Translation: Clemens ayuda a los Astros a tomar la ventaja de 1-0 en la serie contra los Braves. Roger Clemens lanzó siete entradas y Carlos Beltrán bateó un jonrón, tuvo tres hits y anotó tres carreras para ayudar a los Houston Astros a aplastar a los Atlanta Braves 9-3 en el juego inaugural de su Serie Divisional de la Liga Nacional el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the initial game of their National League Divisional Series on Wednesday, the Houston Astros triumphed over the Atlanta Braves 9-3, thanks largely to Roger Clemens' skilled seven-inning pitch, Carlos Beltran's stellar homerun, three hits, and three runs.

Original Text: Nikkei Surges to One-Month High  TOKYO (Reuters) - Japan's Nikkei share average rose to its  highest close in four weeks on Friday as hopes grew for a  seasonal year-end rally.
Translation: El Nikkei se Dispara a Máximos de un Mes TOKIO (Reuters) - El promedio de acciones Nikkei de Japón subió a su cierre más alto en cuatro semanas el viernes, ya que crecieron las esperanzas de un repunte estacional de fin de año.
Paraphrase 1: 1) TOKYO (Reuters) - On Friday, the Nikkei share average of Japan escalated to its peak closing in the span of four weeks, fueled by the increasing optimism for a seasonal year-end rally.
Paraphrase 2: 2) TOKYO (Reuters) - As anticipation built for a seasonal year-end rally, Japan's Nikkei share average achieved its highest culmination in four weeks this Friday.

Original Text: Syrian President Defends Role in Lebanon (AP) AP - Pointing to Lebanon as a stable exception in a troubled neighborhood, President Bashar Assad has suggested an end to Syrian intervention in Lebanon would lead to chaos there.
Translation: Presidente Sirio Defiende su Rol en Líbano (AP) AP - Señalando a Líbano como una excepción estable en un vecindario problemático, el Presidente Bashar Assad ha sugerido que un fin a la intervención siria en Líbano llevaría al caos allí.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - President Bashar Assad has insinuated that withdrawing Syrian intervention in Lebanon might result in turmoil, as he identifies Lebanon as a standing exception in an otherwise problematic region.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Focusing on Lebanon as an unusual stable nation amidst destabilized surroundings, President Bashar Assad of Syria maintains that Syria's cessation of its involvement in Lebanon could incite disorder.

Original Text: Google Corrects Gmail Exploit Search engine Google has fixed a security flaw that was occurring in their email service, Gmail. The company did not reveal the nature of flaw, only that they had corrected it.
Translation: Google Corrige Exploit de Gmail: El motor de búsqueda Google ha solucionado un fallo de seguridad que estaba ocurriendo en su servicio de correo electrónico, Gmail. La compañía no reveló la naturaleza del fallo, solo que lo habían corregido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The security flaw that was present in Google's email service, Gmail, has been fixed by the search engine giant, Google. The company has kept the details of the flaw undisclosed, assuring only that the issue has been rectified.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A security glitch in the email service, Gmail, has been rectified by the search engine behemoth, Google. The exact nature of the flaw remains a secret, with the company only divulging that the problem has been resolved.

Original Text: IBM Unveils New TotalStorage Servers  quot;Our goal is to be number one in the data-storage system market, quot; says Cindy Grossman, director of IBM #39;s TotalStorage programs.
Translation: IBM presenta nuevos servidores TotalStorage. "Nuestro objetivo es ser el número uno en el mercado de sistemas de almacenamiento de datos", dice Cindy Grossman, directora de los programas TotalStorage de IBM.
Paraphrase 1: "Cindy Grossman, director of IBM's TotalStorage programs, states, "Our ambition is to reach the top in the data-storage system industry" as IBM releases new TotalStorage Servers."
Paraphrase 2: "As IBM introduces new TotalStorage servers, Cindy Grossman, in charge of IBM's TotalStorage initiatives, articulates their aim of becoming leading players in the data-storage system domain."

Original Text: Vivendi, Ex-CEO Fined 1 Mln Euros Each  PARIS (Reuters) - French regulators fined Vivendi Universal  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EAUG.PA target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EAUG.PA</A> and former Chief Executive Officer Jean-Marie Messier  1 million euros (\$1.34 million) each on Tuesday after a probe  into allegations that they misled investors when a costly media  acquisition spree went wrong.
Translation: Vivendi, Ex-CEO Multados con 1 Mln de Euros Cada Uno PARÍS (Reuters) - Los reguladores franceses multaron a Vivendi Universal <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EAUG.PA target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EAUG.PA</A> y al ex Director Ejecutivo Jean-Marie Messier con 1 millón de euros (1.34 millones de dólares) cada uno el martes tras una investigación sobre las acusaciones de que engañaron a los inversores cuando una costosa racha de adquisiciones de medios salió mal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. French regulators, on Tuesday, imposed fines of 1 million euros (1.34 million dollars) each on Vivendi Universal and its former CEO, Jean-Marie Messier, following an investigation into accusations of misleading investors over a failed media purchasing spree.

Original Text: Novell Sues Microsoft Over WordPerfect Software Novell Inc. sued Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O on Friday, claiming that the world #39;s largest software maker used its Windows monopoly to hurt sales of the WordPerfect processing program, which the smaller rival owned briefly a decade ago.
Translation: Novell Demanda a Microsoft por el Software WordPerfect. Novell Inc. demandó a Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O el viernes, alegando que el fabricante de software más grande del mundo utilizó su monopolio de Windows para perjudicar las ventas del programa de procesamiento WordPerfect, que el rival más pequeño poseía brevemente hace una década.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Novell Inc. instituted legal proceedings against Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O on Friday, accusing the leading software corporation of exploiting its Windows monopoly to negatively impact the sales of WordPerfect software, a processing program once owned by Novell about ten years ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Novell Inc. filed a lawsuit against Microsoft Corp. MSFT.O, alleging that Microsoft's monopolistic control of Windows had adversely affected the sales of WordPerfect, a word processing software that Novell had temporarily owned around a decade ago.

Original Text: Economic Doubts Rally Treasuries  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Treasury debt prices rallied on  Wednesday as the latest U.S. economic data contained enough  soft spots to keep the economic outlook uncertain.
Translation:
Dudas Económicas Impulsan los Bonos del Tesoro
NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios de la deuda del Tesoro se dispararon el miércoles, ya que los últimos datos económicos de EE.UU. contenían suficientes puntos débiles para mantener la perspectiva económica incierta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Prices of Treasury debt surged on Wednesday because the latest economic data from the U.S. had enough weaknesses to maintain uncertainty about the economic forecast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - With enough weak elements in the latest U.S. economic data to maintain instability in the economic forecast, treasury debt prices saw an upturn on Wednesday.

Original Text: Bank of New York Buys Wilshire Business Bank of New York Co. said Tuesday that its BNY Brokerage Inc. unit has agreed to acquire the execution and commission management business of investment management firm Wilshire Associates for an undisclosed amount.
Translation: El Banco de Nueva York Compra Wilshire Business. El Banco de Nueva York Co. anunció el martes que su unidad BNY Brokerage Inc. ha acordado adquirir el negocio de ejecución y gestión de comisiones de la firma de gestión de inversiones Wilshire Associates por una cantidad no revelada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BNY Brokerage Inc., a unit of Bank of New York Co., announced on Tuesday their agreement to purchase the execution and commission management division of Wilshire Associates, an investment management company. The purchase price hasn't been disclosed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An announcement was made on Tuesday by Bank of New York Co., stating that its subsidiary, BNY Brokerage Inc, has entered into an agreement to buy the execution and commission management branch of the investment management firm Wilshire Associates, with the transaction amount remaining confidential.

Original Text: Federer Advances to U.S. Open Final with Win Over Henman  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Top seed Roger Federer was at his  dismissive best on Saturday as he breezed to a 6-3, 6-4, 6-4  victory over fifth seed Tim Henman to reach the final of the  U.S. Open for the first time.
Translation: Federer Avanza a la Final del Abierto de EE.UU. con Victoria sobre Henman NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El primer sembrado, Roger Federer, estuvo en su mejor momento el sábado, al avanzar con facilidad a una victoria de 6-3, 6-4, 6-4 sobre el quinto sembrado, Tim Henman, para alcanzar la final del Abierto de EE.UU. por primera vez.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The U.S. Open final is in sight for top seed, Roger Federer, thanks to his dominant performance on Saturday that saw him storm past fifth seed, Tim Henman, with a 6-3, 6-4, 6-4 win.

Original Text: Owen should start MICHAEL OWEN is under an intense spotlight now after his early difficulties at Real Madrid and there #39;s talk Jermain Defoe may replace him for England on Saturday.
Translation: Owen debería empezar. MICHAEL OWEN está bajo un intenso escrutinio ahora después de sus dificultades tempranas en el Real Madrid y hay rumores de que Jermain Defoe podría reemplazarlo para Inglaterra el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Being under heavy scrutiny due to his initial challenges at Real Madrid, there's a possibility that Michael Owen might be replaced by Jermain Defoe for England's game on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After facing early struggles at Real Madrid, Michael Owen has found himself at the center of attention. Rumours are surfacing that he may be substituted by Jermain Defoe for the upcoming Saturday match for England.

Original Text: Red Hat to acquire Netscape network security software Red Hat has announced plans to acquire network security software from Netscape #39;s Enterprise Suite, adding it to its Open Source Architecture, The company says they will distribute it as open-source software, according to statements from company executives
Translation: Red Hat para adquirir el software de seguridad de red de Netscape. Red Hat ha anunciado planes para adquirir el software de seguridad de red de la Suite Empresarial de Netscape, añadiéndolo a su Arquitectura de Código Abierto. La compañía dice que lo distribuirá como software de código abierto, según declaraciones de los ejecutivos de la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Red Hat has revealed its plans to purchase the network security software of Netscape's Enterprise Suite to incorporate it into its Open Source Architecture. The company's executives have confirmed that it will be distributed as open-source software.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to the executives at Red Hat, the company is set to incorporate Netscape's Enterprise Suite network security software into its Open Source Architecture, as part of its acquisition plans. Furthermore, the company plans to distribute it as open-source software.

Original Text: Analysts Hint at Bounce in Chip Stocks Despite the beatings chip stocks have endured during the past few months, some analysts on Thursday hinted a bounce might lurk behind a sector whose shares have been punished on concerns customer demand has withered.
Translation: Los analistas insinúan un rebote en las acciones de los chips a pesar de los golpes que las acciones de los chips han soportado durante los últimos meses, algunos analistas el jueves insinuaron que un rebote podría esconderse detrás de un sector cuyas acciones han sido castigadas por preocupaciones de que la demanda del cliente se ha marchitado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the drastic decrease in chip stocks in recent months, some analysts suggested on Thursday that there may be a significant rebound within a sector that has suffered due to concerns over dwindling customer demand.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Although chip stocks have taken a hit over the past few months, there were suggestions from analysts on Thursday that a recovery could be impending in a sector whose shares have been heavily impacted by concerns about decreasing customer demand.

Original Text: Dollar Back on the Defensive  NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar weakened on Wednesday on  dealers' renewed concern about the ability of the United States  to finance its trade and current account deficits, causing a  recent rebound in the currency to fizzle out.
Translation: El Dólar Vuelve a la Defensiva NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dólar se debilitó el miércoles debido a la renovada preocupación de los comerciantes sobre la capacidad de los Estados Unidos para financiar sus déficits comerciales y de cuenta corriente, provocando que el reciente repunte de la moneda se desvaneciera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Wednesday, the dollar took a hit due to renewed anxiety among dealers about the United States' capacity to finance its trade and current account deficits, triggering a premature end to the currency's recent rally.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Renewed doubts about the United States' competencies to finance its trade and current account deficits amongst dealers led to a dip in the dollar's strength on Wednesday, thereby cutting short its recent recovery.

Original Text: Sun Micro Posts Narrower Quarterly Loss Network computer maker Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Quote, Profile, Research) on Thursday posted a narrower quarterly loss as revenue rose year over year for the
Translation: "Sun Micro publica una pérdida trimestral más estrecha. El fabricante de ordenadores en red Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) informó el jueves de una pérdida trimestral más estrecha a medida que los ingresos aumentaron año tras año durante el".
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Thursday, network computer manufacturer Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Quote, Profile, Research) reported a reduced quarterly loss as its year-over-year revenue saw an increase.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Sun Microsystems Inc. (SUNW.O: Quote, Profile, Research), a producer of network computers, announced a decreased quarterly loss on Thursday, in light of a rising year-over-year revenue.

Original Text: UPDATE 1-Freddie Mac to start payments to former CEO US mortgage finance company Freddie Mac said on Friday it began payments to former Chief Executive Leland Brendsel after a court ruled regulators could not freeze his compensation pending investigation into an accounting
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1-Freddie Mac comenzará los pagos al ex CEO. La compañía financiera de hipotecas de Estados Unidos, Freddie Mac, dijo el viernes que ha comenzado los pagos al ex Director Ejecutivo Leland Brendsel después de que un tribunal dictaminó que los reguladores no podían congelar su compensación a la espera de una investigación sobre contabilidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Freddie Mac, the US mortgage finance firm, stated it has initiated payments to its previous CEO, Leland Brendsel. This follows a court's ruling that his salary couldn't be put on hold by the regulators during an ongoing accounting investigation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Freddie Mac, a US mortgage finance corporation, commenced salary disbursements to its ex-CEO, Leland Brendsel, after a legal decision on Friday prevented regulators from suspending it amid an accounting examination, the company declared.

Original Text: National League Game Summary - Colorado at Los Angeles Los Angeles, CA (Sports Network) - Steve Finley #39;s two-run single capped a five-run ninth inning, leading the Los Angeles Dodgers to a 5-4 victory over the Colorado Rockies at Dodger Stadium in the second contest of a four-game series.
Translation: Resumen del Juego de la Liga Nacional - Colorado en Los Ángeles, Los Ángeles, CA (Red Deportiva) - Un sencillo de dos carreras de Steve Finley puso fin a una entrada de noveno inning de cinco carreras, llevando a los Dodgers de Los Ángeles a una victoria de 5-4 sobre los Rockies de Colorado en el Estadio Dodger en el segundo partido de una serie de cuatro juegos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the second match of a four-game series held at Dodger Stadium, Steve Finley's two-run single in the ninth inning led the Los Angeles Dodgers to secure a 5-4 win over the Colorado Rockies. This was a paramount fixture in the National League Game, played in Los Angeles, CA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Los Angeles Dodgers emerged victorious with a 5-4 score against the Colorado Rockies in the National League Game. This triumph, which happened at the Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles, CA, was in the second game of a four-game series, with Steve Finley's remarkable two-run single in the ninth inning topping off a five-run spurt.

Original Text: Alienware #39;s 4GHz Pentium I love overclockers - I don #39;t know if it #39;s the nerves of steel needed to run components so far beyond their factory specifications that they need to be refrigerated, or the glowing water cooling pipes they use, or it might even be the UV lamps and dodgy
Translation: Adoro a los overclockers de Alienware #39; s 4GHz Pentium - No sé si son los nervios de acero necesarios para operar componentes tan más allá de sus especificaciones de fábrica que necesitan ser refrigerados, o las tuberías de refrigeración por agua brillantes que utilizan, o incluso podría ser las lámparas UV y el cableado sospechoso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I'm uncertain if it's the requirement of steel-like nerves to operate elements far beyond their factory limits, necessitating refrigeration, the incorporation of glowing water cooling pipes, or perhaps even the use of UV lamps with questionable wiring that makes me so enamored with Alienware's 4GHz Pentium overclockers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. I adore Alienware's 4GHz Pentium overclockers but I'm unsure whether it's their need for a cooling system due to the intense strain on components running far beyond their factory settings, the bright and intriguing water cooling pipes they utilize, or possibly even the UV lamps with precarious wiring.

Original Text: Economic growth less than forecast in Q3, prices muted The US economy grew at a healthy 3.7 annual rate in the third quarter this year, bolstered by strong consumer spending and accompanied by the lowest inflation in decades, the Commerce Department said Friday.
Translation: El crecimiento económico menor a lo pronosticado en el tercer trimestre, precios moderados. La economía de Estados Unidos creció a una tasa anual saludable del 3.7 en el tercer trimestre de este año, fortalecida por un fuerte gasto del consumidor y acompañada por la inflación más baja en décadas, dijo el Departamento de Comercio el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Strong consumer spending resulted in the US economy growing at a solid 3.7 annual rate in the third quarter of this year, despite economic growth being less than expected and inflation being at its lowest in many years, according to Friday's report by the Commerce Department.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the Commerce Department reported that the US economy experienced a 3.7 annual growth rate in this year's third quarter, supported by robust consumer spending. This happened amidst lesser-than-anticipated economic growth and the lowest inflation rates seen in years.

Original Text: Huskies reportedly fire Gilbertson Seattle, WA (Sports Network) - The University of Washington reportedly fired head football coach Keith Gilbertson on Monday. According to KING 5 News in Seattle, Gilbertson has been dismissed and it is unclear
Translation: Según informes, los Huskies despiden a Gilbertson Seattle, WA (Sports Network) - Aparentemente, la Universidad de Washington despidió al entrenador principal de fútbol, Keith Gilbertson, el lunes. Según KING 5 News en Seattle, a Gilbertson se le ha despedido y no está claro
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the Sports Network in Seattle, WA, the University of Washington has allegedly discharged their football head coach, Keith Gilbertson. However, as stated on KING 5 News in Seattle, it remains uncertain if Gilbertson has indeed been terminated.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It's reported that the University of Washington has let go of their head football coach, Keith Gilbertson, as reported by the Sports Network from Seattle, WA. KING 5 News in Seattle further reports that Gilbertson's dismissal remains hazy.

Original Text: NASA Administrator Steps Down Sean O'Keefe quit Monday to pursue a job as chancellor of Louisiana State University Baton Rouge campus.
Translation: El Administrador de la NASA renuncia: Sean O'Keefe dimitió el lunes para buscar un trabajo como canciller en la Universidad Estatal de Louisiana, campus de Baton Rouge.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sean O'Keefe, the NASA Administrator, resigned on Monday to take up a position as chancellor at the Louisiana State University Baton Rouge campus.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, Sean O'Keefe left his role as NASA Administrator in order to seek employment as the chancellor of Louisiana State University's Baton Rouge campus.

Original Text: United takes title: Eskandarian scores two goals for DC DC United was Major League Soccer #39;s first powerhouse, winning three titles in four years. United surged to the top again yesterday with a 3-2 MLS Cup victory over the Kansas
Translation: United se lleva el título: Eskandarian anota dos goles para DC. DC United fue la primera potencia de la Major League Soccer, ganando tres títulos en cuatro años. United volvió a alzarse hasta la cima ayer con una victoria de 3-2 en la Copa MLS sobre Kansas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DC United, Major League Soccer's initial dominant force having won three titles in four years, regained their spot at the top yesterday. They clinched the MLS Cup with a 3-2 victory over Kansas, primarily due to Eskandarian's contribution of scoring two goals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, DC United, which was Major League Soccer's inaugural powerhouse with three victories in four years, rose to prominence again with a 3-2 win over Kansas in the MLS Cup. Eskandarian stood out with two goals, helping United secure the title.

Original Text: i2 looks to technology rollout for a rebound i2 Technologies is hoping to continue its rebound by rolling out new technology aimed at retailers and manufacturers and forming partnerships that will help make its applications easier to integrate.
Translation: i2 espera que la implementación de la tecnología impulse su recuperación. i2 Technologies espera continuar su recuperación mediante la implementación de nueva tecnología dirigida a minoristas y fabricantes y formando alianzas que ayudarán a facilitar la integración de sus aplicaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. i2 Technologies anticipates a resurgence by launching new technology, targeted at manufacturers and retailers, and by initiating partnerships to simplify integration of its applications.

Original Text: Somerville provides Hannah dreary debut LOWELL -- Few people expected ex-Patriot and NFL Hall of Famer John Hannah to walk into the head coach position at Somerville and turn a winless team into a Super Bowl contender. After last night, skeptics may be looking to Hannah's role in the Somerville youth football program for solace as the Highlanders were swamped by Lowell, 47-14, at Crowley ...
Translation: Somerville brinda a Hannah un sombrío debut LOWELL -- Pocas personas esperaban que el ex-Patriota y miembro del Salón de la Fama de la NFL John Hannah asumiera la posición de entrenador en jefe en Somerville y transformara un equipo sin victorias en un contendiente para el Super Bowl. Después de anoche, los escépticos pueden buscar consuelo en el papel de Hannah en el programa de fútbol juvenil de Somerville, ya que los Highlanders fueron superados por Lowell, 47-14, en Crowley...
Paraphrase 1: Hannah's Somerville debut falls short in Lowell: Despite low expectations, the transition of former Patriot and NFL Hall of Famer John Hannah to the head coach role at Somerville didn't promise an immediate turnaround for the previously winless team into Super Bowl hopefuls. Following last night's overwhelming 47-14 defeat to Lowell at Crowley, critics might now seek comfort in Hannah's involvement with the Somerville youth football program.
Paraphrase 2: Hannah faces challenging start with Somerville in Lowell: The leap of John Hannah, an ex-Patriot and NFL Hall of Famer, into the head coaching position at Somerville wasn't anticipated to instantly transform the team from winless to Super Bowl contenders. The skeptics' doubts only deepened after Somerville's crushing 47-14 loss to Lowell at Crowley last night, turning eyes towards Hannah's contribution to the Somerville youth football program for some consolation.

Original Text: Olympics Wrap: Bad Day for U.S., New Dawn for China  ATHENS (Reuters) - The United States suffered their worst  day of the Athens Olympics on Friday when a tearful Marion  Jones flopped, their basketball "Dream Team" were humiliated  and they captured only one of the 20 golds on offer.
Translation: Resumen de las Olimpiadas: Mal Día para los EE.UU., Nuevo Amanecer para China ATENAS (Reuters) - Estados Unidos sufrió su peor día de las Olimpiadas de Atenas el viernes cuando una llorosa Marion Jones fracasó, su "Dream Team" de baloncesto fue humillado y solo lograron capturar una de las 20 medallas de oro en juego.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS (Reuters) - Friday marked a disappointing day for the United States at the Athens Olympics. The country's performance hit an all-time low when Marion Jones failed to impress, and the much-acclaimed basketball "Dream Team" suffered a crushing defeat. Furthermore, a mere one out of 20 available gold medals was claimed by the Americans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ATHENS (Reuters) - Friday at the Athens Olympics brought a significant setback for the United States. Marion Jones couldn't hold back her tears after her poor performance, and an unexpected defeat left the famed basketball "Dream Team" in disgrace. Moreover, only a single gold medal out of twenty that were up for grabs, went to the US.

Original Text: Arctic Thaw May Open Ship Lanes, But Risks High (Reuters) Reuters - A faster-than-expected thaw of the\Arctic is likely to open legendary short-cut routes between the\Pacific and the Atlantic but experts say icebergs and high\costs will prevent any trans-polar shipping boom.
Translation: Descongelamiento del Ártico puede abrir rutas de navegación, pero los riesgos son altos (Reuters) Reuters - Un deshielo del Ártico más rápido de lo esperado probablemente abrirá las legendarias rutas de atajo entre el Pacífico y el Atlántico, pero los expertos dicen que los icebergs y los altos costos evitarán cualquier auge en la navegación transpolar.
Paraphrase 1: (1) Reuters - The accelerated melting of Arctic ice may facilitate the opening of renowned short-cut paths between the Atlantic and the Pacific. However, professionals believe that the presence of icebergs and the elevated expenses involved will hinder the possibility of a major shipping surge across the polar region.
Paraphrase 2: (2) Reuters - Experts contend that the rapid thawing of the Arctic may unveil mythical short-cut routes bridging the Pacific and the Atlantic. However, they argue that prohibitive costs and the threat of icebergs will likely impede a significant upswing in trans-polar maritime transportation.

Original Text: Arabs remind Bush of Mideast peace commitment Arab governments have reminded US President George W. Bush of his commitment to Middle East diplomacy, in the hope a second Bush administration will pay more attention to one of their top priorities.
Translation: Los árabes recuerdan a Bush su compromiso con la paz en Medio Oriente. Los gobiernos árabes han recordado al presidente de EE.UU., George W. Bush, su compromiso con la diplomacia en Medio Oriente, con la esperanza de que una segunda administración Bush preste más atención a una de sus principales prioridades.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Arab administrations have prompted US President George W. Bush to remember his dedication to Middle Eastern diplomacy, with the aspiration that a subsequent Bush administration will give more focus to one of their main concerns.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arab leaders have pointedly reminded US President George W. Bush about his pledge to diplomacy in the Middle East, hoping that his potential second term will be more attentive to their priority issues.

Original Text: Busch wins NASCAR pole in Darlington DARLINGTON, South Carolina (Ticker) - With so much emphasis being placed on NASCAR #39;s  quot;Chase for the Championship, quot; it won #39;t be hard to keep track of those 10 drivers in Sunday #39;s Southern 500.
Translation: Busch gana la pole de NASCAR en Darlington DARLINGTON, Carolina del Sur (Ticker) - Con tanto énfasis en la "Carrera por el Campeonato" de NASCAR #39, no será difícil seguirle la pista a esos 10 pilotos en el Southern 500 del domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Darlington, South Carolina (Ticker) - Busch triumphs by claiming NASCAR pole in Darlington. The focus on NASCAR's "Chase for the Championship" ensures it will be easy to monitor the progress of the top 10 drivers in the upcoming Sunday's Southern 500.
Paraphrase 2: 2. DARLINGTON, South Carolina (Ticker) - Busch secures a victory by winning the NASCAR pole in Darlington. Given the high emphasis on the "Chase for the Championship" by NASCAR, tracking the ten leading drivers in Sunday's Southern 500 will be a straightforward task.

Original Text: Wagers on oil price prove a slippery slope for CAO State-owned, running a monopoly on imports of jet fuel to China #39;s fast-growing aviation industry and a prized member of Singapore #39;s Stock Exchange.
Translation: Las apuestas sobre el precio del petróleo resultan ser una pendiente resbaladiza para CAO, propiedad del Estado, que opera un monopolio en las importaciones de combustible para aviones en China, una industria de aviación de rápido crecimiento, y un miembro apreciado de la Bolsa de Valores de Singapur.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Betting on the price of oil has proven to be a risky business for CAO State-Owned, a company with a monopoly on China's rapidly expanding aviation industry's jet fuel imports and a respected member of Singapore's Stock Exchange.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For CAO State-Owned, who has a dominant position in importing jet fuel to China's burgeoning aviation industry and is a valued member of Singapore's Stock Exchange, stakes on the oil price have turned out to be a treacherous terrain.

Original Text: Serena Reaches Fourth Round of U.S. Open NEW YORK - Hardly at her best, barely beating one of the tour's pesky teens, Serena Williams suddenly found herself face-down at the U.S. Open...
Translation: Serena llega a la cuarta ronda del U.S. Open NUEVA YORK - Apenas en su mejor momento, apenas superando a una de las pesadas adolescentes del tour, Serena Williams se encontró de repente boca abajo en el U.S. Open...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Serena Advances to the U.S. Open's Fourth Round: Barely winning against a challenging teenage player, Serena Williams, even though not at her peak, found herself unexpectedly on her face during the match in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Serena Williams Progresses to Round Four of the U.S. Open: Despite an uncomfortably close match with a persistent young player, and not being at her optimal form, she ended up falling flat on her face during the contest in New York.

Original Text: Families of Iraq War Dead Target Bush in Ads (Reuters) Reuters - Angered by President Bush's policy\in Iraq, a group of military families whose relatives died\there is targeting the president in new television ads to be\aired ahead of the Nov. 2 election.
Translation: Familias de Muertos en la Guerra de Irak Apuntan a Bush en Anuncios (Reuters) Reuters - Irritadas por la política del Presidente Bush en Irak, un grupo de familias militares cuyos parientes murieron allí apuntan al presidente en nuevos anuncios de televisión que se emitirán antes de las elecciones del 2 de noviembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - Military families, who have lost relatives in the Iraq War and are upset with President Bush's policy, are focusing on the president in upcoming television advertisements set to broadcast prior to the November 2 election.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - A band of military kin, grieving the loss of their relatives in the Iraq War and frustrated with President Bush's policy, are launching new television advertisements pinpointing the president, due for telecast before the November 2 election.

Original Text: Former soldiers occupuing ex-president #39;s home evicted PORT-AU-PRINCE, (AFP) - Armed UN peacekeepers and Haitian police evicted former soldiers who were occupying ousted president Jean Bertrand Aristide #39;s luxurious mansion here.
Translation: Exsoldados ocupando la casa del expresidente #39 desalojados PORT-AU-PRINCE, (AFP) - Los pacificadores armados de la ONU y la policía haitiana desalojaron a exsoldados que estaban ocupando la lujosa mansión del presidente depuesto Jean Bertrand Aristide #39 aquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PORT-AU-PRINCE, (AFP) - Ousted president Jean Bertrand Aristide's lavish estate, which was seized by former military personnel, was retaken by armed UN peacekeepers in alliance with the Haitian police.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Armed squads from the United Nations Peacekeeping force and local Haitian police successfully removed ex-soldiers who had taken control of the opulent residence of the former president, Jean Bertrand Aristide in Port-au-Prince, according to AFP.

Original Text: Record high tornadoes for September, August The US National Weather Service #39;s Storm Prediction Center said Thursday that 173 tornadoes were reported in August and 247 in September.
Translation: Récord histórico de tornados para septiembre, agosto. El Centro de Predicción de Tormentas del Servicio Nacional de Meteorología de EE. UU. #39 dijo el jueves que se informaron 173 tornados en agosto y 247 en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, The US National Weather Service's Storm Prediction Center announced a record high of 173 tornadoes in August and 247 in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Storm Prediction Center of the US National Weather Service revealed on Thursday that there were an unprecedented 173 tornadoes in August and 247 in September.

Original Text: Warriors Place Fisher on Injured List (Reuters) Reuters - The Golden State\Warriors have placed guard Derek Fisher on the injured list\with a sprained right knee.
Translation: Los Guerreros Ubican a Fisher en la Lista de Lesionados (Reuters) Reuters - Los Golden State Warriors han ubicado al base Derek Fisher en la lista de lesionados debido a un esguince en la rodilla derecha.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) The Golden State Warriors have added guard Derek Fisher, who suffers from a sprained right knee, to their injured list.
Paraphrase 2: Reuters reports that Derek Fisher, the guard for The Golden State Warriors, has been put on the injured list due to a sprained right knee.

Original Text: Vendors Address Productivity, Convergence at Wireless Expo (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - The enterprise makes way for mobile video as WiMax advances, Palm's new Treo 650 and Windows mobile productivity all share the stage at the CTIA Wireless show in San Francisco.
Translation: Los Vendedores Abordan la Productividad, Convergencia en la Exposición Inalámbrica (Ziff Davis) Ziff Davis - La empresa abre camino para el video móvil a medida que avanza WiMax, el nuevo Treo 650 de Palm y la productividad móvil de Windows comparten el escenario en la feria CTIA Wireless en San Francisco.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Wireless Expo, vendors tackle productivity and convergence issues (Ziff Davis). As WiMax progresses, mobile video takes center-stage in business, along with Palm's latest Treo 650 and Windows' mobile productivity. They all get highlighted during the CTIA Wireless show in San Francisco, as reported by Ziff Davis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wireless Expo sees vendors addressing productivity and convergence (Ziff Davis). Ziff Davis reports that the path is cleared for mobile video alongside advances in WiMax, the introduction of Palm's Treo 650 and Windows mobile productivity, all of which share the limelight at the San Francisco-based CTIA Wireless show.

Original Text: Rams, Bucs Tied 7-7 After First Quarter (AP) AP - The St. Louis Rams and Tampa Bay Bucs both got off to a fast start Monday night, scoring on their first possessions and they were tied 7-7 after the first quarter.
Translation: Rams, Bucs Empatados 7-7 Después del Primer Cuarto (AP) AP - Los Rams de St. Louis y los Bucs de Tampa Bay ambos tuvieron un inicio rápido el lunes por la noche, anotando en sus primeras posesiones y quedaron empatados 7-7 después del primer cuarto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Monday evening saw both the St. Louis Rams and Tampa Bay Bucs begin on a high note at the games, delivering scores on their initial possessions which resulted in a 7-7 stalemate following the first quarter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - The game commenced with vigorous energy on Monday night as the St. Louis Rams and Tampa Bay Bucs simultaneously made scores on their opening possessions, leaving them at a 7-7 tie after the initial quarter.

Original Text: Test could spot Alzheimer's early A  test capable of diagnosing the early signs of Alzheimer's disease has been developed in the US using nanotechnology.
Translation: Una prueba podría detectar tempranamente el Alzheimer. Se ha desarrollado en los Estados Unidos una prueba capaz de diagnosticar los primeros signos de la enfermedad de Alzheimer utilizando nanotecnología.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Utilizing nanotechnology, a test has been designed in the US that could potentially detect the initial indications of Alzheimer's disease.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A test has been created in the US with the aid of nanotechnology that holds the potential to identify Alzheimer's disease at its early stages.

Original Text: Car Bomb Kills 1 US Soldier near Abu Ghraib A car bomb killed one US soldier and two Iraqi police at a checkpoint near Abu Ghraib on Thursday morning. Separately, Iraqi police reported numerous injuries and some deaths in two
Translation: "Una bomba en un automóvil mata a 1 soldado estadounidense cerca de Abu Ghraib. Una bomba de auto mató a un soldado estadounidense y a dos policías iraquíes en un puesto de control cerca de Abu Ghraib el jueves por la mañana. Por separado, la policía iraquí informó numerosas heridas y algunas muertes en dos"
Paraphrase 1: 1) A car bomb detonated near Abu Ghraib took the life of one US soldier, along with two Iraqi police officers at a checkpoint on Thursday morning. In a separate incident, several casualties, including deaths, were reported by the Iraqi police in two incidences.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Thursday morning, at a checkpoint near Abu Ghraib, a car bomb explosion resulted in the death of one American soldier and two Iraqi policemen. Meanwhile, Iraqi police indicated multiple injuries and casualties in two unrelated incidents.

Original Text: Barcelona clubbers get chipped Some clubbers in Barcelona have opted to have a microchip implanted which lets them pay for drinks.
Translation: Los clubes de Barcelona se digitalizan. Algunos fiesteros en Barcelona han optado por implantarse un microchip que les permite pagar sus bebidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Some party-goers in Barcelona have chosen to get microchipped, allowing them to pay for their drinks without cash or cards.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Barcelona, a number of club enthusiasts are electing to implant a microchip that enables them to effortlessly pay for their beverages.

Original Text: Apple Recalls 28,000 PowerBook Batteries Due to Overheating Concern (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Apple (Nasdaq: AAPL) has issued a warning related to potential problems with the\batteries in some 28,000 of its 15-inch PowerBook G4 laptop computers,\telling customers that the batteries may pose a fire hazard due to\overheating.
Translation: Apple Retira 28,000 Baterías de PowerBook Debido a Preocupaciones de Sobrecalentamiento (NewsFactor) NewsFactor - Apple (Nasdaq: AAPL) ha emitido una advertencia relacionada con posibles problemas con las baterías en aproximadamente 28,000 de sus computadoras portátiles PowerBook G4 de 15 pulgadas, informando a los clientes que las baterías pueden representar un riesgo de incendio debido a sobrecalentamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NewsFactor - Apple (Nasdaq: AAPL) has announced a recall of around 28,000 batteries used in its 15-inch PowerBook G4 laptops because of potential overheating issues that pose a fire risk.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NewsFactor - Due to overheating concerns that could lead to a potential fire hazard, Apple (Nasdaq: AAPL) has initiated a recall of approximately 28,000 batteries from its 15-inch PowerBook G4 laptops.

Original Text: UPDATE 2-Ace, Marsh fire employees amid industry probe Broker Marsh  amp; McLennan Cos. and insurer Ace Ltd. (ACE.N: Quote, Profile, Research) have fired a total of six employees in recent days as a result of internal investigations related
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 2-Ace, Marsh despide a empleados en medio de una investigación de la industria. El corredor Marsh & McLennan Cos. y el asegurador Ace Ltd. (ACE.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) han despedido a un total de seis empleados en los últimos días como resultado de investigaciones internas relacionadas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Recent internal investigations have led to the dismissal of six employees from broker Marsh & McLennan Cos. and insurer Ace Ltd. (ACE.N: Quote, Profile, Research), reflecting the ongoing industry probe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Six employees have been let go from Ace Ltd. (ACE.N: Quote, Profile, Research) and Broker Marsh & McLennan Cos. amid an industry probe sparked by recent internal investigations.

Original Text: Baghdad Airport Closed Indefinitely -- PM Office  BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraq's interim government extended the  closure of Baghdad international airport indefinitely on  Saturday under emergency rule imposed ahead of this week's  U.S.-led offensive on Falluja.
Translation: Aeropuerto de Bagdad Cerrado Indefinidamente -- Oficina del Primer Ministro BAGDAD (Reuters) - El gobierno interino de Irak extendió el cierre del aeropuerto internacional de Bagdad indefinidamente el sábado bajo la regla de emergencia impuesta antes de la ofensiva liderada por Estados Unidos en Falluja de esta semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Under the imposed emergency rule, ahead of this week's U.S-led offensive on Falluja, Iraq's interim government has extended the closure of Baghdad international airport for an indefinite period, as stated by the Prime Minister's Office on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD (Reuters) - As a part of an imposition of emergency rule in anticipation of the U.S.-led offensive on Falluja, the interim government of Iraq declared an indefinite closure of Baghdad's international airport, according to the Prime Minister's Office, who made the announcement on Saturday.

Original Text: Astros Take Game 1 Roger Clemens wins his ninth postseason game and Houston sets a team playoff record with four home runs in a 9-3 win over the Atlanta Braves in Game 1 of their NL playoff series.
Translation: Los Astros ganan el Juego 1. Roger Clemens gana su noveno partido de postemporada y Houston establece un récord de equipo en los playoffs con cuatro jonrones en una victoria 9-3 sobre los Atlanta Braves en el Juego 1 de su serie de playoffs de la Liga Nacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Astros kick off their NL playoff series with a resounding 9-3 victory over the Atlanta Braves, thanks largely to four record-breaking home runs by the team and Roger Clemens winning his ninth postseason match.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Game 1 of their NL playoff series, the Houston Astros claim a 9-3 triumph against the Atlanta Braves. The superb win saw Roger Clemens bag his ninth postseason victory and the team setting a new franchise record with four home runs.

Original Text: Update 1: Time Warner expected to pay SEC \$750 million to settle <b>...</b> Time Warner is nearing settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Justice Department on the accounting scandal in AOL.
Translation: Actualización 1: Se espera que Time Warner pague a la SEC \$750 millones para llegar a un acuerdo <b>...</b> Time Warner se acerca a un acuerdo con la Comisión de Bolsa y Valores y el Departamento de Justicia sobre el escándalo contable en AOL.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Time Warner is anticipated to pay the SEC $750 million as part of a settlement amid the AOL accounting scandal. This information is hinted in the update that Time Warner is drawing close to a settlement agreement with both the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Justice Department.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Indications suggest that Time Warner will have to pay a $750 million settlement to the SEC in the wake of AOL's accounting scandal, as they approach an imminent settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Justice Department.

Original Text: Michael Jackson in legal setback Michael Jackson's lawyers fail in their attempt to have evidence seized in a raid on his ranch thrown out.
Translation: Michael Jackson enfrenta un revés legal. Los abogados de Michael Jackson fracasan en su intento de desechar las pruebas incautadas durante un allanamiento en su rancho.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The attempt by Michael Jackson's lawyers to discard evidence obtained from a raid on his ranch has encountered a legal hurdle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Legal difficulties arose for Michael Jackson when his attorneys' attempt to toss out the evidence from a raid on his ranch was unsuccessful.

Original Text: 'Marathon mouse' doubles stamina Scientists find genetically-modified mice can run twice as far, in a development that could help human stamina.
Translation: "Ratón maratón" duplica resistencia. Los científicos encuentran que los ratones genéticamente modificados pueden correr el doble de distancia, en un desarrollo que podría ayudar a la resistencia humana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scientists have discovered that genetically-altered mice, referred to as 'marathon mice', can run double the distance, a breakthrough that holds potential benefits for enhancing human stamina.
Paraphrase 2: 2. 'Marathon mouse', capable of running double the usual distance, has been successfully created by scientists through genetic modification – a finding that may prove beneficial in increasing human stamina.

Original Text: Google prices its shares at \$85 WASHINGTON  Google closed the unusual auction for its shares yesterday and prepared for its stock to begin trading at \$85 per share, after weaker-than-expected demand from investors forced it to drastically slash the price and size of ...
Translation: Google valora sus acciones en $85 WASHINGTON Google cerró la inusual subasta de sus acciones ayer y se preparó para que su acción comience a cotizar a $85 por acción, después de que una demanda más débil de lo esperado de los inversores lo obligara a reducir drásticamente el precio y el tamaño de...
Paraphrase 1: 1. After witnessing an unexpectedly weak demand from investors, Google dramatically reduced its pricing and share size; concluding its atypical auction yesterday and setting its stock price at $85 per share for the opening trade.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Google ended its non-traditional share auction yesterday, and due to lower than anticipated investor interest, the company substantially reduced its share price to $85, preparing for its stock trading to commence.

Original Text: East Congo Battle Flares, Governments Trade Blame  KINSHASA (Reuters) - Congolese government forces clashed  with rebels at a town near the border with Rwanda for a third  day Wednesday as the two countries traded heated accusations  over who was involved in the fighting.
Translation: Estalla Batalla en el Este del Congo, Gobiernos Intercambian Acusaciones KINSHASA (Reuters) - Las fuerzas gubernamentales congoleñas chocaron con los rebeldes en un pueblo cerca de la frontera con Ruanda por tercer día el miércoles, mientras los dos países intercambiaban acusaciones acaloradas sobre quién estaba involucrado en los combates.
Paraphrase 1: 1) KINSHASA (Reuters) - For the third consecutive day, skirmishes between Congolese government forces and rebels near the Rwanda border continued on Wednesday, inciting a vehement exchange of allegations between the two nations about their involvement in the conflict.
Paraphrase 2: 2) KINSHASA (Reuters) - The battle between Congolese government troops and insurgents near the Rwandan border was extended for a third day on Wednesday. Amidst the ongoing conflict, both countries engaged in a fiery exchange of claims and counterclaims over their roles in the fighting.

Original Text: Delta releases new details on up to 6,900 job cuts ATLANTA Delta Air Lines today released new details on the up to 69-hundred jobs it plans to eliminate starting January first. Delta earlier this year announced it #39;s dropping Dallas-Fort Worth International
Translation: Delta publica nuevos detalles sobre hasta 6,900 recortes de empleos ATLANTA Delta Air Lines lanzó hoy nuevos detalles sobre los hasta seis mil novecientos trabajos que planea eliminar a partir del primero de enero. Delta anunció anteriormente este año que está abandonando el aeropuerto internacional de Dallas-Fort Worth.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Delta Air Lines, based in Atlanta, today revealed further information about its plan to cut as many as 6,900 jobs starting from the first of January. Earlier this year, the airline announced its withdrawal from Dallas-Fort Worth International.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Complementing its earlier announcement of pulling out of Dallas-Fort Worth International, Delta Air Lines today shared more specifics about the 6,900 jobs it aims to remove, starting the first of January. The company, stationed in Atlanta, disclosed these particulars today.

Original Text: New European Commission endorsed by EP The revised team of European commissioners headed by Jose Manuel Durao Barroso was approved by the European Parliament (EP) on Thursday.
Translation: La nueva Comisión Europea respaldada por el PE El equipo revisado de comisarios europeos liderado por José Manuel Durao Barroso fue aprobado por el Parlamento Europeo (PE) el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, the European Parliament (EP) gave its approval to the amended team of European commissioners, led by Jose Manuel Durao Barroso, after being endorsed by the New European Commission.

Original Text: Analogic, partner reach agreement L-3 Communications Corp., which sells equipment to detect bombs in airport luggage, settled a lawsuit in which it claimed business partner Analogic Corp. violated a contract by submitting independent proposals to the Transportation Security Administration. Peabody-based Analogic said terms of the settlement were kept confidential and that the agreement didn't entail a payment by either side.  quot;We look forward to ...
Translation: Analogic, socio llegan a un acuerdo. L-3 Communications Corp., que vende equipo para detectar bombas en el equipaje del aeropuerto, resolvió una demanda en la que afirmaba que su socio comercial, Analogic Corp., violó un contrato al presentar propuestas independientes a la Administración de Seguridad en el Transporte. Analogic, con sede en Peabody, dijo que los términos del acuerdo se mantuvieron confidenciales y que el acuerdo no implicó un pago por ninguna de las partes. "Esperamos con interés...
Paraphrase 1: 1. L-3 Communications Corp., a company specializing in selling bomb detection equipment for airport luggage, has resolved a lawsuit against Analogic Corp., their business partner. The lawsuit accused Analogic of contract breach for independently proposing to the Transportation Security Administration. Analogic, headquartered in Peabody, stated confidentiality on the settlement's terms, also clarifying that there was no exchange of money involved. The two are anticipated to...
Paraphrase 2: 2. A contract violation lawsuit between L-3 Communications Corp., sellers of bomb-detecting airport luggage scanners, and Analogic Corp., has been settled. L-3 had accused its business associate Analogic of independently submitting proposals to the Transportation Security Administration, which was said to be a breach of contract. However, the Peabody-based Analogic maintained the settlement details as confidential, indicating that there weren't any payments involved by either party. The companies are looking forward to...

Original Text: Cendant near \$1.2B deal to buy Orbitz Source says travel and real estate giant is close to reaching agreement to acquire travel Web site. PHILADELPHIA (Reuters) - Travel and real estate company Cendant Corp.
Translation: Cendant cerca de un acuerdo de \$1.2B para comprar Orbitz. Una fuente dice que el gigante de viajes y bienes raíces está cerca de llegar a un acuerdo para adquirir el sitio web de viajes. FILADELFIA (Reuters) - La compañía de viajes y bienes raíces Cendant Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Orbitz, a travel website, is close to being purchased by the travel and real estate powerhouse Cendant Corp for approximately $1.2 billion, says a source. The deal is on the brink of finalisation in Philadelphia, according to Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cendant Corp, a major player in the travel and real estate industry, is on the verge of signing a deal to acquire Orbitz, a travel website, for an estimated $1.2 billion. This is according to a source in Philadelphia, mediated by Reuters.

Original Text: Fleming 'alarmed' by Aussies' thorough planning (AFP) AFP - New Zealand skipper Stephen Fleming said he was alarmed at the scale of planning Australia had put in to conquer their final cricket frontier in India.
Translation: Fleming 'alarmado' por la meticulosa planificación de los australianos (AFP) AFP - El capitán de Nueva Zelanda, Stephen Fleming, dijo que estaba alarmado por la magnitud de la planificación que Australia había realizado para conquistar su última frontera de cricket en India.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - New Zealand's captain, Stephen Fleming, expressed his concern over the intense level of preparation Australia undertook to triumph over their ultimate cricket challenge in India.

Original Text: Inkster Leads LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge (AP) AP - Hall of Famer Juli Inkster, looking to extend to her streak of winning a tournament to eight years, shot a 5-under 66 Friday and took a one-stroke lead over Christina Kim after two rounds of the LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge.
Translation: Inkster Lidera el Desafío de Longs Drugs de la LPGA (AP) AP - La miembro del Salón de la Fama, Juli Inkster, buscando extender su racha de ganar un torneo a ocho años, disparó un 5 bajo par 66 el viernes y tomó una ventaja de un golpe sobre Christina Kim después de dos rondas del Desafío de Longs Drugs de la LPGA.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP reports that Hall of Famer Juli Inkster is in the lead at the LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge, aiming to prolong her winning streak to eight years. With a score of 5-under 66 on Friday, she gained a one-stroke lead over Christina Kim after two rounds.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Juli Inkster, a Hall of Famer, is leading the LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge, going strong in her mission to win a tournament for the eighth consecutive year. After achieving a score of 5-under 66 on Friday, she has a one-stroke advantage over Christina Kim after the first two rounds, as reported by AP.

Original Text: It #39;s time for BCS madness again Bee Staff Writer. Translation: Let the debates begin, and break out your thinking helmets to sort it all out. It comes as no surprise USC took the top spot in the initial Bowl Championship Series standings that were released Monday.
Translation: Es hora nuevamente para la locura del BCS, escribe el personal de Bee. Traducción: Que comiencen los debates, y saquen sus cascos de pensamiento para resolverlo todo. No es una sorprenda que USC haya ocupado el primer lugar en las clasificaciones iniciales de la Serie de Campeonato de Bowl que se publicaron el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: The BCS frenzy is back, notes the Bee Staff Writer. In other words, get ready to dive into heated discussions and put on your analytical caps to make sense of it all. As expected, USC has secured the premier position in the first release of the Bowl Championship Series standings this Monday.
Paraphrase 2: BCS excitement returns, as pointed out by the Bee Staff Writer. This signifies the start of intense debates, so it's time to gear up with your strategic thinking hats to decipher the developments. Unsurprisingly, USC has clinched the leading place in the initial Bowl Championship Series rankings announced on Monday.

Original Text: Venezuelan Beach-Goers Get 'Croc' Shock (Reuters) Reuters - Swimmers and surfers on a\popular Venezuelan beach got a shock when a nearly 10-foot\(three-meter) fresh-water crocodile surfaced in the Caribbean\sea off the coast near Caracas, officials said on Wednesday.
Translation: Los Visitantes de la Playa Venezolana se Llevan un Susto con un 'Cocodrilo' (Reuters) Reuters - Nadadores y surfistas en una playa popular de Venezuela se llevaron un susto cuando apareció un cocodrilo de agua dulce de casi 10 pies (tres metros) en el mar Caribe, cerca de la costa de Caracas, dijeron funcionarios el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - Officials reported on Wednesday that a nearly 10-foot (three-meter) freshwater crocodile appearing in the Caribbean Sea off the coast near Caracas, startled swimmers and surfers at a much-frequented Venezuelan beach.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - On Wednesday, officials announced that a startling scene unfolded when a fresh-water crocodile, nearly 10-feet (three meters) in length, emerged near a popular Venezuelan beach, causing surprise among swimmers and surfers off the coast of Caracas in the Caribbean Sea.

Original Text: Al-Qaeda claims attack on US consulate in Jeddah: website (AFP) AFP - The Saudi branch of Osama bin Laden's Al-Qaeda terror group used an Islamist web site to claim an unprecedented attack on the US consulate in the Saudi port of Jeddah, stating that some assailants had managed to flee after the operation.
Translation: Al-Qaeda reclama ataque al consulado de EE.UU. en Jeddah: sitio web (AFP) AFP - La rama saudita del grupo terrorista Al-Qaeda de Osama bin Laden usó un sitio web islamista para reclamar un ataque sin precedentes en el consulado de EE.UU. en el puerto saudita de Jeddah, afirmando que algunos atacantes lograron huir después de la operación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As reported by AFP, the Saudi subdivision of Osama bin Laden's Al-Qaeda terrorist organization announced on an Islamist website that it was behind the attack on the US consulate in the Saudi coastal city of Jeddah, adding that a few of the attackers were able to escape post-operation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Via an Islamist website, the Al-Qaeda terror faction led by Osama bin Laden in Saudi Arabia announced responsibility for the unprecedented assault on the US consulate in Jeddah, as stated by AFP. They also claimed that some attackers were successful in eluding capture after the operation.

Original Text: Surgeons 'rebuild' patient's face Surgeons carry out the first full face reconstruction, including the nose, using a single flap of skin.
Translation: Los cirujanos "reconstruyen" el rostro del paciente. Los cirujanos realizan la primera reconstrucción total de la cara, incluyendo la nariz, utilizando un solo colgajo de piel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a first, surgeons perform a full face reconstruction, inclusive of the nose, using a single skin flap on a patient.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A patient's face was completely rebuilt by surgeons, including the nose, using just one flap of skin for the first time.

Original Text: Payrolls Grow, But Miss Target (CBS/AP) The Labor Department said Friday that employers #39; payrolls increased by 96,000 overall in September while the unemployment rate held steady at 5.4 percent.
Translation: Los salarios crecen, pero no alcanzan el objetivo (CBS/AP) El Departamento de Trabajo dijo el viernes que los salarios de los empleadores aumentaron en general en 96,000 en septiembre, mientras que la tasa de desempleo se mantuvo estable en el 5.4 por ciento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Labor Department announced on Friday that the total payrolls rose by 96,000 in September, however, it didn't meet the expected target, keeping the unemployment rate consistent at 5.4 percent. (CBS/AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. While employers' payrolls saw an increase of 96,000 in September, announced the Labor Department on Friday, it failed to reach the target, leaving the unemployment rate at a stagnant 5.4 percent. (CBS/AP)

Original Text: Kinsey: Sexologist, Hero The biopic shows admirably how liberating, and threatening, the work of some scientists can be. It's a timely film, a reminder that scientists sometimes suffer in their efforts to reveal truths others would prefer remain hidden. Jason Silverman reviews Kinsey.
Translation: Kinsey: Sexólogo, Héroe. La biografía muestra admirablemente cómo puede ser liberador, y amenazante, el trabajo de algunos científicos. Es una película oportuna, un recordatorio de que los científicos a veces sufren en sus esfuerzos por revelar verdades que otros preferirían que permanecieran ocultas. Jason Silverman reseña Kinsey.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The biopic of Kinsey, a renowned sexologist and hero, commendably illustrates the liberating yet daunting nature of some scientific works. The film serves as a poignant reminder that often scientists endure hardships when presenting truths that others choose to ignore. Reviewed by Jason Silverman, it's a pertinent movie for our times.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jason Silverman's review of the Kinsey biopic highlights how commendably the film demonstrates the liberating and, at the same time, challenging aspects of certain scientific efforts. This timely film serves as a stark reminder of the difficulties scientists face while uncovering truths often concealed by others. Kinsey was not only a sexologist but also a hero in this context.

Original Text: Intel Chips In for New Gateway PCs Desktops will be available at several retailers, including CompUSA.
Translation: Intel contribuye con chips para nuevas PCs de Gateway. Los ordenadores de mesa estarán disponibles en varias tiendas, incluyendo CompUSA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Gateway PCs Desktops with new Intel chips will be accessible at a variety of stores, CompUSA included.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Multiple retailers, including CompUSA, will be selling new Gateway PCs Desktops equipped with Intel chips.

Original Text: Dollar Slips to 7-Month Low Vs Yen  SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Persistent concern about the U.S.  trade deficit pushed the dollar to a 7-month low against the  yen and a 7-year low against the South Korean won on Monday,  while strength on Wall Street drove Asian shares higher.
Translation: El Dólar Caída a Mínimo de 7 Meses Contra el Yen  SINGAPUR (Reuters) - La constante preocupación acerca del déficit comercial de EE.UU. empujó al dólar a un mínimo de 7 meses frente al yen y a un mínimo de 7 años frente al won surcoreano el lunes, mientras que la fortaleza en Wall Street impulsó las acciones asiáticas al alza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SINGAPORE (Reuters) - On Monday, due to ongoing worries regarding the U.S. trade deficit, the dollar fell to a 7-month low against the yen and also dropped to a 7-year low against the South Korean won. Meanwhile, Wall Street's robust performance boosted Asian stocks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Continued anxieties over the U.S. trade deficit led to the dollar declining to its lowest level in seven months against the yen and hitting a seven-year trough against the South Korean won on Monday. In contrast, a robust rally on Wall Street elevated Asian share prices.

Original Text: Bali bombers may be brought here THE Australian Government may try to bring those behind the Bali bombings to Australia for trial if they avoid jail time in Indonesia.
Translation: Los bombarderos de Bali podrían ser traídos aquí. El Gobierno Australiano podría intentar traer a los responsables de los atentados de Bali a Australia para ser juzgados si evitan la cárcel en Indonesia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If the culprits of the Bali bombings manage to evade prison time in Indonesia, the Australian Government might seek to bring them to Australia for prosecution.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Australian Government is considering the possibility of extraditing the Bali bombing suspects for trial in Australia, should they not face imprisonment in Indonesia.

Original Text: Kidde rejects US takeover offer Fire equipment manufacturer Kidde saw its share price rise by 20 on Friday after it confirmed it had rejected a 1.35bn (\$2.46bn) takeover offer.
Translation: Kidde rechaza oferta de adquisición estadounidense. El fabricante de equipos contra incendios Kidde vio su precio de acciones aumentar en un 20 el viernes después de confirmar que había rechazado una oferta de adquisición de 1.35 mil millones (£2.46 mil millones).
Paraphrase 1: 1. Fire equipment manufacturer Kidde rejected a 1.35bn (\$2.46bn) takeover offer, leading to a 20% rise in its share price on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After dismissing an American takeover offer valued at 1.35bn (\$2.46bn), Kidde, a fire equipment manufacturer, witnessed its share price increase by 20% on Friday.

Original Text: Aviation Key in Climate Change Battle -UK Report (Reuters) Reuters - Britain's Tony Blair must make aircraft\pollution a priority in his drive to confront the problems of\climate change, an expert parliamentary committee of peers said\on Wednesday.
Translation: La aviación es clave en la batalla contra el cambio climático -Informe del Reino Unido (Reuters) Reuters - Tony Blair de Gran Bretaña debe hacer de la contaminación de los aviones una prioridad en su empeño por enfrentar los problemas del cambio climático, dijo un comité parlamentario de expertos el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - A parliamentary committee of experts stated on Wednesday that UK's Tony Blair must prioritise addressing aircraft pollution as a key approach in combatting climate change issues. According to a UK report, aviation plays a significant role in this climate change battle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - On Wednesday, a British parliamentary committee of specialists declared that Prime Minister Tony Blair must focus on aircraft pollution as a major part of his strategic plan to deal with climate change. The committee underlined the crucial role of aviation in this battle, according to a report from the UK.

Original Text: Spain coach faces investigation Spain #39;s Anti-Violence Commission have asked the country #39;s football federation to open a disciplinary case against national team coach Luis Aragones.
Translation: El entrenador de España enfrenta investigación. La Comisión Antiviolencia de España ha solicitado a la federación de fútbol del país que abra un caso disciplinario contra el entrenador del equipo nacional, Luis Aragones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Anti-Violence Commission of Spain has requested the country's football federation to initiate a disciplinary investigation against the national team's coach, Luis Aragones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Luis Aragones, the coach of the national team, is under potential investigation as the country's Anti-Violence Commission has urged Spain's football federation to open a disciplinary case against him.

Original Text: Could Be Days Before Terra Nova Restart - Petrocan CALGARY, Alberta - It could could be days before Canada #39;s second-largest offshore oil project, Terra Nova, restarts after being shut down last weekend when crude spilled into the ocean, an official with operator Petro-Canada said Thursday.
Translation: Podrían Pasar Días antes de que Terra Nova se Reinicie - Petrocan CALGARY, Alberta - Podrían pasar días antes de que el segundo proyecto de extracción de petróleo marítimo más grande de Canadá, Terra Nova, se reinicie después de haber sido cerrado el fin de semana pasado cuando el crudo se derramó en el océano, dijo el jueves un oficial de Petro-Canada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The restart of Terra Nova, Canada's second-largest offshore oil project, might be delayed for several days, according to a Petro-Canada official. The project was halted last weekend following a crude oil spill into the ocean.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Petro-Canada, the operator of Terra Nova - Canada's second largest offshore oil project, indicated on Thursday that it might take several days to restart operations. The project had to be shut down last weekend due to a crude oil spill into the ocean.

Original Text: Israeli Officer Charged in Death of Palestinian Girl An Israeli army captain accused of riddling a 13-year-old Palestinian girl #39;s body with bullets after his unit killed her was charged on Tuesday with conduct unbecoming an officer and illegal discharge of a weapon.
Translation: Oficial Israelí Acusado por la Muerte de Niña Palestina Un capitán del ejército israelí, acusado de llenar el cuerpo de una niña palestina de 13 años con balas después de que su unidad la matara, fue acusado el martes de conducta impropia de un oficial y descarga ilegal de un arma.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Tuesday, an Israeli army captain was indicted for conduct unbecoming an officer and unlawfully discharging his firearm, following accusations that he showered a 13-year-old Palestinian girl's body with bullets after his unit had ended her life.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An Israeli military captain who allegedly filled the body of a 13-year-old Palestinian girl with bullets post her death by his unit, was accused on Tuesday and faced charges for unprofessional conduct and illegal weapon discharge.

Original Text: Nuclear Chief Pressures Iran, N. Korea UN nuclear chief Mohamed ElBaradei urged Iran on Monday to suspend uranium enrichment and called on North Korea to dismantle its weapons program or at least allow inspectors to ensure it is  quot;exclusively peaceful.
Translation: El jefe nuclear presiona a Irán y a Corea del Norte. El jefe nuclear de la ONU, Mohamed ElBaradei, instó a Irán el lunes a suspender el enriquecimiento de uranio y pidió a Corea del Norte que desmantelara su programa de armas o al menos permitiera a los inspectores garantizar que es "exclusivamente pacífico".
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, UN Nuclear Chief Mohamed ElBaradei implored Iran to halt its uranium enrichment and urged North Korea to either disassemble its weapons program or permit inspectors to verify its peaceful nature.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Mohamed ElBaradei, the UN's nuclear chief, appealed to Iran on Monday to suspend uranium enrichment, and requested North Korea to either decommission its weapons program or allow checks to confirm its exclusively peaceful intentions.

Original Text: Second doping test on Irish winner Waterford Crystal positive <b>...</b> A backup doping sample from the horse that won the show jumping gold medal at the Athens Olympics also was positive for a banned substance, the Irish rider #39;s lawyer said Tuesday.
Translation: Traduce esto al español de manera precisa: Segunda prueba de dopaje en el ganador irlandés Waterford Crystal positiva <b>...</b> Una muestra de respaldo de dopaje del caballo que ganó la medalla de oro en salto de obstáculos en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas también fue positiva para una sustancia prohibida, dijo el martes el abogado del jinete irlandés #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Waterford Crystal, the Irish horse that won the gold medal in show jumping at the Athens Olympics, has a backup doping sample that also tested positive for a prohibited substance - a fact confirmed on Tuesday by the Irish rider's attorney.

Original Text: Judge appoints lawyers to defend Milosevic, over his objections Overriding the defendant #39;s objections, the UN war crimes tribunal appointed two lawyers to represent Slobodan Milosevic yesterday, hoping
Translation: El juez designa abogados para defender a Milosevic, pese a sus objeciones. Ignorando las objeciones del acusado, el tribunal de crímenes de guerra de la ONU designó ayer a dos abogados para representar a Slobodan Milosevic, con la esperanza.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite Slobodan Milosevic's objections, the judge assigned two lawyers to his defense, with the goal of ensuring proper legal representation in the UN war crimes tribunal yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The UN war crimes tribunal, ignoring Slobodan Milosevic's objections, decided yesterday to assign two lawyers to his defense.

Original Text: Mauresmo Through After Nervy Start  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Amelie Mauresmo's hopes of a first  grand slam title remained intact Wednesday but she had to come  from behind to beat Ukraine's Julia Vakulenko 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 in  the second round of the U.S. Open.
Translation: Mauresmo pasa tras un comienzo nervioso NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las esperanzas de Amelie Mauresmo de obtener su primer título de Grand Slam se mantuvieron intactas el miércoles, pero tuvo que remontar para vencer a Julia Vakulenko de Ucrania 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 en la segunda ronda del Abierto de EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1) After a shaky beginning, Amelie Mauresmo managed to keep her dreams of a maiden grand slam title alive. On Wednesday, she had to pull out all the stops to overcome Ukraine's Julia Vakulenko with a 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 victory in the second round of the U.S. Open in New York.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Despite an unstable beginning, Amelie Mauresmo's aspirations for her first ever grand slam title persisted. Wednesday saw her coming from behind to defeat Julia Vakulenko of Ukraine with scores of 3-6, 6-2, 6-2, propelling her to the second round of the U.S. Open in New York.

Original Text: Image Gallery of Faces of the week Britains Prince Charles has always prided himself on being a man of the people. But with one gruff memo about not all men being equal, the heir to the throne has tarnished his populist credentials.
Translation: Galería de imágenes de las caras de la semana: El príncipe Carlos de Gran Bretaña siempre se ha enorgullecido de ser un hombre del pueblo. Pero con un brusco memorando sobre que no todos los hombres son iguales, el heredero al trono ha empañado sus credenciales populistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Britain's Prince Charles, who has consistently taken pride in being seen as a 'man of the people', has seemingly discredited his image of populism. He had to endure some backlash following a curt memo asserting that not every man is equal, which is quite a contrast to his status as the future king.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite Prince Charles of Britain always boasting about his connection with the general populace, a single terse memorandum stating the inequality among men has blemished his image as a populist. The crown heir now seems to lack the authenticity he once claimed to have.

Original Text: NASA Still Lacks Shuttle Repair Kits (AP) AP - Nearly two years after Columbia shattered in the sky, NASA still has no way of repairing the kind of holes that could doom another shuttle, space agency officials acknowledged Monday in their latest status report on the return-to-flight effort.
