Translation: La NASA aún carece de kits de reparación para el transbordador (AP) AP - Casi dos años después de que el Columbia se desintegrara en el cielo, la NASA todavía no tiene forma de reparar el tipo de agujeros que podrían condenar a otro transbordador, reconocieron los funcionarios de la agencia espacial el lunes en su último informe de estado sobre el esfuerzo de retorno al vuelo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP Report: NASA Yet to Develop Repair Kits for Shuttle, Almost Two Years Post Columbia Disaster - In the most recent status update regarding the effort to return to flight, officials of the space agency confirmed on Monday that NASA is still unable to repair the sort of damage that may lead to another shuttle catastrophe.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Despite Two Years Since the Columbia Incident, NASA Remains Without Shuttle Repair Kits (AP) - The type of damages that could endanger another shuttle still lack a repair solution, as admitted by NASA officials on Monday in their recent status report regarding their progress in the return-to-flight initiative.

Original Text: LNG plant proposed TransCanada Corp. and Petro-Canada will spend \$660-million to build a liquefied natural gas plant on an island in Quebec, the two Calgary-based companies said Thursday.
Translation: La planta propuesta de GNL por TransCanada Corp. y Petro-Canada invertirán 660 millones de dólares para construir una planta de gas natural licuado en una isla en Quebec, dijeron las dos compañías con sede en Calgary el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, TransCanada Corp and Petro-Canada announced their plan to invest $660-million on the construction of a liquefied natural gas plant in Quebec on an island. These companies are both based in Calgary.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It was announced on Thursday by the Calgary-based companies, TransCanada Corp. and Petro-Canada, that they are set to invest $660 million in the establishment of a liquefied natural gas facility located on a Quebec island.

Original Text: Hollywood Embraces HD DVD HD DVD is gaining momentum with Hollywood studios. Several studios have announced their intentions to go with the Toshiba format, among them New Line Cinema, Paramount
Translation: Hollywood adopta el DVD HD. El DVD HD está ganando impulso con los estudios de Hollywood. Varios estudios han anunciado sus intenciones de adoptar el formato de Toshiba, entre ellos New Line Cinema, Paramount.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Numerous Hollywood studios, including New Line Cinema and Paramount, are gaining interest in HD DVD, predominantly the Toshiba format, thus showing signs of increased momentum for HD DVDs in Hollywood.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Toshiba format of HD DVD is growing in popularity among Hollywood studios such as New Line Cinema and Paramount, indicating that HD DVD is being increasingly favored in Hollywood.

Original Text: Japan unsatisfied with N.Korean probe Japan #39;s prime minister on Monday said he was not satisfied with the outcome of North Korea #39;s investigation into the fate of several Japanese nationals abducted decades ago by the communist country #39;s spies.
Translation: Japón insatisfecho con la investigación de Corea del Norte. El primer ministro de Japón dijo el lunes que no estaba satisfecho con el resultado de la investigación de Corea del Norte sobre el destino de varios ciudadanos japoneses secuestrados hace décadas por los espías del país comunista.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Japan's Prime Minister expressed his dissatisfaction with the results of North Korea's probe into the abductions of multiple Japanese citizens by spies from the communist country several decades ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The investigation by North Korea into the decades-old abduction of several Japanese nationals by its communist spies did not satisfy the Japanese Prime Minister, as he stated on Monday.

Original Text: Special attention is paid to teams All signs point to plenty of emphasis on special teams this week in Patriotland after a shoddy performance against the Bills last Sunday in Orchard Park, N.Y. Safety Shawn Mayer , who missed a tackle on Buffalo's Terrence McGee on a 98-yard kickoff return, was released Tuesday. The Patriots brought back Je'Rod Cherry yesterday in the hopes of ...
Translation: Se presta especial atención a los equipos. Todos los indicadores apuntan a un gran énfasis en equipos especiales esta semana en Patriotland después de un desempeño deficiente contra los Bills el domingo pasado en Orchard Park, N.Y. El safety Shawn Mayer, quien falló en un tackle contra Terrence McGee de Buffalo en un retorno de kickoff de 98 yardas, fue despedido el martes. Los Patriots trajeron de vuelta a Je'Rod Cherry ayer con la esperanza de...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In light of a lackluster performance against the Bills last Sunday in Orchard Park, NY, the Patriots plan to concentrate more on their special teams, especially after safety Shawn Mayer, who missed a tackle allowing Buffalo's Terrence McGee a 98-yard kickoff return, was let go on Tuesday. The team rehired Je'Rod Cherry yesterday hoping to improve their performance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following a subpar showing in the match against the Bills last Sunday in Orchard Park, NY, it's clear that extra focus will be placed on the special teams within Patriotland. KEY player, Shawn Mayer, who missed a crucial tackle on a 98-yard kickoff return by Buffalo's Terrence McGee, was dismissed on Tuesday. With a goal to enhance performance, Je'Rod Cherry has been recruited again by the Patriots.

Original Text: China #39;s communist party leaders kick off key meet as power <b>...</b> BEIJING: China #39;s ruling party leadership began a much-anticipated meeting in Beijing amid an apparent power struggle at the heart of the organization.
Translation: Los líderes del partido comunista de China #39 dan inicio a una reunión clave en medio de lucha de poder <b>...</b> PEKÍN: La dirección del partido gobernante de China #39 comenzó una reunión muy esperada en Pekín en medio de una aparente lucha de poder en el corazón de la organización.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amid clear signs of power conflicts within the organization, the leaders of China's communist party commenced a significant meeting in Beijing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With an evident power discord in the core of the organization, the Beijing meeting, led by the key figures of China's Communist Party, has started.

Original Text: Charges dropped against MHS students in rape case Prosecutors dismissed all charges Wednesday, Nov. 3, against two Montclair High School students who were accused of raping a 15-year-old schoolmate last month, ending a case that brought
Translation: Se retiraron los cargos contra los estudiantes de MHS en el caso de violación. Los fiscales desestimaron todos los cargos el miércoles 3 de noviembre contra dos estudiantes de Montclair High School que fueron acusados de violar a un compañero de escuela de 15 años el mes pasado, poniendo fin a un caso que generó
Paraphrase 1: 1. Case closed as all charges were dismissed by prosecutors on Wednesday, Nov. 3, against two Montclair High School students; they were previously accused of raping a 15-year-old schoolmate last month.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Prosecutors cleared two Montclair High School students of all charges in a rape case involving a 15-year-old fellow student last month; the dismissal took place on Wednesday, Nov. 3.

Original Text: A Look at Bush-Kerry Debates (AP) AP - Some things to look for in the upcoming presidential debates between President Bush and Sen. John Kerry:
Translation: Un vistazo a los debates entre Bush y Kerry (AP) AP - Algunas cosas a tener en cuenta en los próximos debates presidenciales entre el Presidente Bush y el Senador John Kerry:
Paraphrase 1: 1) Some Aspects to Watch Out for in the Forthcoming Presidential Debates between President Bush and Sen. John Kerry (AP), AP:
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - Key Things to Watch for in the Impending Bush-Kerry Presidential Debates:

Original Text: No Fears: Laptop D.J.'s Have a Feast Plenty of music available online is not just free but also easily available, legal and  most important  worth hearing.
Translation: Sin Miedos: Los D.J. de Portátiles Tienen un Festín. Mucha de la música disponible en línea no sólo es gratuita sino también fácilmente accesible, legal y, lo más importante, vale la pena escucharla.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Numerous music selections online aren't just accessible at no cost, they're also easily obtainable, legal, and of most importance, worth listening to - a real feast for laptop DJs without any fears.

Original Text: Seoul Sees Efforts Gathering Pace for N.Korea Talks (Reuters) Reuters - This week's talks between Japan and North\Korea show that efforts to hold another round of six-party\negotiations on the North's nuclear program are gathering pace,\South Korea's foreign minister said on Wednesday.
Translation: Seúl Ve Avances en los Esfuerzos para las Conversaciones con Corea del Norte (Reuters) Reuters - Las conversaciones de esta semana entre Japón y Corea del Norte muestran que los esfuerzos para celebrar otra ronda de negociaciones de seis partes sobre el programa nuclear del Norte están ganando ritmo, dijo el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Corea del Sur el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) The foreign minister of South Korea stated on Wednesday that this week's dialogue between Japan and North Korea indicates the rapid progression of efforts to convene another round of six-party negotiations concerning North Korea's nuclear program.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) South Korea's foreign minister reported on Wednesday that the accelerating efforts to assemble another round of six-party discussions on North Korea's nuclear agenda are being displayed through this week's negotiations between Japan and North Korea.

Original Text: Defining moment for NFL High-definition television and the National Football League are going to be entwined this season. All ABC and ESPN games are scheduled to be broadcast in HD. Fox plans to do as many as six games each week in HD, and CBS will do three. And each Wednesday and Thursday at 9 p.m., the NFL Network will have a 60-minute condensed ...
Translation: Momento definitorio para la NFL. La televisión de alta definición y la Liga Nacional de Fútbol Americano van a estar entrelazadas esta temporada. Todos los juegos de ABC y ESPN están programados para ser emitidos en HD. Fox planea hacer hasta seis juegos cada semana en HD, y CBS hará tres. Y cada miércoles y jueves a las 9 p.m., la NFL Network tendrá un compacto de 60 minutos...
Paraphrase 1: 1. This season, high-definition television and the National Football League will be stitched together closely. ABC and ESPN games are on the slate to be broadcast in HD with Fox intending to air up to six games in HD every week, and CBS planning three. Additionally, the NFL Network will present a condensed 60-minute program every Wednesday and Thursday at 9 p.m.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The forthcoming season of the National Football League is set to be linked with high-definition television. A schedule has been put in place, with all games on ABC and ESPN to be televised in HD. Fox has scheduled as many as six weekly games in HD, with CBS lining up three. In addition, the NFL Network will broadcast a condensed, hour-long program every Wednesday and Thursday at 9 p.m.

Original Text: S. Korea Weighs Support for the North Roh's move to do away with the security law has become the latest symbol of an ideological battle now raging in South Korea over whether detente with the North is happening too fast, too soon.
Translation: S. Corea debate el apoyo para el Norte. La decisión de Roh de eliminar la ley de seguridad se ha convertido en el último símbolo de una batalla ideológica que ahora se está librando en Corea del Sur sobre si la distensión con el Norte está ocurriendo demasiado rápido, demasiado pronto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The current ideological conflict in South Korea concerning the hastily progressing détente with the North is epitomized by Roh's decision to abolish the security law, questioning whether they're providing too much support to the North too soon.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Roh's initiative to remove the security law serves as a recent indicator of the ongoing ideological confrontation in South Korea, rooted in debates as to whether the acceleration of détente with North Korea is too rapid and premature.

Original Text: Iraq elections still on target despite security concerns BAGHDAD (AFP) - Iraq #39;s landmark January polls looked set to take place as planned, although ongoing violence did nothing to alleviate the security concerns of the proponents of a delay.
Translation: Las elecciones en Irak siguen en pie a pesar de las preocupaciones de seguridad BAGDAD (AFP) - Las históricas elecciones de enero en Irak parecen dispuestas a llevarse a cabo como estaba previsto, aunque la violencia en curso no hizo nada para aliviar las preocupaciones de seguridad de los partidarios de un aplazamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BAGHDAD (AFP) - Despite security concerns due to persistent violence, Iraq's pivotal January polls appear likely to proceed as scheduled, causing worry for those who advocate for a postponement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BAGHDAD (AFP) - Iraq's momentous January elections are on track to proceed despite the unceasing violence that fails to calm the apprehensions of those suggesting a delay.

Original Text: Simon Tisdall Since throwing his weight behind the Bush administration after September 11 2001, Pakistan #39;s president, Pervez Musharraf, has successfully portrayed himself as an indispensable ally in the US-led  quot;war on terror quot;.
Translation: Desde que Simon Tisdall arrojó su peso detrás de la administración de Bush después del 11 de septiembre de 2001, el presidente de Pakistán, Pervez Musharraf, ha logrado retratarse a sí mismo como un aliado indispensable en la "guerra contra el terror" liderada por Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After backing the Bush administration post the September 11 2001 incidents, Pakistan's president Pervez Musharraf has skillfully projected himself as a crucial ally in the "war on terror" led by the US, as per Simon Tisdall.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Simon Tisdall points out that Pervez Musharraf, the President of Pakistan, has proven himself a key ally in the American-led "war on terror", having pledged his support to the Bush administration following the events of September 11, 2001.

Original Text: AirAsia to make solid debut on Malaysian bourse next week <b>...</b> Kuala Lumpur: Malaysia #39;s budget carrier AirAsia is expected to make a solid debut on the stock exchange Monday, with gains to be made from its retail initial public offer (IPO) price of 1.16 ringgit (0.31 dollars) a share, fund managers and analysts said
Translation: AirAsia hará un sólido debut en la bolsa malasia la próxima semana <b>...</b> Kuala Lumpur: Se espera que AirAsia, la aerolínea de bajo costo de Malasia, haga un sólido debut en la bolsa el lunes, con ganancias a obtener de su oferta pública inicial (IPO) minorista a un precio de 1.16 ringgit (0.31 dólares) por acción, según dijeron gestores de fondos y analistas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Malaysia's budget airline, AirAsia, is predicted to have a strong start on the Malaysian stock exchange next week. According to fund managers and analysts, the gains from its initial public offer (IPO) at 1.16 ringgit (0.31 dollars) per share indicate a promising debut.
Paraphrase 2: 2. AirAsia, Malaysia's economical carrier, is set to perform well in its debut on the Malaysian stock market next week. With an initial public offer (IPO) price of 1.16 ringgit (0.31 dollars) per share, fund managers and analysts are expecting significant returns.

Original Text: German Officials' Growth Outlook Better (AP) AP - German finance professionals grew less pessimistic about the country's economic growth outlook, but remain concerned that the euro's record highs against the U.S. dollar will weigh on exports, a monthly survey showed Tuesday.
Translation: Perspectiva de Crecimiento Mejor para los Funcionarios Alemanes (AP) AP - Los profesionales de finanzas alemanes se volvieron menos pesimistas acerca de las perspectivas de crecimiento económico del país, pero siguen preocupados de que los máximos históricos del euro frente al dólar estadounidense afecten las exportaciones, mostró una encuesta mensual el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - A recent monthly survey conducted on Tuesday revealed that while the pessimism of German finance officials about the nation's economic growth forecast has decreased, there are still concerns about the impact of the euro reaching record highs against the U.S. dollar and its potential to negatively affect exports.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) AP - According to a monthly survey released on Tuesday, German financial experts are becoming less downbeat regarding the future economic progression of Germany though they are still wary about the record peak of the euro against the U.S. dollar which may hinder exports.

Original Text: Consortium Forms to Set Network Centric Communications Standards The Network Centric Operations Industry Consortium (NCOIC) formally introduced itself this week at a Tuesday (Sept. 28) press conference in Washington, DC The new group, consisting initially of 28 companies
Translation: Se Forma Consorcio para Establecer Estándares de Comunicaciones Centradas en la Red. El Consorcio de la Industria de Operaciones Centradas en la Red (NCOIC, por sus siglas en inglés) se presentó formalmente esta semana en una conferencia de prensa el martes (28 de septiembre) en Washington, DC. El nuevo grupo, compuesto inicialmente por 28 empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Network Centric Operations Industry Consortium (NCOIC), initially comprised of 28 companies, was officially launched at a press conference in Washington, DC on Tuesday (Sept. 28). The consortium's mission is to establish standards for network centric communications.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At a press conference in Washington, DC, on Tuesday (Sept. 28), a group of 28 initial companies announced the formal creation of the Network Centric Operations Industry Consortium (NCOIC). Their goal is to craft standards for network centric communications.

Original Text: SCO Web site hack mocks company's legal claims Malicious hackers have compromised The SCO Group's Web page twice in as many days, posting messages that appear to mock the company's claims to own parts of the Linux operating system.
Translation: El hackeo al sitio web de SCO se burla de las afirmaciones legales de la compañía. Los hackers maliciosos han comprometido la página web de The SCO Group dos veces en tantos días, publicando mensajes que parecen burlarse de las afirmaciones de la compañía de poseer partes del sistema operativo Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The SCO Group's web page has been hacked by malevolent cyber intruders twice in consecutive days, who published messages seemingly ridiculing the company's assertions of owning components of the Linux operating system.

Original Text: UPDATE 1-Late twist makes Bayern winter champions Bayern Munich did just enough to claim the honorary title of Bundesliga winter champions on Saturday, snatching a 2-2 draw at home to VfB Stuttgart just as Schalke
Translation: ACTUALIZACIÓN 1-Un giro tardío hace a Bayern campeones de invierno. El Bayern de Múnich hizo justo lo suficiente para reclamar el título honorífico de campeones de invierno de la Bundesliga el sábado, logrando un empate 2-2 en casa contra el VfB Stuttgart justo cuando Schalke
Paraphrase 1: 1. Managing to secure a 2-2 draw at home against VfB Stuttgart on Saturday, Bayern Munich accomplished just enough to earn the Bundesliga winter champions' honorary title, a twist worth mentioning just as Schalke was coming close.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a surprising twist, Bayern Munich snatched a 2-2 draw against VfB Stuttgart at their home ground on Saturday, enough to garner them the Bundesliga winter champions title just in the nick of time as Schalke was on the rise.

Original Text: Russian Cabinet Approves Kyoto Protocol MOSCOW - Russia's Cabinet approved the Kyoto Protocol on global warming Thursday, clearing the way for the worldwide adoption of the document once the Russian parliament ratifies it as widely expected.    The protocol must be ratified by no fewer than 55 countries that accounted for at least 55 percent of global emissions in 1990, and Russia's participation would tip the scale...
Translation: El Gabinete Ruso Acepta el Protocolo de Kioto MOSCÚ - El Gabinete ruso aprobó el jueves el Protocolo de Kioto sobre el calentamiento global, allanando el camino para la adopción mundial del documento una vez que el parlamento ruso lo ratifique, como se espera ampliamente. El protocolo debe ser ratificado por no menos de 55 países que representaron al menos el 55 por ciento de las emisiones globales en 1990, y la participación de Rusia inclinaría la balanza...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Kyoto Protocol on global warming received approval from the Russian Cabinet on Thursday, a move that will potentially lead to global acceptance of the document after expected ratification by the Russian parliament. To be ratified, no less than 55 countries that contributed to at least 55 percent of the 1990 global emissions must participate; Russia's involvement is seen as the decisive factor lifting the balance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Russia's Cabinet, in a significant move, sanctioned the Kyoto Protocol related to global warming this Thursday. This paves the way for its global acceptance, pending its anticipated ratification by the Russian parliament. The protocol's ratification necessitates approval from a minimum of 55 nations, those who were responsible for at least 55% of global emissions in 1990. The inclusion of Russia is what's expected to tip the scale in favor.

Original Text: Netegrity updates provisioning tools CA's latest acquisition target rolls out a new version of its identity and access management software.
Translation: Netegrity actualiza herramientas de aprovisionamiento. El último objetivo de adquisición de CA lanza una nueva versión de su software de gestión de identidad y acceso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The latest acquisition target of CA, Netegrity, launches a new version of its identity and access management software.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Netegrity, CA's most recent acquisition target, releases an updated version of their identity and access management software.

Original Text: Chandra Eyes The Mouse That Soared Chandra X-Ray Observatory -- Astronomers have used an X-ray image to make the first detailed study of the behavior of high-energy particles around a fast moving pulsar.     The image, from NASA's Chandra X-ray Observatory, shows the shock wave created as a pulsar plows supersonically through interstellar space...
Translation: Chandra Observa el Ratón Que Surcó el Cielo Observatorio de Rayos X Chandra -- Los astrónomos han utilizado una imagen de rayos X para realizar el primer estudio detallado del comportamiento de las partículas de alta energía alrededor de un púlsar de movimiento rápido. La imagen, proveniente del Observatorio de Rayos X Chandra de la NASA, muestra la onda de choque creada mientras un púlsar atraviesa supersónicamente el espacio interestelar...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Using an X-ray image from NASA's Chandra X-ray Observatory, astronomers have conducted the inaugural in-depth study examining the mannerisms of high-energy particles in the vicinity of a high-speed pulsar. This image depicts the shock wave that arises as the pulsar travels at supersonic speeds across interstellar space.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Astronomers have managed to inspect the activities of high energy particles surrounding a rapidly moving pulsar in great detail, utilizing an X-ray image provided by NASA's Chandra X-ray Observatory. The image illustrates the shock wave produced when a pulsar moves supersonically through interstellar space.

Original Text: Enter the ultimate ego trip BACK in 1959, the seven men chosen to be the first Americans in space were trained on what Nasa called airborne microgravity missions.
Translation: Ingrese al viaje egoísta definitivo. EN 1959, los siete hombres seleccionados para ser los primeros estadounidenses en el espacio fueron entrenados en lo que Nasa llamaba misiones de microgravedad aérea.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In 1959, NASA selected seven men to be the first Americans in space and trained them on what they referred to as airborne microgravity missions - an ultimate expression of ego trip.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The seven initial Americans chosen for space travel by NASA in 1959 underwent training for what was known as airborne microgravity missions, a quintessential ego trip.

Original Text: Iraq rebels set to surrender arms Shia militias in Baghdad should start handing in weapons on Monday, under a deal with the Iraqi government.
Translation: Los rebeldes de Irak están dispuestos a rendir las armas. Las milicias chiitas en Bagdad deberían comenzar a entregar las armas el lunes, bajo un acuerdo con el gobierno iraquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As per an agreement with the Iraqi government, Shia militias in Baghdad are expected to commence the submission of their weapons on Monday, signifying the end of Iraq rebels.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Under an agreement with the Iraqi government, Baghdad's Shia militias are due to begin giving up their weapons on Monday, signaling the impending surrender of Iraq rebels.

Original Text: DaimlerChrysler Sued Over Car Seat Injury (Reuters) Reuters - DaimlerChrysler AG  (DCXGn.DE)\has been hit with a multimillion-dollar lawsuit filed by a\paraplegic who says the automaker's heated car seats caused him\a severe burn injury.
Translation: DaimlerChrysler Demandada por Lesión en Asiento de Auto (Reuters) Reuters - DaimlerChrysler AG (DCXGn.DE) ha sido golpeada con una demanda de varios millones de dólares presentada por un parapléjico que afirma que los asientos calefactados del fabricante de automóviles le causaron una grave quemadura.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) A severe burn injury, allegedly caused by DaimlerChrysler AG's (DCXGn.DE) heated car seats, has led a paraplegic to file a multimillion-dollar lawsuit against the automaker.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) A paraplegic attributing a severe burn injury to the heated car seats of DaimlerChrysler AG (DCXGn.DE), has lodged a multimillion-dollar lawsuit against the automaker.

Original Text: Thunderbird 1.0 takes on Outlook Express, Eudora Weeks after the launch of its Firefox 1.0 Web browser, the Mozilla Foundation on Tuesday is set to release version 1.0 of its Thunderbird e-mail client.
Translation: Thunderbird 1.0 se enfrenta a Outlook Express, Eudora. Semanas después del lanzamiento de su navegador web Firefox 1.0, la Fundación Mozilla está lista para lanzar el martes la versión 1.0 de su cliente de correo electrónico Thunderbird.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Mozilla Foundation, shortly after launching its Firefox 1.0 Web browser, is planning to introduce the 1.0 version of its Thunderbird e-mail client on Tuesday, aiming to compete with Outlook Express and Eudora.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday is marked for the launch of Thunderbird 1.0 by the Mozilla Foundation. This comes just weeks after Firefox 1.0 was released, and its goal is to rival Outlook Express and Eudora.

Original Text: Yahoo Mobile Brings Search to Cell Phones Yahoo Mobile can obtain localized search results, make calls from the results page, and obtain images. Shortcuts offer quick access to information, such as weather, stock quotes, sport scores and flight information.
Translation: Yahoo Mobile Trae la Búsqueda a los Teléfonos Móviles. Yahoo Mobile puede obtener resultados de búsqueda localizados, realizar llamadas desde la página de resultados y obtener imágenes. Los atajos ofrecen acceso rápido a la información, como el clima, cotizaciones de acciones, resultados deportivos e información de vuelos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yahoo Mobile offers search capabilities on mobile phones enabling users to get localized search results, place calls directly from the results page, and access images. It also provides shortcuts for rapid access to information like weather updates, stock market quotes, sports scores, and flight details.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Utilizing Yahoo Mobile, you can perform searches on your cell phone, generate localized search outputs, make calls straight from the results page, and access pictures. Also, thanks to shortcuts, you can quickly pull up data such as weather forecasts, stock numbers, scores for sports games, and flight information.

Original Text: Report: Tobacco Industry Hid Smoking Dangers NEW YORK (Reuters Health) - The tobacco industry for many years claimed that it was unaware of biological evidence that smoking is harmful to health, but that was untrue according to a medical journal report.
Translation: Informe: La Industria del Tabaco Ocultó los Peligros del Tabaco NUEVA YORK (Reuters Health) - Durante muchos años, la industria del tabaco afirmó que desconocía las pruebas biológicas de que fumar es perjudicial para la salud, pero eso era falso según un informe de una revista médica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a medical journal report, the tobacco industry falsely asserted for many years that they were ignorant of the biological proof which indicated that smoking is detrimental to health. This was a tactic to hide the real dangers of smoking.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A medical journal report reveals that for a long duration, the tobacco industry misrepresented the truth by stating they had no knowledge of any biological data showing the injurious effects of smoking on health.

Original Text: Debian Rejects SenderID RWerp writes  quot;LWN.net reports that Debian, a Linux distribution known for its commitment to Free Software ideas, rejected Microsoft-patented SenderID technology, intended to combat spam.
Translation: "Debian rechaza SenderID RWerp escribe "LWN.net informa que Debian, una distribución de Linux conocida por su compromiso con las ideas de Software Libre, ha rechazado la tecnología SenderID patentada por Microsoft, destinada a combatir el spam."
Paraphrase 1: 1. RWerp has written that LWN.net announced Debian, a Linux distribution recognized for its devotion to the concepts of Free Software, has turned down the use of Microsoft's SenderID technology, which is designed to fight spam.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to a narrative by RWerp on LWN.net, Debian, a Linux distribution dedicated to the principles of Free Software, has declined the use of SenderID technology, a Microsoft patented tool meant for spam reduction.

Original Text: Novell responds to Microsoft email Novell, responding to Steve Ballmer #39;s latest attack on Linux, is accusing Microsoft of selectively using biased reports to back up its claims.
Translation: Novell responde al correo electrónico de Microsoft. Novell, en respuesta al último ataque de Steve Ballmer contra Linux, acusa a Microsoft de utilizar selectivamente informes sesgados para respaldar sus afirmaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In response to Steve Ballmer's most recent assault on Linux, Novell is criticizing Microsoft for its alleged selective use of biased reports to support its claims.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Novell has accused Microsoft of cherry-picking prejudiced reports to justify their claims, as a rebuttal to Steve Ballmer's latest offensive on Linux.

Original Text: Swift Probe Successfully Launched Image: NASA #39;s Swift spacecraft lifts off from Complex 17A, Cape Canaveral Air Force Station in sunny Florida, on Nov. 20 at 12:16:00.611 pm EST aboard a Boeing Delta II expendable launch vehicle.
Translation: Lanzamiento exitoso de la sonda Swift Imagen: La nave espacial Swift de la NASA despega desde el Complejo 17A, estación de la Fuerza Aérea de Cabo Cañaveral en la soleada Florida, el 20 de noviembre a las 12:16:00.611 pm EST a bordo de un vehículo de lanzamiento desechable Boeing Delta II.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The launch of NASA's Swift spacecraft, from Complex 17A at Cape Canaveral Air Force Station in Florida, was successful. It lifted off on November 20, at precisely 12:16:00.611 pm EST, employing a Boeing Delta II expendable launch vehicle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A Boeing Delta II expendable launch vehicle successfully launched NASA's Swift Probe from the sunny Cape Canaveral Air Force Station in Florida (Complex 17A) on November 20 at exactly 12:16:00.611 pm EST.

Original Text: U.S. Expresses Concern About UAL Pensions  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The Bush administration expressed  fresh concern on Wednesday about the possibility bankrupt  United Airlines <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UALAQ.OB target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UALAQ.OB</A> might scrap its employee pension  plans, which would shift the burden of paying benefits to the  government.
Translation: EE.UU. Expresa Preocupación Acerca de las Pensiones de UAL  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - La administración Bush expresó una nueva preocupación el miércoles acerca de la posibilidad de que United Airlines, en bancarrota, <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UALAQ.OB target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UALAQ.OB</A> pueda desechar sus planes de pensiones para empleados, lo que trasladaría la obligación de pagar los beneficios al gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The Bush administration on Wednesday voiced renewed worry over the potential that the bankrupt United Airlines might abandon its staff pension schemes, a move that would transfer the responsibility of benefit payments to the government.
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - On Wednesday, fresh apprehensions were expressed by the Bush administration regarding the chance that United Airlines, currently in bankruptcy, may discard its workers' pension plans, passing the obligation of benefit payouts onto the government.

Original Text: Myanmar PM sacked, arrested for corruption--Thai govt Get INQ7 breaking news on your Smart mobile phone in the Philippines. Send INQ7 BREAKING to 386. BANGKOK, Thailand -- Myanmar #39;s Prime Minister General Khin Nyunt -- among the most reformist of the military
Translation: El primer ministro de Myanmar es destituido y arrestado por corrupción, informa el gobierno tailandés. Recibe las noticias de última hora de INQ7 en tu teléfono móvil Smart en Filipinas. Envía INQ7 BREAKING al 386. BANGKOK, Tailandia -- El primer ministro de Myanmar General Khin Nyunt, uno de los más reformistas de la junta militar
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Prime Minister of Myanmar, General Khin Nyunt, hailed as one of the most reformist in the military, has been dismissed from his position and taken into custody for corruption, according to the Thai government. Stay updated on breaking news from INQ7 on your Smart mobile phone in the Philippines. To subscribe, text INQ7 BREAKING to 386.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Thai government has announced that Myanmar's Prime Minister General Khin Nyunt, widely considered one of the most reform-minded in the military, has been removed from his position and arrested on charges of corruption. Keep yourself updated with top news stories from INQ7 on your Smart mobile phone while you're in the Philippines. Send the message INQ7 BREAKING to the number 386 to subscribe.

Original Text: Russia #39;s space agency approves international space station #39;s next <b>...</b> MOSCOW -- An American and a Russian, both space veterans, have been selected as the next replacement crew for the international space station, a Russian agency spokesman said Tuesday.
Translation: La agencia espacial de Rusia aprueba la próxima <b>...</b> estación espacial internacional #39; MOSCÚ -- Un estadounidense y un ruso, ambos veteranos del espacio, han sido seleccionados como la próxima tripulación de reemplazo para la estación espacial internacional, dijo el martes un portavoz de la agencia rusa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Russian space agency has given the green light for the international space station's subsequent .... The agency's spokesperson confirmed on Tuesday that an American and a Russian, both experienced in space, will be the upcoming replacement crew for the space station.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The international space station's incoming ... has been endorsed by Russia's space agency. On Tuesday, a representative of the Russian agency announced that the next substitute crew for the station will consist of an American and a Russian, both of whom have prior space experience.

Original Text: Hi honey, I #39;m virtually home alone Australian mobile telephone users may be able to buy and woo virtual dates this year after the release of a Virtual Girlfriend game for 3G mobile telephones.
Translation: Hola cariño, estoy prácticamente solo en casa. Los usuarios australianos de teléfonos móviles podrían tener la posibilidad de comprar y cortejar citas virtuales este año tras el lanzamiento de un juego de Novia Virtual para teléfonos móviles 3G.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hello dear, as an Australian mobile user, I might get to purchase and court virtual mates this year since a Virtual Girlfriend game for 3G mobile phones is about to be launched. Incidentally, I am virtually alone at home.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Greetings sweetheart, it appears that 3G mobile phone users in Australia may have the opportunity to purchase and interact with virtual companions this year following the launch of a new Virtual Girlfriend game. By the way, I'm metaphorically the only one at home.

Original Text: NASD Calls for Soft Dollar Deal Limits  BOSTON (Reuters) - The NASD on Wednesday submitted  recommendations to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission  to limit the use of soft dollar deals and increase disclosure  about such practices.
Translation: La NASD pide límites para los acuerdos de 'Soft Dollar' BOSTON (Reuters) - La NASD presentó el miércoles recomendaciones a la Comisión de Valores y Bolsa de los Estados Unidos para limitar el uso de acuerdos de 'soft dollar' y aumentar la divulgación sobre tales prácticas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BOSTON (Reuters) - The NASD presented suggested regulations to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday to impose restrictions on the use of soft dollar deals and enhance transparency regarding these procedures.
Paraphrase 2: 2. BOSTON (Reuters) - On Wednesday, the NASD handed in proposals to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission calling for a reduction in the utilization of soft dollar deals and advocating for a raise in disclosure concerning such activities.

Original Text: 13 killed in Siberian mine explosion At least 13 people were killed and up to 23 injured in an explosion in a Siberian mine. The blast, which was caused by methane, happened as a repair team was fixing a section of the mine near Russia #39;s border with Mongolia.
Translation: 13 muertos en explosión de mina en Siberia Al menos 13 personas murieron y hasta 23 resultaron heridas en una explosión en una mina de Siberia. La explosión, que fue causada por metano, ocurrió mientras un equipo de reparación estaba arreglando una sección de la mina cerca de la frontera de Rusia con Mongolia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An explosion in a Siberian mine, located near Russia's border with Mongolia, resulted in at least 13 fatalities and injured up to 23 people. The explosion occurred due to methane while a repair team was working on a section of the mine.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Methane triggered an explosion in a mine situated in Siberia, close to Mongolia's border with Russia, leading to the death of a minimum of 13 individuals and injuring as many as 23. The calamity struck when a repair crew was fixing a portion of the mine.

Original Text: Sudan Rejects Africa Troop Offer at Darfur Talks  ABUJA (Reuters) - Sudan rejected an offer of African troops  to disarm rebels in Darfur as peace talks began in Nigeria,  insisting it was capable of neutralizing both pro-government  and rebel militia fighting in the western region.
Translation: Sudán rechaza la oferta de tropas africanas en las conversaciones de Darfur ABUJA (Reuters) - Sudán rechazó una oferta de tropas africanas para desarmar a los rebeldes en Darfur mientras comenzaban las conversaciones de paz en Nigeria, insistiendo en que era capaz de neutralizar tanto a las milicias progubernamentales como a las rebeldes que luchan en la región occidental.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ABUJA (Reuters) - As peace discussions initiated in Nigeria, Sudan declined the proposal of deploying African troops in Darfur to dismantle the rebels, asserting their capability to handle both government-supporting and insurgent militias in the western region.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ABUJA (Reuters) - Sudan, amid the onset of peace negotiations in Nigeria, turned down the proposal of African military assistance to disarm Darfur rebels, maintaining their ability to quell both militias affiliated with the government and rebels in the west.

Original Text: Bank of America Exec to Get Severance Pay Bank of America Corp. said a departing executive is eligible to collect about \$20.7 million in severance and other payments from the company.
Translation: El ejecutivo del Bank of America recibirá una indemnización. Bank of America Corp. indicó que un ejecutivo que se va es elegible para cobrar alrededor de $20.7 millones en concepto de indemnización y otros pagos de la empresa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It has been reported by Bank of America Corp. that a leaving executive has the eligibility to receive around $20.7 million as severance and other ensuing payments from the firm.

Original Text: News: Bush Web Site Bars Overseas Visitors The Bush-Cheney reelection campaign has barred people outside the United States from viewing its Web site following an electronic attack that took down the campaign's Internet address for six hours last week, according to computer security experts.\
Translation: Noticias: El Sitio Web de Bush Prohíbe a los Visitantes Extranjeros. La campaña de reelección de Bush-Cheney ha prohibido a las personas fuera de Estados Unidos ver su sitio web tras un ataque electrónico que inhabilitó la dirección de Internet de la campaña durante seis horas la semana pasada, según expertos en seguridad informática.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Computer security experts have revealed that, following a cyber-attack which disabled the campaign's Internet address for six hours last week, the Bush-Cheney reelection campaign has now restricted access to its website only to people within the United States.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After enduring a six-hour electronic attack on their Internet address last week, the Bush-Cheney reelection campaign has taken measures to prevent anyone outside the US from accessing their website, advise computer security professionals.

Original Text: QB Shuffle For Cards And Bears Two games after abruptly benching Josh McCown in favor of Shaun King, Green announced yesterday that John Navarre, a rookie from the University of Michigan, will start Sunday #39;s game at Detroit.
Translation: Cambio de QB para los Cards y Bears. Dos partidos después de haber dejado abruptamente en el banquillo a Josh McCown en favor de Shaun King, Green anunció ayer que John Navarre, un novato de la Universidad de Michigan, será el titular el domingo en el partido contra Detroit.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two games subsequent to unexpectedly replacing Josh McCown with Shaun King, Green declared yesterday that rookie John Navarre from the University of Michigan will spearhead Sunday's game in Detroit, in a quarterback shuffle for the Cardinals and Bears.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Green announced yesterday that John Navarre, a novice from the University of Michigan, will be the start player in Sunday's game at Detroit, just two games after the abrupt switch from Josh McCown to Shaun King, shaking up the quarterback scenario for the Cardinals and Bears.

Original Text: Tyson arrested for beating car POLICE have arrested former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson for allegedly jumping on the bonnet of a car outside a nightclub. The car #39;s driver Asaf Alikadic, 22, told police he had left the club and stopped
Translation: Tyson arrestado por golpear un auto. LA POLICÍA ha arrestado al ex campeón de peso pesado Mike Tyson por supuestamente saltar sobre el capó de un auto fuera de una discoteca. El conductor del auto #39, Asaf Alikadic, de 22 años, le dijo a la policía que había salido del club y se había detenido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Former heavyweight champion, Mike Tyson, was apprehended by the police for reportedly jumping on a car's bonnet outside a nightclub. The vehicle's driver, a 22-year-old named Asaf Alikadic, stated to the police that he had left the club and halted.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Police took former boxing heavyweight champion Mike Tyson into custody for purportedly jumping on the hood of a car stationed outside a nightclub. The 22-year-old car owner, Asaf Alikadic, reported to the police after exiting the club and finding his car damaged.

Original Text: Racing: Best Mate in shape to hold challenge of Rembrandt Today #39;s The Day. Every blade of grass has been inspected and passed fit, every weather forecast scanned. Best Mate will, short of an overnight declaration of Armageddon, make his seasonal
Translation: Carreras: Best Mate en forma para enfrentar el desafío de Rembrandt Hoy es El Día #39. Cada brizna de césped ha sido inspeccionada y aprobada, cada pronóstico del tiempo examinado. Best Mate competirá, a menos que se declare el Armagedón durante la noche, en su temporada
Paraphrase 1: 1. Best Mate is all set to manage the challenge from Rembrandt Today #39; The Day, provided there's no major catastrophe declared overnight. This is confirmed after careful inspection of every detail and extensive weather forecasting. He is ready for his seasonal race.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Assuming there's no unexpected apocalyptic event overnight, Best Mate is in proper form to face the challenge presented by Rembrandt Today #39; The Day in the upcoming seasonal race. The meticulous inspection of every minute element and detailed weather prediction assures us of this.

Original Text: Taylor: Wayne #39;s leading the way England Under-21 coach Peter Taylor hailed Wayne Rooney as the standard-bearer for a new generation of domestic talent. Taylor believes it is up to the country #39;s other best young players to follow Rooney #39;s lead.
Translation: Taylor: Wayne #39 está liderando el camino. El entrenador de Inglaterra Sub-21, Peter Taylor, elogió a Wayne Rooney como el portavoz de una nueva generación de talento doméstico. Taylor cree que depende de los mejores jugadores jóvenes del país seguir el ejemplo de Rooney.
Paraphrase 1: 1. England Under-21 coach Peter Taylor praised Wayne Rooney for setting the bar for the new wave of domestic talent. Taylor emphasized that it's the responsibility of other promising young players in the country to embrace Rooney's leadership.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Peter Taylor, the coach of England's Under-21, has extolled Wayne Rooney for trailblazing a path for the next generation of homegrown talents. He asserts that it's the duty of the nation's most gifted younger players to emulate Rooney's example.

Original Text: Radcliffe ready to tackle Big Apple Paula Radcliffe believes she is ready in every respect to challenge for the ING New York City Marathon title on Sunday. Radcliffe insisted she is in top shape after arriving in the Big Apple and although her
Translation: Radcliffe lista para enfrentarse a la Gran Manzana. Paula Radcliffe cree que está lista en todos los aspectos para luchar por el título del Maratón ING de la Ciudad de Nueva York el domingo. Radcliffe insistió en que está en la mejor forma después de llegar a la Gran Manzana y aunque su
Paraphrase 1: Paula Radcliffe asserts her readiness to vie for the ING New York City Marathon title on Sunday, stating she is in peak condition upon her arrival in New York.
Paraphrase 2: After arriving in New York, Paula Radcliffe is confident she is fully prepared physically and mentally to go for the ING New York City Marathon title this Sunday.

Original Text: Vendors Address Productivity, Convergence at Wireless Expo SAN FRANCISCOThe tension between enterprise and consumer segments of the wireless market was evident at Monday #39;s keynote addresses here at the CTIA Wireless conference and expo.
Translation: Los proveedores abordan la productividad y la convergencia en la Expo Wireless SAN FRANCISCO. La tensión entre los segmentos empresarial y de consumo del mercado inalámbrico fue evidente en las conferencias magistrales del lunes aquí en la conferencia y expo CTIA Wireless.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the CTIA Wireless conference and expo, which took place on Monday, the distinction between enterprise and consumer portions of the wireless market was clear through the keynote addresses. Vendors addressed productivity and convergence at the Wireless Expo in San Francisco.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Wireless Expo held in San Francisco, vendors focused on productivity and convergence. The tug of war between the consumer and enterprise sectors in the wireless market became obvious through the keynote speeches at the CTIA Wireless conference on Monday.

Original Text: Between Old Allies, A Sweeping Divide The rebels from the village of Mona Quibundo fought on the same side with Marceal Miji Itengo during Angola's civil war. But their lives have gone in starkly different directions during the country's troubled peace.
Translation: Entre Antiguos Aliados, Una Amplia División Los rebeldes del pueblo de Mona Quibundo lucharon del mismo lado que Marceal Miji Itengo durante la guerra civil de Angola. Pero sus vidas han tomado direcciones marcadamente diferentes durante la problemática paz del país.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The rebels of Mona Quibundo, who were allies with Marceal Miji Itengo during the civil war in Angola, have lived drastically different lives in the country's tumultuous peace period.
Paraphrase 2: 2. During Angola’s civil war, Marceal Miji Itengo and the rebels of Mona Quibundo stood together. However, in the difficult peace that followed, their lives have diverged significantly.

Original Text: Dollar Hits New Low; Gold Heads for \$455 The dollar hit record lows against the euro Friday and a 4-1/2-year trough versus the yen following a report China had cut its holdings of dollar assets, lifting gold to a 16-year high and undermining Tokyo stocks.
Translation: El dólar alcanza un nuevo mínimo; El oro se dirige hacia los \$455. El dólar alcanzó mínimos históricos frente al euro el viernes y un abismo de 4 años y medio respecto al yen tras un informe que indicaba que China había reducido sus activos en dólares, impulsando al oro a un máximo de 16 años y debilitando las acciones de Tokio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a report indicating China's reduction of its dollar assets, the dollar plummeted to all-time lows against the euro and a 4.5-year bottom compared to the yen last Friday. This situation increased the value of gold to a 16-year peak and adversely affected Tokyo's stock market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the dollar recorded a new low against the euro and hit a 4.5-year descent against the yen, a consequence of the report announcing China's decrease in dollar asset holdings. Furthermore, this resulted in boosting gold value to its highest in 16 years and had a detrimental effect on Tokyo's stock exchange.

Original Text: Hostages seized by gunmen in Iraq A US citizen is among four people reported to have been kidnapped at gunpoint from their office in Baghdad.  quot;They stormed the villa with automatic rifles and rocket-propelled grenades, quot; a police source told the Reuters agency.
Translation: Rehenes secuestrados por hombres armados en Irak. Se informa que un ciudadano estadounidense se encuentra entre las cuatro personas que supuestamente han sido secuestradas a punta de pistola desde su oficina en Bagdad. "Asaltaron la villa con rifles automáticos y granadas propulsadas por cohetes", dijo una fuente policial a la agencia Reuters.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It is reported that four individuals, including one US citizen, have been abducted from their workplace in Baghdad by armed men in Iraq. A police informant revealed to Reuters that the attackers invaded the villa armed with automatic guns and rocket-propelled grenade launchers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Armed assailants in Iraq have reportedly kidnapped four people from an office in Baghdad, one of whom is a US citizen. A law enforcement source informed Reuters that the assailants used automatic rifles and rocket-propelled grenades to raid the villa.

Original Text: Pfizer Will Weather the Storm The company will likely come out on top regardless of the outcome of the latest controversies.
Translation: Pfizer Superará la Tormenta La compañía probablemente saldrá adelante independientemente del resultado de las últimas controversias.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the outcome of recent controversies, Pfizer is expected to emerge victorious.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Irrespective of the results of current controversies, it's likely that Pfizer will overcome the challenges.

Original Text: Software maker exposes hidden data New Workshare Web site highlights the dangers of metadata buried in Microsoft Office documents.
Translation: El fabricante de software expone datos ocultos. El nuevo sitio web de Workshare resalta los peligros de los metadatos enterrados en los documentos de Microsoft Office.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The hidden metadata in Microsoft Office documents is spotlighted as a risk by a new Workshare website, a piece of software creation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A software creator's new Workshare website draws attention to the potential dangers of concealed metadata within Microsoft Office documents.

Original Text: Syria to Offer Iraqi Expat Polling Sites (AP) AP - Iraqi expatriates in Syria will have the opportunity to vote in this month's Iraqi elections under an agreement signed Sunday between the Syrian government and the Geneva-based International Organization for Migration.
Translation: Siria ofrecerá lugares de votación para expatriados iraquíes (AP) AP - Los expatriados iraquíes en Siria tendrán la oportunidad de votar en las elecciones iraquíes de este mes bajo un acuerdo firmado el domingo entre el gobierno sirio y la Organización Internacional para las Migraciones con sede en Ginebra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Under a recently signed agreement between the Syrian government and the Geneva-based International Organization for Migration, Iraqi expatriates residing in Syria will be provided with polling sites to participate in the forthcoming Iraqi elections. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) - The Syrian government, in collaboration with the International Organization for Migration based in Geneva, has arranged to allow Iraqi expatriates in Syria a chance to vote in the Iraqi elections this month through designated polling sites.

Original Text: Powell, Japan #39;s Machimura Discuss Iraq, Afghanistan, North Korea (State Department) -- Secretary of State Colin Powell and Japanese Foreign Minister Nobutaka Machimura held a 90-minute working lunch in Tokyo October 24, exchanging views on Iraq, Afghanistan, North Korea, China, UN reform, and Japan #39;s insistence that
Translation: Powell, Machimura de Japón Discuten sobre Irak, Afganistán, Corea del Norte (Departamento de Estado) -- El Secretario de Estado Colin Powell y el Ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Japón, Nobutaka Machimura, mantuvieron un almuerzo de trabajo de 90 minutos en Tokio el 24 de octubre, intercambiando puntos de vista sobre Irak, Afganistán, Corea del Norte, China, la reforma de las Naciones Unidas, y la insistencia de Japón de que
Paraphrase 1: 1) In a working lunch hosted in Tokyo on October 24, Secretary of State Colin Powell and Japanese Foreign Minister Nobutaka Machimura dedicated a 90-minute conversation to discuss Iraq, Afghanistan, North Korea, China, UN reform, and the strong stance of Japan.
Paraphrase 2: 2) During a 90-minute meeting over lunch in Tokyo on October 24, views on Iraq, Afghanistan, North Korea, China, prospective UN reforms, and Japan's rigid viewpoint were shared between US Secretary of State Colin Powell and Japan's Foreign Minister Nobutaka Machimura.

Original Text: Curses! Gimme a break Consider the circumstances: The Boston Red Sox defeated the vaunted Yankees in Game 7 of the American League Championship Series, and did so in the House That Ruth Built.
Translation: ¡Maldición! Dame un respiro. Considera las circunstancias: Los Boston Red Sox vencieron a los reconocidos Yankees en el Juego 7 de la Serie de Campeonato de la Liga Americana, y lo hicieron en la Casa que Ruth Construyó.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Exasperating! Cut me some slack. Let's look at the context: The esteemed Yankees were beaten by the Boston Red Sox in the decisive Game 7 of the American League Championship Series, and all this drama unfolded in none other than the 'House That Ruth Built'.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Drats! Just give me a moment to process this. Weigh in on the environment: It was in the legendary 'House That Ruth Built' that the Boston Red Sox triumphed over the much-famed Yankees in the climactic Game 7 of the American League Championship Series.

Original Text: Powell, Libya Foreign Minister to Hold First Talks  UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) - In a sign of warming U.S.-Libyan  ties, Secretary of State Colin Powell will meet Libya's foreign  minister on Thursday in the highest level talks between the  countries in decades, U.S. officials said.
Translation: Powell, Ministro de Exteriores de Libia Realizarán Primeras Conversaciones NACIONES UNIDAS (Reuters) - En una señal de calidez en las relaciones entre EE.UU. y Libia, el Secretario de Estado, Colin Powell, se reunirá con el ministro de exteriores de Libia el jueves en las conversaciones de más alto nivel entre los países en décadas, dijeron funcionarios estadounidenses.
Paraphrase 1: 1. U.S. Secretary of State, Colin Powell, is set to sit down with Libya's foreign minister on Thursday, marking the most significant discussions between the two nations in many years, indicating an enhancement in U.S.-Libyan relations, reveal U.S. officials.

Original Text: Over 30 Killed in Iraq attacks, 20 Americans wounded More than 30 people were killed and more than 60 wounded in a rash of suicide car bombs and mortar and rocket attacks in the Sunni Triangle on Saturday as US Marines
Translation: Más de 30 muertos en ataques en Irak, 20 estadounidenses heridos. Más de 30 personas fueron asesinadas y más de 60 heridas en una serie de atentados suicidas con coches bomba y ataques con morteros y cohetes en el Triángulo Sunita el sábado mientras los Marines de EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a wave of suicide car bombs and missile attacks within the Sunni Triangle on Saturday, over 30 individuals lost their lives and upwards of 60 sustained injuries, including 20 wounded US Marines.

Original Text: Scrimmage Gets Ugly Ralph Friedgen used a four-letter word to describe his Maryland team's offensive performance in Sunday's practice: blah.
Translation: El Scrimmage se pone feo. Ralph Friedgen utilizó una palabra de cuatro letras para describir la actuación ofensiva de su equipo de Maryland en la práctica del domingo: bla.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Sunday's practice, Ralph Friedgen expressed his dissatisfaction with his Maryland team's offensive display using a harsh four-letter term: blah.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ralph Friedgen characterized the offensive play of his Maryland team as 'blah' in Sunday's practice, evidencing an ugly scrimmage.

Original Text: Gaza Plan May Bring Palestinian State-Sharon Aide  JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon's  chief of staff on Thursday called a Gaza withdrawal plan a  possible step toward a Palestinian state, in a clear sign of  softening following Yasser Arafat's death.
Translation: El Plan de Gaza Podría Conducir a un Estado Palestino, Dice Ayudante de Sharon. JERUSALÉN (Reuters) - El jefe de gabinete del Primer Ministro israelí Ariel Sharon, el jueves llamó a un plan de retiro de Gaza, un posible paso hacia un estado palestino, en una clara señal de suavización luego de la muerte de Yasser Arafat.
Paraphrase 1: 1) JERUSALEM (Reuters) - The chief of staff for Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon suggested on Thursday that a Gaza pullout plan could be the beginning of a Palestinian state, indicating a shift in attitude following the death of Yasser Arafat.
Paraphrase 2: 2) JERUSALEM (Reuters) - On Thursday, Ariel Sharon's main aide hinted that a scheme to withdraw from Gaza might pave the way for a Palestinian state, indicating an apparent relaxation in stance after the demise of Yasser Arafat.

Original Text: Dollar Hovers Near 1-Month Low Vs Yen  TOKYO (Reuters) - The dollar hovered near a one-month low  against the yen on Tuesday after disappointing U.S. hiring  figures last week fueled speculation the Federal Reserve could  press "pause" on its current tightening cycle.
Translation: El Dólar Se Mantiene Cerca de su Mínimo de 1 Mes Frente al Yen TOKIO (Reuters) - El dólar se mantuvo cerca de su mínimo de un mes frente al yen el martes después de que las decepcionantes cifras de contratación de EE.UU. la semana pasada alimentaran la especulación de que la Reserva Federal podría presionar "pausa" en su actual ciclo de endurecimiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - Following last week's lacklustre U.S. employment numbers, which ignited speculation about a potential halt in the Federal Reserve's ongoing tightening cycle, the dollar hung around its one-month low against the yen on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TOKYO (Reuters) - Unimpressive U.S. hiring stats from last week stoked conjecture that the Federal Reserve might put its current tightening cycle on hold, leading to the dollar remaining near its one-month dip against the yen on Tuesday.

Original Text: Iraq Parties Join Forces to Avert Defeat (AP) AP - In the months before the invasion of Iraq, the United States groomed exiled opposition groups as the nucleus of a future government to replace Saddam Hussein. Now with elections approaching, the parties still enjoy little support among ordinary Iraqis who view them as corrupt puppets of Washington.
Translation: Partidos de Iraq unen fuerzas para evitar la derrota (AP) AP: En los meses previos a la invasión de Iraq, Estados Unidos preparó a los grupos de oposición exiliados como el núcleo de un futuro gobierno para reemplazar a Saddam Hussein. Ahora, con las elecciones acercándose, los partidos aún disfrutan de poco apoyo entre los iraquíes ordinarios, quienes los ven como marionetas corruptas de Washington.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) As elections draw nearer, parties in Iraq that were once primed by the United States as successors to Saddam Hussein's regime are banding together to avoid failure. These groups, despite their pre-invasion grooming to form a new ruling entity, are perceived by regular Iraqis as corrupt and manipulated tools of Washington, thus winning little popularity among them.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ahead of the imminent elections, parties in Iraq, initially shaped by the United States to replace Saddam Hussein's government, are amalgamating to dodge a looming defeat. These parties, despite receiving pre-invasion training for governance, hold scant appeal amongst the average Iraqi citizens, who see them as corrupt proxies of the United States. (AP)

Original Text: U.S. Wins \$1.9 Million in Back Pay for Janitors The Department of Labor reached a settlement with a contractor for the Target Corporation had not paid overtime to hundreds of immigrant janitors who often worked seven nights a week.
Translation: EE.UU. Gana \$1.9 Millones en Pagos Atrasados para Conserjes. El Departamento de Trabajo llegó a un acuerdo con un contratista para la Corporación Target que no había pagado horas extras a cientos de conserjes inmigrantes que a menudo trabajaban siete noches a la semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A settlement has been reached by the Department of Labor with a Target Corporation contractor, retrieving $1.9 million in overdue payment for hundreds of immigrant janitors who tended to work the entire week without receiving overtime pay.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Hundreds of immigrant janitors, frequently working every night of the week without receiving additional pay, are now compensated after the Department of Labor facilitated a $1.9 million settlement against a contractor form associated with the Target Corporation.

Original Text: Oracle #39;s earnings top forecasts NEW YORK (CNN/Money) - Oracle Corp., posted a gain in fiscal second-quarter earnings Monday that beat Wall Street forecasts. The report was released three days earlier than originally scheduled because the
Translation: Los beneficios de Oracle superan las previsiones. NUEVA YORK (CNN/Dinero) - Oracle Corp., registró un aumento en las ganancias del segundo trimestre fiscal el lunes, superando las previsiones de Wall Street. El informe fue publicado tres días antes de lo programado originalmente porque
Paraphrase 1: 1. Beating Wall Street predictions, Oracle Corp. reported an increase in fiscal second-quarter earnings on Monday. This report was published three days ahead of its planned release date, originating from New York (CNN/Money).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Monday saw Oracle Corp., outperform expectations with a rise in its fiscal second-quarter profits, as reported by New York (CNN/Money). This earnings report was unveiled three days earlier than initially intended.

Original Text: Burma crackdown on Indian rebels The Indian army says Burmese troops have begun an offensive to flush out Indian rebel bases in their territory.
Translation: Represión de Birmania sobre los rebeldes indios. El ejército indio dice que las tropas birmanas han comenzado una ofensiva para expulsar a las bases de rebeldes indios en su territorio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Indian military reports that Burmese forces have initiated a campaign to expel Indian rebels from bases on their land.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Burmese soldiers have initiated a purge against Indian rebel strongholds in their region, according to the Indian army.

Original Text: Puerto Ricans break Boomers #39; hearts Australia #39;s hopes of an Olympic Games men #39;s basketball quarter-final berth slumped with a heart-breaking 87-82 loss to Puerto Rico.
Translation: Los puertorriqueños rompen los corazones de los Boomers #39; Las esperanzas de Australia de obtener un lugar en los cuartos de final del baloncesto masculino en los Juegos Olímpicos disminuyeron con una desgarradora derrota de 87-82 contra Puerto Rico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Australia's aspirations for a men's basketball quarter-final spot in the Olympic Games suffered a blow with a distressing 87-82 defeat against Puerto Rico, crushing the hearts of Boomers.

Original Text: SMS and surfing go sky high! Boarding a flight would no longer mean doing away with your communication on your cell phone, with Airbus having developed technology that enables passengers to use their mobiles without interrupting navigational systems.
Translation: ¡Los SMS y la navegación se disparan por las nubes! Abordar un vuelo ya no significa prescindir de la comunicación en tu teléfono móvil, ya que Airbus ha desarrollado una tecnología que permite a los pasajeros usar sus móviles sin interrumpir los sistemas de navegación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Airbus has developed a groundbreaking technology that permits passengers to use their mobile phones for texting and internet surfing without impacting the flight's navigational systems. You can now stay connected even during your air travel!
Paraphrase 2: 2. Thanks to Airbus, you can now use your cell phone for SMS and internet browsing without having any interference with the airplane's navigational systems. Gone are the days of being disconnected while on flight!

Original Text: Microsoft enters Google Territory with MSN Spaces In the last couple of months, we have seen Google invading the Microsoft territory with GMail and Google Desktop Search. Now Microsoft is responding.
Translation: Microsoft entra en territorio de Google con MSN Spaces. En los últimos meses, hemos visto a Google invadir el territorio de Microsoft con GMail y Google Desktop Search. Ahora Microsoft está respondiendo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In recent months, Google has stepped into Microsoft's domain with GMail and Google Desktop Search. Microsoft, however, is not backing down and is retaliating by introducing MSN Spaces, a move into Google's realm.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After Google's intrusion into the Microsoft territory using GMail and Google Desktop Search in the past few months, Microsoft is now counterattacking by venturing into Google's territory with MSN Spaces.

Original Text: Woods looks on target for return to winning ways in 2005 TIGER Woods hinted that his victory at the Target World Challenge on Sunday was a sign that his old self may be set for a return in 2005.
Translation: Woods parece en camino para volver a las victorias en 2005. TIGER Woods insinuó que su victoria en el Target World Challenge el domingo fue una señal de que su antiguo yo podría estar listo para regresar en 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tiger Woods suggested his win at the Target World Challenge on Sunday could be an indication of his comeback to triumph in 2005. He looks poised to return to his previously successful form.

Original Text: Garcia shines as Spain edge ahead in World Cup Sergio Garcia and Miguel Angel Jimenez of Spain came from six strokes behind to take the lead in the WGC World Cup third round on Saturday.
Translation: García brilla mientras España se adelanta en la Copa del Mundo. Sergio García y Miguel Ángel Jiménez de España remontaron seis golpes para tomar la delantera en la tercera ronda de la Copa del Mundo WGC el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Saturday, Spain's Sergio Garcia and Miguel Angel Jimenez managed to get ahead in the WGC World Cup's third round, coming from six strokes behind. Garcia particularly stood out as Spain edged ahead in the World Cup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sergio Garcia and Miguel Angel Jimenez, representing Spain, overcame a deficit of six strokes to clinch the lead in the third round of the WGC World Cup on Saturday. In the World Cup, Spain is starting to pull ahead, with Garcia playing a noteworthy role.

Original Text: Presidential Debate, Consumer Data Eyed (Reuters) Reuters - The first U.S. presidential debate\next week and a load of data on consumer spending will settle\some questions that have been hanging over U.S. stocks, and\equity strategists and traders say the decreased uncertainty\could draw buyers back to the market.
Translation: Debate Presidencial, Datos del Consumidor bajo Observación (Reuters) Reuters - El primer debate presidencial de EE.UU. la próxima semana y un montón de datos sobre el gasto del consumidor resolverán algunas preguntas que han estado rondando sobre las acciones de EE.UU., y los estrategas de renta variable y los comerciantes dicen que la disminución de la incertidumbre podría atraer a los compradores de vuelta al mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) The first U.S. presidential debate scheduled for next week, coupled with a wealth of data on consumer spending, may provide answers to the unresolved issues affecting U.S. stocks. The anticipated reduction in uncertainty, according to equity strategists and traders, might attract buyers back to the market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Equity strategists and traders expect the upcoming U.S. presidential debate and extensive consumer spending data could clear some doubts concerning U.S. stocks thus potentially reeling buyers back to the market, Reuters reports.

Original Text: Analysis: IAEA Concerned Over Dismantlement Of Former Iraqi <b>...</b> Muhammad el-Baradei, the head of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), sent a letter to the current UN Security Council President Sir Emyr Jones Parry last week expressing concern about the whereabouts of equipment from dismantled sites that
Translation: Análisis: La AIEA está preocupada por el desmantelamiento de la antigua Iraq ... Muhammad el-Baradei, jefe de la Agencia Internacional de Energía Atómica (AIEA), envió una carta al actual presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, Sir Emyr Jones Parry, la semana pasada expresando su preocupación sobre el paradero del equipo de los sitios desmantelados que
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysis: Concerns Raised by IAEA Regarding the Disassembly of Former Iraqi ... Last week, Muhammad el-Baradei, who presides over the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), showed his worry in a letter sent to Sir Emyr Jones Parry, the current President of the UN Security Council, regarding the location of the equipment from dismantled locations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Analysis: IAEA's Worry Over the Disassembly of Some Iraqi Sites ... Muhammad el-Baradei, who leads the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), recently conveyed his worries about the uncertain location of equipment from disassembled sites in a letter to the UN Security Council President, Sir Emyr Jones Parry, last week.

Original Text: United Airlines Likely to Terminate Pension Plans The cash-strapped airline said in a bankruptcy court filing today that it "likely" will be necessary to terminate and replace its employee pension plans.
Translation: Es probable que United Airlines Termine los Planes de Pensiones. La aerolínea con problemas de liquidez dijo en un expediente presentado hoy en un tribunal de quiebras que "probablemente" será necesario terminar y reemplazar sus planes de pensiones para empleados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to financial constraints, United Airlines announced in a bankruptcy court filing today that they might have to discontinue their employees' pension plans and introduce a new system.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As stated in a bankruptcy court report today, the financially struggling United Airlines is inclined towards terminating its current pension schemes, with plans to introduce replacement solutions.

Original Text: UN Investigating Reports of Rwandan Rights Violations in Congo The UN mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo is investigating reports that Rwandan soldiers were responsible for violations of human rights in the east of the country last month.
Translation: La ONU investiga informes de Violaciones de Derechos Humanos Ruandeses en Congo. La misión de la ONU en la República Democrática del Congo está investigando informes que indican que los soldados ruandeses fueron responsables de violaciones de derechos humanos en el este del país el mes pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The UN mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo is exploring claims that Rwandan soldiers committed human rights abuses in the country's east last month.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reports of human rights violations allegedly committed by Rwandan soldiers in the eastern part of Congo last month are currently under investigation by the UN mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

Original Text: Martial Law in Chinese Town After Riots Kill Seven China declared martial law in part of a central province after at least seven people were killed, 42 injured and numerous houses set ablaze in clashes between minority Muslims and Han Chinese, officials said on Monday.
Translation: Ley Marcial en Ciudad China tras Disturbios que Matan a Siete. China declaró ley marcial en parte de una provincia central después de que al menos siete personas murieron, 42 resultaron heridas y numerosas casas fueron incendiadas en enfrentamientos entre musulmanes minoritarios y chinos Han, dijeron funcionarios el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following riots that resulted in the death of at least seven individuals and left 42 injured, not to mention numerous houses incinerated, martial law has been instated by China in a certain portion of a central province. These violent confrontations took place between Han Chinese and minority Muslims, as confirmed by officials on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Clashes in a central Chinese province between minority Muslims and Han Chinese led to the killing of no less than seven individuals and multiple houses being set on fire, with over 42 people injured. Consequently, China imposed martial law on the affected town, as announced by officials on Monday.

Original Text: Official: Iraq not likely to hurt economy The economy is growing and the war in Iraq is unlikely to short-circuit the recovery, Roger W. Ferguson, Jr., the vice chairman of the Federal Reserve Board said Tuesday.
Translation: Oficial: Irak probablemente no dañará la economía. La economía está creciendo y es improbable que la guerra en Irak interrumpa la recuperación, dijo el martes Roger W. Ferguson, Jr., el vicepresidente de la Junta de la Reserva Federal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "The economy's growth is unlikely to be impeded by the Iraq war, according to a statement made on Tuesday by Roger W. Ferguson, Jr., the Vice Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board.

Original Text: Nextel, Sprint in talks Sprint, the No. 3 US mobile- phone company, and Nextel Communications are in early talks about a possible merger, people familiar with the matter said.
Translation: Nextel, Sprint en conversaciones. Sprint, la compañía de telefonía móvil número 3 de EE.UU., y Nextel Communications se encuentran en conversaciones preliminares sobre una posible fusión, según personas familiarizadas con el asunto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Early discussions about a potential merger are currently taking place between Sprint, the third largest mobile phone company in the US, and Nextel Communications, according to people acquainted with the situation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. People in the know have stated that Sprint, America's No.3 mobile phone firm, and Nextel Communications, are in the initial stages of merger discussions.

Original Text: Designer puts 96 cores on single chip Chips that help a computer's main microprocessors perform specific types of math problems are becoming a big business once again.\
Translation: El diseñador coloca 96 núcleos en un solo chip. Los chips que ayudan a los microprocesadores principales de una computadora a realizar tipos específicos de problemas matemáticos están volviéndose un gran negocio una vez más.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A designer has placed 96 cores onto a single chip, which is becoming increasingly important in the business, as these chips assist the computer's primary microprocessors in performing certain math-based problems.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Chips equipped with 96 cores on a single chip, designed to aid the computer's main microprocessors with specific mathematical problems, are seeing a resurgence in business importance.

Original Text: NASA to hunt gamma bursts NASA is preparing to launch a nimble spacecraft to detect the most violent explosions in the cosmos and study their afterglow for hints of their origin.
Translation: La NASA buscará estallidos de rayos gamma. La NASA se está preparando para lanzar una nave espacial ágil para detectar las explosiones más violentas del cosmos y estudiar su resplandor residual en busca de pistas de su origen.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A nimble spacecraft is set to be launched by NASA with the aim of detecting the cosmos' most violent explosions and studying their aftermath to gather clues about their origin.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To understand the origins of the most intense cosmic blasts, NASA plans on deploying a nimble spacecraft designed to pick up on gamma bursts and scrutinize their subsequent radiance.

Original Text: Venture Capital's Transparency Trouble   Among the tables, charts and bottom-line numbers in venture capital firm    Grotech Capital Group's  quarterly report to its investors is what Managing General Partner    Frank A. Adams  calls his "heart of hearts," a narrative of his gut feelings about companies that Grotech of Timonium has invested in.
