The essay includes Adams's candid opinions about the companies' top executives and their chance of succeeding.
Translation: El Problema de Transparencia del Capital de Riesgo Entre las tablas, gráficos y cifras finales en el informe trimestral a sus inversores de la firma de capital de riesgo Grotech Capital Group, se encuentra lo que el Socio Gerente General Frank A. Adams llama su "corazón de corazones", una narrativa de sus intuiciones acerca de las empresas en las que Grotech de Timonium ha invertido. El ensayo incluye las opiniones sinceras de Adams sobre los altos ejecutivos de las empresas y sus posibilidades de éxito.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Grotech Capital Group's quarterly report, Managing General Partner Frank A. Adams shares his "heart of hearts" - a narrative revealing his intuitive thoughts on the companies the Timonium-based venture capital firm has invested in. This includes his frank evaluation of the top-ranking executives and their potential for success among the tables, charts and final numbers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Frank A. Adams, the Managing General Partner of venture capital firm Grotech Capital Group based in Timonium, provides a report every quarter which he calls his "heart of hearts". This report contains not just tables, charts and final numbers, but also an essay on his gut feelings about their investments. The essay also features Adams's open evaluation of the top company executives and their likelihood of triumph.

Original Text: Calif. to Sue Diebold Over False Claims  SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - California Attorney General Bill  Lockyer said on Tuesday he would sue electronic voting machine  maker Diebold Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=DBD.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">DBD.N</A> on charges it defrauded the state  with false claims about its products.
Translation: Calif. demandará a Diebold por falsas afirmaciones SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - El fiscal general de California, Bill Lockyer, dijo el martes que demandaría al fabricante de máquinas de votación electrónica Diebold Inc. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=DBD.N qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">DBD.N</A> bajo cargos de haber defraudado al estado con falsas afirmaciones sobre sus productos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Bill Lockyer, the Attorney General of California, announced on Tuesday that he's planning to file a lawsuit against Diebold Inc., the electronic voting machine manufacturer, accusing them of defrauding the state with inaccurate statements about their product capabilities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Diebold Inc., a maker of electronic voting machines, will be sued by Attorney General Bill Lockyer of California, who has accused them of intentionally misleading the state with dishonest assertions about their machines.

Original Text: Yum Brand's  August Sales Up  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Yum Brands Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=YUM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">YUM.N</A> on Thursday  said sales at U.S. restaurants open at least a year, or  same-store sales, rose 5 percent in the four weeks ended Sept.  4, led by strength at its Taco Bell and Pizza Hut chains and a  rebound at KFC.
Translation: Las ventas de agosto de Yum Brands aumentaron NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Yum Brands Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=YUM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">YUM.N</A> dijo el jueves que las ventas en los restaurantes de EE. UU. abiertos al menos un año, o ventas de la misma tienda, aumentaron en un 5 por ciento en las cuatro semanas que terminaron el 4 de septiembre, lideradas por la fortaleza de sus cadenas Taco Bell y Pizza Hut y una recuperación en KFC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yum Brands Inc. reported a sales increase of 5 percent in the four weeks ending Sept. 4 for U.S. restaurants that have been open for at least a year, also known as same-store sales. This rise was driven by Taco Bell and Pizza Hut's performance, as well as a recovery at KFC, as stated on Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, Yum Brands Inc. announced a 5 percent surge in same-store sales, a reference to establishments that have been operating for a minimum of a year, recorded in the month-long period through Sept. 4. Taco Bell and Pizza Hut showed strong sales, and there was a noticeable renewal of success at KFC.

Original Text: Kazaa to dial up a respectable living Kazaa, the internet site which attracted the fury of the music industry by allowing users to download tunes for free, has ventured into the telecoms sector.
Translation: Kazaa busca obtener una vida respetable. Kazaa, el sitio de internet que atrajo la furia de la industria de la música al permitir a los usuarios descargar canciones gratis, ha incursionado en el sector de las telecomunicaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Kazaa, the online platform that caused outrage among the music industry by permitting free song downloads, is now making a foray into the telecommunications field in an effort to earn a decent livelihood.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The internet site Kazaa, which incited anger within the music industry by enabling free music downloads, has embarked on a journey into the telecoms industry to secure a more respectable income.

Original Text: Packers face Rams in Monday nighter GREEN BAY, Wisconsin (Ticker) -- Brett Favre will be hoping his 200th consecutive start turns out better than his last two have against the St.
Translation: Los Packers se enfrentan a los Rams en partido del lunes por la noche GREEN BAY, Wisconsin (Ticker) -- Brett Favre espera que su 200° inicio consecutivo sea mejor que los últimos dos que ha tenido contra los St.
Paraphrase 1: 1. GREEN BAY, Wisconsin (Ticker) -- As Brett Favre prepares for his 200th straight start, he's hoping for a better performance than his previous two encounters against the St. when his team, the Packers, face the Rams on Monday night.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With his 200th unbroken start coming up, Brett Favre is hoping to outshine his previous two performances against the St., as his team, the Packers, gear up to play against the Rams on Monday Night in Green Bay, Wisconsin (Ticker).

Original Text: UF notebook: Inconsistency becomes serious problem for Leak While Florida QB Chris Leak still remains among the top quarterbacks in the Southeastern Conference, his consistency has become a concern in recent weeks.
Translation: Cuaderno UF: La inconsistencia se convierte en un grave problema para Leak. Aunque el mariscal de campo de Florida, Chris Leak, sigue siendo uno de los mejores mariscales de campo de la Conferencia del Sureste, su consistencia se ha convertido en una preocupación en las últimas semanas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. UF notebook: Inconsistency is emerging as a major issue for Leak. Although he continues to be one of the leading quarterbacks in the Southeastern Conference, concerns have been raised about the consistency of Chris Leak's performance of late.
Paraphrase 2: 2. UF notebook: Chris Leak's inconsistency is surfacing as a significant problem. Despite retaining his position amongst the prime quarterbacks in the Southeastern Conference, his constant performance has been causing concerns in the recent weeks.

Original Text: Decisive Bush re-election victory lifts Wall Street NEW YORK : President George W. Bush #39;s re-election sparked a broad stock rally, as Wall Street welcomed the decisive victory for the candidate seen as the most business-friendly.
Translation: Victoria decisiva en la reelección de Bush anima a Wall Street NUEVA YORK: La reelección del presidente George W. Bush provocó un amplio rally de acciones, ya que Wall Street acogió con agrado la victoria decisiva del candidato considerado como el más favorable para los negocios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The resounding re-election triumph of President George W. Bush inspired a widespread surge in stock prices, as Wall Street celebrated the win of the candidate perceived as the most beneficial for business.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wall Street responded with an extensive stock market rally to President George W. Bush's emphatic re-election, hailing the victory of the candidate who was viewed as being the most pro-business.

Original Text: BellSouth: \$3.3 Bln Rise in Benefit Costs WASHINGTON (Reuters) - BellSouth Corp. (BLS.N: Quote, Profile, Research) said on Wednesday its new labor contract had triggered a \$3.3 billion increase in its estimates of future retiree medical costs, reducing fourth-quarter earnings by 3 cents to 4 ...
Translation: BellSouth: Aumento de \$3.3 Mil Millones en Costos de Beneficios WASHINGTON (Reuters) - BellSouth Corp. (BLS.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) dijo el miércoles que su nuevo contrato laboral ha provocado un aumento de \$3.3 mil millones en sus estimados de costos médicos futuros para jubilados, reduciendo las ganancias del cuarto trimestre en 3 centavos a 4...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Washington (Reuters) - BellSouth Corp. (BLS.N: Quote, Profile, Research) announced on Wednesday that its recent labor agreement has led to a surge of $3.3 billion in its future medical costs for retirees, which will lower the fourth quarter earnings by 3 to 4 cents...
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, BellSouth Corp. (BLS.N: Quote, Profile, Research) reported that the new labor contract had caused an increase of $3.3 billion in the projected future medical expenses for retirees, decrementing earnings for the fourth quarter by 3 to 4 cents...

Original Text: WINDIES PERFORMANCE GIVES LARA HOPE Brian Lara hopes his improving West Indies can raise their game again on the way to the semi-finals of the ICC Champions Trophy. Lara is not about to get carried away with yesterday #39;s predictable landslide
Translation: El RENDIMIENTO DE LOS WINDIES DA ESPERANZA A LARA. Brian Lara espera que su mejorado equipo de las Indias Occidentales pueda elevar su juego una vez más en el camino a las semifinales del Trofeo de los Campeones de la ICC. Lara no está a punto de dejarse llevar por la previsible avalancha de ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Brian Lara maintains optimism for his enhancing West Indies team to step-up their performance for the ICC Champions Trophy semi-finals, subsequent to their predictable overwhelming victory yesterday. Lara, however, remains grounded and will not let this success lead to overconfidence.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following yesterday's expected landslide victory, Brian Lara feels hopeful about his progressively improving West Indies team, eyeing an improved performance in the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy semi-finals. Despite the win, Lara is careful to not get overly excited or carried away.

Original Text: Even Knicks get their 15 minutes It was the kind of defense these Knicks are not known for. The kind they often pay lip service to. The kind that leads to ugly basketball, long stretches without points and NBA victories.
Translation: Incluso los Knicks tienen sus 15 minutos. Fue el tipo de defensa por la que estos Knicks no son conocidos. El tipo al que a menudo le rinden un homenaje vacío. El tipo que conduce a un baloncesto feo, largos períodos sin puntos y victorias en la NBA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. These Knicks are not famous for the sort of defense they displayed. It's more of a kind they give lip service to, resulting in a style of basketball that isn't very pleasing. It leads to long periods without points, yet results in NBA triumphs.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Impressive defense is not a usual characteristic of these Knicks, though it's often verbalized by them. It's the type that might make the basketball game unattractive, with extended phases devoid of scoring, but it often results in victories in the NBA.

Original Text: Davenport loses to Myskina in Kremlin Cup semifinals Ailing Davenport loses: A weakened Lindsay Davenport lost to defending champion Anastasia Myskina 6-4, 7-6 (7-1) yesterday in the Kremlin Cup semifinals in Moscow but still will regain the No.
Translation: Davenport pierde ante Myskina en las semifinales de la Copa Kremlin. Una debilitada Davenport pierde: Una debilitada Lindsay Davenport perdió ante la campeona defensora Anastasia Myskina 6-4, 7-6 (7-1) ayer en las semifinales de la Copa Kremlin en Moscú, pero aún así recuperará el Nº.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Kremlin Cup semifinals, Lindsay Davenport, stricken with ailment, lost to reigning champion Anastasia Myskina with a score of 6-4, 7-6 (7-1), but she is still set to reclaim her previous number 1 spot.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite being unwell, Lindsay Davenport was defeated by Anastasia Myskina, the defending champion, in Moscow's Kremlin Cup semifinals with a scoreline of 6-4, 7-6 (7-1), however, she is still poised to reclaim her No.1 ranking.

Original Text: Medium seeks wide impact If satellite radio's proponents are right, the new medium could be the next cable television, only bigger. Currently available through two companies, the XM and Sirius satellite radio networks, satellite radio requires that users pay a monthly fee and buy a special receiver to translate the signal. Both networks offer a wide range of programming on more than 120 stations, ...
Translation: Medium busca un impacto amplio. Si los defensores de la radio satelital tienen razón, el nuevo medio podría ser el siguiente cable de televisión, solo que más grande. Actualmente disponible a través de dos compañías, las redes de radio satelital XM y Sirius, la radio satelital requiere que los usuarios paguen una tarifa mensual y compren un receptor especial para traducir la señal. Ambas redes ofrecen una amplia gama de programas en más de 120 estaciones, ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. If the supporters of satellite radio have read the situation accurately, this medium has the potential to outscale even cable television. At present, the XM and Sirius networks, the only two companies providing this service, require a subscription fee and a unique receiver for signal translation. Their services span over 120 stations, presenting a broad variety of programs...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Assuming that the advocates of satellite radio are correct, this new platform could surpass the scale of cable television. The service, presented by only two firms currently known as the XM and Sirius networks, calls for a monthly charge and a particular receiver to interpret the incoming signal. Presenting a vast assortment of shows across more than 120 stations,...

Original Text: Texas got a break The hurricane season ended Tuesday with Texas escaping major storms, while Florida residents were hard hit with four major storms that claimed 117 lives and caused billions of dollars in damage.
Translation: Texas tuvo un respiro. La temporada de huracanes terminó el martes con Texas escapando de las grandes tormentas, mientras que los residentes de Florida fueron duramente golpeados con cuatro tormentas importantes que cobraron 117 vidas y causaron miles de millones de dólares en daños.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The hurricane season concluded on Tuesday, remarkably leaving Texas unscathed by any significant storms, while Florida, on the other hand, was severely afflicted with four substantial storms resulting in 117 fatalities and billions of dollars in damages.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tuesday marked the end of the hurricane season, with Texas being fortunate to avoid any heavy storms, contrastingly, Florida faced destruction from four severe storms, causing billions in damages and taking 117 lives.

Original Text: Apple Jumps Ahead of HP iPod, iMac Launch <p>\</p><p> SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Shares of Apple Computer Inc.\<AAPL.O> rose to an almost four-year high on Thursday ahead of\the launch of Hewlett-Packard Co.'s <HPQ.N> version of the iPod\digital music player and Apple's revamped iMac computer.</p>
Translation: Apple se adelanta a HP iPod, lanzamiento de iMac <p>\</p><p> SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Las acciones de Apple Computer Inc. \<AAPL.O> subieron a su nivel más alto en casi cuatro años el jueves, previo al lanzamiento de la versión del reproductor de música digital iPod de Hewlett-Packard Co. <HPQ.N> y el renovado ordenador iMac de Apple. </p>
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, prior to the launch of Hewlett-Packard Co.'s version of the iPod digital music player and Apple's updated iMac computer, the shares of Apple Computer Inc. surged to a near four-year peak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ahead of the unveiling of Hewlett-Packard Co.'s iPod variant and Apple's renewed iMac computer, Apple Computer Inc. saw its shares rise to their highest level in almost four years on Thursday.

Original Text: Lidle Agrees to  #36;6.3M Deal With Phillies (AP) AP - Right-hander Cory Lidle returned to the Philadelphia Phillies, agreeing Tuesday to a  #36;6.3 million, two-year contract.
Translation: Lidle Acuerda un Contrato de #36;6.3M con los Phillies (AP) AP - El lanzador derecho Cory Lidle regresó a los Philadelphia Phillies, acordando el martes un contrato de dos años por #36;6.3 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Right-handed pitcher Cory Lidle has agreed to rejoin the Philadelphia Phillies with a two-year contract valued at $6.3 million, according to AP.

Original Text: First Command Paying \$12M in Accords First Command Financial Planning Inc., a company that sold high-fee mutual funds to military officers, has agreed to pay \$12 million to settle regulators #39; charges that it used misleading sales material to promote the funds, it was announced Wednesday.
Translation: Primera Orden pagará \$12M en Acuerdos. Primera Orden Financial Planning Inc., una compañía que vendía fondos mutuos de alta comisión a oficiales militares, ha acordado pagar \$12 millones para resolver las acusaciones de los reguladores de que utilizó material de ventas engañoso para promocionar los fondos, fue anunciado el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1) First Command Financial Planning Inc., which marketed high-fee mutual funds to military officials, has consented to pay a $12 million settlement over regulatory allegations of distributing deceptive promotional materials for the funds, as stated in an announcement made on Wednesday.

Original Text: IDC Raises 2004 PC Outlook, Trims 2005 Forecast  FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Market research firm IDC has raised  its 2004 forecast for global personal computer sales growth to  14.2 percent from 13.5 percent, driven by high commercial  demand, it said on Monday.
Translation: IDC aumenta las perspectivas de PC para 2004, recorta el pronóstico para 2005 FRANKFURT (Reuters) - La firma de investigación de mercados IDC ha aumentado su pronóstico para el crecimiento de las ventas globales de computadoras personales en 2004 al 14.2 por ciento desde el 13.5 por ciento, impulsado por una alta demanda comercial, dijo el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. FRANKFURT (Reuters) - IDC, a market research company, announced on Monday that it has increased its global sales growth forecast for personal computers in 2004 to 14.2 percent, up from 13.5 percent, due to a surge in commercial demand.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, market research company IDC declared an elevation in the 2004 global personal computer sales growth forecast from 13.5 percent to 14.2 percent. The upward adjustment is a result of heightened commercial demand, as reported by Reuters in Frankfurt.

Original Text: No. 2 Oklahoma Blows Out Baylor 35-0 (AP) AP - Adrian Peterson ran for 240 yards, including three second-half touchdowns, and No. 2 Oklahoma got the lopsided win it needed for the BCS standings by beating Baylor 35-0 on Saturday.
Translation: No. 2 Oklahoma Arrasa a Baylor 35-0 (AP) AP - Adrian Peterson corrió para 240 yardas, incluyendo tres touchdowns en la segunda mitad, y No. 2 Oklahoma obtuvo la victoria aplastante que necesitaba para las clasificaciones del BCS al vencer a Baylor 35-0 el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a remarkable Saturday showdown, Adrian Peterson's standout performance, including 240 running yards and three touchdowns in the second-half, led No. 2 ranked Oklahoma to a landslide 35-0 victory over Baylor, strengthening their position in the BCS standings. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dominating the game on Saturday, No. 2 Oklahoma, led by Adrian Peterson's impressive performance of 240 running yards and three second-half touchdowns, trounced Baylor with a sweeping victory of 35-0, thereby boosting their BCS standings. (AP)

Original Text: Non-Cal computer linked to hacking A non-campus computer and server that were hooked to the campus network without proper security precautions have been linked to a University of California, Berkeley, hacker
Translation: Ordenador no-Cal conectado a un hackeo. Un ordenador y servidor no pertenecientes al campus que estaban conectados a la red del campus sin las precauciones de seguridad adecuadas, han sido vinculados a un hacker de la Universidad de California, Berkeley.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A hacker from the University of California, Berkeley, has been found to have a connection to a non-campus computer and server that were improperly secured and connected to the campus network.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A computer and server, located off-campus and inadequately protected, were connected to the campus network and have been associated with a hacker from the University of California, Berkeley.

Original Text: Under Construction In each of the past 31 seasons, Nabraska has gained more rushing yards than passing yards. With the hire of Bill Callahan, a West Coast guy known for the West Coast offense, that will change.
Translation: En Construcción En cada una de las últimas 31 temporadas, Nabraska ha obtenido más yardas por carrera que por pase. Con la contratación de Bill Callahan, un hombre de la Costa Oeste conocido por la ofensiva de la Costa Oeste, eso cambiará.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over the last 31 seasons, Nebraska has consistently achieved more rushing yards than passing yards. However, with the induction of Bill Callahan, a man renowned for implementing West Coast offense, this trend is set to alter.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nebraska has consistently prioritized rushing yards over passing yards in the past 31 seasons. Yet, with the recent appointment of Bill Callahan, a proponent of the West Coast offense, this pattern is expected to shift.

Original Text: Apple readies European iTunes expansion, Switzerland store Apple says it will deliver its iTunes music service to more European countries next month. Corroborating several reports in recent months, Reuters is reporting today that Apple Computer is planning the next
Translation: Apple prepara la expansión europea de iTunes, tienda Apple en Suiza. Apple dice que ofrecerá su servicio de música iTunes en más países europeos el próximo mes. Corroborando varios informes en los últimos meses, Reuters informa hoy que Apple Computer está planeando lo próximo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Apple is preparing to broaden its iTunes music service in more European nations next month, with specific plans to establish a store in Switzerland. This corroborates several reports received in recent months, and today, Reuters confirms that Apple Computer is in the process of planning the next expansion phase.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to multiple sources, Apple Computer is planning to extend its iTunes music services into more European markets next month, a move that includes the launch of a store in Switzerland. This development aligns with various reports from previous months, a fact that is reinforced by today's announcement by Reuters.

Original Text: NASA Cassini Significant Events for 10/28/04 - 11/04/04 The most recent spacecraft telemetry was acquired from the Goldstone tracking station on Wednesday, November 3. The Cassini spacecraft is in an excellent state of health and is operating normally.
Translation: Eventos Significativos de la NASA Cassini para el 28/10/04 - 04/11/04. La telemetría de la nave espacial más reciente se adquirió desde la estación de seguimiento de Goldstone el miércoles 3 de noviembre. La nave espacial Cassini se encuentra en un excelente estado de salud y está operando normalmente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Goldstone tracking station received the latest spacecraft telemetry of NASA Cassini on Wednesday, November 3, during the significant events between October 28 and November 4, 2004. The spacecraft is functioning as expected and is in prime health condition.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the period between October 28 and November 4, 2004, the Cassini spacecraft's most recent telemetry was collected by the Goldstone tracking station on November 3. Presently, the spacecraft is in a top-notch health condition and operating perfectly.

Original Text: Ex-teammates sour on Williams The latest news in the Ricky Williams saga - that he has instructed agent Leigh Steinberg to explore avenues for a return -as all the impact of a wet diaper with his ex-Miami Dolphins teammates.
Translation: Ex-compañeros se amargan con Williams. Las últimas noticias en la saga de Ricky Williams - que ha instruido a su agente Leigh Steinberg para explorar vías para un regreso - tuvo todo el impacto de un pañal mojado con sus excompañeros de los Miami Dolphins.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Williams' former teammates have soured in their attitude towards him. The recent developments in the Ricky Williams narrative - most notably, him directing his agent, Leigh Steinberg, to look into potential ways for a comeback - has affected his ex-Miami Dolphins teammates the same way a damp diaper would.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The unfolding of the Ricky Williams narrative - which now includes his demand for agent Leigh Steinberg to investigate possible pathways for return - has landed as effectively as a soggy diaper with his previous team members from Miami Dolphins, causing their relationships to deteriorate.

Original Text: Component of volcanic gas may have played a significant role in <b>...</b> Scientists at The Scripps Research Institute and the Salk Institute for Biological Studies are reporting a possible answer to a longstanding question in research on the origins of life on Earth--how did the first amino acids form the first peptides?
Translation: Un componente del gas volcánico podría haber jugado un papel significante en <b>...</b> Científicos del Instituto de Investigación Scripps y del Instituto Salk para Estudios Biológicos están informando una posible respuesta a una pregunta de larga data en la investigación sobre los orígenes de la vida en la Tierra: ¿cómo se formaron los primeros péptidos a partir de los primeros aminoácidos?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Scientists from the Scripps Research Institute and the Salk Institute for Biological Studies may have found an answer to a profound question about life's origin on Earth - what led to the formation of the first amino acids into the first peptides? They suggest that a volcanic gas component might have significantly contributed to this process.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With regards to one of the most enduring questions in the study of life's origins on Earth - the formation of the first amino acids into the first peptides, scientists at the Scripps Research Institute and the Salk Institute for Biological Studies propose that elements within volcanic gas may have had a significant role.

Original Text: Nine Antidepressants Raise Suicide Concern -Panel  BETHESDA, Md. (Reuters) - All nine antidepressants studied  by regulators raise concerns about a higher risk of suicidal  behavior in children and teens who take the drugs, a U.S.  advisory panel said on Tuesday.
Translation: Nueve Antidepresivos Elevan la Preocupación sobre el Suicidio - Panel BETHESDA, Md. (Reuters) - Todos los nueve antidepresivos estudiados por los reguladores generan preocupación acerca de un riesgo más elevado de comportamiento suicida en niños y adolescentes que toman estas drogas, dijo un panel asesor de Estados Unidos el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The U.S. advisory panel expressed concerns on Tuesday, warning that all nine antidepressants under investigation may pose a heightened risk of suicide in young children and adolescents who consume these drugs, BETHESDA, Md. (Reuters).
Paraphrase 2: 2) A higher risk of suicidal tendencies in children and teenagers using the drugs has been linked with all nine antidepressants scrutinized by regulators, according to a statement made on Tuesday by a U.S. advisory panel, BETHESDA, Md. (Reuters).

Original Text: U.S. Web Shoppers' Holiday Spending Up (Reuters) Reuters - Online consumers in the United\States spent  #36;8.8 billion, excluding travel purchases, in
Translation: Gasto Festivo de Compradores en Línea de los EE.UU. Aumenta (Reuters) Reuters - Los consumidores en línea en los Estados Unidos gastaron #36;8.8 mil millones, excluyendo las compras de viajes, en
Paraphrase 1: 1. Holiday Spending Increases among U.S. Online Shoppers (Reuters) Reuters - Excluding travel purchases, online consumers in the United States spent $8.8 billion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Internet Users in the U.S. Increase Holiday Expenditure (Reuters) Reuters - In the United States, $8.8 billion was spent by online consumers, not including purchases related to travel.

Original Text: Infineon executives fined; jail term for price fixing NEW YORK, December 6 (newratings.com) - The US Department of Justice has imposed steep fines and announced jail terms for four senior executives of Infineon Technologies (IFX.
Translation: Multan a ejecutivos de Infineon; condena de prisión por fijación de precios NUEVA YORK, 6 de diciembre (newratings.com) - El Departamento de Justicia de los Estados Unidos ha impuesto fuertes multas y anunciado penas de cárcel para cuatro altos ejecutivos de Infineon Technologies (IFX.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Department of Justice announced harsh fines and jail sentences for four high-ranking Infineon Technologies (IFX) executives on December 6 in New York, in relation to their involvement in price fixing.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Four top officials from Infineon Technologies (IFX) faced hefty penalties and imprisonment, as declared by The US Department of Justice in New York on December 6, due to their participation in price manipulation.

Original Text: Countdown to Spa. As the F1 circus leaves Hungary in Eastern Europe, the build up begins to F1s eagerly awaited return to the great Spa-Francorchamps circuit in Belgium this weekend.
Translation: Cuenta regresiva para Spa. A medida que el circo de F1 abandona Hungría en Europa Oriental, comienza la anticipación para el ansiado regreso de la F1 al gran circuito de Spa-Francorchamps en Bélgica este fin de semana.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As the F1 show exits Hungary in Eastern Europe, anticipation builds for F1's highly anticipated comeback to the renowned Spa-Francorchamps circuit in Belgium this coming weekend.

Original Text: Eurostocks close higher Shares in the LSE jumped nearly 26 per cent to a new record at 540 pence after Deutsche Boerse made a 1.3-billion approach, which was rejected by Europe #39;s biggest equity market.
Translation: Las acciones del Eurostocks cierran al alza Las acciones en la LSE aumentaron casi un 26 por ciento hasta un nuevo récord a 540 peniques después de que Deutsche Boerse realizara una oferta de 1.3 mil millones, la cual fue rechazada por el mercado de acciones más grande de Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After Deutsche Boerse laid out a 1.3-billion approach which Europe's largest equity market rejected, the LSE's shares leaped nearly 26 per cent, reaching a new record at 540 pence. This caused Eurostocks to wrap up with substantial gains.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following Deutsche Boerse's 1.3-billion proposal that was turned down by Europe's premier equity market, a near 26 per cent surge was seen in LSE's shares, hitting a fresh record of 540 pence. This resulted in a positive close for Eurostocks.

Original Text: Nortel #39;s Accounting Under Investigation Nortel Networks is under investigation by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police for irregularities in past accounting practices. Announcement of the investigation -- two days before its release of first- and second-quarter financials -- caused ...
Translation: Investigación de la Contabilidad de Nortel. Nortel Networks está bajo investigación por la Real Policía Montada de Canadá por irregularidades en prácticas de contabilidad pasadas. El anuncio de la investigación - dos días antes de la publicación de los resultados financieros del primer y segundo trimestre - causó ...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police are investigating Nortel Networks for past accounting discrepancies. The revelation of this probe, which happened just two days prior to the disclosure of their first and second quarter profits, led to...

Original Text: Ballmer flags security features for a pre-Longhorn Windows  #39; <b>...</b> Speaking at the Gartner Symposium and ITxpo 2004 in Orlando, Florida, yesterday, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer outlined new security initiatives, some of which would make it into a pre-Longhorn  #39;Release 2 #39; for Windows, next year.
Translation: Ballmer destaca características de seguridad para una versión de Windows previa a Longhorn # 39; <b> ... </b> Ayer, en el Simposio Gartner y la ITxpo 2004 en Orlando, Florida, el CEO de Microsoft, Steve Ballmer, delineó nuevas iniciativas de seguridad, algunas de las cuales se incorporarían en una 'Versión 2 # 39;' anterior a Longhorn para Windows, el próximo año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Gartner Symposium and ITxpo 2004 in Orlando, Florida, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer highlighted new security features that will be included in a pre-Longhorn 'Release 2' for Windows next year.

Original Text: UC settles one Enron suit Bee Staff Writer. The University of California, negotiating on behalf of Enron Corp. investors, reached a \$222.5 million settlement Friday with the Lehman Brothers brokerage firm over its part in the multibillion-dollar Enron debacle.
Translation: UC resuelve una demanda de Enron por Bee Staff Writer. La Universidad de California, negociando en nombre de los inversores de Enron Corp., llegó a un acuerdo de \$222.5 millones el viernes con la firma de corretaje Lehman Brothers por su parte en el desastre multimillonario de Enron.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Acting on behalf of Enron Corp. investors, The University of California finally secured a settlement of $222.5 million from the Lehman Brothers brokerage firm on Friday in one of the suits linked to the multibillion-dollar Enron catastrophe.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, The University of California, representing the interests of Enron Corp. investors, finalised a settlement case with the Lehman Brothers brokerage firm. The agreement was worth $222.5 million, and pertained to its involvement in the extensive Enron financial crisis.

Original Text: Typhoon Kills 66 in Japan, Deadliest in 22 Years  TOKYO (Reuters) - Japan's deadliest typhoon in more than  two decades killed 66 people, news reports said on Thursday as  rescuers searched frantically for 22 still missing in floods  and landslides.
Translation: Tifón mata a 66 en Japón, el más mortífero en 22 años TOKIO (Reuters) - El tifón más mortífero de Japón en más de dos décadas mató a 66 personas, informaron las noticias el jueves mientras los rescatistas buscaban frenéticamente a 22 aún desaparecidos en inundaciones y deslizamientos de tierra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the news reports on Thursday, Japan is dealing with its most lethal typhoon in over two decades, claiming 66 lives. Emergency crews are actively searching for 22 individuals still unaccounted for due to floods and landslides.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In what's being described as Japan's deadliest typhoon in 22 years, 66 people have lost their lives. Rescuers are frantically searching for an additional 22 people who remain missing following floods and landslides, as reported by news on Thursday.

Original Text: Hits Record Is Ichiro's 'Best Moment' SEATTLE - The 258th hit in 2004 for Ichiro Suzuki was like so many others, a little ground ball up the middle. Only this one made history - a hit cheered 'round the world...
Translation: El Récord de Hits es el 'Mejor Momento' de Ichiro. SEATTLE - El 258vo hit en 2004 de Ichiro Suzuki fue como tantos otros, un pequeño balón rodado al medio. Solo que este hizo historia - un hit aclamado en todo el mundo...
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Ichiro Suzuki's 'Proudest Moment' Is Setting the Hit Record, SEATTLE - His 258th hit for the year 2004 was just like many others, a small ground ball up the middle. However, this particular hit stood out, as it made history, receiving global applause..."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "SEATTLE - Like numerous others, the 258th hit of Ichiro Suzuki in 2004 was a small ground ball up the middle, but this was the one that went down in history, globally haled, signifying his 'Greatest Moment.'"

Original Text: Tigers' Craig Monroe Facing Theft Charge (AP) AP - Detroit Tigers outfielder Craig Monroe was arrested for allegedly stealing a  #36;29.99 belt from a department store, a records clerk at Charlotte County jail said Tuesday.
Translation: Titular de los Tigres, Craig Monroe, enfrenta cargos por robo (AP) AP - El jardinero de los Tigres de Detroit, Craig Monroe, fue arrestado por supuestamente robar un cinturón de #36;29.99 de una tienda por departamentos, dijo el martes un empleado de registros en la cárcel del condado de Charlotte.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Craig Monroe, an outfielder for the Detroit Tigers, has been detained on allegations of pilfering a $29.99 belt from a retail store, as mentioned by a records clerk from the Charlotte County jail this Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) (AP) The Detroit Tigers' outfielder, Craig Monroe, found himself in legal trouble for reportedly stealing a belt priced at $29.99 from a department store, according to a statement made by a Charlotte County jail records clerk on Tuesday.

Original Text: Karachi bomb  #39;mastermind #39; quizzed The alleged mastermind of a deadly bomb attack outside the US consulate in Karachi two years ago has been arrested near the Pakistani city of Lahore.
Translation: Interrogado el 'cerebro' del atentado de Karachi #39; El supuesto cerebro de un mortal atentado con bomba fuera del consulado de EE.UU. en Karachi hace dos años ha sido arrestado cerca de la ciudad pakistaní de Lahore.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The alleged orchestrator of a fatal bombing outside the US consulate in Karachi two years prior has been taken into custody near Lahore, a Pakistani city.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Near the city of Lahore in Pakistan, the supposed instigator of a deadly bombing that took place outside the US consulate in Karachi two years ago, has been apprehended.

Original Text: Adobe 4Q Earnings Surge 36 Percent (AP) AP - Earnings at Adobe Systems Inc. increased 36 percent in the latest quarter as the company posted record revenue on strong sales of its graphics and imaging software.
Translation: Ganancias del 4T de Adobe aumentan un 36 por ciento (AP) AP - Las ganancias de Adobe Systems Inc. aumentaron un 36 por ciento en el último trimestre ya que la compañía registró ingresos récord gracias a las fuertes ventas de su software de gráficos e imágenes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Adobe Systems Inc. reported a 36% spike in earnings for the recent quarter due to record-setting revenue from robust sales of their graphic and imaging software. (AP)

Original Text: Storm wins WNBA title, beating Connecticut 74-60 Betty Lennox and the Seattle Storm gave the city its first major professional sports title in 25 years -- and made Anne Donovan the first female championship coach in WNBA history.
Translation: Storm gana el título de la WNBA, venciendo a Connecticut 74-60. Betty Lennox y Seattle Storm le dieron a la ciudad su primer gran título profesional deportivo en 25 años, y convirtieron a Anne Donovan en la primera entrenadora campeona en la historia de la WNBA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Seattle Storm, led by Betty Lennox, triumphed over Connecticut with a score of 74-60 to secure the WNBA title, marking the city's first significant professional sports victory in a quarter of a century. This achievement also positioned Anne Donovan as the WNBA's first-ever female championship coach.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anne Donovan became the first woman to coach a team to a WNBA championship when Betty Lennox and the rest of the Seattle Storm defeated Connecticut 74-60. This marked the first major professional sports title for the city in 25 years.

Original Text: Democracy stirs in the Arab world Upcoming elections in Iraq, Saudi Arabia, and the Palestinian Authority are initial steps on still rocky paths to democracy.
Translation: La democracia se agita en el mundo árabe. Las próximas elecciones en Irak, Arabia Saudita y la Autoridad Palestina son los primeros pasos en caminos aún rocosos hacia la democracia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the Arab world, democracy is beginning to emerge. The approaching elections in Iraq, Saudi Arabia, and the Palestinian Authority serve as preliminary stages, albeit with many challenges, towards democratic reform.
Paraphrase 2: 2. There is a burgeoning sense of democracy in the Arab world. The imminent elections in Iraq, Saudi Arabia, and the Palestinian Authority are preliminary measures on a still difficult journey towards democracy.

Original Text: Kazaa Back In Court Beware music downloaders and users of the popular peer-to-peer network known as Kazaa. The Australian recording industry has begun civil proceedings against Sharman Networks Limited, who own the popular file sharing medium.
Translation: De vuelta en el tribunal Kazaa, cuidado con los descargadores de música y los usuarios de la popular red de pares conocida como Kazaa. La industria discográfica australiana ha iniciado procedimientos civiles contra Sharman Networks Limited, que es dueño del popular medio de compartición de archivos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Music downloaders and users of the popular peer-to-peer network, Kazaa, should be cautious. Sharman Networks Limited, the company that owns the widely-used file-sharing platform, is being taken to court by the Australian recording industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Australian recording industry has initiated legal actions against Sharman Networks Limited, the proprietor of the popular file-sharing service, Kazaa. This is a warning to those who download music and utilize this well-known peer-to-peer network.

Original Text: Yudhoyono Becomes President of Indonesia A former general with a doctorate in economics is to be sworn-in as Indonesia #39;s first popularly elected president. . Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono has enjoyed a distinguished career in the military and politics.
Translation: Yudhoyono se convierte en Presidente de Indonesia. Un antiguo general con doctorado en economía será juramentado como el primer presidente elegido popularmente de Indonesia. Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono ha disfrutado de una distinguida carrera en el ejército y la política.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, a former general with an economics doctorate, is set to be inaugurated as Indonesia's first president elected by popular vote, celebrating a remarkable military and political career.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Indonesia's first president to be elected through popular vote, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono – a seasoned military general with a strong footing in economics owing to his doctorate degree – is poised to be officially sworn into office.

Original Text: ConocoPhillips Buys Lukoil Stake for \$1.99 Billion (Update12) ConocoPhillips will buy 7.6 percent of OAO Lukoil from Russia for \$1.99 billion and may raise that stake, expanding its access to the world #39;s largest oil- and gas- producing country as energy prices surge.
Translation: ConocoPhillips compra participación en Lukoil por 1.99 mil millones de dólares (Actualización12) ConocoPhillips comprará el 7.6 por ciento de OAO Lukoil de Rusia por 1.99 mil millones de dólares y podría aumentar esa participación, ampliando su acceso al país productor de petróleo y gas más grande del mundo a medida que los precios de la energía aumentan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As energy prices rise drastically, ConocoPhillips is set to acquire a 7.6 percent stake in Russia's OAO Lukoil for a sum of $1.99 billion, therefore enhancing its reach to the globe's leading oil and gas-producing nation. They may also consider enhancing their share in the future.
Paraphrase 2: 2. For $1.99 billion, ConocoPhillips is planning to secure a 7.6 percent stake in OAO Lukoil from Russia. This move will provide the company increased access to the most significant oil and gas-producing nation worldwide, especially in the face of surging energy prices. The company might also raise its stake down the line.

Original Text: Merrill Lynch looks to 'killer' Apple home media server The Mac maker a likely winner in the digital living room
Translation: Merrill Lynch apunta al 'asesino' servidor de medios domésticos de Apple. El fabricante de Mac, un probable ganador en la sala de estar digital.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Merrill Lynch predicts Apple's impressive home media server to dominate the digital living room space.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tipped by Merrill Lynch, Apple is expected to excel in the digital living room segment with their outstanding home media server.

Original Text: His fire still burning CARSON, Calif. -- Peter Nowak has played in two MLS Cups. He liked the first a lot better.
Translation: Su fuego sigue ardiendo CARSON, Calif. -- Peter Nowak ha jugado en dos Copas MLS. Le gustó mucho más la primera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Carson, California, Peter Nowak still harbors a passion for the sport, having participated in two MLS Cups. However, he expressed a stronger preference for his first experience.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite being based in Carson, California, Peter Nowak's enthusiasm for playing hasn't diminished - he has competed in two MLS Cups and recalls his first time with more fondness.

Original Text: Plane Carrying NBC President Ebersol Crashes in Colorado N.B.C. Sports Chairman and President Dick Ebersol survived a charter plane crash that killed at least two people, NBC said in a statement.
Translation: Avión que transportaba al presidente de NBC Ebersol se estrella en Colorado. El presidente y presidente de deportes de N.B.C., Dick Ebersol, sobrevivió a un accidente de avión charter que mató al menos a dos personas, dijo NBC en un comunicado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A charter plane carrying Dick Ebersol, the President and Chairman of NBC Sports, crashed in Colorado, resulting in at least two fatalities; however, Ebersol survived, according to a statement from NBC.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NBC Sports Chairman and President, Dick Ebersol, was involved in a charter plane crash in Colorado that led to at least two deaths. NBC confirmed in an announcement that Ebersol survived the crash.

Original Text: TI increases dividend, buyback SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- With its stock down 26 percent this year, Texas Instruments boosted its quarterly dividend payment to 2.5 cents a share and set a \$1 billion stock repurchase plan, the chipmaker announced late Thursday.
Translation: TI aumenta dividendo, recompra SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Con su acción bajando un 26 por ciento este año, Texas Instruments aumentó su pago de dividendos trimestral a 2.5 centavos por acción e implementó un plan de recompra de acciones de \$1 mil millones, anunció el fabricante de chips el jueves por la tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Seeing a dip in its stock by 26 percent this year, Texas Instruments has decided to elevate its quarterly dividend payment to 2.5 cents per share. Alongside, the company has also stated a $1 billion stock buyback scheme, which was declared by the chipmaker on late Thursday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite experiencing a 26% plunge in its stock this year, Texas Instruments has announced an increase in its quarterly dividend payment to 2.5 cents per share and has also launched a $1 billion stock repurchase strategy as confirmed by the chip manufacturing firm on late Thursday from San Francisco (CBS.MW).

Original Text: Notebook: Huskies say SJSU game is must-win With the Huskies reeling at 0-4 - the only member of a Bowl Championship Series conference left without a win -an Jose State suddenly looms as the only team left on the schedule that UW will be favored to beat.
Translation: Cuaderno: Los Huskies dicen que el juego contra SJSU es imprescindible ganar. Con los Huskies tambaleándose en 0-4 - el único miembro de una conferencia de la Serie de Campeonato de Bowl sin una victoria - San Jose State de repente surge como el único equipo que queda en el calendario en el que se espera que UW gane.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With a 0-4 record currently dragging them down, the Huskies view the SJSU game as crucial to their season. Given their standing as the only team from a Bowl Championship Series conference yet to secure a win, the upcoming game against San Jose State, which is predicted to be a favorable match for the Huskies, is of utmost importance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The upcoming game against San Jose State is deemed by the Huskies as a must-win. With a current series lose-streak of 0-4, the Huskies are the only Bowl Championship Series conference team without a win. Consequently, they see San Jose State, the last team on their schedule they are anticipated to outplay, as their sole chance at redemption.

Original Text: Alcatel buys conferencing software developer eDial PARIS - French telecommunications equipment specialist Alcatel SA has acquired a U.S. manufacturer of conferencing and collaboration products, eDial Inc., Alcatel said Friday.
Translation: Alcatel compra al desarrollador de software de conferencias eDial PARIS - El especialista francés en equipos de telecomunicaciones Alcatel SA ha adquirido al fabricante estadounidense de productos para conferencias y colaboración, eDial Inc., anunció Alcatel el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Alcatel SA, a French company specialized in telecommunications equipment, announced on Friday that it has purchased eDial Inc., a U.S. based producer of conferencing and collaborative tools.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, Alcatel SA, a French telecommunications equipment company, confirmed their acquisition of eDial Inc., a U.S. firm that develops conferencing and collaboration software.

Original Text: NHLPA proposal rejected The NHL and the players' association appeared headed toward a lockout when talks broke off yesterday after the union's first new proposal in nearly a year.
Translation: La propuesta de NHLPA fue rechazada. La NHL y la asociación de jugadores parecían encaminarse hacia un cierre patronal cuando las negociaciones se interrumpieron ayer después de la primera nueva propuesta de la unión en casi un año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the players' association presented their first new proposal in almost a year, the NHL seemed to be on the path to a lockout due to the termination of discussions yesterday, resulting in the rejection of the NHLPA proposition.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The end of talks yesterday, following the NHLPA's first new proposal in close to a year, signaled a potential lockout between the NHL and the players' association, as their proposal was turned down.

Original Text: High Court Upholds Inmate's Death Penalty (AP) AP - The Supreme Court ruled Monday that a Florida death row inmate should not automatically get a new trial because his lawyer conceded the man's guilt without his consent.
Translation: El Tribunal Supremo Confirma la Pena de Muerte de un Recluso (AP) AP - El Tribunal Supremo dictaminó el lunes que un recluso del corredor de la muerte en Florida no debería obtener automáticamente un nuevo juicio porque su abogado admitió la culpabilidad del hombre sin su consentimiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Supreme Court announced on Monday that a Florida-based prisoner on death row will not be given an automatic retrial due to his lawyer's wrongful admission of his guilt without his agreement (AP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) A death row prisoner in Florida won't be entitled to a straightforward retrial despite his lawyer asserting his guilt without his permission, as decided by The Supreme Court on Monday.

Original Text: Intel Invests in Mobile Wireless Broadband Intel is planning to invest heavily in Clearwire, a wireless broadband service provider. The technology at the heart of Clearwire #39;s service comes from its subsidiary NextNet, which makes a plug
Translation: Intel Invierte en Banda Ancha Inalámbrica Móvil. Intel planea invertir fuertemente en Clearwire, un proveedor de servicios de banda ancha inalámbrica. La tecnología en el corazón del servicio de Clearwire proviene de su subsidiaria NextNet, que fabrica un enchufe.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Intel is making plans for significant investments in Clearwire, a provider of wireless broadband services, which utilizes technology from its subsidiary, NextNet, known for manufacturing a plug.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Planning a major investment in Clearwire, a wireless broadband service provider, Intel aims to support its subsidiary NextNet's technology that provides the core of Clearwire's service, and which makes a plug.

Original Text: Tennis: Spadea, Fish advance but three other seeds fall DELRAY BEACH, United States : Top seed Vince Spadea rallied to join second-seeded fellow American Mardy Fish in the second round of the ATP International Championship here.
Translation: Tenis: Spadea, Fish avanzan pero caen otras tres semillas DELRAY BEACH, Estados Unidos: El cabeza de serie número uno, Vince Spadea, se recuperó para unirse al estadounidense Mardy Fish, segundo cabeza de serie, en la segunda ronda del Campeonato Internacional ATP aquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the ATP International Championship in Delray Beach, United States, top seed Vince Spadea made a comeback to advance to the second round along with the second-seeded American Mardy Fish. However, three other seeds were knocked out.

Original Text: Microsoft Launches Desktop Search Microsoft debuts a preview of its long-anticipated desktop search as part of a toolbar suite that integrates with Windows, Internet Explorer, and the company #39;s Outlook e-mail client.
Translation: Microsoft lanza la búsqueda de escritorio. Microsoft estrena una vista previa de su tan esperada búsqueda de escritorio como parte de un conjunto de barras de herramientas que se integra con Windows, Internet Explorer y el cliente de correo electrónico Outlook de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As part of a toolbar suite that integrates with Windows, Internet Explorer, and its own Outlook email client, Microsoft has finally debuted a preview of its highly expected desktop search.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The long-awaited desktop search from Microsoft has been released as a preview, incorporated within a toolbar suite that functions with Windows, Internet Explorer, and Microsoft's Outlook email application.

Original Text: EMI to Face Spitzer Music Industry Probe  LONDON/NEW YORK (Reuters) - EMI Group PLC <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EMI.L target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EMI.L</A>, the  world's third-largest music company, on Friday said it and  other music companies faced a New York probe into how music  companies influence what songs are played on the radio.
Translation: EMI Enfrentará la Investigación de la Industria Musical por Spitzer LONDRES/NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - EMI Group PLC <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EMI.L target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EMI.L</A>, la tercera compañía musical más grande del mundo, dijo el viernes que tanto ella como otras compañías musicales se enfrentan a una investigación en Nueva York sobre cómo las compañías musicales influyen en qué canciones se reproducen en la radio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON/NEW YORK (Reuters) - EMI Group PLC, the third-largest music company globally, revealed on Friday that it, along with other music firms, is under New York investigation regarding the manipulation by music companies of song selection on radio.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the world's third-largest music company, EMI Group PLC, disclosed that it and other music businesses are subject to a New York investigation exploring the sway of music companies over radio playlist decisions.

Original Text: Glass looks half empty for JD Wetherspoon PUBS group JD Wetherspoon today said a sales slowdown in the second half had taken the fizz out of its annual profits. The city centre pub and bar operator, which runs around 650 outlets including The Standing
Translation: El grupo de PUBS JD Wetherspoon señaló hoy que una disminución en las ventas en la segunda mitad ha quitado el brillo a sus ganancias anuales. El operador de pubs y bares en el centro de la ciudad, que gestiona alrededor de 650 locales, incluyendo The Standing, ve el vaso medio vacío.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The JD Wetherspoon PUBS group stated today that due to a sales slowdown in the last half of the year, its annual profits have suffered. The operator, managing approximately 650 pub and bar establishments like The Standing, indicated that its glass appears half empty.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, JD Wetherspoon admitted that a sales slump in the latter half of the year has deflated its yearly profits. The downtown pub and bar manager, which operates roughly 650 establishments including The Standing, suggested a half-empty glass perspective.

Original Text: Mandrake goes Official with Linux MORENO VALLEY, Calif., and PARIS, Oct. 28 - Mandrakesoft has released Mandrakelinux 10.1 Official, the latest version of its Linux operating system.
Translation: Mandrake se vuelve oficial con Linux MORENO VALLEY, Calif., y PARÍS, 28 de Octubre - Mandrakesoft ha lanzado Mandrakelinux 10.1 Oficial, la última versión de su sistema operativo Linux.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mandrakesoft has launched the latest version of its Linux operating system, Mandrakelinux 10.1 Official, as announced on Oct. 28 in Moreno Valley, California and Paris.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The newest version of the Linux operating system, Mandrakelinux 10.1 Official, has been released by Mandrakesoft, as unveiled in Moreno Valley, California, and Paris on Oct 28.

Original Text: Japan Shares Seen Moving in Narrow Range (Reuters) Reuters - Japanese shares will probably move in a\narrow range in a week shortened by public holidays, but could\dip below the 11,000 level as earnings disappointment saps Wall\Street's momentum and as concern lingers over the global\economic outlook.
Translation: Acciones de Japón se ven moviéndose en un rango estrecho (Reuters) Reuters - Las acciones japonesas probablemente se moverán en un rango estrecho durante una semana acortada por festivos públicos, pero podrían caer por debajo del nivel de 11.000 debido a la decepción de las ganancias que agota el impulso de Wall Street y a medida que persiste la preocupación sobre la perspectiva económica global.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - Anticipations are that Japanese stocks may oscillate within a limited scope in the coming week, which is truncated by public holidays. However, there's a potential drop below the 11,000 mark due to the deflation of Wall Street's vigor caused by earnings letdown, coupled with persisting worries about the global economic forecast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) - In a week cut short by public holidays, it is envisaged that shares in Japan will likely fluctuate within a restricted range. Nonetheless, disappointing earnings which are draining Wall Street's drive, along with ongoing apprehensions about the worldwide economic perspective, could cause them to plunge below the 11,000 benchmark.

Original Text: THQ, Jakks comment on WWE suit Late last night, THQ Inc. and Jakks Pacific, Inc. issued separate responses to the lawsuit filed in district court by World Wrestling Entertainment against the two companies, among others.
Translation:
THQ, Jakks comentan sobre la demanda de WWE

A última hora de la noche, THQ Inc. y Jakks Pacific, Inc. emitieron respuestas separadas a la demanda presentada en el tribunal de distrito por World Wrestling Entertainment contra las dos compañías, entre otras.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last night, THQ Inc. and Jakks Pacific, Inc each independently responded to the lawsuit that World Wrestling Entertainment lodged against them and other businesses in district court.

Original Text: Jacuzzi A Little Too Soggy For a small cap, Jacuzzi has a megabrand. But it's probably not enough to excite investors.
Translation: Jacuzzi Un Poco Demasiado Saturado Para un pequeño capital, Jacuzzi es una megamarca. Pero probablemente no sea suficiente para emocionar a los inversores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Although Jacuzzi is a megabrand despite being a smaller cap, it might not be sufficient to pique investors' interest. The Jacuzzi may be a bit too damp, however.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Given its small cap status, Jacuzzi's megabrand name is impressive, but it may not be captivating enough for investors. In this case, the Jacuzzi might be overly saturated.

Original Text: OU #39;s White takes Maxwell, Davey O #39;Brien awards Oklahoma quarterback Jason White was a two-time award winner Thursday night, taking the Maxwell Award as college football #39;s best all-around player and adding his second straight Davey O #39;Brien quarterback trophy.
Translation: Jason White de la Universidad de Oklahoma, se lleva los premios Maxwell y Davey O'Brien. El quarterback de la Universidad de Oklahoma, Jason White, fue un ganador de dos premios la noche del jueves, obteniendo el premio Maxwell al mejor jugador polifacético del fútbol universitario y sumando su segundo trofeo consecutivo del quarterback Davey O'Brien.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jason White, quarterback for Oklahoma, garnered dual recognition on Thursday night by securing the Maxwell Award as the best all-around player in college football and achieving his second consecutive Davey O'Brien quarterback trophy.

Original Text: Microsoft readies CD launch of SP2 For the nearly 71 percent of the UK who still use dial-up Internet connections, XP SP2 will soon be at hand without a long download.
Translation: Microsoft se prepara para el lanzamiento del CD de SP2. Para casi el 71 por ciento de Reino Unido que todavía utiliza conexiones a Internet de marcación, XP SP2 estará pronto a disposición sin una larga descarga.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the approximately 71 percent of the UK's population who still rely on dial-up internet connections, Microsoft is preparing to launch a CD version of XP SP2, eliminating the need for a lengthy download.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft is set to release a CD version of XP SP2, bringing relief to nearly 71 percent of dial-up internet users in the UK who no longer have to worry about its time-consuming download.

Original Text: ARCHBISHOPS CALL TO END GAY SLURS The Archbishop of Canterbury has written to conservatives in the Anglican Communion, asking them to refrain from using hostile words about homosexuals.
Translation: LOS ARZOBISPOS PIDEN EL FIN DE LOS INSULTOS HOMOFÓBICOS. El Arzobispo de Canterbury ha escrito a los conservadores de la Comunión Anglicana, pidiéndoles que se abstengan de usar palabras hostiles sobre los homosexuales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Archbishop of Canterbury has penned a letter to Anglican Communion conservatives, requesting them to cease using derogatory language towards the homosexual community.

Original Text: Bayern keen to restore European reputation MUNICH, Germany (AFP) - Having qualified for the last sixteen of the Champions League German powerhouse Bayern Munich are determined to repeat their 2001 success to prove they are back as a force in European football.
Translation: Ansioso por restaurar su reputación europea, BAYERN MUNICH, Alemania (AFP) - Tras haberse clasificado para los últimos dieciséis de la Liga de Campeones, el poderoso club alemán Bayern Munich está decidido a repetir su éxito de 2001 para demostrar que han vuelto como una fuerza en el fútbol europeo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MUNICH, Germany (AFP) - Bayern Munich, the German football giant, has made it into the final sixteen of the Champions League and is driven to duplicate their 2001 triumph, underscoring their resurgence in European football.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With their recent qualification into the Champions League's final sixteen, Bayern Munich is resolute in bringing back their 2001 glory and re-establishing their standing in European football, according to MUNICH, Germany (AFP).

Original Text: Scientists create smart phone that doubles as your nanny Scientists at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) are working on software that will get to know you as well as your best mate - and even offers you advice.
Translation: Los científicos crean un teléfono inteligente que funciona como tu niñera. Los científicos del Instituto de Tecnología de Massachusetts (MIT) están trabajando en un software que te conocerá tan bien como tu mejor amigo, e incluso te ofrecerá consejos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Researchers from MIT are in the process of developing a smartphone that not only serves as your nanny but also learns about you in a way that rivals your closest friend; along with providing guidance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A smartphone which can behave as a nanny and also provide advice, by learning about its users as effectively as a best friend would, is currently being developed by a team of scientists at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Original Text: European probe to enter lunar orbit LONDON - A spacecraft the size of a washing machine and driven by a revolutionary ion motor will begin a braking sequence on Monday that should make it the first European mission to enter lunar orbit.
Translation: Sonda europea entrará en órbita lunar LONDRES - Una nave espacial del tamaño de una lavadora y propulsada por un revolucionario motor de iones comenzará una secuencia de frenado el lunes que debería convertirla en la primera misión europea en entrar en órbita lunar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, a spacecraft, similar in size to a washing machine and powered by an innovative ion motor, is slated to initiate a braking sequence, potentially marking it as the first European mission to reach lunar orbit - as reported from London.
Paraphrase 2: 2. London reports that a sizeable spacecraft, comparable to a washing machine, equipped with a cutting-edge ion motor, is set to start its deceleration process on Monday. If successful, it will stand as the inaugural European mission to be captured by the lunar orbit.

Original Text: Hip-hop rings put 'bling' in cell phones Sprint, others hope to hear more ka-ching with "bling tones," cellular ring tones created by hip-hop artists.
Translation: Los anillos de hip-hop ponen 'bling' en los teléfonos móviles. Sprint y otros esperan escuchar más 'ka-ching' con los "tonos bling", tonos de llamada celulares creados por artistas de hip-hop.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sprint and other companies are aiming to increase their revenue with "bling tones," which are cell phone ring notes designed by hip-hop artists, thereby infusing 'bling' into mobile phones.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Bling tones" made by hip-hop artists are adding a 'bling' factor to cell phones, a strategy that Sprint and other businesses hope will lead to more profits.

Original Text: Rice Headed to Seahawks Wide receiver Jerry Rice officially will become a member of the Seattle Seahawks today, provided that he passes a physical and the league approves a trade agreed to late Monday night sending
Translation: Rice se dirige a los Seahawks. El receptor abierto Jerry Rice se convertirá oficialmente en miembro de los Seattle Seahawks hoy, siempre y cuando pase un examen físico y la liga apruebe un traspaso acordado tarde el lunes por la noche para enviarlo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Assuming he passes a physical and the league approves a previously agreed trade, Wide receiver Jerry Rice is set to officially become a member of the Seattle Seahawks today.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jerry Rice, a Wide receiver, is expected to officially join the Seattle Seahawks today, given the trade agreed on late Monday night receives league approval and he passes a physical examination.

Original Text: Mars Rovers Reports Published Both rovers were launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station on central Floridas Space Coast. Spirit ascended in daylight on June 10, 2003.
Translation: Informes Publicados de los Rovers de Marte. Ambos rovers fueron lanzados desde la Estación de la Fuerza Aérea de Cabo Cañaveral en la Costa Espacial central de Florida. Spirit ascendió durante el día el 10 de junio de 2003.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The launch of both Mars Rovers from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, located on Central Florida's Space Coast, was reported. Spirit took off in daylight on June 10, 2003.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Both rovers for Mars were reported to have taken flight from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, found on the Space Coast of Central Florida. Spirit's ascent happened on June 10, 2003 during daylight.

Original Text: Tesco sales exceed expectations Tesco today impressed the City with a surge in third-quarter sales as it boosted market share in clothing and electrical goods. Despite a tougher environment on the high street, Britain #39;s leading retailer
Translation: Las ventas de Tesco superan las expectativas. Hoy Tesco impresionó a la Ciudad con un aumento en las ventas del tercer trimestre, ya que aumentó su participación en el mercado de ropa y productos eléctricos. A pesar de un entorno más duro en la calle principal, el minorista líder de Gran Bretaña.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tesco, Britain's top retailer, astounded the City today with a significant increase in third-quarter sales, surpassing expectations despite a challenging high street environment. This was due to boosting its market share in the clothing and electrical goods sectors.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite the harsh conditions on the high street, Tesco, the leading retailer in Britain, experienced a considerable growth in third-quarter sales today, exceeding forecasted figures. This impressive performance was largely driven by its enhanced market share in the clothing and electrical goods sectors, which caught the City by surprise.

Original Text: Nokia delivers 3G network expansion to MTC in Bahrain (AFP) AFP - Nokia, the world's largest mobile phone maker, said it would provide telecom network equipment to MTC in Bahrain with the aim of rolling out third generation 3G mobile services across the Gulf state by the end of 2004.
Translation: Nokia proporciona expansión de red 3G a MTC en Bahrein (AFP) AFP - Nokia, el fabricante de teléfonos móviles más grande del mundo, dijo que proporcionaría equipos de red de telecomunicaciones a MTC en Bahrein con el objetivo de implementar servicios móviles de tercera generación 3G en todo el estado del Golfo para finales de 2004.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Nokia, the global leader in mobile phone manufacture, has announced plans to supply MTC in Bahrain with telecommunications network equipment intended to facilitate the launch of 3G mobile services throughout the Gulf nation before the end of 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nokia, the largest mobile phone manufacturer worldwide, stated to AFP that it would be delivering 3G network expansion equipment to MTC in Bahrain, with the objective of initiating 3G mobile services across the state before 2004 wraps up.

Original Text: Fed Chairman: US Economic Recovery Continues US Federal Reserve Board Chairman Alan Greenspan Wednesday gave a generally upbeat economic assessment to a congressional committee, saying the US economy seems over the last two months to have withstood the trauma of sharply rising energy prices.
Translation: Presidente de la Fed: La Recuperación Económica de EE.UU Continúa. El presidente de la Junta de la Reserva Federal de EE.UU., Alan Greenspan, dio una evaluación económica generalmente optimista a un comité del Congreso el miércoles, diciendo que la economía de los EE.UU parece, en los últimos dos meses, haber resistido el trauma de los precios de la energía que aumentan bruscamente.
Paraphrase 1: 1. US Federal Reserve Board Chairman, Alan Greenspan, delivered a largely positive overview of the economy to a congressional committee on Wednesday, affirming that the American economy has, in the last two months, successfully withstood the shock of significantly increasing energy prices as the country's economic recovery continues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alan Greenspan, Chairman of US Federal Reserve Board, provided an essentially optimistic analysis of the US economy in front of a congressional committee on Wednesday. He indicated that despite the severe rise in energy costs over the previous two months, the US economy appears to have managed well and the economic restoration of the country endures.

Original Text: Nerve gas death was 'unlawful' An inquest rules that the death of an airman who died in 1953 after a secret nerve gas experiment was unlawful.
Translation: La muerte por gas nervioso fue 'ilegal'. Una investigación determina que la muerte de un aviador que murió en 1953 después de un experimento secreto con gas nervioso fue ilegal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The death of an airman in 1953, subsequent to a confidential nerve gas experiment, has been deemed unlawful by an inquest.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An inquest has decided that the 1953 demise of an airman, following a concealed nerve gas test, was unauthorized.

Original Text: Future Economic Activity Gauge Falls (AP) AP - A closely watched measure of future economic activity fell in August for a third consecutive month, reflecting an uncertain climate for both businesses and consumers.
Translation: Medidor de Actividad Económica Futura Cae (AP) AP - Una medida estrechamente observada de la actividad económica futura cayó en agosto por tercer mes consecutivo, reflejando un clima incierto para las empresas y los consumidores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - For the third consecutive month, the measure used to predict future economic activity experienced a decline in August, indicating unstable conditions for consumers and businesses alike.

Original Text: Bombs in Buenos Aires Kill One Bombs detonated at three banks in downtown Buenos Aires Wednesday resulting in the death of one security guard and in leaving another person injured.
Translation: Bombas en Buenos Aires matan a uno. Las bombas detonaron en tres bancos del centro de Buenos Aires el miércoles, lo que resultó en la muerte de un guardia de seguridad y dejó a otra persona herida.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Wednesday, one security guard was killed, and another person was injured as a result of bombs detonating at three downtown banks in Buenos Aires.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The detonation of bombs at three banks in downtown Buenos Aires on Wednesday led to the death of a security guard and left another person injured.

Original Text: Stocks to Watch Tuesday  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Stocks to watch on Tuesday: JOHNSON    JOHNSON <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNJ.N</A>, GUIDANT CORP. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GDT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GDT.N</A>
Translation: Acciones a Observar el Martes NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Acciones a observar el martes: JOHNSON JOHNSON <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNJ.N</A>, GUIDANT CORP. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GDT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GDT.N</A>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Stocks to Keep an Eye on this Tuesday: JOHNSON & JOHNSON, GUIDANT CORP. (Source: Reuters, New York)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters, New York - This Tuesday, keep a tab on these stocks: JOHNSON & JOHNSON and GUIDANT CORP.

Original Text: 800 million takeover battle for Man Utd Manchester United today electrified the world of football by revealing that it has received a takeover offer worth up to 800 million.
Translation: Batalla de adquisición de 800 millones por el Man Utd Manchester United. Hoy, Manchester United electrificó al mundo del fútbol al revelar que ha recibido una oferta de adquisición de hasta 800 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The world of football was stunned today as Manchester United announced a prospective takeover bid worth as much as 800 million, turning it into a major battle.

Original Text: U.K. Judge: Bankers May Be Extradited (AP) AP - A judge ruled Friday that three British bankers indicted in the United States on Enron-linked fraud charges could be extradited to stand trial in Texas.
Translation: Juez de Reino Unido: Banqueros podrían ser extraditados (AP) AP - Un juez dictaminó el viernes que tres banqueros británicos acusados en los Estados Unidos por cargos de fraude vinculados a Enron podrían ser extraditados para comparecer en juicio en Texas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) - British bankers, who were indicted on fraud charges related to Enron in the United States, can be extradited for trial in Texas, according to a ruling by a U.K. judge on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A judge in the U.K. has decided on Friday to allow the extradition to Texas of three British bankers, indicted on charges of fraud in connection with Enron, as reported by AP.

Original Text: NCAA Game Summary - Stanford vs. Michigan State Michigan State improved to 4-2 all-time against Stanford on the hardwood...Stanford has yet to play at home this season...After scoring 100 or more points in its first three games, Michigan State has not reached the century mark in its last four contests
Translation: Resumen del Juego NCAA - Stanford vs. Michigan State. Michigan State mejoró a 4-2 en todos los tiempos contra Stanford en la cancha de baloncesto... Stanford aún tiene que jugar en casa esta temporada... Después de anotar 100 o más puntos en sus primeros tres juegos, Michigan State no ha alcanzado la marca de cien en sus últimos cuatro enfrentamientos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reaching a 4-2 all-time score against Stanford, Michigan State confirmed its supremacy on the basketball court...Despite the season progressing, Stanford is yet to host a game...Starting the season off with three consequent matches scoring 100 points or more, Michigan State has struggled to reach the hundred points in its latest four encounters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Michigan State, improving its all-time record to 4-2 against Stanford, displayed its prowess in basketball...Stanford has still not played a single game at home this season...Even after an impressive start to the season with hundred plus points in the initial three games, Michigan State hasn't managed to hit a century in the score in the past four games.

Original Text: Placer Dome forecasts higher 2005 gold production VANCOUVER - Mining company Placer Dome said its gold production is expected to hit 3.7 million ounces next year, up from its 2004 forecast of 3.6 million ounces.
Translation: Placer Dome pronostica una mayor producción de oro en 2005 VANCOUVER - La compañía minera Placer Dome dijo que se espera que su producción de oro alcance las 3.7 millones de onzas el próximo año, en comparación con su pronóstico de 2004 de 3.6 millones de onzas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Vancouver, Placer Dome, a mining corporation, has announced an anticipated increase in their gold production for 2005. They expect to achieve up to 3.7 million ounces, a rise from the previous year's projection of 3.6 million ounces.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The mining firm, Placer Dome based in Vancouver, projects a boost in their gold output for 2005 to 3.7 million ounces, which shows a growth from the estimated 3.6 million ounces of the 2004 forecast.

Original Text: MOUSE MADE OVITZ CHEESY DEAL Hollywood dealmaker Michael Ovitz quietly got a very stingy options package before joining Walt Disney - because insiders thought he might flop.
Translation: RATÓN HIZO A OVITZ UN TRATO CUTRE: El negociador de Hollywood, Michael Ovitz, obtuvo discreta y escasamente un paquete de opciones antes de unirse a Walt Disney, porque los internos pensaban que podría fracasar.
