Paraphrase 1: 1. Before joining Walt Disney, Hollywood dealmaker Michael Ovitz was discreetly given a parsimonious options package as insiders suspected he might underperform - a deal that could be aptly termed as a 'cheesy' deal by mouse.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Michael Ovitz, a notable Hollywood dealmaker, was unobtrusively offered a grudgingly parsimonious options package prior to his association with Walt Disney due to the internal speculation that he might fail, which was metaphorically referred to as the 'mouse' manufacturing a 'cheesy' deal.

Original Text: WBA complete Earnshaw signing WEST BROMWICH, Aug 30 (SW) - English Premiership club West Brom have finalised the purchase of Wales striker Robert Earnshaw. The 3m fee paid to Cardiff City is a club record for the midlands club, a price
Translation: WBA completa la contratación de Earnshaw WEST BROMWICH, 30 de agosto (SW) - El club de la Premiership inglesa, West Brom, ha finalizado la compra del delantero galés Robert Earnshaw. La tarifa de 3 millones pagada a Cardiff City es un récord para el club de las midlands, un precio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WEST BROMWICH, Aug 30 (SW) - The English Premier League team, West Brom, have successfully completed the acquisition of Welsh forward Robert Earnshaw from Cardiff City. The transaction, costing the Midlands club a record-breaking fee of 3m, is the most they have ever paid.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On August 30th in West Bromwich, reported by SW, West Bromwich football club officially confirmed purchasing Welsh player Robert Earnshaw. The substantial 3m fee given to Cardiff City has set a new record for the club from the Midlands, achieving a new high in their expenses.

Original Text: Nationalists ahead in Bosnia #39;s local elections SARAJEVO : Bosnia #39;s ruling Croat, Muslim and Serb nationalists, who led the Balkans country throughout its 1992-95 inter-ethnic war, confirmed their dominance in local elections over the weekend, first partial results showed.
Translation: Los nacionalistas lideran en las elecciones locales de Bosnia. SARAJEVO: Los nacionalistas croatas, musulmanes y serbios gobernantes de Bosnia, quienes lideraron el país de los Balcanes durante su guerra interétnica de 1992-95, confirmaron su dominio en las elecciones locales durante el fin de semana, según mostraron los primeros resultados parciales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Bosnia's recent local elections, first partial results revealed that the country's ruling nationalists - Croat, Muslim, and Serb - who guided the nation during its 1992-95 inter-ethnic war, reaffirmed their leadership position.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the weekend, initial partial results from Bosnia's local elections showed that the ruling nationalists from Croat, Muslim, and Serb sections, who had spearheaded the country during the 1992-95 internecine conflict, re-established their supremacy.

Original Text: Apple plans Toronto retail store Mac maker is taking its retail act north of the border, CNET News.com has learned.\<br /> Photo: iPod's Toronto presence
Translation:
Apple planea tienda minorista en Toronto. El fabricante de Mac lleva su acto de venta al por menor al norte de la frontera, ha sabido CNET News.com.
Foto: presencia de iPod en Toronto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CNET News.com has discovered that Apple, the manufacturer of Mac, is intending to extend their retail operations to Toronto, highlighting the iPod's presence in the city.

Original Text: Sox Fans Hope Team #39;s Magic Continues SALEM, NH -- Red Sox fans can be superstitious, and students and teachers in one New Hampshire town are using ritual and music to try to bring the team luck.
Translation: Los fanáticos de los Sox esperan que la magia del equipo #39 continúe. SALEM, NH -- Los fanáticos de los Red Sox pueden ser supersticiosos, y estudiantes y profesores en un pueblo de New Hampshire están utilizando rituales y música para intentar traer suerte al equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Residents of a New Hampshire town, including students and teachers who are Red Sox followers, are resorting to music and rituals in their superstitious ways, hoping their team's good run remains unbroken.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In Salem, New Hampshire, Red Sox enthusiasts are channeling good luck through music and rituals, in hopes of keeping the team's winning streak alive.

Original Text: UK hostage Bigley murdered in Iraq The family of the British hostage Kenneth Bigley confirm that he has been killed by his captors in Iraq.
Translation: Rehén británico Bigley asesinado en Irak. La familia del rehén británico Kenneth Bigley confirma que ha sido asesinado por sus secuestradores en Irak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Kenneth Bigley, a British hostage in Iraq, has been confirmed dead by his family, murdered by his captives.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The captors in Iraq have killed British hostage Kenneth Bigley, a fact that his family has confirmed.

Original Text: Not All Dutch Auctions Are Equal Jeff Stacey, managing director of researcher IPO Monitor in Los Angeles, says Dutch auctions are designed to set the price accurately right away.
Translation: No Todas Las Subastas Holandesas Son Iguales. Jeff Stacey, director gerente del investigador IPO Monitor en Los Ángeles, dice que las subastas holandesas están diseñadas para establecer el precio con precisión de inmediato.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jeff Stacey, the managing director of IPO Monitor in Los Angeles, explains that Dutch auctions are configured to establish a precise price instantly, but they are not all identical.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite not all Dutch auctions being identical, they are intended to immediately determine an accurate price, according to Jeff Stacey, IPO Monitor's managing director based in Los Angeles.

Original Text: Real estate mogul gifts \$100m to Michigan Univ DETROIT: New York real estate mogul Stephen Ross has made a \$100m donation to the University of Michigan, a gift the school hailed as the biggest in its 187-year history.
Translation: Magnate de bienes raíces dona \$100m a la Universidad de Michigan DETROIT: El magnate de bienes raíces de Nueva York, Stephen Ross, ha realizado una donación de \$100m a la Universidad de Michigan, un regalo que la escuela aclamó como el más grande en sus 187 años de historia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. DETROIT: Renowned New York property tycoon, Stephen Ross, has bestowed a donation of \$100m to the University of Michigan, marking the largest gift ever received by the institution in its history spanning 187 years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Stephen Ross, a prominent real estate magnate from New York, has generously donated \$100m to the University of Michigan in DETROIT. The university acknowledged this contribution as the most substantial in its 187 years of existence.

Original Text: Sony's SXRD Projection TV to Take on DLP New rear-projection technology from Sony to be featured in new HDTV.
Translation: La Televisión de Proyección SXRD de Sony para Competir con DLP. La nueva tecnología de proyección trasera de Sony se presentará en el nuevo HDTV.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony's new HDTV will feature a SXRD rear-projection technology, a move meant to compete with DLP.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sony is introducing an SXRD Projection TV, featuring new rear-projection technology in its latest HDTV, aimed at rivaling DLP.

Original Text: Agassi Sends Out Warning with Novak Win  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Twice champion Andre Agassi sent out  an ominous warning to his rivals for the U.S. Open title on  Saturday with a ruthless 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 third-round demolition  of Czech Jiri Novak.
Translation: Agassi Envia Advertencia con Victoria sobre Novak NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - El dos veces campeón Andre Agassi envió una amenaza ominosa a sus rivales por el título del U.S. Open el sábado con una despiadada victoria de 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 en la tercera ronda contra el checo Jiri Novak.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Two-time champion Andre Agassi issued a stark warning to his U.S. Open title contenders on Saturday, decimating Czech Jiri Novak with a brutal 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 third-round triumph.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Andre Agassi, twice a champion,  sent a powerful signal to his competitors for the U.S. Open title on Saturday by mercilessly defeating Czech Jiri Novak 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 in the third round.

Original Text: Five missing German tourists found FIVE German tourists who went missing in Algeria #39;s Sahara desert have been found safe and well in the southern Djanet region of the north African country, local police said today.
Translation: Se encontraron cinco turistas alemanes desaparecidos. CINCO turistas alemanes que habían desaparecido en el desierto del Sahara en Argelia fueron encontrados sanos y salvos en la región sureña de Djanet del país norteafricano, dijo hoy la policía local.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to local police, five German tourists who disappeared in Algeria's Sahara desert have been safely located in the southern Djanet region of the North African nation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Local authorities confirmed today that five German tourists, previously reported missing in Algeria's Sahara desert, have been discovered unharmed in the southern part of country's Djanet region.

Original Text: 13 dead, nine injured in Turkish mine tunnel fire ANKARA (AFP) - Thirteen workers were killed and nine were injured Wednesday in a massive blaze in a tunnel under construction at a copper mine in northern Turkey, the construction company said.
Translation: 13 muertos, nueve heridos en incendio en túnel de mina en Turquía ANKARA (AFP) - Trece trabajadores murieron y nueve resultaron heridos el miércoles en un enorme incendio en un túnel en construcción en una mina de cobre en el norte de Turquía, dijo la empresa constructora.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In a tragic incident in northern Turkey, a colossal fire in an under-construction tunnel at a copper mine claimed the lives of thirteen workers and left nine injured on Wednesday, according to statements from the construction company.
Paraphrase 2: 2) On Wednesday, a major fire broke out in a northern Turkish copper mine's construction tunnel, resulting in thirteen fatalities and nine injuries, as reported by the construction company involved.

Original Text: Intel Drives Tech Sell-Off as Data Looms (Reuters) Reuters - A sell-off in tech stocks following\Intel Corp.'s disappointing outlook pushed Asian shares lower\on Friday, overpowering pockets of strength in some financial,\consumer and industrial issues.
Translation: Intel Impulsa la Venta de Tecnología mientras se Acerca la Data (Reuters) Reuters - Una venta de acciones de tecnología siguiendo una perspectiva decepcionante de la Corporación Intel empujó a la baja las acciones asiáticas el viernes, eclipsando bolsillos de fortaleza en algunas cuestiones financieras, de consumo e industriales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Asian shares witnessed a decrease on Friday due to a tech stocks sell-off triggered by Intel Corp.'s unsatisfactory forecasts, which outweighed isolated strengths in some financial, consumer, and industrial sectors. (Reuters)
Paraphrase 2: 2. A gloom cast over Asian shares on Friday as a sell-off in technology stocks, prompted by a dismal forecast from Intel Corp, overshadowed sporadic highs in financial, consumer, and industrial issues. (Reuters)

Original Text: Latest Zafi Worm Wreaking Holiday E-Mail Havoc The Zafi.D worm, which disguises itself as an e-mail holiday greeting, is currently the most frequently detected worldwide virus, software security company Panda Software said this week.
Translation: Último Gusano Zafi Causando Estragos en Correos Electrónicos durante las Vacaciones. El gusano Zafi.D, que se disfraza como un saludo de vacaciones por correo electrónico, es actualmente el virus más detectado a nivel mundial, dijo esta semana la compañía de seguridad de software Panda Software.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Panda Software, the Zafi.D worm, posing as an email holiday greeting, is presently the most frequently identified virus globally, causing chaos in holiday emails.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This week, Panda Software reported that the Zafi.D worm is the most often detected virus across the globe, masquerading as a holiday greeting in emails and thereby, leading to a disorder in holiday e-mail activities.

Original Text: Lindley Leads LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge (AP) AP - Leta Lindley birdied seven holes Saturday to shoot a 6-under 65 and take a one-shot lead over two-time champion Juli Inkster after three rounds at the LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge.
Translation: Lindley lidera el desafío LPGA Longs Drugs (AP) AP - Leta Lindley embocó siete hoyos el sábado para hacer un 6 bajo par 65 y tomar la delantera de un golpe sobre la dos veces campeona Juli Inkster después de tres rondas en el Desafío LPGA Longs Drugs.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) After three rounds at the LPGA Longs Drugs Challenge, Leta Lindley outperformed all, hitting birdies on seven holes to score a 6-under 65. This puts her one shot ahead of two-time champion, Juli Inkster.

Original Text: Polish president urges S. Korean firms to boost Polish investments (AFP) AFP - Polish President Aleksander Kwasniewski urged South Korean companies to step up their investments in his country as President Roh Moo-Hyun wrapped up a two-day visit to Warsaw.
Translation: Traducir esto al español de manera precisa: El presidente de Polonia insta a las empresas de Corea del Sur a impulsar las inversiones polacas (AFP) AFP - El presidente polaco Aleksander Kwasniewski instó a las empresas surcoreanas a intensificar sus inversiones en su país mientras el presidente Roh Moo-Hyun concluía una visita de dos días a Varsovia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Aleksander Kwasniewski, the President of Poland, had urged companies from South Korea to escalate their investments in Poland. This plea was issued as President Roh Moo-Hyun concluded his two-day tour of Warsaw (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. During President Roh Moo-Hyun's two-day Warsaw visit, South Korean businesses were asked by Polish President Aleksander Kwasniewski to increase their investments in Poland (AFP).

Original Text: Wal-Mart Lowers August Sales Forecast BENTONVILLE, Ark. Aug. 23, 2004 - Wal-Mart Stores Inc., the world #39;s biggest retailer, lowered its sales forecast for August, citing Hurricane Charley #39;s swipe across Florida and slower than expected back-to-school sales.
Translation: Wal-Mart reduce la previsión de ventas de agosto BENTONVILLE, Ark. 23 de agosto de 2004 - Wal-Mart Stores Inc., el minorista más grande del mundo, redujo su previsión de ventas para agosto, citando el paso del Huracán Charley por Florida y ventas de regreso a la escuela más lentas de lo esperado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Citing reasons such as Hurricane Charley's passage through Florida and slower back-to-school sales, Wal-Mart Stores Inc., the leading global retailer, reduced their anticipated sales for August 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The world's largest retailer, Wal-Mart Stores Inc., diminished its August sales forecast. The company cited slower than anticipated back-to-school sales and the impact of Hurricane Charley in Florida as the reasons behind this decision on August 23, 2004, in Bentonville, Ark.

Original Text: Russian, US astronauts leave ISS on maintenance mission The Russian-US crew of the International Space Station (ISS) went on a five-hour space walk overnight to carry out maintenance work, Russian space officials said on Saturday, quoted by ITAR-TASS news agency.
Translation: Astronautas rusos y estadounidenses salen de la ISS en misión de mantenimiento. La tripulación ruso-estadounidense de la Estación Espacial Internacional (ISS) realizó una caminata espacial de cinco horas durante la noche para llevar a cabo trabajos de mantenimiento, dijeron el sábado funcionarios espaciales rusos, citados por la agencia de noticias ITAR-TASS.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On a maintenance mission, astronauts from Russia and the United States departed from the ISS, according to Russian space officials on Saturday via ITAR-TASS news agency. The crew embarked on a five-hour spacewalk overnight to execute necessary technical work.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The crew of the International Space Station, comprising Russian and US astronauts, began an overnight spacewalk spanning five hours, aiming to undertake maintenance work. This was reported on Saturday by Russian space officials, as disclosed by the ITAR-TASS news agency.

Original Text: South Dakota Electoral Race Is Rerun Under a Shadow (Reuters) Reuters - It has only been four months\since Stephanie Herseth became the first woman ever elected to\the House of Representatives from South Dakota, but the\prominence that win gave her may make the difference as she\faces the same opponent again for a full two-year term.
Translation: Carrera Electoral de Dakota del Sur se Repite Bajo una Sombra (Reuters) Reuters - Han pasado apenas cuatro meses desde que Stephanie Herseth se convirtió en la primera mujer elegida para la Cámara de Representantes de Dakota del Sur, pero el prestigio que le otorgó esa victoria puede marcar la diferencia mientras se enfrenta nuevamente al mismo oponente para un período completo de dos años.
Paraphrase 1: (1) Reuters - Merely four months ago, Stephanie Herseth made history as the first woman from South Dakota to get elected to the House of Representatives. With the prominence her victory brought, she stands a good chance in the battle against the same contender for a complete two-year term.
Paraphrase 2: (2) Reuters - Stephanie Herseth, having become the first-ever female representative from South Dakota in the House just four months ago, is now facing the same candidate for a full term of two years. The reputation that her initial win earned her could potentially influence her success.

Original Text: Nikkei Down, Oil Worries Hit Exporters (Reuters) Reuters - Tokyo's Nikkei fell 1.66 percent by\midday on Monday, extending losses into a third day as another\surge in oil prices deepened worries about the global economic\impact and knocked down exporters such as Toyota Motor Corp.
Translation: Nikkei a la Baja, las Preocupaciones por el Petróleo Golpean a los Exportadores (Reuters) Reuters - El Nikkei de Tokio cayó un 1.66 por ciento al mediodía del lunes, extendiendo las pérdidas a un tercer día ante otro aumento en los precios del petróleo que profundizó las preocupaciones sobre el impacto económico global y golpeó a los exportadores como Toyota Motor Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Tokyo's significant stock market index, the Nikkei, dropped by 1.66 percent by Monday midday, making it the third consecutive day of losses. Increasing concerns over the repercussions of a further escalation in oil prices on the global economy were pivotal factors, significantly affecting exporters such as Toyota Motor Corp.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (Reuters) On Monday, rising oil prices further fueled anxieties about their effect on the global economy and led to the Nikkei in Tokyo dropping 1.66 percent by midday. This marks the third day of consecutive losses with exporters like Toyota Motor Corp being notably affected.

Original Text: US warns rebels to curb attacks in Darfur The United States is increasingly worried about attacks by rebel groups in Darfur even as Sudan seems to be reining in militias on the other side of the conflict, a senior US official said on Friday.
Translation: EE.UU advierte a los rebeldes que limiten los ataques en Darfur. Estados Unidos está cada vez más preocupado por los ataques de grupos rebeldes en Darfur, incluso a medida que Sudán parece estar controlando a las milicias en el otro lado del conflicto, dijo un alto funcionario de EE.UU el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "A senior US official commented on Friday expressing the growing concern of the United States about the increasing attacks by rebels in Darfur, notwithstanding Sudan's efforts to control militias in the opposing faction."

Original Text: Four share lead at Nedbank Challenge Sun City, South Africa (Sports Network) - Ernie Els and Retief Goosen, the No. 3 and 4 players in the world, posted rounds of two-under-par 70 on Thursday to grab a share of the lead after one round of the Nedbank Golf Challenge.
Translation: Cuatro comparten liderato en el Desafío Nedbank en Sun City, Sudáfrica (Red Deportiva) - Ernie Els y Retief Goosen, los jugadores número 3 y 4 del mundo, registraron rondas de dos bajo par 70 el jueves para obtener una parte del liderato después de una ronda del Desafío de Golf Nedbank.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ernie Els and Retief Goosen, ranked as the world's No. 3 and No. 4 players, scored rounds of two-under-par 70 on Thursday, thereby securing a share of the lead in the first round of the Nedbank Golf Challenge in Sun City, South Africa.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At the Nedbank Golf Challenge in Sun City, South Africa, the world's third and fourth best players, Ernie Els and Retief Goosen respectively, shot rounds of two-under-par 70 on Thursday. This score landed them in a shared lead position after the tournament's first round.

Original Text: Failed European first Mars probe, Beagle 2, still a mystery Scientists are no closer to discovering what happened to the ill-fated space probe Beagle 2, which vanished while attempting to land on Mars, according to an investigation released Tuesday.
Translation: La primera sonda marciana europea fallida, Beagle 2, sigue siendo un misterio. Los científicos no están más cerca de descubrir lo que le sucedió a la desafortunada sonda espacial Beagle 2, que desapareció mientras intentaba aterrizar en Marte, según una investigación publicada el martes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The mystery of the unsuccessful Beagle 2, Europe's first Mars probe, continues to baffle scientists. Despite recent investigations, scientists have not made any progress in uncovering the fate of the space probe, which disappeared during its Mars landing attempt, as reported on Tuesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The fate of Beagle 2, the first Mars probe from Europe that failed, remains unclear, as per the findings of an investigation released Tuesday. The probe suddenly disappeared while attempting a Martian landing, and scientists still don't have any clues as to what happened.

Original Text: Sports Awards: Holmes wins BBC Sports Personality of the Year If it came as a surprise that Kelly Holmes should win two gold medals at the Athens Olympics, her victory in White City last night, where she became the BBC Sports Personality of the Year, was a racing certainty.
Translation: Premios Deportivos: Holmes gana el premio a la Personalidad Deportiva del Año de la BBC. Si fue una sorpresa que Kelly Holmes ganara dos medallas de oro en los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas, su victoria en White City anoche, donde se convirtió en la Personalidad Deportiva del Año de la BBC, era una certeza indiscutible.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If Kelly Holmes's astonishing twin gold medal victory at the Athens Olympics astounded some, winning the BBC Sports Personality of the Year award in White City was deemed an inevitable triumph.
Paraphrase 2: 2. People were surprised when Kelly Holmes earned two gold medals at the Athens Olympics, yet her clinching of the BBC Sports Personality of the Year award in White City was anticipated with absolute certainty.

Original Text: Kidnappers behead British hostage Fulfilling the worst nightmares of a British family, kidnappers Friday released a video showing their beheading of Kenneth Bigley, a contractor seized from his Baghdad
Translation: Secuestradores decapitan a rehén británico: Cumpliendo las peores pesadillas de una familia británica, los secuestradores liberaron este viernes un video mostrando su decapitación de Kenneth Bigley, un contratista secuestrado desde su Bagdad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A video depicting the beheading of Kenneth Bigley, a contractor kidnapped from his Baghdad home, was released by his captors, on Friday, marking the dreadful realization of his British family's worst nightmares.

Original Text: Kodak hears call of camera phones, answers big time Cellphones that can take and display digital photographs have become enough of a market force to attract major attention from a company long synonymous with photography: Eastman Kodak Co.
Translation: Kodak escucha el llamado de los teléfonos con cámara, responde en grande. Los teléfonos móviles que pueden tomar y mostrar fotografías digitales se han convertido en una fuerza de mercado lo suficientemente grande como para atraer la atención importante de una compañía largamente sinónimo de fotografía: Eastman Kodak Co.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Eastman Kodak Co., a company that has been long associated with photography, is significantly responding to the growing market trend of cellular phones capable of taking and displaying digital photos.

Original Text: Real Madrid Stadium Evacuated in ETA Bomb Threat  MADRID (Reuters) - Some 70,000 people were forced to  evacuate Real Madrid's Santiago Bernabeu stadium minutes before  the end of a league match on Sunday after a bomb threat in the  name of ETA Basque separatist guerrillas.
Translation: Desalojo del Estadio del Real Madrid por Amenaza de Bomba de ETA MADRID (Reuters) - Unas 70,000 personas fueron obligadas a evacuar el estadio Santiago Bernabeu del Real Madrid minutos antes del final de un partido de liga el domingo, tras una amenaza de bomba en nombre de los guerrilleros separatistas vascos de ETA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ETA Basque Separatist Guerrillas Bomb Threat Forces Evacuation of Real Madrid Stadium: About 70,000 individuals had to hastily leave Santiago Bernabeu, Real Madrid's stadium, just before a league match concluded on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Bomb Threat Attributed to ETA Basque Separatist Guerrillas Results in Evacuation of Real Madrid Ground: On Sunday, moments prior to the end of a league football game, approximately 70,000 spectators had to abandon their seats and evacuate the Santiago Bernabeu stadium.

Original Text: E.U., Coca-Cola Antitrust Case Over The changes include an end to exclusivity arrangements with stores or restaurants, while allowing Coca-Cola to avoid a fine and potentially years of continued legal wrangling.
Translation: Caso Antimonopolio de la UE con Coca-Cola: Los cambios incluyen el fin de los acuerdos de exclusividad con tiendas o restaurantes, al mismo tiempo que permiten a Coca-Cola evitar una multa y potencialmente años de continuos litigios legales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The modifications in the E.U., Coca-Cola Antitrust Case conclude the exclusivity deals with stores or restaurants, while Coca-Cola escapes any penalties and possibly protracted legal disputes.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The changes in the E.U., Coca-Cola Antitrust Case, mean that Coca-Cola can avoid a fine and possibly prolonged legal difficulties, and also puts a stop to exclusive contracts with either stores or restaurants.

Original Text: Astronauts Practice Survival Skills (AP) AP - Astronauts spend years training before they can lift off into space. They learn to operate shuttles, perform experiments in zero-gravity, and eat bugs if they must.
Translation: "Los Astronautas Practican Habilidades de Supervivencia (AP) AP - Los astronautas pasan años entrenándose antes de poder despegar al espacio. Aprenden a operar transbordadores, realizar experimentos en gravedad cero y comer insectos si es necesario."
Paraphrase 1: 1) Before they can embark on their journey into space, astronauts undergo years of rigorous training, learning how to operate space shuttles, conduct zero-gravity experiments, and even subsist on bugs if the situation calls for it.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Astronauts receive extensive training over many years preceding their space missions, mastered in shuttle operation, scientific experiments in a weightless environment, and survival techniques including consuming insects when necessary.

Original Text: Family Spending Part of Its Dollar While it is true that many Americans have moved into the ranks of being considered millionaires, the lower-income portion of the country has been taking a worse beating than boxer Roy Jones Jr.
Translation: Gasto Familiar de Parte de su Dólar Si bien es cierto que muchos estadounidenses han ascendido a las filas de ser considerados millonarios, la parte de ingresos más bajos del país ha estado recibiendo un golpe peor que el boxeador Roy Jones Jr.
Paraphrase 1: 1. While it's accurate to assert that numerous Americans have ascended to millionaire status, the impact on the country's less wealthy section has been more severe than the pounding Roy Jones Jr. took as a boxer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Indeed, several Americans have managed to cross over into the millionaires' stratum, yet the brunt endured by the country's lower-income population surpasses the level of beating experienced by boxer Roy Jones Jr.

Original Text: Vanunu re-arrested Former nuclear technician Mordechai Vanunu has been re-arrested in Israel, the BBC and Israeli media reported Thursday. Vanunu, who was freed in April after spending 18 years
Translation: Vanunu es arrestado de nuevo. El antiguo técnico nuclear Mordechai Vanunu ha sido arrestado de nuevo en Israel, informaron el jueves la BBC y los medios israelíes. Vanunu, que fue liberado en abril después de pasar 18 años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As reported by the BBC and Israeli media on Thursday, Mordechai Vanunu, a former nuclear technician, has been arrested once again in Israel. Vanunu, after spending 18 years, was released in April.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Former nuclear technician Mordechai Vanunu has been taken into custody again in Israel, according to reports from the BBC and Israeli Media on Thursday. Vanunu attained freedom in April, following an 18-year imprisonment.

Original Text: RosettaNet takes standards push to small firms The group, which is pushing for adoption of a universal e-business language, wants to make its standards easier and cheaper to use.
Translation: RosettaNet lleva el impulso de estándares a pequeñas empresas. El grupo, que está impulsando la adopción de un lenguaje universal de comercio electrónico, quiere hacer que sus estándares sean más fáciles y baratos de usar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. RosettaNet aims to promote the implementation of a universal e-business language by making its standards more cost-effective and simpler for small firms. The group is strongly endorsing these standards.

Original Text: Putin Opines on Iraq Election Date (AP) AP - President Vladimir Putin said Tuesday he could not imagine how Iraqi elections scheduled for Jan. 30 could be held under current conditions.
Translation: Putin Opina Sobre la Fecha de las Elecciones en Irak (AP) AP - El presidente Vladimir Putin dijo el martes que no puede imaginar cómo las elecciones programadas en Iraq para el 30 de enero podrían llevarse a cabo bajo las condiciones actuales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - President Vladimir Putin expressed on Tuesday his uncertainty about the feasibility of the upcoming Iraqi elections, slated for Jan. 30, given the existing conditions.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Under the prevailing conditions, President Vladimir Putin expressed on Tuesday his inability to foresee the scheduled Iraqi elections taking place on Jan. 30.

Original Text: Arafat in intensive care PARIS: Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat is in a coma in critical condition, a senior Palestinian official says. Arafat has been in intensive care in a French military hospital outside Paris since Wednesday afternoon.
Translation: Arafat en cuidados intensivos PARÍS: El líder palestino Yasser Arafat está en coma en estado crítico, dice un alto funcionario palestino. Arafat ha estado en cuidados intensivos en un hospital militar francés a las afueras de París desde el miércoles por la tarde.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "In a French military hospital outside Paris, Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat is under intensive care and in a critical condition, as confirmed by a senior Palestinian official. From Wednesday afternoon, Arafat has been in a comatose state.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "A senior Palestinian official confirmed that Yasser Arafat, the Palestinian leader, is in a coma and in serious condition. Since Wednesday afternoon, he has been admitted in the intensive care unit of a French military hospital located just outside of Paris."

Original Text: Look to the sky tonight for eclipse If you still don #39;t believe the Earth is round, check out tonight #39;s lunar eclipse: It was enough to convince the ancient Greeks.
Translation: Mira al cielo esta noche para el eclipse. Si aún no crees que la Tierra es redonda, echa un vistazo al eclipse lunar de esta noche: fue suficiente para convencer a los antiguos griegos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. If you still have doubts about the Earth being round, tonight's lunar eclipse should convince you - it was sufficient proof for the ancient Greeks. Don't forget to gaze upon the sky tonight.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Turn your gaze skyward tonight for the lunar eclipse, it might just change your disbelief about the Earth's round shape - a belief that has been backed since the time of ancient Greeks.

Original Text: Census: Poverty up in 2003 WASHINGTON -- The number of Americans in poverty and those without health insurance each rose by more than 1 million in 2003, the Census Bureau reported Thursday.
Translation: Censo: La pobreza aumentó en 2003 WASHINGTON -- El número de estadounidenses en situación de pobreza y aquellos sin seguro médico aumentó en más de 1 millón en 2003, informó el jueves la Oficina del Censo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) The Census Bureau reported on Thursday that in 2003, the count of American citizens living in poverty and those without any health insurance increased by over one million respectively.
Paraphrase 2: 2) According to a Thursday report from the Census Bureau, both the population of impoverished Americans and those lacking health insurance ascended by more than one million each in 2003.

Original Text: Ogunleye traded for Bear receiver A messy contract holdout and the need for a top-flight wide receiver prompted the Dolphins to agree on a trade Saturday that will send defensive end Adewale Ogunleye to the Chicago Bears for Marty Booker and a 2005 third-round draft pick.
Translation: Ogunleye es intercambiado por el receptor de los Bears. Un complicado desacuerdo contractual y la necesidad de un receptor de gran categoría llevaron a los Dolphins a acordar un intercambio el sábado que enviará al ala defensiva Adewale Ogunleye a los Chicago Bears a cambio de Marty Booker y una selección de tercera ronda del draft de 2005.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Dolphins decided on a trade on Saturday due to a complicated contract dispute and a requirement for a high-quality wide receiver. This decision led to the transfer of defensive end Adewale Ogunleye to the Chicago Bears in exchange for Marty Booker and a third-round draft pick for 2005.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Owing to an intricate contract holdout and the necessity for a superior wide receiver, the Dolphins concurred to trade defensive end Adewale Ogunleye to the Chicago Bears for Marty Booker and a 2005 third-round draft pick, on Saturday.

Original Text: Civil Society Slights Visiting IMF Chief Rato THE community constituency of the National Economic, Development and Labour Council (Nedlac) yesterday snubbed the MD of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) , Rodrigo Rato, on the first day of his whistle-stop South African tour .
Translation: La Sociedad Civil Ignora al Director del FMI en Visita Rato LA comunidad representativa del Consejo Nacional Economic, Development and Labour (Nedlac) ayer ignoró al director gerente del Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI) , Rodrigo Rato, en el primer día de su visita fugaz a Sudáfrica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On the first day of his lightning visit to South Africa, Rodrigo Rato, IMF's MD, received a cold shoulder from the National Economic, Development and Labour Council's community constituency. They showed contempt towards the visiting IMF Chief Rato yesterday.

Original Text: IBM Opens Up Design of Its Blade Servers International Business Machines Corp. (IBM.N: Quote, Profile, Research) said it is making the design of its  quot;blade quot; computer servers widely available, in a move designed to gain wider
Translation: IBM Abre el Diseño de Sus Servidores Blade International Business Machines Corp. (IBM.N: Cotización, Perfil, Investigación) dijo que está haciendo que el diseño de sus servidores de computadora "blade" esté ampliamente disponible, en un movimiento diseñado para obtener una mayor adopción.
Paraphrase 1: 1. International Business Machines Corp. (IBM) has made the design of its "blade" computer servers readily available in an effort to gain wider adaptation, as declared by the company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The design of the "blade" computer servers is now being made generally accessible by the International Business Machines Corp. (IBM), a maneuver intended to help them gain wider usage.

Original Text: Labour Party leads Lithuanian parliament election Moscow, Oct 11 (VNA) - Initial results show that the opposition Labour Party led by Viktor Uspaskich appeared to grab the most seats in Lithuania #39;s 141-member parliament in the general election held on Sunday.
Translation: El Partido Laborista lidera las elecciones parlamentarias de Lituania. Moscú, 11 de octubre (VNA) - Los resultados iniciales muestran que el Partido Laborista de la oposición, dirigido por Viktor Uspaskich, parece haber obtenido la mayor cantidad de escaños en el parlamento de 141 miembros de Lituania en las elecciones generales celebradas el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Preliminary outcomes suggest that Viktor Uspaskich's opposition Labour Party has obtained a majority of seats in Lithuania's 141-member parliament in the general election on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the recent general election that took place on Sunday, the Labour Party, under the leadership of Viktor Uspaskich, seemed to secure the largest number of seats in Lithuania's 141-member parliament based on the initial results.

Original Text: Namibians to choose new leader Namibians began voting on Monday for a successor to founding President Sam Nujoma, who stands down in March after 15 years in charge.
Translation: Los namibios elegirán a un nuevo líder. Los namibios comenzaron a votar el lunes para elegir a un sucesor del presidente fundador Sam Nujoma, quien dejará el cargo en marzo después de 15 años al mando.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, voting commenced in Namibia for the selection of a new leader, a successor to initial President Sam Nujoma, who will be stepping down in March after being in command for 15 years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The process of choosing a new leader to succeed Sam Nujoma, the founding President of Namibia, began on Monday. Nujoma is set to retire in March after a 15-year reign.

Original Text: Japan OKs Free Trade Agreement With Mexico Japan #39;s Cabinet formally approved the signing of a free trade agreement with Mexico, ahead of a meeting between the two nations #39; leaders.
Translation: Japón Aprueba Acuerdo de Libre Comercio con México. El gabinete de Japón aprobó formalmente la firma de un acuerdo de libre comercio con México, previo a una reunión entre los líderes de ambas naciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Japan's Cabinet has officially given the green light for the signing of a free trade agreement with Mexico, preceding a meeting between the leaders of the two countries.

Original Text: Portugal child sex trial to begin The trial of seven people accused of forming a child sex ring in Portuguese care homes is set to begin.
Translation: Comienza el juicio por abuso sexual infantil en Portugal. El juicio de siete personas acusadas de formar una red de abuso sexual infantil en hogares de acogida portugueses está a punto de comenzar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The legal proceedings against seven individuals, charged with establishing a child sexual exploitation circle in Portuguese orphanages, are about to commence.

Original Text: House takes aim at identity thieves Most IT Managers won #39;t question the importance of security, but this priority has been sliding between the third and fourth most important focus for companies.
Translation: La casa apunta a los ladrones de identidad. La mayoría de los gerentes de IT no cuestionarán la importancia de la seguridad, pero esta prioridad ha estado deslizándose entre el tercer y cuarto enfoque más importante para las empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. While there is no doubt among most IT Managers about the significance of security, it is observed that this priority fluctuates between being the third and fourth major concern for companies as they tackle identity thieves.

Original Text: New monkey species found in India New Delhi - Scientists have discovered a new species of monkey in north-eastern India, 101 years after the last species of its kind was found, a member of the investigating team said on Thursday.
Translation: Nueva especie de mono encontrada en India Nueva Delhi - Científicos han descubierto una nueva especie de mono en el noreste de India, 101 años después de que se encontrara la última especie de su tipo, dijo el jueves un miembro del equipo de investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A member of the research team announced on Thursday that scientists have uncovered a new monkey species in the northeastern part of India, marking the first discovery of its kind in 101 years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In northeast India, researchers have identified a previously unknown monkey species, a phenomenon not experienced in the last 101 years, a team representative conveyed on Thursday.

Original Text: Sybari offers security for IM, SharePoint (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Sybari Software today added Antigen 8.0 for Microsoft SharePoint and Antigen 8.0 for Instant Messaging, two antivirus, antispam, and content-filtering security software products for enterprise environments.
Translation: Sybari ofrece seguridad para IM, SharePoint (InfoWorld) InfoWorld - Sybari Software hoy añadió Antigen 8.0 para Microsoft SharePoint y Antigen 8.0 para Mensajería Instantánea, dos productos de software de seguridad antivirus, antispam y de filtrado de contenido para entornos empresariales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sybari Software has recently expanded their security offerings by introducing Antigen 8.0 for Microsoft SharePoint and Antigen 8.0 for Instant Messaging. These two solutions provide antivirus, antispam, and content-filtering capabilities for enterprise settings. (InfoWorld)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Antigen 8.0 for Microsoft SharePoint and Antigen 8.0 for Instant Messaging, two security software products featuring antivirus, antispam, and content-filtering services, have been launched by Sybari Software to enhance security in enterprise systems. (InfoWorld)

Original Text: Iraqi pipeline blown up Saboteurs have blown up a junction where multiple oil pipelines cross the Tigris River in northern Iraq. The blast has caused a fire that could take three days to extinguish.
Translation: Un oleoducto iraquí ha sido volado. Saboteadores han hecho volar una intersección donde múltiples oleoductos cruzan el río Tigris en el norte de Iraq. La explosión ha causado un incendio que podría tardar tres días en extinguirse.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A junction in northern Iraq where several oil pipelines intersect across the Tigris River has been destroyed by saboteurs. The explosion has resulted in a fire that is expected to require three days to fully put out.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Saboteurs have exploded a key pipeline junction over the Tigris River in the north of Iraq, causing a fire that is anticipated to take approximately three days to quell.

Original Text: '100 casualties' in Iraq attack More than 100 Iraqis  are killed or wounded by a mortar attack on a National Guard HQ, Iraqi  officials say.
Translation: '100 bajas' en ataque en Irak. Más de 100 iraquíes son asesinados o heridos por un ataque de mortero en un cuartel general de la Guardia Nacional, según informan las autoridades iraquíes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Over 100 Iraqis are reported dead or injured from a mortar strike on a National Guard Headquarters, according to Iraqi authorities.

Original Text: SABMiller #39;s profits soar 81 SABMiller, the worlds third biggest brewer, poured out a strong interim trading performance yesterday - as it also said it had a potential warchest of up to \$2 billion (1.08bn) if a major acquisition opportunity occurred.
Translation: Las ganancias de SABMiller se disparan un 81%. SABMiller, el tercer mayor cervecero del mundo, mostró un sólido rendimiento comercial provisional ayer, mientras también anunciaba que tenía un potencial fondo de guerra de hasta \$2 mil millones (1.08bn) si se presentara una importante oportunidad de adquisición.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, SABMiller, the world's third largest brewer, reported a striking increase of 81% in their interim trading profits. Furthermore, it was stated that the company has access to a potential fund of up to $2 billion (1.08bn), prepared for a significant acquisition opportunity if it arises.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Boasting an 81% increase in profits, SABMiller - the globe's third largest brewer - demonstrated impressive interim trading performance yesterday. They also revealed that they have up to $2 billion (1.08 billion) on hand, ready for use if a substantial acquisition opportunity presents itself.

Original Text: Backfield Carries Load Virginia's win over Clemson would not have been possible without 239 rushing yards.
Translation: La carga del backfield hace posible la victoria de Virginia sobre Clemson no habría sido posible sin 239 yardas de carrera.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Virginia's victory over Clemson could not have been achieved without the contribution of 239 rushing yards from the backfield.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The 239 rushing yards from the backfield were instrumental in Virginia's triumph over Clemson.

Original Text: Microsoft offers sneak peak of SQL Server 2005 Microsoft has announced the availability of Beta 2 of its SQL Server 2005 database, which will include support for AMD's 64-bit Opteron CPU and Intel's 64-bit Itanium chip.
Translation: Microsoft ofrece un vistazo previo de SQL Server 2005. Microsoft ha anunciado la disponibilidad de la Beta 2 de su base de datos SQL Server 2005, que incluirá soporte para la CPU Opteron de 64 bits de AMD y el chip Itanium de 64 bits de Intel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Microsoft has revealed a preview of SQL Server 2005, announcing Beta 2's availability, which will provide support for both AMD's 64-bit Opteron CPU and Intel's 64-bit Itanium chip.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Beta 2 of SQL Server 2005, which includes support for AMD's 64-bit Opteron CPU and Intel's 64-bit Itanium chip, has been launched for a sneak peek by Microsoft.

Original Text: Miller takes weekly honors with fifth, sixth wins com. How high have expectations risen for Bode Miller? The one-time slalom specialist finishes fourth in a World Cup downhill, and it #39;s reported as some sort of crushing loss.
Translation: Miller se lleva los honores semanales con su quinta y sexta victoria. ¿Cuánto han aumentado las expectativas para Bode Miller? El especialista en slalom que fue alguna vez, termina cuarto en una Copa del Mundo de descenso, y se informa como si fuera una especie de derrota aplastante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Expectations for Bode Miller have escalated significantly. With his fifth and sixth wins, Miller receives weekly honors. When the former slalom expert finishes fourth in a World Cup downhill, it's narrated as a huge defeat.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Bode Miller's expectation bar has been raised significantly. He lands himself weekly accolades with his fifth and sixth victories. Despite finishing fourth in a World Cup downhill, the erstwhile slalom specialist's result is portrayed as a devastating loss.

Original Text: Treasuries Surge, Hope for Fed Rate Pause  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Treasury debt prices jumped on Friday  after a soft U.S. jobs report revived speculation the Federal  Reserve may not raise interest rates as far and fast as the  market had feared.
Translation: Los Tesoros se Disparan, Esperanza de una Pausa en la Tasa de la Fed. NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios de la deuda del Tesoro se dispararon el viernes después de que un informe de empleo suave en los Estados Unidos reavivó la especulación de que la Reserva Federal podría no aumentar las tasas de interés tan rápido y lejos como el mercado temía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - On Friday, the unexpected soft U.S. jobs report prompted a significant increase in Treasury debt prices, fuelling conjecture that the Federal Reserve may not heighten interest rates as quickly and extensively as previously anticipated by the market.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - The weak U.S. jobs report on Friday led to a rapid increase in the price of Treasury debts, rekindling market speculation that the Federal Reserve might not escalate interest rates to the extent and pace that was initially feared.

Original Text: Yukos Seeks US Court Protection to Foil Unit Sale (Update3) OAO Yukos Oil Co., Russia #39;s second- largest oil producer, said it sought Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US and requested an emergency court hearing to stop the Russian government #39;s auction of its biggest unit.
Translation: Yukos Busca Protección de la Corte de EE.UU. para Frustrar la Venta de una Unidad (Actualización3) OAO Yukos Oil Co., el segundo productor de petróleo más grande de Rusia, dijo que solicitó la protección por bancarrota del Capítulo 11 en los EE.UU. y solicitó una audiencia judicial de emergencia para detener la subasta de su unidad más grande por parte del gobierno ruso.
Paraphrase 1: 1. OAO Yukos Oil Co., the second-largest oil producer in Russia, announced its appeal for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US. They requested an urgent court hearing with the aim of halting the Russian government's proposed auction of its largest subsidiary.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The second major oil producer in Russia, OAO Yukos Oil Co., has applied for Chapter 11 bankruptcy cover in the United States and asked for an immediate court session to inhibit the auction of its most significant unit by the Russian government.

Original Text: Clearing the hurdle of doping scandals ATHENS -- Evita Agiasoteli has been counting Greece's Olympic medals. Each one comes with a celebration from the boy next door, who likes to run through their neighborhood in the northern Athenian suburb of Nea Ionia yelling  quot;Hellas! quot; with each gold. Other neighbors often leave their evening yogurts unfinished so they can join the boy's victory cheer.
Translation: Superando el obstáculo de los escándalos de dopaje ATENAS -- Evita Agiasoteli ha estado contando las medallas olímpicas de Grecia. Cada una viene con una celebración del chico de al lado, a quien le gusta correr por su barrio en el suburbio norteño de Atenas de Nea Ionia gritando "¡Hellas!" con cada oro. Otros vecinos a menudo dejan sus yogures de la noche sin terminar para poder unirse al grito de victoria del chico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS -- Amidst the cloud of doping controversies, Evita Agiasoteli has kept a tally of every Olympic medal won by Greece. The neighboring boy in Nea Ionia, a suburb in north Athens, perpetually celebrates each victory by racing across their local streets and chanting "Hellas!" with every gold medal. In the enthusiasm of the moment, other surrounding residents frequently abandon their nightly yogurts to participate in the enthusiastic cheering sessions of the boy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amid doping scandal turbulence, Evita Agiasoteli from ATHENS keeps track of Greece's haul in Olympic medals. With every gold, a boisterous celebration is initiated by the enthusiastic boy from next door in Nea Ionia, a northern suburb of Athens, who loves to sprint around their neighborhood shouting "Hellas!" Seeing this, there have been numerous instances where people in the neighborhood left their evening yogurts halfway just to be a part of the boy's jubilant celebrations.

Original Text: Cisco reports record profit but outlook disappoints For the second quarter in a row, No. 1 network-gear maker Cisco (CSCO) reported record profit but saw some signs of economic weakness.
Translation: Cisco informa ganancias récord pero las perspectivas decepcionan Durante el segundo trimestre consecutivo, el fabricante de equipos de red número 1, Cisco (CSCO), reportó ganancias récord pero percibió algunos signos de debilidad económica.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite noticing indications of economic frailty, Cisco (CSCO), the leading network-gear manufacturer, reported a record profit for the second consecutive quarter, however its outlook was less than promising.

Original Text: Kobe Defense Opposes Releasing Statements (AP) AP - Defense attorneys argued that Kobe Bryant's statements to investigators after the NBA star was accused of rape last summer should be kept secret because it is not yet certain they will be used in his trial.
Translation: La Defensa de Kobe se opone a la divulgación de declaraciones (AP) AP - Los abogados defensores argumentaron que las declaraciones de Kobe Bryant a los investigadores después de que la estrella de la NBA fuera acusada de violación el verano pasado deberían mantenerse en secreto porque aún no está claro si se utilizarán en su juicio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - Lawyers defending Kobe Bryant have objected to the publication of his statements given to the authorities following the rape accusations leveled against him last summer. They argue that these statements' usage at his trial remains uncertain.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Kobe Bryant's defense lawyers have contested the revelation of his communications to investigators subsequent to his rape accusation last summer, on the grounds that it is unclear whether these will be used during his trial.

Original Text: 26 Palestinians Die, 131 Wounded in Gaza JEBALIYA REFUGEE CAMP, Gaza Strip - Israeli troops struck deep inside the largest Palestinian refugee camp Thursday, battling masked gunmen in an unprecedented campaign to stop deadly rocket fire on Israeli towns. Twenty-six Palestinians were killed and 131 wounded, the bloodiest single-day toll in fighting in 30 months...
Translation: 26 palestinos mueren, 131 heridos en Gaza CAMPAMENTO DE REFUGIADOS JEBALIYA, Franja de Gaza - Tropas israelíes atacaron en lo más profundo del campamento de refugiados palestino más grande el jueves, luchando contra pistoleros enmascarados en una campaña sin precedentes para detener el mortal fuego de cohetes sobre las ciudades israelíes. Veintiséis palestinos murieron y 131 resultaron heridos, la jornada más sangrienta en los combates en 30 meses...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Israeli forces engaged in an intense firefight with masked gunmen deep within the largest Palestinian refugee camp on Thursday, in a bold move to halt the fatal rocket fire on Israeli towns. This resulted in a single-day death toll of 26 Palestinians and an injury count of 131, marking it the most fatal encounter in the last 30 months.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A daring campaign by Israeli troops, designed to end the lethal rocket attacks on Israeli towns from the JEBALIYA REFUGEE CAMP - Gaza Strip's most crowded Palestinian refugee settlement, led to fierce clashes with armed Palestinians on Thursday. The violent engagement ended with 26 Palestinians losing their lives and another 131 sustaining injuries, making it the highest daily casualty count in warfare over the past two and a half years.

Original Text: Today's schedule College basketball: MEN -- Harbor Invitational at Dorchester, 1 and 3 p.m.; Northeastern at Harvard, 2 p.m.; MIT at Suffolk, 2 p.m.; WOMEN -- Wagner at BU, 1 p.m.; Dartmouth at Fairfield, 1 p.m.; Hartford at Central Conn., 2 p.m.; BC at UMass, 4 p.m.

Paraphrase 1: 1. The College basketball agenda for today lists Harbor Invitational at Dorchester for 1 and 3 p.m. in the men's category, Northeastern facing Harvard at 2 p.m., and MIT competing against Suffolk also at 2 p.m. Women's games are scheduled with Wagner playing at BU and Dartmouth at Fairfield, both at 1 p.m., Hartford challenges Central Conn. at 2 p.m., and BC playing at UMass at 4 p.m.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The matchups on the day's agenda for College basketball are as follows: For the men, at Dorchester, the Harbor Invitational is taking place at both 1 and 3 p.m., Northeastern is competing against Harvard at 2 p.m., and MIT is playing Suffolk also at 2 p.m. However, for the women, apart from Wagner's game at BU and Dartmouth's game at Fairfield both scheduled at 1 p.m., Hartford will go up against Central Conn. at 2 p.m., and BC will take on UMass at 4 p.m.

Original Text: Russia, Japan lead team sychronized swimming; Americans march to <b>...</b> Russia, Japan and the United States were 1-2-3 after the Olympic team technical event, the same places they finished in the duet competition a day earlier.
Translation: Rusia y Japón lideran la natación sincronizada por equipos; los estadounidenses marchan hacia <b>...</b> Rusia, Japón y los Estados Unidos quedaron en la 1-2-3 después del evento técnico del equipo olímpico, las mismas posiciones en las que terminaron en la competencia de dúo el día anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1) After the Olympic team technical event, Russia, Japan, and the United States secured 1st, 2nd, and 3rd places respectively - a repeat of their rankings from the duet competition the day before.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Following the Olympic team technical event, Russia, Japan, and the United States held their positions at first, second, and third respectively, mirroring the same sequence they finished in the previous day's duet competition.

Original Text: Viacom profits up due to cable, TV Viacom Inc., the media conglomerate, said Thursday that profits grew 11.6 percent in the third quarter because of a jump in advertising at its cable and television networks.
Translation: Viacom aumenta sus ganancias debido al cable y la televisión. Viacom Inc., el conglomerado de medios, dijo el jueves que las ganancias crecieron un 11,6 por ciento en el tercer trimestre debido a un aumento en la publicidad en sus redes de cable y televisión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Viacom Inc., a media conglomerate, revealed that there was an 11.6 percent increase in their third-quarter profits, attributable to increased advertising on their cable and television networks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Viacom Inc., the media giant, announced on Thursday an 11.6 percent growth in their profits for the third quarter, driven by a surge in advertising across their cable and television channels.

Original Text: Mars Reconsidered: New Data Raises Fresh Questions (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - JACKSON HOLE, Wyoming -- There is mounting evidence of the role of water \in Mars' evolution. That fact appears to have been favorable to the \development of life -- and the leftover calling card of past biology may be \preserved in that world's geologic record.
Translation: Reconsiderando Marte: Nuevos Datos Plantean Nuevas Preguntas (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - JACKSON HOLE, Wyoming -- Hay pruebas crecientes sobre el papel del agua en la evolución de Marte. Ese hecho parece haber sido favorable para el desarrollo de la vida, y la tarjeta de visita restante de la biología pasada puede estar preservada en el registro geológico de ese mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Fresh Assessment of Mars: New Information Provokes Further Queries (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - JACKSON HOLE, Wyoming -- Exploring Mars' evolution involves growing evidence of water's significant role. This element seemingly contributed positively to the possibility of life's emergence - potential traces from previous biological existence might be archived in the planet's geologic history.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Revisiting Mars: Newly Unearthed Facts Stir Additional Debates (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - JACKSON HOLE, Wyoming -- The part water played in the evolution of Mars is becoming increasingly obvious. This element seems to have been a key factor favoring the origination of life, and signs of past biological activities could likely be preserved in the planet's geological narrative.

Original Text: D-back debacle: Backman fired after four days A year ago, Wally Backman was considered to be a strong contender to become manager of the White Sox, having been a successful skipper in the Sox #39;s minor league system.
Translation: Debacle de D-back: Despiden a Backman después de cuatro días Hace un año, Wally Backman era considerado un fuerte contendiente para convertirse en gerente de los White Sox, habiendo sido un exitoso director en el sistema de ligas menores de los Sox #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A year ago, Wally Backman was viewed as a potential White Sox manager due to his success in their minor league system. However, in a shock D-back disaster, he was dismissed just four days into the job.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wally Backman, once a promising candidate for managing the White Sox thanks to his impressive record in their minor league system, was abruptly let go after only four days, marking a disastrous event for the D-backs.

El candidato presidencial demócrata John Kerry llegó al corazón de un estado conservador golpeado duramente por la pérdida de empleos durante los últimos cuatro años para promocionar su plan de frenar la exportación de empleos mediante la reducción de impuestos corporativos y la aplicación...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Heading to a conservative state that has greatly experienced job losses over the past four years, Democratic presidential aspirant John Kerry delivered his employment creation strategies in NC Charlotte. His outlined plan involves stemming the outflow of jobs by cutting down on corporate taxes and implementing stricter enforcement...

Original Text: Samsung Introduces Phone With Hard Drive swight1701 writes  quot;It is being reported that Samsung has shown what it claims is the world #39;s first mobile phone that incorporates a hard drive.

Original Text: Weather prompts change for Cal By STAFF WRITER.  quot;We #39;ve had concerned parents calling all day long, quot; said Tedford.  quot;Not to mention the aftermath and destruction of something going through (Mississippi).
Translation: El clima provoca cambios en Cal por ESCRITOR DE PERSONAL. "Hemos tenido padres preocupados llamando todo el día", dijo Tedford. "Sin mencionar las consecuencias y la destrucción de algo que pasa por (Mississippi).

Original Text: Kerry Pays Nostalgic Visit to Iowa (AP) AP - John Kerry paid an emotional return visit Friday to the state that launched him toward his party's nomination for president, saying he felt "an unbelievable wave of nostalgia."
Translation: Kerry Realiza una Visita Nostálgica a Iowa (AP) AP - John Kerry realizó una emocionante visita de retorno el viernes al estado que lo catapultó hacia la nominación de su partido para presidente, diciendo que sintió "una increíble ola de nostalgia".
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) John Kerry, consumed by an overwhelming wave of nostalgia, made an emotional revisit to Iowa - the state that propelled him towards securing his party's presidential nomination.

Original Text: His status is not in the pink NORTON -- Had the numbers shaken out a bit differently, spectators at today's third round of the Deutsche Bank Championship would have had some color with their morning coffee.
Translation: Su estado no es el mejor NORTON -- Si los números hubieran salido un poco diferente, los espectadores en la tercera ronda del Campeonato Deutsche Bank de hoy habrían tenido algo de color con su café matutino.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Had the odds been a little different, viewers of today's third round of the Deutsche Bank Championship would have experienced a more vibrant morning. Nevertheless, his current condition isn't at its peak.
Paraphrase 2: 2. If the figures had turned out slightly dissimilar, today's third round of the Deutsche Bank Championship would have offered the audience an added dash of color with their morning caffeine. Unfortunately though, his current state isn't the best.

Original Text: CA #39;s Ex-CEO indicted on fraud An anonymous reader writes  quot;CNN is carrying a story about how Sanjay Kumar, ex-CEO of Computer Associates, was indicted on fraud charges.
Translation: El ex-CEO de CA es acusado por fraude Un lector anónimo escribe "CNN está transmitiendo una historia sobre cómo Sanjay Kumar, ex-CEO de Computer Associates, fue acusado por cargos de fraude.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "An unnamed source reports that CNN is broadcasting a news piece concerning Sanjay Kumar, the former CEO of Computer Associates, who has been charged with fraud," according to CA #39's Ex-CEO's indictment.
Paraphrase 2: 2. CA #39's former CEO is facing a fraud indictment, as reported by an anonymous reader referring to a story from CNN about Sanjay Kumar, the Ex-CEO of Computer Associates.

Original Text: China's economic boom slows down China's economic growth slows for a third straight quarter as efforts by the government to rein in booming expansion continue to take hold.
Translation: El auge económico de China se desacelera. El crecimiento económico de China se ralentiza por tercer trimestre consecutivo mientras los esfuerzos del gobierno para frenar la expansión floreciente continúan surtiendo efecto.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For a third consecutive quarter, China's economic growth is decelerating due to the government's consistent efforts to curb the rapid economic expansion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the government tirelessly works to regulate the explosive expansion, China experiences a slowdown in economic growth for the third quarter in a row.

Original Text: Norway to talk with Tamil Tigers Norway's foreign minister is due to meet  Tamil rebel leader Velupillai Prabhakaran  to revive the peace process in Sri Lanka.
Translation: Noruega hablará con los Tigres Tamil. Se espera que el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Noruega se reúna con el líder rebelde tamil Velupillai Prabhakaran para reactivar el proceso de paz en Sri Lanka.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To rejuvenate the peace negotiations in Sri Lanka, Norway's foreign minister is scheduled to have a meeting with Tamil rebel leader Velupillai Prabhakaran.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The foreign minister of Norway is set to meet Velupillai Prabhakaran, the leader of the Tamil rebels, in an attempt to bring back the peace process in Sri Lanka.

Original Text: Preparation underway for marriage of Japanese Princess Preparation for the marriage of Japanese Princess Sayako, the 35-year-old daughter of Emperor Akihito, and Yoshiki Kuroda, a Tokyo metropolitan government employee, started in
Translation: La preparación está en marcha para el matrimonio de la Princesa Japonesa. Se ha iniciado la preparación para el matrimonio de la Princesa Japonesa Sayako, la hija de 35 años del Emperador Akihito, y Yoshiki Kuroda, un empleado del gobierno metropolitano de Tokio.

Original Text: Young gun Schwartzel wins the Alfred Dunhill as Els and others <b>...</b> South Africa #39;s 20-year-old Charl Schwartzel captured the Alfred Dunhill Championship on Sunday for his first European Tour title, recovering from a poor finish in regulation to win the first playoff hole against England #39;s
Translation: El joven talento Schwartzel gana el Alfred Dunhill mientras Els y otros <b>...</b> Sudafrica #39; El joven de 20 años Charl Schwartzel capturó el campeonato Alfred Dunhill el domingo para su primer título del Tour Europeo, recuperándose de un mal acabado en regulación para ganar el primer hoyo de desempate contra el inglés #39;s
Paraphrase 1: 1. Charl Schwartzel, a 20-year-old South African, clinched his first European Tour title at the Alfred Dunhill Championship on Sunday. Despite a poor finish in regular play, he triumphed by winning the first playoff hole against an English player.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Alfred Dunhill Championship was won by South Africa's Charl Schwartzel, a young 20-year old who secured his first European Tour title on Sunday. Schwartzel rebounded from a lackluster finish in regulation to clinch the win on the first playoff hole against an English opponent.

Original Text: East Asia: Global Uncertainties Threaten to Mar 2005 East Asia #39;s economies are growing at their swiftest pace since before the financial crisis with fewer people than ever living in extreme poverty, according to the latest East Asia and Pacific Regional Update, the World Bank #39;s twice-yearly look at the
Translation: Asia Oriental: Incertidumbres Globales Amenazan con Menoscabar el Mar 2005. Las economías de Asia Oriental están creciendo a su ritmo más rápido desde antes de la crisis financiera, con menos personas que nunca viviendo en extrema pobreza, de acuerdo con la última Actualización Regional de Asia Oriental y el Pacífico, la revisión semestral del Banco Mundial sobre la
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the World Bank's biannual East Asia and Pacific Regional Update, East Asian economies are expanding at their quickest rate since pre-financial crisis, driving extreme poverty to its lowest ever levels, notwithstanding potential global uncertainties lingering over the continued growth forecasted for 2005.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The World Bank's East Asia and Pacific Regional Update, released twice a year, reveals that East Asia's economies are surging at their fastest since before the financial crisis, significantly reducing the number of people in dire poverty. However, global uncertainties posing risks to the rosy economic outlook of 2005 could not be ignored.

Original Text: EDS:US Airways Bankruptcy to Cut Earnings  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Electronic Data Systems Corp.  <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EDS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EDS.N</A> on Thursday said the bankruptcy of US Airways Group  Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UAIRQ.OQ target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UAIRQ.OQ</A> could sharply reduce its third-quarter earnings  because of a long-term information technology contract between  the companies.
Translation: EDS: La bancarrota de US Airways reducirá las ganancias WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Electronic Data Systems Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EDS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EDS.N</A> dijo el jueves que la bancarrota del Grupo US Airways Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UAIRQ.OQ target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UAIRQ.OQ</A> podría reducir significativamente sus ganancias del tercer trimestre debido a un contrato de tecnología de la información a largo plazo entre las compañías.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, Electronic Data Systems Corp. announced that its third-quarter earnings could be significantly impacted due to the bankruptcy of US Airways Group Inc. This is due to a long-term IT contract existing between the two companies.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The bankruptcy of US Airways Group Inc. could potentially cause a dramatic decrease in the third-quarter earnings of Electronic Data Systems Corp., because of an ongoing information technology agreement between them, the corporation revealed on Thursday.

Original Text: Newman wins pole in Martinsville MARTINSVILLE, Virginia (Ticker) - Ryan Newman is probably too far back in the  quot;Chase for the Championship quot; to seriously contend for the title.
Translation: Newman gana la pole en Martinsville MARTINSVILLE, Virginia (Ticker) - Probablemente Ryan Newman está demasiado rezagado en la "Carrera por el Campeonato" para competir seriamente por el título.

Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite his fresh Martinsville pole victory highlighted by Ticker, Ryan Newman, from a standing perspective, seems too distanced to be a considerable contender for the 'Chase for the Championship' title.

Original Text: Zeng Outlines Vision For The Chinese Economy BEIJING, SEPT 13: Chinese Vice-Premier Zeng Peiyan has outlined an ambitious long-term vision for China, with the aim of quadrupling output within two decades, at the opening plenary session of the World Economic Forums China Business Summit 2004.
Translation: Zeng Esboza Visión Para La Economía China BEIJING, 13 DE SEPTIEMBRE: El Viceprimer Ministro Chino, Zeng Peiyan, ha esbozado una ambiciosa visión a largo plazo para China, con el objetivo de cuadriplicar la producción en dos décadas, en la sesión plenaria de apertura de la Cumbre Empresarial de China del Foro Económico Mundial 2004.
Paraphrase 1: BEIJING, SEPT 13: The World Economic Forums China Business Summit 2004 was addressed by Chinese Vice-Premier Zeng Peiyan, who laid out a promising long-term plan with the objective of quadrupling China's output in two decades.
Paraphrase 2: BEIJING, SEPT 13: At the opening plenary session of the World Economic Forums China Business Summit 2004, an ambitious long-term goal for quadrupling China's output within two decades was put forth by Chinese Vice-Premier Zeng Peiyan.

Original Text: Turning the Paige: It #39;s now Mizzou Arena The University of Missouri board of curators on Friday voted to rename the Columbia campus basketball arena Mizzou Arena, severing the connection between the posh sports facility and allegations of cheating at a university 1,700 miles away.
Translation: Pasando la página: Ahora es Mizzou Arena. La Junta de Curadores de la Universidad de Missouri votó el viernes para cambiar el nombre del estadio de baloncesto del campus de Columbia a Mizzou Arena, rompiendo la conexión entre la lujosa instalación deportiva y las acusaciones de trampa en una universidad a 1,700 millas de distancia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The University of Missouri board of curators approved a name change for the Columbia campus basketball arena to Mizzou Arena, disassociating the upscale sports center from alleged cheating scandals at an institution located 1,700 miles away. The rebranding, publicized on Friday, is now known as "Turning the Paige".
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Turning the Paige" is the new chapter introduced on Friday by the University of Missouri's board of curators as they decided to rename their Columbia campus basketball arena to Mizzou Arena, thereby dissolving the link with accusations of corruption at a university far off at a distance of 1,700 miles.

Original Text: Schu crashes, penalised World champion Michael Schumacher will lose ten grid positions on the Brazilian grand prix grid after crashing heavily in a shortened Saturday practice.
Translation: Schu se estrella, penalizado. El campeón del mundo Michael Schumacher perderá diez posiciones en la parrilla del Gran Premio de Brasil tras estrellarse fuertemente en una práctica acortada el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After heavily crashing during a truncated Saturday practice, reigning World Champion Michael Schumacher will be penalised ten grid positions at the Brazilian Grand Prix.

Original Text: A Whole New Line Pakistani editors invited to break the Ramadan fast last week with President Pervez Musharraf were treated to palm dates, curried pastries - and a radical new approach to Pakistan #39;s bitter, 57-year-old dispute with India over Kashmir.
Translation: Una Nueva Línea Completa: Los editores paquistaníes invitados a romper el ayuno de Ramadán la semana pasada con el presidente Pervez Musharraf fueron agasajados con dátiles, pasteles al curry, y un enfoque radicalmente nuevo respecto al amargo conflicto de 57 años con la India sobre Cachemira.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last week, Pakistani editors were asked to break their Ramadan fast with President Pervez Musharraf. They were served palm dates and curried pastries, as well as introduced to a revolutionary new strategy on Pakistan's long-standing, 57-year old conflict with India over Kashmir.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An entirely new approach to the vexing 57-year old Kashmir conflict with India was presented to Pakistani editors, who were guests of President Pervez Musharraf for the breaking of the Ramadan fast last week. The occasion included not just palm dates and curried pastries, but also a fresh perspective on Pakistan's complex dispute.

Original Text: Asteroid to make closest pass in 651 years A giant asteroid will make a close brush by Earth Wednesday -- at least close by asteroid standards. The 4.6-kilometre-long Toutatis will come within 1.5 million kilometres of Earth.
Translation: Un asteroide hará su paso más cercano en 651 años. Un gigantesco asteroide pasará muy cerca de la Tierra el miércoles, al menos cerca según los estándares de los asteroides. El Toutatis, con una longitud de 4.6 kilómetros, estará a 1.5 millones de kilómetros de la Tierra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The giant asteroid, Toutatis, stretching 4.6 kilometres in length, will approach Earth closely this Wednesday, coming within 1.5 million kilometres, marking the closest pass in 651 years as per asteroid measures.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This Wednesday, the 4.6-kilometre long Toutatis, a colossal asteroid, will skim past Earth at a distance of 1.5 million kilometres, making the closest approach in 651 years when judged by asteroid scales.

Original Text: Iran rejects limits on nuclear technology Iran has rejected demands by Europe #39;s three major powers to abandon its uranium enrichment programme. Foreign Ministry spokesman Hamid Riza Asifi said on Sunday Iran had already the technology required for
Translation: Irán rechaza los límites en la tecnología nuclear. Irán ha rechazado las demandas de las tres principales potencias de Europa para abandonar su programa de enriquecimiento de uranio. El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, Hamid Riza Asifi, dijo el domingo que Irán ya tenía la tecnología requerida para
Paraphrase 1: 1) Hamid Riza Asifi, Foreign Ministry spokesman, announced on Sunday that Iran has dismissed the attempts by Europe's three prominent nations to cease its uranium enrichment progress as they already possess the necessary technology.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Iran has declined requests by the three principal European powers to terminate its uranium enrichment project, as stated by Foreign Ministry spokesman, Hamid Riza Asifi, on Sunday because the country already retains the essential technology.

Original Text: Young counters O #39;Keefe, saying the culture at NASA hasn #39;t changed A day after outgoing NASA Administrator Sean O #39;Keefe said the space agency #39;s broken safety culture has vastly improved since the Columbia accident, legendary astronaut John Young begged to differ.
Translation: Young contradice a O'Keefe, diciendo que la cultura en la NASA no ha cambiado. Un día después de que el saliente administrador de la NASA, Sean O'Keefe, dijera que la dañada cultura de seguridad de la agencia espacial ha mejorado enormemente desde el accidente de Columbia, el legendario astronauta John Young suplicó diferir.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Contrary to outgoing NASA Administrator Sean O'Keefe's claims of a vastly improved safety culture post the Columbia accident, legendary astronaut John Young insists that nothing at NASA has fundamentally changed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Just a day after Sean O'Keefe, the outgoing NASA Administrator, praised the significant improvement in NASA's previously flawed safety culture since the Columbia catastrophe, renowned astronaut John Young disagreed, claiming there has been no real change in the organization's culture.

Original Text: 3M Profit Misses Wall Street Estimates  CHICAGO (Reuters) - 3M Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMM.N</A> on Monday reported a 17  percent rise in third-quarter earnings due in part to the weak  dollar, but the diversified manufacturer's results fell short  of Wall Street's estimates for the first time in nearly four  years, sending shares down 5 percent.
