Translation: Los Beneficios de 3M no Cumplen con las Estimaciones de Wall Street CHICAGO (Reuters) - 3M Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMM.N</A> informó el lunes un aumento del 17 por ciento en las ganancias del tercer trimestre debido en parte al debilitamiento del dólar, pero los resultados del diversificado fabricante no cumplieron con las estimaciones de Wall Street por primera vez en casi cuatro años, lo que provocó una caída del 5 por ciento en sus acciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. CHICAGO (Reuters) - With the facilitation of a weakened dollar, 3M Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMM.N</A> announced a rise of 17 percent in the third-quarter profit on Monday. However, despite this increase, the earnings of the diversified manufacturer didn't meet Wall Street's expectations for the first time in close to four years, causing their share price to drop by 5 percent.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMM.N</A> 3M Co. reported an increase in third-quarter earnings by 17 percent, partly due to the weak dollar. However, this was the first time in around four years that the diversified manufacturer from CHICAGO (Reuters) failed to meet the profit estimates of Wall Street, leading to a resultant decline in its shares by 5 percent.

Original Text: SunGard Divides, Spins Off DR Unit (AP) AP - Software company SunGard Data Systems Inc. is dividing into two parts and spinning off its disaster-recovery technology business to shareholders, chief executive Cristobal Conde said. Its shares climbed more than 12 percent Monday.
Translation: División de SunGard, Se Desprende de la Unidad de Recuperación de Desastres (AP) AP - La compañía de software SunGard Data Systems Inc. se está dividiendo en dos partes y desprendiéndose de su negocio de tecnología de recuperación de desastres a los accionistas, dijo el director ejecutivo Cristobal Conde. Sus acciones subieron más del 12 por ciento el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Cristobal Conde, the Chief Executive, SunGard Data Systems Inc. is separating into two entities and is distributing its disaster-recovery technology enterprise to its stakeholders. The software firm saw an increase in its shares by over 12 percent on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Implementing a spin-off and division strategy, SunGard Data Systems Inc., a software establishment, is offering its disaster recovery tech department to its investors, as disclosed by the CEO, Cristobal Conde. The move prompted a surge in the company's shares by more than 12% on Monday.

Original Text: Nuggets 76, Hornets 67 Earl Boykins scored 22 points to help the Denver Nuggets overcome the absence of Carmelo Anthony and defeat the New Orleans Hornets 76-67 on Monday night.
Translation: Nuggets 76, Hornets 67, Earl Boykins anotó 22 puntos para ayudar a los Denver Nuggets a superar la ausencia de Carmelo Anthony y derrotar a los New Orleans Hornets 76-67 la noche del lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday night, the Denver Nuggets managed a 76-67 victory over the New Orleans Hornets, thanks to Earl Boykins' tallying up 22 points, even though Carmelo Anthony was absent.

Original Text: China to Control Power Plant Investments China will step up controls on investment in power plants, despite electricity shortages, to help ease pressure on coal supplies, state media reported Monday.
Translation: China Controlará las Inversiones en Plantas de Energía. China intensificará los controles sobre las inversiones en plantas de energía, a pesar de las escaseces de electricidad, para ayudar a aliviar la presión sobre los suministros de carbón, informó el lunes la prensa estatal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite existing electricity shortages, China is intensifying the regulation of investments in power plants, with the aim of reducing pressure on coal supplies, according to Monday's state media reports.
Paraphrase 2: 2. State media unveiled on Monday that, even in the face of electricity deficits, China is planning to increase restrictions on power plant investments to alleviate strain on coal resources.

Original Text: New tradition starts in California For 54 years, Labor Day weekend meant one thing to NASCAR: a trip to Darlington Raceway for the Southern 500. No more. A new tradition will begin today with the Pop Secret
Translation: Una nueva tradición comienza en California. Durante 54 años, el fin de semana del Día del Trabajo significó una cosa para NASCAR: un viaje al Darlington Raceway para el Southern 500. Eso ya no será así. Hoy comenzará una nueva tradición con el Pop Secret.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Since 54 years, the Labor Day weekend has signified a NASCAR journey to Darlington Raceway for the Southern 500, but not anymore. The new tradition that kicks off today in California is the Pop Secret.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Southern 500 at Darlington Raceway was NASCAR's Labor Day weekend tradition for 54 years, but starting today in California, a brand new tradition, the Pop Secret, is set to commence.

Original Text: Tehran rejects  #39;unbalanced #39; European demands over nuclear standoff Iran on Sunday rejected European demands that it halt all uranium enrichment activities and described a proposal aimed at ending Tehran #39;s nuclear standoff with the international community as  quot;unbalanced.
Translation: Teherán rechaza las demandas "desequilibradas" europeas sobre el enfrentamiento nuclear. Irán rechazó el domingo las demandas europeas de que detenga todas las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio y describió una propuesta dirigida a poner fin al enfrentamiento nuclear de Teherán con la comunidad internacional como "desequilibrada".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Iran dismissed as "unbalanced" the European demands for a complete cessation of its uranium enrichment activities, rejecting a proposal seeking to resolve Tehran's nuclear impasse with the global community on Sunday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Sunday, Iran termed European calls for a full stop to their uranium enrichment exercises as "unbalanced", dismissing a proposition intended to solve Tehran's nuclear deadlock with international players.

Original Text: Delta rocket puts on late-night show with GPS launch After a nerve-racking stay on its Cape Canaveral launch pad with uncomfortably close brushes with two powerful hurricanes, a Boeing Delta 2 rocket finally thundered into space this morning where it successfully deployed a Global Positioning System
Translation: El cohete Delta realiza un espectáculo nocturno con el lanzamiento de GPS. Después de una estadía angustiosa en su plataforma de lanzamiento en Cabo Cañaveral, con encuentros incómodamente cercanos con dos poderosos huracanes, un cohete Boeing Delta 2 finalmente retumbó en el espacio esta mañana donde desplegó exitosamente un Sistema de Posicionamiento Global.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With two major hurricanes narrowly missing its launch pad at Cape Canaveral, a Boeing Delta 2 rocket finally took off early this morning and executed a successful deployment of a Global Positioning System, thereby offering a late-night spectacle.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After facing a tense period on its Cape Canaveral launch pad due to the threatening proximity of two fierce hurricanes, a Boeing Delta 2 rocket managed to propitiously blast off into space this morning, successfully launching a Global Positioning System and presenting a late-night performance.

Original Text: New Computer? Six Steps to Safer Surfing To see the e-mail I get every day from readers about security issues is to develop a deep discomfort with the state of computing today. Keeping a Windows PC safe can demand a high degree of vigilance. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-Rob Pegoraro</B></FONT>
Translation: ¿Nuevo computadora? Seis pasos para navegar más seguro. Ver el correo electrónico que recibo todos los días de los lectores sobre temas de seguridad es desarrollar una profunda incomodidad con el estado de la informática hoy en día. Mantener un PC con Windows seguro puede exigir un alto grado de vigilancia. <FONT face="verdana,MS Sans Serif,arial,helvetica" size="-2" color="#666666"><B>-Rob Pegoraro</B></FONT>
Paraphrase 1: 1. Viewing the daily influx of emails I receive from readers discussing security concerns would lead anyone to feel unsettled about today's computing condition. Maintaining the safety of a Windows PC often requires considerable vigilance. -Rob Pegoraro
Paraphrase 2: 2. When you take into account the constant stream of e-mails I get from readers expressing their anxiety over security, it's easy to feel deeply uneasy about the current state of computing. Taking precautionary measures to ensure a Windows PC's safety can be quite demanding. -Rob Pegoraro

Original Text: Sri Lanka Peace Talks May Not Resume, Norwegian Minister Says Norway, which brokered a cease-fire that halted Sri Lanka #39;s two-decade civil war, isn #39;t confident peace talks will resume between the government and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.
Translation: Las conversaciones de paz en Sri Lanka podrían no reanudarse, dice el Ministro Noruego. Noruega, que medió un alto al fuego que detuvo la guerra civil de dos décadas en Sri Lanka, no está segura de que se reanudarán las conversaciones de paz entre el gobierno y los Tigres de Liberación del Tamil Eelam.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Norwegian Minister, representing the country that orchestrated a cease-fire ending Sri Lanka's 20-year civil war, has expressed uncertainty over the resumption of peace talks between the government and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the minister from Norway - the country which mediated a cessation of hostilities in Sri Lanka's lengthy civil war - there is expectancy that peace negotiations might not be renewed between the government and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.

Original Text: Kuwait hit by blackout KUWAIT CITY: A nationwide blackout hit Kuwait yesterday, forcing it to shut its three oil refineries and halt exports of refined products like gasoline, but crude production and exports were proceeding normally, top energy officials said.
Translation: Kuwait sufre un apagón KUWAIT CITY: Un apagón a nivel nacional golpeó a Kuwait ayer, obligándolo a cerrar sus tres refinerías de petróleo y detener las exportaciones de productos refinados como la gasolina, pero la producción y exportación de crudo procedieron de manera normal, dijeron altos funcionarios de energía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Top energy officials confirmed that a comprehensive power outage occurred in Kuwait yesterday, necessitating the closure of its trio of oil refineries and ceasing exportation of refined items such as gasoline. Despite this, they stated that the production and exportation of crude oil were not affected and proceeded as usual.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, Kuwait experienced a nationwide blackout that led to a complete shutdown of its three oil refineries and disrupted the export of refined products, including gasoline, according to senior energy officials. However, they reported that crude oil production and exports were carried out as planned.

Original Text: News Corp shareholders to vote on move SYDNEY: News Corp Ltd said it plans to hold a shareholder vote on its proposed reincorporation to the US at its annual general meeting in Adelaide on Oct 26, after obtaining approval from Australia #39;s Federal Court earlier yesterday.
Translation: Noticias Corp accionistas votarán sobre la mudanza. SÍDNEY: News Corp Ltd dijo que planea tener una votación de accionistas sobre su propuesta de reincorporación a los EE. UU. en su asamblea general anual en Adelaida el 26 de octubre, después de obtener la aprobación de la Corte Federal de Australia ayer temprano.
Paraphrase 1: 1. News Corp Ltd has unveiled its plan to bring up the proposal of US reincorporation in the annual general meeting in Adelaide on October 26 for a shareholder vote. This decision comes after its proposal got a nod from Australia's Federal Court yesterday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, after getting a green light from Australia's Federal Court, News Corp Ltd announced its intention to propose the US reincorporation. The decision is set to be voted upon by shareholders at the annual general meeting taking place in Adelaide on October 26.

Original Text: Tampa Newspaper Withholds Endorsement (AP) AP - In a break with tradition, The Tampa Tribune, a Republican standard-bearer for decades, refused Sunday to endorse anyone for president for the first time since 1964.
Translation: El Periódico de Tampa Retiene Endoso (AP) AP - En una ruptura con la tradición, The Tampa Tribune, un defensor estándar de los republicanos durante décadas, se negó el domingo a respaldar a alguien para presidente por primera vez desde 1964.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - The Tampa Tribune, long known as a bastion for the Republican party, deviated from its longstanding tradition this Sunday, withholding its presidential endorsement for the first time since 1964.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - In an unprecedented move not seen since 1964, The Tampa Tribune, traditionally a Republican stronghold, did not give their endorsement to any presidential candidate this Sunday.

Original Text: Cy Coleman, Broadway Composer, Dies at 75 The debonair jazz pianist and composer of such legendary Broadway tunes as "Witchcraft," "Big Spender," and "The Best is Yet to Come," died on Thursday night.
Translation: Cy Coleman, Compositor de Broadway, Muere a los 75. El elegante pianista de jazz y compositor de melodías legendarias de Broadway como "Witchcraft", "Big Spender" y "The Best is Yet to Come", murió el jueves por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The renowned jazz pianist and Broadway composer, Cy Coleman, known for timeless tunes like "Witchcraft," "Big Spender," and "The Best is Yet to Come," passed away at age 75 on a Thursday evening.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Cy Coleman, a suave jazz pianist and the creator of legendary Broadway hits including "Witchcraft," "Big Spender," and "The Best is Yet to Come," died on a Thursday night at the age of 75.

Original Text: Costa, Davidenko Bounced in Bucharest  BUCHAREST (Reuters) - Third seed Albert Costa and fifth  seeded Russian Nikolay Davidenko were knocked out of the  Romanian Open tennis tournament Monday, losing in the first  round to unseeded opponents.
Translation: Costa, Davidenko eliminados en Bucarest BUCAREST (Reuters) - El tercer sembrado Albert Costa y el quinto sembrado ruso Nikolay Davidenko fueron eliminados del torneo de tenis Abierto de Rumania el lunes, perdiendo en la primera ronda contra oponentes no sembrados.
Paraphrase 1: 1) In the Romanian Open tennis tournament on Monday, both Albert Costa, the third seed, and Nikolay Davidenko, the fifth seed from Russia, were eliminated in the first round by unseeded opponents - reported by Reuters from Bucharest.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Albert Costa, the third seed, and Nikolay Davidenko, the fifth seed from Russia, suffered a surprising defeat from unseeded players in the first round of the Romanian Open tennis tournament on Monday, as per the report from Bucharest by Reuters.

Original Text: Cost-of-living increase is largest in four years SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Older Americans #39; Social Security checks will rise by about \$25 on average next year, the Social Security Administration announced Tuesday.
Translation: El aumento del costo de vida es el más grande en cuatro años SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- Los cheques de Seguridad Social para los estadounidenses mayores aumentarán en promedio unos \$25 el próximo año, anunció el martes la Administración de Seguridad Social.
Paraphrase 1: 1. SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW) -- The Social Security Administration announced Tuesday that older Americans' Social Security checks will see an average increase of approximately $25 next year, marking the largest cost-of-living adjustment in the past four years.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Older Americans can anticipate an average boost of around $25 to their Social Security checks next year, as announced by the Social Security Administration on Tuesday from SAN FRANCISCO (CBS.MW). This represents the most significant cost-of-living increase in the last four years.

Original Text: Bulls 99, Timberwolves 88 Rookie Ben Gordon scored a career-high 31 points, 16 in the fourth quarter to hold off a furious Minnesota comeback, and the Chicago Bulls beat the Timberwolves 99-88 Saturday night.
Translation: Toros 99, Timberwolves 88 El novato Ben Gordon anotó un récord personal de 31 puntos, 16 de ellos en el último cuarto para frenar un furioso regreso de Minnesota, y los Chicago Bulls vencieron a los Timberwolves 99-88 el sábado por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Rookie Ben Gordon achieved a career-best score with 31 points, with 16 crucial points in the fourth quarter, helping to fend off a determined comeback from Minnesota. Consequently, the Chicago Bulls achieved a victory over the Timberwolves with a score of 99-88 on Saturday night.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Saturday night, the Chicago Bulls triumphed over the Timberwolves with a 99-88 finish. The game witnessed Ben Gordon, the promising rookie, registering his career-high score of 31 points, 16 of which were scored in the crucial fourth quarter, thwarting a vigorous comeback effort from Minnesota.

Original Text: Chinese computer science major sentenced for Internet porn (AFP) AFP - A Chinese university student in eastern Zhejiang province was sentenced to a year in jail for selling pornography on the Internet.
Translation: Traducido al español de manera precisa: Estudiante de informática chino condenado por pornografía en Internet (AFP) AFP - Un estudiante universitario chino en la provincia oriental de Zhejiang fue condenado a un año de prisión por vender pornografía en Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A university student from Zhejiang, China, studying computer science, has been handed a one-year prison sentence for peddling pornography online. (AFP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. AFP reports that a year-long jail term was meted out to a computer science student from China's eastern Zhejiang province for his involvement in Internet pornography sales.

Original Text: Mugabe to seek mining shares The Zimbabwean state could take a 50 stake in the country's leading mining companies to crack down on what it claims is illegal use of export earnings.
Translation: Mugabe buscará acciones mineras. El estado de Zimbabwe podría tomar un 50% de participación en las principales compañías mineras del país para reprimir lo que reclama es el uso ilegal de las ganancias de exportación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Mugabe plans on acquiring mining stocks as the Zimbabwean government may claim a 50% ownership in the country's top mining firms to curb alleged misuse of export profits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. To combat purported illegal utilization of export earnings, the Zimbabwean government, under Mugabe's leadership, may acquire a 50% interest in the nation's main mining corporations.

Original Text: Five remain in hospital after Sasol explosion Five people remained in critical condition on Thursday, a day after a blast in a chemicals plant run by Sasol killed six and injured more than 100, amid a report that the company had flouted safety norms.
Translation: Cinco permanecen en el hospital después de la explosión en Sasol. Cinco personas continuaban en estado crítico el jueves, un día después de que una explosión en una planta de productos químicos operada por Sasol mató a seis e hirió a más de 100, en medio de un informe que indicaba que la empresa había incumplido las normas de seguridad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a devastating explosion at a Sasol chemicals plant, five individuals are still residing in the hospital in critical health Thursday. The incident, which resulted in six deaths and over 100 injuries, had incriminating reports suggesting that Sasol had violated safety regulations.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, five individuals were still being treated in hospital in critical condition, a day after an explosion struck a Sasol chemical plant, causing six fatalities and injuring over 100. The incident is compounded by reports indicating that the company had disregarded safety standards.

Original Text: Corbett hints at bid limit for ALH WOOLWORTHS boss Roger Corbett may have opened his wallet for the last time in the bidding war for Australian Leisure  amp; Hospitality.
Translation: Corbett insinúa un límite en la oferta por ALH. El jefe de WOOLWORTHS, Roger Corbett, puede haber abierto su cartera por última vez en la guerra de ofertas por Australian Leisure & Hospitality.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Roger Corbett, the boss of ALH Woolworths, might have made his final offer in the Australian Leisure & Hospitality bidding war, suggesting a limit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Indicating a bidding limit, Roger Corbett, the chief of ALH Woolworths, may have participated for the last time in the Australian Leisure & Hospitality auction.

Original Text: REVIEW: Music Player Measures Running Pace (AP) AP - It's been a few decades since anyone recorded my mile splits as I bounded over hill and dale, immersed in running's intoxicating rhythm.
Translation: RESEÑA: Reproductor de Música Mide el Ritmo de Carrera (AP) AP - Han pasado algunas décadas desde que alguien registró mis splits de milla mientras corría colina arriba y abajo, sumergido en el ritmo embriagador de la carrera.
Paraphrase 1: REVIEW: Music Gadget Syncs with Your Jogging Speed (AP) AP - It has been several years since my running laps across varying terrains, engrossed in the entrancing rhythm of the run, were last documented.
Paraphrase 2: REVIEW: Music Device Gauges Jogging Tempo (AP) AP - Several decades have passed since anyone kept track of my mile intervals while I was lost in the exhilarating rhythm of running across hills and valleys.

Original Text: Israeli Missile Strike Kills Hamas Leader An Israeli airstrike in Gaza City tonight killed a leading Hamas weapons maker who was responsible for some of the group #39;s most powerful bombs and its homemade rockets, Israel #39;s military said.
Translation: Un Ataque Con Misil Israelí Mata Al Líder De Hamas. Un ataque aéreo israelí en la ciudad de Gaza esta noche mató a un destacado fabricante de armas de Hamas, quien era responsable de algunas de las bombas más poderosas del grupo y sus cohetes caseros, dijo el ejército de Israel.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A prominent Hamas weapons manufacturer, attributed with the creation of some of the group's most potent bombs and homemade rockets, was killed in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza City tonight, as announced by Israel's military.

Original Text: Review: 'San Andreas' Among Best Games (AP) AP - "Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas" is an epic homage to the West Coast gang culture of the early 1990s. Yes, parents, there's way too much violence and profanity here for the kids. For those of us 18 and older, though, it's among the best video games this year.
Translation: Reseña: 'San Andreas' entre los mejores juegos (AP) AP - "Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas" es un homenaje épico a la cultura de las pandillas de la costa oeste de principios de la década de 1990. Sí, padres, hay demasiada violencia y blasfemias aquí para los niños. Sin embargo, para aquellos de nosotros que tenemos 18 años o más, está entre los mejores videojuegos de este año.
Paraphrase 1: Critique: 'San Andreas' Ranks as a Top Game (Associated Press) - The Associated Press praises "Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas" as a masterful tribute to the 1990s West Coast gang scene. Parents be warned, it contains excessive violence and foul language unsuitable for children. However, for adults over 18, it's one of this year's premier gaming experiences.
Paraphrase 2: Assessment: 'San Andreas' Stands Out in Gaming (AP) - In a review by the Associated Press, "Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas" is lauded as a remarkable ode to the gang culture on the West Coast during the early '90s. A caution for parents: the game is rife with intense violence and strong language, making it inappropriate for young audiences. For the adult crowd, aged 18 and up, it's a standout title among this year's video game releases.

Original Text: China Party Chief Rules Out Multi-Party Democracy Chinese Communist Party chief Hu Jintao ruled out multi-party democracy on Wednesday on the eve of a key meeting aimed at tightening the party #39;s grip on power.
Translation: El Jefe del Partido Chino Descarta la Democracia de Múltiples Partidos. El líder del Partido Comunista Chino, Hu Jintao, descartó la democracia de múltiples partidos el miércoles en la víspera de una reunión clave destinada a consolidar el control del partido en el poder.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Hu Jintao, the Chief of Chinese Communist Party, dismissed the possibility of multi-party democracy in China on Wednesday, right before an essential meeting intended to reinforce the party's control.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Wednesday, just ahead of a crucial meeting intended to strengthen Party control, chief of the Chinese Communist Party, Hu Jintao, firmly rejected the idea of a multi-party democracy in China.

Original Text: Mount St. Helens Dates Back 40,000 Years (AP) AP - There has been a volcano on this site for 40,000 years  #151; the youngest and most active peak in a 1,000-mile Cascade Range chain that extends from Mount Garibaldi in Canada to Mount Lassen in Northern California.
Translation: Monte St. Helens tiene 40,000 años de antigüedad (AP) AP - Ha habido un volcán en este sitio durante 40,000 años  #151; el pico más joven y más activo en una cadena de la Cordillera de las Cascadas de 1,000 millas que se extiende desde el Monte Garibaldi en Canadá hasta el Monte Lassen en el norte de California.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - The presence of a volcano on this location can be traced back 40,000 years, making it the youngest and most lively peak in the Cascade Range chain that spans 1,000 miles from Mount Garibaldi in Canada to Mount Lassen in Northern California.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dating back 40,000 years, Mount St. Helens stands as the most active and youngest peak in the 1,000-mile Cascade Range chain, which extends from Mount Garibaldi in Canada to Mount Lassen in Northern California, reveals AP.

Original Text: Sharon #39;s Reason To Mourn For the Israelis who hated and feared him, the Palestinians who chafed at his corruption, or the Western and Arab diplomats who despaired at his mendacity and unwillingness to settle the conflict
Translation: La Razón de Luto de Sharon Para los israelíes que lo odiaban y temían, los palestinos que se resentían de su corrupción, o los diplomáticos occidentales y árabes que desesperaban ante su falsedad y su renuencia a resolver el conflicto
Paraphrase 1: 1. Multiple groups had reasons to mourn Sharon; the Israelis who regarded him with fear and hatred, the Palestinians who were frustrated by his corruption, and the Western and Arab diplomats who were exasperated with his deceitfulness and refusal to resolve the conflict.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sharon's passing was met with mourning by the Israelis who abhorred and felt threatened by him, the Palestinians who gritted their teeth at his corrupt actions, and the both Western and Arab diplomats who were left hopeless by his dishonesty and resistance to conflict resolution.

Original Text: Vivendi Net Loss Widens  PARIS (Reuters) - Vivendi Universal posted a near doubling  in its first-half net loss to 1.86 billion euros (\$2.28  billion) on Tuesday, hit by currency translation losses linked  to its entertainment deal with NBC, but cellphone unit SFR  boosted profits at the operating level.
Translation: La pérdida neta de Vivendi se amplía  PARÍS (Reuters) - Vivendi Universal registró casi el doble en su pérdida neta del primer semestre a 1.86 mil millones de euros (\$2.28 mil millones) el martes, afectada por pérdidas de traducción de moneda vinculadas a su acuerdo de entretenimiento con NBC, pero la unidad de telefonía móvil SFR aumentó las ganancias a nivel operativo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. PARIS (Reuters) - Vivendi Universal announced a nearly twofold increase to its first-half net loss of 1.86 billion euros ($2.28 billion) on Tuesday, primarily due to currency translation losses stemming from its agreement with NBC on entertainment. However, the SFR cellphone division improved the profits at the operational level.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Tuesday, Vivendi Universal reported a first-half net loss increase of nearly 100 percent, coming up to 1.86 billion euros ($2.28 billion). This was primarily due to losses from currency translation connected to its NBC entertainment contract. On a brighter note, the company's SFR cellphone segment boosted operating level profits.

Original Text: Irish coach not thrilled with defense in victory Notre Dame had one of its best offensive games of the past two seasons. Coach Muffet McGraw still wasn #39;t completely happy. She was pleased to see six players score in double figures for the 10th-ranked Irish
Translation: El entrenador irlandés no está entusiasmado con la defensa en la victoria. Notre Dame tuvo uno de sus mejores juegos ofensivos en las últimas dos temporadas. La entrenadora Muffet McGraw aún no estaba completamente satisfecha. Le agradó ver a seis jugadores anotar en cifras dobles para los irlandeses, clasificados en el décimo lugar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Coach Muffet McGraw of Notre Dame was not entirely delighted even though they had among the best offense matches in the previous two years. She was satisfied with six of her players scoring in double digits for the 10th-ranked Irish, but not with the defense.
Paraphrase 2: 2. While she appreciated seeing six players for the 10th ranked Irish score double figures, Coach Muffet McGraw of Notre Dame was not fully appeased. Their defensive performance, despite one of their finest offensive games in two seasons, left her less than thrilled.

Original Text: News: SP2 Fights Worms, Has Bugs After a rough couple of years of embarrassing and serious hacker attacks hitting the Windows-using world, Microsoft Corp. struck back in August with the\security-minded upgrade it dubbed Service Pack 2.\
Translation: Noticias: SP2 lucha contra los gusanos, tiene errores. Después de un par de años difíciles de vergonzosos y serios ataques de hackers que afectaron al mundo de usuarios de Windows, Microsoft Corp. contraatacó en agosto con la actualización orientada a la seguridad que denominó Service Pack 2.
Paraphrase 1: Version 1: After enduring a challenging couple years punctuated by severe hacker attacks, Microsoft Corp., in August, retaliated with a security-focused update known as Service Pack 2 or SP2, which is effective against worms but apparently has some bugs.
Paraphrase 2: Version 2: Microsoft Corp. responded to a series of severe and humiliating hacker attacks experienced over the recent years by launching a security-centric upgrade named Service Pack 2 (SP2) in August, known to combat worms, but unfortunately presents some bugs.

Original Text: Plus: Virtual Farm Game According to a new research study by the non-profit Pew Internet and American Life Project, so-called Instant Messaging (IM) is what #39;s really hot when it comes to electronic communication now.
Translation: Además: Juego de Granja Virtual Según un nuevo estudio de investigación realizado por el proyecto sin fines de lucro Pew Internet y American Life, lo que realmente está de moda en cuanto a comunicación electrónica actualmente es el así llamado Mensajería Instantánea (IM).
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to recent research by the non-profit organization, Pew Internet and American Life Project, the real trend in electronic communication nowadays is the use of Instant Messaging (IM) - putting a plus: a Virtual Farm game.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A new study conducted by the non-profit Pew Internet and American Life Project suggests that Instant Messaging (IM) is currently the hottest trend in electronic communication, along with an interesting plus: a Virtual Farm Game.

Original Text: Online sales pass the \$15bn mark in the US Online retail sales overseas continue to show significant growth, according to the latest figures released by the US Department of Commerce.
Translation: Las ventas en línea superan la marca de los \$15bn en los EE. UU. Las ventas minoristas en línea en el extranjero continúan mostrando un crecimiento significativo, según las últimas cifras publicadas por el Departamento de Comercio de los EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to the most recent data delivered by the US Department of Commerce, overseas online retail sales maintain intense growth, surpassing the $15 billion mark in the US.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US Department of Commerce's latest figures reflect substantial growth in overseas online retail sales, with the total exceeding $15 billion in the US.

Original Text: Stocks Fall As Oil Surpasses \$51 a Barrel Uneasy investors sold stocks mostly lower Tuesday as oil prices climbed above \$51 per barrel, creating new worries that rising energy costs would curb consumer spending and corporate profits.
Translation: Las Acciones Caen a medida que el Petróleo Supera los \$51 por Barril. Inversionistas preocupados vendieron acciones principalmente a la baja el martes, ya que los precios del petróleo superaron los \$51 por barril, creando nuevas preocupaciones de que los crecientes costos de energía podrían frenar el gasto del consumidor y las ganancias corporativas.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Tuesday, investors mostly sold off stocks, displaying their unease as oil prices elevated over $51 per barrel. This move was prompted by rising concerns that the upsurge in energy costs might restrict consumer expenditure and diminish corporate earnings.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As oil prices ascended over $51 per barrel, it instigated anxieties of heightened energy costs negatively impacting consumer spending and companies' profits, which caused nervous investors to predominantly sell off their stocks on Tuesday.

Original Text: Straw shook hand of Zimbabwe's Mugabe 'by mistake' (AFP) AFP - Foreign Secretary Jack Straw has said he shook hands with Zimbabwean President Robert Mugabe in New York last week  quot;by mistake quot; and because it was  quot;dark quot;.
Translation: "Straw estrechó la mano del Mugabe de Zimbabue 'por error' (AFP) AFP - El Secretario de Relaciones Exteriores Jack Straw ha dicho que estrechó la mano del Presidente de Zimbabue Robert Mugabe en Nueva York la semana pasada 'por error' y porque estaba 'oscuro'".
Paraphrase 1: 1. AFP - Jack Straw, the Foreign Secretary, admitted that he mistakenly shook hands with President Robert Mugabe of Zimbabwe in New York last week due to the darkness.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In New York last week, Zimbabwean President Robert Mugabe's hand was inadvertently shaken by Foreign Secretary Jack Straw in the low light, according to AFP.

Original Text: US Airways Needs More Savings To Attract Investors US Airways probably will need more cost cuts or a boost in revenue to attract the USD\$250 million in equity it says it needs to leave bankruptcy next year, the company said on Thursday.
Translation: US Airways necesita más ahorros para atraer inversores. Es probable que US Airways necesite más recortes de costos o un aumento en los ingresos para atraer los 250 millones de dólares en capital que dice que necesita para salir de la bancarrota el próximo año, dijo la compañía el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To attract the necessary USD $250 million in equity to exit bankruptcy next year, US Airways stated on Thursday that it will likely require further cost reductions or an increase in revenue.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, US Airways expressed that they might need to either decrease expenses more or increase income to draw the required USD $250 million of equity to come out of bankruptcy in the following year.

Original Text: Syracuse #39;s Edelin cleared to play by NCAA Syracuse, NY (Sports Network) - Syracuse junior point guard Billy Edelin has been granted the academic waiver petition by the NCAA, making him eligible to play immediately for the Orange.
Translation: Edelin de Syracuse #39; autorizado a jugar por la NCAA Syracuse, NY (Sports Network) - Billy Edelin, el base junior de Syracuse, ha obtenido la exención académica de la NCAA, lo que le permite jugar inmediatamente para los Orange.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The NCAA has granted Syracuse junior point guard Billy Edelin an academic waiver petition, immediately allowing him to play for the Orange from Syracuse, NY, as per Sports Network.

Original Text: Gators  #39;86 Noles TALLAHASSEE - The final act was the showstopper. A jaw-dropper. It was so Ron Zook. You figured he #39;d zig. Well, he zagged. You figured he would coach the Florida Gators to a loss in a big game.
Translation: Gators #39;86 Noles TALLAHASSEE - El acto final fue el más impactante. Asombroso. Fue tan Ron Zook. Pensabas que iba a zigzaguear. Bueno, él cambió de dirección. Esperabas que él entrenara a los Florida Gators hasta la derrota en un partido importante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TALLAHASSEE - The climax was truly unforgettable, a surprising instance. Absolutely typical of Ron Zook. You thought he would head in one direction, instead he went the entirely opposite way. Many anticipated he would lead the Florida Gators to defeat in this important game.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TALLAHASSEE - The end of the show was the most astonishing number. A real eye-opener. This was so characteristic of Ron Zook. People assumed he'd take one path, surprisingly, he took another. Everyone was convinced that under his guidance, the Florida Gators would suffer a defeat in the high-stakes game.

Original Text: Lyon find their Sylvain lining REVITALISED former French international striker Sylvain Wiltord hit the winner in Lyon #39;s 2-1 Champions League victory at Sparta Prague in a virtuoso display contrasting sharply with his fruitless time at Arsenal.
Translation: Lyon encuentra su revestimiento Sylvain REVITALIZADO, el ex delantero internacional francés Sylvain Wiltord anotó el gol de la victoria en la victoria 2-1 de Lyon en la Liga de Campeones contra el Sparta Praga en una actuación virtuosa que contrasta fuertemente con su tiempo infructuoso en el Arsenal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The formerly underperforming French international striker, Sylvain Wiltord, came alive during Lyon's 2-1 victory over Sparta Prague in the Champions League. His outstanding performance, which included scoring the winning goal, was a marked departure from his less successful stint at Arsenal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sylvain Wiltord, the revitalized former French international striker who had a disappointing term at Arsenal, stood out in Lyon's 2-1 win against Sparta Prague in the Champions League. His virtuoso display, culminating in him scoring the decisive goal, underlined his renewed vigor on the field.

Original Text: Nissan to Halt Output at 3 Plants for Lack of Steel (Update1) Nissan Motor Co., Japan #39;s second- largest carmaker, said it will suspend production at three factories for five days over the next two weeks because the company has difficulty obtaining steel.
Translation: Nissan detendrá la producción en 3 plantas por falta de acero (Actualización1) Nissan Motor Co., el segundo fabricante de automóviles más grande de Japón, dijo que suspenderá la producción en tres fábricas durante cinco días en las próximas dos semanas porque la compañía tiene dificultades para obtener acero.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to difficulties in acquiring steel, Nissan Motor Co., the second-largest automaker in Japan, announced they will temporarily halt operations at three of their plants for five days within the upcoming two weeks (Update1).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Over the next two weeks, Nissan Motor Co., Japan's second biggest vehicle manufacturer, will cease production at three of their factories for five days. This decision is owing to their struggle in sourcing steel (Update1).

Original Text: Israel, Palestinians Await Powell Visit  JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel said before a visit by  Secretary of State Colin Powell on Sunday that it would  consider calls to pull its troops away from West Bank cities to  facilitate a Palestinian presidential election.
Translation: Israel, palestinos esperan la visita de Powell JERÚSALEN (Reuters) - Israel dijo antes de una visita del Secretario de Estado Colin Powell el domingo que consideraría los llamados para retirar sus tropas de las ciudades de Cisjordania para facilitar una elección presidencial palestina.
Paraphrase 1: 1. JERUSALEM (Reuters) - In anticipation of Secretary of State Colin Powell's visit on Sunday, Israel articulated its willingness to contemplate requests for the removal of its troops from West Bank cities, to ease the process of the Palestinian presidential election.
Paraphrase 2: 2. JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Prior to Secretary of State Colin Powell's visit on Sunday, Israel indicated that it might heed calls for the withdrawal of its troops from West Bank cities, to enable smoother conduct of the Palestinian presidential election.

Original Text: End of an era as Times ditches broadsheet for compact LONDON - After 216 years of broadsheet life, The Times today followed in the footsteps of The Independent, moving to a compact only format after almost a year of dual publication.
Translation: Fin de una era a medida que Times abandona el formato de periódico de gran tamaño para adoptar el compacto LONDRES - Después de 216 años de vida en formato de periódico de gran tamaño, The Times hoy siguió los pasos de The Independent, pasando a un formato solo compacto después de casi un año de publicación dual.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following The Independent's lead, The Times has transitioned to a compact-only format after 216 years of broader publication. This significant change, marking the end of an era, took place in London today after nearly a year of simultaneous broadsheet and compact publication.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In downtown London today, notable news source The Times ended a 216 year-old era by swapping its broadsheet format for a compact one. Similar to The Independent's prior move, this transition was made after nearly a year of dual format publishing.

Original Text: Brockton rules New Bedford Even without their star rusher, the No. 3 Brockton Boxers continued rolling last night, turning in a dominant defensive effort to handle New Bedford, 32-6.
Translation: Brockton domina a New Bedford Incluso sin su estrella corredora, los Boxers de Brockton número 3 continuaron avanzando anoche, mostrando un esfuerzo defensivo dominante para manejar a New Bedford, 32-6.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite the absence of their leading rusher, the Brockton Boxers, ranked number 3, maintained their momentum last night as they put on an impressively strong defensive display to defeat New Bedford, finishing the game with a scoreline of 32-6.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Even without their primary rusher, the number 3 team known as the Brockton Boxers persisted in their winning streak last evening, showcasing a dedicated defensive play that led them to beat New Bedford, 32-6.

Original Text: Willingham Won't Return to Kansas State (AP) AP - Point guard Dez Willingham won't be back for his sophomore season at Kansas State, coach Jim Wooldridge said Monday.
Translation: Willingham No Volverá a Kansas State (AP) AP - El base Dez Willingham no regresará para su segunda temporada en Kansas State, dijo el entrenador Jim Wooldridge el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dez Willingham, the point guard, will not be rejoining Kansas State for his sophomore season, announced Coach Jim Wooldridge on Monday. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) Coach Jim Wooldridge confirmed on Monday that point guard Dez Willingham will not return for his sophomore season at Kansas State.

Original Text: Love and money reshape family in China From arranged matches to the 8-minute date in the span of one generation. Part 1of three in the series 'The Family Revolution.'
Translation: El amor y el dinero reforman la familia en China. De los matrimonios concertados a las citas de 8 minutos en el transcurso de una generación. Parte 1 de tres en la serie 'La Revolución Familiar'.
Paraphrase 1: 1) "The Family Revolution," a three-part series, details how love and money are transforming the family dynamic in China, from traditional arranged marriages to 8-minute speed dating within a generation.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Within a single generation, arranged marriages have evolved into 8-minute speed dates in China, due to the profound influence of love and money. This is part 1 of 'The Family Revolution' series.

Original Text: CA integrates PestPatrol anti-spyware Computer Associates International (CA) will announce Monday that it has integrated an anti-spyware product from its purchase of PestPatrol with its own eTrust Security Management portfolio.
Translation: CA integra el anti-spyware PestPatrol. Computer Associates International (CA) anunciará el lunes que ha integrado un producto anti-spyware de su compra de PestPatrol con su propio portafolio de Gestión de Seguridad eTrust.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Computer Associates International (CA) is set to make an announcement on Monday about integrating PestPatrol's anti-spyware product, which they acquired through a purchase, into their eTrust Security Management portfolio.
Paraphrase 2: 2. An announcement will be made by Computer Associates International (CA) on Monday, that it has merged an anti-spyware product from PestPatrol, acquired in a previous purchase, into its existing eTrust Security Management portfolio.

Original Text: Silver surprise for US #39;s Abdallah In the weeks leading up to these Olympic Games, American Nia Abdallah wasn #39;t even on the radar screen of international taekwondo.
Translation: Sorpresa de plata para la estadounidense Abdallah #39; En las semanas previas a estos Juegos Olímpicos, la estadounidense Nia Abdallah ni siquiera estaba en el radar del taekwondo internacional.
Paraphrase 1: 1. During the weeks preceding the Olympic Games, American Nia Abdallah was not even a blip on the international taekwondo radar, which makes her Silver surprise for the US truly unexpected.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Nia Abdallah of America, who surprisingly won Silver for the US, was not recognized in the international taekwondo scene in the weeks before these Olympic Games.

Original Text: Oil price in suspense about the impact of OPEC output cuts Crude oil futures begin to factor in colder weather in the US Northeast and OPEC decision to cut production to keep the prices high.
Translation: El precio del petróleo en suspenso sobre el impacto de los recortes de producción de la OPEP. Los futuros del petróleo crudo comienzan a tener en cuenta el clima más frío en el noreste de los EE. UU. y la decisión de la OPEP de reducir la producción para mantener los precios altos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Crude oil futures are factoring in the imminent colder weather in the US Northeast along with the decision of OPEC to cut production in order to maintain high prices, which puts the oil price in a state of suspense concerning the impact of OPEC's output cuts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As crude oil futures start to account for the upcoming wintry weather in the northeastern US and OPEC's strategy to curb production for preserving high prices, the uncertainty regarding the effect of OPEC's production reductions keeps the oil price in suspense.

Original Text: Cubs not out of options for closer Cubs general manager Jim Hendry wasn #39;t down for long Wednesday after learning free-agent closer Troy Percival had signed with the Tigers.
Translation: Los Cachorros no se quedan sin opciones para el cerrador. El gerente general de los Cachorros, Jim Hendry, no estuvo decaído mucho tiempo el miércoles después de enterarse de que el cerrador agente libre Troy Percival había firmado con los Tigres.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After discovering that free-agent closer Troy Percival had signed with the Tigers, Cubs general manager Jim Hendry was not disheartened for long on Wednesday, indicating the Cubs still have other options for a closer.

Original Text: London's 'erotic gherkin' wins top architecture prize (AFP) AFP - A new skyscraper in London popularly dubbed the  quot;erotic gherkin quot; for its curvaceous shape has won one of Britain's top architecture prizes, organisers announced.
Translation: El 'pepinillo erótico' de Londres gana el máximo premio de arquitectura (AFP) AFP - Un nuevo rascacielos en Londres, popularmente apodado el "pepinillo erótico" por su forma curvilínea, ha ganado uno de los premios de arquitectura más prestigiosos de Gran Bretaña, anunciaron los organizadores.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The 'erotic gherkin', a uniquely shaped new skyscraper in London, has been awarded one of the top architecture prizes in Britain, according to the organisers (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2. Organisers have announced that a new building in London, fondly referred to as the 'erotic gherkin', has garnered one of the most prestigious British architecture awards (AFP).

Original Text: Investors Take a Holiday (Reuters) Reuters - Investors may pack up and leave town\this week as the Republican National Convention begins in New\York and many on Wall Street take vacation -- draining U.S.\markets of volume and leaving stocks with little direction.
Translation: Inversionistas Se Toman Unas Vacaciones (Reuters) Reuters - Los inversionistas podrían empacar y salir de la ciudad esta semana mientras comienza la Convención Nacional Republicana en Nueva York y muchos en Wall Street se toman vacaciones - drenando a los mercados estadounidenses de volumen y dejando las acciones con poca dirección.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) As the Republican National Convention commences in New York this week, many investors might choose to go on a vacation, consequently causing a decrease in the volume on U.S. markets and allowing stocks to drift somewhat aimlessly, reports Reuters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters reports that the starting of the Republican National Convention this week in New York may result in a significant number of investors taking a break. This break could potentially lead to a drop in the activity on the U.S. markets and leave the stocks directionless.

Original Text: Microsoft Debuts Desktop Search Tool (Reuters) Reuters - Microsoft Corp.  on Monday\unveiled a new, preliminary version of its search tool for\finding documents, e-mail and other files stored on personal\computer hard drives.
Translation: Microsoft Presenta Herramienta de Búsqueda para Escritorio (Reuters) Reuters - Microsoft Corp. el lunes presentó una nueva versión preliminar de su herramienta de búsqueda para encontrar documentos, correos electrónicos y otros archivos almacenados en los discos duros de las computadoras personales.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) On Monday, Microsoft Corp. revealed an initial version of its new search tool capable of locating documents, emails, and other files stored on the hard drives of personal computers.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Microsoft Corp. introduced a prototype of its desktop search tool on Monday, which can find documents, emails, and other files on personal computer hard drives, Reuters reports.

Original Text: Wobbly footballs and electronic pants <strong>Letters</strong> A typical haul from the postbag...
Translation: Balones de fútbol inestables y pantalones electrónicos <strong>Cartas</strong> Una cosecha típica del correo...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Regular contents from the mailbox typically include shaky footballs and electronic trousers, denoted with distinct "Letters".
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Letters" usually signify an unusual assortment from the mailbag: unsteady footballs and technologic pants.

Original Text: Delta gets American Express aid Delta Air Lines Inc. said Monday it has obtained up to \$600 million in new financing as the struggling carrier seeks to avoid bankruptcy.
Translation: Delta recibe ayuda de American Express. Delta Air Lines Inc. dijo el lunes que ha obtenido hasta \$600 millones en nueva financiación mientras la aerolínea en dificultades busca evitar la bancarrota.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Monday, Delta Air Lines Inc. announced that it has secured up to $600 million in new funding from American Express, as the beleaguered airline attempts to stave off bankruptcy.

Original Text: ICQ Updates Its Web-Based E-Mail Service offers 2GB of storage, wireless access, and video e-mail--for a fee.
Translation: ICQ actualiza su servicio de correo electrónico basado en la web, ofreciendo 2GB de almacenamiento, acceso inalámbrico y correo electrónico con video, por un costo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For a certain fee, ICQ's updated web-based email service provides 2GB storage, wireless access, and video email.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With a simple payment, users get 2GB of storage, wireless access, and video e-mail through ICQ's updated web-based email service.

Original Text: Fierce clashes in Somali regions Fighting erupts between forces of the self-declared Somaliland republic and those of Puntland, an autonomous region of Somalia.
Translation: Enfrentamientos feroces en regiones somalíes. Los combates estallan entre las fuerzas de la república autoproclamada de Somalilandia y las de Puntlandia, una región autónoma de Somalia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In Somalian territories, intense confrontations have broken out between the forces of Puntland, Somalia's autonomous region, and those of the self-proclaimed Somaliland republic.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The self-asserted Somaliland republic and Puntland, a self-governing region of Somalia, are embroiled in severe skirmishes in the Somali districts.

Original Text: Whipper can crack it in Mile There is a sense in which 99 of the runners at the Breeders #39; Cup tonight are visitors. The course has never staged this meeting before - in fact, it is less than a decade since they dug Lone Star Park #39;s foundations
Translation: Whipper puede romperla en la Milla. Existe un sentido en el que 99 de los corredores en la Copa de Criadores esta noche son visitantes. Este curso nunca ha albergado este encuentro antes, de hecho, hace menos de una década desde que se excavaron los cimientos del Parque Lone Star.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At the Breeders' Cup tonight, it could be said that 99 out of the 100 runners are guests. This event is new to the course, given that Lone Star Park's foundation was laid less than ten years ago - a fact showcased by Whipper who can strike a win in a mile.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Tonight, at the Breeders' Cup, it's as if 99 of the total runners are just visiting, given that the course has never hosted this event before. Notably, the park itself, Lone Star, has barely existed for a decade, its foundations having been dug within that timeframe. During this event, Whipper, a participant, has the skill to achieve victory within a mile.

Original Text: Salary 20,421 pa Location London Company Epping Forest District <b>...</b> The takeover battle for Manchester United Football Club (MUFC) is far from over, as Malcolm Glazer has again increased his share in the worlds richest football club.
Translation: Salario 20,421 pa Ubicación Londres Compañía Epping Forest District <b>...</b> La batalla por la adquisición del Manchester United Football Club (MUFC) está lejos de terminar, ya que Malcolm Glazer ha aumentado nuevamente su participación en el club de fútbol más rico del mundo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The struggle for control over Manchester United Football Club (MUFC), the world's wealthiest football club, is far from concluding, with Malcolm Glazer increasing his share once again. The company is Epping Forest District, the post is located in London, with an annual salary of 20,421.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Malcolm Glazer has once again upped his stock in Manchester United Football Club (MUFC), the richest football club globally, indicating that the takeover battle is far from complete. This update comes from Epping Forest District, a company situated in London, offering an annual salary of 20,421.

Original Text: COTE D IVOIRE: All sides pledge commitment to peace process again <b>...</b> ABIDJAN, 7 December (IRIN) - South African President Thabo Mbeki ended his mediation in Cote d #39;Ivoire having wrangled promises from all sides to revive the flagging peace process.
Translation: COSTA DE MARFIL: Todas las partes prometen compromiso con el proceso de paz nuevamente <b>...</b> ABIDJAN, 7 de diciembre (IRIN) - El presidente de Sudáfrica, Thabo Mbeki, finalizó su mediación en Costa de Marfil habiendo conseguido promesas de todas las partes para revivir el debilitado proceso de paz.
Paraphrase 1: 1. COTE D IVOIRE: All Parties Reaffirm Their Dedication to the Peace Process Once More <b>...</b> ABIDJAN, 7 December (IRIN) - As South African President Thabo Mbeki concludes his mediation in Cote d'Ivoire, he ensures commitments from all factions to rejuvenate the weakening peace process.
Paraphrase 2: 2. COTE D IVOIRE: All Stakeholders Reiterate Their Pledge to the Peace Process Again <b>...</b> ABIDJAN, 7 December (IRIN) - Upon ending his mediation role in Cote d'Ivoire, South African President Thabo Mbeki has elicited assurances from all sides to reignite the dwindling peace process.

Original Text: Rains bring new misery to Sri Lanka tsunami victims (Reuters) Reuters - Torrential rains brought fresh hardship to tsunami survivors in eastern Sri Lanka on Sunday, flooding refugee camps, forcing the evacuation of at least one and leaving others dotted with stagnant pools.
Translation: Las lluvias traen nueva miseria a las víctimas del tsunami en Sri Lanka (Reuters) Reuters - Las lluvias torrenciales trajeron dificultades frescas a los supervivientes del tsunami en el este de Sri Lanka el domingo, inundando campamentos de refugiados, forzando la evacuación de al menos uno y dejando otros salpicados de charcos estancados.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Reuters - On Sunday, tsunami survivors in eastern Sri Lanka were plagued by new challenges as torrential rains caused flooding in refugee camps, forcing at least one camp to evacuate and leaving others covered with immobile water bodies.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reuters - The tsunami victims in eastern Sri Lanka were subjected to renewed distress on Sunday when persistent heavy rains caused refugee camps to flood, necessitating the evacuation of a minimum of one camp and leading to the creation of stagnant pools in others.

Original Text: Aliens Attempting To Contact Earth? Are extraterrestrials attempting to contact earth? The thought that ET may be sending out radio signals from somewhere in outer space is creating a buzz and astronomers involved in the search for extraterrestrial
Translation: ¿Alienígenas intentando contactar la Tierra? ¿Están los extraterrestres intentando contactar la Tierra? La idea de que ET podría estar enviando señales de radio desde algún lugar en el espacio exterior está creando revuelo y los astrónomos involucrados en la búsqueda de vida extraterrestre
Paraphrase 1: 1. Is there an attempt by extraterrestrials to communicate with Earth? The idea of ET's possible radio signals from beyond our world is creating a stir, especially among astronomers engaged in the extraterrestrial search.

Original Text: Tokyo Stocks Extend Losses  TOKYO (Reuters) - Tokyo's Nikkei fell 0.67 percent by  mid-morning on Monday, extending losses into a seventh session  as worries about higher oil prices hit airlines while banks and  retailers wilted on concerns about the domestic economic  outlook.
Translation: Las acciones de Tokio amplían las pérdidas TOKIO (Reuters) - El Nikkei de Tokio cayó un 0.67 por ciento a media mañana del lunes, extendiendo las pérdidas en una séptima sesión debido a las preocupaciones sobre los altos precios del petróleo que afectaron a las aerolíneas, mientras que los bancos y los minoristas se debilitaron por las preocupaciones sobre las perspectivas económicas domésticas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - On Monday morning, Tokyo's Nikkei dropped by 0.67 percent, marking loss continuation for a seventh session. Increased oil prices affected airlines negatively and banks and retailers experienced a decline due to the concerning domestic economic forecast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TOKYO (Reuters) - As concerns over higher oil prices and domestic economic outlook increased, Tokyo's Nikkei dropped 0.67 percent by mid-Monday morning. This was the seventh consecutive session of loss, notably affecting airlines, banks, and retailers.

Original Text: China to crack down on telephone sex BEIJING (Reuters) - China #39;s communist leaders, in a fresh move to eradicate pornography, have targeted the telephone sex industry, ordering severe punishment for anyone offering the service, the official People #39;s Daily says.
Translation: China endurece medidas contra el sexo telefónico BEIJING (Reuters) - Los líderes comunistas de China, en un nuevo intento por erradicar la pornografía, han dirigido su mirada a la industria del sexo telefónico, ordenando un castigo severo para cualquier persona que ofrezca el servicio, según informa el periódico oficial People's Daily.
Paraphrase 1: 1) As part of their renewed efforts to eliminate pornography, the communist leaders of China have set their sights on the telephone sex industry. They've commanded harsh penalties for anyone providing such services, as reported by the official People's Daily.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The People's Daily, the official newspaper, has reported that the communist leadership in China is ramping up their efforts to extinguish pornography, now focusing on the telephone sex industry. They have decreed strict consequences for individuals found offering this service.

Original Text: Bomb blast explodes near Australian Embassy in Baghdad, killing 2 <b>...</b> A car bomb targeting a US military convoy exploded near the Australian Embassy Monday, killing at least two people, police and the Iraqi Interior Ministry said.
Translation: Explosión de bomba cerca de la Embajada Australiana en Bagdad, mata a 2 <b>...</b> Una bomba colocada en un automóvil dirigida a un convoy militar de EE.UU explotó cerca de la Embajada Australiana el lunes, matando al menos a dos personas, según informaron la policía y el Ministerio del Interior iraquí.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two individuals were killed when a car bomb aimed at a US military convoy detonated near the Australian Embassy in Baghdad, as reported by the police and the Iraqi Interior Ministry on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, a car bomb explosion targeting a US military convoy near the Australian Embassy in Baghdad resulted in at least two casualties, according to statements from the police and the Iraqi Interior Ministry.

Original Text: Japan's Nikkei Hits a One-Month Low  TOKYO (Reuters) - Japan's Nikkei hit a one-month low on  Wednesday as investors sold a broad range of shares, extending  losses from the day before when poor Japanese industrial output  data put a damper on the economy's outlook.
Translation: El Nikkei de Japón Alcanza un Mínimo de un Mes  TOKIO (Reuters) - El Nikkei de Japón alcanzó un mínimo de un mes el miércoles, ya que los inversores vendieron un amplio rango de acciones, extendiendo las pérdidas desde el día anterior cuando los pésimos datos de producción industrial japonesa pusieron freno a las perspectivas de la economía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - Amid widespread share sales, Japan's Nikkei reached its lowest point in a month on Wednesday, furthering losses following disappointing industrial output data that clouded the economic forecast.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TOKYO (Reuters) - On Wednesday, the Nikkei in Japan plummeted to a one-month low due to investors offloading a variety of shares, thereby exacerbating the decline initiated by weak industrial output data that darkened the economic prospects.

Original Text: Williams Stays Retired Retired running back Ricky Williams has no immediate plans to resume his NFL career with the Dolphins, his attorney said.
Translation: Willians Permanece Retirado. El corredor retirado Ricky Williams no tiene planes inmediatos para retomar su carrera en la NFL con los Dolphins, dijo su abogado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ricky Williams, the retired running back, has no plans to return to his NFL career with the Dolphins, according to his lawyer.
Paraphrase 2: 2. His lawyer confirmed that Ricky Williams, the retired running back, doesn't intend to kickstart his NFL career with the Dolphins anytime soon.

Original Text: Creative unveils 5GB Zen Micro The compact, 5GB unit will  quot;outshine all the others quot;, the company said, with it 12 hour battery life, FM radio with 32 station pre-sets, voice recorder and PDA-style personal information management functionality.
Translation: Creative presenta el Zen Micro de 5GB. La compañía dijo que la compacta unidad de 5GB "eclipsará a todas las demás", con su batería de 12 horas de duración, radio FM con 32 emisoras preestablecidas, grabadora de voz y funcionalidad de gestión de información personal al estilo PDA.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Creative has introduced a 5GB Zen Micro. The small 5GB device is expected to "surpass all others", according to the company. It comes with a 12-hour battery life, has an FM radio with 32 preset stations, a voice recorder, and PDA-style personal information management capabilities.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The company Creative has showcased a new compact device, the 5GB Zen Micro. They assert it will "outperform all others" with its sturdy 12-hour battery life, integrated FM radio that can tune into 32 preset radio channels, accompanying voice recorder and in-built personal information management features akin to a PDA.

Original Text: Peres facing attack from Labor MKs over continued talks with Likud Labor Party Chair Shimon Peres is facing growing opposition from his party over his decision to continue coalition talks with Likud despite the Likud convention #39;s resolution last week against bringing Labor into the government.
Translation: Peres enfrenta ataques de los miembros del Knesset del Partido Laborista por continuar las negociaciones con Likud. El presidente del Partido Laborista, Shimon Peres, enfrenta una creciente oposición de su partido por su decisión de continuar las conversaciones de coalición con Likud a pesar de la resolución de la convención de Likud la semana pasada contra la inclusión del Partido Laborista en el gobierno.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shimon Peres, Chair of the Labor Party, is facing increasing resistance from his party due to his choice to persist with coalition discussions with Likud, even considering the Likud convention's resolution last week opposing the inclusion of Labor in the government.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Labor Party leader, Shimon Peres, is confronting an escalating opposition from his own party for his persistent efforts to maintain coalition negotiations with Likud, notwithstanding the recent resolution by the Likud convention to exclude Labor from government participation.

Original Text: Web Still in Early Days, Tech Leaders Say (Reuters) Reuters - The Internet is only in\its early adolescence with a raft of improvements on the\horizon, and the venture capitalists who helped fund the early\boom are opening their wallets again, technology industry\leaders said on Monday.
Translation: La Web Todavía en sus Primeros Días, Según Líderes Tecnológicos (Reuters) Reuters - Internet está solo en su temprana adolescencia con una serie de mejoras en el horizonte, y los capitalistas de riesgo que ayudaron a financiar el primer auge están abriendo de nuevo sus carteras, dijeron líderes de la industria tecnológica el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) According to technology industry leaders on Monday, the Internet remains in its formative years, with numerous enhancements expected very soon. Venture capitalists, who were vital in supporting the initial growth, are once more ready to invest.
Paraphrase 2: Industry leaders within technology confirmed on Monday that the Internet, still in a youthful phase, is set for a host of improvements and developments. The early stage investors, venture capitalists, are also reigniting their financial support, reported Reuters.

Original Text: Funds: Are Bond Funds Hazardous?  (Clint Willis is a freelance writer who covers mutual funds  for Reuters. Any opinions in the column are solely those of Mr.  Willis.)
Translation: Fondos: ¿Son Peligrosos los Fondos de Bonos? (Clint Willis es un escritor independiente que cubre los fondos mutuos para Reuters. Cualquier opinión en la columna es exclusivamente la de Mr. Willis.)
Paraphrase 1: 1. Clint Willis, a freelance writer who reports on mutual funds for Reuters, questions, "Are Bond Funds Risky?" All views expressed in this column solely belong to Mr. Willis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "Do Bond Funds Pose a Risk?" ponders Clint Willis, an independent writer specializing in mutual funds for Reuters. The column only reflects his personal opinions.

Original Text: WTO backs Antigua, rules US online gaming ban is illegal Antigua and Barbuda, the Caribbean island nation, won a World Trade Organization ruling that US legislation criminalizing online betting violates global laws.
Translation: La OMC respalda a Antigua y Barbuda, dictamina que la prohibición del juego en línea en EE. UU. es ilegal. Antigua y Barbuda, la nación insular del Caribe, ganó un fallo de la Organización Mundial del Comercio que señala que la legislación estadounidense que criminaliza las apuestas en línea viola las leyes globales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The World Trade Organization has supported Antigua and Barbuda, concluding that the United States' prohibition of online gambling is against international laws.

Original Text: News: Cisco fixes 'decoy attack' in security software Cisco has discovered a security flaw in its Cisco Security Agent software (CSA. This could be exploited by attackers to circumvent the security provided by the host-based intrusion prevention product.
Translation: Noticias: Cisco soluciona el 'ataque señuelo' en su software de seguridad. Cisco ha descubierto una falla de seguridad en su software Agente de Seguridad Cisco (CSA). Esto podría ser explotado por los atacantes para eludir la seguridad proporcionada por el producto de prevención de intrusiones basado en el anfitrión.
Paraphrase 1: 1. News: Cisco rectifies a 'decoy attack' vulnerability in its security software. A security breach was identified in Cisco's Security Agent software (CSA), that could potentially be exploited to bypass the protection offered by the host-based intrusion prevention product.
Paraphrase 2: 2. News: Cisco addresses a 'decoy attack' issue in its security software. The company found a flaw in their Security Agent software (CSA) which could provide an opportunity for attackers to evade the security shields of the host-based intrusion prevention product.

Original Text: Script kiddies join forces with spammers The firm #39;s E-mail Security Intelligence report, which covers the first half of 2004, highlights the worrying trend of virus writers linking up with spammers; together they are creating a more refined threat to e-mail security.
Translation: Los script kiddies unen fuerzas con los spammers. El informe de Inteligencia de Seguridad del Correo Electrónico de la empresa #39, que abarca la primera mitad de 2004, resalta la preocupante tendencia de los creadores de virus uniéndose con los spammers; juntos están creando una amenaza más refinada para la seguridad del correo electrónico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The E-mail Security Intelligence report from the firm, covering the first half of 2004, indicates a concerning trend of virus developers collaborating with spammers, generating a more sophisticated threat to email security.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As highlighted by the firm's E-mail Security Intelligence report for the first half of 2004, the disturbing trend of spam senders teaming up with script kiddies speaks to an increasingly enhanced threat to email security.

Original Text: More Thumbnails Please \\Using images to denote context has been within UIs for year.\\When Internet Explorer ipmlemented support for favicons I was really impressed.\Gravatars  provide images for users and even FOAF provides support for\associating an image with a profile.\\Rojo has a cool feature where we thumbnail blogs that don't provide images\within their RSS feed.\\Here are two examples:\\My question is why can't I have Linux show me a thumbnail for processes while\I'm switcing between them with Alt-Tab in KDE?  \\OS X can do it!  Windows XP can do it!\\
Translation: Traduce esto al español con precisión: Más Miniaturas por Favor \\Usar imágenes para denotar contexto ha estado en las interfaces de usuario por años.\\Cuando Internet Explorer implementó soporte para favicons, quedé realmente impresionado.\\Los Gravatars proporcionan imágenes para los usuarios e incluso FOAF proporciona soporte para\asociar una imagen con un perfil.\\Rojo tiene una función interesante donde hacemos miniaturas de blogs que no proporcionan imágenes\dentro de su feed RSS.\\Aquí hay dos ejemplos:\\Mi pregunta es, ¿por qué no puedo hacer que Linux me muestre una miniatura de los procesos mientras\estoy cambiando entre ellos con Alt-Tab en KDE?  \\¡OS X puede hacerlo! ¡Windows XP puede hacerlo!
Paraphrase 1: Sentence 1: Images have been used to indicate context in User Interfaces for years, and I was quite amazed when Internet Explorer added support for favicons. Gravatars show images for different users while FOAF backs associating images with profiles. Rojo offers an interesting feature where blogs without images in their RSS feed are represented as thumbnails. Here are a couple of examples: My query is, why doesn't Linux display thumbnails for different processes when I'm switching between them using Alt-Tab in KDE? Both OS X and Windows XP have this capability!
Paraphrase 2: Sentence 2: Utilizing images to provide context has been a staple of UIs for many years. When Internet Explorer incorporated favicon support, I was genuinely wowed. Not only do Gravatars supply users with images, but FOAF even grants the benefit of linking an image to a profile. Rojo stands out by offering a feature that creates thumbnails for blogs that do not include images in their RSS feed. Below are some illustrations. One question arises, why doesn't Linux present me with a thumbnail view of applications while alternately tabbing through them in KDE? This is a feature available both in OS X and Windows XP.

Original Text: An Ivorian economy  #39;fatally hurt #39; PARIS One week after a fragile calm returned to Ivory Coast, the country #39;s business life remains in shambles, with many foreign chief executives out of the country and no prospect of their immediate return.
Translation: "Una economía marfileña #39;fatalmente herida#39; PARÍS Una semana después de que un frágil calma volviera a Costa de Marfil, la vida empresarial del país sigue en ruinas, con muchos ejecutivos extranjeros fuera del país y sin perspectiva de su regreso inmediato."
Paraphrase 1: 1. A week after a precarious peace was reinstated in the Ivory Coast, the economic landscape is severely damaged. Many foreign CEOs have evacuated the country with no imminent plans for return, causing a significant impact on the business sector of the Ivorian economy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Ivorian economy has been 'critically wounded' in the aftermath of recent unrest. Despite the newfound fragile peace in the country, the disruption to the corporate sector persists with numerous foreign business leaders having left the nation, with no indication of quick return.

Original Text: Knee Injury Puts Slutskaya's Preparations on Ice  MOSCOW (Reuters) - Former world champion Irina Slutskaya  has suffered another setback to her preparations for a new  figure skating season after injuring her knee in practice.
Translation: "Lesión de Rodilla Congela los Preparativos de Slutskaya" MOSCÚ (Reuters) - La ex campeona del mundo, Irina Slutskaya, ha sufrido otro contratiempo en sus preparativos para una nueva temporada de patinaje artístico después de lesionarse la rodilla en un entrenamiento.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MOSCOW (Reuters) - Irina Slutskaya, a former world champion, has experienced another disruption in her preparations for the upcoming figure skating season due to a knee injury sustained during practice.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A knee injury during practice has once again hindered former world champion Irina Slutskaya's readiness for the forthcoming figure skating season, according to Moscow Reuters.

Original Text: North Korea #39;s No. 2 Leader Visits China North Korea #39;s second-most senior leader toured a shiny new science park in Beijing Monday, a first stop on visit aimed at finding ways to help the North #39;s moribund economy as much as jump-starting stalled nuclear talks.
Translation: El número 2 del líder de Corea del Norte visita China. El segundo líder más importante de Corea del Norte realizó un recorrido por un brillante y nuevo parque científico en Beijing el lunes, primera parada en una visita destinada a encontrar formas de ayudar a la moribunda economía del Norte tanto como a reactivar las estancadas conversaciones nucleares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. North Korea's Deputy Leader visited China, making a science park in Beijing one of his first stops on Monday. The purpose of this visit was to explore methods to bolster the stagnant North Korean economy. He also aimed to rejuvenate the stalled nuclear talks.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The second-in-command of North Korea embarked on a journey to China, beginning his trip at a modern science park in Beijing on Monday. His visit purports to both stimulate the stagnant North Korean economy and revitalize the paused nuclear discussions.

Original Text: Ad Network Monitors Web Habits Tacoda, an online marketing company, plans to announce the creation of a network of 60 Web sites that will display ads based on how people surf through the network.
Translation: La Red de Anuncios Monitoriza los Hábitos Web. Tacoda, una empresa de marketing en línea, planea anunciar la creación de una red de 60 sitios web que mostrarán anuncios en función de cómo las personas navegan a través de la red.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tacoda, a digital marketing firm, is set to publicize the formation of a network consisting of 60 websites, which plans to showcase advertisements according to the user's browsing habits within the network.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A network of 60 websites is set to be unveiled by Tacoda, an internet marketing business, with an aim to exhibit ads in accordance to the browsing habits of users.

Original Text: No. 16 Minnesota Wins 7th Straight Game (AP) AP - Jamie Broback scored 21 points and led No. 16 Minnesota to its seventh straight win, a 69-42 victory over Santa Clara on Saturday.
Translation: No. 16 Minnesota gana su séptimo partido consecutivo (AP) AP - Jamie Broback anotó 21 puntos y llevó a No. 16 Minnesota a su séptima victoria consecutiva, un triunfo de 69-42 sobre Santa Clara el sábado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) AP - Jamie Broback was the driving force behind No. 16 Minnesota's seventh consecutive win, as he scored 21 points in the 69-42 triumph over Santa Clara on Saturday.
Paraphrase 2: 2) No. 16 Minnesota, led by Jamie Broback's 21 points, secured their seventh win in a row overwhelming Santa Clara with a 69-42 victory on Saturday, reports AP.

Original Text: Iran Wants OPEC to Return to Quotas  TEHRAN (Reuters) - Iran on Saturday reiterated its call for  OPEC to pull supply back down to official quota levels and  mapped out a way to fund a long-promised production hike, a  newspaper reported.
