Translation: Irán Quiere que la OPEP Regrese a las Cuotas TEHRÁN (Reuters) - Irán reiteró el sábado su llamado para que la OPEP reduzca la oferta hasta los niveles oficiales de cuota y trazó un camino para financiar un aumento de la producción prometido hace mucho tiempo, informó un periódico.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TEHRAN (Reuters) - Iran re-emphasized on Saturday its desire for OPEC to reduce the supply back to recognized quota levels, and outlined a strategy for financing a much-anticipated increase in production, as reported in a newspaper.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A newspaper reported that Iran, on Saturday, repeated its request for OPEC to retract supply to the official quota levels and proposed a funding method for a foreseen production surge.

Original Text: Sony takes on iPod Mini Sony has launched two flash memory digital music players that carry the Walkman brand in Europe. The Walkman NW-E99 and NW-E95 take aim at rival Apple #39;s iPod Minis.
Translation: Sony se enfrenta al iPod Mini. Sony ha lanzado dos reproductores de música digital con memoria flash que llevan la marca Walkman en Europa. El Walkman NW-E99 y NW-E95 apuntan a los iPod Minis, el rival de Apple #39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony has introduced two flash memory digital music players, the Walkman NW-E99 and NW-E95, in Europe that contest with Apple's iPod Minis.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Two flash memory digital music players named Walkman NW-E99 and NW-E95 have been launched in Europe by Sony, to compete with Apple's iPod Minis.

Original Text: Host Says Rather Criticism Got Him Fired SEATTLE - A radio talk-show host said Saturday he has been fired for criticizing CBS newsman Dan Rather's handling of challenges to the authenticity of memos about President Bush's National Guard service.   "On the talk show that I host, or hosted, I said I felt Rather should either retire or be forced out over this," said Brian Maloney, whose weekly "The Brian Maloney Show" aired for three years on KIRO-AM Radio, a CBS affiliate here...
Translation: El presentador dice que fue despedido por criticar a Rather SEATTLE - Un presentador de un programa de radio dijo el sábado que ha sido despedido por criticar el manejo del periodista de CBS, Dan Rather, de los desafíos a la autenticidad de los memorandos sobre el servicio del Presidente Bush en la Guardia Nacional. "En el programa de entrevistas que presento, o presentaba, dije que sentía que Rather debería retirarse o ser obligado a salir por esto", dijo Brian Maloney, cuyo programa semanal "The Brian Maloney Show" se emitió durante tres años en la radio KIRO-AM, un afiliado de CBS aquí...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The host of a radio talk show, Brian Maloney, expressed on Saturday that he was dismissed from his job as a result of his criticism towards CBS newsman Dan Rather’s approach to handling the dispute over the legitimacy of memos regarding President Bush's National Guard service. "During my radio show, which I no longer host, I argued that Rather should either voluntarily leave or be forced out due to this issue,” said Maloney, whose show "The Brian Maloney Show" had a three-year run on KIRO-AM Radio, an affiliate of CBS in Seattle...
Paraphrase 2: 2. Brian Maloney, the radio talk-show host, announced on Saturday that his job at KIRO-AM Radio, a CBS affiliate in Seattle, was terminated due to his public criticisms of CBS newsman Dan Rather's methods of addressing queries about the validity of memos concerning President Bush's National Guard service. "In hosting what used to be my talk show, I opined that Rather should either quit his job or be compelled to do so because of this," said Maloney whose show, "The Brian Maloney Show," had been on air for three years...

Original Text: South Africa 230/4, Andrew Hall unbeaten on 78 South Africa finished day 1 of the first test match against India in Kanpur at 230 for the loss of 4 wickets. The proteas were in comfortable position at one stage with the loss of 2 wickets and Jacques Kallis playing alongside Andrew Hall.
Translation: Sudáfrica 230/4, Andrew Hall se mantiene invicto con 78. Sudáfrica terminó el día 1 del primer partido de prueba contra India en Kanpur con 230 por la pérdida de 4 wickets. Los proteas estaban en una posición cómoda en un momento con la pérdida de 2 wickets y Jacques Kallis jugando junto a Andrew Hall.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Concluding the first day of the initial test match against India in Kanpur, South Africa had achieved a score of 230/4 with Andrew Hall remaining undefeated at 78. At one point, with only 2 wickets lost, the Proteas were in a secure place with Jacques Kallis and Andrew Hall at the crease.
Paraphrase 2: 2. South Africa claimed a steady position on the opening day of the first test match in Kanpur against India, having lost just 4 wickets and securing 230 runs, with Andrew Hall still on the pitch, unbeaten at 78. The Proteas, once in a more comfortable situation, had Jacques Kallis playing alongside with Andrew Hall after losing only two wickets.

Original Text: Brown Does Triple Duty for Patriots (AP) AP - New England Patriots receiver-turned-defensive back Troy Brown was easy to spot on the field in St. Louis: He was the one always trying to catch his breath, but smiling.
Translation: Brown Hace Triple Servicio para los Patriots (AP) AP - El receptor de los New England Patriots convertido en defensa, Troy Brown, era fácil de reconocer en el campo en St. Louis: él era el que siempre intentaba recuperar el aliento, pero sonriendo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (AP) Troy Brown, New England Patriots' receiver who transitioned into a defensive back role, was notable on the St. Louis field, often out of breath and yet constantly grinning.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Troy Brown, receiver of the New England Patriots and current defensive back, was invariably seen on the St. Louis field trying to catch his breath, wearing a smile nevertheless. (AP)

Original Text: GM to Close Van Factory In Baltimore General Motors Corp. said yesterday that it will shut its 70-year-old van factory in southeast Baltimore next year, confirming a closure that some 1,100 workers have long expected but that state officials had hoped to stave off.
Translation: GM cerrará la fábrica de furgonetas en Baltimore. General Motors Corp. anunció ayer que cerrará su antigua fábrica de furgonetas de 70 años en el sureste de Baltimore el próximo año, confirmando un cierre que unos 1,100 trabajadores ya esperaban desde hace tiempo, pero que los funcionarios estatales habían esperado evitar.
Paraphrase 1: 1. General Motors Corp. confirmed yesterday their decision to shut down their van factory in southeast Baltimore next year. A closure that around 1,100 employees expected but something that state officials had been trying to avoid.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It was revealed yesterday by General Motors Corp. that their southeast Baltimore van factory, a 70-year-old institution, will face closure next year. This move, while expected by its 1,100 employees, goes against the hopes of state officials who intended to prevent it.

Original Text: Moveon.org subscriber-data leaked through search Subscribers to Moveon.org #39;s mailing lists may have found their interest in the anti-Bush political site a matter of public record.
Translation: Los datos de los suscriptores de Moveon.org se filtraron a través de la búsqueda. Los suscriptores de las listas de correo de Moveon.org #39 pueden haber encontrado su interés en el sitio político anti-Bush como un asunto de registro público.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The subscription data of Moveon.org's mailing list, which is predominantly anti-Bush, may have become public, potentially exposing users' political interests.

Original Text: Caesars, Quintain to Build Wembley Casino  LONDON (Reuters) - U.S. casino firm Caesars Entertainment  Inc. and Quintain Estates have formed a joint venture to turn  the area around London's Wembley Stadium into a \$600 million  leisure and gambling resort.
Translation: Caesars, Quintain construirán un casino en Wembley LONDRES (Reuters) - La empresa estadounidense de casinos Caesars Entertainment Inc. y Quintain Estates han formado una empresa conjunta para transformar el área alrededor del estadio de Wembley en Londres en un complejo de ocio y juego de 600 millones de dólares.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (Reuters) - An alliance between U.S. casino company Caesars Entertainment Inc. and Quintain Estates aims to convert the surroundings of London's Wembley Stadium into a \$600 million recreational and gambling resort.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (Reuters) - Quintain Estates has partnered with U.S. casino business Caesars Entertainment Inc. with the goal of transforming the Wembley Stadium vicinity in London into a resort worth \$600 million that combines leisure and gambling.

Original Text: Koch off the hook; Marlins release pitcher Miami,FL (Sports Network) - The Florida Marlins released reliever Billy Koch on Tuesday, while catcher Ramon Castro opted for free agency.
Translation: Koch se libera; Marlins deja ir al lanzador Miami, FL (Sports Network) - Los Marlins de Florida liberaron al lanzador de relevo Billy Koch el martes, mientras que el receptor Ramón Castro optó por la agencia libre.
Paraphrase 1: 1) On Tuesday, the Florida Marlins decided to let reliever Billy Koch go, and in the meantime, catcher Ramon Castro chose free agency. This news was released in Miami, FL by the Sports Network.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The Sports Network in Miami, FL announced that Billy Koch, the reliever for the Florida Marlins, was let go on Tuesday. Additionally, catcher Ramon Castro chose to pursue free agency.

Original Text: Skipper wants a final fling MICHAEL Vaughan last night dreamed of capping a spectacularly successful summer for England with an appearance in the final of the ICC Champions Trophy.
Translation: El capitán desea un último lance. Anoche, MICHAEL Vaughan soñó con culminar un verano espectacularmente exitoso para Inglaterra con una aparición en la final del Trofeo de Campeones de la ICC.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Last night, Michael Vaughan, Skipper, harboured the dream of making an appearance in the ICC Champions Trophy final which would wonderfully culminate England's highly successful summer.

Original Text: For Jets, it was a coming-out party for revamped defense The coming-out party began in the tunnel before the game when Jets defensive coordinator Donnie Henderson bumped into owner Woody Johnson.
Translation: Para los Jets, fue una fiesta de presentación para la defensa renovada. La fiesta de presentación comenzó en el túnel antes del partido cuando el coordinador defensivo de los Jets, Donnie Henderson, se encontró con el dueño Woody Johnson.
Paraphrase 1: 1. For the Jets, it was the unveiling of their remodeled defense, initiated when their defensive coordinator, Donnie Henderson, bumped into owner Woody Johnson in the tunnel before the game started.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The revamped defense of the Jets had their grand debut, a moment initiated when Donnie Henderson, their defensive coordinator, unexpectedly met owner Woody Johnson in the game's tunnel.

Original Text: Wenger will not yield Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has vowed to fight his FA misconduct charge as he defended his right to criticise Ruud van Nistelrooy in public.
Translation: Wenger no cederá. El gerente del Arsenal, Arsene Wenger, ha jurado luchar contra su cargo de mala conducta de la FA, mientras defiende su derecho a criticar a Ruud van Nistelrooy en público.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Asserting his right to publicly criticize Ruud van Nistelrooy, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has dashed any hopes of backing down from his FA misconduct charge, making a firm commitment to battle it.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger, taking a firm stance not to succumb to his FA misconduct charge, has pledged to stand up for his right to publicly voice his criticisms of Ruud van Nistelrooy.

Original Text: Els claims record sixth Match Play Ernie Els claimed a record sixth World Match Play title by beating Lee Westwood two and one in a gripping final at Wentworth. The South African world number two celebrated
Translation: Els reclama su sexto récord en el Match Play. Ernie Els reclamó un récord de sexto título en el World Match Play al vencer a Lee Westwood dos a uno en una emocionante final en Wentworth. El número dos del mundo sudafricano lo celebró.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Els secures an unprecedented sixth World Match Play title, marking his victory against Lee Westwood in an enthralling final at Wentworth. He celebrated this accomplishment as the number two world player from South Africa.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Beating Lee Westwood in an intense final at Wentworth, Els triumphantly marked his record-setting sixth World Match Play title. The celebration ensued for the world's second-ranked South African player.

Original Text: New Monkey Species Found in India Scientists discovered a new species of monkey in India, 101 years after the last species of its kind was found. They have called it the Arunachal macaque (scientific name Macaca munzala) after the state of Arunachal Pradesh where it was found.
Translation: Nueva Especie de Mono Encontrada en India Los científicos descubrieron una nueva especie de mono en India, 101 años después de que se encontrara la última especie de su tipo. Lo han llamado el macaco de Arunachal (nombre científico Macaca munzala) en honor al estado de Arunachal Pradesh donde fue encontrado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A new species of monkey, known as the Arunachal macaque (scientific name Macaca munzala), has been discovered in India by scientists. This finding occurred 101 years after the previous species of its kind were identified and it was named after the Arunachal Pradesh state where it was found.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Scientists in India have made the remarkable discovery of a new monkey species, the Arunachal macaque (Macaca munzala), 101 years after the identification of the last species of its type. The discovery occured in the state of Arunachal Pradesh, which inspired the naming of the new species.

Original Text: Sam Kellerman / FOXSports.com Posted: 2 minutes ago I confess that I am a complete ignoramus when it comes to women #39;s beach volleyball. In fact, I know only one thing about the sport - that it is the supreme aesthetic experience available on planet Earth.
Translation: Sam Kellerman / FOXSports.com Publicado: hace 2 minutos Confieso que soy un completo ignorante cuando se trata de voleibol de playa femenino. De hecho, solo sé una cosa sobre el deporte - que es la experiencia estética suprema disponible en el planeta Tierra.
Paraphrase 1: 1. I admit, on FOXSports.com, Sam Kellerman confesses that his understanding of women's beach volleyball is incredibly limited. He amusingly admits his unawareness by stating that he only knows one key factor - that it offers the highest level of aesthetic enjoyment on the Earth. This confession was posted just 2 minutes ago.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sam Kellerman confessed on FOXSports.com, in a post uploaded only 2 minutes ago, his absolute lack of knowledge regarding women's beach volleyball. However, he acknowledges his solitary understanding of it being the most aesthetically pleasing experience available globally.

Original Text: Chirac backs Turkish EU entry The French president throws his weight behind Turkish EU membership ahead of a key summit decision.
Translation: Chirac apoya la entrada de Turquía a la UE. El presidente francés respalda la membresía de Turquía en la UE antes de una decisión clave en la cumbre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Chirac supports Turkey's accession to the EU before a critical summit decision.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The French President advocates for Turkey's EU participation prior to a major summit verdict.

Original Text: Cambodian king says he's abdicating throne BANGKOK -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihanouk, now 83, sick, and dismayed at political infighting in his impoverished country as it tries to recover from the Khmer Rouge era of mass killings, wants to give up his throne. Sihanouk had delayed his scheduled return from China, where he has been undergoing medical treatment for several months, and announced his desire to ...
Translation: El rey camboyano dice que está abdicando al trono BANGKOK -- El rey camboyano Norodom Sihanouk, ahora de 83 años, enfermo y consternado por las luchas políticas en su país empobrecido mientras intenta recuperarse de la época de matanzas masivas de los Jemeres Rojos, quiere renunciar a su trono. Sihanouk ha retrasado su regreso programado desde China, donde ha estado recibiendo tratamiento médico durante varios meses, y anunció su deseo de...
Paraphrase 1: 1. His Majesty King Norodom Sihanouk of Cambodia, currently 83 and unwell, recently expressed a wish to renounce his regency. The king, distressed by the political unrest in his economically disadvantaged nation as it grapples with the aftermath of the Khmer Rouge's mass murders, has postponed his anticipated arrival from China. In China, he has been receiving numerous months of health treatment, and it was there that he made known his intention to abdicate...
Paraphrase 2: 2. At age 83 and in poor health, the King of Cambodia, Norodom Sihanouk, has declared his intention to abdicate. The decision comes amidst his growing concern over political discord in his beleaguered nation, which is still struggling to heal from the mass atrocities of the Khmer Rouge era. The king, who is currently in China to receive extensive medical treatment, decided to delay his planned return home to announce his abdication wish...

Original Text: US pressures Indonesian over mine pollution arrests The United States has stepped up its diplomatic response to Indonesia #39;s arrest of five executives of the American mining company Newmont for alleged pollution in the province of Sulawesi.
Translation: EE.UU presiona a Indonesia sobre arrestos por contaminación minera. Los Estados Unidos han intensificado su respuesta diplomática ante los arrestos en Indonesia de cinco ejecutivos de la compañía minera estadounidense Newmont, por presunta contaminación en la provincia de Sulawesi.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In response to the arrest of five executives from the American mining company Newmont in Indonesia on charges of alleged pollution in Sulawesi province, the United States has intensified its diplomatic pressure.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The US has escalated its diplomatic interventions with Indonesia following the arrest in Sulawesi of five top executives from Newmont, an American mining firm, on allegations of pollution.

Original Text: European Parliament approves new, reshuffled executive The European Parliament approved the reshuffled 24-member European Union executive on Thursday, ending a political showdown with incoming EU chief Jose Manuel Barroso over objections to his team.
Translation: El Parlamento Europeo aprueba el nuevo ejecutivo reorganizado. El Parlamento Europeo aprobó el jueves la reorganización del ejecutivo de 24 miembros de la Unión Europea, poniendo fin a un enfrentamiento político con el nuevo jefe de la UE, Jose Manuel Barroso, por las objeciones a su equipo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The reshuffled 24-member European Union executive was approved by the European Parliament on Thursday, putting an end to a political face-off with incoming EU chief Jose Manuel Barroso due to objections to his lineup.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, the European Parliament gave its approval to the newly rearranged 24-member European Union executive, thereby concluding a political conflict with soon-to-be EU chief, Jose Manuel Barroso, who faced opposition to his team.

Original Text: Blue Chips End Lower, Wal-Mart Weighs US blue chips ended lower on Monday after a disappointing sales forecast from the world #39;s biggest retailer, Wal-Mart Stores Inc.
Translation: Las acciones principales de EE.UU. cierran a la baja, Wal-Mart pesa: Las acciones principales de EE.UU. cerraron a la baja el lunes después de una decepcionante previsión de ventas del mayor minorista del mundo, Wal-Mart Stores Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a dismal sales forecast from the world's largest retailer, Wal-Mart Stores Inc., US blue chips concluded lower on Monday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. US blue chips fell on Monday, driven by a disappointing sales forecast issued by Wal-Mart Stores Inc., the world's leading retailer.

Original Text: Siemens and Ningbo Bird Deny They #39;re in Talks Over Mobile Unit Siemens AG, Germany #39;s biggest engineering company, denied it is in talks with potential venture partners for its troubled mobile-phone business, which sustained losses in the quarter through June.
Translation: Siemens y Ningbo Bird niegan que estén en negociaciones sobre la unidad móvil. Siemens AG, la empresa de ingeniería más grande de Alemania, negó que esté en conversaciones con posibles socios de empresas para su problemático negocio de telefonía móvil, que sufrió pérdidas en el trimestre hasta junio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Siemens AG, the largest engineering company in Germany, refuted claims that they are discussing possible partnerships to salvage their struggling mobile-phone business, which reported a loss in the quarter ending in June. Similarly, Ningbo Bird rejected rumors that talks are ongoing about the mobile unit.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Both Siemens, Germany's foremost engineering firm, and Ningbo Bird dismissed speculations of being in negotiation over the mobile unit, especially valuable to Siemens due to recent losses posted by their mobile-phone business for the quarter that ended in June.

Original Text: Tennis: Spain and the US will square up in Seville for Davis Cup <b>...</b> BARCELONA, Spain : Spain will play the United States in the Davis Cup final in Seville on December 3-5, Spanish tennis federation president Agusti Pujol said.
Translation: Tenis: España y los Estados Unidos se enfrentarán en Sevilla por la Copa Davis <b>...</b> BARCELONA, España: España jugará contra los Estados Unidos en la final de la Copa Davis en Sevilla del 3 al 5 de diciembre, dijo el presidente de la federación española de tenis, Agusti Pujol.
Paraphrase 1: 1) According to Agusti Pujol, the president of the Spanish tennis federation, Spain and the United States will compete in the final of the Davis Cup in Seville, Spain from December 3-5.
Paraphrase 2: 2) As confirmed by the president of the Spanish tennis federation, Agusti Pujol, Spain is set to host the United States for the Davis Cup final in Seville, taking place from the 3rd to the 5th of December.

Original Text: Alcan in Talks to Sell Greek Firm Stake Canadian aluminum producing giant Alcan Inc. said Friday that it is in exclusive talks to sell the company #39;s stake in Aluminium de Grece SA to metals company Mytilineos Holdings SA of Greece.
Translation: El gigante canadiense productor de aluminio Alcan Inc. dijo el viernes que se encuentra en conversaciones exclusivas para vender la participación de la empresa en Aluminium de Grece SA a la empresa metalúrgica Mytilineos Holdings SA de Grecia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Friday, Alcan Inc., a leading Canadian aluminum producer, announced that it has entered exclusive negotiations to sell its shares in Aluminium de Grece SA to the Greek metals firm, Mytilineos Holdings SA.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Alcan Inc., the Canadian aluminum titan, is currently in an exclusive dialogue to dispose of its equity interest in Aluminium de Grece SA, with prospective buyer being Mytilineos Holdings SA, a metals corporation from Greece.

Original Text: Apple fans abuzz over new iMac Company maintains its famous veil of secrecy as faithful speculate about possible designs.
Translation: Los fanáticos de Apple están revolucionados por el nuevo iMac. La compañía mantiene su famoso velo de secreto mientras los fieles especulan sobre posibles diseños.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As loyal followers speculate about potential designs, Apple continues its renowned tradition of secrecy, creating excitement among its fans for the new iMac.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Amidst speculations about prospective designs by its dedicated fans, Apple keeps its characteristic secrecy intact, triggering curiosity over their new iMac.

Original Text: Oil Firms Say Iraqi Purchases Were Legal  Two large American oil companies that received profitable vouchers to buy Iraqi oil under the United Nations' oil-for-food program said yesterday that the purchases complied with U.S. law.
Translation: Las empresas petroleras dicen que las compras en Irak fueron legales. Dos grandes compañías petroleras estadounidenses que recibieron cupones rentables para comprar petróleo iraquí bajo el programa de petróleo por alimentos de las Naciones Unidas, dijeron ayer que las compras cumplían con la ley estadounidense.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two prominent US oil companies, who benefitted from purchasing Iraqi oil under the United Nations' oil-for-food program, asserted yesterday that their transactions adhered to American legislation.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday, two major American oil corporations, which gained profitable vouchers for acquiring Iraqi oil within the framework of the United Nations' oil-for-food initiative, stated their compliance with U.S. legal guidelines.

Original Text: Pawar keeps options open on eve of BCCI polls Kolkata: Keeping his options open amidst intense lobbying for the president #39;s post of the cricket board, Sharad Pawar on Tuesday said that he would take the plunge only if he was sure of victory.
Translation: Pawar mantiene opciones abiertas en la víspera de las elecciones de la BCCI, Kolkata: Manteniendo sus opciones abiertas en medio de un intenso cabildeo para el puesto de presidente del consejo de cricket, Sharad Pawar dijo el martes que sólo se lanzaría a la candidatura si estuviera seguro de la victoria.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Amidst intense lobbying for the president's position within the cricket board, Sharad Pawar declared Tuesday that he would only venture into the race if victory was certain, thereby leaving his options open on the eve of BCCI polls in Kolkata.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As the BCCI polls in Kolkata approach, Sharad Pawar remains undecided amidst strong competition for the cricket board president's post, stating on Tuesday that he will only participate if he is confident of a win.

Original Text: Martha Stewart  #39;cordial #39; with jailmates: report NEW YORK, Oct 10 (AFP) - US style guru Martha Stewart was friendly with inmates on her first night in jail and appeared in  quot;good spirits quot; as she began serving a five-month prison sentence in West Virginia, US media reported Sunday.
Translation: Martha Stewart 'cordial' con compañeras de prisión: informe NUEVA YORK, 10 de Octubre (AFP) - La gurú del estilo estadounidense Martha Stewart fue amigable con las reclusas en su primera noche en prisión y parecía estar en "buenos ánimos" cuando comenzó a cumplir una condena de cinco meses en prisión en West Virginia, informaron medios estadounidenses el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1) U.S media reported on Sunday that Martha Stewart, the American style icon, had a friendly interaction with fellow inmates on her initial night in a West Virginia prison. Embarking on a five-month prison term, she was said to be in a cheerful mood according to reports cited from New York on October 10 (AFP).
Paraphrase 2: 2) Reports from U.S media emerged on Sunday, suggesting that Martha Stewart, renowned style expert from the U.S, had a pleasant start in her prison life in West Virginia. She purportedly maintained a friendly rapport with her jailmates on the first night and seemed to be in high spirits, as she commenced her five-month sentence, as per the reports from New York, dated October 10 (AFP).

Original Text: Paterno's Son-In-Law in Bicycle Accident (AP) AP - Penn State coach Joe Paterno flew home without his team after the Nittany Lions' loss to Wisconsin on Saturday night when he learned his son-in-law had been involved in a serious bicycle accident.
Translation: Hijo político de Paterno en accidente de bicicleta (AP) AP - El entrenador de Penn State, Joe Paterno, voló a casa sin su equipo después de la derrota de los Nittany Lions ante Wisconsin la noche del sábado cuando se enteró de que su yerno había estado involucrado en un grave accidente de bicicleta.
Paraphrase 1: (AP) AP - Following a loss to Wisconsin, Penn State coach Joe Paterno left his team to return home after being informed that his son-in-law had suffered a severe bicycle accident on Saturday night.
Paraphrase 2: (AP) AP - Upon hearing about his son-in-law's serious bicycle accident, Penn State coach Joe Paterno took a flight home independently, leaving his team behind after the Nittany Lions' game against Wisconsin concluded with a loss on Saturday night.

Original Text: U.S.-Iraqi Security Forces Launch Attacks (AP) AP - U.S. and Iraqi security forces launched attacks Thursday to flush out insurgents in northern Iraq, the military and Iraqi officials said.
Translation: Fuerzas de Seguridad Estadounidenses e Iraquíes Lanzan Ataques (AP) AP - Las fuerzas de seguridad estadounidenses e iraquíes lanzaron ataques el jueves para expulsar a insurgentes en el norte de Irak, dijeron el ejército y funcionarios iraquíes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP reports that U.S. and Iraqi security forces initiated assaults on Thursday with the goal of expelling insurgents in northern Iraq, as stated by the military and Iraqi officials.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In northern Iraq, the U.S. and Iraqi security forces commenced operations Thursday to rid the region of insurgents, according to both military and Iraqi official reports (AP).

Original Text: Volandri Upsets Massu in Palermo (AP) AP - Defending champion Nicolas Massu was upset by Filippo Volandri 6-3, 3-6, 6-4 Friday in the quarterfinals of the Campionati Internazionali di Sicilia.
Translation: Volandri sorprende a Massu en Palermo (AP) AP - El campeón defensor, Nicolas Massu, fue sorprendido por Filippo Volandri 6-3, 3-6, 6-4 el viernes en los cuartos de final de los Campionati Internazionali di Sicilia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (AP) AP - In a surprising upset, defending champion Nicolas Massu was defeated by Filippo Volandri with a score of 6-3, 3-6, 6-4, in the quarterfinals of the Campionati Internazionali di Sicilia on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) AP - Filippo Volandri triumphed over defending champion Nicolas Massu in a 6-3, 3-6, 6-4 upset during Friday's quarterfinals of the Campionati Internazionali di Sicilia.

Original Text: Tennessee earns a little respect defeat of Georgia No. 17 Tennessee arrived at No. 3 Georgia on Saturday, coming off a loss to Auburn, while the Bulldogs had thrashed LSU. Not only did the Volunteers drop nine spots in the national rankings
Translation: Tennessee se gana un poco de respeto con la derrota de Georgia. El número 17, Tennessee, llegó a Georgia, número 3, el sábado, tras una derrota contra Auburn, mientras que los Bulldogs habían aplastado a LSU. No sólo los Voluntarios cayeron nueve puestos en los rankings nacionales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Despite coming off a loss to Auburn, No. 17 Tennessee gained some admiration with a surprising victory over No. 3 Georgia last Saturday. The Volunteers had fallen nine places in the national rankings, and yet they managed to subdue the Bulldogs, who had recently crushed LSU.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Arriving at No. 3 Georgia after suffering a loss to Auburn, No. 17 Tennessee garnered some respect by defeating the Bulldogs, who had previously decimated LSU. This notable win occurred while the Volunteers were dropping nine places in the national rankings.

Original Text: Former Sun, BEA execs forge grid venture Former executives from companies such as Sun Microsystems, BEA Systems, and Oracle this week are formally launching a venture called Cassatt, which is endeavoring to automate IT operations, leverage commodity hardware and software, and govern network compute cycles in a grid-like manner.
Translation: Antiguos ejecutivos de Sun, BEA forjan una empresa de grid. Antiguos ejecutivos de empresas como Sun Microsystems, BEA Systems y Oracle están lanzando formalmente esta semana una empresa llamada Cassatt, que se esfuerza por automatizar las operaciones de TI, aprovechar el hardware y software de uso común, y gobernar los ciclos de cálculo de red de una manera similar a una grid.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Former executives from Sun Microsystems, BEA Systems, and Oracle are officially initiating a venture named Cassatt this week. The new venture aims to automate IT operations, utilize commodity hardware and software effectively, and manage network compute cycles in a grid-like approach.
Paraphrase 2: 2. This week sees the formal inauguration of Cassatt, a new venture formed by ex-executives from notable companies like Sun Microsystems, BEA Systems, and Oracle. This enterprise intends to streamline IT operations, capitalize on commodity hardware and software, and control network compute cycles in a way that mimics a grid system.

Original Text: China 'may intervene more' in HK Analysts in Hong Kong say China is signalling its intention to take a more active role in the territory's affairs.
Translation: Los analistas en Hong Kong dicen que China está señalando su intención de tomar un papel más activo en los asuntos del territorio. China 'podría intervenir más'.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Analysts in Hong Kong indicate that China is showing signs of intending to increase its involvement in the region's matters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is indicated by Hong Kong analysts that China is portraying intentions to escalate intervention in the territory's issues.

Original Text: Dollar Gains Ground on Yen  TOKYO (Reuters) - The dollar regained some ground against  the yen on Friday, moving away from four-month lows hit the  previous day, but the market remained reluctant to push the  U.S. currency below the closely watched 107 yen mark.
Translation: El dólar gana terreno frente al yen  TOKIO (Reuters) - El dólar recuperó algo de terreno frente al yen el viernes, alejándose de los mínimos de cuatro meses alcanzados el día anterior, pero el mercado sigue reacio a empujar la moneda estadounidense por debajo de la marca de 107 yenes, cuidadosamente vigilada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. TOKYO (Reuters) - Witnessing a rebound on Friday, the dollar advanced against the yen, distancing itself from the four-month low it had reached a day earlier. However, the market continued to resist driving the U.S. currency beneath the significant threshold of 107 yen.
Paraphrase 2: 2. TOKYO (Reuters) - On Friday, the dollar recouped some prominence in the face of the yen, pulling back from a four-month low attained the day before. Still, the market exhibited hesitancy to nudge the U.S. currency below the pivotal 107 yen level.

Original Text: Array of Innovations at Mobile Tech Show As co-stars of an elite, wireless-oriented tech show they were improbable indeed: A weed whacker, a blender and a boombox. Their decibel assault at this year's 6th annual DEMOmobile show was the perfect foil for its most celebrated product, a noise-canceling cell phone headset called Jawbone.
Translation: Traducción al español precisa: Despliegue de innovaciones en el Show de Tecnología Móvil. Como coprotagonistas de un prestigioso show tecnológico orientado al inalámbrico, eran verdaderamente improbables: un cortador de maleza, una licuadora y un boombox. Su asalto de decibelios en el sexto show anual DEMOmobile de este año fue el contrapunto perfecto para su producto más celebrado, un auricular de teléfono móvil con cancelación de ruido llamado Jawbone.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Unlikely co-stars such as a weed whacker, a blender, and a boombox steal the show with their loud performance at the high-profile, wireless-focused tech show, DEMOmobile. These unexpected stars served as the ideal contrast to the most acclaimed product of the show - a noise-canceling mobile phone headset named Jawbone, at this year's 6th edition of the event.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At this year's 6th annual DEMOmobile show, a top-tier event focusing on wireless technology, the most unexpected spectacle occurred: a weed whacker, a blender, and a boombox made up a stunning sound spectacle. This unlikely trio served as the perfect counterpoint to the event's star product, a cell phone headset named Jawbone, with noise-canceling features.

Original Text: Badgers fans hyped about teams undefeated season Never in the University of Wisconsin football programs 115-year history have the Badgers been 10-0. That could happen today in East Lansing, Mich.
Translation: Los aficionados de los Badgers están emocionados por la temporada invicta del equipo. Nunca en la historia de 115 años del programa de fútbol de la Universidad de Wisconsin, los Badgers han estado 10-0. Eso podría suceder hoy en East Lansing, Michigan.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The University of Wisconsin's football program could make history in East Lansing, Mich today, as the Badgers could reach a 10-0 undefeated season for the first time in their 115-year history, a fact much anticipated by their fans.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today in East Lansing, Mich. could mark a history-making event for the University of Wisconsin's football program. The Badgers stand on the brink of a 10-0 season, a record that has eluded the team throughout their 115-year history. This possibility has Badgers fans in a state of high excitement.

Original Text: Disney Confirms Eisner to Leave in 2006 LONDON - Michael Eisner, who led the Walt Disney Co. to huge success in the 1980s but more recently clashed with dissident stockholders including the founder's family, will leave the company in 2006 when his contract expires, the company said Friday...
Translation: Disney Confirma que Eisner se irá en 2006 LONDRES - Michael Eisner, quien lideró a la compañía Walt Disney Co. hacia un enorme éxito en la década de 1980 pero recientemente chocó con accionistas disidentes, incluyendo a la familia del fundador, abandonará la empresa en 2006 cuando su contrato expire, anunció la compañía el viernes...
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Walt Disney Co. confirmed on Friday that Michael Eisner, the man who propelled the company to immense success in the 80s but later had conflicts with disagreeing shareholders including the founder's family, will depart from the company in 2006 following the expiration of his contract.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Friday, the Walt Disney Co. announced that Michael Eisner, once a pivotal figure in leading the company to major success during the 1980s but known for his recent disagreements with certain shareholders, including members of the founder's family, is set to exit the organization in 2006, upon the termination of his contract.

Original Text: NASA Space Station Status Report 11 October 2004 The 10th crew of the International Space Station is scheduled to launch from the Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan Oct. 13 at 11:06 pm EDT for a six-month stay aboard the orbiting laboratory.
Translation: Informe de Estado de la Estación Espacial de la NASA 11 de octubre de 2004 La 10ma tripulación de la Estación Espacial Internacional está programada para despegar desde el Cosmódromo de Baikonur en Kazajstán el 13 de octubre a las 11:06 pm EDT para una estancia de seis meses a bordo del laboratorio en órbita.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The 10th crew of the International Space Station is slated to depart from the Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan on October 13, at 11:06 pm EDT for a sojourn of six months in the orbital lab, according to the NASA Space Station Status Report dated October 11, 2004.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As stated in the NASA Space Station Status Report from October 11, 2004, a six-month mission in the orbiting laboratory is set for the 10th crew of the International Space Station, with their launch from the Baikonur Cosmodrome in Kazakhstan planned for 11:06 pm EDT on October 13.

Original Text: NASCAR rejects Earnhardt #39;s appeal Dale Earnhardt Jr. lost his appeal of a 25-point penalty and \$10,000 fine for using a vulgarity during a postrace TV interview. Instead of leading the Nextel Cup standings Monday by a point with five races to go, Earnhardt trails Kurt Busch by 24 points.
Translation: NASCAR rechaza la apelación de Earnhardt #39; Dale Earnhardt Jr. perdió su apelación a una penalización de 25 puntos y una multa de \$10,000 por usar una vulgaridad durante una entrevista televisiva después de la carrera. En lugar de liderar la clasificación de la Copa Nextel el lunes por un punto con cinco carreras por disputar, Earnhardt queda detrás de Kurt Busch por 24 puntos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dale Earnhardt Jr's appeal against a 25-point penalty and a fine of $10,000 for using vulgar language during a post-race television interview was rejected by NASCAR. Instead of leading the Nextel Cup standings on Monday by one point and with only five races remaining, Earnhardt is now 24 points behind Kurt Busch.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NASCAR turned down Dale Earnhardt Jr's appeal of a 25-point penalty and a $10,000 fine for inappropriate language during a postrace television interview. Rather than being ahead by a point in the Nextel Cup standings on Monday with just five races left, Earnhardt is now trailing Kurt Busch by 24 points.

Original Text: Israeli Captain Is Charged in Shooting of Palestinian Girl Military prosecutors charged an army captain today with five separate offenses after accusations by fellow soldiers that he repeatedly shot a 13-year-old Palestinian schoolgirl to make sure she was dead.
Translation: Capitán israelí es acusado por dispararle a una niña palestina. Los fiscales militares acusaron hoy a un capitán del ejército con cinco delitos distintos después de las acusaciones de sus compañeros soldados de que disparó repetidamente a una escolar palestina de 13 años para asegurarse de que estaba muerta.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An Israeli army captain has been indicted today on five different counts by military prosecutors. The charges are a result of claims from his own comrades that he intentionally shot a 13-year-old Palestinian girl multiple times to confirm her death.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Charges, amounting to five distinct offenses, have been imposed on an Israeli army captain today by military prosecutors. This consequence came following allegations from other soldiers stating that he ensured the death of a 13-year-old Palestinian schoolgirl by repeatedly shooting her.

Original Text: Music Industry Sues 459 European Net Song-Swappers (Reuters) Reuters - The piracy-battered music industry said\Thursday it will sue British, French and Austrian music fans\for the first time as it intensifies its legal crackdown on\Internet song-swappers.
Translation: La Industria Musical Demanda a 459 Intercambiadores de Canciones en la Red Europea (Reuters) Reuters - La industria de la música, muy afectada por la piratería, anunció el jueves que demandará por primera vez a aficionados a la música británicos, franceses y austriacos, a medida que intensifica su ofensiva legal contra los intercambiadores de canciones en Internet.
Paraphrase 1: (Reuters) Reuters - The music industry, heavily impacted by piracy, announced on Thursday that it will for the first time institute legal proceedings against British, French, and Austrian music fans, in a step-up of its fight against Internet song-swapping.
Paraphrase 2: (Reuters) Reuters - In a more aggressive approach against Internet song-swapping, the music industry, which has been severely affected by piracy, revealed on Thursday it will be suing British, French, and Austrian music enthusiasts for the first time.

Original Text: Gold Fields plans to respond to Harmony offer by Nov. 3 LONDON (CBS.MW) -- South African gold miner Gold Fields (GFI) said it #39;s board met Friday to assess an \$8.1 billion hostile takeover offer from Harmony (HMY) as well as to review measures for its defense.
Translation: Gold Fields planea responder a la oferta de Harmony antes del 3 de noviembre LONDRES (CBS.MW) -- La minera de oro sudafricana Gold Fields (GFI) dijo que su junta se reunió el viernes para evaluar una oferta hostil de adquisición de 8.1 mil millones de dólares de Harmony (HMY), así como para revisar las medidas para su defensa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. LONDON (CBS.MW) -- Following a meeting on Friday, the board of South African Gold miner, Gold Fields (GFI) stated their intention to address a hostile takeover bid, valued at $8.1 billion, from Harmony (HMY) by November 3. In addition to this, they also plan to evaluate their defensive strategies.
Paraphrase 2: 2. LONDON (CBS.MW) -- An $8.1 billion unfriendly takeover bid from Harmony (HMY) was the subject of discussion at a recent Gold Fields (GFI) board meeting which took place on Friday, the South African gold mining company announced. The board plans to formally respond to this offer by November 3 and also look toward formulating the company's protective measures.

Original Text: Apple also announces European version of iTunes Music Store and <b>...</b> Soon, Canada will finally get its own iTunes digital music store. The long-expected announcement came at a press conference held in California last week.
Translation: Apple también anuncia la versión europea de iTunes Music Store y <b>...</b> Pronto, Canadá finalmente tendrá su propia tienda de música digital iTunes. El anuncio, largamente esperado, llegó en una conferencia de prensa que se llevó a cabo en California la semana pasada.
Paraphrase 1: 1. It was also declared by Apple that the iTunes Music Store would be released in a version tailored to Europe. In the foreseeable future, Canada will at last receive a version of the iTunes digital music store, which has been anticipated for a long time. The awaited declaration was made at a press meeting in California the previous week.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In addition, Apple has made known its European version of the iTunes Music Store and soon, the long-awaited iTunes digital music store will be launched in Canada. This announcement, which had been expected for quite some time, was delivered in a press conference that took place in California last week.

Original Text: Ice skater doesn #39;t remember what caused fall that left her with a <b>...</b> World champion pairs skater Tatiana Totmianina said Monday she still doesn #39;t know what caused her to fall and sustain a concussion during a weekend skating program, though she says she doesn #39;t fear going back on the ice.
Translation: La patinadora de hielo no recuerda qué causó la caída que la dejó con una <b>...</b> La campeona mundial de patinaje en parejas, Tatiana Totmianina, dijo el lunes que todavía no sabe qué causó su caída y la consiguiente conmoción cerebral durante un programa de patinaje de fin de semana, aunque afirma que no teme volver al hielo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Tatiana Totmianina, the world champion pairs skater, confessed on Monday that she's yet to understand what led to her fall and subsequent concussion during a weekend skating event, however, she remains unafraid of returning to the ice.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, world championship pairs skater Tatiana Totmianina admitted that she could not recall why she fell and incurred a concussion in a weekend skating routine, even so, she insists she feels no apprehension about skating again.

Original Text: Astros vs. Cardinals preview OFFENSE: Expect the Cardinals, so powerful and varied in skill, to average five-plus runs. But this is no mismatch. Houston #39;s attack is hotter and healthier.
Translation: Vista previa de Astros vs. Cardinals OFENSIVA: Espere que los Cardinals, tan poderosos y diversos en habilidad, promedien más de cinco carreras. Pero esto no es un desajuste. El ataque de Houston es más caliente y saludable.
Paraphrase 1: Preview of Astros vs. Cardinals OFFENSE: We should anticipate the Cardinals, with their powerful array of skills, to score over five runs on average. However, this doesn't imply a clear advantage - Houston's offense is in better form and health.
Paraphrase 2: Offensive Preview of Astros vs. Cardinals: The Cardinals, rich in talent and power, are predicted to average more than five runs. But don’t underestimate Houston. Their offensive line is currently more robust and in peak health.

Original Text: Costly Cloning Isn't a Cure-All Therapeutic cloning is both vilified and hailed as the only hope for stem-cell cures. But it may be prohibitively expensive and unnecessary, at least for developing stem-cell therapies. By Kristen Philipkoski.
Translation: Traducción al español de manera precisa: La clonación costosa no es una cura universal - La clonación terapéutica es tanto vilipendiada como aclamada como la única esperanza para las curas de células madre. Pero puede ser prohibitivamente costosa e innecesaria, al menos para el desarrollo de terapias de células madre. Por Kristen Philipkoski.
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Expensive and Possibly Unnecessary: The Debate Surrounding Therapeutic Cloning as a Path to Stem-cell Cures" - Therapeutic cloning is a subject of intense debate, with some damning it and others viewing it as the sole avenue towards developing stem-cell therapies; however, the procedure may not only be exorbitantly priced but also not essential. Article by Kristen Philipkoski.
Paraphrase 2: 2. "The Uncertainty of Therapeutic Cloning as a Sole Solution to Stem-cell Therapies and its Potential High Costs" - While therapeutic cloning evokes controversy and is regarded by some as the key to stem-cell cures, the process could turn out to be inordinately expensive and needless, particularly in relation to advancing stem-cell treatments. Authored by Kristen Philipkoski.

Original Text: DRM is doubleplus good for business, Congress advised The Budget Office and the case of the disappearing public interest
Translation: El DRM es doblemente bueno para los negocios, advirtió el Congreso a la Oficina de Presupuesto y el caso del interés público desapareciendo
Paraphrase 1: 1. "Congress recommended to The Budget Office that DRM is exceptionally beneficial for companies, highlighting the vanishing concern for public interest."
Paraphrase 2: 2. "The Budget Office was briefed by Congress that DRM is tremendously advantageous for business, also addressing the fading public interest."

Original Text: Lucent Says Earnings More Than Triple (Reuters) Reuters - Lucent Technologies Inc. , among\the world's largest makers of telecommunications equipment, on\Wednesday said its fourth-quarter earnings more than tripled,\helped by improving demand in products for wireless networks\and a growing service business.
Translation: Lucent Dice que las Ganancias se Triplican (Reuters) Reuters - Lucent Technologies Inc., entre los fabricantes de equipos de telecomunicaciones más grandes del mundo, el miércoles dijo que sus ganancias del cuarto trimestre se triplicaron, ayudadas por la mejora de la demanda en productos para redes inalámbricas y un creciente negocio de servicios.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Lucent Technologies Inc., one of the leading manufacturers of telecom gears worldwide, announced on Wednesday that its fourth-quarter profit has more than tripled, boosted by escalating demand for wireless network products coupled with an expanding service business. (Reuters)
Paraphrase 2: 2) Wednesday saw an announcement from Lucent Technologies Inc. - a giant in the world of telecommunications equipment production - about its earnings tripling in the fourth quarter, influenced by a surge in demand for wireless network products and an upturn in their service business. (Reuters)

Original Text: Sony confirms plan to sell large-screen LCD projection TVs in <b>...</b> TOKYO, Sep 08, 2004 (AFX-UK via COMTEX) -- Sony Corp will launch its popular projection televisions with large liquid crystal display (LCD) screens in China early next year, a company spokeswoman said.
Translation: Sony confirma plan para vender televisores de proyección LCD de pantalla grande en <b>...</b> TOKIO, 08 de sep, 2004 (AFX-UK vía COMTEX) -- Sony Corp lanzará sus populares televisiones de proyección con pantallas de cristal líquido (LCD) de gran tamaño en China a principios del próximo año, dijo una portavoz de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sony Corp has affirmed its intent to commence sales of its sought-after large LCD projection TVs in China starting from next year, as per a spokesperson of the company in Tokyo. (AFX-UK via COMTEX, Sep 08, 2004)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sony has corroborated its strategy of launching its large-screen LCD projection televisions, which are widely recognized, in China at the beginning of the following year, relayed a female representative of the company. (Report from Tokyo, Sep 08, 2004, AFX-UK via COMTEX)

Original Text: Manmohan Trip: PM To Raise Issues Of UN Reforms, Terrorism New Delhi, Sept. 19 (NNN): Making a strong pitch for United Nations reforms and restructuring of the Security Council, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh on Sunday left for a nine-day trip to Britain and the United States.
Translation: Viaje de Manmohan: El Primer Ministro Planteará Cuestiones sobre las Reformas de la ONU y el Terrorismo. Nueva Delhi, 19 de septiembre (NNN): Haciendo una fuerte propuesta para las reformas de las Naciones Unidas y la reestructuración del Consejo de Seguridad, el Primer Ministro Manmohan Singh partió el domingo para un viaje de nueve días a Gran Bretaña y los Estados Unidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. New Delhi, Sept. 19 (NNN): Advocating strongly for the reform and restructuring of the United Nations and its Security Council, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh embarked on a nine-day journey to the United Kingdom and the United States on Sunday, during which he plans to address these issues.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Leaving for a journey of nine days to the US and Britain, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, on Sunday, strongly argued the case for United Nations reforms and a restructure of the Security Council, from New Delhi, Sept. 19 (NNN).

Original Text: Dale Earnhardt Jr. on top after first round of Chase Dale Earnhardt Jr. is back on top of the points standings for the first time in three months. How long he can stay there remains to be seen.
Translation: Dale Earnhardt Jr. en la cima después de la primera ronda de Chase. Dale Earnhardt Jr. vuelve a estar en lo más alto de la clasificación de puntos por primera vez en tres meses. Cuánto tiempo puede permanecer allí, queda por ver.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dale Earnhardt Jr. has returned to the top of the points standings for the first time in three months after the first round of Chase, yet it's uncertain how long he can maintain this position.

Original Text: FCC approves broadband over power line rules The US Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has cleared the way for power companies to roll out broadband over power line service by approving a set of rules designed to limit interference to other radio frequency devices.
Translation: La FCC aprueba normas para la banda ancha a través de líneas de electricidad. La Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones de los Estados Unidos (FCC) ha allanado el camino para que las empresas de energía implementen el servicio de banda ancha a través de líneas de electricidad al aprobar un conjunto de normas diseñadas para limitar la interferencia con otros dispositivos de frecuencia de radio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The US Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has endorsed a set of rules to reduce interference to other radio frequency devices, thereby enabling power companies to establish broadband service over power lines.

Original Text: Informal alliance likely for Air NZ, Qantas Air New Zealand and Qantas are likely to form a modified alliance after the New Zealand High Court yesterday ruled against the airlines joining together in a formal way.
Translation: Probable alianza informal entre Air NZ, Qantas Air New Zealand y Qantas probablemente formarán una alianza modificada después de que el Tribunal Superior de Nueva Zelanda dictaminara ayer en contra de que las aerolíneas se unieran de manera formal.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following a ruling by the New Zealand High Court against a formal alliance, Air New Zealand and Qantas are poised to establish an informal alliance.
Paraphrase 2: 2. After getting turned down by the New Zealand High Court for a formal alliance, Air New Zealand and Qantas are expected to create a less formal partnership.

Original Text: Clampdown on music pirates London - An international music industry group said on Thursday it was launching hundreds of lawsuits across Europe accusing people of piracy for illegally sharing music on the internet.
Translation: Represión a los piratas de música en Londres - Un grupo internacional de la industria musical dijo el jueves que está lanzando cientos de demandas en toda Europa acusando a personas de piratería por compartir ilegalmente música en Internet.
Paraphrase 1: 1. An international association representing the music industry announced on Thursday its initiative to launch hundreds of lawsuits across Europe, targeting individuals accused of online music piracy.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Thursday, an international group from the music industry revealed their plan to combat music piracy across Europe by instigating hundreds of lawsuits against individuals accused of illicit music sharing over the internet.

Original Text: Spitzer Plans to Sue Insurer New York Attorney General Eliot Spitzer will file a lawsuit as early as Friday against an insurance company, the second suit stemming from his sweeping probe into bid-rigging in the industry, Spitzer told Reuters Friday.
Translation: Spitzer planea demandar a aseguradora. El Fiscal General de Nueva York, Eliot Spitzer, presentará una demanda tan pronto como el viernes contra una compañía de seguros, la segunda demanda que se deriva de su amplia investigación sobre manipulación de ofertas en la industria, dijo Spitzer a Reuters el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Eliot Spitzer, the New York Attorney General, intends to launch a lawsuit against an insurance company as soon as Friday. This is the second suit related to his extensive investigation into industry bid-rigging, as he revealed to Reuters on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. New York Attorney General, Eliot Spitzer, confirmed to Reuters on Friday that he is preparing for a lawsuit against an insurance company, potentially as early as the end of the week. This action comes as the second lawsuit linked to his broad inquiry into bid-rigging within the insurance sector.

Original Text: Top Saddam aides to go on trial from next week BAGHDAD - Saddam Husseins top henchmen will start going on trial for crimes against humanity next week, Prime Minister Iyad Allawi said yesterday, as he warned violence would increase after Iraqs landmark elections in January.
Translation: "Aides principales de Saddam a juicio a partir de la próxima semana BAGDAD - Los principales secuaces de Saddam Hussein comenzarán a ser juzgados por crímenes contra la humanidad la próxima semana, dijo ayer el Primer Ministro Iyad Allawi, mientras advertía que la violencia aumentaría después de las históricas elecciones de Iraq en enero."
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to Prime Minister Iyad Allawi, from next week, senior aides to Saddam Hussein will commence trial for crimes against humanity. Allawi also forecasted a surge in violence post Iraq's historic January elections.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Prime Minister Iyad Allawi announced yesterday that starting from the following week, the principal accomplices of Saddam Hussein will face trial for their inhuman crimes. Concurrently, he cautioned about an impending rise in violence following the monumental elections in Iraq in the month of January.

Original Text: AMD still mulling plans for a joint-venture chip plant Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (AMD) may yet team up with another chip maker for the construction of a semiconductor fabrication plant (fab) to expand its manufacturing capacity for microprocessors, despite shelving similar plans in 2003, according to a senior company executive.
Translation: AMD aún está considerando planes para una planta de chips de empresa conjunta. Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (AMD) aún puede aliarse con otro fabricante de chips para la construcción de una planta de fabricación de semiconductores (fab) para expandir su capacidad de fabricación de microprocesadores, a pesar de haber aplazado planes similares en 2003, según un alto ejecutivo de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A high-ranking official from Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (AMD) has suggested that the company might reconsider its decision of expanding its microprocessor manufacturing capacity by constructing a semiconductor fabrication plant (fab) in collaboration with another chip producer. This comes despite shelving similar plans in 2003.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (AMD) may reconsider its 2003 decision and partner with another chip manufacturer to build a semiconductor fabrication plant (fab), in an effort to increase its microprocessor manufacturing capacity, according to a statement from a senior company executive.

Original Text: Time Warner Profit Falls on Legal Reserve Time Warner Inc. (TWX) on Wednesday posted an 8 percent drop in quarterly net profit as it set up a \$500 million legal reserve related to accounting probes at its America
Translation: Las ganancias de Time Warner caen debido a la reserva legal. Time Warner Inc. (TWX) el miércoles reportó una caída del 8 por ciento en las ganancias netas trimestrales ya que estableció una reserva legal de \$500 millones relacionada con investigaciones contables en su América.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The net quarterly profit of Time Warner Inc. (TWX) decreased by 8 percent on Wednesday, due to the establishment of a $500 million legal reserve associated with accounting investigations at its America.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As Time Warner Inc. (TWX) allocated a $500 million legal reserve in response to accounting investigations at its America on Wednesday, its quarterly net profit experienced a decline of 8 percent.

Original Text: US Spammer Facing Nine Years in Jail It is believed that with the help of his sister, Jessica DeGroot, 28, who was fined US\$7,500, Jeremy Jaynes pedalled non-existent products via email such as a  quot;FedEx refund processor quot; that supposedly
Translation: Se cree que el spammer estadounidense enfrenta nueve años de cárcel. Se piensa que con la ayuda de su hermana, Jessica DeGroot, de 28 años, quien fue multada con US\$7,500, Jeremy Jaynes comercializó productos inexistentes a través del correo electrónico, como un supuesto "procesador de reembolsos de FedEx".
Paraphrase 1: 1. Jeremy Jaynes, who peddled fake products like a "FedEx refund processor" through email with the aid of his sister, Jessica DeGroot, 28, who was penalized US$7,500, is now facing nine years of imprisonment in the US.
Paraphrase 2: 2. It is anticipated that Jeremy Jaynes will spend nine years in a US prison for selling sham products like "FedEx refund processor" using email, a scheme he ran with his sister Jessica DeGroot, 28, who was forced to pay a fine of US$7,500.

Original Text: Red Hat buys technology from Netscape Seattle, October 1: Linux distributor Red Hat Inc said on Thursday that it had bought Netscape #39;s computer user identification and management technology from America Online Inc, a unit of Time Warner Inc.
Translation: Red Hat compra tecnología de Netscape Seattle, 1 de octubre: El distribuidor de Linux, Red Hat Inc, dijo el jueves que había comprado la tecnología de identificación y gestión de usuarios de computadoras de Netscape #39 de America Online Inc, una unidad de Time Warner Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Thursday, October 1, in Seattle, it was announced by Red Hat Inc, a Linux distributor, that they have acquired Netscape's user identification and management technology from America Online Inc, which is a subsidiary of Time Warner Inc.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Linux distributing company, Red Hat Inc, revealed on Thursday in Seattle that they have purchased user identification and management technology from Netscape, a technology owned by America Online Inc, a branch of Time Warner Inc.

Original Text: DS points the way for the next generation of handheld games Nintendo, the reigning champ of portable gaming, has released its latest hardware: the Nintendo DS. The DS has gotten a head start on its upcoming competition - that would be Sony #39;s
Translation: DS señala el camino para la próxima generación de juegos portátiles. Nintendo, el campeón reinante de los juegos portátiles, ha lanzado su último hardware: la Nintendo DS. La DS ha tomado la delantera a su próxima competencia - eso sería Sony #39;s.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Nintendo, the dominant force in portable gaming, has unveiled its newest piece of equipment, the Nintendo DS. This invention sets the pace for the future of handheld games and has gained an early advantage over its impending rival - Sony's #39.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Having launched its latest device, the Nintendo DS, Nintendo reaffirms its supremacy in portable gaming. The DS, serving as a pioneer for future handheld games, has already got the jump on its soon-to-be competitor - Sony's #39.

Original Text: Sun intros pay-per-use grid computing Sun Microsystems yesterday introduced what it claims to be the industry #39;s first pay-per-use pricing model for grid computing architectures.
Translation: Sun introduce un modelo de pago por uso para la computación en la nube. Sun Microsystems presentó ayer lo que afirma ser el primer modelo de precios de pago por uso de la industria para arquitecturas de computación en la nube.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sun Microsystems has announced what is purported to be the first pay-per-use pricing structure for grid computing architectures in the industry.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In the industry, Sun Microsystems is said to be the first to launch a pay-per-use pricing framework for grid computing architectures.

Original Text: \$20M LOUVRE DIAMOND THEFT Two diamonds worth nearly A\$20 million have been stolen in a daylight robbery from a high-end antique and jewelry dealers #39; show at a showroom below the famous Paris Louvre museum.
Translation: ROBO DE DIAMANTES DE \$20M EN EL LOUVRE Dos diamantes valorados en casi A\$20 millones han sido robados en un robo a plena luz del día de una exposición de vendedores de antigüedades y joyas de alta gama en una sala de exposiciones debajo del famoso museo del Louvre en París.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In a brazen daylight robbery, two diamonds valued at approximately A$20 million were pilfered from a high-end antique and jewelry dealers' exhibition, located in a showroom beneath Paris' renowned Louvre museum.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A high-end antique and jewelry dealer's showroom, situated underneath the infamous Louvre museum in Paris, was the site of a daring daylight theft where two diamonds, collectively valued at nearly A$20 million, were stolen.

Original Text: Palestinian elections committee accuses Israel of interference The Palestinian elections committee said Saturday that Israel #39;s arresting of a Palestinian presidential candidate is unconcealed interference.
Translation: El comité de elecciones palestino acusa a Israel de interferencia. El comité de elecciones palestino dijo el sábado que la detención por parte de Israel de un candidato presidencial palestino es una interferencia flagrante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The Palestinian elections committee stated on Saturday that Israel's arrest of a Palestinian presidential candidate is a clear act of interference.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Saturday, the Palestinian elections committee leveled accusations at Israel for interfering through the arrest of a Palestinian presidential candidate.

Original Text: Franchitti gets second win; Rice has disaster It appears Dario Franchitti of Scotland is getting the hang of it in the Indy Racing League. Franchitti dominated Sunday #39;s Honda Indy 225 at Pikes Peak International Raceway for his second IRL win of the season.
Translation: Franchitti consigue su segunda victoria; Rice sufre un desastre. Parece que Dario Franchitti de Escocia está cogiendo el ritmo de la Indy Racing League. Franchitti dominó el Honda Indy 225 del domingo en el Pikes Peak International Raceway, obteniendo su segundo triunfo de la temporada en la IRL.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Dario Franchitti of Scotland is increasingly becoming proficient in the Indy Racing League, dominating Sunday's Honda Indy 225 at Pikes Peak International Raceway, where he achieved his second win. However, it was a disastrous competition for racer Rice.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Dario Franchitti from Scotland played an impressive role at Sunday's Indy Racing League, claiming his second victory of the season at the Honda Indy 225. In contrast, the race turned out catastrophic for Rice.

Original Text: Russia Beats U.S. Men for Volleyball Bronze  ATHENS (Reuters) - Russia, silver medallists in Sydney, won  the Olympic bronze medal in the men's volleyball competition on  Sunday, beating the United States in straight sets.
Translation: Rusia Derrota a los Hombres de EE.UU. para Ganar el Bronce en Voleibol  ATENAS (Reuters) - Rusia, medallistas de plata en Sydney, ganó la medalla de bronce en la competición de voleibol masculino el domingo, venciendo a los Estados Unidos en sets corridos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. ATHENS (Reuters) - On Sunday, in the men's volleyball competition at the Olympics, Russia - who were the silver medallists in Sydney - secured the bronze medal by defeating the United States in uninterrupted sets.
Paraphrase 2: 2. ATHENS (Reuters) - The bronze medal for the men's volleyball in the Olympics was claimed by Russia on Sunday, as they triumphed over the United States in consecutive sets. In Sydney, they had been the silver medallists.

Original Text: Irish gold medal in jeopardy A SECOND dope test on a blood sample taken from the horse of Irish Olympic show jumping gold medallist Cian O #39;Connor has tested positive for banned substances.
Translation: La medalla de oro irlandesa en peligro. Un SEGUNDO análisis de dopaje en una muestra de sangre tomada del caballo del medallista de oro olímpico irlandés en salto ecuestre, Cian O'Connor, ha dado positivo por sustancias prohibidas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The gold medal of Cian O'Connor, an Irish Olympic showjumping champion, is at risk as a second drug test conducted on his horse's blood sample has detected prohibited substances.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Prohibited substances have been detected in a secondary doping test on a blood sample from the horse of Cian O'Connor, jeopardizing the Irish Olympic show jumper's gold medal.

Original Text: Veerappan shot dead Coimbatore: The country #39;s most wanted forest brigand Veerappan, charged with abduction and murder of politicians and film stars, was on Monday night killed in a gunbattle with Tamil Nadu police in a thick forest about 150 km from here, ending three
Translation: Veerappan fue asesinado a tiros en Coimbatore: El bandido forestal más buscado del país, Veerappan, acusado de secuestro y asesinato de políticos y estrellas de cine, fue asesinado a tiros el lunes por la noche en un enfrentamiento con la policía de Tamil Nadu en un espeso bosque a unos 150 km de aquí, poniendo fin a tres
Paraphrase 1: 1. Veerappan, India's infamous fugitive known for the kidnap and murder of significant political figures and celebrities, was fatally shot on Monday night by the Tamil Nadu police in a heavy police encounter. The incident took place in dense forests around 150 km away from Coimbatore, hence drawing a close to his reign of terror.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday night, in dense forestry approximately 150 kilometers away from Coimbatore, the Tamil Nadu police ended the reign of infamous criminal Veerappan who was frequently in the headlines due to his high-profile abductions and killings. The nefarious forest brigand was killed in a firefight, marking the end of a manhunt for the country's most wanted outlaw.

Original Text: Johansson Upsets Roddick at U.S. Open NEW YORK - Andy Roddick ran into a bold, bigger version of himself at the U.S. Open, and 6-foot-6 Joachim Johansson sent the defending champion home...
Translation: Johansson Sorprende a Roddick en el Abierto de EE.UU. NUEVA YORK - Andy Roddick se encontró con una versión más audaz y grande de sí mismo en el Abierto de EE.UU., y Joachim Johansson de 6 pies 6 pulgadas envió al campeón defensor a casa...
Paraphrase 1: 1. Joachim Johansson, with his audacious and larger stature, ousted the reigning champion, Andy Roddick, at the U.S. Open in New York.

Original Text: Star Trek to boldly go massively multiplayer in 2007 San Francisco based developer Perpetual Entertainment has announced that it has secured the rights to create a massively multiplayer game based on Viacom #39;s Star Trek franchise, which it plans to release in 2007.
Translation: Star Trek se lanzará audazmente como un juego multijugador masivo en 2007. El desarrollador con sede en San Francisco, Perpetual Entertainment, ha anunciado que ha obtenido los derechos para crear un juego multijugador masivo basado en la franquicia Star Trek de Viacom, que planea lanzar en 2007.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Perpetual Entertainment, a San Francisco-based developer, has revealed their acquisition of the rights to develop a massively multiplayer game inspired by Viacom's Star Trek franchise. They have announced a bold release in 2007.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In 2007, the Star Trek franchise is set to boldly transform into a massively multiplayer game, thanks to San Francisco's Perpetual Entertainment securing the rights. Viacom's Star Trek will be the grand inspiration for this venture.

Original Text: Poor Defenders Some anti-spyware companies use confusing ads, and our tests show their \$20-\$60 products are less effective than free competitors.
Translation: Defensores Pobres. Algunas empresas de anti-espionaje utilizan anuncios confusos, y nuestras pruebas muestran que sus productos de \$20-\$60 son menos efectivos que los competidores gratuitos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Some anti-spyware companies resort to convoluted advertisements, and our evaluations indicate that their products, costing between $20-$60, underperform compared to their free counterparts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Our studies illustrate that the effectiveness of certain anti-spyware companies' $20-$60 products, promoted through bewildering ads, is inferior to that of freely available competitors.

Original Text: At Last, Success on the Road for Lions (AP) AP - The Detroit Lions went three full seasons without winning an away game, setting an NFL record for road futility. They ended that ignominious streak Sunday in their first opportunity of the season, beating the Chicago Bears 20-16 at Soldier Field.
Translation: Por fin, Éxito en la Carretera para los Leones (AP) AP - Los Detroit Lions pasaron tres temporadas completas sin ganar un partido fuera de casa, estableciendo un récord de la NFL por ineficacia en la carretera. Terminaron esa ignominiosa racha el domingo en su primera oportunidad de la temporada, venciendo a los Chicago Bears 20-16 en Soldier Field.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Finally, The Detroit Lions Break Their Losing Streak on the Road (AP) - It took three full seasons for the Detroit Lions to finally see a victory in an away game, establishing a new low in NFL's history. However, they put an end to this unfortunate chain of losses on Sunday, their first chance of the season, effectively defeating the Chicago Bears with a score of 20-16 at Soldier Field.
Paraphrase 2: 2. (AP) A Long-Awaited Victory Away from Home for the Detroit Lions - The Detroit Lions had spent three successive seasons unable to secure a win on the road, thereby creating an unwanted NFL record. This shameful sequence of defeats was finally broken on Sunday during their season's first match, where they triumphed over the Chicago Bears by 20-16 at Soldier Field.

Original Text: IBM Counters Hitachi With High-End Server (AP) AP - International Business Machines Corp. countered Hitachi Ltd.'s September announcement by unveiling its own high-end storage server it claims puts it in the lead in that market.
Translation: IBM Contrarresta a Hitachi con Servidor de Alto Rendimiento (AP) AP - International Business Machines Corp. respondió al anuncio de septiembre de Hitachi Ltd., al presentar su propio servidor de almacenamiento de alto rendimiento que afirma lo coloca a la cabeza en ese mercado.
Paraphrase 1: 1) IBM Reveals High-End Server in Response to Hitachi's Announcement (AP) - AP - In response to Hitachi Ltd.'s September announcement, International Business Machines Corp. has unveiled its own leading high-end storage server.
Paraphrase 2: 2) IBM Retorts to Hitachi with Advanced Server Release (AP) - AP - Countering Hitachi Ltd.'s September proclamation, International Business Machines Corp. released a high-end storage server, which the company states, puts it ahead in the market.

Original Text: Memorial honors astronaut Cooper The surviving astronauts of the Mercury 7 offered tribute Friday to compatriot Gordon  quot;Gordo quot; Cooper, who died Oct. 4. At a memorial gathering at Johnson Space Center in Houston, former US Sen.
Translation: El memorial honra al astronauta Cooper. Los astronautas supervivientes del Mercury 7 ofrecieron tributo el viernes a su camarada Gordon "Gordo" Cooper, quien murió el 4 de Octubre. En una reunión conmemorativa en el Centro Espacial Johnson en Houston, el antiguo senador de los EE. UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. At Johnson Space Center in Houston, the remaining astronauts from Mercury 7 paid tribute to their colleague, Gordon "Gordo" Cooper, who passed away on October 4th, during a memorial service on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. In a tribute offered on Friday, the still living Mercury 7 astronauts honored their late colleague, Gordon "Gordo" Cooper, at a memorial event at the Johnson Space Center in Houston. Cooper had died on the 4th of October.

Original Text: Delta to Lay Off 7,000 The friendly skies aren #39;t so friendly to some Delta employees. The airline plans to cut 7,000 jobs in the next 18 months. It #39;s trying to save \$5 billion by 2006, and that means some major changes.
Translation: Delta despedirá a 7,000. Los cielos amigables no son tan amigables para algunos empleados de Delta. La aerolínea planea recortar 7,000 empleos en los próximos 18 meses. Está intentando ahorrar \$5 mil millones para 2006, y eso significa algunos cambios importantes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Some major changes, aimed at saving $5 billion by 2006, are in store at Delta and unfortunately, this means a job cut of 7,000 employees in the following 18 months. The skies surely seem less friendly to these affected Delta workers.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Delta has set its sights on significant reforms, intending to save $5 billion by 2006. However, the reality of these changes translates to a drastic reduction of workforce; specifically, the airline is set to terminate 7,000 employees within a year and a half. Consequently, the so-called friendly skies appear less hospitable to some Delta staff.

Original Text: From Lenovo of China to that of the world  quot;On behalf of the Board of the Lenovo Directors I am honored to announced to the world that Lenovo Group has bought IBM #39;s PC division for US\$1.25 billion.
Translation: De Lenovo de China al del mundo "En representación de la Junta de Directores de Lenovo, me siento honrado de anunciar al mundo que el Grupo Lenovo ha comprado la división de PC de IBM por US\$1.25 mil millones.
Paraphrase 1: "I am honored, as a representative of Lenovo's Board of Directors, to announce globally that Lenovo Group from China has purchased IBM's PC division for US$1.25 billion."
Paraphrase 2: "On behalf of Lenovo's Board of Directors, it's with great honor that I report to the globe that the Lenovo Group, originally from China, has acquired IBM's PC division for a sum of US$1.25 billion."
