Original Text: Dutch filmmaker who criticized Islam is slain in Amsterdam <b>...</b> A Dutch filmmaker who got death threats after his movie sharply criticized how women are treated under Islam was stabbed and shot to death Tuesday on an Amsterdam street.
Translation: Cineasta holandés que criticó al Islam es asesinado en Ámsterdam <b>...</b> Un cineasta holandés que recibió amenazas de muerte después de que su película criticara duramente cómo se trata a las mujeres bajo el Islam, fue apuñalado y tiroteado hasta la muerte el martes en una calle de Ámsterdam.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A Dutch filmmaker, who faced death threats following his film's harsh critique of the treatment of women under Islam, was brutally killed in a street in Amsterdam on Tuesday - having been stabbed and shot.

Original Text: U.S. to File WTO Case Against Airbus Subsidies  WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States said it will file  on Wednesday a World Trade Organization complaint over what it  called "unfair" European subsidies to aircraft manufacturer  Airbus, the European rival of U.S.-based Boeing.
Translation: EE.UU. Presentará Caso ante la OMC Contra las Subvenciones a Airbus WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Estados Unidos dijo que presentará el miércoles una queja ante la Organización Mundial del Comercio por lo que calificó de "injustas" subvenciones europeas al fabricante de aviones Airbus, el rival europeo de Boeing, con sede en EE.UU.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States has announced its plan to lodge a complaint with the World Trade Organization on Wednesday, alleging that European subsidies given to Airbus, Boeing's European competitor, are "unfair".
Paraphrase 2: 2. WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The US declared that it intends to submit a World Trade Organization complaint this Wednesday, targeting what it perceives as "unfair" subsidies provided by Europe to the aircraft manufacturer Airbus, a European competitor to US-based Boeing.

Original Text: Billionaire #39;s latest venture said to be out of this world Sir Richard Branson, airline mogul and adventurer, announced plans yesterday to boldly go where no private transport company has gone before -- into space.
Translation: Se dice que la última empresa del billonario está fuera de este mundo. Sir Richard Branson, magnate de las aerolíneas y aventurero, anunció ayer planes de ir audazmente donde ninguna compañía de transporte privada ha ido antes: al espacio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The latest venture of billionaire Sir Richard Branson, known for his roles as an airline tycoon and adventurer, is reportedly otherworldly. He declared yesterday the staggering plan of his private transport company to daringly venture where no such company has ever gone before -- into the cosmos.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sir Richard Branson, the billion-dollar adventurer and airline magnate, publicized his newest venture yesterday – a journey beyond the confines of Earth led by a private transportation company. He aims to spearhead a journey into space, unprecedented in the realm of private transport.

Original Text: Three-team baseball trade still unresolved If this gets done, the New York Yankees will greatly upgrade their rotation - if this gets done. The Yankees continued discussions Friday with the Dodgers
Translation: El traspaso de béisbol de tres equipos aún sin resolver. Si se concreta, los Yankees de Nueva York mejorarán significativamente su rotación, si es que se concreta. Los Yankees continuaron las discusiones el viernes con los Dodgers.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Discussions between the Yankees and the Dodgers about the three-team baseball trade persisted on Friday, and if accomplished, a substantial improvement in the New York Yankees' rotation will be observed. However, the trade agreement is yet to be confirmed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The New York Yankees had ongoing talks with the Dodgers on Friday about the yet-to-be-settled three-team baseball trade, which, if concluded, could significantly enhance their rotation.

Original Text: Moody #39;s upgrades Lucent Technologies debt ratings Moody #39;s Investors Service upgraded the debt ratings for Lucent Technologies on Friday, citing the company #39;s adequate funds, stabilizing revenue and progress in improving profitability and cash flow.
Translation: Moody #39;s mejora las calificaciones de deuda de Lucent Technologies. El viernes, el Servicio de Inversores de Moody #39;s mejoró las calificaciones de deuda de Lucent Technologies, citando los fondos adecuados de la compañía, la estabilización de los ingresos y el progreso en mejorar la rentabilidad y el flujo de efectivo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Citing reasons such as sufficient funds, stable revenue, and improvements in profitability and cash flow, Moody's Investors Service elevated the debt ratings of Lucent Technologies on Friday.

Original Text: Slavkov Suspended By IOC The Executive Committee of the International Olympic Committee (IOC) has unanimously recommended that Ivan Slavkov, chairman of the Bulgarian Olympic Committee, be suspended.
Translation: Slavkov Suspendido por el COI El Comité Ejecutivo del Comité Olímpico Internacional (COI) ha recomendado unánimemente que Ivan Slavkov, presidente del Comité Olímpico Búlgaro, sea suspendido.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ivan Slavkov, the chairman of the Bulgarian Olympic Committee, has been unanimously recommended for suspension by the executive committee of the International Olympic Committee (IOC); the IOC announced Slavkov's pending suspension.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The International Olympic Committee's Executive Committee has concurred in unison to propose a suspension for Ivan Slavkov, who heads the Bulgarian Olympic Committee.

Original Text: High and mighty ATHENS -- He was dead and buried 6 feet under the landing mat, and he knew it.  quot;That #39;s it, I #39;m done, quot; Paul Hamm told himself last night, after he #39;d tumbled from first to 12th with a slip of a foot on the ...
Translation: Alto y poderoso ATENAS -- Estaba muerto y enterrado a 6 pies bajo la colchoneta de aterrizaje, y lo sabía. "Eso es todo, estoy acabado", se dijo a sí mismo Paul Hamm anoche, después de que había caído del primero al duodécimo lugar con un resbalón de pie en el...
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the impressive city of Athens, he was certain of his metaphorical demise, being buried six feet under. Paul Hamm internally declared his defeat last night, “I’m finished,” he thought, having dropped from the leading position to 12th place due to an unfortunate misstep.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Paul Hamm found himself in the majestic Athens, completely aware that he was metaphorically dead and buried six feet deep. Following a minor foot slip that caused his rank to tumble down from 1st to 12th place, he acknowledged to himself last night, "This is the end."

Original Text: Oracle moves to quarterly patch release schedule NOVEMBER 18, 2004 (COMPUTERWORLD) - Oracle Corp. today announced that it is moving to a quarterly patch release schedule in response to user demands for a more predictable process for applying needed security fixes to the company #39;s software.
Translation: Oracle se pasa al programa de lanzamiento de parches trimestrales 18 DE NOVIEMBRE DE 2004 (COMPUTERWORLD) - Oracle Corp. anunció hoy que se está pasando a un programa de lanzamiento de parches trimestrales en respuesta a las demandas de los usuarios por un proceso más predecible para aplicar las correcciones de seguridad necesarias al software de la compañía.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In compliance with customer requests for a more foreseeable method to implement crucial security fixes, Oracle Corp declared on 18th November 2004 that they will transition to a schedule of releasing patches every quarter (Computerworld).
Paraphrase 2: 2. On November 18, 2004, Oracle Corp. disclosed their plan to shift to a quarterly patch release program to offer a more reliable system for the application of necessary security updates, responding to the demands of their users (Computerworld).

Original Text: Profits Are Up 24 at Disney and So, It Says, Is Teamwork Buoyed by the strong performance of ESPN and its other cable channels, the Walt Disney Company said that its profit rose 24 percent in the fourth quarter.
Translation: Los beneficios han aumentado un 24% en Disney y también, dice, el trabajo en equipo. Impulsada por el sólido rendimiento de ESPN y sus otros canales de cable, la compañía Walt Disney dijo que su beneficio aumentó un 24 por ciento en el cuarto trimestre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the help of ESPN and other cable channels' impressive performances, Walt Disney Company announced a 24 percent profit increase in the fourth quarter, attributing much of it to an improvement in teamwork.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Walt Disney Company has reported a 24% surge in profits for the fourth quarter, which they attribute to enhanced teamwork and the remarkable performance of ESPN along with their other cable channels.

Original Text: NASA: Station #39;s Oxygen Generator Fails CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. - The main oxygen generator for the international space station has failed, and the two astronauts on board may have to tap into an attached cargo ship #39;s air supply next week, NASA said Thursday.
Translation: NASA: Falla el Generador de Oxígeno de la Estación Número 39. CABO CAÑAVERAL, Florida. - El principal generador de oxígeno de la estación espacial internacional ha fallado, y los dos astronautas a bordo podrían tener que recurrir a la reserva de aire de una nave de carga adjunta la próxima semana, afirmó NASA el jueves.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to NASA, the failure of Station #39's primary oxygen generator may push the two residing astronauts to rely on the air supply of an attached cargo ship by next week, as was communicated on Thursday at Cape Canaveral, Fla.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NASA announced on Thursday that the chief oxygen generator at Station #39 has malfunctioned. This could force the two astronauts aboard to draw from the air supply of a docked cargo ship in the following week, as informed at Cape Canaveral, Fla.

Original Text: Taiwan Chen's Pro-Independence Party Loses Poll  TAIPEI (Reuters) - Taiwan President Chen Shui-bian's party  suffered a surprise defeat on Saturday in elections likely to  be welcomed in Beijing as a step back from what it sees as  dangerous moves toward independence from mainland China.
Translation: El Partido Pro-independencia de Chen de Taiwán Pierde en las Encuestas TAIPEI (Reuters) - El partido del presidente de Taiwán, Chen Shui-bian, sufrió una sorpresiva derrota el sábado en las elecciones que probablemente sean celebradas en Beijing como un paso atrás de lo que considera movimientos peligrosos hacia la independencia de la China continental.
Paraphrase 1: 1) TAIPEI (Reuters) - In a move likely to be seen as a step back from potential independence from mainland China, a surprising loss was endured by Taiwan President Chen Shui-bian's party in the Saturday elections – a defeat that's expected to be celebrated in Beijing.
Paraphrase 2: 2) TAIPEI (Reuters) - The party of President Chen Shui-bian of Taiwan faced an unexpected downfall in the recent Saturday elections, a step that Beijing perceives as retreating from risky strides towards independence from mainland China.

Original Text: Indonesian Ex-General Sworn in as President (Reuters) Reuters - Former general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono\was sworn in as Indonesia's sixth president on Wednesday after\sweeping to power by vowing faster job growth, a war on\corruption and tough punishment for terrorists. A\solemn-looking Yudhoyono took the oath of office inside a\cavernous hall at parliament in front of the very legislators\many expect will challenge the big popular mandate he won in\Indonesia's first direct presidential election last month.
Translation: Traducción al español: Exgeneral indonesio juramentado como Presidente (Reuters) Reuters- El ex general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono\ fue juramentado como el sexto presidente de Indonesia el miércoles después de\ llegar al poder al prometer un crecimiento laboral más rápido, una guerra contra\ la corrupción y castigos severos para los terroristas. Un\ Yudhoyono de aspecto serio hizo el juramento de asumir el cargo dentro de un\ salón enorme en el parlamento frente a los mismos legisladores\ que muchos esperan desafien el gran mandato popular que ganó en\ la primera elección presidencial directa de Indonesia el mes pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) - Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, a former general, who had promised accelerated job growth, a fierce battle against corruption, and stringent penalties for terrorists, was inaugurated as the sixth President of Indonesia on Wednesday. The serious-faced Yudhoyono took the oath of office within a spacious parliament hall, under the watchful eyes of many lawmakers predicted to confront the large public support he gained in Indonesia's very first direct presidential election the previous month.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Wednesday witnessed former general Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono swearing in as the sixth president of Indonesia (Reuters). Yudhoyono, who had run a powerful campaign based on promises of rapid job creation, a crackdown on dishonesty, and harsh actions against terrorists, assumed his presidential duties in a solemn ceremony in the parliament's grand hall. His enactment of the oath was before several legislators who, it is believed, may dispute the considerable popularity he achieved in Indonesia's first ever direct presidential election that occurred last month.

Original Text: Blake Undergoes Surgery Washington Wizards President of Basketball Operations Ernie Grunfeld announced today that guard Steve Blake underwent successful surgery to remove a chipped bone from his right ankle.
Translation: Blake se Somete a Cirugía El presidente de Operaciones de Baloncesto de los Washington Wizards, Ernie Grunfeld, anunció hoy que el base Steve Blake se sometió exitosamente a una cirugía para extraer un fragmento de hueso de su tobillo derecho.
Paraphrase 1: 1) Steve Blake, a guard for the Washington Wizards, has had a successful operation to extract a chipped bone from his right ankle, as reported by Ernie Grunfeld, the team's President of Basketball Operations.
Paraphrase 2: 2) The President of Basketball Operations for the Washington Wizards, Ernie Grunfeld, has confirmed that guard Steve Blake has successfully completed a surgery for the removal of a chipped bone in his right ankle.

Original Text: Texas rises to No. 7 in latest BCS rankings and not only on the political spectrum. Another November - another BCS college football quagmire looming. With the release
Translation: Texas sube al No. 7 en las últimas clasificaciones de BCS y no solo en el espectro político. Otro noviembre - otro pantano de fútbol americano universitario de BCS se vislumbra. Con el lanzamiento
Paraphrase 1: In the most recent BCS rankings, Texas ascends to the 7th position, a rise notable not solely in the political sphere. As November arrives, the recurring complex situation of BCS college football becomes apparent once again with the new release.
Paraphrase 2: Texas now ranks No. 7 in the latest BCS charts, and this rise isn't limited to its political position. A BCS college football predicament signals another November, accompanying the latest release.

Original Text: Foster #39;s shares down following poor earnings results, US wine <b>...</b> SYDNEY : Shares in Australian brewer and winemaker Foster #39;s fell sharply in early trade amid disappointment over the poor performance of its US wine operations after the group reported year-to-June results.
Translation: Las acciones de Foster #39 caen tras unos malos resultados de ganancias, vino de EE.UU. <b>...</b> SIDNEY: Las acciones del cervecero y vinicultor australiano Foster #39 cayeron bruscamente en las primeras operaciones debido a la decepción por el pobre rendimiento de sus operaciones de vino en EE.UU. después de que el grupo informó los resultados del año a junio.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Following an unsatisfactory report of Foster #39's year-to-June results, specifically concerning its US wine operations, the shares of the Australian brewing and winemaking company experienced a substantial drop in early trading in Sydney.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Disappointment over the disappointing performance of Foster #39's US wine operations caused an early trading plunge in the shares of the Australian brewer and winemaker, as reflected in the group's year-to-June results in Sydney.

Original Text: Aon CEO Ryan retiring CHICAGO Insurance giant Aon Corporation is looking for a new chief executive officer to succeed Patrick Ryan, who is retiring. The 67-year-old Ryan intends to stay on as CEO until his successor is named and
Translation: El CEO de Aon, Ryan, se retira. CHICAGO El gigante de los seguros, la Corporación Aon, está buscando un nuevo director ejecutivo para suceder a Patrick Ryan, quien se retira. Ryan, de 67 años, tiene la intención de permanecer como CEO hasta que se nombre a su sucesor.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Patrick Ryan, the 67-year-old CEO of insurance titan, Aon Corporation, based in Chicago, has announced his plans for retirement. The company is in the process of finding a successor for the top position, and Ryan will continue to serve as CEO until his replacement is appointed.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The search is on for a successor to Patrick Ryan, Aon Corporation's CEO, as he plans to retire. The 67-year-old executive of the Chicago-based insurance behemoth will maintain his position until his successor is named.

Original Text: FCC adopts rules for broadband over power lines MANHASSET, NY - The Federal Communications Commission voted Thursday (Oct. 14) to modified its rules to open the door to the widespread deployment of broadband access over power lines.
Translation: La FCC adopta reglas para el broadband a través de líneas eléctricas. MANHASSET, NY - La Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones votó el jueves (14 de octubre) para modificar sus reglas y abrir la puerta a la implementación generalizada del acceso a broadband a través de líneas eléctricas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. MANHASSET, NY - The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) approved rule amendments on Thursday (Oct. 14), greenlighting wider use of broadband access via power lines.
Paraphrase 2: 2. MANHASSET, NY - A decision to change its regulations was passed by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) on Thursday (Oct. 14), which will advance the extensive implementation of broadband over power lines.

Original Text: Oil Eases Again as Fuel Costs Hit Economy  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Oil prices ended lower on Tuesday on  signs that high energy costs are slowing the economic growth  that has fueled this year's sharp increase in world oil  consumption.
Translation: El petróleo alivia de nuevo mientras los costos de combustible golpean la economía  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Los precios del petróleo terminaron a la baja el martes ante señales de que los altos costos de energía están ralentizando el crecimiento económico que ha impulsado el fuerte aumento del consumo mundial de petróleo de este año.
Paraphrase 1: 1. NEW YORK (Reuters) - Observations of the economic growth slowdown due to escalating energy costs led to a decrease in oil prices on Tuesday, a growth which has been the primary driver of the heightened global oil consumption this year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. NEW YORK (Reuters) - A decline in oil prices was recorded on Tuesday as a result of indications suggesting that escalating fuel costs are hindering the economic surge that has significantly boosted global oil usage this year.

Original Text: Retailers are wary about Sony stores COSTA MESA, Calif. -- Few people took notice when Sony Electronics Inc. opened a tiny storefront last year here at South Coast Plaza, a swanky mall south of Los Angeles.
Translation: Los minoristas desconfían de las tiendas Sony COSTA MESA, Calif. -- Pocas personas se dieron cuenta cuando Sony Electronics Inc. abrió una pequeña tienda el año pasado aquí en South Coast Plaza, un lujoso centro comercial al sur de Los Ángeles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Concern surrounds Sony stores among retailers. Last year, when Sony Electronics Inc. inaugurated a small shop front at South Coast Plaza, a high-end mall to the south of Los Angeles in Costa Mesa, California, it barely attracted attention.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Retailers show concern about the Sony stores in Costa Mesa, California. It caused little stir when Sony Electronics Inc. launched a compact store at the upscale South Coast Plaza, located south of Los Angeles, the previous year.

Original Text: Five die in stampede for train FOUR women and a 12-year-old girl died and at least 10 people were injured in a stampede at the Indian capital #39;s main railway station today as hordes of people tried to board a train, officials said.
Translation: Cinco personas mueren en estampida por tren CUATRO mujeres y una niña de 12 años murieron y al menos 10 personas resultaron heridas en una estampida en la principal estación de trenes de la capital india hoy, mientras hordas de personas intentaban abordar un tren, dijeron los funcionarios.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Officials declared that, during a splurge of people trying to get on a train at the primary railway station in India's capital today, four women and a 12-year-old girl were fatally trapped in a stampede, resulting in at least 10 more individuals sustaining injuries.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A major incident ensued at the main railway station in the Indian capital today, where a crowd's desperate attempt to board a train led to a stampede. This unfortunate event claimed the lives of four women and a 12-year-old girl while leaving at least 10 other people injured, as confirmed by officials.

Original Text: Fonterra bids US\$1 billion to buy out National Foods Fonterra Co-operative Group Ltd, the world #39;s largest dairy exporter, offered A\$1.34 billion (US\$1 billion) for the shares it does not own in National Foods Ltd, to expand milk sales in Australia and Asia.
Translation: Fonterra ofrece US\$1 mil millones para comprar National Foods. Fonterra Co-operative Group Ltd., el mayor exportador de lácteos del mundo, ofreció A\$1.34 mil millones (US\$1 mil millones) por las acciones que no posee en National Foods Ltd., para expandir las ventas de leche en Australia y Asia.
Paraphrase 1: 1. To increase milk sales in Australia and Asia, Fonterra Co-operative Group Ltd, the world's biggest dairy exporter, has proposed a bid of A$1.34 billion (US$1 billion) to acquire the shares it doesn't already own in National Foods Ltd.
Paraphrase 2: 2. With the aim of expanding its milk sales in Australia and Asia, the world's largest dairy exporter, Fonterra Co-operative Group Ltd, has made a bid of US$1 billion to purchase the remaining shares in National Foods Ltd.

Original Text: McGahee Pressures Bills According to the Associated Press, second-year running back Willis McGahee has asked the Buffalo Bills to trade him if he is not named the starter for opening day.
Translation: Según la Associated Press, el corredor en su segundo año, Willis McGahee, ha pedido a los Buffalo Bills que lo cambien si no es nombrado el titular para el día de apertura.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Willis McGahee, a second-year running back, has requested the Buffalo Bills to trade him if he doesn't get named as the starter for the opening day, as reported by the Associated Press.
Paraphrase 2: 2. According to the Associated Press, if Willis McGahee is not chosen as the starter for the opening day, he has urged the Buffalo Bills, in his second year of running back, to trade him.

Original Text: Patriots rout Bills, go 2 games up in East Division Tom Brady threw two touchdown passes and Adam Vinatieri kicked five field goals to lead the New England Patriots past the Buffalo Bills, 29-6, Sunday night.
Translation: Los Patriots aplastan a los Bills, logran 2 juegos de ventaja en la División Este. Tom Brady lanzó dos pases de touchdown y Adam Vinatieri anotó cinco goles de campo para llevar a los New England Patriots a una victoria sobre los Buffalo Bills, 29-6, el domingo por la noche.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On Sunday night, Tom Brady led the New England Patriots to a 29-6 victory over the Buffalo Bills, supporting a lead of two games in the East Division. Brady achieved this feat by throwing two touchdown passes, alongside five successful field goal kicks from Adam Vinatieri.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The New England Patriots defeated the Buffalo Bills 29-6 on Sunday night, moving two games ahead in the East Division, with Tom Brady scoring two touchdown passes, and Adam Vinatieri making five field goals.

Original Text: Freedom Of Speech On Satellite Radio LOS ANGELES - Howard Stern #39;s move to Sirius Satellite Radio will unlock the one key regulatory advantage possessed by the satellite radio industry: Stern can finally say exactly what he wants on the air.
Translation: Libertad De Expresión En La Radio Satelital LOS ÁNGELES - El traslado de Howard Stern a Sirius Satellite Radio desbloqueará la principal ventaja regulatoria que posee la industria de la radio satelital: Stern finalmente puede decir exactamente lo que quiere en el aire.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Howard Stern's transition to Sirius Satellite Radio in Los Angeles grants him the privilege to speak freely on air, taking advantage of the regulatory benefits particular to the satellite radio field.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At Sirius Satellite Radio, Howard Stern's migration to the satellite radio sector based in Los Angeles will enable him to use his singular benefit of expressing himself freely without any regulatory constraints.

Original Text: US trade gap balloons The US trade deficit widens to fresh record levels after higher oil prices raise the cost of imports.
Translation: La brecha comercial de EE.UU. se amplía. El déficit comercial de EE.UU. se ensancha a nuevos niveles récord después de que los altos precios del petróleo aumentan el costo de las importaciones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. After the rise in oil prices increased the cost of imports, the US trade deficit expanded to an unprecedented level.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The increase in oil prices has elevated the cost of imports, leading to a historic expansion of the US trade deficit.

Original Text: Olympic bids in: Let the quest begin The race for the 2012 Summer Olympics entered its final phase yesterday, as candidate cities from New York to Moscow released the formal bids they hope will land them the Games.
Translation: Candidaturas Olímpicas en: Comienza la búsqueda. La carrera por los Juegos Olímpicos de Verano 2012 entró ayer en su fase final, cuando las ciudades candidatas desde Nueva York hasta Moscú presentaron las ofertas formales que esperan les otorguen los Juegos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The pursuit for hosting the 2012 Summer Olympics officially commenced yesterday, with aspiring cities ranging from New York to Moscow submitting their formal bids in anticipation of winning the Games.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Yesterday marked the commencement of the decisive phase in the competition for the 2012 Summer Olympics, with hopeful cities from New York to Moscow presenting their official bids for hosting the Games.

Original Text: Museveni rejects war mediation Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni says attempts to hold third party talks with LRA rebels are a waste of time.
Translation: Museveni rechaza la mediación en la guerra. El presidente de Uganda, Yoweri Museveni, dice que los intentos de celebrar conversaciones con los rebeldes del LRA son una pérdida de tiempo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. President Yoweri Museveni of Uganda has dismissed the idea of third-party negotiations with LRA rebels, calling such attempts a waste of time.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Third-party negotiations with LRA rebels have been labeled as futile by Uganda's President, Yoweri Museveni.

Original Text: Coke Says 2nd-Half Profit Will Miss Target he Coca-Cola Company warned yesterday that its earnings for the second half of the year would fall short of forecasts, citing competitive pressures in North America and unseasonably cool and rainy weather in Europe.
Translation: Coca-Cola afirma que las ganancias del segundo semestre no alcanzarán el objetivo. La compañía Coca-Cola advirtió ayer que sus ganancias para la segunda mitad del año serán menores a las previstas, citando presiones competitivas en América del Norte y un clima inusualmente fresco y lluvioso en Europa.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Due to increased competition in North America and unexpected cool, rainy weather in Europe, The Coca-Cola Company issued a warning yesterday, anticipating its second half-year earnings to be lower than predicted.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Coca-Cola Company announced yesterday that its profits for the latter half of the year wouldn't meet their projections, attributing this shortfall to competitive issues in North America and unusually cold and wet conditions in Europe.

Original Text: Campbell agrees new deal at Highbury Sol Campbell today revealed he has agreed to sign a new long-term contract at Arsenal. The England defender expects to tie up a few loose ends over the next couple of weeks before making an official announcement
Translation: Campbell acepta nuevo acuerdo en Highbury. Sol Campbell reveló hoy que ha acordado firmar un nuevo contrato a largo plazo con el Arsenal. El defensor de Inglaterra espera atar algunos cabos sueltos en las próximas semanas antes de hacer un anuncio oficial.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Sol Campbell, the England defender, has today confirmed his agreement to sign a new long-term contract with Arsenal. He anticipates finalizing a few more details in the upcoming weeks before making an official statement.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, England's defender Sol Campbell announced his consent to a new lengthy contract with Arsenal. He foresees wrapping up some minor pending issues over the forthcoming weeks prior to releasing an official pronouncement.

Original Text: Tokyo Stocks Climb to a Two-Week High (Reuters) Reuters - Tokyo stocks climbed to a two week high\on Friday after Tokyo Electron Ltd. and other chip-related\stocks were boosted by a bullish revenue outlook from industry\leader Intel Corp.
Translation: Titulares de Tokio suben a un máximo de dos semanas (Reuters) Reuters - Las acciones de Tokio subieron a un máximo de dos semanas el viernes después de que Tokyo Electron Ltd. y otras acciones relacionadas con los chips se vieran impulsadas por unas perspectivas de ingresos optimistas de la líder de la industria Intel Corp.
Paraphrase 1: 1. (Reuters) Tokyo Electron Ltd. and other chip-related stocks saw an increase on Friday, pushing Tokyo stocks to a two-week peak, following a promising revenue outlook by Intel Corp, the industry leader.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Following an encouraging revenue forecast from industry leader Intel Corp, Tokyo stocks, guided by Tokyo Electron Ltd. and other chip-related stocks, reached a two-week high on Friday, as reported by Reuters.

Original Text: Typhoon hits southwestern Japan, kills 5 Powerful Typhoon Chaba hit southwestern Japan on Monday, leaving five people dead, 54 injured, and four freighter crew members missing since Sunday, and paralyzing transportation systems in the region.
Translation: El tifón golpea el suroeste de Japón, mata a 5. El poderoso tifón Chaba golpeó el suroeste de Japón el lunes, dejando cinco personas muertas, 54 heridas y cuatro miembros de la tripulación de un carguero desaparecidos desde el domingo, y paralizando los sistemas de transporte en la región.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The powerful Typhoon Chaba ravaged southwestern Japan on Monday, leading to the tragic death of five individuals, injuries to 54 others, the unaccounted disappearance of four freighter crew members since Sunday, and a complete paralysis of the region's transportation systems.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, southwestern Japan was struck by the potent Typhoon Chaba, resulting in the demise of five people, injuries to a further 54, the missing status of four freighter crew since Sunday, and the crippling of the local transportation systems.

Original Text: Indonesia police identify suicide bomber Police named the bomber as Heri Kurniawan, alias Heri Golun. They said on Friday he had sent a. would become a martyr. Golun was married last year.
Translation: La policía de Indonesia identifica al terrorista suicida. La policía nombró al terrorista como Heri Kurniawan, alias Heri Golun. Dijeron el viernes que él había enviado una. se convertiría en un mártir. Golun se casó el año pasado.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Police in Indonesia have identified the suicide bomber as Heri Kurniawan, also known as Heri Golun. They reported on Friday that he had intended to become a martyr. Golun, who was married the previous year, perpetuated the act.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Heri Kurniawan, alias Heri Golun, was identified as the suicide bomber by the Indonesian police. They declared on Friday that his intention had been martyrdom. Golun entered into marriage last year.

Original Text: Five up for Games inclusion Golf, rugby union and squash have been included in a shortlist of five sports being considered for the 2012 Olympics. Karate and roller sports complete the list, while softball, baseball and modern pentathlon could be excluded.
Translation: Cinco deportes en consideración para su inclusión en los Juegos: golf, rugby y squash han sido incluidos en una lista corta de cinco deportes que se están considerando para los Juegos Olímpicos de 2012. El karate y los deportes sobre ruedas completan la lista, mientras que el sóftbol, el béisbol y el pentatlón moderno podrían ser excluidos.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Golf, rugby union, and squash are among the five sports shortlisted for possible inclusion in the 2012 Olympics, alongside karate and roller sports. However, softball, baseball and modern pentathlon are at risk of exclusion.

Original Text: Dhaka fire destroys 1,800 shops A fire at a market in the Bangladeshi capital, Dhaka,  kills one and destroys about 1,800 shops.
Translation: Incendio en Dhaka destruye 1,800 tiendas. Un incendio en un mercado de la capital de Bangladesh, Dhaka, mata a uno y destruye alrededor de 1,800 tiendas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A blaze in Dhaka's market area, the capital of Bangladesh, claims one life and razes approximately 1,800 shops.
Paraphrase 2: 2. One person dies and approximately 1,800 shops are decimated following a fire outbreak in a market in Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh.

Original Text: AutoZone Earnings Are Flat Autozone #39;s (AZO:NYSE - news - research) first-quarter sales and earnings were virtually unchanged from a year ago, held back by higher fuel prices that made car owners skittish.
Translation: Las Ganancias de AutoZone son Estables. Las ventas y ganancias del primer trimestre de Autozone # 39's (AZO: NYSE - noticias - investigación) prácticamente no cambiaron respecto al año pasado, frenadas por los altos precios del combustible que han puesto nerviosos a los propietarios de automóviles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AutoZone's (AZO:NYSE - news - research) first-quarter sales and earnings saw little to no change compared to the previous year, due to the impact of higher fuel prices making car owners hesitant.

Original Text: VeriSign tallies \$40.3M net income in Q3 Internet infrastructure vendor VeriSign Inc. today reported net income of \$40.3 million for the third quarter of 2004, a reversal of the \$31.3 million loss it posted in the same quarter one year earlier.
Translation: VeriSign registra un ingreso neto de \$40.3M en el tercer trimestre. El proveedor de infraestructura de Internet, VeriSign Inc., reportó hoy un ingreso neto de \$40.3 millones para el tercer trimestre de 2004, una reversión de la pérdida de \$31.3 millones que registró en el mismo trimestre del año anterior.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In the third quarter of 2004, VeriSign Inc, an Internet infrastructure provider, announced a net income of $40.3 million - an impressive turnaround from the $31.3 million loss recorded in the same period the previous year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Today, VeriSign Inc, a vendor of Internet infrastructure, recorded a net income of $40.3 million for Q3 2004, marking a significant turnaround from the net loss of $31.3 million the company experienced in the third quarter of the previous year.

Original Text: Quake rattles northern Italy A strong earthquake measuring about 5.2 on the Richter scale rocked northern Italy from the Tyrrhenian to the Adriatic seas on early on Thursday, causing panic and some damage.
Translation: Un terremoto sacude el norte de Italia. Un fuerte terremoto de alrededor de 5.2 en la escala de Richter sacudió el norte de Italia desde el mar Tirreno hasta el mar Adriático temprano el jueves, causando pánico y algunos daños.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Early on Thursday, a 5.2 magnitude earthquake stirred panic and caused damage in northern Italy, impacting areas from the Tyrrhenian to the Adriatic seas.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On early Thursday, northern Italy was jolted by a strong earthquake of approximately 5.2 Richter scale intensity, causing considerable damage and widespread panic from the Tyrrhenian to the Adriatic shores.

Original Text: Tech Stocks Rise; Oil Prices Boost Sector  NEW YORK (Reuters) - Technology stocks rose on Monday as  semiconductor companies returned to favor, led by Intel  Corp.<A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A> and Broadcom Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BRCM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BRCM.O</A>, helping to lift  major indexes.
Translation: Las Acciones de Tecnología Suben; Los Precios del Petróleo Impulsan el Sector  NUEVA YORK (Reuters) - Las acciones de tecnología subieron el lunes ya que las compañías de semiconductores volvieron a ser favoritas, lideradas por Intel Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A> y Broadcom Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BRCM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BRCM.O</A>, ayudando a elevar los índices principales.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Major indexes experienced a lift on Monday as technology stocks, particularly semiconductor companies like Intel Corp and Broadcom Corp, saw an increase in their value; the sector also gained a boost from rising oil prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. On Monday, the tech-company index saw growth, spurred by the revival of semiconductor majors like Intel Corp and Broadcom Corp. This, coupled with the uptick in oil prices, provided a significant lift to the sector.

Original Text: Nintendo, Sony start pre-holiday push TOKYO - Nintendo Co. Ltd. struck the first blow in what is set to be an all-out war with Sony Corp. for the lucrative handheld game console market, aggressively pricing its new dual-screen model at \$149.
Translation: Nintendo, Sony comienza la campaña pre-navideña TOKIO - Nintendo Co. Ltd. dio el primer golpe en lo que se perfila como una guerra total con Sony Corp. por el lucrativo mercado de consolas de videojuegos portátiles, fijando de manera agresiva el precio de su nuevo modelo de doble pantalla en \$149.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As part of an impending comprehensive competition for the profitable handheld game console market, Nintendo Co. Ltd. launched their new dual-screen model at an aggressive price of $149, taking the initial step against Sony Corp in their pre-holiday push in Tokyo.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Marking the advent of an intense rivalry for the affluent handheld console market, Nintendo Co. Ltd, based in Tokyo, has drawn the first line by introducing their new dual-screen model at the competitive price of $149, ahead of Sony in their joint pre-holiday promotional maneuver.

Original Text: Notebook: Vizquel, Giants agree to terms Shortstop Omar Vizquel, a nine-time Gold Glove winner, has agreed to terms with the San Francisco Giants. Vizquel has a \$12.25 million, three
Translation: Cuaderno: Vizquel y los Gigantes acuerdan términos. El campocorto Omar Vizquel, ganador de nueve Guantes de Oro, ha acordado términos con los Gigantes de San Francisco. Vizquel tiene un acuerdo de \$12.25 millones de dólares, por tres años.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Shortstop Omar Vizquel, a winner of the Gold Glove nine times, has finalized terms with the San Francisco Giants and agreed to a $12.25 million, three years deal in his notebook.

Original Text: Wave machine Hurricane Ivan produces Caribbean swell Surfersvillage Global Surf News, 08 September 2004: - - Hurricane Ivan pounded the islands of the southeastern Caribbean yesterday.
Translation: Máquina de olas, el huracán Ivan produce oleaje en el Caribe. Surfersvillage Global Surf News, 08 de septiembre de 2004: - - El huracán Ivan golpeó las islas del sureste del Caribe ayer.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Surfersvillage Global Surf News, 08 September 2004: Yesterday, the southeastern Caribbean islands were hammered by Hurricane Ivan, also known as the wave machine that causes Caribbean swells.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Surfersvillage Global Surf News, 08 September 2004: The islands of the southeastern Caribbean experienced the powerful impact of Hurricane Ivan, the wave machine causing Caribbean swells, yesterday.

Original Text: Anwar may return by month #39;s end Malaysia #39;s former deputy leader Anwar Ibrahim reportedly plans to return home on October 31 after nearly two months abroad, but will avoid any strenuous political activity throughout the Muslim fasting month that ends next month.
Translation: Anwar podría regresar a finales de este mes. El exlíder adjunto de Malasia, Anwar Ibrahim, supuestamente planea regresar a casa el 31 de octubre después de casi dos meses en el extranjero, pero evitará cualquier actividad política intensa durante el mes de ayuno musulmán que termina el próximo mes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. There are reports that Anwar Ibrahim, former deputy leader of Malaysia, intends to return to his homeland on October 31 following almost two months overseas. However, he won't partake in any intense political activities during the holy month of Muslim fasting, which concludes next month.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anwar Ibrahim, Malaysia's ex-deputy leader, is said to have plans of returning to his home country on the 31st of October after spending almost two months overseas. He, however, will refrain from participating in demanding political engagements during the continous Muslim fasting month, which draws to an end the following month.

Original Text: Future of EU Patent Legislation in Doubt BRUSSELS, Belgium - The future of controversial European Union legislation that would allow for some software patents was in doubt Thursday after the Polish government switched sides, saying the directive could hurt small and medium-sized businesses.
Translation: Futuro de la Legislación de Patentes de la UE en Duda BRUSELAS, Bélgica - El futuro de la controvertida legislación de la Unión Europea que permitiría algunas patentes de software estaba en duda el jueves después de que el gobierno polaco cambiara de bando, diciendo que la directiva podría dañar a las pequeñas y medianas empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. BRUSSELS, Belgium - The Polish government's reversal on a divisive European Union legislation regarding software patents threw its future into uncertainty on Thursday, citing potential damage to small and medium-sized businesses.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The controversial European Union directive that could permit certain software patents was cast into uncertainty on Thursday when the Polish government changed its stance, expressing concerns over the potential impacts on small and medium-sized enterprises. The incident transpired in Brussels, Belgium.

Original Text: Harbhajan has South Africa in spin Off-spinner Harbhajan Singh ran through the South African top order to give India a whiff of victory on the fourth day of the second test in Calcutta on Wednesday.
Translation: Harbhajan tiene a Sudáfrica en un giro. El off-spinner Harbhajan Singh se abrió paso a través del orden superior de Sudáfrica para darle a India un atisbo de victoria en el cuarto día del segundo test en Calcuta el miércoles.
Paraphrase 1: 1. On the fourth day of the second test in Calcutta, off-spinner Harbhajan Singh dominated the South African top order, hinting at a possible victory for India.

Original Text: European Commission crisis averted as Buttiglione dumped Italy #39;s Prime Minister, Silvio Berlusconi, has bowed to the inevitable, abandoning his push to make Rocco Buttiglione a European Commissioner and opening the way for a solution to an unprecedented EU crisis.
Translation: La crisis de la Comisión Europea se evita al descartar a Buttiglione, el Primer Ministro de Italia, Silvio Berlusconi, ha cedido a lo inevitable, abandonando su empuje para hacer a Rocco Buttiglione un Comisionado Europeo y abriendo el camino para una solución a una crisis de la UE sin precedentes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Silvio Berlusconi, Italy's Prime Minister, has conceded in his efforts to appoint Rocco Buttiglione as a European Commissioner, thus preventing an unprecedented crisis in the European Commission.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The pressing crisis in the European Commission was avoided when Italy's Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi backed down from his attempt to install Rocco Buttiglione as a European Commissioner, opening up a path towards resolving an unprecedented EU situation.

Original Text: Munich Set to Approve Linux Despite Patent Worries (Reuters) Reuters - More than a year after the German\city of Munich declared its landmark intention to abandon\Microsoft Windows in favor of upstart rival Linux, its\councillors are finally ready to go ahead with the plan.
Translation: Múnich listo para aprobar Linux a pesar de preocupaciones sobre patentes (Reuters) Reuters - Más de un año después de que la ciudad alemana de Múnich declarara su intención emblemática de abandonar Microsoft Windows a favor del rival emergente Linux, sus concejales están finalmente listos para seguir adelante con el plan.
Paraphrase 1: 1) (Reuters) After over a year since Munich, Germany, famously announced its plans to choose Linux over Microsoft Windows, the city's councillors are at last prepared to proceed with the shift, despite concerns related to patents.
Paraphrase 2: 2) Councillors in the German city of Munich are now poised to move forward with the previously announced plan of replacing Microsoft Windows with Linux, a decision that comes after more than a year of deliberation and despite lingering patent concerns, reports Reuters.

Original Text: Titan close-up only adds to mystery The first close-up pictures of Titan, one of the most enigmatic bodies in the solar system, parted the veil of its smoggy atmosphere Wednesday but managed to deepen questions about the Saturnian moon #39;s icy surface.
Translation: La imagen cercana de Titán solo añade al misterio. Las primeras imágenes cercanas de Titán, uno de los cuerpos más enigmáticos del sistema solar, despejaron el velo de su atmósfera brumosa el miércoles, pero lograron profundizar las preguntas sobre la superficie helada de la luna saturniana número 39.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The first close-up images of Titan, Saturn's mysterious moon and one of the most intriguing bodies in the solar system, have deepened the curiosity about its icy surface, despite peeling back its foggy atmosphere this Wednesday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite removing some of the clouded shroud of its hazy atmosphere with the first detailed images on Wednesday, the perplexing Titan - one of Saturn's moons and one of the solar system's most enigmatic bodies - only increased questions surrounding its icy surface.

Original Text: NetRatings survey shows broadband users now a majority in U.S. There were an estimated 63 million broadband users, or 51 of all home Internet users, last month compared with 61.3 million dial-up users, 49 of the total, according to a survey by NetRatings Inc.
Translation: La encuesta de NetRatings muestra que los usuarios de banda ancha son ahora mayoría en EE.UU. Se estimó que había 63 millones de usuarios de banda ancha, o el 51% de todos los usuarios de Internet en el hogar, el mes pasado en comparación con los 61.3 millones de usuarios de conexión telefónica, el 49% del total, según una encuesta de NetRatings Inc.
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a survey by NetRatings Inc., broadband users constituted a majority in the U.S with approximately 63 million users, which is 51% of all home internet users last month. In contrast, dial-up users only made up 49% of the total, amounting to about 61.3 million users.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A NetRatings Inc. study reveals that broadband users in the U.S have exceeded dial-up users, constituting 51% of all home Internet users last month. The report estimated 63 million broadband users compared to 61.3 million estimated users of dial-up, which is 49% of the total.

Original Text: A Hitch in Offering Online Prices Travel sites want to help you find a cheap trip. But is cost the only factor to consider?
Translation: Un inconveniente en Ofrecer Precios en Línea. Los sitios de viajes quieren ayudarte a encontrar un viaje barato. Pero, ¿es el costo el único factor a considerar?
Paraphrase 1: 1. Travel websites aim to assist you in securing a budget-friendly journey, but might price be the only facet to contemplate? A hitch occurs when offering online prices.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Online travel portals endeavour to aid you in locating an affordable excursion. However, one must wonder if the price is the sole element worth considering. This presents a snag in proposing online fares.

Original Text: Nadal beats Sanguinetti in an hour Madrid, Spain - Spanish youngster Rafael Nadal needed only an hour to push past Italy #39;s Davide Sanguinetti in straight sets on Tuesday and advance to the second round of the Madrid Masters.
Translation: Nadal vence a Sanguinetti en una hora Madrid, España - El joven español Rafael Nadal solo necesitó una hora para superar al italiano Davide Sanguinetti en sets seguidos el martes y avanzar a la segunda ronda del Masters de Madrid.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Madrid, Spain - Rafael Nadal, a young Spanish tennis player, took just an hour to tackle Davide Sanguinetti of Italy. He won in straight sets on Tuesday, propelling him to the second round of the Madrid Masters.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Madrid, Spain - In only an hour on Tuesday, Spanish upstart Rafael Nadal defeated Italy's Davide Sanguinetti in straight sets, propelling him to the next level in the Madrid Masters.

Original Text: The new browser on the block Imagine if everyone watched television using the same set, listened to the radio using the same audio system or surfed the Web using the same browser.
Translation: Imagina si todos vieran televisión con el mismo conjunto, escucharan la radio con el mismo sistema de audio o navegaran en la web con el mismo navegador.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Consider what it would be like if everyone utilized the identical television set for watching TV, the same audio system for listening to radio, or surfed the Internet with the same browser - this introduces the new browser on the block.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Ponder this - everyone using the same television set to watch shows, the same sound system to listen to the radio, or the same browser to surf the Internet. This is where the new browser on the block comes into play.

Original Text: Final Opportunity Brock Berlin and Chris Rix have known each other since 1999. One is from Louisiana, the other is from California. Yet, their story is the same.
Translation: Última Oportunidad Brock Berlin y Chris Rix se conocen desde 1999. Uno es de Louisiana, el otro es de California. Sin embargo, su historia es la misma.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Brock Berlin from Louisiana and Chris Rix from California have been acquainted since 1999. Despite the geographical origins, their stories are strikingly similar, marking this as a final opportunity.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Since 1999, Brock Berlin and Chris Rix, hailing from Louisiana and California respectively, have known each other. Interestingly, their paths share much in common, culminating in this as their last chance.

Original Text: Uranium negotiations are close to the end Pressured by European powers, Iranian negotiators at a key UN atomic agency meeting sought approval from their government Friday for a total freeze of a program that can make nuclear-weapons grade uranium.
Translation: Las negociaciones sobre el uranio están cerca del final. Presionados por las potencias europeas, los negociadores iraníes en una reunión clave de la agencia atómica de la ONU buscaron la aprobación de su gobierno el viernes para un congelamiento total de un programa que puede producir uranio de grado armamentístico nuclear.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Pressured by European authorities, Iranian negotiators are seeking approval from their government for the complete suspension of a nuclear program capable of producing weapons-grade uranium. This request took place at a crucial UN atomic agency meeting, suggesting that uranium negotiations are nearing their conclusion.
Paraphrase 2: 2. At a significant meeting of the UN atomic agency, the Iranian negotiators, under pressure from European powers, approached their government for complete termination of a program that has the potential to produce nuclear-weapons grade uranium, indicating that uranium deliberations are on the verge of conclusion.

Original Text: Web power to the people With the election over and the political signs coming down, Brandeis University freshman Jason Lustig plans to post fliers around campus this week for a new cause: the Firefox open source Web browser.
Translation: Poder web para la gente Con las elecciones finalizadas y los carteles políticos siendo retirados, Jason Lustig, un estudiante de primer año de la Universidad de Brandeis, planea colgar volantes por el campus esta semana para una nueva causa: el navegador web de código abierto Firefox.
Paraphrase 1: 1. With the election concluded and political signages being removed, Jason Lustig, a freshman at Brandeis University, prepares to rally for a fresh cause this week. He intends to distribute fliers across the campus advocating the Firefox open source Web browser; promoting web power for the people.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Jason Lustig, a first-year student at Brandeis University, is planning to switch causes now that the election is over and political signs are being taken down. He aims to use this week to create publicity for a whole new endeavor, the open source Firefox Web browser, by plastering fliers all over campus, championing the idea of empowering people through the Web.

Original Text: Time Warner #39;s profit declines NATIONAL COMPANIES The world #39;s largest media company set aside a \$500 million reserve in anticipation of settling government investigations into its bookkeeping.
Translation: La ganancia de Time Warner #39 disminuye. COMPAÑÍAS NACIONALES. La compañía de medios más grande del mundo ha reservado 500 millones de dólares en anticipación para resolver investigaciones gubernamentales sobre su contabilidad.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Time Warner, which is the largest media company globally, has created a $500 million reserve as they anticipate the settlement of governmental probes into their accounting practices. This action has led to a decline in their profits.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Anticipating the outcome of government-led investigations into its financial records, the world's leading media business, Time Warner, has allocated a $500 million reserve, which has resulted in a decrease in their corporate profits.

Original Text: Indonesian court to try Ba #39;ashir next week The South Jakarta district court will begin next week to try Indonesian Muslim cleric Abu Bakar Ba #39;ashir who was allegedly implicated in deadly terror acts in the country, a court official said on Monday.
Translation: El tribunal de Indonesia juzgará a Ba #39;ashir la próxima semana. El tribunal de distrito de Jakarta Sur comenzará la próxima semana el juicio contra el clérigo musulmán indonesio Abu Bakar Ba #39;ashir, quien supuestamente estuvo implicado en actos terroristas mortales en el país, dijo un funcionario del tribunal el lunes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The South Jakarta district court will commence the trial of Indonesian Muslim cleric Abu Bakar Ba #39;ashir next week, as stated by a court official on Monday. Ba #39;ashir is suspected of involvement in severe terror acts within the country.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A court official announced on Monday that the trial of Abu Bakar Ba #39;ashir, an Indonesian Muslim cleric associated with fatal terror attacks in the country, will start next week in the South Jakarta district court.

Original Text: Nature Outings Reduce ADHD Symptoms 'Green' treatments could provide cheap, healthy therapy for children, study says    HealthDayNews -- The great outdoors provides great benefits to children with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.    So says a University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign study in the September issue of the American Journal of Public Health...
Translation:
Las salidas a la naturaleza reducen los síntomas del TDAH. Los tratamientos 'verdes' podrían proporcionar una terapia barata y saludable para los niños, según un estudio.

HealthDayNews -- El gran aire libre proporciona grandes beneficios a los niños con trastorno por déficit de atención e hiperactividad.

Así lo afirma un estudio de la Universidad de Illinois en Urbana-Champaign en la edición de septiembre de la Revista Americana de Salud Pública...
Paraphrase 1: 1. According to a study from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, outdoor activities can significantly decrease ADHD symptoms in children, providing a cost-effective and healthy therapeutic solution. This study, which appears in the American Journal of Public Health's September issue, highlights the potent benefits derived from nature for children suffering from attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
Paraphrase 2: 2. A study conducted by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, published in September's edition of the American Journal of Public Health, suggests that spending time outdoors can be a therapeutic, economical, and healthy way to lessen ADHD symptoms in children. The substantial benefits offered by nature for kids with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder were prominently emphasized in this research.

Original Text: Cisco, MIT look from lab to market New communications technology could spawn futuristic products. Could your purse tell you to bring an umbrella?<br />\ Photos: Networks of tomorrow\
Translation: Cisco, MIT buscan desde el laboratorio al mercado. La nueva tecnología de comunicaciones podría generar productos futuristas. ¿Podría tu bolso decirte que lleves un paraguas? <br />\ Fotos: Redes del mañana\
Paraphrase 1: 1. Cisco and MIT move from lab to market with a new communications technology that might give rise to futuristic products. Imagine a purse that suggests you take an umbrella?
Paraphrase 2: 2. New technology in communications, set to generate futuristic products, is being explored by Cisco and MIT as they transition from the lab to the market. Have you ever thought your purse could remind you to carry an umbrella?

Original Text: Report says Virtually All Big Companies Will Outsource Security By <b>...</b> A Yankee Group report suggests that the need to stay ahead of hackers will drive a move to outsource security to managed service providers.
Translation: El informe dice que prácticamente todas las grandes empresas subcontratarán la seguridad para <b>...</b> Un informe del grupo Yankee sugiere que la necesidad de mantenerse por delante de los hackers impulsará un movimiento para subcontratar la seguridad a proveedores de servicios gestionados.
Paraphrase 1: 1. A report from the Yankee Group suggests that the urgency to stay a step ahead of cyber attackers will prompt virtually all large corporations to outsource their security needs to managed service professionals.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The push to remain secure from hackers, as suggested by a Yankee Group report, will lead the majority of big businesses to outsource their security responsibilities to specialist service providers.

Original Text: Reports Detail NASA Rover Discoveries of Wet Martian History The most dramatic findings so far from NASA #39;s twin Mars rovers -- telltale evidence for a wet and possibly habitable environment in the arid planet #39;s past -- passed rigorous scientific scrutiny for publication in a major research journal.
Translation: Los informes detallan los descubrimientos de los Rovers de la NASA sobre la húmeda historia marciana. Los hallazgos más dramáticos hasta ahora de los gemelos Rovers de la NASA: evidencia reveladora de un entorno húmedo y posiblemente habitable en el pasado árido del planeta, pasaron un riguroso escrutinio científico para su publicación en una importante revista de investigación.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reports outline details of NASA's Rover discovery of Mars's humid past, highlighting the most significant findings, namely the potential proof of a wet and possibly- inhabitable environment in the parched planet's history. These conclusions have undergone stringent scientific reviews and have been approved for publishing in a prestigious research journal.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The latest reports unveil the astronomical discoveries made by NASA's Mars rovers, revealing evidence of a historically wet and potentially habitable environment on the otherwise arid planet. These significant research findings have passed comprehensive scientific assessment and have received authorization for publication in a major research journal.

Original Text: Spin doctors must deal with truth So the 600-page Olympic and Paralympics candidate file for London 2012 is now with the International Olympic Committee and Sebastian Coe has told us we must Make Britain Proud and Back the Bid
Translation: Los asesores de imagen deben lidiar con la verdad. Por lo tanto, el expediente de 600 páginas para la candidatura Olímpica y Paralímpica de Londres 2012 ya está en manos del Comité Olímpico Internacional y Sebastian Coe nos ha dicho que debemos Hacer a Gran Bretaña Orgullosa y Apoyar la Candidatura.
Paraphrase 1: 1. The 600-page Olympic and Paralympic candidate file for London 2012 is currently under review by the International Olympic Committee. Sebastian Coe is advocating for us to support the Bid, with a goal to Make Britain Proud, upholding the necessity for spin doctors to adhere to facts.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Sebastian Coe, in promoting support for the athletic Bid, has urged the populace to Make Britain Proud concerning the Olympic and Paralympic candidate file for London 2012, currently under the evaluation of the International Olympic Committee. It's pivotal to note that spin doctors are required to stay true to facts in this process.

Original Text: September Job Growth Weaker Than Expected (Reuters) Reuters - U.S. businesses added 96,000 jobs to\payrolls in September, the government reported on Friday, a\weaker-than-expected total that was expected to sharpen a\presidential debate later in the day over the economy's\direction.
Translation: Crecimiento del empleo de septiembre más débil de lo esperado (Reuters) Reuters - Las empresas estadounidenses agregaron 96,000 empleos a sus nóminas en septiembre, informó el gobierno el viernes, una cifra total más débil de lo esperado que se esperaba que agudizara un debate presidencial más tarde en el día sobre la dirección de la economía.
Paraphrase 1: (1) U.S. Businesses Add Fewer Jobs than Anticipated in September, Sparks Presidential Debate: Reuters Reports
Paraphrase 2: Reuters - 96,000 jobs were created in U.S. businesses in September, a figure less than what was forecasted, according to a government report on Friday. This lower-than-predicted total is likely to intensify the presidential debate later in the day regarding the course of the economy.

Original Text: Ice-Age Ivory Flute Found in German Cave (Reuters) Reuters - A 35,000-year-old flute made from a\woolly mammoth's ivory tusk has been unearthed in a German cave\by archaeologists, the University of Tuebingen said on Friday.
Translation: Flauta de Marfil de la Edad de Hielo encontrada en cueva alemana (Reuters) Reuters - Una flauta de 35,000 años de antigüedad hecha del colmillo de marfil de un mamut lanudo ha sido descubierta en una cueva alemana por arqueólogos, dijo la Universidad de Tuebingen el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - An ivory flute dating back to the Ice Age, crafted from a woolly mammoth's tusk, was discovered in a cave in Germany, as revealed by the University of Tuebingen on Friday.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters - The University of Tuebingen announced on Friday the discovery of a 35,000-year-old ivory flute, made from a woolly mammoth's tusk, in a German cave.

Original Text: Mac OS X Tip of the Week: Custom Labels Don #146;t like the names Apple created for the colors used in the Color Labels feature? Then just create your own. Find out how on the Apple Pro/ site  #151; it #146;s the first of a weekly series of Mac OS X killer tips.\\ Sep 09
Translation: Consejo de la Semana para Mac OS X: Etiquetas Personalizadas ¿No te gustan los nombres que Apple creó para los colores utilizados en la función de Etiquetas de Color? Entonces simplemente crea los tuyos propios. Descubre cómo en el sitio de Apple Pro: es el primero de una serie semanal de consejos imprescindibles para Mac OS X.\\ 09 de septiembre
Paraphrase 1: Weekly Mac OS X Tip: Customize your Color Labels - Dislike the color names provided by Apple within the Color Labels feature? Create new ones yourself. Learn how to do this on Apple Pro's website, which is launching a series of brilliant Mac OS X tips every week. September 09, 2021.
Paraphrase 2: Here's a weekly tip for Mac OS X users: Instead of using the pre-named colors in the Color Labels feature that Apple offers, why not come up with your own names? Master this trick by visiting the Apple Pro site. This tip leads our upcoming weekly series on critical Mac OS X tips. Dated September 09.

Original Text: Trade deficit slips lower in July WASHINGTON (CBS.MW) - The US trade deficit narrowed in July as imports fell for the first time in almost a year, the Commerce Department reported Friday.
Translation: El déficit comercial disminuye en julio WASHINGTON (CBS.MW) - El déficit comercial de los EE. UU. se redujo en julio debido a que las importaciones cayeron por primera vez en casi un año, informó el Departamento de Comercio el viernes.
Paraphrase 1: 1. WASHINGTON (CBS.MW) - Reporting on Friday, the Commerce Department confirmed that the US trade deficit had shrunk in July due to a decrease in imports for the first time in nearly a year.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The Commerce Department announced on Friday that the US trade deficit for July declined because imports decreased for the first time in almost a year, according to a WASHINGTON (CBS.MW) report.

Original Text: Gap Profit Off, Sees More Store Closings (Reuters) Reuters - Gap Inc. (GPS.N), the largest U.S.\specialty apparel retailer, on Thursday reported a slight\decline in quarterly profit, meeting lowered forecasts, after\summer clearance sales drew surprisingly small crowds.
Translation: Reuters - Gap Inc. (GPS.N), el mayor minorista de ropa de especialidad de EE. UU., informó el jueves una ligera disminución en las ganancias trimestrales, cumpliendo con las previsiones reducidas, después de que las ventas de liquidación de verano atrajeran multitudes sorprendentemente pequeñas. Prevé más cierres de tiendas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Reuters - After summer clearance sales attracted less people than expected, Gap Inc. (GPS.N), America's largest specialty apparel retailer, experienced a minor decrease in their quarterly profit which was in line with their adjusted predictions, thereby advancing their plan for additional store closures.
Paraphrase 2: 2. As reported by Reuters, Gap Inc. (GPS.N), the premier U.S. specialty clothing store, saw their quarterly profit slightly decrease, as per reduced projections, subsequent to unexpectedly modest turnouts at summer clearance sales, leading to a prediction of an increase in store closures.

Original Text: Venezuela Withdraws Ambassador From Panama (AP) AP - Venezuela withdrew its ambassador from Panama on Friday to protest outgoing President Mireya Moscoso's argument that she pardoned four Cuban emigres for fear they might be sent to Venezuela and executed.
Translation: Venezuela Retira a su Embajador de Panamá (AP) AP - Venezuela retiró a su embajador de Panamá el viernes para protestar contra el argumento de la presidenta saliente Mireya Moscoso de que indultó a cuatro emigrados cubanos por temor a que pudieran ser enviados a Venezuela y ejecutados.
Paraphrase 1: 1) AP - On Friday, Venezuela called back its ambassador from Panama as a reaction to the outgoing President Mireya Moscoso's claim that her pardon to four Cuban emigres was due to fear that they might be extradited to Venezuela and executed.
Paraphrase 2: 2) AP - The Venezuelan ambassador to Panama was withdrawn on Friday by Venezuela in response to a protest against President Mireya Moscoso, who pardoned four Cuban emigres citing fears of their possible execution if sent to Venezuela.

Original Text: Telenor urges fair regulatory system in Thailand (FT.com) FT.com - Telenor, the Norwegian telecommunications company, on Thursday called for "a level-playing field" in Thailand's mobile industry, urging a newly-established Thai telecoms regulator swiftly to create a fair new interconnection regime.
Translation: Telenor insta a un sistema regulatorio justo en Tailandia (FT.com) FT.com - Telenor, la empresa noruega de telecomunicaciones, hizo un llamamiento el jueves por "un campo de juego nivelado" en la industria móvil de Tailandia, instando a un regulador de telecomunicaciones tailandés recién establecido a crear rápidamente un nuevo régimen de interconexión justo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Telenor, a Norwegian telecom firm, pleaded for a just regulatory system in Thailand's mobile industry, encouraging a newly formed Thai telecommunications regulatory body to rapidly establish a balanced interconnection system (FT.com)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Encouraging a recently set up Thai telecommunications regulator to quickly implement a new fair interconnection system, Telenor, a leading telecommunications company from Norway, has requested for equal opportunities in Thailand's mobile industry. (FT.com)

Original Text: XP SP2 Downloads Surpass 100M Mark Two months after the heavily hyped release of Microsoft #39;s Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), the company has exceeded its delivery projections for individual users and small businesses.
Translation: Las descargas de XP SP2 superan la marca de 100M Dos meses después del lanzamiento muy publicitado de Microsoft # 39; s Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), la empresa ha superado sus proyecciones de entrega para usuarios individuales y pequeñas empresas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Two months post the much-publicised launch of Microsoft's Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), the company's distribution expectations for individual users and small enterprises have been surpassed, with downloads exceeding the 100 million mark.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Microsoft has surpassed its delivery forecast for individual users and small businesses for Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), reaching over 100 million downloads within two months of its highly promoted release.

Original Text: Stocks post small gains as investors await earnings NEW YORK Stocks drifted higher yesterday, brushing aside another record high for oil prices amid hopes the impending tide of third-quarter profit reports will override worries about a struggling economic recovery.
Translation: Las acciones registran pequeñas ganancias mientras los inversores esperan los informes de ganancias. NUEVA YORK: Las acciones subieron ligeramente ayer, dejando de lado otro récord histórico para los precios del petróleo, en medio de la esperanza de que la inminente oleada de informes de ganancias del tercer trimestre supere las preocupaciones sobre una recuperación económica que lucha por salir adelante.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Yesterday, stocks slightly increased as investors kept an eye on earnings. Despite the new record high for oil prices, hopes are high that the forthcoming influx of third-quarter profit reports will outshine concerns over a faltering economic recovery.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Stocks experienced minor growth yesterday as investors anticipated earnings, regardless of another record-breaking high for oil prices. There's optimism that the upcoming wave of third-quarter profit declarations will alleviate fears about an uncertain economic recovery.

Original Text: Canadian Natural Resources snaps up Anadarko gas assets for \$698M CALGARY (CP) - Canadian Natural Resources, one of Canada #39;s largest natural gas and heavy oil producers, entered the acquisition market for a fourth time this year, buying energy properties from Houston-based Anadarko for \$698 million.
Translation: Recursos Naturales Canadienses adquiere los activos de gas de Anadarko por \$698M CALGARY (CP) - Recursos Naturales Canadienses, uno de los mayores productores de gas natural y petróleo pesado de Canadá, ingresó al mercado de adquisiciones por cuarta vez este año, comprando propiedades energéticas de Anadarko, con sede en Houston, por \$698 millones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. In its fourth acquisition of the year, Canadian Natural Resources, one of Canada's major natural gas and heavy oil producers, has purchased energy properties worth $698 million from Anadarko, a Houston-based company.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Making its fourth purchase of the year, Canadian Natural Resources, a leading producer of natural gas and heavy oil in Canada, has spent $698 million to acquire energy assets from an entity based in Houston, the Anadarko.

Original Text: Ford Posts Profit, Autos Disappoint Again  DETROIT (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=F.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">F.N</A> reported a  stronger-than-expected quarterly profit on Tuesday, but losses  widened in its core automotive business and the company's  shares sagged after it said U.S. regulators were looking into  its pension accounting practices.
Translation: Ford Publica Ganancias, Autos Decepcionan de Nuevo DETROIT (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=F.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">F.N</A> informó el martes una ganancia trimestral más fuerte de lo esperado, pero las pérdidas se ampliaron en su negocio automotriz principal y las acciones de la empresa cayeron luego de que dijera que los reguladores estadounidenses estaban examinando sus prácticas contables de pensiones.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Ford Motor Co. announced an unexpected increase in quarterly profits on Tuesday. However, the company's shares dropped after the report of expanded losses in its main automotive sector and the announcement that its pension accounting practices are under inspection by U.S. regulators.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Despite registering an unforeseen rise in quarterly profit, Ford Motor Co. didn't have a great Tuesday. Failing automotive business resulted in wider losses, and shares stumbled following the news that U.S. regulatory bodies were investigating the company's pension accounting methods.

Original Text: U.S. Signs Colorado River Protection Pact (AP) AP - Interior Secretary Gale Norton has signed an agreement with representatives of Arizona, Nevada and California to protect wildlife habitat on the Colorado River and aid native species.
Translation: EE.UU. Firma Pacto para la Protección del Río Colorado (AP) AP - La secretaria del Interior, Gale Norton, ha firmado un acuerdo con representantes de Arizona, Nevada y California para proteger el hábitat de la vida silvestre en el Río Colorado y ayudar a las especies nativas.
Paraphrase 1: 1. AP - Gale Norton, the Interior Secretary, inked a deal with representatives from Arizona, Nevada, and California to safeguard the wildlife habitat and support native species on the Colorado River. (AP)
Paraphrase 2: 2. Colorado River wildlife habitat gets protection agreement signed by Gale Norton, the Interior Secretary, collaborating with Arizona, Nevada and California representatives to aid native species. (AP)

Original Text: Summary Box: Venezuela #39;s president vows to track down killers of <b>...</b> THE CRIME: A car bomb killed a prosecutor preparing a case against nearly 400 people who backed a 2002 coup attempt to oust President Hugo Chavez.
Translation: Resumen del Texto: El presidente de Venezuela promete capturar a los asesinos de ... EL CRIMEN: Una bomba de coche mató a un fiscal que estaba preparando un caso contra casi 400 personas que apoyaron un intento de golpe en 2002 para derrocar al presidente Hugo Chávez.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Recap: President of Venezuela declares intent to apprehend the murderers of a prosecutor involved in a case against almost 400 individuals associated with a 2002 coup attempt aimed to depose President Hugo Chavez. The prosecutor's assassination was executed through a car bomb.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Synopsis: The Venezuelan president has sworn to find the culprits behind the car bomb killing of a prosecutor who was building a case against about 400 supporters of an attempted coup in 2002 to remove President Hugo Chavez from office.

Original Text: Durable Goods Up on Communications Demand (AP) AP - Orders to U.S. factories for big-ticket durable goods, propelled by a jump in demand for communications equipment, edged up 0.2 percent in September.
Translation: Bienes Duraderos en Aumento por la Demanda de Comunicaciones (AP) AP - Los pedidos a las fábricas de EE.UU. para bienes duraderos de gran valor, impulsados por un aumento en la demanda de equipos de comunicación, subieron un 0.2 por ciento en septiembre.
Paraphrase 1: 1. As per AP, boosted by increased demand for communications gear, requests for substantial durable goods made to United States factories saw a slight rise of 0.2 percent in September.
Paraphrase 2: 2. The need for communications equipment contributed to a minor increment of 0.2 percent in the orders for high-value durable goods at U.S. factories in September, reports AP.

Original Text: Baseball-Schilling Gives Red Sox 2-0 World Series Lead  BOSTON (Reuters) - Curt Schilling, his wonky ankle held  together by stitches, tossed six courageous innings to help the  Boston Red Sox pound the St. Louis Cardinals 6-2 to seize  control of the 100th World Series Sunday.
Translation: Béisbol- Schilling da a los Red Sox una ventaja de 2-0 en la Serie Mundial.  BOSTON (Reuters) - Curt Schilling, con su tobillo inestable sostenido por puntadas, lanzó seis valientes entradas para ayudar a los Boston Red Sox a derrotar a los St. Louis Cardinals 6-2 para tomar el control de la 100ª Serie Mundial el domingo.
Paraphrase 1: 1. Report from Boston (Reuters) - Despite his shaky ankle being held together by stitches, Curt Schilling courageously threw for six innings which notably assisted the Boston Red Sox in thrashing the St. Louis Cardinals 6-2. This victory enabled them to secure the lead in the 100th World Series on Sunday, with a favorable 2-0.
Paraphrase 2: 2. Reuters, Boston - Curt Schilling, battling through with an unstable ankle reinforced by stitches, delivered a daring six-inning performance. This significantly boosted the Boston Red Sox in their powerful 6-2 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals, ensuring their 2-0 lead in the 100th World Series held on Sunday.
